Ice formations in the titlis himani gupha
A himani gupha is a cave formed bheetar the barf of a himani.
himani caves hai often pukaara ice gufaaen, lakin is term is properly prayukt to describe bedrock gufaaen ki contain year-round barf.
In physics, golakaar gati is a gati of an object along the paridhi of a vrutt or roteshan saath a golakaar path.
it can be vardi, saath constant koniya rate of roteshan ( or nirantar gati ), or non-uniform saath a badalanaa rate of roteshan.
The roteshan around a phixd axis of a three-dimensional deh involves golakaar motion of iske bhaag.
the equations of gati describe the gati of the bich of dravyaman of a deh.
Examples of golakaar motion shaamil : an artificial satellite orbiting the dharti at constant height, a stone jisase is tied to a rassi or is hone swung in vrutt, a car turning through a vakr in a res track, an electron chalati perpendicular to a vardi chumbakeey field, or a gear turning andar a yantriki.
chunki the object 's velocity vector is constantly badalanaa disha, the chalati object is undergoing acceleration by a abhikendriya force in the disha of the bich of roteshan.
bagaiyr is acceleration, the object hota move in a sidhaa line, according to newton 's kanoon of gati.

Variable saarvbhaumik jivan bime ( praayah shortened to vul ) is a type of life bime ki builds a nakadi maan.
in a vul, the nakadi maan can be invested in a wide variety of separate khate, samaan to paraspar funds, or the choice of jisase of the uplabdhiyaan separate khate to use is entirely up to the anubandh owner.
the 'variable ' ghatak in the naam refers to is kshamta to invest in pruthak khate jinaki values vary—they vary kuki ve hai invested in bhandar and/or bandha bazaar.
The 'universal ' ghatak in the naam refers to the flexibility the maalik rai in bananaa premium payments.
the premium can vary isse nothing in a die month up to maximums paribhaashit by the aatanrik Revenue Code liye life bime.
is lacheelaapan is in contrast to puure life bime ki rai phixd premium payments ki typically can not be chhuti without lapsing the niti ( although ek may kasarat an swachaalit Premium rin visheshta, or surrender dividends to pay a puure jivan premium ).
parivartaneey saarvbhaumik life is a prakaar of permanent jivan bime, kuki the maut laabh hoga be paid if the insured marataa koi samay as long as vahin is sufficient cash maan to adaa the laagat of bime in the niti.
saath sabase if nahin sab vuls, unlike whole jivan, vahin is no endowment aayu ( the aayu at jisase the cash maan barabari the maut laabh raashi, which liye puure jivan is typically 100 ).
is is yet another kunjee laabh of VUL over puure Life.
saath a theth puure jivan niti, the maut laabh is simit to the face raashi nirdisht in the policy, or at endowment aayu, the phase raashi is sab that is sashulk out.
Thus saath either maut or endowment, the bime company keeps koi nakadi maan nirmit up over the saalo.
however, kuch participating puure jivan nitiyon prastaav rides jisase specify that koi dividends sashulk on the niti be prayukt to khariden `` paid up parivardhan '' to the policy jisase increase dono the nakadi maan or the death benefit over samay.
If nivesh bana in the pruthak khate out-perform the general account of the bime company, a higher rate-of-return can occur than the phixd rates-of-return typical liye puure jivan.
the sangyojan over the years of no endowment aayu, continually increasing maut laabh, or if a high rate-of-return is arjeet in the pruthak khate of a vul niti, this could parinaam in ucchtar value to the maalik or beneficiary than ki of a puure jivan niti saath the same amounts of dhan sashulk in as premiums.

purdue University, located in West lafayette, Indiana, is the flagship university of the six-campus purdue vishvavidhyalayon pranali.
purdue thi founded on may 6, 1869, as a land-grant vishvavidhyalayon when the indiana saamaanya sabha, lene laabh of the morrill adhinium, accepted a donation of land or money isse lafayette bijnesaman John purdue to sthapit a college of science, technology, and krishi in his name.
the pehla varg yahood held on sitambar 16, 1874, saath six instructors or 39 vidhyaarthee.
aaj, purdue is a sadsy of the big Ten Conference, or is a khub gyaat world-class shodh sanstha.
purdue enrolls the second largest chaatr deh of koi vishvavidhyalayon in indiana as well as the chauthi largest antarrashtriya chaatr janasankhyikee of koi vishvavidhyalayon in the United rajya.
purdue offers dono undergraduate or graduate programs in over 211 pramukh areas of padhai, and is khub gyaat liye iske pratispardhi abhiyantriki curricula.
The university rai bhi maharoom atyadhik influential in america 's itihaas of vimaanan, having sthapit the pehla college credit offered in udaan prashikshan, the first four-year snaatak 's oopaadhi in aviation, or the pehla university airport ( purdue vishvavidhyalayon Airport ).
Purdue 's vimaanan technology kaarykram remains one of the sabase pratispardhi aviation-specific kaarykram in the world.
In the mid-20th sadi, purdue 's aviation kaarykram expanded to encompass unnat spaceflight praudyogiki giving rise to purdue 's upnaam, paalna of astronauts.
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gaye on to become astronauts, sahit gas grissom ( ek of the asli paara saat astronauts ), neil armastrang ( the first person to chalanaa on the chandramaa ), or ujin Cernan ( the sabase haal person to walk on the moon ).
a vasamay gaanth ( ) is a pad ki loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( bhi gyaat as epidermal cysts ; l72.0 ) or pillar cysts ( also gyaat as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ).
Because an epidermoid gaanth originates in the epidermis or a pillar gaanth originates isse bal follicles, by paribhaasha, neither prakaar of gaanth is strictly a vasamay cyst.
the naam is regarded as a misnomer as the fatty, shwet, semi-solid saamagree in dono of these gaanth entities is nahin sebum, lakin keratin.
Furthermore, antargat the sookshmdarshi neither entity contains vasamay glands.
in abhyaas, however, the sharten hai praayah prayukt interchangeably.
`` sachcha '' vasamay cysts hai apekshaakrit viral or hai known as steatocystomas or, if multiple, as steatocystoma multiplex.
aadhunik pointe juute.

a pointe shoe is a type of juuta worn by ballet nartak jab performing pointe kaary.
Pointe shoes developed isse the desire liye nartak to appear weightless and sylph -like or have viksit to enable nartak to dance en pointe ( on the nuskhe of unke toes ) liye extended periods of samay.
They hai normally worn by maadaa nartak, haalanki purush nartak may pahanen them for aparamparaagat roles aise as the bhadda stepsisters in sindrella, neeche in a midsummer Night 's sapana, or main performing as mahilaon in nrity companiyaan aise as les naatikaaon trockadero or grandiva.
They hai manufactured in a kismein of colors, sabase commonly in shades of lite gulabi.
This tablespoon has a kshamta of about 15 ml.
Measuring spoons
in the us or parts of Canada, a tablespoon is the largest prakaar of chamachaa prayukt liye khaane isse a katori.
in the uk, europea or most Commonwealth countries, a tablespoon is a prakaar of large spoon praayah prayukt for sevarat.
In countries jahaan a tablespoon is a sevarat chamachaa, the nikatatam samatuly to the us tablespoon is either the dessert spoon or the soup spoon.
a tablespoonful, nominally the capacity of ek tablespoon, is commonly prayukt as a maap of awaz in cooking.
it is abbreviated as t, tb, tbs, tbsp, tblsp, or tblspn.
the capacity of ordinary tablespoons is nahin regulated by law and is vishay to considerable vibhinnata.
in the uese ek tablespoon ( maapan ikai ) is lagbhag 15 mL ; the kshamta of an vaastavik tablespoon ( dining utensil ) seemayen isse 7 ml to 14 ml.
in Australia ek tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is 20 ml.
Harry Potter is a shrenee of saat fantasy novels likhaa by the angrejon author J. K. Rowling.
the kitabe vrittant the adventures of a jaadugar, harry kumhaar, or uske mitron ronaald visli or harmaini granger, all of jisko hai students at hoguarts School of chudail or wizardry.

A prakshepastra ingine, or simply `` prakshepastra '', is a jet engine ki upyog tabhi bhandaarit propellant dravyaman for forming iske unchi gati propulsive jet.
prakshepastra engines hai pratikriya engines or obtain thrust in accordance saath Newton 's teesraa law.
chunki ve need no bahya saamagree to rup unke jet, prakshepastra ingine can be used liye spacecraft nodan as well as sthaliy uses, aise as misile.
sabase prakshepastra ingine hai aatanrik dahan engines, haalanki non-combusting form bhi maujuud.
prakshepastra ingine as a samooh have the ucchtam exhaust gatiyaan, hai by dur the lightest, lakin are the tanik propellant efficient of all types of jet ingine.

haija is an sankraman in the choti intestine caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae.
the pramukh lakshan hai watery diarrhea or vomiting.
hastantaran occurs primarily by drinking jal or eating khaanaa that rai maharoom contaminated by the mel ( barbaad utpaada ) of an infected vyakti, including ek with no apparent lakshan.
the gambhirtha of the atisar or vomiting can sise to rapid nirjaleekaran and electrolyte asantulan, or maut in some maamle.
the praathmik upachaar is oral punarjaleekaran chikitsa, typically with maukhik rehydration samaadhaan, to badalen jal or electrolites.
if this is not tolerated or karata nahin provide improvement tej paryaapt, intravenous fluids can also be prayukt.
jeevanurodhi drugs hai beneficial in those saath kathor beemaari to shorten iske avadhi or gambhirtha.
Worldwide, it affects 3–5 lakh people and kalyankari 100,000–130,000 mauton a saal.
haija was ek of the earliest infections to be studied by epidemiological vidhi.
the chitra of dorian Gray is the tabhi prakashit anokhaa by auskar wild, appearing as the sise story in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine on 20 june 1890, printed as the July 1890 issue of is magazine.
the patrika 's sampadak feared the story thi abhadra as supurd, so ve censored roughly 500 words, bagaiyr wild 's gyaan, pehle prakaashan.
lakin bhi saath that, the story thi still greeted saath aakrosh by angrejon reviewers, kuch of whom suggested that wild chahie be prosecuted on moral grounds, leading wild to bachaav the novel aggressively in letters to the British press.
Wilde baad revised the story for kitaab prakaashan, bananaa substantial alterations, hataanaa controversial passages, adding new adhyay or including an aphoristic Preface which has since become famous in its own sahi.
The amended version was prakashit by ward, taala or company in april 1891.
kuch vidwaanon believe ki Wilde hota aaj have chaahi us to read the sanskaran he originally submitted to Lippincott 's.
The novel tells of a yang man namit dorian dhoosar, the vishay of a painting by kalakaar Basil hallward.
Basil is impressed by dorian 's beauty and becomes infatuated saath use, believing his beauty is jimmedaar liye a nai vidhi in uske art.
Dorian meets rab henry wotton, a dost of besil 's, and becomes enthralled by Lord Henry 's sansar drishy.
Espousing a nai hedonism, Lord henry suggests the tabhi bate worth pursuing in jivan hai saundarya or fulfilment of the hosh.
realizing ki ek day uske saundarya will feekaa, dorian ( whimsically ) expresses a desire to sell uske aatma to ensure the portret besil rai chitrit would aayu balki than he.
dorian 's kaash is fulfilled, or when he subsequently pursues a life of vilasita, the portret serves as a samaran of the prabhaav each adhinium rai upon his aatma, saath prayek sin pradarshit as a disfigurement of uske form, or through a sign of vriddhavastha.
The chitra of Dorian dhoosar is mana a kaary of clasik gothic fiction with a damdaar faustian theme.
sári gábor ( born 6 farvari 1917 ), gyaat as Zsa za gabar ( ), is a hungarian -born American abhinetri jo acted in supporting bhoomikaaye in movies, on broadway, and occasionally on television.
gabar was bhi a socialite.
She began uske stage kariyar in vienna at aayu 15, and thi pahanaaya miss Hungary in 1936.

bruce Lee ( paramparaagat : 李小龍 ; born lee jun-fan ; 27 navambar 1940 – 20 july 1973 ) thi a chinis American martial artist, actor, martial arts instructor, philosopher, or filmkaar.
The founder of jeet Kune do, lee was the bete of cantonese opera star lee Hoi-Chuen.
he is widely mana by commentators, critics, media or other martial kalakaaron to be ek of the most influential martial kalakaaron of sab samay, and a pop culture pratik of the 20th sadi.
he is praayah credited saath helping to badalen the way Asians yahood prastut in amareeki films.
Lee was born in chinatown, san Francisco on 27 navambar 1940 to abhibhavak isse Hong Kong or thi uthaaya in kolun with his parivaar until his let teens.
he thi introduced to the film udyog by uske father and appeared in several films as a child karta.
lee moved to the sanyukt States at the aayu of 18 to praapt uske ucchtar shiksha, or it thi dauraan is samay ki he began teaching martial arts.
His hong kong or Hollywood -upajand films elevated the paramparaagat hong Kong martial kala filmi to a nai level of popularity or acclaim, sparking a surge of interest in Chinese martial arts in the West in the 1970s.
The disha or tone of his films badla and bahekaave martial kala or martial kala films in hong kong and the rest of the sansar.
he is vikhyath liye uske bhoomikaaye in paanch feature-length films : lo vei 's the big boss ( 1971 ) and mutthi of furi ( 1972 ) ; rasta of the dragon ( 1972 ), directed and likhaa by lee ; warner Brothers ' daalen the Dragon ( 1973 ) or the Game of maut ( 1978 ), both nirdeshit by robert clouse.
lee became an iconic figure known throughout the sansar, visheshkar among the chinis, as he portrayed chinis rashtrawaad in uske films.
he initially prashikshit in wing chun, lakin baad asweekrut well-defined martial art sheliyaan, favouring bajaay the upyog of takneekon isse vibhinn strot, in the spirit of his personal martial kala darshanashastra, which he utaavle jeet kune do ( The rasta of the intercepting mutthi ).
lee held dual citizenship of Hong kong or the sanyukt rajya.
He died in kolun tong on 20 july 1973 at aayu 32.
dirghakaalik obstructive pulmonary beemaari ( copd ), bhi gyaat as dirghakaalik obstructive fefdon beemaari ( thanda ), dirghakaalik obstructive airway disease ( COAD ), chronic airflow limitation ( calories ) or dirghakaalik obstructive respiratory beemaari ( cord ), is the occurrence of chronic bronchitis or emphysema, a jodi of commonly co-existing diseases of the fefde in which the airways narrow over samay.
is had airflow to or isse the fefde, causing shortness of saans ( dyspnea ).
in naidanik abhyaas, copd is defined by iske characteristically kam airflow on fefdon falan pareekshan.
in contrast to dama, this limitation is poorly reversible or praayah gets progressively worse over samay.
copd is caused by noxious anu or gas, most commonly isse tobacco dhumrapaan, jisase triggers an abnormal jalan jawaab in the fefdon.
The nidaan of copd requires fefdon falan tests.
mahatvapurn prabandhan ranneeti hai dhumrapaan cessation, vaccinations, punarvaas, or drug therapy ( praayah using inhalers ).
kuch marijon go on to aavashyaktaa long-term oxigen chikitsa or fefdon transplantation.
vishwavyaapee, COPD ranked as the chathe agrani kaaran of death in 1990.
it is prakshipt to become the chauthi agrani cause of maut vishwavyaapee by 2030, due to an increase in smoking daron and janasankhyikee parivartan in anek deshon.
copd is the teesraa leading kaaran of maut in the u.S., or the economic boj of copd in the u.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 arab in swasthya parvaah costs or khoyaa productivity.
annelies `` eni '' maari frank (, ?, ; 12 June 1929early kooch 1945 ) is one of the sabase discussed yahudee peediton of the holocaust.
Her diary rai maharoom the basis liye anek plays or films.
born in the nagar of francfort am Main in wimer Germany, wo jiya sabase of uske jivan in or nikat Amsterdam, in the netherlands.
born a germany national, frank lost uske naagarikta in 1941.
wo gained international fame maranoparant after uske diary thi published.
it dastauez her experiences chupaana dauraan the German occupation of the netherlands in sansar yuddh ii.
the Frank parivaar moved isse germany to Amsterdam in 1933, the saal the nazis gained control over germany.
By the shuruuaat of 1940, they yahood funs in amsterdam by the naaji occupation of the netherlands.
As persecutions of the yahudee janasankhyikee increased in july 1942, the parivaar gai into chupaana in the chupa kaksh of eni 's father, Otto frank 's, office building.
baad do saalo, the samooh thi gaddari or transported to visheshgyata camps.
eni frank and uske sistar, margot, were aakhirkaar transferred to the bergen-belsen concentration camp, jahaan ve died of typhus in kooch 1945.
oto frank, the tabhi uttarajive of the parivaar, returned to amsterdam after the yuddh to find ki eni 's diary had been saved, and uske praytn led to iske prakaashan in 1947.
it thi translated isse iske asli dach or first prakashit in angrezi in 1952 as the diary of a yang ladki.
it has chunki maharoom translated into anek languages.

Kurt 's hastakshar
court donald cobain ( farvari 20, 1967 – april 5, 1994 ) thi an amareeki sangeetkaar and artist, behtareen gyaat as the sise singer, guitarist or primary songwriter of the grunge band nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, washington in 1985 or established it as bhaag of the sietal music jhaanki, having iske debyue album bleech released on the swatantra record label sub Pop in 1989.
baad hastakshar saath pramukh label dgc Records, the band mila bhedan success saath `` khushbu jaise tin spirit `` from its duusari album nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the kamyaabi of nevermind, Nirvana was labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation x, and Cobain hailed as `` the pravaktaa of a peedhee ''.
Cobain, however, thi praayah asahaj or kunthit, believing uske message or kalakaari vision to have maharoom misinterpreted by the public, saath uske nijee mudde often vishay to media dhyaan.
he challenged nirvana 's darshak saath iske final studio album in utero ( 1993 ).
dauraan the last years of uske life, cobain struggled saath heroin vyasan, beemaari or avsaad.
he bhi tha pareshaani coping saath uske kirti and public image, or the professional and lifelong nijee pressures surrounding khud or uske wife, sangeetkaar Courtney prem.
on April 8, 1994, cobain thi found dead at uske home in sietal, the shikaar of kayaa thi officially shasit a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the sir.
the halaaton of his maut at aayu 27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate.
chunki unke debyue, nirvana, saath cobain as a songwriter, rai bechi over 25 million album in the u.S., or over 50 million vishwavyaapee.

radial engine of a biplen
nipun lathi ( kataraa ), slave and balances isse a two-row, fourteen-cylinder pratt & whitney judwa Wasp
The radial ingine is a pratyaagmani type aatanrik dahan ingine vinyas in which the silendar point outward isse a central crankshaft jaise the spokes of a wheel.
It resembles a stylized star when viewed isse the front, or is called a `` star engine '' ( German sternmotor ) in kuch languages.
the radial configuration was very commonly used in aircraft ingine pehle terbine engines became predominant.

abhinit Bea Arthur, betty shwet, rue McClanahan and Estelle getty, the show centers on chaar puraani mahilaon sharing a ghar in Miami, florida.
it was utpaadit by witt/thomas/harris productions, in sangh saath Touchstone television, or paul junger witt, tony thomas, and Harris served as the asli executive nirmaataa.
The sunahari ladakiyon praapt critical acclaim throughout sabase of its chalaaen or won anek puraskaar, including the primetime emi puraskaar liye bakaayaa kamedi shrenee twice.

All four stars prayek received an Emmy puraskaar throughout the shrenee ' run and tha anek nominations.

deepwater khudaai is the prakram of oil or gas exploration or utpaadan in depths of adhik than 500 feet.
By is paribhaasha, vahin hai approximately 600 deepwater kuen in the gulf of mexico.
it rai maharoom economically infeasible liye anek years, lakin saath uthati aayal prices, more companiyaan hai nivesh in is kshetrafal.
pramukh companies working in is sector include Diamond offshore, transocean, and baker Hughes.
vahin hai basically two kinds of mobile deepwater khudaai rigs : semi-submersible khudaai rigs or drillships.
Drilling can bhi be performed from a fixed-position installation aise as a floating spar ( platform ) or tension-leg platform.
haal udyog vishleshan rai estimated ki the total expenditure in the vaishvik deepwater avasanrachana market hoga pahunchein $ 145bn in 2011.
“not sab oil is accessible on jameen or in shallow water.
tum can find kuch aayal jamaa dafn gahan antargat the samandar floor.”... using sonic upkaran, aayal companiyaan determine the khudaai site most sambhavit to produce oil.
tab they upyog a mobile offshore khudaai ikai ( MODU ) to khudaai the aarambhik khub.
kuch ikai hai parivartit into production rigs, meaning ve switch isse khudaai liye aayal to capturing aayal ekbar it 's mila.
sabase of the time, the aayal company hoga badalen the MODU with a more sthai aayal production rig to capture oil.”... the modu 's job is to drill down into the samandar 's floor to dhundhen oil jamaa.
The part of the drill that extends neeche the deck or through the jal is pukaara the riser.
the riser allows for drilling fluids to move between the manzil or the rig.
ejiniers nimnatar a drill string -- a shrenee of pipe designed to drill down to the oil jamaa -- through the riser.”
“The expansion of deepwater drilling is happening despite durghatnaon in offshore field... ”
in 2010 a large visphot occurred hatya 11 majdoor or spilling millions of gallons of oil into the gulf of mexico jabaki a bp oil rig thi drilling in deep waters.
“... Despite the risks, the deepwater khudaai trend is spreading in the bumadhyasagariya or band the coast of east africa baad a string of vishaal discoveries of natural gas.”
“the kaaran liye the resumption of aise drilling, analyst kah, is continuing high demand for energy worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is lagbhag necessary to phase the unchi risks ki aaiye with deepwater khudaai in anukram liye america to continue to carry on their everyday jeevandaan.
“The urja Department recently prakshipt that gulf aayal utpaadan hota vistaar from iske 2011 str of 1.3 lakh barrels a din, still nearly a quarter of kul gharelu utpaadan, to 2 million barrels a din by 2020.”
deepwater khudaai affects the paryaavaran in dono rinatmak or dhanatmak tareeke.
haalanki Deepwater drilling rarely causes aayal spills it is still a hazardous sambhavit nishkarsh.
Oil spills parinaam in oil sinking to the bottom of the samandar smothering sanyantr jivan leaving machhlee bagaiyr khaanaa or aashray to survive.
on the anya hand deepwater khudaai prabhaav the paryaavaran in a dhanatmak tareeke too.
in time once the deepwater aayal well is not in upyog anymore paudhe hoga grow on and around the khub making a gupha or cavern jaise shelter adarsh liye animals to thrive in.
deepwater khudaai bhi lets us see the gaharaaiyon of the samandar floor ki hai hardly kabhi dekhi.
”cameras on rovers at the neeche of the wells ricard footage or lo photo of viral machhlee ki hai in vahin natural awaas, giving vaigyanik a dekh at pashu they rarely seen” ( Chevron nigam ). ''

francis albert `` frank '' Sinatra,, ( disambar 12, 1915 – may 14, 1998 ) thi an amareeki singer or film karta.
shuruuaat uske musical kariyar in the jhule era saath harry James or tommy Dorsey, Sinatra mila unprecedented success as a solo kalakaar isse the jaldi to mid-1940s baad hone signed to colombia record in 1943.
hone the idol of the `` bobby soxers ``, he released uske pehla album, the awaz of frank sinatra in 1946.
His peshewar kariyar tha stalled by the 1950s, lakin it was punarjanm in 1953 after he jiti the academy puraskaar liye behtareen supporting karta liye his performance in isse yahan to shaashvat.
he signed saath capital Records in 1953 or released several critically lauded album ( aise as In the moot choti Hours, geeton liye Swingin ' Lovers !, Come makkhi with Me, tabhi the Lonely and nice 'n ' Easy ).
sinatra left capital to found uske own ricard label, reprise Records in 1961 ( dhundhna kamyaabi with albums aise as ring-a-ding-ding !, Sinatra at the Sands and francis albert sinatra & Antonio Carlos jobim ), toured internationally, was a founding sadsy of the chuha pack and fraternized saath hastiyaan or statesmen, sahit jon F. kennedy.
sinatra turned 50 in 1965, ankit the retrospective sitambar of my saalo, starred in the Emmy -winning television khaas frank sinatra : A man or His music, or scored hits with `` ajanabi in the raatri `` or `` My rasta ``.
saath bikri of his music dwindling or baad appearing in several poorly praapt films, sinatra ritred liye the pehla samay in 1971.
Two years later, however, he came out of retirement or in 1973 ankit anek album, scoring a sheersh 40 hit saath `` ( theme isse ) nai York, nai york `` in 1980.
using his las vegas shows as a ghar aadhaar, he toured both bheetar the United States or internationally, jabatak a choti time pehle uske maut in 1998.
Sinatra bhi forged a atyadhik kaamyaab kariyar as a film actor.
After jeetna behtareen supporting karta in 1953, he bhi garnered a nomination liye behtareen karta liye The man saath the sunahari bhujaa, or najuk acclaim liye uske pradarshan in the manchurion pratyaashee.
he bhi strecchar in aise musicals as unchi samaaj, pal joy, yaaron or Dolls or on the kasbaa.
sinatra thi sammanit at the Kennedy Center Honors in 1983 and thi awarded the adhyakshiya Medal of swatantraaa by ronaald Reagan in 1985 and the congressional sunaharaa padak in 1997.
he thi the praptakarta of gyaarah grami puraskaar, sahit the grami trustees puraskaar, grami legend Award or the grami aaajeevan uplabdhi Award.
sinatra is also one of world’s best-selling kalakaaron of sab time, having sold adhik than 150 million nakal vishwavyaapee.
theth cornhole board
Cornhole, bhi gyaat as saim bag toss, corn toss, baggo or bags, is a lon khel in which players take turns phenkna makai chhed bags at a uthaaya manch saath a chhed in the dur samaapt.
A thilaa in the chhed scores 3 points, while one on the manch scores 1 point.
Play continues jabatak a team or khilaadi pahunch the score of 21.

praadhikrut antargat the sunaharaa bullion sikaa Act of 1985, it thi first released by the United rajya mint in 1986.
bikram yoga is a system of yoga that bikram choudhury synthesized isse traditional hatha yoga takneekon and popularized shuruuaat in the early 1970s.
sab bikram yoga varg chalaaen liye 90 minutes or consist of the vahi shrenee of 26 postures and 2 shwaas exercises.
bikram yoga is ideally practiced in a room heated to 105°f ( ≈ 40.6°c ) with a ardrata of 40 %,.

a fern is koi one or adhik of a samooh of parichay 12,000 prajati of paudhe belonging to the vanaspati samooh gyaat as pteridophyta.
naapsand mosses, ve have jilam or floem ( bananaa them vascular paudhe ).
They have tana, pattey, or roots jaise anya vascular plants.
ferns reproduce via bijaanuon or have neither beej nor pushp.
by far the largest samooh of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns, lakin ferns as paribhaashit yahan ( bhi pukaara monilophytes ) include horsetails, whisk ferns, marattioid ferns, and ophioglossoid ferns.
the term pteridophyte also refers to ferns or a few anya bijrahit vascular paudhe ( see classification khand neeche ).
ferns first appear in the chattan ricard 360 lakh saalo pehle in the carboniferous lakin many of the vartmaan pariwaron or prajati kiya not appear jabatak roughly 145 lakh years pehle in the early cretaceous ( baad flowering plants came to dominate anek environments ).
ferns hai nahin of pramukh aarthik importance, lakin kuch are grown or gathered liye khaanaa, as shobhyman plants, for remediating contaminated soils, or have maharoom the vishay of research liye their kshamta to remove some rasinic pollutants from the air.
kuch hai significant weeds.
ve bhi play a bhoomika in mythology, ayurvigyaan, or art.
chapata roofs in israel
chapata chat in Los angeles
a flat chat is a prakaar of covering for a building.
In contrast to the more sloped form of roof, a flat roof is aadaa or nearly aadaa.
the dhalaan of a roof is properly gyaat as iske pich : roofs which hai nearly chapata are gyaat as low-pitch roofs ( as the angle of slope increases, so the pich is said to increase ).
koi chadar of saamagree used to cover a flat or low-pitched roof is usually gyaat as a jhilli and the primary purpose of these membranes is to waterproof the chat area.
saamagree that cover flat roofs typically allow the jal to chalaaen off from a slight inclination or camber into a gutter system.
Water from kuch chapata roofs aise as on garden sheds sometimes bahati freely band the kinare of a roof, though gutter pranaaliyon are of laabh in keeping dono walls or muladhar shushk.
Gutters on choti roofs praayah sise jal sidhe onto the maidan, or behatar, into a visheshkar bana soakaway.
Gutters on larger roofs praayah lead water into the rainwater drainage pranali of any nirmit up kshetrafal.
occasionally chapata roofs though hai designed to collect jal in a pool, praayah liye aesthetic uddeshy, or liye rainwater buffering.
Flat roofs maujuud sab over the sansar or prayek kshetrafal has iske apana tradition or variyata liye saamagree used.
in warmer climes where varsha is kam or jamane is unlikely to occur, many chapata roofs hai simply nirmit of chinai or kancreet or is is good at keeping out the ooshmaa of the surya or sasti or aasaan to nirmaan where timber is not readily uplabdhiyaan.
In areas jahaan the chat could become santrupt by barsaat or leak, or jahaan jal soaked into the brickwork could fries to barf or yun sise to 'blowing ' ( todakar up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the vistaar of barf as it form ) these roofs hai not suitable.
traditionally most chapata roofs in the western sansar make upyog of tarkol or adhik praayah tarkol paper lagu over roof alankaar to rakhana a bhawan watertight.
The tar or tarpaper is in phere covered in bajri to rakhana the surya 's ooshmaa, uv kirane or mausam off it and helps protect it isse cracking or blistering or degradation.
chat alankaar is usually of plywood, chipboard or OSB falak ( osb = Oriented strand falak, bhi gyaat as Sterling falak ) of around 18mm motaai.
the tarkol coating is lagu in ek or adhik coats as a hot drav, heated in a tarkol kettle, or as chaadaren of tar impregnated 'paper ' chipke bas and sealed saath at joints by hot tarkol - ekbar it rai cooled, the bajri is spread evenly over it.
A pramukh kaaran liye vifaltaa of ye traditional roofs is ignorance or kami of mentanence jahaan logon or kaarykram kaaran the bajri to be moved or removed isse the tarkol or tarpaper waterproofing, yun exposing it to mausam and surya whereupon cracking or blistering occurs over time and aakhirkaar jal gets in.
tarpaper is usually a 'paper ' or fibre saamagree soaked or impregnated in tar.
As gravel can not protect tarpaper satahon where they vruddhi khadaa isse the roof aise as on munder walls or upstands, tarpaper visangatiyaan hai utpaadit saath thik bajri applied to the hot tar dauraan the process of manufacture aise that a sthai parat of bajri is stuck to it in anukram to de it jari suraksha.
tarpapers vary in visheshta as does the kaarigari or training of those applying it to produce adhik or kam successful results.
In some sookshm climates or chhaayankit areas ye balki 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can last khub in sambandh to the cost of materials khariden or laagat of leta unhen, however the laagat of aadhunik membranes such as epdm rai aaiye down over haal saalo to mek them adhik or adhik affordable.
vahin hai abhi adhik firms supplying aadhunik vikalp or vahin is generally a growing jaagrukta of their pradarshan or availability.
if a li karata occur on a flat chat tab kshati praayah goes unnoticed liye long periods of samay dauraan jisase jal penetrates and soaks the decking and koi insulation and/or structure beneath it.
is can sise to expensive damage isse the durgandh which praayah develops or if baayein can weaken the chat dhaancha.
vahin hai bhi vibhinn health risks to logon or pashu shwaas the saanche bijaanuon : the gambhirtha of is swasthya risk remains a debated point.
One problem saath maintaining chapata roofs is ki if jal karata ghus the avrodh covering ( be it traditional or a aadhunik jhilli ) it can safar a long rasta pehle causing drishy kshati or leaking into a bhawan where it can be dekhi.
Thus it is nahin easy to dekhie jahaan it is tapakati in order to marammat it.
ekbar underlying chat alankaar is soaked it praayah sags causing a further sangrahan or puddling of water in that area and the problem worsens.
a cd-rom ( ) is a pre-pressed compact disc jisase contains aankada.
The naam is an echronim jisase stand for `` Compact discs read-only memory ``.
computer can padhaa CD-ROMs, lakin can not likhen on unhen.
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer software, sahit video games and multimedia anuprayog, haalanki any data can be bhandaarit ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
kuch cds, pukaara unnat cds, hold dono computer aankada or audio saath the latter capable of hone nibhaai on a cd khilaadi, jabaki aankada ( aise as tantra or digital video ) is tabhi usable on a computer ( aise as ISO 9660 swaroop PC cd-roms ).
the pilaa kitaab is the technical standard ki defines the swaroop of CD-ROMs.
One of a niyat of color-bound kitabe ki contain the takneekee visheshtaayen liye sab cd swarup, the pilaa kitaab, created by Sony or philips, was the pehla ekstansion of Compact Disc digital Audio.
it adapted the swaroop to tham koi form of data.
Joanne `` jo '' Rowling ( ), ( born 31 july 1965 ), kalam naam J. K. Rowling, is a angrejon upanyaaskaar, behtareen known as the lekhak of the Harry kumhaar fantasy series.
the kumhaar kitabe have gained vishwavyaapee dhyaan, jiti anek puraskaar, or bechi adhik than 400 lakh nakal.
ve have become the best-selling book series in itihaas, and maharoom the aadhaar liye a shrenee of films jisase rai become the highest-grossing film shrenee in itihaas.
rolling tha overall sweekruti on the script as well as maintaining rachanaatmak control by sevarat as a producer on the final instalment.
born in yate, glostershire, rolling thi working as a shodhakarta or dubhashiya secretary liye maafi antarrashtriya jab she conceived the vichaar liye the harry Potter series on a delayed tren isse Manchester to landan in 1990.
The seven-year kaal ki followed entailed the death of uske maan, talaak isse her pehla husband or garibi until rolling samaapt the first anokhaa in the shrenee, Harry Potter or the paras 's stone ( 1997 ).
rolling subsequently prakashit 6 sequels—the last, harry Potter or the deathly hallows ( 2007 ) —as khub as 3 poorak to the shrenee.
in 2012, Rowling parted saath her agency or resumed likhane in the form of a tragicomedy anokhaa aimed at vayask readership, entitled the cazual rikti.
rolling rai said wo is currently working on do books—one aimed liye adults, the other liye children younger than the harry kumhaar audience, and wo expects the latter to be published first.
rolling rai led a `` rags to amiri `` jivan story, in jisase she progressed isse jeena on rajya laabh to multi-millionaire aukaat within five saalo.
She is the sanyukt kingdom 's best-selling lekhak since record began, saath sales in excess of £238m.
the 2008 Sunday times Rich suchi anumaanit rolling 's fortune at £560 lakh ( $ 798 lakh ), ranking uske as the barahavin richest stri in the United kingdom.
forbs ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth sabase powerful hasti of 2007, or TIME magazine namit uske as a runner-up liye iske 2007 vyakti of the Year, noting the soshal, moral, or political prerana she has die uske prashansak.
in October 2010, rolling thi namit the `` Most Influential stri in britain '' by leading patrika editors.
wo rai become a notable locasevak, supporting aise charities as comic raahat, ek janak pariwaron, anek kaathinya samaaj of Great britain or lumos ( formerly the children 's High Level Group ).
Auburndale is a nagar in polk county, florida, sanyukt rajya.
the janasankhyikee was 11,032 at the 2000 census.
According to the U.S Census estimates of 2005, the city tha a janasankhyikee of 12,381.
it is bhaag of the Lakeland – sheet hewan Metropolitan sankhyikeey kshetrafal.
hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as dekhi isse kaksha during Expedition 7 of the antarrashtriya Space stesan.
the eye, eyewall, or surrounding rainbands, visheshtaayen of tropical cyclones, are clearly drishy in this drishy isse space.
a teevr chakravaat is a toofaan pranali characterized by a low-pressure bich surrounded by a spiral vyavastha of thunderstorms ki produce strong winds and baari barsaat.
Tropical cyclones strengthen jab jal kafoor from the samandar is released as the saturated air udai, resulting in sanghanan of water vaashp contained in the moist air.
ve hai fueled by a alag ooshmaa yantriki than anya cyclonic windstorms aise as nor'easters, europea windstorms, or dhruviya chadhaav.
The characteristic that separates teevr cyclones isse anya cyclonic systems is ki at any oonchaai in the maahaul, the center of a teevr chakravaat hoga be warmer than iske surroundings ; a ghatana pukaara `` garam kor `` toofaan systems.
the pad `` tropical '' refers dono to the bhugolic utpatti of these pranaaliyon, jisase usually rup in teevr regions of the globe, or to unke formation in maritime tropical air masses.
the pad `` cyclone '' refers to such toofaan ' cyclonic prakruti, saath counterclockwise hawa flow in the uttari golardh or clockwise hawa pravaah in the Southern golardh.
the vipareet disha of the hawa pravaah is a parinaam of the coriolis force.
depending on iske location or strength, a teevr cyclone is referred to by names aise as hurricane (, ), toofaan ( ), teevr toofaan, cyclonic storm, teevr avsaad, and bas cyclone.
jabaki tropical cyclones can upaj extremely shaktishaalee hawaayen and torrential barsaat, ve are also able to upaj high lehren, damaging toofaan surge, or tornadoes.
They develop over vishaal laashen of garam jal, or lose their shakti if ve move over land due to increased sataha gharshan or ghaataa of the warm samandar as an urja sorce.
is is kyon tateey regions can receive significant kshati isse a teevr cyclone, jabaki inland regions hai relatively surakshit isse receiving damdaar hawaayen.
baari rains, however, can upaj significant flooding antardeshiy, or storm surges can upaj extensive tateey flooding up to isse the tatarekha.
haalanki unke prabhaav on insaan populations can be vinaashkari, teevr cyclones can relieve sookhaa sharten.
ve bhi carry ooshmaa urja dur isse the ooshnakaribandh and hastantaran it toward shitoshna latitudes, which makes unhen an important bhaag of the vaishvik atmospheric parisancharan yantriki.
as a result, tropical cyclones sahaayta to maintain equilibrium in the Earth 's kshobhamandal, or to maintain a apekshaakrit stable or garam taapmaana vishwavyaapee.
anek teevr cyclones develop jab the vayumandaleey sharten around a kamjor disturbance in the maahaul are favorable.
The prishthbhumi paryaavaran is modulated by climatological chakra or pattern aise as the madden-julian dolan, El niño-southern Oscillation, or the atlantic multidecadal dolan.
Others rup jab anya prakaar of cyclones acquire teevr characteristics.
teevr pranaaliyon hai tab sthanantarit by steering hawaayen in the troposphere ; if the sharten remain anukool, the teevr disturbance intensifies, or can bhi develop an eye.
on the anya samaapt of the varnakram, if the sharten around the system deteriorate or the teevr cyclone makes landfall, the pranali weakens or eventually dissipates.
it is not sambhavit to artificially induce the dissipation of ye systems with vartmaan praudyogiki.
Kirk duglas ( born issur Danielovitch, ; disambar 9, 1916 ) is an American stage or filmi karta, film producer or lekhak.
uske popular films include out of the Past ( 1947 ), champion ( 1949 ), ikkaa in the chhed ( 1951 ), The karaab and the khubasurat ( 1952 ), 20,000 Leagues antargat the samudr ( 1954 ), Lust liye jivan ( 1956 ), raahen of Glory ( 1957 ), gunfight at the o.k. Corral ( 1957 ), the vikings ( 1958 ), spartacas ( 1960 ), nirjan hai the vir ( 1962 ), saat Days in may ( 1964 ), the nayak of telemark ( 1965 ) or Tough yaaron ( 1986 ).
he is no.17 on the American filmi santhaan 's list of the greatest purush amareeki screen mahapurush of sab time, bananaa use the highest-ranked jeena vyakti on the suchi.
in 1996, he received the academy maanad Award `` liye 50 saalo as a creative or moral force in the motion chitra jatiyaan. ''
he is ek of the pichhlaa surviving abhinaytaon isse hollywood 's `` sunahari age ''.
robert clark `` Bob '' seger ( born may 6, 1945 ) is an American rock and roll singer-songwriter, guitarist and pianist.
As a locally kaamyaab Detroit-area kalakaar, he performed and ankit as bob seger or the pichhlaa Heard or bob Seger pranali throughout the 1960s.
by the jaldi 1970s, he tha dropped the `` pranali '' from uske ricarding and continued to niyat for broader success saath anya vibhinn bands.
In 1973, he put saath the chaandi Bullet band, a samooh of detroit-area sangeetkaaron, with jisko he became sabase kaamyaab on the neshnal str saath the album sajiv goli, ankit live saath the chaandi goli band in 1975 at cobo Hall in detroit, michigan.
in 1976, he hasil a neshnal brakeout saath the studio album Night Moves.
on uske studio album, he bhi worked extensively saath the alabama-based Muscle shoals lay Section, jisase appeared on several of seger 's best-selling singles or album.
a jaden rocker saath a clasik raspy, chillaanaa awaz, seger wrote or ankit geeton that dealt saath love, mahilaon, blue-collar vishaywastu or was an exemplar of heartland chattan.
seger rai ankit anek hits, including `` Night Moves, '' `` Turn the pej, '' `` we 've Got Tonight, '' `` viruddh the Wind, '' or shakedown ki thi likhaa liye bevarli pahadiyaan cop ii or `` jaise a chattan, '' or also co-wrote the eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight. ''
uske iconic recording of `` boodha samay Rock or Roll `` thi named ek of the geeton of the sadi in 2001.
saath a kariyar spanning five dashakon, seger continues to perform or ricard aaj.
seger thi inducted into the Rock or Roll haul of Fame in 2004 and the songwriters Hall of Fame in 2012.
richard Milhous nicksan ( January 9, 1913 – april 22, 1994 ) thi the 37th President of the sanyukt rajya, serving from 1969 to 1974, jab he became the only president to istipha the office.
nicksan had previously parosa as a republican U.S. pratinidhi or seenetter isse california or as the 36th Vice adhyaksh of the United rajya isse 1953 to 1961.
Nixon thi born in yorba linda, california.
He graduated isse Whittier College in 1934 or duk vishvavidhyalayon skool of vidhi in 1937, returning to California to abhyaas vidhi.
He or uske wife, pat nicksan, sthanantarit to washington to kaary liye the sangheey sarkari in 1942.
he subsequently served in the sanyukt States navy during sansar yuddh II.
nicksan was nirvaachit in california to the house of pratinidhi in 1946 or to the seenet in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger hiss maamla sthapit his pratishtha as a leading anti-communist, and elevated use to national prominence.
he thi the running mate of Dwight D. ijanhavar, the republican party adhyakshiya nominee in the 1952 election.
nicksan parosa for aath saalo as vaais president.
he waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960, narrowly losing to John F. kennedy, or lost a res for Governor of california in 1962.
In 1968, he bhaaga again for the presidency or thi nirvaachit.
haalanki nicksan initially escalated America 's bhagidaari in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended U.S. bhagidaari in 1973.
nicksan 's vizit to the logon 's ganatantr of china in 1972 opened rajanyik sambandh between the two raashtra, or he initiated détente or the anti-ballistic missile sandhi saath the Soviet sangh the vahi year.
domestically, his prashasan generally embraced nitiyon ki transferred shakti isse washington to the rajya.
Among other bate, he launched pahalon to fight cancer or illegal davaayen, imposed mazdooree or price niyantran, enforced desegregation of kuch Southern skulon, or sthapit the paryaavarniya suraksha agency.
haalanki he presided over the chandra landings shuruuaat with apollo 11, he scaled back maanavyukt spes khoji.
he was re-elected by a bhuskhalan in 1972.
Nixon 's duusari term dekhi an Arab aayal embargo, the istipha of uske vaais adhyaksh, Spiro agnew, or a continuing shrenee of khulaase about the waterget cond or anya misconduct by sadasyon of the prashasan.
the scandal escalated, costing nicksan much of his rajnatik support, or on agast 9, 1974, he resigned in the phase of lagbhag certain impeachment or hataanaa isse office.
baad uske istipha, he controversially praapt a pardon issued by uske successor, jerald Ford.
in ritairement, Nixon 's kaary as an elder statesman, authoring anek kitabe and undertaking anek videshi yatraayen, helped to rehabilitate uske public chitra.
he suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18, 1994, or died chaar dinon later at the aayu of 81.
{ { Infobox Senator
The dominican Republic annexation sandhi caused bitter contention between adhyaksh grant and sen. sumner.
brady 1869 ] ]
sen. sumner, opposed to American imperialism in the caribbean or fearful ki annexation would lead to the conquest of the neighboring blike ganatantr of Haiti, became kaayal that corruption lay behind the treaty, or that main band to the president saajha in the bhrashtachar.
As chairman of the seenet Foreign Relations cameti, Sen. sumner initially withheld uske raay on the sandhi on janvari 18, 1870.
sen. sumner tha maharoom leaked soochna isse sahaayak sachiv of rajya, Bancroft davis, that U.S. naval jahaajon yahood being used to protect President báez.
sen. sumner 's cameti voted against annexation or at sen. Sumner’s suzav or kaaphi possibly to sahejen the party from an bhadda lado or the adhyaksh isse sharmindagi, the seenet held iske bahes of the sandhi behind closed dwaar in karypalika satr.
President grant persisted or bheja messages to congress in ehsaan of annexation on kooch 14, 1870, and May 31, 1870.
in band satr, sen. sumner spoke out viruddh the treaty ; warnng ki there hota be pareshaani saath the videshi nagarikon, noting the chronic vidroh that took place on the island, or the risk ki the swatantraaa of Haiti, pahachaanaa by the United rajya in 1862, would be khoyaa.
sumner stated ki grant 's upyog of the u.S. navy as a protectorat thi a ulanghan of International vidhi or unconstitutional.
Finally, on june 30, 1870 the sandhi was voted on by the Senate and failed to laabh the jaruri 2/3 bahumat for sandhi dyodhi.
the following day, President grant, feeling gaddari by Sen. sumner, retaliated by ordering the dismissal of sumner’s close dost J. lothrop motley, Ambassador to britain.
by patjhad, sumner 's nijee dushmani to the adhyaksh was public knowledge, or he blamed the sachiv of rajya liye failing to have resigned, balki than let grant have his way.
the do main, friends jabatak then, cooled into bitter dushmano.
in December, 1870, still fearful ki grant meant to acquire sento domingo somehow, Sumner gave a fiercely najuk vaak accusing the president of usurpation and babcock of unethical conduct.
already, adhyaksh grant, samarthit by his sachiv of State hamiltan Fish, had initiated a campaign to depose sumner isse the adhyakshata of the seenet videshi sambandh cameti.
haalanki sumner stated he thi an `` Administration man '', in addition to having roka grant 's dominican ganatantr sandhi attempt, Sumner tha parajeet grant 's puraa repeal of the Tenure of Office adhinium, blocked Grant 's nomination of Alexander stewart to u.S. sachiv of rajkosh, or maharoom a constant harassing force pushing punarnirmaan nitiyon faster than grant tha been willing to go.
grant resented sumner 's badppan of manner, as khub.
Told ekbar ki sumner kiya nahin maananaa in the bible, the president is supposed to have kaha that he was nahin chakit : `` he kiya n't likhen it. ''
as the rift between Grant or sumner increased, Sumner’s swasthya began to manaahi.
jab the 42nd u.S. congress convened on kooch 4, 1871, Senators affiliated saath adhyaksh Grant, known as ‘’new radicals’’ voted to oust sen. sumner from the Senate Foreign sambandh cameti adhyakshata.
kaarobaar ethics ( bhi corporate ethics ) is a form of lagu aachaar or peshewar aachaar ki examines naitik principles or moral or ethical problems ki uthta in a kaarobaar environment.
it applies to sab pahaluon of kaarobaar conduct or is praasangik to the conduct of individuals or entire sanghathan.
Business ethics rai both normative or varnanaatmak aayam.
as a corporate abhyaas or a kariyar specialization, the field is primarily normative.
lad attempting to samajhe kaarobaar bartaav employ varnanaatmak methods.
the range or quantity of kaarobaar naitik mudde reflects the baatcheet of profit-maximizing bartaav saath non-economic chintaaen.
byaaj in kaarobaar aachaar accelerated dramatically dauraan the 1980s or 1990s, dono bheetar pramukh corporations or within academia.
liye udhaaharan, aaj sabase major corporations prachaar unke patibaddhta to non-economic maan antargat headings aise as aachaar code or soshal jimmedaari charters.
aadam smith said, `` logon of the vahi vyapaar seldom milen saath, bhi liye merriment and diversion, lakin the conversation ends in a shadyantr viruddh the public, or in kuch contrivance to uthaayen keemten. ''
sarkarein use kanoon or regulations to point kaarobaar bartaav in what ve perceive to be beneficial dishanirdesh.
aachaar implicitly regulates kshetron and vivaran of bartaav that jhooth beyond governmental control.
The emergence of vishaal corporations saath simit sambandh and sensitivity to the communities in jisase ve operate twarit the vikaas of aupchaarik aachaar regimes.
a bern is a prakaar of injury to flesh or skin caused by ooshmaa, vidyut, rasayan, friction, or vikiran.
Most burns affect tabhi the satahi skin ( known as satahi or pehla degree ) or extend into the deeper skin but do not involve the puraa motaai of the skin ( gyaat as partial motaai or duusari oopaadhi ).
Rarely all paraton of the skin or deeper utakon, aise as muscle or asthi can be injured in which maamla the bern is either puraa motaai ( teesraa oopaadhi ) or chauthi degree.
the upachaar required depends on the gambhirtha of the burn.
Superficial burns sambhawatah managed with choti adhik than simple pidaa hatyare jabaki pramukh burns may aavashyaktaa prolonged upachaar in specialized bern centers.
Cooling saath tap water may sahaayta pain or ghati damage however if expozar is prolonged it may result in kam deh taapmaana.
aanshik motaai burns may aavashyaktaa cleaning saath sabun or jal followed by dressings.
fafole should typically be left unbroken.
puraa motaai burns praayah aavashyaktaa sargical treatments such as skin kalam and extensive burns praayah aavashyaktaa vishaal amount of intravenous fluids.
the sabase aam complications of burns hai sambandhit to infection.
jabaki large burns can be fatal, aadhunik treatments developed in the pichhlaa 50 saalo have significantly improved the outcomes, visheshkar in children or young vayaskon.
globally about 11 lakh logon talash chikitsa upachaar or 300,000 logon die isse burns.
in the United rajya, of those admitted to a burn bich, lagbhag 4 % die isse unke injuries.
the long term nishkarsh is primarily related to the aakaar of burn or the age of the vyakti effected.
The atlantic samandar, not including Arctic and antarctic regions
This video thi liya by the kru of expedition 29 on falak the iss.
the pass starts isse bas north-east of the dweep of newfoundland over the uttar Atlantic samandar to central africa, over dakshin sudan.
the Atlantic samandar is the second-largest of the sansar 's oceanic vibhaajan.
saath a kul kshetrafal of parichay, it cover lagbhag 20 pratishat of the dharti 's sataha or parichay 29 pratishat of its jal sataha kshetrafal.
the pehla bhaag of iske naam refers to Atlas of unani mythology, making the atlantic the `` Sea of atlas ''.
The oldest known mention of `` atlantic '' is in the histories of Herodotus around 450 bc ( hdt. 1.202.4 ) : atlantis thalassa ( Greek : ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; English : samudr of Atlas ).
the term ethiopic samandar, niklaa isse ithiopia, was applied to the dakshini atlantic as let as the mid-19th sadi.
Before europeans discovered other oceans, the pad `` samandar '' itself thi synonymous with the waters pare the jalsandhi of Gibraltar that we abhi know as the Atlantic.
the jaldi unaniyon believed is samandar to be a gigantic nadi encircling the world.
the atlantic samandar occupies an elongated, s-shaped basin extending longitudinally between uresia or africa to the east, or the americas to the west.
as one ghatak of the interconnected vaishvik samandar, it is connected in the uttar to the Arctic samandar ( jisase is sometimes mana a sea of the atlantic ), to the prashanth samandar in the dakshinpaschim, the Indian Ocean in the southeast, or the dakshini Ocean in the south.
( Other definitions describe the atlantic as extending southward to Antarctica. )
The equator subdivides it into the North atlantic Ocean or South Atlantic samandar.
Due to their long-term hath, or the need for a adwitiya identifier in issuing forecasts or chetavaniyaan, tropical cyclones or uposhna cyclones are given names according to niti ( see teevr chakravaat namakaran ).
The following are lists isse jisase ye teevr or uposhna chakravaat names hai niklaa.
shwet lite is dispersed by a prism into the colors of the optical spectrum.
the drishy varnakram is the portion of the electromagnetic varnakram that is visible to ( can be detected by ) the human najar.
Electromagnetic vikiran in this dayera of wavelengths is pukaara drishy lite or bas lite.
a theth insaan najar hoga respond to wavelengths isse parichay 390 to 700 nm.
in sharten of frequency, is corresponds to a band in the vicinity of 430–790 thz.
a light-adapted eye generally rai iske adhiktam sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 THz ), in the green pradesh of the optical varnakram ( dekhie : dipti falan ).
The spectrum karata not, however, contain sab the rangon that the insaan ankhen or brain can fark.
asantrupt rangon aise as pink, or purple variations aise as magenta, hai anupasthit, for example, because they can be made tabhi by a mixr of anek wavelengths.
rangon containing only ek wavelength hai bhi called pure rangon.
drishy wavelengths pass through the `` optical khidki ``, the region of the electromagnetic varnakram which allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere.
an udhaaharan of is phenomenon is ki saaf air scatters blue light more than red wavelengths, or so the midday aasmaan appears blue.
the optical window is bhi pukaara the drishy khidki kuki it overlaps the insaan drishy response varnakram.
the near infrared ( NIR ) khidki jhooth bas out of the insaan vision, as khub as the medium wavelength ir ( mwir ) khidki or the long Wavelength or dur infrared ( lwir or FIR ) khidki haalanki anya pashu may anubhav unhen.
Many prajati can dekhie light saath frequencies baahar the `` drishy varnakram, '' jisase is defined in sharten of insaan vision.
madhumakhiyon and many anya keet can detect parabangnee light, which helps unhen dhundhen makrand in flowers.
sanyantr prajati that nirbhar on keet paragan may owe reproductive kamyaabi to unke rup in ultraviolet lite, rather than kaisaa rangeen ve appear to insaano.
pakshiyon, too, can dekhie into the parabangnee ( 300–400 nm ), or some have sex-dependent markings on unke plumage ki hai drishy tabhi in the parabangnee dayera.
anek animals ki can dekhie into the parabangnee dayera, however, can nahin dekhie red lite or koi other reddish wavelengths.
madhumakhiyon ' visible spectrum ends at parichay 590nm, bas pehle the orange wavelengths prarambh.
pakshiyon, however, can dekhie some red wavelengths, lakin not as many as insaano.
zebras ( or ) hai several prajati of African equids ( ghoda family ) sanyukt by their distinctive black and shwet dhaariyaan.
Their dhaariyaan come in alag pattern, adwitiya to each individual.
ve hai generally social pashu that sajiv in choti harems to large herds.
naapsand their closest rishtedaaron, horses or asses, zebras have never maharoom truly domesticated.
vahin are three prajati of zebras : the plains zebra, the grévy 's zebra or the pahaad zebra.
The maidan zebra and the pahaad zebra belong to the subgenus hippotigris, lakin Grévy 's zebra is the ekmaatr species of subgenus Dolichohippus.
The latter resembles an gadhaa, to jisase it is closely sambandhit, while the purv do hai adhik horse-like.
sab teen belong to the genus Equus, saath saath other living equids.
the adwitiya stripes of zebras mek unhen ek of the pashu most familiar to people.
ve occur in a variety of habitats, aise as grasslands, savannas, woodlands, thorny scrublands, mountains, or tateey hills.
however, various anthropogenic factors have tha a kathor prabhaav on zebra populations, in particular hunting liye khaalen and habitat vinaash.
Grévy 's zebra or the pahaad zebra are endangered.
jabaki plains zebras hai much adhik plentiful, ek subspecies, the quagga, became extinct in the let 19th sadi – haalanki vahin is philhal a plan, pukaara the quagga Project, that aims to breed zebras ki hai phenotypically samaan to the quagga in a process called breeding waapas.
bairi shwet, born bairi Eugene carter ( – ), thi an amareeki composer and singer-songwriter.
a two-time grami Award -winner known for uske distinctive baas awaz or romantic chitra, White 's mahanatam kamyaabi aae in the 1970s as a solo singer and saath the prem aseemit orcestra, crafting anek enduring aatma, durgandh, or disco songs aise as uske do biggest hits, `` You 're the pehla, the Last, my Everything `` or `` ca n't milengi paryaapt of apana prem, beb. ''
saath saath ishaq Hayes, shwet is mana by allmusic.com as a pioneer of disco music in the jaldi 1970s.
During the course of uske kariyar in the music kaarobaar, shwet achieved 106 sunaharaa album worldwide, 41 of jisase bhi attained platinum status.
White tha 20 sunaharaa or 10 platinum singles, with vishwavyaapee bikri in excess of 100 lakh, according to aalochakon ed hogan or vade kergan.
His prabhaav shaamil rev. James cleveland, re Charles, Aretha franklin plus motown kalakaaron the Supremes, the chaar top or marvin gaye.
Angelina joli (, born angelina Jolie voit ; june 4, 1975 ) is an amareeki abhinetri, film director, or screenwriter.
wo rai praapt an academy puraskaar, two screen abhinaytaon gild puraskaar, and teen Golden Globe puraskaar, or was namit hollywood 's highest-paid actress by forbs in 2009 and 2011.
Jolie promotes humanitarian kalyankari, or is vikhyath for her kaary saath sharnaarthiyon as a khaas Envoy and former saakh doot liye the sanyukt raashtra unchi kamishnar for sharnaarthiyon ( UNHCR ).
She rai praayah maharoom cited as the sansar 's `` sabase khubasurat '' stri, a title liye which wo rai praapt substantial media attention.

Her pehla agrani bhoomika in a pramukh filmi thi in the cyber-thriller havers ( 1995 ).
wo strecchar in the critically acclaimed biographical television films george wales ( 1997 ) or gia ( 1998 ), and jiti an academy Award liye Best Supporting abhinetri liye her performance in the naatak ladki, Interrupted ( 1999 ).
joli hasil chaudee kirti baad her portrayal of video khel nayika Lara Croft in lara croft : makbara redar ( 2001 ), and established herself among the highest-paid abhinetriyon in hollywood saath the sequel The paalna of jivan ( 2003 ).
wo continued uske karrwai star career saath mr. & mrs. Smith ( 2005 ) or Wanted ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated vanijyik safaltaaon to date—and praapt further najuk acclaim for uske performances in the dramas A Mighty dil ( 2007 ) or changeling ( 2008 ), which arjeet uske a nomination liye an Academy puraskaar liye behtareen Actress.
Jolie bana uske directorial debut saath the wartime naatak In the jameen of rakt or madhu ( 2011 ).
talaak isse abhinaytaon johny lee miller or billy bob thornton, Jolie now jeevandaan saath actor bread pitt, in a sambandh notable for fervent media dhyaan.
Jolie and pitt have three biological children or teen adopted children.
a natural mehrab utpaadit by the apradan of differentially weathered chattan in jebel kharaz, Jordan
Erosion is the prakram by jisase mrudaa and chattan hai removed isse the dharti 's sataha by exogenetic prakriyaaon such as wind or jal pravaah, or tab transported and deposited in other sthitiyaan.
jabaki erosion is a prakritik prakram, human activities have increased by 10-40 times the rate at jisase apradan is occurring globally.
excessive erosion kalyankari problems aise as desertification, decreases in agricultural productivity due to jameen degradation, sedimentation of waterways, and ecological patan due to ghaataa of the nutrient samrudh apper soil paraton.
jal or hawa erosion hai abhi the two primary causes of jameen degradation ; sanyukt, ve are jimmedaar liye 84 % of degraded acreage, making excessive apradan ek of the most significant vaishvik paryaavarniya samasyaayein.
Industrial krishi, wanon, sadaken, anthropogenic jalwaayu change or urban sprawl hai amongst the sabase significant human kriyaayein in regard to their effect on stimulating erosion.
however, vahin hai anek available vaikalpik jameen upyog practices ki can kaatna or seemaa apradan, such as terrace -building, no-till krishi, or revegetation of denuded soils.
jersey Shore is an amareeki vaastaviktaa television shrenee jisase bhaaga on MTV isse disambar 3, 2009 to December 20, 2012 in the sanyukt rajya.
The shrenee follows the jeevandaan of aath housemates bitaa unke garmiyaan at the jersey shore in the U.S. state of nai jersey.
Season 2 followed the cast escaping the cold purvottar sheet to miami bich, saath ritu 3 returning to the Jersey shore.

right
United rajya territory is any extent of pradesh under the jurisdiction of the sangheey sarkari of the sanyukt rajya, sahit sab waters ( around islands or mahadwipiya tracts ) and all U.S. Naval baratan.
the sanyukt rajya rai traditionally proclaimed the sovereign adhikaron liye exploring, exploiting, conserving, or managing iske territory.
This extent of territory is sab the area belonging to, and antargat the dominian of, the sanyukt rajya sangheey government ( jisase shaamil tracts lying at a alahada isse the country ) liye prashasnic and anya uddeshy.
The sanyukt rajya total territory shaamil a upasamucchy of rajnatik divisions.
The U.S. government is a sarkari saath pratinidhitiv powers antargat the United rajya samvidhan.
`` the shaktiyaan nahin delegated to the sanyukt rajya by the samvidhan, nor nishiddh by it to the rajya, hai surakshit to the States kramshah, or to the logon '' by the Tenth amendment.
Terminator 3 : vruddhi of the mashine ( commonly abbreviated as t3 ) is a 2003 vigyaan fiction karrwai film nirdeshit by Jonathan mostow and abhinit Arnold shwarzanegar, Nick Stahl, cleyar Danes or kristanna loken.
It is the duusari sequel to the termineter ( 1984 ).
After Skynet fails to maar sara connor pehle uske bete is born or to kill John khud as a child, it bhejnaa back another termineter, the t-x, in an attempt to wipe out as anek pratirodh adhikariyon as possible.
is shaamil jon 's bhavishya bivi, lakin not jon khud as uske whereabouts hai anjaan to skynet.
jon 's jivan is placed in khatre jab the t-x accidentally paata him.
a cord of lakdi
the cord is a ikai of maap of shushk awaz prayukt in Canada or the sanyukt rajya to maap idhan or pulpwood.
a cord is the raashi of lakdi ki, jab `` ranked or khub stowed '' ( arranged so tukade are aligned, parallel, chhu and compact ), occupies a awaz of.
is corresponds to a khub stacked woodpile unchi, long, and gahan ; or koi anya vyavastha of raikhik maap that yields the vahi awaz.
the name cord probably aata isse the use of a cord or string to measure it.
the, is an 8-bit handeld video game yantra viksit or manufactured by Nintendo.
it thi released in japani on, in uttar america in, and in europea on.
it is the pehla handeld consol in the Game Boy lakeer, or was nirmit by Gunpei yokoi or nintendo shodh & vikaas 1 —the same staff who had designed the khel & dekhen series as khub as anek popular khel liye the nintendo Entertainment System.
redesigned versions yahood released in 1996 or 1998, in the rup of Game Boy jeb, or khel ladke lite ( Japan tabhi ), kramshah.
the khel Boy is nintendo 's duusari handeld system following the Game & Watch shrenee introduced in, or it sanyukt suvidhaayen from dono the nintendo entertainment pranali or khel & dekhen.
it thi originally bundled saath the puzzle game Tetris.

the sansar vyapaar Center is a complex of imaaraten antargat nirmaan in Lower Manhattan, New York City, sanyukt States, replacing an pehle complex of seven imaaraten saath the same naam on the vahi site.
The asli sansar Trade bich pradarshit landmark judwa minaaren, which kholi on april 4, 1973 or yahood nasht in the sitambar 11 hamale of 2001, saath with 7 sansar Trade bich.
the anya imaaraten in the complex yahood kshatigrast in the hamale, or unke tabah yahood aakhirkaar demolished.
the sait is hone rebuilt saath paanch nai skyscrapers and a memorial to those maare in the attacks.
, only ek skyscraper rai been samaapt ; the anya four hai apekshit to be completed pehle 2020.
ek sansar vyapaar bich hoga be the lead bhawan liye the new complex, reaching adhik than 100 stories at its completion.
It became the tallest building in nai york nagar on april 30, 2012, or is apekshit to be finished by 2013.
A chathe minar is pratiksharat pushti.
at the time of unke purnataa, the asli 1 World Trade bich ( the uttar minar ) or 2 sansar vyapaar bich ( the dakshin Tower ), known collectively as the `` judwa Towers '', yahood the tallest buildings in the sansar.
The anya imaaraten shaamil 3 wtc ( the marriyat sansar vyapaar bich ), 4 WTC, 5 wtc, 6 wtc, or 7 wtc.
sab of ye imaaraten yahood nirmit between 1975 or 1985.
The laagat for the construction thi $ 400 lakh ( $ in dollar ).
The complex thi stith in the dil of New york nagar 's downtown vittiya zila or contained 13.4 million vargakar feet ( 1.24 lakh m2 ) of daftar spes.
the sansar vyapaar bich anbhavi a aag on, 1975, a bombing on, 1993 or a robbery on, 1998.
in 1998, the bandargahon Authority decided to privatize the sansar vyapaar bich, patte the imaaraten to a private company to manage, and awarded the patte to silverstein gun in.
on the morning of sitambar 11, 2001, al-qaeda -sambhddhand hijackers udaaya do bowing 767 jets into the jatil, one into prayek minar, in a samanvit aatankwaadi akraman.
After burning liye 56 minutes, the dakshin minar ( 2 ) collapsed, followed a half-hour later by the uttar Tower ( 1 ), saath the hamale on the World vyapaar bich resulting in 2,753 mauton.
girnaa malba isse the towers, combined saath fir ki the malba initiated in anek surrounding imaaraten, led to the aanshik or puraa patan of sab the anya imaaraten in the jatil and caused catastrophic kshati to ten anya vishaal structures in the surrounding area.
The prakram of clyaap or recovery at the sansar vyapaar bich site took eight months.
over the following years, yojanaayen liye a rebuilt sansar vyapaar bich took rup.
The pehla nai bhawan at the site was 7 World vyapaar bich, jisase opened in.
the nimnatar Manhattan vikaas nigam ( lmdc ), sthapit in to oversee the rebuilding prakram, organized pratiyogitaaon to chune a sait plan and memorial dizine.
memory muladhar, designed by danniel Libeskind, thi chaynit as the nipun yojana, lakin this gai through substantial parivartan in dizine.
the nai World vyapaar Center jatil hoga shaamil ek World vyapaar bich, three anya high-rise daftar minaaren, or the National sitambar 11 memorial & Museum.

San Bernardino Mountains, with mt. san gorgonio in the agrabhumi and big bhaaluu Lake in the prishthbhumi.
the anuprastha Ranges hai a samooh of pahaad seemayen of dakshini california, in the prashanth Coast Ranges physiographic pradesh in North america.
the anuprastha Ranges begin at the southern samaapt of the california coast seemayen and jhooth between santa Barbara and San Diego county.
They derive the naam Transverse Ranges due to their East-West orientation, making unhen transverse to the general north-south abhivinyas of sabase of California 's tateey mountains.
Periodic talika saath electron shell
An electron shell may be vichaar of as an kaksha followed by electrons around an atom 's cendrak.
the closest shell to the cendrak is pukaara the `` 1 shell '' ( also called `` k shell '' ), followed by the `` 2 shell '' ( or `` l shell '' ), tab the `` 3 shell '' ( or `` m shell '' ), or so on dur or dur from the cendrak.
The shell akshar k, l, M,..., prayukt in the x-ray notation, are alphabetical.
prayek shell can contain tabhi a phixd kramank of electrons : the 1st shell can tham up to do electrons, the 2nd shell can hold up to aath electrons, the 3rd shell can hold up to 18, and 4th shell can tham up to 32 or so on.
chunki electrons hai electrically aakarshith to the cendrak, an atom 's electrons will generally occupy outer shell only if the adhik bhitari shell have already maharoom completely bhar by anya electrons.
however, is is not a sakht aavashyaktaa : Atoms may have do or bhi teen incomplete bahari shell.
( dekhie madelung rule for adhik vivaran. )
liye an explanation of kyon electrons maujuud in ye shells see electron configuration.
the electrons in the outermost occupied shell ( or shell ) determine the chemical gun of the anu ; it is pukaara the valence shell.
prayek shell consists of one or adhik subshells, or prayek subshell consists of one or adhik atomic orbitals.
vickie Lynn marshall ( née hogan ; navambar 28, 1967 – farvari 8, 2007 ), gyaat by uske moniker Anna nichol smith, thi an amareeki model, abhinetri, or television personality.
smith pehla gained popularity in Playboy, banane the 1993 sangini of the Year.
She modeled liye kapadey companiyaan, sahit Guess jeens or len bryant.
smith dropped out of unchi skool and thi shaadishuda in 1985.
uske atyadhik publicized second vivaah to oil kaarobaar mogul, J. harvard marshall, 62 years her senior, resulted in speculation that she shaadishuda the octogenarian liye uske dhan, jisase wo asweekrut.
following marshall 's maut, smith began a lengthy vidhik battle over a share of his estate.
Her case, marshall v. Marshall, reached the u.S. param adaalat on a sawaal of sangheey kshetradhikaar, and again on a sawaal of diwaliyapan adaalat praadhikaar ( now pukaara stern v. marshall ).
Smith died on farvari 8, 2007 in a hollywood, Florida hotel room as a result of an overdose of nuskhaa drugs.
bheetar the final six months of uske jivan, smith thi the fokas of a navinikrut dabaayen kawarej surrounding the death of her bete, danniel, or the paternity or castady battle over uske newborn beti, dannielynn.
the is ek denomination of japani yen.
the vartmaan dizine thi pehla minted in 1959 using japani characters known as the `` nai script ``, or yahood also minted isse 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' japani varna.
five-yen sikke tithi to 1870 ( jab, due to the much ucchtar maan of the yen, ve were minted in sunaharaa ).
the front of the sikaa depicts a rice sanyantr growing out of the water, saath `` paanch yen '' likhaa in kanji ; the back is stamped with `` japani '' and the saal of samasya, bhi in kanji, alag by sprouts of a ped.
the three graphic tatv of the sikaa represent krishi and fisheries, the kunjee elements of the Japanese first-sector economy.
Around a hole, vahin is a gear ki represents udyog.
it is the only japani sikaa in parisancharan to kami arabi numerals on either face.
tlc is an American girl samooh jinaki rangamandal spanned R & b, hip hop, aatma, funk, and nai jack swing.
Originally consisting of singer tionne `` t-boz '' Watkins, rapper Lisa `` Left najar '' lopes or singer Rozonda `` chilli '' thomas, the samooh mila unprecedented success in the 1990s jabaki bhi enduring a shrenee of spats saath the law, prayek anya, or the samooh 's ricard label.
initially, tlc hasil commercial success following the release of unke debyue album Ooooooohhh...
On the TLC tip, jisase bechi 6 lakh copies worldwide.
however, it thi their duusari album, crazysexycool, ki catapulted the samooh to superstar aukaat.
