paanch saalo baad, the group released their third album fanmail, which became the samooh 's pehla album to debyue at kramank ek or bechi adhik than 11 lakh copies worldwide.
The subsequent daure following fanmails release became the ucchtam grossing daure of sab time by a female band.
in 2002, lisa `` baayein najar '' lopes died in a car durghatana in honduras.
saat maheene later, t-boz or Chilli released the group 's chauthi album 3D, jisase bechi 2 lakh copies vishwavyaapee, it pradarshit unreleased vocals isse baayein Eye.
billboard patrika kramit tlc as ek of the greatest musical trios.
between 1992 or 2003, the band accumulated ten top ten singles, four number ek singles, chaar multi-platinum albums, or chaar Grammy Awards.
at the samaapt of 1999, tlc was ranked as the saatvaan most kaamyaab adhinium of the 1990s by Billboard.
in 2008, the group was inducted into the sab Time hot 100 Artist haul of kirti by the vahi patrika, at 56th place.
ki year it thi bhi listed as the # 25 r & B/hip-hop kalakaar of the preceding 25 years.
TLC rai sold adhik than 65 lakh record worldwide or they hai kramit as the second behtareen selling maadaa samooh of all time, and the behtareen selling maadaa R & b samooh of sab time.
in 2012, tlc kramit 12th on vh1 's 100 mahanatam mahilaon in music, being kramit the kramank ek sab ladki group on ki suchi.
tarzan is a 1999 amareeki anemated adventure filmi utpaadit by walt dijani visheshta anemation or vitarit by Walt Disney tasviren.
the 37th filmi in the walt dijani anemated clasik, it is based on the story tarzan of the Apes by Edgar Rice baroj, or is the tabhi pramukh gati chitra version of the story tarzan property to be anemated.
Directed by kris buck or kevin Lima with a patakatha by Tab Murphy, bob tzudiker, or Noni shwet, tarzan features the awaazen of Tony Goldwyn, Minnie driver, glen band, and Rosie o'donnell saath bryan dhanya, talwaar henriksen, wain nit, or nigel hawthorne.
It thi the pichhlaa bona fide hit pehle the dijani slump of the jaldi 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically or $ 448,191,819 vishwavyaapee, outgrossing its purvavartiyon Hercules ( 1997 ) or mulan ( 1998 ).
At the samay of iske release, its utpaadan bajet of $ 130 lakh bana it the sabase expensive anemated filmi ever made, until awwal by Disney 's own $ 140 lakh khajaana grah in 2002.
It thi bhi the first Disney anemated visheshta to open at # 1 chunki pocahontas.
This thi the pichhlaa pramukh box office kamyaabi of the dijani Renaissance.
aayal manch P-51 band the brazilian coast is a semi-submersible manch.
Oil manch mittelplate in the uttar sea
an aayal manch, ( offshore manch or colloquially oil rig ) is a large dhaancha saath facilities to drill kuen, to nikaalen and process aayal or natural gas, and to temporarily store utpaada until it can be brought to shore liye shodhan and vipanan.
in many cases, the manch contains facilities to house the workforce as khub.
depending on the halaaton, the manch may be phixd to the samandar manzil, may consist of an kritrim dweep, or may float.
remote subsea kuen may bhi be conect to a manch by pravaah linon and by umbilical conections.
ye subsea samaadhaan may consist of ek or adhik subsea kuen, or of ek or more manifold kendron for anek wells.
vadh is the killing of animals, praayah ki of gharelu pashudhan for khaanaa.
the pashu sabase commonly slaughtered liye khaanaa hai choupayon, jal bhens ( liye bif and veal ), sheep, bakriyon ( liye memne or mutton ), boar ( for pork ), ghode ( for ghoda maance ), or fowl, largely murgiyon, turkeys, or batakhon or increasingly fish isse the aquaculture udyog ( fish farming ).
the White house, the president 's aadhikarik residence or center of the prashasan
Under the sanyukt rajya Constitution, the adhyaksh of the United States is the sir of rajya or sir of sarkari of the sanyukt rajya.
As mukhya of the karypalika shakha or sir of the sangheey sarkari as a puure, the presidency is the ucchtam rajnatik office in the sanyukt rajya by influence or manyata.
the adhyaksh is bhi the commander-in-chief of the sanyukt rajya hathiyaarband shaktiyaan.
the adhyaksh is indirectly elected to a four-year pad by an chunavi college ( or by the house of pratinidhi chahie the chunavi college asafal to puraskaar an absolute majority of mat to koi vyakti ).
chunki the anusamarthan of the Twenty-second amendment to the sanyukt rajya samvidhan in 1951, no vyakti may be elected adhyaksh adhik than twice, or no one jo rai parosa adhik than do saalo of a term to jisase kisi else thi nirvaachit may be nirvaachit adhik than once.
upon the maut, istipha, or hataanaa isse daftar of an laazim adhyaksh, the vaais adhyaksh assumes the daftar.
the adhyaksh jarur be at tanik 35 saalo of age or a `` natural born '' naagarik of the sanyukt rajya.
is list shaamil tabhi those vyaktiyon jo were sworn into daftar as president following the anusamarthan of the sanyukt rajya samvidhan, which took prabhaav on kooch 4, 1789.
liye amareeki netao before is ratification, dekhie adhyaksh of the mahadwipiya congress.
the list karata nahin include koi acting raashtrapatiyon under the twenty-fifth amendment to the sanyukt rajya samvidhan.
There have maharoom 43 people sworn into office, and 44 presidencies, as Grover Cleveland served do non-consecutive terms or is gine krambaddhata as dono the 22nd and 24th president.
of the individuals nirvaachit as adhyaksh, chaar died in office of natural kalyankari ( William henry harrison, Zachary tailor, warren G. harding, and Franklin D. rujvelt ), chaar were assassinated ( abraham lincoln, james A. garfield, wiliam McKinley, or John F. Kennedy ) and ek resigned ( richard nicksan ).
george washington, the pehla adhyaksh, thi udghaatan in 1789 after a unanimous vote of the chunavi college.
wiliam Henry Harrison kharch the shortest time in daftar saath 32 dinon in 1841, and franklin D. rujvelt spent the longest saath over baarah saalo, lakin died shortly into uske chauthi term in 1945.
he is the only president to serve adhik than do terms, and a sanvaidhanik amendment, affecting presidents after Harry truman, thi passed to seemaa the kramank of times an vyaktigat can be nirvaachit president.
Andrew jackson, the saatvaan adhyaksh, was the first to be elected by men of sab classes in 1828 after sabase kanoon barring non-land-owners isse matdaan yahood repealed.
Warren Harding thi the pehla nirvaachit baad mahilaon gained voting adhikaron in 1920.
itihaas records chaar presidents – jon q Adams, radarford B. hez, Benjamin Harrison or george W. Bush – jo lost the lokapriy vote lakin assumed daftar.
John F. kennedy rai been the only president of roman catholic aasthaa, and the vartmaan adhyaksh, baraak obama, is the pehla adhyaksh of African descent.
Several firearms saath detachable suppressors, from sheersh to bottom : An Uzi, An ar-15, A Heckler & koch khaasiyat ranneetik, a beretta 92fs, and a sig machhar.
Bolt action rimfire rifl with suppressor
AWM-F sniper rifl with sanlagn suppressor.
a suppressor, sound suppressor, or sound moderator, is a yantra sanlagn to or bhaag of the bairal of a firearm jisase reduces the raashi of noise, or usually the amount of muzzle flash, generated by firing the hathiyaar.
a suppressor can be used dono saath a firearm or saath compressed air gun.
haalanki it is sometimes referred to as a silencer, is pad is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the dhwani of a prakshepya, visheshkar ek chalati tej than the gati of dhwani, through the air can not be eliminated.
using a suppressor in long alahada shooting ( i.e. greater than 300 meters ) can lessen, or retard, the rapat at the pal of prabhaav, or banaaen the impression of silence nikat the nishaanaa.
the noise suna nikat the muzzle as a prakshepya pattey the barrel, haalanki subdued, is not mook at sab.
A suppressor is praayah a metal belan with aatanrik mechanisms to reduce the dhwani of firing by slowing the escaping propellant gas or sometimes by reducing the velocity of the goli.
jaldi suppressors yahood nirmit around the shuruuaat of the 20th century by anek inventors.
amareeki avishkaarak hiram percy kahawat ( nahin to be confused saath hiram stevens kahawat, hiram percy 's pita, or the avishkaarak of the kahawat Machine gan ), is credited with inventing or selling the pehla commercially kaamyaab models circa 1902 ( patented 30 kooch 1909 ).
kahawat diya his yantra the trademarked naam kahawat Silencer.
the mafalar for aatanrik dahan ingine was viksit in samanaantar saath the firearm suppressor by kahawat in the early 20th sadi, using anek of the vahi techniques to provide quieter-running engines ( in anek europea deshon automobile mufflers hai still pukaara silencers ).
the word silencer in reference to gan suppressor remains in widespread upyog, although it rai chunki gire out of ehsaan saath kuch, visheshkar among the firearms udyog, hone replaced with the adhik vastutah accurate pad sound suppressor or bas suppressor, kuki a `` dhwani suppressor '' karata nahin `` silence '' any hathiyaar, balki it eliminates muzzle flash or reduces the sonic pressure of a firearm discharging.
Common usage or u.S. vidhaan bhashaa ehsaan the historically earlier pad, silencer.
in u.S. vidhi, the sharten `` firearm mafalar '' and `` firearm silencer '' hai synonymous.
suppressors were regularly prayukt by agenton of the sanyukt rajya Office of ranneetik sevaayen, jo favored the newly designed unchi Standard hdm.22 Long Rifle pistal dauraan sansar yuddh ii.
oss nideshak wiliam Joseph `` junglee vidheyak '' donoven demonstrated the pistal liye adhyaksh franklin D. rujvelt at the shwet house.
According to oss research mukhya stanley Lovell, donoven ( an boodha or vishwasaneey dost of the adhyaksh ) thi laharaaya into the ovel daftar, jahaan Roosevelt thi dictating a akshar.
While rujvelt samaapt his message, donoven turned his back and fired ten goliyaan into a sandbag he tha brought with use, ghoshit what he tha kiya and haat the dhumrapaan gan to the astonished adhyaksh.
the British SOE ( Special parichaalan karypalika ) Welrod hatya pistal with an abhinn suppressor was bhi prayukt by the American OSS on clandestine operations in naaji occupied europea dauraan the duusari sansar yuddh.

Arthur hasil fame as the akshar maude findlay on the 1970s sitcoms All in the parivaar or Maude, or as dorothi Zbornak on the 1980s sitcom The Golden ladakiyon, jeetna emi Awards liye dono bhoomikaaye.

For a discussion of nonprofit, voluntary neighborhood advocacy samooh, dekhie pados association.
in the sanyukt rajya, a homeowner sangh is a nigam formed by a real estate develper liye the purpose of vipanan, managing, or selling of homes or lots in a residential subdivision.
it grants the develper visheshadhikaar matdaan rights in shaasi the association, jabaki allowing the developer to nikaas vittiya and vidhik responsibility of the sanghathan, typically by transferring swaamitv of the sangh to the homeowners after selling band a predetermined kramank of lot.
sadsyta in the homeowners sangh by a awasaiya kharidaar is typically a condishan of khariden ; a buyer is n't die an vikalp to asweekrut it.
sabase homeowner association hai incorporated, or hai vishay to state statutes that govern non-profit corporations and homeowner association.
rajya oversight of homeowner association is minimal, or mainly takes the rup of kanoon jisase hai asangat isse state to rajya.
Some rajya, aise as florida or california, have a vishaal body of homeowner sangh vidhi, or kuch states, such as masachusets, have vastutah no homeowner association vidhi.
the fastest growing rup of housing in the sanyukt rajya today is common-interest developments ( cids ), a shrenee that includes planned-unit developments of single-family gharon, condominiums, or sahakaari apartment.
chunki 1964, homeowner association have become increasingly common in the USA.
the jatiyaan association santhaan vyapaar sangh estimated ki hoas governed 24.8 million amareeki homes and 62 lakh nivaasiyon in 2010.
a prize-winning lilac-and-white Silkie
vahin are anek breeds of gini pig jisase have maharoom viksit chunki its domestication ca. 5000 bc.
breeds vary widely in rup or purpose, ranging isse dikhaaen breeds saath long, flowing hair to those in upyog as model jeevon by vigyaan.
isse ca. 1200 AD to the spani conquest of the inka Empire in 1532, chaynaatmak breeding by indigenous South amareeki peoples resulted in anek kismein of domestic gini pigs, jisase rup the aadhaar liye kuch of the aadhunik gharelu breeds.
jaldi andean breeds yahood primarily rakhaa as agricultural bhandar liye khaanaa, or efforts at improving the gini pig as a khaanaa sorce continue to the modern era.
saath the niryaat of Guinea boar to europea in the 15th sadi, the lakshya in prajnan shifted to fokas on the vikaas of appealing pets.
to is samaapt, various pratispardhi prajnan organizations yahood santhaapit by fanciers.
the amareeki cavy Breeders sangh, an adjunct to the amareeki Rabbit Breeders sangh, is the governing body in the United States or canada.
the angrejon Cavy Council governs cavy clubs in the United kingdom.
Similar organizations exist in australia ( australian National cavy Council ) and nai jiland ( nai jiland cavy klbon ).
prayek klbon publishes iske apana Standard of purnataa or determines jisase breeds hai yogya liye prardashit.
New breeds continue to emerge in the 21st sadi.
haalanki vahin are anek breeds of Guinea pig, tabhi a few breeds hai commonly found on the dikhaaen talika as pets.
Most gini pigs mila as pets yahood either found undesirable by prajnak or yahood bred to be pleasant pets regardless of how khub they meet the nasl maanak of purnataa.
The choti bal, abyssinian, peruvian or sheltie ( urf Silkie ) breeds hai those sabase aksar seen as paalatu, and the purv teen hai the core breeds in the itihaas of the competitive showing of Guinea boar.
in jod to unke maanak rup, nearly sab breeds aaiye in a satin roopaantar.
satins, due to unke khokhla bal shafts, possess coats of a special gloss or chamak.
However, there is growing pramaan ki the jeenon jimmedaar liye the satin kot bhi can kaaran kathor asthi samasyaayein, sahit osteodystrophy or Paget 's disease.
prardashit satin visangatiyaan is prohibited by some cavy breeders ' association because of animal welfare reasons.
All cavy breeds have kuch saajha general maanakon : the head profile should be rounded, saath large ankhen or large, chikna ears.
the body chahie be damdaar or of compact nirmaan.
kot rang should in all visangatiyaan be clearly defined and thorough isse root to tip.
ye standards hai behtareen mili by long sthapit, commonly bred breeds, as their breeders have tha paryaapt samay or pashu to effectively breed liye these qualities.
the kot rang adarsh of shubh paribhaasha or thoroughness is rarely mili by anya than the chikna coated breeds, jisase have tha khub sthapit, pruthak breeding linon liye alag rang.
rajya schools ( bhi gyaat as public skulon or sarkari skulon ) generally refer to praathmik or dwitiyak schools mandated liye or offered to sab children without charge sashulk for, in puure or in bhaag, by karadhaan.
The pad may bhi refer to sansthaanon of post-secondary shiksha vittposhit, in puure or in part, or overseen by sarkari.
The ribosome assembles polymeric protein molecules jinaki anukram is niyantrit by the anukram of messanger rna anuon.
This is jaruri by sab jeena koshikaayen and sambhddha virus.
The ribosom ( from ribonucleic acid or the unani som, arth `` body '' ) is a large or jatil molecular yantra, found bheetar sab jeena koshikaayen, ki serves as the praathmik site of biological protein sanshleshan ( translation ).
ribosomes kadi amino acids saath in the anukram nirdisht by messanger rna ( mrna ) anuon.
ribosomes consist of do pramukh subunits—the small ribosomal subunit padhe the mRNA, jabaki the vishaal subunit joins amino acids to rup a polypeptide chain.
prayek subunit is rachit of ek or adhik ribosomal rna ( rrna ) anuon or a kismein of proteins.
the anukram of diene ankoding for a protein may be copy many times into messanger RNA ( mRNA ) zanjeeron of a samaan anukram.
Ribosomes can bind to an mRNA kadi and upyog it as a template liye determining the sahi sequence of amino acids in a particular protein.
amino acids are chaynit, collected or carried to the ribosom by transafar rna ( trna anuon ), jisase daalen ek part of the ribosom or bind to the messenger rna kadi.
the sanlagn amino acids hai tab linked together by another bhaag of the ribosome.
Once the protein is utpaadit, it can then 'fold ' to upaj a vishisht kaaryaatmak three-dimensional dhaancha.
a ribosom is made from devalayas of RNAs or protein or is isliye a ribonucleoprotein.
prayek ribosom is vibhajit into do subunits : the choti subunit baandhta to the mrna pattern, jabaki the larger subunit baandhta to the tRNA and the amino acids.
jab a ribosom finishes padhnaa an mRNA anu, these do subunits vibhajit alaava.
ribosomes are ribozymes, because the catalytic peptidyl transferase kaaryaklap ki kadi amino acids saath is performed by the ribosomal rna.
ribosomes isse jeevanu, archaea and eukaryotes ( the three domains of jivan on dharti ) differ in their aakaar, sequence, dhaancha, and the anupaat of protein to rna.
the matbhed in structure allow some antibiotics to maar jeevanu by inhibiting unke ribosomes, jabaki leaving human ribosomes unaffected.
in jeevanu or orchia, more than one ribosom may move saath a single mrna kadi at ek samay, prayek `` padhnaa '' iske sequence or producing a sambandhit protein molecule.
the ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic cells functionally resemble anek suvidhaayen of those in jeevanu, reflecting the sambhavit vikasvaadi origin of mitochondria.
albert claude, isai de duve, or george emil palade yahood jointly awarded the Nobel puraskaar in physiology or ayurvigyaan, in 1974, liye the discovery of the ribosomes.
the nobel puraskaar in Chemistry 2009 thi awarded to venkatraman ramakrishnan, Thomas A. steitz and Ada E. yonath liye determining the vistrut dhaancha or yantriki of the ribosom.

avlokan of the calvin cycle or carbon fixation
The light-independent pratikriyaayein of photosynthesis hai rasinic reactions that badalen carbon dioxide or anya yogicon into glucose.
These pratikriyaayein occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled area of a haritalvak outside of the thylakoid jhilliyon.
ye reactions take the light-dependent pratikriyaayein or perform further chemical prakriyaaon on them.
There hai teen phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively pukaara the calvin cycle : carbon fixation, katautee pratikriyaayein, or ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( rubp ) regeneration.
Despite iske name, is prakram occurs only when light is uplabdhiyaan.
Plants do not carry out the calvin saikil by raatri.
ve, bajaay, relies sucrose into the floem isse unke mand reserves.
is prakram happens when lite is available independent of the dayaalu of photosynthesis ( c3 carbon fixation, c4 carbon fixation, and crassulacean Acid chayapachay ) ; cam paudhe store malic acid in unke vacuoles prayek raatri or relies it by din in order to make this prakram kaary.
in ganit, a square kramank or perfect vargakar is an purnank that is the vargakar of an integer ; in anya shabd, it is the utpaada of kuch purnank saath itself.
liye example, 9 is a vargakar kramank, chunki it can be likhaa as.
The usual sanketan liye the sutara liye the vargakar of a kramank is not the utpaada, but the samatuly exponentiation, praayah sunaaya as `` vargakar ''.
the naam vargakar kramank aata isse the naam of the aakaar ; dekhie below.
vargakar sankhyaayein hai non-negative.
another rasta of saying ki a ( non-negative ) kramank is a square kramank, is that its vargakar jaden hai again integers.
liye example, = ±3, so 9 is a vargakar kramank.
A dhanatmak purnank ki rai no purna vargakar divisors magar 1 is called square-free.
liye a non-negative integer, the th square number is, saath hone the zeroth vargakar.
the avadharana of square can be vistaarit to kuch anya number systems.
if rational numbers hai shaamil, tab a vargakar is the anupaat of do square integers, and, conversely, the ratio of do square integers is a vargakar ( e.g., 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ).
starting with 1, vahin are vargakar sankhyaayein up to and sahit, jahaan the abhivyakti represents the floor of the number.
The era of shubh jajbaat chihnit a kaal in the rajnatik itihaas of the sanyukt rajya ki reflected a bhav of neshnal purpose or a khwaahish liye unity among america in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars.
the era dekhi the patan of the federalist party or an end to the kadava dalgat vivaadon between it or the prabal democratic-republican party dauraan the First Party System.
adhyaksh james munro endeavored to downplay dalgat sambhddha in making his nominations, saath the ultimate lakshya of neshnal ekta and eliminating partiyon altogether isse neshnal raajnneeti.
the period is so closely associated saath Monroe 's presidency ( 1817–1825 ) and uske prashasnic lakshya that uske name or the era are vastutah synonymous.
the era of shubh Feelings marked a transition in amareeki raajnneeti with the samaapt of the federalist party as america began to develop baad the War of 1812.
jabaki america was experiencing vikaas and samruddhi baad the yuddh saath britain, this era bhi marks the pehla udhaaharan of aarthik troubles in the growing sanyukt rajya.
mirroring the American pranali prastaavit by henry mitti, surakshatmak tariffs or the chartering of the duusari bainko of the sanyukt rajya jatil the tension between the uttar and South saath the coming of the pehla financial crisis.
jabaki the pad “era of shubh Feelings” is usually viewed saath irony kuki of the political turmoil, aarthik karkon caused animosity between the uttar or dakshin.
the namakan of the kaal by itihaaskaaron as one of “good feelings” is praayah conveyed saath vidambnaa or skepticism, as the itihaas of the era thi ek in jisase the rajnatik maahaul thi strained and divisive, visheshkar among girohon bheetar the munro prashasan or the republican party.
the phrase “era of shubh feelings” thi coined by benjamin Russell, in the boston Federalist newspaper, columbian Centinel, on july 12, 1817, following munro 's vizit to boston, masachusets as bhaag of uske shubh hoga daure of America.

confucianism, Taoism, and Buddhism hai one, a painting in the litang style portraying teen main hans by a nadi stream, 12th sadi, song rajvansh.
estimating the kramank of baudhon in the sansar, or in anek deshon, is mushkil due to definitional issues as khub as vyaavhaarik problems of enumeration.
to shuru saath, the dharmik manyataon, practices, or pahchaan of east Asians ( jo comprise the majority of the world 's baudhon by any maap ) often mishran buddhism with anya paramparaon sahit confucianism, the chinis lok dharm, daoism, Shinto, or Korean shamanism.
Most followers of Buddhism do nahin belong to sanrachit congregations, or observe a definite anushthan of adherence such as taking sharan, making it mushkil to accurately anumaan the kramank of practitioners.
an additional chunauti is the hostility of several neshnal governments ( praayah Communist ones aise as China or uttar Korea ) to dharm generally or to buddhism specifically.
sarkari policies in ye deshon may protsaahit the under-reporting or non-reporting of dharmik adherence, resulting in official yoga ki may drastically underestimate the number of dharmik practitioners in ye deshon.
Estimate of the vishwavyaapee buddha janasankhyikee dayera isse 350 lakh to over ek arab, lakin cluster nearer to the pehla figure.
adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a figure of 397 lakh.
by pramukh shakhaon, the sankhyaayein are as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana buddhism, sahit east asian Buddhism, saath no kam than 185 lakh adherents, or sambhawatah several times ki anek ( again, depending on definitional mudde ).
is is the predominant rup of buddhism practiced in china, South korian, japani, Taiwan, singapore, or vietnam.
( 2 ) Theravada buddhism, saath no kam than 125 lakh adherents.
is is the predominant rup of buddhism practiced in cambodia, thailand, laos, Sri lanka, or Burma.
( 3 ) vajrayan Buddhism, saath lagbhag 20 lakh adherents.
is rup predominates in the vrihad tibeti and Mongolian regions, as khub as in the Himalayas.
besides the swatantra deshon of mongol or bhutan, or vibhinn territories bheetar what is now western china, Vajrayana is traditional to nishchit regions of rus ( e.g. kalmikia, buratiya ), india ( e.g. ladakh, sikkim ), or Nepal ( e.g. Khumbu ).
vajrayan, bhi gyaat as tibeti buddhism, is praayah conflated saath Tantric buddhism, but this is imprecise, as shingon or anya form of East asian Buddhism bhi abhyaas tantra.
at tanik 7 deshon ( shri lanka, Thailand, cambodia, Laos, burma, bhutan, or mongol ) have unambiguous buddha majorities.
depending on how ek calculates chinis or anya East asian adherents, is figure might vistaar to shaamil anek adhik deshon.
In jod, buddhism is the rajya dharm of cambodia or bhutan, or receives prominent mention in the constitutions of thailand or Sri lanka.
in northern india or nepal, the land jahaan buddhism thi born, the dharm severely asweekrut dauraan the pehla milinium.
whether is manaahi was due to the islamic conquest of northern india, or to other karkon, remains controversial.

a Mars rover is an swachaalit motor gadee which propels itself aarpaar the sataha of the grah mangal baad landing.

A vittiya audit, or more accurately, an audit of vittiya kathan, is the satyaapan of the vittiya kathan of a vidhik entity, with a drishy to express an audit opinion.
the audit raay is intended to provide uchit parakh, lakin nahin nirpeksh parakh, ki the financial kathan are prastut fairly, in sab saamagree respects, and/or de a sachcha or mela drishy in accordance saath the financial reporting fremawork.
the purpose of an audit is provide or uddeshy swatantra parikshaw of the vittiya statements, which increases the value or credibility of the vittiya kathan utpaadit by prabandhan, thus increase upayokta vishwaas in the vittiya bayaan, reduce niveshkon risk or consequently reduce the laagat of puunji of the preparer of the financial statements.
vittiya audits are typically performed by firms of practicing lekhpal jo are visheshgy in vittiya reporting.
the vittiya audit is ek of anek assurance functions provided by accounting firms.
anek sanghathan separately employ or hire aatanrik auditors, jo do nahin attest to vittiya reports but fokas mukhyatah on the internal niyantran of the sanghathan.
bahya auditors may choose to place simit reliance on the kaary of aatanrik auditors.
auditing promotes transparency or sateekta in the vittiya disclosures made by an sanghathan, isliye hota sambhavit to reduce of aise corporations to conceal unscrupulous dealings.
internationally, the antarrashtriya maanakon on auditing ( isa ) jari by the International auditing or Assurance maanakon falak ( IAASB ) is mana as the benchmark liye audit prakram.
Almost sab jurisdictions aavashyaktaa auditors to follow the isa or a local variation of the isa.
dollars coins have maharoom minted in the United rajya in sunaharaa, chaandi, or aadhaar metal sanskaran.
The pad chaandi dollars is praayah used for koi vishaal shwet metal sikaa jari by the United rajya with a phase value of one dollars, haalanki purists insist that a dollars is not chaandi unless it contains kuch of that metal.
chaandi dollar, the pehla dollars coin samasya, yahood minted shuruuaat in 1794.
Gold dollars or gold-colored dollar have also maharoom produced by the sanyukt rajya.
the sacagawea and Presidential dollar hai praayah referred to as `` sunahari dollar ''.

despite praytn by the sarkari to prachaar their upyog, most Americans currently use the one dollars bill rather than dollars sikke.
in straight or level flight lift ( l ) barabari vazan ( w ).
in a banked phere of 60°, lift equals doguna the weight ( l=2w ).
The pilot anubhavon 2g or a doubled vazan.
the steeper the bainko, the vrihad the g-forces.
This top-fuel dragster can accelerate isse shunya to in 0.86 second.
is is a horizontal twaran of 5.3 g. sanyukt saath the lambavat g-force in the stationary maamla the pythagorean prameya yields a g force of 5.4 g.
g-force ( saath g isse gurutvkarshak ) is a term liye accelerations felt as vazan or measurable by accelerometers.
It is nahin a force, prati se, but a force per ikai dravyaman.
chunki such a force is perceived as a vazan, any g-force can be varnit as a `` vazan per ikai dravyaman '' ( dekhie the paryaay vishisht vazan ).
The g-force twaran adhiniyamon as a multiplier of weight-like forces for prayek unit of an object 's mass, and ( sahejen liye nishchit electromagnetic force prabhaav ) is the kaaran of an object 's acceleration in relation to free-fall.
is twaran experienced by an object is due to the vector yoga of non-gravitational shaktiyaan acting on an object free to move.
the accelerations ki are nahin utpaadit by gravity hai termed uchit accelerations, or it is tabhi ye ki are measured in g-force units.
ve kaaran tanaavon and strains on vastuen.
Because of these strains, vishaal g-forces may be destructive.
gravitation acting alon does not produce a g-force, even haalanki g-forces hai expressed in multiples of the twaran of a maanak gambheertha.
yun, the maanak gurutvkarshak twaran at the dharti 's sataha produces g-force tabhi indirectly, as a result of resistance to it by mechanical shaktiyaan.
The 1 g-force on an object baithe on the dharti 's sataha is caused by mechanical force exerted in the upward disha by the maidan, keeping the object isse going into free-fall.
the upward force isse the ground ensures that an object at baaki on the dharti 's sataha is accelerating saapeksh to the free-fall condition, which is the path ki the object hota follow jab girnaa freely toward the Earth 's bich.
vastuen anumat to free-fall in an inertial trajectory under the influence of gravitation-only, mahasoos no g-force.
is is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' conditions andar a freely falling elevator girnaa toward the Earth 's bich ( in vaikum ), or ( to shubh sanniktan ) sharten inside a spacecraft in dharti kaksha.
ye are udhaaharan of nirdeshaank twaran ( a change in gati ) bagaiyr a sansani of weight.
the experience of no g-force ( zero-g ), however it is utpaadit, is synonymous saath weightlessness.
in the anupasthiti of gurutvkarshak field, or in directions at sahi kone to unhen, proper and nirdeshaank accelerations hai the vahi, or koi nirdeshaank twaran jarur be utpaadit by a corresponding g-force twaran.
an udhaaharan yahan is a prakshepastra in free spes, in jisase saral parivartan in gati hai produced by the engines, or upaj g-forces on the rocket or passengers.
an augur pakadakar a lituus, the curved wand often used as a symbol of augury on Roman sikke
The augur thi a pujari and official in the shastreey sansar, visheshkar ancient rome or etruria.
uske pramukh role thi to interpret the hoga of the devataaon by adhyayan the udaan of birds : whether ve are flying in samooh or alon, kayaa noises they mek as they makkhi, disha of flight or what dayaalu of pakshiyon ve hai.
is was gyaat as `` lene the auspices. ''
the rasm and falan of the augur thi central to koi pramukh undertaking in roman society—public or private—including matters of yuddh, commers, or religion.
The roman itihaaskaar livy stresses the importance of the augurs : `` Who karata not know that is nagar thi santhaapit only baad lene the auspices, ki sabakuch in yuddh or in salaam, at home or videsh, was kiya tabhi baad lene the auspices ? ''
Farmington pahadiyaan is an affluent jatiyaan in southeastern michigan.
it is the duusari largest nagar in ockland county in the u.S. rajya of michigan.
iske janasankhyikee was 79,740 at the 2010 census.
It is bhaag of the upscale northwestern upnagaron of mahanagar detroit or is also purvottar of downtown ain arbor.
farmington pahadiyaan consistently baandhane as one of the safest shaharon in the sanyukt States, as khub as in the rajya of Michigan.

Present-day chhap of a let kaansya Age seal
Town muhar ( matrix ) of náchod isse 1570
a seal is a yantra liye bananaa an chhap in mom, clay, paper, or some anya medium, sahit an embossment on paper, and is bhi the chhap yun bana.
the asli purpose thi to authenticate a dastauez, a wrapper liye ek aise as a modern lipapha, or the cover of a sangraahak or package pakadakar valuables or anya vastuen.
the sealing process is essentially ki of a saanche, saath the final chitra represented on the yantra liye making the chhap by a mirror-image dizine, incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio.
The seal-making yantra is bhi referred to as the seal metrics or die ; the imprint it creates as the seal impression ( or, adhik rarely, the sealing ).
if the impression is made purely as a raahat resulting isse the vrihad dabaav on the paper jahaan the unchi bhaag of the metrics touch, the muhar is gyaat as a shushk seal ; in all anya cases a drav or liquified medium ( such as ink or mom ) is used, praayah in another rang than the paper.
liye vidhik uddeshy, the definition of a muhar may be vistaarit to include rabar stamps, or writing specified shabd ( `` muhar '' or `` l.s. `` ).
in the United States, the shabd `` muhar '' is sometimes abantit to a facsimile of the seal dizine ( in monochrome or color ), which may be prayukt in a variety of contexts including architectural jamaavat, on dhvaj, or on official letterheads.
yun, for example, the Great muhar of the sanyukt rajya, among other uses, appears on the reverse of the one-dollar vidheyak ; or several of the seals of the U.S. rajya appear on unke sambandhit rajya dhvaj.
in Europe, haalanki coats of bahen and heraldic baij may khub visheshta in aise contexts as well as on seals, the muhar dizine in iske entirety rarely appears as an emblem.
the padhai of seals is gyaat as sigillography or sphragistics.
groundhog Day ( pencilvenia germany : grundsaudaag, murmeltiertag ) is a din manaaye on farvari 2.
according to folklore, if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges isse its burrow on this day, then vasant hoga aaiye jaldi ; if it is sani, the groundhog hoga mana dekhie iske shadow or retreat back into iske burrow, and the sheet weather hoga continue for chah adhik saptaah.
Modern customs of the avkaash involve jashn where jaldi morning festivals are yojit to dekhen the groundhog ubharate isse iske burrow.
in southeastern pencilvenia, Groundhog lodges ( grundsow Lodges ) celebrate the avkaash saath fersommlinge, soshal events in jisase khaanaa is served, speeches hai made, or ek or adhik g'spiel ( plays or skits ) hai performed for entertainment.
The Pennsylvania germany dialect is the only bhashaa bolaa at the event, or those jo speak angrezi adaa a penalty, praayah in the form of a nickel, dime, or quarter prati word spoken, saath the dhan put into a bowl in the bich of the talika.
the largest groundhog Day celebration is yojit in punxsutawney, Pennsylvania.
groundhog din, already a widely pahachaanaa or lokapriy parampara, praapt widespread dhyaan as a result of the 1993 filmi groundhog Day, jisase thi niyat in punxsutawney, pa ( haalanki filmaaya primarily in Woodstock, il ) or portrayed punxsutawney Phil.
unchi rezolution chitra of tampa Bay pradesh
The Tampa khadi kshetrafal rai a ardra subtropical jalwaayu ( koppen cfa ), saath garam or ardra greeshm saath frequent thunderstorms and drier winters saath jamane temperatures occurring prayek 2–3 saalo.
the area experiences a significant garmiyaan geela season, as nearly two-thirds of the salanaa varshan jalprapaat in the months of june through September.
the area is soochibaddh by the sanyukt rajya Department of krishi ( usd ) as hone in hardiness mandal 10, jisase is parichay the uttari seemaa of jahaan nariyal hatheliyaan or royal hatheliyaan can be grown.
highs praayah dayera between 65 or 95 °f ( 18 and 35 °c ) saal golakaar.
Though gyaat for hot summers, tampa 's aadhikarik high rai never pahunche 100 °f ( 38 °c ) – the nagar 's all-time ricard taapmaana is 99 °f ( 37 °C ).
st. petersburg 's all-time ricard unchi is exactly 100 °f ( 38 °c ).
pinellas county lies on a peninsula between tampa Bay or the Gulf of Mexico, or much of the nagar of tampa jhooth on a choti prayadweep jutting out into tampa khadi.
is nikatataa to vishaal laashen of jal dono narampanthiyon temperatures or introduces large amounts of ardrata into the maahaul.
In saamaanya, the local communities farthest isse the coast have larger temperature seemayen, both dauraan a single day or throughout the sizan of the saal.
A aarekh of the electromagnetic varnakram, showing vibhinn gun across the dayera of barambharataa and wavelengths
The electromagnetic varnakram is the dayera of sab sambhavit barambharataa of electromagnetic vikiran.
the `` electromagnetic varnakram '' of an object rai a alag meaning, or is bajaay the characteristic vitaran of electromagnetic vikiran utsarjit or avashoshit by ki particular object.
the electromagnetic varnakram extends isse below the low frequencies used liye aadhunik radio sanchaar to gamma vikiran at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) samaapt, thereby covering wavelengths isse hazaron of kilometre bas to a fraction of the aakaar of an atom.
the seemaa liye long wavelengths is the aakaar of the universe itself, jabaki it is vichaar ki the short wavelength seemaa is in the vicinity of the plank lambaai, haalanki in principle the varnakram is anant and continuous.
sabase parts of the electromagnetic varnakram are used in vigyaan for spectroscopic or anya probing interactions, as tareeke to padhai and characterize matter.
In jod, radiation isse various parts of the varnakram rai mila anek other uses liye sanchaar or manufacturing ( dekhie electromagnetic radiation liye adhik anuprayog ).
legend
franklin Delano rujvelt ( or ; janvari 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), bhi gyaat by uske initials, FDR, thi the 32nd President of the sanyukt rajya ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in sansar kaarykram dauraan the mid-20th sadi, agrani the United rajya during a samay of vishwavyaapee economic depression or kul yuddh.
A dominant leader of the Democratic party or the only American adhyaksh elected to more than do terms, he nirmit a nai saude gathbandhan ki realigned American politics baad 1932, as his gharelu nitiyon paribhaashit American udaarataavaad liye the madhya teesraa of the 20th sadi.
saath the bouncy popular song `` prasann dinon hai Here again `` as uske abhiyaan theme, FDR parajeet incumbent republican herbert hover in navambar 1932, at the gaharaai of the Great avsaad.
sakriy by uske personal vijay over polio, fdr 's unfailing optimism or activism contributed to a naveekaran of the neshnal spirit.
he worked closely with angrejon pradhan mantri winston churchill and soviet saamaanya Secretary joseph stallin in agrani the allies viruddh germany or Japan in sansar War ii, or restoring samruddhi to the swadesh 's arthvyavastha.
in uske pehla sau dinon in daftar, jisase began kooch 4, 1933, rujvelt pathpradarshan major vidhaan or jari a profusion of karypalika aadesh that instituted the nai saude —a variety of kaarykram designed to upaj raahat ( sarkari jobs liye the berozegaar ), recovery ( aarthik vikaas ), or sudhaar ( through regulation of wal gali, bainko or transportation ).
the economy improved rapidly isse 1933 to 1937, lakin then relapsed into a gahan mandi.
the bipartisan roodhiwaadee gathbandhan that formed in 1937 prevented uske packing the param adaalat or passing koi considerable legislation ; it abolished anek of the raahat kaarykram jab berogari diminished dauraan sansar yuddh ii.
sabase of the regulations on kaarobaar yahood ended parichay 1975–85, magar liye the viniman of wal gali by the Securities or Exchange ayog, which still exists.
Along saath several smaller programs, pramukh surviving programs shaamil the sangheey Deposit Insurance nigam, jisase was nirmit in 1933, and soshal suraksha, jisase Congress passed in 1935.
as sansar War II loomed after 1938, with the japani akraman of china or the aakraamakata of naaji Germany, fdr diya damdaar diplomatic or financial support to China or great Britain, jabaki remaining officially neutral.
His lakshya was to mek america the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` which hota supply munitions to the allies.
in kooch 1941, rujvelt, saath congressional sweekruti, provided lend-lease aid to the deshon lard viruddh naaji germany saath britain.
saath bahut damdaar national support, he bana yuddh on Japan or Germany baad the japani akraman on Pearl harbar on December 7, 1941, calling it a `` tithi jisase will sajiv in infamy ``.
he paryvekshit the mobilization of the u.S. economy to support the alide yuddh praytn.
as an kriyasheel sainya netaa, rujvelt implemented an overall yuddh ranneeti on do fronts ki ended in the defeat of the aksh shaktiyaan and the vikaas of the sansar 's pehla anu bomb.
in 1942 rujvelt ordered the internment of 100,000 japani amareeki nagarikon.
berogari dropped to 2 %, raahat kaarykram largely ended, and the industrial arthvyavastha grew rapidly to new hits as lakho of people moved to nai kaary in yuddh centers, and 16 lakh men or 300,000 women yahood drafted or volunteered for sainya service.
rujvelt varchasv the amareeki rajnatik jhaanki nahin tabhi dauraan the twelve saalo of uske presidency, lakin also for dashakon afterward.
he orchestrated the realignment of matadaata ki created the Fifth Party pranali.
FDR 's New saude gathbandhan united majdoor unions, big nagar machines, shwet ethnics, africa america or gramin white southerners.
he bhi influenced the later sristi of the sanyukt Nations or bretton woods.
rujvelt is consistently rated by vidwaanon as one of the sheersh teen U.S. raashtrapatiyon, saath saath abraham lincoln or george Washington.
a liberal democrate, rujvelt paribhaashit his vaicharik sthiti as `` a choti baayein of center. ''
a Joint cameti is a term in politics ki is prayukt to refer to a cameti made up of sadasyon of dono chambers of a bicameral vidhanmandal.
in anya contexts, it refers to a cameti with members isse adhik than ek sanghathan.
The viniman of veshyavriti in the sanyukt States is nahin among the enumerated shaktiyaan of the sangheey sarkari ; antargat the Tenth amendment to the sanyukt rajya samvidhan, it is therefore exclusively the domen of the rajya to permit, prohibit, or varanaa viniyamit vanijyik sex, magar insofar as Congress may viniyamit it as bhaag of antarraji commers with kanoon like the man Act.
in sabase rajya, prostitution is mana a misdemeanor in the shrenee of public order crime, a aparaadhon that disrupts the anukram of a community.
It thi at ek time considered to be a vagrancy aparaadhon.
philhal, newada is the tabhi rajya to allow brothel prostitution, the terms of jisase hai stipulated in the newada sanshodhit statutes.
tabhi 8 county currently contain kriyasheel brothels.
sab form of veshyavriti hai illegal in clark county ( jisase contains the Las vegas–paradise mahanagar kshetrafal ), washoe county ( jisase contains reno ), carsan City, duglas county, or Lincoln county.
The anya counties theoretically allow veshyalay veshyavriti, lakin kuch of ye county philhal have no active brothels.
gali prostitution, `` pandering, '' or jeena off of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal antargat Nevada vidhi, as elsewhere in the country.
as saath anya countries, veshyavriti in the United rajya can be vibhajit into teen vyapak categories : gali veshyavriti, veshyalay veshyavriti, and escort prostitution.
the neshnal dhvaj of the sanyukt States of America, often bas referred to as the American dhvaj, consists of thirteen baraabar aadaa dhaariyaan of red ( sheersh or neeche ) alternating saath shwet, saath a blue ytaakar in the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` sangh '' ) bearing fifty choti, white, five-pointed sitaron arranged in nine offset aadaa pankti of six sitaron ( sheersh or bottom ) prayavarti saath pankti of paanch sitaron.
the 50 sitaron on the dhvaj represent the 50 rajya of the sanyukt rajya of america or the 13 dhaariyaan represent the thirteen angrejon colonies ki declared swatantraaa isse the kingdom of Great Britain and became the first states in the sangh.
Nicknames for the flag shaamil the `` sitaron and dhaariyaan '', `` Old mahima ``, or `` The star-spangled dhvaj. ''
india is a federal sangh of rajya comprising twenty-eight states or saat sangh territories.
the states and territories hai further subdivided into jile or so on.
Congressional districts liye the 113th sanyukt rajya congress
2010 janasankhyikee change:
Change in apportionment of congressional jile, starting in 2013, as a result of the 2010 census.
2000 janasankhyikee change:
badalen in apportionment of congressional jile, from 2003 to 2013, as a parinaam of the 2000 janasankhyikee.
is is a puraa suchi of congressional jile liye representation in the sanyukt rajya house of pratinidhi.
the maatra ( apportionment ) or boundaries ( redistricting ) of jile hai determined after prayek janasankhyikee, although in kuch maamle rajya have badla the seemayen adhik than ekbar prati census.
This suchi includes the 435 vartmaan or over 200 obsolete districts.
For example, chunki the 2000 janasankhyikee, nebraska rai tha three jile, lakin it prayukt to have as anek as chah.
in the pehla dashak of the twenty-first sadi, texas tha 32 jile, but rai since added chaar due to reapportionment as a parinaam of the 2010 janasankhyikee.
Other states have khoyaa jile chunki the number of congressional site rai maharoom niyat at 435 by statute.
bhi included here hai non-voting delegations : six vartmaan or chaar obsolete.
The seemayen of jile praayah shift saath prayek redistricting.
Over samay, the region and demographics represented in a zila can badalen substantially.
Furthermore, districts sometimes retain the same seemayen jabaki badalanaa unke zila numbers.
mariah kairi ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an amareeki singer, songwriter, ricard nirmaataa, abhinetri, and locasevak.
Under the guidance of colombia Records karypalika tommy Mottola, Carey released her self-titled debyue studio album mariah kairi in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and shakhit four lagaataar number ek singles on the U.S. billboard Hot 100 chart.
Following uske vivaah to Mottola in 1993 and kamyaabi saath hit records bhav ( 1991 ), music baksaa ( 1993 ), or mairi christmas ( 1994 ), Carey was established as colombia 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) bana music history jab iske duusari single `` One mithi din ``, a duet saath boij II main, kharch a record solah saptaah on sheersh of the billboard Hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history.
dauraan the recording of the album, kairi began to deviate from uske r & b and pop beginnings or slowly traversed into hip hop.
is musical badalen became evident with the release of titali ( 1997 ), at jisase samay Carey tha separated isse mottola.
kairi baayein colombia in 2000, or hastakshrit a record-breaking $ 100 lakh recording anubandh with Virgin record.
Before the relies of uske pehla feature film glitter ( 2001 ), wo suffered a shaareerik and emotional vishleshan or thi hospitalized liye severe exhaustion.
Following the filmi 's garib resepshan, wo thi kharida out of uske recording contract liye $ 50 million, jisase led to a manaahi in her kariyar.
She hastakshrit a multi-million dollars anubandh saude saath Island record in 2002, or after an unsuccessful kaal, laute to the sheersh of music chart saath the emancipation of mimi ( 2005 ).
iske duusari single `` we belong saath `` became uske sabase successful single of the 2000s, or thi later named `` song of the dashak '' by billboard.
kairi ekbar again ventured into filmi saath a well-received starring bhoomika in ( 2009 ) ; wo was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance puraskaar '' at the Palm sroton International filmi parv, and blike reel or NAACP Image puraskaar nominations.
in a kariyar spanning over do decades, kairi rai bechi adhik than 200 lakh record worldwide, bananaa her ek of the best-selling music kalakaaron of sab samay.
in 1998, she thi honored as the sansar 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the sansar Music Awards.
kairi thi bhi namit the best-selling maadaa kalakaar of the milinium in 2000.
according to the recording Industry sangh of America, wo is the third best-selling maadaa kalakaar in the sanyukt rajya, with 63.5 lakh certified album.
saath the release of `` tach my Body `` ( 2008 ), Carey gained uske eighteenth number ek single in the sanyukt rajya, adhik than koi other solo kalakaar.
In 2012, kairi thi kramit second on vh1 's suchi of the `` 100 mahanatam mahilaon in music ''.
aside isse her commercial accomplishments, kairi rai jiti paanch grami Awards, 17 World music Awards, 11 amareeki music Awards, and 31 Billboard music puraskaar.
referred to as the `` songbird param '' by the ginis World record, wo is famed liye uske five-octave vocal dayera, power, melismatic style or hastakshar upyog of the siti panjikaran.
stratocumulus stratiformis cumulogenitus
in meteorology, a cloud is a visible dravyaman of drav droplets or frozen crystals bana of water or vibhinn chemicals nilambit in the maahaul upar the sataha of a grahiy deh.
These nilambit anu hai bhi known as aerosols.
badal in dharti 's maahaul hai studied in the cloud bhautikee branch of meteorology.
do processes, sambhawatah acting saath, can lead to air banane santrupt ; kooling the air or adding water vapor to the air.
In saamaanya, precipitation hoga patan to the sataha ; an excepshan is virga, jisase evaporates pehle reaching the surface.
the international cloud classification pranali is aadhaarit on the fact badal in unke sabase moulik form can dikhaaen free-convective upward vikaas jaise kapaasi, appear in non-convective paratdaar sheets aise as strates, or take the form of patala tantumay wisps, as in the case of pakshabh.
prefixes hai used in conection with badal to express variations or complexities in ye basic form or to bataaen madhya or unchi oonchaai ranges.
ye shaamil strato- liye kam clouds saath simit sanvahan ki rup mostly in uneven layers, cumulo- liye jatil highly-convective toofaan badal, nimbo- liye motaa layered badal of some jatilta that can upaj moderet to baari varshan, alto- liye madhya badal, or cirro- liye unchi badal ; the latter two of jisase may be of saral or madhyam jatil dhaancha.
whether or not a cloud is kam, middle, or unchi str depends on kaisaa dur above the maidan its aadhaar forms.
Cloud types saath significant lambavat extent can rup in the kam or madhya oonchaai ranges depending on the nami saamagree of the air.
Clouds in the kshobhamandal have latin names due to the lokapriy anukulan of luk harvard 's cloud categorization pranali, which began to sprad in popularity during disambar 1802.
synoptic sataha mausam observations upyog code sankhyaayein to ricard and rapat the prakaar of tropospheric cloud drishy at prayek anusuchit observation samay aadhaarit on the height or shaareerik rup of the clouds.
jabaki a bahumat of clouds rup in Earth 's troposphere, vahin are avasaron jab badal in the stratosphere or mesosphere can be observed.
ye three main paraton of the maahaul jahaan clouds may be seen hai collectively gyaat as the homosphere.
upar is lies the thermosphere or exosphere, jisase together make up the heterosphere ki marks the transition to bahari space.
badal have maharoom observed on other grah and moons bheetar the saura pranali, lakin, due to unke alag temperature characteristics, ve hai rachit of other substances aise as methane, ammonia, or sulfuric acid.
Galveston County is a county located in the U.S. rajya of texas bheetar the houston–sugar land–baytown mahanagar kshetrafal.
as of the 2010 janasankhyikee, the janasankhyikee thi 291,309.
Its county seat is Galveston.
lig nagar is the largest nagar in Galveston County in sharten of janasankhyikee ; url_http between 2000 or 2005 it surpassed galveston as the county 's largest city.
galveston county thi founded in 1838.

is is a suchi of shaharon in the bahama.

the big ten sammelan, formerly Western sammelan or Big nau sammelan, is the oldest Division i college athlettic sammelan in the United rajya.
iske baarah sadsy institutions ( which are primarily flagship shodh vishvavidhyalayon in unke sambandhit rajya, well-regarded academically, or with apekshaakrit large chaatr namakan ) hai stith primarily in the Midwest, stretching from nebraska in the west to penn rajya in the east.
the sammelan competes in the NCAA 's prabhag i ; iske football tiimon compete in the footbaal katori subdivision ( fbs ), formerly gyaat as prabhag I-A, the ucchtam str of ncaa pratiyogita in ki khel.
sadsy schools of the big Ten ( or, in two cases, unke janak vishvavidhyalayon pranaaliyon ) bhi hai sadasyon of the cameti on sansthagat sahyog, a agrani shaikshanik or research consortium.
despite the sammelan 's naam, the big ten darasal consists of 12 skulon, following the jod of the pencilvenia rajya vishvavidhyalayon in 1993 and the vishvavidhyalayon of Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011.
In 2014, the conference will vistaar to 14 sadasyon with the additions of the vishvavidhyalayon of maryland, college park or rutgers, the rajya University of nai jersey.
it is nahin to be uljhan saath the big 12 sammelan, which rai only ten skulon or represents a alag pradesh of the country.
single malt scoch is single malt whisky made in scotland using a pot still distillation prakram at a single distillery, saath malted jau as the tabhi anaaj sanghatak.
as saath koi scoch whisky, a single malt Scotch jarur be asut in scotland and matured in ok casks in Scotland liye at least teen saalo ( sabase single malts hai matured longer ).
`` malt '' indicates that the whisky is asut isse a `` malted '' grain.
Several prakaar of grains can be malted ( for udhaaharan, barley, rye and wheat hai sab dane jisase can be malted ) ; however, in the maamla of single malt Scotch, jau is sadaa the tabhi anaaj used.
`` Single '' indicates ki all the malts in the bottle come isse a single distillery.
Bottlings containing malt whisky from multiple distilleries are pukaara `` blended malt ``.
jabatak the Scotch whisky regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ), the word `` blended '' tabhi appeared ( in the context of scoch whisky ) on botalon of whisky ki contained a mixture of dono jau or non-barley anaaj whisky, lakin is is no longer the maamla.
antargat the terminology established by the swr 2009, a `` blended malt scoch whisky '' is a mixture of single malt scoch whiskies, nahin a mishran of malted jau whisky and non-barley whisky ; those hai pukaara `` blended scoch whisky '', bagaiyr the word `` malt ''.
the pad `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted malt '' prayukt antargat the prior labling prathaon.
the aayu bayaan on a bottle of single malt scoch is the number of years the whisky kharch maturing in cask.
as bahut few whiskies hai bottleband isse a single cask the aayu statement reflects the aayu of the youngest malt in the mixr.
a texture may be arranged so as to, `` closely approach the single-object status of fused-ensemble timbres, liye example, the beautiful 'northern lits ' cord..., in a bahut interesting distribution of pitches, produces a fused sound supported by a suspended cymbal phenken `` ( arikson ( 1975 ), p.166 & 168 ).
in contrast to adhik paramparaagat musical textures, sound dravyaman sangyojan `` minimizes the mahatv of vyaktigat pitches in variyata liye texture, timbre, or dynamiks as praathmik shapers of gesture and prabhaav. ''
viksit from the modernist tone cluster or spread to orchestral likhane by the let 1950s or 1960s, sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between dhwani or noise `` ( edwards 2001, pp. 326–27 ).
takneekon jisase may create or be prayukt saath dhwani dravyaman shaamil vistaarit takneekon aise as muted pital or strings, aatur tonguing, chaudee vibrato, charam seemayen, or glissandos.
composers or works shaamil barbara Kolb, pauline Oliveros ' Sound pattern for chorus ( 1961 ), norma beecroft 's From sapano of pital liye kores ( 1963–1964 ), and nancy vine de vate.
beecroft `` tukdaa vyaktigat pitches in ehsaan of a samuhik timbre through the upyog of gayan or instrumental cluster, choral vaak, narrator, and a dho of dhwani isse an electronic tepe. ''
( ibid )
A very early example is the kholane of jean-féry vidrohi 's baile Les Elémens ( 1737–38 ), jahaan araajaktaa is represented by a dhire cumulating orchestral cluster of all saat notes of the d minor scale ( Henck 2004, pp. 52–54 ).
a baad udhaaharan is the third gati of Ruth Crawford seeger 's string quartet 1931 ( nonesuch h-71280 ) jabaki adhik recently phill Niblock 's anek drone based music serves as an example.
The upyog of `` madari approaching timbres '' begins with Debussy and edgard varèse praayah carefully scored vyaktigat instrumental bhaag so ki they hota fus into ek ensemble timbre or sound dravyaman ( arikson 1975, pp. 18 or 21 ).
anya udhaaharan shaamil European `` textural '' rachanaaen of the fifties or sixties such as Krzysztof Penderecki 's Threnody to the peediton of hiroshima ( 1959 ) and György ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works like Atmosphères ( 1961 ) or uske requiem ( 1963-65 ).
Other composers with works using is takanic include henryk górecki, karel husa, Witold Lutosławski, kazimierz serocki, or Steven stucky.
dhwani dravyaman takneekon bhi appear in the music of george Crumb ( anon. n.d. ).

A student is a learner, or kisi jo attends an shaikshanik sanstha.
in kuch raashtra, the angrezi term ( or iske cognate in another bhashaa ) is surakshit for those jo attend university, jabaki a schoolchild antargat the aayu of atharah is called a pupil in angrezi ( or an samatuly in other bhashaaen ), haalanki in the United rajya a person namankit in grades k–12 is praayah pukaara a chaatr.
in its widest upyog, student is prayukt for anyone who is learning.
Australia is a continent comprising menland australia, tasmania, nai Guinea, seram, sambhawatah timor, or neighbouring islands.
the continent is sometimes gyaat in technical contexts by the names sahul, Australinea or meganesia, to fark it isse the australian mainland.
it is the smallest of the saat paramparaagat mahadwipon in the angrezi dharna.
nai Zealand is nahin part of the mahadweep of australia, lakin of the separate, submerged mahadweep of Zealandia.
zealandia or Australia hai dono part of the wider regions gyaat as australasia or mahasagariya.
The continent of Australia jhooth on a mahadwipiya shelf overlain by uthle seas jisase divide it into several landmasses — the arafura samudr or torace jalsandhi between mainland Australia or New gini, and baas Strait between mainland Australia or Tasmania.
jab samudr str yahood nimnatar dauraan the pleistocene barf age, sahit the pichhlaa glacial adhiktam parichay 18,000 bc, they were connected by shushk jameen.
During the past ten thousand saalo, rising samudr str overflowed the lowlands or alag the mahadweep into aaj 's low-lying arid to semi-arid menland and the two mountainous islands of nai gini or tasmania.
geologically, a mahadweep extends to the kinare of iske mahadwipiya shelf, so the now-separate islands hai considered part of the mahadweep.
due to the sprad of pashu, fungi or plants across the single Pleistocene landmass the pruthak lands have a related biota.
Central park is nearly twice as big as the world 's second-smallest country, monako.
historically its tank yahood mahatvapurn components of the nagar 's jal supply.
Environmental mudde in nai york City are affected by the city 's aakaar, ghanatv, abundant public parivahan infrastructure, or sthaan at the munh of the hadsan River.
New york 's population ghanatv has paryaavarniya phaayde and thag.
It facilitates the ucchtam mass transit upyog in the United rajya, lakin bhi concentrates pradooshan.
Gasoline khapat in the city is at the rate the national average was in the 1920s, or greenhouse gas emissions hai a fraction of the neshnal ausat, at 7.1 metric ton prati vyakti prati saal, neeche san Francisco, at 11.2 metric ton, or the neshnal ausat, at 24.5 metric ton.
nai York City khate liye tabhi 1 % of sanyukt States greenhouse gas emissions while awaas 2.7 % of iske population.
in sitambar 2012, nai York thi namit the # 1 `` America 's Dirtiest nagar, '' by a travel+leisure readership survey ki rated the paryaavarniya visheshta of 35 prominent shaharon in the sanyukt rajya.
atlanta (, stressed, locally ) is the capital of or the sabase populous city in the u.S. state of georgia, with an anumaanit 2011 population of 432,427.
atlanta is the saanskrithik and economic center of the atlanta mahanagar area, ghar to 5,457,831 logon or the ninth largest metropolitan kshetrafal in the sanyukt States.
Atlanta is the county seat of Fulton county, and a choti portion of the nagar extends eastward into dekalb county.
Atlanta was established in 1837 at the intersection of two railroad linon, or the nagar rose isse the raakh of the civil yuddh to become a neshnal center of commers.
in the decades following the civil adhikaron gati, dauraan which the nagar earned a pratishtha as `` too vyast to hate '' liye the pragatisheel views of iske nagarikon or leaders, Atlanta attained antarrashtriya prominence.
atlanta is the praathmik parivahan hub of the Southeastern United States, via rajmarg, railroad, or air, saath Hartsfield–Jackson atlanta International vimaanashetra being the world 's busiest vimaanashetra chunki 1998.
atlanta is considered an `` alpha ( - ) sansar nagar, '' and, saath a sakal gharelu product of us $ 270 arab, Atlanta’s arthvyavastha ranks 15th among sansar shaharon or chathe in the swadesh.
haalanki atlanta’s economy is mana vividh, dominant sectors include logistics, peshewar or kaarobaar sevaayen, media parichaalan, sarkari administration, or higher shiksha.
topographically, atlanta is chihnit by rolling pahadiyaan or ghanaa tree coverage.
punaroddhar of atlanta 's pados, initially spurred by the 1996 olympic, has intensified in the 21st sadi, altering the nagar 's demographics, politics, and samskruti.
A 1947 prachaar comic kitaab prakashit by the catechetical gild shaikshanik samaaj uthaane the specter of a Communist takeover
mccarthyism is the practice of bananaa aaropon of disloyalty, subversion, or treason bagaiyr proper regard liye pramaan.
It bhi means `` the abhyaas of bananaa anyaaypurna doshaaropan or using anyaaypurna investigative takneekon, visheshkar in anukram to simit dissent or rajnatik criticism. ''
the pad rai iske origins in the kaal in the sanyukt States gyaat as the duusari red scare, sthaayee roughly isse 1950 to 1956 or characterized by heightened fears of communist influence on amareeki institutions or espionage by Soviet agenton.
Originally coined to criticize the anti-communist pursuits of republican u.s. seenetter joseph maikaarthi of visconsin, `` mccarthyism '' jald took on a broader arth, describing the excesses of samaan efforts.
The pad is bhi now used adhik generally to describe laaparvaah, unsubstantiated aaropon, as khub as demagogic hamale on the akshar or rashtrabhakti of political adversaries.
During the McCarthy era, hazaron of america yahood abhiyukt of hone samyavaadiyon or communist sympathizers or became the vishay of aakraamak investigations and questioning pehle sarkari or private-industry panels, samitiyon and agenciyon.
the primary lakshya of aise suspicions were government karmchaaree, those in the entertainment industry, shikshak or sangh kaaryakartaaon.
Suspicions yahood praayah die credence despite inconclusive or questionable evidence, or the level of threat posed by a vyakti 's real or supposed vampanthi association or manyataon thi praayah greatly atiranjit.
anek logon suffered ghaataa of employment and/or vinaash of unke kariyar ; some even suffered karawas.
sabase of these punishments aae parichay through vichaaran verdicts later vikal, kanoon ki would be declared asanvaidhanik, dismissals liye kaaran later ghoshit illegal or actionable, or extra-legal prakriyaaon ki hota aaiye into general disrepute.
the sabase prasiddh udhaaharan of mccarthyism include the speeches, investigations, and hearings of seenetter maikaarthi khud ; the hollywood blacklist, sambhddha saath hearings conducted by the house Un-American kriyaayein Committee ( huac ) ; or the various anti-communist kriyaayein of the sangheey beuro of chaanbin ( epabiai ) antargat nideshak J. edgar hover.
McCarthyism was a faili social or cultural ghatana ki prabhavit sab str of samaaj and thi the sorce of a great saude of bahes or conflict in the sanyukt States.

the varun canada project is the world’s pehla regional-scale bhaate samandar observatory that plugs directly into the Internet.
Since disambar 2009, it has allowed logon to `` surf '' the seafloor while ocean vaigyanikon run deep-water prayog from labs and vishvavidhyalayon around the world.
saath with iske sistar project, shukr, varun offers a unique approach to ocean vigyaan.
traditionally, samandar scientists have relied on infrequent jalayaan cruge or space-based satellites to carry out their shodh, jabaki the varun project upyog a remotely sanchalit crollar.

rashtramandal is a paramparaagat angrezi term for a rajnatik community founded for the aam shubh.
historically, it has sometimes maharoom synonymous with `` ganatantr ``.

the sitambar 11 attacks ( also referred to as sitambar 11, sitambar 11th, or 9/11 ) yahood a shrenee of chaar coordinated aatankwaadi attacks launched by the Islamic aatankwaadi group al-Qaeda upon the United rajya in nai York nagar or the washington, d.C. kshetrafal on sitambar 11, 2001.
Four yatri airliners yahood hijacked by 19 al-qaeda aatankwaadi so they could be flown into buildings in aatmahatya attacks.
Two of those planes, amareeki Airlines udaan 11 and United airlines Flight 175, yahood krash into the uttar and South towers, respectively, of the sansar vyapaar Center complex in nai york City.
Within two ghanton, dono minaaren collapsed saath malba or the resulting fir causing aanshik or puraa collapse of all anya imaaraten in the wtc complex, as khub as pramukh damage to ten anya large surrounding structures.
a teesraa plane, American Airlines udaan 77, thi krash into the Pentagon ( the headquarters of the sanyukt States vibhaag of raksha ), leading to a aanshik patan in its pashchimi paksh.
the chauthi plane, sanyukt airlines udaan 93, thi targeted at the sanyukt States capital in Washington, d.C., lakin crashed into a field nikat shanksville, pencilvenia, baad iske yatri aajamaaya to overcome the hijackers.
in total, lagbhag 3,000 logon died in the hamale, sahit the 227 nagarikon or 19 hijackers aboard the chaar planes.
suspicion jaldi fell on al-Qaeda.
haalanki the samooh 's netaa, osama bin Laden, initially denied koi bhagidaari, in 2004 he claimed responsibility liye the attacks.
Al-Qaeda or bin laden cited u.S. support of Israel, the upasthiti of U.S. troops in Saudi arab, or pratibandhon viruddh iraqi as motives for the hamale.
The sanyukt States responded to the attacks by shubharambh the yuddh on Terror or akramanakari afghanistan to depose the taliban, jisase had harbored al-Qaeda.
anek deshon strengthened their anti-terrorism vidhaan or expanded vidhi enforcement shaktiyaan.
having evaded capchar liye saalo, bin Laden thi stith or maare by U.S. forces in May 2011.
The vinaash of the judwa minaaren or anya gun caused serious damage to the arthvyavastha of nimnatar manahaton or had a significant prabhaav on global bazaar.
clyaap of the sansar vyapaar bich site thi completed in may 2002, or the prastutikaran thi repaired bheetar a saal.
numerous memorials have been constructed, sahit the neshnal September 11 memorial & sangrahalay in nai York, the Pentagon memorial, and the Flight 93 neshnal memorial in pencilvenia.
After a lengthy vilamb, the ek sansar vyapaar bich is apekshit to be samaapt at maidan Zero in nai york City in 2013.
Crater jhil National park is a sanyukt States neshnal park stith in dakshini oregon.
sthapit in 1902, crater Lake neshnal park is the paanchvaan oldest neshnal park in the sanyukt States and the only ek in the rajya of Oregon.
The park encompasses the caldera of crater jhil, a remnant of a nasht volcano, Mount Mazama, or the surrounding hills or wanon.
The lake is deep at its deepest point, jisase makes it the deepest jhil in the sanyukt States, the duusari deepest in uttar america and the naveen deepest in the world.
Crater jhil is praayah referred to as the saatvaan deepest jhil in the sansar, lakin this purv listing excludes the lagbhag gaharaai of subglacial jhil Vostok in Antarctica, which resides under nearly of barf, or the haal report of a adhiktam gaharaai liye Lake o'higgins /san martin, stith on the kinaaraa of chile or argentina.
however, jab comparing its average gaharaai of to the ausat gaharaai of other gahan jhiilon, crater Lake becomes the deepest in the pashchimi golardh or the third deepest in the sansar.
the prabhaavshaalee ausat depth of is volcanic jhil is due to the nearly samamit gahan caldera formed 7,700 saalo ago dauraan the hinsak climactic eruptions or subsequent collapse of Mount Mazama or the apekshaakrit moist jalwaayu that is theth of the crest of the cascade Range.
The caldera rim ranges in elevation isse.
the sanyukt rajya Geological surveykshan benchmarked elevation of the jhil sataha itself is.
is National park encompasses.
Crater jhil has no stream bahati into or out of it.
sab jal ki enters the jhil is aakhirkaar khoyaa isse vashpikaran or subsurface seepage.
the jhil 's jal commonly rai a striking blue varna, or the jhil is re-filled entirely isse sidhaa precipitation in the rup of him or barsaat.
the Supreme adaalat of the sanyukt rajya is the highest adaalat in the sanyukt rajya.
It rai param ( and largely vivekadhin ) appellate kshetradhikaar over sab sangheey courts and over state adaalat cases involving issues of sangheey vidhi, or original jurisdiction over a choti range of maamle.
The adaalat, jisase meets in the sanyukt States param adaalat Building in washington, d.C., consists of a mukhya insaaf or aath associate justices who hai manonith by the adhyaksh and pushti by the sanyukt rajya seenet.
ekbar niyukt, justices have jivan tenure jabatak ve resign, retire, or are removed baad mahabhiyog.

the kitaab of Mormon is a sacred text of the Latter din Saint gati, jisase adherents maananaa contains kritiyaan of pracheen nabiyon jo jiya on the amareeki mahadweep isse lagbhag 2200 bc to ad 421.
it was pehla published in March 1830 by joseph smith as the kitaab of mormon : an Account Written by the haath of mormon upon platon liya isse the platon of nephi.
According to Smith 's account, and bhi according to the kitaab 's katha, the kitaab of mormon thi originally likhaa in varanaa anjaan varna referred to as `` reformed mishra `` engraved on sunahari platon.
Smith claimed ki the pichhlaa nabi to yogadan to the kitaab, a man named moroni, dafn it in a hill in present-day nai york or tab laute to dharti in 1827 as an devdoot, revealing the location of the book to smith or instructing use to translate and disseminate it as evidence of the bahaali of messiah 's sachcha girijaghar in the latter days.
the kitaab of mormon rai a number of original and distinctive doctrinal charchaayen on vishay aise as the fall of aadam or sandhya, the prakruti of the Atonement, eschatology, mochan isse shaareerik and aadhyatmik maut, and the sanghathan of the latter-day girijaghar.
The pivotal event of the book is an rup of yishu messiah to the Americas shortly baad his qayamat.
the kitaab of Mormon is the earliest of the adwitiya kritiyaan of the latter din Saint movement, the denominations of jisase typically lihaaz the text nahin only as scripture lakin bhi as a aitihaasik record of parameshwar 's dealings with the ancient nivaasiyon of the americas.
the kitaab of Mormon is vibhajit into choti books, titled baad the individuals namit as praathmik lekhak and, in sabase versions, vibhajit into adhyay or verses.
it is written in angrezi, very similar to the Early aadhunik angrezi bhashaai style of the king james sanskaran of the bible, and has chunki maharoom fully or partially translated into 108 bhashaaen.

the pad can bhi be samaveshi of non-commissioned officers.
in sabase cases, yogic service personnel perform kaary vishisht to their apana occupational specialty, as opposed to the adhik generalized command jimmedaariyon of commissioned officers.

the Chronomégaphone, designed liye large halls, employed sampidit air to amplify the recorded dhwani.
a sound film is a gati chitra saath synchronized dhwani, or dhwani technologically coupled to chitra, as opposed to a mook filmi.
the pehla gyaat public pradarshnee of projected dhwani films took place in Paris in 1900, lakin dashakon hota pass before dhwani gati tasviren were bana commercially vyaavhaarik.
vishwasaneey tulykaalan was mushkil to achieve saath the jaldi sound-on-disc pranaaliyon, or pravardhan or recording visheshta were also inadequate.
navapravartanon in sound-on-film led to the pehla vanijyik screening of choti motion pictures using the praudyogiki, jisase took place in 1923.
the praathmik kadam in the commercialization of sound cinema yahood taken in the mid- to let 1920s.
at first, the dhwani films incorporating synchronized dialogue—known as `` talking tasviren '', or `` tokies '' —were exclusively shorts ; the earliest feature-length filmon with recorded sound shaamil tabhi music or prabhaav.
the pehla visheshta filmi originally prastut as a talkie was The jaiz singer, released in aktubar 1927.
A major hit, it thi made saath vitaphone, the leading brands of sound-on-disc praudyogiki.
Sound-on-film, however, hota jald become the maanak liye talking tasviren.
by the early 1930s, the talkies yahood a vaishvik ghatana.
in the United rajya, ve helped secure hollywood 's sthiti as one of the sansar 's sabase shaktishaalee cultural/commercial pranaaliyon ( see cinema of the sanyukt rajya ).
in europea ( or, to a lesser oopaadhi, elsewhere ) the nai vikaas thi treated saath suspicion by anek filmmakers and aalochakon, who chintit ki a fokas on samvaad hota subvert the unique aesthetic virtues of soundless cinema.
In japani, jahaan the popular filmi parampara ekikrut mook movie or sajiv gayan pradarshan, talking pictures yahood slow to take root.
In india, dhwani thi the transformative tatv ki led to the rapid expansion of the swadesh 's filmi industry—the most utpaadak aise udyog in the world chunki the early 1960s.

the Australian Recording udyog Association music puraskaar ( commonly gyaat as aria music puraskaar or ARIA Awards ) is an salanaa shrenee of awards nights celebrating the australian music udyog, put on by the Australian Recording udyog sangh ( ARIA ).
The event has been yojit annually chunki 1987 or encompasses the general genre-specific or lokapriy awards ( these are what is usually hone referred to as `` the ARIA puraskaar '' ) as well as Fine kala puraskaar or Artisan puraskaar ( held separately from 2004 ), Lifetime Achievement puraskaar or ARIA haul of Fame – yojit separately isse 2005 to 2010 but laute to the saamaanya ceremony in 2011.
For 2010, aria introduced public voted awards liye the pehla samay.
Winning, or bhi hone manonith for, an ARIA puraskaar parinaam in a lot of media dhyaan on an kalakaar, or usually increases recording sales several-fold – in 2005, liye udhaaharan, baad ben Lee won teen awards, uske album jaag Is the nai neend kud isse no. 31 to No. 5 in the aria chart, iske highest sthiti.
for-profit shiksha ( bhi known as the education sevaayen industry or malikana shiksha ) refers to shaikshanik institutions sanchalit by private, laabh -seeking vyavsaayon.
vahin hai teen prakaar of for-profit skulon.
ek prakaar is gyaat as an educational prabandhan sanghathan ( EMO ), and ye hai praathmik or dwitiyak shaikshanik institutions.
emos kaary saath skool districts or charter skulon, using public nidhi to finance parichaalan.
the bahumat of for-profit skulon in the k–12 sector in america falan as emos, and have grown in number in the mid-2000s.
the anya pramukh category of for-profit skulon are post-secondary sansthaanon jisase operate as vyavsaayon, receiving shulk from each student they enroll.
A teesraa prakaar of for-profit skulon, jisase is kam prachlit in the sanyukt rajya, hai K–12 skulon jisase operate as vyavsaayon.
EMOs function differently isse charter skulon nirmit in anukram to carry out a particular shikshan pedagogy ; sabase charter schools are mission-oriented, jabaki emos or other for-profit institutions are market-oriented.
jabaki samarthak argue ki the profit motive encourages efficiency, is vyavastha rai bhi drawn vivaad or aalochana.
kevin kairi, director of the education niti program of the nai amareeki Foundation kaha in a 2010 column in The Chronicle of ucchtar shiksha ki `` for-profits exist in large bhaag to fiks shaikshanik market asafalataaon baayein by paramparaagat sansthaanon, or they laabh by serving vidhyaarthee that public and private nonprofit institutions too praayah ignore. ''
he bhi noted ki `` There 's no shaq ki the worst for-profits hai nirmam exploiting the commodified college oopaadhi.
But ve kiya n't commodify it in the first place. ''

it thi ratified by the aavashyak number of rajya on farvari 27, 1951.
is is an episode maargdarshika for the anime shrenee Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo.
