Elizabeth ii ( elizabeth elexandra mariyam ; born 21 april 1926 ) is the sanvaidhanik monarch of 16 sovereign states, gyaat as the rashtramandal realms, or unke territories or dependencies, or sir of the 54-member rashtramandal of raashtra.
wo is param rajyapal of the girijaghar of england or, in some of her realms, carries the title of defender of the Faith as bhaag of uske puraa sheershak.
On uske accession on 6 farvari 1952, Elizabeth became sir of the rashtramandal or queen regnant of seven independent rashtramandal countries : the United kingdom, canada, australia, nai Zealand, dakshin Africa, pakistani or ceylon.
isse 1956 to 1992, the number of uske realms varied as territories gained independence and some realms became republics.
at upasthit, in addition to the pehla chaar aforementioned countries, elizabeth is maharani of jamaica, barbados, the bahama, haraa, Papua nai gini, the suleman islands, Tuvalu, Saint loosia, Saint Vincent or the grenadines, Belize, antigua or barbuda or Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Her shasankaal of saalo is philhal the duusari longest for a British monarch ; only maharani victoria has reigned longer at over 63 saalo.
elizabeth was born in landan or educated privately at ghar.
Her father acceded to the throne as George vi in 1936 on the abdication of uske bhai edward VIII, isse which time she thi the vaaris presumptive.
wo began to undertake public kartavya dauraan the duusari sansar yuddh, in jisase wo served in the auxiliary territorial Service.
in 1947, she shaadishuda prince philip, Duke of edinburgh, saath jisko wo has chaar children : charles, eni, Andrew, or Edward.
uske rajtilak seva took place in 1953 and was the pehla to be televised.
The maharani 's anek aitihaasik vizit and baithak shaamil a rajya vizit to the ganatantr of ireland or reciprocal vizit to or isse the pope.
The maharani rai dekhi pramukh constitutional changes in uske realms, aise as devolution in the sanyukt Kingdom or the patriation of the canadai samvidhan.
times of nijee significance have shaamil the births or vivaah of uske children, the births of uske grandchildren, the pratishthapan of the Prince of wales, or the jashn of milestones aise as her chaandi, sunahari, or Diamond jubilees in 1977, 2002, or 2012, respectively.
Major kaarykram in the maharani 's shasankaal have included the pareshaaniyon in Northern ireland, the falklands War, wars saath Iraq or the yuddh in Afghanistan.
vahin have maharoom times of nijee sorrow liye uske jisase include the maut of her pita at 56, the hatya of prince Philip 's taaoo, rab mountbeton, the vishleshan of uske children 's marriages in 1992 ( a saal deemed uske annus horribilis ), the maut in 1997 of uske former daughter-in-law, dyna, rajkumaari of wales, and the deaths of her maan and sistar in 2002.
the Queen rai occasionally faced kathor press criticism of the royal parivaar and republican sentiments, lakin support liye the samrajya and uske nijee popularity remain high.
christianity is the largest dharm listed by Australians in the national census.
in the 2011 Census, 61.1 % of australians yahood soochibaddh as isai.
Australia rai no official rajya religion and the australian samvidhan protects freedom of religion.
the upasthiti of Christianity in australia began saath the arrival of the First bede of British convicts in 1788.
the religion grew to account liye 96.1 % of the neshnal janasankhyikee at the samay of the sangh of Australia in 1901.
The anglican girijaghar of australia ( formerly gyaat as the girijaghar of england in Australia ) remained the largest denomination jabatak 1986, when it thi surpassed by the Roman catholic Church in australia.
post-war multiculturalism or a decline in dharmik observance among kuch sections of the janasankhyikee have diversified the janasankhyikee of religion in australia.
of the roughly 61 % identifying as Christian in 2011, the largest denominations yahood either roman catholic ( 25 % ) or anglican ( 17 % ), saath the third largest denomination being the 5 % sambhddha saath the uniting girijaghar in australia.
Post-war avrajan rai grown the sankhyaayein belonging to carch like the unani paramparaagat archdiocese of australia and vahin hai vishaal or growing paintecostal samooh, aise as sidney 's Hillsong Church.
The tyohaar of easter and christmas hai public chhuttiyaan in australia.
around a quarter of vidhyaarthee attend church skulon or isai sanghathanon hai agrani non-government pradaataaon of swasthya or welfare services through sanghathanon jaise Catholic Health australia, anglicare, UnitingCare australia, the moksh fouj and St Vincent de paul samaaj.
historically significant Australian Christians have included Rev dr jon dunmore laing, sant mariyam MacKillop, catherine hellen spence, padri daud Unaipon, the Reverend John flynn or padri sar dag nicholls.
unchi profile samakaleen Australian isaayiyon shaamil : tim Costello baptist minister and vartmaan siio of World drushti Australia, Frank briken, jesuit insaan adhikaron vakil, cardinal george Pell, Catholic archbishop of sidney, philip aspinall the vartmaan anglican primate or archbishop of Brisbane, Kevin Rudd, purv majdoor pradhan mantri, and tony abot, netaa liye the sangheey vipaksh Liberal party.
Charter bananaa colejiet School, jisase became yale college, aktubar 9, 1701
yale vishvavidhyalayon is a private ivi lig research university located in New hewan, Connecticut.
Founded in 1701 in the Colony of connectikat, the vishvavidhyalayon is the third-oldest sanstha of ucchtar shiksha in the United States.
originally chartered as the `` Collegiate skool '', the sanstha traces its jaden to 17th-century clergymen jo sought to establish a college to tren padri and political netao liye the colony.
In 1718, the College thi renamed `` Yale college '' to sammaan a tohfa isse elihu yale, a rajyapal of the angrejon east india company.
in 1861, the Graduate skool of Arts or sciences became the first u.S. institution to puraskaar the phd. Yale became a founding member of the sangh of American Universities in 1900.
yale College was transformed, beginning in the 1930s, through the sthapana of awasaiya collejon : 12 abhi maujuud or do adhik are niojit.
yale employs over 1,100 sankaay to sikhaa or salaah about 5,300 undergraduate and 6,100 graduate and peshewar vidhyaarthee.
lagbhag sab tenured professors teach undergraduate paathyakram, adhik than 2,000 of jisase are offered annually.
The University 's asset shaamil an endowment valued at $ 19.4 arab, the second-largest of koi academik sanstha in the sansar.
Yale 's pranali of adhik than do dozen libraries holds 12.5 lakh aaytan.
49 nobel laureates have maharoom sambhddha saath the University as vidhyaarthee, faculty, or staff.
Yale rai utpaadit anek notable alumni, sahit paanch u.S. Presidents, 19 U.S. param Court Justices, or anek foreign heads of rajya.
at the graduate level, yale vidhi School, yale skool of art, and yale skool of naatak are consistently kramit the top programs in unke field.
yale Law skool is the sabase selective vidhi skool in the United States.
Yale vidhyaarthee compete intercollegiately as the yale bulldogs in the NCAA prabhag I ivi League.
the oldest intercollegiate athlettic event in the United rajya is the Yale-Harvard regatta.
artemisia tridentata ( `` big sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an khushboodaar jhaadi isse the parivaar Asteraceae, jisase grows in arid or semi-arid conditions, throughout a dayera of thanda desert, stan, or pahaad habitats in the intermountain West of North america.
The deshi naam `` sagebrush '' is bhi prayukt liye anek related members of the genus artemisia, such as california Sagebrush ( artemisia californica ).
Big Sagebrush or anya artemisia prajati are the prabal plants across vishaal portions of the great jalashay, covering kuch 422,000 vargakar miles in 11 pashchimi u.S. & canadai rajya.
it is the rajya pushp of Nevada.
Sagebrush provides khaanaa or awaas liye a kismein of prajati, aise as rishi grouse, pronghorn antelope, gray vireo, saano khargosh, or mule deer.
Big sagebrush thi prayukt as an herbal ayurvigyaan by Native Americans throughout the Intermountain west of uttar america—especially for preventing infection in wounds, stopping internal bleeding, and treating headaches and zukam.
Chemically, the kriyasheel medicinal constituents shaamil camphor, terpenoids, and tannins.
anek pramukh khatre maujuud to rishi brush ecosystems, sahit insaan settlements, conversion to agricultural jameen, livestock charne, hridayrog sanyantr species, wildfires, and jalwaayu change.
yahuu ! mail is a free email service offered by the amareeki dhundhen ingine company yahuu !
It was shubharambh in 1997, or, according to comScore, yahuu ! mail is the third-largest web-based email seva with 281 million upayokta as of disambar 2012.
philhal, Yahoo ! offers three sanskaran of Yahoo ! Mail.
the paramparaagat `` yahuu ! mail Classic '' continues the uplabdhta of the original interfes introduced in 1997.
a sanskaran introduced in 2005 shaamil a new ajaks interfes, drag-and-drop suvidhaayen, improved dhundhen kaaryakshmata, kunjeepatal shortcuts, pataa auto-complete, tabs, or anya adhyatanikrut suvidhaayen.
in aktubar 2010, yahuu ! released a beta sanskaran of Yahoo ! mail, which shaamil sudhaar to the design, pradarshan, dhundhen kaaryakshmata, or fasebuk sangyojan.
in may 2011, beta pareekshan liye the nai sanskaran roka, or it became the default interface liye yahuu ! mail.
in jaldi 2008, Yahoo ! began offering aseemit mail storage to iske users in response to heated pratiyogita in the free web-mail market khand.
on june 27, 2009, Yahoo ! messanger was integrated with yahuu ! mail.
tacoma (, ) is a mid-sized urban bandargahon nagar or the county seat of piers county, washington, sanyukt rajya.
The city is on Washington 's Puget Sound, southwest of sietal, northeast of the state capital, olympia, or northwest of mount rainier neshnal park.
the janasankhyikee thi 198,397, according to the 2010 janasankhyikee.
tacoma is the second-largest nagar in the puget Sound kshetrafal or the teesraa largest in the rajya.
Tacoma also serves as the center of kaarobaar kaaryaklap for the dakshin dhwani pradesh, jisase has a population of around 1 million logon.
tacoma adopted its naam baad the nearby Mount Rainier, originally called mount tahoma.
it is gyaat as the `` nagar of niyati '' kuki the area was chosen to be the pashchimi terminus of the uttari prashanth Railroad in the let 19th sadi.
the nirnay of the railroad thi bahekaave by tacoma 's neighboring deep-water harbar, shuruyaat khadi.
By connecting the khadi with the railroad Tacoma 's motto became `` jab rails milen sails. ''
aaj Commencement khadi serves the bandargahon of tacoma, a center of antarrashtriya trade on the prashanth Coast or Washington rajya 's largest port.
jaise most central shaharon, tacoma suffered a prolonged decline in the mid-20th sadi as a result of suburbanization or divestment.
chunki the 1990s, developments in the shahar kor shaamil the vishvavidhyalayon of washington Tacoma ; tacoma Link, the pehla modern electric light rail seva in the state ; the rajya 's highest ghanatv of art or itihaas sangrahalay ; or a lauti shahari waterfront, the thea Foss Waterway.
saath a long itihaas of blue-collar labor raajnneeti — isse the railroad workers of the 19th century, to the longshoremen of the 20th sadi, to the Labor taiyaar workers of aaj — tacoma rai long maharoom known liye iske rough, kirakiri image.
A song parichay tacoma, `` Thrice sab amareeki '', by amareeki singer-songwriter or purv nivasee neko Case, describes it as `` a dusty boodha jewel in the dakshin puget Sound / jahaan the kaarkaanon churn / or the timber 's sab kaaten bas ''.
tacoma-pierce county rai maharoom named one of the sabase livable kshetron in the desh.
tacoma thi also recently soochibaddh as the 19th sabase walkable city in the country.
in contrast, the nagar is bhi kramit as the sabase stressed-out city in the desh in a 2004 surveykshan.
in 2006, mahilaon 's patrika swah namit tacoma the `` sabase sexually swasth City '' in the sanyukt rajya.
in 2012, the Advocate diya tacoma the sheershak of `` gayest City in america '', in bhaag because of the vishaal vividhta of public karyaalayon yojit, and washington State guzar a vidheyak in 2012 allowing lgbt yugal to nikaah.
Tacoma is famous liye the 1940 collapse of the tacoma narrows sethu.
Chula Vista ( ; ) is the duusari largest nagar in the San diego mahanagar kshetrafal, the seventh largest city in Southern California, the fourteenth largest nagar in the State of california, or the 77th-largest city in the United States.
The janasankhyikee was 243,916 as of the 2010 census.
Located just from shahar san diego and isse the mexican kinaaraa in the dakshin khadi pradesh of the metropolitan kshetrafal, the city is at the bich of ek of the richest economic or culturally vividh zones in the sanyukt rajya.
Chula vista is so namit kuki of iske darshneey sthaan between the san diego khadi or tateey pahaad foothills.
Founded in the jaldi 19th sadi, tej population vikaas has recently maharoom observed in the city.
as the duusari largest nagar in san diego County, chula vista rai jaldi become a gantavy lokapriy to many tourists.
stith in the nagar is ek of America 's few year-round United rajya olympic prashikshan centers or lokapriy paryatak destinations shaamil cricket betaar amphitheater, the chula Vista marina, and the chula Vista prakruti bich.
metes or bounds is a pranali or vidhi of describing jameen, real property ( in contrast to nijee property ) or real estate.
the system rai been prayukt in england for anek centuries, and is still prayukt there in the paribhaasha of saamaanya seemayen.
by custom, it thi lagu in the asli Thirteen colonies that became the sanyukt rajya, or in anek anya jameen jurisdictions aadhaarit on English aam vidhi.
typically the system upyog shaareerik features of the local geography, along with dishanirdesh or dooriyaan, to define and describe the seemayen of a parcel of jameen.
The seemayen are described in a kaaryshil gadhy style, working around the parcel in sequence, isse a point of shuruuaat, returning waapas to the vahi point ; compare saath the maukhik anushthan of dhadkan the bounds.
it may shaamil sandarbh to other adjoining parcels ( or unke swami ), or it, in turn, could bhi be referred to in later surveykshan.
At the samay the varnan is compiled, it may have maharoom chihnit on the maidan saath sthai monuments lagaai jahaan vahin yahood no upyukt natural smarak.
the pad `` metes '' refers to a boundary paribhaashit by the measurement of prayek sidhaa run, specified by a alahada between the terminal ank, or an orientation or disha.
a direction may be a simple compass bearing, or a precise abhivinyas determined by sateek surveykshan vidhi.
The pad `` bounds '' refers to a adhik general boundary varnan, aise as along a nishchit watercourse, a stone wal, an adjoining public sadak rasta, or an maujuuda building.
the system is praayah prayukt to define larger pieces of property ( e.g. kheto ), or rajnatik subdivisions ( e.g. kasbaa seemayen ) where precise paribhaasha is nahin jaruri or hota be dur too mahangi, or previously designated seemayen can be incorporated into the varnan.
sar ishaq newton ( 25 disambar 164220 kooch 1727 ) was an angrezi physicist or ganitagya jo is widely regarded as ek of the sabase influential vaigyanikon of all time or as a key figure in the vaigyanik kranti.
uske book philosophiæ Naturalis Principia mathematica ( `` ganitiya Principles of prakritik darshanashastra '' ), first published in 1687, laid the muladhar liye sabase of shastreey mechanics.
newton bhi bana seminal yogadan to prakaashiki or saajha credit saath gotfrid Leibniz liye the avishkaar of the infinitesimal kalan.
newton 's princepia pratipaadit the kanoon of motion and universal gravitation ki varchasv vaigyanikon ' drishy of the physical brahmad liye the next teen sadiyaan.
It bhi demonstrated that the gati of vastuen on the dharti or ki of celestial laashen could be varnit by the same principles.
by deriving Kepler 's kanoon of grahiy motion from his ganitiya varnan of gravity, newton removed the pichhlaa doubts parichay the vaid of the heliocentric model of the cosmos.
newton built the pehla practical reflecting doordarshee and viksit a theory of rang aadhaarit on the avlokan ki a prism decomposes white lite into the many rang of the drishy spectrum.
he also formulated an empirical law of kooling or padhai the gati of dhwani.
in addition to his kaary on the kalan, as a mathematician newton contributed to the padhai of shakti shrenee, generalised the dwipad prameya to non-integer exponents, or developed Newton 's vidhi for approximating the jaden of a function.
newton was a fellow of Trinity college or the duusari Lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the vishvavidhyalayon of cambridge.
he was a devout lakin aparamparaagat isai or, unusually liye a member of the Cambridge sankaay, he refused to lo holy orders in the girijaghar of england, shaayad kuki he privately asweekrut the doctrine of trinitarianism.
in addition to his work on the ganitiya sciences, newton bhi samarpit much of uske samay to the study of alchemy or biblical kalkram, lakin sabase of his kaary in those areas remained unpublished until long after uske death.
in his baad jivan, newton became adhyaksh of the royal samaaj.
He also parosa the angrejon government as warden or nipun of the Royal mint.
Prof. walter Lewin explains newton 's vidhi of gravitation in emiti course 8.01
Satellites or projectiles all obey Newton 's vidhi of gravitation
newton 's law of saarvbhaumik gravitation rajya ki prayek point dravyaman in the universe attracts prayek other point dravyaman with a force ki is sidhe proportional to the utpaada of their masses or inversely aanshik to the vargakar of the distance between unhen.
( Separately it was dikhaaya ki vishaal spherically samamit masses attract or hai attracted as if sab unke dravyaman were concentrated at unke centers. )
is is a saamaanya shaareerik vidhi niklaa isse anubhavjanya observations by kayaa newton called preran.
It is a part of classical yantriki and thi pratipaadit in newton 's kaary philosophiæ Naturalis princepia mathematica ( `` the princepia '' ), first published on 5 july 1687.
( jab newton 's kitaab was prastut in 1686 to the royal Society, robert hooke bana a arji that newton had obtained the vilom vargakar law isse use – dekhie History section neeche. )
in aadhunik bhashaa, the law rajya the following:
Assuming si ikai, f is measured in newtons ( n ), m1 or m2 in gamma ( kg ), r in meter ( m ), or the constant g is approximately baraabar to.
the maan of the nirantar G thi pehla accurately sankalpit isse the parinaam of the cavendish prayog conducted by the British vaigyanik Henry cavendish in 1798, haalanki cavendish kiya nahin khud gananaa a numerical maan liye G.
is prayog thi bhi the first pareekshan of newton 's siddhanth of gravitation between masses in the prayogshaala.
it took place 111 saalo after the prakaashan of newton 's Principia or 71 years after Newton 's maut, so none of newton 's calculations could upyog the maan of g ; instead he could only calculate a force relative to another force.
Newton 's law of gravitation resembles culumb 's law of electrical shaktiyaan, jisase is prayukt to gananaa the pariman of vidyut force between do charge laashen.
dono hai inverse-square kanoon, in which force is inversely aanshik to the vargakar of the alahada between the laashen.
Coulomb 's vidhi rai the utpaada of do aarope in place of the utpaada of the masses, and the electrostatic constant in place of the gurutvkarshak nirantar.
Newton 's vidhi rai chunki been superseded by oinstin 's siddhanth of saamaanya aapekshikta, but it continues to be prayukt as an behtareen sanniktan of the prabhaav of gravity.
aapekshikta is jaruri tabhi jab there is a need liye charam parishuddhta, or jab dealing saath gravitation liye extremely vishaal and dense vastuen.
White and red dhvaj, representing Iraqi and American deaths, baithna in the grass chatushkon of the ghati pustakaalayon on the corvallis, oregon, campus of oregon rajya vishvavidhyalayon.
as bhaag of the traveling Iraq deh ginati exhibit from 2008 to 2009 ( nahin sambandhit to iraqi deh ginati project ), the dhvaj uddeshy to `` raise jaagrukta of the insaan cost of the iraqi yuddh. ''
( may 2008 )
hataahat of the conflict in Iraq since 2003 ( shuruuaat with the 2003 invasion of iraqi, or continuing saath the ensuing occupation of Iraq, as khub as the kriyaayein of the vibhinn hathiyaarband samooh oparating in the country ) have aaiye in many form, and the sateekta of the soochna uplabdhiyaan on different prakaar of iraqi yuddh casualties varies greatly.
the talika neeche summarizes various estimates of the iraqi casualty figures.
For sainikon in the u.s.-led multinational gathbandhan, the maut toll is carefully tracked or adhyatanikrut rose, and the names and photographs of those maare in karrwai as khub as in durghatnaon have maharoom prakashit widely.
a kul of 4,486 u.S. sainiko yahood maare in iraqi between 2003 or 2012.
regarding the Iraqis, however, soochna on dono military or civilian hataahat is both kam precise or kam satat.
Estimates of casualty levels hai uplabdhiyaan from patrakaron on the scene, isse officials of shaamil sanghathan, or from samooh ki summarize information on incidents reported in the news media.
the shabd `` hataahat `` in iske most saamaanya sense shaamil the injured as khub as the murde.
khate of the kramank of gathbandhan wounded vary widely, partly kuki it is nahin spasht kayaa chahie be gine : chahie only those choton gambhir enough to put a sipaahi out of ayog be shaamil ?
do illnesses or choton caused by durghatnaon ginati, or chahie the fokas be restricted to wounds caused by shatru sagaai ?
strot using different paribhaashaayen may arrive at bahut alag sankhyaayein, or sometimes the precise paribhaasha is nahin clearly specified.
asalto al coche ( dakaiti of the coach ), by Francisco de goyaa
a highwayman thi a chor or brigand who preyed on travellers.
This type of gaiyrkanoonee praayah travelled or robbed by horse, as compared to a footpad jo travelled and robbed on pair.
arohit luteron yahood widely mana to be socially shreshth to footpads.
aise luteron sanchalit in great Britain or Ireland isse the elizabethan era jabatak the jaldi 19th sadi.
The shabd highwayman is pehla gyaat to be prayukt in the year 1617 ; anya euphemisms shaamil `` shoorveeron of the sadak '' and `` gentlemen of the sadak. ''
Two sharten lagu to 19th-century North American highwaymen yahood sadak agenton in kuch instances liye mountain daakuon jabaki in anya maamle the term is rlallaala liye mountain-based ruffians.
In the vahi samay period in Australia, ve yahood gyaat as bushrangers.
earvin `` jaadu '' johnson, jr. ( born August 14, 1959 ) is a retired amareeki peshewar basket khilaadi jo nibhaai point guard liye the los angeles lekars of the neshnal basket sangh ( NBA ).
After jeetna championships in high skool or college, johnson thi selected pehla overall in the 1979 enbie draft by the Lakers.
he jiti a championship or an enbie final sabase moolyawaan Player puraskaar in uske rukii ritu, or won four adhik championships saath the lekars dauraan the 1980s.
johnson ritred abruptly in 1991 baad announcing that he tha contracted hiv, lakin laute to khel in the 1992 all-star khel, jeetna the all-star mvp puraskaar.
baad protests isse his fellow khilaadi, he retired again liye chaar saalo, lakin laute in 1996, at aayu 36, to khel 32 khel for the Lakers pehle retiring liye the teesraa or final samay.
Johnson 's kariyar uplabdhiyaan include three NBA mvp puraskaar, nau enbie final dikhaave, baarah All-Star khel, and ten All-NBA First and duusari toli nominations.
He led the lig in regular-season assists chaar times, or is the enbie 's all-time netaa in ausat assists prati game, at 11.2.
johnson was a member of the `` sapana Team ``, the U.S. basket toli ki won the olympic sunaharaa padak in 1992.
baad leaving the enbie in 1992, johnson formed the Magic johnson all-stars, a barnstorming team ki travelled around the world playing pradarshnee games.
johnson thi sammanit as one of the 50 mahanatam khilaadi in enbie itihaas in 1996, or enshrined in the basket haul of Fame in 2002.
he thi rated the greatest enbie point guard of sab samay by iespien in 2007.
uske dosti or funsane saath boston celtics star laire bird, jisko he faced in the 1979 NCAA final and three enbie championship series, yahood khub pralekhith.
chunki uske ritairement, Johnson rai maharoom an advocate liye hiV/ aids rokthaam or safe sex, as khub as an udyogon, locasevak, prasarankarta or motivational speaker.
Johnson thi a part-owner of the lekars liye anek saalo, or was bhaag of a group ki kharida the Los Angeles Dodgers in 2012.
allium cells in alag phases of the koshika saikil
the koshikaayen of eukaryotes ( baayein ) and prokaryotes ( sahi )
The cell is the moulik structural, functional and biological ikai of all known living jeevon.
it is the smallest ikai of jivan ki is vargeekrut as a jeena thing ( magar virus, jisase consists tabhi isse DNA/RNA covered by protein or lipids ), and is praayah pukaara the bhawan blaak of jivan.
It consists of a protoplasm enclosed bheetar a jhilli, which contains anek biomolecules aise as protein or nucleic acids.
jeevon can be vargeekrut as eckoshikeey ( consisting of a single koshika ; sahit sabase jeevanu ) or bahukoshikeey ( including paudhe and animals ).
jabaki the kramank of koshikaayen in paudhe and pashu varies isse species to prajati, insaano contain parichay 100 kharab ( 1014 ) cells.
sabase sanyantr and animal koshikaayen are between 1 or 100 micrometres and isliye are drishy tabhi antargat the sookshmdarshi.
the koshika thi discovered by robert hooke in 1665.
the koshika siddhanth, pehla viksit in 1839 by matthias jakob schleiden or theodor Schwann, rajya ki all jeevon hai rachit of ek or adhik koshikaayen, that sab koshikaayen aaiye isse preexisting koshikaayen, ki vital krityon of an sajiv occur bheetar cells, and ki all koshikaayen contain the khandaani soochna jaruri liye regulating koshika krityon and for transmitting information to the aglaa peedhee of koshikaayen.
koshikaayen emerged on grah dharti at tanik 4.0–4.3 arab saalo ago.
the shabd koshika comes isse the latin garbhagrih, arth `` choti room ''.
the varnanaatmak term liye the smallest jeena biological dhaancha was coined by robert hooke in a kitaab he prakashit in 1665 when he compared the cork cells he saw through his sookshmdarshi to the choti kaksh bhikshuon jiya in.
grecian Formula is a main 's bal coloring utpaada in the sanyukt rajya.
Canada or europea previously banned the utpaada kuki of iske upyog of sise acitate.
A motor scooter 's saamne with an avyavhaarik number or kismein of headlamps, added liye decorative purposes
a headlamp is a balb sanlagn to the saamne of a gadee to lite the sadak ahead.
headlamp performance rai steadily improved throughout the automobile aayu, spurred by the great disparity between daytime or nighttime traffic fatalities : the U.S. neshnal rajmarg trekkic suraksha prashasan rajya ki nearly half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the andhera, despite only 25 % of trekkic yatraaen dauraan darkness.
jabaki it is aam liye the term hedlite to be prayukt interchangeably in anaupchaarik charchaa, headlamp is the term for the yantra itself, while hedlite properly refers to the beam of light utpaadit or vitarit by the yantra.
Other vehicles, such as rail and vayuyan, hai jaruri to have headlamps.
Bicycle headlamps hai praayah prayukt on cycle, or hai jaruri in some jurisdictions.
They can be sanchalit by a bydaree or a choti vidyut srujankarta on the wheel.
additionally automotive night vision pranaaliyon work to sampoorak headlamps.
mahilaon 's adhikaron are the rights or entitlements claimed liye women or ladakiyon of anek societies vishwavyaapee.
in some sthaan ye adhikaron are institutionalized or supported by vidhi, local custom, or aacharan, whereas in anya ve may be upekshit or suppressed.
ve differ isse broader dharanaen of insaan adhikaron through daawa of an antarnihit historical or traditional purvaagrah against the kasarat of adhikaron by mahilaon or girls in favour of main and boys.
Issues commonly sambhddha saath dharanaen of mahilaon 's adhikaron shaamil, though are nahin limited to, the sahi : to bodily akhandta or swaittata ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to tham public office ; to work ; to fair wages or baraabar adaa ; to apana property ; to shiksha ; to serve in the sainya or be conscripted ; to daalen into vidhik anubandh ; or to have vaivaahik, parental and dharmik rights.
caryn Elaine johnson, behtareen gyaat as whoopi Goldberg (, ( born November 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, abhinetri, singer-songwriter, rajnatik activist, lekhak and talk dikhaaen mejabaan.
goldberg bana uske film debyue in the rang jamuni ( 1985 ), playing celie, a mistreated black stri in the Deep South.
wo received a nomination liye the Academy Award liye behtareen abhinetri and jiti uske pehla sunahari globe puraskaar liye uske bhoomika in the filmi.

is pradarshan won uske a second Golden globe or an academy puraskaar liye behtareen Supporting abhinetri ; this made goldberg tabhi the duusari blike woman in the history of the academy puraskaar to win an acting Oscar—the first hone haiti McDaniel jo jiti liye gaye saath the Wind in 1939.
notable later films shaamil sistar adhinium or sistar Act 2, the khilaadi, bana in America, kaisaa Stella mila uske naalee Back, ladki, baadhit or chuha res.

Goldberg rai maharoom manonith liye 13 Emmy Awards for uske work in television.
wo thi co-producer of the popular khel dikhaaen Hollywood virgon isse 1998 to 2004.
She has maharoom the moderator of the daytime baat dikhaaen the drishy since 2007.

She is ek of the few entertainers jo have won an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and tony Award.
the National hockey lig ( enechael ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' jisase operates a pramukh peshewar barf hockey league of 30 franchised sadsy club, of jisase saat are philhal stith in canada or 23 in the United rajya.
headquartered in nai York City, the enechael is widely mana to be the premier peshewar barf hockey lig in the sansar, or one of the pramukh peshewar khel lig in the United States or canada.
the stanley Cup, the oldest peshewar sports trophy in uttar America, is awarded annually to the lig playoff champion at the samaapt of prayek ritu.
the league thi organized on November 26, 1917, in montrial, quebec, canada, baad the suspension of parichaalan of iske purvavarti sanghathan, the National hockey sangh ( nah ), jisase tha maharoom santhaapit in 1909.
it prarambh with four tiimon or, through a shrenee of expansions, contractions, or relocations, the league is abhi rachit of 30 kriyasheel franchises.
the swadesh to which the naam of the lig originally referred was canada, haalanki the lig rai now been binational chunki 1924 jab it vistaarit into the sanyukt rajya.
baad a shramik dispute ki led to the raddikaran of the entire 2004–05 ritu, the lig resumed play antargat a nai samuhik bargaining anubandh ki shaamil a selary cap.
in 2009, the enechael enjoyed ricard highs in sharten of sponsorships, upasthiti, or television audiences.
The NHL draws anek atyadhik skilled khilaadi from sab over the sansar or philhal has players isse parichay 20 different deshon.
haalanki canadians have historically constituted the bahumat of the khilaadi in the enechael, over the past chaar plus dashakon the percentages of US and europea players have increased dono kuki of the enechael 's jari expansion from chah to tees club since 1967, or the increased uplabdhta of atyadhik skilled europea khilaadi.
maggots feeding on carrion.
a maggot is the larva of a makkhi ( order diptera ) ; it is lagu in particular to the larve of brachyceran udata, such as houseflies, cheez flies, or blowflies, balki than larve of the Nematocera, aise as machharon or Crane udata.
`` maggot '' is not a takneekee pad and should nahin be liya as such ; in anek standard pathyapustakon of entomology it karata nahin appear in the anukramanika at sab.
In anek non-technical granth the pad is prayukt liye insect larve in general.
anya sources have coined unke apana paribhaashaayen ; liye udhaaharan : ``...
The pad applies to a grab when all tres of limbs has disappeared... '' or ``... Applied to the footless larve of dipters. ''
Maggot-like fly larvae hai of chaudee mahatv in paristhitiki and ayurvigyaan ; among anya bhoomikaaye, vibhinn species are prominent in recycling carrion and garbage, attacking crops or foodstuffs, spreading sookshmjaivik infections, or causing myiasis.
herodes (, Hordos, unani :, hērōdēs ), bhi gyaat as herodes the great ( 73/74 bce – 4 bce in jerrico ), thi a roman claayent king of judea.
His epithet of `` the Great '' is widely disputed as he is varnit as `` a madman who murdered uske apana parivaar or a great anek rabbis ``.
he is also known liye his colossal bhawan projects in Jerusalem and elsewhere, including uske vistaar of the Second Temple in jerusalem ( sometimes referred to as herodes 's temple ) and the nirmaan of the bandargahon at Caesarea Maritima.
mahatvapurn details of uske biography are gleaned isse the works of the 1st century ce Roman–Jewish historian josephus flavius.
the romans bana herodes 's bete, herodes archelaus, ethnarch of judea, samaria, and idumea ( biblical edom ) isse 4 bce to 6 ce, referred to as the tetrarchy of judea.
archelaus thi judged incompetent by the roman samraat augustus jo then sanyukt samaria, judea uchit or idumea into iudaea province under niyam of a prefect jabatak aayu 41.
herodes 's other bete herodes Antipas thi tetrarch of galilee from 4 BCE–39 CE.
abo rakt samooh antigens present on red rakt cells and IgM antibodies present in the serum
the ABO blood samooh system is the sabase mahatvapurn rakt prakaar system ( or rakt samooh pranali ) in human blood transfusion.
the sambhddha anti-A or anti-B antibodies hai praayah igm antibodies, which hai praayah produced in the pehla saalo of life by sensitization to paryaavarniya substances aise as khaanaa, jeevanu, or virus.
ABO rakt types are also upasthit in kuch anya pashu, for example apes aise as chimpanzees, bonobos, or gorillas.

brett lorenzo favre ( born aktubar 10, 1969 ) is a former amareeki footbaal quarterbaque who kharch the bahumat of uske kariyar saath the green khadi pakars of the National footbaal League ( enegel ).
He thi a 20-year diggaj of the enegel, having nibhaai quarterbaque liye the atlanta falcons ( 1991 ), green khadi pakars ( 1992 – 2007 ), nai york jets ( 2008 ) and minesota vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ).
Favre is the only quarterbaque in enegel itihaas to throw liye over 70,000 gaj, over 500 touchdowns, over 300 interceptions, over 6,000 completions, or over 10,000 pass attempts.
Favre prarambh at the quarterbaque sthiti liye the vishvavidhyalayon of dakshini mississippi for chaar saalo before hone chaynit in the duusari golakaar of the 1991 enegel draft by atlanta ( 33rd overall ).
He thi traded to green khadi on February 10, 1992, liye the 19th pick in the 1992 enegel Draft.
favre became the Packers ' starting quarterbaque in the chauthi khel of the 1992 season, stepping in for injured quarterbaque don majkowski, or prarambh prayek khel through the 2007 ritu.
he thi traded to the nai York jets or prarambh at quarterbaque liye the 2008 ritu pehle hastakshar with the vikings on agast 18, 2009 as their starting quarterbaque.
He bana an NFL record 297 lagaataar starts ( 321 sahit playoffs ).
he is the tabhi khilaadi to win the ap sabase moolyawaan khilaadi teen lagaataar times ( 1995–97 ).
he rai led tiimon to aath prabhag championships ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2007, 2009 ), paanch NFC championships khel ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2007, 2009 ), and two super Bowl dikhaave ( Super katori XXXI, super katori XXXII ), winning ek ( super Bowl xxxi ).
he holds anek enegel record, sahit sabase kariyar touchdown gujarata, sabase career guzar gaj, sabase kariyar pass completions, most kariyar pass koshishen, most kariyar interceptions thrown, sabase consecutive starts by a player, sabase lagaataar starts by a quarterback, sabase kariyar victories as a starting quarterbaque, most sacked, and most fumbles.
he is bhi referred to by his upnaam `` the gunslinger ''.

The sansar Wide web ( abbreviated as www or w3, commonly gyaat as the web ), is a pranali of interlinked hypertext documents pahunchaa via the antarjaal.
saath a web broujar, one can drishy web pages ki may contain text, bimb, videos, or anya multimedia, or navigate between unhen via hyperlinks.
Using avadharanaon isse uske pehle hypertext pranaaliyon jaise enquire, angrejon engineer, computer scientist or at that time karmchaaree of the CERN, sar Tim Berners-Lee, abhi nideshak of the World chaudee web consortium ( w3c ), likhaa a prastaav in kooch 1989 liye kayaa hota eventually become the sansar chaudee web.
at cern, a European shodh sanghathan nikat geneva straddling the border between France or switzaraland, berners-lee or belgian computer vaigyanik robert cailliau proposed in 1990 to upyog hypertext `` to link and abhigam information of vibhinn kinds as a web of node in which the user can browz at will '', and they saream introduced the project in disambar of the vahi saal.
Wayne lyman morse ( aktubar 20, 1900July 22, 1974 ) thi a rajaneta and attorney isse oregon, sanyukt rajya, gyaat liye uske proclivity liye opposing uske partiyon ' netritv, and specifically liye uske vipaksh to the vietnam War on sanvaidhanik grounds.
born in medisson, Wisconsin, or educated at the vishvavidhyalayon of wisconsin-madison or the vishvavidhyalayon of minesota Law skool, morse sthanantarit to Oregon in 1930 or began shikshan at the vishvavidhyalayon of oregon School of vidhi.
dauraan sansar yuddh II he thi nirvaachit to the sanyukt States seenet as a republican ; he became an swatantra after dwite D. Eisenhower 's chunaav to the presidency in 1952.
While an swatantra, he niyat a record liye performing the second longest one-person filibuster in the itihaas of the seenet.
morse joined the loktantric Party in 1955, or thi reelected twice jabaki a sadsy of that party.
morse made a brief run liye the Democratic party 's adhyakshiya nomination in 1960.
a few saalo later, morse thi ek of tabhi do Senators jo opposed the gulf of tonkin rezolution, jisase praadhikrut the adhyaksh to take sainya karrwai in vietnam bagaiyr a ghoshnaa of war.
he continued to bolo out viruddh the war in the ensuing saalo, and khoyaa uske 1968 boli liye reelection to bob packwood, jo criticized his damdaar opposition to the yuddh.
morse bana two adhik bids liye reelection to the Senate pehle uske death in 1974.
in parliamentary kaarividhi, a motion to talika rai do different and contradictory arthus:
in the sanyukt rajya, to talika praayah arthath the to lay [ the topic ] on the table or to move liye postponement of vichaar ; a proposal to barkhaastagi vichaar of a pending gati.
Much kam praayah, it arthath a gati to `` put on the talika '' : a prastaav to shuru consideration ( or reconsideration ), a upyog satat saath the baaki of the english-speaking sansar.
in the rest of the English-speaking sansar aise as the sanyukt kingdom, to talika arthath to move to place [ the topic ] upon the talika ( or to move to place on the talika ) : a proposal to shuru vichaar ( or reconsideration ) of a proposal.
dono the amareeki or the angrejon dialects have the sense of `` to table '' as to lay [ the topic ] on the talika or to cause [ the topic ] to lie on the talika.
the antar is the vichaar of kayaa the table is for, ki of a shelf off to the side, or an kriyasheel kaary bench.
the British meaning rai the sense of the talika as hone an kriyasheel work bench, with the topic being the bich of attention, mana or discussed by sab jabatak it can be resolved, at jisase point it is liya off the 'table '.
the American sense is that the talika is jaise ki of a shelf, abhilekh, or long-term storage device, jahaan the topic rai been disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' or leaving it vahin.
Toy Story 3 is a 2010 amareeki 3d computer animated comedy-drama prison film, and the teesraa installment in the Toy story series.
it thi utpaadit by pikchars anemation Studios and vitarit by Walt dijani tasviren.
nirdeshit by lee Unkrich, the film was released worldwide isse june through aktubar in dijani digital 3-d, reald, and imax 3d.
Toy story 3 thi bhi the pehla filmi to be released theatrically saath dolby gher 7.1 dhwani.
The screenplay thi likhaa by maaikel arndt, while unkrich likhaa the story saath saath jon lasseter or andrew Stanton, respectively director and co-writer of the do pehla films.
the plat focuses on the khilone woodi, baz lightyear, or their mitron dealing with an uncertain bhavishya as unke maalik, endi, prepares to chhod for college.
abhinaytaon tom hanks, Tim alan, jone cusack, don rickles, estelle haris, John ratzenberger, Wallace shawn, jeff pidgeon, jodi benson, R. Lee ermey, jon morris, or Laurie metcalf reprised unke voice-over bhoomikaaye isse the previous films.
gym Varney, jo played Slinky shwaan in the pehla two films, or Joe Ranft, jo portrayed lenny or wheezy, both died pehle utpaadan began on khilonaa story 3.
The bhoomika of slinky shwaan thi liya over by blake clark ( a friend of varney ), jabaki ranft 's varna and vibhinn anya yahood likhaa out of the story.
nai characters shaamil performances by ned beatty, Timothy dalton, cristan Schaal, bonnie Hunt, whoopi Goldberg, jeff Garlin, richard dayaalu, and Michael kiton.
the visheshta broke shrek the Thirds ricard as the biggest opening din uttar amareeki gross for an anemated filmi unadjusted for inflation, or a big opening saath an unadjusted gross of $ 110,307,189.
it is bhi the highest-grossing kholane weekend liye a pikchars filmi, as khub as the highest-grossing kholane weekend liye a film to have kholi in the maah of june.
This is the highest-grossing filmi of 2010, dono in the sanyukt rajya and canada, or vishwavyaapee.
in jaldi agast, it became Pixar 's highest-grossing filmi at the North amareeki baksaa daftar ( surpassing Finding nemo ), or the highest-grossing animated filmi of sab time vishwavyaapee ( surpassing shrek 2 ) ; baad ki maah, khilonaa story 3 became the pehla kabhi anemated filmi in itihaas to mek over $ 1 billion vishwavyaapee.
it is philhal the 10th-highest-grossing film of all time.
khilonaa Story 3 was manonith liye five academy puraskaar, sahit behtareen chitra, behtareen adapted patakatha, or behtareen Sound sampadan.
it thi the teesraa anemated film ( baad Beauty or the jaanavar or Up ) to be manonith liye academy puraskaar liye Best chitra.
it jiti the puraskaar liye behtareen anemated visheshta or Best asli Song.
jon levell starks ( born agast 10, 1965 ) is an American ritred peshewar basket shooting guard.
Starks was listed at 6'5 '' and 190 pound dauraan uske enbie playing kariyar.
Although he thi nahin drafted in the 1988 enbie draft after upasthit chaar colleges in his deshi oklahoma, sahit oklahoma rajya University, he gained kirti jabaki playing liye the nai York knicks of the neshnal Basketball Association in the 1990s.
Secure digital or ( sd ) is a non-volatile memory card swaroop for use in portable divaais, aise as mobile phone, digital camere, GPS nevigation devices, and tablett computer.
the surakshit Digital maanak is kaayam by the sd Card Association ( SDA ).
sd technologies have been implemented in adhik than 400 brands aarpaar dozens of utpaada shrenee and more than 8,000 model.
the Secure Digital swaroop includes chaar card pariwaron available in teen different form karkon.
the chaar families are the asli standard-capacity ( sdsc ), the high-capacity ( sdhc ), the eXtended-Capacity ( sdxc ), and the sdio, which combines input/output krityon saath aankada bhandar.
the teen rup factors hai the asli aakaar, the `` mini '' aakaar, or the `` micro '' aakaar ( see illustration ).
vahin are many combinations of rup factors or device families.
electrically passive adapters allow the use of a choti card in a host yantra nirmit to hold a larger card.
mejabaan divaais ki comply saath nae versions of the specification provide backward compatibility or accept puraani SD taash, lakin this aalekh explains several karkon ki can prevent the upyog of a newer sd card:
A nae card may prastaav vrihad capacity than the mejabaan device can handle.
a nae card may use a file system the mejabaan yantra can nahin navigate.
upyog of an SDIO card requires the mejabaan yantra be designed liye the input/output krityon the card provides.
the organization of the card thi badla starting saath the SDHC parivaar.
kuch vikreta produced SDSC taash upar 1 gb before the sda tha manakikrut a vidhi of doing so.
the SDA upyog anek trademarked logos to enforce compliance with its specifications or assure users of sangatta.
Hugh John mungo grant ( born 9 September 1960 ) is a British karta and filmi nirmaataa.
he rai praapt a sunahari globe, a BAFTA, or an maanad césar.
uske films have arjeet adhik than US $ 2.4 arab isse 25 natya relies worldwide.
grant achieved international stardom after appearing in Richard Curtis 's kaamyaab chaar vivaah or a Funeral ( 1994 ).
he used is breakthrough bhoomika as a barambar cinematic persona dauraan the 1990s, delivering comic pradarshan in mainstream films like miki blue ankhen ( 1999 ) or Notting Hill ( 1999 ).
By the phere of the 21st century, he tha established khud as a agrani man skilled saath a satirical comic talent.
grant rai vistaarit his oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a cad in Bridget jones 's Diary ( 2001 ), About a ladke ( 2002 ), Love darasal ( 2003 ), or amareeki Dreamz ( 2006 ).
he later nibhaai viruddh type saath anek cameo bhoomikaaye in the apik drama filmi Cloud atlas ( 2012 ).
bheetar the filmi udyog, grant is cited as an anti-film star jo approaches his bhoomikaaye jaise a akshar karta, or koshishen to mek uske acting appear spontaneous.
Hallmarks of uske comic skills shaamil a nonchalant tach of irony / sarcasm or studied shaareerik mannerisms as well as uske precisely-timed dialogue delivery or facial expressions.
the entertainment media 's kawarej of grant 's jivan band the big screen rai praayah nishprabh his kaary as a thespian.
he has maharoom gayan parichay his disrespect liye the profession of acting, or in uske tiraskaar towards the samskruti of celebrity and dushmani towards the media.
in a kariyar spanning 30 saalo, Grant rai repeatedly claimed ki acting is not a true calling but just a job he giri into.
the haan rajvansh ( ; ) ( 206 bc – 220 ad ) thi an imperial dynasty of china, preceded by the Qin rajvansh ( 221–207 bc ) or succeeded by the teen Kingdoms ( 220–280 ad ).
it thi santhaapit by the vidrohi netaa liyu bang, known maranoparant as samraat Gaozu of Han.
it thi briefly baadhit by the Xin rajvansh ( 9–23 AD ) of the purv regent Wang mang.
is interregnum separates the haan into two avadhi : the pashchimi Han ( 206 BC – 9 AD ) or purvi Han ( 25–220 ad ).
spanning over four centuries, the kaal of the haan Dynasty is mana a sunahari aayu in chinis itihaas.
To this day, China 's bahumat jaateey samooh refers to itself as the `` haan people '' or the Chinese script is referred to as `` haan characters ``.
The Han Empire thi vibhajit into kshetron sidhe niyantrit by the central sarkari, gyaat as commanderies, or a kramank of semi-autonomous kingdoms.
ye kingdoms dhire khoyaa sab vestiges of their independence, visheshkar following the vidroh of the saat rajya.
the xiongnu, a nomadic canfederation jisase varchasv the eastern Eurasian stan, parajeet the haan fouj in battle in 200 bc.
Following the shikast, a rajnatik vivaah gathbandhan thi negotiated in which the haan became the de facto avar sangi.
jab, despite the sandhi, the xiongnu jari to red Han borders, samraat wu of haan ( r. 141–87 bc ) shubharambh several sainya campaigns viruddh unhen.
the ultimate haan victory in ye wars eventually majaboor the xiongnu to accept vassal aukaat as Han tributaries.
ye campaigns vistaarit haan prabhutaa into the Tarim jalashay of central asia or helped sthapit the vishaal vyapaar network gyaat as the resha sadak, which pahunche as dur as the bumadhyasagariya sansar.
haan shaktiyaan prabandhit to divide the Xiongnu into do competing nations, the dakshini and uttari xiongnu, and majaboor the uttari xiongnu aarpaar the ili River.
Despite ye victories, the territories uttar of Han 's simaayen yahood jaldi overrun by the nomadic Xianbei Confederation.
baad 92 ad, the rajmahal hijde increasingly shaamil themselves in adaalat raajnneeti, engaging in hinsak shakti struggles between the vibhinn consort clans of the empresses and samraji dowagers, causing the Han 's param downfall.
imperial praadhikaar was bhi seriously challenged by vishaal daoist dharmik samaajon jisase instigated the Yellow pagadi Rebellion or the paanch pecks of rice Rebellion.
Following the death of samraat ling ( r. 168–189 ad ), the rajmahal hijde suffered wholesale narsanhaar by military adhikariyon, allowing sadasyon of the aristocracy or military rajyapalon to become warlords or divide the samrajya.
jab saao Pi, king of vei, usurped the singhaasana isse samraat xian, the haan rajvansh ceased to exist.
The Han Dynasty thi an age of aarthik samruddhi or dekhi a significant vikaas of the money arthvyavastha pehla sthapit during the jhou Dynasty ( c. 1050–256 bc ).
the coinage issued by the central sarkari mint in 119 bc remained the maanak coinage of China until the tang Dynasty ( 618–907 ad ).
to adaa liye iske sainya abhiyaan or the upnivesh of newly conquered frontier territories, the government rashtriyakrut the nijee namak or iron udyog in 117 bc.
ye government monopolies yahood repealed during the Eastern haan period, or the lost aay thi recouped through heavily taxing nijee udhyamiyon.
the samraat was at the pinnacle of Han society.
he presided over the haan sarkari lakin shared shakti saath both the nobility or appointed mantriyon who aae largely isse the scholarly gentry class.
From the shasankaal of samraat wu onward, the chinis adaalat officially pryojit confucianism in education or court raajnneeti, synthesized saath the cosmology of baad vidwaanon aise as Dong zhongshu.
This niti endured jabatak the patan of the Qing rajvansh in 1911 ad.
Science or praudyogiki dauraan the haan kaal dekhi significant agrim, sahit papermaking, the nautical parichaalan aritra, the upyog of rinatmak sankhyaayein in ganit, the raised-relief map, the hydrolic -powered armillary sphere liye khagolashastra, or a bhukampamapi employing an inverted lolak.
tourette syndrome ( bhi pukaara Tourette 's syndrome, tourette 's vikaar, gailes de la tourette syndrome, gts or, adhik commonly, simply Tourette 's or ts ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric vikaar saath onset in childhood, characterized by anek shaareerik ( motor ) tics and at least ek vocal ( phonic ) tik.
These tics characteristically mom or wane, can be suppressed temporarily, or hai preceded by a premonitory urge.
tourette 's is defined as bhaag of a varnakram of tik disorders, which shaamil kshanik or dirghakaalik tics.
tourette 's thi ekbar mana a viral or vicitra syndrome, sabase praayah sambhddha with the munh of obscene words or socially anuchit or apmanjanak remarks ( coprolalia ), lakin is lakshan is upasthit in only a choti alpsankhyak of logon saath tourette 's.
tourette 's is no longer considered a viral condishan, lakin it is not always correctly pahachaanaa kuki most cases hai mild or the gambhirtha of tics decreases liye most children as they pass through kishoravastha.
between 0.4 % or 3.8 % of children ages 5 to 18 may have tourette 's ; the vyapaktaa of kshanik or dirghakaalik tics in school-age children is ucchtar, with the adhik aam tics of najar blinking, khaansi, throat clearing, sniffing, and facial andolanon.
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity, or Tourette 's karata nahin adversely affect pragna or life pratyaasha.
genetic or paryaavarniya karkon khel a bhoomika in the etiology of tourette 's, lakin the sateek kalyankari hai anjaan.
in most maamle, dawa is unnecessary.
vahin is no prabhavi upachaar liye prayek maamla of tics, lakin nishchit medications and therapies can sahaayta jab unke upyog is warranted.
Education is an important bhaag of koi upachaar yojana, and spashtikaran or reassurance alon hai often sufficient upachaar.
comorbid conditions ( co-occurring diagnoses anya than Tourette 's ) aise as attention-deficit atisakriyata vikaar ( adhd ) or obsessive–compulsive vikaar ( osidi ) hai present in anek patients dekhi in tertiary specialty clinics.
These other sharten praayah cause adhik kaaryaatmak putliyon to the vyaktigat than the tics ki hai the hallmark of tourette 's, hence it is mahatvapurn to correctly identify comorbid sharten and daavat unhen.
The eponym thi bestowed by Jean-Martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on nimitt of uske resident, georges Albert édouard brookes gailes de la tourette ( 1859–1904 ), a French chikitsak or neurologist, jo published an khaataa of nine marijon with Tourette 's in 1885.
sanbeam baij.
Sunbeam was a marque registered by jon marston co. ltd of Wolverhampton, england, in 1888.
The company pehla bana cycle, tab motorcycle or gaadiyaan from the let 19th sadi until parichay 1936, or applied the marque to sab teen form of parivahan.
The company bhi manufactured airo ingine in the pehla sansar yuddh or 647 aircraft dauraan the Second sansar War.
a sanbeam was the pehla angrejon car to win a Grand pricks res, or niyat a kramank of jameen gati record.
The company gai into receivership in 1935 or was kharida by the rootes Group, which jari to use the Sunbeam marque.
fox News channel ( fnc ), bhi gyaat as fox news, is a cabel news channel owned by the fox Entertainment samooh, a subsidiary of News nigam.
as of april 2009, the channel thi uplabdhiyaan to 102 million households in the sanyukt rajya or to viewers internationally, prasaaran primarily isse its nai York studios.
The channel thi nirmit by australian-american media mogul ruport murdoch, jo niyukt purv NBC karypalika roger ailes as its founding CEO.
It shubharambh on aktubar 7, 1996 to 17 lakh cabel sadsy.
It grew dauraan the let 1990s or 2000s to become the dominant cabel news sanjaal in the United rajya.
Critics have stated that fox News channel promotes roodhiwaadee rajnatik sthitiyaan or pakshpatpurna reporting.
tikaakaron, news anchors, or reporters at fox news channel have responded that news reporting and rajnatik commentary operate independently of prayek anya, or have asweekrut any purvaagrah in news reporting.
the mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the daant stith distally ( dur isse the midline of the phase ) isse dono the mandibular duusari premolars of the munh but mesial ( toward the midline of the phase ) isse dono mandibular duusari molars.
it is stith on the mandibular ( nimnatar ) arch of the mouth, or generally opposes the maxillary ( apper ) pehla molars or the urdhvahanu 2nd premolar in saamaanya class i occlusion.
the falan of this molar is samaan to ki of sab molars in lihaaz to pis being the principal karrwai dauraan mastication, commonly gyaat as chewing.
vahin are praayah paanch well-developed cusps on mandibular pehla molars : two on the buccal ( side nearest the cheek ), do lingual ( paksh nikatatam the jeebh ), and one distal.
vahin hai great differences between the deciduous ( baby ) mandibular molars or those of the permanent mandibular molars, even though unke falan are samaan.
the sthai mandibular molars hai nahin mana to have koi daant that precede it.
despite hone namit molars, the patjhadi molars hai followed by sthai premolars.
in the saarvbhaumik pranali of notation, the patjhadi mandibular pehla molars hai designated by a akshar likhaa in aprkes.
the sahi patjhadi mandibular pehla molar is gyaat as `` s '', and the left ek is gyaat as `` l ''.
the antarrashtriya notation rai a alag pranali of notation.
Thus, the sahi patjhadi mandibular first molar is gyaat as `` 84 '', or the baayein one is known as `` 74 ''.
in the saarvbhaumik pranali of notation, the permanent mandibular pehla molars are designated by a kramank.
the sahi sthai mandibular pehla molar is gyaat as `` 30 '', or the baayein ek is gyaat as `` 19 ''.
the Palmer sanketan upyog a kramank in sangyojan with a symbol designating in which quadrant the tooth is mila.
For is daant, the baayein and sahi pehla molars hota have the vahi kramank, `` 6 '', lakin the sahi one hota have the pratik, `` ┐ '', over it, jabaki the left one hota have, `` ┌ ''.
the international notation rai a different kramakan pranali than the previous do, and the right sthai mandibular first molar is gyaat as `` 46 '', or the baayein ek is known as `` 36 ''.
mandibular primary pehla molars usually have chaar pulp horns.
the pehla molar is praayah the first sthai daant to erupt or rai vayask undertones.
anatomy : The mandibular pehla molar has paanch pulin : the mesiobuccal ( mb, toward midline or gaal ), mesiolingual ( ML, toward midline or jeebh ), distolingual ( DL, dur isse midline and towards jeebh ), distobuccal ( db, dur isse midline or toward gaal ), or distal ( d, away isse midline ), soochibaddh in anukram of decreasing aakaar.
Listed in anukram of decreasing oonchaai they hai : ml, dl, DF, MF, and D. An aathvin cusp thi mila in a praathmik duusari nimnatar molar in an Argentinean child.
viewed isse the sheersh of the daant ( occlusal drishy ), the mandibular first molar is pentagonal ( paanch tarafa ) in aakaar or tapers toward the lingual, saath the pahalu hone the buccal surface, the mesial surface, the lingual sataha, distal sataha, or the distobuccal surface.
the occlusal surface rai chaar dole.
the central groove is not sidhaa lakin runs bas the center of the daant mesially to distally and contains chaar pits ( mesial, central, central, or distal ).
The distobuccal naalee ranon isse the distal pit in the central naalee distobuccally separating the distal or distobuccal cusps.
the lingual naalee ranon from the more distal of the central pits in the central naalee toward the lingual sataha between the mesiolingual or distolingual pulin.
the buccal naalee runs isse the adhik mesial of the central pits in the central groove toward the buccal sataha between the mesiobuccal or distobuccal pulin ending in the buccal gadde.
The portion of the central naalee between the central gaddhon is termed the louis ofaset or is anivaary to khaataa liye the sthitiyaan of the buccal or lingual grooves ( buccal naalee hone adhik mesial than the lingual naalee while ve hai samanaantar ).
From the buccal ( buccal drishy ), two jaden hai upasthit.
the distal root is generally straighter, although both praayah have a patala distal golai.
the hits of ruparekha on the mesial and distal sampark the sata daant or are stith at the jankshan of the occlusal or madhya tihaai of the crown.

the chapter 's sorce text is predominantly likhaa in aramaic.

porcupines are rodents saath a coat of sharp spines, or quills, ki bachaav and camouflage unhen isse predators.
ve hai indigenous to the americas, dakshini asia, or Africa.
porcupines hai the third largest of the rodents, peeche the capybara or the biver.
Most porcupines hai parichay long, with an long tail.
weighing, they hai rounded, large and slow.
Porcupines aaiye in vibhinn shades of brown, dhoosar, and the unusual shwet.
porcupines ' spiny suraksha resembles ki of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs or monotreme echidnas.
the common saahi is a herbivore.
it eats pattey, herbs, tahaniyon or green plants like skunk gobhi or chlovar or in the winter it may eat chaal.
the uttar American saahi often climbs trees to dhundhen khaanaa.
The africa saahi is not a climber and forages on the ground.
It is zyaadaatar nocturnal, but hoga sometimes forage for food in the din.
Porcupines have become a pest in kenya or are khaaya as a komalta.
the naam porcupine aata isse madhya French porc espin ( spined suar ).
a kshetreey American naam liye the animal is quill suar.

eliyas J. mccoy ( may 2, 1844 – October 10, 1929 ) thi a black canadian-american avishkaarak and ejeeniyar, who thi notable liye uske 57 u.S. patents, most to do with lubrication of bhaap ingine.
born free in canada, he returned as a five-year-old child with uske parivaar to the sanyukt rajya in 1847, jahaan he lived for the baaki of uske jivan or became a us naagarik.
Honda FCX spashtataa, a hydrogen eendhan cell demonstration gadee introduced in 2008
A hydrogen gadee is a vehicle that upyog hydrogen as iske onboard eendhan liye motive shakti.
hydrogen vaahanon shaamil hydrogen fueled space rockets, as khub as automobiles or anya parivahan vaahanon.
the shakti plants of aise vehicles badalen the chemical urja of hydrogen to mechanical urja either by burning hydrogen in an aatanrik dahan ingine, or by reacting hydrogen with oxigen in a fuel koshika to chalaaen electric motors.
Widespread use of hydrogen liye fueling parivahan is a kunjee tatv of a prastaavit hydrogen arthvyavastha.
hydrogen fuel karata nahin occur naturally on Earth or thus is not an urja sorce ; rather it is an urja carrier.
it is most aksar bana isse mithen or anya fossil fuels, lakin it can be utpaadit using strot ( aise as wind, saura, or nuclear ) ki are intermittent, too diffuse or too cumbersome to sidhe propel vaahanon.
ekikrut wind-to-hydrogen paudhe, using electrolysis of jal, hai exploring technologies to deliver laagat low enough, or quantities great paryaapt, to compete with traditional urja strot.
anek companiyaan are working to develop technologies ki might efficiently exploit the sambhavit of hydrogen energy for mobile upyog.
the aakarshan of using hydrogen as an urja karency is ki, if hydrogen is prepared bagaiyr using chattan fuel inputs, vehicle propulsion hota nahin yogadan to carbon dioxide emissions.
the kamiyaan of hydrogen upyog hai unchi puunji laagat, low energy saamagree prati ikai awaz, unchi tankage weights, bahut unchi storage pot pressures, the bhandar, transportation and filling of gasiy or drav hydrogen in vaahanon, the large nivesh in avasanrachana ki would be required to eendhan vaahanon, or the inefficiency of utpaadan prakriyaaon.
Sacramento is the puunji nagar of the u.S. state of California or the seat of sarkari of sacramento county.
it is located at the sangam of the Sacramento nadi or the amareeki River in the uttari portion of california 's expansive central Valley.
With an anumaanit 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest city in California or the 35th largest city in the sanyukt States.
Sacramento is the kor cultural and aarthik bich of the sacramento metropolitan kshetrafal jisase shaamil saat counties saath an estimated 2009 janasankhyikee of 2,527,123.
iske mahanagar area is the chauthi largest in California after the vrihad los angeles Area, san francisco khadi Area, or the san diego mahanagar area, as khub as the 25th largest in the United rajya.
sacramento thi cited by Time magazine as america 's sabase ethnically or racially integrated nagar in 2002.
sacramento became a nagar through the efforts of the swiss apravasi jon sutter, sr., uske bete jon sutter, jr., or James W. Marshall.
sacramento grew jaldi dhanyavad to the protection of sutter 's Fort, jisase thi sthapit by sutter in 1839.
During the California Gold fatafat, sacramento thi a pramukh vitaran point, a vanijyik or agricultural bich, or a terminus for wagon rail, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the tattu express, or the pehla Transcontinental railroad.
california rajya University, Sacramento, adhik commonly gyaat as sacramento rajya or Sac rajya, is the largest local university.
It is ek of the twenty-three campuses of the California rajya University pranali.

the UC davis Medical bich, a world-renowned research hospital, is stith in the nagar of sacramento.
the tehraana store is a kadi of khudara stores swaamitv or operated by Apple inc., dealing in computer or consumer electronics.
the stores bechein Macintosh nijee computer, software, iPods, ipads, aiphone, third-party accessories, or anya upabhokta electronics aise as tehraana tv.

Under the leadership of Ron johnson, the purv varisht Vice adhyaksh of khudara Operations, the Apple stores have, according to an aalekh in the New York times, maharoom jimmedaar liye `` [ turning ] the ubaau computer bikri manzil into a sleek playroom bhar saath gajet ''.
, tehraana rai 405 stores vishwavyaapee, saath global bikri of arab in merchandise in 2011, or they sise the sanyukt States retail market in terms of bikri prati ikai kshetrafal.
steven paul `` steve '' kaary ( ; farvari 24, 1955 – October 5, 2011 ) was an amareeki udyogon or inventor, behtareen gyaat as the co-founder, adhyaksh, or siio of Apple inc.
through tehraana, he was widely pahachaanaa as a charismatic pioneer of the nijee computer revolution and liye uske influential kariyar in the computer and upabhokta electronics field, transforming `` ek udyog baad another, from computer or smartphones to music or filmon... ''
kaary bhi co-founded or parosa as chief karypalika of pikchars anemation Studios ; he became a sadsy of the falak of nirdeshkon of the walt dijani company in 2006, jab Disney acquired Pixar.
kaary thi among the first to dekhie the vanijyik sambhavit of xerox PARC 's chuha -driven aalekhiy user interfes, jisase led to the creation of the Apple lisa or, ek saal baad, the Macintosh.
He also played a bhoomika in introducing the LaserWriter, ek of the pehla widely uplabdhiyaan leisure printers, to the market.
After a shakti struggle saath the falak of directors in 1985, kaary left Apple and founded aglaa, a computer manch vikaas company specializing in the higher-education or kaarobaar markets.
in 1986, he acquired the computer graphics prabhag of lucasfilm, jisase was spun off as pikchars.
he thi credited in Toy Story ( 1995 ) as an karypalika nirmaataa.
he served as siio or majority shareholder jabatak Disney 's khariden of pikchars in 2006.
in 1996, baad tehraana tha vifal to deliver iske oparating pranali, copland, gil amelio turned to aglaa computer, or the NeXTSTEP platform became the nyaas liye the Mac os x.
kaary returned to Apple as an salaahkaar, and took control of the company as an antarim CEO.
Jobs brought tehraana isse near bankruptcy to profitability by 1998.
as the nai siio of the company, kaary oversaw the vikaas of the iMac, itunes, ipod, iphone, or iPad, and on the sevaayen side, the company 's Apple khudara Stores, iTunes Store and the app store.
The success of these products and services provided anek years of stable vittiya ritern, or propelled tehraana to become the sansar 's sabase moolyawaan publicly traded company in 2011.
the reinvigoration of the company is regarded by anek commentators as one of the mahanatam turnarounds in kaarobaar itihaas.
in 2003, kaary was diagnosed saath a agnyashay neuroendocrine tumor.
Though it thi initially treated, he reported a hormone asantulan, underwent a jigar transplant in 2009, or appeared progressively thinner as uske swasthya asweekrut.
on chikitsa chhod liye sabase of 2011, Jobs resigned in agast that saal, or thi nirvaachit adhyaksh of the falak.
He died of respiratory giraftaar sambandhit to uske metastatic tumor on October 5, 2011.
kaary received a kramank of honors or public manyata liye uske influence in the technology or music industries.
He rai been referred to as `` legendary '', a `` futurist '' or bas `` doordarshee '', or has been described as the `` Father of the Digital kranti '', a `` nipun of innovation '', or a `` dizine perfectionist ''.

the Roman numeral pranali is a cousin of etruscan numerals.

prabhavi Nuclear Charge aarekh
the effective nabhikeey charge ( praayah symbolize as or Z* ) is the jaal positive charge anbhavi by an electron in a multi-electron atom.
The pad `` prabhavi '' is prayukt kuki the shielding prabhaav of negatively charged electrons roktaa higher kakshiya electrons isse experiencing the full nuclear charge by the repelling prabhaav of inner-layer electrons.
the prabhavi nabhikeey charge anbhavi by the outer shell electron is also pukaara the kor charge.
It is sambhavit to determine the shakti of the nabhikeey charge by looking at the oxikaran kramank of the anu.

the dwite D. ijanhavar National pranali of antarraji or raksha Highways ( commonly known as the Interstate rajmarg pranali, antarraji frive pranali, antarraji System, or bas the antarraji ) is a sanjaal of freeways ki form a bhaag of the neshnal rajmarg pranali of the sanyukt rajya.
the pranali is namit liye adhyaksh dwite D. Eisenhower, jo championed its formation.
nirmaan thi praadhikrut by the sangheey sahaayta rajmarg adhinium of 1956, and the asli portion thi samaapt 35 saalo baad.
the sanjaal has since maharoom vistaarit, and, it tha a total length of, making it the sansar 's duusari longest baad China 's., parichay one-quarter of sab gadee mile chalit in the country upyog the antarraji system.
The laagat of nirmaan has maharoom anumaanit at $ 425 arab ( in 2006 dollars ), bananaa it the `` largest public works program since the Pyramids ``.
the pranali rai contributed in shaping the United States into a sansar aarthik mahashakti and a atyadhik industrialized nation.

Launched on 7 December 2005, the domen is uplabdhiyaan for sanghathanon in and residents of eu sadsy states.
The TLD is administered by eurid, a consortium originally consisting of the neshnal cctld registry oparator of belgium, Sweden, or italy, joined baad by the neshnal registry oparator of the check ganatantr.

meister arthath nipun in germany ( as in nipun craftsman, or as an honorific sheershak aise as meister eckhart ).
The word is akin to maestro.
in khel, meister is used for the vartmaan neshnal, europea or sansar champion ( Deutscher meister, *Europameister, weltmeister ).
Many modern din germany police shaktiyaan upyog the sheershak Meister.
dauraan the duusari sansar yuddh, Meister thi the ucchtam enlisted rank of the ordnungspolizei.
Meister has been udhaar into English kathboli, where it is prayukt in yogic nouns.
a person referred to as “Meister” is ek jo rai extensive saidhantik knowledge or vyaavhaarik kaushal in his vyavsaayik, business, or kuch anya kind of work or activity.
liye udhaaharan, a “puzzle-meister” hota be someone highly skilled at solving paheliyaan.
These neologisms sometimes have a vyangyatmak intent ( liye udhaaharan, “stubble-meister” for someone saath a choti, neat dadhi or “crier-meister” liye kisi jo praayah cries ).
Mighty Morphin Power rangeron is an amareeki live-action children 's television series about teenagers saath super-powers, based on the 16th kisht of the japani super sentai matadhikaar, kyōryū sentai zyuranger.
Both the dikhaaen and iske sambandhit merchandise saw unbridled overnight kamyaabi, becoming a staple of 1990s pop samskruti in mere maheene.

However the kakuranger veshbhusha yahood baad prayukt liye the sheershak characters of the mini-series, Mighty morphin alian Rangers.

the dikhaaen 's merchandise was produced and distributed by bandai Entertainment.
