jabaki an overarching kathanak hota continue until shakti Rangers khoyaa Galaxy, subsequent shrenee baad mmpr hai not sequels or spin-offs in the traditional bhav.
in 2010, a re-version of mighty morphin Power rangeron, saath a nai logo, comic book-referenced graphics, or atirikt alternative special effects, was broadcast on abisi bachche, or bandai utpaadit brands new khilone to coincide saath the shrenee.
edgar allan po ( born edgar po ; January 19, 1809 – aktubar 7, 1849 ) was an amareeki lekhak, kavi, editor or literary aalochak, mana bhaag of the American romantic Movement.
Best gyaat liye uske tales of mystery and the macabre, po thi ek of the earliest amareeki practitioners of the choti story and is generally considered the avishkaarak of the jasoos fiction vidha.
he is further credited with contributing to the emerging vidha of vigyaan fiction.
he thi the pehla well-known amareeki lekhak to try to earn a jeena through writing alon, resulting in a financially difficult jivan or career.
He thi born as Edgar po in Boston, masachusets ; he thi orphaned yang jab his maan died shortly baad uske pita abandoned the family.
po thi liya in by jon or frances allan, of richmond, Virginia, but ve never formally apanaaya use.
he attended the vishvavidhyalayon of virginia liye one semester but left due to kami of money.
baad enlisting in the fouj or later failing as an adhikari 's cadet at West point, Poe parted ways saath the allans.
uske prakaashan career began vinamratapurvak, with an anonymous collection of kavitaayen, tamerlane or anya Poems ( 1827 ), credited tabhi to `` a bostonian ''.
po switched his focus to gadhy and spent the aglaa anek years working liye saahitiyik journals and periodicals, becoming known liye his apana style of saahitiyik aalochana.
uske kaary majaboor use to move among anek shaharon, sahit Baltimore, philadelphia, and nai York City.
in balteemor in 1835, he shaadishuda virginia clemm, uske 13-year-old cousin.
in janvari 1845 po prakashit his kavita, `` The Raven ``, to instant kamyaabi.
uske bivi died of tuberculosis do years baad iske prakaashan.
He began niyojan to upaj uske apana journal, the penn ( later renamed the stilas ), haalanki he died pehle it could be utpaadit.
on aktubar 7, 1849, at aayu 40, Poe died in balteemor ; the kaaran of uske maut is anjaan and has maharoom variously attributed to daaru, dimag jamghat, haija, drugs, heart disease, rabies, aatmahatya, tapedic, or anya agents.
Poe and his works bahekaave sahitya in the sanyukt States or around the sansar, as khub as in specialized field, aise as cosmology and kryptography.
po or his kaary appear throughout lokapriy samskruti in sahitya, music, films, or television.
a kramank of uske homes are samarpit sangrahalay aaj.
The rahasy lekhak of america upasthit an salanaa award gyaat as the edgar Award for distinguished kaary in the rahasy vidha.
sher are obligate carnivores ; ve require up to seven kilograms ( 15 pound ) of maance prati din.
a pramukh ghatak of unke aahaar is the flesh of large mammals, jaise is African bhens.
a carnivore ( ) arth 'meat eater ' ( Latin, caro meaning 'meat ' or 'flesh ' and vorare arth 'to devour ' ) is an sajiv ki garbhashayi its urja and nutrient aavashyaktaayen isse a aahaar consisting mukhyatah or exclusively of animal utak, whether through predation or scavenging.
pashu ki depend solely on animal flesh liye their nutrient requirements hai mana carnivores while those that bhi consume non-animal khaanaa hai mana carnivores.
omnivores bhi consume both animal and non-animal khaanaa, and apart isse the more general definition, vahin is no clearly paribhaashit anupaat of sanyantr to animal saamagree that hota distinguish a facultative carnivore from an sarvahari.
a carnivore ki sits at the sheersh of the foodchain is an apex parabhakshi.
paudhe that capchar or digest keet are pukaara maansaahaari paudhe.
similarly, fungi that capchar microscopic animals hai praayah called maansaahaari fungi.
the fifa sansar cap, often bas the World cap, is an antarrashtriya sangh football pratiyogita contested by the varisht main 's neshnal tiimon of the members of fédération Internationale de footbaal sangh ( fifa ), the sport 's vaishvik shaasi deh.
the championships rai been awarded every chaar years since the inaugural toornament in 1930, magar in 1942 and 1946 jab it thi nahin held kuki of the duusari World War.
The current champions hai spain, jo jiti the 2010 tournament.
The current format of the toornament involves 32 teams spardhaa for the sheershak at venues bheetar the host swadesh ( s ) over a kaal of parichay a maah ; is phase is praayah pukaara the World cap final.
a qualification phase, which philhal takes place over the preceding teen years, is prayukt to determine which teams qualify for the toornament saath saath the mejabaan nation ( s ).
the 19 sansar cap tournaments have maharoom jiti by aath alag neshnal tiimon.
Brazil have won five times, or ve hai the tabhi team to have nibhaai in prayek tournament.
the other sansar cap vijeta hai italy, with chaar sheershak ; germany, with teen titles ; Argentina or inaugural winners urugve, with do sheershak each ; or england, frans, and spain, with one sheershak prayek.
The sansar cap is the sansar 's sabase widely viewed sporting event ; an anumaanit 715.1 lakh people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World cap held in germany.
the aglaa teen World cups hoga be hosted by Brazil in 2014, Russia in 2018, and qatar in 2022.
nayak is an amareeki science fiction television naatak shrenee created by Tim kring that appeared on enbisi liye chaar sizan isse sitambar 25, 2006 through farvari 8, 2010.
The series tells the kahaniyaan of ordinary people jo discover superhuman abilities, or kaisaa ye abilities lo effect in the characters ' jeevandaan.
The shrenee emulates the aesthetic style or storytelling of amareeki comic kitabe, using multi-episode story arcs ki nirmaan upon a larger, adhik encompassing chaap.
the shrenee thi utpaadit by tailwind productions in association saath saarvbhaumik Media studios.
it thi filmaaya primarily in los angeles, california.
chaar puraa sizan aired, samaapti on farvari 8, 2010.
the critically acclaimed pehla season tha a chalaaen of 23 apisod or garnered an ausat of 14.3 lakh darshak in the United States, receiving the highest darja liye an enbisi drama premier in five saalo.
the duusari ritu of nayak aakarshith an ausat of 13.1 lakh darshak in the u.S., or chihnit enbisi 's sole shrenee among the sheersh 20 kramit kaarykram in kul viewership liye the 2007–2008 ritu.
Heroes has arjeet a kramank of awards or nominations, sahit primetime emi puraskaar, sunahari globs, logon 's Choice puraskaar or British academy television puraskaar.
an online ekstansion of the series, nayak 360 anubhav, baad rebranded as nayak Evolutions, thi nirmit to explore the Heroes brahmad and provides insite into the show 's mythology.
anya official nayak media shaamil magazine, karrwai aankade, tie-in or interactive websiton, a mobile khel, a anokhaa, kapadey or other merchandise.
in the patan of 2008, NBC Digital entertainment released a series of online saamagree for the garmiyaan, sahit adhik original web saamagree, betaar itivi interactivity, graphic novels uplabdhiyaan liye mobile dekhne or webisodes.
enbisi ghoshit nayak raddikaran on may 14, 2010.
afterward, the network mana bananaa a television special event to conclude the shrenee ; however, on sitambar 9, 2010, enbisi ghoshit the nirnay to roke koi further vikaas of the nayak matadhikaar.
Tim kring then sujhaayaa ki the vyapak aadhaar of nayak storylines allowed liye the franchise to vaapasi liye prashansak, lakin he kiya nahin bataaen jab or in kayaa media format.
on april 17, 2013, tv Line reported ki emesain thi in bate to revive the shrenee saath a new daal.
jon pierpont `` J. p. ''
morgan ( april 17, 1837 – kooch 31, 1913 ) thi an amareeki financier, banker, philanthropist and art colector who varchasv corporate vitt or industrial consolidation during uske samay.
in 1892 morgan arranged the vilay of Edison saamaanya electric and thomson-houston electric Company to rup General electric.
baad financing the sristi of the sangheey Steel company, he merged in 1901 saath the carnegi steel company or anek anya steel or iron businesses, sahit Consolidated steel or taar company swaamitv by wiliam edenborn, to rup the sanyukt rajya Steel Corporation.
morgan died in rome, italy, in his sleep in 1913 at the age of 75, leaving his saubhaahgya or kaarobaar to uske bete, jon pierpont `` Jack '' morgan, jr., and bequeathing uske mansion and vishaal kitaab sangrahan to the morgan pustakaalayon & Museum in nai york.
at the oonchaai of morgan 's career dauraan the early 1900s, he and uske saajhedaar tha financial nivesh in anek vishaal corporations and were abhiyukt by critics of controlling the swadesh 's unchi vitt.
he directed the banking gathbandhan that roka the dehshat of 1907.
he was the agrani financer of the pragatisheel Era, or uske dedication to dakshata or modernization helped transform amareeki kaarobaar.
is is a list of apisod of the television shrenee.

The shrenee thi utpaadit to commemorate the tenth varshganth of the AT-X sanjaal it originally aired on.
aerial photo of fletc, where us digital forensics maanakon yahood developed in the 1980s or '90s
digital forensics ( sometimes gyaat as digital forensic science ) is a branch of forensic vigyaan encompassing the recovery and investigation of saamagree mila in digital divaais, often in sambandh to computer aparaadhon.
the pad digital forensics thi originally used as a synonym liye computer forensics but has expanded to cover investigation of sab divaais sakasham of storing digital aankada.
saath roots in the personal computing revolution of the let 1970s or jaldi '80s, the anushaasan viksit in a haphazard manner dauraan the 1990s, or it thi nahin jabatak the jaldi 21st sadi ki national nitiyon emerged.
Digital forensics investigations have a kismein of anuprayog.
the sabase aam is to support or refute a pariklpana pehle dand or civil ( as bhaag of the electronic discovery process ) nyaayalayon.
forensics may bhi visheshta in the nijee sector ; such as dauraan aatanrik corporate investigations or intrusion chaanbin ( a visheshgy probe into the prakruti or extent of an unauthorized sanjaal intrusion ).
The takneekee pahalu of an investigation is vibhajit into several sub-branches, relating to the prakaar of digital divaais shaamil ; computer forensics, sanjaal forensics, forensic aankada analysis and mobile yantra forensics.
the theth forensic process encompasses the seizure, forensic imaging ( acquisition ) or analysis of digital media or the utpaadan of a rapat into ekatrit evidence.
as khub as identifying direct evidence of a aparaadhon, digital forensics can be used to visheshta pramaan to vishisht suspects, confirm alibis or statements, determine intent, pahachaano sources ( liye udhaaharan, in copyright maamle ), or authenticate dastauez.
investigations hai much broader in paimaana than other kshetron of forensic vishleshan ( where the usual uddeshy is to provide answers to a shrenee of simpler sawaal ) often involving complex time-lines or hypotheses.
a tulana of the chromaticities enclosed by kuch rang spaces.
a color model is an amoort mathematical model describing the way rangon can be represented as tuples of numbers, typically as teen or chaar maan or rang components ( e.g. arjibi or cmyk are rang models ).
however, a color model saath no associated maanchitran falan to an nirpeksh rang spes is a adhik or kam manamaani rang system saath no connection to any globally understood system of color nirvachan.
adding a nishchit maanchitran function between the rang model or a certain reference color spes parinaam in a definite `` padchihn '' bheetar the sandarbh rang spes.
is `` padchihn '' is gyaat as a gamut, and, in sangyojan saath the color model, defines a nai color spes.
For example, adobe RGB or sRGB are do different absolute rang spaces, dono based on the RGB model.
in the sabase generik sense of the paribhaasha upar, color spaces can be paribhaashit bagaiyr the use of a color model.
ye spaces, aise as Pantone, hai in prabhaav a given niyat of names or numbers which are paribhaashit by the astitv of a sambandhit niyat of shaareerik rang swatches.
This aalekh focuses on the mathematical model avadharana.
Labor din is an amareeki sangheey avkaash observed on the pehla Monday in sitambar, ki manaata the aarthik and social yogadan of majdoor.
jivan insurance is a anubandh between an insured ( insurance niti holder ) or an insurer, where the insurer promises to pay a designated labhaarthi a yoga of dhan ( the `` benefits '' ) upon the maut of the insured vyakti.
depending on the anubandh, anya events aise as terminal illness or najuk beemaari may also trigger payment.
the niti holder typically pays a premium, either regularly or as a lump yoga.
anya kharch ( aise as funeral kharch ) hai bhi sometimes shaamil in the laabh.
Life nitiyon hai legal anubandh or the sharten of the anubandh describe the limitations of the insured kaarykram.
Specific exclusions hai praayah likhaa into the anubandh to seemaa the deyta of the insurer ; aam examples hai daawa relating to aatmahatya, dhokhadhadi, war, riot or civil commotion.
life-based contracts tend to patan into do pramukh categories:
suraksha nitiyon – designed to provide a benefit in the event of nirdisht event, typically a lump yoga bhugtan.
a aam rup of is design is term bime.
nivesh policies – jahaan the main uddeshy is to sukar the vikaas of capital by niyamit or single premiums.
aam form ( in the US ) hai puure jivan, universal life or variable jivan nitiyon.

mitzi Gaynor Donahue ( born may 2, 1962 in yorba linda, Orange county, california ) is an American abhinetri, also credited or adhik popularly gyaat as mitzi kapture.
kapture began uske career in films, sabase of jisase were nahin vishaal commercial safaltaaon.
wo gai on to mek a few television guest dikhaave ( MacGyver, 1st & ten, or as a pratiyogi on The $ 100,000 Pyramid ) pehle she gained antarrashtriya exposure saath her pehla pramukh television bhoomika as sargent Rita lee talwaar in the television shrenee Silk stalkings.
kapture 's bhoomika as reeta, the anya half of the do `` Sams '' for almost 5 saalo, cemented her popularity.
yugma saath rob Estes jo played sargent kris lorenzo, kapture gained vaishvik manyata saath saath her costar chunki the show thi broadcast in anek deshon.
sargent talwaar aakhirkaar became leftinent talwaar by the samay kapture baayein the shrenee in 1995 to have her pehla child medisson.
During her time with the series, Kapture briefly sat in the nideshak 's kursi, for do apisod.
wo thi interviewed liye the resha stalkings ritu 1 DVD jisase was vitarit by lungar khadi entertainment or released in sitambar 2004.
baad a choti antaraal from the screen following uske nikaas from resha stalkings, Kapture laute in 1997 to the choti screen and uese sanjaal.
She nibhaai sise roles in do uese Pictures Originals telemovies, Perfect aparaadhon ( based on a true story, bhi pukaara chupa or talash : The joan jensen Story ), which also strecchar Jasmine guy and uske angrakshak.
She baad strecchar in a few anya independent filmi projects and theatre productions or tha several television guest appearances.
kapture also tha a punaravarti bhoomika on Baywatch as Alexis Ryker.
wo nibhaai Anita hojes on the yang or the Restless isse 2002 through 2004, jahaan she was credited as mitzi Kapture donahue, or starred in the made-for-TV film Night of Terror jisase premiered kooch 26, 2006 on Lifetime sanjaal.
uske naveenatam is a supporting bhoomika in parameshwar 's Ears, released in 2007.
kapture is the official hasti spokesperson for the xeroderma pigmentosum Society.
the exbox 360 is the duusari video khel console viksit by or utpaadit liye microsoft or the successor to the exbox.
the Xbox 360 competes saath soni 's PlayStation 3 or Nintendo 's ve as bhaag of the saatvaan peedhee of video khel consoles.
As of September 30, 2012, 70 lakh exbox 360 consoles have been bechi worldwide.
the exbox 360 thi officially anaavaran on amtivi on may 12, 2005, saath detailed launch or khel soochna divulged later ki month at the Electronic entertainment expo ( E3 ).
the console bechi out completely upon relies in all regions except in japani.
anek major suvidhaayen of the exbox 360 are iske ekikrut exbox Live seva ki allows khilaadi to compete online ; downlod arcade khel, khel demos, trailers, tv shows, music and movies ; and iske Windows media Center multimedia capabilities.
The Xbox sajiv bhi offers access to vibhinn ( praayah region-specific ) third-party media strimming anuprayog.
At unke e3 prastutikaran on june 14, 2010, microsoft ghoshit a redesigned exbox 360 ki hota jalayaan on the vahi din.
The redesigned console is slimmer than the previous exbox 360 model or suvidhaayen integrated 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi, toslink s/pdif optical audio output, paanch usb 2.0 port ( compared to the teen from puraani versions ) or a khaas AUX bandargahon.
Older model of the exbox 360 have chunki maharoom discontinued.
the pehla nai consol to be released suvidhaayen a 250 gb hard drive, jabaki a baad, less mahangi SKU suvidhaayen 4 gb internal storage.

a backpack ( also pukaara ruksaa, knapsack, packsack, pack ) is, in iske simplest rup, a cloth sack carried on one 's waapas and secured saath do straps that go over the kandhon, lakin vahin can be exceptions.
lightweight types of backpacks are sometimes worn on tabhi one kandhe strap.
Backpacks hai often pasandida to handbag liye carrying baari loads or carrying koi sort of equipment, kuki of the simit capacity to carry baari weights for long periods of time in the hands.
vishaal backpacks, prayukt to carry loads over 10 kg ( 22 pound ), praayah offload the largest bhaag ( up to about 90 % ) of their vazan onto padded hip belt, leaving the kandhe straps mainly liye stabilising the lod.
is improves the potential to carry baari loads, as the kulhon hai stronger than the kandhon, or bhi increases chapaltaa or santulan, since the lod yatraayen nearer the wearer 's apana bich of dravyaman.
in ancient times, the backpack thi prayukt as a means to carry the shikari 's larger game or other prakaar of prey and as a way of easier hastantaran for anya saamagree.
in the maamle of larger hunts, the hunters would dismember their shikaar or vitarit the tukade of the animal around, each one packing the meat into anek wrappings or then into bag which ve lagaai on to their backs.
the thilaa itself thi bana up of different animal chupa or skin ( depending on kayaa sorts of animals yahood in the area ) and sewn together by the aanton of kaha pashu, jisase yahood woven saath tightly to mek a sturdy thread-like saamagree.
Mexico ( ; ; ), officially the sanyukt mexican rajya ( ), is a sangheey constitutional ganatantr in uttar America.
It is bordered on the uttar by the sanyukt rajya ; on the dakshin and west by the prashanth samandar ; on the southeast by guatemala, beliz, or the caribbean Sea ; or on the east by the gulf of mexico.
Covering almost do lakh vargakar kilometre ( over 760,000 sq mi ), mexico is the paanchvaan largest desh in the americas by kul area or the 13th largest independent nation in the sansar.
saath an anumaanit janasankhyikee of over 113 million, it is the sansar 's eleventh sabase populous desh or the sabase populous spanish-speaking country.
mexico is a sangh comprising thirty-one rajya or a sangheey zila, the capital nagar.
In pre-columbian mexico anek samskritiyon matured into unnat sabhyataaon such as the olmec, the toltec, the teotihuacan, the Zapotec, the maaya or the azetek pehle first sampark saath Europeans.
in 1521, spain conquered or colonized the territory isse iske aadhaar in méxico-tenochtitlan, which thi administered as the viceroyalty of New spain.
is territory hota aakhirkaar become mexico following manyata of the colony 's independence in 1821.
the post-independence period thi characterized by economic instability, the mexican-american yuddh and territorial cession to the sanyukt States, a civil yuddh, two empires or a gharelu dictatorship.
the latter led to the mexican kranti in 1910, jisase culminated saath the promulgation of the 1917 samvidhan or the emergence of the country 's vartmaan rajnatik pranali.
Elections held in July 2000 marked the first samay ki an vipaksh party won the presidency isse the Institutional krantikari party.
chunki 2006 the desh rai maharoom in the midst of a drug yuddh jisase rai caused 60,000 mauton.
mexico rai ek of the world 's largest economies, and is mana dono a kshetreey shakti and middle shakti.
In jod, Mexico thi the pehla latin amareeki sadsy of the Organisation liye Economic co-operation and Development oecd ( since 1994 ), or mana an upper-middle aay desh by the sansar Bank.
Mexico is mana a newly industrialized country and an ubharate power.
it rai the fourteenth largest nominal GDP and the eleventh largest jidipi by khareednaa shakti parity.
the economy is strongly linked to those of its North amareeki free vyapaar anubandh ( nafta ) saajhedaar, especially the United rajya of america.
mexico baandhane sixth in the world or pehla in the americas by kramank of unesco sansar viraasat Sites saath 31, or in 2007 thi the tenth sabase visited country in the world saath 21.4 lakh antarrashtriya arrivals prati saal.
Babe ruth holds the emelbi kariyar slugging percentage ricard (.690 ).
in besabaal aankde, slugging percentage ( abbreviated slg ) is a lokapriy maap of the power of a hitter.
It is gananaa as kul bases vibhajit by at bats :
jahaan AB is the kramank of at-bats liye a die player, and 1B, 2b, 3B, and hr hai the kramank of singles, yugal, tiguna, and home ranon, respectively.
Walks hai specifically excluded isse is calculation.
liye example, in 1920, Babe ruth played his pehla ritu liye the nai York Yankees.
in 458 at bats, Ruth had 172 hits, comprising 73 singles, 36 yugal, 9 triples, and 54 ghar ranon, jisase brings the kul aadhaar ginati to ( 73 × 1 ) + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388.
His kul kramank of bases ( 388 ) vibhajit by uske total at-bats ( 458 ) is.847, uske slugging percentage for the ritu.
the aglaa saal he slugged.846, or ye records gai unbroken jabatak 2001, when bairi bonds achieved 411 bases in 476 at-bats, bringing uske slugging pratishat to.863, unmatched chunki.
is a role-playing video game developed or prakashit by vargakar ( abhi vargakar anics ) for the super nintendo entertainment pranali in 1995.
chrono Trigger 's vikaas toli shaamil three designers ki Square dubbed the `` sapana Team '' : hironobu Sakaguchi, the nirmaataa of Square 's final kaalpanik series ; yuji Horii, a freelance panktiyaan or nirmaataa of Enix 's lokapriy Dragon Quest series ; and akira toriyama, a freelance manga kalakaar famed liye uske kaary with dragon Quest and Dragon ball.
Kazuhiko aoki produced the khel, masato kaato likhaa sabase of the plat, jabaki composer yasunori mitsuda scored sabase of the khel pehle girnaa ill or deferring remaining tracks to final kaalpanik composer nobuo uematsu.
the khel 's story folo a samooh of adventurers who safar through time to prevent a vaishvik pralay.
vargakar re-released a ported version by tose in japani liye soni 's plastesan in 1999, baad repackaged saath a Final kaalpanik iv bandargahon as Final kaalpanik chronicals in 2001 liye the uttar amareeki market.
A thodaa unnat chrono trigar thi released liye the Nintendo ds on navambar 25, 2008, in North America and Japan, or gai on bikri in australia on farvari 3, 2009 or in europea on farvari 6, 2009.
The game was never released in pal territories pehle the nintendo ds sanskaran.
Chrono trigar thi a najuk and commercial kamyaabi upon relies and is considered today to be ek of the mahanatam video games of sab samay.
Nintendo shakti patrika varnit pahaluon of chrono Trigger as krantikari, including iske anek endings, plot-related sidequests focusing on character vikaas, adwitiya battle pranali, or vistrut graphics.
Chrono trigar thi the teesraa best-selling khel of 1995, or the khel 's SNES or plastesan iterations have shipped 2.65 lakh copies as of kooch 2003.
The sanskaran liye the nintendo ds bechi 790,000 nakal as of kooch 2009.
chrono Trigger thi bhi ported to mobile phone, abhaasi consol, the plastesan Network ( tabhi in the uese ), ioes divaais, and android divaais.
bakrii cheese
Goat cheese, or chèvre ( isse the french shabd liye bakrii ), is cheez made out of the milk of bakriyon.
Hyperthermia is elevated deh taapmaana due to vifal thermoregulation ki occurs jab a deh produces or absorbs adhik ooshmaa than it dissipates.
Extreme taapmaana elevation then becomes a medical apaat requiring taatkaalik upachaar to prevent viklaangata or maut.
The sabase aam kalyankari include ooshmaa stroke or adverse pratikriyaayein to drugs.
the purv is an acute taapmaana elevation caused by expozar to excessive ooshmaa, or sangyojan of heat and ardrata, ki overwhelms the heat-regulating mechanisms.
the latter is a relatively viral paksh prabhaav of anek davaayen, visheshkar those ki affect the central nervous pranali.
malignant atitaap is a viral complication of some prakaar of saamaanya anesthesia.
Hyperthermia can bhi be deliberately induced using davaayen or chikitsa divaais or may be used in the upachaar of kuch kinds of karkat or anya conditions, sabase commonly in sangyojan saath radiotherapy.
Hyperthermia differs isse fever in that the deh 's temperature set point remains aparivartit.
The vipareet is hypothermia, jisase occurs when the taapmaana boonden neeche that required to maintain saamaanya chayapachay.
beliz, is a desh located on the northeastern coast of central america.
It is the tabhi country in the kshetrafal where angrezi is the aadhikarik bhashaa, haalanki kriol or spani hai more commonly bolaa.
beliz is bordered on the north by mexico, to the south or west by guatemala or to the east by the caribbean Sea.
iske mainland is about long or chaudee.
saath of jameen or a janasankhyikee of tabhi 312,698 nivaasiyon ( 2010 janasankhyikee ), Belize possesses the lowest janasankhyikee ghanatv in Central america.
the country 's janasankhyikee vikaas rate of 3.15 % ( 2012 est. ) is the duusari ucchtam in the pradesh and one of the ucchtam in the pashchimi golardh.
beliz 's prachurtaa of sthaliy or samudri prajati, or iske vividhta of ecosystems de it a kunjee place bheetar the globally significant mesoamerican biological Corridor.
beliz has a vividh samaaj, comprising many samskritiyon or bhashaaen.
it is the tabhi nation in the pradesh saath a angrejon aupniveshik viraasat, lakin as a bhaag of the Western caribbean mandal, it bhi saajha a common heritage with the fellow anglophone caribbean countries.
In saamaanya, beliz is mana to be a central amareeki and caribbean swadesh with damdaar ties to both the caribbean or Latin america.
beliz is a member of the Caribbean jatiyaan ( caricom ), the jatiyaan of Latin amareeki or caribbean rajya ( CELAC ), and central American Integration pranali ( sika ).
beliz is gyaat liye iske sitambar jashn, and is the janmasthan of chabane gum or punta chattan.
the `` betsi ross '' dhvaj
a `` betsi ross '' dhvaj udati baahar san francisco nagar Hall
the betsi ross flag is an early design of the dhvaj of the sanyukt rajya, popularly attributed to betsi ross, using the common motifs of prayavarti red-and-white dharidaar field saath five-pointed stars in a blue canton.
the dhvaj thi designed dauraan the American Revolution and suvidhaayen 13 sitaron to represent the original 13 colonies.
the distinctive feature of the ross dhvaj is the arrangement of the sitaron in a vrutt.
haalanki the Betsy Ross story is sweekrut by sabase Americans, kuch flag itihaaskaaron or revisionists do not accept the betsi ross dizine as the pehla American flag.
According to the paramparaagat khaataa, the asli dhvaj thi bana in june 1776, jab a choti committee—including george washington, Robert morris and saapeksh George ross —visited Betsy or discussed the need liye a nai American dhvaj.
betsi sweekrut the job to manufacture the flag, altering the committee 's dizine by replacing the six-pointed sitaron with five-pointed sitaron.
jabaki the betsi ross legend is questionable, the dhvaj dizine is known to have maharoom in use by 1777 ; alfred b. gali varnit it at the aatmasamarpan of saamaanya burgoyne and samajha the vrutt of sitaron to represent samta among the amareeki rajya.
it is one of the oldest sanskaran of U.S. dhvaj gyaat to exist ; jabaki it is nahin the oldest surviving flag centuries in cloth rup, iske likeness appears on puraani shaareerik aurbindo, namely, the samakaleen battlefield paintings by jon Trumbull or charles Willson peale.
They depict the golakaar star arrangement hone flown isse jalayaan masts and anek anya sthaan, or yun provide the pehla gyaat aitihaasik documentation of the dhvaj 's appearance.
The muhar of the u.S. Department of Veterans Affairs upyog the betsi Ross dhvaj to represent seva to all veterans from the amareeki kranti to the present day.
the betsi Ross dizine of 13-star us dhvaj has maharoom pradarshit in anek lokapriy artworks ( sometimes inaccurately, as in Washington crossing the delaware ) or films, such as the 1960 sanskaran of pollyanna.
The dhvaj continues to be ek of the sabase lokapriy pratikon of the amareeki kranti.
a purr is a dhwani made by sab species of felids or is a bhaag of billi communication.
It varies between cats ( liye udhaaharan by loudness or tone ), or from prajati to prajati, but can be characterized as a tonal buzzing.
The pad `` purring '' rai maharoom used liberally in sahitya, or it rai maharoom claimed ki viverrids ( sivit, nevala, genet ), bears, badgers, hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr.
anya animals ki have maharoom said to purr are rabbits, squirrels, gini pigs, tapirs, ring-tailed lemurs, haathiyon, raccoons or gorillas while khaane.
however, using a sakht paribhaasha of purring ki nirantar sound production jarur vaikalpik between pulmonic egressive or ingressive airstream ( or praayah go on liye minutes ), peters ( 2002 ), in an exhaustive review of the vaigyanik sahitya, pahunche the nishkarsh that until tab tabhi ‘purring cats’ ( felidaye ) and two prajati of genets, genetta tigrina, and sabase sambhavit also genetta genetta, tha maharoom documented to purr.
The platypus ( ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic mammal endemic to purvi australia, sahit Tasmania.
saath saath the chaar prajati of ekidna, it is ek of the paanch extant prajati of monotremes, the tabhi mammals ki lay eggs bajaay of giving janam.
It is the sole jeena pratinidhi of iske family ( ornithorhynchidae ) or genus ( ornithorhynchus ), haalanki a kramank of sambandhit species have maharoom mila in the chattan record.
the unusual rup of this egg-laying, batakh -billed, biver -tailed, otter -footed mammal manorath europea naturalists when ve pehla encountered it, saath kuch considering it an elaborate dhokhadhadi.
it is ek of the few vishaiylla stanadhariyon, the male platypus having a spur on the hind pair that delivers a venom capable of causing kathor pidaa to insaano.
the unique suvidhaayen of the platypus make it an mahatvapurn subject in the study of vikasvaadi jeevigyaan or a recognisable and iconic pratik of australia ; it rai appeared as a mascot at neshnal kaarykram or is pradarshit on the reverse of its 20-cent sikaa.
The platypus is the animal emblem of the state of nai South wales.
Until the early 20th sadi, it was hunted liye its fer, lakin it is abhi surakshit throughout iske dayera.
haalanki khilaate prajnan programmes have tha tabhi simit kamyaabi or the platypus is vulnerable to the prabhaav of pradooshan, it is nahin antargat any immediate threat.

the janasankhyikee thi 336 at the 2010 census.
wilton is a census-designated place ( cdp ) in Sacramento county, california, sanyukt States.
it is part of the sacramento – arden-arcade – roseville mahanagar sankhyikeey kshetrafal.
the population thi 5,363 at the 2010 census, up isse 4,551 at the 2000 janasankhyikee.
in human-computer baatcheet, kaaten or paste and nakal and paste hai related cmand that offer a user-interface interaction takanic liye transferring text, aankada, filein or objects from a sorce to a gantavy.
sabase ubiquitously, upayokta aavashyaktaa the kshamta to kaaten and paste bhaag of maidan text.
the kaaten cmand removes the selected aankada isse its asli position, jabaki the nakal command creates a nakal ; in dono maamle the selected aankada is lagaai in a clipboard.
The aankada in the clipboard is baad inserted in the position where the paste command is issued.
the cmand names hai an interface roopak aadhaarit on the shaareerik kaarividhi prayukt in pandulipi sampadan to banaaen a pej leout.
is baatcheet technique rai band association saath sambandhit techniques in aalekhiy upayokta interfaces ki upyog ingit devices aise as a computer mouse ( by drag or buund, for example ).
aarthik anukram maatra is the order quantity ki minimizes kul inventory holding laagat or ordering laagat.
it is ek of the oldest shastreey utpaadan scheduling model.
The framework prayukt to determine is anukram maatra is also known as Barabas eoq model or barabas sutara.
the model thi viksit by Ford W. Harris in 1913, but R. H. wilson, a consultant jo lagu it extensively, is die credit for his in-depth vishleshan.
stephen `` steewi '' Ray vaughan ( aktubar 3, 1954 – agast 27, 1990 ) was an American guitarist, singer-songwriter, and ricard nirmaataa.
praayah referred to by his adyakshar srv, vaughan is best known as a founding sadsy or netaa of Double trubal.
saath with vadak kris layton or bassist tommy shainan, ve ignited the blues revival of the 1980s.
saath a kariyar spanning saat years, vaughan and doguna trubal consistently bechi out concerts jabaki unke album aksar gai sunaharaa.
He was born or uthaaya in dalas, texas, or for a choti kaal of samay lived in graham, Texas.
As the younger bhai of jimmie vaughan, vaughan started playing the guitar at aayu saat or formed several bands ki occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At aayu 17, he dropped out of unchi skool or sthanantarit to Austin to further pursue uske musical kariyar, joining samooh aise as Krackerjack, the Nightcrawlers, or the Cobras.
in 1977, he formed Triple Threat Revue, a band that aakhirkaar viksit into doguna trubal and regularly performed around austin.
in 1982, vaughan or Double trubal performed at the Montreux jaiz Festival in switzaraland, catching the dhyaan of sangeetkaaron David bovi or Jackson browne.
bovi poocha vaughan to khel on his aagaamee studio album let 's Dance, jabaki browne offered the band free upyog of his personal studio in Los angeles to ricard an album.
In kooch 1983, Vaughan and doguna trubal were hastakshrit to apik record by diggaj ricard producer John hamend Sr. and released unke debut album, texas baadh in June of ki saal.
baad kaamyaab touring, the samooh released the album, Could n't stand the mausam ( 1984 ) or Soul to aatma ( 1985 ), the latter of which pradarshit nai keyboardist reez Wynans.
haalanki his kariyar tha progressed safaltaapurvak, vaughan checked into a rehabilitation hospital in Atlanta, georgia to de up a cocaine or alcohol habit or returned to touring saath the band.
in june 1989, in Step was released and arjeet unhen a Grammy puraskaar for behtareen Contemporary Blues Performance.
on agast 27, 1990, vaughan thi killed in a helicopter crash following a performance in east Troy, visconsin.
vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet teevr style thi niklaa isse a kismein of musical jati.
he was influenced by blues sangeetkaaron including albert king, Freddie King, Otis fatafat, and muddy Waters, or chattan guitarists aise as Jimi hendrix or lonnie mack.
uske guitar playing reflected the clasik bluez and pentatonic taraazoo.
He has praapt chaudee najuk recognition liye his guitar playing, ranking at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 mahanatam guitarists '' in 2011.
He thi maranoparant inducted into the Blues haul of kirti in 2000 and a memorial pratimaa thi erected in austin 's auditorium shores park.
Stevie re Vaughan is widely mana to be ek of the mahanatam sangeetkaaron to come isse the rajya of texas.
The Las vegas strip sansar of coca-cola sangrahalay in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated naram peya bechi in stores, restaraan, or vending mashine in prayek desh magar cuba and uttar Korea.
it is produced by The coca-cola Company of atlanta, Georgia, and is praayah referred to bas as coke ( a panjikrut trademark of The coca-cola company in the sanyukt rajya chunki March 27, 1944 ).
originally intended as a patent medicine jab it was invented in the let 19th century by jon Pemberton, coca-cola thi kharida out by bijnesaman asa Griggs candler, jinaki marketing tactics led coke to iske dabadabaa of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th sadi.
The company produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world.
the bottlers, jo tham territorially vishesh anubandh saath the company, upaj samaapt utpaada in cans and botalon from the concentrate in sangyojan saath filtered water or sweeteners.
The bottlers tab bechein, distribute and merchandise coca-cola to khudara stores or vending mashine.
aise bottlers shaamil coca-cola Enterprises, jisase is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in uttar america or pashchimi Europe.
The Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate liye soda sroton to pramukh restaurants or khaanaa seva distributors.
the Coca-Cola Company rai, on avasar, introduced anya cola peya under the coke brand naam.
the most aam of ye is aahaar coke, with anya sahit caffeine-free Coca-Cola, aahaar Coke caffeine-free, coca-cola cheri, Coca-Cola shunya, coca-cola vanilla, or khaas sanskaran saath lemon, lim or coffee.
aadhaarit on Interbrand 's best vaishvik brands 2011, coca-cola was the world 's sabase valuable brand.
bairi lui larkin ( born april 28, 1964 ) is a retired Major lig besabaal khilaadi.
larkin played shortstop for the Cincinnati Reds from 1986 to 2004 and thi ek of the pivotal khilaadi on the 1990 Reds ' sansar shrenee championships toli.
Larkin was nirvaachit to the neshnal besabaal haul of kirti in janvari 2012 or thi inducted on july 22.
Larkin is mana one of the sheersh khilaadi of uske era, jeetna nine chaandi slugger puraskaar or teen Gold Glove awards.
He thi chaynit to the Major League all-star khel baarah times, or thi elected the 1995 neshnal League Most moolyawaan Player.
Brasília ( ) is the sangheey puunji of Brazil or the seat of government of the sangheey District.
Administratively, the nagar is stith in the sangheey zila which is in the central-west pradesh.
physically, it is stith in the Brazilian Highlands.
it rai a janasankhyikee of parichay 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the metropolitan kshetrafal ) as of the 2008 ibge anumaan, bananaa it the chauthi largest nagar in brazil.
however, as a metropolitan area, it baandhane lower at chathe in population.
brasília is the largest city in the world ki kiya not maujuud at the beginning of the 20th sadi.
brasília rai the fifth largest jidipi among latin amareeki shaharon or the teesraa in brazil.
at around r $ 62,000 brazilian reais ( baraabar to approximately $ 30,900 US dollar or €23,000 euros ), the nagar 's prati capita aay is the ucchtam among brazil 's largest cities.
as the neshnal capital, brasília is the seat of sab three shakhaon of the sangheey sarkari of brazil.
The nagar also hosts the mukhyalay of anek brazilian companiyaan.
niyojan nitiyon aise as the sthaan of residential buildings around expansive shahari kshetron, as well as bhawan the city around large avenues or dividing it into sector, have sparked a bahes or reflection on jivan in big cities in the 20th sadi.
the nagar 's design divides it into gine block as well as sector liye nirdisht kriyaayein, aise as the hotel sector, the banking sector or the Embassy sector.
brasília host 124 videshi embassies.
The nagar thi planned or viksit in 1956 saath lúcio Costa as the principal shahari planar, auskar niemeyer as the principal vaastu and roberto Burle marks as the landscape panktiyaan.
brasilia is in the unesco 's sansar Hertitage suchi due to iske vaastukala.
on april 22, 1960, it formally became brazil 's national puunji.
Viewed from upar, the pramukh portion of the nagar resembles an vayuyan or a titali.
the nagar is commonly referred to as puunji sangheey, or bas BSB.
Residents of Brasília hai gyaat as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter referring to those nahin born in the nagar but who migrated vahin baad it thi established ).
In local upyog, the shabd `` brasília '' praayah refers only to the pehla Administrative pradesh ( ra I ) bheetar the Federal zila ( Distrito sangheey ), jahaan the sabase mahatvapurn sarkari buildings hai stith.
Brasília rai a adwitiya status in Brazil, as it is an administrative prabhag balki than a legal municipality like nearly all cities in brazil.
nationally, the pad is almost always used synonymously saath the sangheey zila, jisase constitutes an indivisible federative ikai, analogous to a state.
anek `` upgrah shaharon '' maujuud jisase hai also bhaag of the sangheey zila.
brasília International vimaanashetra is the pramukh vimaanashetra in brasília, connecting the capital to all pramukh brazilian cities or anek antarrashtriya gantavyon.
It is the teesraa sabase mahatvapurn airport in Brazil, in terms of yatri or aircraft movements.
Personifications of Germany, frans, rus, austria-hungary, or the sanyukt kingdom attempting to rakhana the dhakkan on the simmering cauldron of imperialist or rashtravaadi tanaav in the Balkans to prevent a saamaanya europea war.
They yahood successful in 1912 and 1913 lakin kiya nahin safal in in 1914.
the causes of World yuddh i, jisase began in central europea in late july 1914 and samaapt in 1918, shaamil anek factors, aise as the virodh or dushmani of the chaar decades agrani up to the yuddh.
Militarism, alliances, samrajyavad, or nationalism played major bhoomikaaye in the virodh as khub.
the immediate origins of the yuddh, however, lay in the nirnay liya by kootneetigyon or senapatiyon dauraan the sankat of 1914, casus belli liye jisase thi the hatya of archduke franj ferdinand ( the archduke of austria Hungary ) or uske bivi Sophie by gavrilo princip, an irredentist serb.
The crisis aae after a long and mushkil shrenee of rajanyik clashes between the great shaktiyaan ( italy, frans, Germany, the British Empire, the Austria-Hungarian samrajya and rus ) over europea or aupniveshik mudde in the decade pehle 1914 ki had baayein tanaav unchi.
in phere ye rajanyik clashes can be traced to parivartan in the balance of shakti in europea chunki 1867.
the adhik taatkaalik kaaran liye the yuddh thi tensions over territory in the Balkans.
austria-hungary competed with srbija or rus liye territory or influence in the region and ve khinchaa the rest of the great Powers into the virodh through their vibhinn alliances or treaties.
haalanki the kadi of kaarykram unleashed by the assassination triggered the yuddh, the yuddh 's origins go deeper, involving neshnal raajnneeti, samskritiyon, arthshaastra, or a complex web of alliances and counterbalances that tha viksit between the vibhinn europea shaktiyaan since 1870.
kuch of the sabase important long pad or structural kalyankari hai : the growth of rashtrawaad aarpaar Europe, unresolved territorial disputes, an intricate pranali of alliances, the perceived vishleshan of the balance of shakti in europea, convoluted or fragmented shashan, the bahen daud of the pichhlaa dashakon, pichhlaa sainya niyojan, imperial or colonial funsane for maal, shakti or prestige, and aarthik or sainya funsane in udyog and trade – e.g., the Pig yuddh between austria or srbija.
anya kalyankari ki aae into play dauraan the rajanyik sankat ki preceded the yuddh included misperceptions of intent ( e.g., the germany vishwaas ki the sanyukt kingdom hota remain neutral ) or deree or misunderstandings in diplomatic communications.
the vibhinn shrenee of spashtikaran for sansar yuddh I correspond to different historians ' overall vidhi.
sabase itihaaskaaron or lokapriy tikaakaron shaamil kalyankari from adhik than one category of spashtikaran to provide a rounded khaataa of the causes of the yuddh.
the deepest distinction among ye khate is between stories ki dekhie it as the aprihaary or predictable nishkarsh of nishchit karkon, and those ki describe it as an manamaani or durbhagyapurna mistake.
In attributing kalyankari liye the yuddh, itihaaskaaron or lad tha to saude saath an unprecedented baadh of memoirs or aadhikarik documents, released as prayek desh shaamil aajamaaya to avoid blame liye starting the yuddh.
Early releases of soochna by governments, visheshkar those released liye upyog by the `` ayog on the Responsibility of the lekhak of the yuddh '' yahood shown to be incomplete and pakshpatpurna.
in addition kuch documents, visheshkar rajanyik cabel between Russia or frans, were mila to have maharoom doctored.
bhi in later dashakon however, jab much adhik information tha maharoom released, itihaaskaaron isse the vahi samskruti have maharoom dikhaaya to come to differing conclusions on the kalyankari of the yuddh.
johnson 's nai chart of national pratik, prakashit c. 1868.
the vishaal flags dikhaaya in the kinare hai the 37-star dhvaj of the United rajya ( flown 1867-1877 ), the Royal Standard of the sanyukt kingdom, the roosi imperial Standard, or the french tricolore saath inset Imperial tribhuj.
vibhinn anya dhvaj flown by ships are shown.
The dhvaj of cuba is labelled `` cuban ( so called ) ``.
the chinis dragon on the dhvaj of China thi drawn mistakenly as a pashchimi dragon.
a neshnal dhvaj is a dhvaj ki symbolizes a country.
The dhvaj is flown by the government, lakin praayah can bhi be flown by nagarikon of the country.
dono public or nijee buildings aise as skulon or courthouses may makkhi the neshnal flag.
in kuch deshon, the neshnal dhvaj are tabhi flown from non-military imaaraten on certain dhvaj dinon.
vahin hai teen pruthak types of neshnal dhvaj for use on jameen, or three liye upyog at samudr, haalanki anek deshon upyog ekasmaan dizin liye anek ( or sometimes all ) of ye prakaar of dhvaj.
The amareeki civil yuddh ( acw ), bhi known as the yuddh between the rajya or bas the civil War ( dekhie namakaran ), thi a civil yuddh fought isse 1861 to 1865 between the sanyukt rajya ( the `` Union '' or the `` uttar '' ) or anek dakshini slave rajya ki ghoshit unke secession and formed the confederate States of america ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` dakshin '' ).
the yuddh had its utpatti in the issue of slavery, especially the ekstansion of gulaami into the western territories.
Foreign shaktiyaan kiya nahin intervene.
baad chaar years of khooni combat ki left over 600,000 sainiko murde and nasht much of the dakshin 's avasanrachana, the Confederacy collapsed, gulaami thi abolished, or the mushkil punarnirmaan process of restoring neshnal ekta or guaranteeing adhikaron to the freed slave began.
in the 1860 adhyakshiya election, Republicans, led by abraham lincoln, opposed expanding gulaami into sanyukt rajya ' territories.
Lincoln won, but pehle uske udghaatan on kooch 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave rajya formed the confederacy.
outgoing loktantric President james Buchanan and the aavak republicans asweekrut secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural address declared uske prashasan hota nahin initiate civil war.
Eight baaki slave states continued to asweekrut kals liye secession.
confederate shaktiyaan jabt numerous sangheey durgon within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
a salaam Conference vifal to dhundhen a sulah, or dono pahalu prepared for war.
the confederates assumed ki europea deshon were so nirbhar on `` King kapaas `` that ve hota intervene ; none did and none recognized the nai confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, jab Confederate shaktiyaan fired upon Fort sumter, a key fort yojit by sangh troops in South Carolina.
lincoln pukaara liye each rajya to provide sainikon to retake the fort ; consequently, chaar adhik slave rajya joined the confederacy, bringing unke total to eleven.
the Union soon niyantrit the border rajya or sthapit a naval nakebandi that abodh the dakshini arthvyavastha.
the purvi theatre thi inconclusive in 1861–62.
The patjhad 1862 confederate abhiyaan into Maryland ( a sangh rajya ) ended saath confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading angrejon hastkshep.
lincoln issued the emancipation Proclamation, jisase made samaapti gulaami a yuddh lakshya.
To the west, by summer 1862 the sangh nasht the Confederate nadi navy, tab much of unke western sena, and the sangh at vicksburg vibhajit the Confederacy in do at the mississippi nadi.
in 1863, Robert E. lee 's confederate incursion north ended at the battle of gettysburg.
pashchimi safaltaaon led to ulysses S. grant cmand of sab sangh armies in 1864.
in the pashchimi theatre, wiliam T. sharaman drove east to capture Atlanta or marched to the samudr, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the rasta.
the sangh marshaled the sansaadhan and manpower to akraman the confederacy from all directions, or could afford to lado battles of apgharshan through the overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate puunji.
the defending Confederate army vifal, leading to lee 's aatmasamarpan to grant at appomattox Court house on April 9, 1865.
the American Civil yuddh thi ek of the earliest sachcha audyogic yudhon.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, or mass-produced hathiyaar yahood employed extensively.
the mobilization of civilian kaarkaanon, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation or khaanaa aapurtiyan sab foreshadowed sansar yuddh i.
it remains the deadliest yuddh in amareeki itihaas, resulting in the mauton of an anumaanit 750,000 sainiko or an undetermined kramank of civilian hataahat.
itihaaskaar jon huddleston estimates the maut toll at ten pratishat of sab Northern males 20–45 years old, or 30 pratishat of sab Southern white males aged 18–40.
norrie beemaari is a genetic vikaar ki primarily affects the najar or lagbhag sadaa lead to drishtiheenta.
in jod to the janmajaat ocular lakshan, some marijon suffer from a pragatisheel hearing ghaataa starting zyaadaatar in unke 2nd dashak of life, jabaki another portion may be maansik challenged.
marijon saath norrie disease may develop cataracts, leukocoria ( a condishan where the pupils appear shwet jab light is shone on unhen ), along with other developmental mudde in the najar, such as shrinking of the globe or the barbaad dur of the iris.
Around 30–50 % of unhen hoga also have developmental delaca/ dimagi retardation, psychotic-like suvidhaayen, incoordination of andolanon or behavioral abnormalities.
Most marijon hai born saath saamaanya sunanaa ; however, the onset of sunanaa ghaataa is very aam in jaldi kishoravastha.
parichay 15 % of the marijon hai anumaanit to develop sab the suvidhaayen of the beemaari.
the beemaari affects lagbhag tabhi male infants at janam or jald after birth, because the beemaari is inherited x-linked recessive.
tabhi in bahut viral maamle, mahilaon have been diagnosed with Norrie disease as khub.
the sateek incidence kramank is anjaan ; tabhi a few hundred cases have been reported so far.
it is a bahut viral vikaar ki is not associated saath koi specific jaateey or jatigat samooh.
a contract is an anubandh having a lawful object daalaa into voluntarily by do or adhik parties, prayek of whom intends to banaaen ek or adhik legal dayitvon between unhen.
the tatv of a anubandh hai `` prastaav '' or `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons '' having legal kshamta jo exange `` vichaar '' to banaaen `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of kuch or sab of ye elements may be kiya in writing, though anubandh may be bana entirely orally or by conduct.
the upaay for ulanghan of contract can be `` kshatipurti '' in the rup of muaavje of money or vishisht performance enforced through an aadesh.
dono of ye remedies award the party at ghaataa the `` laabh of the saudebaaji '' or expectation kshatipurti, which hai greater than mere reliance kshatipurti, as in promissory estoppel.
the partiyon may be prakritik vyaktiyon or juristic vyaktiyon.
A anubandh is a legally enforceable promise or undertaking ki kuch will or hoga nahin occur.
The shabd vaada can be prayukt as a vidhik synonym liye anubandh, although parvaah is required as a vaada may not have the full khadaa of a contract, as jab it is an anubandh bagaiyr vichaar.
anubandh vidhi varies greatly from ek kshetradhikaar to another, sahit matbhed in common vidhi compared to civil vidhi, the impact of praapt law, visheshkar from england in common law deshon, and of vidhi samhitabaddh in regional legislation.
Regarding australian anubandh vidhi for udhaaharan, there hai 40 praasangik adhiniyamon jisase prabhaav on the nirvachan of contract at the rashtramandal ( Federal / neshnal ) level, or an atirikt 26 adhiniyamon at the str of the state of nsw.
in addition vahin hai 6 antarrashtriya yantra or prathaon which hai lagu liye antarrashtriya dealings, such as the sanyukt raashtra sammelan on Contracts for the antarrashtriya Sale of goods.
ASP.NET is a server-side Web anuprayog fremawork designed liye Web development to upaj dianemic web pages.
It thi viksit by microsoft to allow programmers to build dianemic web site, web anuprayog or web services.
It thi pehla released in janvari 2002 saath sanskaran 1.0 of the.NET fremawork, or is the successor to microsoft 's kriyasheel sarwar prishthon ( asp ) praudyogiki.
asp.net is built on the aam bhashaa runtime ( clr ), allowing programmers to likhen ASP.NET code using koi samarthit.neT language.
The asp.net sabun ekstansion fremawork allows asp.net components to prakram sabun sandesh.
Lysergic acid diethylamide, abbreviated LSD or LSD-25, also gyaat as lysergide ( in ) or colloquially as acid, is a semisynthetic cicedelik drug of the ergoline parivaar, khub gyaat for iske manovaigyanik effects jisase can shaamil altered thinking prakriyaaon, band or kholen najar visuals, synesthesia, an altered sense of time or aadhyatmik experiences, as well as for iske key role in 1960s counterculture.
it is prayukt mukhyatah as an entheogen, recreational drug, and as an agent in cicedelik chikitsa.
alesady is non-addictive, is nahin gyaat to cause brain damage, or rai atyadhik kam toxicity saapeksh to khuraaq.
however, adverse psychiatric pratikriyaayein such as anxiety, paranoia, or delusions hai sambhavit.
alesady was pehla synthesized by Albert hofmann in 1938 from ergotamine, a rasinic niklaa by arthur stoll isse ergot, a anaaj kavak ki typically grows on rye.
the short form `` alesady '' aata isse iske jaldi code naam lsd-25, jisase is an sankshipt liye the German `` lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed by a sequential kramank.
alesady is samvedansheel to oxygen, ultraviolet lite, or chloride, visheshkar in solution, haalanki iske potency may pichhlaa for saalo if it is bhandaarit away from lite or nami at kam taapmaana.
In pure form it is a colorless, odorless, tasteless solid.
LSD is typically vitarit orally, usually on a substrate aise as absorbent blotter paper, a sugar ghan, or gelatin.
in iske drav rup, it can also be administered by intramuscular or intravenous injection.
alesady is bahut potent, saath 20–30 μg ( micrograms ) hone the dahalij khuraaq.
nai prayog with alesady prarambh in 2009 liye the first samay in 40 saalo.
introduced by sandoz laboratories, with trade-name Delysid, as a drug with vibhinn manorog upyog in 1947, alesady quickly became a therapeutic agent ki appeared to show great vaada.
In the 1950s, officials at the u.S. Central pragna agency ( CIA ) vichaar the drug might be lagu to dimag control or chemical warfare ; the agency 's mkultra shodh kaarykram propagated the drug among young servicemen and vidhyaarthee.
the subsequent recreational upyog of the drug by yuvavastha samskruti in the pashchimi sansar dauraan the 1960s led to a rajnatik firestorm ki resulted in iske prohibition.
philhal, a kramank of organizations—including the beckley Foundation, maanchitr, heffter shodh Institute or the albert hofmann foundation—exist to fund, protsaahit and coordinate shodh into the aushadhiy and spiritual uses of alesady and related psychedelics.

World janasankhyikee estimates isse 1800 to 2100, aadhaarit on UN 2010 projections ( red, naarangi, green ) or us janasankhyikee beuro aitihaasik estimates ( blike ).
vaastavik ankit population aankade hai in blue.
According to the highest estimate, the sansar janasankhyikee may vruddhi to 16 arab by 2100 ; according to the nunatam anumaan, it may manaahi to 6 arab.
the sansar janasankhyikee is the kul kramank of jeena insaano on dharti.
As of aaj, it is anumaanit to kramank arab by the sanyukt States Census beuro ( uscb ).
the uscb estimates ki the sansar janasankhyikee exceeded 7 billion on kooch 12, 2012.
according to a separate anumaan by the sanyukt raashtra Population Fund, it pahunche this padaav on aktubar 31, 2011.
the sansar population rai anbhavi continuous vikaas since the samaapt of the Great akaal and the Black maut in 1350, jab it stood at around 370 lakh.
The highest daron of vikaas – vaishvik population increases upar 1.8 % prati saal – were seen briefly dauraan the 1950s, or liye a longer kaal during the 1960s or 1970s.
The vikaas rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, or tha declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
kul salanaa births were ucchtam in the let 1980s at parichay 138 lakh, and are abhi apekshit to remain essentially nirantar at unke 2011 str of 134 million, jabaki mauton kramank 56 million prati saal, or are apekshit to badhayen to 80 lakh prati saal by 2040.
vartmaan projections show a jari increase in janasankhyikee in the nikat bhavishya ( lakin a steady manaahi in the janasankhyikee growth rate ), saath the vaishvik janasankhyikee apekshit to pahunchein between 7.5 or 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates bhavishyavaanee further growth, stagnation, or bhi overall decline in the vaishvik janasankhyikee by 2150.
kuch vishleshkon have questioned the sthirataa of further sansar janasankhyikee growth, citing the growing pressures on the paryaavaran, vaishvik khaanaa supplies, or urja resources.

the nagar is stith on the 4th chickasaw bluff, south of the sangam of the bhediya and Mississippi nadiyaan.

skeletal mansapeshiyaan homo sapiens
is is a talika of mansapeshiyaan of the insaan anatomy.
There hai lagbhag 642 skeletal muscles bheetar the theth insaan, and lagbhag every muscle constitutes ek bhaag of a jodi of ekasmaan dwipaksheeya mansapeshiyaan, mila on dono pahalu, resulting in lagbhag 320 pairs of mansapeshiyaan, as presented in is aalekh.
Nevertheless, the exact kramank is mushkil to define because different strot group muscles differently, e.g. regarding what is defined as alag bhaag of a single mansapeshi or as several mansapeshiyaan.
udhaaharan dayera isse 640 to 850.
the mansapeshiyaan of the insaan deh can be categorized into a kramank of groups jisase shaamil muscles relating to the sir or gardan, mansapeshiyaan of the torso or trunk, muscles of the apper limbs, and muscles of the nimnatar limbs.
The action refers to the karrwai of prayek muscle isse the maanak anatomical sthiti.
In anya sthitiyaan, anya actions may be performed.

the acre is a ikai of area prayukt in the imperial or u.S. customary pranaaliyon.
an acre is parichay 40 % of a hectare – slightly choti than an amareeki footbaal field.
The acre is no longer commonly prayukt, haalanki a few notable exceptions shaamil the United rajya, australia, burma and the sanyukt Kingdom ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially prayukt in the sanyukt Kingdom, haalanki is still prayukt in real estate descriptions ).
It is still used, to kuch extent, in Canada.
the antarrashtriya pratik of the acre is ac, or is defined as 1/640 of a vargakar mile.
the sabase commonly prayukt acre aaj is the antarrashtriya acre.
in the United rajya both the international acre or the thodaa different US surveykshan acre hai in upyog.
the sabase aam upyog of the acre is to measure tracts of jameen.
ek international acre is defined as 4046.8564224 square metres.
dauraan the Middle Ages, an acre was the amount of land ki could be plowed in ek din saath a yoke of oxen.

bhashaa processing refers to the way insaan beings use shabd to communicate vichaar or jajbaat, or how such communications are processed or samajha.
yun it is how the dimag creates or understands bhashaa.
sabase haal theories consider ki this prakram is carried out entirely by and inside the dimag.
is is mana one of the sabase characteristic abilities of the insaan prajati - shaayad the sabase characteristic.
However bahut choti is known parichay it or vahin is vishaal paimaana liye shodh on it.
sabase of the knowledge acquired to tithi on the vishay has aaiye isse marijon who have suffered kuch prakaar of significant head injury, whether bahya ( wounds, bullate ) or internal ( strokes, tumors, degenerative rogon ).
adhyayan have shown ki sabase of the language processing functions are carried out in the cerebral cortex.
the anivaary falan of the cortical language kshetron is sankethik representation.
Even though bhashaa exists in different form, sab of unhen hai based on symbolic representation.

DVD is an optical disc storage swaroop, invented or developed by philips, Sony, toshiba, or panasonic in 1995.
dvds offer ucchtar bhandar capacity than compact discs while having the vahi aayam.
pre-recorded DVDs hai mass-produced using sancha mashine that physically stamp data onto the dvd.
Such discs hai known as dvD- rom, because aankada can tabhi be padhaa or not likhaa nor erased.
rikt recordable DVD discs ( dvd-r and dvd+r ) can be ankit ekbar using a dvd recorder and tab falan as a DVD-ROM. rewritable dvds ( dvd-rw, dvd+rw, and dvd-ram ) can be recorded or erased multiple times.
DVDs hai used in dvd-video consumer digital video swaroop or in dvd-audio consumer digital audio swaroop, as khub as for authoring avchd discs.
dvds containing anya prakaar of information may be referred to as DVD aankada discs.

Greek mythology is the deh of mithkon or teachings ki belong to the pracheen Greeks, concerning unke devataaon or heroes, the prakruti of the sansar, or the origins or significance of their apana cult and anushthan practices.
it was a bhaag of the religion in pracheen unaniyon or is bhaag of religion in aadhunik unaniyon or around the sansar, gyaat as Hellenismos.
aadhunik vidwaanon refer to or padhai the myths in an attempt to throw light on the dharmik and rajnatik institutions of Ancient unaniyon or iske civilization, and to laabh understanding of the prakruti of myth-making itself.
unani mythology is explicitly samavisht in a large sangrahan of kahaniyaan, and implicitly in unani representational kala, aise as vase-paintings or votive gifts.
unani myth attempts to bataaiye the origins of the sansar, and vivaran the lives or adventures of a chaudee kismein of devataaon, deviyaan, heroes, heroines, or puranic jeev.
ye khate initially yahood disseminated in an oral-poetic parampara ; aaj the unani mithkon hai gyaat primarily isse unani sahitya.
the oldest gyaat unani saahitiyik strot, homer 's apik kavitaayen Iliad or odissi, fokas on kaarykram surrounding the trojan yuddh.
Two poems by homer 's nikat samakaleen Hesiod, the theogony and the works or dinon, contain khate of the genesis of the sansar, the uttaradhikaar of daivi rulers, the succession of insaan ages, the origin of insaan woes, or the utpatti of sacrificial practices.
Myths hai also preserved in the homeric Hymns, in fragments of apik kavitaayen of the Epic Cycle, in lyric kavitaayen, in the works of the tragedians of the fifth century bc, in writings of vidwaanon and kaviyon of the hellenistic aayu, and in granth isse the time of the roman samrajya by writers such as Plutarch and pausanias.
puraatatv nishkarshon provide a principal sorce of vivaran parichay unani mythology, saath devataaon or heroes featured prominently in the sajaavat of many artifacts.
jyamitiya dizin on pottery of the aathvin sadi bc depict drishyon isse the trojan saikil as khub as the adventures of Heracles.
In the succeeding archaic, shastreey, or Hellenistic avadhi, Homeric or various anya puranic drishyon appear, supplementing the maujuuda literary evidence.
Greek mythology rai tha an extensive influence on the culture, arts, or sahitya of pashchimi sabhyataa or remains bhaag of pashchimi viraasat or bhashaa.
kaviyon and kalakaaron from pracheen times to the upasthit have derived prerana from Greek mythology or have khoja samakaleen significance and praasangikta in the vishaywastu.
