the frank ( sign : fr. or sfr. ; German : franken, french or romansh : frank, Italian : franco ; code : chf ) is the karency and legal tender of Switzerland or Liechtenstein ; it is bhi vidhik tender in the italvi exclave campione d'italia.
haalanki not formally legal tender in the German exclave Büsingen ( the sole vidhik karency is the european ), it is in wide rose upyog vahin.
The swiss neshnal bainko issues banknotes or the sangheey mint Swissmint issues sikke.
the swiss franc is the tabhi sanskaran of the franc still jari in europea.
the smaller denomination, a hundredth of a franc, is a rappen ( rp. ) in germany, centime ( c. ) in french, centesimo ( ct. ) in Italian, or rap ( rp. ) in Romansh.
the iesao code of the currency prayukt by banks or vittiya institutions is CHF, haalanki `` fr. '' is used by most businesses and vigyapandaata ; some upyog SFr. ; the Latinate `` ch '' stand for Confoederatio Helvetica.
die the alag bhashaaen prayukt in switzaraland, latin is prayukt liye language-neutral inscriptions on the coins.
sar charles Spencer `` Charlie '' chaplin, ( 16 april 188925 disambar 1977 ) was a angrejon comic actor or filmmaker who rose to kirti in the mook era.
chaplin became a worldwide icon through his screen persona `` the tremp `` or is considered ek of the sabase important aankade of the filmi udyog.
His kariyar spanned adhik than 75 years, from a child in the victorian era to close to his maut at the aayu of 88, or encompassed both adulation or vivaad.
uthaaya in London, Chaplin 's childhood was defined by poverty and hardship.
he thi sent to a workhouse twice pehle the aayu of nau ; uske father thi anupasthit, and uske maan thi vachanabaddh to a mental asylum.
chaplin began performing isse a yang age, touring music haul and baad working as a stage karta or hasya.
at 19 he was hastakshrit to the prestigious Fred karno company, jisase took him to america.
chaplin was scouted by the film udyog, or made uske pehla dikhaave in 1914 saath keystone Studios.
he jald viksit the tremp persona or formed a large prashansak aadhaar.
Chaplin nirdeshit his films isse an jaldi stage, or jari to hone uske craft as he sthanantarit to the essanay, Mutual, or pehla neshnal corporations.
by 1918, he thi ek of the sabase prasiddh main in the world.
In 1919, chaplin co-founded the vitaran company sanyukt kalakaaron, giving use puraa control over his films.
uske pehla feature-length chitra thi the Kid ( 1921 ), followed by a Woman of paris ( 1923 ), the sunaharaa fatafat ( 1925 ), or the sarkas ( 1928 ).
He refused to move to dhwani films in the 1930s, bajaay producing nagar lits ( 1931 ) or Modern times ( 1936 ) without samvaad.
chaplin became increasingly political or uske next filmi, the Great Dictator ( 1940 ), satirised adolf hitler.
the 1940s thi a decade marked saath vivaad liye chaplin, or uske lokapriyata asweekrut rapidly.
He thi abhiyukt of communist sympathies, jabaki uske involvement in a paternity suut or vivaah to much younger mahilaon yahood mana scandalous.
An FBI chaanbin was opened on Chaplin, or he was aakhirkaar forced to leave the sanyukt rajya or settle in switzaraland.
he abandoned the Tramp for uske later films, jisase shaamil monsieur verdoux ( 1947 ), limelight ( 1952 ), A king in nai york ( 1957 ), and A Countess From hong kong ( 1967 ).
Chaplin likhaa, nirdeshit, utpaadit, edited, scored, or starred in most of his films.
he thi a perfectionist, and uske vittiya independence meant he praayah kharch saalo on the vikaas or utpaadan of a chitra.
uske films hai characterised by slapstick combined with pathos, or praayah visheshta the tremp struggling viruddh adversity.
anek contain soshal or political vishaywastu, as khub as autobiographical elements.
In 1972, as part of a navinikrut saraahna for uske work, chaplin received an maanad academy Award liye `` the incalculable prabhaav he has tha in bananaa motion pictures the art rup of is century ''.
he continues to be yojit in unchi lihaaz, saath the sunaharaa fatafat, City lits, aadhunik Times, or the great Dictator often ranked among the mahanatam films of all samay.
niojit parenthood Federation of america ( ppfa ), commonly shortened to Planned parenthood, is the u.S. sambhddha of the antarrashtriya niojit parenthood sangh ( IPPF ) or ek of its larger members.
ppfa is a non-profit sanghathan providing reproductive swasthya or matra or child health sevaayen.
The niojit parenthood Action nidhi, inc. ( ppaf ) is a sambandhit sanghathan which lobbies liye pro-choice legislation, vyapak sex shiksha, or abhigam to sasti health parvaah in the United rajya.
niojit parenthood is the largest u.S. pradaata of reproductive swasthya services, sahit karkat screening, hiv screening and counseling, nirodhak, and garbhpaat.
nirodhak accounts liye 35 % of ppfa 's total services and abortions khaataa liye 3 % ; PPFA conducts roughly 300,000 abortions prayek saal, among 3 million logon served.
the sanghathan rai its roots in brukaleen, nai york, where Margaret sanger kholi the desh 's pehla birth-control clinic.
Sanger santhaapit the amareeki janam control lig in 1921, jisase in 1942 became bhaag of the Planned Parenthood sangh of america.
Since tab, niojit parenthood rai grown to have over 820 clinics sthitiyaan in the u.S., with a kul bajet of US $ 1 billion.
PPFA provides an sarani of services to over three lakh logon in the sanyukt rajya, or supports sevaayen for over ek lakh client baahar the sanyukt rajya.
purushon rea is Latin liye `` guilty dimag ''.
In criminal vidhi, it is viewed as one of the jaruri tatv of kuch aparaadhon.
the maanak common vidhi pareekshan of dand deyta is praayah expressed in the latin phrase, actus gaiyr facit reum nisi purushon baithna rea, jisase arthath `` the adhinium is nahin culpable unless the dimag is apradhi ''.
yun, in jurisdictions saath due process, vahin jarur be an actus reus, or `` apradhi adhinium, '' accompanied by kuch str of purushon rea to constitute the aparaadhon with jisase the prativaadee is charge ( see the takneekee aavashyaktaa of concurrence ).
as a general niyam, dand deyta karata nahin sanlagn to a person jo acted saath the absence of mental dosha.
the excepshan is sakht deyta crimes.
in civil vidhi, it is praayah nahin jaruri to prove a subjective dimagi tatv to sthapit liability liye ulanghan of anubandh or tort, for udhaaharan.
however, if a apkrutya is intentionally vachanabaddh or a anubandh is intentionally breached, aise intent may badhayen the scope of deyta as well as the measure of damages payable to the abhiyokta.
Therefore, purushon rea refers to the dimagi tatv of the offence ki accompanies the actus reus.
In some jurisdictions, the terms purushon rea or actus reus have maharoom replaced by vaikalpik shabdaawalee.
In australia, for udhaaharan, the tatv of the sangheey offences are abhi designated as `` dosha tatv '' or `` dimagi tatv '' ( mens rea ) or `` shaareerik tatv '' or `` external tatv '' ( actus reus ).
This shabdaawalee thi apanaaya to badalen the aspashtataa of the latin sharten saath saral or sateek phrasing.
ulysses S. Grant ( born hiram ulysses Grant ; april 27, 1822 – July 23, 1885 ) thi the 18th President of the sanyukt rajya ( 1869–1877 ) following uske highly kaamyaab bhoomika as a war saamaanya in the duusari half of the Civil yuddh.
antargat Grant, the sangh fouj parajeet the confederate sainya ; having effectively ended the yuddh or secession saath the surrender of robert E. Lee 's fouj at appomattox.
as president he led the kattarpanthi republicans in unke praytn to eliminate sab vestiges of confederate rashtrawaad or slavery.
Upset over uncontrolled violence in the dakshin or having desired to protect africa amareeki citizenship, adhyaksh grant effectively destroyed the Ku klux claan in 1871.
Grant was the pehla President to sthapit civil Service reform having nirmit a two-year federally vittposhit civil seva Commission in 1871.
in terms of videshi niti, grant revealed an `` unexpected kshamta for deliberation and paraamarsh '' ki promoted the neshnal interest.
His reputation was marred by uske repeated raksha of bhrasht appointees, or by america 's pehla audyogic aayu economic avsaad ( pukaara the `` dehshat of 1873 `` ) ki dominated uske duusari pad.
haalanki uske republican party split in 1872 with reformers denouncing him, grant thi easily reelected.
by 1875 the conservative shwet Southern vipaksh regained control of prayek state in the dakshin or as he baayein the shwet house in March 1877 uske nitiyon were hone undone.
a kariyar sipaahi, he graduated isse the United rajya Military academy at west Point or parosa in the mexican–american yuddh.
When the civil yuddh began in 1861, Grant prashikshit Union swayamsevi regiments in illinois.
In 1862, as a saamaanya he ladaa a shrenee of ladaaiyon and thi prachaarit to major general baad forcing the aatmasamarpan of a vishaal confederate army and gaining control of kentki and sabase of Tennessee.
He tab led sangh shaktiyaan to victory baad initial setbacks in the battle of shiloh, kamai a pratishtha as an aggressive commander.
In july 1863, after a long, complex abhiyaan, Grant defeated paanch uncoordinated confederate armies ( capturing ek of unhen ) or jabt vicksburg.
is prasiddh vijay gave the Union puraa control of the mississippi nadi, vibhajit band the pashchimi Confederacy, or kholi the rasta liye adhik sangh triumphs.
After another jeet at the battle of chattanuga in late 1863, adhyaksh Abraham lincoln bana use leftinent saamaanya or commander of sab of the sangh sena.
as commanding saamaanya of the army, Grant confronted robert E. Lee in a shrenee of very khooni ladaaiyon in 1864 known as the overland abhiyaan ki ended saath the bottling up of lee at petersburg, baahar the confederate puunji of Richmond.
dauraan the gheraa, grant coordinated a shrenee of vinaashkari abhiyaan shubharambh by William tecumseh Sherman, philip sheridan, and George thomas.
aakhirkaar todakar through lee 's trenches, the sangh fouj captured Richmond in april 1865.
lee surrendered uske depleted shaktiyaan to grant at Appomattox as the confederacy collapsed.
Although pro-confederate itihaaskaaron attacked grant as a nishthur kasaai jo won by brute force, most itihaaskaaron have hailed uske sainya pratibhashali.
grant 's two lagaataar sharten as President stabilized the swadesh after the amareeki civil yuddh or dauraan the turbulent Reconstruction period ki followed.
as adhyaksh, he enforced Reconstruction by enforcing civil rights laws and lard ku Klux claan violence.
grant jiti dyodhi of the pandrahavin amendment ; giving constitutional suraksha for african-american matdaan adhikaron.
he prayukt the army to nirmaan the Republican Party in the South, based on black matadaata, Northern newcomers ( `` carpetbaggers `` ) or deshi shwet samarthak ( `` scalawags. '' )
as a parinaam, africa Americans yahood represented in the u.S. Congress for the pehla samay in amareeki itihaas in 1870.
reformers praised Grant 's Indian peace niti by having broken the deadlock on bhartiya appropriations in Congress, the creation of the Board of bhartiya commissioners to mek reform recommendations, or uske enlistment of Quaker protestants jo niyantrit mid western bhartiya agenciyon, that effectively curbed congressional patronage.
grant remained sankalpit in keeping indiens from hone exterminated from shwet settler atikaraman or by the U.S. sainya.
grant 's pratishtha as adhyaksh by 1875 thi at an all-time unchi liye uske pichhlaa vito of the mahangaai vidheyak, the dyodhi of the resumption of specie adhinium, or sachiv bristow 's kaamyaab chaape that shut bas the whiskey ring.
grant 's foreign niti, led by sachiv of rajya Hamilton machhlee, implemented antarrashtriya madhyasthata, settled the Alabama Claims saath britain and avoided yuddh saath Spain over the Virginius Affair.
a jeukabox is a partially automated music-playing yantra, praayah a coin-operated yantra, ki hoga khel a sangrakshak 's selection isse self-contained media.
The classic jeukabox has batan saath akshar or sankhyaayein on them that, when daalaa in sangyojan, are prayukt to khel a vishisht chayan.
a drug test is a technical vishleshan of a biological namoona – for udhaaharan mutr, hair, rakt, sweat, or maukhik drav / laar – to determine the upasthiti or absence of nirdisht parent davaayen or unke metabolites.
pramukh uses of drug pareekshan hai to detect the upasthiti of performance badhanaa steroids in sport or liye davaayen prohibited by laws, aise as canbis, coca or heroin.
a `` 10-panel mutr screen '' consists of the following:
Amphetamines ( including methamphetamine )
barbiturates
Benzodiazepines
cannabinoids ( THC )
coca
methadone
Methaqualone
Opiates ( codeine, Morphine, Heroin, Oxycodone, hydrocodone, ityadi. )
phencyclidine ( pcp )
propoxyphene
Saturn v prakshepastra, used for the American maanavyukt chandra landing missions
Space exploration is the discovery and khoji of bahari spes by means of spes praudyogiki.
shaareerik exploration of spes is conducted both by insaan spaceflights or by robotic spacecraft.
jabaki the avlokan of vastuen in spes, gyaat as khagolashastra, predates vishwasaneey recorded itihaas, it was the vikaas of vishaal or apekshaakrit kushal rockets during the jaldi 20th sadi ki allowed physical space khoji to become a reality.
aam rationales for exploring space shaamil advancing scientific research, uniting alag nations, ensuring the future survival of maanavtaa or vikasshil sainya and strategic laabh viruddh anya countries.
vibhinn aalochanaon of spes khoji are sometimes bana.
Space khoji rai often maharoom used as a proxi competition liye geopolitical rivalries such as the thanda yuddh.
The early era of spes exploration was driven by a `` spes res `` between the Soviet sangh or the sanyukt rajya, the launch of the pehla man-made object to kaksha the dharti, the USSR 's sputnik 1, on 4 aktubar 1957, or the first Moon landing by the American Apollo 11 shilp on 20 july 1969 are praayah liya as the seemayen liye is aarambhik kaal.
the Soviet spes kaarykram hasil anek of the pehla milestones, sahit the pehla jeena hone in kaksha in 1957, the pehla insaan spaceflight ( euri gagarin aboard Vostok 1 ) in 1961, the first spacewalk ( by aleksei leonov ) on 18 kooch 1965, the pehla automatic landing on another celestial body in 1966, or the launch of the pehla spes stesan ( salyut 1 ) in 1971.
After the pehla 20 saalo of exploration, fokas shifted isse one-off flite to bedardi hardware, aise as the spes Shuttle program, or isse pratiyogita to sahyog as saath the antarrashtriya Space stesan ( iss ).
With the substantial purnataa of the iss following sts-133 in kooch 2011, yojanaayen for space khoji by the USA remain in flux.
nakshatra, a Bush Administration program liye a return to the chandramaa by 2020 thi judged inadequately vittposhit or unrealistic by an visheshgy punarvilokan falak reporting in 2009.
The obama Administration prastaavit a sanshodhan of nakshatra in 2010 to fokas on the development of the capability liye crewed mishan pare kam dharti orbit ( LEO ), envisioning extending the aaparishan of the iss beyond 2020, transferring the vikaas of launch vehicles liye human kru isse nasa to the nijee sector, and vikasshil praudyogiki to enable missions to pare leo, aise as earth/moon l1, the chandramaa, Earth/Sun l2, near-earth kshudragrah, or Phobos or Mars kaksha.
as of kooch 2011, the US seenet and house of pratinidhi hai still working towards a compromise nasa funding vidheyak, jisase hoga sambhawatah terminate nakshatra or nidhi vikaas of a baari lift launch gadee ( HLLV ).
in the 2000s, the logon 's Republic of china initiated a kaamyaab manned spaceflight kaarykram, while the European sangh, Japan, and India have bhi niojit bhavishya manned spes missions.
china, rus, japani, and india have advocated manned missions to the chandramaa dauraan the 21st century, while the europea Union rai advocated maanavyukt mishan to both the chandramaa and Mars dauraan the 21st century.
isse the 1990s onwards, nijee ruchi began promoting spes paryaton and tab private spes khoji of the chandramaa ( dekhie google Lunar x puraskaar ).
jon calvin kulij, jr. ( July 4, 1872January 5, 1933 ) was the 30th adhyaksh of the sanyukt States ( 1923–1929 ).
a republican lawyer isse vermant, kulij worked uske rasta up the ladder of Massachusetts rajya raajnneeti, aakhirkaar banane rajyapal of ki rajya.
uske conduct dauraan the Boston police strike of 1919 thrust him into the neshnal spotlight or diya use a pratishtha as a man of nirnaayak action.
jald baad, he was nirvaachit as the 29th Vice President in 1920 or succeeded to the presidency upon the achaanak death of warren G. harding in 1923.
nirvaachit in uske apana right in 1924, he gained a pratishtha as a small-government conservative, or also as a man jo said bahut choti.
Coolidge lauti public confidence in the shwet House baad the scandals of uske purvavarti 's administration, or baayein office saath considerable lokapriyata.
As a kulij biographer put it, `` he embodied the spirit and hopes of the madhya class, could interpret unke longings or express their raay.
That he kiya represent the pratibhashali of the ausat is the sabase convincing pramaan of his shakti. ''
kuch later criticized kulij as bhaag of a saamaanya aalochana of laissez-faire sarkari.
His pratishtha underwent a punarjagran during the Ronald reagan prashasan, lakin the ultimate moolyankan of his presidency is still divided between those jo sweekruti of his katautee of the aakaar of sarkari programs and those jo maananaa the sangheey sarkari chahie be adhik shaamil in regulating or controlling the economy.
aspreso is a concentrated peya brewed by forcing a choti amount of nearly boiling water antargat dabaav through finely ground coffee beans.
aspreso often rai a thicker sangati than coffee brewed by anya vidhi, a ucchtar visheshgyata of nilambit or dissolved solids, or crema ( arth malai, lakin hone a sandarbh to the jhaag saath a malaaidaar banaavat ki form as a parinaam of the dabaav ).
As a parinaam of the pressurized brewing process the jaayaka or chemicals in a theth cap of aspreso hai bahut concentrated.
aspreso is the aadhaar liye other peya, aise as a latte, cappuccino, macchiato, mocha, or americano.
aspreso has adhik caffeine prati unit volume than sabase peya, lakin the usual serving aakaar is smaller—a theth 60 ml ( 2 us drav ounce ) of aspreso rai 80 to 150 mg of caffeine, little kam than the 95 to 200 mg of a maanak 240 mL ( 8 us drav ounce ) cup of drip-brewed coffee.
bryan kaith keli ( born October 25, 1961 ) is an amareeki footbaal coach or purv khilaadi.
he is philhal the sir footbaal coach for the notre dame lard irish, a sthiti he has held chunki disambar 2009.
Kelly thi previously sir coach at grand ghati State vishvavidhyalayon ( 1991–2003 ), central michigan vishvavidhyalayon ( 2004–2006 ), and vishvavidhyalayon of sinsinati ( 2006–2009 ).
A contract is an anubandh having a lawful object daalaa into voluntarily by do or adhik partiyon, prayek of jisko intends to create ek or more vidhik obligations between them.
the elements of a contract hai `` prastaav '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent vyaktiyon '' having legal capacity jo exange `` vichaar '' to banaaen `` mutuality of obligation. ''
pramaan of kuch or all of these tatv may be kiya in likhane, haalanki anubandh may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
The upaay for ulanghan of contract can be `` kshatipurti '' in the rup of muaavje of money or specific pradarshan enforced through an aadesh.
Both of these remedies award the party at ghaataa the `` laabh of the bargain '' or expectation kshatipurti, jisase hai greater than mere reliance kshatipurti, as in promissory estoppel.
The parties may be prakritik vyaktiyon or juristic persons.
a anubandh is a legally enforceable vaada or undertaking ki kuch hoga or hoga nahin occur.
the shabd vaada can be used as a vidhik paryaay for anubandh, although care is required as a promise may nahin have the puraa khadaa of a anubandh, as when it is an anubandh bagaiyr consideration.
anubandh law varies greatly isse ek jurisdiction to another, sahit matbhed in aam vidhi compared to civil vidhi, the impact of received vidhi, visheshkar isse england in aam vidhi deshon, or of law samhitabaddh in regional legislation.
regarding Australian anubandh Law liye example, there hai 40 praasangik acts jisase prabhaav on the nirvachan of anubandh at the rashtramandal ( sangheey / neshnal ) str, and an atirikt 26 adhiniyamon at the level of the state of nsw.
in jod there are 6 international yantra or prathaon jisase hai applicable liye antarrashtriya dealings, such as the sanyukt Nations sammelan on anubandh liye the International bikri of goods.
sidney patric crosby, ons ( born August 7, 1987 ) is a Canadian peshewar ice hockey khilaadi who is captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins of the neshnal hockey lig ( NHL ).
crosby thi drafted first overall by the penguins out of the quebec Major junior hockey lig ( qmjhl ).
During his two-year pramukh junior kariyar with the rimouski océanic, he arjeet back-to-back chl khilaadi of the saal awards or led his klbon to the 2005 Memorial cap final.
nicknamed `` the aglaa ek ``, he thi one of the sabase highly regarded draft chayan in hockey history, leading anek to refer to the 2005 draft Lottery as the `` sidney Crosby sweepstakes ''.
In uske pehla enechael ritu, crosby samaapt chathe in lig scoring saath 102 ank ( 39 lakshya, 63 assists ) or thi a runner-up liye the calder memorial Trophy ( jiti by Alexander ovechkin ).
by uske duusari ritu, he led the enechael saath 120 ank ( 36 goals, 84 assists ) to capchar the art ross trophy, banane the youngest khilaadi or the tabhi kishoravastha to jeet a scoring sheershak in koi major uttar American khel lig.
ki same ritu, Crosby bhi won the Hart Memorial trophy as the peshewar Hockey Writers sangh 's choice liye sabase moolyawaan khilaadi and the lester B. pimmersan Award as the NHL khilaadi Association 's chunaav liye sabase bakaayaa khilaadi, banane the seventh player in enechael history to earn sab teen puraskaar in ek saal.
crosby started the 2007–08 ritu saath the team 's captaini and subsequently led unhen to the 2008 Stanley cap final, jahaan ve yahood parajeet by the detroit red wings in chah khel.
The penguins laute to the final against Detroit the following saal or won in seven khel ; crosby became the youngest captain in enechael history to jeet the stanley cap.
In the 2009–10 ritu, crosby scored a career-high 51 lakshya, tying use with Steven stamkos liye the prakshepastra Richard trophy as the league-leader ; saath 58 assists, he totaled 109 points, duusari in the enechael.
dauraan the off-season, crosby received the Mark mesier netritv puraskaar.
in 2010–11, Crosby sustained a concussion as a parinaam of hits to the sir in back-to-back khel.
The injury left use sidelined for ten and a half maheene.
however, baad playing aath games in the 2011–12 ritu, crosby 's concussion-like lakshan laute in disambar 2011, or he kiya not return jabatak mid-march 2012.
internationally, crosby rai represented Canada in numerous tournaments liye the desh 's junior or main 's tiimon.
baad spardhaa in the 2003 U-18 junior World Cup, he represented canada in back-to-back IIHF sansar u20 championships, jeetna chaandi in 2004 or sunaharaa in 2005.
at the 2006 IIHF World championships, he led the tournament in scoring, jabaki bhi kamai Top Forward or All-Star toli honours.
Four saalo baad, crosby thi namit to toli canada liye the 2010 sheet Olympics in vainkuvar.
playing the United States in the sunaharaa medal khel, he scored the game-winning goal in overtime.
a sanyukt rajya cent, bhi gyaat as a paini.
`` my two saint '' ( 2¢ ) or its longer sanskaran `` put my two saint in '' is an sanyukt rajya ( us ) idiomatic abhivyakti, liya isse the asli angrezi idiom abhivyakti : to put in `` my do pennies worth '' or `` my tuppence worth. ''
It is prayukt to preface the antarim stating of one’s opinion.
by deprecating the opinion to follow – suggesting iske maan is tabhi do saint, a bahut small raashi – the upayokta of the phrase hopes to lessen the prabhaav of a possibly bayaan, prardashit politeness or vinamrata.
However, it is bhi sometimes prayukt saath irony jab expressing a strongly felt opinion.
the phrase is also used out of habit to preface uncontentious raay.
liye example:
The Chinese Civil yuddh thi a civil yuddh in china ladaa between shaktiyaan vafaadaar to the sarkari of the Republic of china led by the kuomintang ( kmt ) or shaktiyaan of the communist party of china ( cpc ).
the yuddh began in April 1927, amidst the uttari Expedition, or essentially ended jab major kriyasheel ladaaiyon ceased in 1950.
the virodh aakhirkaar resulted in do de facto rajya, the ganatantr of china ( aaraosi ) in taiwan or the logon 's Republic of china ( PRC ) in menland China, both claiming to be the legitimate sarkari of china.
the yuddh represented an vaicharik split ( baayein vs. sahi ) between the communist cpc, and the kmt 's brands of rashtrawaad.
the civil yuddh jari intermittently until let 1937, when the do parties formed a duusari United saamne to counter a japani akraman.
china 's full-scale civil yuddh resumed in 1946, a saal baad the end of hostilities with Japan.
After chaar adhik saalo, 1950 dekhi the cessation of pramukh military hostilities—with the newly founded logon 's ganatantr of China controlling mainland China ( sahit hyenan ), or the Republic of China 's jurisdiction being restricted to taiwan, penghu, Quemoy, matsu or anek outlying islands.
the kuomintang defeat is attributed to anek karkon : bhrashtachar - Chiang likhaa in uske diary on june 1948 that the KMT tha failed, nahin because of bahya dushmano lakin kuki of durgandh from within.
damdaar aarambhik support isse the U.S. diminished, or tab, roka.
( Partly because of kmt bhrashtachar or anti-democratic shashan, and partly kuki of the anishchit u.S. foreign policy towards Communism between 1945 or 1950 ) ; communist jameen sudhaar niti promised poor peasants farmland isse unke jameendaar.
is ensured PLA lokapriy support.
baad the aatmasamarpan of japani at the samaapt of World yuddh ii, soviet forces turned over their captured japani weapons to the cpc and anumat the cpc to lo control of territory in Manchuria.
To is din, no armistice or salaam sandhi rai kabhi been hastakshrit, or it is debated as to the whether the Civil yuddh rai legally ended.
Cross-Strait sambandh have maharoom hindered by military khatre or rajnatik and aarthik dabaav, visheshkar over taiwan 's rajnatik status, saath both governments officially adhering to a `` one-china policy. ''
The piarsi still actively daawa taiwan as bhaag of iske territory or continues to threaten the ROC with a sainya akraman if the aaraosi officially declares swatantraaa by badalanaa iske naam to and gaining international recognition as the ganatantr of Taiwan.
the ROC mutually daawa menland China, or ve both continue the fight over rajanyik recognition.
Today, the yuddh as aise occurs on the political or aarthik fronts in the form of cross-strait sambandh ; however, the do separate de facto rajya have band aarthik ties.
The One sau barahavin sanyukt rajya Congress thi the meeting of the vidhaan shakha of the sanyukt States sangheey sarkari, isse January 3, 2011 jabatak January 3, 2013.
it convened in washington, d.C. on janvari 3, 2011, or ended on janvari 3, 2013, 17 dinon pehle the samaapt of the adhyakshiya term to which baraak obama thi nirvaachit in 2008.
seenetteron elected to niyamit sharten in 2006 completed those sharten in this congress.
This Congress shaamil the pichhlaa house of pratinidhi nirvaachit isse congressional districts ki were apportioned aadhaarit on the 2000 janasankhyikee.
in the 2010 madhyavadhi chunaavon, the republican Party won the bahumat in the house of pratinidhi.
jabaki the Democrats rakhaa unke seenet bahumat, it thi reduced from the previous congress.
is thi the pehla congress in which the house and seenet yahood niyantrit by alag parties since the 107th Congress ( 2001–2003 ), or the first Congress to shuru ki rasta chunki the 99th congress ( 1985–1987 ).
in is congress, the House of pratinidhi tha the largest number of Republican sadasyon, 242, chunki the 80th congress ( 1947–1949 ).
it thi bhi the pehla congress chunki 1947 in jisase no member of the kennedy family served, as khub as the most nitiyaan polarized Congress since Reconstruction, with ricard kam sweekruti darja.
Wealth in the sanyukt rajya is commonly measured in sharten of jaal laayak, jisase is the sum of sab asset, including ghar equity, rin all dendaree.
the total jaal laayak of us households or nonprofit organizations 1945–2009, unadjusted liye mahangaai or janasankhyikee badalen.
liye udhaaharan, a household in kabza of an $ 800,000 house, $ 5,000 in mutual nidhi, $ 30,000 in gaadiyaan, $ 20,000 laayak of stock in their apana company, and a $ 45,000 IRA hota have assets totaling $ 900,000.
assuming ki is household hota have a $ 250,000 bandhak, $ 40,000 in car loans, or $ 10,000 in credit card debt, iske debts hota kul $ 300,000.
Subtracting the debts isse the worth of is household 's asset ( 900,000 - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000 ), is household hota have a jaal worth of $ 600,000.
jaal laayak can vary saath fluctuations in value of the underlying asset.
The maal —more specifically, the madhya jaal worth—of households in the United rajya is varied with sambandh to race, education, bhugolic location or ling.
as ek hota expect, households saath vrihad income visheshta the ucchtam jaal worths, though unchi aay can nahin be liya as an always accurate indicator of net laayak.
overall the number of wealthier households is on the rise, saath baby boomers hitting the highs of unke kariyar.
in jod, maal is unevenly vitarit, with the wealthiest 25 % of us households owning 87 % of the maal in the sanyukt States, jisase thi $ 54.2 kharab in 2009.
sahit human puunji aise as kaushal, the United Nations anumaanit the kul wealth of the sanyukt rajya in 2008 to be $ 118 kharab.
is aalekh deals saath chaynaatmak prishthiya rhizotomy ( sdr ) balki than the rhizotomy procedures liye pain relief ; liye those prakriyaaon, jisase have begun to lo the naam `` rhizotomy '' in certain udhaaharan, dekhie facet rhizotomy and similar.
a rhizotomy ( ) is a pad chiefly referring to a neurosurgical kaarividhi ki selectively nasht samasyapurna tantrika roots in the spinal cord, sabase often to relieve the lakshan of neuromuscular sharten aise as spastic diplegia and anya form of spastic dimagi palsy.
the chaynaatmak dorsal rhizotomy ( sdr ) liye spastic dimagi palsy rai maharoom the pramukh use of rhizotomy liye neurosurgeons specialising in spastic CP chunki the 1980s ; in this surgery, the spasticity-causing nerves hai pruthak or tab targeted and nasht.
the samvedi tantrika jaden, where spasticity is located, hai first alag isse the motor ones, or the tantrika machhlee to be kaaten hai tab pahachaanaa via electromyographic uttejnaaon.
the ones producing spasticity hai tab selectively lesioned with chota vidyut pulses.
In spasticity, rhizotomy precisely lakshya or nasht the kshatigrast nerves ki don’t praapt gamma amino butyric acid, jisase is the core problem liye logon with spastic cerebral palsy.
These over-firing, non-gaba-absorbing nerves generate asaamaanya electrical activity dauraan the EMG pareekshan phase in sdr or hai yun mana to be the sorce of the patient 's hypertonia ; they hai eliminated saath the vidyut pulses ekbar pahachaanaa, while the remaining nerves or nerve routes carrying the sahi sandesh remain fully barkaraar and untouched.
is arthath that the spasticity is permanently dissolved, and ki is is done bagaiyr affecting baichaiyn pranali samvedansheeltaa or falan in anya kshetron, kuki the tabhi nerves nasht are the over-firing ones jimmedaar liye the mansapeshi tightness.
the sharten rhizotomy or neurotomy are bhi increasingly becoming interchangeable in the upachaar of dirghakaalik waapas pidaa from degenerative discs beemaari.
is is a procedure pukaara a facet rhizotomy or is nahin a surgical kaarividhi lakin is bajaay done on an outpatient aadhaar using a saral jaanch to apply radiofrequency lehren to the impinged pain-causing tantrika root lying between the facet sanyukt or the vertebral deh.
Such radio aavriti tantrika lesioning parinaam in five to aath or more maheene of pidaa relief before the tantrika regenerates and another round of the kaarividhi needs to be performed.
A facet rhizotomy is bas one of many alag forms of radiofrequency ablation, and iske upyog of the `` rhizotomy '' naam should nahin be uljhan saath the sdr kaarividhi.

the teardrop tattoo or aansu tatu is a symbolic tattoo ki is lagaai underneath the eye.
It rai no phixd arth but lagbhag sab meanings ( dekhie below ) have some conection to thana.
u.S. Route 75 is a north–south U.S. rajmarg.
the rajmarg 's uttari terminus is in kittson county, minesota, at the Canadian border, jahaan it once jari as manitoba rajmarg 75 on the other side of the now-closed border crossing.
iske dakshini terminus is at antarraji 30 or antarraji 45 in dalas, texas, where it is gyaat as North central Expressway.
U.S. 75 was a border-to-border route, from canada to the Gulf of mexico at galveston, texas.
however, the entire segment dakshin of Dallas, texas rai maharoom decommissioned in ehsaan of antarraji 45, a katof khand of town-to-town sataha sadak having become rajya rajmarg 75.
Lower naveen ward is a neighborhood of the nagar of nai Orleans.
as the name implies, it is bhaag of the naveen ward of New orlions.
the Lower naveen Ward is often vichaar of as the sampurna kshetrafal within nai orlions downriver of the audyogic kanal ; however, the nagar Planning ayog divides is area into the nimnatar Ninth ward ( 2 ) or paavan cross ( 3 ) pados.
the pad `` nimnatar '' refers to iske location farther towards the munh of the mississippi nadi, `` bas '' or `` neeche '' the rest of the nagar in local bhugolic shabdaawalee.
lakin the 9th ward, like sab wards in New orlions, is a matdaan district.
the 9th ward thi added as a matdaan zila in 1852.
the `` nimnatar '' 9th ward is rachit of Ward 9 Districts 1, 2, 4, and 7 jisase make up the paavan cross Area or ward 9 Districts 3, 5, 6, and 8.
ucchtar matdaan zila sankhyaayein in the 9th ward ( 8-27 ) hai on the upriver paksh of the audyogic kanal.
the kshetrafal aae to national attention liye iske devastation in the aftermath of Hurricane katrina in 2005.

red or naarangi tinted chandramaa, as dekhi isse dharti during a chandra grahan, jahaan the dharti aata between the Moon and surya
the Moon is the only prakritik satellite of the dharti, or the paanchvaan largest satellite in the saura System.
it is the largest prakritik upgrah of a grah in the saura pranali saapeksh to the aakaar of its praathmik, having 27 % the vyas and 60 % the ghanatv of dharti, resulting in iske dravyaman.
the Moon is the duusari densest upgrah after io, a upgrah of brihaspati.
The Moon is in tulykaalik rotation saath dharti, sadaa prardashit the same phase saath iske nikat paksh chihnit by dark volcanic mariya ki fill between the ujjwal pracheen crustal hilands or the prominent prabhaav craters.
it is the brightest object in the aasmaan baad the Sun, haalanki iske sataha is darasal very dark, saath a reflectance samaan to that of koyale.
iske prominence in the aasmaan and iske regular saikil of phases have, chunki ancient times, made the chandramaa an important saanskrithik influence on language, panchang, art or mythology.
the chandramaa 's gravitational influence produces the samandar tides or the minute lengthening of the din.
the chandramaa 's vartmaan kakshiya alahada, about tees times the vyas of the dharti, kalyankari it to appear lagbhag the vahi size in the sky as the surya, allowing it to cover the surya nearly precisely in total saura eclipses.
is milan of apparent visual aakaar is a sanyog.
the chandramaa 's linear alahada isse the dharti is currently increasing at a rate of 3.82±0.07cm prati saal, lakin is rate is not constant.
the Moon is vichaar to have formed nearly 4.5 arab saalo pehle, not long after the Earth.
haalanki vahin have maharoom several hypotheses liye iske origin in the past, the vartmaan sabase widely sweekrut explanation is ki the chandramaa formed isse the malba baayein over baad a daanav prabhaav between dharti or a mangal -akarand deh.
the chandramaa is the tabhi celestial deh other than dharti on jisase humans have set pair.
the soviet sangh 's luna programme was the pehla to pahunchein the chandramaa with unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the United States ' NASA Apollo kaarykram hasil the tabhi manned missions to tithi, shuruuaat with the first maanavyukt chandra orbiting mishan by apollo 8 in 1968, or chah maanavyukt lunar avataran between 1969 or 1972, saath the pehla being Apollo 11.
ye mishan laute over 380 kg of lunar rocks, which have maharoom prayukt to develop a geological samajhnaa of the chandramaa 's origins, the gathan of its aatanrik dhaancha, and iske subsequent history.
After the Apollo 17 mishan in 1972, the Moon rai maharoom visited tabhi by unmanned spacecraft, notably by the final Soviet lunokhod rover.
chunki 2004, japani, china, India, the sanyukt rajya, or the europea spes agency have each bheja lunar orbiters.
These spacecraft have contributed to confirming the discovery of chandra jal barf in permanently shadowed craters at the danda or bandhi into the chandra regolith.
Future maanavyukt mishan to the chandramaa have been niojit, including sarkari as well as privately vittposhit praytn.
The chandramaa remains, under the bahari spes sandhi, free to sab nations to explore liye shantipurna uddeshy.
ronaald wilson reagan ( ; farvari 6, 1911 – june 5, 2004 ) was the 40th President of the sanyukt States ( 1981–1989 ).
prior to ki, he thi the 33rd Governor of california ( 1967–1975 ), or a radio, film and television actor.
Born in tampico, illinois, or uthaaya in Dixon, reagan was shikshit at Eureka College, kamai a Bachelor of kala oopaadhi in arthshaastra or sociology.
baad graduating, reagan moved pehla to iova to kaary as a radio prasarankarta or then, in 1937, to los angeles where he began a kariyar as an karta, pehla in films or baad television.
kuch of uske sabase notable films shaamil knute rockne, sab American ( 1940 ), kings Row ( 1942 ), or bedtime liye bonzo ( 1951 ).
reagan served as adhyaksh of the Screen Actors gild or baad as a spokesman liye General electric ( ge ) ; uske prarambh in raajnneeti occurred dauraan uske kaary liye ge.
originally a sadsy of the Democratic Party, his sthitiyaan began shifting rightward in the 1950s, or he switched to the Republican Party in 1962.
baad delivering a rousing vaak in support of Barry goldwater 's adhyakshiya candidacy in 1964, he thi persuaded to talash the california governorship, jeetna do saalo baad or again in 1970.
he was parajeet in uske chalaaen liye the Republican presidential namakan in 1968 or in 1976, lakin jiti dono the nomination or saamaanya election in 1980, defeating laazim jimmy carter.
as adhyaksh, Reagan implemented sweeping new political or economic pahalon.
uske supply-side aarthik nitiyon, utaavle `` Reaganomics ``, advocated reducing kar rates to spur economic vikaas, controlling the money supplai to reduce mahangaai, deregulation of the arthvyavastha, or reducing sarkari bitaa.
in uske pehla pad he survived an hatya attempt, took a mushkil lakeer viruddh majdoor sangh, ghoshit a nai yuddh on davaayen, or ordered an akraman of haraa.
He thi re-elected in a bhuskhalan in 1984, proclaiming that it was `` morning in America ``.
His second term was primarily chihnit by videshi matters, aise as the ending of the thanda War, the 1986 bombing of libya, or the revelation of the iran-contra affair.
saream describing the soviet sangh as an `` dusht empire ``, he samarthit anti-communist movements vishwavyaapee or kharch uske pehla term forgoing the strategy of détente by ordering a vishaal sainya buildup in an bahen res saath the ussr.
reagan negotiated saath soviet General sachiv mikhail Gorbachev, culminating in the inf sandhi or the ghati of dono deshon ' nabhikeey arsenals.
reagan left office in 1989.
in 1994, the former adhyaksh disclosed that he tha maharoom diagnosed saath alzimer 's beemaari earlier in the saal ; he died ten saalo baad at the aayu of 93.
a conservative pratik, he baandhane atyadhik in public raay pole of U.S. Presidents or is credited liye generating an vaicharik punarjagran on the American political right.
puraa set of scrolls, constituting the sampurna tanakh.
the Tanakh (, or ; bhi tenakh, tenak, Tanach ) is a naam prayukt in judaism for the canon of the Hebrew bible.
the tanakh is bhi gyaat as the Masoretic Text or the miqra.
the naam is an echronim formed from the aarambhik yahudee letters of the Masoretic text 's teen paramparaagat subdivisions : The tora ( `` shikshan '', bhi gyaat as the paanch kitabe of musa ), nevi'im ( `` nabiyon '' ) or ketuvim ( `` kritiyaan '' ) —hence tanakh.
the naam `` miqra '' ( מקרא ), arth `` ki jisase is read '', is an vaikalpik Hebrew pad liye the tanakh.
the kitabe of the tanakh yahood relayed with an accompanying maukhik parampara passed on by prayek generation, called the maukhik Torah.

hatya koshishen and bhukhand on Presidents of the sanyukt States have been numerous : more than 20 koshishen to maar baithe and purv raashtrapatiyon, as well as the presidents-elect, hai gyaat.
chaar baithe raashtrapatiyon have maharoom killed : Abraham Lincoln ( the 16th adhyaksh ), james A. Garfield ( the 20th adhyaksh ), wiliam mckinley ( the 25th adhyaksh ) and jon F. kennedy ( the 35th adhyaksh ).
do raashtrapatiyon yahood ghayal in attempted assassinations : purv President theodor rujvelt ( the 26th President ), or adhyaksh ronaald reagan ( the 40th President ).
haalanki the itihaaskaar J.W. clark has sujhaayaa ki most amareeki assassinations were nitiyaan prerit kriyaayein, carried out by tarksangat main, nahin all aise hamale have maharoom undertaken liye political kaaran.
Some hamalavar had questionable dimagi stability, or a few yahood judged legally insane.
Since the vaais adhyaksh of the United rajya has for adhik than a sadi maharoom elected isse the vahi rajnatik party as the adhyaksh, the hatya of the adhyaksh is asambhavit to parinaam in pramukh niti parivartan.
This may bataaiye why rajnatik samooh typically do not make aise hamale.

oklahoma ( ) ( pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, cay : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state located in west dakshin Central sanyukt rajya.
oklahoma is the 20th sabase extensive and the 28th sabase populous of the 50 United States.
The state 's naam is niklaa from the choctaw shabd okla and humma, arth `` red logon '', or it is known informally by iske nickname, the sooner rajya.
formed by the combination of oklahoma Territory and bhartiya Territory on navambar 16, 1907, Oklahoma thi the 46th state to daalen the union.
Its nivaasiyon hai gyaat as Oklahomans or, informally `` okies '', and iske capital or largest city is oklahoma City.
A pramukh nirmaataa of prakritik gas, oil, and agriculture, oklahoma relies on an aarthik aadhaar of vimaanan, energy, doorsanchaar, and biotechnology.
it has ek of the tivratam growing economies in the nation, ranking among the sheersh rajya in prati capita aay vikaas and sakal gharelu product vikaas.
oklahoma nagar or Tulsa serve as oklahoma 's praathmik aarthik anchors, with nearly do thirds of oklahomans living bheetar unke metropolitan sankhyikeey areas.
saath small mountain seemayen, preyari, mesas, and eastern wanon, sabase of oklahoma lies in the Great maidan or the u.s. aantarik hilands —a pradesh visheshkar prone to kathor mausam.
in jod to having a prevalence of English, German, scottish, irish and deshi amareeki ancestry, more than 25 Native American languages are spoken in oklahoma, second only to california.
Oklahoma is stith on a confluence of teen major amareeki cultural regions and historically served as a route liye choupayon drives, a gantavy liye southern settlers, or a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans.
Redwall, by bryan Jacques, is a shrenee of children 's kaalpanik novels.
it is the sheershak of the pehla kitaab of the shrenee, published in 1986, as well as the naam of the abi pradarshit in the kitaab or the name of an anemated tv shrenee aadhaarit on teen of the novels ( Redwall, mattimeo, and martin the Warrior ), jisase pehla aired in 1999.
the kitabe are primarily aimed at puraani children, lakin have prashansak of sab aayu.
There have been twenty-two novels or two chitra kitabe prakashit.
the twenty-second, and final, novel, the Rogue Crew, thi maranoparant released on May 3, 2011.
Natural gas is praayah measured by volume in the United States or is stated in cubic feet.
A ghan pair of gas is the raashi of gas needed to bharan a volume of ek ghan foot under set sharten of dabaav and temperature.to maap larger amounts of natural gas, a `` therm '' is used to denote 100 ghan feet, and `` mcf '' is prayukt to denote 1,000 ghan feet.
To provide vrihad accuracy in comparing fuels, energy content is measured in sharten of `` angrejon Thermal ikai ( btu 's ). ''
a BTU is the amount of heat jaruri to uthaayen ek pound of water ( approximately a pint ), ek degree Fahrenheit at or band to iske point of adhiktam ghanatv.
ek British therm ( symbol thm ) is a non- SI ikai of heat energy baraabar to 100,000 angrejon thermal ikai ( btu ).
it is approximately the urja samatuly of burning 100 ghan feet ( praayah referred to as 1 ccf ) of prakritik gas.
chunki ( Natural gas ) meter maap awaz or not urja content, a therm factor is prayukt by ( prakritik ) gas companiyaan to badalen the awaz of gas prayukt to iske ooshmaa samatuly, or yun gananaa the actual urja use.
the therm factor is praayah in the ikai therms/CCF.
it hoga vary saath the mix of hydrocarbons in the prakritik gas.
prakritik gas saath a ucchtar than ausat visheshgyata of ithen, propen or butane will have a higher therm factor.
impurities, aise as carbon dioxide or nitrogen, nimnatar the therm factor.
The awaz of the gas is gananaa as if measured at maanak taapmaana or dabaav ( stp ).
the ooshmaa content of prakritik gas is solely nirbhar on the sangyojan of the gas, or is independent of temperature and pressure.
ek therm is baraabar to parichay 105.5 megajoules, 25,200 kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours.
One therm can bhi be provided by about of prakritik gas.
the therm sometimes has maharoom confused saath the thermie ( see below ).
the names of both units aaiye from the unani shabd liye heat.
A thermie ( th ) is a metric unit of ooshmaa energy, bhaag of the meter-tonne-second pranali sometimes prayukt by europea ejiniers.
the thermie is baraabar to the amount of energy jaruri to uthaayen the temperature of 1 ton of jal by 1 °C.
The thermie is equivalent to 1,000 kilocalories, 4.1868 megajoules or 3968.3 btu.
the American civil yuddh ( acw ), bhi gyaat as the yuddh between the States or bas the civil yuddh ( see naming ), thi a civil yuddh ladaa isse 1861 to 1865 between the sanyukt States ( the `` Union '' or the `` uttar '' ) or several Southern slave states that ghoshit their secession and formed the confederate States of america ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` dakshin '' ).
the war had iske utpatti in the issue of slavery, visheshkar the ekstansion of gulaami into the western territories.
Foreign powers did nahin intervene.
After four years of bloody combat ki baayein over 600,000 soldiers murde or nasht much of the dakshin 's infrastructure, the confederacy collapsed, gulaami thi abolished, or the mushkil punarnirmaan prakram of restoring national ekta or guaranteeing rights to the freed slave began.
in the 1860 presidential chunaav, republicans, led by abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding gulaami into sanyukt States ' territories.
Lincoln jiti, lakin before uske udghaatan on kooch 4, 1861, saat cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
outgoing loktantric adhyaksh james bukanan or the aavak republicans asweekrut secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural address declared uske prashasan hota nahin initiate civil yuddh.
aath baaki slave states jari to asweekrut kals liye secession.
confederate shaktiyaan jabt numerous sangheey durgon within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
a Peace sammelan vifal to dhundhen a sulah, or dono sides prepared liye yuddh.
the Confederates assumed that europea deshon yahood so nirbhar on `` king Cotton `` ki ve hota intervene ; none did or none pahachaanaa the new Confederate States of america.
hostilities began on april 12, 1861, when confederate shaktiyaan fired upon fort sumter, a key fort yojit by Union troops in dakshin carolina.
lincoln pukaara liye prayek state to provide sainikon to retake the fort ; consequently, chaar adhik slave states joined the confederacy, bringing unke kul to gyaarah.
the sangh jald niyantrit the kinaaraa states or sthapit a naval nakebandi ki abodh the southern arthvyavastha.
the purvi theatre was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The patjhad 1862 confederate abhiyaan into maryland ( a Union rajya ) ended saath confederate retreat at the battle of antietam, dissuading angrejon hastkshep.
lincoln issued the emancipation udghoshnaa, jisase bana ending gulaami a yuddh lakshya.
to the west, by garmiyaan 1862 the sangh destroyed the Confederate nadi navy, tab much of their pashchimi sena, or the sangh at vicksburg vibhajit the confederacy in do at the mississippi nadi.
in 1863, robert E. lee 's Confederate incursion uttar ended at the Battle of gettysburg.
Western successes led to ulysses S. Grant command of all Union sena in 1864.
in the pashchimi Theater, William T. sharaman drove east to capchar atlanta or marched to the sea, destroying confederate infrastructure saath the rasta.
The Union marshaled the sansaadhan or janashakti to akraman the confederacy isse sab dishanirdesh, and could afford to lado ladaaiyon of attrition through the overland abhiyaan towards richmond, the Confederate puunji.
the defending confederate army vifal, leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at appomattox adaalat house on April 9, 1865.
the American civil yuddh was ek of the earliest sachcha audyogic yudhon.
railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced weapons yahood employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian kaarkaanon, khaanon, shipyards, bainko, parivahan and khaanaa aapurtiyan sab foreshadowed sansar yuddh I.
it remains the deadliest yuddh in American itihaas, resulting in the mauton of an anumaanit 750,000 sainiko or an undetermined number of civilian hataahat.
itihaaskaar jon huddleston estimates the maut toll at ten pratishat of sab Northern males 20–45 saalo boodha, or 30 pratishat of sab dakshini white males aged 18–40.

he jiti the sunaharaa medal liye decathlon in the Montreal 1976 garmiyaan olympic.
following uske Olympic jeet or the sambandhit manyata, he shaadishuda kris Kardashian, or uske professional career viksit into hone a television celebrity.
by 1981, he tha strecchar in several made-for-TV filmon or thi erik estrada 's replacement on the top rated tv shrenee chips.
he rai six children : bart, Casey, brandan, brody, candal or kaili.
chunki uske 1991 vivaah to kris jiner, he is the stepfather to courtney, kim, khloe or rob kardasian.
chunki 2007, he rai appeared saath uske blended parivaar on Keeping up saath the kardashians.
escherichia kolai ( ; commonly abbreviated E. kolai ) is a gram-negative, rod-shaped bacterium ki is commonly mila in the nimnatar aant of warm-blooded jeevon ( endotherms ).
sabase E. coli strains hai hanirahit, lakin kuch serotypes can kaaran gambhir khaanaa vishaaktata in insaano, or are occasionally jimmedaar for utpaada recalls due to food sandushan.
the hanirahit strains hai bhaag of the saamaanya flora of the aant, or can benefit their host by producing vitamin k2, or by preventing the sthapana of rogajanak jeevanu within the intestine.
E. kolai or related bacteria constitute parichay 0.1 % of aant flora, and fecal–oral hastantaran is the pramukh route through jisase rogajanak strains of the bacterium kaaran disease.
Cells are able to survive baahar the deh liye a simit raashi of samay, which makes unhen ideal indicator organisms to pareekshan environmental samples liye fecal sandushan.
vahin is, however, a growing body of research ki rai examined environmentally persistent E. kolai jisase can jivit for vistaarit avadhi outside of the host.
the bacterium can bhi be grown easily or inexpensively in a laboratory setting, or rai maharoom intensively investigated liye over 60 years.
E. kolai is the sabase widely padhai prokaryotic model sajiv, or an important prajati in the field of jaevpraudyogiki or sookshmjaiviki, jahaan it has parosa as the host sajiv for the majority of kaary saath recombinant diene.
Area code 217 is the uttar American telephone kshetrafal code for much of pashchimi or central illinois.
the 217 kshetrafal includes illinois ' capital, springfield, plus champaign, urbana, decatur, danville, quinci, or rantoul.
217 thi ek of the asli area code, jisase yahood nirmit in 1947.

chitra of the largest antarctic ozone chhed kabhi recorded ( sitambar 2006 ), over the Southern pole
paraton of the atmosphere ( not to scale )
Ozone depletion describes do pruthak lakin sambandhit phenomena observed chunki the let 1970s : a sthir manaahi of parichay 4 % prati dashak in the kul awaz of ozone in dharti 's stratosphere ( the ozone parat ), and a much larger springtime ghati in stratospheric ozone over Earth 's dhruviya regions.
the latter ghatana is referred to as the ozone hole.
in jod to ye well-known stratospheric phenomena, vahin hai bhi springtime dhruviya tropospheric ozone depletion kaarykram.
the vivaran of dhruviya ozone chhed gathan differ isse ki of mid-latitude thinning, lakin the sabase important process in dono is catalytic vinaash of ozone by parmaanu hellogence.
the pramukh source of ye hellojan anu in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( cfcs, freons, halons ).
ye yogicon hai transported into the stratosphere after hone utsarjit at the sataha.
dono types of ozone depletion yahood observed to badhayen as emissions of halo-carbons increased.
cfcs and anya contributory substances hai referred to as ozone-depleting substances ( ods ).
Since the ozone parat prevents most harmful uvb wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of parabangnee lite ( uv lite ) isse guzar through the dharti 's maahaul, observed or projected decreases in ozone have utpann worldwide concern agrani to apnaanaa of the montrial Protocol ki bans the utpaadan of cfcs, halons, or anya ozone-depleting chemicals aise as carbon tetrachloride or trichloroethane.
It is suspected that a kismein of biological consequences aise as increases in skin karkat, cataracts, kshati to paudhe, and katautee of plavak populations in the samandar 's photic zone may result from the increased uv exposure due to ozone depletion.
The prastaavna to the sanyukt rajya Constitution is a bread parichayatmak bayaan of the samvidhan 's aadharbhoot uddeshy and guiding siddhanth.
It rajya in saamaanya sharten, or nyaayalayon have referred to it as vishwasaneey evidence of, the founding fathers ' iraadon regarding the samvidhan 's arth or kayaa they hoped the samvidhan hota achieve as it pertains to all of the logon of the sanyukt rajya.
as the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests ki the nai government originates isse the logon of the United States and it set into gati a sawaal as it pertains to that vishaal population concerning the individual rights or samta among sab logon ; this can be dekhi sabase broadly in the divide between republicanism or social loktantr.

the shot put ( pronounced ) is a track or field event involving `` phenkna '' / '' putting '' ( throwing in a pushing gati ) a baari spherical object —the shot—as far as sambhavit.
the shot put competition liye main rai maharoom a bhaag of the modern olympic chunki unke punaruddhar in 1896, mahilaon 's pratiyogita began in 1948.
map of the sanyukt raashtra ( UN ) sadsy rajya, with their territories ( sahit nirbhar territories ) pahachaanaa by the un in blue
vahin hai sanyukt raashtra ( un ) member rajya, or prayek of them is a sadsy of the sanyukt raashtra saamaanya Assembly.
the criteria liye pravesh of new sadasyon are niyat out in the sanyukt raashtra charter, adhyay ii, aalekh 4:
a anushansa liye pravesh isse the suraksha parishad requires affirmative votes isse at tanik nine of the parishad 's pandrah sadasyon, saath none of the paanch sthai sadasyon voting viruddh.
the Security parishad 's recommendation must tab be subsequently sweekrut in the saamaanya Assembly by a two-thirds bahumat vote.
in principle, only sovereign rajya can become un members, and philhal all UN sadasyon hai sovereign rajya ( although a few members yahood nahin sovereign jab ve joined the un ).
kuki a rajya can tabhi be admitted to the UN by the sweekruti of the suraksha parishad and the General sabha, a kramank of rajya ki may be mana sovereign rajya according to the montevideo Convention maapdand hai not members because the un karata not consider unhen to possess sovereignty, mukhyatah due to the kami of antarrashtriya manyata or vipaksh isse certain sadasyon.
in jod to the sadsy states, the un bhi aamantran non-member rajya ( philhal do : the paavan See or philistin ), intergovernmental sanghathan, and anya international sanghathan or entities jinaki statehood or prabhutaa are not precisely paribhaashit, to become observers at the saamaanya Assembly, allowing them to participate or speak, lakin nahin vote, in saamaanya sabha meetings.
the Eiffel minar (, ) is an iron lattice minar stith on the Champ de mangal in paris, namit baad the ejeeniyar Gustave effil, whose company designed or nirmit the minar.
erected in 1889 as the entrance arch to the 1889 World 's mela, it rai become both a vaishvik cultural icon of frans or ek of the sabase recognizable structures in the world.
The minar is the tallest dhaancha in paris or the most-visited sashulk monument in the world ; 7.1 lakh logon ascended it in 2011.
The teesraa str observatory 's upper manch is at the ucchtam accessible to public in the European sangh or the ucchtam in europea as long as the platform of the ostankino Tower, at, remains band as a parinaam of the aag of agast 2000.
the minar received iske 250 millionth visitor in 2010.
The minar stand lambaa, parichay the vahi height as an 81-storey bhawan.
dauraan iske construction, the effil minar surpassed the washington smarak to assume the sheershak of the tallest man-made dhaancha in the sansar, a sheershak it yojit liye 41 saalo, until the chrisler bhawan in nai york nagar thi nirmit in 1930.
kuki of the jod, in 1957, of the antina atop the effil minar, it is now taller than the chrisler bhawan.
nahin sahit broadcast antena, it is the second-tallest dhaancha in frans, baad the Millau Viaduct.
The minar rai teen str liye visitors.
tikaten can be kharida to ascend, by seedhiyaan or lift ( elevator ), to the pehla or second str.
the chalanaa from maidan str to the first level is over 300 kadam, as is the chalanaa isse the first to the duusari str.
The third or ucchtam str is accessible tabhi by lift—stairs do maujuud lakin hai praayah band to the public.
the pehla or duusari str have restaraan.
the minar has become the sabase prominent pratik of dono paris or frans, often in the establishing shot of films niyat in the city.

the canadai footbaal League or cfl ( ' [ lcf ] in french ) is a professional khel lig located in canada.
the cfl is the highest str of competition in Canadian footbaal, a form of gridiron footbaal closely related to amareeki footbaal.
iske aath vartmaan teams, which are stith in aath pruthak shaharon, hai divided into two divisions of four teams prayek — the East prabhag or the west prabhag.
The lig 's 19-week niyamit ritu ranon isse let june to jaldi navambar ; each toli plays 18 khel with one bye saptaah.
Following the niyamit ritu, the teen tiimon with the behtareen records in unke prabhag ( magar if the chauthi place team in ek prabhag rai a behatar ricard than the teesraa place team in the anya prabhag, when the toli with the better ricard makes the playoffs or `` crosses over '' to the anya prabhag 's playoff ) compete in the league 's three-week diviginal playoffs, jisase culminate in the late-november dhoosar Cup championships, the desh 's largest salanaa khel or television event.
the CFL thi officially santhaapit on janvari 19, 1958, bananaa it the duusari oldest gridiron footbaal lig in uttar America still in aaparishan, haalanki sab its tiimon long predate the aadhunik gathan of the lig.
it is the ucchtam str of khel in canadai footbaal, the sabase popular footbaal lig in canada, or the second-most popular major khel league in Canada, after the neshnal hockey lig.
haalanki barf hockey is canada 's sabase lokapriy khel, the cfl rai increased the popularity of Canadian footbaal in quebec and pashchimi canada.
canadai footbaal is bhi nibhaai at amateur str ( i.e. yuvavastha, unchi skool, cjfl, QJFL, cis or senior lig aise as the alberta footbaal lig ).
The 2010s hoga be a significant dashak liye the cfl in sharten of growth, as tiimon have sanvar, vistaarit stadiums, or yojana to nirmaan entirely nai stadiums.
The montrial alotes sampannataa is pehla, adding 5,000 site to Percival molson memorial stadium in samay for the 2010 CFL ritu.
the edmonton esquimos and kaila stempedras bhi sanvar unke sambandhit stadium or suvidhaayen for the 2010 ritu.
in 2011, the bc sher played antargat a new, retractable chat in bc place after bitaa ek or a half sizan at samrajya Field.
tab the vinnipeg blue bamavarshak hoga khel in an entirely nai stadium at the University of manitoba, anusuchit to kholen in time for the 2013 ritu.
the Hamilton tiger-cats, saskatchewan Roughriders or the nai Ottawa matadhikaar hai bhi looking at nai or extensively-renovated stadium in the following saalo.
vahin hai also ummiden of expanding the lig to atlantic canada ( ideally basing a toli in either the adhik populated Halifax, or the adhik centralized moncton ), as 2010 or 2011 tha regular season games hosted in Moncton.
according to khel historian Douglas brei, the canadai footbaal lig holds the distinction of hone the tabhi peshewar khel lig in North america, pramukh or naaballig league, in which prayek existing matadhikaar rai jiti at tanik ek lig sheershak jabaki in unke vartmaan sthaan.
prayek antibody baandhta to a vishisht pratijan ; an baatcheet samaan to a taala or kunjee.
An antibody ( ab ), bhi gyaat as an immunoglobulin ( ig ), is a vishaal Y-shaped protein utpaadit by b-cells ki is prayukt by the pratiraksha pranali to pahachaano or neutralize videshi objects aise as bacteria or virus.
the antibody recognizes a unique part of the videshi nishaanaa, called an pratijan.
prayek tip of the `` Y '' of an antibody contains a paratope ( a structure analogous to a taala ) ki is vishisht for ek particular epitope ( similarly analogous to a kunjee ) on an antigen, allowing ye two structures to bind saath with parishuddhta.
Using is binding yantriki, an antibody can tag a microbe or an infected koshika for akraman by anya bhaag of the pratiraksha system, or can neutralize iske nishaanaa sidhe ( for udhaaharan, by blocking a bhaag of a microbe ki is anivaary liye its akraman or survival ).
the production of antibodies is the main function of the humoral immune pranali.
antibodies hai sravit by a prakaar of shwet rakt koshika pukaara a plasma koshika.
antibodies can occur in do physical form, a ghulansheel rup ki is sravit isse the koshika, or a jhilli -bound rup ki is sanlagn to the surface of a b koshika or is referred to as the b koshika receptor ( bcr ).
The bcr is tabhi mila on the sataha of b cells or facilitates the sakriyan of ye cells and their subsequent differentiation into either antibody kaarkaanon called plasma koshikaayen, or memory b cells ki will jivit in the deh or yaad that same pratijan so the B koshikaayen can respond tej upon future exposure.
in sabase cases, interaction of the b koshika saath a t helper cell is necessary to upaj full sakriyan of the b koshika or, isliye, antibody generation following pratijan binding.
Soluble antibodies are released into the rakt or utak fluids, as well as anek secretions to continue to surveykshan liye akramanakari microorganisms.
antibodies are glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin superfamily ; the terms antibody or immunoglobulin hai praayah prayukt interchangeably.
antibodies are typically bana of basic sanrachanaatmak units—each saath do large heavy zanjeeron or do small lite zanjeeron.
vahin are several alag prakaar of antibody baari zanjeeron, and anek alag kinds of antibodies, jisase hai grouped into alag isotypes aadhaarit on jisase baari kadi they possess.
paanch alag antibody isotypes are gyaat in stanadhariyon, jisase perform different bhoomikaaye, or help sidhaa the uchit immune jawaab for prayek different type of videshi object ve encounter.
haalanki the saamaanya dhaancha of sab antibodies is bahut samaan, a small region at the tip of the protein is atyadhik parivartaneey, allowing millions of antibodies saath thodaa different tip structures, or pratijan binding sites, to maujuud.
This pradesh is known as the hypervariable pradesh.
prayek of ye visangatiyaan can bind to a different antigen.
is vishaal vividhta of antibodies allows the pratiraksha pranali to recognize an baraabar chaudee kismein of antigens.
the vishaal or diverse janasankhyikee of antibodies is utpann by yadrichhik combinations of a niyat of gene khand that encode alag pratijan binding sites ( or paratopes ), followed by yadrichhik mutations in is kshetrafal of the antibody gene, jisase banaaen further diversity.
antibody jeenon also re-organize in a process pukaara class switching ki parivartan the base of the baari chain to another, bananaa a alag isotype of the antibody that retains the antigen vishisht parivartaneey pradesh.
is allows a single antibody to be used by anek alag bhaag of the pratiraksha system.
the symbol prayukt by the zodiac kaatil to sign uske patrachaar
the Zodiac kaatil thi a serial kaatil jo sanchalit in uttari California in the let 1960s or jaldi 1970s.
the killer 's identity remains anjaan.
The zodiac murdered peediton in benicia, vallejo, Lake Berryessa, or San francisco between disambar 1968 and October 1969.
chaar main or three mahilaon between the ages of 16 or 29 yahood targeted.
the kaatil originated the naam `` zodiac '' in a shrenee of taunting letters bheja to the local khadi kshetrafal dabaayen.
These akshar shaamil chaar cryptograms ( or ciphers ).
of the chaar cryptograms bheja, only ek has maharoom definitively hal.
sandigdhon have maharoom namit by vidhi pravartan or amateur investigators, but no conclusive pramaan rai surfaced.
in april 2004, the san Francisco police vibhaag marked the maamla `` niskriy '', yet re-opened the case at kuch point prior to kooch 2007.
the maamla bhi remains kholen in the city of vallejo, as khub as in napa county or Solano county.
The California vibhaag of insaaf rai maintained an open maamla sanchika on the zodiac hatyaein chunki 1969.
jenings is a choti nagar in and the mohalla seat of Jefferson davis mohalla, louisiana, sanyukt States, near jhil Charles.
The janasankhyikee thi 10,383 at the 2010 census, a choti decline isse the 2000 tabulation.
the nagar is 68 pratishat shwet.
Jennings is the principal nagar of the jenings Micropolitan Statistical Area, jisase shaamil sab of Jefferson davis Parish.
It is also bhaag of the larger jhil charles-jennings sanyukt Statistical kshetrafal.
nanotechnology ( sometimes shortened to `` nanotech '' ) is the manipulation of padaarth on an parmaanu or aanvik scale.
the earliest, faili description of nanotechnology referred to the particular technological lakshya of precisely manipulating anu or anuon for fabrication of macroscale utpaada, bhi abhi referred to as aanvik nanotechnology.
A more generalized varnan of nanotechnology thi subsequently sthapit by the neshnal nanotechnology pahal, jisase defines nanotechnology as the herpher of matter with at least ek dimension sized isse 1 to 100 nanometers.
is paribhaasha reflects the fact ki quantum mechanical effects are mahatvapurn at this quantum-realm scale, or so the definition shifted isse a particular technological lakshya to a shodh shrenee inclusive of sab prakaar of shodh or technologies ki deal with the khaas gun of padaarth ki occur neeche the die aakaar threshold.
it is isliye common to see the bahuvachan rup `` nanotechnologies '' as khub as `` nanoscale technologies '' to refer to the broad dayera of shodh or anuprayog jinaki common trait is aakaar.
kuki of the kismein of sambhavit anuprayog ( sahit audyogic or sainya ), sarkarein have invested arabon of dollar in nanotechnology shodh.
through iske neshnal Nanotechnology pahal, the uese rai invested 3.7 arab dollars.
The European sangh has invested 1.2 arab or japani 750 lakh dollar.
nanotechnology as defined by size is naturally very vyapak, including field of vigyaan as diverse as surface vigyaan, sashulk rasayan, molecular jeevigyaan, semiconductor bhautikee, microfabrication, etc.
The sambhddha shodh or applications hai equally diverse, ranging isse ekstansion of conventional yantra bhautikee to completely new approaches based upon aanvik self-assembly, isse vikasshil nai saamagree saath aayam on the nanoscale to sidhaa control of matter on the parmaanu scale.
vaigyanikon philhal bahes the bhavishya implications of nanotechnology.
Nanotechnology may be able to create anek nai materials or devices saath a vishaal dayera of anuprayog, aise as in ayurvigyaan, electronics, biomaterials or urja utpaadan.
on the anya haath, nanotechnology uthaata anek of the vahi issues as any new technology, sahit concerns about the toxicity or environmental impact of nanomaterials, and unke sambhavit prabhaav on vaishvik arthshaastra, as well as speculation parichay vibhinn doomsday scenarios.
These chintaaen have led to a debate among vakaalat samooh and sarkarein on whether special regulation of nanotechnology is warranted.
