the pad Eastern Bloc or communist Bloc refers to the purv communist states of central and purvi europea, generally the soviet sangh or the countries of the Warsaw Pact.
the sharten communist bloc or soviet bloc yahood bhi prayukt to denote groupings of rajya lakeer saath the soviet sangh, haalanki these sharten might shaamil rajya baahar central and purvi europea.
the nai jersey gubernatorial chunaav of 2009 took place on navambar 3, 2009.
loktantric Governor jon Corzine thi running for a duusari pad or thi hone challenged by republican kris christy, swatantra christopher Daggett or nau others, in jod to anek write-in ummidavaar.
christy won the chunaav, saath parichay 48.5 pratishat of the vote, to 44.9 pratishat liye Corzine or 5.8 pratishat liye daggett.
christy jiti the largest hashia liye a first term republican chunki 1969.
Christie assumed daftar on January 19, 2010.
is was the pehla chunaav to fill the newly nirmit daftar of leftinent rajyapal.
The candidates liye rajyapal or leftinent governor were joined saath as a single chunaav, so that matadaata kiya nahin have the opportunity to vibhajit the tikat.
Kim guadagno, christy 's kaaryshil mate, became nai jersey 's pehla leftinent governor following her udghaatan.
Health parvaah in the sanyukt rajya is provided by anek pruthak sanghathan.
Health parvaah suvidhaayen hai largely swaamitv or operated by private sector vyavsaayon.
swasthya insurance for public sector employees is primarily provided by the sarkari.
60-65 % of healthcare praavdhaan and spending aata isse programs aise as medicare, medicaid, tricare, the children 's swasthya Insurance kaarykram, or the Veterans Health prashasan.
sabase of the population antargat 65 is insured by unke or a family member 's employer, kuch khride swasthya bime on unke apana, or the shesh are uninsured.
of 17 high-income deshon padhai by the National Institutes of swasthya in 2013, the sanyukt rajya thi at or near the bottom in infant mortality, dil or fefdon disease, sexually transmitted infections, adolescent pregnancies, choton, homicides, or daron of disability.
saath, aise mudde place the u.S. at the bottom of the suchi for jivan expectancy.
on average, a u.S. purush can be expected to sajiv lagbhag chaar fewer saalo than those in the top-ranked desh.
according to the sansar swasthya sanghathan ( jo ), the United rajya kharch adhik on swasthya parvaah prati capita ( $ 7,146 ), or more on swasthya parvaah as percentage of its jidipi ( 15.2 % ), than any anya swadesh in 2008.
the rashtramandal nidhi kramit the sanyukt rajya pichhlaa in the visheshta of health parvaah among samaan deshon, and tip U.S. parvaah laagat the most.
the u.S. janasankhyikee beuro reported ki 49.9 lakh nivaasiyon, 16.3 % of the population, yahood uninsured in 2010 ( up isse 49.0 million nivaasiyon, 16.1 % of the janasankhyikee, in 2009 ).
a 2004 santhaan of Medicine ( iom ) rapat said : `` The United rajya is among the few industrialized raashtra in the sansar ki karata nahin guarantee abhigam to swasthya parvaah liye iske janasankhyikee. ''
A 2004 oecd rapat said : `` saath the exception of mexico, Turkey, and the sanyukt rajya, sab OECD deshon had hasil saarvbhaumik or near-universal ( at tanik 98.4 % insured ) kawarej of their populations by 1990. ''
a 2010 rapat observed ki lack of swasthya insurance kalyankari roughly 48,000 anaavashyak mauton prayek saal in the United rajya.
In 2007, 62.1 % of filers liye bankruptcies claimed high chikitsa expenses.
a 2013 padhai found that about 25 % of sab varisht nagarikon ghoshit diwaliyapan due to chikitsa kharch, or 43 % hai forced to mortgage or bechein unke praathmik residence.
On kooch 23, 2010, the Patient suraksha or sasti Care adhinium ( ppaca ) became vidhi, providing for pramukh parivartan in health bime.
in physiology, body jal is the jal saamagree of the insaan deh.
a significant bhinn of the insaan body is jal.
Arthur guyton 's textbook of chikitsa physiology states ki `` the kul raashi of jal in a man of ausat vazan ( 70 kilograms ) is lagbhag 40 litre, averaging 57 pratishat of uske kul deh vazan.
in a newborn shishu, is may be as unchi as 75 pratishat of the deh weight, lakin it progressively decreases isse janam to boodha aayu, most of the ghati occurring dauraan the pehla 10 saalo of jivan.
bhi, motopa decreases the pratishat of jal in the deh, sometimes to as kam as 45 pratishat ''.
ye aankade are sankhyikeey averages, so hai illustrative, and jaise sab biostatistics, hoga vary with bate like prakaar of janasankhyikee, aayu and kramank of logon sampled, or methodology.
so there is nahin, or can nahin be, a figure that is exactly the vahi for sab people, for is or any anya physiological measure.
liye udhaaharan, jackson 's ( 1985 ) anatomy & physiology liye Nurses gives a figure of 60 % liye the proportion of body-weight attributable to water, jisase approximates guyton 's 57 %.
In diseased rajya jahaan deh jal is prabhavit, the compartment or compartments ki have badla can give clues to the prakruti of the problem.
deh water is regulated by hormone, sahit anti-diuretic hormone ( ad ), aldosterone or alindi natriuretic peptid.
prati Netter 's Atlas of insaan physiology, deh jal is tutaa bas into the following compartmentres:
intracellular drav ( 2/3 of deh jal ).
prati guyton, in a deh containing 40 litre of fluid, parichay 25 litres is intracellular, jisase amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ), band paryaapt to the 2/3 niyam of angootha.
jackson 's granth states 70 % of deh drav is intracellular.
extracellular fluid ( 1/3 of deh jal ).
Per guyton 's illustration, liye a 40 litre deh, parichay 15 litres is extracellular, which amounts to 37.5 % again, is is band to the 1/3 niyam of angootha cited yahan.
plasma ( 1/5 of extracellular drav ).
Per guyton 's illustration, of the 15 litres of extracellular fluid, plasma awaz averages 3 litre.
is amounts to 20 %, the vahi as per Netter 's atlas.
antaraleey drav ( 4/5 of extracellular drav )
transcellular fluid ( a.k.a. `` teesraa space, '' normally upekshit in calculations )
contained andar organs, aise as the jathrantra, pramastishcameru, udaravarniya, or ocular fluids.
Self-esteem is a pad prayukt in psychology to pratibimbit a vyakti 's overall emotional moolyankan of his or uske apana laayak.
it is a nirnay of oneself as well as an ravaiya toward the swah.
self-esteem encompasses manyataon ( liye udhaaharan, `` I am competent, '' `` I am worthy '' ) or bhav such as triumph, despair, abhimaan and shame.
smith or mackie define it by saying `` The self-concept is kayaa we socho parichay the swah ; self-esteem, is the dhanatmak or rinatmak evaluations of the self, as in kaisaa we mahasoos about it. ''
self-esteem is also gyaat as the evaluative aayam of the swah that includes jajbaat of worthiness, prides or discouragement.
ek 's self-esteem is bhi closely associated saath self-consciousness.
self-esteem is a disposition ki a person rai jisase represents unke nirnyon of their own worthiness.
In the mid-1960s, Morris rosenberg and social-learning pairokaar defined self-esteem as a nijee laayak or worthiness.
nathaniel branden in 1969 paribhaashit self-esteem as `` the anubhav of hone competent to cope saath the moulik chunautiyaan of jivan and hone worthy of sukh. ''
according to branden, self-esteem is the yoga of self-confidence ( a feeling of personal capacity ) and self-respect ( a ahsaas of nijee laayak ).
it exists as a consequence of the implicit nirnay ki prayek vyakti has of unke kshamta to face life 's chunautiyaan, to samajhe or solve problems, or unke sahi to achieve sukh, or be die aadar.
As a soshal manovaigyanik construct, self-esteem is aakarshak kuki shodhakartaaon have conceptualized it as an influential predictor of praasangik outcomes, aise as academik achievement ( daldal 1990 ) or exercise bartaav ( hagger et al. 1998 ).
in jod, self-esteem rai bhi maharoom treated as an mahatvapurn nishkarsh due to iske close sambandh with manovaigyanik well-being ( daldal 1989 ).
Self-esteem can lagu specifically to a particular dimension ( liye udhaaharan, `` I maananaa i am a shubh lekhak and I feel prasann parichay ki '' ) or a vaishvik extent ( liye udhaaharan, `` i believe i am a karaab vyakti, or mahasoos karaab parichay myself in saamaanya '' ).
Psychologists usually lihaaz self-esteem as an enduring personality characteristic ( `` trait '' self-esteem ), haalanki saamaanya, short-term visangatiyaan ( `` rajya '' self-esteem ) bhi maujuud.
samanaarthi or near-synonyms of self-esteem shaamil : self-worth, self-regard, self-respect, or self-integrity.
A masonic awaas, often termed a nijee awaas or Constituent awaas, is the moulik organisational ikai of Freemasonry.
prayek new awaas jarur be warranted or chartered by a grand Lodge, lakin is vishay to iske disha only in enforcing the prakashit Constitution of the kshetradhikaar.
by excepshan the teen surviving lodges that formed the world 's pehla gyaat grand awaas in landan ( aaj pukaara the sanyukt grand awaas of england ) have the adwitiya privilege to operate as samay immemorial i.e. bagaiyr such warrant ; only ek other lodge operates without a warrant - is is the Grand Stewards ' Lodge in landan, haalanki it is not also hakdaar to the `` samay immemorial '' title.
a freemason is generally hakdaar to vizit any awaas, in koi jurisdiction ( i.e. under koi grand awaas ) in amity saath his apana.
in kuch jurisdictions this visheshadhikaar is restricted to nipun masons ( that is, Freemasons jo have attained the anukram 's teesraa oopaadhi ).
He is pehla usually jaruri to jaanch, or certify, the niyamitata of the sambandh of the awaas - or be samarth to satisfy that Lodge of uske niyamitata of membership.
freemasons ekatrit together as a awaas to work the teen basic Degrees of Entered prashikshu, fellowcraft or nipun Mason.

A quotation is the repetition of ek abhivyakti as bhaag of another one, visheshkar jab the quoted abhivyakti is well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to its original sorce, or it is indicated by ( punctuated saath ) quotation marks.
a quotation can bhi refer to the doharaaya use of ikai of koi other rup of abhivyakti, visheshkar bhaag of artistic works : tatv of a painting, drishyon isse a movie or sections from a musical sangyojan.

blike pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering bel in the parivaar piperaceae, cultivated liye its fal, which is praayah dried or prayukt as a spice or seasoning.
The fruit, gyaat as a peppercorn jab sukhi, is lagbhag in diameter, dark red jab fully mature, or, like sab drupes, contains a single beej.
Peppercorns, or the ground pepper niklaa from unhen, may be described bas as pepper, or adhik precisely as black pepper ( pakaaya and dried unripe fal ), green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) or white pepper ( sukhi pake beej ).
Black pepper is deshi to dakshin india, and is extensively cultivated vahin or elsewhere in tropical regions.
philhal vietnam is the world 's largest producer or niryaatak of pepper, producing 34 % of the sansar 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008.
Dried maidan pepper rai maharoom prayukt since pracheenta for dono iske flavor and as a medicine.
Black pepper is the sansar 's sabase traded spice.
It is one of the most aam spices added to europea bhojan or iske vanshajon.
The spiciness of blike pepper is due to the rasinic piperine, not to be uljhan saath the capsaicin ki gives fleshy mirch theirs.
It is in the modern world, praayah yugma saath namak.

a aag hydrant ( also gyaat colloquially as a aag plag in the sanyukt rajya or as a johny pump in nai York City ), is an kriyasheel aag suraksha maap, or a sorce of jal provided in sabase shahari, suburban or rural areas saath nagarpalika jal seva to enable agnishman to tap into the nagarpalika water supply to assist in extinguishing a fire.
imaaraten nikat a hydrant may qualify liye an bime chhot chunki agnishman chahie be samarth to adhik rapidly buja a fire on the insured property.
The avadharana of aag plugs dates to at tanik the 17th century.
This thi a samay jab firefighters responding to a call would khudaai bas to the lakdi jal mens and hastily bore a hole to surakshit water to lado fir.
the water hota bharan the chhed bananaa a asthai khub, and be transported isse the well to the aag by baaltee brigades or, baad, by hand-pumped aag ingine.
The holes yahood tab plugged with stoppers, saamanytah redwood, jisase over time aae to be gyaat as aag plugs.
the sthaan of the plag hota praayah be ankit or marked so ki it could be reused in bhavishya fir.
This is the sorce of the colloquial pad aag plag still used liye aag hydrants aaj.
baad the Great aag of landan in 1666, the city santhaapit jal mens saath holes drilled at intervals, equipped with risers, allowing an access point to the lakdi aag plugs isse gali str.
the avishkaar of a post- or pillar-type aag hydrant is generally credited to fredrick Graff sr., Chief Engineer of the philadelphia jal Works around the year 1801.
it had a combination hose/faucet outlet and was of `` wet bairal '' dizine saath the valve in the sheersh.
it is kaha that graff held the first patent liye a fire hydrant, lakin is can nahin be verified kuki the patent office in washington D.C. caught on aag in 1836 destroying many patent records from ki kaal in the process.
The adhyaksh of the ganatantr of dakshin africa is the head of rajya and head of sarkari antargat dakshin Africa 's samvidhan.
isse 1961 to 1994, the sir of state thi pukaara the State adhyaksh.
the adhyaksh is nirvaachit by sadasyon of the National Assembly, the nimnatar house of parliament, and is usually the netaa of the largest party, jisase rai been the African neshnal Congress since the pehla non-racial elections yahood yojit on 27 April 1994.
The bhoomika thi originally santhaapit to be pruthak isse the abhi defunct bhoomika of pradhan mantri, lakin the do roles yahood milaayaa in the 1983 samvidhan jisase specified a four-year pad of office.
The 1993 or later constitutions had the adhyaksh 's samay in daftar to two five-year terms.
the first adhyaksh to be nirvaachit antargat the new samvidhan was nelson mandela, or the incumbent adhyaksh is yaaqub zuma.

Along with Thabo mbeki, the last State President, f.w. de klerk bhi parosa as Deputy adhyaksh, in uske capacity as the netaa of the neshnal Party jisase was the second-largest party in the new parliament.
lakin de Klerk later resigned or gai into opposition saath uske party.
a voluntary gathbandhan government continues to exist antargat the nai constitution ( adopted in 1996 ), although vahin have maharoom no appointments of opposition politicians to the post of dipti president.
khaas shiksha or khaas needs shiksha is the shiksha of vidhyaarthee saath special needs in a rasta ki addresses the vidhyaarthee ' vyaktigat matbhed and needs.
Ideally, this process involves the individually niojit or systematically monitored vyavastha of shikshan procedures, adapted equipment or materials, accessible jamaavat, and anya interventions designed to help learners with khaas needs achieve a ucchtar level of nijee self-sufficiency or kamyaabi in skool or community than hota be uplabdhiyaan if the chaatr yahood tabhi die abhigam to a theth kaksha shiksha.
aam khaas needs include challenges saath siikhnaa, sanchaar chunautiyaan, emotional or behavioral vikaar, physical disabilities, and developmental vikaar.
vidhyaarthee with ye kinds of khaas needs hai sambhavit to benefit from additional shaikshanik sevaayen such as alag approaches to shikshan, use of praudyogiki, a specifically adapted teaching area, or sansaadhan room.
Intellectual giftedness is a antar in learning and can bhi laabh isse specialized shikshan takneekon or alag shaikshanik kaarykram, lakin the pad `` khaas shiksha '' is generally prayukt to specifically indicate instruction of students jinaki khaas needs reduce unke ability to sikh independently or in an ordinary classroom, or gifted shiksha is sambhala separately.
In sabase viksit deshon, shikshak are modifying teaching vidhi or environments so ki the adhiktam kramank of students hai parosa in saamaanya education environments.
khaas shiksha in viksit deshon is often regarded kam as a `` place '' or adhik as `` a range of sevaayen, uplabdhiyaan in every skool. ''
sangyojan can reduce social stigmas or improve academik uplabdhi liye anek vidhyaarthee.
The vipareet of khaas shiksha is general shiksha.
saamaanya shiksha is the standard curriculum presented saath standard shikshan vidhi or bagaiyr atirikt supports.

a nipun of thik kala ( mfa, m.f.a. ) is a graduate degree typically requiring 2–3 saalo of postgraduate padhai beyond the snaatak 's degree ( BFA ), haalanki the pad of padhai hoga vary by country or by vishvavidhyalayon.
the MFA is a rachanaatmak oopaadhi praayah awarded as a terminal degree in vizual kala, creative writing, filmmaking, nrity, or theatre and anya performing kala.
coursework is primarily of an lagu or performing prakruti saath the kaarykram often culminating in a pramukh kaary or performance.
nipun of Fine kala kaarykram have generally jaruri a snaatak 's degree prior to pravesh, lakin anek do nahin aavashyaktaa that the undergraduate major be the vahi as the MFA field of padhai.
The sabase mahatvapurn admissions requirement has often been a sample portpholio or a performance audishan.
the Master of thik kala differs isse the Master of Arts in ki the mfa, while an academik program, centers around abhyaas in the particular field, whereas kaarykram leading to the ma praayah bich on the scholarly, academik, or najuk padhai of the field.
Additionally, in the sanyukt States, an mfa is recognized as a terminal oopaadhi liye practitioners of vizual art, dizine, nrity, theatre, film/video, New media, or rachanaatmak likhane - arth ki it is mana to be the ucchtam oopaadhi in iske field, or is prayukt as a nunatam yogyata to be samarth to lagu to become a Full-Time praadhyaapak shikshan at the vishvavidhyalayon str in ye disciplines.
There hai exceptions to is maanak in the kala, notably in the maamla of music pradarshan, jahaan the MFA is not dekhi as a terminal oopaadhi in the context of the more manakikrut dma oopaadhi.
It is bhi najuk to note that in the byaaj of extending the connection between rachanaatmak production and continued academik shodh, kuch vishvavidhyalayon have sthapit practice-based ph.d kaarykram in field such as creative likhane, vizual arts, nai media, design or theater.
jabaki this rai had an prabhaav in Creative likhane, or to a lesser extent in dizine or nai media, the influx of graduates isse practice-based phd kaarykram rai nahin appreciably changed the standard liye the MFA as the terminal oopaadhi in most kala disciplines yet.
is is an jari contentious topic, or is the frequent vishay of academic panels, visheshkar at the salanaa College art Association sammelan.
The CAA 2008 dishanirdesh regarding the mfa strongly re-affirms ki the PhD is nahin required as a terminal oopaadhi in the visual kala.
the parmaanu bombings of the shaharon of hiroshima or Nagasaki in japani yahood conducted by the sanyukt States dauraan the final charan of sansar War II in 1945.
the two kaarykram hai the only upyog of nabhikeey hathiyaar in yuddh to date.
following a firebombing campaign that nasht many Japanese shaharon, the Allies prepared for a costly invasion of japani.
the yuddh in europea ended when naaji germany signed its yantra of aatmasamarpan on 8 may, but the prashanth War continued.
Together with the sanyukt kingdom or the ganatantr of china, the sanyukt rajya pukaara for a surrender of japani in the Potsdam Declaration on 26 july 1945, threatening japani saath `` sanket or utter vinaash ''.
The japani government upekshit is ultimatum, or the sanyukt States deployed do nuclear weapons viksit by the Manhattan project.
American airmen dropped Little Boy on the nagar of hiroshima on 6 August 1945, followed by mote Man over Nagasaki on 9 agast.
bheetar the first do to chaar months of the bombings, the adhi prabhaav maare 90,000–166,000 people in hiroshima or 60,000–80,000 in Nagasaki, saath roughly half of the deaths in prayek city occurring on the pehla day.
the Hiroshima prifekchar health department estimated that, of the logon jo died on the day of the explosion, 60 % died from flash or jwaala burns, 30 % from falling malba and 10 % isse anya kalyankari.
During the following months, vishaal sankhyaayein died isse the prabhaav of burns, radiation sickness, or anya choton, compounded by beemaari.
in a us estimate of the kul taatkaalik or choti pad kaaran of maut, 15–20 % died from vikiran beemaari, 20–30 % from burns, or 50–60 % isse anya choton, compounded by beemaari.
in both shaharon, most of the dead yahood civilians, although hiroshima tha a sizeable garrison.
On 15 agast, chah dinon baad the bombing of nagasaki, japani announced iske surrender to the allies, signing the yantra of aatmasamarpan on 2 sitambar, officially ending sansar War ii.
the bombings led, in bhaag, to post-war japani 's adopting teen non-nuclear Principles, forbidding the swadesh isse nabhikeey armament.
The bhoomika of the bombings in japani 's aatmasamarpan and unke ethical auchity hai still debated.
mohandas Karamchand gandhi ( ; 2 October 1869 – 30 January 1948 ), commonly gyaat as mahatma Gandhi, was the preeminent netaa of Indian nationalism in british-ruled india.
Employing non-violent civil disobedience, gandhi led India to independence or inspired movements liye non-violence, civil adhikaron or swatantraaa aarpaar the sansar.
the son of a senior sarkari aadhikarik, gandhi thi born or uthaaya in a hindu bania jatiyaan in tateey Gujarat, or prashikshit in vidhi in landan.
Gandhi became prasiddh by lard liye the civil rights of muslim or hindu Indians in dakshin africa, using nai takneekon of non-violent civil disobedience that he viksit.
returning to india in 1915, he niyat parichay organising peasants to protest excessive land-taxes.
A lifelong pratidwandi of `` sampradayikta `` ( i.e. basing politics on dharm ) he reached out widely to all religious samooh.
he became a netaa of musalmaan protesting the declining status of the Caliphate.
Assuming netritv of the bhartiya neshnal Congress in 1921, gandhi led deshbhar campaigns for easing garibi, expanding women 's adhikaron, building religious and jaateey sauhaard, samaapti asprishyata, increasing economic self-reliance, and upar sab for achieving Swaraj —the swatantraaa of india isse angrejon hukumat.
Gandhi led Indians in protesting the neshnal namak kar with the Dandi Salt kooch in 1930, or baad in demanding the angrejon to tatkaal chodo india in 1942, during World yuddh ii.
he thi imprisoned liye ki and liye numerous anya rajnatik offenses over the saalo.
gandhi sought to abhyaas non-violence and truth in all paristhitiyon, and advocated that anya do the vahi.
he dekhi the gaanvon as the core of the true india and prachaarit self-sufficiency ; he kiya nahin support the industrialization kaarykram of uske shishy jawaharlal Nehru.
he jiya modestly in a self-sufficient residential community and wore the traditional bhartiya dhoti and chadar, woven saath dhaage he tha hand spun on a charkha.
uske mukhya rajnatik enemy in britain thi winston churchill, jo ridiculed him as a `` half-naked fakir. ''
he was a dedicated shaakaahaari, and undertook long fasts as arthath of dono self-purification or rajnatik mobilization.
in his last saal, unhappy at the partition of india, gandhi worked to roke the carnage between musalmaan, hinduon and sikhon that raged in the kinaaraa kshetrafal between india or pakistani.
He thi assassinated on 30 janvari 1948 by nathuram godse jo thought gandhi was too sympathetic to India 's Muslims.
30 January is observed as shahido ' Day in India.
The honorific mahatma ( `` great aatma '' ) was lagu to use by 1914.
in India he thi bhi called Bapu ( `` pita '' ).
he is gyaat in india as the pita of the swadesh ; uske janmdiwas, 2 aktubar, is commemorated there as gandhi Jayanti, a neshnal avkaash, or world-wide as the antarrashtriya Day of non-violence.
gandhi 's philosophy thi nahin theoretical lakin one of vyaavhaariktawaad, ki is, practicing uske siddhanth in the pal.
poocha to de a message to the logon, he hota respond, `` my jivan is my sandesh. ''
Joan crockerd ( kooch 23, ca. 1904 – may 10, 1977 ), born lucille Fay lesueur, was an amareeki abhinetri in filmi, television and theatre.
starting as a nartki in traveling natya companiyaan pehle debuting on broadway, Crawford thi hastakshrit to a motion chitra contract by metro-goldwyn-mayer in 1925.
initially kunthit by the aakaar or quality of uske bhaag, crockerd began a abhiyaan of self-publicity and became nationally gyaat as a flapper by the samaapt of the 1920s.
in the 1930s, crockerd 's fame rivaled, or later outlasted, mgm colleagues norma Shearer and greta garbo.
crockerd praayah nibhaai mehnatee yang women who dhundhen romance and vittiya success.
ye `` rags-to-riches '' kahaniyaan yahood well received by avsaad -era audiences or were lokapriy saath mahilaon.
crockerd became one of hollywood 's most prominent film sitaron or ek of the highest sashulk women in the sanyukt States, but uske films began khone dhan and by the samaapt of the 1930s wo thi labeled `` baksaa daftar zehar ''.
baad an absence of nearly two years from the screen, Crawford staged a vaapasi by starring in Mildred Pierce ( 1945 ), liye jisase she jiti the academy puraskaar liye behtareen abhinetri.
in 1955, wo became shaamil with the Pepsi-Cola Company through uske vivaah to company adhyaksh alfred steel.
baad uske maut in 1959, crockerd thi nirvaachit to fill his rikti on the board of directors lakin thi forcibly ritred in 1973.
wo jari acting in filmi or television regularly through the 1960s, jab uske pradarshan became kam ; baad the relies of the British horror filmi Trog in 1970, Crawford ritred isse the screen.
following a public rup in 1974, baad jisase unflattering photographs yahood prakashit, crockerd withdrew from public life or became increasingly reclusive jabatak her maut in 1977.
crockerd shaadishuda chaar times.
uske first three vivaah ended in talaak ; the pichhlaa ended saath the maut of husband Alfred steel.
wo apanaaya paanch children, one of jisko was reclaimed by uske birth maan.
crockerd 's sambandh saath her do older children, christina or christopher, were acrimonious.
Crawford disinherited the do or, baad crockerd 's maut, christina likhaa a `` tell-all '' sansmaran, Mommie dearest, in jisase wo kathith a lifelong pattern of physical or emotional gaali perpetrated by crockerd.
wo thi voted the tenth mahanatam female star in the itihaas of American cinema by the amareeki Film santhaan.

tonneau cover ( or ) describes a mushkil or naram cover prayukt to protect unoccupied yatri seats in a convertible or roadster, or the cargo bed in a pikup trek.
Hard tonneau cover open by a hinging or folding mechanism jabaki naram covers kholen by rolling up.
The tonneau cover is prayukt to conceal cargo.
jab the cover is khinchaa out, it keeps vasteen out of the sun and provides atirikt suraksha by keeping nijee vasteen out of sight, as well as shielding the driver isse drishy.
twitor is an online soshal networking seva or microblogging seva ki enables iske upayokta to send or read text-based sandesh of up to 140 characters, known as `` tweets ''.
twitor was nirmit in kooch 2006 by joker dorsey or by july, the soshal networking site thi launched.
the seva rapidly gained vishwavyaapee lokapriyata, saath over 500 lakh registered upayokta as of 2012, generating over 340 lakh tweets rose or handlling over 1.6 billion search prashnon prati din.
chunki its launch, twitor rai become one of the ten most visited websiton on the antarjaal, and rai been varnit as `` the sms of the Internet. ''
apnjikrut users can padhaa tweets, jabaki panjikrut upayokta can post tweets through the website interfes, sms, or a dayera of eps liye mobile divaais.
Twitter inc. is aadhaarit in San francisco, saath atirikt sarwar or offices in nai York nagar, boston, or san antonio.
the hangover is a 2009 amareeki kamedi film, co-produced and directed by tod phillips and likhaa by jon Lucas or scot moore.
it is the pehla film of the hangover matadhikaar.the filmi stars bradli kupar, ed helms, zach Galifianakis, hethar graham, justin Bartha, and Jeffrey tambor.
the Hangover tells the story of phil wenneck, stu Price or alan garnor, who safar to las vegas liye a snaatak party to celebrate unke friend dag billings ' impending vivaah.
however, phil, Stu or alan have no memory of the previous night 's kaarykram and must dhundhen dag before the vivaah can lo place.
Lucas or moore likhaa the script baad karypalika nirmaataa kris bender 's dost disappeared or tha a vishaal bill after hone sent to a strip club.
baad lucas and moore bechi it to the studio for $ 2 lakh, philips or jeremi Garelick rewrote the script to include a tiger as khub as a subplot involving a baby or a police kruger, or bhi sahit boxer mike Tyson.
Filming took place in Nevada liye 15 dinon, and dauraan filming, the teen pramukh abhinaytaon ( kupar, helms or galifianakis ) formed a dosti.
the hangover thi released on june 5, 2009, becoming a najuk or commercial kamyaabi.
it became the tenth-highest-grossing filmi of 2009, saath a vishwavyaapee sakal of over us $ 467 lakh.
Critics praised the filmi 's comedic drushtikon lakin criticized it liye its vulgarity.
The filmi won the sunahari globe Award liye Best gati chitra – Musical or kamedi, or received multiple anya accolades.
It is the tenth-highest-grossing filmi of 2009 in the sansar, as khub as the duusari highest-grossing R-rated comedy kabhi in the sanyukt rajya, surpassing a ricard previously held by bevarli Hills Cop liye almost 25 saalo or baad hone surpassed by Ted in 2012.
out of all R-rated films, it is the third highest-grossing ever in the u.S., peeche only the junun of the messiah or the metrics reloaded.
A sequel, the Hangover Part ii, thi released in 2011, or a teesraa or final filmi, the hangover bhaag III, is niyat liye relies in 2013.
kaarykram involving meiosis, prardashit chromosomal crossover
meiosis ( ) is a special type of cell division necessary for yon janan in eukaryotes.
the koshikaayen utpaadit by meiosis are gametes or spores.
in many jeevon, sahit sab animals or jameen paudhe ( lakin nahin some anya samooh such as fungi ), gamit hai called sperm or anda koshikaayen.
whilst the prakram of meiosis bears a number of similarities saath the 'life-cycle ' koshika prabhag prakram of samasutran, it differs in two mahatvapurn respects:
the gunasutron in meiosis undergo a recombination jisase shuffles the jeenon producing a alag genetic sangyojan in prayek gamete, compared saath the co-existence of prayek of the two separate pairs of prayek chromosome ( ek received isse prayek janak ) in each koshika jisase parinaam from mitosis.
the nishkarsh of meiosis is potentially chaar ( genetically adwitiya ) haploid koshikaayen, compared saath the two ( genetically ekasmaan ) dwiguneet cells utpaadit from samasutran.
Meiosis begins saath ek dwiguneet cell containing do nakal of each chromosome —one isse the organism 's maan or ek isse iske pita.
The cell divides twice, potentially producing up to chaar agunit koshikaayen containing one nakal of prayek chromosome.
( `` potentially '' kuki in kuch maamle, aise as the gathan of oocytes in mammals, only ek of the sambhavit four haploid koshikaayen survives. )
In animals the agunit cell resulting isse meiosis is a purush or female gamete.
prayek of the resulting gunasutron in the gamete koshikaayen is a adwitiya mishran of matra or paternal DNA, resulting in offspring ki hai genetically pruthak isse either janak.
is gives rise to genetic vividhta in sexually reproducing populations.
is genetic vividhta can provide the vibhinnata of shaareerik or behavioural gun ( phenotypes ) upon jisase prakritik chayan can act, lakin, as varnit neeche in Section 6, utpatti and falan of meiosis, the genetic vividhta may be largely a by-product of the samajaat recombination ki is primarily employed liye iske diene marammat falan dauraan meiosis.
it is also noteworthy ki during meiosis, vishisht jeenon hai adhik highly transcribed, and these hai pukaara the meiome, the term prayukt in kaaryaatmak jinomix for the meiotic transcriptome.
meiosis is a key visheshta for sab sexually reproducing eukaryotes in jisase homologous chromosome pairing, antargrathan or recombination occur.
in jod to damdaar meiotic stage-specific expression of mRNA ( the meiome ), however, there hai bhi pervasive translational niyantran ( e.g. selective upyog of preformed mRNA ), regulating the param meiotic stage-specific protein expression of jeenon during meiosis.
Thus, both the meiome or translational controls determine the vyapak restructuring of meiotic cells needed to carry out meiosis.
prior to the meiosis prakram the koshika 's gunasutron are duplicated by a round of DNA replication, creating from the matra or paitruk sanskaran of prayek chromosome ( homologs ) do sateek nakal, sistar chromatids, sanlagn at the centromere region.
in the beginning of meiosis the maternal or paitruk homologs jodi to prayek anya.
tab they typically exchange parts by homologous recombination leading to crossovers of DNA between the matra or paitruk sanskaran of the chromosome.
spindle machhlee bind to the centromeres of each jodi of homologs and arrange the pairs at the spindle equator.
Then the fibers khincho the recombined homologs to vipareet danda of the koshika.
As the gunasutron move dur from the bich the koshika divides into do daughter koshikaayen, each containing a agunit number of chromosomes rachit of do chromatids.
baad the recombined maternal or paitruk homologs have separated into the do daughter koshikaayen, a second round of cell division occurs.
vahin meiosis ends as the do sistar chromatids bananaa up prayek homolog are separated or move into ek of the four resulting gamete cells.
Upon fertilization, liye example jab a shukranu enters an egg koshika, do gamete koshikaayen utpaadit by meiosis fuse.
the gamete isse the maan and the gamete from the pita each contribute one half of the set of chromosomes ki mek up the nai aulad 's genome.
meiosis upyog anek of the vahi mechanisms as samasutran, a prakaar of koshika prabhag used by eukaryotes jaise paudhe and pashu to vibhajit ek koshika into do ekasmaan beti koshikaayen.
in all plants or in anek protists meiosis parinaam in the gathan of bijaanuon : agunit koshikaayen ki can divide vegetatively bagaiyr undergoing fertilization.
mukkebaazi ( pugilism, prize lard, the sweet vigyaan or in unani pygmachia ) is a martial art or combat sport in jisase two logon engage in a pratiyogita of shakti, gati, reflexes, sahansheeltaa and hoga by throwing ghunse saath gloved hands.
amateur mukkebaazi is an Olympic or rashtramandal khel and is a common fixture in sabase of the pramukh international khel - it also rai iske own sansar championships.
mukkebaazi is supervised by a referi over a shrenee of one- to three-minute intervals called rounds.
The parinaam is decided jab an pratidwandi is deemed incapable to continue by a referee, is disqualified liye todakar a rule, resigns by phenkna in a tauliya, or is sunaaya the vijeta or haara aadhaarit on the nyaayadhishon ' scorecards at the end of the pratiyogita.
the janam ghanta of boxing as a khel may be iske acceptance by the pracheen unaniyon as an Olympic khel as jaldi as 688 BC.
mukkebaazi viksit isse 16th- and 18th-century prizefights, largely in great britain, to the forerunner of aadhunik mukkebaazi in the mid-19th sadi, again initially in great britain and baad in the sanyukt rajya.
in 2004, iespien ranked mukkebaazi as the sabase mushkil sport in the sansar.
Agreement or concord happens when a word parivartan form depending on the anya shabd to jisase it relates.
It is an udhaaharan of inflection, or usually involves bananaa the maan of kuch vyakaranik shrenee ( aise as ling or vyakti ) `` sahamat '' between alag shabd or parts of the vaakya.
liye udhaaharan, in Standard angrezi, ek may kah i am or he is, lakin nahin `` I is '' or `` he am ''.
is is kuki the vyakaran of the bhashaa requires that the kriya and iske vishay agree in person.
The pronouns I or he hai first or teesraa person kramshah, as are the kriya forms am or is.
The kriya form jarur be chaynit so ki it rai the vahi person as the subject.
the anubandh aadhaarit on overt grammatical shrenee as upar is aupchaarik anubandh, in contrast to notional agreement, jisase is aadhaarit on meaning.
liye udhaaharan, the phrase the sanyukt rajya is treated as ekvachan for uddeshy of agreement, even haalanki it is formally bahuvachan.

sthaan in tunnels, khaanon, tahkhaanon, khoda chhed ( bhi saath open sky ), antargat water, antargat ice, or existing temporarily as a result of ebbing of sea tide ityadi. are not shaamil.

dibbi Macomber ( born aktubar 22, 1948 in yakima, washington ) is a best-selling amareeki lekhak of over 150 romance novels or samakaleen mahilaon 's fiction.
over 140 lakh copies of her kitabe are in print throughout the world, or chaar have become made-for-TV-movies.

the population thi 41,567 at the 2010 census.
the jatiyaan jhooth to the west of balteemor along the city 's kinaaraa.

A vakil, according to blike 's vidhi shabdkosh, is `` a vyakti siikhe in the law ; as an attorney, counsel or solicitor ; a vyakti jo is practicing vidhi. ''
Law is the pranali of niyam of conduct sthapit by the sovereign sarkari of a samaaj to sahi wrongs, maintain the stability of political and soshal praadhikaar, or deliver justice.
working as a vakil involves the practical anuprayog of abstract vidhik theories and knowledge to solve vishisht individualized samasyaayein, or to agrim the ruchi of those who retain ( i.e., hire ) vakil to perform vidhik sevaayen.
The bhoomika of the vakil varies significantly aarpaar vidhik jurisdictions, and so it can be treated yahan in tabhi the sabase saamaanya terms.
vector vipanan is the gharelu sales bhujaa of Cutco nigam, an olean, New york aadhaarit cutlery nirmaataa.
the parivaar or Medical chhod Act of 1993 ( fmla ) is a United rajya federal vidhi requiring covered niyokta to provide karmchaaree job-protected or unpaid chhod liye qualified chikitsa or parivaar kaaran.
yogya medical and parivaar kaaran shaamil : nijee or parivaar beemaari, parivaar sainya chhod, garbhavastha, adoption, or the foster care placement of a child.
The FMLA is administered by the mazdooree or ghanta prabhag of the sanyukt States vibhaag of majdoor.
the vidheyak was a pramukh bhaag of adhyaksh vidheyak clinton 's kaarysoochee in uske first pad.
adhyaksh Clinton hastakshrit the vidheyak into law on February 5, 1993 ( ; 29 u.s.c. sek. 2601 ; 29 cfr 825 ) and it took prabhaav on agast 5, 1993, chah maheene later.
the fmla thi intended `` to balance the maange of the kaarysthal with the needs of pariwaron. ''
the adhinium allows yogya karmchaaree to lo up to 12 kaary weeks of unpaid chhod dauraan koi 12-month kaal to attend to the serious swasthya condishan of the employee, janak, spouse or child, or liye garbhavastha or care of a newborn child, or liye apnaanaa or foster care of a child.
In anukram to be yogya liye FMLA chhod, an karmchaaree must have maharoom at the business at tanik 12 maheene, or worked at tanik 1,250 ghanton over the past 12 months, or kaary at a sthaan jahaan the company employs 50 or adhik karmchaaree bheetar 75 miles.
The fmla cover dono public- or private-sector karmchaaree, lakin certain categories of karmchaaree hai excluded, sahit elected officials or unke nijee staff sadasyon.
The vietnam yuddh ( ) was a Cold yuddh -era military conflict that occurred in vietnam, laos, or Cambodia from 1 November 1955 to the fall of Saigon on 30 april 1975.
This war followed the pehla Indochina yuddh and was ladaa between North vietnam, samarthit by its communist allies, and the sarkari of dakshin vietnam, samarthit by the sanyukt rajya or anya anti-communist countries.
the Viet cong ( bhi gyaat as the neshnal mukti saamne, or nlf ), a halake hathiyaarband dakshin vietnami communist aam saamne directed by the North, largely ladaa a guerrilla war against anti-communist shaktiyaan in the pradesh.
the vietnam logon 's fouj ( North vietnami fouj ) sagaai in a more conventional war, at times committing vishaal ikai into battle.
U.S. and dakshin vietnami shaktiyaan relied on air badppan or overwhelming firepower to conduct dhundhen or destroy parichaalan, involving maidan shaktiyaan, topakhane, and airstrikes.
the u.S. government viewed bhagidaari in the war as a rasta to prevent a communist kabza of dakshin Vietnam as bhaag of their wider strategy of containment.
The uttar Vietnamese government and viet cong yahood lard to reunify vietnam antargat communist rule.
They viewed the virodh as a aupniveshik yuddh, ladaa initially against frans, backed by the u.S., and later viruddh dakshin Vietnam, jisase it regarded as a U.S. kathputli state.
amareeki sainya advisors arrived in what was tab french indochyna shuruuaat in 1950.
u.S. bhagidaari escalated in the early 1960s, saath troop str tripling in 1961 or tripling again in 1962.
u.S. combat units yahood tainaat shuruuaat in 1965.
parichaalan spanned antarrashtriya simaayen, saath laos or cambodia heavily bombed.
American bhagidaari in the war peaked in 1968, at the samay of the tet Offensive.
baad this, u.S. ground shaktiyaan yahood dhire withdrawn as part of a policy gyaat as Vietnamization.
despite the paris Peace accords, hastakshrit by sab partiyon in janvari 1973, lard jari.
u.S. sainya bhagidaari ended on 15 agast 1973 as a parinaam of the Case–Church amendment passed by the U.S. congress.
the capture of sigon by the vietnam People 's fouj in april 1975 chihnit the end of the yuddh, and North or dakshin vietnam yahood reunified the following saal.
the yuddh exacted a vishaal human cost in sharten of fatalities ( dekhie vietnam yuddh hataahat ).
estimates of the kramank of vietnami sainiko or nagarikon maare vary from 800,000 to 3.1 million.
kuch 200,000–300,000 Cambodians, 20,000–200,000 Laotians, and 58,220 u.S. seva members also died in the conflict.
cleveland jwalamukhi in the aleutian Islands of alaska photographed isse the antarrashtriya spes stesan, may 2006.
raakh plumes pahunche a oonchaai of 19 km dauraan the climactic fatna at mount pinatubo, Philippines in 1991.
a jwalamukhi is an opening, or rupture, in a grah 's surface or crust, which allows hot megma, volcanic ash and gaison to escape isse the megma kaksh neeche the sataha.
jwalamukhi hai generally found jahaan tectonic plates hai diverging or converging.
a mid-oceanic lakeeren, liye udhaaharan the Mid-Atlantic lakeeren, rai udhaaharan of jwalamukhi caused by apsaari tectonic platon pulling alaava ; the prashanth Ring of Fire rai examples of jwalamukhi caused by abhisari tectonic platon coming together.
by contrast, jwalamukhi hai praayah nahin nirmit jahaan two tectonic platon slide past ek another.
jwalamukhi can also rup where vahin is stretching and thinning of the dharti 's crust in the interiors of plates, e.g., in the east africa Rift, the Wells gray-clearwater volcanic field and the rio grandey Rift in uttar america.
is prakaar of volcanism falls antargat the chhatariyaan of `` Plate pariklpana '' volcanism.
Volcanism dur isse plate boundaries rai bhi maharoom samajhaayaa as mantle plumes.
ye so-called `` hotspots ``, liye example hawaii, hai postulated to uthta isse upwelling diapirs with megma isse the core–mantle boundary, 3,000 km gahan in the dharti.
erupting volcanoes can pos anek jokhimon, nahin tabhi in the taatkaalik vicinity of the fatna.
volcanic raakh can be a threat to aircraft, in particular those saath jet ingine jahaan raakh anu can be melted by the unchi oparating temperature.
Large eruptions can affect taapmaana as ash or droplets of sulfuric acid obscure the surya or cool the dharti 's nimnatar maahaul or kshobhamandal ; however, ve bhi absorb heat radiated up from the Earth, thereby warming the stratosphere.
historically, so-called volcanic sardiyon have caused anarthakaari famines.
a gahan pothole on nai york nagar 's duusari avenue
a pothole ( sometimes pukaara a kettle or gyaat in bhaag of the pashchimi United States as a chuckhole ) is a type of disruption in the sataha of a roadway jahaan a portion of the sadak saamagree rai tutaa dur, leaving a chhed.
renal koshika carcinoma ( rcc, bhi known as hypernephroma ) is a gurda karkat ki originates in the astr of the proximal convoluted tubule, the bahut choti tubes in the gurda ki hastantaran gf ( glomerular filtrate ) isse the glomerulus to the descending limb of the nephron.
rcc is the sabase aam prakaar of kidney cancer in adults, responsible liye approximately 80 % of cases.
It is also known to be the sabase lethal of sab the genitourinary tumors.
aarambhik treatment is sabase commonly a kattarpanthi or aanshik nephrectomy and remains the mainstay of curative treatment.
Where the tumor is confined to the renal parenchyma, the 5-year astitv rate is 60-70 %, lakin this is lowered considerably jahaan metastases have sprad.
it is relatively resistant to radiation chikitsa or chemotherapy, although kuch maamle respond to immunotherapy.
Targeted karkat therapies aise as sunitinib, temsirolimus, bevacizumab, interferon-alpha, and sorafenib have improved the outluk liye rcc.

the company rai iske mukhyalay in midtown manahaton, nai York City.
the peritoneum ( ) is the serous membrane ki form the lining of the abdominal guha or the coelom —it covers sabase of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in amniotes or kuch invertebrates ( annelids, liye udhaaharan ).
it is rachit of a layer of mesothelium samarthit by a patala parat of connective utak.
The peritoneum dono supports the abdominal angon and serves as a conduit liye unke blood or lasika baratan or nerves.
the abdominal cavity ( the space bounded by the vertebrae, abdominal mansapeshiyaan, diaphragm or shroni manzil ) chahie nahin be confused saath the intraperitoneal space ( stith bheetar the abdominal cavity, but wrapped in peritoneum ).
the structures bheetar the intraperitoneal spes are called `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the stomach ), the structures in the abdominal guha ki hai located behind the intraperitoneal spes are pukaara `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g. the gurde ), or those structures neeche the intraperitoneal space hai pukaara `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the blader ).
aadhunik 2.5 '' ssd used in upabhokta laptop or desktop computer.
ddr sdram aadhaarit ssd.
Max or.
PCI sanlagn io twarak SSD
PCI-E, DRAM, or NAND aadhaarit ssd.
it uses an external shakti supplai to mek the dram non-volatile.
A solid-state drive ( ssd ) ( bhi gyaat as a solid-state discs or electronic discs, haalanki it contains no actual `` discs '' of koi dayaalu ) is a aankada bhandar yantra using ekikrut circuit assemblies as memory to store data persistently.
ssd praudyogiki upyog electronic antarfalak sangat saath paramparaagat block input/output ( i/o ) hard discs drive.
SSDs have no chalati mechanical components, jisase fark unhen from paramparaagat electromechanical magnetic discs aise as mushkil discs drives ( HDDs ) or flopy discs, jisase contain gum disks or movable read/write heads.
compared saath electromechanical discs, ssds are typically kam susceptible to physical shock, much quieter, have nimnatar abhigam samay, or kam latency.
however, jabaki the daam of ssds rai jari to decline in 2012, SSDs hai still parichay 7 to 8 times more mahangi prati ikai of bhandar than hdds.
anek ssds use I/O antarfalak viksit for mushkil disk drives, yun permitting simple replacement in aam anuprayog.
, sabase ssds upyog nand-based flash memory, jisase retains data bagaiyr shakti.
liye anuprayog requiring fast abhigam, lakin nahin necessarily aankada hath after shakti ghaataa, ssds may be constructed isse random-access memory ( RAM ).
aise divaais may employ separate shakti strot, such as bydaree, to maintain data baad power ghaataa.
Hybrid drives or thos rajya sankar drives ( SSHD ) combine the features of ssds or hdds in the vahi ikai, containing a vishaal mushkil discs drive and an ssd sanchay to improve pradarshan of frequently pahunchaa aankada.
These divaais may offer near-ssd pradarshan liye anek anuprayog.
Salmon roe ( left ) or sturgeon caviar ( right ) parosa saath maan of parl caviar spoons to avoid tainting the swaad of the caviar.

caviar, according to the khaanaa or krishi Organization, is a utpaada bana isse salt-cured fish-eggs of the acipenseridae parivaar.
The roe can be `` fresh '' ( non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized, saath pasteurization reducing iske culinary and aarthik maan.
traditionally the term caviar refers tabhi to roe isse junglee sturgeon in the caspian and blike Seas ( beluga, Ossetra and sevruga caviars ).
Depending on the desh, caviar may bhi be used to describe the roe of anya machhlee such as salmon, steelhead, trout, lumpfish, whitefish, or anya prajati of sturgeon.
caviar is mana a lakjri komalta or is khaaya as a garnish or a sprad.
In 2012, caviar sold liye $ 2,500 prati pound, or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 prati kilo.
the SEC sanjaal is a television anuprayog sanjaal featuring live prasaaran of college football or basket kaarykram from the southeastern sammelan.
it is owned and sanchalit by iespien plus or is dikhaaya in more than 50 pratishat of households in the sanyukt rajya, mostly Southeastern United rajya bazaar.

the sek sanjaal is also available in canada via Atlanta 's WPCH-TV.
the sek Network uses the vahi on-screen graphics philhal prayukt by iespien on abisi, a sanskaran of iespien 's graphics package.
sek Network 's footbaal programming still upyog a sheershak surakshit kshetrafal because sabase of iske affiliates do nahin letterbox unke maanak paribhaasha feeds, jabaki iespien 's television sanjaal have anumat their graphics to laaparvaahee the sheershak surakshit, lakin letterbox liye sd viewers.
starting saath the sek 2012 basket ritu, SEC sanjaal 's graphics have maharoom parivartit to a 16:9 widescreen-only swaroop.

the 1990s, pronounced or bhi gyaat as `` the Nineteen-Nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the nineties '' or `` the '90s '', thi a dashak that began on janvari 1, 1990, or ended on disambar 31, 1999.
It thi the 10th and last dashak of the 20th sadi or the 100th and last dashak of the 2nd milinium.
the dashak is behtareen known liye the samaapt of the thanda War at the beginning of the dashak and the vistaar or vyavsyeekaran of the Internet dauraan the duusari half of the dashak.
In much of the west the 1990s is remembered as a kaal of unprecedented salaam or samruddhi, though many bhaag of the so-called teesraa World faced vibhinn samasyaayein sahit narsanhaar, aids and nai or continuing jaateey tanaav and civil yudhon.
Culturally bolnaa the dashak thi characterized by the vruddhi of bahusamskritwad and alternative media.
andolanon aise as grunge, the rev scene or hip hop sprad around the sansar to young logon dauraan the decade, aided by then-new praudyogiki aise as cabel television or the antarjaal.
a combination of factors, sahit the mass mobilization of capital bazaar through neoliberalism, the shuruuaat of the faili aprasar of nai media aise as the antarjaal, or the viched of the soviet sangh led to a realignment or reconsolidation of aarthik or rajnatik shakti aarpaar the world, or within deshon.
aay asamanta among deshon in the world rose sharply between the 1980s or the mid-1990s, pehle levelling off or tab girnaa baad 2000.
nai jaateey conflicts ubhara in Africa, the balkans and the Caucasus, the former do which led to the rwandan narsanhaar and Bosnian genocide, kramshah.
the sanyukt rajya began iske current military occupation of the madhya East dauraan the garmiyaan of 1990 saath Desert shield baad it kaaten off a large portion of the world 's petroleum supply.
lakshan of any rezolution of tensions between Israel or the arab world remained elusive, though the irish pareshaaniyon aae to a standstill in 1998 saath the Good Friday anubandh after 30 years of violence.
the dhoosar bhediya or dhoosar bhediya ( canis lupus ) is a prajati of canid deshi to the wilderness and remote kshetron of uttar america, uresia, or uttar Africa.
it is the largest sadsy of iske parivaar, saath males averaging, or females.
it is samaan in saamaanya rup and proportions to a German shepherd, or sled shwaan, lakin rai a larger sir, narrower chaati, longer legs, straighter tail or bade paws.
Its winter fer is long and bushy, and predominantly a mottled gray in rang, haalanki nearly pure shwet, red, or bhura to blike bhi occur.
Within the genus canis, the gray bhediya represents a adhik specialised or pragatisheel rup than its choti cousins ( the kyoti and sunahari jackal ), as demonstrated by iske morphological adaptations to shikaar vishaal shikaar, its adhik milansaar prakruti or iske atyadhik unnat expressive bartaav.
it is a soshal animal, travelling in nuclear pariwaron consisting of a mated pair, accompanied by the pair 's vayask aulad.
The dhoosar bhediya is typically an apex parabhakshi throughout iske dayera, with only humans or tigers pos a gambhir threat to it.
it feeds primarily on vishaal ungulates, haalanki it bhi eats choti pashu, livestock, carrion, or garbage.
The dhoosar bhediya is ek of the sansar 's sabase khub shodhakarya pashu, with sambhawatah adhik kitabe likhaa about it than any anya vanyajeev species.
It rai a long itihaas of association saath insaano, having maharoom despised or hunted in most agricultural communities due to iske hamale on pashudhan, jabaki conversely hone aadarneey by some Native amareeki janajatiyon.
it is the sole ancestor of the shwaan, jisase thi first domesticated in the madhya East.
haalanki the bhay of wolves is prachlit in many insaan samaajon, the bahumat of recorded hamale on logon have maharoom attributed to pashu suffering isse rabies.
non-rabid wolves have attacked or maare logon, mukhyatah children, lakin is is asaamaanya, as wolves hai relatively few, sajiv dur isse people, and have been sikhaaya to bhay insaano by hunters or gadriye.
shikaar or trapping has ghataya the prajati ' dayera to, haalanki iske still apekshaakrit widespread range or stable janasankhyikee arthath ki the prajati is nahin threatened at a vaishvik str, or is isliye vargeekrut by the aiusien as tanik Concern.
The roman samrajya ( ) thi the post- republican kaal of the pracheen roman sabhyataa, characterised by an autocratic form of sarkari or large territorial holdings around the bumadhyasagariya in europea, Africa, or asia.
the 500-year-old roman ganatantr, jisase preceded it, tha maharoom destabilized through a shrenee of civil yudhon.
Several events chihnit the parivartan isse ganatantr to samrajya, sahit julius Caesar 's niyukti as perpetual taanashaah ( 44 BC ) ; the battle of Actium ( 31 BC ) ; or the granting of the honorific Augustus to octavian by the roman seenet ( 27 BC ).
the pehla two sadiyaan of the Empire yahood a period of unprecedented stability and samruddhi gyaat as the pax romana ( `` roman salaam '' ).
it pahunche its mahanatam expanse during the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 ad ).
In the 3rd century, the Empire underwent a sankat ki threatened iske astitv, but thi reunified or stabilized under the emperors aurelian or Diocletian.
Christians rose to power in the 4th sadi, dauraan jisase time a system of dual niyam thi viksit in the latin west or Greek East.
baad the patan of central sarkari in the West in the 5th sadi, the purvi half jari as kayaa hota baad be known as the bizantin Empire.
kuki of the samrajya 's vishaal extent or long endurance, the sansthaanon or samskruti of rome tha a profound and sthaayee influence on the vikaas of language, dharm, vaastukala, darshanashastra, vidhi, or forms of sarkari in the territory it governed, particularly europea, or by means of europea expansionism throughout the aadhunik sansar.
shiksha in the sanyukt rajya is mukhyatah provided by the public sector, saath control and funding coming from three str : local, rajya, or sangheey, in ki anukram.
child education is anivaary, and vahin are bhi a vishaal number or chaudee variety of ucchtar shiksha sansthaanon throughout the country ki ek can chune to attend, both publicly or privately administered.
public education is universally uplabdhiyaan.
skool curricula, funding, shikshan, niyukti, and other nitiyon are niyat through locally elected school falak with kshetradhikaar over skool jile saath anek directives from rajya legislatures.
School jile hai praayah separate isse anya local jurisdictions, saath swatantra officials or budgets.
shaikshanik standards or standardized pareekshan nirnay hai usually bana by rajya governments.
the aayu liye anivaary shiksha vary by state.
it begins isse ages paanch to aath or ends isse aayu chaudaa to atharah.
Compulsory shiksha aavashyaktaayen can generally be santusht by educating children in public skulon, state-certified nijee skulon, or an sweekrut ghar skool kaarykram.
In sabase public and nijee skulon, shiksha is vibhajit into three str : elementary school, middle skool ( sometimes pukaara junior high school ), and high skool ( sometimes referred to as dwitiyak shiksha ).
in lagbhag sab skulon at these str, children hai vibhajit by age samooh into grad, ranging isse kindergarton ( followed by first grad ) liye the youngest children in elementary school, up to barahavin grad, the final saal of unchi skool.
the exact aayu range of vidhyaarthee in these grad levels varies slightly isse area to kshetrafal.
post-secondary shiksha, behatar known as `` college `` in the sanyukt rajya, is generally governed separately isse the elementary or unchi skool system, or is varnit in a pruthak khand neeche.
sarkari samarthit, free public skulon liye sab prarambh hone sthapit after the kranti, or expanded in the 19th sadi, as the parinaam of praytn of men jaise horess Mann and bukar T. Washington.
by 1870, all rajya had free elementary schools, albeit tabhi in shahari centers.
as the 20th sadi khinchaa nearer, states started guzar kanoon to mek schooling anivaary, and by 1910, 72 pratishat of children attended school.
nijee skulon jari to sprad dauraan is time, as khub as collejon and—in the gramin centers— land grant colleges.
The saal of 1910 bhi dekhi the first sachcha unchi skulon.
dauraan the baaki of the 20th sadi, shaikshanik efforts centered on reducing the asamanta of the schooling system.
the landmark Supreme adaalat maamla bhura v. falak of shiksha bana the desegregation of elementary or unchi schools a national priority, jabaki the Pell grant kaarykram helped poor minorities laabh abhigam to college.
Special shiksha thi made into sangheey vidhi in 1975.
the Elementary or dwitiyak shiksha adhinium of 1965 bana manakikrut pareekshan a aavashyaktaa, or in 1983, a commission thi sthapit to evaluate unke results or propose a course of karrwai.
the resulting no child baayein Behind Act of 2001 thi vivaadaaspad or iske lakshya proved to be unrealistic.
a commission established in 2006 evaluated ucchtar shiksha, but iske suzav have yet to be fully implemented.
Paul bragg ( February 6, 1895 – disambar 7, 1976 ), nutritionist, thi a pionier in america’s wellness gati.
swasthya bitaa per capita, in $ us ppp-adjusted, saath the us or Canada compared amongst anya pehla sansar raashtra.
tulana of the health parvaah pranaaliyon in Canada and the United rajya hai often bana by sarkari, public swasthya or public policy analysts.
the do deshon tha samaan swasthya care systems pehle canada reformed iske system in the 1960s or 1970s.
the United rajya kharch much adhik dhan on swasthya care than canada, on dono a per-capita aadhaar or as a percentage of GDP.
in 2006, per-capita bitaa liye swasthya parvaah in canada was US $ 3,678 ; in the u.S., us $ 6,714.
The u.S. kharch 15.3 % of jidipi on swasthya care in ki saal ; canada kharch 10.0 %.
in 2006, 70 % of swasthya parvaah spending in Canada was financed by government, banaam 46 % in the sanyukt States.
Total sarkari spending prati capita in the u.S. on health parvaah thi 23 % ucchtar than canadai sarkari spending, or U.S. sarkari vyay on swasthya care thi bas antargat 83 % of kul canadai bitaa ( public and nijee ) haalanki ye statistics do n't lo into khaataa population differences.
Studies have aaiye to alag conclusions parichay the parinaam of is disparity in bitaa.
a 2007 punarvilokan of sab adhyayan comparing swasthya outcomes in canada or the us in a canadai peer-reviewed chikitsa jarnal found ki `` swasthya outcomes may be shreshth in marijon cared liye in canada banaam the United rajya, but matbhed hai nahin satat. ''
jivan expectancy is longer in Canada, and its shishu mrityu rate is nimnatar than ki of the u.S., but there is debate parichay the underlying kalyankari of these matbhed.
ek commonly cited tulana, the 2000 sansar swasthya sanghathan 's darja of `` overall swasthya seva pradarshan '', which prayukt a `` composite maap of uplabdhi in the str of swasthya, the distribution of swasthya, the level of responsiveness or nishpakshta of vittiya yogadan '', kramit canada 30th or the US 37th among 191 member raashtra.
This study rated the us `` responsiveness '', or visheshta of service for individuals receiving upachaar, as 1st, compared with 7th liye canada.
jabaki the ausat life expectancy for Canadians thi 80.34 years compared with 78.6 saalo liye nivaasiyon of the US, simply comparing the jivan pratyaasha of do samooh saath alag jatigat mechap and alag motopa daron is sambhavit nahin an effective way of determining jisase healthcare pranali is superior.
the jo 's padhai vidhi were criticized by some analyses.
haalanki vahin is a maap of sarvasammati ki life-expectancy and shishu mrityu chihnit the most vishwasaneey ways to compare nation-wide swasthya care, assuming the population mechap is similar, a recent rapat by the congressional Research Service carefully summarizes kuch recent aankada or tip the `` difficult shodh mudde '' facing antarrashtriya comparisons.
the dhwani source has abhi tutaa through the sound gati avrodh, and is traveling at 1.4 times the gati of dhwani, ( Mach 1.4 ).
Since the source is moving faster ( saath a gati ) than the dhwani waves it creates, it darasal lead the advancing tarangagra.
The dhwani source will pass by a stationary observer ( saath a gati ) pehle the observer actually hears the sound it creates.
as a parinaam, an nireekshak in saamne of the source hoga detect
or an nireekshak peeche the sorce.
A sonic boom utpaadit by an vayuyan moving at M=2.92, gananaa isse the cone kone of 20 degrees.
an observer hears the boom jab the shock wave, on the edges of the cone, crosses uske or her sthaan.
Mach cone angle
a sonic boom is the sound sambhddha saath the shock lehren created by an object traveling through the air faster than the gati of dhwani.
sonic booms generate vishaal amounts of dhwani energy, sounding much jaise an visphot.
the crack of a supersonic goli guzar overhead is an udhaaharan of a sonic boom in miniature.
the tonight Show saath jay Leno is an amareeki late-night baat show hosted by jay Leno ki initially aired isse may 25, 1992 to may 29, 2009, and resumed utpaadan on March 1, 2010.
the chauthi incarnation of the tonight Show franchise made iske debyue on May 25, 1992, three days following johny Carson 's ritairement as host of the kaarykram.
the kaarykram originates isse enbisi studios in burbank, california, and is broadcast somvaar through Friday at 11:35 pm in the purvi or prashanth samay zones ( 10:35 pm central / pahaad samay ).
naapsand Carson or uske predecessor joker paar, lino tabhi ekbar utilized a atithi mejabaan, preferring to mejabaan the shrenee by khud.
on april 26, 1999, the show began prasaaran in 1080i hdtv, banane the first American nightly talk show to be shot in unchi paribhaasha.
the show is shot in 16:9 pahalu ratio.
the shrenee, jisase followed the vahi basic format as ki of uske purvavartiyon ( an kholane monologue followed by comedy dincharya, saakshaatkaar and pradarshan ), ran jabatak may 29, 2009, baad jisase lino thi succeeded by conan O'Brien.
enbisi signed lino to a nai saude for a nightly baat dikhaaen in the 10:00 pm et timeslot.
The primetime shrenee, titled the jay Leno dikhaaen, debuted on sitambar 14, 2009, following a similar format to the Leno avatar of tonight.
neither O'Brien 's sanskaran of the program, jisase premiered june 1, 2009, nor The jay Leno Show utpann the darja ki NBC had apekshit.
The sanjaal decided to move a condensed 30-minute sanskaran of Leno 's dikhaaen to O'Brien 's samay slot, or O'Brien 's tonight dikhaaen a half-hour baad.
This nirnay mili saath vipaksh isse o'brien, jinaki karyavadhi on the tonight dikhaaen ended janvari 22, 2010, baad which he began uske apana talk show on TBS.
the Tonight Show saath jay lino tab began its second or vartmaan avatar, the chathe of the matadhikaar, on kooch 1, 2010.
RFID chip aglaa to a anaaj of rice.
is chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field kundali that modulates an external magnetic field to transafar a coded pahchaan number jab queried by a reader yantra.
is choti prakaar is incorporated in upabhokta utpaada, or implanted in paalatu, for pahchaan uddeshy.
radio-frequency pahchaan ( rfid ) is the betaar non-contact upyog of radio-frequency electromagnetic field to transfer data, liye the purposes of automatically identifying or trekking tag sanlagn to objects.
the tags contain electronically stored information.
kuch tag hai sanchalit or read at choti ranges ( a few meter ) via chumbakeey field ( electromagnetic induction ).
anya use a local shakti sorce aise as a battery, or else have no bydaree but collect urja isse the interrogating EM field, and then adhinium as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio lehren ( i.e., electromagnetic vikiran at high frequencies ).
bydaree sanchalit tag may operate at hundreds of meters.
naapsand a baar code, the tag karata nahin necessarily need to be bheetar line of sight of the reader, or may be antahsthapit in the tracked object.
rfid tags hai prayukt in anek udyog.
an rfid tag attached to an automobile dauraan production can be prayukt to track iske pragati through the sabha lakeer.
davaayen can be tracked through warehouses.
pashudhan or paalatu may have tag injected, allowing dhanatmak pahchaan of the animal.
Since RFID tags can be sanlagn to kapadey, possessions, or bhi implanted bheetar logon, the sambhaavna of padhnaa personally-linked soochna bagaiyr sahmati has raised gopneeyata chintaaen.
Id, ahankaar or super-ego are the teen bhaag of the psychic apparatus paribhaashit in sigmund frid 's structural model of the psyche ; ve are the teen theoretical constructs in sharten of whose activity or baatcheet dimagi jivan is described.
according to is model of the psyche, the id is the niyat of uncoordinated instinctual rujhaan ; the super-ego plays the critical or moralizing bhoomika ; or the ahankaar is the vyavasthit, realistic bhaag that mediates between the desires of the id or the super-ego.
the super-ego can stop tum isse doing certain bate ki apana id may want tum to do.
bhi though the model is sanrachanaatmak and makes reference to an apparatus, the id, ego or super-ego are krityon of the dimag balki than bhaag of the dimag or do not correspond one-to-one saath vaastavik daihik structures of the dayaalu dealt saath by neuroscience.
the concepts themselves arose at a let stage in the development of Freud 's vichaar : the `` structural model '' ( which succeeded his `` aarthik model '' or `` topographical model '' ) was pehla discussed in his 1920 essay `` pare the kushi Principle `` and was formalized and elaborated upon three saalo baad in his `` the ahankaar or the id ``.
Freud 's prastaav thi influenced by the ambiguity of the pad `` behosh `` or iske anek conflicting upyog.

the Air force arakshit adhikari Training corps ( afrotc ) is one of the three primary commissioning strot for officers in the sanyukt States air force, the anya do being the sanyukt States Air force academy ( USAFA ) or Air force adhikari prashikshan School ( ots ).
A adhinsth command of the air University bheetar the Air shiksha or Training cmand ( AETC ), afrotc is lakeer under the jeanne M. holm bich for Officer accessions or Citizen vikaas at maxwell afb, Alabama.
The holm bich, formerly gyaat as the air Force Officer accession or Training skulon ( AFOATS ), retains sidhaa jimmedaari for dono afrotc or OTS.
AFROTC is the largest or oldest sorce of commissioned adhikariyon liye the U.S. Air Force.
AFROTC 's stated mishan is to upaj quality netao liye the u.S. air force.
AFROTC ikai are located on 144 college or vishvavidhyalayon campuses saath 984 additional sansthaanon of ucchtar siikhnaa participating in cross-town samjhauton ki allow unke vidhyaarthee to attend afrotc varg at a aasapaas `` host '' college or vishvavidhyalayon.
According to AFOATS hq, in 2006, AFROTC commissioned 2,083 USAF duusari lieutenants, saath AFROTC namakan ranging from 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993, and around 13,000 namankit aaj.
afrotc ikai at collejon or vishvavidhyalayon hai pukaara `` detachments, '' or are typically headed by an active duty uaseef officer in the rank of karnal or leftinent karnal jo krityon as dono the Detachment commander liye uaseef uddeshy or saath the nominal sheershak of praadhyaapak of aerospace adhyayan ( pas ) bheetar the institution 's academik community.
sabase colleges or universities will designate the afrotc detachment as the vibhaag of aerospace adhyayan.
the pas is assisted by teen to chaar Assistant professors of aerospace Studies ( apas ), sab active duty USAF adhikariyon in the ranks of major or captain.
teen uaseef non-commissioned adhikariyon or ek varisht non-commissioned adhikari hoga typically provide sainya prashasnic support and are often augmented by one to do civilian staff support karmchaaree of the academik sanstha.
Within afrotc detachments, the vidhyaarthee ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) hai vyavasthit into wings, samooh, squadrons, and flite, mirroring the uaseef kaaryaatmak wing dhaancha.
the afrotc detachment 's cadet wing or cadet samooh is alag into two divisions : the saamaanya sainya course ( jiemasi ) consisting of the first do saalo of training, or the peshewar Officer course ( poc ) consisting of the pichhlaa do years of training.
the afrotc kaarykram is bhi divided into do prashikshan krityon : the academik Classroom kaarykram ( Aerospace adhyayan varg ) or cadet Activities ( i.e., netritv prayogshaala, Physical prashikshan, or anya prashikshan ).
paper ghanatv ( bhi known as basis weight or grammage ) is a pad used in the pulp and paper udyog and also liye fabric udyog to denote a maap of dravyaman of the utpaada prati ikai of kshetrafal liye a prakaar of kapadaa, paper or paperboard.
the pad `` ghanatv '' is nahin prayukt in iske paramparaagat sense of mass prati ikai awaz.
`` paper ghanatv '', balki, is a maap of the kshetrafal ghanatv.
paper utpaada ki let little or no lite pass through ( e.g. poster falak ) are mana ghanaa or baari.
paper utpaada ki allow kuch lite to pass through ( e.g. utak paper ) are considered lightweight.
In the guda or paper udyog, it is common to niyat a commercial paper machine to produce paper to a target paper ghanatv.
paper ghanatv can bhi be used to distinguish paper from paperboard as the latter praayah rai a grammage greater than 134 g/m2.
do tareeke of expressing paper ghanatv hai commonly used:
expressed in gamma prati vargakar meter ( g/m2 ), paper ghanatv is bhi gyaat as grammage.
is is the measure prayukt in sabase bhaag of the world.
expressed in sharten of the mass ( expressed as vazan ) per kramank of chaadaren, it is known as basis vazan.
The sammelan prayukt in the sanyukt rajya or a few anya deshon using US paper aakaar is pound of a ream of 500 ( or in some maamle 1000 ) chaadaren of a given ( kaccha, still uncut ) basis aakaar.
japani paper is expressed as the weight in kg of 1000 chaadaren.

a khaanaa guide pyramid is a pyramid taraasha maargdarshika of healthy bhojan vibhajit into bhaag to dikhaaen the anushansit seven liye prayek khaanaa samooh.
the pehla khaanaa pyramid was prakashit in Sweden in 1974.
the sabase widely gyaat food pyramid was introduced by the sanyukt States vibhaag of Agriculture in the saal 1992, was updated in 2005, or then replaced in 2011.

hans isai Andersen ( ; often referred to in Scandinavia as H. C. andersen ; April 2, 1805August 4, 1875 ) thi a danish lekhak and kavi.
haalanki a safal lekhak of plays, travelogues, novels, or kavitaayen, Andersen is behtareen remembered liye uske pari kisse, a saahitiyik vidha he so mastered that he himself rai become as mythical as the kisse he likhaa.

ve have prerit gati tasviren, plays, naatikaaon, and anemated films.

najar sampark occurs jab `` two logon dekh at each other 's ankhen at the same time. ''
In human beings, eye sampark is a rup of nonverbal sanchaar or is thought to have a large influence on soshal bartaav.
coined in the early to mid-1960s, the pad rai come in the West to praayah define the adhinium as a meaningful or important chihn of vishwaas or soshal sanchaar.
the custom and significance of eye contact vary widely between samskritiyon, with religious or soshal differences often altering iske meaning greatly.
the padhai of najar sampark is sometimes gyaat as oculesics.
bed bugs are parasitic insects of the cimicid family ki feed exclusively on blood.
the pad sabase commonly refers to sadasyon of the genus cimex of which cimex lectularius, the aam bed bug, is the behtareen gyaat as it prefers to feed on insaan rakt haalanki anya Cimex species are specialized to anya pashu, e.g., chamagadad bag, C. pipistrelli ( europea ), C. pilosellus ( pashchimi us ), or C. adjunctus ( sampurna purvi us ).
the naam of the `` bed bug '' is derived isse the preferred awaas of cimex lectularius : garam gharon and visheshkar aasapaas or inside of beds or bedding or other neend kshetron.
bed bugs hai mainly active at raatri, lakin hai nahin exclusively nocturnal.
ve praayah feed on unke host without being noticed.
a kramank of adverse swasthya prabhaav may parinaam from bed keedaa bites, sahit skin rashes, psychological prabhaav, or allergic symptoms.
nidaan involves dono dhundhna bed bag and the occurrence of sangat lakshan.
bed bugs have maharoom gyaat as insaan parasites liye hazaron of years.
At a point in the early 1940s, ve were zyaadaatar eradicated in the viksit sansar, lakin have increased in vyapaktaa chunki 1995.
kuki infestation of insaan habitats has been on the badhayen, bed keedaa bites and sambandhit sharten have maharoom on the vruddhi as well.
the kitaab of yashayah ( ) is the pehla of the Latter nabiyon in the yahudee bible, preceding Ezekiel, Jeremiah or the kitaab of the baarah.
( the anukram of the subsequent kitabe differs somewhat in the isai boodha vasiyat ).
The first 39 adhyay prophesy doom for a sinful yahuda and liye sab the raashtra of the sansar ki oppose God, jabaki the last 27 prophesy the bahaali of the swadesh of israel or a nai sristi in parameshwar 's gauravshaalee bhavishya kingdom ; is khand shaamil the geeton of the Suffering Servant, chaar pruthak passages referring to the nation of israel, interpreted by isaayiyon as prefiguring the coming of yishu messiah.
parampara ascribes authorship of the book to yashayah son of amoz, lakin now vidwaanon widely agree ki the kitaab is the kaary of teen alag authors - few vidwaanon inkaar this view, or those that do, do so liye theological kaaran.
the pehla, termed proto-isaiah ( adhyay 1–39 ), contains the shabd of the 8th-century BCE nabi saath 7th-century BCE expansions ; the duusari, deutero-isaiah ( chapters 40–55 ), is the work of a 6th-century bce lekhak likhane nikat the samaapt of the babylonian captivity ; and the third, the kavy trito-isaiah ( chapters 56–66 ), thi rachit in jerusalem shortly baad the return isse exile, sambhawatah by multiple lekhak.
oregon rajya University ( OSU ) is a coeducational, public shodh university located in corvallis, Oregon, sanyukt rajya.
the vishvavidhyalayon offers undergraduate, graduate or doctoret degree or a multitude of shodh opportunities.
There are more than 200 academik oopaadhi kaarykram offered through the vishvavidhyalayon.

More than 200,000 logon have attended osu chunki its founding.
