the Witch 's Finger in the carlsbad caverns
a stalagmite ( or ; isse the unani σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês, isse σταλαγμίας - stalagmias, `` chhodane, trickling '' ) is a prakaar of speleothem that udai isse the manzil of a chuunaa cave due to the tapakataa of mineralized solutions or the deposition of calcium carbonate.
is stalagmite gathan occurs tabhi antargat nishchit pH sharten bheetar the bhumigat cavern.
the corresponding formation on the chat of a cave is known as a stalactite.
if ye formations grow saath, the parinaam is gyaat as a kalam.
The haul of diggaj in the Carlsbad caverns
stalagmites should saamanytah nahin be chuaa, chunki the rock buildup is formed by khanij precipitating out of the jal solution onto the old sataha ; skin oils can alter the sataha where the khanij jal hoga chipki, yun affecting the growth of the gathan.
Oils or dirt from human contact can bhi stain the gathan and badalen iske color permanently.
samaan structures can bhi rup in lava tubes, sambhddha saath some types of lavacicles, although the yantriki of gathan is very alag.
stalactites and stalagmites can also rup on kancreet ceilings or floors, haalanki ve rup much adhik rapidly vahin than in the natural gupha paryaavaran.
The largest stalagmite in the sansar is unchi and is located in the gupha of cueva martin infierno, Cuba.
In the zagros Mountains of dakshin iraan, lagbhag isse the pracheen nagar of bishapur, in the Shapur cave on the fourth of paanch baramada stand the 3rd century ce pratimaa of shapur i, duusari ruler of the Sassanid Empire.
the pratimaa, carved from ek stalagmite, is nearly unchi.
kaisaa I mili Your maan is an amareeki sitcom that premiered on CBS on sitambar 19, 2005.
The dikhaaen thi nirmit by craig Thomas and Carter bays.
kaisaa I mili apana maan is framed by the year 2030, jab ted mosby ( voiced by Bob saget ) gathers uske daughter ( lyndsy fonseca ) and bete ( David Henrie ) to tell unhen the story of how he mili their maan.
we flashback to jahaan it begins in 2005 with ted mosby ( josh Radnor ) as a single, 27-year-old vaastu jeena saath uske two best mitron isse wesleyan vishvavidhyalayon, marshall eriksen ( jesan Segel ), a law chaatr, and lily elderin ( alyson haningan ), a kindergarton teacher, jo have maharoom dating liye lagbhag nine saalo jab marshall proposes.
unke sagaai causes Ted to socho parichay dhundhna his apana soul mate, much to the disgust of uske dost Barney stinson ( neil patric haris ), a womanizer saath an benaam corporate job.
or thus, Ted begins uske dhundhen liye his purna mate, or meets robin scherbatsky ( kobi smalders ), jisko he bhi befriends.
The 100th apisod of kaisaa i mili apana Mother aired on January 11, 2010.
on disambar 21, 2012, the shrenee thi renewed liye a naveen ritu.
on janvari 30, 2013, it was ghoshit ki ritu 9 will be its final ritu.
gringo (,, ) is a kathboli spani or Portuguese shabd prayukt in ibero-america, to denote videshiyon, often isse the United rajya.
the term can be lagu to kisi jo is darasal a foreigner, or it can denote a damdaar sangh or sammilan into videshi ( particularly us ) society and samskruti.
In spani it karata nahin have a negative connotation.
roger Axtell, a safar tahazeeb visheshgy, tip ki `` [ t ] he shabd gringo is nahin necessarily a karaab shabd.
it is kathboli lakin is apmanjanak tabhi in iske use or context. ''
the word was prayukt in spain long before it crossed the atlantic to denote videshi, non-native speakers of Spanish.
the great shwet shark, carcharodon carcharias, also gyaat as the great shwet, shwet suchak, shwet shark, or shwet death, is a prajati of large lamniform shark which can be found in the coastal sataha waters of sab the pramukh mahaasaagar.
The great white shark is mukhyatah gyaat liye iske aakaar, saath the largest individuals gyaat to have approached or exceeded in lambaai, or in vazan.
This shark pahunch iske paripakvata around 15 saalo of aayu or can have a jivan span of over 30 years.
the great shwet shark is arguably the sansar 's largest gyaat extant macropredatory machhlee, or is ek of the praathmik parabhakshi of samudri mammals.
it is bhi known to shikaar upon a kismein of anya samudri pashu, sahit machhlee and seabirds.
it is the tabhi gyaat surviving prajati of its genus carcharodon, and is ranked pehla in having the most hamale on insaano.
the aiusien suchi the great shwet shark as a vulnerable species, jabaki it is shaamil in parishisht ii of CITES.
The bestselling anokhaa jabade by peter benchley and the subsequent blockbster filmi by steven spilberg depicted the great white shark as a `` ferocious man eater ``.
in reality, humans are nahin the pasandida prey of the great white shark.
the sanyukt rajya hathiyaarband shaktiyaan hai the sainya shaktiyaan of the sanyukt rajya of america.
ve consist of the fouj, navy, samudri corps, Air force, or coast Guard.
the U.S. rai a damdaar parampara of civilian control of the military.
the adhyaksh is the sainya 's overall head, and helps rup sainya niti saath the u.S. vibhaag of Defense ( dod ), a sangheey karypalika vibhaag, acting as the principal organ by which sainya niti is carried out.
the dod is headed by the sachiv of raksha, jo is a civilian or cabinet member.
the raksha sachiv is duusari in the military 's kadi of command, bas neeche the President, or serves as the principal sahaayak to the President in sab dod-related matters.
to coordinate sainya action with kootneeti, the adhyaksh rai an advisory National Security parishad headed by a National suraksha salaahkaar.
dono the President and Secretary of Defense are advised by a seven-member sanyukt chiefs of Staff, jisase shaamil the sir of each of the raksha vibhaag 's seva shakhaon as khub as the chief of the neshnal guard beuro.
netritv is provided by the adhyaksh of the sanyukt chiefs of staff or the Vice Chairman of the Joint chiefs of staff.
The Commandant of the coast guard is not a sadsy of the Joint chiefs of staff.
All of the shakhaon kaary saath during operations or sanyukt missions, antargat the ekikrut combatant Commands, under the authority of the Secretary of raksha saath the excepshan of the coast guard.
the coast guard jalprapaat antargat the administration of the vibhaag of mathrubhumi Security or receives iske operational aadesh isse the sachiv of mathrubhumi suraksha.
The Coast guard may be transferred to the vibhaag of the Navy by the adhyaksh or congress dauraan a time of yuddh.
sab five hathiyaarband sevaayen are among the seven uniformed sevaayen of the sanyukt rajya ; the others hai the u.S. public Health Service commissioned corps or the neshnal oceanic and vayumandaleey prashasan commissioned corps.
From the samay of its inception, the sainya played a decisive bhoomika in the history of the sanyukt rajya.
A sense of neshnal ekta or pahchaan thi forged as a result of victory in the pehla barbary yuddh or the Second Barbary yuddh.
bhi so, the sansthaapakon were sandigdh of a permanent military force and nahin jabatak the outbreak of sansar War ii kiya a vishaal standing fouj become officially sthapit.
the National Security Act of 1947, apanaaya following World War ii and dauraan the thanda War 's onset, nirmit the aadhunik u.S. military fremawork ; the Act merged previously cabinet-level vibhaag of yuddh or the vibhaag of the Navy into the neshnal sainya sthapana ( renamed the vibhaag of raksha in 1949 ), headed by the sachiv of raksha ; or created the Department of the air force and National suraksha Council.
the u.S. sainya is ek of the largest militaries in sharten of number of karmiyon.
it draws iske manpower from a vishaal pool of sashulk swayamsevak ; although conscription has been prayukt in the past in vibhinn times of dono war or salaam, it has nahin maharoom prayukt chunki 1972.
as of 2013, the U.S. kharch about $ 554.2 billion annually to nidhi iske sainya shaktiyaan, or appropriates lagbhag $ 88.5 arab to nidhi videshi aakasmikta parichaalan.
Put together, the U.S. constitutes roughly 43 percent of the sansar 's sainya expenditures.
the u.S. hathiyaarband Forces as a puure possess vishaal quantities of advanced or powerful upkaran, saath saath widespread avasthiti of shaktiyaan around the sansar, giving them significant samarthy in dono raksha and shakti projection.
swatantraaa of vaak is the rajnatik sahi to communicate ek 's raay or ideas using ek 's body or property to anyone jo is willing to receive unhen.
the pad swatantraaa of abhivyakti is sometimes prayukt synonymously, but shaamil any act of seeking, receiving or imparting information or ideas, regardless of the medium used.
in abhyaas, the sahi to swatantraaa of vaak is nahin absolute in koi desh or the sahi is commonly vishay to simaaen, as with manahani, slander, obscenity, rajdroh ( including, liye udhaaharan inciting jaateey dwesh ), copyright violation, revelation of soochna ki is vargeekrut or varanaa.
the right to swatantraaa of abhivyakti is pahachaanaa as a insaan sahi antargat Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of insaan Rights or recognized in international insaan adhikaron law in the antarrashtriya vachan on civil and rajnatik adhikaron ( iccpr ).
aalekh 19 of the ICCPR rajya ki `` [ e ] veryone shall have the sahi to tham raay without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to swatantraaa of abhivyakti ; is sahi shall shaamil swatantraaa to talash, praapt or impart information or vichaar of sab kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in chapai, in the form of art, or through koi anya media of uske choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to kah that the kasarat of ye adhikaron carries `` khaas duties or jimmedaariyon `` or may `` isliye be vishay to certain restrictions '' jab jaruri `` [ f ] or respect of the adhikaron or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of neshnal suraksha or of public anukram ( order public ), or of public health or morals ''.
swatantraaa of speech may be legally curtailed in some religious vidhik pranaaliyon or in dharmanirpeksh jurisdictions jahaan it is mila to cause dharmik thokar, aise as the angrejon jatigat and Religious Hatred Act 2006.
the Big bang siddhanth logo.
the Big Bang siddhanth is an American kamedi television shrenee nirmit or karypalika produced by chak lorre or vidheyak prady.
Like the naam of the shrenee itself, saath the excepshan of the pehla episode— '' payalat '' —episode sheershak of the big Bang siddhanth always start saath `` the '' or resemble the naam of a vaigyanik principle, siddhanth or prayog, whimsically referencing a plat point or quirk.
, 133 apisod have aired.
The big bang Theory rai maharoom navinikrut liye a saatvaan ritu.
dwite David `` ike '' ijanhavar ( sunaaya, ; October 14, 1890 – March 28, 1969 ) was the 34th adhyaksh of the sanyukt States isse 1953 jabatak 1961.
he had previously maharoom a five-star saamaanya in the sanyukt rajya Army during World yuddh ii or parosa as param Commander of the Allied Forces in europea ; he tha responsibility liye niyojan or supervising the akraman of uttar africa in aaparishan mashaal in 1942–43 or the successful invasion of frans or germany in 1944–45 from the pashchimi saamne.
In 1951, he became the first param commander of nato.
ijanhavar was of Pennsylvania dach ancestry or was reared in a vishaal parivaar in kansas by abhibhavak saath a majboot work ethic and dharmik prishthbhumi.
as one of six bete, he thi conditioned by a competitive maahaul which instilled self-reliance.
he attended or graduated isse West point or baad married or had two bete.
After World War ii, ijanhavar served as fouj mukhya of staff under President harry S. truman, tab assumed the post of President at colombia vishvavidhyalayon.
Eisenhower daalaa the 1952 adhyakshiya res as a republican to counter the non-interventionism of Senator robert A. taft or to crusade against `` samyavaadee, korian or bhrashtachar ''.
He jiti by a landslide, defeating democrate adlai stevenson or samaapti do dashakon of the nai saude Coalition.
in the pehla saal of uske presidency, ijanhavar deposed the netaa of iraan in the 1953 irani takhtapalat d'état and prayukt nabhikeey khatre to conclude the Korean yuddh saath china.
uske nai dekh niti of nabhikeey deterrence diya pradhanta to inexpensive nabhikeey weapons jabaki reducing the funding liye conventional sainya forces ; the lakshya thi to rakhana dabaav on the soviet sangh and reduce federal deficits.
in 1954, ijanhavar pehla articulated the domino siddhanth in uske varnan of the threat presented by the sprad of samyavaadee.
The Congress agreed to uske nivedan in 1955 liye the formosa rezolution, which enabled use to prevent chinis communist aakraamakata against chinis rashtravaadiyon and sthapit the U.S. niti of defending taiwan.
jab the soviets shubharambh sputnik in 1957, he tha to khel catch-up in the spes res.
ijanhavar majaboor Israel, the uk, or frans to samaapt unke akraman of mishra dauraan the suez sankat of 1956.
In 1958, he sent 15,000 US sainikon to lebanon to prevent the pro-western sarkari from falling to a Nasser -inspired kranti.
nikat the samaapt of uske term, uske praytn to set up a summit meeting saath the Soviets collapsed kuki of the U-2 ghatana.
on the gharelu front, he covertly opposed joseph maikaarthi or contributed to the samaapt of mccarthyism by khulkar invoking the modern expanded version of karypalika visheshadhikaar.
he varanaa left most rajnatik kaaryaklap to uske Vice adhyaksh, richard Nixon.
he thi a moderate roodhiwaadee jo jari nai Deal agencies or vistaarit soshal suraksha.
among his enduring navapravartanon, he launched the antarraji rajmarg pranali ; the raksha unnat shodh project Agency ( darpa ), jisase led to the antarjaal, among many invaluable output ; the neshnal aeronautics or Space prashasan ( NASA ), driving peaceful discovery in spes ; the sthapana of strong vigyaan education via the neshnal Defense Education adhinium ; and protsaahit shantipurna use of nabhikeey shakti via amendments to the parmaanu urja adhinium.
in soshal niti, he bheja sangheey troops to choti chattan, arkansaas, liye the first samay since Reconstruction to enforce sangheey court orders to desegregate public skulon.
he bhi signed civil adhikaron vidhaan in 1957 or 1960 to protect the sahi to vote.
he implemented desegregation of the armed forces in do saalo or bana paanch niyukti to the param Court.
he was the pehla term-limited president in accordance saath the 22nd amendment.
Eisenhower 's do sharten yahood shantipurna ones for the sabase bhaag and dekhi considerable economic samruddhi magar liye a sharp mandi in 1958–59.
ijanhavar is praayah kramit atyadhik among the U.S. Presidents.
Air force ek is the official air trekkic control kol sign of a sanyukt States air force vayuyan carrying the adhyaksh of the United rajya.
In aam parlance the term refers to those air force vayuyan specifically designed, nirmit, or used liye the purpose of transporting the adhyaksh.
the adhyakshiya vayuyan is a prominent symbol of the American presidency or its power.
The vichaar of designating vishisht sainya aircraft to hastantaran the adhyaksh arose in 1943, jab officials of the sanyukt rajya Army Air shaktiyaan – the purvavarti to the u.S. Air force – became chintit saath relying on vanijyik airlines to hastantaran the adhyaksh.
a c-87 muktivaadee express thi reconfigured for upyog as a presidential hastantaran ; however, it thi asweekrut by the rahasy Service amid concerns over the aircraft 's safety ricard.
a C-54 skymaster thi tab parivartit liye adhyakshiya upyog ; this vayuyan, utaavle the pavitra gaay, transported adhyaksh franklin D. rujvelt to the Yalta sammelan in February 1945, and thi subsequently used liye another do saalo by adhyaksh harry S. truman.
the `` air force One '' call chihn thi created baad a 1953 ghatana dauraan jisase a flight carrying adhyaksh dwite D. ijanhavar daalaa the vahi airspace as a vanijyik airline udaan using the same call chihn.
anek vayuyan have been used as air force One chunki the sristi of the adhyakshiya fleet, sahit do bowing 707s introduced in the 1960s or 1970s, kramshah ; chunki 1990, the adhyakshiya bede rai consisted of do bowing vc-25as – specifically vinyast, atyadhik customized bowing 747-200B series vayuyan.
the air Force is looking into replacing the do vc-25 vayuyan saath teen badalanaa vayuyan shuruuaat in 2017.
a vivaah varshganth is the varshganth of the tithi a vivaah took place.
paramparaagat names maujuud for sabase of unhen : for udhaaharan, 50 saalo of vivaah is called a `` sunahari vivaah varshganth '' or bas a `` golden varshganth ''.
a scanner with Duplexing swachaalit Document feader.
In multifunction or all-in-one printers, fax mashine, photocopiers and scanners, an swachaalit document feader or ADF is a visheshta jisase takes several prishthon or feeds the paper ek pej at a samay into a scinar or copier, allowing the upayokta to scan, or thereby nakal, chapai, or fax, multiple-page documents bagaiyr having to manually badalen each pej.
sabase copiers allow scanning on the flatsbed or platen ( the `` glass '' ) or through a dastauez feeder.
The vast bahumat of fax machines have an adf, allowing the unattended sending of multi-page faxes.
due to the ubiquity of adf in fax mashine, some fax yantra owners upyog the fax yantra as a scanner, faxing multi-page dastauez to themselves.
dastauez feeders hai varnit by speed, in prishthon per minute or ppm, or kshamta, praayah in a dayera isse 10 sheets to 200.
There are do kinds of document feeders capable of two-sided ( duplex ) scanning : a reversing automatic dastauez feader or radf scans one paksh of a pej, tab flips it or scans the anya paksh.
A duplexing automatic dastauez feeder or dadf scans dono sides in ek pass.
The laabh of the dadf is faster speed liye two-sided originals.
radfs and dadfs hai rated in bimb prati minute ( ipm ), the number of pahalu ve can scan prayek minute.
mela park is a recreational or educational complex located in dalas, texas ( USA ).
The complex is registered as a dalas landmark, National aitihaasik landmark or is home to nau museums, chah performance suvidhaayen, a lagoon, or the largest feris wheel in uttar america.
anek of the buildings on the complex yahood constructed liye the texas centennial exposition in 1936 jisase drew over chah million visitors.
Most of the imaaraten nirmit for the exposition still jivit or it is recognized as a significant example of Art Deco vaastukala.
Fair park rai been designated a great place in america by the amareeki niyojan sangh.
the amareeki niyojan Association ( apa ) “is an swatantra, not-for-profit shaikshanik organization that provides netritv in the development of vital communities.”
the Great sthaan in amareeki kaarykram helps to celebrate kshetron saath “exemplary character, visheshta, and planning.”
Being designated as a great place in america, mela park thi ek of only ten shaharon chuni in 2011.
san jose ( ; spani : st. joseph ) is the third-largest city in california, the tenth-largest in the u.S., or the county seat of santa clara county jisase is stith at the dakshini end of San francisco khadi.
san Jose is the largest city bheetar silicon ghati, which is a pramukh ghatak of the vrihad San Francisco khadi kshetrafal, a region of 8.4 lakh logon and the fifth largest mahanagar area ( CSA ) in the sanyukt rajya.
it is the largest city in uttari california.
san jose thi founded on November 29, 1777, as el pueblo de san José de guadalupe, the pehla civilian kasbaa in the spani upnivesh of Nueva california, which later became alta california.
the nagar parosa as a kheti jatiyaan to support spani sainya sansthapana at San francisco or monterey.
jab california gained statehood in 1850, san jose parosa as iske pehla puunji.
After more than 150 years as a choti kheti nagar, san jose or the surrounding santa Clara Valley became the last ( or largest ) sanlagn area of undeveloped jameen surrounding the san francisco khadi.
San jose anbhavi increased maang liye housing from sainiko or diggajon returning from sansar War II.
san jose tab continued iske aggressive vistaar during the 1950s and 1960s by annexing more land kshetrafal.
The rapid vikaas of the high-technology or electronics industries further accelerated the parivartan from an agricultural bich, to an urbanized mahanagar kshetrafal.
By the 1990s, san Jose 's sthaan within the booming local technology udyog earned the nagar its nickname, puunji of Silicon ghati.
san Jose abhi maintains vaishvik nagar status or is the largest nagar in the san francisco khadi Area in sharten of janasankhyikee, land kshetrafal, and audyogic vikaas.
The u.S. janasankhyikee beuro reported the janasankhyikee of the nagar to be 945,942 as of the 2010 janasankhyikee.
as of april 2013, the estimated janasankhyikee of San Jose thi 984,000.
San jose, along with the santa clara ghati, anbhavi parichay half a sadi of spectacular suburban sprawl, with visheshtaayen of intense shahari samaan to the los angeles kshetrafal of Southern california.
The nagar has liya definite kadam to avoid banane `` l.A. uttar ''.
however, the sprawl in San jose is badtar than in Los angeles by measures aise as janasankhyikee ghanatv or public transit suraksha, nivesh, and ridership.
europea depicted by antwerp cartographer abraham ortelius in 1595
The itihaas of Europe cover the logon inhabiting the europea mahadweep chunki it thi pehla populated in pragaitihaasik times to upasthit, saath the pehla homo sapiens arriving between 45,000 or 25,000 bc.
the earliest settlers to Prehistoric Europe came dauraan the paleolithic era.
the aagaman of krishi around 7000 bc ushered in the neolithic age.
Neolithic europea lasted for 4000 saalo, overlapping saath metal-using samskritiyon that dhire spread throughout the mahadweep.
technological agrim during the pragaitihaasik age tended to arrive isse the madhya East, spreading dhire to the uttarpashchim.
kuch of the best-known sabhyataaon of pragaitihaasik europea yahood minoai or Mycenaean, jisase flourished dauraan the Bronze Age jabatak ve collapsed in a choti kaal of samay around 1200 bc.
the period known as classical pracheenta began saath the vruddhi of the city-states of pracheen unaniyon.
Greek influence pahunche iske zenith antargat the expansive empire of Alexander the great, spreading throughout asia.
Northern or pashchimi Europe yahood varchasv by the la tène culture, a precursor to the celts.
Rome, a choti city-state traditionally founded in 753 BC, would grow to become the roman ganatantr in 509 bc and hota safal unani culture as the prabal Mediterranean sabhyataa.
the events of the niyam of julius seizar led to reorganization of the Republic into the roman samrajya.
the samrajya was baad vibhajit by the samraat diocletian into the pashchimi or purvi empires.
dauraan the baad saalo of the roman Empire, the germanic peoples of uttari Europe grew in shakti and doharaaya hamale led to the Fall of the pashchimi Roman samrajya in AD 476, a date jisase traditionally marks the end of the shastreey kaal or the start of the Middle Ages.
dauraan the Middle aayu, the purvi roman Empire batch, haalanki aadhunik historians refer to this rajya as the bizantin samrajya.
in pashchimi Europe, germanic peoples sthanantarit into positions of shakti in the remnants of the purv pashchimi Roman samrajya or established kingdoms or empires of unke own.
of sab of the germanic peoples, the franks hota vruddhi to a sthiti of Hegemony over pashchimi europea, the frankish samrajya reaching iske shikhar antargat sharalamen around ad 800.
francia thi divided into anek parts ; west francia hota evolve into the kingdom of France, jabaki east francia hota evolve into the paavan roman Empire, a precursor to aadhunik germany.
The angrejon Isles yahood the sait of several large-scale migrations.
Native celtic peoples had been marginalized dauraan the kaal of roman britain, or jab the Romans abandoned the British isles dauraan the 400s, lehren of germanic anglo-saxons migrated to dakshini britain or established a shrenee of kshudra kingdoms in kayaa would aakhirkaar develop into the kingdom of england by ad 927.
dauraan this kaal, the kingdom of candal or kingdom of hungarian ( 1000–1945 ) yahood organized as khub.
the viking aayu, a kaal of migrations of scandinavian peoples, varchasv the period isse the let 700s to the madhya 1000s.
mukhya among the viking rajya thi the Empire of cnut the great, a danish netaa who hota become king of england, Denmark, or Norway.
the normans, a viking logon jo settled in uttari frans or santhaapit the Duchy of normandy, hota have a significant impact on anek parts of Europe, isse the norman conquest of england to Southern italy and sicili.
another Scandinavian logon, the rus ' people, hota go on to mila kievan rus ', an jaldi rajya which thi a precursor liye the aadhunik country of rus.
As the viking aayu drew to a band, the period gyaat as the Crusades, a series of religiously-motivated sainya rijhaane originally intended to lao the levant waapas into isai niyam, began.
anek Crusader states yahood santhaapit in the purvi bumadhyasagariya.
These yahood sab short-lived.
the Crusaders would have a profound prabhaav on anek bhaag of europea.
unke bori of Constantinople in 1204 brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine samrajya.

a smart key is an electronic abhigam or praadhikaran pranali jisase is uplabdhiyaan as an option or standard in anek gaadiyaan.
It was first viksit by siemens in the mid-1990s or introduced by mercedes-benz antargat the naam `` keyless go '' in 1998 on the w220 s-class following iske design patent filed by Daimler-Benz on May 17, 1997.
Univisión ( ) is a spanish-language television sanjaal in the United States.
The sanjaal is primarily samarpit liye latin amareeki pariwaron jo reside in the sanyukt rajya.
it rai the largest darshak of spanish-language television darshak in the world according to Nielsen darja.
Randy falco, ( siio as of june 29, 2011 ) coo, rai maharoom in charge of the company since the prasthaan of Univision sanchaar adhyaksh or siio jo uva in April 2010.
in haal years the sanjaal has reached parity saath the U.S. 's paanch major english-language television sanjaal, or is praayah a damdaar fifth, outranking The cw, saath kuch fourth-place saptahik placings, or as of 2012, bhi pehla place rankings for vyaktigat kaarykram over sab five English sanjaal due to the sanjaal 's satat anusuchee of nai telenovelas all 52 saptaah of the year.
Univisión is headquartered in nai York, and has iske pramukh studios, production suvidhaayen, and parichaalan in doral, Florida, a upnagareey of miami.
in 2009, another television studio thi ghoshit, univision Studios, to be built in doral.
Univision is uplabdhiyaan on cabel or upgrah in sabase of the country, saath local stations in over 50 bazaar saath vishaal hispanic or Latino populations and a neshnal cabel sanjaal feed vitarit in bazaar without either the uplabdhta or the demand liye a locally-based station.
sabase of these stations air full local news or anya local programing in jod to sanjaal shows, or in major markets aise as los Angeles, nai york, or miami the local newscasts carried by the network 's owned-and-operated stesan ( o & O ) stations hai baraabar pratispardhi with unke english-language counterparts ratings-wise.
Univisión thi acquired on kooch 29, 2007 by a consortium led by Haim saban 's saban puunji samooh ( jo tha previously swaamitv the antity Saban entertainment ), TPG puunji, L.P., vidhaataa equity saajhedaar, medisson Dearborn saajhedaar, or thomas H. Lee Partners liye $ 13.7 billion or $ 36.25 prati share plus $ 1.4 billion in acquired karz.
The buyout baayein the company saath a karz str of twelve times its annual cash pravaah, jisase thi twice the norm in buyouts kiya over the pichhlaa do saalo.
kalakaar 's conception of a protoplanetary discs
the formation or of the saura pranali is estimated to have begun 4.6 billion years pehle with the gurutvkarshak patan of a small bhaag of a daanav molecular cloud.
Most of the collapsing dravyaman collected in the kendra, forming the Sun, jabaki the rest flattened into a aadigrah disk out of jisase the planets, moons, asteroids, or other small Solar System laashen formed.
is widely sweekrut model, gyaat as the nebular hypothesis, thi pehla developed in the 18th sadi by emanuel Swedenborg, Immanuel kant, or Pierre-Simon laplas.
iske subsequent vikaas has interwoven a kismein of scientific disciplines sahit astronomy, physics, geology, or grahiy vigyaan.
chunki the dawn of the spes age in the 1950s or the discovery of extrasolar grah in the 1990s, the model rai been dono challenged and refined to khaataa liye new observations.
The Solar System rai viksit considerably since its aarambhik gathan.
anek moons have formed from ghoomana discs of gas and dhul around unke janak grah, jabaki other moons are vichaar to have formed independently and baad maharoom captured by their grah.
still anya, as the dharti 's Moon, may be the result of daanav collisions.
takkaron between laashen have occurred continually up to the upasthit day or have maharoom central to the evolution of the Solar pranali.
The positions of the grah praayah shifted, and grah have switched sthaan.
This planetary migration is now thought to have maharoom jimmedaar liye much of the saura System 's jaldi evolution.
in roughly 5 billion years, the Sun will cool or expand outward many times its vartmaan vyas ( banane a red daanav ), pehle casting band its outer layers as a grahiy niharika or leaving peeche a stellar remnant gyaat as a white bouna.
In the dur dur bhavishya, the gambheertha of guzar stars hoga dhire reduce the surya 's retinue of grah.
kuch grah hoga be nasht, anya ejected into antartaarkeey space.
ultimately, over the course of tens of billions of years, it is sambhavit that the surya hoga be baayein with none of the asli laashen in kaksha around it.
the vichaaran ( Kafka 's asli germany sheershak :, later as, and ) is a novel likhaa by franj kafka in 1914 or 1915 lakin nahin prakashit jabatak 1925.
ek of kafka 's best-known works, it tells the story of a man giraftaar or prosecuted by a remote, inaccessible praadhikaar, saath the prakruti of uske crime nazil to neither use nor the reader.
jaise Kafka 's anya novels, The Trial thi never samaapt, haalanki it does shaamil a adhyay which brings the story to an end.
Because of is vahin hai nishchit inconsistencies jisase maujuud bheetar the anokhaa, such as disparities in samay in jod to other discontinuities in narration.
baad kafka 's death in 1924 his dost or saahitiyik executor adhiktam Brod edited the text for publication by verlag Die schmiede.
The asli pandulipi is yojit at the sangrahalay of Modern Literature, Marbach am neckar, germany.
in 1999, the kitaab thi listed in le mondes 100 kitabe of the sadi or as no. 2 of the Best German novels of the beesvin sadi.
lisa eni loeb ( born kooch 11, 1968 ) is an amareeki singer-songwriter or abhinetri.
wo shubharambh her career in 1994 with the song, `` Stay ( I chhuti You ) ``, jisase thi shaamil in the filmi vaastaviktaa Bites.
wo thi the pehla artist to have a kramank ek single in the United rajya while not hastakshrit to a recording anubandh.
uske paanch studio cds shaamil uske pramukh label debyue, the gold-selling Tails or iske follow-up, the Grammy-nominated, gold-selling pataakhaa.
loeb rai bhi worked in filmi, television, voice-over work or children’s recordings.
Loeb rai appeared in two television shrenee, dweezil & lisa, a weekly culinary adventure liye the Food Network or Number 1 Single, a reality dikhaaen on the e !
Network in 2006 kendrit on uske quest liye love, kamyaabi, kariyar, and parivaar.
uske children 's music shaamil the album kaich the Moon ( 2003 ), and shivi lisa ( 2008 ).
uske pehla sanyukt children 's book or album lisa loeb 's pagali sing-along : the niraashajanak pancek or Other Zany geeton thi prakashit in 2011.
in 2010 she santhaapit the lisa Loeb Eyewear Collection, jisase is based on uske apana designs.
The kot of bahen of the rajya of New jersey shamilaus:
a shield saath three plows emblazoned, pratinidhi of nai jersey 's agricultural tradition.
a forward-facing knight 's helmet.
A ghoda 's head as the crest of the helmet.
The female aankade swatantraaa or ceres, representative of the rajya 's motto ( dekhie aglaa item ).
swatantraaa is holding a staff supporting a `` swatantraaa cap `` ; ceres is pakadakar an overflowing cornucopia.
the streamer at the pair of the emblem contains the rajya motto of nai Jersey, `` Liberty and samruddhi '', and the saal of statehood, 1776.
it thi originally designed by Pierre ujin du Simitiere in 1777 and thi parivardhit slightly in 1928.
The seal is the central motiff in the dhvaj of nai jersey and the great muhar of the State of nai jersey.
the Coat of bahen contains a ghoda 's sir.
a helmet showing that New Jersey governs itself tadnusaar or teen plows on a shield referring to the rajya 's krishi tradition, giving it the upnaam `` Garden rajya ''.
the do deviyaan represent the rajya motto, `` Liberty or samruddhi ''.
Liberty is on the baayein.
wo is pakadakar a staff saath a liberty cap on it, and the shabd swatantraaa underneath uske.
the devi on the sahi is Ceres, devi of agriculture.
wo is pakadakar a cornucopia with samruddhi written neeche her.
according to the minutes of the New Jersey saamaanya Assembly for kooch 11, 1896, the tithi in which the sabha officially approved the dhvaj as the state emblem, the buff rang is due indirectly to george washington, jo had ordered on aktubar 2, 1779, ki the vardi coats of the nai Jersey mahadwipiya lakeer be andhera ( Jersey ) blue, saath buff facings.

`` we Can Work it out '' is a song by the betals, likhaa by paul McCartney or John lenon.

as a medical nidaan, pedophilia or paedophilia is a manorog vikaar in vyaktiyon 16 saalo of age or puraani typically characterized by a praathmik or vishesh sexual interest toward prepubescent children ( generally aayu 11 saalo or younger, though vishisht diagnosis criteria liye the vikaar extends the cut-off point liye prepubescence to aayu 13 ).
an adolescent who is 16 saalo of age or puraani jarur be at tanik paanch saalo older than the prepubescent child pehle the aakarshan can be diagnosed as pedophilia.
The term rai a range of definitions, as found in psychiatry, manovigyaan, the deshi, and vidhi pravartan.
the International vargeekaran of Diseases ( aisidi ) defines pedophilia as a `` vikaar of vayask vyaktitv or behaviour '' in jisase vahin is a sexual preference liye children of prepubertal or jaldi pubertal age.
according to the nidaan or Statistical Manual of dimagi vikaar ( dsm ), it is a paraphilia in jisase vayaskon or adolescents 16 saalo of aayu or older have teevr or tool sexual preranaayen towards or kalpanaaon about prepubescent children ki ve have either acted on or jisase kaaran unhen distress or interpersonal pareshaani.
In lokapriy upyog, pedophilia arthath koi yon byaaj in children or the act of child yon gaali, praayah termed `` pedophilic bartaav ''.
For udhaaharan, The amareeki viraasat stedman 's chikitsa shabdkosh states, `` pedophilia is the adhinium or kaalpanik on the part of an vayask of engaging in sexual kaaryaklap saath a child or children. ''
is aam upyog anuprayog also extends to the yon byaaj in and yon contact saath pubescent or post-pubescent naaballig.
Researchers sujhaayen ki ye imprecise upyog be avoided kuki haalanki people jo commit child sexual gaali commonly exhibit the disorder, kuch aparaadhiyon do nahin milen the naidanik nidaan maanakon for pedophilia or ye maanakon pertain to prepubescents.
additionally, not sab pedophiles darasal commit aise gaali.
Pedophilia thi pehla formally pahachaanaa or namit in the late 19th sadi.
a significant amount of shodh in the kshetrafal rai taken place since the 1980s.
haalanki mostly pralekhith in men, vahin are bhi mahilaon who exhibit the disorder, and shodhakartaaon assume uplabdhiyaan estimates underrepresent the sachcha number of maadaa pedophiles.
no ilaaj liye pedophilia rai been viksit, lakin there are therapies ki can reduce the incidence of a vyakti committing child yon abuse.
In the United rajya, following kansas v. hendricks, sex offenders jo hai diagnosed with nishchit dimagi vikaar, visheshkar pedophilia, can be vishay to indefinite civil patibaddhta, antargat vibhinn rajya laws ( generically pukaara SVP laws ) or the sangheey aadam walsh Child suraksha or suraksha Act of 2006.
At upasthit, the sateek kalyankari of pedophilia have nahin maharoom conclusively sthapit.
Research suggests that pedophilia may be correlated with anek different neurological abnormalities, and praayah co-exists saath other vyaktitv disorders and manovaigyanik pathologies.
in the contexts of forensic psychology or law enforcement, a variety of typologies have maharoom suggested to categorize pedophiles according to behavior or motivations.
Julio césar chávez ( born julio César Chávez gonzález on July 12, 1962 ) is a ritred mexican professional boxer.
chávez is mana by anek logon liye unke khel aankde the mahanatam senaanee kabhi to aaiye out of mexico.
he is a six-time world champion in three weight divisions, or liye anek saalo he was mana ek of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the sansar.
In a kariyar ki spanned over 25 saalo, chávez jiti paanch sansar titles in teen weight vibhaajan : wbc super featherweight in 1984, WBA lightweight in 1987, wbc lightweight in 1988, wbc lite Welterweight in 1989, ibf Light welterweight in 1990, and wbc Light welterweight in 1994.
He holds record liye sabase kaamyaab lagaataar defenses of sansar sheershak ( 27 ), sabase title jhagade ( 37 ), most title-fight victories ( 31 ) and he is baad jo lui with ( 23 ) for sabase sheershak defenses jiti by nokout ( 21 ).
chávez bhi rai the longest aparajit streak in boxing itihaas, 13 saalo.
uske ricard thi 89-0-1 going into uske pehla ghaataa to frenki randel or tha an 87 lado jeet streak jabatak his `` chithran '' with Whitaker.
julio César Chávez thi gyaat liye uske bakaayaa panching shakti, vinaashkari body akraman, remarkably damdaar chin or the athak stalking of uske pratidwandviyon.
He ranks # 24 on ESPN 's 50 mahanatam Boxers of sab Time.
on disambar 7, 2010, he thi inducted in the prestigious antarrashtriya Boxing haul of kirti liye the class of 2011.
He is the pita of prospect Omar chávez and purv WBC middleweight champion Julio césar Chávez, jr.

the holocaust ( isse the unani ' : hólos, `` whole '' or kaustós, `` jaale '' ) bhi gyaat as the shoah ( Hebrew :, hashoah, `` pralay '' ; yahudee :, churben or hurban, isse the yahudee liye `` vinaash '' ), thi the dravyaman hatya or genocide of lagbhag chah lakh Jews during sansar War II, a kaarykram of systematic state-sponsored hatya by Nazi germany, led by adolf Hitler or the Nazi Party, throughout german-occupied territory.
of the nau lakh Jews jo had resided in europea pehle the holocaust, lagbhag two-thirds yahood maare.
over ek lakh yahudee children yahood maare in the holocaust, as were lagbhag two lakh Jewish mahilaon or teen million yahudee main.
A sanjaal of over 40,000 suvidhaayen in germany and german-occupied territory yahood used to concentrate, tham, or kill yahudiyon and anya peediton.
kuch vidwaanon argue ki the mass murder of the Romani and logon with disabilities should be shaamil in the paribhaasha, or some upyog the aam noun `` holocaust '' to describe other naaji dravyaman murders, sahit those of soviet bandiyon of yuddh, polish or Soviet nagarikon, or homosexuals.
haal estimates based on aankade praapt chunki the patan of the soviet sangh indicates kuch ten to gyaarah lakh nagarikon or bandiyon of war yahood intentionally murdered by the naaji shashan.
the persecution and genocide were carried out in charan.
vibhinn laws to hataayen the yahudiyon isse civil samaaj, sabase prominently the nuremberg Laws, yahood enacted in Germany years pehle the outbreak of sansar yuddh ii.
Concentration shiviron yahood sthapit in which inmates were vasheebhoot to slave majdoor jabatak ve died of exhaustion or beemaari.
jahaan germany conquered nai territory in purvi europea, specialized ikai pukaara Einsatzgruppen murdered yahudiyon or rajnatik pratidwandviyon in mass shootings.
The occupiers jaruri yahudiyon or romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos pehle hone transported by haada tren to extermination camps jahaan, if they batch the yatra, sabase were systematically maare in gas chambers.
prayek bhujaa of Germany 's afasarshahi thi shaamil in the logisticks ki led to the genocides, turning the teesraa reich into kayaa one holocaust vidwaan rai pukaara `` a genocidal rajya ''.
4-h in the United rajya is a youth organization administered by the National santhaan of Food or Agriculture of the sanyukt rajya vibhaag of krishi ( usd ), saath the mission of `` engaging yuvavastha to pahunchein unke fullest sambhavit while advancing the field of yuvavastha vikaas. ''
The naam represents chaar nijee vikaas areas of fokas for the sanghathan : sir, dil, hands, or swasthya.
the sanghathan rai over 6.5 million sadasyon in the sanyukt rajya, from aayu paanch to twenty-one, in lagbhag 90,000 club.
The goal of 4-h is to develop naagarikta, netritv, jimmedaari or jivan kaushal of yuvavastha through experiential learning kaarykram or a dhanatmak yuvavastha vikaas drushtikon.
haalanki typically vichaar of as an agriculturally kendrit sanghathan as a result of its itihaas, 4-h aaj focuses on naagarikta, healthy living, vigyaan, abhiyantriki, and praudyogiki kaarykram.
aaj, 4-h or sambandhit kaarykram maujuud in over assi deshon around the sansar ; the sanghathan or prashasan varies isse desh to country.
Each of ye kaarykram operates independently, lakin cooperatively through antarrashtriya exchanges, global shiksha kaarykram, or sanchaar.
the 4-h motto is `` To mek the behtareen better '', while iske slogan is `` Learn by doing '' ( sometimes likhaa as `` Learn to do by doing '' ).
the neshnal dhvaj of Chile, consists of do gairbarabari horizontal bands of white or red and a blue vargakar the vahi oonchaai as the shwet band in the canton, jisase bears a shwet five-pointed star in the bich.

virginia ( ), officially the rashtramandal of virginia, is a U.S. state stith in the dakshin Atlantic pradesh of the sanyukt States.
Virginia is nicknamed the `` Old Dominion '' and the `` Mother of raashtrapatiyon '' after the aath U.S. raashtrapatiyon born vahin.
the bhugol or jalwaayu of the rashtramandal hai taraasha by the blue lakeeren kyu and the chesapeake Bay, which provide awaas for much of iske flora and fauna.
the puunji of the rashtramandal is richmond ; or virginia Beach is the sabase populous city.
Fairfax county is the sabase populous political subdivision.
the wealthiest is Loudoun county.
the rashtramandal 's janasankhyikee is over eight lakh.
the kshetrafal 's history begins saath several indigenous samooh, including the powhatan.
In 1607 the London company sthapit the upnivesh of virginia as the first sthai nai sansar angrezi colony.
slave labor and the jameen acquired isse displaced Native amareeki janajatiyon each nibhaai a significant bhoomika in the colony 's jaldi raajnneeti or vriksharopan economy.
virginia was ek of the 13 colonies in the amareeki kranti and joined the Confederacy in the American civil yuddh, dauraan which Richmond was bana the Confederate puunji or virginia 's northwestern counties seceded to rup the rajya of west Virginia.
haalanki the rashtramandal thi antargat roodhiwaadee single-party niyam liye nearly a sadi following Reconstruction, both major neshnal partiyon hai competitive in modern virginia.
The virginia saamaanya sabha is the oldest vidhanmandal in the pashchimi golardh.
the rajya sarkari rai been repeatedly ranked sabase effective by the pew bich on the rajya.
it is unique in kaisaa it treet shaharon or counties baraabar, manages local sadaken, or prohibits iske rajyapalon from sevarat lagaataar sharten.
virginia 's arthvyavastha rai anek sector : krishi in the Shenandoah Valley ; federal agenciyon in uttari virginia, sahit the mukhyalay of the Department of Defense or siie ; or sainya suvidhaayen in Hampton sadaken, the sait of the pradesh 's main seaport.
virginia 's public skulon or anek collejon or vishvavidhyalayon have contributed to growing media or praudyogiki sector.
as a parinaam, computer chips have become the rajya 's agrani export.

`` brenda 's mila A baby '' is the solo debyue single by tupak Shakur, and tenth track isse uske debyue album, 2Pacalypse abhi.
The song, jisase suvidhaayen r & b singer dev hollister, is parichay a twelve year-old ladki namit Brenda jo lives in a ghetto, has a baby, or is incapable of supporting it.

the official logo of pokimon liye iske international release ; `` pokimon '' is choti liye the original japani title of `` Pocket Monsters ''.
is a media franchise published or swaamitv by japani video khel company Nintendo or nirmit by satoshi tajiri in 1996.
originally released as a pair of interlinkable Game ladke role-playing video khel viksit by khel freak, pokimon rai chunki become the second-most successful or lucrative video game-based media matadhikaar in the sansar, peeche only nintendo 's apana mario franchise.
pokimon gun have chunki maharoom merchandised into dushmani, manga, vyapaar taash, khilone, kitabe, or anya media.
The matadhikaar celebrated in 2006, or, sanchayi bikri of the video khel ( sahit home consol sanskaran, such as the `` pikachu '' Nintendo 64 ) have pahunche more than 200 lakh copies.
in navambar 2005, 4kids entertainment, jisase tha prabandhit the non-game sambandhit licencing of Pokémon, announced ki it tha sahamat not to navinikrut the pokimon representation agreement.
pokimon uese inc. ( abhi the Pokémon company International ), a subsidiary of japani 's pokimon co., now oversees sab pokimon licensing baahar of asia.
the name pokimon is the romanized sankuchan of the Japanese brands.
The term pokimon, in addition to referring to the pokimon franchise itself, bhi collectively refers to the 649 fictional species ki have made dikhaave in Pokémon media as of the release of the paanchvaan peedhee sheershak pokimon Black 2 or shwet 2 ; with the aagaamee relies of pokimon x and y, 6 new pokimon have maharoom pradarshit in promotions liye the khel.
`` pokimon '' is ekasmaan in dono the ekvachan or bahuvachan, as is prayek vyaktigat prajati name ; it is grammatically sahi to say `` ek pokimon '' and `` anek pokimon '', as khub as `` ek pikachu `` and `` many Pikachu ''.
cover of the pehla edition of the prakaashan dada by tristan tzara ; jurikh, 1917
Dada ( ) or dadaism thi an art movement of the europea avant-garde in the jaldi 20th sadi.
Many arji dada began in jurikh, Switzerland in 1916, spreading to Berlin shortly thereafter lakin the height of New York dada thi the saal pehle in 1915.
To uddhran donna budd 's the bhashaa of art gyaan, Dada was born out of negative pratikriya to the horrors of World yuddh i.
This antarrashtriya gati thi begun by a samooh of kalakaar and poets sambhddha saath the cabre voltare in jurikh.
dada asweekrut reason or logic, prizing bakawaas, irrationality and antargyaan.
The origin of the naam dada is unclear ; some maananaa ki it is a nonsensical shabd.
Others maintain that it originates from the Romanian kalakaaron tristan tzara and marsal Janco 's frequent upyog of the words da, da, meaning yas, yas in the Romanian bhashaa.
another siddhanth says that the name `` dada '' aae dauraan a baithak of the group jab a paper knife stuck into a french-german shabdkosh happened to point to 'daday ', a french word liye 'hobbyhorse '.
the gati primarily shaamil vizual kala, sahitya, poetry, art manifestoes, art siddhanth, theatre, and graphic design, or concentrated its anti-war politics through a asweekruti of the prachlit maanakon in art through anti-art cultural works.
in addition to hone anti-war, dada thi bhi anti- bourgeois or tha political affinities with the radical baayein.
dada activities shaamil public gatherings, demonstrations, or prakaashan of art/literary jarnals ; passionate kawarej of art, politics, and samskruti yahood vishay praayah discussed in a kismein of media.
kunjee aankade in the movement shaamil hugo Ball, emi hennings, hans Arp, Raoul hausmann, hanna höch, Johannes baader, Tristan tzara, francis picabia, Richard Huelsenbeck, georg grosz, jon heartfield, marsal duchamp, Beatrice Wood, court schwitters, and Hans Richter, among anya.
The gati influenced baad sheliyaan jaise the avant-garde or shahar music movements, or groups sahit surrealism, Nouveau réalisme, pop art and fluxus.
dada is the groundwork to amoort art or dhwani poetry, a starting point liye pradarshan art, a prelude to postmodernism, an influence on pop art, a jashn of antiart to be baad embraced for anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the gati ki lay the nyaas liye surrealism.
First trophic str.
the paudhe in is chitra, or the shaiwal or phytoplankton in the lake, hai praathmik nirmaataa.
ve take nutrients isse the soil or the jal, and manufacture unke apana khaanaa by photosynthesis, using urja isse the sun.
the trophic str of an organism is the position it occupies in a khaanaa chain.
the shabd trophic garbhashayi from the unani τροφή ( trophē ) referring to khaanaa or feeding.
a food kadi represents a uttaradhikaar of jeevon that kha another organism or hai, in phere, khaaya themselves.
the number of kadam an organism is isse the prarambh of the chain is a measure of its trophic str.
khaanaa zanjeeron prarambh at trophic level 1 with praathmik nirmaataa aise as paudhe, move to herbivores at str 2, parabhakshi at str 3 or typically samaapt saath carnivores or apex parabhakshi at str 4 or 5.
the path saath the kadi can rup either a one-way pravaah, or a food `` web. ''
Ecological communities saath ucchtar biodiversity rup adhik jatil trophic raahen.
Four of the sabase mahatvapurn domesticated resha moths.
sheersh to neeche : bombyx mori, hyalophora cecropia, Antheraea pernyi, samia sinthia.
From mayers konversations-lexikon ( 1885-1892 )
a silk-producing raspy cricket.
resha is a natural protein fibre, kuch form of jisase can be woven into vastra.
The protein fibre of resha is rachit mukhyatah of fibroin or utpaadit by nishchit keet larve to form cocoons.
The best-known type of resha is praapt isse the cocoons of the larvae of the shahatut silkworm bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ).
the shimmering appearance of silk is due to the triangular prism -like structure of the silk fibre, jisase allows resha cloth to refract incoming lite at different kone, yun producing alag colors.
silks are produced by anek anya insects, lakin generally only the resha of shalab caterpillars has been prayukt liye vastra manufacturing.
vahin has maharoom kuch shodh into other silks, jisase differ at the molecular level.
anek silks hai mukhyatah utpaadit by the larve of keet undergoing puraa metamorphosis, lakin kuch vayask insects such as webspinners upaj resha, or some keet aise as raspy crickets upaj resha throughout their jeevandaan.
resha production also occurs in Hymenoptera ( bees, wasps, or ants ), silverfish, mayflies, thrips, leafhoppers, bhring, lacewings, fleas, udata or midges.
anya prakaar of sandhipad produce resha, sabase notably vibhinn arachnids aise as makadiyon ( dekhie makadi silk ).
let dikhaaen saath daud letterman is an American late-night talk dikhaaen hosted by daud Letterman on CBS.
the show debuted on agast 30, 1993, or is produced by letterman 's utpaadan company, vishwavyaapee Pants incorporated.
The dikhaaen 's music director or band-leader of the house band, the sibies Orchestra, is paul shaffer.

of the pramukh u.S. late-night programs, let dikhaaen baandhane duusari in sanchayi average darshak over samay and teesraa in kramank of apisod over samay.
The dikhaaen lead anya late night shows in ad aay with $ 271 lakh in 2009.
in sabase u.S. markets the dikhaaen airs at 11:35 p.m. Eastern/Pacific time, lakin is ankit somvaar through buudhvaar at 4:30 p.m., or Thursdays at 3:30 p.m or 6:00 p.m.
the duusari guuruuvaar episode usually airs on Friday of ki saptaah.

the Real Housewives of naarangi county is an American reality documentary television kaarykram on braavo, set in naarangi county, California.
it was the pehla The Real housewives kaarykram in the shrenee.
the shrenee is a voyeuristic dekh into the wealthy jeevandaan of ye housewives, as ve duukaan, milengi plastic surgery, gapshap, lado and sajiv lavishly.
The financial sankat, the shuruuaat of jisase coincided almost exactly saath the pehla ritu 's broadcast, rai since trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles with job nuksaan, evictions, mortgage defaults, foreclosures, or marital stress—all ankit in progressive seasons of the dikhaaen.
cyberstalking is the upyog of the antarjaal or anya electronic arthath to stalk or harass an vyaktigat, a samooh of individuals, or an sanghathan.
It may shaamil the bananaa of false accusations or kathan of fact ( as in defamation ), nigaraanee, bananaa threats, identity chori, kshati to aankada or upkaran, the solicitation of naaballig liye sex, or gathering soochna ki may be prayukt to harass.
the paribhaasha of `` utpeedan '' jarur milen the maandand ki a uchit vyakti, in kabza of the vahi soochna, hota lihaaz it as sufficient to cause another uchit vyakti takalif.
cyberstalking is alag isse sthanik or ofline stalking in that it occurs through the upyog of electronic sanchaar technology aise as the antarjaal.
however, it sometimes lead to it, or is accompanied by it.
dono hai criminal offenses.
cyberstalking saajha mahatvapurn visheshtaayen saath ofline stalking.
Many stalkers – online or band – are motivated by a khwaahish to control unke peediton.
a cyberstalker may be an online ajanabi or a person jisko the nishaanaa knows.
A cyberstalker may be benaam or may solicit involvement of other people online jo do nahin bhi know the target.
Cyberstalking is a dand thokar that aata into khel antargat rajya anti-stalking laws, badanaami kanoon, and utpeedan kanoon.
a cyberstalking conviction can parinaam in a restraining order, pariviksha, or bhi dand dand viruddh the assailant, sahit karawas.
a kaarobaar letter is praayah prayukt when writing isse ek company to another, or liye patrachaar between aise sanghathan or unke graahak, client or other bahya partiyon.
the overall style of akshar hoga depend on the relationship between the partiyon chintit.
vahin are many kaaran to likhen a kaarobaar akshar.
It could be to nivedan sidhaa soochna or karrwai isse another party, to anukram aapurtiyan isse a pradaayak, to pahachaano a mistake that thi vachanabaddh, to reply directly to a request, to apologize liye a galat or simply to convey goodwill.
bhi aaj, the business letter is still bahut upyogi kuki it produces a sthai ricard, is gopneey, aupchaarik or delivers persuasive, well-considered sandesh.
Tilapia ( ) is the aam name liye nearly a sau prajati of cichlid machhlee isse the tilapiine cichlid janajati.
tilapia hai mukhyatah freshwater machhlee, inhabiting uthle stream, ponds, nadiyaan or jhiilon, or less commonly found jeena in brackish water.
historically, they have been of pramukh mahatv in artisan fishing in africa or the levant, or are of increasing mahatv in aquaculture.
tilapia can become samasyapurna invasive species in nai warm-water habitats, whether deliberately or accidentally introduced, lakin generally nahin in shitoshna climates due to their aakshamata to jivit in cooler waters neeche parichay.
turnar & hooch is a 1989 kamedi naatak aparaadhon filmi abhinit tom Hanks or beasley the Dog as the eponymous characters, Turner or Hooch kramshah.
the film bhi stars ghodi Winningham, craig T. nelson, or reginald veljohnson.
It thi directed by roger Spottiswoode ; the filmi thi originally slated to be nirdeshit by Henry winkler, lakin he was terminated due to `` creative differences ''.
it was co-written by Michael blodgett isse pare the ghati of the doll fame.
haalanki K-9 ( saath James belushi ) thi released prior to is filmi ( exactly three months pehle ), turnar & hooch became adhik lokapriy or seemingly overshadowed iske vrihad success, bhi haalanki K-9 had a very samaan plat.
a pilot liye a turnar & Hooch tv shrenee was bana or ran as a part of The jaadui sansar of Disney.

adolf hitler ( ; 20 april 1889 – 30 April 1945 ) was an austria -born germany rajaneta and the netaa of the Nazi Party ( ( NSDAP ) ; neshnal Socialist German majdoor party ).
He thi chancelar of germany isse 1933 to 1945 and taanashaah of naaji germany ( as Führer und reichskanzler ) isse 1934 to 1945.
hitler thi at the centre of naaji germany, World yuddh ii in europea, and the Holocaust.
Hitler thi a decorated veteran of sansar yuddh i.
He joined the German Workers ' Party ( precursor of the nsdap ) in 1919, or became netaa of the NSDAP in 1921.
in 1923, he attempted a takhtapalat d'état in Munich, gyaat as the bear Hall putsch.
the failed takhtapalat resulted in hitler 's karawas, during which samay he likhaa his sansmaran, mein kemff ( My sangharsh ).
baad uske relies in 1924, hitler gained popular support by attacking the sandhi of versailles or promoting pan-germanism, antisemitism, or anti-communism with charismatic chaaye and naaji prachaar.
baad uske niyukti as chancellor in 1933, he transformed the Weimar ganatantr into the teesraa Reich, a single-party taanaashaahee aadhaarit on the totalitarian or nirankush vichaardhaara of natsivaad.
hitler 's aim thi to establish a nai Order of absolute naaji German aadhipaty in mahadwipiya europea.
to is end, uske videshi or domestic policies tha the uddeshy of seizing lebensraum ( `` living spes '' ) liye the germanic logon.
He directed the rearmament of Germany or the akraman of candal by the Wehrmacht in sitambar 1939, resulting in the outbreak of sansar yuddh ii in europea.
antargat hitler 's niyam, in 1941 germany forces or unke europea allies occupied most of europea or uttar africa.
In 1943, Germany had maharoom forced onto the rakshaatmak or suffered a shrenee of escalating defeats.
in the final dinon of the yuddh, dauraan the battle of Berlin in 1945, hitler married uske long-time partner, eva braun.
on 30 April 1945, kam than do dinon baad, the do vachanabaddh suicide to avoid capchar by the red Army, or unke shavon yahood burned.
hitler 's aggressive videshi policy is mana the pramukh kaaran of the outbreak of World War ii in europea.
uske antisemitic nitiyon and racially prerit vichaardhaara resulted in the mauton of at tanik 5.5 lakh yahudiyon, and lakho of anya people deemed racially avar.

a domen naam is an pahchaan string that defines a realm of administrative swaittata, authority, or control on the antarjaal.
Domain names hai formed by the niyam and prakriyaaon of the domen Name pranali ( DNS ).
technically, any naam panjikrut in the dnes is a domen name.
domen names hai used in various netwarking contexts or application-specific namakaran or sambodhit uddeshy.
in saamaanya, a domain name represents an antarjaal protocol ( IP ) resource, aise as a nijee computer prayukt to abhigam the antarjaal, a sarwar computer hosting a web sait, or the web sait itself or koi anya service communicated via the Internet.
Domain names hai organized in subordinate str ( subdomains ) of the dnes root domen, jisase is nameless.
the first-level set of domen names hai the top-level domen ( TLDs ), sahit the generik top-level domains ( gtlds ), such as the prominent domains com, soochna, net and org, or the desh code top-level domen ( cctlds ).
neeche ye top-level domen in the dnes padanukram hai the second-level or third-level domen names that hai typically open liye reservation by end-users who kaash to connect local kshetrafal sanjaal to the antarjaal, banaaen other saream accessible antarjaal sansaadhan or chalaaen web site.
The registration of ye domain names is praayah administered by domen naam registrars jo sell unke services to the public.
a fully yogya domen naam ( fqdn ) is a domen name ki is completely specified in the padanukram of the dnes, having no omitted parts.
Domain names hai praayah likhaa in loarkes, haalanki labals in the domen naam pranali hai case-insensitive.

These nitrate esters hai a specialized class of visphotak.
A gehun kataai in idaho
is photo from a 1921 encyclopedia shows a tractor ploughing a crop field.
Agriculture is a major udyog in the sanyukt rajya or the desh is a jaal exporter of khaanaa.
as of the pichhlaa janasankhyikee of krishi in 2007, vahin were 2.2 lakh kheto, covering an kshetrafal of, an average of prati farm.
haalanki agricultural activity occurs in sabase rajya, it is visheshkar concentrated in the vishaal expanse of chapata, arable jameen gyaat as the great maidan, jisase encompasses the central pradesh of the nation.
the Mpemba prabhaav, namit after tanzanian student erasto mpemba, is the assertion ki warmer water can fries tej than colder water.
haalanki vahin is anecdotal support liye the effect, there is no anubandh on exactly kayaa the prabhaav is and under what halaaton it occurs.
vahin have maharoom reports of samaan phenomena chunki pracheen times, haalanki with insufficient vivaran liye the claims to be replicated.
the ghatana seems contrary to thermodynamics, lakin a number of sambhavit spashtikaran liye the prabhaav have been prastaavit.
Further investigations hoga need to decide on a precise paribhaasha of `` freezing '' or control a vishaal kramank of starting parameters in anukram to confirm or bataaiye the effect.
the siamese (, ) is one of the pehla distinctly recognized breeds of Oriental cat.
the nasl originated in Thailand ( formerly gyaat as siam ), jahaan they hai ek of several native breeds or hai pukaara wichian mat ( วิเชียรมาศ, a name meaning `` chandramaa diamond '' ).
in the 20th sadi the Siamese billi became ek of the sabase popular breeds in europea or uttar america.
Quality khaanaa Centers ( QFC ) is a supermarket kadi based in bellevue, washington, with 64 stores in the puget dhwani pradesh of washington state or in the portland, oregon mahanagar kshetrafal.
in economics, the dhan supply or dhan bhandar, is the kul amount of monetary assets uplabdhiyaan in an arthvyavastha at a vishisht samay.
vahin are anek tareeke to define `` dhan, '' but maanak upayon usually shaamil currency in parisancharan or maang deposits ( jamakartaon ' easily pahunchaa asset on the books of financial sansthaanon ).
dhan supplai aankada hai ankit and prakashit, praayah by the sarkari or the central bank of the desh.
Public or nijee sector vishleshkon have long monitored parivartan in money supplai kuki of its effects on the daam level, mahangaai, the exange rate or the business saikil.
ki sambandh between dhan and keemten is historically associated saath the maatra theory of money.
vahin is strong empirical pramaan of a direct sambandh between money-supply vikaas and long-term price mahangaai, at tanik liye rapid increases in the raashi of dhan in the arthvyavastha.
ki is, a desh aise as zimbabwe jisase saw rapid increases in its dhan supplai bhi dekhi rapid increases in keemten ( hyperinflation ).
is is one reason liye the reliance on maudrik niti as a arthath of controlling mahangaai.
the prakruti of this causal chain is the vishay of contention.
kuch shaast arthshaastriyon argue that the money supplai is endogenous ( sankalpit by the workings of the arthvyavastha, nahin by the central bank ) or that the strot of mahangaai must be found in the distributional dhaancha of the economy.
In addition, those economists dekhakar the central bainko 's control over the money supply as feeble kah ki vahin hai do kamjor kadi between the vikaas of the dhan supply and the inflation rate.
pehla, in the aftermath of a mandi, jab anek resources are underutilized, an badhayen in the dhan supply can kaaran a sustained badhayen in real utpaadan instead of mahangaai.
duusari, if the gati of dhan, i.e., the anupaat between nominal jidipi or dhan supplai, changes, an increase in the dhan supplai could have either no effect, an atiranjit prabhaav, or an manamaujee effect on the vikaas of nominal jidipi.

imax rai the kshamta to ricard or display bimb of dur vrihad aakaar or rezolution than conventional filmi pranaaliyon.
Since 2002, some feature films have maharoom converted ( or upgraded ) into imax format for pradarshak in imax theatre or kuch have also been partially shot in IMAX.
imax is the sabase widely prayukt pranali liye special-venue film presentations.
, there hai 697 imax theatres in 52 deshon.

a political organization is constitutional to the extent ki it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of power control liye the suraksha of the interests and liberties of the citizenry, sahit those that may be in the alpsankhyak ``.

an ice-cream headache, bhi gyaat as dimag fries, cold-stimulus sirdard, or iske die scientific name sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( arth `` tantrika pidaa of the sphenopalatine gandika `` ), is a rup of bread cranial pidaa or sirdard commonly associated saath khapat ( visheshkar jaldi khapat ) of cold peya or bhojan aise as barf cream and barf chabutare.
It is caused by having kuch cold touch the roof of the munh ( palate ), or is believed to parinaam isse a nerve jawaab causing rapid constriction and sujan of rakt vessels or a `` referring `` of pidaa isse the chat of the munh to the head.
the rate of seven for thanda foods has maharoom padhai as a contributing factor.
There are logon who can nahin anubhav `` dimag fries '' or similar lakshan.
the pad ice-cream headache rai been in upyog chunki at least 31 janvari 1937, contained in a journal pravishti by rebeka Timbres prakashit in the 1939 book we kiya n't pucho utapia : a quaker parivaar in soviet rus.
the pehla published use of the pad dimag fries, as it pertains to cold-induced headaches, thi on 27 may 1991.
`` auld laing Syne '' ( : note `` s '' balki than `` z '' ) is a scots kavita likhaa by Robert burns in 1788 or set to the dhun of a paramparaagat lok song ( roud # 6294 ).
it is khub known in many deshon, visheshkar in the english-speaking sansar ; iske paramparaagat upyog hone to celebrate the start of the nai Year at the stroke of midnight.
By extension, it is bhi sung at funerals, graduations and as a vidaai or ending to anya occasions.
The antarrashtriya ladke Scout yuvavastha gati, in anek deshon, upyog it as a band to jamborees and anya krityon.
The song 's scots sheershak may be anudit into angrezi literally as `` boodha long since '', or adhik idiomatically, `` long long pehle '', `` dinon gaye by '' or `` boodha times ''.
Consequently `` liye auld laing syne '', as it appears in the first line of the kores, might be loosely anudit as `` for ( the khatir of ) old times ''.
the phrase `` Auld laing Syne '' is bhi prayukt in samaan kavitaayen by robert Ayton ( 1570–1638 ), allan ramsay ( 1686–1757 ), or james watasan ( 1711 ) as well as puraani folk geeton predating Burns.
mathew fitt upyog the phrase `` in the dinon of auld laing syne '' as the samatuly of `` ekbar upon a samay...
`` in his retelling of fairy kisse in the scots bhashaa.

leeroy janakins, sometimes misspelled leroy janakins and praayah elongated saath numerous additional letters, is an antarjaal meme namit liye a khilaadi akshar created by ben schulz in blizzard Entertainment 's mmorpg, sansar of Warcraft.
the akshar became popular due to a video of the game that parichaalit around the Internet.

auskar grant thi fatally shot by bart police officer yohaness Mehserle in ockland, California, sanyukt rajya, in the early morning hours of nai saal 's Day 2009.
Responding to reports of a lado on a bheed khadi kshetrafal rapid Transit train returning isse san francisco, bart police adhikariyon detained Oscar grant or anek other yatri on the manch at the fruitvale bart Station.
adhikari yohaness Mehserle and another adhikari were restraining grant, jo thi prostrate and allegedly resisting giraftaar.
adhikari mehserle stood or, according to gavaah, kaha : `` milengi waapas, i 'm gon na tase him. ''
Then mehserle khinchaa uske gan or shot grant ekbar in the waapas ; Mehserle appeared dang, put his hands to uske sir and exclaimed, `` Oh, my God ! ''
During his court gavaahi, mehserle kaha ki grant then exclaimed, `` tum shot me ! ''
Grant turned out to be unarmed ; he thi sunaaya dead the aglaa morning at Highland hospital in ockland.
the events were captured on anek digital video or koshika phone camere.
The footage was disseminated to media outlets or to vibhinn websiton, jahaan it thi dekhi lakho of times.
the following dinon saw both shantipurna or hinsak protests.
the shooting rai been variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter or a saransh nishpaadan.
on janvari 13, Alameda County prosecutors charge mehserle saath hatya liye the shooting.
he resigned uske position or pleaded nahin apradhi.
the trial began on june 10, 2010.
maaikel Rains, mehserle 's dand raksha attorney, argued ki mehserle mistakenly shot Grant saath his pistol, intending to upyog his taasir jab he saw Grant reaching liye uske waistband.
pretrial filings argue that uske client kiya nahin commit first-degree hatya and poocha a Los angeles nyaayadhish to instruct the juri to seemaa its deliberations to either second-degree hatya or acquittal.
Oakland civil adhikaron attorney John burris daayar a $ 25 lakh wrongful death arji against bart on behalf of grant 's parivaar.
on July 8, 2010, the jury returned its verdict : mehserle was found apradhi of involuntary manslaughter or nahin apradhi of second-degree hatya and voluntary manslaughter.
Initial virodh viruddh the sattadhari yahood peacefully vyavasthit ; luutane, aagjanee, vinaash of property, and choti dange broke out after dark.
Nearly 80 people yahood aakhirkaar giraftaar.
on shuukravaar, july 9, 2010, the U.S. Justice vibhaag opened a civil rights maamla viruddh mehserle ; the sangheey sarkari can prosecute use independently liye the vahi adhinium antargat the pruthak adhipati excepshan to double jeopardy.
the vibhaag of insaaf will be working with the u.S. attorney 's daftar in San francisco or the FBI.
On navambar 5, 2010, mehserle thi sentenced to do saalo, minus samay parosa.
He parosa uske samay in the los Angeles county karawas, occupying a nijee cell dur isse other bandiyon.
he thi released on june 13, 2011 and is abhi on parole.
Major pratinidhi of the Harlem Renaissance.
the harlem Renaissance thi a cultural gati ki spanned the 1920s.
at the samay, it thi gyaat as the `` nai nigro gati '', named after the 1925 anthology by alain locke.
Though it was kendrit in the harlem neighborhood of nai york nagar, anek french-speaking black lekhak isse African and caribbean colonies jo jiya in paris yahood bhi bahekaave by the harlem punarjagran.
the harlem Renaissance is unofficially recognized to have spanned from about 1919 until the jaldi or mid-1930s.
anek of iske vichaar jiya on much longer.
The zenith of is `` flowering of nigro sahitya '', as james weldon johnson pasandida to kol the harlem punarjagran, thi lagaai between 1924 ( the year ki avasar : a jarnal of nigro Life hosted a party liye blike lekhak jahaan anek shwet publishers were in upasthiti ) or 1929 ( the saal of the bhandar market krash and the shuruuaat of the great Depression ).
African rajya between 500 BCE or 1500 ce
obelisk at temple of luxsar, mishra.
c. 1200 BCE.
africa nit of baguirmi in full padded armour suut.
The history of africa begins saath the prehistory of Africa or the emergence of homo sapiens in East Africa, continuing into the present as a patchwork of vividh or nitiyaan vikasshil swadesh rajya.
kuch jaldi pramaan of krishi in africa tithiyaan from 16,000 bce, and metallurgy isse parichay 4000 BCE.
the recorded itihaas of jaldi sabhyataa arose in Egypt, and baad in nubia, the magarib and the Horn of Africa.
dauraan the Middle aayu, islam sprad through the regions.
Crossing the magarib or the Sahel, a pramukh bich of muslim culture was Timbuktu.
Some notable pre-colonial rajya or societies in africa include the nok culture, Mali samrajya, ashanti samrajya, Kingdom of Mapungubwe, Kingdom of jya, Kingdom of Saloum, kingdom of baol, kingdom of Zimbabwe, kingdom of kongo, pracheen karthej, numidia, mauretania, the akasumi samrajya, the Ajuuraan rajya or the Adal sultanate.
isse the late 15th sadi, europeans and arabs took slave from west, central or southeast Africa overseas in the africa slave vyapaar.
europea colonization of africa viksit rapidly in the hathapayee liye Africa of the let 19th and jaldi 20th centuries.
following struggles liye swatantraaa in anek bhaag of the mahadweep, as khub as a weakened europea after the duusari World yuddh ; decolonization took place.
africa 's itihaas rai maharoom chunauteepurn liye shodhakartaaon in the field of africa studies because of the killat of likhaa strot in vishaal parts of sub-saharan Africa.
scholarly takneekon such as the recording of maukhik history, historical linguistics, puraatatv or anuvanshiki have been nirnaayak.
Curry foli thi the pehla khilaadi in pramukh lig besabaal itihaas to hit liye the cycle.
in besabaal, hitting liye the saikil is the accomplishment of ek batter hitting a single, a doguna, a triple, or a ghar run in the same khel.
collecting the hits in ki order is known as a `` prakritik saikil ''.
chakra hai uncommon in pramukh lig Baseball ( emelbi ), and have occurred 294 times chunki the first by Curry foli in 1882.
The cycle is roughly as aam as a no-hitter ( 279 occurrences in emelbi itihaas ) ; it rai been pukaara `` one of the rarest '' or `` most difficult feats '' in besabaal.
Based on 2009 apriy levels, the sambhavyata of an average MLB player hitting liye a saikil against an ausat toli in a game is lagbhag 0.00590 % ; is corresponds to parichay 2.5 cycles in a 162-game ritu saath 30 tiimon.
In anya besabaal lig, the saikil is hasil kam aksar.
Through sitambar 4, 2008, 62 players in nippan peshewar besabaal ( npb ), the top-level besabaal sanghathan in japani, have hit liye the saikil, the sabase recent hone michihiro ogasawara.
do khilaadi have hit liye the saikil on the same din ekbar in npb itihaas ; is rai occurred twice in emelbi itihaas.
ek npb khilaadi rai also hit for the cycle in an NPB all-star khel.
no khilaadi rai kabhi hit for the cycle in the MLB all-star khel or the postseason.
the main slave root in madhyakaalin africa.
is article discusses pranaaliyon, itihaas, or prabhaav of gulaami bheetar Africa.
dekhie arab slave vyapaar, Atlantic slave vyapaar, Maafa, and gulaami in contemporary Africa liye anya discussions.
`` slave hastantaran in Africa ''.
europeans usually kiya nahin enter the aantarik regions.
gulaami in africa has existed throughout the continent liye many sadiyaan, and continues in the vartmaan day.
pranaaliyon of servitude or slavery yahood common in anek bhaag of the continent, as they yahood in much of the pracheen world.
in sabase African samaajon jahaan gulaami was prachlit, the enslaved people yahood largely treated as indentured servants and nahin treated as chattel slave.
jab the Arab slave vyapaar or Atlantic slave vyapaar began, anek of the local slave pranaaliyon changed or began supplying captives liye slave bazaar outside of africa.
gulaami in historical Africa was practiced in anek alag forms or some of ye do not clearly fit the paribhaashaayen of gulaami elsewhere in the sansar.
Debt gulaami, enslavement of war captives, sainya slavery, and dand gulaami yahood sab practiced in vibhinn bhaag of africa.
haalanki vahin tha maharoom some trans-Saharan vyapaar isse the aantarik of Sub-Saharan africa to other regions, gulaami thi a choti bhaag of the aarthik life of anek samaajon in africa jabatak the introduction of transcontinental slave trade ( arab or atlantic ).
slave practices yahood again roopantarit saath europea colonization of africa and the aupchaarik abolition of gulaami in the jaldi 1900s.
Windows kaary manager is a kaary manager or pranali monitor anuprayog shaamil saath the microsoft khidkiyaan nt family of oparating pranaaliyon ki provides limited soochna parichay computer pradarshan or running applications, processes or cpu upyog, commit charge or memory information, network activity and aankde, logged-in upayokta, or pranali sevaayen ( or as praayah is the maamla saath tantra tools provided by microsoft liye khidkiyaan, 3rd party tantra is uplabdhiyaan jisase fills the aavashyaktaayen more thoroughly, e.g, `` prakram explorer '', `` vistaarit kaary manager '', `` anvir kaary manager '', `` prakram haikar '', and `` pranali Explorer '' ).
the kaary manager can bhi be used to niyat prakram praathamiktaayen, procesar apnaapan, forcibly terminate processes, or shut bas, restart, hibernate or log band isse khidkiyaan.
khidkiyaan Task manager thi introduced with khidkiyaan NT 4.0.
pichhlaa sanskaran of khidkiyaan nt shaamil the kaary suchi anuprayog, jisase tha dur kam features.
The kaary suchi thi sakasham of listing philhal kaaryshil processes or hatya unhen, or bananaa a nai prakram.
in khidkiyaan XP only, a shutdown menu is bhi upasthit that allows access to Standby, hibernate, Turn band, restart, log band or switch upayokta.
pehle sanskaran of microsoft khidkiyaan ( microsoft khidkiyaan 3.x, khidkiyaan 95, khidkiyaan 98 ) tha a kaarykram known as kaary to pradarshak the kaarykram philhal kaaryshil.
This sanchika thi chalaaya by running the taskman.exe file isse the c : \Windows nirdeshika.
