if the darshak stares at this chitra liye 20–60 second or stares at a shwet object, a rinatmak afterimage hoga appear ( in is maamla, it hoga be kyaan on magenta ).
is can also be achieved by the darshak closing his/her ankhen and tilting their sir up.
an afterimage or bhut chitra or chitra burn-in is an optical bhram ki refers to an chitra continuing to appear in ek 's vision baad the expozar to the asli image rai ceased.
ek of the sabase aam afterimages is the ujjwal glow ki seems to flash before ek 's ankhen baad looking into a lite sorce liye a few second.
closing the eye can help achieve a behatar bhav of the rang in iske apana aspect.
afterimages come in two form, rinatmak ( ulat ) or dhanatmak ( retaining original rang ).
The prakram behind positive afterimages is unknown, haalanki vichaar to be sambandhit to neural anukulan.
On the anya haath, rinatmak afterimages hai a retinal ghatana and are khub samajha.
khoyaa is an American serial naatak television shrenee ki premiered on sitambar 22, 2004 on the American Broadcasting company ( abisi ).
The shrenee was nirmit by J. J. abrams and daiman lindelof, aadhaarit upon an asli payalat script titled nowhere written by jeffri lieber.
chah sizan of the dikhaaen aired, in jod to numerous kaaten shows to purvavlokan previous apisod.
ABC ghoshit ki khoyaa hota samaapt baad chah seasons, having utpaadit a kul of 121 apisod.
the series folo the past, upasthit, or bhavishya anubhav ( s ) of the survivors of a plane krash on a yatri jet, oceanic udaan 815, udati isse Sydney to los angeles after it krash on a tropical island in the dakshin prashanth.
The shrenee bhi shaamil kahaniyaan of the jeevandaan of logon already jeena on the island — they shaamil the `` Others ``, jo initially antagonize the survivors, as khub as a group of logon who arrive on the freighter kahana.
prayek apisod typically features karrwai on the island as khub as a secondary kathanak isse another point in a akshar 's jivan.
Season 6 suvidhaayen a detailing of the jeevandaan of the survivors in a alag reality, as if the flight tha never krash.
in the following list, the pad `` pradarshit akshar ( s ) '' refers to the akshar or varna jo are featured in the dwitiyak kathanak of prayek episode.
`` no.
in shrenee '' refers to the apisod 's number in the overall shrenee, whereas `` No.
in ritu '' refers to the apisod 's kramank in prayek particular ritu.
`` u.S. darshak ( million ) '' refers to the kramank of america in lakho who dekhi the episode sajiv.
a total of 121 episodes of khoyaa yahood produced, the pichhlaa of which aired on May 23, 2010.
sab sizan hai uplabdhiyaan on DVD in regions 1–4 or on blu-ray in Regions a or B.
Flat feet ( bhi called pes planus or gire arches ) is a aupchaarik sandarbh to a medical condishan in which the mehrab of the foot collapses, saath the sampurna sole of the foot coming into puraa or near-complete sampark saath the maidan.
in kuch individuals ( an anumaanit 20–30 % of the saamaanya janasankhyikee ) the arch simply never develops in ek pair ( unilaterally ) or both feet ( bilaterally ).
teen adhyayan ( see citations below in sainya khand ) of sainya rangaruton have shown no evidence of later increased injury, or pair problems, due to chapata feet, in a janasankhyikee of logon who pahunchein sainya service age bagaiyr prior pair samasyaayein.
however, ye adhyayan can nahin be prayukt to nyaayadhish possible future kshati isse is condition jab diagnosed at younger aayu.
ve bhi can not be lagu to vyaktiyon jinaki chapata feet hai sambhddha saath foot lakshan, or nishchit symptoms in other bhaag of the body ( aise as the leg or waapas ) sambhawatah referable to the pair.
peedhee x, commonly abbreviated to Gen x, is the peedhee born after the pashchimi post-World War ii baby boom.
demographers, itihaaskaaron or tikaakaron upyog beginning birth tithiyaan isse the jaldi 1960s to the jaldi 1980s.
the pad thi popularized by Douglas coupland 's 1991 anokhaa peedhee X : Tales for an twarit samskruti.
pehle ki, it had been prayukt for vibhinn subcultures or countercultures baad the 1950s.
Pressure chhaale, bhi gyaat as decubitus chhaale or bedsores, hai sthaniyakrut choton to the skin and/or underlying tissue praayah over a bony prominence, as a parinaam of pressure, or dabaav in sangyojan saath shear and/or gharshan.
sabase commonly this hoga be the sacrum, coccyx, heels or the kulhon, lakin anya sites aise as the elbows, knees, ankles or the waapas of the cranium can be affected.
the kaaran of pressure chhaale is pressure lagu to soft utak so ki rakt pravaah to the soft utak is completely or partially obstructed.
Shear is bhi a kaaran ; shear khinchataa on rakt vessels ki feed the skin.
dabaav ulcers most commonly develop in vyaktiyon jo hai nahin moving about or hai confined to wheelchairs.
It is widely believed ki other karkon can influence the sahishnutaa of skin liye pressure or shear thereby increasing the risk of dabaav ulcer development.
ye karkon hai protein-calorie kuposhan, microclimate ( skin wetness caused by sweating or incontinence ), rogon ki reduce rakt pravaah to the skin, aise as arteriosclerosis or diseases that reduce the ahsaas in the skin, such as paralysis or neuropathy.
the healing of dabaav chhaale may be slowed by the age of the person, chikitsa sharten ( aise as arteriosclerosis, diabetes or sankraman ), dhumrapaan or medications aise as antiinflammatory davaayen.
haalanki often prevented or treatable if mila early, pressure chhaale can be bahut mushkil to prevent in critically ill patients, frail elders, wheelchair users ( especially jahaan spinal chot is shaamil ) or terminally biimaar marijon.
praathmik prevention is to redistribute pressure by turning the rogi regularly.
The laabh of turning to avoid further sores is well pralekhith since at tanik the 19th sadi.
In addition to turning and re-positioning the rogi in bed or wheelchair, khaane a santulit aahaar saath adequate protein or keeping the skin free isse expozar to mutr or stool is bahut mahatvapurn.
the vyapaktaa of dabaav ulcers in hospital jamaavat is high, lakin improvements are hone made.
According to the 2010 IPUP ( antarrashtriya Pressure ulcer vyapaktaa surveykshan ) conducted in canada, vahin thi a significant ghati in the overall facility-acquired prevalence of dabaav chhaale isse 2009-2010.
chhaale yahood sabase commonly identified at the sacral/coccyx ulcer location ; however, edi chhaale were the most common facility-acquired sthaan in the surveykshan.

green khadi is a city in or the county seat of Brown county in the u.S. rajya of Wisconsin, stith at the sir of green Bay, a sub-basin of Lake michigan, at the munh of the fox nadi.
It has an elevation of upar samudr level and is located uttar of Milwaukee.
The population thi 104,057 at the 2010 janasankhyikee.
it is the third-largest nagar in the rajya of visconsin, baad milvowki or Madison.
it is also the third-largest nagar on the west shore of jhil Michigan, baad chicago or milvowki.
green khadi is ghar to the green Bay pakars of the neshnal footbaal lig, making it by far the smallest mahanagar area in the uese to mejabaan a pramukh peshewar sports franchise.
Green khadi is the principal city of the green Bay Metropolitan sankhyikeey Area, jisase cover bhura, kewaunee, and oconto county and had a sanyukt population of 282,599 at the 2000 janasankhyikee.
green Bay is an industrial nagar saath several meatpacking or paper paudhe, or a port on green khadi, an bhujaa of jhil michigan ki sthaneey kol the Bay of green Bay, to avoid conflating it with the eponymous city.
It is ghar to the neshnal Railroad sangrahalay ; the Neville Public Museum, with exhibitions of art, itihaas, or vigyaan ; or the University of wisconsin–green khadi.
Luteinizing hormone ( lh, bhi gyaat as lutropin or sometimes lutrophin ) is a hormone utpaadit by gonadotroph cells in the agravarti pituitary gland.
In females, an adhi vruddhi of lh ( `` lh surge '' ) triggers ovulation or development of the corpus luteum.
in males, jahaan LH tha also maharoom called antaraleey cell-stimulating hormone ( icsh ), it stimulates leydig koshika utpaadan of testosterone.
It adhiniyamon synergistically saath fsh.
Selena Quintanilla-Pérez ( april 16, 1971 – kooch 31, 1995 ), gyaat bas as Selena, thi an amareeki singer-songwriter.
She thi namit the `` sheersh latin kalakaar of the '90s '' or `` Best selling Latin kalakaar of the dashak '' by billboard for her fourteen top-ten singles in the Top latin geeton chart, including seven number-one hits.
selina tha the sabase successful singles of 1994 and 1995, `` amor prohibido `` and `` no me queda Más ``.
wo was called `` the Queen of tejano music `` and the Mexican samatuly of madonna.
selina released uske pehla album, selina y Los dinos, at the aayu of twelve.
She jiti maadaa Vocalist of the Year at the 1987 tejano music puraskaar or landed a recording anubandh with emi a few saalo baad.
uske fame grew throughout the jaldi 1990s, visheshkar in spanish-speaking deshon, and wo had begun recording in angrezi as khub.
selina thi murdered at the aayu of 23 on March 31, 1995 by Yolanda saldívar, the former president of uske prashansak klbon.
on april 12, 1995, do weeks baad her death, george W. Bush, rajyapal of Texas at the samay, ghoshit uske janmdiwas `` selina din '' in texas.
Warner bhaius. utpaadit Selena, a filmi based on uske jivan abhinit Jennifer lopez, in 1997.
selina 's jivan thi bhi the aadhaar of the musical selina forever abhinit Veronica vazquez as selina.
In June 2006 Selena thi commemorated with a life-sized kaansya statue ( Mirador de la flor in corpus Christi, texas ) and a Selena museum kholi there.
wo rai bechi over 60 lakh album worldwide, bananaa her ek of the best-selling kalakaaron of sab samay.
wo is bhi the tabhi maadaa kalakaar to have paanch albums in u.s. Billboard 200 at the same time.
germany stahlhelm from sansar War ii
tamgaa of the bolivian fouj colorados regiment, prardashit a Stahlhelm or do crossed bayonets
Stahlhelm ( bahuvachan, Stahlhelme ) is germany liye `` steel helmet ''.
the imperial German Army began to replace the paramparaagat boiled-leather Pickelhaube ( spiked combat helmet ) saath the stahlhelm during sansar War I in 1916.
The pad stahlhelm refers both to a generik steel helmet, and adhik specifically to the distinctive ( or iconic ) germany design.
the Stahlhelm, with iske distinctive `` coal scuttle `` aakaar, was an instantly recognizable icon liye sainya imagery or became a common tatv of sainya prachaar on dono pahalu, just like the pickelhaube pehle it.
Its name thi bhi prayukt by the Stahlhelm, a paramilitary rashtravaadi organization sthapit at the end of 1918.
Glow-in-the-dark may refer to:
Bioluminescence, the utpaadan or utsarjan of lite by a living sajiv
chemiluminescence, is the utsarjan of light ( sandipti ) bagaiyr utsarjan of ooshmaa
sfuradipti, a vishisht type of photoluminescence sambandhit to fluorescence
radioluminescence, utpaadan of sandipti in a saamagree by the bambaari of inkaree vikiran
glow in the andhera daure, a 2008 concert daure by kanye west
francfort Airport serves as a hub city liye lufthansa and receives flite isse star Alliance vaahak.
airline hubs hai airport kramit as vishaal, medium, small, or non-hubs as one of the faa airport categories jisase hai re-evaluated every saal aadhaarit on kramank of vanijyik yatri.
the adhik aam lakin anaupchaarik use liye the phrase airline hub is an vimaanashetra ki an airline upyog as a transafar point to get yatri to unke intended gantavy.
It is part of a hub or spoke model, jahaan travelers chalati between airport nahin parosa by sidhaa flite change planes en root to unke gantavyon.
is is as opposed to the point to point model.
Many hubs of the airlines are bhi situated at airport in the shaharon of the sambandhit sir karyaalayon.
kuch airlines may use only a single hub, jabaki anya airlines upyog multiple hubs.
hubs hai used liye dono yatri flights as khub as cargo flite.
anek airlines bhi upyog fokas shaharon, jisase falan much the vahi as hubs.
airlines may also upyog secondary hubs, a non-technical pad liye vishaal fokas shaharon.
a hub in the madhya of a route is adhik prabhavi than at either samaapt as connecting trekkic adhik easily bharta the plane - yatri prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) root over a two-stop ( three-leg ) route.
Hollow Lacedaemon.
Site of the menelaion, the shrine to Helen and menelaus constructed anciently in the kaansya aayu nagar ki stood on the hill of Therapne on the left bainko of the Eurotas nadi overlooking the bhavishya sait of dorian sparta.
aarpaar the ghati the successive ridges of Mount taygetus are in pramaan.
sparta ( Doric unani : ; ataari Greek : ), or lacedaemon, thi a prominent city-state in pracheen unaniyon, situated on the bainko of the eurotas River in Laconia, in south-eastern Peloponnese.
It ubhara as a rajnatik antity around the 10th century bc, jab the akramanakari dorians subjugated the local, non-Dorian janasankhyikee.
Around 650 BC, it rose to become the prabal sainya land-power in pracheen unaniyon.
die iske sainya pre-eminence, sparta thi pahachaanaa as the overall netaa of the sanyukt unani forces dauraan the greco-persian Wars.
between 431 or 404 BC, sparta thi the principal enemy of athens dauraan the Peloponnesian yuddh, from jisase it ubhara vijayi, haalanki at great laagat.
Sparta 's shikast by thebes in the battle of Leuctra in 371 bc ended sparta 's prominent role in unaniyon.
However, it kaayam iske rajnatik swatantraaa jabatak the Roman conquest of Greece in 146 bc.
it tab underwent a long period of decline, visheshkar in the madhya Ages, jab anek spartans sthanantarit to sajiv in mystras.
aadhunik sparta is the puunji of the unani regional ikai of Laconia or a bich liye the prasanskaran of goods such as citrus or olives.
sparta thi adwitiya in pracheen unaniyon liye iske soshal pranali and constitution, jisase completely focused on military prashikshan or excellence.
iske inhabitants yahood vargeekrut as spartiates ( spartan citizens, jo enjoyed puraa rights ), Mothakes ( non-Spartan free main uthaaya as Spartans ), perioikoi ( freedmen ), and helots ( state-owned serfs, enslaved non-Spartan local janasankhyikee ).
spartiates underwent the rigorous agoge prashikshan and education regimen, or spartan phalanges were widely mana to be among the behtareen in battle.
Spartan women enjoyed considerably adhik adhikaron or samta to main than elsewhere in the classical world.
sparta thi the vishay of fascination in its apana din, as well as in the West following the punaruddhar of shastreey siikhnaa.
is prem or admiration of Sparta is gyaat as laconism or laconophilia.
kaalpanik footbaal is an interactive pratiyogita in jisase upayokta compete viruddh prayek anya as saamaanya prabandhak of abhaasi tiimon.
The khilaadi that an vyaktigat is samarth to manage hai professional American footbaal khilaadi in the neshnal Football lig.
The different kriyaayein people hai able to mek are drafting, vyapaar, adding or chhodane players, and badalanaa rosters.
Due to the growth of the Internet, Fantasy footbaal rai vastly increased in popularity, visheshkar because kaalpanik footbaal pradaataaon aise as iespien, Yahoo, CBS, or the NFL itself are samarth to keep track of statistics entirely online, eliminating the need to check box score or newspapers regularly to keep track of players.
Most lig have a single saptaah championship in saptaah 16 of the enegel ritu.
sansar janasankhyikee estimates isse 1800 to 2100, based on un 2010 projections ( red, naarangi, green ) or us Census beuro aitihaasik estimates ( black ).
vaastavik ankit janasankhyikee aankade hai in blue.
according to the ucchtam estimate, the sansar janasankhyikee may vruddhi to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the nunatam anumaan, it may decline to 6 arab.
the sansar janasankhyikee is the kul kramank of living insaano on dharti.
As of today, it is estimated to kramank arab by the sanyukt States janasankhyikee beuro ( USCB ).
the uscb estimates that the sansar janasankhyikee exceeded 7 arab on kooch 12, 2012.
according to a separate anumaan by the sanyukt raashtra janasankhyikee nidhi, it pahunche is padaav on aktubar 31, 2011.
The world population rai anbhavi nirantar vikaas chunki the samaapt of the great Famine or the blike Death in 1350, jab it stood at around 370 lakh.
the highest rates of growth – global population increases upar 1.8 % per saal – yahood dekhi briefly dauraan the 1950s, and liye a longer kaal during the 1960s or 1970s.
the vikaas rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, or tha asweekrut to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total salanaa births yahood highest in the let 1980s at about 138 lakh, or are abhi expected to remain essentially constant at unke 2011 str of 134 lakh, jabaki deaths kramank 56 million prati saal, or hai apekshit to badhayen to 80 lakh prati year by 2040.
Current projections show a jari increase in janasankhyikee in the near future ( but a sthir manaahi in the janasankhyikee vikaas rate ), saath the global population apekshit to pahunchein between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
vibhinn longer-term estimates predict further vikaas, stagnation, or even overall decline in the vaishvik janasankhyikee by 2150.
kuch vishleshkon have questioned the sthirataa of further world population vikaas, citing the growing pressures on the environment, vaishvik khaanaa aapurtiyan, and urja resources.
skeletal muscles homo sapiens
is is a talika of muscles of the insaan anatomy.
vahin hai lagbhag 642 skeletal mansapeshiyaan bheetar the theth human, and lagbhag prayek muscle constitutes ek bhaag of a jodi of ekasmaan dwipaksheeya mansapeshiyaan, mila on dono pahalu, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of mansapeshiyaan, as prastut in is aalekh.
nevertheless, the sateek kramank is mushkil to define kuki alag sources samooh mansapeshiyaan differently, e.g. regarding kayaa is paribhaashit as alag parts of a single muscle or as anek mansapeshiyaan.
udhaaharan dayera isse 640 to 850.
the muscles of the human deh can be categorized into a kramank of samooh which shaamil mansapeshiyaan relating to the head or gardan, muscles of the dhad or trunk, mansapeshiyaan of the apper limbs, or muscles of the lower limbs.
the karrwai refers to the karrwai of prayek mansapeshi isse the standard anatomical sthiti.
in anya positions, anya actions may be performed.
a sunaharaa baar is a maatra of refined dhatvik sunaharaa of koi shape ki is bana by a baar nirmaataa meeting maanak sharten of manufacture, labeling, or record keeping.
larger sunaharaa bars ki are utpaadit by pouring the molten metal into molds hai called pindon.
Smaller bars may be manufactured by minting or stamping isse appropriately lipte gold chaadaren.
The maanak sunaharaa baar yojit as sunaharaa reserves by central bainko and traded among bullion dealer is the 400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 ounce ) shubh delivery gold baar.
The kilobar, which is to kah 1000 gamma in dravyaman, is the baar ki is adhik manageable or is prayukt extensively liye trading and investment.
the premium on these bars jab traded is bahut kam over the spot value of the sunaharaa bananaa it ideal liye choti hastantaran between bainko or vyapaariyon.
sabase kilobars hai chapata, haalanki kuch niveshkon, visheshkar in europea, prefer the eenton aakaar.
elisha Archibald `` archi '' manning iii ( born may 19, 1949 ) is a purv amareeki footbaal quarterbaque in the neshnal footbaal lig, playing for the nai orlions Saints from 1971 to 1982, tab for the Houston oilrs or minesota vikings.
he is the pita of vartmaan denwar broncos quarterbaque peyton Manning, current nai york diggaj starting quarterbaque eli manning, or purv ole miss receiver kupar manning.
vakaalat is a rajnatik prakram by an vyaktigat or group jisase aims to influence public-policy or resource aavanton nirnay bheetar political, aarthik, or soshal pranaaliyon or institutions.
Advocacy can shaamil many activities ki a vyakti or organization undertakes sahit media abhiyaan, public bolnaa, commissioning or prakaashan shodh or pole or the daakhil of an amicus bread.
lobbying ( praayah by lobby samooh ) is a form of advocacy where a sidhaa approach is made to vidhayak on an issue jisase plays a significant bhoomika in aadhunik politics.
shodh is beginning to explore how vakaalat samooh in the u.S. or canada hai using soshal media to sukar naagarik sagaai and samuhik action.
the flag of Mexico ( spani : Bandera de méxico ) is a lambavat tricolor of green, shwet, and red saath the neshnal kot of bahen charge in the bich of the white stripe.
jabaki the arth of the colors rai badla over samay, ye teen rangon were apanaaya by Mexico following swatantraaa isse spain dauraan the desh 's yuddh of Independence, or subsequent pehla mexican samrajya.
the vartmaan dhvaj was apanaaya in 1968, lakin the overall dizine rai maharoom prayukt since 1821, jab the pehla neshnal dhvaj was nirmit.
the vartmaan vidhi of neshnal pratikon, Law on the neshnal bahen, dhvaj, or gaan, ki governs the use of the neshnal dhvaj has been in place since 1984.
Red, shwet, or green are the rangon of the neshnal mukti fouj in Mexico.
the central emblem is the azetek pictogram liye tenochtitlan ( abhi mexico nagar ), the bich of unke samrajya.
It recalls the legend ki prerit the aztecs to settle on kayaa thi originally a lake-island.
the rup of the kot of arms thi sabase recently sanshodhit in 1968.
A riban in the neshnal colors is at the neeche of the kot of bahen.
throughout itihaas, the dhvaj rai badla chaar times, as the dizine of the kot of bahen or the length-width ratios of the dhvaj have maharoom parivardhit.
however, the coat of bahen rai had the vahi features throughout : an tribhuj, pakadakar a serpent in iske talon, is perched on sheersh of a prickly naashpati cactus ; the cactus is situated on a chattan ki rises upar a lake.
the kot of bahen is derived isse an Aztec legend that their devataaon bataai them to nirmaan a nagar jahaan ve spot an tribhuj on a nopal eating a serpent, which is now mexico nagar.
the current neshnal flag, the chauthi neshnal Flag, is bhi used as the mexican naval ensign by ships panjikrut in mexico.
a gantavy vipanan organization or convention and visitor beuro promotes a town, nagar, region, or country in anukram to badhayen the number of vizitor.
it promotes the development or marketing of a destination, focusing on convention sales, paryaton vipanan, or services.
aise sanghathan prachaar aarthik vikaas of a gantavy by increasing vizit isse paryatakon and business travelers, which generates overnight awaas liye a destination, vizit to restaurants, or shopping revenues.
Convention or visitor bureaus hai the sabase mahatvapurn paryaton vipanan organizations in unke respective paryatak destinations, as ve hai directly jimmedaar liye vipanan the gantavy brands through travel or paryaton `` utpaada jaagrukta '' to vizitor.
dmos upaj arabon of dollar in sidhaa or apratyaksh aay and kar liye unke gantavyon ' economies with unke marketing or bikri visheshgyata.
gantavy vipanan sanghathan hai praayah pukaara safar, sammelan, vizitor, or paryaton bureaux, welcome centers, soochna centers and more.
regardless of the naam, these organizations prastaav many sevaayen to the traveling public.
the nilgai or wapiti ( cervus canadensis ) is one of the largest prajati of deer in the sansar, or ek of the largest jameen stanadhariyon in uttar america or eastern asia.
it thi long believed to be a subspecies of the europea red hiran ( cervus elaphus ), lakin pramaan from a 2004 padhai of the mitochondrial diene indicates ki the do hai pruthak prajati.
is animal should nahin be uljhan saath the larger moose ( alces alces ), to which the naam `` nilgai '' applies in uresia.
Apart from the moose, the tabhi anya sadsy of the hiran family to rival the nilgai in aakaar is the dakshin asian sambar ( rusa unicolor ).
nilgai dayera in van or forest-edge habitat, feeding on grasses, paudhe, pattey, and chaal.
Although native to uttar america or purvi asia, ve have adapted khub to countries where they have maharoom introduced, including Argentina, australia, and New jiland.
unke great adaptability may threaten endemic species or ecosystems into which they have been introduced.
Male nilgai have vishaal antlers jisase are shed prayek saal.
males bhi engage in ritualized samagam vyavhaar during the rut, including posturing, antler kushti ( sparring ), and bugling, a laud shrenee of vocalizations jisase establishes dominance over anya males or attracts females.
Elk hai susceptible to a kramank of sankramak rogon, kuch of jisase can be transmitted to livestock.
praytn to eliminate sankramak rogon from elk populations, largely through vaccination, have tha mishrit kamyaabi.
Some samskritiyon aadar the nilgai as a spiritual force.
In bhaag of asia, antlers or their makhmal are used in traditional davaaiyaan.
nilgai hai hunted as a game species ; the maance is leaner or ucchtar in protein than beef or murga.
The george washington vishvavidhyalayon ( gw, gwu, or george washington ) is a vyapak private, coeducational shodh vishvavidhyalayon located in washington, d.C..
it puraskaar praaanpatr, snaatak degrees, masters degree, or phds aarpaar several darjan disciplines.
The vishvavidhyalayon was chartered by an adhinium of Congress on farvari 9, 1821 as The columbian college in the District of colombia.
the lion ( Panthera leo ) is ek of the four big billiyon in the genus penthera or a member of the parivaar felidaye.
saath kuch males exceeding in vazan, it is the second-largest jeena cat after the baagh.
junglee sher philhal maujuud in sub-saharan africa or in asia ( where an endangered remnant population resides in gir van neshnal park in india ) jabaki anya prakaar of lions have disappeared isse uttar Africa or dakshinpaschim Asia in historic times.
jabatak the let Pleistocene, parichay 10,000 years ago, the sher thi the sabase widespread vishaal jameen standhari after insaano.
ve were mila in sabase of africa, aarpaar uresia from pashchimi europea to india, and in the americas isse the yukon to peru.
the sher is a vulnerable prajati, having dekhi a pramukh population manaahi of 30–50 % over the past do dashakon in iske africa range.
Lion populations hai untenable baahar designated reserves or neshnal park.
Although the kaaran of the manaahi is not fully samajha, habitat ghaataa or virodh saath humans are currently the mahanatam kalyankari of chintaa.
bheetar africa, the west African sher janasankhyikee is visheshkar endangered.
sher live liye 10–14 saalo in the junglee, while in captivity they can live longer than 20 saalo.
in the wild, males seldom live longer than 10 saalo, as choton sustained isse continual lard saath rival males greatly reduce their aayu.
They typically inhabit savana or ghasbhumi, haalanki they may take to bush or van.
sher hai unusually soshal compared to anya billiyon.
a abhimaan of sher consists of sambandhit mahilaon and aulad or a choti number of adult males.
samooh of maadaa sher typically hunt saath, preying zyaadaatar on vishaal ungulates.
sher are apex and keystone parabhakshi, although they scavenge as opportunity allows.
jabaki sher do not typically hunt insaano, kuch have been gyaat to do so.
Sleeping mainly dauraan the day, sher hai primarily nocturnal, haalanki bordering on crepuscular in nature.
Highly distinctive, the purush sher is easily recognised by iske mane, or its face is one of the sabase widely recognised animal pratikon in insaan culture.
depictions have existed isse the apper Paleolithic kaal, saath utkeernan or paintings isse the Lascaux and Chauvet gufaaen, through virtually all ancient or madhyakaalin samskritiyon where ve ekbar occurred.
It has been extensively chitrit in sculptures, in paintings, on national dhvaj, or in samakaleen films or sahitya.
Lions have maharoom rakhaa in menageries chunki the time of the roman samrajya, or have maharoom a key prajati sought liye pradarshnee in zoos over the sansar chunki the let 18th century.
zoos hai cooperating vishwavyaapee in breeding programs liye the endangered aciatic subspecies.
in the history of video games, the seventh peedhee of consoles is the pichhlaa peedhee, and shaamil consoles released chunki let by nintendo, microsoft, or soni.
liye ghar consoles, the saatvaan generation began on 22 navambar 2005 with the relies of exbox 360 or jari with the relies of plastesan 3 on 11 navambar 2006, and ve on 19 navambar 2006.
prayek nai consol introduced a nai prakaar of breakthrough in praudyogiki.
the exbox 360 offered khel rendered natively at hd resolutions, the plastesan 3 offered, in addition to FHD gaming, hd movie plabac via a built-in 3d blu-ray discs player, or the ve kendrit on integrating parirakshak saath movement sensor as khub as joysticks.
joining nintendo in the gati market, soni released the plastesan move in sitambar 2010.
the plastesan Move suvidhaayen gati samvedan gaming, samaan to ki of the ve.
Microsoft also joined Sony and nintendo, saath iske Kinect.
naapsand the other two pranaaliyon ( plastesan 3 or ve ), Kinect karata nahin upyog any parirakshak of koi sort or makes the upayokta the `` controller. ''
Having bechi 8 million ikai in its first 60 dinon on the market, Kinect rai claimed the ginis sansar ricard of hone the `` fastest selling upabhokta electronics yantra ''.
jabaki the Xbox 360 offers taar parirakshak as a staneylon utpaada, sab plastesan 3 parirakshak can be used in taar or betaar configurations.
starting saath handheld consoles, the seventh peedhee began on 21 November 2004 with the uttar American introduction of the Nintendo ds as a `` teesraa pillar '', alongside nintendo 's maujuuda khel ladke agrim or gamecube consoles.
the nintendo ds ( nds ) suvidhaayen a tach screen or built-in microphone, or supports wireless iiqui 802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) standards.
Additionally, the sanshodhit sanskaran of the NDS, the DSi, suvidhaayen do built in camere, the kshamta to downlod games from the dsi store, and a web broujar.
the PlayStation portable, or psp, released baad the vahi saal on 12 disambar 2004, followed a different pattern.
it became the pehla handheld video game consol to upyog an optical discs swaroop, Universal media discs ( UMD ), as its praathmik bhandar media.
soni also gave the psp majboot multi-media kaabiliyat, connactivity saath the plastesan 3 or anya psps, and antarjaal connactivity.
The nintendo ds likewise has connectivity to the internet through the Nintendo wi-fi Connection or nintendo ds broujar, as khub as betaar connectivity to anya ds pranaaliyon or ve consoles.
despite high bikri sankhyaayein liye dono consoles, plastesan portable sales have consistently pichhadaapan behind those of the Nintendo ds ; nevertheless, the PlayStation Portable has the bhed of hone the best-selling non-Nintendo handheld gaming pranali.
sgt. pepper 's nirjan Hearts klbon Band ( praayah shortened to sgt. pepper ) is the eighth studio album by English rock band the Beatles.
released in june 1967, the album included geeton such as `` saath a choti sahaayta isse my mitron ``, `` luci in the aasmaan with eent ``, or `` a Day in the jivan ``.
continuing the kalakaari maturation seen on the band 's album revolver ( 1966 ), sgt. pepper further raji from the conventional pop chattan muhaavara of the samay or incorporated balladry, cicedelik, music hall, or symphonic influences.
dauraan the sgt. pepper sessions, the group improved upon the quality of their music 's utpaadan while exploring praayogic recording takneekon.
Producer george martin 's abhinav approach shaamil the upyog of an orcestra.
Widely acclaimed and imitated, the album cover, designed by angrezi pop artists peter blake or Jann haworth, thi inspired by a sketch by paul mccartney that chitrit the band pos in saamne of a collage of kuch of their pasandida celebrities.
sgt. pepper was a vishwavyaapee najuk and commercial kamyaabi, bitaa 27 saptaah at the sheersh of the UK Album chart and 15 weeks at kramank one on the US billboard 200.
A seminal kaary in the ubharate cicedelik chattan style, the album thi critically acclaimed upon release and jiti chaar grami puraskaar in 1968.
saath an anumaanit 32 million copies sold, it is ek of the sansar 's behtareen selling album.
Sgt. Pepper is mana by many to be the sabase influential and famous rock album kabhi, or rai maharoom namit the mahanatam album of all samay by dono All Time sheersh 1000 album or rolling stone.
the temporal pali is a region of the cerebral cortex ki is stith beneath the parshvavarti fisher on dono dimagi baantati of the mammalian brain.
the temporal lobes are involved in the retention of vizual memories, prasanskaran sensory input, comprehending bhashaa, storing new yaaden, emotion, or deriving meaning.
The insaan fefde hai the angon of respiration in insaano.
insaano have do fefde, a sahi fefdon or a baayein fefdon.
the sahi fefdon consists of teen nirmoke jabaki the baayein lung is slightly choti consisting of tabhi do lobes ( the left lung rai a `` hriday paaydaan '' allowing spes liye the dil bheetar the chest ).
Together, the fefde contain lagbhag of airways and 300 to 500 million alveoli, having a total sataha kshetrafal of parichay ( ) in vayaskon — roughly the same kshetrafal as ek paksh of a tennis adaalat.
furthermore, if all of the capillaries that surround the alveoli yahood unwound and laid end to samaapt, ve would extend liye parichay.
prayek lung weighs, isliye bananaa the sampurna ang parichay.
insaan lungs
the shwaasanlee divides into do bronchi ( ek liye prayek paksh ) at the str of t4.
is jankshan is bhi gyaat as the carina.
the conducting mandal contains the shwaasanlee, the bronchi, the bronchioles, and the terminal bronchioles the respiratory mandal contains the respiratory bronchioles, the alveolar nalikaayen, and the alveoli.
the conducting mandal or the respiratory stuffers ( lakin nahin the alveoli ) hai made up of airways.
The conducting zone rai no gas exange with the rakt, or is reinforced saath upasthi in anukram to hold kholen the airways.
the conducting mandal warms the air to or humidifies the air.
it bhi cleanses the air by nikaalnaa anu via cilia stith on the deevaaren of sab the passageways.
the fefde hai ghiri by the pasli pinjraa.
the respiratory mandal is the sait of gas exange saath blood.
The sahanubhutipurna baichaiyn pranali via noradrenaline acting on the beta receptors causes bronchodilation.
The parasympathetic baichaiyn pranali via acetylcholine, which adhiniyamon on the M-3 muscarinic receptors, maintains the resting tone of the bronchiolar chikna mansapeshi.
is karrwai is sambandhit, haalanki mana pruthak isse bronchoconstriction.
anek anya non-autonomic baichaiyn and biochemical stimuli, sahit carbon dioxide and oxigen, hai bhi shaamil in the viniman prakram.
the pleural cavity is the sambhavit space between the parietal pleura, astr the inner wall of the thoracic pinjraa, and the visceral pleura astr the fefde.
The fefdon parenchyma is sakhti prayukt to refer solely to alveolar utak with respiratory bronchioles, alveolar nalikaayen or terminal bronchioles.
however, it praayah shaamil koi rup of fefdon tissue, also sahit bronchioles, bronchi, blood baratan and lung interstitium.
the margrita is a mexican cocktail consisting of takila mishrit saath Cointreau or similar naarangi -flavoured liqueur or lime or nibu ras, often parosa saath namak on the kaanch rim.
It is the sabase common tequila-based cocktail in the United rajya.
The drink is parosa shaken saath barf ( on the rocks ), blended saath ice ( frozen margrita ), or bagaiyr barf ( sidhaa up ).

bargandi is a andhera red rang sambhddha saath the bargandi wine of the vahi name, jisase in turn is namit baad the Burgundy region of frans.
The rang bargandi is samaan to other shades of andhera red aise as marun.
jab referring to the color, `` bargandi '' is usually not capitalized.
the pehla ankit upyog of `` bargandi '' as a rang naam in English thi in 1881.

laapata in karrwai ( MIA ) is a casualty Category assigned antargat the aukaat of laapata to hathiyaarband sevaayen karmiyon jo hai reported missing dauraan kriyasheel seva.
ve may have been maare, wounded, become a kaidi of war, or ujaad.
if mritak, neither unke remains nor sangeen can be positively pahachaanaa.
banane mia rai maharoom an occupational risk liye seva karmiyon for as long as vahin rai been warfare.

the red-eye prabhaav in chayachitr is the common rup of red vidhyaarthiyon in rang chayachitr of eyes.
it occurs jab using a photographic flash very close to the camera lens ( as saath sabase compact camere ), in ambient kam lite.
the prabhaav appears in the ankhen of insaano or pashu ki have tapetum lucidum.
natya followspot operators, positioned nearly coincidentally saath a bahut ujjwal lite or somewhat dur from the abhinaytaon, occasionally gavaah red-eye in abhinaytaon on stage.
the effect is nahin drishy to the rest of the darshak kuki it is reliant on the bahut choti kone between the followspot oparator and the lite.
The vishvavidhyalayon of california, santa Barbara ( commonly referred to as uc santa Barbara or UCSB ) is a public research vishvavidhyalayon or ek of the ten saamaanya campuses of the vishvavidhyalayon of california pranali.
the main campus is stith on a site in Goleta, California, United States, from santa barbara and uttarpashchim of Los angeles.
tracing its roots waapas to 1891 as an independent shikshak ' college, ucsb joined the University of California pranali in 1944 and is the third-oldest general-education campus in the pranali.
UCSB is ek of america 's public ivi vishvavidhyalayon, jisase recognizes sheersh public shodh vishvavidhyalayon in the sanyukt rajya.
The vishvavidhyalayon is a comprehensive doctoret vishvavidhyalayon or is vyavasthit into five collejon or skulon offering 87 undergraduate degree and 55 graduate degree.
the campus is the 6th-largest in the uc pranali by namakan saath 18,977 undergraduate or 2,950 graduate vidhyaarthee.
in 2012, ucsb thi ranked 41st among `` neshnal vishvavidhyalayon '' or 10th among public vishvavidhyalayon by U.S. News & sansar rapat.
the vishvavidhyalayon thi bhi ranked 35th vishwavyaapee by the Times Higher Education sansar University rankings or 34th vishwavyaapee ( 6th vishwavyaapee liye engineering ) by the academik ranking of sansar vishvavidhyalayon in 2012. < ref name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 '' >
uc santa Barbara is a `` very unchi kaaryaklap '' shodh vishvavidhyalayon and kharch $ 191.2 lakh on shodh expenditures in the 2007 phiscal year, 97th-largest in the sanyukt rajya.
ucsb houses baarah national shodh centers, sahit the prasiddh Kavli Institute liye saidhantik bhautikee.
ucsb sankaay shaamil paanch nobel puraskaar laureates, ek field medalist, 29 members of the National academy of sciences, 27 members of the neshnal academy of abhiyantriki, or 31 sadasyon of the amareeki academy of Arts or sciences.
UCSB thi the No. 3 mejabaan on the arpanet and thi elected to the sangh of amareeki vishvavidhyalayon in 1995.
The uc Santa barbara gauchos compete in the NCAA prabhag i big west sammelan.
the Gauchos have jiti ncaa neshnal championships in main 's soker or main 's water polo.
sant Joseph saath the shishu yishu by guido reni
Saint joseph 's Day, kooch 19, the Feast of st. Joseph is in Western christianity the principal feast din of sant Joseph, jeevanasathi of the Blessed virgin Mary.
he is bhi the step-father of yishu of nasarat /jesus messiah.
It rai the rank of a solemnity in the roman catholic Church ; catholics jo follow the Missal of 1962 celebrate it as a pehla class feast.
pichhlaa to 1962 it thi manaaye as a feast of the rank of doguna of the first class.
it is a feast or commemoration in the provinces of the anglican niyaaz, or a feast or parv in the lutheran girijaghar.
Saint joseph 's din is the patronal feast din liye candal as khub as for canada, persons namit joseph, Josephine, etc., for dharmik institutes, skulon or parishes bearing his name, or for carpenters.
it is bhi pita 's din in kuch Catholic countries, mukhyatah Spain, portugal, and italy.
kooch 19 was samarpit to sant joseph in several pashchimi calendars by the dasavaan sadi, or this custom thi sthapit in Rome by 1479.
Pope St. Pius v extended iske upyog to the sampurna Roman Rite by his apostolic samvidhan Quo primum ( July 14, 1570 ).
chunki 1969, episkopel sammelnon may, if ve kaash, transafar it to a tithi outside lent.
between 1870 or 1955, a feast thi manaaye in honor of st. Joseph as jeevanasathi of the dhanya virgin mariyam and Patron of the saarvbhaumik girijaghar, the latter title having been given to use by Pope paayas ix.
Originally manaaye on the teesraa sande after easter saath an octave, baad divino afflatu of St. paayas x ( dekhie Reform of the Roman breviary by Pope paayas X ), it was moved to the preceding Wednesday.
The feast thi bhi retitled The solemnity of sant joseph.
is jashn or iske accompanying octave thi abolished dauraan the modernisation or sarleekaran of rubrics antargat Pope Pius barahavin in 1955.
it is still kaayam by Catholics jo follow the missal of 1962 or pehle missals.
as the traditional holiday of the rasulon ss. philip and James, may 1, tha dhundhlee isse the memory of sabase Catholics by the mid-twentieth sadi, ki of joseph the kaaryakarta was created in anukram to coincide saath the celebration of antarrashtriya shramik din ( may din ) in anek deshon.
the feast of ss. philip or james, jisase tha maharoom manaaye on ki date chunki the chathe sadi, was moved isse its traditional place.
in the nai calendar prakashit in 1969, the feast, jisase at one samay occupied the ucchtam possible rank in the girijaghar calendar, was reduced to an vaikalpik Memorial, the nunatam rank for a sant 's din.
The purvi paramparaagat girijaghar celebrates sant joseph on the sande baad christmas.
mariah kairi ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an amareeki singer, songwriter, ricard producer, abhinetri, or locasevak.
antargat the guidance of colombia record karypalika tommy mottola, kairi released uske self-titled debyue studio album mariah kairi in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum or shakhit chaar lagaataar kramank ek singles on the u.s. billboard hot 100 chart.
Following her vivaah to mottola in 1993 or kamyaabi saath hit records bhav ( 1991 ), music baksaa ( 1993 ), and mairi christmas ( 1994 ), kairi thi sthapit as colombia 's highest-selling adhinium.
daydream ( 1995 ) bana music history jab iske duusari single `` ek Sweet din ``, a duet with boij ii main, spent a ricard solah weeks on top of the billboard Hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart itihaas.
dauraan the recording of the album, kairi began to deviate isse uske r & b or pop beginnings and dhire traversed into hip hop.
is musical badalen became evident saath the release of titali ( 1997 ), at which samay Carey had alag from mottola.
kairi baayein Columbia in 2000, or hastakshrit a record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract with virgin Records.
pehle the relies of uske pehla feature filmi Glitter ( 2001 ), she suffered a shaareerik or emotional breakdown and thi hospitalized for severe exhaustion.
Following the filmi 's garib resepshan, wo was bought out of her recording anubandh liye $ 50 lakh, jisase led to a manaahi in uske kariyar.
wo hastakshrit a multi-million dollar anubandh deal saath dweep record in 2002, or baad an unsuccessful kaal, laute to the top of music chart saath the Emancipation of mimi ( 2005 ).
iske duusari single `` we belong Together `` became uske sabase kaamyaab single of the 2000s, or thi baad namit `` Song of the dashak '' by Billboard.
kairi ekbar again ventured into film saath a well-received abhinit bhoomika in ( 2009 ) ; wo thi awarded the `` bhedan pradarshan Award '' at the tad sroton International filmi Festival, and blike reel or naacp Image Award nominations.
in a kariyar spanning over do dashakon, kairi has sold more than 200 million record vishwavyaapee, bananaa uske ek of the best-selling music kalakaaron of sab time.
In 1998, wo thi sammanit as the world 's best-selling recording kalakaar of the 1990s at the sansar music Awards.
kairi was bhi namit the best-selling maadaa artist of the milinium in 2000.
according to the recording Industry sangh of america, she is the teesraa best-selling maadaa artist in the United rajya, saath 63.5 lakh certified album.
With the relies of `` Touch my Body `` ( 2008 ), kairi gained her eighteenth kramank one single in the sanyukt States, adhik than koi other solo kalakaar.
in 2012, kairi thi kramit duusari on vh1 's suchi of the `` 100 Greatest Women in music ''.
aside isse uske commercial accomplishments, kairi rai won five Grammy Awards, 17 sansar Music puraskaar, 11 American music puraskaar, or 31 billboard Music Awards.
referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the ginis World record, she is famed for her five-octave gayan dayera, shakti, melismatic style or hastakshar use of the siti panjikaran.
a bumblebee is any member of the madhumakhi genus bombus, in the parivaar apidae.
vahin are over 250 gyaat species, maujuuda primarily in the uttari golardh although ve bhi occur in dakshin america.
ve have maharoom introduced to New Zealand or the australian rajya of Tasmania.
bumblebees are soshal keet that hai characterised by black or yellow deh baalo, praayah in bands.
however, kuch prajati have orange or red on unke bodies, or may be entirely blike.
another spasht ( lakin nahin adwitiya ) characteristic is the naram nature of the bal ( long, branched setae ), pukaara pile, ki cover their sampurna body, bananaa unhen appear and mahasoos faji.
ve hai behtareen vishisht from similarly vishaal, fuzzy madhumakhiyon by the rup of the maadaa hind leg, jisase is parivardhit to rup a corbicula : a chamakdaar concave sataha ki is bare, lakin surrounded by a frinz of baalo used to transport paraag ( in samaan bees, the hind leg is completely hairy, or paraag grains hai wedged into the baalo for hastantaran ).
jaise unke relatives the honey madhumakhiyon, bumblebees feed on nectar and ekatrit paraag to feed their young.
a man khulkar carrying a handgun in a Burger king in Eagle, colorado.
in the sanyukt rajya, kholen carry is ashulipi terminology liye `` khulkar carrying a firearm in public '', as distinguished isse concealed carry, jahaan firearms can nahin be dekhi by the cazual observer.
the abhyaas of kholen carry, jahaan gun swami khulkar carry firearms while they go parichay their rose kaarobaar, has dekhi an badhayen in the U.S. in haal years.
is rai maharoom marked by a number of organized events intended to badhayen the visibility of open carry and public jaagrukta parichay the abhyaas.
proponents of kholen carry point to itihaas or aankde, noting that criminals praayah conceal unke hathiyaar.
protsaahit by samooh like opencarry.org, georgiacarry.org or some bhagidaar of the free State Project, open carry has dekhi a punaruddhar in recent saalo, lakin it is not yet saaf if is represents bas a short-term trend.
the gun rights community rai maharoom mishrit in iske jawaab.
alan gottlieb of the Second amendment nyaas and the nra have maharoom cautious in expressing support, jabaki special-interest groups such as the aforementioned opencarry.org or georgiacarry.org, or nishchit neshnal samooh aise as the Gun Owners of america ( goa ) have maharoom more outspoken in ehsaan of the abhyaas.
kholen carry is strongly opposed by gan control samooh aise as the Brady Campaign or the gathbandhan to roke gan hinsa.
the cattenom Nuclear Power sanyantr in France.
frans produces around three quarters of iske electricity by nabhikeey shakti.
The grafenrheinfeld Nuclear Power Plant in Germany.
chancelar angela markel 's coalition ghoshit on may 30, 2011, ki germany’s 17 nuclear power stesan hoga be shut down by 2022, in a niti reversal following Japan 's phukushima Daiichi nabhikeey vipatti.
philhal, 68 riektaron are antargat construction in 15 countries.
Nuclear power stesan operate in thirty countries.
in 2010, before the phukushima daiichi nabhikeey disaster, it thi reported ki an ausat of parichay 10 nabhikeey reactors yahood apekshit to become operational prati saal, although according to the sansar nabhikeey sangh, of the 17 civilian riektaron niojit to become operational between 2007 or 2009, tabhi paanch darasal aae on stream.
as of June 2011, germany or Switzerland hai phasing-out nabhikeey shakti.
as of june 2011, deshon aise as australia, austria, denmark, Greece, ireland, italy, latvian, liechtenstein, Luxembourg, malaysia, malta, nai jiland, norway or Portugal remain opposed to nabhikeey shakti.
Color gati chitra filmi refers dono to unexposed rang photographic film in a swaroop upyukt liye use in a gati chitra camera, or to samaapt motion picture filmi, ready liye use in a projector, jisase bears bimb in rang.
the pehla rang cinematography thi by arthath of yogtmak rang pranaaliyon such as the one patented in england by edward remand Turner in 1899 or tested in 1902.
A simplified yogtmak pranali was viksit by george albert smith and safaltaapurvak commercialized in 1909 as kinemacolor.
ye jaldi pranaaliyon prayukt black-and-white filmi to photograph or project do or more ghatak images through alag rang filter.
still isse footage recorded by edward turnar in 1902
saath the present-day praudyogiki, vahin hai two pruthak prakriyaaon : eastman rang rinatmak 2 rasayan ( camera rinatmak stox, duplicating interpositive or internegative stox ) or eastman Color dhanatmak 2 rasayan ( positive prints for sidhaa prakshep ), praayah abbreviated as ecn-2 and ecp-2.
fuji 's utpaada hai sangat with ecn-2 or ecp-2.
ashanti shequoiya Douglas ( born October 13, 1980 ) is an amareeki singer-songwriter, record producer, or abhinetri.
ashanti is sabase prasiddh liye uske eponymous debyue album, which featured the hit song `` foolish ``, or bechi over 503,000 copies in iske first saptaah of release throughout the U.S. in april 2002.
The album niyat a soundscan ricard as the biggest kholane saptaah bikri liye a nai maadaa kalakaar, outselling debuts by elicia kunjiyaan or lorin hill.
in the vahi saptaah, wo became the pehla maadaa yajmaan to simultaneously hold the sheersh two sthaan on the billboard hot 100 singles chart saath `` Foolish '', and `` What 's luv ? ``
( with Fat jo ).
ashanti broke record again by having three top ten geeton, `` foolish, '' `` What 's luv ? '' and `` sadaa on Time ``, on the Billboard hot 100 chart in the vahi week, being the pehla stri to accomplish this feat or hone duusari tabhi to the betals.
in 2003, the self-titled debyue album jiti ashanti uske pehla grami puraskaar for behtareen samakaleen r & b album.
as of April 1st 2013, ashanti rai bechi over 27.7 million records vishwavyaapee.
Ashanti ended the decade ( 2000–09 ) as the third top nai R & B kalakaar peeche elicia Keys or bayons.
wo also ended the decade at kramank 38 on the sheersh Artist of the Decade list.
wo is currently on the suchi of the bees Best Selling music singles chunki 1990 liye her single foolish for selling 7.2 lakh nakal to-date.
ashanti rai an anumaanit net laayak of $ 40 million dollar [ usd ].
Ashanti likhaa or sang background on jenifer lopez 's `` ai n't it mjedaar ( hatya remix ) ``, jisase pahunche number ek on billboard hot 100, jisase thi also in the top 10 chart at the vahi time as `` foolish '', `` sadaa on samay '' ( saath Ja niyam ), or `` kayaa 's luv '' ( with mote jo ).
baad that year, wo thi acclaimed as the `` rajkumaari Of hip-hop & r & b '' by uske label or capped band uske kaamyaab debut by jeetna eight billboard puraskaar and two amareeki Music Awards.
bheetar seven years of ashanti 's kariyar, wo rai scored 16 sheersh 40 hits on the hot 100.
ashanti rai endorsed numerous utpaada sahit gap, Herbal essences or mudd jeens.
ashanti cites Whitney huston, Janet jackson, prince, madonna, tupak shakur, Mary J. blige, ela fitzgerald, nashile robinsan, donna Summer, or blue Magic as uske musical prabhaav.

The United rajya Army air Forces ( usaaf or aaf ) thi the sainya vimaanan bhujaa of the sanyukt rajya of america dauraan or immediately after sansar yuddh II, or the sidhaa purvavarti of the United rajya Air force.
The aaf was a ghatak of the sanyukt States fouj, which in 1942 thi vibhajit functionally by karypalika anukram into teen autonomous shaktiyaan : the fouj Ground shaktiyaan, the Services of supplai ( jisase in 1943 became the fouj seva shaktiyaan ), or the aaf.
prayek of these shaktiyaan tha a commanding general jo reported sidhe to the mukhya of staff of the sanyukt rajya fouj.
The AAF administered sab bhaag of sainya vimaanan formerly vitarit among the fouj air corps, General mukhyalay air force, or maidan shaktiyaan corps kshetrafal cmanderon, or thus became the pehla air sanghathan of the u.S. Army to control its apana installations and support karmiyon.
in abhyaas, the AAF thi vastutah autonomous andar the fouj.
the peak size of the aaf thi over 2.4 lakh main or mahilaon in service or nearly 80,000 vayuyan in 1944, or 783 domestic bases in disambar 1943.
By VE Day it tha 1.25 million main stationed videshi or operated from more than 1,600 airfields vishwavyaapee.
the air Corps became the fouj air shaktiyaan in June 1941 to provide the air arm a vrihad swaittata in jisase to vistaar adhik efficiently, or to provide a dhaancha liye the atirikt cmand echelons required by a vastly increased force.
Although anya raashtra already had pruthak air shaktiyaan swatantra of the army or navy ( aise as the angrejon royal air Force or the German luftwaffe ), the aaf remained a part of the sanyukt States Army until the United rajya air force aae into hone in September 1947.
however, in iske vistaar and conduct of the yuddh, the AAF became more than bas an bhujaa of the greater organization.
by the samaapt of World yuddh ii the AAF tha become vastutah an swatantra seva.
By viniman or karypalika anukram, the aaf thi a adhinsth agency of the War Department tasked tabhi saath aayojan, training, or equipping combat ikai, simit in responsibility to the mahadwipiya sanyukt States, as yahood the fouj Ground shaktiyaan or the fouj seva shaktiyaan.
in vaastaviktaa, mukhyalay AAF niyantrit the conduct of all aspects of the air yuddh in prayek bhaag of the sansar, determining air niti or issuing orders without transmitting unhen through the mukhya of Staff.
This `` contrast between siddhanth or fact is... fundamental to an samajhnaa of the aaf. ''
the swatantraaa of Information adhinium ( foia ) is a sangheey freedom of soochna vidhi ki allows liye the puraa or aanshik prakatikaran of previously unreleased information or documents controlled by the United rajya government.
the adhinium defines agency records vishay to disclosure, outlines anivaary prakatikaran prakriyaaon or anudaan nau chhuton to the statute.
it thi originally hastakshrit into law by President Lyndon B. johnson, despite his misgivings, on july 4, 1966 as or gai into prabhaav the following year.
the sangheey sarkari 's swatantraaa of soochna adhinium chahie nahin be confused saath the different or varying swatantraaa of soochna Acts passed by the vyaktigat rajya.
anek of those rajya adhiniyamon may be samaan lakin not ekasmaan to the federal act.
The European sangh ( eu ) is an aarthik or political sangh of 27 sadsy rajya ki hai stith primarily in europea.
the eu operates through a pranali of supranational swatantra sansthaanon and intergovernmental negotiated decisions by the sadsy rajya.
sansthaanon of the EU include the European Commission, the Council of the europea sangh, the europea parishad, the adaalat of insaaf of the europea sangh, the European central bainko, the Court of auditors, or the europea Parliament.
the europea parliament is nirvaachit every paanch saalo by eu nagarikon.
The eu 's de facto capital is brussels.
The eu traces iske origins isse the europea Coal or steel Community ( ecsc ) and the europea Economic Community ( eec ), formed by the bhitari chah deshon in 1951 or 1958 kramshah.
In the intervening saalo the jatiyaan or its successors have grown in aakaar by the accession of nai member rajya or in shakti by the jod of niti kshetron to iske remit.
The maastricht sandhi established the europea Union under its vartmaan name in 1993.
the naveenatam pramukh amendment to the sanvaidhanik basis of the eu, the sandhi of lisbon, aae into force in 2009.
the EU rai viksit a single market through a standardised pranali of laws ki apply in sab member states.
bheetar the Schengen kshetrafal ( jisase includes 22 EU or 4 non-eu rajya ) passport niyantran have maharoom abolished.
eu nitiyon uddeshy to ensure the free gati of people, goods, sevaayen, or puunji, enact vidhaan in insaaf or home afares, or maintain common nitiyon on trade, krishi, fisheries or regional vikaas.
A maudrik sangh, the eurozone, thi sthapit in 1999 and is composed of 17 sadsy rajya.
through the aam videshi and Security Policy the eu has developed a bhoomika in external sambandh or raksha.
Permanent rajanyik mishan have maharoom sthapit around the sansar.
the eu is represented at the sanyukt Nations, the wto, the g8 and the g-20.
With a sanyukt janasankhyikee of over 500 million nivaasiyon, or 7.3 % of the sansar population, the eu, in 2012, generated a nammaatr sakal gharelu product ( GDP ) of 16.584 trillion US dollars, representing approximately 20 % of the vaishvik GDP jab measured in sharten of khareednaa shakti parity, or represents the largest nammaatr jidipi or jidipi PPP in the world.
the eu was the praptakarta of the 2012 Nobel salaam puraskaar.
the wales neshnal rugby league toli represent wales in antarrashtriya rugby league footbaal milan.
philhal the toli is saatvaan in the rlif sansar rankings.

And it thi a touring nai jiland side ki wales pehla nibhaai viruddh in 1908, jeetna 9-8 at aberdare.
Since tab wales have regularly nibhaai england, since 1935 frans, as khub as satkar the touring Australia or nai Zealand tiimon, haalanki ve rarely toured themselves, nahin playing a match in the Southern golardh jabatak 1975.
liye twenty-six years wales competed viruddh unke do biggest virodhiyon, england and frans, in the europea Nations Cup, winning the trophy chaar times.

in 2008 australian jon dikson became the new sir coach or appointed lee Briers as captain, having nibhaai liye wales since 1998.
in haal sizan Wales have liya massive strides antargat purv player Iestyn haris who rai coached wales to back to waapas europea cap safaltaaon, which culminated in a Four Nations rup in 2011.
Cardiomyopathy ( vastutah `` heart muscle disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the function of the myocardium ( the dil mansapeshi ) liye koi reason, praayah agrani to heart vifaltaa ; aam lakshan hai dyspnea ( breathlessness ) and paridhiy edema ( sujan of the taange ).
logon with cardiomyopathy hai praayah at risk of khatarnaak forms of irregular dil taal or achaanak hriday maut.
the most aam rup of cardiomyopathy is dilated cardiomyopathy.

the utpatti of the word is aspasht.
It is usually mana to be pehla attested to around 1475, lakin it may be considerably puraani.

in pokar, players construct hands of paanch taash according to predetermined niyam, jisase vary according to which roopaantar of pokar is being nibhaai.
ye hands are compared using a hand ranking pranali ki is maanak aarpaar all variants of poker, the khilaadi saath the highest-ranking haath jeetna ki particular saude in sabase visangatiyaan of pokar.
in kuch visangatiyaan, the lowest-ranking haath can jeet or taai.
These haath rankings hai also prayukt in kuch anya card khel, and in pokar dice.
the ranking of a particular hand is increased by sahit multiple cards of the same card rank, by all five taash hone isse the vahi suut, or by all five cards being of consecutive rank.
the saapeksh ranking of the various haath categories is aadhaarit on the probability of hone randomly dealt aise a hand from a well- shuffled deck.
bruce randel hornsby ( born navambar 23, 1954 ) is an amareeki virtuoso ; a singer, pianist, synthesiser, accordion, or dulcimer player, or songwriter.
gyaat for the spontaneity and rachanaatmakataa of uske sajiv pradarshan, hornsby draws frequently from shastreey, jaiz, bluegrass, lok, Motown, inzel, chattan, bluez, or jam band musical paramparaon saath uske songwriting and the seamless improvisations contained bheetar.

ganna plantation in gramin cuba
krishi in cuba rai nibhaai an important part in the arthvyavastha for anek sau years.
Agriculture contributes kam than 10 percent to the sakal gharelu utpaada ( jidipi ), lakin it employs roughly 20 pratishat of the working janasankhyikee.

Mega lakho ( initially pukaara the big khel aachman lakho as the successor of the big khel ) is an American multi-jurisdictional $ 1 lottery khel.
The pehla ( The big Game ) aachman lakho aarekhan thi in 2002 ( dekhie neeche ).
the nunatam Mega Millions advertised jacopot is $ 12,000,000, sashulk in 26 baraabar yearly kishton ( unless the nakadi vikalp is chosen ) ; praayah, the jacopot increases jab vahin is no top-prize vijeta.
however, despite no jacopot vijeta liye the $ 12,000,000 disambar 18, 2012 drawing, the jacopot remained at $ 12,000,000 liye the drawing to be yojit on disambar 21.
( dekhie below for soochna on how the game 's jacopot is funded. )
reflecting aam abhyaas among amareeki lotteries, the jackpot is advertised as a nammaatr maan of annual kishton.
a cash maan option ( the usual chunaav ), jab chuni by a jackpot winner ( dekhie below ), pays the sannikat upasthit maan of the kishton.
aachman lakho currently upyog a 5/56 ( shwet genden ) plus 1/46 ( the aachman ball ) doguna matrix to select iske jeetna sankhyaayein.
prayek game laagat $ 1.
in 43 of the 44 aachman Millions jurisdictions ( california is the exception ), there is an vikalp, pukaara megaplier ( aise khel hai $ 2 prayek ) jahaan non-jackpot puraskaar hai multiplied by 2, 3, or 4.
the megaplier thi bana uplabdhiyaan to sab aachman lakho jurisdictions in janvari 2011 ; it began as a texas -only option.
Mega Millions is drawn at 10:59 p.m. purvi samay mangalvaar and shuukravaar, sahit holidays.
Mega lakho is administered by a consortium of iske 12 asli lotteries and the drawings are held at wsb-tv in Atlanta, georgia.
paryvekshit by the georgia Lottery.
The largest jackpot in aachman lakho, as khub as in American lottery itihaas, thi $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( saath a cash vikalp of $ 474,000,000 ) liye the kooch 30, 2012 aarekhan in jisase there yahood three jackpot-winning tikaten ; ek each in illinois, kansas, and maryland.
sab teen tickets had maharoom claimed as of April 18, with each niyat of vijeta chunanaa the nakadi option.
is a japani manga shrenee nirmit by writer tsugumi ohba or manga kalakaar takeshi obata.
The pramukh akshar is lite yagami, a high skool student who discovers a supernatural notebook, the `` maut note '', dropped on Earth by a shinigami ( a god of maut ) namit Ryuk.
The maut note grants iske upayokta the ability to maar anyone jinaki naam or phase ve jaan, by writing the name in the notebook jabaki picturing their face.
the shrenee centers around lite 's attempt to banaaen or niyam a sansar `` cleansed of evil '' as `` God '' using the kopi, or the praytn of a jasoos gyaat as l to roke use.
maut Note was pehla serialized in 108 chapters by shueisha in the Japanese manga patrika saptahik Shōnen jamp isse disambar 2003 to may 2006.
the series was bhi prakashit in tankōbon swaroop in japani starting in may 2004 and ending in aktubar 2006 saath a kul of teraa aaytan.

Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a sankuchan of `` sab hallows ' sandhya `` ), bhi known as sab hallows ' Eve, is a yearly jashn observed in a kramank of deshon on aktubar 31, the eve of the pashchimi Christian feast of All Hallows ( or sab santo ) or the din initiating the triduum of hallowmas.
According to many vidwaanon, sab Hallows ' Eve is a christianised feast originally influenced by pashchimi European kataai tyohaar, or festivals of the murde saath sambhavit pagan jaden, visheshkar the Celtic Samhain.
anya vidwaanon maintain that it originated independently of samhain or rai solely isai jaden.
theth tyohaar hellovien activities shaamil trick-or-treating ( bhi known as `` guising `` ), attending veshbhusha parties, nakkashi pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, tehraana bobbing, visiting haunted aakarshan, playing pranks, telling scary stories, or watching horror films.
New york nagar taxicabs dauraan midtown rush ghanta in manahaton
the taxicabs of nai York City, saath unke distinctive pilaa paint, are a widely pahachaanaa pratik of the nagar.
taxicabs are sanchalit by nijee companies or licensed by the nai york City taxi or Limousine ayog ( TLC ).
It also oversees over 40,000 other for-hire vehicles, sahit `` black gaadiyaan '', commuter vine or ambulettes.
`` Medallion taxi, '' the familiar pilaa cab, hai the only vaahanon in the nagar permitted to chune up passengers in jawaab to a gali hail.
schematic cross khand of bhaag of patta, jilam shown as red vrutt at figure 8.
jilam is ek of the do prakaar of hastantaran tissue in vascular paudhe ( floem is the anya ).
The word xylem is niklaa from the unani shabd ξύλον ( xylon ), arth `` lakdi '' ; the best-known jilam utak is lakdi, haalanki it is mila throughout the sanyantr.
iske basic falan is to hastantaran jal, lakin it bhi transports kuch nutrients through the plant.
u.S. mahilaon suffragists demonstrating for the right to vote, February 1913.
Women 's suffrage bhi known as woman suffrage is the sahi of mahilaon to vote or to chalaaen liye office.
Limited voting rights yahood gained by women in Sweden, finland or some pashchimi U.S. rajya in the let 19th sadi.
antarrashtriya sanghathan yahood formed to nirdeshaank praytn, visheshkar the antarrashtriya parishad of mahilaon ( 1888 ) and the antarrashtriya stri suffrage gathbandhan ( 1904 ).
in 1893, nai jiland, tab a self-governing angrejon upnivesh, granted adult mahilaon the right to vote or the self-governing British colony of dakshin australia kiya the vahi in 1895, lakin bhi permitted mahilaon to chalaaen liye daftar.
australia federated in 1901, or women acquired the sahi to vote or stand in sangheey elections isse 1902, haalanki uneven pratibandh on aboriginal mahilaon matdaan in neshnal elections were nahin completely removed jabatak 1962.
the pehla European country to introduce mahilaon 's suffrage was the grand duchy of finland, then bhaag of the roosi samrajya, jisase also produced the sansar 's pehla maadaa sadasyon of parliament in the 1907 sansadeey chunaavon.
norway followed, granting puraa mahilaon 's suffrage in 1913.
in sabase pashchimi deshon, mahilaon 's suffrage aae baad sansar i War I I, saath kuch important let anukulak being France in 1944 or switzaraland in 1971.
mahilaon 's suffrage rai generally maharoom pahachaanaa baad rajnatik campaigns to obtain it were waged.
in anek deshon it thi granted pehle universal suffrage.
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a right antargat the Convention on the Elimination of sab form of Discrimination Against mahilaon, apanaaya by the sanyukt raashtra in 1979.
the Thirteenth tail ( 2006 ) by diane setterfield is a gothic suspense anokhaa, the lekhak 's pehla prakashit kitaab.
Jehovah 's gavaah is a millenarian restorationist isai denomination with nontrinitarian manyataon pruthak isse mukhyadhara christianity.Sources liye descriptors : • millenarian : • Restorationist : • isai : • denomination : the sanghathan reports vishwavyaapee sadsyta of over 7.78 million adherents shaamil in evangelism, sammelan upasthiti of over 12 million, or salanaa Memorial upasthiti of over 19 lakh.
ve hai nirdeshit by the shaasi Body of yahova 's Witnesses, a group of bado in brukaleen, nai york, that establishes all doctrines.
Jehovah 's gavaah ' manyataon hai aadhaarit on unke interpretations of the Bible and ve prefer to upyog unke apana anuwaad, the nai sansar anuwaad of the Holy shastron.
ve maananaa ki the destruction of the upasthit sansar pranali at armageddon is imminent, or ki the establishment of parameshwar 's kingdom on dharti is the tabhi solution liye sab problems faced by mankind.
the samooh emerged isse the bible chaatr gati —founded in the let 1870s by charles taze rasel saath the formation of Zion 's dekhen minar tract samaaj —with significant organizational or doctrinal parivartan antargat the leadership of joseph franklin radarford.
the naam yahova 's gavaah, aadhaarit on yashayah 43:10–12, thi apanaaya in 1931 to fark themselves isse other bible chaatr samooh and symbolize a break with the legacy of rasel 's traditions.
yahova 's gavaah are behtareen gyaat liye unke door-to-door upadesh, distributing literature aise as the burj or jaag !
, or refusing sainya seva and rakt transfusions.
They consider upyog of the name yahova vital liye uchit worship.
ve asweekrut trinitarianism, antarnihit amartv of the soul, or hellfire, which ve consider to be unscriptural doctrines.
ve do not observe Christmas, easter, janmdin, or anya chhuttiyaan or custom ve consider to have pagan origins asangat saath Christianity.
adherents commonly refer to unke body of manyataon as `` the truth '' and consider themselves to be `` in the sachai ''.
ve consider dharmanirpeksh samaaj to be morally bhrasht or antargat the influence of shaitani, or sabase limit their soshal interaction saath non-Witnesses.
Congregational anushaasanamak kriyaayein shaamil disfellowshipping, unke pad liye formal expulsion or shunning.
baptized individuals who formally chhod are mana disassociated or are bhi shunned.
Disfellowshipped or disassociated individuals may eventually be reinstated if deemed repentant.
the religion 's sthiti regarding eemaandaar aapatti to sainya service and refusal to salute national dhvaj rai brought it into conflict saath some governments.
natijatan, yahova 's gavaah have maharoom persecuted or their activities hai banned or pratibandhit in some countries.
Persistent vidhik chunautiyaan by yahova 's gavaah have bahekaave vidhaan sambandhit to civil adhikaron in several countries.
pichhlaa tango in paris ( ) is a 1972 franco-italian romantic Drama film directed by barnardo bertolucci which portrays a haal amareeki widower jo begins an benaam yon sambandh saath a yang, betrothed Parisian woman.
it sitaron marlon Brando, Maria shnider, and jean-pierre léaud.
The filmi 's kaccha portrayal of yon hinsa or emotional turmoil led to antarrashtriya vivaad and khinchaa vibhinn levels of government sensorship.
the mpaa diya the filmi an x darja upon relies in the sanyukt rajya.
baad revisions yahood bana to the MPAA ratings code, it thi vargeekrut as an nc-17 in 1997.
mgm released a censored r-rated kaaten in 1981.
the filmi rai iske nc-17 darja liye `` kuch suspasht yon saamagree. ''
Windows xp is an oparating pranali utpaadit by Microsoft liye upyog on nijee computer, sahit ghar and kaarobaar desktops, laptop or media centers.
First released to computer nirmaataaon on agast 24, 2001, it is the second sabase popular version of khidkiyaan, aadhaarit on santhaapit upayokta aadhaar.
The naam `` xp '' is short liye `` eXPerience '', highlighting the unnat upayokta anubhav.
khidkiyaan xp, the successor to Windows 2000 or Windows me, thi the first consumer-oriented oparating system utpaadit by microsoft to be nirmit on the khidkiyaan nt kernel.
Windows XP thi released vishwavyaapee liye khudara sale on October 25, 2001, and over 400 million nakal yahood in upyog in January 2006.
it was succeeded by khidkiyaan vista in janvari 2007.
Direct OEM or khudara bikri of khidkiyaan xp ceased on june 30, 2008.
microsoft jari to bechein khidkiyaan XP through unke pranali builder ( choti OEMs who sell samavet computers ) kaarykram jabatak January 31, 2009.
on April 10, 2012, Microsoft reaffirmed ki vistaarit support liye Windows XP or Office 2003 hota samaapt on April 8, 2014 and sujhaayaa that prashaskon shuru taiyaari to migrate to a nae os.
the nt -based versions of khidkiyaan, jisase are programit in C, C++, or assembly, hai known liye their improved sthirataa or dakshata over the 9x sanskaran of Microsoft khidkiyaan.
khidkiyaan xp presented a significantly redesigned aalekhiy upayokta interface, a badalen Microsoft prachaarit as more user-friendly than pichhlaa sanskaran of khidkiyaan.
in an attempt to further ameliorate the `` DLL narak `` ki plagued the past sanskaran of Windows, improved side-by-side sabha praudyogiki in khidkiyaan xp allows side-by-side installation, panjikaran and servicing of multiple sanskaran of globally shared tantra components in full algaav.
it is also the pehla sanskaran of khidkiyaan to upyog product sakriyan to combat illegal copying.
During khidkiyaan xp 's development, the project thi codenamed `` whistler '', baad whistler, British colombia, as anek Microsoft karmchaaree skied at the whistler-blackcomb ski resort.
According to web analytics aankada generated by Net anuprayog, khidkiyaan xp was the most widely used oparating pranali until agast 2012, jab khidkiyaan 7 overtook it.
, khidkiyaan xp market share is at 38.99 %, having decreased lagbhag every maah since at tanik navambar 2007, the pehla maah for jisase aankde hai publicly uplabdhiyaan isse jaal Applications.
`` por una Cabeza '' is an argentine tango saath music or geet written in 1935 by Carlos gardel or alphredo Le prabhaa kramshah.
the name is a spani horse-racing phrase arth `` by a sir '', which refers to a ghoda jeetna a res by the lambaai of ek sir.
The geet bolo of a baadhyataa horse-track juaari jo compares uske vyasan liye ghode with uske aakarshan to women.
Alfredo le Pera thi a brazilian isse São poulo, a much italian-influenced kshetrafal in Brazil, or bhi the birthplace of zequinha de abreu, composer of tico-tico no fubá.
le prabhaa and gardel died in an vayuyan krash in Medellín, ( colombia ), on june 24, 1935.
Por una cabeza
The tango rai chunki maharoom performed by numerous tango orchestras.

In the film frida ( salama Hayek, 2002 ), Gardel is suna singing it on a radio.
It is bhi quoted in daud del tredici 's `` shubh news !
nilda is waapas '' ( from the song cycle miz inez sez ).
in saint of a stri ( 1992 ), the tango is performed by the `` the Tango Project '', jo darasal appear in the naachna jhaanki abhinit al pachino ( the recording used is available on ek of their cd album ).
jon williams arranged a sanskaran of the piece ki appears on the album `` cinema serenade '' with the violin solo performed by itzhak parlman.
parlman or williams ( conducting ) have bhi performed the tukdaa together in sajiv concerts.

the baroreflex or baroreceptor reflex is ek of the deh 's homeostatic mechanisms for maintaining rakt dabaav.
It provides a rinatmak pratikriya loop in which an elevated rakt pressure reflexively kalyankari dil rate to ghati isliye causing rakt dabaav to ghati ; likewise, decreased rakt pressure activates the baroreflex, causing heart rate to badhayen thus causing an increase in rakt dabaav.
the pranali relies on specialized neurons, known as baroreceptors, in the aortic mehrab, carotid sinus, or elsewhere to monitor parivartan in rakt dabaav or riley unhen to the brainstem.
subsequent parivartan in rakt pressure hai mediated by the autonomic nervous pranali.
alindi natriuretic peptid form a parallel rinatmak pratikriya loop in an endocrinological contrast to the renin-angiotensin system.
The loma Prieta bukamp, also gyaat as the Quake of '89 or the sansar Series bukamp, was a major bukamp ki struck the san francisco khadi Area of california on aktubar 17, 1989, at 5:04 pm local samay.
caused by a slip along the san Andreas dosha, the bukamp lasted 10–15 second and measured 6.9 on dono the pal pariman scale ( surface-wave magnitude 7.1 ) or on the open-ended richter scale.
The bukamp maare 63 logon throughout uttari california, ghayal 3,757 or baayein kuch 3,000–12,000 logon beghar.
the bukamp occurred dauraan the warm-up abhyaas liye the third khel of the 1989 World shrenee, featuring dono of the khadi Area 's pramukh lig besabaal tiimon, the Oakland athletics and the san francisco Giants.
kuki of game-related khel coverage, this thi the pehla pramukh bukamp in the sanyukt rajya to have iske aarambhik dhakka broadcast sajiv on television.
