the sahuukaar ( ♙♟ ) is the sabase numerous or in sabase halaaton the weakest piece in the khel of shatranj, historically representing infantry or, more visheshkar, hathiyaarband peasants or pikemen.
In shatranj, prayek player begins the khel saath aath pawns, one on prayek square of the rank tatkaal in saamne of the anya pieces.
( in algebraic sanketan, the white pyaade prarambh on a2, b2, c2,..., h2, jabaki blike pyaade prarambh on a7, b7, c7,..., h7. )
vyaktigat pyaade hai referred to by the sanchika on jisase ve stand.
liye udhaaharan, ek bolti of `` shwet 's f-pawn '' or `` blike 's b-pawn '', or less commonly ( using varnanaatmak sanketan ), `` shwet 's king 's bishop pawn '' or `` Black 's maharani 's knight sahuukaar ''.
It is also aam to refer to a rook pawn, arth koi sahuukaar on the a- or h-file, a knight sahuukaar ( on the b- or g-file ), a bishap pawn ( on the c- or f-file ), a maharani sahuukaar ( on the d-file ), a king sahuukaar ( on the e-file ), and a central sahuukaar ( on either the d- or e-file ).
the sainya shaktiyaan of the sansar have differing approaches to the enlistment of homosexual ( gay and lesbian ) and dwillingi individuals.
the armed shaktiyaan of sabase viksit deshon have now removed nitiyon excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( saath sakht nitiyon on yon utpeedan ).
raashtra ki permit gay logon to serve khulkar in the military shaamil the 4 of the 5 sadasyon of the un Security parishad ( sanyukt rajya, sanyukt kingdom, frans, and rus ), the ganatantr of china ( taiwan ), australia, Israel, South africa, argentina, or sab NATO sadasyon excluding turkon.
hydrogen utpaadan is the parivaar of audyogic methods liye generating hydrogen.
philhal the prabal praudyogiki for sidhaa utpaadan is steam reforming isse hydrocarbons.
anek anya vidhi are gyaat sahit electrolysis and thermolysis.
In 2006, the sanyukt rajya thi estimated to have a utpaadan capacity of 11 lakh tonnes of hydrogen.
5 million tonnes of hydrogen yahood khapat on-site in aayal shodhan, or in the production of ammonia ( haber prakram ) or methanol ( reduction of carbon monooxide ).
0.4 lakh ton yahood an incidental by-product of the chlor-alkali process.
Hydrogen production is an anumaanit $ 100 arab industry.
a basis point ( often denoted as bp, colloquially referred to in the bahuvachan as `` bips '', bhi gyaat as a `` beep '' ) is a ikai equal to ek hundredth of a percentage point, or ek part per ten hajaar, 1/10000.
the vahi ikai is bhi ( rarely ) pukaara a permyriad, vastutah arth 'for ( prayek ) asankhya ( ten hajaar ) ', or in ki context is likhaa saath jisase looks jaise a pratishat chihn ( % ) saath do atirikt zeroes at the samaapt ( like a stylized rup of the chaar zeros in the denominator, haalanki it originates as a prakritik ekstansion of the pratishat ( % ) or permille ( ‰ ) signs ).
a aadhaar point is defined as:
1 aadhaar point = 1 permyriad = one one-hundredth pratishat
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 % = 0.1‰ = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1 % = 100 bp = 100
aadhaar ank hai prayukt as a suvidhajanak ikai of maapan in contexts jahaan pratishat matbhed of less than 1 % hai discussed.
the sabase common udhaaharan is byaaj daron, where matbhed in byaaj daron of kam than 1 % per year hai usually meaningful to baat parichay.
For example, a antar of 0.10 percentage points is samatuly to a change of 10 aadhaar ank ( e.g. a 4.67 % rate increases by 10 aadhaar ank to 4.77 % ).
Like pratishat ank, aadhaar ank avoid the ambiguity between saapeksh and nirpeksh charchaayen parichay interest daron by dealing tabhi with the nirpeksh change in newmeric maan of a rate.
For example, if a report says vahin rai maharoom a `` 1 % badhayen '' from a 10 % interest rate, is could refer to an badhayen either isse 10 % to 10.1 % ( saapeksh, 1 % of 10 % ), or isse 10 % to 11 % ( nirpeksh, 1 % plus 10 % ).
If, however, the rapat says vahin rai maharoom a `` 10 aadhaar point badhayen '' from a 10 % byaaj rate, tab we jaan ki the byaaj rate of 10 % rai increased by 0.10 % ( the nirpeksh badalen ) to a 10.1 % rate.
it is common practice in the financial industry to use basis ank to denote a rate badalen in a vittiya instrument, or the antar ( sprad ) between do byaaj daron, sahit the yields of fixed-income securities.
chunki nishchit lone and bonds may commonly be quoted in sambandh to kuch anukramanika or underlying suraksha, ve will often be quoted as a spread over ( or antargat ) the index.
For udhaaharan, a rin that bears byaaj of 0.50 % prati annum upar the landan Interbank offered rate ( LIBOR ) is said to be 50 aadhaar ank over LIBOR, which is commonly expressed as `` l+50bps '' or simply `` l+50 ''.
The pad `` basis point '' rai its origins in vyapaar the `` basis '' or the sprad between two byaaj rates.
chunki the aadhaar is praayah choti, ye hai quoted multiplied up by 10000, and hence a `` full point '' gati in the `` aadhaar '' is a aadhaar point.
Contrast saath pips in fx aage bazaar.
The sambandh between pratishat parivartan or basis points can be summarized as folo : 1 pratishat point badalen = 100 aadhaar ank, and 0.01 pratishat ank = 1 aadhaar point.
so, a bond jinaki upaj increases from 5 % to 5.5 % is kaha to badhayen by 50 aadhaar ank ; or interest daron that have risen 1 pratishat point are kaha to have increased by 100 aadhaar ank.
The British royal Family is the group of close rishtedaaron of the monarch of the sanyukt kingdom.
the term is bhi commonly lagu to the same group of logon who hai the relations of the monarch in uske or uske bhoomika as sovereign of any of the anya Commonwealth realms, yun sometimes at variance saath aadhikarik national sharten for the parivaar.
sadasyon of the Royal parivaar belong to, either by birth or vivaah, the house of windsar, chunki 1917, jab george v changed the naam of the royal house isse Saxe-Coburg and gotha.
is decision was primarily liya kuki britain and her Empire yahood at yuddh saath germany or die the angrejon Royal parivaar 's damdaar germany ancestry ; it was felt ki iske public chitra could be improved by chunanaa a adhik angrejon house naam.
The nai name chosen, windsar, tha bilkul no connection anya than as the naam of the castle jisase thi or continues to be a royal residence.
haalanki in the sanyukt Kingdom vahin is no sakht vidhik or aupchaarik paribhaasha of jo is or is not a sadsy of the Royal parivaar, or alag suchiyaan hoga shaamil different logon, those carrying the style uske or uske Majesty ( HM ), or uske or uske royal highness ( HRH ) are sadaa mana sadasyon, jisase praayah parinaam in the anuprayog of the pad to the monarch, the consort of the monarch, the vidhwaa consorts of pichhlaa monarchs, the children of the monarch or pichhlaa monarchs, the male-line grandchildren of the monarch or previous monarchs, and the spouses and the widows of a monarch 's and pichhlaa monarch 's bete or male-line pote.
on 30 November 1917, king george V issued akshar patent defining jo hai sadasyon of the royal parivaar ; the text of the soochna isse the landan gajet is as follows:
in 1996, uske Majesty The maharani parivardhit ye akshar patent, as was evidenced by is soochna from the landan gazette:
in 2013 akshar patent were jari to extend a sheershak and a style borne by sadasyon of the royal Family to additional vyaktiyon to be born, evidenced by is Notice isse the landan Gazette:
sadasyon and rishtedaaron of the British royal Family historically represented the monarch in vibhinn places throughout the British samrajya, sometimes liye extended avadhi as viceroys, or liye vishisht ceremonies or kaarykram.
aaj, ve praayah perform ceremonial or social kartavya throughout the sanyukt kingdom or videsh on behalf of the sanyukt kingdom.
aside isse the monarch, unke tabhi sanvaidhanik role in the afares of sarkari is to serve, if yogya and when niyukt by letters patent, as a Counsellor of rajya, do or more of jisko kasarat the authority of the crown ( bheetar stipulated had ) in the indisposal or absence isse the angrejon frem of the monarch.
in the anya realms of the rashtramandal roylty do not serve as Counsellors of State.
However in each aise frem the monarch 's parivaar members may adhinium on nimitt of, hai vittposhit by, and represent the sovereign of ki particular rajya, or nahin the sanyukt Kingdom.
the maharani, uske consort, uske children or grandchildren, as khub as sab former adhipati ' children and grandchildren tham sthaan in the pehla bhaag of the aadhikarik orders of purvata in England or wales, scotland, or uttari ireland.
Wives of the kaha anand unke patiyon ' precedence, or husbands of rajkumariyon hai unofficially lakin habitually lagaai with unke patniyaan as khub.
however, the maharani badla the nijee anukram of purvata in the royal parivaar in paksh of rajkumariyon eni or elexandra, jo henceforth lo private purvata over the duchess of cornwall, jo is otherwise the frem 's ucchtam ranking woman after the Queen herself.
She kiya nahin alter the saapeksh precedence of anya born-princesses, aise as the betiyaan of her younger sons.
haiti ( ; haitian creole ayiti ), officially the ganatantr of haiti ( ; ), is a caribbean desh.
it occupies the pashchimi, smaller portion of the island of hispaniola, in the vrihad antillean dweepasmooh, jisase it saajha saath the dominican Republic.
ayiti ( land of unchi mountains ) thi the swadeshi Taíno or Amerindian naam liye the dweep.
The desh 's highest point is pic la Selle, at.
the total kshetrafal of haiti is or iske capital is Port-au-Prince.
Haitian creole or french are the aadhikarik bhashaaen.
haiti 's regional, aitihaasik, or ethno-linguistic sthiti is adwitiya liye anek kaaran.
it thi the first independent swadesh of Latin america or the Caribbean, the first black -led ganatantr in the sansar, and the duusari ganatantr in the americas when it gained independence in 1804 as bhaag of a kaamyaab slave kranti lasting nearly a dashak.
In 2012, Haiti ghoshit iske intention to seek sambhddha membership aukaat in the africa sangh.
Haiti is the sabase populous of the predominantly francophone swatantra nations in the americas.
It is ek of tabhi do swatantra raashtra in the Americas ( saath saath canada ) to designate French as an official bhashaa ; the anya French-speaking kshetron are all overseas départements, or collectivités, of frans.
haiti is the sabase populous full member-state of the Caribbean jatiyaan ( CARICOM ).
it is the poorest country in the americas as measured by the Human Development anukramanika.
Political violence has occurred regularly throughout its itihaas, agrani to sarkari instability.
sabase recently, in farvari 2004, a coup d'état originating in the uttar of the country forced the resignation or nirvaasan of adhyaksh jean-bertrand Aristide.
a asthaayee government took control saath suraksha provided by the United raashtra sthirikaran mishan in haiti ( MINUSTAH ).
Michel martelly, the vartmaan adhyaksh, was nirvaachit in the haitian general chunaav, 2011.
the island has had a itihaas of destructive bukamp.
a 7.0 pariman bukamp struck haiti on 12 janvari 2010 and tabah port-au-prince.
the ucchtam vishwasaneey maut count was estimated at 220,000.
Haitian sarkari estimates yahood higher.
the adhyakshiya palace, Parliament and many anya mahatvapurn structures yahood nasht, saath saath anginat gharon or businesses, leaving sainkadon of hazaron of logon homeless.
The desh has yet to ricover isse the 2010 earthquake ( and subsequent incidents ) due to dono the gambhirtha of the damage Haiti endured in 2010, as khub as a sarkari ki thi aprabhavi khub pehle the bukamp.
United rajya aid sanghathan have daan $ 2 arab.
sanyukt saath other antarrashtriya daan, ye nidhi hai intended to yogadan to the rebuilding of the desh.
the khooni beetroots is the pseudonym of sar Bob Cornelius rifo, the Italian electro house or dance-punk music nirmaataa, DJ or photographer.
the khooni beetroots is well-known liye the blike venom mukhauta he wears dauraan pradarshan.
in fact, the tabhi identifying public visheshta of Rifo is the saal `` 1977 '' tattooed aarpaar his chaati, jisase is dono the saal ki the nirmaataa and punk-rock thi born.
`` The khooni beetroots dj niyat '' contains Sir Bob cornelius Rifo and tommy chaay.

A pager is a betaar telecommunications device ki receives and pradarshak numeric or text messages, or receives and announces awaz sandesh.
one-way pagers can tabhi praapt messages, jabaki response pagers and two-way pagers can also acknowledge, jawaab to, or originate messages using an aatanrik transmeter.
pagers operate as part of a paging pranali which shaamil one or adhik phixd transmitaron ( or in the case of jawaab pagers or two-way pagers, one or adhik aadhaar stesan ), as khub as a kramank of pagers carried by mobile users.
ye systems can dayera isse a restaurant system saath a single low-power transmeter, to a deshbhar pranali saath hazaron of high-power base stesan.
ek of the pehla vyaavhaarik paging services thi shubharambh in 1950 liye physicians in the nai york City kshetrafal.
physicians sashulk US $ 12 per maah liye the seva or carried a ( 6 oz ) pager ki would praapt phone sandesh within ( 25 mi ) of a single transmitter tower.
The pranali thi manufactured by the reevesound Company or operated by Telanswerphone.
in 1960, jon francis Mitchell sanyukt tatv of Motorola 's walkie talkie or automobile radio technologies to create the first transistorized pager, or isse this point, paging praudyogiki continued to agrim, or pager apnaanaa jari to expand, jabatak the jaldi 1990s.
However, by the mid-1990s, as cellular technologies became sasta and adhik widely uplabdhiyaan, unnat sevaayen began to displace paging as a commercial product.
Today, pagers maujuud largely as niche products, dhundhna preferential upyog in anuprayog aise as hospitals, public safety, or retail sthitiyaan jahaan unke simplicity, unchi vishwasaneeyata, or low laagat represent significant advantages.
Reevesville is a kasbaa in dorchester county, dakshin carolina, sanyukt rajya.
the population thi 196 at the 2010 janasankhyikee.
As paribhaashit by the u.S. Office of Management or bajet, or prayukt by the u.S. Census beuro liye sankhyikeey uddeshy tabhi, reevesville is included bheetar the charleston-north charleston-summerville mahanagar area.
frida kahlo de revera ( born magdalena carmen frieda kahlo y calderón ; July 6, 1907 – July 13, 1954 ) thi a mexican chitrakaar, born in coyoacán, jo is behtareen known liye uske self-portraits.
kahlo 's jivan began or ended in mexico City, in uske ghar gyaat as the blue House.
She diya uske janam tithi as july 7, 1910, but her birth certificate shows july 6, 1907.
Kahlo tha allegedly chaahi the saal of uske janam to coincide saath the saal of the shuruuaat of the mexican revolution so ki her jivan hota shuru saath the birth of aadhunik Mexico.
uske work rai maharoom celebrated in mexico as emblematic of neshnal or indigenous tradition, and by nariwadi for iske uncompromising depiction of the female experience or form.
Mexican culture or Amerindian saanskrithik parampara hai mahatvapurn in uske kaary, jisase rai maharoom sometimes characterized as Naïve art or lok art.
uske kaary rai bhi been varnit as `` surrealist '', and in 1938 andre Breton, principal initiator of the surrealist gati, varnit Kahlo 's art as a `` riban around a bomb ''.
kahlo had a volatile vivaah saath the prasiddh mexican artist diego Rivera.
She suffered lifelong swasthya samasyaayein.
anek of uske health samasyaayein yahood the parinaam of a trekkic durghatana wo survived as a kishoravastha.
Recovering isse her choton isolated uske isse anya logon or this algaav bahekaave her works, many of jisase hai self-portraits of one sort or another.
kahlo suggested, `` I paint myself because i am so praayah alone or kuki i am the vishay I jaan behtareen. ''
She bhi stated, `` I thi born a kutiya.
i thi born a chitrakaar. ''

theresienwiese on the din pehle oktoberfest 2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival celebrating beer yojit annually in munich, byrn, Germany, running from late September to the pehla weekend in aktubar.
it is ek of the sabase prasiddh kaarykram in Germany or is the world 's largest fair, saath adhik than 6 million logon isse around the sansar upasthit the event prayek saal.
to the locals, it is nahin pukaara oktoberfest, lakin `` die wiesn '', baad the colloquial name of the fairgrounds themselves.
The oktoberfest is an important part of bar culture, having been held chunki 1810.
anya cities across the sansar bhi tham oktoberfest jashn, modeled after the original Munich event.
The Munich oktoberfest originally took place dauraan the solah dinon up to, or including, the pehla sande in October.
in 1994, the anusuchee thi parivardhit in jawaab to German reunification so that if the pehla Sunday in aktubar jalprapaat on the 1st or 2nd, tab the parv hota go on jabatak aktubar 3 ( germany Unity din ).
yun, the parv is abhi 17 dinon jab the pehla sande is aktubar 2 or 18 dinon jab it is aktubar 1.
In 2010, the festival lasted until the pehla Monday in aktubar, to chihnit the varshganth of the event.
the parv is yojit in an kshetrafal namit the theresienwiese ( field, or marg, of therese ), praayah called wiesn liye short, stith nikat munich 's bich.
vishaal quantities of oktoberfest Beer hai khapat, with lagbhag 7 lakh liters parosa during the 16 din parv in 2007.
vizitor may bhi anand a chaudee kismein of traditional khaanaa aise as Hendl ( chicken ), schweinebraten ( roast pork ), Schweinshaxe ( grilled ham ol ), steckerlfisch ( grield machhlee on a stick ), würstl ( sausages ) saath saath brezeln ( Pretzel ), knödel ( potato or bread pakodee ), Käsespätzle ( cheese noodles ), reiberdatschi ( aalu pancakes ), sauerkraut or rotkohl/blaukraut ( red gobhi ) saath with such bar delicacies as obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter sprad ) or Weisswurst ( a white sockes ).
a platter with cheez or garnishes
Wheels of gouda
cheez is a generik pad liye a vividh samooh of milk-based khaanaa products.
cheez is produced in wide-ranging jaayaka, banaavat, and form.
Cheese consists of proteins and fat isse milk, praayah the milk of cows, buffalo, bakriyon, or sheep.
It is produced by jaman of the milk protein casein.
typically, the milk is acidified or addition of the anzime rennet kalyankari coagulation.
The solids hai separated and pressed into final rup.
kuch cheeses have molds on the rind or throughout.
sabase cheeses melt at kooking taapmaana.
sainkadon of prakaar of cheez isse vibhinn deshon hai produced.
unke sheliyaan, banaavat or jaayaka nirbhar on the origin of the milk ( sahit the animal 's diet ), whether they have been pasteurized, the butterfat saamagree, the jeevanu or mold, the prasanskaran, or vriddhavastha.
Herbs, spices, or wood dhunaa may be prayukt as flavoring agenton.
the yellow to red color of anek cheeses, aise as red licester, is saamanytah formed isse adding annatto.
liye a few cheeses, the milk is curdled by adding acids aise as sirka or lemon ras.
sabase cheeses are acidified to a lesser oopaadhi by bacteria, which phere milk sugars into lactic acid, tab the addition of rennet completes the curdling.
shaakaahaari vikalp to rennet are uplabdhiyaan ; most are utpaadit by fermentation of the fungus mucor miehei, lakin anya have been extracted isse vibhinn species of the Cynara thistle parivaar.
cheez is valued for its portability, long jivan, and unchi content of mote, protein, calcium, or phosphorus.
Cheese is adhik compact or rai a longer shelf jivan than milk, haalanki kaisaa long a cheese will keep may depend on the type of cheez ; labals on packets of cheez praayah arji ki a cheez chahie be khapat bheetar teen to paanch days of opening.
generally bolnaa, mushkil cheeses pichhlaa longer than naram cheeses, aise as brie or bakrii 's milk cheez.
Cheesemakers nikat a dugdh pradesh may benefit from fresher, lower-priced milk, and lower shipping laagat.
The long storage life of some cheez, visheshkar if it is encased in a surakshatmak rind, allows selling jab bazaar hai favorable.
atirikt ingredients may be added to kuch cheeses, aise as black peppers, lahasun, chives or jamaaya.
a visheshgy vikreta of cheez is sometimes gyaat as a cheesemonger.
To become an visheshgy in is field, like wine or cooking, requires kuch formal education and saalo of tasting or hands-on anubhav.
is sthiti is typically jimmedaar liye sab pahaluon of the cheez inventory ; selecting the cheez menu, khareednaa, receiving, bhandar, or ripening.
vidhik citation signals hai a niyat of bread abbreviated phrases or shabd prayukt to clarify the praadhikaar or significance of a vidhik citation as it relates to a proposition.
signal sahaayta a reader jaldi discern arth or upyogita of a particular sandarbh jab the sandarbh itself karata nahin provide paryaapt soochna.
sabase citation signal hai lagaai in saamne of the citation to which they apply.
For example, in the paragraph jab likhane a vidhik argument, it is important to refer to praathmik sources.
to assist pathak in locating ye strot, it is vaanchhneeya to use a standardized citation format.
See generally harvard vidhi punarvilokan Association, the bluebook : a Uniform pranali of citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ).
Note, however, ki kuch nyaayalayon may aavashyaktaa koi legal papers ki hai submitted to unhen to conform to a alag citation swaroop.
the signal is the phrase `` dekhie generally, '' jisase indicates ki the citation `` The bluebook : a Uniform System of citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ) '' provides saamaanya background soochna on the topic.
neil eldan armastrang ( agast 5, 1930 – agast 25, 2012 ) was an amareeki astronaut and the pehla vyakti to chalanaa on the chandramaa.
he thi bhi an aerospace ejeeniyar, naval aviator, pareekshan payalat, and vishvavidhyalayon praadhyaapak.
Before banane an astronaut, armastrang was an adhikari in the u.S. navy or served in the korian War.
baad the yuddh, he arjeet his snaatak 's oopaadhi at purdue vishvavidhyalayon or parosa as a pareekshan pilot at the neshnal Advisory cameti liye Aeronautics High-Speed udaan stesan, abhi gyaat as the Dryden udaan Research bich, jahaan he logged over 900 flights.
he baad completed graduate adhyayan at the University of dakshini california.
a bhagidaar in the u.S. Air force 's man in spes Soonest or x-20 dyna-soar insaan spaceflight kaarykram, armastrang joined the NASA astronaut corps in 1962.
He made uske pehla spes udaan, as command payalat of mithun 8, in 1966, banane nasa 's pehla civilian astronaut to makkhi in spes.
On this mishan, he performed the pehla docking of two spacecraft, saath pilot daud scot.
armastrang 's duusari and last spaceflight was as mishan commander of the Apollo 11 chandramaa landing, in July 1969.
on is mishan, armastrang and baz elderin descended to the chandra surface or kharch two and a half ghanton exploring, while Michael colins remained in chandra kaksha in the cmand modul.
saath saath Collins or elderin, armastrang thi awarded the adhyakshiya padak of swatantraaa by adhyaksh richard Nixon ; in 1978, President Jimmy carter prastut armastrang the congressional spes padak of sammaan in 1978 ; he or uske purv crewmates received the congressional sunaharaa padak in 2009.
armastrang died in sinsinati, ohio, on agast 25, 2012, at the aayu of 82, baad jatiltaaon isse coronary artery bypass surgery.
sachivalay ( March 30, 1970 – aktubar 4, 1989 ) thi an amareeki thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the first U.S. tripal Crown champion in 25 years.
he niyat res record in all three kaarykram in the shrenee — the kentki darbi ( 1:59.4 ), the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ), or the Belmont stakes ( 2:24 ) — record that still stand aaj.
he is mana to be one of the mahanatam Thoroughbreds of all samay.
in 1999, ESPN kramit sachivalay the 35th best athlete of the 20th century, the highest ranking racehorse on the list url_http.
He kramit second peeche man o ' yuddh in The blood-horse 's List of the sheersh 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th sadi.
sachivalay thi sired by Bold shaasha out of Somethingroyal, by princequillo.
he thi foaled at the Meadow in caroline county, virginia.
Like his prasiddh predecessor man o ' yuddh, Secretariat was a vishaal shahbaloot colt or thi die the vahi upnaam, `` big red. ''
sachivalay 's grandsire, nasrullah, is bhi the great-great-grandsire of 1977 tripal crown vijeta Seattle slew.
swaamitv by paini chenery, he thi trained by lucien laurin and mukhyatah ridden by canadai jockey Ron turcotte, along with prashikshu jockey paul Feliciano ( pehla do races ), or veteran edi mapel ( last res ).
he raced in chenery 's Meadow stable 's blue and white checkered colors or his duulhe thi Eddie swead.
sachivalay stood lagbhag lambaa, and weighed, saath a 75-inch girth, in his racing pradhan.
madrid (, ) is the puunji or largest city of spain.
the janasankhyikee of the nagar is roughly 3.3 lakh or the sampurna janasankhyikee of the madrid mahanagar area is gananaa to be around 6.5 million.
it is the third-largest city in the European sangh, baad landan and berlin, or iske mahanagar kshetrafal is the third-largest in the europea sangh baad landan or Paris.
The nagar spans a kul of.
the nagar is stith on the Manzanares nadi in the kendra of dono the country or the jatiyaan of madrid ( jisase comprises the city of madrid, its conurbation and vistaarit upnagaron and villages ) ; is jatiyaan is bordered by the autonomous samudaayon of castile or león or castile-la maancha.
as the puunji nagar of spain, seat of government, or nivas of the spani monarch, madrid is bhi the rajnatik, economic or saanskrithik kendra of spain.
The current mahayor is ana botella from the logon 's party ( PP ).
the Madrid shahari agglomeration rai the third-largest jidipi in the European sangh or its prabhaav in politics, education, entertainment, paryaavaran, media, faishan, vigyaan, samskruti, or the kala sab yogadan to iske aukaat as one of the world 's major vaishvik shaharon.
Due to iske economic output, unchi standard of jeena, or market aakaar, Madrid is mana the pramukh vittiya kendra of dakshini Europe or the iberia prayadweep ; it host the sir offices of the vishaal bahumat of the pramukh Spanish companiyaan, aise as telefónica, Iberia or Repsol.
madrid is the sabase touristic city of spain, the fourth-most touristic of the mahadweep, or the saatvaan sabase visited city in the world according to Forbes.
is the 10th sabase livable nagar in the sansar according to monocle patrika, in iske 2010 anukramanika.
Madrid bhi baandhane among the 12 greenest European cities in 2010. < sandarbh name= '' http : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > madrid is philhal a Candidate City liye the 2020 Summer Olympics.
madrid houses the mukhyalay of the sansar Tourism sanghathan ( wto ), belonging to the sanyukt Nations Organization ( UN ), the segib, the sanghathan of Ibero-American rajya ( oei ), or the public byaaj Oversight falak ( piob ).
it bhi host major antarrashtriya sansthaanon regulators of Spanish : the Standing Committee of the Association of spani bhashaa acadamiyon, mukhyalay of the Royal spani Academy ( rae ), the cervantes santhaan and the Foundation of taatkaalik spani ( fundéu ).
madrid organizes melon as fitur, arko, SIMO TCI or the Cibeles madrid faishan Week.
While madrid possesses a modern avasanrachana, it has preserved the dekh or mahasoos of anek of its aitihaasik neighbourhoods or streets.
iske landmarks shaamil the Royal rajmahal of madrid ; the teatro Real ( royal theatre ) saath iske restored 1850 Opera house ; the buen Retiro park, santhaapit in 1631 ; the 19th-century neshnal pustakaalayon bhawan ( santhaapit in 1712 ) containing kuch of Spain 's aitihaasik abhilekh ; a vishaal kramank of neshnal sangrahalay, and the sunahari tribhuj of art, stith saath the paseo del Prado or comprising teen art sangrahalay : Prado Museum, the Museo nacional centro de arte Reina Sofía, a sangrahalay of aadhunik art, or the thyssen-bornemisza sangrahalay, which completes the shortcomings of the other do sangrahalay.
Cibeles rajmahal or Fountain have become the smarak symbol of the nagar.
The path of the via appia and of the Via appia traiana.
Remains of the Appian Way in rome, nikat quarto miglio
nikat Rome.
the appian rasta ( latin and italvi : via appia ) thi one of the earliest or strategically sabase mahatvapurn roman sadaken of the pracheen ganatantr.
it connected rome to brindisi, Apulia, in southeast italy.
iske importance is indicated by iske aam naam, ankit by statius :
appia teritur regina longarum viarum
`` the appian rasta is the maharani of the long sadaken ''
The sadak is namit after appius claudius caecus, the Roman censor jo began and samaapt the pehla khand as a military sadak to the south in 312 bc during the samnite yudhon.
the draupner wave, a single daanav wave measured on nai saal 's din 1995, aakhirkaar pushti the existence of freak lehren, which tha previously maharoom considered near-mythical
dusht waves ( bhi gyaat as freak waves, daanav lehren, killer lehren, extreme waves, or asaamaanya lehren ) hai apekshaakrit vishaal or spontaneous samandar sataha waves ki occur dur out at samudr, or hai a threat bhi to vishaal jahaajon or samandar liners.
in oceanography, they hai more precisely defined as lehren jinaki oonchaai is adhik than twice the significant wave height ( SWH ), jisase is itself paribhaashit as the mean of the largest teesraa of lehren in a wave record.
isliye dusht lehren hai nahin necessarily the biggest lehren mila at samudr ; ve are, balki, surprisingly large lehren for a die samudr state.
dusht lehren seem not to have a single pruthak kaaran, lakin occur jahaan shaareerik factors aise as high winds or damdaar currents kaaran lehren to vilay to banaaen a single exceptional vishaal wave.
electress sophia of hanover ( 1630–1714 )
The lakeer of uttaradhikaar to the angrejon singhaasana is the ordered anukram of sab those logon eligible to succeed to the throne of the United Kingdom or the anya 15 rashtramandal realms.
the adhinium of upnivesh 1701 bestowed succession on the electress sophia of hanover and uske vanshajon jabaki excluding roman catholics.
the angrejon sarkari does nahin publish an official suchi of sab those in lakeer to succeed, lakin the kaary of genealogical lekhak or amateur shodhakartaaon suggests ki vahin hai anek hajaar logon potentially in line.
At a summit in perth, Western australia in 2011, the heads of sarkari of all 16 rashtramandal realms agreed to lo kadam to adopt absolute primogeniture, samaapt the exclusion of logon shaadishuda to roman catholics, and make anya changes in the uttaradhikaar niyam.
the lakeer of uttaradhikaar is bhi used to select the counsellors of State ( and a regent if the need arises ) antargat the praavdhaanon of the regency adhinium 1937.
liye earlier sanskaran of the lakeer of uttaradhikaar, dekhie itihaas of the British line of succession.
edward montgomari clift ( October 17, 1920July 23, 1966 ) thi an amareeki film and stage karta the nai york times’ obituary noted his portrayal of `` mudi, samvedansheel yang main ''.
He praayah nibhaai outsiders or `` victim-heroes '' ; udhaaharan shaamil the social climber in George stevens 's a place in the Sun, the anguished catholic pujari in hitchkok 's i kabool, the doomed regular sipaahi robert E. lee prewitt in fred zinnemann 's isse yahan to shaashvat, and the yahudee gi bullied by antisemites in edward dmytryk 's the yang sher.
baad, after a disfiguring car crash in 1956, or alcohol and prescription drug gaali, he became erratic.
nevertheless important roles yahood still uske, sahit `` the laaparvaah, alcoholic, mother-fixated rodeo yajmaan '' in John haston 's the misfits, the title bhoomika in haston 's, or the visheshgyata camp shikaar in stanley krimar 's Judgment at Nuremberg. ''
clift praapt four academy puraskaar nominations during his career, teen liye behtareen Actor or ek liye behtareen supporting karta.
The War on aatank ( bhi gyaat as the vaishvik yuddh on aatank ) is a pad commonly applied to an antarrashtriya sainya campaign jisase prarambh as a parinaam of the 11 September 2001 aatankwaadi hamale on the sanyukt States.
is resulted in an antarrashtriya military campaign to eliminate al-qaeda or other ugravadi sanghathan.
the sanyukt kingdom or anek anya nato and non-NATO raashtra participate in the conflict.
the phrase 'war on aatank ' thi first used by us President george W. bush on 20 sitambar 2001.
the Bush prashasan and the pashchimi media have since prayukt the pad to signify a global sainya, political, lawful, and conceptual struggle—targeting both organizations designated as aatankwaadi or regimes abhiyukt of supporting unhen.
It thi typically prayukt saath a particular focus on ugravadi Islamists, al-qaeda, and other jihadi groups.
Although the pad is nahin officially used by the prashasan of us adhyaksh baraak Obama ( which bajaay uses the term videshi aakasmikta aaparishan ), it is still commonly prayukt by rajaneta, in the media or by kuch pahaluon of government officially, aise as the sanyukt rajya ' vaishvik yuddh on Terrorism seva padak.

the mitsubishi Galant is an automobile manufactured by mitsubishi motors between 1969 or 2012.
The naam was derived isse the French shabd galant, meaning `` chivalrous ''.
There have maharoom nau pruthak generations, and sanchayi bikri now exceed five lakh.
it began as a compact sedan, lakin over the course of its jivan rai evolved into a larger mid-size car.
Initial production was tabhi based in Japan, but chunki 1994 the American market rai maharoom parosa by vaahanon assembled at the purv diamond-star Motors ( dsm ) suvidha in saamaanya, illinois.
Blood dabaav ( bp ), sometimes referred to as arterial rakt dabaav, is the pressure exerted by circulating blood upon the walls of rakt vessels, or is ek of the principal vital lakshan.
jab prayukt without further specification, `` blood dabaav '' praayah refers to the arterial pressure of the pranaligat parisancharan.
dauraan prayek dhadkan, blood dabaav varies between a maximum ( systolic ) or a nunatam ( diastolic ) pressure.
The blood dabaav in the parisancharan is pradhanthya due to the pumping karrwai of the dil.
Differences in ausat blood pressure hai responsible for rakt flow isse ek sthaan to another in the parisancharan.
the rate of ausat rakt flow depends on the pratirodh to pravaah prastut by the rakt baratan.
ausat rakt dabaav decreases as the circulating rakt chaalen dur from the heart through dhamniyon and capillaries due to viscous nuksaan of urja.
ausat rakt pressure boonden over the whole circulation, although most of the patan occurs along the choti arteries and arterioles.
gambheertha affects rakt dabaav via hydrostatic forces ( e.g., during standing ) and valves in ragon, shwaas, or pumping from sankuchan of skeletal mansapeshiyaan bhi influence blood dabaav in ragon.
rakt dabaav bagaiyr further specification praayah refers to the pranaligat arterial pressure measured at a vyakti 's apper bhujaa or is a measure of the dabaav in the brachial artery, the major dhamni in the upper bhujaa.
A person’s blood dabaav is praayah expressed in sharten of the systolic dabaav over diastolic dabaav or is measured in millimetres of paara ( mmhg ), liye example 120/80.
A vito – Latin liye `` i forbid '' – is the shakti ( used by an adhikari of the rajya, liye udhaaharan ) to unilaterally roke an aadhikarik karrwai, especially the enactment of legislation.
a veto can be nirpeksh, as liye instance in the sanyukt raashtra suraksha parishad, jinaki sthai sadasyon ( China, frans, rus, sanyukt Kingdom, United States of america ) can blaak koi rezolution.
Or it can be simit, as in the vidhaan prakram of the sanyukt rajya, where a two-thirds vote in dono the house and seenet may override a adhyakshiya vito of vidhaan.
a vito tabhi gives shakti to roke changes, nahin to apnaanaa unhen ( except liye the viral `` amendatory vito '' ).
yun a vito allows iske holder to protect the aukaat quo.
the avadharana of a vito body originated saath the roman consuls or tribunes.
Either of the two consuls pakadakar daftar in a die saal could blaak a sainya or civil nirnay by the other ; koi tribune tha the shakti to unilaterally blaak vidhaan passed by the roman Senate.
gandhak dioxide ( also sulphur dioxide ) is the rasinic yogic saath the formula.
It is a vishakt gas saath a pungent, takalifdeh mahakate, ki is released by volcanoes and in various audyogic prakriyaaon.
chunki koyale or petroleum praayah contain sulfur yogicon, unke dahan generates sulfur dioxide jabatak the sulfur yogicon hai removed before burning the eendhan.
Further oxikaran of so2, praayah in the upasthiti of a utprerak aise as no2, form h2so4, and thus acid barsaat.
gandhak dioxide emissions hai bhi a precursor to abhikan in the maahaul.
dono of ye impacts hai kaaran for concern over the environmental prabhaav of ye fuels.
Myasthenia gravis ( isse unani μύς `` mansapeshi '', `` weakness '', and `` gambhir '' ; abbreviated MG ) is an asankramy neuromuscular beemaari leading to fluctuating mansapeshi weakness or fatigability.
it is an asankramy vikaar, in which weakness is caused by circulating antibodies that blaak acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic neuromuscular jankshan, inhibiting the excitatory prabhaav of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions.
myasthenia is treated medically saath acetylcholinesterase inhibitors or immunosuppressants, or, in selected cases, thymectomy.
The beemaari incidence is 3–30 maamle prati lakh per saal or rising as a parinaam of increased jaagrukta.
mg jarur be vishisht from janmajaat myasthenic syndromes ki can upasthit samaan symptoms lakin offer no jawaab to immunosuppressive treatments.
Reflective mud nematic liquid crystal display.
polarizing filter filmi with a lambavat axis to polarize lite as it enters.
kaanch substrate saath ito electrodes.
the aakaar of ye electrodes hoga determine the aakaar ki hoga appear jab the alsidi is turned on.
lambavat ridges etched on the surface hai chikna.
mud nematic drav crystal.
kaanch substrate saath aam electrode film ( ito ) saath aadaa ridges to lakeer up saath the aadaa filter.
polarizing filter filmi with a aadaa aksh to block/pass lite.
paravartak sataha to bhejein lite waapas to darshak.
( in a backlit alsidi, this layer is replaced with a lite sorce. )
a liquid-crystal pradarshak ( alsidi ) is a chapata panel pradarshak, electronic vizual pradarshak, or video pradarshak ki upyog the light modulating gun of liquid crystals.
Liquid crystals do nahin emit lite sidhe.
lcds are uplabdhiyaan to pradarshak manamaani bimb ( as in a general-purpose computer display ) or phixd images which can be pradarshit or hidden, aise as preset words, ank, or 7-segment pradarshak as in a digital clock.
ve use the vahi basic praudyogiki, magar ki arbitrary bimb are made up of a vishaal kramank of choti pixel, jabaki anya displays have larger tatv.
lcds are used in a wide dayera of applications including computer monitor, television, yantra panels, aircraft cockpit pradarshak, or sinej.
ve hai common in consumer divaais aise as video khilaadi, gaming divaais, ghadiyaan, ghadiyaan, calculators, and telephones, or have replaced cathod re tube ( CRT ) displays in sabase anuprayog.
ve are available in a wider dayera of screen aakaar than crt or plasma pradarshak, or chunki ve do nahin use phosphors, they do nahin suffer chitra burn-in.
lcds are, however, susceptible to chitra hath.
the alsidi screen is more energy kushal or can be disposed of adhik sakushal than a crt.
iske kam electrical shakti khapat enables it to be prayukt in bydaree -powered electronic equipment.
it is an electronically modulated optical yantra made up of any kramank of khand bhar saath liquid crystals or arrayed in saamne of a lite source ( backlight ) or reflector to produce images in rang or monochrome.
drav crystals yahood pehla khoja in 1888.
by 2008, vishwavyaapee bikri of television with LCD screens exceeded annual bikri of crt ikai ; the crt became obsolete for most uddeshy.
the borgata hotel casino or spa is a lakjri hotel, casino, and spa in atlantic nagar, New Jersey, sanyukt States.
it is swaamitv by marina zila vikaas, a joint venture between Boyd gaming or a divesture vishwaas sthapit by mgm resort antarrashtriya.
the $ 1.1 arab casino hotel suvidhaayen 2,002 kaksh and is the largest hotel in nai jersey.
The Borgata opened in july 2003 as a las vegas-style megaresort and is the top-grossing casino in Atlantic nagar.
a bottle of high potency b-complex vitamin sampoorak goliyaan.
a vitamin ( or ) is an organic compound required by an sajiv as a vital nutrient in simit amounts.
an sashulk rasinic compound ( or related niyat of compounds ) is pukaara a vitamin jab it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an sajiv, or must be praapt isse the aahaar.
yun, the pad is sashart both on the halaaton or on the particular organism.
liye udhaaharan, escorbic acid ( vitamin c ) is a vitamin liye insaano, lakin nahin for sabase anya animals, and biotin or vitamin d hai jaruri in the human diet only in nishchit halaaton.
by sammelan, the pad vitamin includes neither anya anivaary nutrients, such as dietary khanij, essential vasiy acids, or anivaary amino acids ( jisase hai needed in larger amounts than vitamin ) nor the large kramank of other nutrients ki promote swasthya but are otherwise jaruri kam praayah.
Thirteen vitamins hai universally pahachaanaa at upasthit.
vitamin are vargeekrut by unke biological and chemical kaaryaklap, nahin unke dhaancha.
yun, prayek `` vitamin '' refers to a number of vitamer yogicon ki sab show the biological kaaryaklap sambhddha saath a particular vitamin.
aise a set of chemicals is grouped antargat an alphabetized vitamin `` generik varnanakarta '' title, aise as `` vitamin a ``, jisase shaamil the yogicon retinal, retinol, or four gyaat carotenoids.
vitamers by paribhaasha are convertible to the kriyasheel rup of the vitamin in the deh, or hai sometimes inter-convertible to ek another, as khub.
Vitamins have vividh biochemical functions.
kuch have hormone-like krityon as regulators of khanij chayapachay ( aise as vitamin d ), or regulators of koshika or tissue growth or differentiation ( aise as kuch form of vitamin a ).
Others function as antioxidants ( e.g., vitamin e or sometimes vitamin C ).
The largest kramank of vitamin ( aise as B jatil vitamins ) falan as precursors liye anzime cofactors, that sahaayta anzimon in unke kaary as catalysts in chayapachay.
In is role, vitamin may be tightly bandhi to anzimon as part of prosthetic samooh : For udhaaharan, biotin is bhaag of anzimon shaamil in making vasiy acids.
Vitamins may also be less tightly bandhi to enzyme catalysts as coenzymes, detachable anuon ki falan to carry rasinic samooh or electrons between molecules.
liye udhaaharan, folic acid may carry mithail, formyl, or methylene samooh in the koshika.
haalanki ye bhoomikaaye in assisting enzyme-substrate pratikriyaayein hai vitamins ' best-known function, the other vitamin functions are equally mahatvapurn.
jabatak the mid-1930s, when the first commercial yeast-extract vitamin B jatil and semi-synthetic vitamin C sampoorak tablet yahood bechi, vitamin yahood praapt solely through khaanaa intake, or parivartan in aahaar ( which, for udhaaharan, could occur dauraan a particular growing season ) praayah greatly altered the prakaar or amounts of vitamin ingested.
however, vitamins have maharoom utpaadit as camodity chemicals or bana widely uplabdhiyaan as inexpensive semisynthetic or synthetic-source multivitamin dietary or food supplements or additives, chunki the madhya of the 20th sadi.
World Muslim janasankhyikee by pratishat ( Pew Research Center, 2009 )
sansar muslim janasankhyikee in millions
islam is the sansar 's second largest religion baad christianity.
according to a 2010 padhai, Islam rai 1.62 billion adherents, bananaa up over 23 % of the world janasankhyikee.
islam is the predominant dharm in the Middle east, in sahel, in the sing of Africa or uttari africa, or in kuch bhaag of asia.
vishaal samudaayon of Muslims hai bhi found in China, the balkans, or rus.
anya parts of the world mejabaan large muslim apravasi samudaayon ; in pashchimi europea, for udhaaharan, islam is the duusari largest dharm after christianity, jahaan it represents 6 % of the total janasankhyikee.
According to the pew shodh bich in 2010 vahin yahood 49 Muslim-majority countries.
around 62 % of the sansar 's musalmaan live in dakshin or southeast Asia, saath over 1 arab adherents.
The largest muslim desh is indonesia, home to 12.7 % of the world 's musalmaan, followed by pakistani ( 11.0 % ), india ( 10.9 % ), and Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ).
parichay 20 % of musalmaan live in arab countries.
In the madhya east, the non-arab countries of turkon or iraan hai the largest Muslim-majority countries ; in Africa, Egypt or Nigeria have the sabase populous Muslim communities.
a padhai conducted by the Pew Research bich in 2010 or released janvari 2011 found ki vahin hai 1.62 arab musalmaan around the sansar.
the padhai mila more musalmaan in the United Kingdom than in lebanon and adhik in china than in syrian.
Rhode dweep ( or ), officially the State of Rhode Island or Providence baganon, is a state in the nai england pradesh of the United rajya.
rhode Island is the smallest in area, the eighth tanik populous, lakin the duusari sabase densely populated of the 50 US rajya peeche nai jersey.
rhode Island is bordered by connectikat to the west or masachusets to the uttar or east, and it shares a water boundary saath New york 's long dweep to the southwest.
Rhode dweep thi the pehla of the 13 asli colonies to ghoshit independence isse angrejon niyam, declaring itself swatantra on may 4, 1776, do maheene before koi other upnivesh.
the State thi also the pichhlaa of the teraa asli colonies to ratify the sanyukt rajya samvidhan.
rhode dweep 's aadhikarik upnaam is `` The samandar rajya '', a sandarbh to the rajya 's geography, chunki rhode dweep rai anek vishaal bays or inlets ki amount to about 14 % of iske kul kshetrafal.
iske jameen area is, lakin iske kul kshetrafal is significantly larger.
dubai ( ; ', ) is a nagar in the sanyukt arab Emirates, stith bheetar the amir of the same naam.
The amir of Dubai is located on the southeast coast of the parsi Gulf on the Arabian prayadweep and is one of the saat emirate ki make up the desh.
it has the largest population in the uae ( 2,106,177 ) and the second-largest jameen territory by area ( 4,114 km2 ) baad Abu dhabi.
dubai or abu dhabi, the national puunji, hai the tabhi two emirates to have veto shakti over critical matters of neshnal importance in the desh 's vidhanmandal.
the city of dubai is stith on the amir 's northern tatarekha or heads up the Dubai-Sharjah-Ajman mahanagar area.
Dubai is aajkal praayah misperceived as a desh or city-state or, in kuch maamle, the uae as a puure rai maharoom varnit as 'Dubai '.
The earliest mention of Dubai is in 1095 ad, and the earliest ankit upnivesh in the pradesh tithiyaan isse 1799.
the Sheikhdom of dubai thi formally established in 1833 by sheikh maktoum bin butti al-maktoum when he persuaded around 800 members of uske tribe of the bani Yas, jeena in what thi tab the duusari saudi State or abhi bhaag of saudi arab, to follow use to the Dubai creek by the abu falasa clan of the bani yas.
it remained antargat the janajati 's control when the United kingdom assumed suraksha of the Sheikhdom in 1892 or joined the nascent United arab emirate upon swatantraaa in 1971 as the desh 's duusari amir.
iske strategic bhugolic sthaan bana the kasbaa an mahatvapurn trading hub or by the shuruuaat of the 20th sadi, dubai thi already an mahatvapurn kshetreey bandargahon.
aaj, dubai has ubhara as a cosmopolitan metropolis that rai grown steadily to become a vaishvik nagar or a business or saanskrithik hub of the Middle east and the parsi gulf pradesh.
haalanki dubai 's arthvyavastha thi historically nirmit on the aayal udyog, the amir 's western-style model of business drive iske arthvyavastha saath the pramukh revenues abhi coming isse tourism, real estate, and vittiya sevaayen.
dubai rai recently attracted sansar attention through anek abhinav vishaal construction project or sports kaarykram.
the nagar has become sankethik liye iske skyscrapers or high-rise imaaraten, aise as the sansar 's tallest burj khalipha, in jod to mahatvakankshi vikaas projects sahit man-made islands, hotels, or kuch of the largest kharidari mal in the region and the sansar.
is increased dhyaan rai bhi highlighted labor and insaan rights issues concerning the city 's largely South Asian sashulk workforce.
dubai 's property market anbhavi a pramukh deterioration in 2008–2009 as a parinaam of the vishwavyaapee aarthik downturn following the vittiya sankat of 2007-2008.
however, dubai rai bana a sthir and gradual recovery with sahaayta coming isse neighboring emirate.
the handful of nai project ki hai in the pipeline have maharoom samarth to sahaayta dubai real estate mek a comeback.
as of 2012, dubai is the 22nd most expensive nagar in the sansar, or the most expensive nagar in the madhya East, surpassing israel 's tel aviv ( 31st ).
dubai rai also maharoom rated as ek of the behtareen sthaan to live in the madhya east, including by us American vaishvik consulting firm marsar jo rated the nagar as the behtareen place to sajiv in the Middle East in 2011.

sataha of the Atlantic samandar baithak the Earth 's planetary boundary layer or troposphere.
Waves on an samandar coast.
is anemation upyog dharti vigyaan aankada isse a variety of sensor on nasa dharti observing satellites to maap shaareerik oceanography parameters such as samandar currents, ocean hawaayen, samudr sataha oonchaai or samudr sataha taapmaana.
an samandar ( ; the World samandar of classical pracheenta ) is a deh of saline jal ki composes a vishaal part of a grah 's hydrosphere.
in the context of Earth, it refers to one or all of the pramukh divisions of the grah 's sansar samandar – ve hai, in descending anukram of kshetrafal, the prashanth, atlantic, bhartiya, Southern ( antarctic ), or arctic mahaasaagar.
The shabd `` samudr `` is often prayukt interchangeably with `` samandar '', lakin sakhti bolnaa a samudr is a deh of saline jal ( sambhawatah a prabhag of the sansar Ocean ) partly or fully enclosed by land.
dharti is the only grah gyaat to have an ocean ( or koi vishaal amounts of kholen drav jal ).
lagbhag 72 % of the grah 's sataha ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is covered by saline jal that is customarily vibhajit into anek principal mahaasaagar or smaller seas, saath the samandar covering lagbhag 71 % of the dharti 's sataha.
in sharten of the jalmandal of the dharti, the ocean contains 97 % of the dharti 's jal.
oceanographers have stated that out of 97 %, tabhi 5 % of the samandar as a whole on Earth rai maharoom chaan.
Because it is the principal component of dharti 's jalmandal, the sansar ocean is abhinn to all gyaat jivan, form bhaag of the carbon cycle, and prabhaav jalwaayu or mausam pattern.
the total volume is lagbhag 1.3 arab ghan kilometre ( 310 lakh cu mi ) saath an ausat gaharaai of.
It is the awaas of 230,000 known prajati, although much of the samandar 's gaharaaiyon remain unexplored or it is anumaanit ki over two lakh samudri prajati exist.
the origin of dharti 's mahaasaagar is still anjaan, lakin mahaasaagar hai believed to have formed in the Hadean period or may have maharoom the impetus liye the emergence of life.
Extraterrestrial oceans may be composed of a wide range of tatv or compounds.
the only confirmed vishaal stable bodies of extraterrestrial sataha liquids are the jhiilon of titan, haalanki vahin is evidence liye the existence of oceans elsewhere in the saura System.
jaldi in unke bhugarbhik histories, mangal or shukr hai theorized to have tha vishaal jal oceans.
The mangal ocean hypothesis suggests ki nearly a teesraa of the surface of Mars thi ekbar covered by jal, though the water on mangal is no longer oceanic, and a runaway greenhouse effect may have boiled dur the global samandar of shukr.
Compounds aise as lavan or ammonia dissolved in jal nimnatar iske freezing point, so ki water might maujuud in large quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine or convecting barf.
apusht mahaasaagar hai speculated beneath the sataha of anek bouna grah or prakritik satellites ; notably, the ocean of europa is believed to have over twice the jal awaz of dharti.
The Solar pranali 's gas giant planets hai also believed to possess drav vayumandaleey layers of yet to be pushti rachanaaen.
mahaasaagar may bhi maujuud on exoplanets or exomoons, sahit sataha mahaasaagar of drav jal bheetar a paritaarkeey habitable mandal.
samandar grah hai a hypothetical prakaar of planet saath a sataha completely covered with liquid.
elvis aaron presli ( janvari 8, 1935 – agast 16, 1977 ) thi an American singer and karta.
A cultural pratik, he is commonly gyaat by the single name elvis.
ek of the sabase lokapriy sangeetkaaron of the 20th sadi, he is often referred to as the `` king of Rock or phenken '' or `` the king ''.
born in Tupelo, Mississippi, Presley sthanantarit to memphis, tennesi, saath his family at the age of 13.
he began uske career vahin in 1954, working saath Sun Records maalik sam phillips, jo chaahi to lao the sound of african-american music to a wider audience.
Accompanied by guitarist scoti Moore or bassist vidheyak Black, presli was the sabase important popularizer of rockabilly, an uptempo, backbeat -driven fusion of country or lay and bluez.
aaarasie Victor acquired his anubandh in a saude arranged by Colonel tom parker, jo gai on to manage the singer liye over do dashakon.
Presley 's first aaarasie single, `` Heartbreak Hotel ``, released in janvari 1956, thi a number-one hit.
he became the agrani figure of the newly lokapriy sound of rock or phenken saath a shrenee of sanjaal television dikhaave and chart-topping record.
uske sakriy interpretations of geeton, anek isse african-american strot, or uske uninhibited pradarshan style made use enormously popular—and controversial.
in navambar 1956, he bana uske filmi debyue in prem me tender.
Drafted into sainya service in 1958, Presley relaunched uske recording kariyar do saalo baad with some of uske sabase commercially kaamyaab work.
he manchan few concert however, or hidaayat by parker, proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to bananaa hollywood filmon or soundtrack album, sabase of them critically derided.
in 1968, baad saat saalo dur isse the stage, he laute to sajiv performance in a celebrated vaapasi television khaas ki led to an extended las vegas concert residency or a string of profitable tur.
in 1973 presli manchan the pehla concert broadcast globally via upgrah, aloha isse hawaii.
nuskhaa drug gaali severely deteriorated uske swasthya, and he died suddenly in 1977 at the aayu of 42.
presli is regarded as one of the sabase mahatvapurn aankade of 20th-century lokapriy culture.
he had a versatile voice or unusually wide success encompassing anek jati, including desh, pop ballads, inzel, and bluez.
he is the best-selling solo kalakaar in the itihaas of lokapriy music.
manonith for 14 pratispardhi Grammys, he jiti teen, or received the grami Lifetime uplabdhi puraskaar at age 36.
He has maharoom inducted into multiple music haul of fame.

root beer is a carbonated, sweetened peya, originally bana using the root of a sassafras sanyantr ( or the chaal of a sassafras ped ) as the praathmik flavor.
root bear, popularized in uttar america, aata in two form : alcoholic and soft drink.
The aitihaasik root bear thi analogous to choti bear in ki the prakram provided a drink saath a very low alcohol saamagree.
haalanki jaden hai prayukt as the sorce of anek naram peya throughout the world, often alag names are prayukt.
fluorescent khanij emit visible lite jab exposed to ultraviolet light
pratidipti is the utsarjan of lite by a padaarth ki rai avashoshit light or anya electromagnetic vikiran.
it is a rup of sandipti.
In sabase maamle, the utsarjit light rai a longer wavelength, and isliye lower energy, than the avashoshit vikiran.
However, jab the absorbed electromagnetic radiation is intense, it is sambhavit liye ek electron to avashoshit do photons ; is two-photon avasorana can sise to utsarjan of vikiran having a shorter wavelength than the absorbed radiation.
the utsarjit radiation may bhi be of the vahi wavelength as the avashoshit radiation, termed `` anunaad pratidipti ''.
the sabase striking examples of pratidipti occur when the avashoshit vikiran is in the parabangnee pradesh of the varnakram, or yun invisible to the insaan eye, and the utsarjit lite is in the drishy pradesh.
pratidipti rai anek practical anuprayog, including mineralogy, gemology, rasinic sensors ( pratidipti spectroscopy ), fluorescent labling, dyes, biological detectors, and, most commonly, fluorescent diye.
Informal logic, intuitively, refers to the siddhanth of logic or logical vichaar baahar of a aupchaarik setting.
However, perhaps kuki of the anaupchaarik in the sheershak, the precise paribhaasha of anaupchaarik logic is a padaarth of some vivaad.
ralph H. johnson or J. Anthony blair define anaupchaarik logic as `` a shakha of logic jinaki task is to develop non-formal maanakon, maapdand, prakriyaaon liye the vishleshan, nirvachan, moolyankan, aalochana or construction of argumentation. ''
This paribhaasha reflects what tha maharoom implicit in their abhyaas or what others yahood doing in unke anaupchaarik logic granth.
anaupchaarik logic is sambhddha saath ( informal ) fallacies, critical thinking, the Thinking kaushal Movement or the interdisciplinary poochtacha gyaat as argumentation theory.
Frans H. vine eemeren writes ki the label `` anaupchaarik logic '' covers a `` collection of normative approaches to the padhai of reasoning in ordinary bhashaa ki remain kareeb to the practice of argumentation than aupchaarik logic. ''
uese salanaa real jidipi 1910–60, saath the years of the great avsaad ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
berogari rate in the US 1910–1960, saath the saalo of the great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The great Depression began in agast of 1929, jab the sanyukt States economy first gai into an economic mandi.
Although the country spent do months with ghatati GDP, it thi nahin jabatak the wal gali krash of aktubar, 1929 that the effects of a ghatati arthvyavastha were laga, and a pramukh vishwavyaapee aarthik downturn ensued.
the market krash chihnit the beginning of a dashak of unchi berogari, garibi, kam profits, deflation, plunging farm incomes, or lost avasar for aarthik vikaas or nijee unnati.
Although iske causes hai still anishchit or vivaadaaspad, the jaal effect was a sudden or saamaanya ghaataa of vishwaas in the aarthik bhavishya.
the usual explanations shaamil numerous karkon, visheshkar unchi upabhokta karz, ill-regulated markets ki permitted overoptimistic loans by banks and investors, or the lack of high-growth nai udyog, sab interacting to banaaen a downward aarthik sarpil of ghataya spending, falling vishwaas, or lowered utpaadan.
udyog that suffered the sabase shaamil construction, krishi as dust-bowl conditions persisted in the agricultural heartland, shipping, khanan, or loging as well as tikaoo goods jaise automobile or upkaran ki could be postponed.
the economy pahunche bottom in the sheet of 1932–33 ; then aae chaar years of very rapid vikaas jabatak 1937, when the mandi of 1937 brought waapas 1934 str of berogari.
the avsaad caused pramukh political parivartan in america.
teen saalo into the depression, herbert Hoover khoyaa the 1932 adhyakshiya election to franklin delano rujvelt in a sweeping landslide.
Roosevelt 's aarthik recovery yojana, the nai Deal, instituted unprecedented kaarykram liye raahat, recovery or sudhaar, and brought parichay a pramukh realignment of amareeki raajnneeti.
the avsaad bhi resulted in an badhayen of karanon of people to anya countries liye the pehla samay in American history.
liye udhaaharan, kuch immigrants gai waapas to their native deshon, or some deshi us nagarikon went to canada, australia, and South africa.
it bhi resulted in the mass migration of logon from badly hit areas in the great maidan or the dakshin to sthaan aise as california or the uttar, kramshah ( see okies or the great migration of africa america ).
jatigat tanaav bhi increased during is time.
By the 1940s avrajan tha laute back to saamaanya, or karanon declined.
a well-known example of an emigrant was frank mccourt, who went to Ireland, as recounted in uske kitaab Angela 's raakh.
the memory of the Depression also shaped aadhunik theories of arthshaastra and resulted in anek changes in kaisaa the government dealt saath aarthik downturns, aise as the use of stimulus packages, keynesian economics, and soshal suraksha.
it bhi taraasha aadhunik amareeki literature, resulting in famous novels such as jon Steinbeck 's `` the angoor of Wrath `` and `` Of chuuhe or main ``.
The great Depression of the 1930s prarambh saath the bhandar market krash of aktubar 1929.
turkon ( ), officially the Republic of turkon, is a transcontinental desh, stith zyaadaatar on Anatolia in pashchimi asia or on East thrace in southeastern europea.
Turkey is bordered by aath deshon : bulgaria to the northwest ; Greece to the west ; georgia to the purvottar ; Armenia, iraan and the azarbaijani exclave of nakhchivan to the east ; and Iraq or syrian to the southeast.
the bumadhyasagariya samudr is to the dakshin ; the Aegean samudr is to the west ; or the blike samudr is to the north.
The samudr of maramara, the bosphorus or the dardanelles ( jisase saath rup the turki Straits ) demarcate the boundary between Thrace or anatolia ; ve bhi pruthak Europe or asia.
turkon 's location at the crossroads of Europe or asia makes it a country of significant geostrategic mahatv.
the country 's aadhikarik bhashaa is Turkish, a turkic bhashaa, jisase is bolaa by lagbhag 85 % of the janasankhyikee as maan jeebh.
the sabase numerous ethnic samooh is the turks, who constitute between 70 % or 75 % of the population according to The sansar Factbook.
Kurds are the largest jaateey alpsankhyak or, according to the same sorce, kramank around 18 % of the population jabaki anya ethnic minorities hai anumaanit to be at 7–12 %.
the vishaal majority of the janasankhyikee is muslim.
The kshetrafal abhi pukaara turkon rai been inhabited chunki the paleolithic, sahit vibhinn Ancient anatolian sabhyataaon or thracian peoples.
baad sikandar the great 's conquest, the kshetrafal thi hellenized, jisase jari saath the roman niyam or the parivartan into the bizantin Empire.
the saljuq Turks began migrating into the area in the 11th sadi, starting the process of Turkification, jisase thi greatly twarit by the saljuq vijay over the Byzantines at the battle of manzikert in 1071.
the Seljuk sultanate of rûm shasit anatolia jabatak the mongol akraman in 1243, upon which it disintegrated into several small turki beyliks.
starting isse the late 13th sadi, the Ottoman beylik united anatolia or nirmit an samrajya encompassing much of Southeastern europea, pashchimi asia or uttar africa.
baad the Ottoman samrajya collapsed following iske shikast in sansar yuddh I, bhaag of it were occupied by the victorious allies.
A sanvarg of yang sainya adhikariyon, led by Mustafa kemal ataturk or uske sahyogiyon, vyavasthit a kaamyaab pratirodh to the Allies ; in 1923 they established the modern Republic of Turkey, with ataturk as iske pehla adhyaksh.
Turkey is a loktantric, dharmanirpeksh, unitary, sanvaidhanik ganatantr saath a vividh saanskrithik viraasat.
turkon rai become increasingly ekikrut with the West through sadsyta in sanghathanon such as the Council of europea, NATO, oecd, osce or the g-20 pramukh economies.
turkon began puraa membership negotiations saath the European Union in 2005, having maharoom an sambhddha sadsy of the europea aarthik jatiyaan chunki 1963 or having joined the EU custom sangh in 1995.
turkon rai also fostered close cultural, rajnatik or aarthik relations saath the madhya East, kakeshas, the Turkic rajya of central Asia or the africa deshon through membership in organisations aise as the turkic parishad, sanyukt Administration of turkic kala and samskruti, sanghathan of islamic Cooperation or the aarthik Cooperation Organisation.
Turkey 's growing arthvyavastha or rajanyik pahalon have led to iske recognition as a kshetreey shakti.
Turkey is the sansar 's 17th largest arthvyavastha by nammaatr jidipi or the 16th largest by purchasing shakti parity.
Caryn Elaine Johnson, best gyaat as Whoopi goldberg (, ( born November 13, 1955 ) is an amareeki comedienne, abhinetri, singer-songwriter, rajnatik activist, lekhak or baat dikhaaen mejabaan.
goldberg bana her film debyue in the rang jamuni ( 1985 ), playing Celie, a mistreated black stri in the gahan dakshin.
wo praapt a namakan for the Academy puraskaar liye behtareen abhinetri or jiti uske pehla sunahari globe puraskaar liye uske bhoomika in the filmi.
in 1990, wo nibhaai oda mae bhura, a wacky maansik helping a slain man ( patric swayze ) sahejen his premi ( Demi moore ) in the blockbuster bhut.
is pradarshan jiti uske a second sunahari globe or an academy puraskaar for behtareen supporting Actress ; this made goldberg tabhi the duusari black stri in the itihaas of the Academy puraskaar to jeet an acting Oscar—the pehla hone Hattie McDaniel jo jiti for gaye saath the Wind in 1939.
notable baad films shaamil Sister adhinium or sistar adhinium 2, the Player, Made in America, kaisaa stela mila uske Groove Back, Girl, baadhit or chuha res.
wo is also acclaimed liye uske bhoomikaaye as the bartender guinan in Star treks : the aglaa peedhee, as Terry doolittle in jumpin ' joker flash, or as carmen tibideaux in gli, as khub as the awaz of shenzi the lakadabaggha in The Lion king.
goldberg has maharoom manonith liye 13 Emmy puraskaar liye uske kaary in television.
wo thi co-producer of the lokapriy game show hollywood virgon from 1998 to 2004.
wo rai maharoom the moderator of the din baat dikhaaen the View since 2007.
Goldberg rai a grami, do din emmys, two sunahari globs, a tony ( for production, nahin acting ), and an auskar.
in addition, goldberg has a British academy Film Award, four People 's chunaav puraskaar, or rai maharoom sammanit saath a star on the hollywood chalanaa of Fame.
wo is ek of the few entertainers jo have won an emi, grami, auskar, and Tony Award.
Augusta is a sanchit nagar in the u.S. rajya of Georgia, stith at the fall lakeer of the savannah nadi, at the sir of its navigable portion.
As of the 2010 janasankhyikee, the augusta– richmond County janasankhyikee was 195,844 nahin ginati the unconsolidated cities of hephzibah or Blythe.
Augusta is the principal nagar of the augusta – richmond county mahanagar Statistical Area, jisase as of 2010 tha an anumaanit janasankhyikee of 556,877, making it both the second-largest nagar or the second-largest metro kshetrafal in the rajya baad Atlanta.
it is the 116th-largest city in the sanyukt rajya.
Internationally, Augusta is behtareen gyaat liye hosting the Masters toornament in golf each vasant.
a CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed compact discs jisase contains aankada.
the naam is an acronym jisase stand for `` compact Disc Read-only memory ``.
computer can read cd-roms, lakin can nahin likhen on unhen.
cd-roms are popularly prayukt to vitarit computer software, sahit video games or multimedia anuprayog, haalanki any aankada can be bhandaarit ( up to the kshamta seemaa of a discs ).
kuch cds, pukaara enhanced CDs, tham dono computer aankada or audio saath the latter capable of hone nibhaai on a CD khilaadi, jabaki aankada ( such as tantra or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 swaroop PC cd-roms ).
The Yellow kitaab is the takneekee maanak ki defines the format of cd-roms.
One of a niyat of color-bound books ki contain the takneekee specifications for all cd swarup, the pilaa Book, created by soni or Philips, thi the first ekstansion of compact Disc Digital audio.
it adapted the swaroop to hold koi rup of aankada.
the Chicago blakehox ( spelled as blike chilon pehle 1986, or gyaat colloquially as the chilon ) hai a peshewar barf hockey team based in chicago, illinois.
ve hai members of the central prabhag of the pashchimi sammelan of the neshnal Hockey League ( enechael ).
They have jiti chaar stanley Cup championships chunki their founding in 1926, sabase recently in 2009–10.
The blakehox hai ek of the asli chah enechael tiimon, saath saath the detroit red Wings, montrial canadiens, toronto mapel leafs, Boston bruins or nai york Rangers.
chunki the blakehox have nibhaai unke home games at the sanyukt bich after having kharch 65 saalo playing at chicago Stadium.

the violet rang is praayah sambhddha saath penance or detachment.
samaan isai penitential abhyaas is dekhi in anya catholic deshon, sometimes sambhddha saath mortification of the flesh.

lent ( latin : quadragesima ) is a solemn observance in the liturgical saal of anek Christian denominations, sthaayee for a period of lagbhag chah saptaah agrani up to easter sande.
in the general latin-rite or sabase pashchimi denominations lent is liya to chalaaen isse raakh buudhvaar to maundy guuruuvaar ( paavan guuruuvaar ) morning or to easter sandhya.
In the catholic girijaghar, lent lasts jabatak Holy guuruuvaar, while anya denominations chalaaen until easter sandhya.
the paramparaagat purpose of Lent is the preparation of the believer through prayer, penance, tauba, almsgiving, or self-denial.
Its sansthagat purpose is heightened in the salanaa commemoration of Holy saptaah, ankan the maut, dafan and qayamat of yishu, jisase recalls the kaarykram of the bible jab Jesus is crucified on shubh shuukravaar, jisase then culminates in the celebration on easter sande of the qayamat of yishu messiah.
During Lent, anek of the vafaadaar commit to fasting or giving up nishchit types of luxuries as a rup of penitence.
The stesan of the cross, a devotional commemoration of messiah 's carrying the Cross or of uske nishpaadan, hai praayah observed.
Many Roman catholic or kuch protostant churches hataayen pushp isse unke altars, jabaki crucifixes, religious statues, and other elaborate religious symbols are often veiled in violet fabrics in solemn observance of the event.
in nishchit parhezgaaron catholic countries, kuch adherents mark the ritu saath the paramparaagat abstention from the khapat of maance.
in kuch deshon, grand dharmik processions or saanskrithik custom hai observed, or the vafaadaar attempt to vizit saat churches dauraan paavan Week in sammaan of yishu messiah heading to mount kalvari.
lent is traditionally described as sthaayee liye chalis days, in commemoration of the chalis dinon which, according to the gospels of Matthew, chihnit or Luke, yishu kharch upwas in the desert pehle the shuruuaat of uske public ministry, jahaan he endured pralobhan by the Devil.
however, alag isai denominations gananaa the forty dinon of Lent differently.
in sabase pashchimi paramparaon the Sundays are not gine as bhaag of lent ; yun the kaal isse Ash buudhvaar jabatak easter consists of 40 dinon jab the sundays are excluded.
however in the roman catholic girijaghar lent is now liya to samaapt on paavan Thursday balki than easter sandhya, and hence lasts 38 dinon excluding Sundays, or 44 days in total.
This event, saath with iske pious custom hai observed by Catholics, lutherans, methodists, presbyterians, and Anglicans.
