the chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska katastrofa – Chornobyl pralay ) thi a anarthakaari nuclear accident ki occurred on 26 april 1986 at the chernobyl nabhikeey shakti sanyantr in yukt ( tab officially the Ukrainian SSR ), jisase thi antargat the sidhaa kshetradhikaar of the central adhikariyon of the Soviet sangh.
an visphot or fire released vishaal quantities of radioskriy anu into the atmosphere, which spread over much of the pashchimi ussr and Europe.
the chernobyl vipatti is widely considered to have been the worst nabhikeey shakti sanyantr durghatana in itihaas, or is ek of tabhi do classified as a str 7 event on the antarrashtriya nabhikeey event Scale ( the anya hone the phukushima Daiichi nuclear vipatti in 2011 ).
the battle to contain the contamination or avert a greater catastrophe ultimately involved over 500,000 majdoor or cost an estimated 18 billion rubles.
the official soviet casualty count of 31 mauton rai maharoom vivaadit, or long-term prabhaav aise as cancers or deformities hai still hone accounted for.
in grammar, a subject poorak is a predicative abhivyakti that folo a linking verb ( copula ) or ki complements ( completes ) the vishay of the vaakya by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it.
in the former maamla, a renaming noun phrase aise as a sangya or sarvnaam is pukaara a predicative nammaatr.
An kriyasheel following the copula and describing the vishay is pukaara a predicative kriyasheel.
in either maamla the predicative poorak in prabhaav mirrors the vishay.
vishay complements hai prayukt saath a choti class of kriyaayein called linking verbs or copula, of jisase be is the sabase aam.
Since copula are stative verbs, vishay complements hai not prabhavit by any karrwai of the kriya.
Subject complements hai typically nahin clause vitark, nor are they clause kendribhoot.
Throughout the fifty-five saal itihaas of the Grammy Awards, anek significant record have maharoom niyat.
is pej tabhi shaamil the pratispardhi puraskaar won by vibhinn kalakaaron.
This does nahin shaamil the various khaas awards ki are prastut by the neshnal academy of recording kala or sciences such as aaajeevan uplabdhi puraskaar, trustees puraskaar, takneekee puraskaar or Legend Awards.
the pej however karata shaamil anya non-performance related grammys ( known as the shilp & utpaadan field ) that may have maharoom prastut to the kalakaar ( s ).
marshall Bruce Mathers iii ( born aktubar 17, 1972 ), behatar gyaat by uske stage naam eminem ( stylized as eminǝm ) and by his alter ahankaar Slim chhayaadaar, is an amareeki rapper, ricard nirmaataa, songwriter or karta.
Eminem, saath saath uske solo kariyar, is a member of uske samooh d12, or bhi ek half of the hip hop duo karaab meets dusht, saath royas da 5'9 ''.
Eminem is ek of the best-selling kalakaaron in the sansar or is the best-selling kalakaar of the 2000s.
he has maharoom soochibaddh or kramit as ek of the greatest kalakaaron of all samay by many magazines, including rolling stone patrika jisase kramit use 82nd on its list of the 100 mahanatam Artists of sab samay.
the vahi patrika ghoshit use the king of Hip Hop.
sahit uske kaary saath d12 or karaab meets dusht, eminem has hasil ten number-one albums on the billboard 200.
he rai bechi adhik than 100 lakh records worldwide, sahit 42 lakh tracks and 49.1 lakh album in the sanyukt States.
as an bhumigat rapper eminem released uske debyue solo album, Infinite in 1996.
The album was a najuk or commercial vifaltaa.
he gained mukhyadhara popularity in 1999 after the relies of his major-label debut album the patala Shady lp.
the LP bhi earned eminem uske first grami puraskaar for behtareen Rap album.
His aglaa do record the marshall mathers lp, or the eminem Show, bhi jiti behtareen Rap album grami Awards, bananaa eminem the pehla artist to jeet behtareen Rap album for teen lagaataar alpi.
This thi followed by another studio release in 2004 titled encore.
Eminem tab gai on antaraal after touring in 2005.
he released his pehla album in paanch years titled patan, on May 15, 2009.
in 2010, Eminem released uske saatvaan studio album recovery.
Recovery was an antarrashtriya kamyaabi and thi namit the behtareen selling album of 2010 vishwavyaapee, joining The eminem dikhaaen, jisase was the behtareen seller of 2002.
eminem jiti grami puraskaar liye dono patan or recovery, giving him a total of 13 grammys in his kariyar.
eminem rai kholi anya ventures, including his apana record label Shady Records saath his manager Paul Rosenberg.
he bhi rai uske apana radio channel, shed 45 on sirius xm radio.
Eminem began an acting kariyar in 2002, jab he starred in the hip hop naatak filmi 8 mile.
he jiti the Academy Award for behtareen Original Song, banane the pehla rap kalakaar kabhi to jeet the puraskaar.
he has bhi bana chemiyo dikhaave in the Wash ( 2001 ), mjedaar logon ( 2009 ) or the television shrenee Entourage.
the acre is a ikai of kshetrafal prayukt in the imperial or u.S. prathagat pranaaliyon.
an acre is parichay 40 % of a hectare – slightly choti than an amareeki footbaal field.
the acre is no longer commonly prayukt, haalanki a few notable apwaad include the sanyukt States, australia, burma or the sanyukt Kingdom ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially prayukt in the sanyukt kingdom, haalanki is still prayukt in real estate descriptions ).
it is still used, to kuch extent, in canada.
The antarrashtriya pratik of the acre is ac, or is paribhaashit as 1/640 of a square mile.
the most commonly used acre aaj is the antarrashtriya acre.
In the United rajya dono the antarrashtriya acre and the thodaa alag us surveykshan acre are in upyog.
the sabase aam upyog of the acre is to measure tracts of land.
ek antarrashtriya acre is defined as 4046.8564224 square metres.
During the Middle Ages, an acre thi the raashi of land that could be plowed in ek din with a yoke of oxen.
antony lavvazye 's discovery of the Law of sangrakshan of dravyaman led to anek nai findings in the 19th sadi.
joseph Proust 's law of definite proportions or jon dalton 's parmaanu theory branched isse the discoveries of antony lavvazye.
lavvazye 's quantitative experiments nazil that combustion shaamil oxigen rather than kayaa thi previously vichaar to be phlogiston.
the vidhi of sangrakshan of dravyaman, or principle of dravyaman conservation, states that for any pranali band to sab hastantaran of matter or energy ( dono of jisase have dravyaman ), the dravyaman of the system jarur remain nirantar over samay, as pranali mass can nahin badalen quantity if it is nahin added or removed.
hence, the maatra of mass is `` conserved '' over time.
The vidhi implies that dravyaman can neither be created nor nasht, haalanki it may be rearranged in spes, or the entities sambhddha saath it may be changed in rup, as liye udhaaharan jab light or shaareerik kaary is roopantarit into anu ki contribute the vahi mass to the system as the lite or kaary had contributed.
The vidhi implies ( requires ) ki dauraan koi rasinic pratikriya, nabhikeey pratikriya, or radioskriy decay in an pruthak system, the dravyaman of the reactants or starting saamagree must baraabar the dravyaman of the products.
the concept of mass sangrakshan is widely prayukt in anek field aise as chemistry, yantriki, and drav dynamiks.
Historically, dravyaman sangrakshan was khoja in chemical pratikriyaayein by antony lavvazye in the let 18th century, or thi of crucial mahatv in the pragati isse alchemy to the modern natural vigyaan of rasayan.
the closely related avadharana of matter sangrakshan thi mila to tham shubh in chemistry to aise unchi sanniktan ki it vifal tabhi for the unchi energies treated by the baad refinements of relativity theory, lakin otherwise remains upyogi or fear sateek liye sabase rasinic calculations, bhi in modern abhyaas.
in khaas aapekshikta, needed liye sateekta jab vishaal energy hastantaran between systems is involved, the antar between thermodynamically band or pruthak pranaaliyon becomes mahatvapurn, chunki sangrakshan of dravyaman is strictly and perfectly upheld tabhi for so-called pruthak pranaaliyon, i.e. those completely isolated isse all exchanges with the paryaavaran.
In is paristhiti, the mass-energy equivalence prameya states ki dravyaman sangrakshan is samatuly to kul urja sangrakshan, jisase is the pehla vidhi of ooshmaagatiki.
by contrast, liye a thermodynamically closed system ( i.e., one jisase is band to exchanges of padaarth, lakin kholen to exchanges of non-material urja, aise as heat or kaary, saath the parivesh ) dravyaman is ( praayah ) only lagbhag conserved.
the input or output of non-material energy must badalen the mass of the pranali in aapekshikta siddhanth, haalanki the badalen is usually choti, chunki relatively vishaal amounts of aise energy ( by tulana saath ordinary experience ) carry tabhi a choti raashi of mass ( again by ordinary maanakon of maapan ).
In khaas aapekshikta, mass is not parivartit to urja, since energy in sab of iske form sadaa retains iske equivalent raashi of dravyaman throughout any parivartan or translocation into, or out of, a pranali.
however, nishchit prakaar of padaarth ( a alag avadharana ) may be converted to energy, so long as the dravyaman of the pranali is aparivartit in the prakram.
however, if aise energy is removed isse systems, ve jarur lose the dravyaman ki is sambhddha saath it.
in saamaanya relativity, dravyaman ( and energy ) conservation in expanding aaytan of spes is a complex concept, vishay to alag paribhaashaayen, and neither dravyaman nor energy is as sakhti and bas conserved as is the maamla in khaas aapekshikta or in minchovsky spes.
For a discussion, dekhie dravyaman in saamaanya aapekshikta.
a pig is koi of the pashu in the genus sas, bheetar the suidae parivaar of even-toed ungulates.
Pigs shaamil the gharelu suar, its purvaj the wild boar, or anek anya junglee rishtedaaron.
Young or choti pigs are known as piglets.
boar hai omnivores or hai atyadhik soshal or budhimaan pashu.

8-inch, -inch ( full oonchaai ), or -inch drive
A 3.5-inch diskette 's `` flopy '' magnetic saamagree, removed isse iske awaas
a flopy discs, or diskette, is a discs bhandar medium rachit of a discs of patala or lacheelee chumbakeey bhandar medium, sealed in a ytaakar plastic vaahak lined saath fabric ki removes dhul anu.
They hai padhaa and likhaa by a flopy discs drive ( fdd ).
flopy disks, initially as media or baad in or 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) aakaar, were a sarvyaapee rup of aankada bhandar and exange isse the mid-1970s khub into the pehla dashak of the 21st century.
by 2010, computer motherboards yahood rarely manufactured with flopy drive support ; `` floppies could be used as an external usb drive, but ``, 8 ``, or non-standard drive could tabhi be sambhala by boodha upkaran.
jabaki flopy disk drives still have kuch limited upyog, visheshkar with viraasat audyogic computer upkaran, they have been superseded by data bhandar methods saath much vrihad kshamta, aise as USB flash drive, portable bahya mushkil disk drives, optical discs, memory taash, or computer sanjaal.
an anemated diagram of a kattar
In besabaal, a kattar, or cut fastball, is a type of fastball jisase brake thodaa toward the pitcher 's dastaane paksh as it pahunch ghar thali.
This pich is somewhere between a slider and a fastball, as it is praayah thrown faster than a slider but saath adhik motion than a typical fastball.
kuch pitchers upyog a cutter as a rasta to prevent hitters from expecting unke niyamit fastballs.
a aam takanic prayukt to throw a kattar is to upyog a four-seam fastball pakad with the besabaal niyat thodaa band bich in the haath.
jab a batter is samarth to hit a kattar pich, it praayah parinaam in naram sampark and an aasaan out, due to the pich 's gati keeping the ball dur isse the bat 's mithi spot.
the kattar is typically 2–5 kimi slower than a pichar 's four-seam fastball.
in 2010, the average pitch classified as a cutter by pitchf/x thrown by a right-handed pitcher thi 88.6 mph ; the ausat four-seamer thi 92.1 kimi.

the album sanskaran of the song is followed by an benaam hidden track.

odysseus ( or ; unani :, ), bhi gyaat by the roman naam ulysses ( ; ), thi a legendary unani king of ithaca or a nayika of homer 's apik kavita the Odyssey.
Odysseus bhi plays a key bhoomika in homer 's elliod or anya works in that vahi Epic saikil.
Husband of Penelope, pita of telemachus, or bete of laërtes ( or sisyphus ) or anticlea, odysseus is renowned liye uske brilliance, chal, and versatility ( polytropos ), or is hence known by the epithet odysseus the cunning ( mētis, or `` cunning intelligence `` ).
he is sabase prasiddh liye the ten eventful saalo he took to vaapasi ghar after the decade-long trojan yuddh or his prasiddh trojan ghoda ploy to capchar the city of Troy.
Erie is a statutory kasbaa in boulder or veld county in the U.S. rajya of Colorado.
The janasankhyikee according to the 2010 census is 18,135 or was recorded as 6,291 at the 2000 census.
the kasbaa of erie is stith bas west of I-25 for easy abhigam to I-70, denwar International vimaanashetra and Colorado 's entire saamne dayera.
erie 's Planning Area spans 48 vargakar miles, extending isse the north side of rajya rajmarg 52 dakshin to State rajmarg 7, or between US 287 on the west and antarraji 25 to the east.
erie is approximately 35 minutes isse Denver antarrashtriya Airport, 25 minutes to Denver or 20 minutes isse boulder.
the falak of trustees serves as the vidhaan or governing deh of the kasbaa of Erie or is responsible for establishing Town nitiyon or lakshya.
The falak rai the authority to apnaanaa kanoon, ordinances and rizolution as needed to conduct the kaarobaar of the kasbaa, or by adhyadesh may daalen into anubandh or intergovernmental samjhauton to furnish, praapt sevaayen or to provide liye cooperative service delivery.
niyukt by or sevarat at the kushi of the Board of trustees, the Town vyavasthaapak is the mukhya operating or administrative adhikari of the kasbaa and is jimmedaar liye providing peshewar netritv in the prashasan and nishpaadan of nitiyon and uddeshy pratipaadit by the falak.
the mishan of the erie police Department is to communicate or kaary saath the jatiyaan to maintain a safe paryaavaran, prevent aparaadhon and enforce the vidhi, jabaki protecting the adhikaron of sab.
erie nagarpalika Airport ( EIK ) is swaamitv or sanchalit by the Town of erie or is ranneetik stith in the Denver-Boulder mahanagar kshetrafal on colorado rajmarg 7, a little over three mile west of antarraji 25.
The main runway is kancreet prashast or 4,700 feet long.

It is the successor to the plastesan 2, as part of the PlayStation series.

pramukh features of the consol include iske ekikrut online gaming seva, the plastesan sanjaal, and iske connactivity saath the PlayStation portable or plastesan vita, in sitambar 2009 the adhyatanikrut plastesan 3 patala, thi released.

salvador domingo phelip jacinto dalí i domènech, 1st Marqués de dalí de pubol ( may 11, 1904january 23, 1989 ), known as salvador Dalí ( ), thi a prominent spani surrealist chitrakaar born in Figueres, spain.
dalí was a skilled draftsman, best gyaat liye the striking or vicitra bimb in uske surrealist kaary.
uske painterly skills hai praayah attributed to the influence of punarjagran masters.
uske best-known work, the Persistence of Memory, thi samaapt in 1931.
dalí 's expansive artistic rangamandal shaamil film, murtikla, and photography, in sahyog with a range of artists in a kismein of media.
dalí attributed uske `` prem of sabakuch ki is gilded or excessive, my passion liye luxury or my prem of oriental kapadey '' to a self-styled `` arab lineage '', claiming that his purvajo yahood descended isse the moore.
dalí thi highly kalpanasheel, or bhi enjoyed indulging in unusual or vaibhavshaalee bartaav.
uske eccentric manner and attention-grabbing public actions sometimes khinchaa adhik dhyaan than his artwork, to the dismay of those jo yojit uske kaary in unchi esteem, or to the irritation of uske aalochakon.
paras plato by silanion
the humanities hai academik disciplines ki padhai insaan culture, using vidhi ki hai primarily vishleshnatmak, critical, or satte, or having a significant historical tatv, as vishisht isse the mainly anubhavjanya approaches of the prakritik sciences.
the maanavtaa shaamil ancient or modern bhashaaen, literature, darshanashastra, dharm, and visual or performing kala such as music and theatre.
the maanavtaa ki hai bhi regarded as soshal sciences include itihaas, anthropology, kshetrafal adhyayan, sanchaar studies, saanskrithik adhyayan, vidhi, arthshaastra or linguistics.
Scholars working in the maanavtaa hai sometimes described as `` humanists ''.
however, ki pad also describes the philosophical sthiti of maanavtawaad, which kuch `` antihumanist `` vidwaanon in the maanavtaa reject.
kuch dwitiyak skulon prastaav maanavtaa varg, usually consisting of angrezi sahitya, vaishvik adhyayan, and art.
insaan disciplines like itihaas, saanskrithik anthropology or manovishleshan padhai subject matters to jisase the praayogic vidhi karata nahin lagu, and ve have abhigam bajaay to the tulanaatmak vidhi or comparative research.
The 2005 Blue room christmas Tree
the shwet house christmas Tree, also gyaat as the blue room Christmas ped, is the official andar christmas ped at the nivas of the adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya, the White house.
the pehla andar christmas ped thi santhaapit in the White house sometime in the 19th century ( vahin hai varying daawa as to the exact saal ) or chunki 1961 the tree rai tha a prasang motiff at the discretion of the First Lady of the United States.
the adhyaksh of the United rajya of america ( POTUS ) is the sir of state or head of government of the United rajya.
the president lead the karypalika shakha of the sangheey sarkari or is the commander-in-chief of the sanyukt rajya hathiyaarband shaktiyaan.
Article ii of the u.S. Constitution vests the karypalika power of the sanyukt rajya in the president or aarope use with the nishpaadan of federal vidhi, alongside the jimmedaari of appointing sangheey karypalika, rajanyik, niamak, and nyaayik adhikariyon, or concluding treaties with videshi shaktiyaan, with the salaah and consent of the seenet.
the adhyaksh is further empowered to grant sangheey pardons and reprieves, and to convene or adjourn either or dono gharon of Congress under extraordinary circumstances.
chunki the founding of the sanyukt rajya, the shakti of the adhyaksh or the sangheey sarkari have grown substantially and prayek aadhunik adhyaksh, despite possessing no aupchaarik vidhaan shaktiyaan beyond hastakshar or vetoing congressionally passed bills, is largely jimmedaar liye dictating the vidhaan agenda of his party and the videshi and domestic policy of the United rajya.
The president is aksar described as the sabase shaktishaalee vyakti in the sansar.
the adhyaksh is indirectly elected by the logon through the chunavi college to a four-year pad, and is ek of tabhi two nationally nirvaachit sangheey adhikariyon, the anya being the vaais President of the United rajya.
the Twenty-second Amendment, adopted in 1951, prohibits anyone from ever hone nirvaachit to the presidency for a teesraa puraa pad.
it also prohibits a vyakti isse hone nirvaachit to the presidency adhik than once if ki person previously tha parosa as president, or acting president, liye adhik than do saalo of another person 's pad as adhyaksh.
in sab, 43 individuals have served 55 four-year terms.
on janvari 20, 2009, Barack obama became the 44th and vartmaan president.
on navambar 6, 2012, he was re-elected or is scheduled to serve jabatak janvari 20, 2017.
Senses hai physiological capacities of organisms ki provide aankada liye bodh.
The hosh or unke operation, classification, and siddhanth hai overlapping vishay padhai by a variety of field, most notably neuroscience, cognitive psychology ( or sangyanatmak vigyaan ), or darshanashastra of bodh.
The baichaiyn system rai a vishisht samvedi pranali or ang, samarpit to prayek sense.
insaano have a multitude of hosh.
Sight ( ophthalmoception ), sunanaa ( audioception ), swaad ( gustaoception ), mahakate ( olfacoception or olfacception ), and touch ( tactioception ) hai the five traditionally pahachaanaa.
jabaki the kshamta to detect anya stimuli pare those governed by the paramparaagat senses exists, including taapmaana ( thermoception ), kinesthetic bhav ( proprioception ), pidaa ( nociception ), santulan ( equilibrioception ), acceleration ( kinesthesioception ), or various internal stimuli ( e.g. the different chemoreceptors for detecting salt and carbon dioxide ekaagratha in the rakt ), only a choti number of ye can sakushal be vargeekrut as separate hosh in or of themselves.
What constitutes a bhav is a padaarth of kuch bahes, agrani to kathinaaiyon in dhamak kayaa exactly a bhav is.
Animals also have receptors to sense the sansar around unhen, saath degrees of kaabiliyat varying greatly between prajati.
insaano have a comparatively kamjor bhav of smell, jabaki kuch pashu may lack ek or adhik of the paramparaagat paanch senses.
kuch pashu may bhi intake or interpret samvedi stimuli in bahut alag tareeke.
Some prajati of pashu hai able to bhav the sansar in a rasta ki insaano can nahin, with kuch prajati samarth to sense electrical and magnetic field, and detect jal dabaav or currents.
Spiders ( anukram araneae ) hai air-breathing arthropods ki have eight legs or chelicerae saath fangs ki inject venom.
ve are the largest anukram of arachnids or rank saatvaan in kul species vividhta among all other groups of jeevon.
makadiyon hai found worldwide on every continent except liye antarctic, and have become sthapit in nearly prayek awaas saath the excepshan of air or samudr colonization.
As of 2008, at tanik 43,678 makadi prajati, or 109 pariwaron have been ankit by taxonomists ; however, vahin rai maharoom confusion bheetar the vaigyanik jatiyaan as to kaisaa all ye pariwaron chahie be classified, as evidenced by the over 20 alag classifications ki have maharoom prastaavit chunki 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ from anya arthropods in that the usual deh segments hai fused into do tagmata, the cephalothorax or udar, or joined by a choti, belanaakaar pedicel.
naapsand keet, makadiyon do not have antennae.
In sab magar the most aadim samooh, the mesothelae, makadiyon have the most centralized baichaiyn pranaaliyon of sab arthropods, as all unke ganglia hai fused into ek mass in the cephalothorax.
Unlike most arthropods, makadiyon have no extensor mansapeshiyaan in unke limbs and instead extend unhen by hydrolic dabaav.
unke abdomens bhaaluu appendages that have maharoom parivardhit into spinnerets ki extrude resha from up to chah prakaar of resha glands within their udar.
makadi webs vary widely in aakaar, shape or the amount of stick thread prayukt.
it now appears that the sarpil orb web may be ek of the earliest forms, and makadiyon that upaj uljhe cobwebs hai adhik abundant or diverse than orb-web makadiyon.
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the devonian kaal about, lakin these pashu apparently lacked spinnerets.
sachcha spiders have been mila in Carboniferous rocks isse, and hai very samaan to the most aadim surviving order, the mesothelae.
the pramukh samooh of modern spiders, mygalomorphae and araneomorphae, first appeared in the Triassic kaal, pehle.
A herbivorous species, bagheera kiplingi, thi described in 2008, lakin all anya known prajati hai parabhakshi, zyaadaatar preying on keet or on anya spiders, although a few large prajati bhi lo pakshiyon or lizards.
Spiders upyog a wide dayera of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in sticky webs, lassoing it saath stick bolas, mimicking the shikaar to avoid ditection, or kaaryshil it bas.
Most detect prey mukhyatah by samvedan kampan, lakin the kriyasheel hunters have acute vision, or hunters of the genus Portia dikhaaen lakshan of intelligence in unke choice of tactics and kshamta to develop new ones.
makadiyon ' gustaakhee hai too simit to lo solids, and ve liquidize unke food by baadh it with digestive anzimon and pis it saath the bases of their pedipalps, as ve do nahin have sachcha jabade.
purush makadiyon pahachaano themselves by a kismein of jatil premalap sanskaar to avoid hone khaaya by the mahilaon.
males of sabase species jivit a few matings, simit mukhyatah by unke short jivan spans.
mahilaon bunate resha egg-cases, prayek of which may contain hundreds of andey.
mahilaon of anek prajati care for their yang, liye udhaaharan by carrying them around or by sharing khaanaa saath unhen.
A alpsankhyak of species are social, bhawan sampradayik webs that may house anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals.
soshal bartaav seemayen from precarious toleration, as in the vidhwaa makadiyon, to co-operative hunting and food-sharing.
haalanki sabase makadiyon sajiv liye at most do saalo, tarantulas or other mygalomorph makadiyon can live up to 25 years in captivity.
While the venom of a few species is khatarnaak to insaano, vaigyanikon hai abhi researching the upyog of makadi venom in ayurvigyaan and as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness, shakti or loch that is shreshth to ki of synthetic saamagree, or makadi resha jeenon have maharoom inserted into mammals or paudhe to dekhie if ye can be prayukt as resha kaarkaanon.
as a parinaam of unke chaudee dayera of vyavhaar, makadiyon have become aam symbols in art and mythology symbolizing various combinations of sabar, krurta or rachanaatmak shaktiyaan.

the series thi created to be racially vividh, utilizing a color-blind dhalaai technique.
it is primarily filmaaya in los Angeles, california.

Schizophrenia ( or ) is a dimagi disorder characterized by a vishleshan of thought prakriyaaon and by a deficit of theth emotional pratikriyaayein.
aam symptoms shaamil auditory mati, paranoid or vicitra delusions, or disorganized vaak or soch, and it is accompanied by significant soshal or occupational dysfunction.
the onset of lakshan typically occurs in yang adulthood, saath a vaishvik lifetime vyapaktaa of parichay 0.3–0.7 %.
nidaan is aadhaarit on observed bartaav or the rogi 's reported anubhavon.
anuvanshiki, jaldi paryaavaran, neurobiology, or manovaigyanik or soshal prakriyaaon appear to be important contributory karkon ; kuch recreational or prescription davaayen appear to kaaran or worsen lakshan.
vartmaan research is kendrit on the bhoomika of neurobiology, haalanki no single isolated sashulk kaaran has maharoom mila.
the anek possible combinations of lakshan have triggered bahes parichay whether the diagnosis represents a single vikaar or a number of alahada syndromes.
Despite the etymology of the pad isse the unani jaden skhizein ( σχίζειν, `` to split '' ) or phrēn, phren- ( φρήν, φρεν- ; `` mind '' ), schizophrenia karata not imply a `` vibhajit vyaktitv '', or `` multiple vyaktitv vikaar '' ( which is gyaat ye days as dissociative identity disorder ) —a condition saath which it is praayah uljhan in public bodh.
balki, the term arthath a `` splitting of dimagi krityon '', kuki of the symptomatic prastutikaran of the beemaari.
the mainstay of treatment is antipsychotic dawa, jisase primarily dabaa dopamine ( or sometimes serotonin ) receptor kaaryaklap.
Psychotherapy and vocational and soshal punarvaas are also mahatvapurn in upachaar.
In adhik gambhir cases—where there is risk to swah or others— involuntary hospitalization may be jaruri, haalanki hospital stays are abhi shorter and kam frequent than they ekbar yahood.
the vikaar is vichaar mukhyatah to affect sangyaan, lakin it bhi usually contributes to dirghakaalik samasyaayein saath behavior or jajbaat.
logon saath schizophrenia hai sambhavit to have atirikt ( comorbid ) sharten, sahit major avsaad or anxiety vikaar ; the aaajeevan occurrence of substance upyog vikaar is lagbhag 50 %.
Social samasyaayein, aise as long-term unemployment, poverty, or homelessness hai common.
the ausat life pratyaasha of logon with the disorder is 12 to 15 saalo kam than those without, the parinaam of increased physical swasthya problems or a ucchtar aatmahatya rate ( parichay 5 % ).

the apik of gilgamesh, an epic kavita isse mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of sahitya.
the saahitiyik itihaas of gilgamesh begins saath paanch swatantra Sumerian kavitaayen parichay 'bilgamesh ' ( sumerian liye gilgamesh ), king of uruk.
chaar of ye were prayukt as source saamagree liye a sanyukt apik in Akkadian.
This pehla combined apik, gyaat as the `` boodha Babylonian '' sanskaran, tithiyaan to the 18th sadi bc or is titled baad iske incipit, shūtur eli sharrī ( `` surpassing sab anya kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have survived.
the later `` maanak babylonian '' version tithiyaan isse the 13th to the 10th centuries BC or bears the incipit sha naqba īmuru ( `` he who dekhi the Deep '' ).
fragments of lagbhag two tihaai of is longer, twelve-tablet version have been recovered.
kuch of the behtareen copies yahood khoja in the pustakaalayon ruins of the 7th-century bc assyrian king ashurbanipal.
the story centers on a dosti between gilgamesh and enkidu.
Enkidu is a junglee man nirmit by the gods as gilgamesh 's equal to distract use from oppressing the logon of uruk.
Together, they yatra to the deodaar pahaad to defeat Humbaba, iske monstrous guardian.
baad ve maar the sand of swarg, jisase the devi ishtaar sends to sajaa Gilgamesh for spurning uske advances.
as a dand liye ye kriyaayein, the gods vaakya Enkidu to maut.
the duusari half of the epic focuses on gilgamesh 's takalif at enkidu 's maut, or uske quest liye amartv.
in anukram to sikh the rahasy of eternal jivan, gilgamesh undertakes a long or perilous journey.
He learns that `` the life ki tum are seeking tum hoga never find.
When the devataaon nirmit man they aavantit to use maut, but jivan ve retained in unke apana keeping. ''
is uddhran was originally attributed to siduri in the Old babylonian sanskaran of the apik, and tab attributed to the immortal baadh nayika utnapishtim in the Akkadian sanskaran of the apik.
Nevertheless, gilgamesh 's kirti jiya on baad uske maut, kuki of uske great bhawan project, and uske account of kayaa Utnapishtim bataai use happened dauraan the baadh.
the story has maharoom translated into many alag bhashaaen, and gilgamesh rai chunki become adapted in works of lokapriy fiction.
a sukendrik ( or ) is an organism jinaki cells contain jatil structures enclosed bheetar jhilliyon.
eukaryotes may more formally be referred to as the texon eukarya or eukaryota.
The defining membrane-bound dhaancha that sets eukaryotic cells apart isse prokaryotic cells is the cendrak, or nuclear lipapha, within which the genetic saamagree is carried.
the presence of a nucleus detaa eukaryotes unke naam, jisase aata from the unani ( eu, `` shubh '' ) or ( karyon, `` nut '' or `` karnel '' ).
Most eukaryotic koshikaayen bhi contain anya membrane-bound organelles aise as mitochondria, chloroplasts or the golgi apparatus.
sab large complex jeevon hai eukaryotes, sahit animals, paudhe or fungi.
The samooh bhi shaamil many eckoshikeey jeevon.
koshika prabhag in eukaryotes is alag isse ki in jeevon bagaiyr a nucleus ( Prokaryote ).
it involves separating the duplicated gunasutron, through andolanon directed by microtubules.
There are do prakaar of division processes.
in samasutran, ek koshika divides to upaj do genetically identical koshikaayen.
in meiosis, jisase is jaruri in yon reproduction, ek dwiguneet cell ( having two udhaaharan of prayek chromosome, ek isse prayek janak ) undergoes recombination of each pair of parental chromosomes, or tab do charan of cell division, resulting in four agunit cells ( gamit ).
prayek gamete rai just ek poorak of gunasutron, prayek a unique mixr of the sambandhit pair of parental gunasutron.
eukaryota appears to be monophyletic, or so makes up ek of the teen domen of life.
the two anya domen, jeevanu or Archaea, hai prokaryotes or have none of the upar suvidhaayen.
Eukaryotes represent a chota alpsankhyak of sab jeena bate ; bhi in a insaan deh there are 10 times adhik microbes than insaan cells.
However, due to unke much larger aakaar unke samuhik vishwavyaapee biomas is estimated at about baraabar to ki of prokaryotes.
ve hai considered to have pehla viksit approximately 1.6–2.1 arab saalo pehle.

A bahut common rup of antarjaal dhokhadhadi is the vitaran of dusht suraksha tantra.

antarjaal fraud can occur in gapshap kaksh, email, sandesh falak, or on websiton.
the International suraksha Assistance force ( ISAF ) is a NATO -led security mission in afghanistan that was sthapit by the sanyukt raashtra Security Council in disambar 2001 by Resolution 1386, as envisaged by the bon Agreement.
Its pramukh purpose is to tren the Afghan neshnal suraksha shaktiyaan ( ansf ) and assist Afghanistan in punarnirmaan kunjee sarkari sansthaanon lakin is bhi sagaai in the 2001-present war with insurgent samooh.
isaf was initially charge saath securing Kabul or surrounding kshetron isse the Taliban, al qaeda or factional warlords, so as to allow liye the sthapana of the afgaan transitional prashasan headed by hamid karzai.
in aktubar 2003, the un Security parishad praadhikrut the expansion of the ISAF mishan throughout Afghanistan, or isaf subsequently vistaarit the mission in four pramukh charan over the puure of the desh.
isse 2006 to 2011, isaf had maharoom involved in increasingly more intensive combat operations in dakshini or purvi Afghanistan.
Troop contributors shaamil from the sanyukt rajya, sanyukt kingdom, nato sadsy states and a number of anya countries.
the intensity of the combat faced by contributing raashtra varies greatly, saath the sanyukt rajya, sanyukt kingdom, or canada sustaining the bahumat of hataahat in intensive combat parichaalan, saath other yogadanakarta sustaining significantly kam.
as of jaldi 2010, there yahood at least 700 sainya bases andar Afghanistan but more yahood apekshit to be built in the coming saalo.
parichay 400 of ye yahood prayukt by american‐led nato shaktiyaan or 300 by ansf.
Cocaine ( benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( INN ) is a crystalline tropane alcoload that is obtained isse the pattey of the coca sanyantr.
The naam comes isse `` coca '' and the alkaloid pratyay -ine, forming coca.
It is a uttejk, an appetite suppressant, or a topical anesthetic.
Biologically, coca adhiniyamon as a serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor, also known as a tripal reuptake inhibitor ( tri ).
it is addictive because of iske prabhaav on the mesolimbic reward pathway.
naapsand most molecules, cocaine has pockets with dono high hydrophilic or lipophilic efficiency, violating the rule of hydrophilic-lipophilic santulan.
This causes it to cross the blood–brain avrodh dur behatar than anya psychoactive rasayan and may bhi induce blood-brain avrodh vishleshan.
it is illegal to possess, upaj, or distribute coca liye non-medicinal or non-government-sanctioned uddeshy in almost every country.

A cykil frem is the pramukh component of a cykil, on to which pahiyon or anya components are fitted.
the aadhunik and most common frem dizine liye an upright cykil is aadhaarit on the safety cykil, and consists of do trikon, a pramukh tribhuj or a yugma rear tribhuj.
This is gyaat as the diamond frame.
frames hai jaruri to be damdaar, stiff and lite, which they do by combining alag saamagree or aakaar.

a pendulum is a vazan nilambit isse a so ki it can jhule freely.
jab a lolak is displaced bagalon isse iske resting equilibrium sthiti, it is subject to a restoring force due to gravity that hoga accelerate it waapas toward the santulan sthiti.
jab released, the restoring force combined saath the pendulum 's dravyaman kalyankari it to oscillate parichay the equilibrium sthiti, suhane waapas and forth.
the samay liye one puraa cycle, a baayein jhule or a sahi jhule, is called the kaal.
a lolak swings with a vishisht kaal which depends ( mukhyatah ) on iske length.
From iske discovery around 1602 by galileo gallily the niyamit motion of pendulums was prayukt liye timekeeping, and was the sansar 's sabase accurate timekeeping praudyogiki until the 1930s.
Pendulums hai prayukt to regulate pendulum clocks, and hai prayukt in vaigyanik instruments aise as accelerometers and seismometers.
historically ve yahood used as gravimeters to maap the acceleration of gravity in geophysical surveykshan, or bhi as a standard of lambaai.
The shabd 'pendulum ' is nai Latin, isse the latin pendulus, arth 'hanging '.
The simple gravity pendulum is an idealized mathematical model of a lolak.
is is a weight ( or bob ) on the samaapt of a massless cord nilambit isse a, bagaiyr gharshan.
jab die an initial push, it will jhule waapas and forth at a constant aayam.
real pendulums hai vishay to gharshan and air khichein, so the aayam of their swings giravat.
The First Battle of sand chalaaen, bhi gyaat as pehla manassas ( the name prayukt by Confederate shaktiyaan ), was ladaa on july 21, 1861, in prince wiliam County, virginia, nikat the nagar of manassas.
It thi the pehla major jameen battle of the amareeki civil yuddh.
bas maheene baad the start of the war at fort sumter, the uttari public clamored liye a kooch viruddh the confederate puunji of richmond, Virginia, which ve apekshit to bring an jaldi end to the vidroh.
yielding to rajnatik dabaav, Brig. gen. irvin mcdowell led uske unseasoned sangh fouj aarpaar Bull chalaaen viruddh the baraabar anubhavheen Confederate Army of brigadier. gen. P. G. T. beauregard camped near manassas jankshan.
mcdowell 's ambitious yojana liye a aashcharya parshv akraman on the Confederate left thi poorly chalaaya by his officers and main ; nevertheless, the confederates, jo tha maharoom niyojan to attack the sangh baayein flank, mila themselves at an aarambhik disadvantage.
confederate sudrudheekaran under brigadier. Gen. Joseph E. Johnston arrived isse the Shenandoah Valley by railroad or the course of the battle quickly badla.
a brigade of virginians antargat a apekshaakrit unknown karnal isse the Virginia sainya santhaan, thomas J. jackson, stood their maidan or jackson praapt uske prasiddh upnaam, `` stonewall jackson ''.
The confederates tab shubharambh a damdaar counterattack, or as the Union troops began withdrawing antargat aag, anek panicked or it turned into a rout as McDowell 's main frantically bhaaga bagaiyr anukram in the disha of washington, d.c.

mausam is the state of the maahaul, to the oopaadhi ki it is hot or cold, geela or dry, shant or stormy, clear or cloudy.
Most weather phenomena occur in the kshobhamandal, bas neeche the stratosphere.
mausam generally refers to day-to-day temperature or varshan kaaryaklap, whereas jalwaayu is the term liye the average vayumandaleey sharten over longer periods of samay.
When prayukt bagaiyr qualification, `` mausam '' is samajha to be the mausam of Earth.
mausam is chalit by air pressure ( taapmaana or nami ) matbhed between one place and another.
These dabaav or taapmaana differences can occur due to the sun kone at koi particular spot, jisase varies by akshansh isse the ooshnakaribandh.
the strong temperature contrast between polar or tropical air detaa vruddhi to the jet stream.
mausam pranaaliyon in the mid-latitudes, aise as extratropical cyclones, hai caused by instabilities of the jet stream flow.
kuki the dharti 's axis is tilted saapeksh to iske kakshiya plane, dhoop is ghatana at alag angles at different times of the saal.
on dharti 's sataha, temperatures usually dayera ±40 °c ( −40 °F to 100 °f ) annually.
over hazaron of saalo, parivartan in dharti 's orbit affect the raashi or vitaran of saura urja praapt by the dharti or influence long-term jalwaayu or vaishvik jalwaayu change.
Surface taapmaana differences in phere kaaran dabaav matbhed.
Higher altitudes hai cooler than nimnatar altitudes due to matbhed in compressional heating.
Weather forecasting is the anuprayog of vigyaan and technology to bhavishyavaanee the state of the maahaul liye a bhavishya samay or a die location.
the maahaul is a chaotic system, so small changes to ek bhaag of the system can grow to have vishaal effects on the pranali as a puure.
insaan koshishen to control the mausam have occurred throughout human itihaas, or vahin is pramaan ki insaan kaaryaklap aise as krishi or udyog rai inadvertently parivardhit mausam pattern.
adhyayan kaisaa the mausam works on other planets has maharoom sahaayak in samajhnaa kaisaa mausam works on dharti.
a prasiddh landmark in the saura pranali, brihaspati 's Great red spot, is an anticyclonic toofaan gyaat to have existed for at tanik 300 saalo.
However, mausam is not simit to grahiy laashen.
a star 's kirit is constantly hone lost to spes, creating kayaa is essentially a bahut patala atmosphere throughout the Solar System.
The movement of dravyaman ejected isse the Sun is gyaat as the solar hawa.

the following is a suchi of sovereign rajya or territories where angrezi is an official bhashaa or language of government.
in 2012, vahin were 88 states in kul ( 60 sovereign rajya or 28 non-sovereign states ).
in anek deshon angrezi is the prabal bhashaa, lakin karata nahin have aadhikarik status.
in australia, angrezi is bolaa by the vast bahumat of the janasankhyikee or is the tabhi bhashaa prayukt in government sansthaanon, lakin Australia does nahin have an official bhashaa.
the maamla is the same in the sanyukt kingdom or the sanyukt States, haalanki anek rajya or regions bheetar the u.S. do have angrezi as an aadhikarik bhashaa.
angrezi is the dominant language of nai jiland and an aadhikarik bhashaa of canada ( saath saath french ), india ( saath with hindi or several anya bhashaaen ), ireland ( saath saath irish ), or the philippine ( saath with tagalog ).
English is the ekmaatr aadhikarik bhashaa of the Commonwealth of raashtra or the rashtramandal Games.
angrezi is ek of the official bhashaaen of the sanyukt raashtra, the europea sangh or the International olympic Committee.
anek of ye deshon hai vartmaan or purv colonies or dependencies of the sanyukt kingdom ( dekhie also British samrajya ), or of the sanyukt rajya, itself a purv upnivesh of the uk.
notable exceptions include Rwanda, jisase thi a purv Belgian upnivesh and Eritrea, jisase thi an italvi upnivesh jahaan the angrejon samrajya spanned its control tabhi in World War II and shortly baad ( 1941-1952 ).
india 's bhashaai picture is jatil.
according to the samvidhan of India, `` hindi in the devanagari script '' is the aadhikarik bhashaa of the sangh ; or English the 'subsidiary aadhikarik language ' ; however, angrezi is mandated liye the authoritative granth of sab federal kanoon or param adaalat nirnay or ( saath saath hindi ) is one of the do languages of the bhartiya parliament.
English is used almost exclusively liye ucchtar shiksha, business or vigyaan.
Courses in bahumat of the skulon hai sikhaaya exclusively in angrezi.
angrezi is extensively used liye administrative uddeshy in india.
india is the second-largest english-speaking desh in the sansar by number of speakers, after the sanyukt rajya.
As aise, anek consider English to be the de facto aadhikarik bhashaa of india.
See Official bhashaaen of india.
the bhashaai mechap of pakistani is similarly jatil.
jabaki the neshnal bhashaa is urdu, English is an official language and used in kaarobaar, sarkari or vidhi.
angrezi is a anivaary bhashaa in schools.
sab skool paathyakram hai taught in angrezi.
Pakistan is the 9th largest english-speaking country in the sansar by population.
Southern Cone (, ) is a bhugolic pradesh composed of the southernmost kshetron of dakshin america, dakshin of the tropic of Capricorn.
haalanki geographically this shaamil Southern or part of southeast ( São poulo ) of brazil, in sharten of rajnatik geography the dakshini cone rai traditionally comprised argentina, chile, Paraguay, or Uruguay.
in the narrowest sense, it tabhi covers argentina, chile and urugve, bounded on the uttar by the rajya of brazil, Paraguay, bolivia or peru, on the west by the prashanth samandar, or dakshin to the junction between the prashanth or Atlantic mahaasaagar, jisase it is the closest mahadwipiya kshetrafal of Antarctica ( 1000 km ).
High jivan pratyaasha, the ucchtam insaan vikaas anukramanika of latin america, high maanak of living, significant bhagidaari in the vaishvik bazaar or the ubharate arthvyavastha of iske sadasyon make the dakshini cone the sabase prosperous macro-region in dakshin America.
liye multi-event athlettic pratiyogitaaon see track or Field pratiyogitaaon, khand `` baithak ''.
baithak are sometimes held around sammelan tables.
in a baithak, two or adhik logon aaiye together to discuss ek or adhik topics, often in a aupchaarik setting.
an aadhikarik khel in baseball, also sometimes called a regulation khel, is a game ki rai progressed pare the point at jisase it can be mana puraa if necessary.
is is lagbhag the halfway point of the khel.
in the case of inclement weather, any khel which rai pahunche this point may be roka and shortened as needed, saath the parinaam hone final, or all record and aankde counted.
a game jisase rai not pahunche this point pehle hone roka is either mana a nilambit game ( to be jari at a baad tithi isse the point of stoppage ), or is simply canceled and replayed isse the prarambh.
( is depends on the niyam of prayek individual lig. )
in either case, no aankde hai gine until the khel becomes aadhikarik.
chunki sabase peshewar baseball khel are nau pari long, the fifth inning is used as the threshold liye an official game.
if the visiting toli is leading, or the khel is tied, the samaapt of the fifth inning marks is point.
if the home toli ( jisase bats pichhlaa ) is already ahead in the score, and theoretically hota nahin need iske half of the paanchvaan inning, then 41⁄2 pari ( i.e., the madhya of the paanchvaan ) is mana an aadhikarik khel.
the khel is bhi mana official if the ghar toli score to lo the lead in the bottom of the paanchvaan inning, since the khel hota samaapt immediately if the vahi baat happened in the ninth.
in nearly sab cases, the `` aadhikarik khel '' aukaat is prayukt to determine whether a barsaat jaanch hoga be sammanit liye prashansak pakadakar tikaten.
if a khel is prarambh lakin karata not pahunchein the point of banane aadhikarik, fans hai entitled to a nai ticket for the make-up khel or ( in sabase cases ) any anya available khel of unke chunaav.
if a khel is halted baad it becomes official, the khel is bas shortened or no barsaat jaanch is die.
The `` official game '' statistic praapt kuch attention dauraan the 1995 ritu, when calories ripken, jr. thi approaching the ricard for lagaataar khel nibhaai, previously held by Lou gehrig.
Large numbers were hung on the paksh of the b & o godaam at Oriole park at camden Yards to show the number of khel in ripken 's streak.
Each day, a new kramank thi unfurled dauraan the paanchvaan inning baad prayek khel tha become official ( since the statistic would nahin have gine if the game tha maharoom roka pehle that point ).
a samaan abhyaas has maharoom prayukt to ginati down toward the demolition of anek stadium ( sahit diggajon stadium in philadelphia in 2003, Busch memorial Stadium in St. lui in 2005, and the asli yanki stadium or Shea stadium in nai York nagar in 2008 ) ; as prayek khel became aadhikarik, the team hota unveil a nai ( nimnatar ) kramank prardashit the kramank of khel baayein to be played in the stadium.
A telephone number or phone kramank is a sequence of ank prayukt to kol isse ek telephone line to another in a public switched telephone sanjaal.
jab telephone sankhyaayein yahood invented, they were choti — as few as ek, do or teen ank — or yahood die orally to a switchboard oparator.
as phone pranaaliyon have grown or interconnected to encompass the world, telephone sankhyaayein have become longer.
In jod to telephones, they abhi abhigam anya devices, such as computer and fax mashine.
the kramank contains the soochna jaruri to pahachaano uniquely the intended endpoint for the telephone kol.
prayek aise endpoint must have a unique kramank within the public switched telephone sanjaal.
sabase deshon use phixd lambaai sankhyaayein ( liye saamaanya lines at tanik ) and therefore the kramank of endpoints determines the jaruri length of the telephone number.
It is bhi sambhavit for prayek subscriber to have a set of shorter sankhyaayein liye the endpoints sabase praayah prayukt.
ye `` shorthand '' or `` speed colling '' sankhyaayein are automatically anudit to unique telephone sankhyaayein pehle the kol can be conect.
kuch special sevaayen have unke own choti numbers ( e.g., 1-1-9, 9-1-1, 0-0-0, 9-9-9, 1-1-1, and 1-1-2 hone the apaat sevaayen numbers liye china, japani, dakshin Korea, taiwan or Sri Lanka ; canada and the sanyukt rajya ; australia ; the United kingdom, Ireland, South africa, candal, saudi arab, the sanyukt Arab emirate, morocco, makaao, bahrain, qatar, bangladesh, Botswana, ghana, kenya, hong kong, malaysia, Mauritius, singapore, zimbabwe, Trinidad, tobago ; nai jiland ; kuwait and the European sangh, kramshah. )
anek systems bhi allow kals bheetar a local kshetrafal to be bana without dialing the local kshetrafal code.
liye example, a phone kramank in uttar America hoga prarambh saath teen sankhyaayein ( aise as 661 ), jisase is the kshetrafal code, followed by saat ank split into bhaag of three or chaar ( aise as 550-1212 ), jisase is the local kramank.
kuch kshetron abhi have anivaary ten-digit dialing in place, bhi liye local calls.
Most telephone sanjaal aaj ( exceptions being nijee intercom or surakshit phone sanjaal ) hai interconnected in the international telephone network, jahaan the swaroop of telephone sankhyaayein is manakikrut by ITU-T in the anushansa e.164.
is specifies ki the sampurna kramank chahie be 15 ank or shorter, or shuru saath a desh upsarg.
For sabase deshon, is is followed by an area code or nagar code and the subscriber kramank, which might consist of the code liye a particular telephone exange.
itu-t recommendation E.123 describes how to represent an international telephone kramank in likhane or chapai, starting saath a plus sign ( `` + '' ) and the desh code.
jab colling an international number isse a phixd lakeer phone, the + must be replaced saath the antarrashtriya kol upsarg chuni by the desh the kol is hone made isse.
Some mobile phone allow the + to be entered sidhe.
the format or aavanton of local phone numbers hai niyantrit by prayek nation 's respective sarkari, either directly or by sponsored sanghathan ( aise as NANPA overseen by neustar inc. ).
pehle a telephone kol is connected, the telephone kramank jarur be dialed by the colling party or collar.
the pukaara party might have equipment ki presents collar id pehle the kol is answered.
a sangrahan agency is a kaarobaar ki pursues payments of debts owed by individuals or businesses.
Most sangrahan agenciyon operate as agenton of lendaaron and collect debts liye a shulk or pratishat of the kul raashi owed.
vahin hai anek prakaar of sangrahan agenciyon.
First-party agenciyon hai oftentimes subsidiaries of the original company the karz is owed to.
Third-party agenciyon are separate companiyaan contracted by a company to collect debts on unke nimitt liye a shulk.
karz kharidaar purchase the karz at a pratishat of iske value, tab attempt to collect it.
prayek desh rai iske apana rules and regulations regarding them.
Cannabis pushp with drishy trichomes
canbis, also gyaat as marijuana ( isse the mexican spani marihuana ), and by anya names, is a taiyaari of the canbis sanyantr intended liye upyog as a psychoactive drug or as ayurvigyaan.
pharmacologically, the principal psychoactive constituent of canbis is tetrahydrocannabinol ( thc ) ; it is ek of 483 gyaat compounds in the sanyantr, including at least 84 anya cannabinoids, such as cannabidiol ( sibidi ), cannabinol ( cbn ), tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ).
or cannabigerol ( CBG ).
This is a suchi of amareeki football quarterbacks who have prarambh liye the washington Redskins, as khub as its purvavartiyon the boston braves ( 1932 ) or boston Redskins ( 1933 – 1936 ), in the neshnal footbaal lig ( NFL ).
The washington redskins matadhikaar thi originally santhaapit in boston, Massachusetts as the boston braves, namit baad the local besabaal matadhikaar.
the naam thi badla the following saal to the Redskins.
in 1937, the matadhikaar sthanantarit to washington, d.c.
Of the 49 redskins starting quarterbacks, two have maharoom inducted into the pro footbaal haul of Fame : saimi Baugh or sanni jurgensen.

1st khaas Forces operational Detachment-Delta ( 1st sfod-d ), popularly gyaat as Delta Force, is ek of the United States ' chaar gupachup tier-one counter-terrorism or khaas mishan ikai.
it thi formerly soochibaddh as the combat Applications samooh by the vibhaag of raksha lakin has chunki maharoom officially re-designated the fouj Compartmented Elements ( ikkaa ).
While 1st sfod-d is administratively supported by usasoc, it jalprapaat antargat the operational control of the sanyukt khaas Operations cmand.
delta Force or iske Navy bantwaaraa, the naval khaas warfare vikaas samooh, are the sanyukt rajya military 's primary counter-terrorism units.
delta force 's praathmik kaary hai counter-terrorism, sidhaa karrwai, or neshnal intervention parichaalan, haalanki it is an atyadhik versatile samooh sakasham of conducting many types of gupt mishan, including, but not simit to, hostage rescues or raids.
the Central Intelligence agency 's atyadhik gupachup khaas kriyaayein prabhag ( udhaas ) or adhik specifically iske elite Special parichaalan samooh ( sog ) praayah works saath – or recruits – oparator from delta Force.
alpha decay is ek example prakaar of radioactive kshay, in jisase an parmaanu cendrak emits an alpha kan, or thereby transforms ( or 'kshaymus ' ) into an atom saath a dravyaman kramank 4 kam or parmaanu kramank 2 kam.
anek other types of decays are sambhavit.
radioskriy kshay, bhi gyaat as nabhikeey kshay or radioactivity, is the prakram by which a nucleus of an unstable atom loses energy by emitting anu of ionizing vikiran.
A saamagree ki anayas emits is kind of vikiran — which shaamil the emission of urjavan alpha anu, beta anu, or gamma kirane — is mana radioactive.
vahin are anek alag prakaar of radioskriy decay ( dekhie talika neeche ).
a kshay, or ghaataa of urja, parinaam when an anu saath ek type of nucleus, pukaara the janak radionuclide, parinat to an anu saath a cendrak in a alag state, or to a different cendrak containing alag sankhyaayein of protons or neutrons.
Either of these utpaada is namit the beti nuclide.
in kuch decays the janak or beti hai different chemical tatv, or thus the kshay process parinaam in nabhikeey transmutation ( sristi of an anu of a new element ).
the first decay prakriyaaon to be khoja were alpha decay, beta kshay, and gamma kshay.
alpha kshay occurs jab the cendrak ejects an alpha particle ( helium nucleus ).
This is the most common prakram of emitting nucleons, lakin in rarer prakaar of decays, nuclei can eject protons, or vishisht nuclei of anya elements ( in the prakram called cluster decay ).
Beta kshay occurs jab the cendrak emits an electron or positron and a prakaar of neutrino, in a prakram that parivartan a proton to a neutron or the anya rasta around.
The nucleus may capture an orbiting electron, converting a proton into a neutron ( electron capture ).
All of these prakriyaaon parinaam in nabhikeey transmutation.
by contrast, there maujuud radioskriy decay prakriyaaon ki do nahin result in transmutation.
the urja of an utsahit cendrak may be emitted as a gamma re in gamma kshay, or prayukt to eject an orbital electron by baatcheet saath the excited cendrak in a prakram called aatanrik parivartan.
Radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons, or is results in a change in an tatv from ek isotope to another.
ek prakaar of radioskriy kshay parinaam in products jisase are nahin defined, lakin appear in a dayera of `` tukade '' of the asli cendrak.
is kshay is pukaara spontaneous parivardhan.
is kshay happens jab a vishaal asthir cendrak spontaneously splits into do ( and occasionally three ) choti beti nuclei, or praayah emits gamma kirane, neutrons, or other particles as a consequence.
Radioactive kshay is a stochastic ( i.e., yadrichhik ) prakram at the str of single anu, in that, according to kwantum siddhanth, it is impossible to bhavishyavaanee when a particular atom will decay.
however, the mauka that a die anu hoga kshay is nirantar over time.
liye a vishaal number of anu, the kshay rate liye the sangrahan is computable isse the measured decay constants of the newclide ( or equivalently isse the half-lifes ).
Waxing is a rup of semi-permanent bal hataanaa jisase removes the bal isse the root.
New bal will nahin grow back in the previously waxed kshetrafal liye do to aath weeks, haalanki kuch people hoga prarambh to dekhie regrowth in tabhi a saptaah.
Almost any kshetrafal of the body can be waxed, sahit eyebrows, phase, bikini kshetrafal, legs, arms, waapas, udar and feet.
vahin are anek prakaar of vexing upyukt for nikaalnaa unwanted hair.
strip vexing is sampannataa by spreading a mom thinly over the skin.
a cloth or paper strip is tab pressed on the sheersh or ripped off the disha of bal vikaas.
is removes the mom saath saath the bal.
strip wax can bhi be bana at ghar using lemon ras, water, sugar or honey.
hot vexing utilizes Hot mom ( as opposed to strip mom ).
in is case, the mom is applied somewhat thickly and saath no cloth or paper strips.
The wax tab hardens jab it cools, yun allowing the aasaan hataanaa by a chikitsak bagaiyr the sahaayta of cloths.
This waxing vidhi is bahut phydemand to people who have sensitive skin.

pracheen roman samskruti existed throughout the lagbhag 1200-year history of the sabhyataa of pracheen rome.
The term refers to the samskruti of the roman Republic, baad the Roman Empire, jisase, at iske peak, covered an area isse lowland Scotland or morocco to the euphrates.
Life in ancient rome revolved around the nagar of rome, iske famed saat pahadiyaan, and iske smaarkeey structures such as the flavian amphitheatre ( abhi pukaara the Colosseum ), the Forum of traajaan, or the Pantheon.
The nagar bhi tha anek theatre, gymnasiums, or anek taverns, baths, and brothels.
throughout the territory antargat ancient rome 's control, awasaiya architecture ranged isse bahut modest gharon to desh vila, and in the puunji nagar of Rome, vahin yahood imperial nivas on the suruchipurna palatine hill, from which the word rajmahal is niklaa.
The vishaal majority of the janasankhyikee jiya in the nagar center, packed into insulae ( apartment block ).
The nagar of rome thi the largest megalopolis of ki time, with a janasankhyikee that may khub have exceeded one lakh people, with a unchi end anumaan of 3.6 lakh or a kam samaapt anumaan of 450,000.
aitihaasik estimates indicate that around 30 pratishat of the population under the city 's kshetradhikaar jiya in innumerable urban centers, saath population of at least 10,000 or anek sainya settlements, a very high rate of urbanization by pre-industrial maanakon.
the sabase urbanized bhaag of the samrajya was Italy, which had an anumaanit rate of shahari of 32 %, the vahi rate of urbanization of England in 1800.
sabase Roman towns or shaharon tha a foram, mandiron or the vahi prakaar of imaaraten, on a choti scale, as found in rome.
The vishaal shahari population jaruri an antaheen supply of khaanaa which was a jatil logistical task, including acquiring, transporting, storing or vitaran of food for rome and anya shahari centers.
Italian farms supplied vegetables or fal, lakin machhlee or maance were luxuries.
aqueducts yahood nirmit to bring water to shahari centers and wine or oil were aaayaatit from hispania, gaul or Africa.
vahin thi a bahut large raashi of commerce between the praanton of the roman samrajya, chunki its parivahan technology thi bahut efficient.
The ausat laagat of hastantaran and the praudyogiki were comparable saath 18th-century europea.
the baad nagar of Rome kiya nahin bharan the space bheetar iske pracheen aurelian deevaaren until baad 1870.
assi pratishat of the janasankhyikee under the kshetradhikaar of pracheen rome jiya in the countryside in settlements with kam than 10 thousand inhabitants.
jameendaar generally resided in shaharon or their estates yahood baayein in the care of farm managers.
the durdasha of rural slave thi generally worse than unke counterparts working in urban vaibhavshaalee households.
to stimulate a ucchtar labor utpaadakta sabase jameendaar freed a vishaal kramank of slave or anek praapt mazdooree.
Some record indicate ki `` as anek as 42 logon lived in ek choti farm hat in mishra, jabaki six pariwaron swaamitv a single olive ped. ''.
aise a gramin environment jari to induce migration of population to shahari centers until the jaldi 2nd sadi, when the shahari population stopped growing or prarambh to manaahi.
starting in the middle of the 2nd sadi BC, nijee Greek culture thi increasingly in ascendancy, in spite of tirades against the `` softening '' prabhaav of hellenized samskruti from the roodhiwaadee moralists.
by the samay of augustus, sanskari Greek household slave taught the roman yang ( sometimes bhi the ladakiyon ) ; shef, decorators, secretaries, doctor, and hairdressers—all came from the Greek east.
unani sculptures sushobhit hellenistic landscape bagwani on the palatine or in the vila, or were imitated in roman murtikla yards by unani slave.
the roman cuisine preserved in the cookery kitabe ascribed to apicius is essentially unani.
roman writers disdained latin liye a sanskari unani style.
tabhi in vidhi and shashan was the tirachha nature of rome 's accretive culture supreme.
Against is human prishthbhumi, dono the urban or rural setting, one of itihaas 's most influential sabhyataaon took aakaar, leaving peeche a saanskrithik viraasat ki survives in bhaag aaj.
james joseph `` Duffy '' waldorf, Jr. ( born agast 20, 1962 ) is an American professional manahosthiti.

kaanch utpaadan involves do main methods – the flash kaanch process, jisase produces sheet kaanch, or glassblowing jisase produces botalon or anya containers.
a season is a subdivision of the saal, chihnit by parivartan in mausam, paristhitiki, or ghanton of daylight.
sizan parinaam isse the vaarshik revolution of the dharti around the Sun or the tilt of the dharti 's axis saapeksh to the plane of kranti.
in shitoshna or polar regions, the sizan hai chihnit by changes in the tivrata of dhoop ki pahunch the dharti 's surface, visangatiyaan of jisase may kaaran pashu to go into sheetanishkriyata or to migrate, and paudhe to be dormant.
dauraan may, June and july, the northern hemisphere is ujagar to adhik sidhaa sunlight kuki the golardh chehron the sun.
the same is sachcha of the dakshini golardh in November, disambar and January.
It is the tilt of the dharti ki kalyankari the surya to be ucchtar in the sky dauraan the summer maheene jisase increases the solar flux.
However, due to mausami lag, june, July or August are the hottest maheene in the northern hemisphere or December, janvari or farvari are the hottest months in the dakshini golardh.
in shitoshna and subpolar regions, generally four calendar -aadharand sizan ( saath their adjectives ) are recognized : vasant ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), patjhad ( autumnal ) or sheet ( hibernal ).
however, ecologists zyaadaatar use a chah ritu model liye shitoshna climate regions ki shaamil pre-spring ( prevernal ) and let summer ( serotinal ) as pruthak sizan saath saath the paramparaagat four.
Hot regions have do or teen sizan ; the barsaat ( or geela, or monsoon ) ritu or the shushk ritu, or in kuch tropical kshetron, a kool or mild ritu.
In some bhaag of the world, khaas `` sizan '' hai loosely defined aadhaarit on mahatvapurn kaarykram aise as a hurricane ritu, bavandar season or a dawanal ritu.
The chah ecological seasons
