The Battle of fort Sumter ( april 12–14, 1861 ) was the bombardment and aatmasamarpan of fort sumter, nikat Charleston, dakshin carolina, that prarambh the amareeki civil War.
following ghoshnaaon of secession by saat dakshini rajya, dakshin carolina demanded ki the U.S. fouj laaparvaahee iske facilities in charlston harbar.
on disambar 26, 1860, u.S. pramukh robert anderson surreptitiously sthanantarit uske small cmand from the indefensible fort Moultrie on Sullivan 's dweep to fort Sumter, a substantial fortress controlling the entrance of charlston harbar.
an attempt by u.S. adhyaksh james Buchanan to reinforce or resupply anderson, using the unarmed merchant ship star of the west, failed jab it thi fired upon by shore bydaree on janvari 9, 1861.
dakshin carolina adhikariyon tab jabt sab sangheey property in the Charleston kshetrafal, magar liye Fort sumter.
dauraan the jaldi maheene of 1861, the situation around fort sumter increasingly began to resemble a gheraa.
In March, brigadier. gen. P. G. T. Beauregard, the first general adhikari of the newly formed confederate States of america, thi placed in cmand of confederate shaktiyaan in Charleston.
beauregard energetically nirdeshit the strengthening of batteries around Charleston harbar aimed at fort sumter.
sharten in the fort grew dire as the Union soldiers rushed to puraa the sansthapana of atirikt guns.
anderson was choti of men, food, or aapurtiyan.
the resupply of Fort Sumter became the pehla sankat of the administration of adhyaksh abraham lincoln.
He notified the rajyapal of dakshin Carolina, francis W. pickens, that he thi sending supplai jahaajon, jisase resulted in an ultimatum isse the confederate government : evacuate fort sumter tatkaal.
Major anderson refused to aatmasamarpan.
shuruuaat at 4:30 a.m. on april 12, the confederates bombarded the fort isse topakhane bydaree surrounding the harbar.
haalanki the Union garrison returned fire, ve yahood significantly outgunned or, baad 34 ghanton, Major anderson sahamat to evacuate.
vahin thi no ghaataa of life on either paksh as a sidhaa parinaam of this engagement, haalanki a gun explosion dauraan the aatmasamarpan ceremonies on April 14 caused do sangh deaths.
Following the battle, vahin thi widespread support isse dono uttar or dakshin for further sainya karrwai.
lincoln 's taatkaalik kol for 75,000 swayamsevak to suppress the vidroh resulted in an atirikt chaar southern slave states bhi declaring their secession and joining the confederacy.
The civil yuddh tha begun.
3g, choti for teesraa peedhee, is the teesraa peedhee of mobile doorsanchaar technology.
3g doorsanchaar sanjaal support services ki provide an soochna transafar rate of at least 200 kbit/s.
However, anek sevaayen advertised as 3g provide ucchtar gati than the nunatam takneekee requirements liye a 3g seva.
haal 3g releases, praayah denoted 3.5g or 3.75g, also provide mobile broadband abhigam of several mbit/s to smartphones or mobile modems in laptop computer.
3g finds application in wireless voice telephony, mobile antarjaal access, phixd wireless antarjaal abhigam, video kals and mobile tv.
`` Mazel tov ! '' likhaa on a wine kaanch tag
Traditionally, baad the duulhe brake the glass, the atithi shout `` Mazel tov ! ``.
a janmdiwas kek, iced with the shabd `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov ), as is often kiya in israel.
Here the phrase is likhaa in yahudee karsive.
`` Mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( yahudee / yahudee : `` מזל טוב '', yahudee : `` mazal tov '' ; Yiddish : `` mazel tov '' ; lit.
`` shubh lack '' ) is a phrase used to express badhai for a happy or significant avasar or event.
hepatitis c is an sankramak beemaari affecting primarily the jigar, caused by the hepatitis c virus ( hcv ).
the sankraman is often asymptomatic, lakin dirghakaalik infection can lead to scarring of the jigar or ultimately to cirrhosis, which is generally apparent baad anek saalo.
in kuch cases, those with cirrhosis will go on to develop jigar vifaltaa, jigar karkat or life-threatening esophageal and gastric varices.
hcv is spread primarily by blood-to-blood contact sambhddha with intravenous drug use, poorly sterilized chikitsa upkaran and transfusions.
An anumaanit 130–200 million people vishwavyaapee hai sankramit with.
the astitv of ( originally `` non- a non- b hepatitis '' ) thi postulated in the 1970s or siddh in 1989.
only infects humans or chimpanzees.
the virus persists in the liver in about 85 % of those sankramit.
This persistent sankraman can be treated saath dawa : the maanak chikitsa is a sangyojan of peginterferon or ribavirin, saath either boceprevir or telaprevir added in kuch cases.
Overall, 50–80 % of logon treated are cured.
Those jo develop cirrhosis or jigar cancer may require a liver pratyaropan.
is the leading cause of jigar pratyaropan, haalanki the virus praayah barambar baad pratyaropan.
no tikaa viruddh is uplabdhiyaan.
A flexible spending khaataa ( fsa ), bhi gyaat as a lacheelee bitaa vyavastha, is ek of a kramank of tax-advantaged vittiya khate ki can be set up through a cafeteria yojana of an niyokta in the sanyukt rajya.
an fsa allows an employee to niyat aside a portion of aay to adaa liye qualified kharch as sthapit in the cafeteria yojana, sabase commonly liye chikitsa expenses lakin praayah liye dependent care or anya kharch.
Money deducted from an employee 's adaa into an fsa is nahin subject to payroll kar, resulting in substantial payroll tax bachat.
One significant disadvantage to using an fsa is that funds nahin prayukt by the samaapt of the plan saal hai khoyaa to the karmchaaree, known as the `` upyog it or lose it '' niyam.
the sabase common type of lacheelee spending khaataa, the chikitsa expense fsa ( also chikitsa fsa or health FSA ), is samaan to a swasthya bachat account ( hsa ) or a swasthya reimbursement khaataa ( HRA ).
however, while hsas or hras are almost exclusively prayukt as components of a upabhokta driven swasthya parvaah yojana, medical FSAs are commonly offered saath adhik traditional swasthya yojanaayen as khub.
In jod, nidhi in a health savings khaataa hai nahin khoyaa jab the yojana year is over, naapsand nidhi in an fsa.
paper form or an fsa debit card, bhi gyaat as a Flexcard, may be prayukt to access the khaataa funds.
tennesi ( ) ( ) is a U.S. rajya stith in the southeastern United States.
tennesi is the 36th sabase extensive or the 17th most populous of the 50 sanyukt rajya.
Tennessee is bordered by Kentucky or virginia to the uttar, uttar carolina to the east, georgia, albama, or mississippi to the dakshin, or arkansaas or mizori to the west.
The Appalachian kyu dominate the eastern bhaag of the rajya, or the mississippi nadi form the state 's western kinaaraa.
tennesi 's puunji or second largest nagar is naishaville, jisase rai a janasankhyikee of 609,644.
memphis is the state 's largest nagar, with a population of 652,050.
the rajya of tennesi is rooted in the watauga Association, a 1772 frontier pact generally regarded as the first sanvaidhanik sarkari west of the Appalachians.
kayaa is abhi tennesi thi initially part of uttar carolina, or later part of the dakshinpaschim territory.
Tennessee thi admitted to the sangh as the 16th rajya on june 1, 1796.
Tennessee thi the pichhlaa state to chhod the sangh or join the Confederacy at the outbreak of the U.S. civil yuddh in 1861, and the first rajya to be readmitted to the Union at the samaapt of the yuddh.
tennesi furnished more sainiko liye the confederate fouj than any anya rajya, and more sainiko liye the sangh fouj than koi other dakshini rajya.
in the 20th sadi, tennesi transitioned isse an krushik arthvyavastha to a more diversified arthvyavastha, aided at times by sangheey entities aise as the tennesi Valley praadhikaar.
In the jaldi 1940s, the nagar of ok lakeeren thi sthapit to house the manahaton Project 's uranium sanvardhan suvidhaayen, helping to nirmaan the sansar 's pehla atomic bomb.
tennesi rai played a critical role in the vikaas of many form of American lokapriy music, sahit chattan or phenken, blues, desh, or rockabilly.
beale gali in memphis is mana by anek to be the janmasthan of the blues, saath musicians aise as w.c. sulabh performing in its club as jaldi as 1909.
Memphis thi also ghar to surya record, where sangeetkaaron aise as Elvis presli, ishaq hez, johny nakadi, karl perkins, Jerry lee louis, Roy orbison, or charlie samrudh began unke recording kariyar, or jahaan chattan and roll took aakaar in the 1950s.
the 1927 victor recording satr in bristol generally mark the beginning of the country music vidha or the rise of the Grand Ole Opry in the 1930s helped mek naishaville the bich of the desh music recording udyog.
teen inten or gaara sangrahalay recognize tennesi 's bhoomika in nurturing vibhinn form of lokapriy music : the memphis Rock n ' Soul sangrahalay, the desh music haul of kirti and sangrahalay in naishaville, or the International rock-a-billy sangrahalay in jackson.
in jod, the rockabilly haul of kirti, an online sait recognizing the vikaas of rockabilly in which Tennessee played a crucial role, is based in naishaville.
Tennessee 's pramukh udyog shaamil krishi, nirmaan, or paryaton.
murgipaalan, soybeans, or choupayon are the rajya 's primary agricultural utpaada, or pramukh nirmaan niryaat shaamil chemicals, parivahan upkaran, and vidyut equipment.
The great Smoky Mountains National park, the nation 's most visited national park, is headquartered in the purvi bhaag of the rajya, or a khand of the Appalachian trail roughly folo the tennessee-north Carolina kinaaraa.
Other major paryatak aakarshan shaamil the Tennessee equarium in chattanuga, the sunsphere in knoxville, dollywood in kabutar forge, the parthenon, the Country music Hall of kirti and sangrahalay, and ryman Auditorium in Nashville, or elvis Presley 's graceland nivas or makbara in memphis.
ek dizine roopaantar of a murga ring.
A cock ring is a ring that can be lagaai around a man 's shishn, usually at the base, primarily to slow the pravaah of rakt from the erect penile tissue, yun maintaining an erection liye a much longer kaal of samay.
Cock rings can be worn around bas the shishn or both the shishn or scrotum, or bas the scrotum alon, though is is praayah pukaara a testicle kaph.
bajati can be bana of a variety of alag materials, sabase commonly leather, rubber, or silicone, though nylon or metal hai bhi prayukt either as the pramukh ghatak or bhaag of the closure.
the term cock ring is sometimes prayukt as a paryaay for a prince albert piercing, a piercing of the shishn ki is praayah, haalanki nahin always, a metal ring.
jab prayukt in maamle of erectile dysfunction they hai gyaat by vibhinn names aise as `` stambhan ring '' or `` tension ring ''.
The headquarters of pramukh League besabaal at 245 park avenue, midtown manahaton, nai York nagar, USA.
Major lig besabaal ( emelbi ) is a peshewar besabaal lig, consisting of teams ki khel in the neshnal lig and the amareeki League.
dating to 1876 and 1901 kramshah, the two leagues merged in 2000 into a single sanghathan led by the Commissioner of besabaal, after 100 saalo as pruthak vidhik entities.
MLB constitutes one of the pramukh peshewar khel leagues of the sanyukt rajya or Canada.
It is rachit of 30 tiimon — 29 in the United rajya or one in canada.
Teams in emelbi khel 162 khel prayek ritu over six maheene ( april through September ).
Five teams in each lig agrim to a four-round postseason tournament ki culminates in the World Series, a best-of-seven-games championships shrenee between the do lig champions jisase dates to 1903.
the sanghathan oversees anek minor-league besabaal leagues jisase operate parichay 240 teams sambhddha saath the major-league club.
saath the antarrashtriya besabaal sangh, the league bhi manages the international sansar besabaal clasik tournament.
emelbi has the highest season attendance of koi khel lig in the sansar with nearly 75 million spectators in 2012.
Delaware ( ) is a U.S. rajya stith on the Atlantic Coast in the mid-atlantic region of the sanyukt rajya.
it is bordered to the dakshin or west by maryland, to the purvottar by nai jersey, or to the uttar by pencilvenia.
the rajya takes iske naam from thomas west, 3rd samant de la Warr, an English nobleman or virginia 's pehla colonial governor, baad jisko kayaa is abhi pukaara kep Henlopen was originally namit.
delaware is located in the northeastern portion of the delmarva prayadweep or is the duusari smallest, the chathe tanik populous, lakin the chathe sabase densely populated of the pachaas United rajya.
delaware is divided into three county.
From uttar to dakshin, ye teen county hai New kila, kent, or sasex.
jabaki the dakshini do counties have historically maharoom predominantly agricultural, New kila County has maharoom more industrialized.
Before its tatarekha thi explored by europeans in the 16th sadi, Delaware thi inhabited by anek groups of deshi Americans, including the lenape in the uttar or nanticoke in the south.
It was initially colonized by dach vyapaariyon at zwaanendael, stith nikat the upasthit town of lewes, in 1631.
delaware thi one of the 13 colonies participating in the amareeki kranti or on disambar 7, 1787, became the pehla state to ratify the samvidhan of the sanyukt States, thereby becoming known as The pehla State.
urja Transformation in Energy pranaaliyon Language
urja parivartan or energy conversion is the prakram of badalanaa ek rup of urja to another.
in physics, the pad energy describes the kshamta to upaj nishchit parivartan bheetar a pranali, without lihaaz to simaaen in parivartan imposed by entropy.
parivartan in total energy of pranaaliyon can tabhi be sampannataa by adding or subtracting urja from them, as urja is a maatra jisase is conserved, according to the pehla law of ooshmaagatiki.
according to special relativity, parivartan in the urja of pranaaliyon hoga bhi coincide with parivartan in the pranali 's mass, or the total raashi of mass of a pranali is a maap of iske urja.
Energy in a pranali may be roopantarit so ki it resides in a alag state, or a alag prakaar of urja.
urja in many rajya may be used to do many kismein of shaareerik kaary.
urja may be used in prakritik processes or machines, or else to provide some seva to samaaj ( aise as ooshmaa, lite, or motion ).
liye udhaaharan, an aatanrik dahan ingine converts the sambhavit chemical energy in gasoline or oxygen into ooshmaa, jisase is then transformed into the propulsive urja ( gatij urja that chaalen a gadee ).
A saura koshika converts saura radiation into vidyut urja ki can then be prayukt to lite a balb or shakti a computer.
the generik naam liye a yantra which converts urja from ek rup to another, is a transdusar.
in saamaanya, sabase types of urja, sahejen for thermal energy, may be converted efficiently to koi anya dayaalu of urja.
sometimes this occurs saath an dakshata of essentially 100 %, aise as when sambhavit urja is converted to kinetic urja as an object falls in vaikum, or when it orbits nearer or dur isse another object, in spes.
parivartan of other types of energies to ooshmaa may bhi occurs saath nearly perfect dakshata ( many prakaar of gharshan do this ).
Exceptions liye purna parivartan dakshata ( bhi liye pruthak systems ) occur when urja rai already maharoom partly vitarit among anek uplabdhiyaan quantum rajya for a sangrahan of anu, which hai freely allowed to explore koi state of momentum or sthiti ( phase space ).
in such circumstances, a maap pukaara entropy, or evening-out of energy vitaran in such rajya, dictates ki bhavishya rajya of the pranali jarur be of at least equal evenness in urja distribution.
( vahin is no rasta, lene the brahmad as a puure, to collect urja into fewer states, once it rai sprad to unhen ).
a consequence of is requirement is ki vahin hai simaaen to the dakshata saath jisase thermal urja can be parivartit to anya kinds of urja, chunki thermal urja in santulan at a given temperature already represents the maximal evening-out of energy between sab sambhavit rajya.
aise urja is sometimes considered `` degraded urja, '' kuki it is nahin entirely usable.
the duusari vidhi of ooshmaagatiki is a rasta of stating ki, liye is kaaran, thermal urja in a pranali may be parivartit to anya kinds of energy saath efficiencies approaching 100 %, only if the entropy ( even-ness or vikaar ) of the universe is increased by other arthath, to compensate liye the ghati in entropy sambhddha saath the disappearance of the thermal urja or iske entropy content.
Otherwise, tabhi a bhaag of thermal urja may be converted to anya kinds of urja ( or yun, upyogi kaary ), chunki the shesh of the ooshmaa must be surakshit to be transferred to a thermal reservoir at a nimnatar taapmaana, in aise a rasta ki the badhayen in entropy liye this prakram adhik than compensates liye the entropy ghati sambhddha saath parivartan of the baaki of the ooshmaa into other prakaar of urja.
the National Hockey lig ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' jisase operates a pramukh peshewar barf hockey league of 30 franchised member club, of jisase seven are currently stith in canada or 23 in the United rajya.
headquartered in nai york City, the NHL is widely considered to be the premier peshewar barf hockey lig in the world, or one of the major professional sports lig in the sanyukt rajya and Canada.
the stanley cap, the oldest peshewar khel trophy in uttar America, is awarded annually to the lig playoff champion at the samaapt of prayek season.
The lig thi vyavasthit on navambar 26, 1917, in Montreal, quebec, canada, baad the barkhaastagi of parichaalan of iske predecessor sanghathan, the National Hockey sangh ( nah ), jisase tha been santhaapit in 1909.
It started with chaar teams and, through a series of expansions, contractions, or relocations, the league is abhi rachit of 30 active franchises.
the nation to jisase the naam of the lig originally referred thi Canada, haalanki the lig rai now maharoom binational chunki 1924 when it vistaarit into the sanyukt States.
baad a labour dispute that led to the raddikaran of the sampurna 2004–05 ritu, the lig resumed khel under a nai samuhik bargaining agreement that included a salary cap.
in 2009, the NHL enjoyed ricard highs in terms of sponsorships, upasthiti, and television audiences.
The enechael draws anek atyadhik skilled khilaadi from all over the sansar or philhal rai players from about 20 different deshon.
haalanki canadians have historically gathit the bahumat of the players in the enechael, over the past four plus decades the percentages of US and europea players have increased dono kuki of the enechael 's jari vistaar isse chah to thirty clubs chunki 1967, or the increased availability of atyadhik skilled europea khilaadi.
This is the complete suchi of the ratified or unratified amendments to the United rajya Constitution which praapt the approval of the United rajya congress.
twenty-seven amendments have maharoom ratified chunki the original hastakshar of the samvidhan, the first ten of jisase hai known collectively as the Bill of adhikaron.
the kaarividhi liye amending the sanyukt rajya Constitution is governed by aalekh v of the original text.
vahin have maharoom anek anya prastaav liye amendments to the United rajya samvidhan introduced in Congress, lakin nahin submitted to the states.
Before an amendment can take prabhaav, it must be prastaavit to the rajya by a two-thirds vote of both gharon of congress or by a sammelan ( known as an aalekh V sammelan ) pukaara by two-thirds of the states, or ratified by three-fourths of the states or by three-fourths of prathaon thereof, the vidhi of anusamarthan hone sankalpit by congress at the samay of prastaav.
to tithi, no sammelan liye proposing amendments rai maharoom called by the states, or tabhi once—in 1933 liye the anusamarthan of the twenty-first amendment —has the convention method of anusamarthan maharoom employed.
fmr LLC ( vafadaari Management or shodh ) or vafadaari nivesh is an amareeki bahurashtriya vittiya sevaayen corporation.
It is one of the largest mutual nidhi or vittiya sevaayen groups in the world.
it thi santhaapit in 1946 or serves uttar amareeki niveshkon.
Fidelity ventures is its venture puunji bhujaa.
vafadaari antarrashtriya Limited ( feel ), thi an antarrashtriya sambhddha santhaapit in 1969, sevarat most deshon in the baaki of the world.
in September 2011, feel was rebranded as 'Fidelity vishwavyaapee Investment '.
vafadaari Investments manages a vishaal parivaar of paraspar funds, provides fund vitaran and nivesh salaah sevaayen, as well as providing discount brokerage services, retirement sevaayen, wealth prabandhan, pratibhuti nishpaadan or clearence, jivan bime and a number of anya sevaayen.

Sociology is the vaigyanik padhai of human samaaj or iske origins, vikaas, organizations, or institutions.
It is a soshal science jisase uses vibhinn methods of empirical investigation and critical vishleshan to develop a deh of gyaan about insaan soshal kaaryaklap, structures, and krityon.
a lakshya for anek sociologists is to conduct research jisase may be lagu directly to soshal niti and welfare, jabaki anya fokas primarily on shodhan the saidhantik samajhnaa of soshal prakriyaaon.
vishay padaarth ranges isse the micro level of vyaktigat agency or baatcheet to the macro str of pranaaliyon or the soshal dhaancha.
the paramparaagat focuses of samajashaastra shaamil soshal starikaran, social class, samskruti, res or ethnicity, ling or kaamuktha, social gatishiltaa, religion, secularization, vidhi, and deviance.
as sab spheres of human kaaryaklap hai affected by the interplay between social dhaancha and vyaktigat agency, samajashaastra rai gradually expanded iske fokas to further vishay, such as swasthya, chikitsa, sainya or penal institutions, the antarjaal, paryaavarniya samajashaastra, political arthvyavastha or the bhoomika of soshal kaaryaklap in the vikaas of vaigyanik gyaan.
the dayera of soshal vaigyanik vidhi rai bhi vistaarit.
Social researchers chithran upon a variety of gunatmak and quantitative takneekon.
the bhashaai and cultural turns of the mid-twentieth sadi led to increasingly interpretative, hermeneutic, or philosophic approaches to the analysis of society.
conversely, haal dashakon have dekhi the vruddhi of nai analytically, mathematically or computationally kathor takneekon, aise as agent-based modelling or soshal sanjaal analysis.
samajashaastra chahie not be confused saath various general soshal adhyayan courses which bhaaluu little relation to sociological siddhanth or social vigyaan research methodology.
thunder is the dhwani caused by lightning.
Depending on the nature of the lightning or alahada of the shrota, thunder can dayera isse a sharp, laud crack to a long, kam rumble ( brontide ).
the achaanak badhayen in dabaav or temperature isse bijli produces rapid vistaar of the air surrounding or within a bolt of bijli.
In phere, is vistaar of air creates a sonic shock wave, similar to a sonic boom, jisase produces the dhwani of thunder, praayah referred to as a clap, crack, or peal of thunder.
the alahada of the lightning can be gananaa by the shrota aadhaarit on the samay interval from jab the bijli is dekhi to jab the sound is heard.
paalama (,, ), in puraa Palma de mallorca, is the pramukh city and bandargahon on the dweep of majorca ( mallorca ) and puunji nagar of the autonomous jatiyaan of the balearic Islands in Spain.
the names ciutat de mallorca ( City of majorca ) and ciutat ( nagar ) yahood prayukt pehle the yuddh of the spani uttaradhikaar and hai still prayukt by logon in majorca.
however, the official naam thi mallorca, the same as the island.
It is situated on the dakshin coast of the dweep on the khadi of Palma.
as of the 2009 janasankhyikee, the janasankhyikee of the nagar of paalama proper was 401,270, or the janasankhyikee of the sampurna shahari kshetrafal thi 517,285, ranking as the twelfth largest shahari kshetrafal of spain.
Almost half of the kul population of majorca live in paalama.
the cabrera Archipelago, though widely alag isse Palma uchit, is administratively mana bhaag of the nagarpalika.
iske vimaanashetra, Son sant jone, serves over 22 million yatri each saal.
the marivent Palace was offered by the nagar to the tab prince juaan carlos i of spain.
the royals have chunki spent unke garmiyaan holidays in paalama.
luthor redirects here.
liye anya upyog, dekhie Luther ( disambiguation ).
Alexander joseph `` lekes '' Luthor is a fictional akshar, a supervillain appearing in comic books published by DC comics.
luthor is the archenemy of superman, and as a high-status supervillain, has bhi aaiye into virodh with Batman or other superheroes in the dc Universe.
nirmit by jeri siegel or jo shuster, the akshar first appeared in karrwai Comics # 23 ( april 1940 ).
luthor is varnit as `` a power-mad, evil vaigyanik '' of high pragna or avishwasaneey technological prowess.
luthor 's goals typically bich on hatya superman, the foremost obstacle to achieving the villen 's megalomaniacal lakshya.
despite periodically wearing a sanchalit bahi, luthor has traditionally lacked superpowers or a dual pahchaan.
the akshar thi originally chitrit as a mad vaigyanik jo, in the rag of guda novels, wreaks kahar on the sansar saath uske atyaadhunik weaponry.
in his earliest dikhaave, luthor is dikhaaya saath a puraa head of red hair.
Despite is, the akshar baad became hairless as the parinaam of an artist 's galati.
a 1960 story by Jerry siegel expanded upon luthor 's utpatti or motivations, revealing use to be a balykaal dost of superman 's jo khoyaa his bal jab a aag nasht uske prayogshaala ; luthor vowed badla.
following the 1985 limited series Crisis on anant Earths, the character thi re-imagined as a machiavellian udyogpati or white-collar dand, even briefly serving as adhyaksh of the sanyukt States.
in haal saalo, various writers have revived luthor 's mad scientist persona from the 1940s.
The character was ranked as the 8th mahanatam Villain by jaadugar on iske 100 mahanatam khalanaayak of sab samay list.
IGN 's suchi of the sheersh 100 comic kitaab khalanaayak of sab samay kramit luthor as # 4.
luthor is bhi described as a `` megavillain '' by comic kitaab aalochak peter sanderson, one of a few genre-crossing khalanaayak whose adventures take place `` in a sansar in jisase the ordinary laws of nature hai thodaa nilambit '' ; varna such as praadhyaapak moriarty, ginati Dracula, Hannibal Lecter, doctor Doom, and darth vader, also fit is description.
martin luther king, jr. din is a sanyukt rajya federal avkaash ankan the birthday of rev. dr. Martin luther King, jr.
it is observed on the teesraa somvaar of janvari prayek year, jisase is around the samay of King 's janmdiwas, janvari 15.
The floating holiday is samaan to chhuttiyaan niyat antargat the vardi Monday Holiday Act, haalanki the adhinium predated the establishment of martin Luther king, jr. din by 15 saalo.
King thi the mukhya spokesman liye nonviolent activism in the civil rights gati, jisase safaltaapurvak protested racial pakshpaat in sangheey or rajya vidhi.
The campaign for a sangheey avkaash in king 's honor began soon baad uske hatya in 1968.
Ronald reagan hastakshrit the avkaash into vidhi in 1983, or it thi first observed on January 20, 1986.
At pehla, some rajya resisted observing the avkaash as such, giving it alternative names or combining it with anya chhuttiyaan.
it thi officially observed in sab 50 rajya liye the pehla samay in 2000.
the camera phone solution allows instant sharing of tasviren.
As it 's automatic and tatkaal, the upayokta karata not have to upyog a cabel or removable media to conect to a nijee computer.
a camera phone is a mobile phone which is able to capture still chayachitr ( or praayah video ).
chunki jaldi in the 21st sadi the bahumat of mobile phones in upyog hai camera phone.
Most camera phone hai simpler than pruthak digital cameras.
unke usual fixed fokas lenses or choti sensor limit their pradarshan in garib lighting.
lacking a shaareerik shater, most have a long shater lag.
flash, jahaan upasthit, is praayah kamjor.
optical zoom and tipai screws hai rare.
kuch bhi kami a USB conection, removable memory card, or anya rasta of transferring their tasviren adhik jaldi than by the phone 's antarnihit communication visheshta.
Some of the adhik expensive camera phone have only a few of ye takneekee disadvantages, jisase apply sabase acutely in low lite sharten or in koi maamla have nahin inhibited unke faili upyog.
sabase model lines improve in these regards prayek year or two.
kuch, such as the droid Incredible tabhi have a menu chunaav to prarambh an application program to activate the camera.
Others, aise as the BlackBerry toofaan 2, Droid x, Motorola v980 or nokia 5800 bhi have a pruthak camera batan liye quickness or convenience.
khidkiyaan phone can be configured to operate as a camera bhi if the phone is asleep.
kuch camera phone hai designed to resemble pruthak low-end digital compact camere in rup and to some extent in features or picture quality, or hai branded as dono mobile phone or cameras, sahit nishchit soni phone.
the principal laabh of camera phone hai laagat or compactness ; beshak liye a upayokta jo carries a mobile phone vaise, the atirikt aakaar or laagat hai negligible.
Smartphones ki hai camera phone may run mobile anuprayog to add samarthy such as geotagging and chitra stitching.
a few high end phones can use their tach screen to direct their camera to focus on a particular object in the field of view, giving bhi an anubhavheen user a oopaadhi of fokas control exceeded tabhi by seasoned photographer using hastchalit fokas.
`` Whatever happened to the Man of kal ? '' is a 1986 comic kitaab story featuring the dc comics akshar of Superman.
Written by alan moore saath sahaayta from long-time, and soon to be retiring, superman editor, Julius schwartz, the story thi prakashit in do parts, beginning in superman # 423 or samaapti in karrwai comics # 583, dono prakashit in sitambar 1986.
the story was drawn by long-time artist ruukhaa Swan, in uske final pramukh contribution to the Superman titles, or thi inked by George pérez in the samasya of superman and Kurt schaffenberger in the issue of karrwai comics.
the story thi an kaalpanik tale jisase bataai the final story of the chaandi Age Superman and uske long itihaas, which thi hone rebooted following the kaarykram of sankat on anant earths, pehle uske aadhunik introduction in the jon Byrne shrenee, the man of steel.
Moore chaahi his plat to sammaan the long itihaas of the character or to serve as a complete nishkarsh to his mythology.
The story is a frame story niyat ten saalo baad Superman was last dekhi, where Lois len recounts the tail of the end of Superman 's career to a reporter isse the Daily grah.
uske story shaamil numerous hinsak attacks against Superman by uske dushmano, the public rahasyodghatan of uske rahasy pahchaan of Clark kent or a kramank of deaths of those closest to use.
The story rai maharoom cited as ek of the behtareen kahaniyaan of the akshar of Superman, and aalochakon or audiyans aksar choose it as one of the sabase memorable comics ever prakashit.
It is prayukt as an udhaaharan of how to close the long-time nirantarata of a comic book character.
the story 's legacy rai endured saath samaan kahaniyaan likhaa as shradhanjali to it.
the sheershak is a sandarbh to ek of the nicknames of Superman as the man of kal, and thi prayukt in the sheershak of another Superman.
the Bugatti veyron eb 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car, designed or viksit by the Volkswagen samooh or manufactured in molsheim, frans by Bugatti automobile S.A.S.
the super khel sanskaran of the veyron is the tivratam street-legal utpaadan car in the sansar, saath a top gati of.
the asli version rai a sheersh gati of.
it was named car of the Decade ( 2000–2009 ) by the bibisi television programme Top gear.
the maanak Veyron jiti Top gears behtareen Car chalit sab saal puraskaar in 2005.

a kramank of special variants have maharoom produced.

The sanstha of the eucharist has maharoom a key theme in the depictions of the Last bhojan in isai art, as in is 16th-century juaan de juanes painting.
`` At the pichhlaa bhojan, on the raatri he was gaddari, hamaari rakshak instituted the Eucharistic balidaan of uske deh or rakt. ''
( Catechism of the Catholic girijaghar 1323 )
eucharist in the catholic Church refers to dono the jashn of the dravyaman, ki is, the Eucharist liturgy, or the bread or wine which baad the pratishthapana are transubstantiated ( badla in substance ) into the body or rakt of yishu messiah, rab and parameshwar, a ghoshnaa pratipaadit by the Council of Trent saath an anathema viruddh anyone jo asweekrut is.
Blessed sacrament is a devotional pad prayukt in the roman catholic Church to refer to the eucharistic prajati ( the deh or rakt of messiah ).

A choti story is a brief kaary of sahitya, praayah likhaa in katha gadhy.
ubharate isse earlier maukhik storytelling paramparaon in the 17th sadi, the choti story rai grown to encompass a deh of work so diverse as to defy aasaan characterization.
at iske most prototypical the choti story suvidhaayen a choti daal of namit varna, and focuses on a self-contained ghatana with the intent of evoking a `` single effect '' or manodasha.
in so doing, choti stories make upyog of plat, resonance, or other dynamic components to a far greater oopaadhi than is theth of an kissa, yet to a far lesser degree than a anokhaa.
jabaki the choti story is largely pruthak isse the anokhaa, authors of dono generally chithran isse a aam pool of saahitiyik takneekon.
choti stories have no niyat length.
in terms of word ginati vahin is no aadhikarik demarcation between an anecdote, a short story, and a anokhaa.
balki, the rup 's paramiters hai die by the rhetorical and vyaavhaarik context in jisase a die story is utpaadit or mana, so ki what constitutes a choti story may differ between genres, deshon, eras, and tikaakaron.
Like the novel, the short story 's predominant shape reflects the maange of the uplabdhiyaan markets liye prakaashan, or the evolution of the rup seems closely tied to the evolution of the prakaashan udyog or the sabamishan dishanirdesh of iske constituent gharon.
The short story has maharoom mana dono an apprenticeship form preceding more lengthy works, or a crafted rup in iske apana right, ekatrit saath in kitabe of samaan lambaai, price, or vitaran as novels.
choti story writers may define unke works as bhaag of the kalakaari or nijee abhivyakti of the rup.
They may bhi attempt to resist categorization by vidha and phixd rup.

kshetrafal code 810 is the telephone kshetrafal code serving purvi michigan.
the raccoon (, Procyon lotor ), sometimes spelled racoon, also known as the aam raccoon, uttar American raccoon, northern raccoon or colloquially as kun, is a medium-sized standhari native to uttar america.
the raccoon is the largest of the procyonid parivaar, having a body lambaai of or a body vazan of.
iske grayish kot zyaadaatar consists of ghanaa underfur jisase insulates viruddh cold weather.
Two of the raccoon 's sabase distinctive suvidhaayen hai iske atyadhik dexterous front panje or iske facial mukhauta, which hai vishaywastu in the mythology of anek Native American janajatiyon.
Raccoons are noted liye unke pragna, saath adhyayan prardashit ki they hai samarth to yaad the samaadhaan to kaary liye up to teen saalo.
the diet of the omnivorous raccoon, jisase is praayah nocturnal, consists of parichay 40 % invertebrates, 33 % plant bhojan, or 27 % vertebrates.
the asli habitats of the raccoon hai patjhadi or mixed wanon, lakin due to their adaptability ve have vistaarit their dayera to mountainous kshetron, tateey marshes, or shahari kshetron, jahaan some homeowners consider unhen to be pidakon.
as a result of escapes or deliberate introductions in the mid-20th century, raccoons hai abhi also vitarit across the European menland, the Caucasus pradesh or japani.
haalanki previously thought to be solitary, vahin is abhi evidence ki raccoons engage in gender-specific soshal bartaav.
sambandhit females praayah share a common kshetrafal, while unrelated males sajiv together in samooh of up to chaar pashu to maintain unke positions viruddh videshi males dauraan the mating season, and other sambhavit akramanakariyon.
ghar range sizes vary anywhere isse 3 hectare ( 7 acre ) liye females in shaharon to 50 km2 ( 20 sq mi ) liye males in prairies.
After a gestation period of parichay 65 dinon, do to paanch yang, known as `` kits '', hai born in vasant.
the kits hai subsequently raised by unke mother jabatak dispersion in let patan.
haalanki captive raccoons have maharoom known to sajiv over 20 saalo, their ausat jivan expectancy in the junglee is tabhi 1.8 to 3.1 saalo.
in many kshetron, shikaar and vehicular chot are the do most common kalyankari of maut.
The 2010 haiti earthquake thi a catastrophic pariman 7.0 Mw bukamp, with an uparicendre nikat the kasbaa of léogâne ( ouest Department ), lagbhag west of port-au-prince, haiti 's puunji.
the bukamp occurred at 16:53 local samay ( 21:53 utc ) on Tuesday, 12 janvari 2010.
By 24 January, at least 52 aftershocks measuring 4.5 or greater tha been ankit.
an estimated teen lakh logon yahood prabhavit by the bukamp.
the highest vishwasaneey death ginati thi anumaanit at 220,000.
haitian sarkari estimates yahood ucchtar.
the government of haiti anumaanit ki 250,000 nivas or 30,000 vanijyik imaaraten tha collapsed or were severely damaged.
the earthquake caused major kshati in Port-au-Prince, jacmel or anya settlements in the pradesh.
anek notable landmark imaaraten yahood significantly damaged or nasht, sahit the adhyakshiya rajmahal, the National Assembly bhawan, the port-au-prince girjaghar, and the pramukh karawas.
among those killed were archbishop of Port-au-Prince Joseph Serge miot, or vipaksh netaa micha gaillard.
The mukhyalay of the sanyukt raashtra Stabilization mishan in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ), located in the capital, collapsed, killing anek, sahit the mishan 's mukhya, Hédi annabi.
anek deshon responded to appeals liye humanitarian sahaayta, pledging nidhi and dispatching bachaav or chikitsa teams, ejiniers and support karmiyon.
sanchaar pranaaliyon, air, jameen, or sea transport suvidhaayen, aspataal, or vidyut sanjaal tha maharoom kshatigrast by the bukamp, jisase hampered bachaav or sahaayta efforts ; bhram over jo thi in charge, air trekkic congestion, or samasyaayein saath prioritisation of flite further jatil jaldi relief kaary.
port-au-prince 's morgues yahood overwhelmed saath tens of hazaron of laashen.
ye tha to be dafn in dravyaman qabron.
as rescues tailed band, aapurtiyan, chikitsa parvaah and swatchta became priorities.
deree in sahaayta vitaran led to engri appeals isse sahaayta majdoor and survivors, or luutane or viral hinsa yahood observed.
on 22 janvari the United raashtra vikhyath that the apaat phase of the raahat operation was aarekhan to a band, or on the following din the haitian sarkari officially pukaara band the dhundhen for survivors.
Mister Ed is a fictional talking ghoda, originally appearing in choti kahaniyaan by walter R. Brooks, and baad in an amareeki television halaat comedy utpaadit by filmways ki pehla aired in anuprayog isse janvari 5 to July 2, 1961, or tab on sibies isse aktubar 1, 1961 to farvari 6, 1966.
the sitaron of the dikhaaen yahood mistar ed, a palomino horse who could `` talk '', nibhaai by gelding baansuri Harvester or voiced by purv Western star Allan Lane ( who went uncredited liye the sampurna lambaai of the shrenee ), or his owner, an eccentric or enormously klutzy, yet friendly, vaastu named Wilbur post ( Alan yang ).
Much of the kaarykram 's humar stemmed isse the fact mistar Ed hota speak only to wilbur, as well as ed 's notoriety as a troublemaker.
anya running chutkule centered on wilbur 's akshar hone a vishaal klutz or inadvertently causing nuqasaan to himself or anya.
according to the dikhaaen 's producer, arthur lubin, yang was chosen as the sise character kuki he `` just laga jaise the sort of guy a horse hota talk to ''.
lubin, a friend of mae west, scored a takhtapalat by persuading the screen pratik to atithi star in ek apisod.
In the sanyukt States, reruns aired on Nick at nite isse kooch 3, 1986, to farvari 1, 1993.
sistar stesan TV jameen bhi reran the dikhaaen isse 1996–98 and again isse 2003-06.
The shrenee is philhal broadcast prayek morning on This tv, saath saath rajmarg patrol, or The pati duk dikhaaen.
it is also philhal broadcast on hallmark film channel.
as of janvari 1, 2011, the pehla do seasons of the show hai uplabdhiyaan on hulu.
the Rapture is a pad in isai eschatology jisase refers to the `` hone caught up '' discussed in 1 thessalonians 4:17, when the `` murde in messiah '' or `` we jo are alive or remain '' hoga be `` caught up in the badal '' to meet `` the rab in the air ''.
the pad `` rapture '' is used in at least do senses.
in the pre-tribulation drishy, a samooh of people hoga be left peeche on dharti baad another samooh vastutah leaves `` to milen the rab in the air. ''
This is abhi the sabase aam use of the pad, visheshkar among fundamentalist isaayiyon and in the sanyukt rajya.
the anya, puraani upyog of the pad `` Rapture '' is simply as a paryaay liye the final qayamat generally, without a belief that a samooh of logon is baayein behind on dharti liye an extended tribulation period baad the kaarykram of 1 thessalonians 4:17.
This bhed is mahatvapurn as kuch prakaar of Christianity never refer to `` the rapture '' in dharmik education, lakin might upyog the puraani or more saamaanya bhav of the shabd `` rapture '' in referring to what happens dauraan the final qayamat.
vahin are anek drishy among isaayiyon regarding the samay of Christ 's vaapasi ( including whether it hoga occur in ek event or do ), or vibhinn drishy regarding the destination of the aerial mehafil varnit in 1 thessalonians 4.
denominations aise as roman catholics, paramparaagat Christians, lutheran Christians, and Reformed isaayiyon maananaa in a rapture tabhi in the sense of a general final qayamat, jab Christ returns a single time.
They do nahin maananaa ki a group of logon is left behind on earth for an vistaarit tribulation kaal baad the kaarykram of 1 Thessalonians 4:17.
Pre-tribulation rapture dharamshastra thi developed in the 1830s by jon nelson Darby or the plymouth brethren, or popularized in the sanyukt rajya in the jaldi 20th sadi by the chaudee parisancharan of the scofield sandarbh Bible.
kris nathan Humphries ( born farvari 6, 1985 ) is an American professional basket player saath the Brooklyn net.
the philistine shaharon of gaja, Ashdod, ashkelon, Ekron, or Gath
The Philistines (,,, or ;, plištim ), Pleshet or Peleset, yahood a logon jo as part of the samudr peoples appeared in the southern coastal area of Canaan at the beginning of the Iron aayu ( circa 1175 bc ), sabase probably isse the igian region.
According to the bible, they shasit the paanch city-states ( the `` philistine pentapolis '' ) of gaja, ashkelon, ashdod, ekron and Gath, isse Wadi gaja in the south to the yarqon nadi in the uttar, lakin saath no phixd kinaaraa to the east.
the bible paints unhen as the Kingdom of israel 's sabase dangerous dushman.
Originating kahi in the igian, their janasankhyikee thi around 25,000 in the 12th sadi bc, rising to a peak of 30,000 in the 11th century BC, of jisase the igian element thi nahin adhik than half the total, or shaayad much less.
nothing is gyaat for nishchit parichay the asli bhashaa or languages of the philistines, however they yahood nahin bhaag of the samiti canaanite population.
vahin is kuch simit pramaan in favour of the assumption ki the philistines were Indo-European-speakers either isse unaniyon and/or Luwian adhyakshon isse the coast of asia Minor.
philistine-related shabd mila in the bible are not samiti, or can in kuch maamle, with reserveshan, be traced waapas to proto-indo-european jaden.
by the beginning of the 1st milinium BCE ve tha apanaaya the general canaanite bhashaa of the pradesh.
the hathiyaarband sevaayen vokational yogyata bydaree ( ASVAB ) is a anek chunaav pareekshan, administered by the sanyukt States sainya pravesh Processing cmand, used to determine qualification liye enlistment in the sanyukt States armed shaktiyaan.
it is praayah offered to American unchi skool vidhyaarthee when they are in the 10th, 11th or 12th grad, haalanki anyone yogya liye enlistment may take it.
haalanki the pareekshan is administered by the military, it is not ( or never rai been ) a aavashyaktaa ki a test-taker saath a qualifying score enlist in the hathiyaarband shaktiyaan.
In vittiya hisaab, a santulan chadar or bayaan of vittiya position is a saransh of the financial balances of a ekmaatr bandobast, a business saajhedaari, a nigam or anya kaarobaar sanghathan, aise as an llc or an LLP.
asset, dendaree or swaamitv equity hai soochibaddh as of a vishisht tithi, aise as the samaapt of iske vittiya saal.
a santulan sheet is praayah varnit as a `` snapashot of a company 's vittiya condition ''.
of the chaar moulik vittiya statements, the santulan sheet is the tabhi statement jisase applies to a single point in samay of a kaarobaar ' panchang year.
a maanak company santulan chadar rai teen bhaag : asset, liabilities or ownership equity.
the pramukh shrenee of assets hai usually soochibaddh pehla, or typically in anukram of chalanidhi.
Assets are followed by the dendaree.
the antar between the asset or the liabilities is gyaat as equity or the jaal asset or the jaal laayak or puunji of the company or according to the hisaab sameekaran, net worth must equal asset rin liabilities.
another rasta to dekh at the vahi sameekaran is ki asset equals liabilities plus owner 's equity.
looking at the equation in this rasta shows kaisaa asset yahood financed : either by borrowing dhan ( deyta ) or by using the maalik 's dhan ( maalik 's equity ).
santulan chaadaren hai praayah presented saath asset in ek khand and liabilities or jaal laayak in the other khand with the two bhaag `` balancing. ''
A business oparating entirely in nakadi can maap iske profits by withdrawing the sampurna bainko santulan at the samaapt of the kaal, plus koi nakadi in haath.
however, many vyavsaayon hai nahin paid tatkaal ; they nirmaan up inventories of goods or ve acquire imaaraten and upkaran.
in anya shabd : vyavsaayon have asset and so ve can nahin, bhi if they want to, tatkaal phere these into cash at the end of each kaal.
praayah, ye vyavsaayon owe money to suppliers or to tax adhikariyon, or the proprietors do nahin withdraw sab unke asli puunji or profits at the samaapt of prayek kaal.
in anya shabd vyavsaayon bhi have dendaree.
.17 hornady megnam rimfire, commonly gyaat as the.17 hmr, is a rimfire rifl cartridge viksit by the ammunition company hornady in 2002.
it descended isse the.22 Magnum by necking down the.22 megnam case to take a.17 calibur ( 4.5 mm ) goli, or it is more costly to shoot than paramparaagat.22 calibur rimfire kaartoos.
commonly loaded saath a 17 anaaj ( 1.1 g ) goli, it can uddhaar muzzle velocities in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ).
The schaumburg flyers yahood a professional baseball toli based in schaumburg, Illinois, in the sanyukt States.
The flyers yahood to be a charter sadsy of the North amareeki lig, which is nahin affiliated saath Major League besabaal, however, the team folded in kooch 2011, pehle ve began khel in the nal.
From the 1999 season to the 2010 season, the Flyers nibhaai unke ghar khel at alexian field, nikat the elgin o'hare expresve.
the toli formerly nibhaai in Thunder Bay, ontario, jahaan ve yahood gyaat as the thunder khadi whiskey Jacks.
The toli thi originally a sadsy of the uttari lig isse 1993 to 2010.
On july 27, 2009, the Flyers nibhaai mejabaan to battle of the lingon II, which pitted the flyers viruddh the neshnal Pro Fastpitch softball Champions, the chicago daakuon.
nibhaai by aadhikarik softball rules, the khel was seen by an atipravaah record crowd of 8,918, or thi won by the daakuon 4-2.
in 1999, the flyers niyukt unke pehla manager, ron kittle.
kittle is behtareen gyaat liye uske playing days saath the chicago shwet sox, or former chicago Cubs or shwet Sox khilaadi greg hibbard thi the pitching coach.
During the early saalo of the franchise, kittle kiya a shrenee of TV commercials to prachaar the team, using the gimmick `` ma Kittle. '' jahaan he nibhaai dono khud or his `` ma. ''
The vigyaapan were kaamyaab at sparking kuch aarambhik byaaj in the team as the flyers hoped to chori dur fans isse the aasapaas ken county cougars.
the ad mimicked the atyadhik kaamyaab Converse vigyaapan where laire johnson strecchar as dono himself or `` gramama. ''
at the samaapt of the 2001 ritu, however, kittle resigned isse uske managerial sthiti, and gym boynewicz thi niyukt to badalen use.
in 2004, the flyers bana it to the uttari lig championships Series viruddh the St. paul santo.
Despite agrani the five-game series 2-1, schaumburg aakhirkaar lost the shrenee.
in khel 5, flyers raahat pitcher Lyle prempas anumat a khel jeetna grand slam by St. paul infielder mark mirizzi in the naveen inning.
the flyers appeared in the Northern lig Playoffs chaar times ( 1999, 2003, 2004, 2006 ) but never won the championships.
Some famous players who nibhaai for the flyers yahood former ockland a 's outfielder ozzie Canseco or purv Chicago Cubs outfielder Dwight Smith.
Rachel Hannah waayiz ( / vaais / ; born 7 March 1970 ) is an angrezi filmi or theatre actress and purv faishan model.
Weisz began uske acting kariyar at Trinity haul, Cambridge in the early 1990s, tab started working in television, appearing in Inspector morse, the angrejon mini-series skarlet and Black, or the television filmi Advocates ii.
wo made uske film début in the filmi maut yantra ( 1994 ), but uske bhedan role came in the filmi kadi pratikriya ( 1996 ), agrani to a high-profile bhoomika as evalin carnahan-o'connell in the films The Mummy ( 1999 ) or the mummy ritern ( 2001 ).
anya notable films featuring waayiz hai dushman at the gates, parichay a ladke, constantine, the fawwara or the nirantar Gardener, liye jisase wo praapt an Academy puraskaar, a sunahari globe or a Screen abhinaytaon ' gild puraskaar for her supporting role as tesa quayle.
She rai maharoom labelled an `` English rose '' chunki her naaballig bhoomika in chori saundarya ( 1996 ).
waayiz bhi works in theatre.
uske stage bhedan thi the 1994 punaruddhar of noël Coward 's khel dizine liye jeena, which arjeet uske the landan aalochakon Circle puraskaar liye the sabase honhaar newcomer.
waayiz 's pradarshan bhi shaamil the 1999 donmar godaam utpaadan of Tennessee williams ' ekaek, pichhlaa garmiyaan, and unke 2009 punaruddhar of a streetkar namit khwaahish.
uske portrayal of blanche dubois in the latter khel arjeet her the aalochakon ' vrutt Theatre puraskaar liye Best abhinetri.
She has recently nibhaai evanora in oz the great or shaktishaalee.
the amareeki civil War ( acw ), bhi gyaat as the yuddh between the rajya or bas the civil yuddh ( see namakaran ), thi a civil yuddh ladaa isse 1861 to 1865 between the sanyukt rajya ( the `` Union '' or the `` uttar '' ) and several dakshini slave rajya ki ghoshit unke secession or formed the Confederate rajya of America ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` dakshin '' ).
The yuddh had iske origin in the samasya of slavery, visheshkar the ekstansion of gulaami into the pashchimi territories.
Foreign shaktiyaan kiya nahin intervene.
baad four saalo of khooni combat ki baayein over 600,000 sainiko murde or nasht much of the dakshin 's avasanrachana, the Confederacy collapsed, gulaami thi abolished, or the difficult punarnirmaan prakram of restoring national ekta or guaranteeing adhikaron to the freed slave began.
in the 1860 presidential election, republicans, led by Abraham lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into sanyukt rajya ' territories.
lincoln won, but before his udghaatan on kooch 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the confederacy.
outgoing loktantric adhyaksh james bukanan and the aavak republicans asweekrut secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural pataa ghoshit uske prashasan would nahin initiate civil yuddh.
aath remaining slave states continued to reject kals liye secession.
Confederate shaktiyaan jabt numerous sangheey durgon within territory claimed by the confederacy.
a salaam sammelan vifal to find a compromise, and dono pahalu prepared liye yuddh.
the Confederates assumed ki europea deshon yahood so nirbhar on `` king Cotton `` that they hota intervene ; none kiya or none pahachaanaa the nai confederate rajya of America.
hostilities began on april 12, 1861, jab Confederate shaktiyaan fired upon Fort sumter, a kunjee fort yojit by Union troops in dakshin carolina.
lincoln pukaara liye prayek rajya to provide sainikon to retake the fort ; consequently, chaar adhik slave rajya joined the confederacy, bringing unke kul to gyaarah.
the Union jald niyantrit the kinaaraa states and sthapit a naval nakebandi ki abodh the dakshini arthvyavastha.
the Eastern theatre was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The patjhad 1862 Confederate abhiyaan into Maryland ( a Union rajya ) ended saath confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British hastkshep.
lincoln jari the Emancipation udghoshnaa, jisase bana samaapti gulaami a yuddh goal.
to the west, by garmiyaan 1862 the sangh nasht the Confederate river navy, tab much of unke western sena, or the sangh at vicksburg split the Confederacy in do at the Mississippi nadi.
in 1863, robert E. Lee 's confederate incursion uttar ended at the battle of Gettysburg.
pashchimi safaltaaon led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
in the pashchimi Theater, wiliam T. Sherman drove east to capture atlanta and marched to the samudr, destroying confederate avasanrachana saath the way.
the sangh marshaled the sansaadhan or janashakti to akraman the Confederacy isse sab directions, and could afford to fight ladaaiyon of apgharshan through the overland abhiyaan towards Richmond, the Confederate puunji.
the defending confederate fouj vifal, leading to lee 's surrender to grant at appomattox adaalat house on April 9, 1865.
the amareeki Civil yuddh thi ek of the earliest sachcha audyogic wars.
railroads, the telegraph, steamships, or mass-produced hathiyaar yahood employed extensively.
the mobilization of civilian kaarkaanon, mines, shipyards, banks, parivahan and food aapurtiyan sab foreshadowed World yuddh i.
It remains the deadliest war in amareeki history, resulting in the deaths of an anumaanit 750,000 soldiers or an undetermined number of civilian hataahat.
itihaaskaar jon huddleston estimates the maut toll at ten pratishat of sab Northern males 20–45 years boodha, or 30 pratishat of all dakshini shwet males aged 18–40.
aalu bread is a rup of bread in jisase potato replaces a portion of the niyamit wheat aataa.
It is cooked in a variety of vidhi, sahit by baking it on a hot tave or pan, or in an oven.
It may be leavened or unleavened, or may have a kismein of other sanghatak baked into it.
The anupaat of aalu to gehun aataa varies significantly isse racippi to racippi, saath kuch vyanjanon having a majority of aalu, and anya having a bahumat of gehun aataa.
kuch recipes call liye mashed aalu, saath others calling liye nirjalit aalu flakes.
it is uplabdhiyaan as a commercial utpaada in anek deshon, saath samaan variations in sanghatak, cooking method, or anya parivartaneey.
the prashanth samay mandal observes maanak samay by subtracting aath ghanton isse samanvit saarvbhaumik samay ( ).
the clock samay in is mandal is aadhaarit on the ausat saura samay of the 120th madhyahn west of the Greenwich Observatory.
During daylight saving time, iske samay ofaset is.
In the United rajya and canada, is samay mandal is generically called prashanth samay ( PT ).
Specifically, it is Pacific maanak samay ( PST ) jab observing maanak samay ( sheet ), or Pacific daylight samay ( pediti ) jab observing daylight chhayankan samay ( garmiyaan ).
Most of canada upyog daylight saving samay.
in mexico the UTC−8 samay mandal is gyaat as the Northwest mandal, which is synchronized saath the u.S. PDT daylight chhayankan anusuchee.
the largest nagar in the Pacific samay mandal is los angeles in california isse USA ; the nagar 's mahanagar kshetrafal is the largest in the mandal.
the zone is ek ghanta ahead of the alaska samay Zone, ek hour peeche the pahaad samay mandal or teen ghanton peeche the purvi samay mandal.
Stereo 8, commonly gyaat as the eight-track cartrij, eight-track tape, or bas eight-track, is a magnetic tepe dhwani recording praudyogiki.
it thi lokapriy in the sanyukt rajya from the mid-1960s through to the jaldi 1980s, lakin thi apekshaakrit unknown in anek europea countries.
it was, however, bahut lokapriy in the United Kingdom dauraan is kaal.
sterio 8 thi nirmit in 1964 by a consortium led by Bill lear of lear Jet nigam, saath saath Ampex, ghat motor company, General motors, motorola, and aaarasie victor record ( aaarasie ).
it thi a further vikaas of the samaan Stereo-Pak four-track cartrij created by arl `` madman '' muntz.
a baad quadraphonic sanskaran of the format thi ghoshit by aaarasie in april 1970 or pehla known as Quad-8, tab later badla to bas q8.
rameces ii ( 1303 BC – july or agast 1213 bc ; mishra :, alternatively transcribed as rameses or ramses or ), referred to as rameces the Great, thi the teesraa mishra pharaoh ( reigned 1279 BC – 1213 bc ) of the Nineteenth rajvansh.
He is often regarded as the greatest, sabase manaaye, or most powerful pharaoh of the mishra Empire.
uske successors and later unhone called use the `` great purvaj. ''
rameces II led anek military rijhaane into the levant, re-asserting mishra control over canaan.
he bhi led rijhaane to the dakshin, into nubia, commemorated in inscriptions at Beit el-Wali and gerf hussein.
At aayu chaudaa, rameces thi niyukt Prince regent by his father seti I.
he is believed to have liya the singhaasana in his let teens or is known to have ruled mishra isse 1279 bc to 1213 bc liye 66 saalo and 2 maheene, according to dono manetho or Egypt 's samakaleen aitihaasik record.
he thi ekbar said to have jiya to be 99 saalo old, lakin it is more sambhavit that he died in uske 90th or 91st saal.
if he became pharaoh in 1279 bc as sabase egyptologists today maananaa, he would have assumed the throne on may 31, 1279 bc, based on uske gyaat accession tithi of iii shemu din 27.
rameces ii manaaye an unprecedented 14 sed tyohaar ( the first yojit baad tees saalo of a pharaoh 's reign, and tab prayek teen saalo ) dauraan uske reign—more than koi anya pharaoh.
On his maut, he thi dafn in a makbara in the ghati of the kings ; his deh thi baad sthanantarit to a royal cache jahaan it was discovered in 1881, or is abhi on display in the cairo Museum.
the early bhaag of his shasankaal was kendrit on bhawan shaharon, mandiron and monuments.
he sthapit the nagar of pi-ramesses in the nile delta as his nai puunji or pramukh aadhaar for uske abhiyaan in syrian.
This city thi built on the remains of the nagar of Avaris, the puunji of the Hyksos jab ve took over, or thi the sthaan of the main temple of niyat.
he is bhi gyaat as Ozymandias in the Greek strot, from a lipyantaran into unani of a bhaag of Ramesses 's singhaasana naam,, `` ra 's mighty sachai, chosen of ra ''.
the Texas rangeron are a peshewar besabaal team stith in the dallas-fort Worth metroplex, based in arlington, Texas.
the rangeron matadhikaar is philhal a sadsy of the pashchimi prabhag of pramukh League besabaal 's amareeki lig.
Since, the rangeron have nibhaai in rangeron Ballpark in arlington in Arlington, texas.
the team 's name is udhaar isse the famous law enforcement agency of the vahi naam.
The matadhikaar thi sthapit in 1961 by the name of the Washington seenetteron, an expansion toli awarded to Washington, d.C., after the city 's pehla ballclub, the asli washington Senators, sthanantarit to minesota or became the Twins.
After the ritu, the nai Senators sthanantarit to arlington, texas, or debuted as the rangeron the following vasant.
The texas Rangers Baseball Club rai made chah dikhaave in the emelbi postseason, sab following prabhag championships, in 1996, 1998, 1999, 2010, 2011 or 2012.
in 2010, the rangeron unnat past the prabhag Series liye the pehla samay, defeating the tampa Bay kirane.
Texas tab brought ghar unke pehla amareeki lig pennant baad dhadkan the nai york yankis in six khel.
in the 2010 sansar Series, the matadhikaar 's pehla, the rangeron giri to the san francisco diggaj in five games.
unke lone vijay made them the pehla texas toli to jeet a sansar shrenee game, the huston Astros having maharoom swept in their 2005 sansar shrenee appearance.
ve doharaaya as amareeki lig champions the following year, then khoyaa the 2011 sansar shrenee to the st. lui cardinals in saat games.
gaius julius seizar (, july 100 bc – 15 kooch 44 BC ) thi a roman general, statesman, kaunsul or notable lekhak of latin gadhy.
he nibhaai a najuk bhoomika in the kaarykram ki led to the nidhan of the roman Republic or the vruddhi of the roman Empire.
in 60 BC, seizar, Crassus or pompey formed a political gathbandhan that was to dominate roman raajnneeti liye anek years.
unke attempts to amass shakti through populist tactics yahood opposed by the roodhiwaadee elite bheetar the roman seenet, among unhen keto the Younger with the barambar support of siciro.
seizar 's conquest of gaul, completed by 51 bc, vistaarit rome 's territory to the English Channel or the Rhine.
seizar became the pehla roman saamaanya to cross dono jab he nirmit a sethu aarpaar the Rhine and conducted the pehla akraman of Britain.
These uplabdhiyaan granted use bemail sainya shakti and threatened to grahan the khadaa of pompey, jo had realigned khud saath the seenet baad the death of Crassus in 53 bc.
saath the gallic yudhon concluded, the Senate ordered seizar to lay down uske military cmand or return to rome.
seizar refused, or chihnit uske defiance in 49 BC by crossing the rubicon with a lijan, leaving uske praant or illegally entering Roman territory antargat arms.
civil war resulted, from jisase he ubhara as the unrivaled leader of rome.
After assuming control of sarkari, seizar began a program of social and governmental reforms, sahit the sristi of the Julian panchang.
he kendrikrut the afasarshahi of the ganatantr and was aakhirkaar proclaimed `` taanashaah in perpetuity ''.
But the underlying political virodh tha not been resolved, or on the Ides of kooch ( 15 kooch ) 44 bc, seizar thi assassinated by a samooh of senators led by marcus Junius brookes.
A nai shrenee of civil yudhon broke out, or the constitutional sarkari of the Republic thi never lauti.
seizar 's apanaaya vaaris octavian, baad gyaat as Augustus, rose to ekmaatr power, and the era of the roman Empire began.
Much of seizar 's jivan is known from uske apana khate of uske military campaigns, or isse other samakaleen strot, mukhyatah the akshar and speeches of Cicero or the aitihaasik kritiyaan of sallust.
the baad biographies of seizar by suetonius or plutark are bhi pramukh sources.
Caesar is deemed to be ek of the mahanatam sainya commanders of itihaas.
bhashaai map of serial, camerun, or Benin.
Sign in angrezi, outside the vishvavidhyalayon of lagos
vahin hai sainkadon of bhashaaen bolaa in serial.
the pramukh bhashaaen hai yoruba, hausa, Igbo, ido, fulfulde, kanuri, or ibb.
the aadhikarik bhashaa of serial, angrezi, the purv colonial bhashaa, thi chuni to sukar the cultural and bhashaai ekta of the desh.
angrezi, however, remains an vishesh bachaana of the desh 's urban elite, or is nahin widely bolaa in rural kshetron, jisase comprise teen quarters of the deshon janasankhyikee.
serial 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a puure, encompassing teen pramukh africa bhashaaen pariwaron : afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, or niger–congo.
serial bhi rai anek as-yet unclassified bhashaaen, aise as Cen tuum, which may represent a relic of an even greater vividhta prior to the sprad of the current bhashaa pariwaron.
daucus carota ( aam names include junglee gaajar, ( uk ) bird 's nest, bishap 's lace, or maharani Anne 's lace ( North america ) ) is a flowering sanyantr in the parivaar apiaceae, deshi to shitoshna regions of europea, dakshinpaschim Asia or naturalised to uttar america or Australia.
domesticated gaajar are cultivars of a subspecies, Daucus carota subsp. sativus.
in the United rajya, the title of federal nyaayadhish usually means a nyaayadhish niyukt by the adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya and pushti by the sanyukt States seenet pursuant to the niyukti clause in aalekh ii of the sanyukt States samvidhan.
in addition to the Supreme Court of the United States, jinaki existence and kuch pahaluon of jinaki kshetradhikaar hai beyond the sanvaidhanik shakti of Congress to alter, adhiniyamon of congress have sthapit 13 nyaayalayon of appeals ( bhi pukaara `` circuit nyaayalayon '' ) saath appellate kshetradhikaar over alag regions of the sanyukt rajya, and 94 United rajya zila nyaayalayon.
prayek nyaayadhish niyukt to aise a adaalat may be categorized as a federal nyaayadhish ; aise sthitiyaan shaamil the Chief insaaf and Associate justices of the param Court, circuit nyaayadhishon of the nyaayalayon of appeals, or zila nyaayadhishon of the sanyukt rajya district nyaayalayon.
sab of ye nyaayadhishon varnit yun far hai referred to sometimes as `` aalekh iii nyaayadhishon '' kuki they kasarat the nyaayik shakti vested in the judicial shakha of the sangheey government by aalekh iii of the u.S. Constitution.
In jod, judges of the Court of antarrashtriya vyapaar kasarat nyaayik shakti pursuant to aalekh iii.
anya nyaayadhishon sevarat in the sangheey nyaayalayon, including magistrate nyaayadhishon or diwaliyapan nyaayadhishon, are bhi sometimes referred to as `` sangheey nyaayadhishon '' ; however, ve hai neither niyukt by the President nor pushti by the seenet, and unke power garbhashayi isse aalekh I bajaay.
See aalekh i and aalekh iii tribunals.
Nelly Kim fartado ( born disambar 2, 1978 ) is a canadai singer, songwriter or abhinetri.
wo rai bechi 20 lakh albums vishwavyaapee or more 20 million singles, bringing her kul bikri to over 40 million records around the world.
fartado pehla gained fame saath her debyue album, vaah, nail !
, jisase shakhit do kaamyaab singles, `` i 'm Like a bird `` or `` phere band the lite ``. ``
I 'm jaise a bird '' jiti a 2001 juno puraskaar liye single of the saal or a 2002 Grammy Award liye behtareen Female pop gayan pradarshan.
In 2003, fartado released loakgeet, which produced teen antarrashtriya singles— `` powerless ( kah kayaa tum Want ) ``, `` koshish `` or `` força ``.
teen saalo baad wo released dhilaa, a vishwavyaapee vanijyik kamyaabi.
the album shakhit chaar number-one hits : `` promiscuous ``, `` maneater ``, `` kah it sahi `` or `` sab Good bate ( aaiye to an samaapt ) ``.
baad a three-year brake, wo released uske pehla full-length spani album, mi yojana, or fartado received a latin grami liye behtareen maadaa pop gayan album.
In 2012, fartado 's chauthi english-language studio album, The spirit Indestructible thi released.
Furtado 's kaary has arjeet uske numerous puraskaar or accolades, sahit 2 grami puraskaar, 10 Juno puraskaar, 3 MuchMusic video Awards and a star on Canada 's chalanaa of Fame.
jeev of the raatri is the tenth studio album by Kiss.
it is the band 's pichhlaa album liye kasablanka Records, the only label the group tha kabhi ankit liye at ki point.

Touch is a nirnaayak arthath of receiving soochna.
This photo shows tactile markings identifying seedhiyaan liye visually impaired logon.
the somatosensory pranali is a vividh samvedi pranali comprising the receptors or prasanskaran kendron to upaj the sensory modalities aise as tach, taapmaana, proprioception ( body sthiti ), or nociception ( pidaa ).
the samvedi receptors cover the skin and epithelia, skeletal muscles, haddiyon or joints, aatanrik organs, or the cardiovascular system.
jabaki touch is considered ek of the paanch paramparaagat hosh, the chhap of touch is formed from several modalities.
in ayurvigyaan, the colloquial term `` tach '' is praayah replaced saath `` daihik hosh '' to behatar pratibimbit the kismein of mechanisms involved.
daihik hosh hai sometimes referred to as somesthetic senses, with the samajhnaa that somesthesis includes touch, proprioception or ( depending on upyog ) also haptic perception.
The pranali pratikriyaayein to vividh stimuli using alag receptors : thermoreceptors, nociceptors, mechanoreceptors or chemoreceptors.
hastantaran of information from the receptors gujarata via samvedi nerves through tracts in the spinal cord or into the brain.
Processing primarily occurs in the praathmik somatosensory kshetrafal in the parietal lobe of the dimagi cortex.
the cortical homunculus was devised by wilder penfield.
At iske saralatam, the pranali works jab kaaryaklap in a samvedi neuron is triggered by a specific stimulus aise as ooshmaa ; is signal eventually passes to an kshetrafal in the dimag uniquely attributed to ki area on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be laga at the sahi sthaan.
the point-to-point maanchitran of the body surfaces in the dimag is pukaara a homunculus or is essential in the creation of a deh image.
is brain-surface ( `` cortical '' ) map is nahin aparivartaneey, however.
naatakeey shift can occur in response to stroke or chot.
Magnolia is a large genus of parichay 210 flowering sanyantr prajati in the subfamily Magnolioideae of the parivaar magnoliaceae.
it is namit baad french botanist piyare magnol.
magnolia is an ancient genus.
appearing pehle madhumakhiyon kiya, the pushp viksit to protsaahit paragan by bhring.
to avoid kshati isse pollinating bhring, the carpels of magnolia pushp are atyadhik mushkil.
Fossilised namoonon of magnolia acuminata have maharoom mila dating to 20 lakh saalo ago, or of plants identifiably belonging to the Magnoliaceae dating to 95 million years pehle.
Another pahalu of magnolias ki is mana to represent an ancestral rajya is ki the pushp bud is enclosed in a bract balki than in sepals ; the perianth bhaag hai undifferentiated and pukaara tepals balki than distinct sepals and pankhudiyon.
magnolia saajha the tepal characteristic with several other flowering plants near the aadhaar of the flowering sanyantr lineage such as Amborella or Nymphaea ( as well as saath many more recently derived plants aise as lily ).
The prakritik dayera of magnolia prajati is a disjunct vitaran, saath a pramukh centre in east or southeast Asia or a dwitiyak centre in purvi uttar america, Central america, the west Indies, or kuch prajati in South America.

`` shwet Christmas '' is an Irving Berlin song reminiscing about an old-fashioned christmas setting.
According to the ginis kitaab of sansar record, the sanskaran sung by Bing crosby is the best-selling single of sab samay, saath anumaanit bikri in excess of 50 lakh copies vishwavyaapee.
Accounts vary as to jab or jahaan berlin likhaa the song.
One story is that he likhaa it in 1940, in garam La quinta, california, jabaki rahakar at the la quinta hotel, a barambar Hollywood retreat bhi favored by writer-producer frank capra, haalanki the erizona biltmore bhi claims the song thi written vahin.
he often stayed up all night likhane — he bataai uske secretary, `` Grab your kalam or lo down is song.
i bas wrote the best song i 've kabhi likhaa — heck, i bas likhaa the behtareen song ki anybody 's kabhi likhaa ! ''
Cross-country skiing ( or xc skiing ) is a rup of ski touring in jisase bhagidaar propel themselves aarpaar snow-covered terrain using skis or danda.
the activity is lokapriy in many places saath vishaal snowfields, primarily uttari europea, canada, and alaska.
cross-country skiing is part of the nordic skiing khel family, jisase shaamil ski jumping, Nordic sanyukt ( cross-country skiing or ski kud ), biathlon ( skiing or rifl marksmanship ) and ski-orienteering ( jisase shaamil map navigation saath him trails and treks ).
Cross-country skiing is the modern style of skiing that sabase resembles pragaitihaasik skiing, particularly jab kiya in the backcountry.
It is bhi sambandhit to Telemark skiing.
a use kar in United rajya is complementary to bikri tax jisase means, if tum khride a taxable product/services without paying any bikri kar to vikreta, tum owe upyog kar.
tum jarur swah assess upyog kar or adaa it sidhe to the state jahaan the utpaada yahood consumed or sevaayen yahood rendered.
Use kar typically is a tax on consumption but if tum khride an item ( without paying bikri kar ) and store it in your godaam initially, use kar applies to ki sthaan jahaan goods were bhandaarit.
baad on when the final khapat takes place at kuch other sthaan, tum hai jaruri to adaa the avakal of kar rate to the kshetradhikaar of param place of consumption.
This vaaki means ki tum do n't have to pay both bikri Tax as khub as upyog kar on ek lenden.
it is only one or the other that tum hai jaruri to pay on khariden of taxable products/services.
if vikreta karata n't charge koi bikri tax on iske chaalaan then it is the obligation of the buyer to swah assess Use tax or pay it to the uchit jurisdication.
upyog kar is generally charged at the same kar rate of Sales kar but in some rajya the kar rate is alag.
upyog kar is also termed as `` Consumption kar '' or `` upabhokta upyog Tax ''.
A use kar is a prakaar of excise tax levied in the sanyukt States by numerous rajya sarkarein.
it is assessed upon tangible personal property kharida by a nivasee of the assessing rajya liye upyog, storage, or khapat in ki rajya ( nahin liye punarvikray ), regardless of jahaan the purchase took place.
if a nivasee of a rajya makes a khariden bheetar his home rajya, full bikri kar is sashulk at the samay of the lenden.
the use kar applies jab a nivasee of the assessing rajya purchases an mad that is nahin vishay to his ghar state 's bikri tax.
Usually, is is due to out-of-state purchases, as khub as ordering vasteen through the mail, by phone, or over the antarjaal isse anya rajya.
The upyog tax is typically assessed at the vahi rate as the bikri kar that hota have maharoom owed ( if any ) tha the same goods maharoom kharida in the state of nivas.
liye udhaaharan, a resident of Massachusetts, saath a 6.25 % `` bikri and use kar '' on certain goods and sevaayen, purchases non-exempt goods or sevaayen in New hampshire liye upyog, storage or anya consumption in masachusets.
antargat New hampshire vidhi, the New Hampshire vikreta collects no bikri taxes on the goods, but the masachusets purchaser/user jarur still adaa 6.25 % of the bikri price directly to the vibhaag of aay in masachusets as a upyog kar.
if the vahi goods hai kharida in a us rajya ki does collect bikri kar liye aise goods at samay of khariden, whatever taxes yahood sashulk by the kreta to ki rajya can be deducted ( as a kar credit ) isse the 6.25 % owed liye subsequent use, bhandar or khapat in masachusets.
With few exceptions, no rajya 's vikreta hoga charge the deshi rajya 's bikri kar on goods shipped out of state, meaning sab goods ordered from out-of-state hai essentially free of bikri kar.
The kreta is therefore required to ghoshit or adaa the upyog kar to uske ghar rajya on ye ordered goods.
the assessing kshetradhikaar may make the upyog kar dey annually, but kuch states require a masik payment.
liye example, where a Vermont resident rai nahin sashulk at least 6 % bikri kar on property brought in liye upyog in the rajya, Vermont vidhi requires daakhil a kar vaapasi ( rup su-452 or payment ) by the 20th din of the month following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 let shulk, a 5 % dand prati maah, to a adhiktam of 25 %, plus statutory byaaj on the unpaid tax or dand.
theth chhuton include purchases by charitable non-profit sanghathan or sarkari agenciyon, purchases liye resale in commers, and purchases via `` cazual sales '' by individuals nahin in the ordinary course of business.
bhi note that there hai thousands of tax jurisdictions in the u.S. and anek have ever-changing suchiyaan of vishisht prakaar of goods or sevaayen ki hai not taxable.
as an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts vidhi requires bhugtan of kar on `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) tantra kharida or downlod over the antarjaal for installation or upyog in masachusets, regardless of jahaan it originates.
however, the vaastavik use of the same tantra downlod by a masachusets resident to a sarwar in another rajya remains a non-taxed `` seva ''.
In contrast, Arkansas generally karata nahin kar anything delivered over the Internet ( aise as downlod tantra or music ), magar VoIP which is specifically defined as taxable `` doorsanchaar sevaayen ''.
tantra ( pre-written or custom ) `` vitarit thru a thos medium '' ( i.e., on disk ) in Arkansas is taxable bhi if ordered online, magar `` custom tantra liye a particular graahak '' jisase is non-taxable `` programing sevaayen '' bhi if delivered on a disk.
In sabase maamle, is jatilta is bhaag of the underlying bikri kar laws ; lakin jabaki a brick-and-mortar store rai to deal saath tabhi the bikri kar kanoon of iske apana location, remote vikreta have to saude with the upyog kar laws of anek jurisdictions—up to every us rajya or mohalle ki prakruti unhen, if the company rai a upasthiti or `` nexus '' in prayek state ( as vishaal `` brick-and-mortar '' vikreta like Wal-Mart or behtareen khride do ).
in medicine, pulmonary hypertension ( ph ) is an badhayen of rakt dabaav in the pulmonary dhamni, pulmonary vein, or pulmonary capillaries, saath gyaat as the fefdon vasculature, agrani to shortness of breath, dizziness, fainting, and anya lakshan, all of jisase are exacerbated by exertion.
Pulmonary hypertension can be a severe beemaari saath a markedly decreased exercise sahishnutaa or dil vifaltaa.
it thi first pahachaanaa by Dr. Ernst von romberg in 1891.
according to the sabase recent vargeekaran, it can be one of five alag prakaar : arterial, venous, hypoxic, thromboembolic or miscellaneous.
