Sanuk, a prabhag of Deckers bahari Corporation, is a footwear brands based in dakshini california.
Sanuk, the Thai word liye majaa, thi santhaapit by dakshini California deshi jeff kelley jab he prarambh bananaa chappal out of indoor-outdoor carpet.
The pehla utpaada nirmit was green carpeted or entitled the `` fer Real '' baad ek shop owner asked if the vilakshantaa sandal was `` liye Real. ''
The fer Real first became a runaway hit through boutique stores or nahin the intended lahare dukaane.
The novelty act thi followed up by a sandal lapeta in taar jaal, a tendua chapai sanskaran, and sheliyaan made out of a poncho saamagree in a variety of rangon.
sanuk rai grown to include style vikalp for main, mahilaon and youth or is distributed aarpaar the sanyukt rajya and in over 50 deshon throughout europea, asia, South america and australia.
sanuk centers itself around a dhanatmak jeevanstyli vakaalat the slogan, `` muskaan, pass it on ! ``.
in computer science, sarani programing bhashaaen ( bhi gyaat as vector or multidimensional languages ) generalize parichaalan on scalars to apply transparently to sadish, matrices, or ucchtar dimensional arrays.
sarani programing primitives concisely express vyapak ideas parichay aankada manipulation.
The str of conciseness can be naatakeey in nishchit maamle : it is nahin uncommon to dhundhen sarani programing language one-liners ki aavashyaktaa adhik than a yugal of pages of java code.
APL, designed by Ken Iverson, thi the pehla programing bhashaa to provide array programing capabilities.
the mnemonic APL refers to the title of uske seminal kitaab `` a programing bhashaa '' or not to arrays prati se. iverson 's yogadan to rigor and spashtataa was sambhawatah adhik mahatvapurn than the saral ekstansion of dimensions to krityon.
in the sanyukt rajya an annuity anubandh is nirmit jab an insured party, praayah an vyaktigat, pays a jivan bime company a single premium ki hoga later be vitarit waapas to the insured party over samay.
annuity contracts traditionally provide a guaranteed vitaran of aay over samay, aise as via phixd payments, jabatak the death of the vyakti or persons namit in the contract or jabatak a final tithi, whichever comes pehla.
however, the bahumat of aadhunik annuity graahak use annuities tabhi to accumulate nidhi free of aay and puunji gains kar or to baad take lump-sum withdrawals bagaiyr using the guaranteed-income-for-life visheshta.

nabhikeey shakti is the upyog of sustained nabhikeey parivardhan to generate ooshmaa or vidyut.
Nuclear power paudhe provided parichay 5.7 % of the world 's energy or 13 % of the sansar 's vidyut, in 2012.
in 2013, the iaea rapat ki there hai 437 operational nabhikeey power reactors ( haalanki nahin sab hai producing vidyut ), in 31 deshon.
In jod, vahin hai lagbhag 140 naval baratan using nabhikeey nodan in aaparishan, sanchalit by kuch 180 riektaron.
vahin is an jari bahes parichay the use of nuclear energy.
Proponents, aise as the sansar nabhikeey sangh, the iaea and Environmentalists liye nabhikeey Energy contend ki nabhikeey shakti is a chirsthayee energy sorce ki reduces carbon emissions.
Opponents, aise as greenpis antarrashtriya or nirs, maananaa ki nabhikeey shakti mudraayen anek khatre to logon and the environment.
nabhikeey shakti sanyantr durghatnaon shaamil the chernobyl vipatti ( 1986 ), phukushima daiichi nuclear vipatti ( 2011 ), or the teen mile dweep durghatana ( 1979 ).
vahin have also been kuch nuclear-powered submarine mishaps.
shodh into suraksha sudhaar is continuing or nuclear sanlayan, believed to be safer, may be prayukt in the bhavishya.
As of 2012, according to the IAEA, worldwide vahin yahood 68 civil nuclear shakti riektaron antargat nirmaan in 15 deshon.
in the us the panktiyaan of almost half iske riektaron have maharoom vistaarit to 60 years, or plans to build another darjan are antargat gambhir vichaar.
However, japani 's 2011 Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster prompted a punarvichaar of nuclear urja niti in anek deshon.
germany decided to close sab iske riektaron by 2022, or Italy rai bain nabhikeey shakti.
Following Fukushima, the antarrashtriya urja agency halved iske anumaan of additional nabhikeey generating kshamta to be nirmit by 2035.
Photograph of the berlin wal liya from the west paksh.
The wal was nirmit in 1961 to prevent east germans isse fleeing isse samyavaadee.
it was an iconic symbol of the thanda yuddh or iske fall in 1989 marked the samaapt of the yuddh.
the Cold War, praayah dated from 1947 to 1991, thi a sustained rajya of rajnatik or sainya tension between powers in the pashchimi Bloc, varchasv by the United States saath nato among iske allies, and shaktiyaan in the purvi bloc, varchasv by the soviet sangh saath saath the warso anubandh.
is began after the success of their asthai wartime gathbandhan viruddh Nazi germany, leaving the ussr or the us as do superpowers saath profound aarthik or political differences.
a neutral gut arose saath the non-aligned Movement santhaapit by mishra, india, or yugoslavia ; is gut rejected association saath either the US-led West or the soviet-led east.
the Cold War was so named kuki the do pramukh powers—each possessing nabhikeey hathiyaar or thereby threatened with mutual assured vinaash —never met in sidhaa sainya combat.
Instead, in unke sangharsh liye vaishvik influence ve sagaai in ongoing manovaigyanik warfare or in niyamit apratyaksh confrontations through proxi yudhon.
chakra of saapeksh shant hota be followed by high tension, jisase could have led to sansar yuddh.
The tensest times yahood during the Berlin nakebandi ( 1948–1949 ), the korian yuddh ( 1950–1953 ), the Suez sankat ( 1956 ), the Berlin sankat of 1961, the cuban missile sankat ( 1962 ), the vietnam yuddh ( 1959–1975 ), the yom kippur yuddh ( 1973 ), the Soviet yuddh in afghanistan ( 1979–1989 ), the soviet downing of korian Air linon udaan 007 ( 1983 ), or the `` Able archer '' NATO sainya exercises ( 1983 ).
the virodh was expressed through sainya coalitions, ranneetik conventional force deployments, extensive aid to claayent states, espionage, massive prachaar abhiyaan, conventional or nabhikeey bahen daud, appeals to neutral raashtra, rivalry at sports events ( in particular the olympic ), and technological pratiyogitaaon aise as the spes res.
The us or ussr became shaamil in rajnatik and military conflicts in the teesraa sansar deshon of latin america, africa, the madhya East, or Southeast asia.
To alleviate the risk of a sambhavit nuclear yuddh, both pahalu sought raahat of rajnatik tanaav through détente in the 1970s.
In the 1980s, the sanyukt rajya increased rajanyik, sainya, or aarthik pressures on the soviet sangh, at a samay when the communist state thi already ksht isse economic stagnation.
in the mid-1980s, the nai soviet President Mikhail gorbachev introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization '', 1987 ) and glasnost ( `` khulepan '', ca. 1985 ).
Pressures liye national swatantraaa grew stronger in Eastern europea, especially candal.
ve reached a todakar point jab Gorbachev refused to use Soviet troops to support the faltering sarkari of east germany in let 1989.
bheetar saptaah sab the upgrah rajya broke free from Moscow in a shantipurna wave of revolutions ( vahin was kuch hinsa in Romania ).
the pressures escalated andar the Soviet Union, where samyavaadee giri or the ussr thi formally dissolved in let 1991.
The United States remained as the sansar 's only superpower.
the thanda yuddh and its events have left a significant legacy, or it is often referred to in lokapriy samskruti, especially in media featuring themes of espionage or the threat of nabhikeey warfare.
pikes Peak rajya park is a rajya park of Iowa, uese, featuring a bluff nihaar the apper mississippi nadi vipareet the confluence of the Wisconsin nadi.
the park is sanchalit by the iova Department of Natural sansaadhan.
it is nearly a hajaar acre ( 4 km2 ) in extent.
the nikatatam nagar is McGregor, Iowa.

it gets its naam from the iova avatar of pikes Peak, a visheshkar unchi point nihaar the gorge of the Upper mississippi, or jaise pikes Peak in colorado, is named liye Zebulon pike.

Mountain bike hai permitted in nishchit portions of the park.

the purvottar iova Legacy trail pranali is undergoing development, or hoga conect elements of ye site.

baat radio is a radio swaroop containing charchaa about topical mudde.
sabase shows are regularly hosted by a single vyaktigat, and often feature interviews with a kramank of alag atithi.
baat radio typically includes an tatv of shrota bhagidaari, usually by broadcasting sajiv conversations between the host or shrota jo `` kol in '' ( praayah via telephone ) to the dikhaaen.
Listener yogadan hai usually screened by a show 's nirmaataa ( s ) in anukram to adhiktam darshak byaaj and, in the maamla of commercial baat radio, aakarshith vigyapandaata.
generally, the shows hai vyavasthit into khand, prayek separated by a tehraana liye vigyaapan ; however, in public or non-commercial radio, music is sometimes played in place of commercials to separate the program khand.
Variations of baat radio shaamil conservative baat, hot talk, liberal talk and sports talk.
jabaki talk radio rai historically maharoom sambhddha saath am/fm, starting around 2005 the technology liye internet-based talk-radio shows became laagat effective in the rup of podcasts.
abhi, it is sambhavit liye an vyaktigat to upyog a kismein of services to mejabaan an Internet-based talk-radio dikhaaen bagaiyr carriage by a traditional radio stesan.
In jod TV programing isse talk and news outlet aise as bibisi, CNN, bloomberg or Fox are now praayah uplabdhiyaan expanding the world of baat radio further.
Talk radio sunanaa is abhi enjoyed nahin only on radios, lakin a chaudee variety of other devices or sevaayen including PCs using itunes, station directories aise as tunein, dikhaaen nirdeshika smartphones saath eps aise as Stitcher.
Hippa is a genus of decapod crustaceans in the family hippidae, containing the following species:
hippa adactyla Fabricius, 1787
Hippa admirabilis ( thallwitz, 1892 )
hippa alcimede ( de man, 1902 )
Hippa australis hale, 1927
hippa carcineutes Holthuis & manning, 1970
hippa celaeno ( de man, 1896 )
hippa granulatus ( borradaile, 1904 )
hippa hirtipes ( dana, 1852 )
hippa indica Haig, murugan & baalkrishnan Nair, 1986
hippa marmorata ( Hombron & jacquinot, 1846 )
hippa ovalis ( A. milne-edwards, 1862 )
hippa picta ( heller, 1861 )
Hippa strigillata ( stimpson, 1860 )
Hippa testudinaria ( Herbst, 1791 )
hippa truncatifrons ( miers, 1878 )
it is closely related to the genus Emerita, or prajati have praayah maharoom transferred between the do genera.
jakarta ( ), officially known as the Special puunji pradesh of jakarta ( ), is the capital and largest nagar of indonesia.
Located on the uttarpashchim coast of java, jakarta is the desh 's aarthik, cultural or rajnatik centre, or saath a janasankhyikee of 10,187,595 as of navambar 2011, it is the sabase populous nagar in indonesia or in southeast Asia, and is the thirteenth sabase aabaadi nagar in the sansar.
the aadhikarik mahanagar kshetrafal, gyaat as jabodetabek ( a naam formed by combining the aarambhik syllables of jakarta, bogor, depok, tangerang and bekasi ), is the duusari largest in the world, yet the metropolis 's suburbs still continue pare it.
jakarta is soochibaddh as a global nagar in the 2008 vaishvikaran or sansar shaharon padhai Group or Network ( gawc ) shodh.
or rai an kshetrafal of.
is area rai population of khub over 28 lakh, bananaa it ek of the sansar 's largest conurbations in sharten of kramank of inhabitants.
In 2011, jakarta ranked 17th among the sansar 's 200 largest shaharon, a jamp from iske 2007 ranking of 171.
jakarta rai grown adhik rapidly than kuala lumpur, beijing or Bangkok.
sthapit in the chauthi sadi, the nagar became an mahatvapurn vyapaar bandargahon for the Kingdom of sunda.
It thi the de facto capital of the dach East indies ( when it thi known as batavia ) and has jari as the capital of indonesia chunki the desh 's independence thi declared in 1945.
the nagar is the seat of the asian sachivalay.
jakarta is parosa by the soekarno–hatta antarrashtriya vimaanashetra, haleem Perdanakusuma antarrashtriya vimaanashetra, and tanjung priok harbour ; it is conect by anek intercity or commuter rail, or parosa by anek bas linon kaaryshil on surakshit busways.
a theth ghar air condishning window ikai.
air condishning is the prakram of altering the gun of air ( primarily taapmaana or ardrata ) to adhik favourable sharten.
adhik generally, air condishning can refer to koi rup of technological cooling, heating, ventilation, or keetanushodhan that modifies the condishan of air.
An air condishnar ( praayah referred to as air con, AC or A/C, and not to be confused saath the sankshipt liye prayavarti vartmaan ) is a pramukh or ghar appliance, system, or yantriki designed to badalen the air taapmaana and humidity within an area ( prayukt liye kooling and sometimes heating depending on the air gun at a die time ).
The cooling is typically kiya using a saral prashithan saikil, lakin sometimes evaporation is used, commonly for sukun kooling in imaaraten and motor vaahanon.
In nirmaan, a puraa pranali of heating, ventilation and air condishning is referred to as `` HVAC ``.

the bible is a sankalan of anek shorter kitabe likhaa at alag times and later assembled into the biblical canon.
All but the shortest of ye books have maharoom divided into chapters, generally a pej or so in length, chunki the jaldi 13th sadi.
Since the mid-16th sadi, prayek adhyay rai been further vibhajit into `` aayatein '' of a few choti linon or sentences.
sometimes a sentence spans adhik than ek verse, as in the maamla of, and sometimes there is adhik than ek vaakya in a single shloke, as in the maamla of.
As the chapter or shloke vibhaajan yahood nahin bhaag of the asli granth, ve rup bhaag of the paratext of the bible.
The yahudee vibhaajan of the yahudee text differ at various points from those prayukt by isaayiyon.
liye udhaaharan, in yahudee parampara, the ascriptions to anek Psalms hai regarded as independent aayatein, bananaa 116 adhik aayatein, whereas the sthapit Christian practice is to ginati and kramank prayek psalm ascription saath with the pehla shloke following it.
kuch chapter vibhaajan also occur in different sthaan, e.g. in yahudee bibles is numbered as in Christian translations.
An index ( bahuvachan : indexes ) is a list of shabd or phrases ( 'headings ' ) or sambhddha pointers ( 'loketerbus ' ) to where useful material relating to ki heading can be mila in a dastauez.
In a traditional back-of-the-book anukramanika the headings hoga shaamil names of people, sthaan and kaarykram, or concepts chaynit by a vyakti as hone praasangik or of interest to a sambhavit reader of the kitaab.
The sanketak hai typically pej sankhyaayein, anuchhed sankhyaayein or khand numbers.
in a library catalog the words hai lekhak, sheershak, subject headings, etc., and the sanketak hai kol sankhyaayein.
antarjaal dhundhen engines, aise as google, and puraa text searching sahaayta provide abhigam to soochna lakin are nahin as chaynaatmak as an index, as ve provide non-relevant links, or may miss praasangik information if it is nahin phrased in exactly the rasta ve expect.
In United States vittiya viniman, a sandigdh activity rapat ( or sar ) is a report made by a vittiya sanstha to the Financial aparaadhon pravartan sanjaal ( fincen ), an agency of the United rajya Department of the rajkosh, regarding suspicious or potentially suspicious kaaryaklap.
Facebook on the ad-tech 2010
fasebuk is an online soshal netwarking seva, jinaki naam tana isse the colloquial naam for the kitaab given to students at the start of the academik saal by some vishvavidhyalayon administrations in the sanyukt rajya to sahaayta vidhyaarthee get to jaan prayek anya.
it was santhaapit in February 2004 by chihnit zuckerberg saath uske college roommates or fellow harvard University vidhyaarthee Eduardo saverin, andrew McCollum, Dustin moskovitz or kris Hughes.
The jalsthal 's membership was initially simit by the sansthaapakon to harvard students, but thi vistaarit to other colleges in the Boston kshetrafal, the ivi lig, or Stanford University.
it dhire added support liye vidhyaarthee at vibhinn other universities before kholane to high skool students, or aakhirkaar to anyone aged 13 or over.
fasebuk abhi allows koi users who ghoshit themselves to be at tanik 13 years old to become panjikrut upayokta of the sait.
Users jarur panjikaran before using the sait, after jisase ve may create a nijee profile, add other upayokta as friends, and exange sandesh, sahit automatic notifications jab they adhyatan unke profile.
Additionally, upayokta may juden common-interest upayokta samooh, organized by workplace, school or college, or anya characteristics, or categorize unke mitron into lists aise as `` People From kaary '' or `` Close mitron ''.
as of sitambar 2012, Facebook rai over ek arab kriyasheel users.
according to a may 2011 upabhokta reports surveykshan, vahin are 7.5 lakh children under 13 saath khate or 5 lakh antargat 10, violating the site 's terms of service.
in may 2005, accel saajhedaar invested $ 12.7 lakh in fasebuk, or gym breyer added $ 1 lakh of uske apana dhan to the ghat.
a January 2009 compete.com study ranked fasebuk as the sabase prayukt soshal networking seva by worldwide masik active upayokta.
entertainment saptahik included the sait on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` How on dharti did we stalk hamaari exes, remember hamaari co-workers ' janmdin, keedaa hamaari mitron, or khel a rousing khel of scrabulous pehle fasebuk ? ''
aalochakon, aise as fasebuk detox, rajya ki fasebuk rai turned into a neshnal obsession in the United rajya, resulting in vishaal amounts of samay lost or protsaahit atmmoh.
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 lakh monthly adwitiya u.S. vizitor in may 2011.
according to soshal media aaj, in april 2010 an anumaanit 41.6 % ( 129.5 lakh ) of the u.S. population tha a Facebook khaataa.
nevertheless, fasebuk 's market growth prarambh to stall in kuch regions, saath the sait khone 7 lakh kriyasheel upayokta in the sanyukt rajya or canada in may 2011.
Facebook aakhirkaar daayar for an aarambhik public offering on farvari 1, 2012, and thi headquartered in menlo park, california.
fasebuk Inc. began selling stock to the public and vyapaar on the NASDAQ on may 18, 2012.
salphonamide functional samooh
Hydrochlorothiazide is a salphonamide or a thiazide.
Furosemide is a salphonamide, but nahin a thiazide.
salphonamide or sulphonamide is the aadhaar of anek samooh of davaayen.
The asli jeevanurodhi sulfonamides ( sometimes pukaara sulfa drugs or sulpha davaayen ) hai synthetic roganurodhi agenton ki contain the salphonamide samooh.
Some sulfonamides hai bhi viheen of antibacterial kaaryaklap, e.g., the anticonvulsant sultiame.
The sulfonylureas or thiazide diuretics are nae drug samooh aadhaarit on the jeevanurodhi sulfonamides.
sulfa allergies hai aam, hence medications containing sulfonamides are prescribed carefully.
It is important to make a distinction between sulfa drugs and other sulfur-containing davaayen and editive, aise as sulfates or sulfites, which hai chemically unrelated to the salphonamide samooh, and do nahin kaaran the vahi hypersensitivity pratikriyaayein dekhi in the sulfonamides.
is is a suchi of varna isse george Lopez.
Domestic geese ( ansar ansar domesticus or ansar cygnoides ) hai domesticated dhoosar geese ( either Greylag Geese or Swan geese ) rakhaa as murgipaalan liye their maance, eggs, and bas feathers chunki pracheen times.
30 Seconds to Mars is an American chattan band isse los Angeles, formed in 1998.
chunki 2007, the band has consisted of karta jared Leto ( lead vocals, lay guitar, songwriter ), Shannon leto ( drums, percussion ) or tomo miličević ( lead guitar, keyboards ).
Following the prasthaan of Matt wachter ( abhi of Angels & airwaves ) in 2007, Tim Kelleher became the bassist for the samooh, performing live tabhi saath both jared or miličević recording baas liye studio ricarding, jabaki braxton olita ( keyboards ) thi added to the touring linep in 2009.
Previously, the samooh also featured guitarists solon bixler ( now of great Northern ) or kevin drek ( abhi of Polaroid chumban ).
to tithi, 30 Seconds to mangal have released teen studio album – 30 second to mangal ( 2002 ), A khubasurat Lie ( 2005 ), This Is yuddh ( 2009 ) and teen extended plays – eoel Sessions andercover ( 2007 ), to the kinare of the dharti ( 2008 ), or amtivi Unplugged : 30 second to mangal ( 2011 ).
30 Seconds to mangal ' music rai maharoom sambhddha mostly saath neo-prog, pragatisheel metal or post-grunge, lakin ve have also shaamil emo, screamo, spes chattan or synthrock into unke music.
They have maharoom compared to gulabi floyd ( jo yahood an influence on unke work ) and aujaar kuki of their use of philosophical or spiritual geet, avadharana album or unke use of praayogic music.
a christmas Story is a 1983 American christmas kamedi filmi aadhaarit on the short stories and semi-fictional upakhyanon of author or raconteur jaan Shepherd, aadhaarit on uske kitaab in parameshwar we Trust, All anya adaa nakadi, with some elements derived from wanda hikki 's raatri of Golden yaaden.
It thi nirdeshit by bob clark.
the filmi has chunki become a avkaash clasik and is dikhaaya numerous times on television dauraan the christmas ritu on the sanjaal tbs, often in a 24-hour marathon.
in 2012, the filmi was chaynit liye preservation in the neshnal filmi Registry by the pustakaalayon of congress for hone `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
A Joe 's kekada Shack shakha in san Diego, ca.
the building was initially a rowing club or was baad converted into the restaraan.
Joe 's kekada shack is an amareeki kadi of beach-themed seafood cazual dining restaurants swaamitv by Ignite Restaurant samooh.
Founded in huston, texas, the restaraan now operates sthitiyaan all aarpaar the United States of america.
It serves seafood or amareeki bhojan.
the restaraan bhi have a gift duukaan that bikta facetious t-shirts featuring phrases vigyaapan jo 's seafood chunaav.
It is based in Houston, Texas.
nai york nagar krooj Liner terminal in narak 's rasoighar at 52nd Street.
the New york yatri Ship terminal ( also gyaat as the Luxury Liner pankti or manahaton krooj Terminal or nai york Cruise Terminal ) is a terminal liye ocean-going yatri ships on manahaton 's west paksh.
the terminal consists of uttar nadi pier 88, 90, 92 or 94 on the hadsan nadi between west 46th or west 54th gali.
( as a general rule, baandh sankhyaayein in manahaton can be sankalpit by adding 40 to the sambandhit cross-street. )
jahaajon abhi dock at pier 88, 90 or 92.
Pier 94 on the uttar paksh is abhi prayukt for pradarshnee spes.
baandh 86, ekbar prayukt by sanyukt States Lines, is now ghar to the uss intrepid.
in 2003, the terminal sambhala 900,000 yatri.
the nagar is forecasting ki 1.5 lakh will use the terminal by 2017.
the pier hai long or alaava.
ve yahood pehla completed in 1935 to replace the chelsi pier as the city 's luxury liner terminal.
the new terminal thi nirmit to handle bigger jahaajon ki tha outgrown the Chelsea Piers.
the pier yahood sanvar in 1970 or hai philhal undergoing another $ 150 lakh naveekaran.
the renovated yojanaayen kol liye it to handle teen large jahaajon at a samay.
in doing renovations, the city is also considering decommissioning Pier 92.
logo of the nai york Cruise terminal.for
dashakon the terminal was the tabhi ocean-going yatri terminal in nai york harbor.
saath an upsurge in krooj jalayaan trekkic or the terminal 's kshamta to handle comfortably only three vishaal jahaajon at a samay, do new terminals have kholi in the harbar — the kep Liberty krooj bandargahon opened in 2004 in bayonne, New jersey ( prayukt by royal caribbean krooj Line, Celebrity Cruises and Azamara Cruises ), or the brukaleen krooj Terminal ( prayukt by the maharani Mary 2 or other jahaajon of the carnival nigam krooj brands ) kholi in 2006 in brukaleen, nai york.
the west paksh rajmarg takes a choti jog east isse the pier to neeche West 42nd gali because when the terminal thi built jameen tha to be liya away isse manahaton to allow liye longer pier.
the US fouj Corps of Engineers, who control the waterfront aayam, would nahin extend the pierhead line farther into the nadi, so the city vistaarit the pier by kating dur at the land.
the nagar pehle kiya is liye the Chelsea pier ; however in chelsi tabhi landphil thi taken dur.
At the yatri terminal vaastavik manahaton schist was liya dur.
From downstream in the river
anek pramukh passenger jahaajon have docked vahin, including the rms maharani Mary 2 and swatantraaa of the samandar, before the brukaleen and Bayonne terminals kholi.
the ss Normandie caught aag or subsequently capsized at its baandh 88 berth dauraan sansar yuddh II.
the Normandie, renamed uss lafayette, lies capsized in the frozen mud at baandh 88 in the sheet of 1942
Norwegian krooj lakeer 's jald to be naveenatam ship the norwegian breakaway will paal year-round out of the nai York yatri jalayaan terminal.
The city hoga kharch $ 4 lakh to renovate and upgrade the krooj terminal to accommodate the jalayaan.
is is an avlokan of the niyamit, punaravarti, or anya varna of the tv shrenee ncis.
isai sahi is a pad used in the United States to describe right-wing Christian political samooh ki hai characterized by unke damdaar support of socially roodhiwaadee nitiyon.
Christian conservatives principally talash to lagu unke samajhnaa of the shikshaaon of Christianity to raajnneeti or public policy by proclaiming the maan of those teachings and/or by seeking to upyog those shikshaaon to influence law or public policy.
in the u.S., the isai right is an anaupchaarik gathbandhan formed around a kor of dharmantaran protestants ki draws `` support isse nitiyaan roodhiwaadee Catholics, yahudiyon, Mormons, or occasionally secularists '' jo share unke goals.
the gati rai iske jaden in amareeki politics going waapas as far the 1940s and has maharoom visheshkar influential chunki the 1970s.
unke influence draws, in bhaag, isse grassroots activism as well as unke fokas on soshal issues or kshamta to motivate the electorate around those mudde.
the Christian right is notable today liye advancing socially roodhiwaadee sthitiyaan on issues sahit school prayer, stem koshika shodh, samalangikta, nirodhak, garbhpaat, and pornography.
haalanki the isai right is praayah associated saath the u.S., the gati rai maharoom a key factor in the raajnneeti of canada, the netherlands, uttari ireland or australia, among others.
Far East gati ( stylized as far★east Movement or abbreviated fm ) is an American hip hop band quartet aadhaarit in Los Angeles.
the group formed in 2003 and consists of kev nish ( Kevin nishimura ), prohgress ( James Roh ), j-splif ( Jae choung ), and dj virman ( virman Coquia ).
Far East Movement 's pehla claim to kirti thi their song `` golakaar golakaar '' featured in the hollywood film, the tej or the krodhit : tokio Drift, or iske subsequent soundtrack, video game and dvd.
chunki `` Round Round '', the samooh rai maharoom pradarshit on vibhinn sanjaal shows sahit,, anugami, Gossip Girl, or finishing the Game ( a pradarshit filmi at sundance 2007 ).
unke single `` jaise a G6 `` hit kramank ek on the Billboard hot 100 Chart or on itunes as khub in late aktubar 2010.
Far east gati also rai the bhed of being the pehla asian-american samooh to earn a # 1 hit on the Billboard Hot 100 in the sanyukt States.
lr44 is the iisi namakan liye an kshareey 1.5 volt batan koshika, commonly prayukt in small led flashlights, digital thermometers, calculators, calipers, ghadiyaan, ghadiyaan, khilone and leisure sanketak.
lr44 kshareey koshika
the battery namakaran is paribhaashit by the antarrashtriya vidyutatakneekee Commission ( iisi ) in its 60086-3 maanak ( praathmik bydaree, bhaag 3 dekhen bydaree ).
the akshar l indicates the electrochemical system used ; a jasta rinatmak electrode, mangneej dioxide depolarizer or dhanatmak electrode, or an alkaline electrolyte.
r44 indicates a golakaar koshika 11.4±0.2 mm diameter or 5.2±0.2 mm oonchaai as defined by the IEC maanak 60086.
nirmaataaon have unke own part numbers liye iisi prakaar lr44 bydaree including:
lr44, lr44g, lr44gd, lr44h
lr1154, l1154, l1154c, L1154F, l1154g, l1154h
6135-99-792-8475 ( nsn )
1166a
ag13, a613, AG14, AG-14, G13A, G13-A
157, 303, 357
a76, gda76, GP76A, gpa7, gpa75, gpa76, GPS76A,
1128mp, 208-904, A-76, CA18, CA19, CR44, D76A, ka, ka76, ms76h, px76a, px675a, RPX675, RW82, SB-F9, v13ga
4.5-volt, D, C, aa, aaa, aaaa, A23, 9-volt, cr2032 or LR44 batteries
anya types of bydaree hai or yahood made in the R44 size.
formerly, paara bydaree were made as batan cells ( prakaar mr44 and nr44 ).
zinc-air bydaree prakaar pr44 aavashyaktaa air to kaary.
Silver-oxide bydaree prakaar sr44 may provide atirikt kshamta compared to lr44 types lakin have thodaa alag voltage visheshtaayen.
pradarshan of a yantra meant to upyog a silver-oxide bydaree may be degraded with pratisthaapan of lr44 prakaar.

hurricane Katrina thi the deadliest or most destructive atlantic hurricane of the 2005 Atlantic hurricane ritu.
it thi the costliest prakritik vipatti, as khub as ek of the paanch deadliest hurricanes, in the history of the United States.
among ankit atlantic hurricanes, it thi the sixth strongest overall.
At tanik 1,833 logon died in the hurricane or subsequent floods, bananaa it the deadliest u.S. hurricane since the 1928 okeechobee hurricane ; kul property kshati thi estimated at $ 81 arab ( 2005 usd ), nearly tripal the kshati brought by hurricane andrew in 1992.
hurricane katrina formed over the bahama on agast 23, 2005 and crossed dakshini florida as a moderet shrenee 1 hurricane, causing kuch mauton and flooding there pehle strengthening rapidly in the gulf of mexico.
the hurricane strengthened to a shrenee 5 hurricane over the garam gulf jal, but weakened pehle making iske duusari landfall as a shrenee 3 hurricane on the morning of somvaar, August 29 in southeast Louisiana.
It caused severe vinaash saath the Gulf coast isse central florida to texas, much of it due to the toofaan surge.
The most significant kramank of deaths occurred in nai Orleans, louisiana, jisase flooded as the tatabandh pranali catastrophically vifal, in anek maamle ghanton baad the toofaan tha sthanantarit antardeshiy.
Eventually 80 % of the nagar or vishaal tracts of neighboring parishes became flooded, or the floodwaters lingered liye saptaah.
however, the worst property kshati occurred in coastal kshetron, aise as all mississippi beachfront kasbon, jisase yahood flooded over 90 % in ghanton, as boats or casino barges rammed imaaraten, pushing gaadiyaan or houses antardeshiy, saath waters reaching 6–12 mile ( 10–19 km ) from the bich.
The hurricane surge suraksha failures in nai orlions are mana the worst civil abhiyantriki vipatti in U.S. history or prompted a mukadmaa viruddh the u.S. fouj corps of Engineers ( usace ), the designers or builder of the tatabandh pranali as mandated by the Flood control Act of 1965.
jimmedaari liye the asafalataaon or flooding thi rakhi squarely on the fouj corps in janvari 2008 by nyaayadhish Stanwood duval, U.S. zila adaalat, lakin the sangheey agency could not be yojit financially liable due to sovereign pratirakshan in the baadh control adhinium of 1928.
There was bhi an chaanbin of the pratikriyaayein isse sangheey, state and local sarkarein, resulting in the istipha of sangheey apaat Management Agency ( FEMA ) nideshak maaikel D. bhura, or of New Orleans police vibhaag ( NOPD ) adheekshak edi compass.
anek agenciyon sahit the sanyukt rajya coast guard ( uscg ), neshnal Hurricane bich ( NHC ), and National Weather seva ( nws ) were commended liye unke kriyaayein.
ve provided accurate hurricane mausam trekking forecasts saath sufficient sise samay.
Even the most insistent appeals isse neshnal, rajya and local public officials to nivaasiyon to evacuate before the toofaan kiya nahin warn ki the levees could breach or asafal.
u.S. karz from 1940 to 2011.
Red linon indicate the `` debt yojit by the public '' or blike linon indicate the total neshnal karz or sakal public karz.
the antar is the `` intragovernmental karz, '' which shaamil dayitvon to government kaarykram such as soshal suraksha.
Stated as a sutara, National Debt = Debt yojit by the Public + Intragovernmental karz.
the duusari falak shows the do karz figures as a pratishat of u.S. jidipi ( dollar value of u.S. aarthik production liye ki saal ).
the sheersh falak is deflated so every year is in 2010 dollars.
the sanyukt rajya public karz is the dhan udhaar by the sangheey sarkari of the United rajya through the issuing of pratibhuti by the rajkosh or anya federal sarkari agenciyon.
US public karz consists of do ghatakaus:
karz yojit by the public shaamil Treasury pratibhuti yojit by niveshkon outside the federal sarkari, sahit ki yojit by individuals, corporations, the sangheey arakshit System or videshi, rajya or local governments.
karz yojit by government accounts or intragovernmental karz shaamil non-marketable rajkosh pratibhuti yojit in accounts administered by the sangheey government ki are owed to kaarykram beneficiaries, aise as the soshal Security vishwaas nidhi.
karz held by sarkari khate represents the cumulative surpluses, sahit byaaj aay, of ye accounts ki have maharoom invested in rajkosh pratibhuti.
public debt increases or decreases as a parinaam of the annual ekikrut bajet deficit or surplus.
the sangheey sarkari budget deficit or surplus is the difference between government receipts or bitaa, ignoring intra-governmental hastantaran.
however, kuch bitaa ki is excluded from the deficit ( supplemental appropriations ) also adds to the karz.
historically, the us public karz as a share of jidipi increased dauraan yudhon and recessions, or subsequently declined.
liye example, debt held by the public as a share of jidipi peaked bas after sansar yuddh ii ( 113 % of jidipi in 1945 ), lakin tab fell over the following 30 saalo.
in haal dashakon, however, vishaal bajet deficits or the resulting increases in karz have led to chintaa about the long-term sthirataa of the sangheey sarkari 's phiscal nitiyon.
on 2 april 2013, debt yojit by the public thi lagbhag $ 11.959 kharab or about 75 % of jidipi.
intragovernmental holdings stood at $ 4.846 kharab, giving a sanyukt kul public karz of $ 16.805 kharab.
As of janvari 2013, $ 5.6 kharab or lagbhag 47 % of the karz yojit by the public thi swaamitv by foreign investors, the largest of jisase yahood the logon 's ganatantr of china and japani at bas over $ 1.1 kharab each.
In basket, an assist is attributed to a player who gujarata the ball to a teammate in a rasta that lead to a score by field lakshya, arth ki he or wo thi `` assisting '' in the basket.
vahin is kuch nirnay shaamil in deciding whether a passer should be credited saath an assist.
An assist can be scored for the passer bhi if the player jo receives the pass makes a basket after dribling the ball.
However, the asli paribhaasha of an assist kiya nahin include aise paristhitiyon, so the tulana of assist statistics aarpaar eras is a complex padaarth.
Only the pass directly pehle the score may be gine as an assist, so no adhik than ek assist can be recorded prati field lakshya ( unlike in other khel, aise as barf hockey ).
a pass that lead to a shooting beyimaani or scoring by free throws does not ginati as an assist in the enbie, but does in FIBA khel ( tabhi ek assist is awarded prati niyat of free throws in jisase at tanik one free throw is made ).
point guard tend to milengi the most assists per khel ( apg ), as unke bhoomika is primarily ki of a passer and ballhandler.
centers tend to get fewer assists, but centers saath good manzil upasthiti or adaalat drushti can dominate a toli by assisting.
Being andar the kunjee, the bich praayah rai the best kone or the behtareen sthiti liye `` bartan '' or anya short gujarata in the scoring kshetrafal.
bich wilt Chamberlain led the enbie in assists in 1968.
a damdaar center with inside-scoring prowess, aise as purv NBA center Hakeem olajuwon, can bhi be an prabhavi assistor because the defense 's double-teaming tends to kholen up offense in the rup of shooters.
The enbie single-game assist ricard is 30, yojit by Scott skiles of the orlando jaadu viruddh the Denver Nuggets, on December 30, 1990.
the enbie record liye sabase kariyar assists is yojit by jon stowton saath 15,806.
the mil or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the uk, jab discussing property kar in the sanyukt rajya, or previously in cyprus or Malta ) is a now-abstract unit of karency used sometimes in hisaab.
in the United rajya, it is a notional ikai samatuly to of a United rajya dollars ( a dasavaan of a cent ).
In the sanyukt kingdom it thi prastaavit dauraan the dashakon of charchaa on the decimalization of the pound as a prabhag of the pound sterling.
anek anya currencies prayukt the mil, aise as the Maltese lira.
the pad aata isse the latin `` millesimum '', arth `` thousandth bhaag ''.
the greco-persian yudhon ( also praayah called the Persian yudhon ) yahood a shrenee of conflicts between the hakhaamani samrajya of Persia or city-states of the Hellenic world ki prarambh in 499 bc or lasted until 449 BC.
the collision between the fractious political world of the unaniyon or the enormous empire of the farsiyon began when sires the great conquered Ionia in 547 bc.
struggling to niyam the independent-minded shaharon of ionia, the farsiyon niyukt utpeedak to rule prayek of unhen.
This would prove to be the source of much trouble for the unaniyon or Persians alike.
in 499 bc, the then tyrant of miletus, aristagoras, embarked on an expedition to jeeten the dweep of naxos, saath parsi support ; however, the expedition thi a qahar or, pre-empting his dismissal, Aristagoras incited sab of helenic asia naaballig into vidroh viruddh the Persians.
is thi the shuruuaat of the ionian vidroh, jisase hota pichhlaa jabatak 493 bc, progressively aarekhan adhik regions of asia naaballig into the virodh.
aristagoras secured sainya support from athens or eretria, or in 498 bc ye forces helped to capchar or burn the parsi regional capital of sardis.
the Persian king daara the great vowed to have badla on Athens or eretria liye this act.
the revolt jari, saath the two pahalu effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 bc.
In 494 bc, the farsiyon regrouped, and attacked the epicentre of the revolt in miletus.
at the Battle of lade, the Ionians suffered a decisive shikast, and the vidroh collapsed, saath the final sadasyon being stamped out the following saal.
seeking to surakshit uske samrajya isse further revolts and isse the hastkshep of the menland unaniyon, daara embarked on a scheme to jeeten unaniyon and to sajaa Athens or eretria for burning Sardis.
The pehla Persian invasion of unaniyon began in 492 bc, with the parsi saamaanya mardonius conquering Thrace and macedon before anek mishaps majaboor an early end to the abhiyaan.
in 490 bc a duusari force thi sent to unaniyon, this samay aarpaar the igian samudr, antargat the cmand of Datis or Artaphernes.
is expedition subjugated the cyclades, pehle besieging, capturing or razing eretria.
However, jabaki en root to akraman athens, the parsi force was decisively defeated by the athenians at the battle of Marathon, samaapti parsi praytn liye the time hone.
daara then began to yojana to complete the conquest of unaniyon, but died in 486 BC or responsibility liye the conquest passed to his bete xerxes I.
In 480 BC, xerxes personally led the duusari parsi akraman of Greece saath ek of the largest ancient sena kabhi samavet.
vijay over the 'allied ' unani rajya ( led by sparta or athens ) at the Battle of Thermopylae anumat the farsiyon to mashaal athens or overrun sabase of Greece.
However, while seeking to nasht the combined Greek bede, the farsiyon suffered a kathor shikast at the battle of Salamis.
the following saal, the confederated unaniyon gai on the offensive, defeating the Persian fouj at the Battle of plataea, or ending the akraman of unaniyon.
the alide Greeks followed up their kamyaabi by destroying the rest of the parsi fleet at the Battle of mycale, pehle expelling parsi garrisons isse Sestos ( 479 BC ) and byzantium ( 478 bc ).
the kriyaayein of the saamaanya pausanias at the siege of Byzantium alienated anek of the unani states isse the spartans, or the anti-persian gathbandhan was isliye reconstituted around athenian netritv, as the so-called delian lig.
the delian lig jari to abhiyaan against faras for the aglaa teen dashakon, shuruuaat saath the expulsion of the baaki Persian garrisons isse europea.
At the battle of the Eurymedon in 466 bc, the lig won a doguna vijay ki aakhirkaar secured swatantraaa liye the shaharon of ionia.
however, the lig 's bhagidaari in an Egyptian revolt ( isse 460–454 BC ) resulted in a disastrous shikast, or further campaigning was nilambit.
A bede was bheja to Cyprus in 451 bc, lakin hasil little, or when it withdrew the greco-persian yudhon khinchaa to a shant samaapt.
kuch aitihaasik strot sujhaayen the end of hostilities thi chihnit by a salaam sandhi between athens or Persia, the so-called salaam of callias.
hooverville nikat Portland, oregon
A `` Hooverville '' is the popular naam for shanty kasbon nirmit by beghar logon dauraan the great avsaad.
They yahood namit baad herbert Hoover, jo was adhyaksh of the United rajya dauraan the onset of the avsaad or widely blamed liye it.
the pad was coined by charles micelson, publicity mukhya of the loktantric neshnal Committee.
mathew maaikel Hasselbeck ( born sitambar 25, 1975 ) is an amareeki footbaal quarterbaque liye the Indianapolis coltas of the National footbaal League ( enegel ).
he was drafted in the sixth golakaar of the 1998 enegel Draft by the green khadi pakars.
After a season on the abhyaas squad or two sizan backing up brett favre, he was traded to the Seattle sihox in 2001.
Hasselbeck gained the starting bhoomika in 2003, or led sietal to chah playoff dikhaave or a Super Bowl rup ; he thi chaynit to teen pro pyaale and an All-Pro selection.
following ten sizan saath the sihox, hasselbeck joined the tennesi Titans in 2011.
Hasselbeck then hastakshrit a anubandh saath the indianapolis coltas in 2013 less than 24 hours after hone released by the tennesi titans.
isiti is inevitably sambandhit to the computer network.
Information and sanchaar Technology or ( isiti ), is often prayukt as an extended paryaay liye soochna praudyogiki ( it ), lakin is a adhik vishisht term that stresses the bhoomika of ekikrut sanchaar and the integration of doorsanchaar ( telephone linon or wireless signal ), computer as khub as necessary enterprise tantra, middleware, bhandar, and audio-visual pranaaliyon, jisase enable upayokta to abhigam, store, transmit, and herpher soochna.
the phrase isiti tha been prayukt by academik researchers since the 1980s, lakin it became lokapriy after it thi prayukt in a report to the uk sarkari by Dennis stevenson in 1997 or in the sanshodhit neshnal Curriculum liye england, Wales and uttari ireland in 2000.
the term ICT is abhi also used to refer to the convergence of audio-visual or telephone sanjaal saath computer networks through a single cabling or kadi pranali.
vahin are large aarthik protsaahan ( huge laagat bachat due to vilopan of the telephone sanjaal ) to vilay the audio-visual, bhawan management and telephone sanjaal saath the computer sanjaal pranali using a single unified system of cabling, signal vitaran and management.
The term infocommunications is used in some maamle as a shorter rup of soochna or sanchaar ( s ) technology.
in fact Infocommunications is the vistaar of telecommunications with soochna prasanskaran or content handlling krityon on a common digital praudyogiki aadhaar.
liye a tulana of these or anya terms, dekhie.
For ICT Development anukramanika around the sansar, dekhie.
is is a suchi of varna isse george lopez.
A schematic prastutikaran of the plums pudding model of the anu ; in thomson 's ganitiya model the `` corpuscles '' ( or aadhunik electrons ) were arranged non-randomly, in ghurnan rings
the current model of the sub-atomic dhaancha involves a ghanaa cendrak surrounded by a probabilistic `` cloud '' of electrons
the plums kheer model of the anu by J. J. thomson, who khoja the electron in 1897, thi prastaavit in 1904 pehle the discovery of the parmaanu nucleus in order to add the electron to the parmaanu model.
In is model, the atom is rachit of electrons ( jisase Thomson still pukaara `` corpuscles '', haalanki G. J. stoney tha proposed ki atoms of electricity be called electrons in 1894 ) ghiri by a soup of dhanatmak charge to santulan the electrons ' rinatmak aarope, jaise negatively charge `` plums `` ghiri by positively charge `` kheer ``.
the electrons ( as we jaan them today ) were thought to be positioned throughout the anu, lakin with anek structures sambhavit liye positioning anek electrons, visheshkar rotating bajati of electrons ( dekhie neeche ).
Instead of a soup, the anu thi also sometimes said to have tha a `` cloud '' of dhanatmak charge.
saath is model, thomson abandoned his earlier `` nebular atom '' pariklpana in jisase the anu was composed of immaterial vortices.
Now, at tanik part of the anu thi to be rachit of Thomson 's particulate negative corpuscles, haalanki the baaki of the positively charge bhaag of the anu remained somewhat nebulous or ill-defined.
the 1904 thomson model thi disproved by the 1909 gold foil prayog of hans geiger or Ernest marden.
This thi interpreted by arnest radarford in 1911
to imply a very choti cendrak of the atom containing a very unchi dhanatmak charge ( in the maamla of gold, enough to santulan parichay 100 electrons ), yun agrani to the radarford model of the anu.
haalanki sunaharaa has an parmaanu kramank of 79, immediately baad radarford 's paper appeared in 1911 Antonius vine den broek bana the sahaj suzav ki parmaanu number is nuclear charge.
the padaarth required experiment to decide.
henry Moseley 's kaary dikhaaya experimentally in 1913 ( dekhie moseley 's vidhi ) ki the prabhavi nabhikeey charge was bahut close to the atomic kramank ( Moseley found only one ikai difference ), or moseley sanderbhit tabhi the papers of vine den broek and radarford.
This kaary culminated in the solar-system-like ( lakin quantum-limited ) bohr model of the anu in the same year, in which a cendrak containing an parmaanu number of positive charge is surrounded by an baraabar kramank of electrons in kakshiya shell.
Bohr tha bhi inspired moseley 's kaary.
thomson 's model was compared ( though nahin by thomson ) to a British dessert called plums kheer, hence the name.
thomson 's paper thi prakashit in the kooch 1904 sanskaran of the philosophical patrika, the leading British vigyaan jarnal of the din.
in thomson 's view :... the atoms of the elements consist of a number of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in a sphere of vardi dhanatmak vidyutikaran,...
in this model, the electrons were free to ghurnan bheetar the blob or badal of dhanatmak padaarth.
ye orbits yahood stabilized in the model by the fact that jab an electron moved dur isse the bich of the dhanatmak badal, it felt a larger net dhanatmak inward force, kuki there thi adhik saamagree of vipareet charge, andar its kaksha ( dekhie gouse 's vidhi ).
in Thomson 's model, electrons yahood free to rotate in bajati jisase yahood further stabilized by interactions between the electrons, or spectra yahood to be accounted for by urja differences of different ring orbits.
thomson attempted to mek uske model account for some of the pramukh spectral linon gyaat liye kuch elements, lakin was not notably successful at this.
Still, thomson 's model ( saath saath a similar saturnian ring model liye atomic electrons, bhi put forward in 1904 by Nagaoka after james clerk maxwell 's model of Saturn 's rings ), yahood pehle harbingers of the baad or adhik successful solar-system-like bohr model of the anu.
theth strip of bekan.
bekan is a cured maance prepared from a suar.
it is pehla cured using vishaal quantities of namak, either in a brine or in a dry packing ; the result is bhais bacon ( also gyaat as green bekan ).
Fresh bekan may then be further sukhi liye saptaah or months in thanda air, or it may be boiled or smoked.
bhais and sukhi bekan is typically cooked pehle eating.
Boiled bacon is taiyaar to eat, as is some smoked bekan, but may be pakaaya further pehle eating.
Bacon is prepared from anek alag katautee of meat.
It is praayah bana isse paksh or waapas katautee of pork, except in the United rajya, jahaan it is almost sadaa prepared isse pork belly ( typically referred to as `` streaky '', `` vasiy '', or `` amareeki style '' baahar of the us or canada ).
the side cut rai more meat or kam mote than the pet.
bekan may be prepared isse either of do pruthak waapas katautee : fatback, jisase is lagbhag pure mote, and pork loin, jisase is very jhukna.
Bacon-cured pork loin is known as waapas bekan.
uncooked pork pet bekan strips.
bekan may be khaaya smoked, boiled, fried, baked, or grield, or prayukt as a naaballig ingredient to swaad bartan.
bekan is bhi used liye barding or larding roasts, visheshkar khel, e.g. venison, pheasant.
the shabd is derived from the boodha unchi germany bacho, meaning `` buttock '', `` ham '' or `` paksh of bekan '', and cognate saath the Old French bekan.
In mahadwipiya europea, is bhaag of the suar is praayah nahin smoked jaise bekan is in the United States ; it is used primarily in ghan ( lardons ) as a kooking sanghatak, valued dono as a source of mote or for iske swaad.
In italy, this is pukaara pancetta or is usually pakaaya in choti ghan or served uncooked or thinly sliced as bhaag of an antipasto.
Meat from anya pashu, aise as beef, lamb, murga, bakrii, or turkey, may bhi be cut, cured, or varanaa prepared to resemble bekan, and may even be referred to as `` bacon ''.
aise use is aam in kshetron with significant yahudee or muslim populations.
the USDA defines bekan as `` the cured belly of a swine carcass '' ; other katautee or visheshtaayen must be separately yogya ( e.g., `` smoked pork loin bekan '' ).
For safety, bekan jarur be treated to prevent trichinosis, caused by trichinella, a parasitic roundworm jisase can be nasht by heating, jamane, drying, or dhumrapaan.
bekan is vishisht from namak pork or ham by differences in the brine ( or shushk packing ).
Bacon brine has added curing sanghatak, most notably sodium nitrite, or occasionally sodium nitrate or potacium nitrate ( saltapeter ) ; sodium ascorbate or erythorbate hai added to accelerate curing and stabilize color.
flavorings aise as brown sugar or mapel hai prayukt for kuch utpaada.
if prayukt, sodium polyphosphates hai added to improve sliceability or reduce spattering when the bekan is pan fried.
aaj, a brine liye ham, lakin nahin bacon, includes a vishaal raashi of sugar.
historically, `` ham '' or `` bekan '' referred to alag katautee of maance that yahood brined or packed identically, often together in the same barrel.
the karmchaaree ritairement aay Security Act of 1974 ( ERISA ) (, samhitabaddh in bhaag at ) is a sangheey vidhi jisase establishes nunatam maanakon liye pension yojanaayen in private udyog or provides for extensive rules on the federal aay kar prabhaav of transactions sambhddha saath karmchaaree benefit yojanaayen.
erisa thi enacted to protect the interests of karmchaaree benefit yojana participants or unke beneficiaries by:
requiring the disclosure of vittiya or anya information concerning the yojana to beneficiaries ;
establishing maanakon of conduct liye yojana fiduciaries ;
providing liye uchit remedies or abhigam to the federal courts.
erisa is sometimes prayukt to refer to the full body of kanoon regulating employee laabh yojanaayen, which hai mila mukhyatah in the aatanrik aay code or ERISA itself.
Responsibility liye the nirvachan or pravartan of ERISA is vibhajit among the vibhaag of majdoor, the Department of the rajkosh ( particularly the aatanrik aay seva ), or the pension laabh Guaranty nigam.
Illegal avrajan to the United rajya is the act of videshi nagarikon entering the sanyukt rajya, bagaiyr sarkari permission or in ulanghan of sanyukt rajya nationality law, or rahakar beyond the termination tithi of a visa, also in violation of the law.
a warning chihn at the international boundary between the sanyukt rajya or Canada in point Roberts, washington.
A much different drushtikon at the u.s.-mexico kinaaraa nikat el paso, texas
the undocumented immigrant janasankhyikee of the United States in 2008 thi anumaanit by the bich liye avrajan adhyayan to be about 11 lakh logon, bas isse 12.5 lakh people in 2007.
Other estimates dayera isse 7 to 20 lakh.
according to a 2005 pew hispanic bich rapat, 56 % of undocumented apravasiyon yahood isse Mexico ; 22 % were isse anya latin amareeki deshon ; 13 % yahood isse Asia ; 6 % yahood isse europea or Canada ; or 3 % yahood isse Africa and the rest of the world.

in insaan anatomy, the ulnar tantrika is a tantrika jisase ranon nikat the ulna bone.
the ulnar collateral snaayu of kohni sanyukt is in sambandh with the ulnar nerve.
the tantrika is the largest unprotected tantrika in the insaan deh ( meaning unprotected by muscle or asthi ), so chot is aam.
This tantrika is directly conect to the choti ungali, or the sata half of the ring ungali, supplying the palmar paksh of ye fingers, sahit dono saamne and back of the tips, shaayad as far waapas as the fingernail beds.
ek vidhi of injuring the nerve is to strike the medial epicondyle of the humerus isse posteriorly, or inferiorly with the kohni flexed.
The ulnar tantrika is funs between the asthi or the overlying skin at this point.
This is commonly referred to as bumping ek 's `` mjedaar asthi ''.
is name is vichaar to be a pun, aadhaarit on the dhwani praturup between the name of the asthi of the upper bhujaa, the `` humerus `` or the word `` humorous ``.
alternatively, according to the Oxford English shabdkosh it may refer to `` the peculiar sansani anbhavi jab it is struck ''.
Hogwarts skool of chudail and wizardry, shortened hoguarts, is a fictional angrejon skool of jaadu liye vidhyaarthee aged eleven to atharah, or is the praathmik setting liye the pehla chah books in J.K. rolling 's harry kumhaar shrenee.
rolling rai sujhaayaa that she may have inadvertently liya the naam isse the hogwort plant ( croton capitatus ), which she tha dekhi at Kew gardens kuch samay before writing the series, haalanki the names `` The hoguarts '' or `` hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 nigel molesworth book kaisaa to be topp by Geoffrey Willans.
hoguarts school thi voted as the 36th behtareen scottish educational sthapana in a 2008 online ranking, outranking edinburgh 's loretto School.
According to a nideshak of the swatantra skulon sanjaal rankings, it thi added to the skulon listing `` for majaa '' and thi then voted on.
the u.S. subprime bandhak sankat thi a niyat of kaarykram or sharten ki led to a vittiya crisis and subsequent recession that began in 2008.
it was characterized by a vruddhi in subprime bandhak delinquencies or foreclosures, or the resulting manaahi of pratibhuti backed by kaha mortgages.
anek major vittiya sansthaanon collapsed in sitambar 2008, with significant disruption in the pravaah of credit to vyavsaayon or upabhokta or the onset of a kathor vaishvik mandi.
There yahood anek causes of the sankat, with commentators assigning different str of dosha to financial institutions, regulators, credit agencies, sarkari housing policies, or upabhokta, among anya.
a proximate kaaran thi the vruddhi in subprime lending.
the percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated dauraan a given year rose from the aitihaasik 8 % or nimnatar range to lagbhag 20 % isse 2004 to 2006, saath much ucchtar ratios in some parts of the u.s.
A unchi pratishat of ye subprime mortgages, over 90 % in 2006 liye udhaaharan, were adjustable-rate mortgages.
These do parivartan yahood bhaag of a broader trend of lowered lending standards or higher-risk mortgage utpaada.
further, U.S. households tha become increasingly rini, saath the ratio of debt to dispojable personal aay uthati isse 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the samaapt of 2007, much of is increase mortgage-related.
jab U.S. ghar keemten asweekrut steeply baad peaking in mid-2006, borrowers ' ability to punarvitt their lone became adhik mushkil.
as adjustable-rate mortgages began to riset at higher interest daron ( causing ucchtar masik bhugtan ), bandhak delinquencies soared.
pratibhuti samarthit saath mortgages, sahit subprime mortgages, widely held by vittiya firms globally, khoyaa sabase of unke maan.
vaishvik niveshkon also drastically ghataya purchases of mortgage-backed debt and anya securities as bhaag of a manaahi in the kshamta or willingness of the private vittiya pranali to support lending.
chintaaen about the soundness of u.S. credit or financial markets led to tightening credit around the sansar or slowing aarthik vikaas in the u.S. or europea.
the sankat tha kathor, long-lasting consequences liye the u.S. or europea economies.
the u.S. daalaa a gahan mandi, saath nearly 9 lakh jobs khoyaa during 2008 or 2009, roughly 6 % of the workforce.
u.S. housing keemten fell nearly 30 % on ausat or the u.S. bhandar market fell lagbhag 50 % by early 2009.
As of jaldi 2013, the u.S. bhandar market tha recovered to its pre-crisis peak lakin awaas keemten remained nikat their low point or berogari remained elevated.
aarthik vikaas remained neeche pre-crisis levels.
Europe also jari to sangharsh with iske own aarthik crisis.
Carl Jung in 1910.
myrs or Briggs extrapolated their mbti theory isse Jung 's writings in uske kitaab manovaigyanik prakaar.
the Myers-Briggs prakaar indicator ( mbti ) assessment is a psychometric questionnaire designed to measure manovaigyanik variyataon in kaisaa people perceive the sansar and make nirnay.
ye preferences yahood extrapolated from the typological theories proposed by karl gustav jang and pehla prakashit in uske 1921 kitaab manovaigyanik prakaar ( angrezi sanskaran, 1923 ).
jang theorized ki vahin hai four principal psychological krityon by which we anubhav the sansar : sansani, antargyaan, ahsaas, or soch.
ek of ye four krityon is dominant sabase of the samay.
the original develper of the personality inventory yahood katharine cook briggs and uske beti, isabel briggs myrs ; ye do, having padhai extensively the kaary of Jung, turned their byaaj of insaan behavior into a bhakthi of turning the siddhanth of psychological prakaar to vyaavhaarik use.
ve began bananaa the indicator during sansar yuddh II, believing ki a gyaan of vyaktitv preferences hota sahaayta mahilaon jo yahood pravesh the audyogic workforce liye the first samay to pahachaano the sort of war-time kaary ki would be `` sabase aaramdaayak or prabhavi ''.
the aarambhik prashnawali grew into the myers-briggs prakaar indicator, jisase was pehla prakashit in 1962.
The mbti focuses on saamaanya populations or emphasizes the maan of naturally occurring matbhed.
robert Kaplan or denis Saccuzzo maananaa `` the underlying assumption of the mbti is ki we sab have vishisht variyataon in the rasta we construe our experiences, or these variyataon underlie hamaari ruchi, needs, maan, or prerana '' ( p. 499 ).
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording kalakaar mahila gaaga, isse uske duusari studio album born is rasta ( 2011 ).
it thi released by interscope Records on april 15, 2011, four dinon ahead of its anusuchit relies.
likhaa or produced by mahila gaaga and RedOne, `` yahuda '' is a nrity and electro house song parichay a stri in love saath a man jo gaddari uske.
it embodies the incidents ki have haunted Gaga in the past, or iske kor meaning refers to the rinatmak parts of her life ki wo ca n't escape.
gaaga rai further samajhaayaa ki the song thi bhi about honoring one 's bhitari andhera in anukram to lao oneself into the light.
the kalakriti liye the single was designed by gaaga in microsoft shabd.
in spite of a polarizing prabhaav on anek dharmik samooh, the song thi generally well praapt by aalochakon, jo likened the song to `` Bad romance `` with kuch noting it should have been the album 's lead single.
The song rai a samaan dhwani to gaaga 's pichhlaa redone-produced treks, sahit `` pokar phase ``, `` lovegame ``, `` karaab romance '', and `` Alejandro ``.
it contains teen distinct hooks or a house -influenced brake bas.
gaaga samajhaayaa ki the linon spoken during the breakdown baat parichay uske as pare redemption, regarding the paramparaagat views of what a stri chahie be.
`` yahuda '' initially tha a damdaar bikri kholane, lakin thi kam kaamyaab commercially in comparison to Gaga 's pichhlaa singles.
The song pahunche the sheersh ten of the chart in sabase pramukh music bazaar, and bhi pahunche the sheersh of the charts in dakshin Korea.
A music video liye the song thi filmed in april 2011, co-directed by Gaga or Laurieann gibson or co-starring norman reedus.
It has a biblical storyline jahaan Reedus nibhaai Judas iscarriyat or Gaga nibhaai mariyam magdalene.
the video portrays them as aadhunik din prachaarkon going to Jerusalem.
It shaamil the biblical story of yahuda betraying yishu, and ended saath Gaga as magdalene getting stoned to maut.
pehle iske relies, the catholic lig condemned gaaga liye the kathith upyog of dharmik imagery and uske bhoomika in the video.
however, critics generally praised the video, nahin dhundhna koi apriy saamagree.
The video was manonith liye do puraskaar at the 2011 amtivi video Music puraskaar.

Marvin Gaye ( April 2, 1939april 1, 1984 ), born marvin pentz Gay, Jr., was an American singer-songwriter and sangeetkaar.
gaye helped to aakaar the dhwani of motown Records in the 1960s saath a string of hits sahit `` kaisaa Sweet it Is ( To be loved by You ) `` or `` I Heard It through the Grapevine `` and duet ricarding saath Mary Wells or tammi Terrell, baad earning the sheershak `` prince of motown '' or `` prince of aatma ''.
dauraan the 1970s, Gaye ankit the concept albums What 's Going on and let 's Get it on or became among the first kalakaaron in Motown to brake away isse the reins of its production company.
gaye 's baad ricarding bahekaave anek r & b subgenres aise as quiet toofaan or neo-soul.
following a kaal in europea under a kar nirvaasan in the early 1980s, gaye released the 1982 grami Award-winning hit `` yon healing `` or the madhyaraatri prem album.
chunki uske maut in 1984, gaye rai maharoom maranoparant sammanit by anek institutions, sahit the Grammy aaajeevan uplabdhi Award or the chattan or phenken haul of kirti.
the academy puraskaar liye Best chitra is ek of the academy Awards of Merit presented annually by the academy of Motion chitra kala or sciences ( ampas ) to nirmaataa working in the gati chitra udyog or is the tabhi category in jisase prayek member is yogya to nominate liye.
behtareen Picture is mana the most mahatvapurn of the Academy puraskaar, as it represents sab the directing, acting, music composing, likhane, editing and other praytn put forth into a filmi.
natijatan, behtareen Picture is the final award or the conclusion of the salanaa Academy puraskaar ceremony.
The Grand staircase columns at the dolby Theatre in Los Angeles, where the Academy Awards ceremonies have been held since 2002, shokes every film ki rai jiti the Best chitra sheershak since the puraskaar 's inception 85 years pehle.
baari barsaat is an interactive naatak action-adventure video khel created by french develper Quantic sapana exclusively liye the plastesan 3.
the game is written or nirdeshit by quantic sapana 's sansthaapak and siio daud pinjraa.
Heavy Rains story is a naatakeey thriller modelled baad filmi noir, featuring chaar protagonists shaamil saath the rahasy of the origami kaatil, a serial kaatil jo upyog extended periods of rainfall to dubo uske peediton.
Ethan mangal is trying to sahejen uske bete isse hone the aglaa victim, jabaki investigative patrkaar medisson Paige, epabiai profiler norman jayden, and nijee jasoos Scott Shelby hai each trying to track bas clues to the origami kaatil 's pahchaan.
the khilaadi interacts saath the khel by performing kriyaayein highlighted on screen sambandhit to motions on the niyantrak, or in kuch maamle, performing a shrenee of jaldi samay kaarykram dauraan fast-paced action sequences.
the khilaadi 's nirnay or kriyaayein during the khel hoga affect the katha.
the pramukh varna can be maare, or nishchit kriyaayein may sise to alag drishyon or endings.

Total superannuation udyog liabilities : sadasyon funds or reserves ( a $ lakho ) chunki 1988.
Annual kul superannuation udyog asset growth 1996-2005.
Superannuation in Australia refers to the arrangements jisase logon mek in australia to have nidhi uplabdhiyaan liye unhen in ritairement.
in Australia, superannuation intjaam hai government-supported or protsaahit, or nunatam provisions hai compulsory for karmchaaree.
liye udhaaharan, niyokta hai required to adaa a proportion of an karmchaaree 's salaries or mazdooree ( philhal 9 % ) into a superannuation nidhi, but logon hai protsaahit to put aside atirikt nidhi into superannuation.
the nunatam daayitv jaruri by niyokta is set to increase to 12 % gradually stepping annually from 2013 to 2020.
an vyaktigat can withdraw nidhi out of a superannuation fund when the vyakti meets ek of the conditions of relies contained in anusuchee 1 of the superannuation udyog ( Supervision ) regulations 1994.

Electoral college map prardashit the parinaam of the 2012 U.S. adhyakshiya chunaav.
adhyaksh Barack obama ( D - il ) won the lokapriy vote in 26 rajya or the zila of Columbia ( denoted in blue ) to capchar 332 electoral mat.
purv rajyapal Mitt romney ( r - ma ) jiti the popular vote in 24 rajya ( denoted in red ) to capture 206 chunavi mat.
cartogram pratinidhitiv of the chunavi college vote for the 2012 chunaav, saath prayek vargakar representing one electoral vote.
The United rajya Electoral College is the sanstha that officially elects the adhyaksh or vaais adhyaksh of the United rajya prayek chaar years.
the adhyaksh and Vice adhyaksh are not elected sidhe by the matadaata.
bajaay, ve hai elected by `` nirvaachak '' jo hai chosen by lokapriy vote on a state-by-state aadhaar.
Electors are apportioned to prayek rajya or the District of colombia, lakin nahin to territorial possessions of the United States, aise as purto rico or Guam.
the kramank of electors in each rajya is equal to the kramank of sadasyon of Congress to which the state is hakdaar.
the twenty-third amendment rai sadaa resulted in the zila of colombia having teen nirvaachak.
vahin hai 538 nirvaachak, based on vahin hone 435 pratinidhi and 100 senators, plus the teen nirvaachak isse the District of colombia.
nirvaachak are pledged to particular adhyakshiya or vaais presidential ummidavaar, though unpledged nirvaachak hai sambhavit.
In sab rajya, magar maine or nebraska, electors hai nirvaachit on a `` winner-take-all '' aadhaar.
ki is, all nirvaachak pledged to the presidential pratyaashee jo vins the sabase mat in a rajya become nirvaachak liye ki state.
maine and Nebraska upyog the `` congressional district method '', selecting ek elector bheetar each congressional zila by lokapriy vote or selecting the baaki do nirvaachak by a rajyavyapee lokapriy vote.
haalanki no elector is required by sangheey vidhi to sammaan a pledge, vahin have tabhi been bahut few avasaron jab an elector voted contrary to a pratigya.
the barahavin Amendment specifies kaisaa a adhyaksh and vaais adhyaksh are nirvaachit and requires prayek elector to daal ek vote liye President or another vote liye vaais adhyaksh.
aalochakon argue ki the chunavi college is inherently undemocratic and detaa swing states disproportionate influence in electing the President or vaais adhyaksh.
the chunavi college detaa a numeric advantage in the chunaav of the adhyaksh to the choti states, as the minimum kramank of electors for the choti rajya is teen compared to ek liye the chunaav of pratinidhi.
on the anya haath, the winner-take-all vidhi of matdaan favors the larger states.
a kramank of sanvaidhanik amendments have maharoom prastaavit seeking to alter the chunavi College or badalen it with a sidhaa lokapriy vote.
baraak hussein obama II ( ; born August 4, 1961 ) is the 44th or current adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya, the pehla africa amareeki to hold the daftar.
born in Honolulu, hawaii, obama is a graduate of Columbia vishvavidhyalayon or Harvard vidhi skool, jahaan he was adhyaksh of the harvard Law punarvilokan.
He was a community organizer in chicago pehle kamai uske vidhi degree.
he worked as a civil rights attorney in chicago or sikhaaya constitutional law at the vishvavidhyalayon of chicago vidhi skool from 1992 to 2004.
He parosa teen sharten representing the 13th District in the Illinois seenet isse 1997 to 2004, kaaryshil unsuccessfully liye the United rajya House of pratinidhi in 2000.
in 2004, Obama praapt neshnal dhyaan dauraan his abhiyaan to represent Illinois in the sanyukt States seenet saath uske vijay in the kooch loktantric party primary, uske keynote pataa at the Democratic neshnal sammelan in July, and uske chunaav to the Senate in navambar.
he began uske presidential abhiyaan in 2007, and in 2008, baad a band praathmik campaign against hillari rodham Clinton, he jiti sufficient delegates in the loktantric Party primaries to praapt the presidential namakan.
he tab defeated Republican nominee jon macken in the saamaanya election, or thi inaugurated as adhyaksh on January 20, 2009.
Nine maheene later, Obama thi namit the 2009 Nobel salaam Prize laureate.
he was re-elected president in navambar 2012, defeating Republican nominee mitt romney, and thi sworn in liye a duusari pad on janvari 20, 2013.
jaldi in uske pehla pad in daftar, Obama signed into vidhi aarthik stimulus vidhaan in jawaab to the great mandi in the rup of the amareeki recovery and reinvestment adhinium of 2009 or the Tax raahat, berogari Insurance reauthorization, and Job sristi Act of 2010.
anya pramukh gharelu pahalon in uske presidency shaamil the Patient Protection or sasti parvaah Act, praayah referred to as `` obamacare '' ; the dodd–frank wal gali Reform or upabhokta suraksha Act ; the do n't Ask, do n't bataanaa Repeal adhinium of 2010 ; the Budget control adhinium of 2011 ; and the American Taxpayer raahat adhinium of 2012.
in May 2012, he became the pehla sitting U.S. adhyaksh to saream support same-sex vivaah and in 2013 uske prashasan daayar briefs which urged the Supreme adaalat to rule in ehsaan of same-sex yugal in do high-profile maamle.
in videshi niti, Obama ended u.S. military bhagidaari in the iraqi yuddh, increased troop str in afghanistan, hastakshrit the nai prarambh bahen control sandhi with rus, ordered U.S. sainya bhagidaari in libya, or ordered the sainya operation ki resulted in the maut of osama bin laden.
the honda cbr1100xx super Blackbird was a Honda motorcycle bana from 1996 to 2007.
the bike thi viksit to chunauti the Kawasaki ninja zx-11 as the sansar 's tivratam utpaadan motorcycle, or honda succeeded with a sheersh gati of.

The blackbird is named after the lochid sr-71, also a gati record holder.
Sample drishy of an electronic health record aadhaarit on bimb
namoona view of an electronic health ricard
An electronic health ricard ( EHR ) is an evolving avadharana defined as a vyavasthit sangrahan of electronic swasthya information parichay individual marijon or populations.
it is a ricard in digital swaroop ki is theoretically sakasham of being saajha aarpaar alag swasthya parvaah settings.
in some maamle this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide soochna pranaaliyon and anya soochna networks or exchanges.
ehrs may shaamil a dayera of data, sahit janasankhyikee, medical itihaas, medication or allergies, immunization aukaat, prayogshaala pareekshan results, radiology bimb, vital signs, nijee stats jaise age or weight, or billing soochna.
the meriner up on the mast in a toofaan.
ek of the wood-engraved illustrations by Gustave doré.
the rime of the pracheen meriner ( originally the Rime of the ancyent marinere ) is the longest pramukh kavita by the angrezi kavi Samuel tailor cholorij, written in 1797–98 or prakashit in 1798 in the pehla sanskaran of gitatmak ballads.
Modern editions use a baad revised sanskaran printed in 1817 ki pradarshit a gloss.
saath with anya kavitaayen in Lyrical ballads, it was a signal shift to aadhunik poetry or the shuruuaat of angrejon Romantic sahitya.
a proxi auto-config ( PAC ) sanchika defines kaisaa web browsers and anya upayokta agenton can automatically chune the appropriate proxi server ( access vidhi ) liye fetching a die url.
a pac file contains a JavaScript function “findproxyforurl ( url, host ) ”.
This falan ritern a string saath one or adhik abhigam method visheshtaayen.
ye specifications kaaran the user agent to upyog a particular proxy sarwar or to conect directly.
anek visheshtaayen provide a fall-back jab a proxi fails to respond.
The broujar fetches is pac sanchika pehle requesting anya yuarel.
the url of the pac sanchika is either configured hastchalit or determined automatically by the web proxi autodiscovery protocol.

Zendaya is bhi a musician.

iOS ( previously iphone os ) is a mobile oparating pranali developed or vitarit by Apple Inc. originally released in 2007 liye the iphone or ipod tach plateform, it rai been vistaarit to support anya Apple devices such as the ipad or tehraana TV.
Unlike microsoft 's khidkiyaan Phone and google 's android, tehraana karata not license ioes liye sansthapana on non-apple hardware.
, Apple 's app store contained adhik than 700,000 iOS applications, jisase have collectively maharoom downlod adhik than 30 billion times.
It tha a 21 % share of the smartphone mobile oparating pranali ikai shipped in the chauthi quarter of 2012, peeche only google 's android.
in june 2012, it accounted for 65 % of mobile web aankada khapat ( sahit use on dono the iPod tach or the ipad ).
at the half of 2012, vahin yahood 410 lakh divaais activated.
According to the special media event yojit by tehraana on sitambar 12, 2012, 400 million divaais have maharoom sold through june 2012.
the user interfes of ioes is based on the avadharana of direct herpher, using multi-touch gestures.
interfes control elements consist of sliders, switches, or batan.
baatcheet saath the os includes ishaaron aise as swipe, tap, pinch, or reverse pinch, all of jisase have specific paribhaashaayen bheetar the context of the ioes oparating pranali or iske multi-touch interfes.
Internal accelerometers hai prayukt by some anuprayog to respond to shaking the device ( ek aam result is the undo cmand ) or rotating it in teen aayam ( ek common parinaam is switching from portret to landscape vidhi ).
ioes is niklaa isse os X, saath which it shares the darwin foundation.
ioes is Apple 's mobile sanskaran of the os X operating pranali used on tehraana computer.
in ioes, vahin hai chaar abstraction paraton : the Core OS parat, the Core sevaayen layer, the media layer, or the cocoa tach parat.
The vartmaan version of the oparating system ( ioes 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 gb of the device 's flash memory liye the pranali vibhaajan, using roughly 800 mb of ki partition ( varying by model ) liye ioes itself.
ioes currently ranon on iphone, ipad, ipod tach or tehraana TV.

a bigaadane is an automotive aerodynamic device jinaki intended dizine function is to 'spoil ' pratikul air movement aarpaar a deh of a gadee in gati, usually varnit as turbulence or khichein.
vighn on the saamne of a gadee hai often pukaara air dams, kuki in jod to directing air flow they bhi reduce the raashi of air flowing underneath the vehicle jisase generally reduces aerodynamic lift or khichein.
Spoilers hai praayah fitted to res or high-performance khel gaadiyaan, although ve have become aam on yatri vaahanon as khub.
kuch vighn hai added to gaadiyaan primarily for styling uddeshy or have either choti aerodynamic laabh or bhi mek the vayugatiki badtar.
vighn for cars are praayah incorrectly confused with, or the pad used interchangeably with, wings.
automotive wings hai divaais jinaki intended dizine is to generate downforce as air gujarata around unhen, not bas disrupt existing airflow pattern.

it does n't include koi Virtual consol re-releases.

The volt ( pratik : v ) is the si niklaa ikai liye electric sambhavit ( voltage ), electric potential difference, and vidyutvahak force.
the volt is namit in sammaan of the Italian physicist Alessandro Volta ( 1745–1827 ), jo invented the voltayik pile, sambhawatah the pehla chemical battery.
