on 28 june 1914, archduke Franz ferdinand of austria, vaaris presumptive to the austro-hungarian singhaasana, or uske bivi, Sophie, duchess of Hohenberg, were shot dead in sarajevo, by gavrilo princip, ek of a group of six bosnian Serb assassins samanvit by Danilo ilić.
the rajnatik uddeshy of the hatya thi to brake band austria-hungary 's south-slav praanton so ve could be sanyukt into a vrihad Serbia or a yugoslavia.
the assassins ' motives were satat saath the movement ki baad became gyaat as yang bosnia.
srbian sainya adhikariyon stood peeche the akraman.
at the sheersh of these srbian sainya conspirators thi mukhya of srbian Military Intelligence dragutin Dimitrijević, uske righthand man Major Vojislav tankosić, or masterspy rade malobabić.
pramukh tankosić armed the hatyare with bam and pistols or trained unhen.
the assassins were die abhigam to the vahi clandestine tunnel of safe-houses or agents that rade malobabić prayukt liye the ghuspaith of hathiyaar and operatives into austria-hungary.
The hatyare, the kunjee sadasyon of the clandestine tunnel, or the key srbian military shadyantrkariyon jo were still jinda yahood giraftaar, aajamaaya, convicted or punished.
those jo yahood giraftaar in bosnia yahood tried in sarajevo in aktubar 1914.
the anya conspirators were giraftaar or aajamaaya pehle a srbian kangaroo adaalat on the french-controlled salonika saamne in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; srbija chalaaya three of the top sainya shadyantrkariyon.
much of what is gyaat about the assassinations comes isse ye two trial and sambandhit record.
kaarybhaar of jimmedaari liye the bombing and hatyaein of 28 june is highly vivaadaaspad kuki the akraman led to the outbreak of sansar yuddh i one month baad.
mishan San juaan Capistrano was a spani mishan in Southern california, located in present-day San juaan Capistrano.
it thi santhaapit on All Saints ' Day navambar 1, 1776, by Spanish catholics of the franciscan anukram.
Named liye giovanni da Capistrano, a 15th sadi theologian and `` yoddha pujari '' jo resided in the abruzzo pradesh of Italy, san juaan capistrano has the bhed of being ghar to the oldest bhawan in california still in upyog, a chapel built in 1782.
Known alternately as `` Serra 's chapel '' or `` Father Serra 's girijaghar, '' it is the only extant dhaancha jahaan it rai maharoom documented ki the padre Junipero sera manaaye dravyaman.
One of the best gyaat of the Alta california mishan ( or ek of the few missions to have darasal maharoom founded twice—others being mishan san Gabriel arcángel and mishan la purísima concepción ).
The sait thi originally consecrated on aktubar 30, 1775, by pita Fermín lasuén, lakin thi jaldi abandoned due to ashaanti among the swadeshi janasankhyikee in san diego.
The success of the settlement is evident in its aitihaasik records.
prior to the arrival of the prachaarkon, kuch 550 natives yahood bikhare throughout the local kshetrafal.
by 1790, the kramank of parivartit isaayiyon tha grown to 700, or bas chah saalo baad nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( haal converts ) jiya in or around the Mission compound.
1,649 baptisms were conducted ki year alon, out of the kul 4,639 souls parivartit between 1776 and 1847.
adhik than 2,000 purv nivaasiyon ( zyaadaatar juaneño indiens ) hai buried in unmarked graves in the mishan 's cemetery ( campo santo ).
The remains of pita ( baad monsignor ) st. jon o'sullivan, jo pahachaanaa the property 's aitihaasik maan and working tirelessly to conserve or rebuild its structures, are dafn at the pravesh to the cemetery on the west paksh of the property, and a pratimaa raised in his honor stand at the sir of the kript.
the surviving chapel bhi serves as the final resting place of three padress jo passed on jabaki sevarat at the mishan : Fathers jose barona, vicent fustér, and Vicente paskual oliva hai sab entombed beneath the abhayaarany manzil.
The criolla or `` mishan angoor, '' thi first planted at san Juan capistrano in 1779 ; in 1783, the pehla wine utpaadit in alta california ubhara isse the mishan 's winary.
The mishan entered a long period of kramik manaahi baad secularization in 1833.
numerous praytn were bana over the years to restore the Mission to iske former glory, but none mili saath great kamyaabi until the aagaman of pita O'Sullivan in 1910.
bahaali efforts continue, or `` sera 's chapel '' is still prayukt liye dharmik services.
About half-a-million visitors, sahit 80,000 skool children, aaiye to the mishan prayek year.
or jabaki the tabah of `` the great stone Church '' ( which was all but leveled by an 1812 bukamp ) are a renowned architectural achraj, the Mission is shaayad behtareen known for the annual `` vaapasi of the daat '' jisase is traditionally observed prayek March 19 ( Saint joseph 's Day ).
Mission san juaan capistrano rai served as a favorite subject liye anek notable kalakaaron, and rai maharoom immortalized in sahitya and on filmi numerous times, shaayad more than koi anya mission.
In 1984, a aadhunik girijaghar jatil thi constructed bas north or west of the mishan yogic and is abhi gyaat as mishan Basilica san juaan capistrano.
aaj, the mishan compound serves as a sangrahalay, saath the sera chapel bheetar the compound sevarat as a chapel for the mishan mohalla.

it tells the story of unchi school chaatr len Myer jo is suicidal baad his girlfriend brake up with use.
mercedes-benz superdome ( originally Louisiana superdome or commonly the Superdome ) is a khel or pradarshnee stadium, located in the Central kaarobaar zila of nai orlions, louisiana, uese.
yojanaayen yahood drawn up in 1967, by the nai Orleans modernist architectural kad of curtis and davis.
iske steel frem cover a expanse.
Its dome is bana of a lamella multi-ringed frem or rai a vyas of, bananaa it the largest phixd domed structure in the sansar.
it is ghar to the enegel 's nai orlions Saints, the ncaa 's prabhag i-a Tulane green Wave footbaal team ( the largest footbaal stadium in sammelan uese ), the rajya farm bayou clasik, the r+l Carriers nai orlions katori, the allstate sugar Bowl or, prayek chauthi saal, the bcs neshnal championships Game.
Because of the aakaar or sthaan in one of the pramukh paryatak gantavyon in the sanyukt rajya, the Superdome routinely makes the `` choti suchi '' of ummidavaar hone mana liye pramukh sporting kaarykram, such as the Super Bowl and the Final chaar.
in 2005, the superdome gained antarrashtriya attention of a different prakaar when it housed hazaron of logon seeking aashray from hurricane katrina.
The building suffered extensive kshati as a parinaam of the storm, or thi band liye anek months afterward.
on aktubar 3, 2011, it was ghoshit that germany automaker Mercedes-Benz purchased namakaran rights to the stadium.
the nai naam took prabhaav on aktubar 23, 2011.
it is the teesraa stadium ki rai namakaran adhikaron isse mercedes-benz ( and pehla in the sanyukt rajya ), baad the mercedes-benz arina, the stadium of bundesliga club vfb stuttgart, in stuttgart, germany and the mercedes-benz Arena in shanghai, china.

dijani 's animal kingdom awaas is an African-themed dealks resort at the Walt Disney sansar resort.
it kholi on April 16, 2001.

the logon 's party, bhi gyaat as the `` populists '', was a short-lived political party in the United rajya established in 1891 during the Populist gati ( United rajya, 19th Century ).
it thi sabase mahatvapurn in 1892-96, and then rapidly dhundhlee away.
Based among poor, shwet cotton kisaano in the South ( visheshkar uttar carolina, albama, or Texas ) or hard-pressed gehun kisaano in the maidan states ( visheshkar kansas or Nebraska ), it represented a radical crusading form of agrarianism or dushmani to banks, railroads, or elites generally.
It sometimes formed coalitions with majdoor sangh, or in 1896 the democrate endorsed their presidential nominee, wiliam jenings bryan.
the sharten `` populist '' and `` populism `` are commonly prayukt liye anti-elitist appeals in vipaksh to sthapit interests or mukhyadhara partiyon.
bhashaai map of Nigeria, Cameroon, and Benin.
chihn in angrezi, baahar the vishvavidhyalayon of lagos
There hai sainkadon of bhashaaen bolaa in Nigeria.
the pramukh bhashaaen hai yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, ido, fulfulde, kanuri, and ibb.
The aadhikarik bhashaa of Nigeria, angrezi, the purv aupniveshik bhashaa, was chuni to sukar the saanskrithik or bhashaai ekta of the desh.
angrezi, however, remains an vishesh bachaana of the desh 's shahari elite, and is nahin widely bolaa in rural kshetron, jisase comprise three quarters of the countries population.
serial 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of africa as a puure, encompassing teen pramukh africa bhashaaen pariwaron : afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, or niger–congo.
Nigeria also rai several as-yet unclassified bhashaaen, aise as cen tuum, which may represent a relic of an even vrihad vividhta prior to the sprad of the vartmaan bhashaa pariwaron.
a shrenee of kaarykram led to the attack on parl harbar.
yuddh between Japan and the sanyukt States tha maharoom a sambhaavna ki prayek swadesh 's sainya shaktiyaan niojit for chunki the 1920s, haalanki real tension kiya nahin shuru jabatak the 1931 akraman of Manchuria by japani.
over the aglaa decade, japani vistaarit dhire into china, leading to all out yuddh between the do in 1937.
in 1940 Japan invaded french Indochina in an praytn to embargo all imports into china, sahit yuddh supplies kharida isse the U.S.
This move prompted the sanyukt States to embargo sab aayal niryaat, leading the Imperial japani navy to anumaan ki it tha kam than do years of bunker oil remaining and to support the maujuuda plans to seize aayal resources in the dach east indies.
niyojan tha maharoom underway liye some samay on an akraman on the `` dakshini sansaadhan kshetrafal '' to add it to the vrihad east asia co-prosperity gola ki japani envisioned in the Pacific.
The philippine islands, at ki time an American territory, were bhi a Japanese nishaanaa.
the japani military concluded ki an akraman of the philippine would provoke an amareeki sainya jawaab.
balki than seize or fortify the islands, or intjaar for the aprihaary us counterattack, japani 's military netao bajaay decided on the pre-emptive Pearl harbar attack, which they assumed hota negate the amareeki forces needed liye the liberation and reconquest of the islands.
niyojan for the attack tha begun in very jaldi 1941, by admiral Isoroku yamamoto.
He aakhirkaar won assent isse the naval unchi cmand by, among other bate, threatening to istipha.
The akraman thi sweekrut in the garmiyaan at an imperial sammelan or again at a second sammelan in the patan.
simultaneously over the saal, payalton yahood trained, and jahaajon prepared liye its execution.
praadhikaar liye the akraman was granted at the duusari imperial sammelan if a diplomatic parinaam santoshjanak to japani thi nahin pahunche.
baad final sweekruti by Emperor herohito the anukram to attack was issued at the shuruuaat of disambar.
a common office stapler
a common skool stapler
a stapler is a mechanical yantra that joins chaadaren of paper or samaan material by driving a patala metal stepal through the chaadaren and folding the ends.
staplers hai widely used in sarkari, business, offices, homes and skulon.
the shabd `` stapler '' can actually refer to a kramank of different devices of varying upyog.
in addition to joining paper chaadaren saath, staplers can also be prayukt in a surgical setting to juden utak saath saath sargical stepuls to band a sargical ghaav ( much in the vahi rasta as taanke or sutures ).
Typically, sabase staplers hai prayukt to juden multiple sheets of paper.
paper staplers come in do distinct types : hastchalit or electric.
Manual staplers are saamanytah hand-held, haalanki model ki hai prayukt jabaki niyat on a desk or other sataha are nahin uncommon.
Electric staplers exist in a kismein of alag designs and model.
unke praathmik oparating falan is to juden vishaal sankhyaayein of paper chaadaren together in rapid succession.
kuch electric staplers can join up to 20 sheets at a time.
swallowing, gyaat scientifically as deglutition, is the process in the insaan or animal body that makes kuch pass from the mouth, to the pharynx, or into the esophagus, jabaki shutting the epiglottis.
if is fails and the object goes through the trachea, then choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur.
In the insaan body it is niyantrit by the swallowing reflex.
thaddeus Stevens ( April 4, 1792 – agast 11, 1868 ), of pencilvenia, thi a netaa of the kattarpanthi republican gut of the republican Party or a fierce pratidwandi of gulaami.
he thi ek of the sabase influential members in the itihaas of Congress.
as chairman of the shaktishaalee house Ways and Means cameti, Stevens, a witty, vyangyatmak spikar and flamboyant party netaa, dominated the house isse 1861 jabatak uske death.
he likhaa much of the financial legislation ki paid liye the amareeki civil War.
stevens or Senator charles sumner were the pradhan netao of the kattarpanthi Republicans dauraan the war or punarnirmaan era.
scholarly views of stevens have swung sharply chunki uske death as interpretations of punarnirmaan have badla.
itihaaskaaron of the dunning School ( 1890s–1940s ) held stevens jimmedaar for demanding harsh upachaar of the shwet South or violating American paramparaon of republicanism, depicting stevens as a villen for his vakaalat of harsh measures in the dakshin such as disfranchising sab ex-confederates.
is atyadhik rinatmak characterization yojit sway into the 1950s.
the vruddhi of the neo-abolitionist skool in the 1950s led to a damdaar positive saraahna of stevens ' work on civil adhikaron liye freedmen.
a haal biographer characterizes use as, `` the great Commoner, savior of free public education in Pennsylvania, neshnal republican netaa in the struggles viruddh gulaami in the sanyukt States or intrepid mainstay of the attempt to surakshit racial justice liye the freedmen dauraan Reconstruction, the tabhi member of the House of pratinidhi ever to have maharoom gyaat as the 'dictator ' of Congress. ''
avlokan of the anuwaad of eukaryotic messanger rna
Diagram prardashit the anuwaad of mrna or the sanshleshan of protein by a ribosom
in molecular jeevigyaan or anuvanshiki, translation is the prakram through jisase cellular ribosomes manufacture protein.
it is part of the process of jin abhivyakti.
in anuwaad, messanger rna ( mrna ) utpaadit by transcription is decoded by the ribosom to upaj a vishisht amino acid kadi, or polypeptide, ki will baad moden into an active protein.
in bacteria, anuwaad occurs in the koshika 's koshikadravya, jahaan the vishaal or choti subunits of the ribosome hai stith, or bind to the mRNA.
In eukaryotes, anuwaad occurs aarpaar the jhilli of the endoplasmic reticulum in a prakram pukaara vectorial sanshleshan.
the ribosom facilitates decoding by inducing the binding of trnas saath poorak anticodon sequences to ki of the mRNA.
The tRNAs carry vishisht amino acids ki are chained together into a polypeptide as the mrna gujarata through or is `` read '' by the ribosome in a fashion reminiscent to ki of a bhandar ticker or tikar tape.
in anek instances, the sampurna ribosome/mrna jatil baandhta to the outer jhilli of the rough endoplasmic reticulum or relies the nascent protein polypeptide inside liye later vesicle transport or secretion outside of the koshika.
Many types of transcribed rna, aise as transafar rna, ribosomal rna, or choti nabhikeey RNA, do nahin undergo anuwaad into protein.
anuwaad proceeds in chaar phases : initiation, elongation, translocation or termination ( sab describing the growth of the amino acid chain, or polypeptide that is the product of translation ).
amino acids hai brought to ribosomes and assembled into protein.
In activation, the sahi amino acid is covalently bandhua to the sahi transfer rna ( tRNA ).
The amino acid is joined by iske carboxyl samooh to the 3 ' oh of the tRNA by an ester bandha.
jab the trna rai an amino acid linked to it, it is termed `` charge ''.
Initiation involves the choti subunit of the ribosom binding to the 5 ' samaapt of mrna with the help of diksha factors ( if ).
termination of the polypeptide happens when the a site of the ribosom chehron a roke codon ( uaa, UAG, or uga ).
no trna can recognize or bind to is codon.
Instead, the roke codon induces the binding of a release factor protein that prompts the disassembly of the sampurna ribosome/mrna jatil.
a kramank of antibiotics act by inhibiting anuwaad ; ye shaamil anisomycin, cycloheximide, chloramphenicol, tetracycline, streptomycin, erythromycin, or puromycin, among anya.
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a alag dhaancha from ki of eukaryotic ribosomes, or yun antibiotic can specifically nishaanaa bacterial infections bagaiyr koi detriment to a eukaryotic mejabaan 's koshikaayen.
A multimedia sandesh on a mobile phone.
multimedia Messaging seva ( MMS ) is a standard way to bhejein messages that shaamil multimedia saamagree to or isse mobile phone.
It extends the kor SMS ( choti sandesh Service ) kaabiliyat ki allowed exange of text sandesh tabhi up to 160 varna in length.
the most lokapriy upyog is to bhejein chayachitr isse camera-equipped handsets, haalanki it is also lokapriy as a vidhi of delivering news or entertainment saamagree sahit videos, tasviren, text prishthon and ringtones.
the standard is viksit by the Open Mobile Alliance ( omo ), although during vikaas it was bhaag of the 3GPP or vaip samooh.
Smallpox was an sankramak beemaari adwitiya to insaano, caused by either of do virus visangatiyaan, variola major or Variola naaballig.
The disease is bhi gyaat by the latin names variola or Variola veeraa, niklaa isse varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` munhaase '' ).
the disease thi originally known in angrezi as the `` chechak '' or `` red plig '' ; the term `` smallpox '' thi first prayukt in Britain in the 15th sadi to fark variola isse the `` great chechak '' ( upadansh ).
the pichhlaa naturally occurring case of smallpox ( variola naaballig ) thi diagnosed on 26 aktubar 1977.
Smallpox sthaniyakrut in small rakt baratan of the skin and in the munh or galaa.
in the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular khaaj and, later, uthaaya fluid-filled blisters.
V. major produces a adhik gambhir disease or rai an overall mrityu rate of 30–35 %.
V. naaballig kalyankari a milder form of beemaari ( bhi gyaat as alastrim, cottonpox, milkpox, whitepox, and cuban itch ) jisase martha parichay 1 % of iske peediton.
long-term jatiltaaon of V. major sankraman shaamil characteristic scars, commonly on the phase, jisase occur in 65–85 % of survivors.
drishtiheenta resulting isse corneal ulceration or scarring, or limb deformities due to gathiya or osteomyelitis are kam common jatiltaaon, seen in parichay 2–5 % of maamle.
smallpox is believed to have emerged in human populations about 10,000 bc.
the earliest shaareerik evidence of it is sambhawatah the pustular khaaj on the mummified deh of pharaoh ramses v of mishra.
The disease killed an anumaanit 400,000 europeans annually dauraan the closing saalo of the 18th sadi ( sahit paanch reigning monarchs ), or thi responsible liye a teesraa of sab blindness.
of sab those infected, 20–60 % —and over 80 % of sankramit children—died isse the beemaari.
Smallpox was jimmedaar for an estimated 300–500 million deaths dauraan the 20th sadi.
as recently as 1967, the sansar swasthya Organization ( jo ) anumaanit that 15 lakh people contracted the disease and ki two lakh died in that saal.
After tikaakaran abhiyaan throughout the 19th or 20th centuries, the jo certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979.
smallpox is ek of do sankramak rogon to have maharoom eradicated, the anya hone rinderpest, jisase thi ghoshit eradicated in 2011.
`` I want to tham apana Hand '' is a song by the angrezi chattan band the Beatles.
likhaa by jon Lennon or paul mccartney, or ankit in aktubar 1963, it was the pehla betals record to be made using four-track upkaran.
With agrim aadesh exceeding ek lakh copies in the sanyukt Kingdom, `` I want to tham apana haath '' would ordinarily have gaye straight to the sheersh of the British ricard chart on iske din of release ( 29 navambar 1963 ) had it nahin maharoom avarodhit by the samooh 's pehla million vikreta `` wo loves tum ``, the Beatles ' previous uk single, jisase was having a resurgent vartanee in the sheersh sthiti following teevr media kawarej of the group.
lene do saptaah to dislodge iske predecessor, `` i Want to tham apana Hand '' tehre at kramank ek liye five weeks or remained in the uk top pachaas for twenty-one weeks in kul.
it thi also the samooh 's pehla amareeki kramank one, pravesh the billboard hot 100 chart on 18 janvari 1964 at number forty-five or starting the angrejon akraman of the amareeki music udyog.
By 1 farvari it yojit the kramank ek spot — liye saat saptaah — before being replaced by `` wo loves tum '', a reverse scenario of what tha occurred in Britain, and remained in the US charts liye a kul of pandrah saptaah.
`` I want to tham Your haath '' became the betals ' best-selling single vishwavyaapee.
a gasser thi a prakaar of hot lathi originating on the dragstrips of the sanyukt rajya in the late 1950s or jari until the jaldi 1970s.
gassers yahood based on production model from the 1930s to mid-1960s, jisase have maharoom stripped of extraneous weight or jacked up using a trek beam dhuree to provide behatar weight vitaran on twaran ( beam axles hai bhi halkaa than an swatantra front barkhaastagi ), haalanki a raised bhandar saamne barkhaastagi is aam as well.
aam vazan katautee techniques include fiberglass deh panels, stripped interiors or plexiglass khidkiyaan ( sometimes rang tinted ).
kuki ve yahood primarily built liye racing, these cars typically tha the engine swapped to a larger or more shaktishaalee one, the existing bhandar ingine parivardhit ( often heavily ) or dono.
it was bahut aam to anuroop a jaden supercharger or mechanical eendhan injection, aise as one from algon, Hilborn, or crower.
With form hone likhavai by falan, unke rup is praayah bahut sheersh baari or ungainly, largely due to saamne ends hone uthaaya ucchtar than bhandar, to assist in the weight transafar dauraan rapid twaran ( racing ).
Having unke exhaust pipe exit through the saamne phender khub is a aam characteristic of gassers, as is having laashen chitrit in flamboyant metalflakes, pearls, or candy finishes complemented by lettering in junglee fonts.
The naam arose kuki ve competed in a gasoline -fueled drag racing class, balki than ek using methanol or nitromethane.
The gasser is the purvavarti of the aadhunik Funny Car.
Twelve-lead ichaji of a 26-year-old purush
electrocardiography ( isiji or ichaji from ) is a transthoracic ( across the thorax or chaati ) nirvachan of the electrical activity of the heart over a kaal of samay, as detected by electrodes sanlagn to the surface of the skin and recorded by a yantra bahya to the deh.
the recording utpaadit by this noninvasive procedure is termed an electrocardiogram ( also ECG or ichaji ).
an ECG is prayukt to measure the rate or niyamitata of heartbeats, as well as the size or sthiti of the kakshon, the upasthiti of koi kshati to the dil, or the prabhaav of davaayen or devices used to regulate the dil, such as a pacemaker.
sabase ecgs hai performed liye nidaan or shodh uddeshy on insaan dil, lakin may also be performed on pashu, praayah liye nidaan of dil abnormalities or shodh.
donald jon trump, sr. ( born june 14, 1946 ) is an amareeki kaarobaar maharathi, television personality or lekhak.
he is the adhyaksh or adhyaksh of the trump sanghathan and the founder of trump entertainment resort.
trump 's had jeevanstyli, outspoken manner, and bhoomika on the NBC vaastaviktaa dikhaaen The prashikshu have made use a well-known celebrity who thi no. 14 on the 2012 forbs hasti 100 suchi.
trump is the son of Fred trump, a dhanwaan nai york nagar real-estate develper.
he worked liye his father 's kad, elizabeth trump & bete, while upasthit the Wharton School of the vishvavidhyalayon of Pennsylvania, or in 1968 officially joined the company.
he was given control of the company in 1971 or renamed it the trump sanghathan.
in 2010, trump expressed an byaaj in becoming a pratyaashee liye president of the sanyukt States in the 2012 election, though in may 2011, he ghoshit he hota not be a candidate.
in December 2011, trump thi suggested as a sambhavit vice adhyakshiya chayan by Michele Bachmann, if wo were to jeet the Republican nomination.
`` A badalen Is Gon na aaiye '' is a 1964 single by R & b singer-songwriter sam cooke, written and pehla recorded in 1963 or released antargat the aaarasie Victor label shortly baad uske maut in late 1964.
haalanki tabhi a modest hit for cooke in tulana saath uske previous singles, the song aae to exemplify the 1960s ' civil adhikaron Movement.
the song rai gained in lokapriyata or critical acclaim in the decades since its relies, and is # 12 on rolling stone 's 500 mahanatam geeton of sab samay.
Steam uthati isse the Nesjavellir Geothermal shakti stesan in Iceland.
Geothermal urja is thermal urja generated and bhandaarit in the Earth.
thermal energy is the urja that determines the taapmaana of padaarth.
The geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the asli gathan of the planet ( 20 % ) or from radioactive kshay of khanij ( 80 % ).
the geothermal anupaat, jisase is the difference in taapmaana between the kor of the grah or its surface, drives a nirantar conduction of thermal urja in the rup of ooshmaa isse the kor to the sataha.
the kriyasheel geothermal originates isse the unani jaden γη ( ge ), arth dharti, or θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the kor of the Earth, thermal urja is created by radioskriy kshay or temperatures may pahunchein over 5000 °c ( 9,000 °F ).
ooshmaa conducts isse the kor to surrounding cooler chattan.
the unchi temperature and dabaav kaaran kuch chattan to melt, bananaa megma sanvahan upward chunki it is halkaa than the solid rock.
the megma heats chattan and water in the crust, sometimes up to 370 °c ( 700 °f ).
isse hot sroton, geothermal urja has maharoom prayukt liye snaan chunki paleolithic times and liye spes heating since pracheen roman times, lakin it is abhi behatar known liye electricity generation.
vishwavyaapee, parichay 10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal shakti is online in 24 countries.
an additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating kshamta is installed liye district heating, space heating, spas, audyogic processes, desalination or agricultural anuprayog.
geothermal power is laagat prabhavi, vishwasaneey, chirsthayee, or environmentally friendly, lakin rai historically maharoom simit to kshetron nikat tectonic plate seemayen.
haal technological advances have dramatically expanded the dayera or aakaar of sugathit sansaadhan, visheshkar liye anuprayog aise as home heating, opening a potential liye widespread shoshan.
Geothermal kuen relies greenhouse gases funs gahan bheetar the dharti, but ye emissions are much nimnatar per urja ikai than those of chattan fuels.
as a parinaam, geothermal shakti rai the potential to sahaayta mitigate vaishvik warming if widely deployed in place of chattan fuels.
The dharti 's geothermal resources are theoretically adhik than paryaapt to supplai maanavtaa 's energy needs, lakin tabhi a very choti bhinn may be profitably shoshit.
khudaai or khoji liye deep resources is bahut expensive.
forecasts liye the bhavishya of geothermal shakti depend on assumptions about technology, urja keemten, subsidies, or interest rates.
payalat kaarykram jaise EWEB 's customer opt in green Power kaarykram show that graahak would be willing to pay a choti more liye a renewable urja source jaise geothermal.
lakin as a result of sarkari assisted shodh and udyog anubhav, the laagat of generating geothermal shakti has decreased by 25 % over the past do dashakon.
In 2001, geothermal urja laagat between two and ten saint prati sampaat.
Ownership of property may be nijee, samuhik, or aam or the property may be vastuen, land/real estate, or bauddhik property.
determining swaamitv in vidhi involves determining jo rai nishchit adhikaron or duties over the property.
ye adhikaron or kartavya, sometimes pukaara a 'bundle of adhikaron ', can be alag and yojit by alag partiyon.
the sawaal of swaamitv reaches waapas to the pracheen darshanikon, plato or arestu, who yojit alag raay on the vishay.
Plato ( 428/427 bc – 348/347 BC ) vichaar nijee property created divisive inequalities, jabaki arestu ( 384 bc – 322 BC ) vichaar nijee property enabled logon to receive the puraa benefit of unke labor.
nijee property can circumvent kayaa is abhi referred to as the “ traasadee of the comons ” problem, jahaan people tend to rusavaa aam property more than ve do nijee property.
Given a short-sighted maalik, however, a nijee property pranali can mek these tragedies worse—for udhaaharan, a nijee maalik of a tukdaa of oil-rich property, depending on uske worldview, might be adhik interested in short-term financial gain than vriddhishil upyog saath an eye toward anya 's chintaaen ( e.g., those of bhavishya peedhiyaan, the disenfranchised, etc. ).
jabaki arestu jaij the existence of private swaamitv, he baayein open sawaal of ( 1 ) how to allocate property between kayaa is nijee or aam or ( 2 ) kaisaa to allocate the private property within society.
over the millennia, or aarpaar samskritiyon kayaa can be property or kaisaa it is regarded culturally have varied widely.
Ownership is the aadhaar liye many anya avadharanaon that form the muladhar of pracheen or aadhunik societies aise as money, vyapaar, karz, diwaliyapan, the criminality of chori, and nijee vs. public property.
swaamitv is the kunjee building blaak in the development of the capitalist socio-economic pranali.
aadam smith stated that ek of the pavitra laws of justice thi to guard a vyakti 's property or possessions.
The prakram or mechanics of ownership hai fairly jatil : one can gain, transfer or khona swaamitv of property in a number of tareeke.
to acquire property ek can purchase it saath dhan, vyapaar it for anya property, praapt it as a tohfa, steal it, find it, mek, it or homestead it.
ek can transafar or khona swaamitv of property by selling it liye dhan, exchanging it for other property, giving it as a tohfa, being robbed of it, it, or having it stripped from one 's swaamitv through vidhik arthath aise as eviction, foreclosure, seizure, or taking.
swaamitv is self-propagating in ki the owner of any property hoga bhi own the economic benefits of that property.
`` kayaa 's my naam ? '' is a song recorded by barbadian recording artist Rihanna, liye her paanchvaan studio album laud ( 2010 ).
featuring atithi vocals isse Canadian rapper drek, the song was released as the duusari single isse Loud on October 29, 2010 through def Jam ricarding.
the r & b song was produced by the norwegian utpaadan duo starget, or thi likhaa by the duo along saath Ester Dean, traci hale, and drek.
lyrically, it incorporates vishaywastu of yon maithun or romance.
music critics gave the song dhanatmak samikshaayen, citing it some of rihana 's behtareen vocal kaary to tithi ; vahin thi a taareef regarding iske romantic prakruti, as khub as iske yon tone.
`` kayaa 's my Name ? '' was a vanijyik kamyaabi and awwal the us billboard Hot 100 chart, giving rihana uske teesraa number-one single in 2010, as well as uske aathvin overall on the chart.
the song bhi awwal the chart in hungarian and the United Kingdom and pahunche the top five in canada, ireland, New jiland, norway or slowe.
the song received a nomination at the 54th grami puraskaar liye behtareen rap/sung sahyog.
an accompanying music video, nirdeshit by Philip Andelman, portrays a romantic encounter between rihana or drek in a grocery store saath with romantic drishyon between the jodi or Rihanna walking through manahaton 's nimnatar East Side.
`` kayaa 's my Name ? '' was prachaarit saath sajiv pradarshan aarpaar dono pahalu of the atlantic, including Saturday Night sajiv in america or the shrenee seven finale of the X Factor in the sanyukt Kingdom.
the latter performance resulted in an investigation isse the country 's media niamak, ofcom, for the raunchy prakruti of rihana 's pahanava.
a ganitiya nirantar is a special kramank, praayah a real number, that is `` significantly dilachasp in kuch way ''.
sthiraank arise in anek different areas of ganit, with sthiraank aise as e ( ganitiya nirantar ) | and pi| occurring in aise vividh contexts as bhugol, kramank siddhanth or kalan.
kayaa it means liye a nirantar to uthta `` naturally '', or kayaa makes a nirantar `` interesting '', is ultimately a padaarth of swaad, and kuch ganitiya sthiraank hai notable adhik liye historical kaaran than liye unke intrinsic ganitiya interest.
the adhik popular sthiraank have maharoom studied throughout the aayu and computed to many dashamalav places.
All mathematical constants are definable numbers or praayah hai bhi computable sankhyaayein ( chaitin 's constant hone a significant excepshan ).
chunaavon to the sanyukt States Senate yahood held on navambar 2, 2010, liye 37 of the sanyukt rajya Senate 's 100 seats.
( a special chunaav on janvari 19, 2010 in Massachusetts thi held pehle in the saal. )
thirty-four of the seats were for six-year sharten to the seenet 's `` class teen '', or three yahood special chunaavon for shorter terms.
of the 37 elections, 19 featured laazim democrate ( 7 of jisko ritred or yahood defeated in the primary ) or 18 pradarshit incumbent republicans ( aath of jisko ritred or were defeated in the primary ).
baad the pichhlaa chunaavon ( in 2008 ), the sanyukt States seenet thi composed of 58 democrate, 40 republicans, and 2 independents jo caucus saath the democrate.
republicans won chaar seats yojit by retiring Democrats and Republicans defeated do laazim Democrats.
is was the largest number of republicans gains chunki the 1994 chunaavon and bhi the pehla samay since that chunaav ki republicans safaltaapurvak defended sab of their own site.
is thi the chauthi lagaataar election of `` class 3 '' seenetteron jahaan Democrats have vifal to laabh site or the third consecutive mid-term chunaav yojit in a adhyaksh 's pehla pad jahaan republicans have picked-up site.
Despite ye Republican vins, however, the Democrats retained a bahumat of the seenet with 51 site plus 2 independents jo caucus saath them, compared to the 47 republicans.
a sankranti is an khagoleey event ki occurs twice prayek saal as the Sun reaches iske ucchtam or nunatam excursion saapeksh to the celestial equator on the celestial gola.
as a parinaam, on the din of the sankranti, the surya appears to have reached iske ucchtam or lowest salanaa oonchaai in the aasmaan above the horizon at local saura noon.
the shabd sankranti is niklaa from the Latin sol ( surya ) or sistere ( to stand still ), kuki at the solstices, the Sun stands still in utaar ; that is, the mausami gati of the surya 's path ( as dekhi isse dharti ) comes to a roke pehle reversing direction.
The solstices, saath saath the equinoxes, hai connected saath the sizan.
in anek samskritiyon the solstices chihnit either the shuruuaat or the midpoint of sheet or garmiyaan.
The pad sankranti can also be prayukt in a broader bhav, as the tithi ( din ) jab this occurs.
the din of the sankranti is either the longest din of the saal ( in garmiyaan ) or the shortest din of the year ( in sheet ) for koi place baahar of the ooshnakaribandh.
Jerry lee louis ( born sitambar 29, 1935 ) is an amareeki rock and phenken or country music singer-songwriter or pianist.
he is known by the upnaam `` The kaatil '' and is often viewed as “rock & phenken 's pehla great junglee man”.
an early pionier of chattan or roll music, in 1956 louis bana uske first recordings at surya Records.
`` kreji Arms `` sold 300,000 nakal in the South, but it thi his 1957 hit `` puure lotta shakin ' going on `` ki shot louis to kirti vishwavyaapee.
louis followed is in ki same saal jab he recorded songs such as `` Great genden of aag ``, `` breathless `` or `` unchi skool Confidential ``.
Lewis bechi more record than elvis presli at is time.
however, louis ' chattan 'n ' roll kariyar faltered in the wake of uske vivaah to uske yang cousin.
He tha choti kamyaabi in the chart following the cond and his popularity jaldi dhundhlee.
uske live performance shulk plummeted isse $ 10,000 prati raatri to $ 250.
In the meantime he thi sankalpit to gain back kuch of uske lokapriyata.
dauraan the jaldi 60’s he kiya n't have much chart kamyaabi saath few apwaad aise as `` What 'd I kah ``.
uske sajiv performances at is samay were increasingly junglee or urjavan.
uske album sajiv at the Star Club, hamberg from 1964 is praayah regarded by anek music journalists or prashansak as ek of the wildest or mahanatam chattan and phenken concert albums ever.
baad recording songs such as `` i 'm on aag '' liye several saalo with little success, in 1968 louis bana a parivartan into country music and tha hits with songs aise as `` another place, Another samay ''.
is reignited his kariyar or throughout the let '60s or '70s he regularly awwal the country-western chart.
His # 1 country hits included `` to mek prem Sweeter For tum ``, `` vahin Must be More to prem Than This ``, `` hota tum lo another mauka on Me `` and `` me And bobby mcgee ``.
louis 's successes jari throughout the dashak or he embraced uske chattan 'n ' phenken past saath geeton aise as a cover of the big Bopper 's `` Chantilly feeta `` and `` Rockin ' my Life dur ``.
in the 21st sadi louis continues to daure to audiences around the sansar and still relies nai albums.
One such album, titled pichhlaa man khadaa, is uske best selling to tithi at over a lakh nakal bechi vishwavyaapee.
This thi followed by ausat boodha man which has praapt kuch of the behtareen bikri of Lewis’s kariyar.
louis has had a darjan sunaharaa record in dono chattan or country, jiti several grami puraskaar, sahit a Lifetime uplabdhi puraskaar.
Lewis thi inducted into the chattan or phenken Hall of Fame in 1986, or his pioneering yogadan to the vidha has maharoom pahachaanaa by the Rockabilly haul of kirti.
in 1989, uske life thi chronicled in the film Great genden of aag, starring Dennis quaid.
In 2003, rolling Stone patrika soochibaddh uske baksaa set All Killer, no philler : the anthology kramank 242 on their suchi of `` 500 mahanatam album of sab samay ``.
in 2004, ve kramit use number 24 on unke list of the 100 mahanatam Artists of sab samay.
louis is the pichhlaa surviving sadsy of surya record ' Million dollars quartet and the class of '55 album, jisase bhi shaamil johny Cash, Carl perkins, roy orbison and Elvis presli.
henry Louis stephens, benaam watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man reading a samachaarpatr saath sheershak `` Presidential udghoshnaa / gulaami ''.
the emancipation udghoshnaa thi an order jari to sab khand of the karypalika shakha ( sahit the fouj or Navy ) of the sanyukt rajya by adhyaksh Abraham Lincoln on January 1, 1863, during the amareeki Civil yuddh.
it thi aadhaarit on the adhyaksh 's constitutional praadhikaar as commander in chief of the hathiyaarband shaktiyaan ; it was nahin a vidhi passed by congress.
it proclaimed all those enslaved in confederate territory to be forever free, or ordered the fouj ( and sab khand of the karypalika shakha ) to daavat as free all those enslaved in ten rajya that yahood still in rebellion, thus applying to 3.1 million of the 4 lakh slave in the u.s.
the udghoshnaa could nahin be enforced in kshetron still under vidroh, but as the fouj took control of confederate regions, the slave in those regions were emancipated rather than laute to unke masters.
From 20,000 to 50,000 purv slave in regions where rebellion tha already maharoom subdued were tatkaal emancipated, and over 3 lakh more yahood emancipated as the Union fouj unnat.
The udghoshnaa did not apply to the paanch slave rajya ki yahood nahin in rebellion, nor to sabase regions already niyantrit by the sangh army ; emancipation vahin would come after pruthak rajya kriyaayein and/or the disambar 1865 anusamarthan of the Thirteenth amendment, which bana slavery illegal everywhere in the u.s.
the udghoshnaa kiya nahin compensate the swami, kiya nahin itself gaiyrkanoonee gulaami, or kiya nahin make the ex-slaves ( pukaara freedmen ) nagarikon.
it bana the eradication of gulaami an suspasht war lakshya, in jod to the lakshya of reuniting the sangh.
on sitambar 22, 1862, Lincoln tha jari a praarambhik udghoshnaa ki he hota anukram the emancipation of sab slave in any state of the confederate rajya of america ki did nahin vaapasi to Union control by janvari 1, 1863.
none laute, or the anukram, hastakshrit or issued January 1, 1863, took effect magar in sthitiyaan jahaan the sangh tha already zyaadaatar regained control.
the udghoshnaa outraged white Southerners jo envisioned a race war, angered kuch uttari democrate, sakriy anti-slavery shaktiyaan, or weakened shaktiyaan in europea ki chaahi to intervene to sahaayta the Confederacy.
it bhi lifted the atmaaon of African america dono in the dakshini and uttari rajya, or led to anek slave escaping unke masters or running peeche sangh linon in anukram to have their emancipation enforced.
chooshak panch is a 2011 amareeki kaalpanik karrwai film directed by zack snidar or co-written by him and Steve shibuya.
it is Snyder 's first filmi based on an original script.
the film sitaron Emily browning, abbie cornish, Jena malone, venesa hagence, jemi Chung, or karla gugino.
the kathanak follows the kalpanaaon of a yang stri jo is vachanabaddh to a mental sanstha, as wo makes a yojana to escape the hospital before ksht a mastishkakhandaedan.
the filmi thi released in dono conventional or IMAX theatres in the sanyukt rajya at midnight on kooch 25, 2011.
it praapt generally negative samikshaayen isse aalochakon, but thi a moderet baksaa office success.

haselblad 503cw with ixpress V96C digital waapas, an udhaaharan of a peshewar digital camera pranali
a digital camera ( or digicam ) is a camera ki takes video or still chayachitr by recording bimb on an electronic image sensor.
sabase camere bechi aaj hai digital, or digital camere hai incorporated into anek devices ranging isse gusse or mobile phone ( pukaara camera phone ) to vaahanon.
Digital or filmi cameras share an optical system, typically using a lens with a parivartaneey diaphragm to fokas light onto an chitra pikup yantra.
the diaphragm or shater admit the correct raashi of light to the imager, bas as saath filmi lakin the chitra pikup device is electronic balki than rasinic.
However, unlike filmi camere, digital camere can pradarshak images on a screen tatkaal baad hone recorded, or store or delete images isse memory.
anek digital cameras can also ricard chalati video saath dhwani.
kuch digital camere can crop or silaai tasviren and perform other elementary chitra sampadan.
the andar or front of a del PowerEdge web server, a computer designed liye rack mounting
anek web sarwar may be prayukt liye a high trekkic jalsthal, yahan chaar surya aag x4200 sarwar hai installed together

the American red cross ( chaap ), bhi known as the amareeki National Red cross, is a humanitarian sanghathan ki provides apaat sahaayta, disaster raahat or shiksha andar the United rajya.
it is the designated U.S. sambhddha of the antarrashtriya Federation of Red Cross and red Crescent Societies.
aaj, in addition to gharelu disaster raahat, the amareeki red Cross offers services in paanch anya kshetron : jatiyaan services ki help the mohataaj ; sanchaar sevaayen or sukun liye sainya sadasyon or their parivaar sadasyon ; the sangrahan, prasanskaran or distribution of rakt or rakt utpaada ; shaikshanik kaarykram on preparedness, swasthya, or suraksha ; or antarrashtriya raahat and development kaarykram.
jari a corporate charter by the sanyukt rajya congress antargat sheershak 36 of the sanyukt rajya code, khand 3001, the amareeki National Red Cross is governed by volunteers or samarthit by community donations, aay isse swasthya or safety prashikshan or products, or aay isse blood utpaada.
the amareeki red Cross is headquartered in washington, d.c.

A rooster ( bhi pukaara a cockerel or murga ) is a purush gallinaceous bird.
It praayah refers to a purush murga ( gallus gallus ).
nadaan male murgiyon kam than ek saal boodha hai pukaara cockerels.
the pad `` murga '' originates in the sanyukt rajya, or the pad is widely prayukt throughout uttar america, as khub as australia or New Zealand.
in the United kingdom and ireland the puraani term `` cockerel '' is more commonly prayukt.
`` murga '' is in general upyog as the name for a male of other species of bird, liye example `` Cock sparrow ''.
`` Roosting '' is the action of perching aloft to sleep at raatri, or is kiya by dono lingon.
The murga is polygamous, lakin can not guard anek nests of andey at once.
he guard the general kshetrafal jahaan uske murgiyaan hai nesting, or hoga attack anya roosters ki enter uske territory.
dauraan the din, he usually sits on a unchi parch, usually 3–5 feet band the maidan to serve as a lookout for his jhund.
he will dhwani a distinctive sachetak kol if parabhakshi are nearby.
The Pokémon vyapaar card khel ( pokimon tcg ) is a collectible card khel aadhaarit on the pokimon video game series, pehla prakashit in aktubar 1996 by Media factory in Japan.
in the us, it was initially prakashit by wizards of the coast, the company ki produces, in disambar 1998.
Nintendo took over publishing in june 2003.
it is ek of nintendo 's pichhlaa baaki strong kadi to its heritage as a playing card company.
jameen rover is a angrejon car nirmaataa saath iske mukhyalay in gaydon, warwickshire, sanyukt Kingdom jisase specialises in four-wheel-drive vaahanon.
It is bhaag of the jaiguaar jameen rover group, a subsidiary of tata Motors of India.
It is the duusari oldest four-wheel-drive car brands in the sansar ( after jeepi ).
the jameen rover name was originally used by the rover company liye ek vishisht vehicle model, namit bas the jameen rover, shubharambh by rover in 1948.
Over the following years it viksit into a marque encompassing a dayera of four-wheel-drive model, sahit the Defender, discovery, freelander, dayera rover, dayera Rover khel or Range Rover evoque.
jameen rovers hai currently samavet in the company 's halewood and solihull paudhe, saath shodh or vikaas lene place at jlr 's gaydon or whitley engineering centres.
jameen Rover bechi 194,000 vaahanon vishwavyaapee in 2009.
haalanki the brands originates isse the original 1948 model, Land rover as a company rai tabhi existed since 1978.
Prior to is, it thi a utpaada lakeer of the Rover Company which thi subsequently avashoshit into the rover-triumph prabhag of the British Leyland motor Corporation ( bl ) following leyland motor nigam ’s kabza of Rover in 1967.
the ongoing commercial kamyaabi of the asli jameen rover shrenee model, or latterly the dayera Rover in the 1970s in the midst of BL’s khub documented kaarobaar pareshaaniyon prompted the sthapana of a pruthak Land Rover company lakin still antargat the bl chhatariyaan, baaki part of the subsequent Rover samooh in 1988, antargat the swaamitv of angrejon aerospace baad the remains of British leyland yahood broken up or privatised.
in 1994 rover samooh pielsi was acquired by BMW.
in 2000, Rover samooh was broken-up by bmw or jameen rover was bechi to ghat Motor Company, becoming bhaag of its premier Automotive samooh.
In 2006 ghat kharida the rover brand isse bmw liye around £6 lakh.
is reunited the rover and jameen rover brands liye the pehla samay chunki 2000 jab the rover samooh was broken up by bmw.
in june 2008, ghat bechi dono jameen rover or Jaguar gaadiyaan to tata motors.
is bikri bhi included the dormant rover brands

the naveen ritu of the Bleach dushmani shrenee is namit.

The episodes hai nirdeshit by noriyuki Abe or produced by tv tokio, dentsu, or studio pierrot.

The ritu began airing on april 23, 2008 in Japan on TV Tokyo or ended on aktubar 7, 2008.

the viniman of prostitution in the sanyukt rajya is nahin among the enumerated shaktiyaan of the federal sarkari ; antargat the dasavaan Amendment to the United States samvidhan, it is isliye exclusively the domen of the rajya to permit, prohibit, or varanaa regulate commercial sex, magar insofar as Congress may viniyamit it as bhaag of antarraji commers saath kanoon jaise the man adhinium.
in most states, veshyavriti is considered a misdemeanor in the shrenee of public order aparaadhon, a aparaadhon that disrupts the order of a jatiyaan.
it thi at ek samay mana to be a vagrancy aparaadhon.
Currently, newada is the tabhi rajya to allow veshyalay prostitution, the sharten of jisase hai stipulated in the newada sanshodhit Statutes.
tabhi 8 county philhal contain kriyasheel brothels.
All form of prostitution hai illegal in clark county ( jisase contains the las vegas–paradise mahanagar area ), Washoe County ( which contains reno ), Carson nagar, Douglas county, and lincoln County.
the anya county theoretically allow veshyalay prostitution, lakin some of ye county philhal have no kriyasheel brothels.
gali veshyavriti, `` pandering, '' or living band of the proceeds of a veshya remain illegal antargat newada law, as elsewhere in the country.
as with anya deshon, veshyavriti in the United rajya can be divided into three vyapak categories : gali veshyavriti, brothel veshyavriti, or escort veshyavriti.
the East coast of the sanyukt rajya, also known as the purvi Seaboard or the atlantic Seaboard and commonly shortened to east coast, refers to the easternmost coast of the sanyukt rajya saath the atlantic samandar.
The rajya which have shoreline on the East Coast are, from uttar to dakshin, the u.S. states of maine, nai hampshire, masachusets, rhode dweep, Connecticut, nai York, nai jersey, Delaware, maryland, virginia, uttar carolina, dakshin carolina, georgia, or Florida.
Richard milhous nicksan ( janvari 9, 1913 – april 22, 1994 ) thi the 37th adhyaksh of the United rajya, serving isse 1969 to 1974, jab he became the only president to resign the daftar.
nicksan tha previously served as a republican U.S. pratinidhi or seenetter isse california or as the 36th vaais adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya isse 1953 to 1961.
nicksan was born in yorba linda, california.
he graduate from whittier college in 1934 or Duke vishvavidhyalayon skool of vidhi in 1937, returning to california to abhyaas vidhi.
he and uske bivi, pat nicksan, sthanantarit to washington to kaary for the federal government in 1942.
he subsequently served in the sanyukt rajya Navy dauraan sansar yuddh II.
nicksan thi elected in california to the House of pratinidhi in 1946 or to the seenet in 1950.
uske pursuit of the alger hiss case sthapit uske pratishtha as a agrani anti-communist, or elevated use to national prominence.
he was the kaaryshil mate of Dwight D. ijanhavar, the republican party presidential nominee in the 1952 chunaav.
Nixon parosa liye aath saalo as vice adhyaksh.
he waged an unsuccessful adhyakshiya campaign in 1960, narrowly khone to John F. kennedy, and lost a res liye rajyapal of California in 1962.
in 1968, he ran again liye the presidency or was nirvaachit.
Although nicksan initially escalated America 's bhagidaari in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973.
nicksan 's vizit to the logon 's ganatantr of china in 1972 opened diplomatic sambandh between the do raashtra, or he initiated détente and the anti-ballistic missile sandhi with the soviet sangh the vahi saal.
domestically, uske prashasan generally embraced nitiyon that transferred power isse Washington to the rajya.
among anya bate, he shubharambh pahalon to fight karkat or illegal davaayen, imposed wage and daam niyantran, enforced desegregation of some dakshini skulon, or sthapit the paryaavarniya suraksha agency.
haalanki he presided over the chandra avataran shuruuaat saath apollo 11, he scaled waapas maanavyukt spes exploration.
He was re-elected by a bhuskhalan in 1972.
nicksan 's duusari term dekhi an arab oil embargo, the istipha of uske vice adhyaksh, spiro Agnew, and a continuing shrenee of khulaase parichay the waterget cond or other misconduct by members of the prashasan.
The cond escalated, costing nicksan much of uske rajnatik support, or on agast 9, 1974, he resigned in the phase of almost certain impeachment or removal from office.
baad his istipha, he controversially received a pardon jari by uske successor, jerald ghat.
in ritairement, nicksan 's work as an elder statesman, authoring several kitabe or undertaking anek videshi trips, helped to rehabilitate uske public chitra.
he suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18, 1994, or died chaar dinon later at the age of 81.
Sertraline hydrochloride ( vyapaar names Zoloft, lustral ) is an antidepressant of the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class.
it thi introduced to the market by fizer in 1991.
sertraline is primarily vihit liye major depressive vikaar in vayask outpatients as well as obsessive–compulsive, dehshat, or soshal chintaa disorders in dono adults and children.
in 2011, it thi the second-most vihit antidepressant on the u.S. khudara market, saath 37,208,000 prescriptions.
the efficacy of sertraline for avsaad is samaan to ki of older tricyclic antidepressants, lakin iske paksh prabhaav hai much kam sunaaya.
matbhed saath nae antidepressants hai subtler or also zyaadaatar confined to side prabhaav.
Evidence suggests ki sertraline may work behatar than fluoxetine ( prozac ) liye kuch subtypes of depression.
Treatment of dehshat disorder saath sertraline parinaam in a significant ghati of the kramank of panic attacks or in improved visheshta of jivan.
For obsessive-compulsive vikaar, sertraline is nahin as prabhavi as sangyanatmak behavioral chikitsa ; the best parinaam have maharoom achieved by combining ye do treatments.
haalanki sweekrut liye social phobia and posttraumatic stress disorder, sertraline lead to tabhi modest sudhaar in ye conditions.
Sertraline bhi alleviates the lakshan of premenstrual dysphoric vikaar and can be used in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently liye its upachaar.
sertraline saajha the common paksh prabhaav and contraindications of anya ssris, with unchi daron of matlee, atisar, anidra, or yon paksh prabhaav ; however, it does nahin cause weight laabh, or iske prabhaav on dono cognition or satarkta hai relatively mild.
in pregnant mahilaon lene sertraline, the drug thi upasthit in significant ekaagratha in fetal rakt, and was bhi sambhddha saath a ucchtar rate of various janam dosha.
similarly to anya antidepressants, the use of sertraline for avsaad may be associated with a ucchtar rate of suicidality.
The paanch heartbeats is a 1991 musical naatak filmi nirdeshit by robert townsend, jo co-wrote the script saath Keenan Ivory wayans.
Distributed by 20th Century fox, the filmi 's main daal shaamil Townsend, maaikel rhite, Leon robinsan, Harry J. lennix, tico Wells, Harold nicholas of the Nicholas bhaaiyo, and diahann Carroll.
the plot of the filmi ( which is loosely aadhaarit on the jeevandaan of anek artists : the Dells, The Temptations, Four Tops, wilson picket, James Brown, frenki lymon, sam cooke and others ) folo the three decade career of the r & b gayan samooh the paanch Heartbeats.
the filmi depicts the vruddhi or patan of a Motown prerit aatma adhinium through the ankhen of the filmi 's pramukh protagonist, donald `` batakh '' matthews ( portrayed by townsend ), jo serves as a narrator throughout the filmi.
however, a bahumat of the cinema is prastut in a lagaataar samay line as opposed to traditional flash backs.
the filmi includes a significant raashi of asli music conceived by vibhinn artists liye the film 's soundtrack, sahit singles aise as `` a dil Is a house for prem ``, `` we have n't samaapt yet '', or `` Nothing lakin prem ''.
the filmi thi released to sabase uttar amareeki audiyans kooch 29, 1991 however it was nahin made available to audiyans in anya continents jabatak 2002 jab a dvd thi released prior to another dvd relies in 2006 liye the filmi 's 15th varshganth.
the film praapt mishrit samikshaayen isse aalochakon.
sachivalay ( March 30, 1970 – aktubar 4, 1989 ) thi an American thoroughbred racehorse ki in 1973 became the pehla u.s. tripal Crown champion in 25 years.
he set res records in sab teen kaarykram in the shrenee — the kentki darbi ( 1:59.4 ), the Preakness stakes ( 1:53 ), or the Belmont stakes ( 2:24 ) — record ki still stand today.
he is mana to be one of the mahanatam thoroughbreds of sab samay.
in 1999, ESPN kramit sachivalay the 35th best khilaadi of the 20th sadi, the highest ranking racehorse on the suchi URL_http.
He kramit duusari peeche man o ' yuddh in The blood-horse 's suchi of the sheersh 100 u.S. Racehorses of the 20th sadi.
sachivalay thi sired by bindaas shaasha out of somethingroyal, by princequillo.
He thi foaled at the Meadow in caroline county, virginia.
jaise his famous predecessor man o ' War, sachivalay thi a vishaal shahbaloot tattu or thi given the vahi upnaam, `` Big Red. ''
sachivalay 's grandsire, Nasrullah, is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 tripal crown winner sietal slew.
swaamitv by Penny chenery, he thi prashikshit by lucien laurin or mainly ridden by canadai jockey ron turcotte, saath saath prashikshu jockey Paul pheliciano ( pehla do daud ), or diggaj edi mapel ( pichhlaa race ).
he raced in Chenery 's marg Stable 's blue and shwet checkered colors or his duulhe was edi swead.
sachivalay stood lagbhag tall, and weighed, saath a 75-inch girth, in his racing pradhan.
a typical 12 v, 40 ah lead-acid car battery
an automotive bydaree is a type of rechargeable battery that aapurtiyan electric energy to an automobile.
praayah is refers to an sli bydaree ( starting, lighting, prajvalan ) to power the prarambh motor, the lits, and the ignition pranali of a vehicle’s engine.
automotive SLI batteries hai praayah lead-acid prakaar, and are bana of six galvani koshikaayen in series to provide a 12 volt pranali.
prayek koshika provides 2.1 volts liye a kul of 12.6 volt at puraa charge.
baari vaahanon aise as highway trek or tractors, often equipped with diesel engines, may have do batteries in series for a 24 volt pranali, or may have parallel strings of bydaree.
lead-acid bydaree are bana up of platon of lead or pruthak plates of lead dioxide, which are submerged into an electrolyte solution of parichay 38 % sulfuric acid or 62 % water.
is causes a rasinic pratikriya ki relies electrons, allowing them to flow through conductors to produce vidyut.
as the battery discharges, the acid of the electrolyte pratikriyaayein with the saamagree of the platon, badalanaa unke surface to sise sulphate.
jab the bydaree is recharged, the rasinic pratikriya is reversed : the sise sulphate reforms into sise dioxide and lead.
saath the platon lauti to unke asli condishan, the prakram may abhi be doharaaya.
Battery recycling of automotive bydaree reduces the need liye sansaadhan required for manufacture of nai bydaree, diverts vishakt sise isse landfills, or roktaa risk of improper disposal.
full-time niyukti is employment in jisase a person works a nunatam kramank of ghanton defined as aise by his/her niyokta.
full-time employment praayah aata with laabh ki hai nahin typically offered to part-time, temporary, or lacheelee workers, such as salanaa leave, sickleave, and swasthya bime.
full-time jobs are often considered kariyar.
ve generally adaa adhik than part-time kaary, and praayah carry adhik ghanton prati saptaah.
the mela majdoor Standards adhinium ( flsa ) karata nahin define full-time employment or part-time niyukti.
This is a padaarth generally to be sankalpit by the niyokta ( US vibhaag of majdoor ).
the paribhaasha by employer can vary or is generally published in a company 's Employee Handbook.
companiyaan commonly require isse 30–35 or 40 hours prati week to be defined as full-time or isliye yogya for benefits.
full-time aukaat varies between company or is often aadhaarit on the shift the employee jarur kaary dauraan each work saptaah.
The `` maanak '' kaary week consists of five eight-hour dinon, commonly parosa between 9:00AM to 5:00pm totaling 40 ghanton.
jabaki a four-day week generally consists of chaar ten-hour days ; it may bhi consist of as choti as nine hours liye a kul of a 36 ghanta kaary saptaah.
twelve-hour shift hai often teen days per week, unless the company rai the iraade of paying out the karmchaaree overtime.
overtime is legally paid out anytime an karmchaaree works adhik than 40 ghanton prati saptaah.
the vidhik minimum liye overtime starts at aadhaar adaa + one-half.
the increased payout is mana to compensate thodaa liye the increased fatigue jisase a vyakti anubhavon on such long shift.
shift can bhi be very irregular, as in khudara, but hai still full-time if the jaruri kramank of hours is pahunche.
vahin hai kuch situations jahaan a vyakti jo needs full-time kaary is dropped to part-time, which is sometimes a rup of constructive dismissal to avoid paying berogari laabh to a laid-off kaaryakarta.
seahorse is the title die to 54 prajati of samudri machhlee in the genus hippocampus.
`` hippocampus '' comes from the pracheen unani hippos meaning `` ghoda '' or kampos arth `` samudr monster ''.
The niyantrit substances adhinium ( siese ) thi enacted into law by the congress of the sanyukt States as sheershak ii of the vyapak Drug gaali rokthaam or Control Act of 1970.
the siese is the sangheey U.S. drug policy antargat jisase the manufacture, importation, kabza, upyog and vitaran of certain substances is regulated.
the adhinium bhi served as the national implementing vidhaan liye the single Convention on narcotic Drugs.
the legislation nirmit paanch schedules ( classifications ), with varying qualifications liye a padaarth to be included in each.
do sangheey agenciyon, the Drug pravartan prashasan or the Food and drug prashasan, determine jisase substances hai added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by congress nirmit the aarambhik listing, or congress rai sometimes anusuchit other substances through vidhaan aise as the Hillory J. Farias or samantha reid date-rape Prevention adhinium of 2000, which lagaai gamma hydroxybutyrate in anusuchee i. vargeekaran decisions are jaruri to be bana on maapdand sahit sambhavit liye gaali ( an undefined term ), philhal sweekrut chikitsa use in upachaar in the sanyukt rajya, or international treaties.
maaya numerals
maaya numerals are a vigesimal ( base - bees ) numeral system prayukt by the pre-columbian maaya sabhyataa.
the numerals are made up of teen pratikon ; zero ( shell aakaar ), one ( a bindu ) and five ( a baar ).
liye example, teraa is written as teen dots in a horizontal pankti above do aadaa linon stacked above prayek anya.
lyndon baines johnson ( agast 27, 1908 – janvari 22, 1973 ), praayah referred to as LBJ, thi the 36th adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed after uske seva as the 37th Vice President of the United rajya ( 1961–1963 ).
he is ek of only four logon jo parosa in sab four nirvaachit sangheey karyaalayon of the United rajya : pratinidhi, seenetter, vaais adhyaksh, or President.
johnson, a democrate isse Texas, parosa as a United rajya Representative isse 1937–1949 or as a seenetter isse 1949–1961, including chah saalo as sanyukt States seenet bahumat netaa, do as seenet alpsankhyak Leader and do as seenet bahumat chaabuk.
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the loktantric namakan in 1960, Johnson thi asked by jon F. kennedy to be uske kaaryshil mate liye the 1960 adhyakshiya chunaav.
johnson succeeded to the presidency following the hatya of John F. Kennedy on November 22, 1963, samaapt kennedy 's pad or was elected President in his apana sahi, winning by a vishaal hashia over bairi Goldwater in the 1964 election.
Johnson was greatly samarthit by the loktantric party or as adhyaksh, he thi jimmedaar for designing the `` great Society `` legislation ki shaamil laws ki upheld civil adhikaron, public prasaaran, Medicare, medicaid, paryaavarniya suraksha, aid to education, or uske `` yuddh on Poverty. ''
Johnson was prasiddh liye his domineering vyaktitv and the `` Johnson treatment, '' his coercion of shaktishaalee politicians in order to advance legislation.
Meanwhile, Johnson escalated American bhagidaari in the vietnam yuddh, from 16,000 amareeki advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat troops in jaldi 1968, as amareeki hataahat soared or the salaam process bogged bas.
The bhagidaari stimulated a vishaal engri antiwar gati aadhaarit especially on university campuses in the u.S. or videsh.
garmiyaan dange broke out in sabase pramukh shaharon baad 1965, or crime rates soared, as his pratidwandviyon uthaaya maange liye `` vidhi or anukram '' nitiyon.
the loktantric Party split in multiple feuding girohon, or after Johnson kiya poorly in the 1968 nai hampshire praathmik, he ended his boli liye reelection.
Republican Richard Nixon was nirvaachit to safal him.
itihaaskaaron argue ki johnson 's presidency chihnit the shikhar of aadhunik udaarataavaad in the sanyukt rajya baad the nai Deal era.
johnson is ranked favorably by kuch itihaaskaaron kuki of his gharelu nitiyon.
Progesterone also gyaat as P4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a C-21 steroid hormone involved in the maadaa menstrual saikil, pregnancy ( supports gestation ) or embryogenesis of humans or anya prajati.
Progesterone belongs to a class of hormone called progestogens, or is the pramukh naturally occurring insaan progestogen.

But despite is chaudee array of talents, he is prone to barambar misunderstandings, on ek occasion even gayan the varnmaala as one big long shabd ( isse the song called `` abc-def-ghi, '' sunaaya `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ), pondering kayaa it could kabhi ausat.
He jeevandaan in a vishaal ghonslaa behind the 123 til gali brownstone or rai a teddy bhaaluu namit radar.

The duusari Crusade ( 1145–1149 ) thi the duusari major crusade shubharambh from europea.
the duusari crusade thi prarambh in response to the patan of the County of Edessa the pichhlaa year to the shaktiyaan of zengi.
The county had been founded dauraan the First crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by baldwin of boulogne in 1098.
While it thi the pehla Crusader state to be santhaapit, it thi bhi the pehla to patan.
The Second crusade thi ghoshit by pope ujin iii, or thi the pehla of the crusades to be led by europea kings, namely Louis saat of France or conrad iii of Germany, saath help isse a kramank of anya europea nobles.
the sena of the two kings marched separately across europea.
baad crossing Byzantine territory into Anatolia, dono armies yahood separately parajeet by the Seljuq Turks.

wal-mart stores, inc. ( ), branded as walmart, is an amareeki bahurashtriya khudara nigam ki runs zanjeeron of vishaal chhot vibhaag stores and godaam stores.
The company is the sansar 's teesraa largest public corporation, according to the saubhaahgya Global 500 suchi in 2012, the biggest private niyokta in the sansar saath over do million karmchaaree, or is the largest retailor in the sansar.
walmart remains a family-owned kaarobaar, as the company is niyantrit by the Walton family, who apana a 48 pratishat hissedari in walmart.
it is bhi ek of the sansar 's sabase moolyawaan companiyaan.
The company thi founded by sam Walton in 1962, incorporated on October 31, 1969, or saream traded on the nai york bhandar exange in 1972.
it is headquartered in bentonville, arkansaas.
walmart is also the largest grocery retailer in the United States.
in 2009, it utpann 51 percent of its us $ 258 arab sales in the u.S. from kiraanaa kaarobaar.
It bhi owns or operates the sam 's Club khudara warehouses in uttar america.
by 1988, wal-mart thi the sabase laabhprad retailor in the us, or by November 1990, it outsold k-mart.
by 1991 it outsold Sears in khudara, bananaa it america 's largest retailor, a bhed it still holds.
walmart has 8,500 stores in 15 deshon, antargat 55 alag names.
the company operates antargat the walmart name in the sanyukt States, sahit the 50 states and purto rico.
It operates in mexico as walmex, in the United Kingdom as asda, in japani as Seiyu, or in india as behtareen daam.
It has wholly swaamitv operations in argentina, Brazil, or canada.
walmart 's nivesh outside uttar america have had mishrit parinaam : iske parichaalan in the United kingdom, dakshin america, or china are atyadhik kaamyaab, whereas ventures in germany or South korian yahood unsuccessful.

an example of rack arohit servers
a web hosting seva is a prakaar of antarjaal hosting service ki allows individuals and sanghathan to mek unke jalsthal accessible via the World chaudee Web.
Web host hai companies ki provide space on a sarwar swaamitv or leased liye upyog by client, as well as providing Internet connactivity, typically in a aankada center.
web host can bhi provide aankada bich spes or connectivity to the antarjaal liye anya sarwar stith in their aankada bich, pukaara colocation, bhi gyaat as awaas in Latin america or France.
the paimaana of web hosting sevaayen varies greatly.
The sabase basic is web page and small-scale sanchika hosting, jahaan filein can be uploaded via File transafar protocol ( apatpi ) or a web interfes.
the filein hai usually vitarit to the Web `` as is '' or saath minimal prasanskaran.
anek antarjaal seva pradaataaon ( isps ) prastaav is seva free to sadsy.
individuals or sanghathan may also obtain web pej hosting isse alternative service pradaataaon.
Personal web sait hosting is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web sait hosting praayah has a ucchtar vyay depending upon the aakaar or prakaar of the website.
Single pej hosting is generally sufficient liye nijee web prishthon.
a complex site kals for a more vyapak package ki provides database support or anuprayog vikaas plateform ( e.g. piechapi, java, maaniky on rails, coldfusion, or asp.net ).
ye facilities allow graahak to likhen or sthapana script liye anuprayog jaise forums or saamagree prabandhan.
bhi, surakshit Sockets parat ( esasail ) is typically prayukt liye e-commerce.
the host may bhi provide an interfes or control panel for managing the web sarwar or installing script, as well as anya maudul or seva anuprayog like e-mail.
kuch host specialize in certain tantra or sevaayen ( e.g. e-commerce ), which hai commonly prayukt by larger companiyaan that outsource sanjaal avasanrachana.

The rhite brothers, orville ( agast 19, 1871 – janvari 30, 1948 ) or wilbur ( April 16, 1867 – May 30, 1912 ), yahood two amareeki bhaaiyo, avishkaarak, or vimaanan pioneers who yahood credited with inventing or bhawan the sansar 's first kaamyaab vayuyan or making the first niyantrit, sanchalit or sustained heavier-than-air insaan udaan, on disambar 17, 1903.
isse 1905 to 1907, the bhaaiyo viksit unke udati yantra into the first vyaavhaarik fixed-wing vayuyan.
haalanki nahin the pehla to build or makkhi praayogic aircraft, the Wright bhaaiyo yahood the pehla to ifatera vayuyan niyantran that made fixed-wing powered udaan sambhavit.
the bhaaiyo ' fundamental breakthrough thi unke avishkaar of three-axis control, jisase sakriy the pilot to steer the vayuyan effectively and to maintain iske santulan.
is vidhi became maanak or remains maanak on fixed-wing vayuyan of all kinds.
isse the shuruuaat of their aeronautical work, the rhite bhaaiyo kendrit on vikasshil a vishwasaneey method of payalat control as the kunjee to solving `` the udati problem ''.
is approach differed significantly isse anya experimenters of the samay jo put more jor on vikasshil shaktishaalee ingine.
using a choti homebuilt hawa tunnel, the wrights also collected adhik sateek data than any before, enabling them to dizine or nirmaan wings or propellers that yahood adhik kushal than koi before.
unke pehla u.S. patent, 821,393, kiya not claim invention of a udati yantra, but rather, the invention of a pranali of aerodynamic control that manipulated a udati yantra 's satahon.
They gained the mechanical skills anivaary for their kamyaabi by working for saalo in unke shop saath printing dabaata, bicycles, motors, or anya mashinari.
unke kaary saath bicycles in particular influenced unke vishwaas ki an asthir gadee like a flying yantra could be niyantrit or santulit with abhyaas.
isse 1900 jabatak their pehla sanchalit flite in let 1903, ve conducted extensive glider tests ki bhi viksit unke skills as payalton.
unke cykil shop karmchaaree charlie tailor became an mahatvapurn part of the toli, bhawan their first vayuyan engine in band sahyog saath the brothers.
the Wright bhaaiyo ' status as inventors of the vayuyan rai maharoom subject to counter-claims by various partiyon.
much vivaad persists over the anek spardhaa daawa of early aviators.
