exxon mobil nigam, or exxonmobil, is an American bahurashtriya aayal or gas nigam headquartered in irving, texas, sanyukt rajya.
It is a sidhaa descendant of John D. Rockefeller 's maanak Oil company, or thi formed on navambar 30, 1999, by the merger of Exxon and mobil.
It is sambhddha with imperial aayal jisase operates in canada.
ExxonMobil is the sansar 's largest company by revenue or in 2013, became the largest saream traded company by market capitalization in the sansar.
the company is kramit # 5 globally in forbs vaishvik 2000 suchi in 2013.
exxon mobil 's reserves yahood 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels at the end of 2007 and, at tab ( 2007 ) daron of utpaadan, hai apekshit to pichhlaa over 14 saalo.
saath 37 aayal refineries in 21 deshon constituting a combined rose refining capacity of, exxon Mobil is the largest refiner in the sansar, a sheershak ki thi bhi sambhddha saath maanak Oil chunki iske incorporation in 1870.
exxonmobil is the largest of the sansar 's supermajors saath rose utpaadan of 3.921 lakh boe ( barrels of aayal samatuly ).
in 2008, is thi lagbhag 3 % of world production, which is kam than anek of the largest state-owned petroleum companies.
jab ranked by aayal or gas reserves it is 14th in the sansar saath less than 1 % of the kul.
a 2012 aalekh in the rose telegraph says that exxonmobil rai `` grown into ek of the planet’s sabase hated corporations, samarth to determine American foreign policy or the bhagya of sampurna raashtra ''.
in sharten of iske paryaavarniya ricard, ExxonMobil increasingly drills in terrains leased to them by dictatorships, such as those in chad or Equatorial gini.
lee remand, the corporation’s mukhya karypalika jabatak 2005, thi `` notoriously sceptical parichay jalwaayu badalen or disliked government hastkshep at koi level ''.
the company was widely criticized liye iske slow jawaab to safaai iske 1989 Valdez aayal spill in alaska.
is aalekh is parichay the globe theatre of shakespeare.
For the aadhunik reconstruction in landan, dekhie Shakespeare 's globe.
For other upyog, dekhie Globe Theatre ( bahuviklpi ).
The globe Theatre was a theatre in landan associated with wiliam shakespeare.
It thi nirmit in 1599 by Shakespeare 's playing company, the rab chemberlen 's main, on land swaamitv by Thomas Brend or inherited by uske son, nicholas Brend and pota sar mathew brend, or thi destroyed by aag on 29 June 1613.
a duusari globe theatre thi nirmit on the vahi site by June 1614 or band in 1642.
a aadhunik punarnirmaan of the globe, namit `` shakespeare 's globe ``, opened in 1997 lagbhag from the sait of the asli theatre.
it 's a adbhut Life is a 1946 American christmas naatak filmi utpaadit or nirdeshit by Frank capra, aadhaarit on the short story `` the mahanatam Gift ``, jisase Philip vine Doren stern wrote in 1939 or privately prakashit in 1945.
The filmi is considered one of the sabase loved films in amareeki cinema or has become paramparaagat viewing during the christmas season, alongside lokapriy classics aise as charles Dickens ' a christmas carol.
the filmi sitaron james stewart as george Bailey, a man jo rai die up uske dreams in anukram to sahaayta anya or jinaki nikat aatmahatya on christmas sandhya brings parichay the hastkshep of uske guardian devdoot, clarence odbody ( Henry trevers ).
clarence shows george all the jeevandaan he rai touched and kaisaa different jivan in uske jatiyaan of bedford jalprapaat hota be tha he never been born.
despite initially performing poorly at the baksaa daftar due to unchi utpaadan laagat and stiff pratiyogita at the samay of iske relies, the filmi has aaiye to be regarded as a classic or is a stepal of christmas television around the world.
Theatrically, the filmi 's break-even point thi darasal $ 6.3 lakh, approximately twice the production laagat, a figure it never aae close to achieving in iske aarambhik relies.
An appraisal in 2006 reported : `` haalanki it was not the puraa baksaa daftar vifaltaa that today everyone maanata... it thi initially a pramukh disappointment or pushti, at tanik to the studios, ki capra was no longer sakasham of turning out the populist suvidhaayen ki bana uske films the must-see, money-making kaarykram ve ekbar yahood. ''
the filmi thi manonith liye paanch auskar and rai been pahachaanaa by the amareeki filmi Institute as ek of the 100 behtareen amareeki films kabhi made, rakhkar kramank 11 on its aarambhik 1998 mahanatam movie suchi, and hota bhi place number ek on iske suchi of the most preranadayak amareeki films of sab samay.
aankada godaam Overview
in computing, a aankada godaam or enterprize aankada godaam ( dw, DWH, or edw ) is a database prayukt liye reporting or aankada vishleshan.
it is a central repository of data jisase is nirmit by integrating aankada from ek or adhik disparate strot.
Data warehouses store vartmaan as khub as historical aankada or hai used liye bananaa charchit reports liye senior management reporting aise as salanaa or tremasik comparisons.
the aankada stored in the godaam are uploaded from the operational pranaaliyon ( such as vipanan, bikri etc., dikhaaya in the figure to the sahi ).
The aankada may pass through an operational data store liye atirikt parichaalan pehle ve are prayukt in the dw for reporting.
the theth etl -aadharand data godaam uses staging, aankada integration, or abhigam layers to house iske key krityon.
the staging parat or staging database stores kaccha aankada nikaali isse prayek of the disparate sorce aankada pranaaliyon.
the integration parat integrates the disparate data set by transforming the data isse the staging parat often storing this roopantarit data in an operational aankada store ( ods ) database.
the ekikrut data are tab sthanantarit to yet another database, praayah pukaara the aankada godaam database, jahaan the data is arranged into hierarchical samooh praayah pukaara aayam or into tathy and kul tathy.
the sangyojan of tathy and aayam is sometimes pukaara a star schema.
the abhigam parat helps upayokta retrieve data.
a data warehouse constructed isse an ekikrut aankada source pranaaliyon karata nahin require etl, staging databases, or operational data store databases.
the ekikrut aankada sorce pranaaliyon may be mana to be a bhaag of a vitarit operational aankada store parat.
aankada sangh vidhi or aankada virtualization methods may be prayukt to abhigam the vitarit ekikrut source aankada pranaaliyon to consolidate or kul aankada sidhe into the data godaam database teble.
naapsand the etl-based aankada godaam, the integrated sorce data pranaaliyon or the aankada godaam are sab ekikrut since vahin is no parivartan of aiami or sandarbh aankada.
This ekikrut aankada warehouse vaastukala supports the drill bas isse the aggregate aankada of the aankada godaam to the transactional aankada of the ekikrut source aankada systems.
aankada warehouses can be subdivided into aankada marts.
aankada marts store subsets of data isse a warehouse.
is definition of the aankada warehouse focuses on aankada storage.
the pramukh sorce of the aankada is cleaned, transformed, cataloged or bana uplabdhiyaan for upyog by prabandhak or anya business peshewar liye aankada khanan, online vishleshnatmak prasanskaran, market shodh and nirnay support ( marakas & O'Brien 2009 ).
However, the arthath to retrieve and analyze aankada, to nikaalen, transform or lod data, or to manage the data shabdkosh are bhi considered essential components of a data warehousing system.
anek sandarbh to aankada warehousing upyog is broader context.
yun, an vistaarit paribhaasha for data warehousing includes kaarobaar intelligence tools, tuls to extract, roopantaran or lod data into the repository, or tools to manage and retrieve metadata.
portland stone quarry on the oil of portland, england
an abandoned nirmaan kul pashaan nikat edilade, dakshin australia
a quarry is a type of open-pit meraa isse jisase chattan or minerals hai extracted.
khadaanon hai generally prayukt for extracting bhawan materials, aise as dimension stone, nirmaan kul, riprap, baaluu, and bajri.
ve are praayah collocated saath concrete and daamer paudhe due to the requirement liye vishaal amounts of aggregate in those saamagree.
kholen khaanon that upaj khanij hai typically referred to as kholen gadde mines.
the shabd quarry can shaamil underground quarrying liye stone, aise as nahaana stone.
Mormons ( ) hai a dharmik or cultural group sambandhit to mormonism, the principal shakha of the latter din sant movement of restorationist christianity, jisase began with the visions of joseph smith in upstate New york dauraan the 1820s.
baad smith 's death in 1844 the mormons followed Brigham yang to kayaa hota become the uta territory.
aaj mormons hai understood to be sadasyon of the girijaghar of yishu Christ of latter-day santo ( lds girijaghar ).
kuch Mormons hai also either swatantra or non-practicing.
the bich of mormon saanskrithik influence is in uta, and North america has adhik Mormons than koi anya mahadweep, haalanki the bahumat of mormons live baahar the sanyukt rajya.
Mormons have viksit a strong sense of communality ki tana isse unke doctrine or itihaas.
dauraan the 19th century mormon converts tended to ekatrit to a central geographic sthaan, or between 1852 or 1890 a alpsankhyak of Mormons khulkar practiced plural marriage, a rup of dharmik polygamy.
Mormons dedicate vishaal amounts of time and resources to serving in their girijaghar, or anek yang mormons chune to serve a full-time proselytizing mishan.
mormons have a swasthya code ki eschews alcoholic beverages, tambaaku, coffee, chaay, or anya addictive substances.
ve tend to be bahut family-oriented, and have damdaar conections across peedhiyaan or saath vistaarit parivaar, paravartak of unke vishwaas ki families can be sealed saath pare death or throughout eternity.
mormons bhi have a sakht vidhi of chastity, requiring abstention from yon sambandh baahar of vivaah and sakht vafadaari within marriage.
mormons self-identify as Christian, haalanki kuch of unke manyataon differ from mukhyadhara Christianity.
Mormons maananaa in the Bible, as khub as anya books of scripture, such as the Book of Mormon.
ve have a adwitiya drishy of cosmology, or maananaa ki all logon hai spirit-children of parameshwar.
mormons maananaa that returning to God requires following the example of yishu Christ, or accepting uske atonement through ordinances aise as baptism.
ve believe ki Christ 's girijaghar thi restored through joseph Smith, or is hidaayat by living nabiyon or rasulon.
Central to mormon aasthaa is the vishwaas that parameshwar bolti to uske children or jawaab their prarthanaayen.
in vittiya hisaab, asset hai economic sansaadhan.
Anything thos or intangible ki is sakasham of being swaamitv or niyantrit to upaj value or that is yojit to have dhanatmak aarthik maan is mana an asset.
Simply stated, asset represent maan of swaamitv ki can be converted into cash ( haalanki nakadi itself is bhi considered an asset ).
the santulan chadar of a firm record the monetaryJ.
G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` the baniyaan jeb CPA '', wiley, 2005.there hai alag vidhi of assessing the maudrik maan of the asset ankit on the santulan chadar.
In kuch maamle, the Historical laagat is prayukt ; such that the value of the asset jab it thi kharida in the past is used as the monetary maan.
In anya udhaaharan, the upasthit mela market maan of the asset is used to determine the value shown on the santulan chadar.
value of the asset swaamitv by the kad.
it is dhan or other valuables belonging to an individual or kaarobaar.
do major asset varg hai thos asset or intangible asset.
thos asset contain vibhinn subclasses, sahit current asset or phixd assets.j.
downes, j.e. gudman, `` Dictionary of Finance & nivesh sharten '', samant 's vittiya Guides, 2003 vartmaan asset shaamil inventory, jabaki fixed asset shaamil aise items as imaaraten or upkaran.J. Downes, j.e. Goodman, `` shabdkosh of Finance & nivesh sharten '', Baron 's Financial maargdarshika, 2003 ; or J. G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` the Vest Pocket CPA '', wiley, 2005.
Intangible asset hai nonphysical sansaadhan or rights ki have a maan to the kad kuki ve de the kad some kind of advantage in the market place.
udhaaharan of intangible asset hai saakh, copyrights, trademarks, patents and computer kaarykram, or vittiya asset, sahit aise vasteen as khate receivable, bonds or stox.
A neuron ( or ; bhi gyaat as a neurone or tantrika koshika ) is an electrically excitable koshika ki processes and transmits soochna through vidyut or chemical signals.
A rasinic signal occurs via a antargrathan, a specialized conection saath anya cells.
Neurons conect to prayek anya to rup neural networks.
neurons hai the core components of the baichaiyn pranali, jisase shaamil the brain, spinal cord, or paridhiy ganglia.
a kramank of specialized types of neurons exist : sensory neurons respond to tach, dhwani, lite or numerous other stimuli affecting koshikaayen of the samvedi angon ki tab bhejein signal to the spinal cord and dimag.
Motor neurons praapt signal isse the brain or spinal cord, cause muscle contractions, or affect grathiyon.
interneurons conect neurons to other neurons within the vahi pradesh of the dimag or spinal cord.
a typical neuron possesses a koshika deh ( praayah pukaara the som ), dendrites, or an axon.
Dendrites hai thin structures ki uthta isse the koshika deh, praayah extending for sainkadon of micrometres or branching anek times, giving vruddhi to a jatil `` dendritic ped ''.
an axon is a special cellular ekstansion that arises isse the cell body at a site pukaara the axon hillock and travels liye a distance, as dur as 1 meter in insaano or even adhik in anya species.
the koshika deh of a neuron frequently detaa vruddhi to multiple dendrites, lakin never to adhik than ek axon, haalanki the axon may branch sainkadon of times pehle it terminates.
at the majority of synapses, signals hai bheja isse the axon of ek neuron to a dendrite of another.
vahin are, however, anek exceptions to ye niyam : neurons that kami dendrites, neurons ki have no axon, synapses that conect an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite, ityadi.
sab neurons hai electrically excitable, maintaining voltage gradients aarpaar their jhilliyon by means of metabolically chalit ion pumps, jisase combine saath ion channels antahsthapit in the jhilli to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular concentration differences of ions aise as sodium, potacium, chloride, or calcium.
Changes in the cross-membrane voltage can alter the function of voltage-dependent aayan channels.
if the voltage parivartan by a large paryaapt amount, an all-or-none electrochemical pulse called an action sambhavit is utpann, which travels rapidly along the cell 's axon, or activates synaptic conections with other cells jab it aagaman.
Neurons do not undergo koshika division.
in most cases, neurons are utpann by khaas types of stem koshikaayen.
astrocytes, a type of glial koshika, have bhi maharoom observed to phere into neurons by virtue of the stem cell characteristic pluripotency.
In insaano, neurogenesis largely ceases dauraan adulthood—but in do dimag areas, the hippocampus or ghran bulb, vahin is damdaar evidence liye peedhee of substantial sankhyaayein of new neurons.
super katori xliii thi an amareeki footbaal khel between the American footbaal sammelan ( afc ) champion Pittsburgh stilers or the neshnal footbaal sammelan ( nfc ) champion Arizona cardinals to decide the neshnal footbaal lig ( enegel ) champion liye the 2008 ritu.
the Steelers defeated the cardinals by the score of 27–23.
the game was nibhaai on February 1, 2009, at Raymond james stadium in tampa, florida.
With is jeet, the Steelers became the first toli to jeet chah super pyaale.
pittsburg, jo samaapt the niyamit ritu saath a 12–4 record, also jiti their second super Bowl in chaar years baad jeetna super katori xl at the samaapt of the 2005 ritu.
the cardinals entered the khel seeking their pehla enegel title chunki 1947, the longest championships sookhaa in the lig.
the klbon became an anpekshit vijeta dauraan the regular season, compiling a 9–7 ricard, and the playoffs saath the sahaayta of sir coach ken whisenhunt, jo was the stilers ' apriy samanvayak in Super Bowl xl, or the re-emergence of quarterbaque court warner, jo was the Super Bowl mvp in Super katori xxxiv saath uske purv toli, st. lui medhon.
Pittsburgh jumped to a 17–7 madhyantar lead, aided by linebacker James harrison 's super Bowl ricard 100-yard interception return for a touchdown.
trailing 20–7 at the prarambh of the chauthi quarter, Arizona scored 16 unanswered ank, sahit chaudee receiver laire fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown resepshan, to take the sise with 2:37 remaining in the game.
But the stilers marched 78 yards to score on chaudee receiver santonio Holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 second baayein.
Holmes, jo caught nau passes liye 131 gaj or a touchdown, including four receptions liye 73 gaj on ki final game-winning drive, was namit super Bowl mvp.
he became the chathe chaudee receiver to win the award, or also thi the teesraa pittsburg receiver to jeet the award, following lynn swann and hines ward.
despite the vaishvik financial crisis or simit raashi of ancillary festivities that hai saamanytah yojit pehle the game, the NBC television network broadcast attracted an average u.S. audience of 98.7 million darshak, bananaa it the sabase dekhi Super katori in history to ki point.
a aarekh of the electromagnetic varnakram, prardashit vibhinn properties aarpaar the dayera of barambharataa or wavelengths
the electromagnetic varnakram is the dayera of sab sambhavit frequencies of electromagnetic vikiran.
the `` electromagnetic varnakram '' of an object rai a different arth, and is bajaay the characteristic vitaran of electromagnetic vikiran utsarjit or avashoshit by ki particular object.
The electromagnetic varnakram extends isse neeche the kam barambharataa prayukt liye aadhunik radio communication to gamma vikiran at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) samaapt, thereby covering wavelengths isse hazaron of kilometre bas to a fraction of the aakaar of an atom.
The seemaa liye long wavelengths is the aakaar of the brahmad itself, jabaki it is thought ki the choti wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the plank lambaai, haalanki in principle the varnakram is anant or continuous.
Most parts of the electromagnetic varnakram hai prayukt in vigyaan liye spectroscopic and anya probing interactions, as tareeke to padhai and characterize matter.
in addition, vikiran isse vibhinn bhaag of the varnakram rai mila anek anya uses liye sanchaar or nirmaan ( dekhie electromagnetic vikiran liye more applications ).
legend
Marchantia, a liverwort
Bryophyte is a paramparaagat naam used to refer to all embryophytes ( jameen plants ) ki do nahin have sachcha vascular utak or hai therefore pukaara ' non-vascular paudhe '.
Some bryophytes do have specialized utakon liye the hastantaran of jal ; however chunki ye do nahin contain lignin, ve hai nahin mana to be sachcha vascular tissue.
Currently bryophytes are vichaar nahin to be a prakritik or monophyletic samooh ; however the naam is convenient or remains in use as a samuhik pad liye mosses, hornworts, and liverworts.
bryophytes produce enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia or sporangia ), lakin they produce neither flowers nor beej, reproducing via spores.
The term bryophyte aata isse Greek βρύον, bryon, `` tree-moss, oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` sanyantr ''.
A bainko is a vittiya sanstha and a vittiya intermediary ki accepts jamaa or channels those deposits into lending activities, either sidhe by loaning or indirectly through puunji markets.
a bainko is the conection between graahak that have puunji deficits or graahak with puunji surpluses.
due to unke influence bheetar a vittiya pranali and an arthvyavastha, bainko are generally atyadhik regulated in most deshon.
sabase banks operate antargat a pranali gyaat as fractional reserve banking jahaan ve tham tabhi a small arakshit of the nidhi deposited or lend out the baaki liye profit.
ve hai generally subject to nunatam capital aavashyaktaayen jisase hai aadhaarit on an international niyat of puunji maanakon, known as the basel accords.
The oldest bainko still in existence is monte dei paschi di Siena, headquartered in siena, Italy, jisase rai maharoom oparating lagaataar chunki 1472.
It is followed by berenberg Bank of hamberg ( 1590 ) or sveriges riksbank of sweden ( 1668 ).
Banking in its aadhunik bhav viksit in samrudh shaharon of Renaissance Italy, aise as florence, venice or genoa.
In the itihaas of banking, a kramank of banking dynasties —among them notably Medici, fugger, welser, Berenberg, baring or Rothschild —have nibhaai a central role over anek sadiyaan.
The exbox is a video game console manufactured by Microsoft.
It thi released on navambar 15, 2001 in uttar america, February 22, 2002 in japani, and kooch 14, 2002 in australia or europea.
It was microsoft 's pehla foray into the gaming consol market.
as part of the sixth-generation of gaming, the exbox competed saath soni 's plastesan 2, sega 's dreamcast ( jisase roka American bikri pehle the exbox gai on bikri ), or nintendo 's gamecube.
The exbox thi the pehla consol offered by an amareeki company baad the Atari Jaguar stopped sales in 1996.
the ekikrut exbox sajiv service shubharambh in November 2002 anumat khilaadi to play khel online saath a broadband connection.
it pehla competed saath Dreamcast 's online seva but baad primarily competed saath plastesan 2 's online seva.
haalanki ye two hai free jabaki Xbox Live jaruri a sabsakripshan, as khub as broadband-only connection jisase thi not completely apanaaya yet, exbox sajiv thi a kamyaabi due to better sarwar, features aise as a dost list, or padaav sheershak jaise Halo 2 released in navambar 2004, jisase is the best-selling Xbox video khel or was by far the most popular online khel liye saalo.
exbox 's successor, the exbox 360, was launched in November 2005.
The Xbox thi discontinued in let 2005 in japani jahaan sales yahood garib.
It thi discontinued in let 2006 in Europe or jaldi 2007 in uttar America.
the pichhlaa exbox game in europea thi tony hoque 's project 8 released in navambar 2006, or the pichhlaa khel in North America thi maden enegel 09 released in agast 2008.
support liye out-of-warranty exbox consoles thi discontinued on kooch 2, 2009, stating ki any in-warranty marammat abhi needed hoga not be undertaken.
Xbox abhigam to Xbox sajiv thi stopped on april 15, 2010.
the Gospel according to John ( unani τὸ κατὰ Ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ), commonly referred to as the inzel of jon or bas jon and praayah referred to in New Testament scolership as the Fourth inzel, is an account of the public ministry of Jesus.
It begins saath the gavaah or pratigyaan by jon the baptist or concludes saath the maut, burial, qayamat, or post-resurrection dikhaave of yishu.
is account is chauthi of the canonical gospels, after the synoptics mathew, chihnit or luk.
rajya ki the book derives isse the gavaahi of the ' shishy whom yishu loved. '
Along saath peter, the benaam shishy is especially band to yishu, or early-church parampara identified use as jon the apostle, ek of yishu ' baarah rasulon.
the inzel is closely sambandhit in style or saamagree to the teen surviving epistles of jon aise ki tikaakaron daavat the chaar books saath, yet, according to most aadhunik vidwaanon, jon thi nahin the lekhak of koi of ye kitabe.
haal isai Scripture scolership adhik or adhik rai lagaai jon bheetar a first-century yahudee context.
remand E. bhura kiya pioneering kaary to tres the vikaas of the parampara isse jisase the gospel arose.
the pravachan seem to be chintit saath the vaastavik issues of the church-and-synagogue bahes at the samay jab the Gospel was likhaa.
it is notable that, in the inzel, the jatiyaan still appears to define itself primarily against judaism, balki than as bhaag of a wider Christian girijaghar.
haalanki christianity prarambh as a gati bheetar Judaism, dhire Christians and yahudiyon became bitterly opposed.
jon presents a `` ucchtar '' christology than the synoptics, arth ki it describes Jesus as the incarnation of the daivi logo through jisko sab bate were bana, as the object of veneration, and adhik explicitly as parameshwar incarnate.
Only in John karata yishu baat at lambaai about himself and uske daivi role, often shared saath the shishyon tabhi.
viruddh the synoptics, jon focuses largely on different miracles ( sahit resurrecting lazarus ), die as lakshan meant to engender aasthaa.
synoptic elements aise as parables or exorcisms hai nahin found in jon.
It presents a ehsaas eschatology in jisase moksh is already upasthit liye the aastik.
the Plagues of Egypt ( ), bhi pukaara the ten plagues ( ) or the Biblical plagues, were ten calamities ki, according to the biblical kitaab of exodus, israel 's parameshwar, yahweh, inflicted upon mishra to raji pharaoh to release the ill-treated israelites isse gulaami.
pharaoh capitulated baad the tenth plig, triggering the exodus of the Jewish logon.
the plagues yahood designed to contrast the shakti of yahweh with the napunsakata of mishra 's various devataaon.
Some tikaakaron have sambhddha anek of the plagues saath nirnay on vishisht devataaon sambhddha saath the Nile, prajnan or natural phenomena.
The plagues of mishra are bhi ullekith in the quran ( 7,133–136 ).
according to the kitaab of exodus, parameshwar proclaims ki sab the devataaon of mishra will be judged through the tenth and final plague:
John martin 's painting of the plague of hail or aag ( 1823 ).
A role-playing game ( RPG or sometimes roleplaying game ) is a khel in jisase players assume the bhoomikaaye of varna in a fictional setting.
khilaadi lo jimmedaari for acting out these roles within a katha, either through literal acting or through a prakram of structured decision-making or akshar development.
kriyaayein liya bheetar anek khel safal or asafal according to a aupchaarik pranali of niyam or guidelines.
There hai anek forms of arpiji.
the asli rup, sometimes called the tabletop arpiji, is conducted through charchaa, whereas in sajiv action role-playing games ( larp ) khilaadi physically perform unke varna ' actions.
In dono of these form, an arranger pukaara a khel master ( gm ) usually decides on the niyam or setting to be prayukt or adhiniyamon as referi, jabaki prayek of the other players plays the bhoomika of a single akshar.
anek kismein of arpiji bhi maujuud in electronic media, such as multi-player text-based muds and unke graphics-based successors, massively ekaadhik online role-playing khel ( MMORPGs ).
Role-playing khel bhi shaamil single-player ofline role-playing video khel in jisase players control a akshar or team jo undertake quests, or may include samarthy ki agrim using sankhyikeey yantriki.
These khel often share settings and niyam saath tabletop rpgs, but emphasize character unnati more than collaborative storytelling.
despite this kismein of form, kuch khel form aise as trading card games or wargames ki hai related to role-playing games may nahin be shaamil.
role-playing kaaryaklap may sometimes be upasthit in aise khel, lakin it is nahin the primary fokas.
the pad is bhi sometimes prayukt to describe roleplay simulation khel or exercises prayukt in teaching, prashikshan, or academik shodh.
the American civil War ( acw ), bhi known as the War between the rajya or simply the civil War ( dekhie namakaran ), thi a civil yuddh fought isse 1861 to 1865 between the sanyukt States ( the `` sangh '' or the `` uttar '' ) or anek dakshini slave rajya that ghoshit unke secession or formed the confederate rajya of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
the yuddh had its origin in the samasya of gulaami, visheshkar the ekstansion of gulaami into the pashchimi territories.
videshi shaktiyaan kiya nahin intervene.
baad chaar saalo of khooni combat ki left over 600,000 sainiko murde and nasht much of the dakshin 's avasanrachana, the confederacy collapsed, gulaami thi abolished, or the mushkil punarnirmaan prakram of restoring neshnal ekta or guaranteeing rights to the freed slave began.
in the 1860 adhyakshiya election, republicans, led by abraham lincoln, opposed expanding gulaami into United rajya ' territories.
Lincoln won, lakin pehle uske udghaatan on kooch 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave rajya formed the confederacy.
Outgoing loktantric adhyaksh james Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural address ghoshit his prashasan would nahin initiate civil yuddh.
Eight baaki slave rajya jari to asweekrut kals liye secession.
confederate forces jabt numerous sangheey durgon bheetar territory claimed by the confederacy.
a salaam sammelan vifal to dhundhen a sulah, or both pahalu prepared liye yuddh.
the confederates assumed ki European deshon were so nirbhar on `` king kapaas `` ki they hota intervene ; none kiya or none recognized the nai Confederate rajya of America.
hostilities began on april 12, 1861, jab confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter, a kunjee fort held by sangh sainikon in dakshin Carolina.
lincoln pukaara for prayek rajya to provide sainikon to retake the fort ; natijatan, chaar adhik slave rajya joined the confederacy, bringing unke kul to gyaarah.
the Union jald niyantrit the kinaaraa states or established a naval nakebandi that crippled the dakshini arthvyavastha.
The Eastern theatre thi inconclusive in 1861–62.
The patjhad 1862 confederate abhiyaan into maryland ( a sangh rajya ) ended saath confederate retreat at the Battle of antietam, dissuading angrejon hastkshep.
lincoln jari the emancipation Proclamation, which made samaapti slavery a war lakshya.
To the west, by garmiyaan 1862 the sangh nasht the confederate nadi navy, tab much of unke pashchimi sena, and the sangh at vicksburg vibhajit the confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
in 1863, robert E. lee 's confederate incursion uttar ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western safaltaaon led to ulysses S. grant command of sab sangh sena in 1864.
in the pashchimi theatre, wiliam T. sharaman drove east to capchar Atlanta or marched to the samudr, destroying Confederate infrastructure saath the rasta.
the sangh marshaled the sansaadhan or janashakti to akraman the confederacy isse sab dishanirdesh, and could afford to lado ladaaiyon of apgharshan through the overland Campaign towards richmond, the Confederate puunji.
the defending confederate fouj failed, agrani to lee 's aatmasamarpan to grant at appomattox adaalat house on april 9, 1865.
The American civil yuddh was ek of the earliest sachcha audyogic wars.
railroads, the telegraph, steamships, or mass-produced hathiyaar were employed extensively.
the mobilization of civilian factories, khaanon, shipyards, bainko, parivahan and khaanaa aapurtiyan all foreshadowed sansar yuddh i.
It remains the deadliest yuddh in amareeki itihaas, resulting in the mauton of an anumaanit 750,000 soldiers or an undetermined kramank of civilian casualties.
itihaaskaar jon huddleston estimates the death toll at ten pratishat of sab Northern males 20–45 years boodha, or 30 pratishat of sab Southern shwet males aged 18–40.
the paribhaasha of the world 's vyastatam vimaanashetra has been specified by the airport parishad antarrashtriya in geneva, switzaraland.
the aci defines and upayon the following teen prakaar of vimaanashetra traffic:
yatri traffic : kul yatri emplaned or deplaned, yatri in pargaman gine ekbar
cargo traffic : loaded or mod haada and mail in metric ton
trekkic andolanon : landings or take-offs of vayuyan
sansar yuddh i ( wwi ) thi a vaishvik yuddh kendrit in Europe ki began on 28 july 1914 or lasted jabatak 11 navambar 1918.
it thi predominantly pukaara the sansar War or the Great yuddh isse iske occurrence jabatak the prarambh of sansar War ii in 1939, and the pehla sansar yuddh or sansar yuddh i thereafter.
it shaamil all the sansar 's great powers, jisase were assembled in do opposing alliances : the allies ( based on the tripal entente of the United kingdom, frans or Russia ) and the central shaktiyaan ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as austria–hungary tha liya the offensive viruddh the anubandh, italy kiya not daalen into the war ).
ye alliances yahood both reorganised and vistaarit as adhik raashtra entered the war : Italy, japani or the United rajya joined the allies, or the Ottoman Empire or Bulgaria the central shaktiyaan.
ultimately, adhik than 70 lakh sainya karmiyon, including 60 lakh Europeans, yahood mobilised in one of the largest yudhon in itihaas.
More than 9 lakh combatants yahood maare, largely because of technological advancements ki led to vishaal increases in the lethality of weapons bagaiyr sambandhit sudhaar in protection or gatishiltaa.
it thi the fifth- deadliest virodh in sansar itihaas, subsequently paving the way liye vibhinn rajnatik parivartan, aise as revolutions in anek of the raashtra involved.
ek of the long-term kalyankari of the yuddh was the punarutthan of samrajyavad in the foreign nitiyon of the great powers of europea.
adhik tatkaal, the hatya of archduke franj Ferdinand of austria, the vaaris to the singhaasana of austria-hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav rashtravaadi gavrilo princip in sarajevo triggered a rajanyik sankat jab austria-hungary subsequently vitarit an ultimatum to the Kingdom of srbija.
Several alliances formed over the pichhlaa decades yahood invoked.
bheetar saptaah, the pramukh shaktiyaan yahood at yuddh or, via unke colonies, the virodh jald sprad around the world.
on 28 july, the Austro-Hungarians fired the pehla shots of the yuddh as taiyaari liye the akraman of srbija.
jabaki the russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium or Luxembourg on the rasta to France, providing a casus belli for britain 's ghoshnaa of yuddh viruddh germany.
baad the German kooch on paris was brought to a halt—the so-called chamatkaar of the marne —the pashchimi saamne settled into a sthir battle of attrition with a gart lakeer ki badla little until 1917.
On the purvi saamne, the roosi fouj thi successful viruddh the Austro-Hungarians, but thi stopped in its akraman of east Prussia by the germans.
In navambar the osmani samrajya joined the war, kholane up fronts in the kakeshas, Mesopotamia or the sinai.
italy or bulgaria gai to yuddh in 1915 or romania in 1916.
In rus, the tsar 's government collapsed in kooch 1917 and a subsequent kranti in November brought the Russians to sharten with the central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive saath the western saamne, the Allies drove back the Germans in a shrenee of kaamyaab offensives or amareeki shaktiyaan began entering the trenches.
germany, jisase tha iske apana trubal saath revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
the yuddh ended in vijay for the allies.
kaarykram on the home fronts yahood as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the participants aajamaaya to mobilize their janashakti and aarthik sansaadhan to fight a kul yuddh.
by the samaapt of the yuddh, chaar pramukh imperial powers—the German, roosi, Austro-Hungarian or osmani empires—ceased to maujuud.
the successor rajya of the purv do khoyaa a great amount of territory, jabaki the latter do yahood dismantled entirely.
the map of central europea thi redrawn into anek choti rajya.
The lig of raashtra thi formed in the aashaa of preventing another aise virodh.
the European nationalism spawned by the yuddh or the brallep of empires, the parakhnaa of germany 's shikast or samasyaayein with the sandhi of versailles hai agreed to be factors contributing to sansar yuddh II.
the Deepwater Horizon oil spill ( bhi referred to as the bp oil spill, the BP aayal vipatti, the gulf of mexico aayal spill, or the Macondo blowout ) thi an oil spill in the gulf of mexico on the BP -operated macondo prospect, mana the largest aakasmik samudri aayal spill in the itihaas of the petroleum udyog, anumaanit to be between 8 % or 31 % larger in awaz than the pehle Ixtoc I aayal spill.
following the explosion or dub of the Deepwater kshitij aayal rig, which claimed 11 jeevandaan, a sea-floor aayal gusher flowed unabated liye 87 days, until it thi capped on 15 july 2010.
The kul nirvahan is anumaanit at.
a vishaal jawaab ensued to protect samudratat, wetelends and estuaries isse the spreading aayal utilizing skimmer ships, floating booms, niyantrit burns or of Corexit oil dispersant.
baad anek vifal praytn to contain the flow, the khub thi ghoshit sealed on 19 sitambar 2010.
kuch reports indicate the well site continues to li.
due to the months-long spill, saath saath adverse prabhaav isse the jawaab or cleanup kriyaayein, extensive damage to samudri and vanyajeev habitats, fishing and tourism industries, or human swasthya problems have continued through 2013.three saalo baad the spill, tarkol genden could still be mila on the mississippi coast.
Numerous investigations chaan the kalyankari of the visphot and record-setting spill.
notably, the u.S. government 's sitambar 2011 rapat pointed to defective cement on the khub, faulting zyaadaatar BP, lakin also well oparator transocean or contractor Halliburton.
pehle in 2011, a shwet House ayog likewise blamed bp and iske partners liye a shrenee of cost-cutting nirnay or an aparyaapt suraksha pranali, but bhi concluded that the spill resulted from `` systemic '' root kalyankari or `` anupasthit significant reform in both udyog practices and government nitiyon, might khub recur ''.
In navambar 2012, BP or the sanyukt rajya vibhaag of insaaf settled sangheey dand aarope saath BP pleading apradhi to 11 rishto of manslaughter, do misdemeanors, or a felony count of lying to congress.
bp also agreed to four saalo of sarkari nigaraanee of its suraksha practices or ethics, or the Environmental Protection agency ghoshit ki bp hota be temporarily bain isse nai anubandh with the us government.
bp or the Department of insaaf sahamat to a record-setting $ 4.525 arab in jurmaana and other payments lakin further vidhik kaarywahi nahin apekshit to conclude jabatak 2014 are jari to determine payouts or jurmaana antargat the saaf Water adhinium or the prakritik Resources Damage moolyankan.
as of February 2013, criminal or civil settlements and bhugtan to a vishwaas nidhi had cost the company $ 42.2 arab.
`` Where the galiyon have no Name '' is a song by chattan band u2.
It is the kholane track isse unke 1987 album the joshua Tree and thi released as the album 's teesraa single in agast 1987.
the song 's aankada is a repeating guitar arpeggio using a delay effect, nibhaai dauraan the song 's introduction and again at the samaapt.
Lead vocalist bono likhaa the lyrics in jawaab to the khyaal ki it is sambhavit to identify a vyakti 's religion or aay based on the street on which ve jiya, visheshkar in Belfast.
dauraan the band 's kathinaaiyon recording the song, nirmaataa bryan Eno considered erasing the song 's tepon to have unhen start isse scratch.
`` jahaan the Streets have no naam '' thi praised by aalochakon and became a commercial kamyaabi, peaking at kramank teraa in the us, kramank chaudaa in Canada, kramank ten in the Netherlands, and number chaar in the sanyukt kingdom.
The song rai become one of the band 's sabase lokapriy songs or rai remained a stepal of unke sajiv adhinium chunki the song debuted in 1987 on the joshua Tree Tour.
the song thi notably performed on a los angeles chat liye the filmakan of iske music video, which jiti a Grammy Award for Best pradarshan Music video.recently the song rai maharoom prayukt by the enegel 's balteemor Ravens as their pravesh song in super katori xlvii
thomas jeffri `` tom '' Hanks ( born july 9, 1956 ) is an American karta, nirmaataa, lekhak, or nideshak.
hanks is gyaat liye uske bhoomikaaye in Apollo 13, big, That baat You do !
, the green Mile, tum 've Got mail, sleepless in sietal, charlie wilson 's yuddh, Catch Me If tum can, Forrest gamp, daal dur, a lig of unke Own, the da vinci code, farishte & Demons, as khub as anemated films jaise the Toy story film shrenee, the dhruviya express, or the Simpsons film.
he rai arjeet and maharoom nominated liye numerous awards dauraan his kariyar, sahit jeetna a sunahari globe liye behtareen Actor or an academy puraskaar liye behtareen Actor liye his bhoomika in Philadelphia or a Golden Globe, an academy puraskaar, a Screen abhinaytaon gild puraskaar, or a logon 's chunaav puraskaar liye behtareen karta liye his bhoomika in Forrest Gump, or kamai the stanley kubrick Britannia puraskaar liye Excellence in Film isse the BAFTAs in 2004.
hanks is bhi known liye uske collaboration saath filmi nideshak Steven Spielberg on chhayankan nijee rayaan or the mini-series band of Brothers, jisase launched Hanks bhi as a kaamyaab nideshak, nirmaataa or writer.
As of 2012, hanks ' films have grossed over $ 4.2 arab at the United rajya box daftar alon, or over $ 8.5 arab vishwavyaapee making him the ucchtam all-time baksaa office star.
the kep is an amareeki superhero naatak series.
It premiered on NBC dauraan the 2010–2011 television season as a mid-season badalanaa shuruuaat saath a two-hour pilot episode on sande, January 9, 2011 at 9 pm purvi or Pacific Time.
an encore played on somvaar, January 10, saath follow-up apisod continuing on Monday evenings in the 9 pm timeslot beginning on January 17.
NBC subsequently kaaten the kul kramank of episodes to be aired isse 13 to 10 as a parinaam of kam darja.
on kooch 2, 2011, enbisi announced ki the series finale hota tabhi be aired on the sanjaal 's jalsthal.
heley 's Comet or dhoomaketu heley ( or ), officially designated 1p/halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets or is visible from dharti prayek 75–76 saalo.
heley is the tabhi short-period comet ki is clearly drishy to the nagn najar from Earth, or yun the tabhi naked-eye dhoomaketu that might appear twice in a human lifetime.
anya naked-eye dhoomaketuon may be ujjwal or more spectacular, lakin hoga appear tabhi ekbar in hazaron of saalo.
heley 's ritern to the bhitari Solar pranali have maharoom observed or ankit by khagolashastriyon chunki at least 240 bce.
saaf record of the dhoomaketu 's dikhaave were bana by Chinese, babylonian, or madhyakaalin europea chroniclers, lakin yahood nahin pahachaanaa as reappearances of the same object at the time.
the dhoomaketu 's periodicity was first sankalpit in 1705 by English astronomer edmond Halley, baad jisko it is now named.
Halley 's dhoomaketu pichhlaa appeared in the inner saura pranali in 1986 or will aglaa appear in mid-2061.
dauraan iske 1986 apparition, heley became the pehla dhoomaketu to be observed in vivaran by spacecraft, providing the pehla observational aankada on the dhaancha of a dhoomaketu nucleus or the mechanism of coma or tail gathan.
These observations samarthit a kramank of longstanding hypotheses parichay comet nirmaan, particularly fred whipple 's `` ganda snobal '' model, jisase correctly predicted ki heley hota be rachit of a mixture of volatile ices – aise as water, carbon dioxide or ammonia – or dust.
the mishan bhi provided aankada which substantially reformed or reconfigured ye vichaar ; liye instance it is abhi samajha that heley 's sataha is largely rachit of dusty, non-volatile materials, or ki only a choti portion of it is icy.
The following is a list of the sabase populous incorporated sthaan of the sanyukt rajya of America.
as defined by the sanyukt rajya janasankhyikee beuro, an `` incorporated place `` includes a kismein of designations, sahit city, town, gaanv, borough, or nagarpalika.
A few asaadhaaran janasankhyikee designated sthaan ( cdps ) hai also included in the janasankhyikee beuro 's listing of incorporated sthaan.
sanchit city-counties represent a pruthak prakaar of government ki shaamil the sampurna janasankhyikee of a county, or county equivalent.
kuch sanchit city-counties, however, shaamil anek incorporated sthaan.
is list presents tabhi that portion ( or `` santulan '' ) of such sanchit city-counties ki hai nahin a bhaag of another incorporated place.
note ki is list refers tabhi to the janasankhyikee of individual municipalities bheetar unke paribhaashit had, jisase karata nahin shaamil anya municipalities or unincorporated suburban kshetron within urban agglomerations.
a alag ranking is evident jab considering u.S. mahanagar kshetrafal populations.

unke story is ek of travail and astitv in a harsh nai sansar paryaavaran.
a nai jiland forward ( in white ) takes a shot on lakshya against camerun in the 2011 fifa u-20 sansar Cup.
aage, also gyaat as strikers, hai the khilaadi on a toli in sangh footbaal jo khel nikatatam to the opposing toli 's lakshya, or hai isliye principally jimmedaar liye scoring goals.
This very unnat position and its limited defensive responsibilities mean aage saamanytah score more lakshya than anya khilaadi.
is sthiti requires intelligence, speed, or shakti, dono of execution and of thought, to perform the bhoomika khub.
Modern team formations usually shaamil ek to teen aage ; two is the sabase common.
Coaches typically field ek striker jo plays in an unnat sthiti ( the kendra aage ), or another attacking aage who plays somewhat deeper or assists in making lakshya as khub as scoring ( the duusari striker ).
it chahie be noted that andar forwards develop isse attacking midfield sthitiyaan or hence hai naturally midfielders.
barsilona fc star leonnelle messi is a theth Attacking midfilder seen as a aage due to his shot sateekta.
a california gharelu saajhedaari is a legal sambandh uplabdhiyaan to same-sex yugal, or to certain opposite-sex yugal in jisase at tanik one party is at least 18 years of aayu.
it affords the couple `` the vahi adhikaron, protections, or benefits, or... the same jimmedaariyon, dayitvon, or kartavya antargat vidhi... '' as shaadishuda spouses.
enacted in 1999, the domestic saajhedaari registry was the first of its kind in the United rajya nirmit by a vidhanmandal bagaiyr court hastkshep.
initially, gharelu partnerships enjoyed very few privileges—principally bas hospital-visitation rights and the sahi to be claimed as a next of kin of the estate of a mritak partner.
the vidhanmandal rai since vistaarit the paimaana of california domestic partnerships to shaamil sab of the rights or responsibilities aam to vivaah.
as such, california gharelu partnerships are functionally equivalent to civil unions offered in several anya rajya.
haalanki the kaarykram enjoys broad support in california, it has maharoom the sorce of kuch vivaad.
samooh opposed to the manyata of same-sex families have challenged the vistaar of gharelu partnerships in adaalat.
conversely, adhivaktaaon of same-sex marriage contend ki anything kam than full vivaah adhikaron extended to same-sex partners is analogous to the `` separate lakin baraabar '' racial laws of the gym Crow era.
chihnit A. jackson ( born april 1, 1965 ) is an amareeki basket coach, or purv khilaadi who is the current head coach of the Golden rajya yoddhaon of the enbie.
a point guard from St. John 's vishvavidhyalayon, he played liye the New york knicks, Indiana Pacers, Los angeles clipurs, denwar tenders, toronto rapatars, uta Jazz or huston Rockets in the NBA in a career spanning isse 1987 to 2004.
jackson rai bhi worked as a camentator liye ESPN or abisi alongside uske purv coach jeff vine gundy and play-by-play man mike Breen.
he thi previously an NBA analyst liye the yas sanjaal 's nai jersey net khel.
dakshin africa has gyaarah aadhikarik bhashaaen : africa, angrezi, Ndebele, uttari sotho, Sotho, Swazi, tswana, songa, Venda, Xhosa or zulu.
kam than do percent of dakshin Africans bolo a pehla bhashaa anya than an aadhikarik one.
sabase South africans can bolo more than ek language.
Dutch and angrezi yahood the pehla aadhikarik languages of South africa from 1910 to 1925.
africa thi added as a bhaag of dach in 1925.
dach was replaced by africa jab South africa became a ganatantr in 1961, or dach thi dropped in 1983, so between 1983 or 1994, dakshin africa had do aadhikarik languages : angrezi and africa.
the angrezi sanskaran of the dakshin africa samvidhan refers to the languages by the names in those bhashaaen : isizulu, isixhosa, africa, sepedi ( referring to uttari sotho ), Setswana, English, Sesotho ( referring to dakshini sotho ), xitsonga, siswati, tshivenda and isindebele ( referring to Southern ndebele ).
in South africa, dakshini ndebele is known simply as ndebele, as sabase adhyakshon of uttari ndebele sajiv in zimbabwe.
the 1993 sanskaran of the samvidhan referred to uttari sotho as Sesotho sa leboa, lakin the 1996 version referred to the language as Sepedi.
Different sarkari departments or aadhikarik laashen upyog alag sharten to denote uttari Sotho.
The main bhashaa of government is English bhi if dakshin africans praayah take abhimaan in using swadeshi languages liye koi purpose.
africa also suvidhaayen prominently in commers saath saath angrezi as the languages saath the ucchtam number of dharapravaah adhyakshon hai africa and angrezi.
in terms of bhashaai vargeekaran, the official languages shaamil do West-Germanic bhashaaen ( angrezi or Afrikaans ) or nine bantu bhashaaen.
chaar of these hai nguni languages ( zulu, khosa, swati and ndebele ) or teen are sotho–tswana bhashaaen ( uttari sotho, dakshini sotho or tswana ).
Tsonga is a tswa–ronga bhashaa.
dakshin African chihn Language is a distinct haalanki incompletely ubhara national maanak bhashaa jisase bhi subsumes a cluster of semi-standardised dialects.
aluminium nitrate is a salt of aluminium and nitric acid, maujuuda normally as a crystalline hydrate, sabase commonly as aluminium nitrate nonahydrate, al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O.
the nai York Jets are a professional football toli headquartered in Florham park, New Jersey, representing the nai york metropolitan area.
the toli is a member of the Eastern prabhag of the amareeki Football sammelan ( afc ) in the National footbaal lig ( enegel ).
in a adwitiya arrangement liye the lig, the Jets share metlife stadium in east Rutherford, nai jersey with the nai york diggaj.
the matadhikaar is legally or corporately panjikrut as nai york jets, LLC.
the team thi santhaapit in 1959 as the titans of New york, an asli member of the American footbaal League ; baad, the matadhikaar joined the NFL in the afl–nfl vilay.
The toli began to khel in 1960 at the polo grounds.
antargat nai ownership, the current naam thi apanaaya in 1963 or the matadhikaar thi relocated to shea stadium in 1964 or then to the meadowlands Sports jatil in 1984.
the Jets advanced to the playoffs liye the pehla time in 1968 and gai on to compete in super Bowl III jahaan ve parajeet the Baltimore coltas, banane the first AFL team to shikast an NFL klbon in an afl-nfl sansar championships Game.
chunki 1968, the Jets have appeared in the playoffs thirteen times, or in the afc championships khel chaar times, sabase recently khone to the pittsburg stilers in 2010.
however, the Jets have never laute to the super Bowl, bananaa unhen ek of teen enegel tiimon to jeet unke lone super katori rup, saath saath the nai orlions Saints or Tampa khadi buccaneers.
The toli 's prashikshan suvidha, atlantic swasthya jets Training bich, jisase opened in 2008, is stith in florham park.
the toli philhal holds unke annual prashikshan shivi satr on the campus of the State vishvavidhyalayon of nai york at cortland in Cortland, nai York jabaki pakadakar occasional sessions at the florham park jatil.
psilocybe semilanceata
psilocybin mashroom, bhi gyaat as cicedelik mushrooms, hai fungi that contain psychoactive indole alkaloids.
There are multiple colloquial sharten liye psilocybin mashroom, the sabase aam being shrooms or jaadu mushrooms.
biological genera containing psilocybin mashroom shaamil Agrocybe, conocybe, copelandia, galerina, gerronema, gymnopilus, hypholoma, inocybe, Mycena, panaeolus, pluteus, or Psilocybe.
vahin are lagbhag 190 prajati of psilocybin mashroom and sabase of unhen patan in the genus psilocybe.
Psilocybin mushrooms have sambhavit been prayukt chunki prehistoric times or may have maharoom depicted in chattan art.
anek samskritiyon have prayukt these mashroom in dharmik rites.
in modern Western society ve are prayukt recreationally liye unke cicedelik prabhaav.
haal studies kiya at imperial college London or Johns Hopkins skool of ayurvigyaan conclude that jab prayukt properly, psilocybin adhiniyamon as an anti-depressant as sujhaayaa by fmri dimag scans.
alaska ( ) is a rajya in the sanyukt rajya, situated in the northwest extremity of the uttar amareeki mahadweep, saath the antarrashtriya boundary saath canada to the east, the Arctic samandar to the uttar, and the prashanth samandar to the west or dakshin, saath rus further west across the bering jalsandhi.
alaska is the largest rajya in the sanyukt rajya by kshetrafal, the 4th tanik populous and the tanik densely aabaadi of the 50 United rajya.
Approximately half of alaska 's 731,449 nivaasiyon live bheetar the Anchorage metropolitan area.
Alaska 's arthvyavastha is varchasv by the oil, prakritik gas, or fishing industries ; it rai ye sansaadhan in abundance.
Alaska thi kharida isse Russia on kooch 30, 1867, for $ 7.2 lakh ( $ adjusted liye mahangaai ) at lagbhag do saint prati acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
the jameen gai through anek prashasnic parivartan pehle banane an vyavasthit ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11, 1912, or the 49th rajya of the U.S. on janvari 3, 1959.
the naam `` alaska '' ( Аляска ) thi already introduced in the roosi aupniveshik kaal, jab it thi prayukt only liye the peninsula or is niklaa isse the Aleut alaxsxaq, arth `` the mainland '' or, more vastutah, `` the object towards jisase the karrwai of the samudr is directed ''.
it is bhi known as alyeska, the `` great jameen '', an aleut shabd niklaa isse the vahi root.
The 101 french departments hai vibhajit into 342 arrondissements, jisase may be anudit into angrezi as districts.
the puunji of an arrondissement/district is pukaara a subprefecture.
When an arrondissement contains the prifekchar ( capital ) of the vibhaag, ki prifekchar is the puunji of the arrondissement, acting dono as a prifekchar or as a subprefecture.
arrondissements hai further vibhajit into cantons or communes.
the yoni ( from latin vāgīna, vastutah `` myaan '' or `` myaan `` ) is a tubular tract which is a sex ang and rai do pramukh krityon ; yon maithun or childbirth.
in humans, this dyodhi leads isse the opening of the bhaga to the garbhashay ( garbh ), lakin the vaginal tract ends at the cervix.
naapsand main, jo have tabhi ek genital orifice, mahilaon have two, the urethra or the vagina.
the vaginal kholane is much larger than the urethral kholane, or both udghaatan hai protected by the labia.
the bhitari mould of the vagina rai a foldy banaavat jisase can banaaen friction liye the shishn dauraan maithun.
During arousal, the yoni gets nam to facilitate the pravesh of the shishn.
the Latinate bahuvachan `` vaginae '' is rarely prayukt in angrezi.
Colloquially, the shabd vagina is praayah prayukt to refer to the bhaga or to the maadaa genitals in saamaanya.
however, by its shabdkosh or anatomical definitions, yoni refers exclusively to the vishisht aatanrik dhaancha.
The sinsinati Reds hai a Major lig besabaal toli based in Cincinnati, Ohio.
ve hai members of the National League central prabhag.
Established in 1881 as an independent club, the toli became a charter member of the amareeki sangh in 1882, or joined the neshnal League in 1890.
the klbon traditionally traces iske origin to besabaal 's pehla khulkar professional toli in 1869.
The laal have jiti five sansar Series sheershak, ek amareeki sangh pennant, nau neshnal lig pennants or ten division sheershak.
the Reds nibhaai in the National lig west between 1969 or 1993 and have maharoom in the neshnal League central chunki 1994.
chunki 2003, the Reds have nibhaai at great American Ball park, nirmit aglaa to unke ghar from 1970 to 2002, riverfront Stadium.
bob Castellini rai swaamitv the sinsinati Reds chunki 2006.
a sharaarat stink bomb.
A badboo bomb is a device designed to create an apriy mahakate.
ve range in effectiveness from simple pranks to sainya grad malodorants or riot control rasinic agents.
the ginis Book of Records suchiyaan two smelliest substances.
ek is `` us sarkari maanak bathroom malodor '' ; a mishran of aath rasayan with a stench resembling insaan mel, only much stronger, designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers or air fresheners.
another ek, `` jo me ? ``, is a mixture of paanch sulfur-containing rasayan or smells jaise rotting food or carcasses.
the kahawat `` a chitra is laayak a thousand shabd '' refers to the khyaal ki a jatil vichaar can be conveyed saath just a single still image.
it bhi aptly characterizes one of the pramukh goals of kalpana, namely making it possible to absorb large amounts of aankada quickly.
The abhivyakti `` Use a chitra.
it 's worth a hajaar shabd. '' appears in a 1911 samachaarpatr aalekh quoting samachaarpatr editor arthur Brisbane discussing journalism and publicity.
1913 samachaarpatr advertisement
A samaan phrase, `` ek dekh is laayak a hajaar Words '', appears in a 1913 samachaarpatr advertisement liye the piqua Auto supplai House of piqua, ohio.
an jaldi upyog of the sateek phrase appears in an 1918 newspaper vigyaapan for the san antonio Light which says : ek of the Nation 's mahanatam sampadak says : One chitra is Worth a hajaar shabd The san Antonio lite 's sachitr patrika of the yuddh exemplifies the sachai of the above statement -- judging isse the garam reception it rai praapt at the hands of the sande lite pathak.
it is believed by kuch ki the aadhunik use of the phrase tana isse an article by Fred R. Barnard in the vigyaapan vyapaar jarnal Printers ' Ink, promoting the use of bimb in advertisements that appeared on the pahalu of streetcars.
the disambar 8, 1921 samasya carries an ad hakdaar, `` ek dekh is laayak a hajaar Words. ''
another ad by barnard appears in the March 10, 1927 issue saath the phrase `` ek chitra laayak ten hajaar shabd, '' jahaan it is labeled a chinis kahawat ( 一圖勝萬言 ).
the ghar Book of proverbs, maxims, or parichit vaakyansh uddhran Barnard as saying he called it `` a chinis proverb, so ki logon hota take it seriously. ''
jald baad, the kahawat hota become popularly attributed to kanceyucious.
The charchaa of `` One Picture laayak Thousand shabd '' versus `` ek chitra laayak ten hajaar shabd '' wan yen i hua or 10.000 miles laayak 10.000 books is cited in Information graphics jahaan the concept of anek in alag disciplines and samskritiyon.
a picture is worth a hajaar shabd
despite is aadhunik utpatti of the popular phrase, the bhaavana rai maharoom expressed by earlier lekhak.
liye udhaaharan the Russian writer Ivan Turgenev likhaa ( in fathers or bete in 1862 ), `` a chitra shows me at a glance what it takes darjanon of prishthon of a kitaab to expound. ''
computer programmer or lekhak fred Brooks makes an vipareet bayaan regarding programming in The Mythical Man-Month : `` dikhaaen me apana flowcharts or chhipate apana teble, or I shall continue to be mystified.
Show me apana teble, or I won’t praayah need your flowcharts ; they’ll be obvious. ''
The phrase rai bhi maharoom spoofed by jon maikaarthi, the prasiddh computer scientist, to mek the vipareet point : `` As the Chinese kah, 1001 shabd is laayak adhik than a picture. ''
A ritu is a subdivision of the saal, chihnit by parivartan in mausam, paristhitiki, or ghanton of daylight.
Seasons parinaam isse the yearly kranti of the dharti around the Sun and the jhukaav of the dharti 's axis saapeksh to the plane of kranti.
in temperate or polar regions, the seasons hai chihnit by parivartan in the tivrata of dhoop ki pahunch the dharti 's sataha, variations of jisase may kaaran pashu to go into sheetanishkriyata or to migrate, or plants to be dormant.
dauraan May, June or july, the uttari hemisphere is ujagar to adhik sidhaa dhoop because the golardh faces the surya.
the same is true of the dakshini golardh in navambar, disambar or January.
It is the jhukaav of the dharti ki kalyankari the Sun to be higher in the aasmaan dauraan the garmiyaan maheene jisase increases the saura flux.
However, due to mausami lag, june, july or August are the hottest maheene in the uttari golardh or December, janvari or February are the hottest months in the dakshini hemisphere.
In shitoshna or subpolar regions, generally four calendar -aadharand sizan ( saath unke adjectives ) hai recognized : vasant ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), patjhad ( autumnal ) or sheet ( hibernal ).
however, ecologists zyaadaatar upyog a chah ritu model for shitoshna jalwaayu regions ki shaamil pre-spring ( prevernal ) or late garmiyaan ( serotinal ) as pruthak seasons along saath the traditional chaar.
hot regions have do or teen sizan ; the barsaat ( or geela, or monsoon ) ritu or the shushk ritu, or in kuch teevr kshetron, a kool or mild ritu.
In some bhaag of the sansar, khaas `` sizan '' hai loosely paribhaashit aadhaarit on mahatvapurn kaarykram aise as a hurricane ritu, bavandar ritu or a dawanal season.
the chah ecological sizan
The chaar panchang seasons, depicted in an ancient roman mosaic from tunisia
dach niryaat in 2006
at the samay of likhane the netherlands is the 17th largest economy of the sansar.
( dekhie : List of deshon by jidipi ( nammaatr ) )
GDP per capita is roughly $ 42,000 jisase puts it in the sheersh 10 of richest nations in the sansar ( dekhie : List of countries by GDP ( ppp ) per capita ).
between 1996 and 2000 annual economic vikaas ( jidipi ) averaged over 4 %, khub upar the europea ausat.
Growth slowed considerably in 2001-05 as part of the vaishvik aarthik slowdown.
2006 or 2007 however dikhaaya aarthik growth of 3.4 % and 3.9 %.
The dach economy thi hit considerably by the jari global vittiya crisis or the ensuing europea karz sankat.
Several bainko gai diwalia, or a kramank of others had to praapt sarkari sahaayta.
In 2009 the arthvyavastha asweekrut with 3.5 %, followed by do years of mild growth.
the dach arthvyavastha is philhal in a mandi again, saath an aarthik manaahi of 0.5 % in 2012.
mahangaai is at 3.2 % in farvari 2013.
berogari rai maharoom apekshaakrit kam compared to other eu raashtra for dashakon lakin baad mid-2012 it rai seen a fast increase and in February 2013 it rai hit 7.7 %.

The View is an amareeki baat dikhaaen broadcast on abisi ki debuted in 1997 as bhaag of the sanjaal 's din programing blaak.
Created by Barbara walters or vidheyak Geddie, who dono bhi serve as the dikhaaen 's karypalika producers, the kaarykram suvidhaayen a panel of mahilaon as co-hosts.
saath saath Walters, the vartmaan falak includes whoopi Goldberg, who serves as the moderator, anand behar, elizabeth Hasselbeck, and sherri gadriye.

kaarykram ( 25 ), or The opera Winfrey Show ( 25 ).
prunus virginiana, commonly pukaara bitter-berry, chokecherry, virginia bird cheri or pashchimi chokecherry ( bhi blike chokecherry for P. virginiana var. demissa ), is a prajati of bird cheri ( Prunus subgenus padus ) deshi to North america ; the prakritik aitihaasik dayera of P. virginiana includes most of the mahadweep, except for the dur uttar or dur dakshin.
Los Angeles antarrashtriya vimaanashetra is the praathmik vimaanashetra sevarat the vrihad Los angeles kshetrafal, the second-most populated mahanagar area in the United rajya.
It is sabase praayah referred to by iske iata vimaanashetra code lax, with the akshar sunaaya individually.
lax is stith in southwestern Los Angeles saath the prashanth coast in the pados of westchester, isse the shahar kor or is the primary airport of Los angeles World airport ( lawa ), an agency of the los angeles nagar sarkari formerly gyaat as the Department of Airports.
in 2011, lax thi the chathe vyastatam vimaanashetra in the sansar baad hartsfield-jackson atlanta antarrashtriya vimaanashetra, beijing Capital International vimaanashetra, landan heathrow vimaanashetra, chicago O'Hare antarrashtriya vimaanashetra, or tokio haneda antarrashtriya Airport saath 61,862,052 yatri.
the airport holds the claim liye `` the sansar 's busiest origin or gantavy ( o & D ) vimaanashetra '' in 2011 ki involves non-connecting passenger trekkic.
it is bhi the only vimaanashetra to rank among the top five U.S. airports for both yatri and cargo trekkic.
lax is the busiest vimaanashetra in the Greater los angeles kshetrafal, but other airport including Bob aashaa vimaanashetra, jon wain vimaanashetra, long bich vimaanashetra, LA/Ontario antarrashtriya Airport, or tad sroton antarrashtriya Airport bhi serve the region.
LAX is bhi the vyastatam vimaanashetra in california or the West coast of the United rajya in sharten of udaan parichaalan, yatri traffic and air cargo activity, agrani it to be referred to as the `` getwe to the prashanth rim ``.
Peyton williams manning ( born kooch 24, 1976 ) is an amareeki footbaal quarterback liye the denwar broncos of the neshnal footbaal lig ( enegel ).
he nibhaai liye the indianapolis Colts liye 14 sizan isse 1998 to 2011.
He is the bete of purv enegel quarterbaque archi manning or an elder bhai of New york diggaj quarterbaque eli manning.
manning nibhaai college footbaal liye the vishvavidhyalayon of tennesi, leading the swayamsevak to the 1997 SEC Championship in uske senior ritu.
however, No. 3 tennesi khoyaa to the no. 2 nebraska cornhuskers 42-17 in the naarangi Bowl giving Nebraska and tom Osborne their 3rd national championship in 4 years.
He was chuni by the indianapolis coltas with the pehla overall chune in the 1998 enegel draft.
isse 1998 to 2010, he led the coltas to aath ( saat AFC South or ek afc east ) prabhag championships, two afc championships, or to a super katori championship ( super katori xli ).
he rai jiti a ricard four league sabase moolyawaan khilaadi puraskaar, thi the sabase valuable khilaadi of super Bowl XLI, rai been namit to baarah pro pyaale, rai baarah 4,000-yard guzar sizan, or is the indianapolis coltas ' all-time netaa in passing gaj ( 54,828 ) or touchdown gujarata ( 399 ).
in 2009, he thi named the behtareen player in the enegel or fox Sports along saath khel illustrated namit use the NFL khilaadi of the decade of the 2000s.
in May 2011, he underwent neck surgery to alleviate gardan pidaa and bhujaa kamazori he dealt saath during the pichhlaa few sizan pehle hastakshar a five-year, $ 90 lakh anubandh ekstansion saath the Colts in July 2011.
Manning tha hoped to khel in the 2011 ritu, lakin in September 2011, he underwent a much more serious second surgery : a str ek cervical fusion kaarividhi.
Manning tha never missed an NFL khel in his kariyar, but was forced to miss the sampurna 2011 ritu.
he thi released by the coltas on kooch 7, 2012, or baad an almost two-week period jahaan he visited saath or worked out liye anek enegel tiimon, he hastakshrit saath the denwar Broncos on kooch 20, 2012.
manning 's pre-snap dincharya rai arjeet use the nickname, `` The sheriff '' and is ek of the sabase recognizable or parodied in the NFL.
The Indianapolis coltas ' lagbhag exclusive upyog of the hurry-up offense led to manning using an sarani of ishaaron and maukhik cmand to kol the play at the lakeer of muthbhed balki than in the huddle.
the america minar of the amareeki General bich, the mukhyalay of Baker hughes
Baker Hughes is ek of the sansar 's largest oilfield sevaayen companiyaan.
It operates in over 90 deshon, providing the aayal or gas udyog with utpaada and services liye khudaai, formation moolyankan, completion, production and tank paraamarsh.
Baker Hughes rai iske mukhyalay in the America Tower in the American saamaanya bich in Neartown, huston.
baker Hughes incorporated was formed when Baker antarrashtriya and hughes aujaar Company merged in 1987.
baker hughes operates vishwavyaapee saath pramukh karyaalayon in Liverpool, United Kingdom ; singapore ; Dubai ; a research or mentanence facility in celle, Germany ; Lafayette, Louisiana ; Houston, texas ; pescara, italy ; or kuala lumpur, malaysia.
the company is administered broadly in do baantati : the purvi golardh saath paanch regions ( Europe, Africa, the madhya east, asia Pacific or Russia/Caspian ) or the pashchimi golardh saath four regions ( canada, US jameen, us gulf, or latin america ).
prayek of ye regions is subdivided into bazaar.
the sanyukt States one- cent sikaa, commonly gyaat as a penny, is a ikai of karency equaling ek one-hundredth of a sanyukt States dollars.
the cent 's symbol is ¢.
Its obverse rai pradarshit the profil of President Abraham lincoln chunki 1909, the centennial of his birth.
isse 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of Lincoln 's birth ) to 2008, the reverse featured the Lincoln memorial.
chaar alag reverse dizin in 2009 sammanit Lincoln 's 200th janmdiwas and a new, sthai reverse – the sangh Shield – was introduced in 2010.
the sikaa is 0.75 inch ( 19.05 mm ) in vyas or 0.061 inch ( 1.55 mm ) in motaai.
The u.S. mint 's official naam liye a paini is `` '' or the u.S. Treasury 's aadhikarik naam is `` ek cent tukdaa ''.
the colloquial pad penny garbhashayi from the angrejon coin of the vahi naam, the pre-decimal sanskaran of jisase tha a samaan maan.
in American angrezi, pennies is the plural form, other plural form pence or pee ( standard upyog in angrejon English ) hai nahin used.
as of 2012, it laagat the U.S. mint 2.00 saint to make a cent kuki of the laagat of saamagree and production.
is figure includes the Mint’s phixd components for vitaran or fabrication, anumaanit at $ 13 lakh in fy 2011.
it bhi shaamil Mint overhead abantit to the penny, jisase was $ 17.7 lakh liye 2011.
phixd costs or overhead hota have to be avashoshit by other circulating sikke bagaiyr the penny.
the ghaataa in profitability due to producing the ek cent sikaa in the sanyukt rajya liye the saal of 2012 was $ 58,000,000.
is was a patala ghati isse 2011, the saal pehle, jisase tha a production ghaataa of $ 60,200,000.

the evolution of paudhe rai resulted in increasing str of jatilta, isse the earliest algal mats, through bryophytes, lycopods, ferns to the jatil gymnosperms and angiosperms of today.
jabaki anek of the samooh jisase appeared pehle continue to thrive, visheshkar in the environments in jisase ve evolved, liye a samay prayek nai grad of organisation became adhik `` kaamyaab '' than its purvavartiyon.
in the ordovician period, around, the pehla land paudhe appeared.
ye began to diversify in the let silyurian kaal, around, or the parinaam of unke diversification are pradarshit in ullekhneey detail in an jaldi devonian chattan assemblage isse the Rhynie chert.
is chert preserved early paudhe in cellular detail, petrified in volcanic springs.
by the madhya of the devonian kaal, sabase of the suvidhaayen recognised in paudhe aaj are upasthit, sahit jaden, pattey and secondary wood ; or, by late Devonian times, beej tha viksit.
let devonian paudhe had thereby pahunche a oopaadhi of parishkar that allowed unhen to rup wanon of tall ped.
vikasvaadi naveenta jari into the Carboniferous kaal or is still jari aaj.
sabase sanyantr samooh yahood relatively unscathed by the permo-triassic extinction event, although the structures of communities badla.
is may have niyat the scene liye the rup of the flowering plants in the Triassic ( ~ ), and unke later diversification in the cretaceous or paleogene.
The naveenatam pramukh group of paudhe to evolve yahood the grasses, jisase became mahatvapurn in the mid-paleogene, isse around.
the grasses, as khub as many other groups, viksit new mechanisms of metabolism to jivit the low or garam, shushk sharten of the ooshnakaribandh over the pichhlaa.
The jeetna super Bowl toli receives the Vince Lombardi trophy.
the super katori is an salanaa amareeki football khel ki determines the champion of the National footbaal lig ( enegel ).
the pratiyogita is held in an American nagar ki is chosen teen to chaar years beforehand, usually in warm-weather or domed site.
Since 1971, the vijeta of the amareeki footbaal sammelan ( afc ) Championship khel rai faced the winner of the neshnal footbaal sammelan ( nfc ) championships khel in the culmination of the enegel playoffs.
pehle the 1970 vilay between the amareeki footbaal lig ( AFL ) and the neshnal Football lig ( NFL ), the do lig mili in four such pratiyogitaaon.
the pehla do were known as the `` afl-nfl sansar championships khel. ''
super katori III in 1969 thi the pehla aise game ki carried the `` super katori '' moniker, the names `` super Bowl i `` and `` super Bowl ii `` yahood retroactively lagu to the first do khel.
The nfc /nfL lead in super katori vins saath 25, jabaki the AFC /AFL rai jiti 22.
Eighteen alag franchises, sahit tiimon that relocated to another nagar, have jiti the super katori.
The pittsburg stilers have jiti the sabase super pyaale saath chah championships ( record 6–2 ), jabaki dono the dalas cowboys and san francisco 49ers have paanch vins each ( Cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1 ).
dalas or Pittsburgh have the sabase Super katori dikhaave with eight, jabaki the bhens Bills have the sabase lagaataar dikhaave with four nuksaan in a row isse 1990 to 1993.
the New England deshpremi, Denver Broncos and minesota vikings have also lost a record chaar super pyaale.
bhens and minesota are both 0–4, denwar is 2–4 or nai england is 3–4.
The ricard for lagaataar wins is do and is saajha by seven franchises : the 1966-67 green Bay Packers, the 1972-73 Miami dolphin, the 1974-75 or 1978-79 pittsburg Steelers ( the tabhi toli to accomplish is feat twice ), the 1988-89 san francisco 49ers, the 1992-93 Dallas cowboys, the 1997-98 denwar broncos, and the 2003-04 New england Patriots.
the only team saath multiple super katori dikhaave or no nuksaan is the Baltimore ravens, jo in jeetna super katori xlvii unseated or replaced the 49ers in ki sthiti.
chaar current NFL tiimon have never appeared in a super Bowl, including matadhikaar relocations or renaming : the Cleveland bhura, detroit sher, jacksonville jaguars, or huston Texans, haalanki both the bhura or Lions tha jiti NFL championships games prior to the sristi of the super Bowl.

kshareey phosphatase ( alp, alkp ) ( ) is a hydrolase enzyme jimmedaar liye nikaalnaa phosphate samooh isse anek prakaar of anuon, including nucleotides, proteins, or alkaloids.
the prakram of nikaalnaa the phosphate samooh is pukaara dephosphorylation.
As the naam suggests, kshareey phosphatases hai most prabhavi in an kshareey paryaavaran.
It is sometimes prayukt synonymously as moulik phosphatase.
triticale ( × triticosecale ), ( ) is a sankar of gehun ( triticum ) or rye ( secale ) pehla bred in laboratories dauraan the let 19th sadi.
the anaaj thi originally karavaaya in scotland or sweden.
commercially uplabdhiyaan triticale is lagbhag always a duusari generation hybrid, i.e., a cross between do kinds of praathmik ( pehla cross ) triticales.
As a niyam, triticale combines the upaj sambhavit and anaaj visheshta of wheat with the beemaari and paryaavarniya sahishnutaa ( sahit mrudaa conditions ) of rye.
tabhi recently has it maharoom viksit into a commercially viable crop.
Depending on the cultivar, triticale can more or kam resemble either of iske abhibhavak.
it is grown zyaadaatar for forage or chaara, haalanki some triticale-based bhojan can be kharida at swasthya khaanaa stores or are to be mila in kuch breakfast cereals.
When crossing gehun or rye, gehun is prayukt as the female parent or rye as the purush janak ( paraag daata ).
the resulting sankar is bandhya, or jarur be treated saath colchicine to induce polyploidy or yun the ability to reproduce itself.
the praathmik producers of triticale hai candal, germany, frans, belarus and australia.
in 2009, according to the khaanaa or krishi sanghathan ( FAO ), 15.0 lakh ton yahood harvested in 29 deshon aarpaar the world.
the triticale sankaran hai sab amphidiploid, which arthath the sanyantr is dwiguneet liye two genomes derived from alag prajati.
In anya shabd, triticale is an allotetraploid.
in pehle saalo, sabase kaary thi kiya on octoploid triticale.
alag ploidy str have maharoom nirmit or evaluated over time.
The tetraploids dikhaaya choti vaada, lakin hexaploid triticale thi kaamyaab enough to dhundhen vanijyik application.
the cimmyt triticale sudhaar kaarykram chaahi to improve khaanaa utpaadan or poshan in vikasshil deshon.
triticale rai sambhavit in the utpaadan of bread or anya khaanaa products, such as kukies, pasta, pizza dough or naashtaa cereals.
the protein saamagree is ucchtar than that of gehun, haalanki the glutenin bhinn is kam.
the anaaj rai bhi maharoom stated to have ucchtar str of lysine than gehun.
Assuming increased acceptance, the milling industry hoga have to adapt to triticale, as the milling techniques employed liye gehun hai unsuited to triticale.
bechein et al. mila triticale could be prayukt as a feed anaaj, or baad research found iske mand thi visheshkar readily pachataa.
as a feed anaaj, triticale is already khub sthapit or of high aarthik mahatv.
it rai praapt dhyaan as a sambhavit energy crop, or shodh is currently being conducted on the upyog of the crop 's biomas in bioethanol production.

The song hasil great lokapriyata.
A college footbaal national championship in the ucchtam str of colejiet khel in the sanyukt rajya, philhal the neshnal Collegiate athlettic Association ( ncaa ) prabhag i footbaal katori Subdivision ( FBS ), is a namakan awarded annually by vibhinn third-party sanghathan to unke selection ( s ) of the best college footbaal toli ( s ).
Division I FBS ( formerly Division i-a ) football is the tabhi ncaa khel in which a yearly champion is nahin sankalpit by an ncaa sanctioned championships event.
Because the championship toli is not sankalpit by a ncaa championships or toornament event, it is sometimes unofficially referred to as a `` mythical neshnal championships ``.
chunki the NCAA, the khel 's governing deh, does not determine or ghoshit a neshnal champion in is field, determination of aise rai often engendered vivaad.
A championship toli is independently ghoshit by vibhinn individuals and organizations, often referred to as `` selectors ''.
These chunaav hai sometimes at halaat saath prayek anya.
While the NCAA has never officially endorsed an salanaa championships toli, it rai pralekhith the choices of anek chayankartaaon in the aadhikarik NCAA footbaal katori subdivision record.
In jod, various teesraa party vishleshkon have independently published unke apana suchiyaan of kayaa ve have sankalpit to be the sabase legitimate selections liye prayek ritu.
ye hai bhi praayah at halaat saath prayek anya as khub as vyaktigat skool 's daawa on neshnal championships, jisase, liye koi particular season, may or may nahin correlate to the chayan prakashit elsewhere.
Currently, do widely recognized neshnal champions selectors hai the sambhddha dabaayen, jisase conducts a pole of footbaal sportswriters, and the uese aaj coach ' pole, a pole of American footbaal Coaches sangh kriyasheel coaches that is contractually obligated to name the vijeta of the katori championships Series championships khel as iske neshnal champion.

The nagarikon hai a sadsy of the East prabhag of the neshnal lig of Major lig Baseball ( emelbi ).
The toli 's home ballpark is nagarikon park, stith on South capital gali in southeast d.C., near the anacostia River.

unke upnaam is `` the nats '' —a shortened sanskaran that thi also used by the boodha d.C. teams.
