The expos tha unke highest jeetna pratishat in the strike-shortened ritu of, jab the toli had the behtareen ricard in besabaal.
the toli 's subsequent shedding of khilaadi caused prashansak interest to drop band.
baad the 2001 ritu, emelbi mana revoking the toli 's matadhikaar, saath with either the minesota judwa or the tampa Bay shaitan Rays.

a nirbhar shulk ( in the United States ) or sashart shulk ( in england and wales ) is koi fee liye sevaayen provided jahaan the shulk is dey only if vahin is a favourable parinaam.
in the vidhi, it is paribhaashit as a `` fee charge for a vakil 's sevaayen tabhi if the mukadmaa is kaamyaab or is favorably settled out of adaalat....
Contingent shulk are praayah gananaa as a percentage of the client 's net recovery. ''
in the English vidhik system, it is generally referred to as no win no fee.
A sashart fee agreement between a vidhi kad and a client.
the usual rup of is anubandh is ki the solicitor hoga lo a law case on the samajhnaa ki if khoyaa, no bhugtan is bana.
However, if the maamla is jiti, the vakil hoga be entitled to the saamaanya shulk aadhaarit on hourly billing, plus a kamyaabi shulk.
the kamyaabi shulk in england jarur be as a pratishat no vrihad than 100 % of the normal shulk.
This contrasts saath the contingency fee in the us, jisase detaa the kaamyaab attorney a pratishat of the damages awarded in ehsaan of uske claayent.
is makes it easier liye the garib to pursue unke civil rights chunki otherwise, to sue kisi liye a apkrutya, ek must pehla be wealthy paryaapt to pursue aise vaad in the pehla place.
However, kuki of the unchi risk, few attorneys hoga take cases on a contingency aadhaar jabatak ve mahasoos the maamla has shubh merit.
According to a 2004 kitaab by vidhi praadhyaapak herbert kritzer, nirbhar shulk were anumat as of that saal in the following countries : Australia, Brazil, Canada, the dominican ganatantr, France, Greece, ireland, japani, nai Zealand, the sanyukt Kingdom or the sanyukt rajya.
They hai bhi anumat in personal chot actions in lithuania.
Recently, they have maharoom anumat in belgium as well.

the grímsvötn sub-glacial jhiilon ( ; vötn = `` waters '', ekvachan : ) and the jwalamukhi of the vahi naam are in south-east iceland.
ve are in the hilands of Iceland at the northwestern paksh of the vatnajökull ice-cap.
the lakes are at, at an unnayan of.
Beneath the lakes is the megma chamber of the grímsvötn jwalamukhi.
grímsvötn is a basaltic volcano jisase has the ucchtam fatna frequency of all the jwalamukhi in iceland or rai a southwest-northeast-trending fissure pranali.
the vishaal climate-impacting Laki fissure eruption of 1783–1784 thi a bhaag of the same fissure pranali.
Grímsvötn thi erupting at the vahi samay as laki during 1783, but jari to erupt until 1785.
Because sabase of the jwalamukhi jhooth underneath vatnajökull, sabase of iske eruptions have maharoom subglacial or the baatcheet of megma and meltwater isse the barf kalyankari phreatomagmatic visphotak kaaryaklap.
on 21 may 2011 at 19:25 utc, an fatna began, with unchi plumes accompanied by multiple bukamp, resulting in cancellation of 900 flite in Iceland, or in the United kingdom, Greenland, germany, ireland or Norway on 22–25 may.
Until 25 may the eruption scale had maharoom larger than ki of the 2010 fatna of eyjafjallajökull.
The fatna stopped at 02:40 utc on 25 May 2011, haalanki vahin was some visphotak kaaryaklap isse the tephra vents affecting only the kshetrafal around the crater.

the company, aadhaarit in Paradise, Nevada, is the largest gaming company in the sansar, saath salanaa revenues of $ 8.9 arab ( 2010 ).
caesars is a public company, saath a sanyukt venture of apollo Global prabandhan or Texas prashanth samooh ownig a vishaal portion of the stack and blackstone samooh also holding a significant hissedari.
the name badalen isse `` harrah 's Entertainment inc. '' to `` caesars Entertainment nigam '' thi bana official on navambar 23, 2010.
Harrah 's remains a kunjee brands in the company.

a sthai nivasee in canada is a vyakti who is nahin a canadai naagarik but jo has maharoom granted anumati to sajiv or work in canada bagaiyr koi time seemaa on uske or uske raho.
a permanent resident jarur sajiv in canada for two saalo out of every paanch or risk khone ki aukaat.
A sthai nivasee holds anek of the vahi adhikaron or jimmedaariyon as a Canadian naagarik, among anya the sahi to kaary liye koi enterprize as khub as liye the sangheey or prantiy sarkari ( antargat pratibandh of access adhikaron to nishchit regulated vyavsaayon ).
the main matbhed hai that nivaasiyon can nahin :
vote in chunaavon in canada ;
chalaaen liye nirvaachit daftar ;
tham canadai passports ;
In addition, ve may be anumat to juden Canada 's hathiyaarband shaktiyaan if the neshnal byaaj would nahin be prejudiced.
sthai residents bhi risk deportation for gambhir aparaadhon vachanabaddh jabaki nivasee in Canada.
sthai nivaasiyon may lagu for canadai naagarikta baad teen saalo in Canada ; however this is nahin mandatory.

a consumer daam index ( CPI ) measures parivartan in the price str of a market basket of upabhokta goods or sevaayen kharida by households.
the cpi in the sanyukt rajya is defined by the Bureau of Labor aankde as `` a maap of the ausat badalen over samay in the keemten sashulk by urban upabhokta for a market basket of upabhokta goods or services. ''
the CPI is a sankhyikeey anumaan constructed using the prices of a namoona of pratinidhi vasteen whose keemten hai ekatrit periodically.
sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are computed liye alag shrenee or sub-categories of goods or sevaayen, hone sanyukt to produce the overall anukramanika with weights reflecting unke shares in the total of the upabhokta expenditures covered by the anukramanika.
it is one of anek daam indices gananaa by sabase neshnal sankhyikeey agenciyon.
the salanaa pratishat badalen in a CPI is prayukt as a maap of inflation.
a cpi can be prayukt to anukramanika ( i.e., adjust liye the prabhaav of inflation ) the real maan of mazdooree, salaries, pensions, liye regulating keemten and for deflating monetary magnitudes to dikhaaen changes in real maan.
In sabase countries, the cpi is, along with the janasankhyikee census or the USA neshnal aay and utpaada khate, ek of the sabase closely dekhi national aarthik aankde.
knocking on lakdi, or to tach lakdi, refers to the apotropaic parampara in pashchimi loakgeet of vastutah touching/knocking on wood, or merely stating ki tum are doing or intend vahi, in anukram to avoid `` tempting bhagya `` baad bananaa a favourable avlokan, a boast, or ghoshnaa concerning ek 's apana death.
Rocker bhujaa
generally referred to within the context of the aatanrik dahan ingine of automotive, marine, motorcycle and pratyaagmani vimaanan engines, the rocker arm is an oscillating lever ki conveys radial gati isse the cam pali into raikhik movement at the poppet valve to open it.
ek samaapt is raised or lowered by a ghurnan pali of the camshaft ( either sidhe or via a tappet ( lifter ) or pushrod ) jabaki the other samaapt adhiniyamon on the valve stem.
jab the camshaft pali raises the baahar of the bhujaa, the inside dabaata down on the valve stem, kholane the valve.
When the baahar of the bhujaa is permitted to vaapasi due to the camshafts roteshan, the andar rises, allowing the valve spring to band the valve.
the drive cam is chalit by the camshaft.
is pushes the rocker bhujaa up or down parichay the trunnion pin or rocker shaft.
gharshan may be ghataya at the point of sampark with the valve stem by a roller cam anusarankarta.
A samaan vyavastha transfers the gati via another roller cam follower to a second rocker bhujaa.
This ghumata parichay the rocker shaft, and hastantaran the gati via a tappet to the poppet valve.
in is maamla this opens the seven valve to the cylinder head.
the effective leverage of the bhujaa ( and thus the force it can exert on the valve stem ) is determined by the rocker arm anupaat, the anupaat of the alahada isse the rocker bhujaa 's bich of roteshan to the tip vibhajit by the alahada isse the bich of roteshan to the point acted on by the camshaft or pushrod.
vartmaan automotive design favors rocker bhujaa ratios of about 1.5:1 to 1.8:1.
however, in the past choti positive ratios ( the valve lift is greater than the cam lift ) or bhi rinatmak ratios ( valve lift choti than the cam lift ) have been used.
Many pre-ww2 engines upyog 1:1 ( neutral ) ratios.
For car engines the rocker bahen hai generally steel stampings, providing a uchit santulan of shakti, vazan or economical cost.
Because the rocker arms are, in bhaag, pratyaagmani vazan, excessive dravyaman especially at the lever ends had the ingine 's kshamta to reach unchi operating speeds.
`` the raatri the Lights gai Out in georgia '' is a dakshini Gothic song likhaa by songwriter bobby Russell or performed in 1972 by uske then-wife vicki laurence.
Reba mcentire baad covered it in 1991.
Recorded in late aktubar 1972 in United/Western Studios on Sunset in Hollywood or released kam than two saptaah baad in navambar 1972, the song centers around the older bhai of the narrator, falsely convicted of and chalaaya for a murder, which the narrator herself has vachanabaddh.
in postal mail, a vaapasi pataa is an suspasht samavesh of the pataa of the vyakti sending the sandesh.
it provides the praptakarta ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries ) with a means to determine kaisaa to respond to the preshak of the sandesh if needed.
the vaapasi pataa need nahin shaamil a preshak 's naam, lakin chahie include pataa or P.O. baksaa vivaran in the vahi way as the delivery pataa chahie.
in some deshon, the return pataa is conventionally stith in the apper baayein haath kone of the lipapha, card, or label.
in the United kingdom, the vaapasi pataa is praayah lagaai on the reverse of the lipapha, near the sheersh.
vyavsaayon often use lipaphe preprinted saath a vaapasi pataa.
Many individuals have chaadaren of chipakane labals preprinted with unke ghar pataa to affix to unke patrachaar.
dharmarth sometimes include aise chaadaren in mailshots.
rolls of vaapasi pataa Labels can be kharida isse companiyaan ki sell personalized labals to provide individuals an aasaan rasta to chhilake and stick vaapasi pataa labals to their lipaphe.
the vaapasi pataa is nahin jaruri on dak mail.
However, lack of a vaapasi address roktaa the dak seva isse hone samarth to vaapasi the mad if it proves undeliverable ; such as isse kshati, postage due, or amaanya gantavy.
aise mail may yun become murde akshar mail.
chahie the vaapasi pataa be of a alag rajya or desh, the mail may be routed through that sthaan for aasaani of vaapasi.
a nerve maargdarshan conduit ( bhi referred to as an kritrim tantrika conduit or kritrim tantrika graft, as opposed to an autograft ) is an kritrim arthath of guiding axonal regrowth to sukar nerve regeneration or is ek of anek clinical upachaar liye tantrika choton.
jab sidhaa suturing of the do stumps of a severed tantrika can nahin be accomplished bagaiyr tension, the maanak naidanik upachaar for paridhiy tantrika choton is autologous tantrika kalam.
due to the simit uplabdhta of daata utak or kaaryaatmak recovery in autologous tantrika kalam, neural utak abhiyantriki shodh rai kendrit on the development of bioartificial nerve maargdarshan conduits as an vaikalpik upachaar, visheshkar liye vishaal dosha.
samaan takneekon are bhi hone chaan for tantrika marammat in the spinal cord lakin nerve regeneration in the central baichaiyn pranali mudraayen a vrihad chunauti kuki its axons do nahin regenerate appreciably in their deshi environment.
The sristi of kritrim conduits is also known as entubulation because the tantrika ends or intervening gap hai enclosed bheetar a tube rachit of biological or synthetic saamagree.
whether the conduit is in the rup of a biologic tub, synthetic tub or tissue-engineered conduit, it chahie facilitate neurotropic or neurotrophic communication between the proximal or distal ends of the tantrika gap, blaak external inhibitory karkon, or provide a physical maargdarshan liye axonal regrowth.
the most moulik objective of a tantrika maargdarshan conduit is to combine physical, rasinic, or biological cues antargat sharten ki will foster utak gathan.
Materials ki have been prayukt to mek biologic tubes include rakt baratan or skeletal mansapeshiyaan, jabaki nonabsorbable or bioabsorbable synthetic tubes have maharoom made isse silicone or polyglycolide kramshah.
tissue-engineered tantrika maargdarshan conduits hai a sangyojan of anek tatv : scaffold structure, scaffold saamagree, cellular therapies, neurotrophic factors or biomimetic materials.
the chunaav of which shaareerik, rasinic or biological cues to upyog is aadhaarit on the gun of the nerve paryaavaran, jisase is critical in creating the sabase vaanchhneeya paryaavaran liye axon regeneration.
the karkon that control saamagree selection shaamil biocompatibility, biodegradability, mechanical akhandta, controllability dauraan nerve vikaas, implantation or nasbandi.
hardkor sahuukaar is an amareeki vaastaviktaa television shrenee utpaadit by rdf uese ( later zodiak USA ) or Richard dominick Productions for trutv about the day-to-day parichaalan of amareeki Jewelry or rin, a family-owned sahuukaar duukaan stith at 20450 greenfield sadak, between 8 Mile Road or the jon C. awaas frive in detroit, michigan.
The shrenee premiered on agast 16, 2010, delivering two million darshak, setting a ricard as trutv 's most-watched series premier kabhi.
Amoxicillin bp
amoxicillin ( in ), formerly amoxycillin ( BAN ), or abbreviated amox, is a moderate-spectrum, bacteriolytic, β-lactam antibiotic prayukt to daavat bacterial infections caused by susceptible microorganisms.
it is praayah the drug of chunaav bheetar the class kuki it is behatar avashoshit, following maukhik administration, than anya β-lactam antibiotic.
Amoxicillin is ek of the sabase aam antibiotic vihit liye children.
the drug became available in 1972.
amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase -producing jeevanu, which hai resistant to a vyapak spectrum of β-lactam antibiotic, aise as penicillin.
liye this kaaran, it is often combined saath clavulanic acid, a β-lactamase inhibitor.
is increases effectiveness by reducing its susceptibility to β-lactamase pratirodh.
lyndon baines Johnson ( agast 27, 1908 – janvari 22, 1973 ), praayah referred to as LBJ, was the 36th adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed baad uske seva as the 37th vaais adhyaksh of the sanyukt States ( 1961–1963 ).
he is ek of tabhi chaar logon jo served in sab chaar nirvaachit sangheey offices of the United rajya : pratinidhi, seenetter, vaais adhyaksh, or adhyaksh.
johnson, a democrate isse texas, parosa as a United States pratinidhi from 1937–1949 or as a Senator from 1949–1961, including chah saalo as sanyukt States seenet bahumat Leader, do as seenet Minority netaa or do as Senate bahumat chaabuk.
baad campaigning unsuccessfully liye the Democratic namakan in 1960, johnson was asked by John F. Kennedy to be uske kaaryshil mate for the 1960 adhyakshiya chunaav.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the hatya of John F. kennedy on November 22, 1963, samaapt Kennedy 's term or was elected adhyaksh in his apana sahi, jeetna by a large margin over bairi goldwater in the 1964 chunaav.
johnson was greatly samarthit by the loktantric party or as adhyaksh, he thi jimmedaar liye digining the `` great Society `` vidhaan ki shaamil kanoon ki upheld civil adhikaron, public broadcasting, Medicare, medicaid, paryaavarniya suraksha, aid to shiksha, or uske `` yuddh on garibi. ''
Johnson thi prasiddh for uske domineering vyaktitv or the `` johnson upachaar, '' uske coercion of shaktishaalee rajaneta in anukram to agrim vidhaan.
meanwhile, Johnson escalated American bhagidaari in the Vietnam War, isse 16,000 amareeki advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat sainikon in jaldi 1968, as amareeki hataahat soared or the salaam prakram bogged bas.
the bhagidaari stimulated a vishaal engri antiwar gati aadhaarit visheshkar on vishvavidhyalayon campuses in the u.S. or abroad.
garmiyaan dange broke out in sabase pramukh cities after 1965, and aparaadhon daron soared, as his opponents raised maange liye `` law or anukram '' nitiyon.
The Democratic Party vibhajit in multiple feuding factions, or baad Johnson did poorly in the 1968 nai hampshire praathmik, he ended uske boli liye reelection.
Republican Richard Nixon thi elected to safal use.
itihaaskaaron argue that johnson 's presidency chihnit the peak of aadhunik udaarataavaad in the sanyukt States baad the nai Deal era.
johnson is kramit favorably by kuch itihaaskaaron kuki of uske domestic nitiyon.
the big bang siddhanth cast at Comic con 2009, from baayein : kunal nayyar, Simon helberg, kaley cuoco, Jim Parsons, or Johnny galecki
the amareeki sitcom the big Bang siddhanth, nirmit or karypalika utpaadit by chak lorre and vidheyak prady, premiered on sibies on sitambar 24, 2007.
the dikhaaen centers on paanch varna : roommates sheldon kupar or leonard Hofstadter, do caltech physicists ; paini, a waitress and aspiring abhinetri jo jeevandaan across the haul ; or Leonard or sheldon 's mitron and co-workers aerospace ejeeniyar harvard Wolowitz, or astrophysicist rajesh koothrappali.
over time, several supporting characters have maharoom prachaarit to abhinit bhoomikaaye : lesley winkle ( ritu 1 punaravarti ; ritu 2 regular ; ritu 3 guest ), a physicist sahyogi, or, at alag times, a premi of dono Leonard or harvard ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ritu 3 punaravarti ; season 4-present niyamit ), a microbiologist, harvard 's fiancée or subsequent bivi, or purv part-time waitress alongside paini ; neuroscientist emi Farrah fowler ( ritu 3 atithi ; ritu 4 recurring ; ritu 4-present niyamit ), jo joins the group baad hone matched to sheldon on a dating jalsthal ; or comic kitaab store-owner, stuart khilte ( sizan 2–5 punaravarti ; season 6-present regular ), who replaces harvard as raaj 's best dost when harvard is in spes.
The dikhaaen also suvidhaayen numerous supporting characters, prayek of jisko plays a prominent bhoomika in a choti samooh of episodes.
the amareeki civil yuddh ( acw ), also gyaat as the yuddh between the rajya or simply the civil War ( see naming ), thi a civil war fought isse 1861 to 1865 between the United rajya ( the `` sangh '' or the `` North '' ) and anek dakshini slave rajya ki ghoshit their secession or formed the confederate rajya of america ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` dakshin '' ).
the war had iske utpatti in the issue of slavery, visheshkar the extension of gulaami into the western territories.
videshi powers kiya nahin intervene.
baad chaar years of khooni combat that left over 600,000 sainiko murde and nasht much of the South 's avasanrachana, the confederacy collapsed, gulaami was abolished, and the mushkil Reconstruction prakram of restoring national ekta and guaranteeing rights to the freed slave began.
in the 1860 presidential chunaav, Republicans, led by abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding gulaami into sanyukt rajya ' territories.
Lincoln jiti, but pehle uske inauguration on kooch 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the confederacy.
Outgoing loktantric adhyaksh james Buchanan or the aavak republicans asweekrut secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural pataa declared uske administration hota not initiate civil yuddh.
aath remaining slave rajya jari to reject kals liye secession.
confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the confederacy.
A salaam sammelan failed to dhundhen a sulah, or both pahalu prepared liye war.
The Confederates assumed ki europea deshon were so nirbhar on `` King kapaas `` ki ve would intervene ; none did or none recognized the new confederate States of America.
hostilities began on April 12, 1861, jab confederate shaktiyaan fired upon fort sumter, a key fort yojit by Union sainikon in dakshin Carolina.
lincoln pukaara liye prayek rajya to provide troops to retake the fort ; natijatan, chaar adhik slave rajya joined the confederacy, bringing their kul to gyaarah.
the sangh jald niyantrit the border rajya or sthapit a naval nakebandi ki crippled the dakshini economy.
the purvi theatre was inconclusive in 1861–62.
the patjhad 1862 confederate abhiyaan into maryland ( a sangh rajya ) ended with confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading angrejon hastkshep.
lincoln jari the emancipation udghoshnaa, jisase made ending gulaami a yuddh lakshya.
to the west, by summer 1862 the Union nasht the confederate nadi navy, tab much of their pashchimi sena, and the Union at vicksburg vibhajit the Confederacy in do at the mississippi nadi.
in 1863, robert E. Lee 's confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of gettysburg.
Western safaltaaon led to Ulysses S. Grant cmand of sab Union sena in 1864.
In the Western theatre, wiliam T. sharaman drove east to capchar atlanta or marched to the sea, destroying confederate infrastructure saath the rasta.
The Union marshaled the sansaadhan and janashakti to akraman the confederacy isse all directions, and could afford to lado battles of attrition through the overland abhiyaan towards Richmond, the confederate capital.
the defending confederate fouj vifal, agrani to lee 's surrender to grant at appomattox adaalat House on april 9, 1865.
the American Civil yuddh was one of the earliest true audyogic yudhon.
railroads, the telegraph, steamships, or mass-produced hathiyaar yahood employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian kaarkaanon, khaanon, shipyards, banks, parivahan or khaanaa aapurtiyan sab foreshadowed sansar War I.
it remains the deadliest yuddh in amareeki itihaas, resulting in the mauton of an anumaanit 750,000 sainiko and an undetermined kramank of civilian hataahat.
itihaaskaar jon huddleston estimates the maut toll at ten pratishat of sab Northern males 20–45 saalo old, or 30 pratishat of sab dakshini shwet males aged 18–40.
insaan evolution refers to the evolutionary prakram leading up to the rup of modern insaano.
jabaki it began saath the last aam ancestor of sab life, the topic praayah cover tabhi the vikasvaadi history of primates, in particular the genus homo, or the emergence of homo sapiens as a pruthak prajati of hominids ( or `` great apes '' ).
the padhai of insaan evolution involves many scientific disciplines, including shaareerik anthropology, primatology, puraatatv, bhashavigyaan, vikasvaadi manovigyaan, bhrunvigyaan or anuvanshiki.
According to genetic adhyayan, primates diverged from anya stanadhariyon parichay in the let cretaceous kaal, and the earliest jeevashmon appear in the Paleocene, around.
the parivaar manavnuma diverged from the hylobatidae ( Gibbon ) parivaar 15-20 lakh saalo pehle, or around, the ponginae ( orangutans ), diverged isse the manavnuma parivaar.
bipedalism is the moulik adaption of the Hominin lakeer, or the earliest bipedal hominin is mana to be either sahelanthropus or orrorin, saath ardipithecus, a puraa bipedal, coming somewhat baad.
the gorilla or chimpanji diverged around the vahi time, parichay 4-6 lakh saalo pehle, or either sahelanthropus or orrorin may be hamaari pichhlaa saajha purvaj saath unhen.
the jaldi bipedals aakhirkaar viksit into the australopithecines and baad the genus Homo.
the earliest documented sadasyon of the genus homo hai homo habilis jisase viksit around ; the earliest prajati liye jisase vahin is dhanatmak pramaan of upyog of stone tuls.
the dimag of these early hominins yahood about the vahi size as ki of a chimpanji.
dauraan the aglaa lakh saalo a prakram of encephalization began, and with the aagaman of homo iractus in the chattan ricard, cranial kshamta tha doubled to 850 cm3.
homo erectus or homo ergaster were the pehla of the hominina to chhod africa, or ye prajati spread through africa, asia, or europea between.
it is believed ki ye prajati were the pehla to use aag or jatil tools.
according to the haal africa ancestry siddhanth, aadhunik humans evolved in africa sambhawatah isse homo heidelbergensis, homo rhodesiensis or Homo antecessor and migrated out of the continent some 50,000 to 100,000 saalo ago, replacing local populations of homo erectus, Homo denisova, Homo floresiensis or homo neanderthalensis.
archaic homo sapiens, the forerunner of anatomically aadhunik humans, viksit between 400,000 or 250,000 saalo pehle.
haal diene evidence suggests that anek haplotypes of neanderthal origin hai present among sab non-African populations, and Neanderthals and anya hominids, aise as denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 % of unke genome to present-day insanbus. < sandarbh name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202 '' > Anatomically aadhunik insaano evolved isse archaic Homo sapiens in the Middle paleolithic, parichay 200,000 saalo ago.
The parivartan to behavioral modernity saath the vikaas of sankethik samskruti, bhashaa, or specialized lithic technology happened around 50,000 saalo pehle according to anek vigyaniyon although kuch sujhaayen a kramik badalen in bartaav over a longer samay span.
lisa Cuddy, m.d., is a fictional character on the Fox network medical naatak House.
She is portrayed by lisa Edelstein.
cuddy was the dean of ayurvigyaan or hospital vyavasthaapak of the fictional princeton-plainsboro Teaching Hospital in nai jersey.
wo bhi becomes house 's prem byaaj through the years to prarambh a sambandh with use in season saat.

Track or field is a khel comprising various pratispardhi athlettic pratiyogitaaon aadhaarit on kaaryshil, kud, or phenkna.
the naam of the sport garbhashayi isse the pratiyogita sthaan : a stadium saath an ovel kaaryshil track around a grass field.
The phenkna or jumping events generally lo place in the central enclosed kshetrafal.
Track or field jalprapaat antargat the chhatariyaan khel of athletics, jisase bhi shaamil sadak kaaryshil, cross desh kaaryshil, or res chalanaa.
the do sabase prestigious antarrashtriya track or field competitions hai yojit antargat the banner of athletics : the athletics pratiyogita at the olympic khel or the ieeef sansar championships in athletics.
The antarrashtriya Association of Athletics federations is the antarrashtriya governing deh liye track and field.
track or field kaarykram are generally individual khel saath athlete chunauteepurn each other to decide a single victor.
The racing events hai jiti by the khilaadi with the fastest samay, jabaki the jumping or throwing kaarykram hai jiti by the khilaadi jo has hasil the mahanatam alahada or oonchaai in the pratiyogita.
the kaaryshil kaarykram hai categorised as sprints, madhya or long-distance kaarykram, relays, or hurdling.
Regular kud events include long jump, tripal jump, high jamp and pole vault, jabaki the sabase aam throwing kaarykram hai shot put, javelin, discus or hammer.
vahin are bhi `` sanyukt events '', aise as heptathlon or decathlon, in jisase athlete compete in a kramank of the above kaarykram.
Records hai kept of the behtareen pradarshan in vishisht events, at sansar or neshnal str, sahi bas to a nijee level.
however, if athlete hai deemed to have violated the event 's niyam or regulations, ve hai disqualified isse the pratiyogita or unke marks are erased.
In uttar america, the term track or field may be prayukt to refer to athletics in saamaanya, balki than specifically track or field kaarykram.
The Gulf War ( 2 agast 1990 – 28 farvari 1991 ), codenamed Operation Desert toofaan ( 17 janvari 1991 – 28 February 1991 ) thi a war waged by a u.n.-authorized gathbandhan force isse 34 nations led by the sanyukt rajya, viruddh iraqi in response to iraqi 's invasion or annexation of Kuwait.
the yuddh is also known under anya names, such as the parsi Gulf yuddh, pehla Gulf yuddh, Gulf yuddh i, or the pehla Iraq War, pehle the term `` iraqi War '' became pahachaanaa instead saath the 2003 iraqi yuddh ( bhi referred to in the U.S. as `` Operation Iraqi Freedom '' ).
kuwait 's akraman by iraqi sainikon ki began 2 agast 1990 was mili with antarrashtriya condemnation, or brought taatkaalik economic sanctions viruddh iraqi by members of the u.N. suraksha Council.
u.S. adhyaksh george H. W. Bush deployed u.S. shaktiyaan into saudi arab, or urged anya countries to send unke apana shaktiyaan to the jhaanki.
an array of nations joined the Coalition.
the great majority of the gathbandhan 's sainya shaktiyaan yahood from the U.S., saath saudi arab, the sanyukt kingdom or mishra as agrani yogadanakarta, in ki anukram.
saudi arab sashulk around US $ 36 arab of the us $ 60 arab cost.
the yuddh thi chihnit by the shuruuaat of sajiv news on the saamne lines of the lado, saath the primacy of the U.S. sanjaal sienen.
the yuddh rai also arjeet the upnaam video khel yuddh after the daily broadcast bimb on falak the u.S. bombers during Operation marusthal toofaan.
the aarambhik virodh to nikaal iraqi troops isse kuwait began saath an aerial bambaari on 17 janvari 1991.
is was followed by a maidan utpeedan on 24 farvari.
is thi a decisive vijay liye the gathbandhan shaktiyaan, jo liberated kuwait or unnat into iraqi territory.
the gathbandhan ceased unke agrim, or ghoshit a cease-fire 100 hours after the ground abhiyaan started.
aerial and maidan combat was confined to Iraq, kuwait, or areas on saudi arab 's border.
iraqi shubharambh Scud missiles viruddh Coalition sainya lakshya in saudi arab or viruddh israel.
The nikal, in amareeki upyog, is a five- cent sikaa jari by the sanyukt States mint.
Composed of 75 % tambe or 25 % nikal, the tukdaa rai maharoom struck chunki 1866.
the chaandi half dime, equal to five saint, tha been issued chunki the 1790s.
the amareeki Civil yuddh caused aarthik hardship, driving gold or silver isse circulation ; in response, in place of low-value sikke, the sarkari at pehla issued paper karency.
in 1865, Congress abolished the five-cent fractional currency note baad spencer M. clark, head of the karency beuro ( today the beuro of Engraving or mudran ), placed his apana portret on the denomination.
baad kaamyaab parichay of two-cent and three-cent tukade, bagaiyr anmol metal, Congress also praadhikrut a five-cent piece consisting of aadhaar metal ; the mint began striking is sanskaran in 1866.
The aarambhik design of the shield nikal was struck jabatak 1883, tab replaced by the swatantraaa sir nikal.
the Buffalo nikal was introduced in 1913 as bhaag of a drive to badhayen the beauty of amareeki coinage ; in 1938, the jeffrasan nikal followed.
In 2004 and 2005, khaas designs in sammaan of the bicentennial of the louis and clark expedition were issued.
in 2006, the Mint reverted to using Jefferson nikal designer Felix schlag 's asli reverse ( or `` tails '' paksh ), haalanki a nai obverse, by Jamie franki, was substituted.
as of 2013, it laagat more than eleven saint to upaj a nickel ; the mint is exploring the sambhaavna of reducing laagat by using kam mahangi metals.
A poster saath pushp or cluster of pushp produced by baarah species of flowering paudhe isse different families
A pushp, sometimes gyaat as a khilte or khilanaa, is the reproductive structure mila in flowering paudhe ( paudhe of the prabhag magnoliophyta, also called angiosperms ).
the biological falan of a flower is to prabhaav janan, praayah by providing a yantriki for the sangh of shukranu saath andey.
pushp may facilitate outcrossing ( sanlayan of shukranu or andey isse different individuals in a population ) or allow selfing ( sanlayan of sperm or anda isse the vahi pushp ).
kuch pushp upaj diaspores bagaiyr fertilization ( parthenocarpy ).
Flowers contain sporangia or hai the sait jahaan gametophytes develop.
pushp give vruddhi to fal or beej.
anek pushp have viksit to be attractive to pashu, so as to cause unhen to be sadish liye the transafar of paraag.
in jod to facilitating the reproduction of flowering paudhe, pushp have long been admired or used by insaano to beautify unke paryaavaran, or bhi as objects of romance, ritual, dharm, ayurvigyaan or as a sorce of khaanaa.
the mcdonnell Douglas ( abhi bowing ) f-15 tribhuj is a twin-engine, all-weather ranneetik senaanee designed by mcdonnell duglas to gain and maintain air badppan in aerial combat.
it is mana among the sabase successful aadhunik fighters, saath over 100 aerial combat victories saath no losses in dogfights.
following samikshaayen of prastaav, the sanyukt rajya air force chaynit mcdonnell duglas ' dizine in 1967 to milen the seva 's need liye a samarpit air superiority senaanee.
The tribhuj first udaaya in july 1972, and daalaa seva in 1976.
chunki the 1970s, the tribhuj rai been exported to Israel, japani, saudi arab, or anya raashtra.
the F-15 thi originally envisioned as a pure air badppan vayuyan.
iske dizine shaamil a dwitiyak ground-attack kaabiliyat ki thi largely aprayukt.
the design proved lacheelee enough that an all-weather strike derevative, the F-15E strike Eagle, was baad developed, and daalaa seva in 1989.
the f-15 Eagle is expected to be in seva saath the U.S. air Force past 2025.
mimio is a brands naam of a lakeer of technology utpaada aimed at the education market.
the praathmik products hai kendrit around computer whiteboard interactive shikshan devices.
mimiocapture divaais bhi allow upayokta to capchar all of the syaahi strokes ki hai written on the whiteboard.
When prayukt in conjunction saath a video projector it turns the ordinary whiteboard sataha into a fully interactive whiteboard.
the product lakeer was originally designed by Virtual Ink.
on aktubar 4, 2006 newell Rubbermaid acquired the mimio interactive whiteboard ( iwb ) product lakeer.
rahab of jerrico
rahab, ( ; ; ) thi, according to the kitaab of joshua, a woman jo lived in jerrico in the promised Land or assisted the israelites in capturing the nagar.
nearly all English translations of joshua describe her as a harlot or prostitute.
the sanghathan of amareeki rajya ( Spanish : organización de los estados americanos, portugali : Organização dos estados americanos, French : Organisation des états américains ), or the OAS, is a regional antarrashtriya sanghathan.
the oas thi santhaapit on 30 April 1948, or rai iske mukhyalay in Washington, d.C., sanyukt rajya.
iske members hai the 35 swatantra rajya of the Americas.
chunki 26 may 2005, the sachiv saamaanya of oas rai been José miguel insulza.
Christopher columbus ( italvi : cristoforo colon ; Spanish : cristóbal colón ; portugali : cristóvão Colombo ; pehle 31 aktubar 145120 may 1506 ) thi an Italian explorer, navik, and colonizer, born in the ganatantr of genoa, in kayaa is aaj northwestern italy.
Under the auspices of the catholic monarchs of Spain, he samaapt four voyages across the atlantic Ocean ki led to general European jaagrukta of the amareeki mahadwipon.
those voyages, or uske praytn to sthapit permanent settlements on the dweep of Hispaniola, initiated the spani colonization of the nai sansar.
in the context of ubharate pashchimi imperialism and aarthik competition between europea kingdoms seeking maal through the sthapana of trade routes or colonies, columbus 's satte proposal, to pahunchein the East indies by sailing westward, aakhirkaar praapt the support of the Spanish crown, jisase dekhi in it a promise, however remote, of gaining the apper haath over pratidwandvi powers in the pratiyogita liye the lucrative masala vyapaar saath asia.
dauraan uske first voyage in 1492, bajaay of reaching Japan as he had intended, Columbus landed in the Bahamas dweepasmooh, at a locale he namit san Salvador.
over the course of teen adhik voyages, columbus visited the vrihad and lesser Antilles, as khub as the caribbean coast of Venezuela or Central america, claiming unhen liye the spani samrajya.
haalanki columbus was nahin the pehla europea explorer to pahunchein the Americas ( having maharoom preceded by the norse expedition led by Leif ericson in the 11th sadi ), Columbus 's voyages led to the pehla sthaayee europea contact saath the americas, inaugurating a kaal of europea khoji, conquest, or colonization ki lasted liye anek sadiyaan.
ve tha, therefore, an enormous prabhaav in the historical development of the modern pashchimi sansar.
columbus khud dekhi uske accomplishments primarily in the light of the spreading of the Christian religion.
never admitting ki he had pahunche a mahadweep previously unknown to europeans, rather than the east Indies he had set out liye, columbus pukaara the nivaasiyon of the lands he visited indios ( spani liye `` indiens `` ).
columbus 's strained relationship saath the spani crown or iske niyukt aupniveshik prashaskon in america led to his giraftaar or dismissal as governor of the settlements on the dweep of hispaniola in 1500, and baad to protracted vaad over the laabh jisase columbus or uske vaaris claimed were owed to them by the crown.
karavaaya in germany, the Boxer is a breed of stocky, medium-sized, short-haired dogs.
the kot is chikna or tight-fitting ; rangon hai fawn or brindled, saath or bagaiyr shwet markings, jisase may cover the sampurna body.
mukkebaaz hai brachycephalic ( ve have broad, choti skulls ), or have a square muzzle, mandibular prognathism ( an underbite ), bahut damdaar jaws, and a shaktishaalee bite adarsh liye faansee on to vishaal prey.
the boxer thi bred from the boodha angrezi Bulldog or the abhi extinct bullenbeisser, or is bhaag of the molosser samooh.
Boxers yahood first exhibited in a dog dikhaaen liye St. bernards in munich in 1895, the pehla boxer klbon hone santhaapit the next saal.
aadhaarit on 2012 American Kennel Club aankde, mukkebaaz yojit sthir as the saatvaan sabase popular nasl of shwaan in the sanyukt rajya liye the teesraa lagaataar saal.
Serial ata ( sata ) is a computer bas interfes that connects mejabaan bus adapters to mass bhandar divaais aise as mushkil discs drive or optical drives.
serial ata replaces the puraani at anulgnak maanak ( ATA ; later referred to as samanaantar ata or pata ), offering anek laabh over the puraani interface : ghataya cabel aakaar and laagat ( saat conductors bajaay of 40 ), deshi hot swapping, tej aankada transafar through ucchtar signalling daron, or adhik kushal transafar through an ( vaikalpik ) I/O queuing protocol.
sata host adapters and devices communicate via a high-speed serial cabel over do pairs of conductors.
In contrast, samanaantar ata ( the redesignation liye the legacy ata visheshtaayen ) prayukt a 16-bit chaudee data bas saath many atirikt support or control signal, sab oparating at much lower aavriti.
to ensure pichhadaa sangatta saath viraasat ata software and anuprayog, sata upyog the same moulik ATA or atapi command-set as viraasat ata devices.
sata rai replaced samanaantar ata in upabhokta desktop and laptop computer, or has largely replaced PATA in new embedded applications.
sata 's market share in the desktop PC market was 99 % in 2008.
PATA remains widely prayukt in industrial or embedded anuprayog ki upyog CompactFlash bhandar, bhi haalanki the nai cfast maanak is aadhaarit on sata.
serial ATA udyog sangatta specifications originate from the serial ata antarrashtriya sanghathan ( urf.
sata-io, serialata.org ).
The sata-io samooh collaboratively creates, reviews, ratifies, or publishes the interoperability visheshtaayen, the test maamle, and plug-fests.
as saath anek anya industry compatibility maanakon, the SATA saamagree swaamitv is transferred to anya udyog laashen : primarily the incits t13 upasmiti ATA, the incits t10 upasmiti ( SCSI ) ; a subgroup of t10 jimmedaar liye serial sanlagn SCSI ( sas ).
the puraa specification isse sata-io.
the remainder of is article hoga try to upyog the shabdaawalee or visheshtaayen of sata-io.
the itihaas of the antarjaal began saath the vikaas of electronic computer in the 1950s.
the public thi pehla introduced to the concepts ki would sise to the antarjaal jab a sandesh was bheja over the ARPANet isse computer science Professor leonard Kleinrock 's prayogshaala at vishvavidhyalayon of california, los Angeles ( UCLA ), after the second tukdaa of sanjaal equipment thi santhaapit at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ).
Packet switched sanjaal such as arpanet, Mark i at npl in the UK, CYCLADES, Merit Network, Tymnet, and telenet, yahood viksit in the late 1960s or jaldi 1970s using a kismein of protocols.
The arpanet in particular led to the vikaas of protocol liye internetworking, in jisase multiple pruthak networks could be joined together into a network of networks.
In 1982, the antarjaal protocol suite ( tcp/ip ) was manakikrut, and natijatan, the avadharana of a world-wide network of interconnected tcp/ip networks, called the antarjaal, was introduced.
abhigam to the arpanet was vistaarit in 1981 jab the National vigyaan Foundation ( nsf ) viksit the computer vigyaan Network ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 jab NSFNET provided abhigam to supercomputer site in the sanyukt rajya from research or shiksha sanghathan.
Commercial antarjaal service pradaataaon ( isps ) began to emerge in the let 1980s or jaldi 1990s.
the arpanet thi decommissioned in 1990.
the antarjaal thi commercialized in 1995 jab nsfnet thi decommissioned, removing the last pratibandh on the upyog of the antarjaal to carry commercial trekkic.
chunki the mid-1990s, the Internet rai had a krantikari prabhaav on samskruti and commerce, sahit the rise of near-instant communication by electronic mail, instant messaging, Voice over Internet Protocol ( voip ) `` phone kals '', two-way interactive video calls, or the sansar Wide Web with iske charchaa forums, blog, soshal netwarking, and online kharidari site.
the shodh or shiksha jatiyaan continues to develop and upyog unnat sanjaal such as NSF 's very unchi gati ridh Network seva ( vbns ), internet2, and neshnal lambdarail.
Increasing amounts of aankada hai transmitted at ucchtar and ucchtar speeds over resha optic sanjaal oparating at 1-Gbit/s, 10-gbit/s, or adhik.
The antarjaal 's takeover over the vaishvik sanchaar landscape thi lagbhag tatkaal in aitihaasik terms : it tabhi communicated 1 % of the soochna bahati through two-way doorsanchaar sanjaal in the saal 1993, already 51 % by 2000, and adhik than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
Today the antarjaal continues to grow, chalit by ever vrihad amounts of online soochna, commerce, entertainment, or soshal netwarking.

calcitonin ( also gyaat as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino acid linear polypeptide hormone ki is utpaadit in insaano primarily by the parafollicular koshikaayen ( bhi gyaat as C-cells ) of the thyride, or in many anya animals in the ultimobranchial body.
it adhiniyamon to reduce rakt calcium ( ca2+ ), opposing the prabhaav of parathyroid hormone ( pth ).
calcitonin rai maharoom mila in machhlee, sarisrupon, pakshiyon, or mammals.
iske mahatv in humans has nahin been as khub sthapit as its mahatv in other pashu, as iske falan is praayah not significant in the viniman of normal calcium samasthaapan.
it belongs to calcitonin-like protein parivaar.
a mousepad with a padded kalai baaki.
a mousepad ( us ) or mouse mat ( uk ) is a sataha liye placing and chalati a computer mouse.
A mousepad enhances the upyogita of the chuha compared to using a chuha sidhe on a talika by providing a sataha to allow the trekking led or ball ( in purv models ) to measure movement accurately and bagaiyr jitor.
kuch mousepads increase ergonomics by providing a padded kalai baaki.

the Cincinnati bengals ' paul bhura Stadium is in the alahada.
riverfront Stadium ( 1970–1995 ), baad known as Cinergy field ( 1996–2002 ), thi the ghar of the sinsinati laal neshnal lig baseball toli or the Cincinnati Bengals neshnal footbaal lig toli.
stith on the ohio River in shahar Cincinnati, the stadium was behtareen gyaat as the home of `` the big red yantra ``, as the laal were often pukaara in the 1970s.
nirmaan began on farvari 1, 1968, or was samaapt at a laagat of less than $ 50 lakh.
on June 30, 1970, the laal hosted the atlanta braves in unke grand opening, saath Hank Aaron hitting the pehla kabhi home chalaaen at riverfront.
Two saptaah baad on july 14, 1970, Riverfront hosted the 1970 pramukh League besabaal all-star khel.
is khel is behtareen remembered liye the often-replayed collision at home plate between laal star peet rose or catcher re fosse of the cleveland indiens.
in sitambar 1996, riverfront Stadium thi renamed `` cinergy Field '' in a praayojan saude with Greater Cincinnati 's energy company, cinergy Corporation.
In 2001, to mek room for great amareeki ball park, the seating kshamta at Cinergy field thi ghataya to 39,000.
vahin thi a vishaal wal in bich Field visible after the renovations, to serve as the batter 's eye.
the stadium was demolished by implosion on disambar 29, 2002.

the mook majority is an unspecified vishaal bahumat of logon in a country or samooh who do nahin express unke raay saream.
the term thi popularized ( though nahin pehla prayukt ) by U.S. adhyaksh richard nicksan in a November 3, 1969, speech in jisase he kaha, `` And so tonight—to tum, the great silent majority of my fellow Americans—I pucho liye apana support. ''
in this upyog it referred to those Americans jo did nahin juden in the vishaal demonstrations against the Vietnam yuddh at the samay, jo did nahin juden in the counterculture, or who did nahin participate in public pravachan.
nicksan saath with anek anya dekhi is samooh of madhya america as being nishprabh in the media by the adhik gayan minority.
The phrase thi prayukt in the 19th century as a preyokti referring to sab the logon who have died, or others have prayukt it before or after Nixon to refer to samooh of matadaata in vibhinn nations of the sansar.
sam, a rhesus monkey, udaaya to an altitude of 88 km in 1959.
( nasa )
pehle insaano gai into spes, several pashu were launched into spes, including numerous bandaron, so ki vaigyanikon could investigate the biological prabhaav of space travel.
the sanyukt rajya shubharambh flights containing primate cargo primarily between 1948-1961 saath ek flight in 1969 or one in 1985.
frans shubharambh do monkey-carrying flite in 1967.
the Soviet sangh and rus launched bandaron between 1983 and 1996.
Most monkeys yahood anesthetized before lift-off.
overall thirty-two bandaron flew in the spes program ; none flew more than ekbar.
Numerous back-up bandaron bhi went through the kaarykram but never udaaya.
bandaron isse several species yahood prayukt, sahit rhesus bandaron, cynomolgus monkeys, gilahari bandaron, and pig-tailed macaques.
Some chimpanzees ( jisase hai apes rather than bandaron ) yahood bhi prayukt.
red ( redundant array of independent discs, originally anaavashyak sarani of inexpensive discs ) is a bhandar technology ki combines anek discs drive components into a logical unit.
aankada is vitarit across the drive in ek of anek ways pukaara `` red str '', depending on the str of redundancy and performance jaruri.
The pad `` RAID '' was pehla paribhaashit by daud patterson, garth A. gibson, and Randy katz at the vishvavidhyalayon of california, Berkeley in 1987.
vipanak representing udyog red manufacturers baad attempted to reinvent the pad to describe a anaavashyak array of swatantra disks as a arthath of disassociating a low-cost expectation isse RAID technology.
red is abhi prayukt as an umbrella pad liye computer aankada bhandar schemes ki can divide and replicate data among anek shaareerik drive : RAID is an udhaaharan of bhandar abhasikaran or the sarani can be pahunchaa by the oparating pranali as ek single drive.
The different yojanaayen or architectures hai namit by the shabd red followed by a kramank ( e.g. red 0, red 1 ).
prayek yojana provides a alag santulan between the kunjee lakshya : vishwasaneeyata and uplabdhta, pradarshan and kshamta.
red str greater than RAID 0 provide suraksha against unrecoverable ( sector ) padhaa errors, as khub as whole disk vifaltaa.
A lymphocyte is a type of white blood koshika in the vertebrate pratiraksha pranali.
antargat the sookshmdarshi, lymphocytes can be vibhajit into vishaal lymphocytes and choti lymphocytes.
vishaal granular lymphocytes shaamil prakritik kaatil koshikaayen ( NK cells ).
Small lymphocytes consist of t koshikaayen or b koshikaayen.
the big lebowski is a 1998 dark kamedi film likhaa and directed by Joel or Ethan koen.
Jeff pulon stars as Jeff Lebowski, an berozegaar los angeles slacker or avid bowler, nicknamed `` the Dude. ''
baad a maamla of mistaken pahchaan, the Dude is introduced to a karodpati also namit jeffri lebowski.
jab the karodpati lebowski 's trophy bivi is baad kidnapped, he commissions The yaar to uddhaar the phiroti to surakshit uske release.
the yojana goes awry jab the yaar 's friend walter Sobchak ( John gudman ) yojanaayen to rakhana the puraa phiroti.
Steve buscemi, philip seymour hoffman, daud huddleston, julianne moore, Tara reid, or jon turturro also star in the film, which is narrated by a county known tabhi as `` the ajanabi '', nibhaai by sam elliott.
the filmi is loosely inspired by the work of remand chandalar.
joel koen stated : `` we wanted to do a chandalar dayaalu of story – kaisaa it moves episodically, or deals saath the varna trying to suljhaana a mystery, as khub as having a hopelessly jatil plat that 's ultimately mahatvaheen. ''
The asli score was rachit by Carter burwell, a longtime collaborator of the koen bhaaiyo.
the Big lebowski was a niraashaa at the U.S. baksaa office or praapt mishrit samikshaayen at the time of iske relies.
samikshaayen have trended towards the dhanatmak over time, and the filmi rai become a cult pasandida, vikhyath liye its idiosyncratic characters, sapana sequences, unconventional samvaad, or eclectic soundtrack.
severas snape is a fictional akshar in the Harry kumhaar kitaab shrenee written by j.K. rolling.
In the pehla anokhaa of the series, he is hostile toward harry or is built up to be the primary vipakshi jabatak the final adhyay.

he ultimately becomes headmaster of Hogwarts in the final novel.
rolling has described him as `` a gift of a akshar ''.
Grits refers to a ground-corn khaanaa of Native amareeki utpatti, that is aam in the dakshini United States or mukhyatah khaaya at breakfast.
aadhunik grits hai commonly made of alkali-treated makai gyaat as hominy.
grits are samaan to anya motaa maize-based porridges isse around the sansar aise as polenta or the thinner farina.
`` Instant grits '' have maharoom processed to gati kooking.
The word `` grits '' garbhashayi isse the boodha English shabd `` grytt, '' arth coarse bhojan.
is word originally referred to wheat or anya porridges abhi known as groats in bhaag of the u.K..
makka, anjaan in europea in the madhya aayu, is a khaanaa niklaa from makai ( a nai sansar sanyantr ) and `` makai '' had been used to describe wheat products in many europea regions.
`` grits '' may be either ekvachan or bahuvachan ; historically, in the amareeki dakshin the word was invariably ekvachan notwithstanding iske bahuvachan rup ( cf. aise food names as `` spaghetti '' or `` linguine '', likewise bahuvachan in rup, lakin ekvachan in upyog ).
sometimes, grits hai pukaara sofkee or sofkey ( from a deshi amareeki muskogee word ).
in molecular jeevigyaan, insaan chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a hormone produced by the fertilized anda baad dharna.
baad dauraan garbhavastha it is made by the developing placenta, or baad by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast.
kuch cancerous tumors upaj is hormone ; therefore, elevated levels measured jab the rogi is nahin pregnant can sise to a karkat nidaan.
However, it is nahin gyaat whether this production is a contributing kaaran or an prabhaav of tumorigenesis.
the pituitary analogue of hcg, gyaat as luteinizing hormone ( lh ), is utpaadit in the pituitary gland of males or mahilaon of all aayu.
, the epad rai nishiddh the bikri of `` homeopathic '' or over the counter hcg diet utpaada or ghoshit unhen beyimaan or illegal.

coca-cola is a carbonated naram drink bechi in stores, restaraan, or vending mashine in prayek country except cuba or North Korea.
it is utpaadit by the coca-cola company of atlanta, Georgia, and is praayah referred to bas as coke ( a registered trademark of the coca-cola company in the sanyukt rajya since kooch 27, 1944 ).
originally intended as a patent medicine jab it was invented in the late 19th sadi by jon pemberton, coca-cola thi bought out by bijnesaman asa griggs candler, whose vipanan tactics led coke to its dabadabaa of the sansar soft-drink market throughout the 20th sadi.
The company produces concentrate, which is tab sold to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the sansar.
the bottlers, who tham territorially exclusive anubandh saath the company, upaj samaapt utpaada in dibbe and botalon from the concentrate in sangyojan saath filtered jal or sweeteners.
the bottlers tab bechein, vitarit and merchandise coca-cola to khudara stores or vending mashine.
aise bottlers shaamil coca-cola udhyamon, jisase is the largest single coca-cola bottler in North america or pashchimi europea.
the coca-cola company bhi bikta concentrate liye soda fountains to pramukh restaraan or khaanaa service vitarakon.
the coca-cola Company rai, on avasar, introduced other cola peya antargat the Coke brands naam.
the sabase aam of ye is aahaar coke, with others sahit caffeine-free coca-cola, aahaar coke caffeine-free, coca-cola Cherry, Coca-Cola Zero, coca-cola vanilla, or special sanskaran saath nibu, lim or coffee.
Based on Interbrand 's best vaishvik brands 2011, coca-cola thi the sansar 's most moolyawaan brand.
an ombudsman is an aadhikarik, praayah niyukt by the sarkari or by parliament lakin with a significant oopaadhi of swatantraaa, jo is charge saath representing the ruchi of the public by investigating or sambodhit shikaayat of maladministration or ulanghan of rights.
In some deshon an Inspector saamaanya, naagarik edwocket or anya aadhikarik may have duties similar to those of a neshnal ombudsman, or may bhi be niyukt by the legislature.
neeche the neshnal str an ombudsman may be appointed by a state, local or nagarpalika government, or unofficial ombudsmen may be niyukt by, or bhi kaary liye, a nigam such as a utility supplier or a samachaarpatr, liye an NGO, or for a peshewar niamak deh.
whether appointed by the vidhanmandal, the executive, or an organization ( or, less aksar, nirvaachit by the constituency ki he or wo serves ), the theth kartavya of an ombudsman hai to investigate shikaayat or attempt to niraakaran unhen, praayah through suzav ( binding or nahin ) or madhyasthata.
Ombudsmen sometimes bhi aim to pahachaano pranaligat mudde agrani to poor seva or breaches of logon 's adhikaron.
at the neshnal level, sabase ombudsmen have a chaudee mandate to saude saath the entire public sector, or sometimes bhi elements of the nijee sector ( liye udhaaharan, contracted service providers ).
in some maamle, vahin is a adhik pratibandhit mandate, for example saath particular sector of samaaj.
adhik haal developments have included the creation of specialised children 's Ombudsman or Information kamishnar agenciyon.
in kuch jurisdictions an ombudsman charged saath the handlling of concerns parichay neshnal government is adhik formally referred to as the `` sansadeey Commissioner '' ( e.g. the United kingdom Parliamentary kamishnar for Administration, and the Western australian state Ombudsman ).
In many deshon jahaan the ombudsman 's remit extends beyond dealing saath alleged maladministration to promoting or protecting insaan adhikaron, the ombudsman is recognised as the neshnal insaan adhikaron sanstha.
the post of ombudsman tha by the end of the 20th century been instituted by most governments or by kuch intergovernmental sanghathan aise as the europea sangh.
Making a shikaayat to an ombudsman is praayah free of charge.

nai england is a pradesh in the northeastern kone of the sanyukt States consisting of the chah rajya of Maine, New Hampshire, vermant, masachusets, Rhode Island, or connectikat.
New England is bordered by nai York rajya to the southwest, quebec to the northwest, and nai bransavik or the atlantic samandar to the east.
in one of the earliest angrezi settlements in North america, tirthayatriyon isse england pehla settled in nai england in 1620, to rup plymouth Colony.
ten saalo baad, the puritans settled north of plymouth Colony in Boston, yun forming masachusets Bay upnivesh.
over the next 130 saalo, nai england ladaa in chaar french or bhartiya yudhon, jabatak the angrejon parajeet the french or unke deshi allies in North America.
in the late 18th sadi, the nai england Colonies initiated the pratirodh to the angrejon parliament 's praytn to impose nai kar bagaiyr the sahmati of the colonists.
the Boston Tea party thi a virodh to which great Britain responded saath a series of dandatmak kanoon stripping Massachusetts of self-government, which yahood termed the `` asahneeya adhiniyamon `` by the colonists.
The confrontation led to kholen warfare in 1775, the expulsion of the angrejon authorities isse nai England in spring 1776, or the ghoshnaa of swatantraaa in july 1776.
kuch of the first andolanon of amareeki literature, darshanashastra, or shiksha originated in nai england.
the pradesh nibhaai a prominent bhoomika in the movement to abolish gulaami, or thi the pehla pradesh of the United rajya to be roopantarit by the audyogic kranti.
Today, nai england is a pramukh sansar bich of education, unchi praudyogiki, bime, or ayurvigyaan.
boston is its saanskrithik, vittiya, shaikshanik, chikitsa or parivahan center.
prayek rajya is pradhanthya subdivided into choti incorporated municipalities gyaat as nai england kasbon, which are praayah governed by kasbaa baithak.
the tabhi unincorporated territory in nai england exists in the sparse, uttari regions of vermant, New Hampshire, or maine.
chunki 1970, voters have adhik often supported liberal ummidavaar at the rajya or federal str than those of any anya region in the sanyukt rajya.
New England is the tabhi ek of the United States janasankhyikee beuro 's nau kshetreey vibhaajan whose naam does nahin derive isse its bhugol, and it is the tabhi multi-state pradesh saath saaf, consistent boundaries.
it maintains a damdaar sense of saanskrithik identity set alaava isse the rest of the desh, haalanki the sharten of this pahchaan are praayah contested, combining Puritanism saath udaarataavaad, krushik life saath udyog, or isolation saath avrajan.

the Eastern samay Zone ( ET ) encompasses 17 U.S. rajya in the eastern bhaag of the sanlagn sanyukt rajya, bhaag of canada or three countries in South america.
Places that upyog purvi maanak samay ( EST ) jab observing maanak samay ( autumn/winter ) are 5 ghanton peeche Coordinated saarvbhaumik Time ( ).
purvi daylight samay ( edt ), when observing daylight chhayankan time ( spring/summer ) is 4 ghanton behind samanvit saarvbhaumik samay ( ).
in the uttari bhaag of the samay mandal, dauraan the duusari sande in March, at 2:00 a.m. EST, ghadiyaan hai unnat to 3:00 a.m. EDT leaving a one ghanta `` gap. ''
dauraan the pehla sande in navambar, at 2:00 a.m. edt, ghadiyaan hai sthanantarit waapas to 1:00 a.m. est, yun `` duplicating '' ek ghanta.
dakshini bhaag of the mandal ( panama or the caribbean ) do nahin observe daylight chhayankan.
maanak rup of the periodic table.
The rangon represent alag shrenee of elements samajhaayaa neeche.
The aavadhik talika is a table display of the rasinic tatv, vyavasthit on the aadhaar of unke atomic sankhyaayein, electron configurations, or punaravarti rasinic gun.
tatv are prastut in order of increasing parmaanu kramank ( kramank of protons ).
the standard rup of talika comprises an 18 × 7 grid or main deh of tatv, positioned upar a choti double pankti of tatv.
the talika can bhi be deconstructed into four rectangular block : the s-block to the left, the p-block to the sahi, the d-block in the middle, or the f-block neeche ki.
the rows of the table are pukaara avadhi ; the columns of the s-, d-, or p-blocks hai pukaara groups, with some of these having names aise as the halogens or the noble gaison.
chunki, by paribhaasha, a aavadhik table incorporates punaravarti rujhaan, koi aise talika can be prayukt to derive sambandh between the gun of the tatv or predict the properties of nai, yet to be khoja or synthesized, elements.
As a result, a aavadhik table—whether in the maanak rup or kuch other variant—provides a upyogi fremawork liye analyzing rasinic bartaav, or such tables hai widely prayukt in rasayan or anya sciences.
Although precursors exist, dmitri mendeleev is generally credited saath the prakaashan, in 1869, of the pehla widely pahachaanaa aavadhik talika.
he viksit uske talika to illustrate aavadhik rujhaan in the gun of the then-known elements.
mendeleev also purvanumanit kuch gun of then-unknown elements ki hota be apekshit to bharan gap in is table.
Most of uske purvanumaan yahood proved correct jab the elements in question yahood subsequently khoja.
mendeleev 's aavadhik talika has since maharoom vistaarit or refined saath the discovery or sanshleshan of further new tatv or the vikaas of new saidhantik model to explain chemical bartaav.
sab tatv from parmaanu sankhyaayein 1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have maharoom khoja or synthesized.
the elements isse 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to maujuud naturally, haalanki some hai found tabhi in tres amounts or yahood initially khoja by sanshleshan in laboratories.
the tatv after 98 have tabhi maharoom synthesized in laboratories.
Production of tatv pare ununoctium is hone pursued, with the sawaal of kaisaa the aavadhik talika may need to be parivardhit to accommodate koi aise additions hone a padaarth of jari bahes.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring tatv have bhi maharoom utpaadit in laboratories.
minecraft is a sandbox indie game originally created by swedish programmer markus `` paaydaan '' persson or baad viksit or published by mojang.
it was saream released liye the pc on may 17, 2009, as a developmental alpha sanskaran or, baad gradual adhyatan, thi prakashit as a puraa relies version on navambar 18, 2011.
A sanskaran liye android thi released a maah earlier on October 7, or an iOS sanskaran thi released on November 17, 2011.
on may 9, 2012, the khel was released on Xbox 360 as an Xbox sajiv Arcade khel, co-developed by 4j studios.
sab sanskaran of Minecraft praapt aavadhik updates.
the rachanaatmak or bhawan pahaluon of minecraft allow khilaadi to build constructions out of textured ghan in a 3D procedurally utpann sansar.
anya kriyaayein in the khel shaamil khoji, mehafil resources, crafting or combat.
gameplay in iske vanijyik release rai two principal mods : astitv, jisase requires khilaadi to acquire sansaadhan and maintain unke health or bhukh ; or rachanaatmak, jahaan khilaadi have an unlimited supplai of sansaadhan, the kshamta to fly, or no swasthya or bhukh.
A teesraa gameplay mode namit hardcore is the same as astitv, differing only in pareshaani ; it is set to hardest setting or respawning is niskriy, forcing khilaadi to delete their worlds upon maut.
minecraft praapt five puraskaar isse the 2011 Game Developers Conference : it was awarded the Innovation Award, behtareen downloadable khel Award, or the behtareen debyue khel puraskaar isse the khel develper chunaav Awards ; or the darshak Award, as well as the seumas mcnally grand puraskaar, from the swatantra khel Festival in 2011.
In 2012, Minecraft was awarded a sunahari Joystick puraskaar in the shrenee behtareen Downloadable Game.
as of April 8, 2013, the khel rai bechi over 10 lakh nakal on PC and as of January 22, 2013, over 20 million copies across sab plateform.
the andhera Knight is a 2008 British-American superhiro film nirdeshit, produced, and co-written by Christopher nolan.
Based on the dc comics akshar bitman, the film is the second bhaag of nolan 's bitman filmi shrenee or a sequel to 2005 's Batman begins.
isai bale reprises the lead bhoomika of Bruce Wayne/Batman, saath a returning daal of maaikel caine as alfred Pennyworth, geri oldman as james Gordon or morgan friman as lucius fox.
The filmi introduces the character of Harvey dent ( aaron eckhart ), gotham 's newly elected District Attorney and the consort of bruce wain 's balykaal friend rechal dawes ( megi jillenhol ), who joins bitman or the police in combating the nai uthati threat of a dand mastermind calling khud `` the joker `` ( jhaad lager ).
nolan 's inspiration liye the filmi thi the joker 's comic kitaab debut in 1940, the 1988 graphic anokhaa, or the 1996 series, jisase retold Two-Face 's origin.
the upnaam `` the andhera nit '' was pehla applied to bitman in bitman no. 1 ( 1940 ), in a story likhaa by vidheyak ungali.
the andhera nit was filmed primarily in Chicago, as khub as in anek anya sthitiyaan in the sanyukt rajya, the United kingdom, or Hong kong.
Nolan prayukt an IMAX camera to film kuch sequences, including the joker 's pehla rup in the filmi.
on janvari 22, 2008, kuch months baad he had samaapt filming on The Dark nit or six maheene pehle the filmi 's release, jhaad lager died from a toxic combination of nuskhaa davaayen, agrani to intense dhyaan from the dabaayen and movie-going public.
warner Bros. tha initially nirmit a viral vipanan campaign liye the Dark nit, vikasshil promotional websiton or trailers highlighting screen shots of lager as the Joker, but baad lager 's maut, the studio refocused iske promotional campaign.
the andhera Knight thi released on july 16, 2008 in australia, on July 18, 2008 in uttar America, or on july 24, 2008 in the United kingdom.
Considered one of the behtareen films of the 2000s or ek of the behtareen superhero films kabhi made, the filmi received atyadhik dhanatmak samikshaayen or niyat numerous record dauraan iske natya chalaaen.
saath over $ 1 billion in aay vishwavyaapee, it is the 14th-highest-grossing filmi of sab samay, unadjusted for mahangaai.
the filmi praapt eight academy puraskaar nominations ; it jiti the puraskaar liye behtareen Sound sampadan or lager thi maranoparant awarded Best supporting karta.
the Dark nit udai, the final bhaag of the trayee, thi released on July 20, 2012.

The Sydney Opera house is a multi-venue performing arts centre in New dakshin Wales, australia.
it thi conceived and largely built by danish vaastu Jørn utzon, kholane in 1973 after a long gestation ki began saath his competition-winning dizine in 1957.
Joseph kahil 's New dakshin Wales Government gave the go-ahead liye kaary to begin in 1958.
the sarkari 's bindaas decision to chune utzon 's dizine is often nishprabh by the scandal that followed.
It is on Bennelong point in Sydney harbour, band to the sidney harbour sethu.
it sits at the northeastern tip of the Sydney central kaarobaar zila ( the CBD ), ghiri on teen sides by the harbour ( sidney cove and Farm cove ) or antardeshiy by the royal Botanic Gardens.
Contrary to iske naam, it gharon multiple pradarshan venues.
it is among the vyastatam performing kala centres in the sansar, hosting over 1,500 performances prayek saal attended by kuch 1.2 lakh logon.
it provides a venue for anek performing-arts companiyaan, sahit the four kunjee resident companies opera Australia, the australian baile, the Sydney theatre company or the sidney singhni Orchestra, or presents a chaudee dayera of productions on its apana khaataa.
It is also ek of the sabase lokapriy visitor aakarshan in australia, with more than saat lakh logon visiting prayek year, 300,000 of whom lo a guided daure.
it is administered by the sidney opera House vishwaas, antargat the New dakshin wales mantralay of the kala.
on 28 june 2007, it thi made a UNESCO sansar viraasat sait.
It is one of the 20th sadi 's sabase distinctive imaaraten or ek of the sabase famous performing kala kendron in the sansar.
A graph of deh dravyaman anukramanika as a function of deh mass or deh height is shown upar.
the dashed linon represent subdivisions within a pramukh class.
For udhaaharan the `` underweight '' vargeekaran is further vibhajit into `` kathor '', `` moderet '', or `` mild '' subclasses.
the body mass index ( BMI ), or quetelet index, is a maap liye insaan deh shape aadhaarit on an vyaktigat 's weight and oonchaai.
it thi devised between 1830 and 1850 by the belgian bahushrut Adolphe Quetelet during the course of vikasshil `` social physics ''.
Body dravyaman anukramanika is paribhaashit as the individual 's deh mass vibhajit by the square of their oonchaai.
The formulae universally prayukt in ayurvigyaan produce a unit of maap of kg/m2.
biemai can also be determined using a biemai chart, jisase displays biemai as a falan of vazan ( aadaa axis ) and oonchaai ( lambavat axis ) using ruparekha linon for different maan of biemai or colors liye alag biemai categories.
† the factor liye uk/us units is adhik precisely 703.06957964, but ki str of parishuddhta is nahin sarthak liye is gananaa.
To kaary isse stone or pound pehla guna the stone by 14 tab add the pounds to de the puure dravyaman in pound ; to kaary from feet or inch first guna the feet by 12 tab add the inch to de the puure oonchaai in inch.
thomas paine ( January 29, 1737 ( ns February 9, 1737 ) – June 8, 1809 ) thi an english-american rajnatik activist, lekhak, rajnatik theorist or krantikari.
as the author of two atyadhik influential pamphlets at the prarambh of the American kranti, he prerit the deshpremi in 1776 to declare swatantraaa isse Britain.
uske vichaar reflected atmagyaan era bayaanbaji of transnational insaan adhikaron.
he rai maharoom pukaara `` a corsetmaker by vyapaar, a patrkaar by profession, and a propagandist by inclination. ''
born in thetford, england, in the county of norfok, paine emigrated to the angrejon American colonies in 1774 saath the sahaayta of Benjamin franklin or he arrived in samay to participate in the amareeki Revolution.
uske principal yogadan yahood the shaktishaalee, widely read pamphlet aam Sense ( 1776 ), the all-time best-selling American kitaab ki advocated aupniveshik america 's swatantraaa isse the Kingdom of great britain, or the amareeki Crisis ( 1776–83 ), a pro-revolutionary pamphlet shrenee.
aam bhav thi so influential ki jon adams kaha, `` bagaiyr the pen of the lekhak of aam bhav, the talwaar of washington hota have maharoom uthaaya in vain.”
Paine jiya in frans liye sabase of the 1790s, becoming deeply involved in the French kranti.
he likhaa the adhikaron of man ( 1791 ), in bhaag a raksha of the French kranti viruddh iske critics.
His hamale on angrejon writer edmund burke led to a trial and conviction in absentia in 1792 liye the aparaadhon of seditious libel.
in 1792, despite not hone samarth to speak french, he thi elected to the French National Convention.
the girondists regarded use as an ally.
natijatan, the Montagnards, visheshkar Robespierre, regarded him as an dushman.
in disambar 1793, he thi arrested and imprisoned in paris, tab released in 1794.
he became badnaam kuki of the aayu of kaaran ( 1793–94 ), uske kitaab ki adhivaktaaon devvaad, promotes kaaran and freethinking, or argues viruddh institutionalized dharm in saamaanya or Christian doctrine in particular.
He also likhaa the pamphlet krushik insaaf ( 1795 ), discussing the origins of property, or introduced the avadharana of a guaranteed minimum aay.
In 1802, he returned to america jahaan he died on June 8, 1809.
tabhi six people attended his antyeshti as he tha maharoom ostracized liye uske ridicule of christianity.
Clinical trial hai set of pareekshan in medical shodh or drug vikaas ki generate suraksha or efficacy aankada ( or more specifically, soochna parichay pratikul drug pratikriyaayein and pratikul prabhaav of anya upachaar ) liye swasthya interventions ( e.g., davaayen, naidanik, devices, therapy protocols ).
ve hai conducted only baad satisfactory soochna rai maharoom gathered on the quality of the non naidanik safety, or swasthya authority/ethics cameti sweekruti is granted in the country where sweekruti of the drug or yantra is sought.
previously, many emerging countries kiya not aavashyaktaa local trial for utpaada approvals.
abhi, haalanki ubharate deshon still accept aankada isse u.s./europe, ve also aavashyaktaa kuch local trials.
depending on the prakaar of utpaada or the stage of iske vikaas, jaanchakartaaon initially enroll volunteers and/or marijon into small payalat adhyayan, or subsequently conduct larger scale adhyayan in patients ki often compare the new product saath anya already sweekrut liye the affliction of interest.
As positive suraksha and efficacy aankada hai gathered, the kramank of patients is typically increased.
naidanik trials can vary in size, or can involve a single research antity in ek desh or anek such entities in multiple countries.
a full series of trial may incur sizable laagat, or the boj of paying liye all the necessary logon and services is praayah borne by the praayojak, jisase may be a sarkari sanghathan or a pharmaceutical, biotechnology or chikitsa device company.
When the vividhta of required support bhoomikaaye exceeds the sansaadhan of the praayojak, a naidanik trial is prabandhit by an outsourced sangi, such as a anubandh shodh sanghathan or a clinical trial unit in the academik sector.
The green Bay Packers hai an amareeki footbaal team aadhaarit in Green Bay, visconsin.
They hai members of the uttar prabhag of the National Football sammelan ( nfc ) in the neshnal footbaal lig ( enegel ).
green Bay is the third-oldest matadhikaar in the NFL, having maharoom vyavasthit or playing in 1919.
The pakars are the tabhi non-profit, community-owned pramukh lig peshewar sports toli in the sanyukt rajya.
the pakars hai the last vestige of `` small town tiimon '' that were once common in the enegel dauraan the 1920s and 1930s.
santhaapit in 1919 by arl `` ghunghraale '' lambeau ( hence the naam Lambeau field on jisase the team plays ) or george Whitney calhoun, the green Bay pakars can tres unke lineage to anya semi-professional tiimon in green Bay dating back to 1896.
in 1919 and 1920 the pakars competed as a semi-professional footbaal toli viruddh club isse around visconsin or the midwest.
They joined the amareeki peshewar footbaal sangh ( apfa ) in 1921, the forerunner to what is known aaj as the neshnal Football lig ( enegel ).
haalanki green Bay is the pichhlaa enegel `` choti kasbaa '' toli, iske local fan aadhaar or media extends into aasapaas milvowki ; the toli also nibhaai selected ghar khel vahin between 1933 and 1994.
the green Bay pakars have jiti 13 lig championships ( adhik than any anya toli in the enegel ), sahit nau NFL championships prior to the super katori era or chaar super katori victories —in 1967 ( super katori i ), 1968 ( super katori ii ), 1997 ( Super katori xxxi ) or 2011 ( super katori XLV ).
the pakars have long-standing, kadava rivalries saath unke nfc uttar ( formerly the nfc central ) pratidwandviyon, the chicago bears, minesota vikings or the detroit sher.
the bears-packers funsane is ek of the oldest rivalries in enegel itihaas, dating back to 1921.
ithenul fuel is ithenul ( ethyl daaru ), the vahi prakaar of daaru mila in alcoholic peya.
it is sabase praayah prayukt as a motor eendhan, mukhyatah as a biofuel yogtmak for gasoline.
World ithenul utpaadan liye transport fuel tripled between 2000 and 2007 from 17 billion to adhik than 52 arab liters.
isse 2007 to 2008, the share of ithenul in vaishvik gasoline type eendhan upyog increased isse 3.7 % to 5.4 %.
In 2011 vishwavyaapee ithenul eendhan production pahunche 22.36 arab u.S. drav galen ( bg ) ( 84.6 arab liters ), saath the sanyukt rajya as the sheersh nirmaataa saath 13.9 bg ( 52.6 billion liters ), hisaab for 62.2 % of vaishvik utpaadan, followed by brazil saath 5.6 bg ( 21.1 arab liters ).
ithenul fuel rai a `` gasoline galen equivalency `` ( GGE ) maan of, jisase arthath 1.5 galen of ithenul upaj the energy of ek galen of gasoline.
Ethanol eendhan is widely prayukt in Brazil and in the sanyukt rajya, and saath dono deshon yahood responsible for 87.1 % of the world 's ithenul eendhan utpaadan in 2011.
sabase gaadiyaan on the sadak aaj in the U.S. can chalaaen on blends of up to 10 % ethanol, and ethanol represented 10 % of the U.S. gasoline eendhan supplai niklaa isse gharelu strot in 2011.
Since 1976 the brazilian government rai made it anivaary to mishran ithenul saath gasoline, or since 2007 the vidhik blend is around 25 % ithenul or 75 % gasoline ( e25 ).
By disambar 2011 Brazil had a bede of 14.8 lakh flex-fuel automobile and light trek and 1.5 million flex-fuel motorcycle ki regularly upyog neat ithenul eendhan ( gyaat as e100 ).
bioethanol is a rup of bedardi urja that can be utpaadit isse agricultural feedstocks.
it can be bana isse bahut common fasalon aise as sugar cane, aalu, manioc or makai.
There has maharoom considerable debate parichay kaisaa upyogi bioethanol hoga be in replacing gasoline.
chintaaen about iske utpaadan and upyog sunaanaa to increased food keemten due to the vishaal raashi of arable jameen jaruri liye crops, as khub as the urja or pradooshan santulan of the whole saikil of ithenul utpaadan, especially from makai.
Recent developments saath cellulosic ithenul utpaadan or vyavsyeekaran may allay kuch of these chintaaen.
cellulosic ethanol offers vaada kuki cellulose machhlee, a major or saarvbhaumik ghatak in sanyantr koshikaayen deevaaren, can be prayukt to produce ithenul.
according to the International Energy Agency, cellulosic ethanol could allow ithenul fuels to khel a much bade bhoomika in the bhavishya than previously vichaar.
