a plake commemorating the sthaan of the Sarajevo hatya or kadam of gavrilo princip ( chitra taken in 1987, pehle steps yahood removed in 1992 or plake badla isse cyrillic to latin script )
a plake commemorating the sthaan of the sarajevo hatya ( chitra liya in 2009 )
on 28 june 1914, archduke Franz ferdinand of austria, vaaris presumptive to the austro-hungarian singhaasana, or his bivi, Sophie, Duchess of hohenberg, yahood shot murde in Sarajevo, by gavrilo princip, ek of a group of six Bosnian serb hatyare coordinated by danniel ilić.
the rajnatik uddeshy of the hatya thi to break band austria-hungary 's south-slav provinces so they could be sanyukt into a vrihad srbija or a yugoslavia.
The assassins ' motives yahood satat saath the movement ki later became known as Young bosnia.
srbian military officers stood peeche the akraman.
at the top of ye srbian sainya shadyantrkariyon thi Chief of srbian sainya Intelligence dragutin dimitrijević, uske righthand man pramukh vojislav tankosić, and Masterspy rade malobabić.
pramukh tankosić armed the hatyare saath bombs or pistols or prashikshit unhen.
the hatyare were die abhigam to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses or agenton ki rade malobabić prayukt for the ghuspaith of hathiyaar and operatives into austria-hungary.
the hatyare, the kunjee sadasyon of the clandestine tunnel, or the key Serbian sainya conspirators who were still jinda yahood giraftaar, aajamaaya, convicted and punished.
Those jo yahood giraftaar in Bosnia yahood tried in Sarajevo in aktubar 1914.
the anya shadyantrkariyon yahood giraftaar or aajamaaya pehle a srbian kangaroo adaalat on the french-controlled Salonika saamne in 1916–1917 on unrelated galat aarope ; Serbia chalaaya three of the sheersh sainya shadyantrkariyon.
much of what is gyaat parichay the assassinations comes isse these do trial or sambandhit record.
Assignment of jimmedaari liye the bombing and hatyaein of 28 June is atyadhik vivaadaaspad kuki the attack led to the outbreak of sansar yuddh i ek maah baad.
renée katholin zellweger ( born april 25, 1969 ) is an amareeki abhinetri or producer.
Zellweger first gained faili attention liye her bhoomika in the filmi jeri magwair ( 1996 ), or subsequently praapt do nominations liye the Academy puraskaar liye behtareen abhinetri liye uske roles as brijet jones in the kamedi brijet jones 's diary ( 2001 ), or as roxie heart in the musical Chicago ( 2002 ).
wo jiti the Academy puraskaar liye behtareen supporting Actress for uske pradarshan in the naatak Cold pahaad ( 2003 ).
wo has jiti an Academy Award, three sunahari Globe puraskaar, teen Screen abhinaytaon gild puraskaar, or a bafta puraskaar ; thi namit hasty kheer 's Woman of the Year in 2009 ; and sthapit herself as ek of the highest-paid Hollywood actresses as of 2007.
the ossicles ( bhi called auditory ossicles ) hai the teen smallest haddiyon in the insaan deh, the malleus, the incus or the stapes.
ve hai contained within the madhya kaan spes and serve to transmit dhwani isse the air to the fluid-filled vyamoh ( cochlea ).
the anupasthiti of the auditory ossicles would constitute a moderate-to-severe hearing ghaataa.
the pad `` ossicles '' vastutah arthath `` tiny haddiyon '' or commonly refers to the auditory ossicles, haalanki the term may refer to koi choti asthi throughout the deh.
the nai vachan ( yahudee • • — unani • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical interpretation originally derived from a phrase in the kitaab of yirmayaah, in the yahudee shastron.
It is often thought of as an eschatological muktidaata Age or sansar to aaiye or is sambandhit to the biblical avadharana of the Kingdom of parameshwar.
Generally, Christians believe ki the New vachan thi instituted at the Last Supper as part of the Eucharist, which in the Gospel of jon includes the nai commandment.
vahin hai anek isai eschatologies ki further define the New vachan, as an example an udghaatan eschatology defines or describes the nai Covenant as an ongoing relationship between Christian eemanvaalon or parameshwar ki will be in puraa faleebhoot baad the Second coming of messiah ; ki is, it hoga not tabhi be in puraa fruition in believing dil, but in the bhavishya external world as khub.
The conection between the rakt of messiah and the nai vachan is seen in sabase aadhunik angrezi anuwaad of the New Testament saath the saying : `` is cup that is poured out liye tum is the new vachan in my rakt ''.
Christians maananaa that yishu is the mediator of the nai vachan, or ki the rakt of messiah shed at uske crucifixion is the jaruri blood of the covenant.
As with sab covenants between parameshwar and man varnit in the bible, the nai vachan is mana `` a bond in rakt sovereignly administered by parameshwar. ''
it has maharoom theorized that the nai Covenant is the vidhi of messiah as spoken during uske Sermon on the mount.
the following suchi of logon pardoned or granted dayaa by the adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya dastauez the sabase prominent cases of each presidency.
as granted by the samvidhan ( aalekh II, khand 2, clause 1 ), raashtrapatiyon have the shakti to grant clemency in ek or adhik of the following ways : the ability to grant a puraa pardon, to bhraman a sentence, or to todna a thik.
u.S. raashtrapatiyon have no shakti to grant clemency liye aparaadhon prosecuted antargat state vidhi.
as to the difference between a pardon or a commutation:
A pardon is an executive order vacating a conviction.
a commutation is the shaman of the vaakya of kisi philhal sevarat a vaakya liye a aparaadhon pursuant to a conviction, bagaiyr vacating the conviction itself.
Approximately 20,000 pardons or clemencies yahood jari by u.S. raashtrapatiyon in the 20th century alon.
The records of acts of dayaa yahood public jabatak 1934.
in 1981 the Office of the Pardon attorney thi nirmit and record isse adhyaksh H. W. Bush aage hai abhi soochibaddh.
is suchi includes pardons and commutations.
tampa ( ) is a nagar in the u.S. rajya of Florida.
it serves as the county seat liye hillsborough county or is located on the west coast of Florida, on tampa khadi near the gulf of Mexico.
the janasankhyikee of tampa in 2011 was 346,037.
the vartmaan sthaan of Tampa thi ekbar inhabited by swadeshi peoples of the Safety harbar culture, sabase notably the tocobaga or the pohoy, jo jiya saath the shores of tampa khadi.
it thi briefly explored by spani explorers in the jaldi 16th sadi, lakin there yahood no sthai American or European settlements bheetar aaj 's nagar had jabatak baad the sanyukt rajya tha acquired florida isse spain in 1819.
In 1824, the sanyukt rajya Army sthapit a frontier chaowkee called Fort bruke at the munh of the hillsborough River, nikat the sait of aaj 's tampa sammelan bich.
The pehla civilian residents yahood pioneers who settled near the fort liye suraksha isse the aasapaas seminole janasankhyikee.
The kasbaa grew slowly jabatak the 1880s, jab railroad links, the discovery of phosphate, and the arrival of the cigar udyog jump-started tampa 's vikaas or helped it to grow into an mahatvapurn nagar by the jaldi 1900s.
aaj, tampa is a bhaag of the metropolitan kshetrafal sabase commonly referred to as the tampa khadi kshetrafal.
liye u.S. janasankhyikee uddeshy, tampa is bhaag of the tampa-st. petersburg-clearwater, florida Metropolitan sankhyikeey kshetrafal.
the four-county area is rachit of roughly 2.7 lakh nivaasiyon, bananaa it the duusari largest metropolitan statistical kshetrafal ( emesa ) in the rajya, or the chauthi largest in the Southeastern sanyukt rajya, peeche miami, washington, d.C., and Atlanta.
the vrihad tampa khadi kshetrafal rai bas over 4 lakh nivaasiyon or generally shaamil the Tampa and Sarasota metro kshetron.
The tampa khadi saajhedaari and u.S. Census data dikhaaya an average salanaa vikaas of 2.47 pratishat, or a laabh of lagbhag 97,000 nivaasiyon per year.
between 2000 or 2006, the vrihad Tampa khadi market anbhavi a sanyukt vikaas rate of 14.8 pratishat, growing isse 3.4 lakh to 3.9 lakh or hitting the 4 million logon chihnit on April 1, 2007.
a 2012 anumaan shows the Tampa khadi area population to have 4,310,524 logon and a 2017 prakshep of 4,536,854 logon.
tampa rai a number of khel tiimon, such as the tampa Bay buccaneers of the neshnal footbaal League, the tampa khadi bijli of the neshnal Hockey lig, or the tampa khadi toofaan of the arina Football League.
the tampa khadi Rays in Major lig Baseball or the tampa khadi Rowdies of the uttar American Soccer League khel unke ghar khel in neighboring st. Petersburg, florida.
in 2008, tampa was ranked as the 5th behtareen outdoor nagar by forbs.
a 2004 survey by the nyu newspaper Washington vargakar news kramit tampa as a sheersh city liye `` twenty-somethings. ''
Tampa is abhi kramit as a `` gamma '' world nagar by Loughborough vishvavidhyalayon.
according to Loughborough, Tampa baandhane alongside anya sansar shaharon such as phinics, sento domingo, or osaka.
in recent years tampa has dekhi a notable upsurge in high-market maang from upabhokta, signaling adhik maal concentrated in the area.
tampa hosted the 2012 Republican National Convention.
The Chevrolet cavalier was a compact automobile utpaadit from 1982 to 2005 by saamaanya motors.
nirmit on the company 's j platform, the cavalier utpaadit the ucchtam bikri in 1984.
at & T gatishiltaa LLC branded and referred to as at & t ( formerly cingular betaar LLC ), is a wholly swaamitv subsidiary of AT & T inc. that provides wireless sevaayen to 107 lakh sadsy in the sanyukt rajya, sahit purto rico and the u.S. Virgin islands.
at & t gatishiltaa is the second largest wireless doorsanchaar provider in the sanyukt States or purto rico, peeche verizon Wireless, which serves 115.78 million customers as of the chauthi quarter of 2012.
at & t gatishiltaa is headquartered in the lenox park area of dekalb co. georgia, bas outside Atlanta.
Originally cingular betaar llc isse 2000 to 2007, a sanyukt venture between sbc sanchaar and bellsouth, the company acquired the boodha at & T Wireless in 2004 ; sbc later acquired the asli at & t and re-branded as `` at & t ''.
Cingular became wholly swaamitv by at & T in December 2006 as a result of at & t 's adhigrahan of bellsouth.
in janvari 2007, Cingular pushti it hota re-brand itself antargat the at & t naam.
Although the vidhik corporate naam badalen occurred tatkaal, for dono regulatory or brand-awareness kaaran both brands yahood used in the company 's sinej or advertising during a parivartan period.
The parivartan concluded in let june, just prior to the rollout of the tehraana iphone.
on kooch 20, 2011, at & t gatishiltaa ghoshit iske iraade to acquire t-mobile uese isse doyche telekom liye $ 39 arab.
if it tha praapt sarkari or regulatory sweekruti, at & t hota have had adhik than 130 million sadsy.
however, the u.S. vibhaag of insaaf, the sangheey sanchaar ayog, or AT & t gatishiltaa 's pratispardhi ( aise as Sprint nextel ) opposed the move on the grounds ki it would reduce pratiyogita in the cellular communications market.
in disambar 2011, in the phase of dono governmental or faili upabhokta vipaksh, at & t withdrew unke prastaav to puraa the merger.
martin luther King, jr. ( janvari 15, 1929 – April 4, 1968 ) was an American clergyman, activist, or netaa in the african-american Civil adhikaron gati.
he is best gyaat liye his role in the advancement of civil adhikaron using nonviolent civil disobedience.
king rai become a national pratik in the history of American pragativaad.
A baptist mantri, King became a civil adhikaron activist early in his kariyar.
he led the 1955 Montgomery Bus bahishkaar or helped mila the dakshini isai Leadership Conference ( sclc ) in 1957, sevarat as iske pehla adhyaksh.
saath the sclc, king led an unsuccessful sangharsh against pruthakkaran in Albany, georgia, in 1962, or organized nonviolent virodh in Birmingham, albama, ki aakarshith neshnal dhyaan following television news kawarej of the krur police jawaab.
king also helped to organize the 1963 kooch on washington, jahaan he delivered uske `` i have a sapana `` vaak.
There, he sthapit uske reputation as ek of the mahanatam orators in amareeki itihaas.
he bhi sthapit his reputation as a kattarpanthi, or became an object of the sangheey beuro of Investigation 's cointelpro for the baaki of his jivan.
epabiai agenton investigated use for sambhavit communist ties, ankit uske extramarital liaisons and reported on unhen to sarkari officials, or on one avasar, mailed king a threatening anonymous letter that he interpreted as an attempt to make him commit aatmahatya.
on aktubar 14, 1964, king praapt the Nobel Peace Prize for combating jatigat asamanta through nonviolence.
In 1965, he and the SCLC helped to organize the Selma to montgomari marches or the following saal, he took the gati uttar to chicago.
in the final saalo of uske life, king vistaarit uske fokas to shaamil garibi or the Vietnam yuddh, alienating anek of uske udaar allies saath a 1967 speech titled `` Beyond Vietnam ''.
king thi niyojan a neshnal occupation of washington, d.C., called the Poor logon 's Campaign.
king thi assassinated on April 4, 1968, in memphis, tennesi.
uske death was followed by dange in anek u.S. shaharon.
doshaaropan that james arl re, the man convicted of hatya king, tha maharoom framed or acted in concert saath sarkari agenton persisted for dashakon baad the shooting, or the jury of a 1999 civil trial mila Loyd jowers to be complicit in a shadyantr against King.
King was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom or the congressional sunaharaa Medal maranoparant.
Martin luther king, jr. din thi sthapit as a u.S. sangheey holiday in 1986.
Hundreds of streets in the u.S. have maharoom renamed in uske sammaan.
A memorial statue on the National mal thi opened to the public in 2011.
The baagh ( penthera tigris ) is the largest billi prajati, reaching a kul deh length of up to and weighing up to.
it is the third largest jameen carnivore ( peeche tabhi the dhruviya bear and the brown bhaaluu ).
Its most recognizable visheshta is a pattern of andhera lambavat dhaariyaan on reddish-orange fer saath a lighter underside.
it rai exceptional stout teeth, or the canines hai the longest among jeena felids saath a crown oonchaai of as much as or bhi.
In zoos, tigers have jiya liye 20 to 26 saalo, jisase bhi seems to be unke aayu in the junglee.
They hai territorial or generally ekaant lakin soshal pashu, often requiring vishaal sanlagn kshetron of awaas ki support unke shikaar aavashyaktaayen.
This, coupled saath the fact that they hai swadeshi to kuch of the adhik densely populated sthaan on dharti, rai caused significant virodh saath insaano.
tigers once ranged widely across asia, from turkon in the west to the purvi coast of rus.
over the past 100 saalo, ve have khoyaa 93 % of unke historic dayera, and have maharoom extirpated from dakshinpaschim or central asia, isse the islands of Java or bali, or isse large kshetron of southeast and purvi asia.
aaj, ve dayera from the siberian taiga to kholen grasslands and tropical mangrove swamps.
The baaki six tiger subspecies have been vargeekrut as endangered by aiusien.
the vaishvik janasankhyikee in the junglee is anumaanit to kramank between 3,062 or 3,948 individuals, down isse around 100,000 at the prarambh of the 20th century, with most remaining populations occurring in choti pockets pruthak isse prayek anya.
pramukh kaaran liye population decline shaamil awaas vinaash, awaas fragmentation or poaching.
the extent of area occupied by tigers is estimated at less than, a 41 % decline from the kshetrafal estimated in the mid-1990s.
tigers are among the sabase recognisable or lokapriy of the world 's charismatic mahapraani.
They have featured prominently in pracheen mythology and loakgeet, or continue to be chitrit in aadhunik films or sahitya.
tigers appear on anek flags, coats of bahen, or as mascots liye sporting tiimon.
the bengal baagh is the neshnal animal of both india or Bangladesh.
The sarlikrut aatanrik dhaancha of a haritalvak
avlokan of the calvin saikil and carbon fixation
the light-independent pratikriyaayein of photosynthesis hai rasinic reactions ki badalen carbon dioxide or other compounds into glucose.
ye pratikriyaayein occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled kshetrafal of a chloroplast baahar of the thylakoid jhilliyon.
These reactions lo the light-dependent pratikriyaayein and perform further rasinic prakriyaaon on unhen.
There hai three phases to the light-independent pratikriyaayein, collectively pukaara the calvin saikil : carbon fixation, reduction pratikriyaayein, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( rubp ) regeneration.
despite iske name, is process occurs tabhi when lite is uplabdhiyaan.
Plants do nahin carry out the calvin saikil by night.
They, bajaay, release sucrose into the floem isse unke mand reserves.
This prakram happens jab lite is uplabdhiyaan swatantra of the kind of photosynthesis ( c3 carbon fixation, c4 carbon fixation, or crassulacean acid chayapachay ) ; cam plants store malic acid in unke vacuoles prayek raatri or relies it by din in order to mek is process kaary.
a linen handkerchief saath khinchaa thread kadhai around the edges
linen cloth baraamad from qumran gupha 1 nikat the Dead samudr.
linen ( ) is a textile bana isse the machhlee of the flax sanyantr, linum usitatissimum.
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture, but jab it is made into garments, it is valued liye iske exceptional sheetaltaa or taazgi in hot weather.
the shabd `` linen '' is of west germanic utpatti or cognates saath the latin naam liye the flax sanyantr linum, or the pehle unani λινόν ( linon ).
is shabd itihaas rai given vruddhi to a number of other terms in English, the sabase notable of jisase is the angrezi shabd line, niklaa isse the upyog of a linen ( flax ) ladi to determine a sidhaa lakeer.
vastra in a linen bunate texture, even when made of kapaas, ganja and anya non-flax machhlee hai bhi loosely referred to as `` linen ''.
aise fabrics generally have unke apana specific names anya than linen ; for example, thik cotton dhaage in a linen-style bunate is pukaara madapolam.
The collective pad `` linens `` is still often prayukt generically to describe a class of woven or bhi knitted bed, nahaana, talika and rasoighar vastra.
The name linens is retained kuki traditionally, linen was prayukt liye many of these items.
in the past, the shabd `` linens '' thi also prayukt to ausat lightweight undergarments such as shirts, chemises, waistshirts, lingerie ( a shabd also cognate saath linen ), or detachable shirt chhallon and cuffs, jisase yahood historically made lagbhag exclusively out of linen.
the inside cloth parat of thik composite clothing garments ( as for udhaaharan jackets ) was traditionally bana of linen, and is is the utpatti of the shabd astr.
linen vastra appear to be kuch of the oldest in the sansar : their history goes waapas anek hazaron of saalo.
Fragments of straw, seeds, fibers, yarns, or vibhinn prakaar of fabrics jisase tithi waapas to about 8000 bc have maharoom found in Swiss jhil dwellings.
dyed flax machhlee found in a pragaitihaasik gupha in Georgia suggest the upyog of woven linen fabrics from junglee flax may tithi waapas bhi earlier to 36,000 bp.
linen thi sometimes used as karency in pracheen mishra.
mishra mummies were wrapped in linen kuki it thi seen as a symbol of lite or pavitrataa, or as a pradarshak of maal.
kuch of ye fabrics, woven from haath spun yarns, yahood very fine liye unke din, lakin hai coarse compared to modern linen.
aaj, linen is usually an mahangi vastra, or is utpaadit in apekshaakrit small quantities.
it has a long `` stepal '' ( individual resha lambaai ) saapeksh to kapaas and anya prakritik fibers.
Many utpaada are bana of linen : aprons, bag, towels ( swimmers, nahaana, bich, deh or wash tauliye ), napkins, bed linens, linen chauke, dhaavak, chair covers, or main 's & mahilaon 's pahanen.
The fifa sansar Cup, praayah simply the World cap, is an antarrashtriya association football pratiyogita lade by the varisht main 's neshnal tiimon of the members of Fédération internationale de footbaal sangh ( FIFA ), the khel 's global shaasi body.
the championships rai been awarded prayek chaar saalo chunki the inaugural tournament in 1930, except in 1942 or 1946 jab it was nahin held because of the duusari sansar yuddh.
the vartmaan champions are Spain, jo won the 2010 tournament.
The vartmaan swaroop of the tournament involves 32 tiimon spardhaa for the title at venues bheetar the host swadesh ( s ) over a period of parichay a maah ; this phase is praayah pukaara the World cap final.
a qualification phase, jisase philhal takes place over the preceding three saalo, is used to determine which teams qualify liye the toornament saath saath the mejabaan nation ( s ).
the 19 sansar cap tournaments have been jiti by aath alag national tiimon.
Brazil have jiti paanch times, and they hai the tabhi team to have nibhaai in every toornament.
the other sansar cap vijeta hai italy, saath chaar sheershak ; germany, with three sheershak ; Argentina and inaugural vijeta urugve, saath do sheershak prayek ; or england, frans, or spain, saath ek sheershak each.
The World cap is the sansar 's sabase widely viewed sporting event ; an anumaanit 715.1 million logon dekhi the final match of the 2006 fifa sansar cap yojit in germany.
the next teen sansar Cups hoga be hosted by brazil in 2014, rus in 2018, or Qatar in 2022.
the is an expansion yantra for the Wii remote video game niyantrak for the ve ki allows it to adhik accurately capture jatil motion.
According to Nintendo, the sensor in the yantra supplements the accelerometer or sensor baar samarthy of the ve Remote to enable kriyaayein to be rendered identically on the screen in real samay.
the ve 's successor consol, the Wii u, supports the Wii motionplus or iske peripherals in khel jahaan upyog of iske touchscreen-built-in primary niyantrak is not jaruri.
Majulah singapura ( onward singapore ) is the neshnal gaan of singapore.
rachit by Zubir kaha in 1958 as a theme song for aadhikarik functions of the nagar parishad of singapore, the song thi chaynit in 1959 as the dweep 's gaan jab it attained self-government.
upon full independence in 1965, Majulah Singapura was formally apanaaya as singapore 's neshnal gaan.
By law the gaan may tabhi be sung saath iske original malay geet, although vahin maujuud authorized anuwaad of the geet of the gaan in singapore 's three other official languages : angrezi, mandarin and tamil.
originally rachit in the kunjee of g major, in 2001 the neshnal gaan thi officially relaunched in the nimnatar kunjee of f pramukh as is was kaha to allow for a `` grander or adhik preranadai vyavastha ''.
The neshnal gaan is regularly performed or sung in skulon or armed forces shiviron at ceremonies yojit at the shuruuaat and/or the end of prayek din, during jisase the neshnal flag is bhi uthaaya or lowered and the neshnal pratigya is liya.
Singaporeans hai especially protsaahit to gaao the neshnal anthem on avasaron of national celebration or neshnal significance such as at the neshnal Day parade, at neshnal Day observance ceremonies conducted by shaikshanik institutions or government vibhaag, and at sporting events at jisase singapore tiimon hai participating.
an expedition 's shipwrights building a brigantine, 1541.
shipbuilding is the nirmaan of ships or floating baratan.
it normally takes place in a specialized suvidha gyaat as a shipyard.
shipbuilders, bhi pukaara shipwrights, follow a specialized occupation ki traces iske jaden to pehle ankit itihaas.
shipbuilding or jalayaan marammat, dono vanijyik and sainya, hai referred to as `` naval abhiyantriki ''.
the nirmaan of naukaaye is a samaan activity pukaara naav bhawan.
The dismantling of ships is pukaara jalayaan todakar.

The following is a list of the sabase populous incorporated sthaan of the sanyukt States of america.
as defined by the sanyukt rajya janasankhyikee beuro, an `` incorporated place `` shaamil a kismein of designations, sahit city, town, gaanv, borough, and municipality.
a few asaadhaaran Census Designated sthaan ( cdps ) are bhi included in the janasankhyikee beuro 's listing of incorporated sthaan.
sanchit city-counties represent a distinct type of sarkari ki shaamil the sampurna population of a county, or county equivalent.
kuch sanchit city-counties, however, include anek incorporated sthaan.
This suchi presents tabhi that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of aise consolidated city-counties ki hai not a bhaag of another incorporated place.
note ki this list refers only to the janasankhyikee of vyaktigat municipalities within unke defined had, which karata nahin shaamil anya municipalities or unincorporated suburban kshetron bheetar shahari agglomerations.
a alag ranking is evident jab considering u.S. mahanagar kshetrafal populations.

Nintendo ds bhandar divaais are divaais prayukt to store a licensed developer 's work-in-progress images, homebrew video games and downlod commercial khel ( chunki the nintendo ds is nahin bechi saath a rewritable bhandar medium ).
licensed developers, however, can upyog a blue Intelligent pranaaliyon Nitro emulator baksaa to flash taash.
ye devices hai also gyaat as `` flashcarts '' or `` flashcards ''.
There hai do pramukh varg of flashcarts : older divaais which anuroop in slot-2 ( the Game ladke agrim Game paak slot ) and newer divaais that anuroop in Slot-1 ( the DS Game card slot ).
slot-2 ( or first-generation ) devices have maharoom historically sasta due to economies of scale ( inherited isse their upyog saath khel Boy agrim ), but aavashyaktaa a booting aujaar in Slot-1 in order to upyog the tach screen or anya ds suvidhaayen.
second-generation divaais ( those jisase tabhi upyog Slot-1 ) do nahin work with gba homebrew, but became kam mahangi and easier to upyog, rivaling anek slot-2 divaais in price.
first-generation divaais shaamil gba flash cartridges, gbamp cf, supercard, or m3.
second-generation divaais include R4 Revolution, cyclods, g6 Real or ds-x.
the bhandar yantra either contains flash memory or a slot liye a memory card to store homebrew.
bhandar divaais saath a memory-card slot praayah have adhik bhandar kshamta than flash-memory divaais.
Although flash-memory kshamta is praayah measured in megabits ( mb ), memory-card kshamta is usually measured in megabite ( mb ) ( where 8 mb is 1 MB ).
Storage-device brands differ in unke support for homebrew ; ds or Game Boy agrim ROMs ; khaas suvidhaayen ( aise as kshamta to khel media files ) ; shaareerik size and laagat.
sakhti bolnaa, a bhandar yantra is not jaruri liye DS saath flashme installed kuki homebrew can be bheja to the DS using wmb.
However, is is nahin an easily-portable vidhi kuki the DS needs to be bheetar range of a suitable Wi-Fi card.
hai amareeki logon of japani viraasat.
Japanese america have historically been among the teen largest Asian amareeki communities, lakin in haal dashakon, it has become the chathe largest group at roughly 1,304,286, sahit those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity.
in the 2010 janasankhyikee, the largest japani amareeki communities yahood mila in california saath 272,528, hawaii saath 185,502, nai york with 37,780, washington with 35,008, or Illinois saath 17,542.
Southern california rai the largest japanese-american janasankhyikee in North america.

is is a vyapak listing jisase highlights significant uplabdhiyaan and milestones aadhaarit upon billboard patrika 's singles charts, sabase notably the billboard hot 100.
is list spans isse the samasya dinaak janvari 1, 1955 to upasthit.
the billboard hot 100 began with the samasya dinaak agast 4, 1958, and is philhal the standard popular music chart in the sanyukt rajya.
prior to the creation of the Hot 100, billboard prakashit chaar singles charts : `` Best vikreta in stores '', `` Most nibhaai by Jockeys '', `` Most nibhaai in jukeboxes '' or `` The sheersh 100 ''.
ye chart, jisase ranged from 20 to 100 slot, yahood phased out at alag times between 1957 and 1958.
haalanki technically nahin bhaag of the hot 100 chart history, their data is shaamil liye computational purposes, or to avoid unenlightening or bhraamak characterizations.
sab vasteen soochibaddh below hai from the hot 100 era, jabatak otherwise noted ( pre-hot 100 chart ).
v is an amareeki science fiction television shrenee ki bhaaga liye two seasons on abisi, isse navambar 3, 2009 to March 15, 2011.

V stars muraina baccarin, lourdes benedicto, morris shahbaloot, Joel gretsch, logan huffman, charles mesure, elizabeth mishael, laura Vandervoort or scot bhediya, or thi karypalika utpaadit by scot rosenbaum, Yves Simoneau, scot Peters, or jace haul.

Geocaching is an bahari recreational kaaryaklap, in jisase the bhagidaar use a vaishvik positioning pranali ( GPS ) receiver or mobile yantra or anya navigational takneekon to hide or talash containers, pukaara `` geocaches '' or `` caches '', anywhere in the sansar.
A theth sanchay is a choti waterproof sangraahak containing a logbook where the geocacher enters the date ve mila it or signs it saath their sthapit code name.
baad hastakshar into the log, the sanchay jarur be lagaai back exactly where the vyakti mila it.
Larger containers such as plastic bhandar containers ( tupperware or samaan ) or ammunition boxes can bhi contain vasteen liye vyapaar, praayah toys or trinkets of choti maan.
geocaching saajha many pahaluon saath benchmarking, trigpointing, orienteering, treasure-hunting, letterboxing, or waymarking.
bogi bas productions thi a hip hop samooh ki thi originally composed of krs-one, d-nice, or DJ scot La chattan.
DJ scot la chattan thi murdered on August 27, 1987, maheene baad the relies of bdp 's debyue album, dand Minded.
the naam of the group, Boogie Down, garbhashayi isse a nickname liye the dakshin bronx section of the bronx, one of the paanch boroughs of nai york nagar.
the group pioneered the sanlayan of danceol regi and hip hop music and unke debyue lp dand minded contained frank descriptions of jivan in the dakshin bronx of the let 1980s yun setting the stage liye kayaa hota aakhirkaar become gangsta rap.
a nagarpalika bandha is a bandha issued by a local sarkari, or unke agenciyon.
Potential issuers of nagarpalika bonds include rajya, cities, counties, redevelopment agenciyon, special-purpose jile, skool districts, public utility jile, saream owned airport or seaports, or koi anya governmental entity ( or group of sarkarein ) at or neeche the state level.
nagarpalika bonds may be saamaanya obligations of the issuer or secured by nirdisht revenues.
in the sanyukt rajya, byaaj aay praapt by holders of nagarpalika bonds is praayah exempt from the federal income tax or from the aay tax of the state in jisase ve are jari, haalanki municipal bonds jari liye nishchit purposes may nahin be kar exempt.
naapsand nai samasya stox ki hai brought to market saath daam pratibandh jabatak the deal is bechi, nagarpalika bonds are free to vyapaar at any time ekbar ve hai purchased by the niveshkon.
peshewar vyapaariyon regularly trade and retrade the vahi bonds anek times a saptaah.

scsi mejabaan Bus adapter ( 16-bit isa card )
in computer hardware, a host niyantrak, mejabaan adapter, or host bas adapter ( hba ) connects a mejabaan pranali ( the computer ) to other network or storage divaais.
the sharten are primarily used to refer to divaais liye connecting scsi, fibre Channel or esata divaais.
however, divaais liye connecting to idii, Ethernet, FireWire, usb and anya systems may bhi be pukaara host adapters.
recently, the aagaman of iSCSI or fibre channel over ethernet rai brought parichay ethernet hbas, jisase hai different isse ethernet NICs in ki ve shaamil tisipi offload Engines.
There hai bhi converged hbas ki support dono ethernet or Fibre channel called converged sanjaal adapters ( cnas ).

cashmere wool, praayah bas gyaat as cashmere, is a fiber praapt isse cashmere bakriyon or anya prakaar of bakrii.
The shabd cashmere garbhashayi isse an boodha spelling of kashmir.
cashmere is thik in banaavat, damdaar, lite, and soft.
garments made from it provide behtareen insulation.
in the sanyukt rajya, antargat the U.S. oon utpaada labeling adhinium of 1939, as amended, ( 15 Uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ), states that a wool or vastra product may nahin be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
aise oon utpaada is the thik ( dehaired ) undercoat fibers produced by a cashmere bakrii ( capra hircus laniger ) ;
the ausat vyas of the fiber of aise oon utpaada does nahin exceed 19 microns ; or
aise wool utpaada karata nahin contain more than 3 percent ( by vazan ) of cashmere fibers saath average diameters that exceed 30 microne.
the ausat fiber vyas may be vishay to a gunank of vibhinnata around the ausat that shall not exceed 24 pratishat.

Within china egg rolls hai khaaya predominantly in the southeast or are nahin as commonly khapat in the uttar or pashchimi bhaag of china.

pidaa or suffering is the vidhik pad liye the physical or emotional tanaav caused isse an chot ( dekhie bhi pidaa or ksht ).
kuch kshatipurti that might be under is shrenee hota be : aches, asthai and sthai limitations on activity, sambhavit shortening of life, depression or scarring.
jab filing a lawsuit as a result of an chot, it is aam liye kisi to talash dhan both in muaavje for vaastavik dhan ki is lost or liye the pidaa or tanaav sambhddha saath vastutah koi chot.
In a suit, pidaa or ksht is part of the `` saamaanya kshatipurti '' khand of the claimant 's claim, or, alternatively, it is an tatv of `` compensatory '' non-economic damages that allows recovery liye the dimagi anguish and/or physical pidaa endured by the claimant as a parinaam of chot liye which the plaintiff seeks parithosh.
Apart from dhan damages awarded in trial, dhan kshatipurti hai bhi given informally baahar the judicial pranali in mediations, madhyasthata ( both of jisase may be adaalat annexed or gaiyr litigated claims ) as khub as in dincharya insurance settlements.
Individual claimants or those represented by vakil often present demands to insurers to settle liye dhan.
ye demand liye bodily injury compensation monies often niyat out kshatipurti ki hai similarly used in the adaalat litigated pleadings.
maange hai praayah likhaa summaries of a claimant 's chikitsa parvaah or the tathy which resulted in the chot.
namoona of a medallion hastakshar guarantee stampIn
the sanyukt States or canada, a medallion hastakshar guarantee is a khaas signature guarantee liye the transafar of securities.
it is a guarantee by the transferring financial sanstha that the signature is vaastavik and the vittiya institution sweekrut deyta liye koi jaalsaji.
hastakshar guarantees protect shareholders by preventing anadhikrut hastantaran or sambhavit investor losses.
They also seemaa the deyta of the transafar agent jo accepts the praaanpatr.
alag sansthaanon have alag nitiyon as to what prakaar of identification ve aavashyaktaa to provide the guarantee or whether ve charge a fee liye aise seva ( praayah nammaatr if koi ).
sabase sansthaanon hoga nahin guarantee a hastakshar of kisi jo rai nahin already been their customer.
a medallion hastakshar guarantee is nahin the same as an acknowledgment by a notary public, in the bhav ki a `` hastakshar guarantee '' is a pramann by the institution ki the signature is pramanik, and an acknowledgment is a certification by a notary public attesting ki the signer hastakshrit a document voluntarily.
Some bainko may no longer provide is seva, however, anek still do as khub as other vittiya institutions aise as a bachat or lone or credit sangh.
at unke ekmaatr discretion, ye institutions may still manaahi to provide the medallion Signature guarantees.
jab US citizens hai videsh, some vittiya sansthaanon may accept sanyukt rajya duutavas seals, in place of the medallion hastakshar guarantee stamp.

the saamaanya motors streetkar shadyantr ( bhi gyaat as the great amareeki streetkar cond ) refers to doshaaropan or convictions in sambandh to a kaarykram by saamaanya motors ( gm ) or anya companies who kharida or tab dismantled streetcar and electric tren pranaaliyon in anek American shaharon.
between 1936 or 1950, National nagar linon or prashanth nagar Lines —with nivesh isse GM, firestone tair, Standard aayal of California, phillips petroleum, Mack trek, and the sangheey Engineering Corporation—bought over 100 electric surface-traction systems in 45 shaharon including Baltimore, neurk, Los angeles, New York nagar, Oakland and san diego or parivartit unhen into bas aaparishan.
Several of the companiyaan shaamil yahood convicted in 1949 of conspiracy to monopolize interstate commerce lakin yahood acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the swaamitv of ye companiyaan.
Some sujhaayen ki is program nibhaai a kunjee bhoomika in the manaahi of public pargaman in shaharon aarpaar the sanyukt States ; notably Edwin J. Quinby, jo first drew dhyaan to the kaarykram in 1946, or tab Bradford C. Snell, an anti-trust attorney liye the sanyukt rajya seenet whose vivaadaaspad 1974 gavaahi to a Senate poochtacha brought the samasya to neshnal awareness.
dono quinby or snell argued ki the deliberate destruction of streetcars thi part of a larger strategy to dhakka the sanyukt rajya into automobile nirbharta.
anya say that swatantra economic karkon brought about parivartan in the pargaman pranali, sahit the great avsaad, the public utility Holding company adhinium of 1935, majdoor ashaanti, market forces, rapidly increasing trekkic jamghat, shahari sprawl, karadhaan nitiyon ki favored nijee gadee swaamitv, and general enthusiasm liye the automobile.
ek lekhak on the subject has sujhaayaa ki snell or others fell into simplistic shadyantr theory soch, bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` clearly, gm waged a yuddh on electric karshan.
It was beshak an sab out utpeedan, but by no arthath the single kaaran for the failure of rapid pargaman.
bhi, it is bas as clear ki kriyaayein and inactions by sarkari contributed significantly to the elimination of electric karshan. ''
tabhi a choti handful of U.S. shaharon have surviving prabhavi rail-based urban transport systems aadhaarit on streetcars or trams, sahit neurk, philadelphia, San francisco, Pittsburgh, or boston ; anya hai re-introducing unhen.

a gramophone ricard, commonly gyaat as a phonograph record ( in amareeki English ), vinyl record ( in sandarbh to vinyl, the saamagree most commonly used baad parichay 1950 ), or colloquially, `` a ricard '', is an analog dhwani bhandar medium consisting of a flat discs saath an inscribed, modulated sarpil naalee.
The naalee usually starts nikat the periphery or ends nikat the center of the discs.
Phonograph record hai generally varnit by their vyas in inch ( 12-inch, 10-inch, 7-inch, ityadi. ), the rotational speed at jisase ve hai nibhaai ( `` 33 arpm ``, `` 78 '', `` 45 '', ityadi. ), their samay kshamta ( `` long playing '' ), their reproductive accuracy, or `` fidelity `` ( `` unchi fidelity '', `` orthophonic '', `` full-range '', ityadi. ), and the kramank of channels of audio provided ( `` mono ``, `` sterio ``, `` quadraphonic ``, etc. ).
phonograph record were the praathmik medium used liye music reproduction for most of the 20th sadi, replacing the phonograph belan, saath jisase it had co-existed, by the 1920s.
by the let 1980s, digital media had gained a larger market share, or the vinil record baayein the mukhyadhara in 1991.
ve continue to be manufactured and bechi in the 21st sadi.
in 2008, nearly 2.9 lakh units shipped, the sabase in koi saal chunki 1998 and the swaroop rai jari to dhire regain lokapriyata.
ve hai visheshkar prayukt by DJs or audiophiles liye anek prakaar of music.
as of 2013, vinil record continue to be prayukt for distribution.

grasslands are areas where the vegetation is dominated by grasses ( poesi ), however sedge ( Cyperaceae ) or fatafat ( juncaceae ) families can also be mila.
Grasslands occur naturally on sab mahadwipon magar antarctic.
In temperate latitudes, such as northwestern europea or the Great maidan or california in uttar America, native grasslands are varchasv by baramasi bunch grass prajati, whereas in warmer climates annual prajati rup a vrihad ghatak of the vanaspati.
grasslands hai mila in sabase ecoregions of the Earth.
liye udhaaharan vahin are paanch sthaliy ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the temperate grasslands, savannas, or shrublands biome ( ' ecosystem ' ), jisase is ek of eight terrestrial ecozones of the Earth 's sataha.
hina ( lawsonia inermis, bhi pukaara henna tree ) or hina is a flowering sanyantr, the ekmaatr prajati in the genus lawsonia in the family Lythraceae.
the English naam `` hina '' comes isse the Arabic ( ALA-LC : ḥinnāʾ / sunaaya ) or colloquially, loosely sunaaya.
the naam is bhi used liye dye preparations niklaa isse the sanyantr, or for the art of asthai godana based on those dyes.
hina rai maharoom prayukt chunki pracheenta to daai skin, hair, or fingernails, as khub as fabrics including resha, oon or chamade.
additionally, the naam is misused liye anya skin and bal dyes, aise as black hina or neutral hina, which hai nahin niklaa from the sanyantr.
a thin filmi is a parat of saamagree ranging isse bhinnon of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to several micrometers in motaai.
electronic semiconductor divaais or optical coatings are the main anuprayog benefiting isse thin-film construction.
a parichit application of patala films is the household darpan, which typically rai a thin metal coating on the waapas of a chadar of kaanch to rup a paravartak interfes.
The prakram of silvering was ekbar commonly used to upaj mirrors.
a very-thin-film coating ( kam than a nanometer motaa ) is used to upaj two-way mirrors.
The pradarshan of optical coatings ( e.g. antireflective, or ar, coatings ) are typically unnat when the thin-film coating consists of anek layers having varying thicknesses or refractive indices.
similarly, a periodic structure of prayavarti patala films of alag saamagree may collectively form a so-called superlattice jisase karname the ghatana of kwantum karawas by restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions.
Work is hone kiya with ferromagnetic or ferroelectric thin films for use as computer memory.
it is also hone lagu to davaayen, via thin-film drug delivery.
thin-films hai used to produce thin-film batteries.
Thin films hai also used in dye-sensitized solar cells.
Ceramic thin films are in chaudee use.
the apekshaakrit high kathorta and inertness of ceremic materials mek this prakaar of thin coating of byaaj for suraksha of substrate saamagree viruddh sanksharan, oxikaran or wear.
In particular, the use of aise coatings on kating tools can extend the jivan of ye vasteen by anek aadesh of magnitude.
Research is being kiya on a nai class of thin-film acarbonic oxide saamagree, called amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent oxides, jisase could be used to make paardarshee transistors ki hai inexpensive, stable, or environmentally benign.
gears of yuddh is a sainya vigyaan fiction third-person shooter video khel developed by apik khel and prakashit by microsoft khel Studios.
It thi initially released as an exclusive sheershak for the Xbox 360 in November 2005 in North america, Australia, or most of europea and shaamil a `` Limited colector 's Edition '' saath added saamagree or an art kitaab titled nasht saundarya ki detailed much of the khel 's back-story.
Despite the aarambhik kathan of Xbox 360 exclusivity, a microsoft khidkiyaan version of the khel thi viksit in sangyojan with logon can Fly and released a year later, featuring new saamagree including atirikt abhiyaan levels, a nai multiplayer game vidhi, and khel for Windows Live functionality.
the khel focuses on the sainikon of delta Squad as ve wield a hataash, last-ditch attempt to sahejen the baaki insaan nivaasiyon of the fictional planet sera isse a athak or seemingly ajey subterranean dushman gyaat as the Locust horde.

The khel is aadhaarit on the upyog of cover or ranneetik aag liye the player to agrim through the scenarios ; a duusari khilaadi can play cooperatively through the pramukh abhiyaan to assist.
The game bhi suvidhaayen anek online ekaadhik khel mods for up to eight khilaadi.

World map saath the intertropical zone highlighted in red.
teevr climate zones of the dharti jahaan sab baarah months have ausat temperatures upar 18 °C ( 64 °f ).
The tropics is a pradesh of the Earth surrounding the equator.
it is simit in akshansh by the tropic of karkat in the northern golardh at lagbhag n or the Tropic of makar in the dakshini golardh at S ; ye latitudes correspond to the aksheeya tilt of the dharti.
the ooshnakaribandh are bhi referred to as the teevr mandal or the torrid mandal ( see bhugolic mandal ).
the ooshnakaribandh shaamil all the kshetron on the Earth jahaan the surya reaches a point directly overhead at least ekbar dauraan the solar saal.
the ooshnakaribandh are vishisht from the other climatic or biomatic regions of dharti, the middle latitudes or the dhruviya regions on either paksh of the equatorial mandal.

the driver or yatri front airbags, after having maharoom tainaat, in a British peugeot 306 car.
an airbag is a gadee suraksha yantra.
It is an occupant sanyam system consisting of a lacheelee fabric envelope or cushion designed to inflate rapidly during an automobile collision.
iske purpose is to cushion occupants dauraan a krash or provide suraksha to their laashen jab ve strike aantarik vastuen aise as the parichaalan wheel or a khidki.
aadhunik vaahanon may contain anek airbag maudul in vibhinn paksh or frontal sthitiyaan of the passenger seating positions, or sensors may tainaat ek or adhik airbags in an prabhaav mandal at parivartaneey daron aadhaarit on the prakaar, kone and gambhirtha of prabhaav ; the airbag is designed to tabhi inflate in moderate to severe frontal krash.
airbags hai normally designed with the iraade of supplementing the suraksha of an occupant who is correctly restrained saath a seatbelt.
Most designs hai inflated through pyrotechnic arthath or can tabhi be sanchalit ekbar.
nae side-impact airbag maudul consist of sampidit air cylinders ki hai triggered in the event of a paksh prabhaav gadee prabhaav.
the first vanijyik dizin yahood introduced in passenger automobile dauraan the 1970s saath simit kamyaabi.
Broad vanijyik apnaanaa of airbags occurred in anek bazaar dauraan the let 1980s or early 1990s saath a driver airbag, and a saamne yatri airbag as khub on kuch gaadiyaan ; or anek modern vaahanon now shaamil four or adhik units.
irs kar forms hai prayukt for taxpayers or tax-exempt sanghathan to report vittiya soochna to the aatanrik aay seva ( irs ) of the United rajya.
ve hai prayukt to rapat aay, gananaa kar to be sashulk to the sangheey government of the sanyukt States, or disclose other information as jaruri by the aatanrik aay Code ( iarasi ).
vahin hai over 800 vibhinn form or schedules.
the best-known of ye is rup 1040 prayukt by individuals.
in the sanyukt rajya, driver 's licenses hai issued by each individual state ( sahit washington, D.C. or territories ), balki than the sangheey government kuki of the rajnatik avadharana of sanghavaad.
Drivers hai saamanytah jaruri to obtain a license isse unke rajya of nivas or sab rajya recognize prayek anya 's panktiyaan for temporary vizitor vishay to saamaanya age aavashyaktaayen.
a rajya may bhi barkhaastagi an vyaktigat 's driving privilege bheetar iske borders liye trekkic violations.
anek rajya share a common pranali of anugna varg, saath some apwaad, and commercial license varg hai manakikrut by sangheey viniman at 49 CFR part 383.
China rai maharoom the sorce of anek avishkaron, sahit the chaar Great avishkaron : papermaking, the compass, gunpowder, or printing ( both woodblock and movable type ).
The suchi below contains these and other inventions.
The chinis invented technologies involving yantriki, hydraulics, or ganit lagu to horology, metallurgy, khagolashastra, agriculture, engineering, music siddhanth, craftsmanship, nautics, or warfare.
by the yuddhrat States kaal ( 403–221 bc ), they tha unnat metallurgic technology, sahit the blast furnace or cupola furnace, jabaki the finery forge or puddling prakram yahood gyaat by the Han rajvansh ( 202 BC – ad 220 ).
a sophisticated aarthik system in China diya janam to inventions aise as paper dhan dauraan the song rajvansh ( 960–1279 ).
the avishkaar of gunpowder by the 10th sadi led to an sarani of inventions such as the aag talwaar, jameen meraa, naval meraa, haath cannon, exploding golon, multistage prakshepastra, or prakshepastra bam saath aerodynamic wings and visphotak payloads.
With the navigational aid of the 11th-century compass or kshamta to steer at high samudr saath the 1st-century sternpost rudder, premodern Chinese sailors sailed as far as East africa or mishra.
in water-powered clockworks, the premodern chinis tha used the escapement yantriki chunki the 8th sadi or the endless power-transmitting kadi drive in the 11th century.
ve also made vishaal mechanical kathputli theatre chalit by waterwheels and carriage pahiyon or wine-serving automatons chalit by chappu wheel naukaaye.
The contemporaneous peiligang or Pengtoushan samskritiyon represent the oldest Neolithic samskritiyon of china or yahood formed around 7000 bc.
kuch of the pehla avishkaron of Neolithic, pragaitihaasik china shaamil semilunar or rectangular stone knives, stone hoes or spades, the cultivation of bajra, rice or the soyabean, the refinement of sericulture, the bhawan of rammed dharti structures saath lim -plastered house floors, the sristi of the potter 's wheel, the sristi of pottery saath cord-mat-basket designs, the sristi of pottery tripods or pottery steamers, and the vikaas of ceremonial baratan and scapulimancy liye uddeshy of divination.
Francesca Bray argues ki the domestication of the ox or bhens during the longshan samskruti ( c. 3000–c. 2000 BC ) kaal, the absence of Longshan-era sinchai or high-yield crops, puraa evidence of longshan cultivation of dry-land khadyann fasalon jisase diya unchi yields `` only jab the mrudaa was carefully cultivated, '' sujhaayen ki the hal thi gyaat at tanik by the longshan samskruti period or explains the high agricultural utpaadan yields jisase anumat the vruddhi of chinis civilization dauraan the Shang Dynasty ( c. 1600–c. 1050 bc ).
saath baad inventions aise as the multiple-tube beej drill and baari moldboard aayran plow, China 's agricultural output could sustain a much larger janasankhyikee.
For the purposes of is suchi, avishkaron hai regarded as technological firsts viksit in china, and as aise does not shaamil videshi technologies jisase the Chinese acquired through contact, aise as the pavanchakki isse the Middle east or the doordarshee isse jaldi aadhunik europea.
it bhi karata not shaamil technologies developed elsewhere or baad invented separately by the chinis, aise as the odometer or kadi pump.
vaigyanik, mathematic or prakritik discoveries, parivartan in naaballig concepts of dizine or style and kalakaari navapravartanon can nahin be regarded as avishkaron or do not appear on the list.
sakal gharelu utpaada in 2011 us dollar per capita, samyojit liye inflation or khareednaa shakti parity ( log scale ) isse 1860 to 2011, saath janasankhyikee ( disk kshetrafal ) liye the us ( pilaa ), uk ( naarangi ), japani ( red ), China ( red ), and india ( blue ).
vaishvikaran ( or globalisation—see ssailing matbhed ) is the process of international sangyojan arising isse the interchange of sansar drishy, utpaada, vichaar, or anya pahaluon of samskruti.
put in saral terms, vaishvikaran refers to processes ki prachaar world-wide exchanges of neshnal or cultural resources.
Advances in parivahan or telecommunications avasanrachana, sahit the vruddhi of the antarjaal, hai major karkon in vaishvikaran, generating further interdependence of aarthik or cultural activities.
haalanki anek scholars place the origins of vaishvikaran in aadhunik times, others trace iske itihaas long pehle the europea age of discovery and voyages to the nai sansar.
kuch even tres the origins to the teesraa milinium bce.
Since the shuruuaat of the 20th sadi, the pace of vaishvikaran rai intensified at a rapid rate, visheshkar dauraan the post thanda War era.
the pad vaishvikaran rai maharoom in increasing upyog chunki the mid-1980s and visheshkar chunki the mid-1990s.
In 2000, the International Monetary nidhi ( imf ) identified four moulik pahaluon of vaishvikaran : vyapaar and tranjection, capital or investment andolanon, migration and gati of logon or the dissemination of gyaan.
Further, paryaavarniya challenges aise as climate badalen, cross-boundary jal or air pradooshan, or over-fishing of the samandar are linked saath globalization.
Globalizing prakriyaaon affect or hai prabhavit by kaarobaar and kaary sanghathan, arthshaastra, socio-cultural sansaadhan, or the prakritik environment.
the replacements is a 2000 amareeki sports comedy film nirdeshit by harvard deutch.
it sitaron kiyanu reeves, jin hackman, or bruke langton.
an amareeki airlines vayuyan takes band isse Dallas/Fort laayak antarrashtriya vimaanashetra.
This airport is the airline 's largest hub.
amareeki airlines udata to 79 domestic gantavyon or 78 antarrashtriya destinations in 48 countries.
( as of disambar 2012 )
The list shaamil the city, country, the code of the antarrashtriya air hastantaran sangh ( iata airport code ) or the antarrashtriya civil Aviation sanghathan ( ICAO vimaanashetra code ), or the vimaanashetra 's naam, saath the airline 's hubs, focus shaharon or seasonal destinations chihnit.
the suchi bhi contains destinations no longer parosa by the airline, which hai chihnit as terminated gantavyon.
it karata nahin include destinations parosa liye amareeki airlines by iske regional affiliates American tribhuj airlines, karypalika airlines, or americanconnection.
`` day-o ( the banana naav Song ) '' is a traditional jamaican mento lok song, the best-known sanskaran of jisase thi sung by Harry belafonte or an alternate version interspersed saath another jamaican folksong, hill and gulli savaar, by dame sharlee Bassey.
despite the song 's mento prabhaav, `` day-o ( the banana naav song ) '' is widely gyaat as an example of callypso music.
it is a work song, isse the point of drishy of dock workers working the raatri shift loading kele onto jahaajon.
daylight rai aaiye, the shift is over and ve want unke kaary to be gine up so ki ve can go home.
World yuddh I ( wwi ) thi a vaishvik yuddh kendrit in europea that began on 28 july 1914 and lasted jabatak 11 navambar 1918.
It thi predominantly pukaara the World yuddh or the great War from iske occurrence jabatak the prarambh of sansar yuddh II in 1939, or the pehla sansar yuddh or sansar yuddh i thereafter.
it involved all the sansar 's great shaktiyaan, which were samavet in do opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple entente of the sanyukt kingdom, France or rus ) and the central shaktiyaan ( originally the Triple gathbandhan of Germany, austria-hungary and Italy ; lakin, as austria–hungary tha liya the apriy viruddh the anubandh, italy kiya nahin daalen into the war ).
ye alliances were dono reorganised and expanded as more raashtra daalaa the war : italy, Japan or the United States joined the allies, or the osmani samrajya and bulgaria the central shaktiyaan.
Ultimately, more than 70 lakh military personnel, sahit 60 lakh Europeans, yahood mobilised in ek of the largest yudhon in history.
adhik than 9 lakh combatants were maare, largely kuki of technological advancements ki led to vishaal increases in the lethality of hathiyaar without sambandhit sudhaar in suraksha or gatishiltaa.
it was the fifth- deadliest virodh in sansar itihaas, subsequently paving the rasta for vibhinn rajnatik changes, aise as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the yuddh thi the resurgence of samrajyavad in the foreign nitiyon of the great powers of europea.
adhik tatkaal, the hatya of archduke Franz ferdinand of Austria, the vaaris to the singhaasana of austria-hungary, on 28 june 1914 by yugoslav rashtravaadi gavrilo Princip in sarajevo triggered a rajanyik crisis jab Austria-Hungary subsequently vitarit an ultimatum to the kingdom of srbija.
Several alliances formed over the pichhlaa decades yahood invoked.
bheetar weeks, the pramukh shaktiyaan yahood at war or, via unke colonies, the conflict jald sprad around the world.
On 28 july, the austro-hungarians fired the pehla goliyaan of the yuddh as taiyaari liye the invasion of srbija.
While the russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral belgium and dhvaj on the rasta to frans, providing a casus belli liye Britain 's declaration of yuddh viruddh germany.
baad the germany kooch on paris was brought to a halt—the so-called chamatkaar of the Marne —the Western saamne settled into a static battle of attrition with a gart lakeer ki badla choti jabatak 1917.
on the purvi saamne, the roosi fouj thi kaamyaab viruddh the austro-hungarians, lakin thi stopped in iske akraman of east prussia by the germans.
in navambar the Ottoman samrajya joined the yuddh, kholane up fronts in the kakeshas, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy or bulgaria gai to yuddh in 1915 or Romania in 1916.
in Russia, the tsar 's sarkari collapsed in kooch 1917 or a subsequent kranti in November brought the russians to sharten with the central Powers.
baad a 1918 germany apriy saath the pashchimi saamne, the Allies drove waapas the germans in a shrenee of kaamyaab offensives or amareeki shaktiyaan began pravesh the trenches.
germany, jisase tha iske own trubal saath krantikariyon, sahamat to an armistice on 11 navambar 1918.
The yuddh ended in vijay liye the allies.
kaarykram on the home fronts yahood as ugr as on the battle fronts, as the bhagidaar aajamaaya to mobilize unke manpower or aarthik resources to lado a total yuddh.
by the samaapt of the yuddh, four pramukh imperial powers—the germany, Russian, austro-hungarian or osmani empires—ceased to maujuud.
The successor rajya of the purv do khoyaa a great raashi of territory, jabaki the latter do yahood dismantled entirely.
the map of central europea was redrawn into anek choti rajya.
The lig of raashtra thi formed in the aashaa of preventing another such virodh.
the europea rashtrawaad shakhit by the yuddh and the brallep of empires, the parakhnaa of Germany 's shikast or problems saath the sandhi of versailles hai sahamat to be karkon contributing to World yuddh II.
Nurse Jackie is an amareeki shrenee ki premiered on june 8, 2009, on showtime, film central or the Movie Network.
the shrenee sitaron edie falco as the sheershak akshar Jackie peyton, an emergency vibhaag nurse at sab santo ' hospital in New york nagar.
For jaiki, `` prayek day is a high taar act of juggling marijon, doctors, fellow nurse or uske own indiscretions. ''

it follows the jeevandaan of the kardashian/jenner parivaar, sahit bahanon courtney, Kim, and Khloé kardasian.
the shrenee ' success rai led to the spin-offs courtney or kim lo nai York, khloé & laimor, Kourtney and khloé lo miami, or courtney or Kim lo miami.
Afghanistan ( ; ; ), officially the islamic ganatantr of afghanistan, is a landlocked sovereign rajya forming part of South asia, central asia, or to kuch extent pashchimi Asia.
it rai a population of around 30 million inhabiting an area of lagbhag, bananaa it the 42nd most populous or 41st largest swadesh in the world.
it is bordered by pakistani in the dakshin or the east, iraan in the west, Turkmenistan, uzbekistan and Tajikistan in the uttar, and China in the dur purvottar.
afghanistan rai been an pracheen focal point of the Silk sadak or human migration.
archaeologists have found pramaan of insaan habitation isse as far waapas as the madhya paleolithic.
Urban civilization may have begun in the kshetrafal as early as 3,000 to 2,000 bce.
baithe at an mahatvapurn geostrategic sthaan ki connects the madhya East samskruti saath central asia or the Indian subcontinent, the jameen rai maharoom ghar to vibhinn peoples through the aayu or witnessed many sainya abhiyaan, notably by sikandar the great, changez khan, and in aadhunik era pashchimi forces.
The land bhi parosa as a sorce isse jisase the greco-bactrians, kushans, hephthalites, Saffarids, ghaznavids, ghorids, Khiljis, timurids, mughalon, Durranis, or anya have risen to rup major empires.
the rajnatik itihaas of the aadhunik state of afghanistan begins in 1709, jab the hotaki rajvansh thi sthapit in Kandahar followed by ahamed shah durrani 's vruddhi to shakti in 1747.
in the let 19th sadi, afghanistan became a bafar state in the `` great khel `` between the British and roosi empires.
following the 1919 anglo-afghan War, king amanulla began a europea style modernization of the desh but thi roka by the ultra-conservatives.
dauraan the thanda War, baad the vaapasi of the angrejon isse neighboring india in 1947, the United rajya or the soviet sangh began spreading prabhaav in Afghanistan, jisase led to a khooni yuddh between the US-backed mujahidin forces or the soviet-backed afgaan sarkari in jisase over a million afghans khoyaa unke jeevandaan.
This was followed by the 1990s civil yuddh, the vruddhi and patan of the extremist Taliban sarkari and the 2001–present war.
In December 2001, the sanyukt raashtra suraksha parishad praadhikrut the sristi of the International suraksha sahaayta force ( isaf ) to sahaayta maintain security in afghanistan or assist the karzai prashasan.
teen dashakon of war bana afghanistan ek of the sansar 's most khatarnaak deshon, including the largest nirmaataa of sharnaarthiyon or asylum zaruratmandon.
While the antarrashtriya jatiyaan is punarnirmaan war-torn afghanistan, aatankwaadi samooh aise as the hakkaani sanjaal and hezbi islami are actively involved in a nationwide taliban -led ugravad, jisase shaamil hundreds of assassinations and aatmahatya attacks.
according to the sanyukt raashtra, the insurgents yahood jimmedaar for 80 % of civilian hataahat in 2011 or 2012.
the amareeki Civil yuddh ( acw ), bhi gyaat as the yuddh between the States or bas the civil yuddh ( see namakaran ), was a civil yuddh ladaa from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` sangh '' or the `` uttar '' ) or anek Southern slave states ki ghoshit unke secession and formed the Confederate rajya of america ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` dakshin '' ).
The yuddh tha iske utpatti in the samasya of slavery, especially the ekstansion of gulaami into the western territories.
videshi shaktiyaan kiya nahin intervene.
baad chaar years of khooni combat ki baayein over 600,000 sainiko murde or nasht much of the South 's avasanrachana, the confederacy collapsed, slavery thi abolished, or the mushkil punarnirmaan prakram of restoring neshnal unity and guaranteeing adhikaron to the freed slave began.
In the 1860 adhyakshiya chunaav, republicans, led by abraham lincoln, opposed expanding gulaami into sanyukt rajya ' territories.
Lincoln won, lakin pehle uske udghaatan on kooch 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the confederacy.
outgoing loktantric adhyaksh James bukanan and the aavak Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural pataa ghoshit uske administration would not initiate civil yuddh.
aath baaki slave rajya jari to asweekrut calls liye secession.
confederate forces seized numerous sangheey durgon bheetar territory claimed by the confederacy.
a Peace sammelan vifal to dhundhen a sulah, or dono pahalu prepared liye yuddh.
the confederates assumed ki europea deshon were so nirbhar on `` king kapaas `` ki ve hota intervene ; none kiya or none pahachaanaa the new confederate States of america.
Hostilities began on april 12, 1861, jab Confederate shaktiyaan fired upon fort sumter, a kunjee fort yojit by sangh sainikon in dakshin Carolina.
lincoln called liye prayek rajya to provide sainikon to retake the fort ; natijatan, four adhik slave rajya joined the confederacy, bringing their total to gyaarah.
The sangh jald controlled the kinaaraa rajya or sthapit a naval blockade ki abodh the southern arthvyavastha.
the Eastern theatre thi inconclusive in 1861–62.
the patjhad 1862 confederate abhiyaan into maryland ( a sangh rajya ) ended saath Confederate retreat at the battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln jari the emancipation udghoshnaa, jisase made samaapti gulaami a yuddh goal.
To the west, by garmiyaan 1862 the sangh destroyed the confederate nadi navy, tab much of unke pashchimi sena, or the Union at vicksburg split the confederacy in two at the mississippi nadi.
in 1863, Robert E. lee 's Confederate incursion uttar ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western safaltaaon led to ulysses S. Grant cmand of sab sangh armies in 1864.
in the pashchimi theatre, wiliam T. Sherman drove east to capchar atlanta or marched to the sea, destroying Confederate avasanrachana saath the rasta.
The Union marshaled the sansaadhan or janashakti to akraman the confederacy isse sab dishanirdesh, or could afford to lado ladaaiyon of attrition through the overland abhiyaan towards richmond, the confederate puunji.
The defending confederate army vifal, leading to lee 's surrender to Grant at appomattox Court house on april 9, 1865.
the amareeki civil yuddh thi ek of the earliest sachcha audyogic yudhon.
railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced hathiyaar yahood employed extensively.
the mobilization of civilian kaarkaanon, khaanon, shipyards, banks, parivahan or khaanaa aapurtiyan all foreshadowed sansar War i.
it remains the deadliest yuddh in amareeki history, resulting in the deaths of an anumaanit 750,000 sainiko or an undetermined kramank of civilian hataahat.
itihaaskaar John Huddleston estimates the maut toll at ten pratishat of all uttari males 20–45 years old, or 30 percent of sab dakshini white males aged 18–40.
Cost of goods sold ( COGS ) refer to the inventory laagat of those goods a business has bechi dauraan a particular kaal.
laagat hai sambhddha with particular goods using one of anek formulas, sahit vishisht pahchaan, first-in first-out ( FIFO ), or average laagat.
laagat shaamil sab laagat of khariden, laagat of parivartan or anya costs incurred in bringing the inventories to unke present location or condishan.
Costs of goods bana by the business shaamil saamagree, labor, or allocated overhead.
the costs of those goods nahin yet sold hai deferred as laagat of inventory until the inventory is bechi or likhaa bas in value.

a confectionery store ( adhik commonly referred to as a mithi shop in the sanyukt Kingdom, a candi store in the uttar America, or a lolly shop in australia ) sells confectionery or is praayah targeted to children.
sabase confectionery stores hai bhar saath an assortment of mithai far larger than a grocer or convenience store could accommodate.
ve often prastaav a chayan of old fashioned treet, or mithai from alag deshon.
Very praayah unchanged in leout since unke inception, confectioneries are gyaat liye unke varming or nostalgic mahasoos.
the gaanv of pateley sethu daawa to have the oldest confectionery store in england.
the oldest mithi shop in england, in the gaanv of Pateley Bridge
Oklahoma ( ) ( pawnee : uukuhuúwa, Cayuga : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state stith in West dakshin central United rajya.
Oklahoma is the 20th sabase extensive and the 28th sabase populous of the 50 United States.
the state 's name is derived isse the choctaw words okla or humma, meaning `` red people '', or it is gyaat informally by iske upnaam, the Sooner State.
Formed by the sangyojan of Oklahoma territory or bhartiya Territory on November 16, 1907, oklahoma thi the 46th rajya to enter the sangh.
iske nivaasiyon hai gyaat as Oklahomans or, informally `` okies '', and its puunji and largest city is oklahoma City.
a pramukh nirmaataa of natural gas, aayal, or krishi, oklahoma relies on an aarthik aadhaar of vimaanan, urja, telecommunications, or jaevpraudyogiki.
It rai ek of the tivratam growing economies in the nation, ranking among the sheersh states in prati capita income vikaas and sakal domestic utpaada vikaas.
oklahoma City or tulasa serve as Oklahoma 's primary aarthik anchors, saath nearly do tihaai of oklahomans living bheetar their mahanagar sankhyikeey kshetron.
saath choti pahaad seemayen, preyari, mesas, and purvi wanon, most of Oklahoma jhooth in the great maidan and the u.s. aantarik hilands —a pradesh especially prone to kathor mausam.
in jod to having a vyapaktaa of angrezi, germany, scottish, irish or deshi amareeki ancestry, adhik than 25 deshi amareeki bhashaaen hai bolaa in oklahoma, second tabhi to california.
Oklahoma is stith on a sangam of three pramukh amareeki saanskrithik regions or historically parosa as a root liye choupayon drive, a destination for dakshini settlers, or a government-sanctioned territory liye deshi Americans.
stacked or standing car tair
A tire ( or tair ) is a ring-shaped covering ki fits around a wheel 's rim to protect it or enable behatar gadee pradarshan.
sabase tair, such as those liye automobiles or bicycles, provide karshan between the gadee and the sadak jabaki providing a lacheelee cushion ki absorbs shock.
the saamagree of aadhunik neumatic tair are synthetic rabar, prakritik rubber, fabric or taar, along saath carbon blike or other rasinic yogicon.
ve consist of a tread or a deh.
the tread provides karshan jabaki the deh provides containment for a maatra of sampidit air.
pehle rubber was viksit, the first sanskaran of tair yahood bas bands of metal ki fitted around wooden wheels to prevent pahanen or tear.
Early rabar tair yahood thos ( not neumatic ).
Today, the majority of tair are neumatic inflatable structures, comprising a doughnut-shaped deh of rassiyaan or wires encased in rubber or generally bhar saath sampidit air to rup an inflatable cushion.
Pneumatic tair hai prayukt on anek types of vaahanon, including cars, bicycles, motorcycle, trek, earthmovers, or vayuyan.
metal tair hai still used on locomotives or railcars, and thos rubber ( or anya polimur ) tires hai still used in various non-automotive anuprayog, such as kuch casters, cart, lawnmowers, or wheelbarrows.
Dr. Joseph warren ( June 11, 1741 – June 17, 1775 ) was an amareeki doctor jo played a agrani bhoomika in American Patriot sanghathan in Boston in jaldi dinon of the amareeki kranti, eventually sevarat as adhyaksh of the krantikari Massachusetts prantiy congress.
Warren yogic paul Revere or wiliam dawes on april 18, 1775, to chhod boston or sprad the sachetak ki the angrejon garrison in boston was setting out to red the kasbaa of concord or giraftaar rebel netao jon Hancock or samuel adams.
warren participated in the next day 's ladaaiyon of Lexington or Concord, jisase hai commonly considered to be the kholane engagements of the amareeki Revolutionary yuddh.
Warren had been commissioned a pramukh saamaanya in the upnivesh 's milicia shortly pehle the june 17, 1775 Battle of bunker hill.
balki than exercising uske rank, warren parosa in the battle as a private sipaahi, or thi killed in combat when angrejon sainikon stormed the redoubt atop nasl 's Hill.
uske maut, immortalized in jon trumbull 's painting, the maut of saamaanya warren at the Battle of bunker 's hill, june 17, 1775, jasti the vidrohi shaktiyaan, or he has maharoom memorialized in anek place names in the sanyukt rajya.
stm chitra of self-assembled supramolecular zanjeeron of the organic semiconductor quinacridone on Graphite.
an sashulk semiconductor is an organic saamagree with semiconductor gun, ki is, saath an electrical conductivity between that of insulators and ki of dhaatuon.
single molecules, short kadi ( oligomers ) or sashulk polymers can be semiconductive.
semiconducting choti anuon ( khushboodaar hydrocarbons ) shaamil the polycyclic khushboodaar compounds pentacene, anthracene, or rubrene.
polymeric sashulk semiconductors shaamil bahu ( 3-hexylthiophene ), bahu ( p-phenylene vinylene ), as khub as polyacetylene or iske derevative.
There hai do pramukh overlapping varg of sashulk semiconductors.
ye are organic charge-transfer devalayas or vibhinn linear-backbone conductive polymers niklaa isse polyacetylene.
Linear ridh sashulk semiconductors shaamil polyacetylene itself or iske derivatives polypyrrole, and polyaniline.
at tanik locally, charge-transfer devalayas often pradarshnee samaan conduction mechanisms to acarbonic semiconductors.
aise mechanisms uthta isse the presence of chhed or electron conduction paraton alag by a band gap.
jabaki aise clasik mechanisms hai important locally, as saath acarbonic amorphous semiconductors, tunnelling, sthaniyakrut states, gatishiltaa gap, or phonon -assisted hopping bhi significantly contribute to conduction, visheshkar in polyacetylenes.
jaise acarbonic semiconductors, sashulk semiconductors can be doped.
Organic semiconductors susceptible to doping aise as polyaniline ( ormecon ) or are also known as sashulk metals.
Typical current vaahak in sashulk semiconductors are chhed or electrons in π-bonds.
lagbhag sab organic solids hai insulators.
But jab unke constituent anuon have π-conjugate systems, electrons can move via π-electron badal overlaps, visheshkar by hopping, tunnelling or sambandhit mechanisms.
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons or phthalocyanine namak crystals are udhaaharan of is prakaar of organic semiconductor.
mukhyatah due to low gatishiltaa, bhi unpaired electrons may be stable in charge-transfer devalayas.
Such unpaired electrons can falan as vartmaan vaahak.
is prakaar of semiconductor is bhi praapt by pairing an electron daata anu saath an electron acceptor anu.
maadaa skhalan is the expulsion of drav by insaan mahilaon from the paraurethral nalikaayen through and around the female urethra dauraan or pehle an orgasm.
it is bhi gyaat colloquially as gushing or squirting, although ye hai mana to be alag phenomena in kuch shodh publications.
The sateek sorce or prakruti of the drav continue to be a topic of bahes among medical peshewar, jisase is bhi sambandhit to doubts over the existence of the g-spot.
the FIFA mahilaon 's sansar cap is an antarrashtriya sangh footbaal pratiyogita contested by the varisht women 's neshnal tiimon of the sadasyon of fédération Internationale de Football sangh ( FIFA ), the khel 's vaishvik shaasi deh.
the championships rai been awarded prayek chaar saalo chunki the inaugural tournament in 1991.
Japan jiti the 2011 tournament in a dand shootout.
the vartmaan swaroop of the toornament involves 16 tiimon spardhaa liye the title at venues bheetar the host swadesh ( s ) over a kaal of parichay teen saptaah ; – this phase is praayah pukaara the sansar Cup final.
A qualification phase, jisase philhal takes place over the preceding teen saalo, is prayukt to determine jisase teams qualify for the toornament saath saath the host swadesh ( s ).
the fifa mahilaon 's sansar cap is recognized as the sabase important antarrashtriya pratiyogita in women 's footbaal or is nibhaai amongst women 's national football tiimon of the sadsy rajya of fifa, the khel 's global shaasi deh.
the pehla mahilaon 's sansar cap toornament, namit the mahilaon 's sansar championships, thi held in 1991, sixty-one years baad the main 's pehla fifa sansar Cup toornament in 1930.
The chah sansar cap tournaments have been won by four alag neshnal tiimon.
The next World cap hoga be hosted by canada in 2015.
scorpions is a yang vayask anokhaa likhaa by walter dean myrs, pehla prakashit in the sanyukt rajya by harper & Row on June 20, 1988.
saamne pej of a 17th sadi Hebrew bible by Joseph Athias, abhi at Beth hatefutsoth, israel
'son of man ' is the translation of vibhinn yahudee or unani vaakyansh prayukt in dono the Hebrew Bible and the nai Testament.
it rai diverse meanings, ranging isse a saamaanya insaan hone to a prophesied anant, daivi shaasha.
the yahudee abhivyakti `` son of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e. ben-'adam ) appears one sau or seven times in the yahudee bible.
is is the sabase aam yahudee nirmaan for the singular but is prayukt zyaadaatar in Ezekiel ( 93 times ) or 14 times elsewhere.
in tees do maamle the phrase appears in intermediat plural rup `` bete of main '', i.e. insaan beings.
as generally interpreted by Jews, it denotes humankind generally.
in the Koine Greek of the New vasiyat, `` the bete of man '' is invariably prayukt as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite aalekh.
the upyog of the definite aalekh in `` the son of man '' in the isai gospels is anokhaa, and pehle iske use vahin, no record of iske use in koi of the surviving Greek dastauez of antiquity maujuud.
geza Vermes has stated ki `` the bete of man '' in the isai gospels is unrelated to Hebrew bible usages.
in isai usage, naapsand the Son of parameshwar title, jisase rai maharoom an anivaary tatv of isai creeds chunki the Apostolic aayu, the udghoshnaa of `` yishu as the Son of man '' has never maharoom an aalekh of aasthaa in christianity.
The nirvachan of the upyog of `` the bete of man '' in the nai vasiyat rai remained challenging and baad 150 saalo of bahes no sarvasammati on the issue rai ubhara among vidwaanon.
Master of foxhounds lead the field isse powderham kila in devon, england, with the hounds in front.
fox shikaar is an kaaryaklap involving the tracking, peechha, and sometimes hatya of a fox, traditionally a red fox, by prashikshit foxhounds or anya saint hounds, or a samooh of nihathe anusarankarta led by a nipun of foxhounds, jo follow the hounds on pair or on horseback.
Fox shikaar originated in the form practised until recently in the sanyukt Kingdom in the 16th century, lakin is practised sab over the world, including in australia, Canada, frans, ireland, italy and the sanyukt rajya.
in australia, the term also refers to the shikaar of foxes saath firearms samaan to spotlighting or hiran shikaar.
in much of the sansar hunting in saamaanya is samajha to sunaanaa to koi khel pashu or hathiyaar ( e.g., hiran shikaar saath bow and tir ) ; in britain or Ireland, `` shikaar '' bagaiyr yogyata implies fox shikaar ( or other form of shikaar with houndaus- beagling, stag hunting, mink shikaar, drag hunting or shikaar the clean boot ) as varnit yahan.
The khel is vivaadaaspad, particularly in the uk, jahaan it was bain in scotland in 2002, or in england or wales in navambar 2004 ( vidhi enforced isse farvari 2005 ), though shooting foxes as vermin remained vidhik.
proponents of fox hunting drishy it as an important bhaag of gramin samskruti and upyogi liye kaaran of sangrakshan and pest control, while pratidwandviyon argue that it is bedard and anaavashyak.
tambaaku vigyaapan is the vigyaapan of tobacco utpaada or upyog ( typically cigarette dhumrapaan ) by the tambaaku udyog through a kismein of media sahit praayojan, particularly of sporting kaarykram.
It is abhi ek of the sabase atyadhik regulated form of marketing.
Some or all form of tambaaku vigyaapan hai banned in many deshon.
