the company was founded in 1968 as unnat patent praudyogiki.
it eventually badla iske naam to Alliance gaming or acquired, in 1996, balli gaming antarrashtriya, a purv division of Bally nirmaan.
in 2006, the entire company adopted the balli name, a trademark that originated in 1932 by the Bally Manufacturing nigam.
Gustave doré 's engravings illustrated the daivi kamedi ( 1861–1868 ) ; yahan, Dante is lost in canto 1 of the inferno.
inferno ( italvi liye `` Hell `` ) is the pehla bhaag of dante elegiyari 's 14th-century apik kavita daivi kamedi.
it is followed by purgatorio or Paradiso.
It is an allegory telling of the yatra of dante through narak, guided by the roman kavi virgil.
in the kavita, Hell is depicted as nau vrutt of ksht stith within the dharti.
allegorically, the daivi Comedy represents the journey of the soul towards parameshwar, with the Inferno describing the recognition and asweekruti of sin.
smaranof is a brand of vodka swaamitv or utpaadit by the British company Diageo.
the smaranof brands began with a vodaka distilleri santhaapit in masco by pyotr arsenievich smirnov ( 1831–1898 ).
it is abhi distributed in 130 deshon.
It is produced in several deshon including india, ireland, italy, the United kingdom and the sanyukt States.
smaranof utpaada shaamil vodka, flavoured vodaka, and malt peya.
In March 2006, diageo uttar America claimed ki smaranof vodaka was the best-selling asut spirit brands in the world.

karavaaya by dr. geri B. Knapp 's monticule Farms in lexington, kentki, he jiti uske pehla five race starts.
He thi sired by grad iii winner boundary, a bete of uttar amareeki champion sire danzig, a bete of Northern nartki.

the serenity Prayer is the common name liye an originally untitled dua by the amareeki theologian reinhold niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ).
it rai maharoom apanaaya by Alcoholics benaam or anya twelve-step programs.
The best-known rup is : parameshwar, grant me the serenity to accept the bate i can nahin change,
The himmat to badalen the bate i can,
or akl to jaan the antar.
the ghoshnaa and resolves of the pehla Continental Congress ( bhi gyaat as the Declaration of aupniveshik Rights, or the ghoshnaa of adhikaron ), was a bayaan adopted by the pehla Continental congress on aktubar 14, 1774, in response to the Intolerable adhiniyamon passed by the British parliament.
The Declaration outlined colonial objections to the Intolerable adhiniyamon, soochibaddh a aupniveshik bill of rights, or provided a vistrut list of grievances.
it was similar to the ghoshnaa of adhikaron or Grievances, passed by the stamp adhinium congress a dashak pehle.
the ghoshnaa concluded with an ruparekha of Congress 's yojanaayen : to enter into a bahishkaar of angrejon vyapaar ( the mahadwipiya sangh ) jabatak unke grievances were redressed, to publish pataa to the logon of great britain and angrejon America, or to bhejein a petition to the king.
Pulse dabaav is the dabaav ki is laga when feeling the pulse.
measured in millimeters of paara ( mmHg ), the pressure antar between the systolic or diastolic pressures is the dabaav badalen to banaaen the pulse, jisase is the pulse dabaav.
if resting blood dabaav is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of paara ( mmhg ), pulse dabaav is 40.
the pahadiyaan is a vaastaviktaa television series which originally aired on MTV isse may 31, 2006 jabatak july 13, 2010.
the show upyog a vaastaviktaa television swaroop, following the personal jeevandaan of anek yang vayaskon jeena in los angeles, california, lakin tends towards a katha swaroop more commonly mila in scripted genres such as sabun operas.

After paanch seasons, conrad baayein the shrenee or was replaced by another purv laguna bich star, kristin Cavallari, shuruuaat in the second half of the fifth ritu.

entertainment saptahik ranked the Hills 82nd on unke suchi of `` The 100 behtareen shows of the Last 25 saalo, '' stating ki the shrenee thi a `` nai clasik. ''
AOL tv called it TV 's biggest Guilty Pleasure.
the shrenee premiered in anuprayog in the patan of 2009 alongside laguna Beach : The real Orange County.
in pokar, karaab taal is a subjective pad liye a hand in jisase a khilaadi saath kayaa appear to be damdaar taash nevertheless loses.
It most often occurs jahaan one khilaadi bets the clearly stronger hand or unke opponent makes a poor call ki eventually `` hits '' or vins.
vahin is no sarvasammati among pokar khilaadi as to kayaa exactly constitutes a bad taal or praayah khilaadi hoga asahmat parichay whether a particular haath was a bad taal.
the goldfish ( Carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater machhlee in the family cyprinidae of anukram cypriniformes.
It was ek of the earliest machhlee to be domesticated, or is ek of the sabase commonly kept equarium machhlee.
a apekshaakrit choti sadsy of the carp parivaar ( jisase bhi includes the koi carp or the crucian carp ), the goldfish is a domesticated sanskaran of a less-colorful carp ( Carassius auratus ) deshi to east asia.
It thi pehla domesticated in china adhik than a hajaar saalo pehle, or several pruthak breeds have chunki maharoom viksit.
goldfish breeds vary greatly in aakaar, body aakaar, jode vinyas or coloration ( vibhinn combinations of shwet, pilaa, orange, red, bhura, or blike are gyaat ).
uncooked rouladen
rouladen ( or rinderroulade, ekvachan : roulade ) is a German maance roulade usually consisting of bekan, pyaaj, sarson and pickles wrapped in thinly sliced beef jisase is then pakaaya.
In some countries, the roulade is bhi gyaat as `` beef jaitoon ''.
bif or vil is prayukt as maance haalanki kuch khaanaa vidwaanon tend to believe that the asli sanskaran thi sambhawatah venison or pork, or pork is still popular in some areas.
the beef rouladen as we jaan them today have become lokapriy over the last sadi.
the cut is usually topside bif or silverside chunki is is the sasta kaaten.
the adhik expensive sanskaran would be the golakaar stick, bhi gyaat as rump steak.
The maance is cut into vishaal, thin slis.
The bharna is a mixture of smoked and cooked pork belly, kataa pyaaj or kataa achaar ( gurken ) which is at times varied by adding minced maance, sockes maance, pine nuts or sarson.
the mishran varies isse pradesh to pradesh.
rouladen hai traditionally served liye dinar.
Red wine is praayah served saath is dish.
theth eukaryotic koshika.
cellular shwasan is the set of the metabolic pratikriyaayein or prakriyaaon that lo place in the koshikaayen of jeevon to badalen biochemical energy isse nutrients into adinosin triphosphate ( atipi ), or tab relies barbaad utpaada.
the pratikriyaayein shaamil in respiration hai catabolic pratikriyaayein, which brake vishaal molecules into smaller ones, releasing urja in the prakram as kamjor so-called `` high-energy '' bonds hai replaced by stronger bonds in the utpaada.
Respiration is ek of the key ways a cell gains upyogi urja to eendhan cellular kaaryaklap.
cellular respiration is mana an ooshmakshepi radox pratikriya.
the overall pratikriya is tutaa into many choti ones when it occurs in the deh, most of jisase hai radox pratikriyaayein themselves.
Although technically, cellular shwasan is a dahan pratikriya, it clearly karata nahin resemble ek jab it occurs in a jeena cell.
is antar is kuki it occurs in anek separate kadam.
jabaki the overall pratikriya is a combustion reaction, no single reaction that comprises it is a dahan reaction.
Nutrients ki are commonly prayukt by animal and sanyantr cells in shwasan shaamil sugar, amino acids or vasiy acids, or a aam oxidizing agent ( electron acceptor ) is aanvik oxygen ( o2 ).
the urja stored in atipi ( iske teesraa phosphate samooh is weakly bonded to the baaki of the anu or is cheaply tutaa allowing stronger bonds to rup, thereby transferring urja for upyog by the koshika ) can tab be used to drive processes requiring energy, including jaivasanshleshan, locomotion or transportation of anuon aarpaar koshika jhilliyon.
deshon by 2011 jidipi ( nammaatr ) according to the siie sansar Factbook.
is aalekh shaamil a suchi of countries in the sansar sorted by unke sakal gharelu utpaada ( jidipi ), the market value of sab final goods or sevaayen isse a nation in a die saal.
the jidipi dollars estimates prastut here are gananaa at market or sarkari aadhikarik exange rates.
anek economies jisase hai not mana to be countries ( world, the EU, or kuch nirbhar territories ) are shaamil in the suchiyaan kuki they appear in the strot.
ye economies hai nahin ranked in the chart here, but hai soochibaddh jahaan applicable.
The figures presented yahan do not lo into khaataa differences in the cost of jeena in alag deshon, and the parinaam can vary greatly isse ek saal to another aadhaarit on fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's karency.
aise fluctuations may badalen a desh 's ranking isse ek year to the next, bhi haalanki they praayah mek little or no antar to the standard of living of iske janasankhyikee.
isliye these aankade chahie be prayukt saath saavdhaanee.
kuch countries/regions may have citizens which hai on average dhanwaan.
ye countries/regions could appear in is suchi as having a small GDP.
This hota be because the country/region soochibaddh has a choti population, or therefore small kul arthvyavastha ; the jidipi is gananaa as the population times the maal prati capita.
Comparisons of neshnal wealth are bhi aksar made on the aadhaar of khareednaa power parity ( PPP ), to samaayojan liye matbhed in the laagat of jeena in alag deshon.
( dekhie suchi of deshon by jidipi ( ppp ) )
ppp largely removes the exchange rate problem, lakin rai iske own kamiyaan ; it does nahin reflect the value of aarthik output in antarrashtriya trade, or it bhi requires adhik estimation than nammaatr jidipi.
on the whole, ppp prati capita figures hai more narrowly spread than nammaatr GDP per capita aankade.
the first suchi shaamil aankada compiled by the sanyukt raashtra Statistics prabhag for 2011.
the duusari suchi largely includes aankada ( anumaan ) compiled by the antarrashtriya maudrik Fund liye 2012.
the teesraa suchi shows the sansar bainko 's zyaadaatar 2011 estimates, or the fourth list shaamil zyaadaatar 2012 estimates isse the siie sansar Factbook.
lapping is a machining prakram, in jisase do satahon are mala saath saath an abrasive between them, by hand gati or by way of a yantra.
This can take do form.
the pehla prakaar of lapping ( traditionally pukaara pis ), typically involves ragad a bhangur saamagree aise as kaanch viruddh a sataha aise as aayran or kaanch itself ( also gyaat as the `` god '' or pis tool ) with an akkhad such as aluminium oxide, jeweller 's rouge, optician 's rouge, emry, silicon carbide, diamond, etc., in between unhen.
is produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as the akkhad rolls about between the two satahon or removes saamagree from both.
the other rup of lapping involves a softer saamagree aise as pich or a ceremic liye the god, jisase is `` charge '' with the akkhad.
The god is tab used to cut a harder material—the workpiece.
The abrasive embeds within the softer material which holds it or permits it to score aarpaar and kaaten the harder saamagree.
liya to a finer limit, is hoga upaj a polished surface aise as saath a policing cloth on an automobile, or a policing cloth or polishing pich upon glass or steel.
liya to the ultimate seemaa, with the sahaayta of accurate interferometry or specialized policing machines or skilled haath polishing, lensmakers can upaj surfaces ki hai chapata to behatar than 30 nanometers.
is is ek beesvin of the wavelength of lite isse the commonly prayukt 632.8 nm helium neon leisure light source.
satahon is chapata can be molecularly bandhua ( optically contacted ) by bringing unhen saath antargat the sahi conditions.
( is is not the same as the wringing prabhaav of johansan blocks, haalanki it is similar ).

The nickname originated with the team 's 1978 hilite filmi, where the narrator opens with the following parichay : the pad is pahachaanaa or praayah prayukt by media outlet, sahit ESPN, yahuu !, echbio khel, or khel illustrated.

A pikup trek or pick-up, praayah bas referred to as a pikup, is a light motor gadee saath an open-top, rear cargo area ( bed ).
in North America, the pad pikup is prayukt for lite trek saath a halkaa duty chassis and factory nirmit, integrated bed, as khub as for coupé utility vaahanon, praayah aadhaarit on a nijee car chassis, lakin also praayah on a khaas samarpit chassi liye aise upyog.
kuch deshon have unke apana terms similar to pikup, aise as ute in australia or New jiland, or bakkie in South africa.
vishaal pickup trek hai somewhat viral in europea, jahaan vine or light lorries hai commonly used for similar bhoomikaaye.
the adhyaksh of the United States of America ( POTUS ) is the head of state or head of sarkari of the sanyukt States.
the adhyaksh leads the karypalika shakha of the federal sarkari or is the commander-in-chief of the United rajya hathiyaarband shaktiyaan.
aalekh ii of the U.S. samvidhan vests the karypalika shakti of the sanyukt States in the president or aarope him saath the nishpaadan of sangheey law, alongside the jimmedaari of appointing federal executive, rajanyik, niamak, and judicial adhikariyon, or concluding treaties with foreign shaktiyaan, saath the advice and sahmati of the seenet.
the adhyaksh is further shashakt to grant sangheey pardons or reprieves, or to convene and adjourn either or dono houses of congress antargat asaadhaaran circumstances.
chunki the founding of the sanyukt rajya, the power of the adhyaksh and the sangheey sarkari have grown substantially and prayek aadhunik adhyaksh, despite possessing no aupchaarik vidhaan shaktiyaan beyond hastakshar or vetoing congressionally passed bills, is largely jimmedaar for dictating the legislative kaarysoochee of uske party or the videshi or domestic policy of the sanyukt rajya.
the adhyaksh is aksar described as the sabase shaktishaalee person in the world.
The adhyaksh is indirectly nirvaachit by the people through the chunavi College to a four-year term, and is ek of tabhi do nationally nirvaachit federal officers, the anya hone the vaais adhyaksh of the sanyukt States.
The twenty-second amendment, apanaaya in 1951, prohibits anyone isse ever hone nirvaachit to the presidency liye a teesraa puraa pad.
it bhi prohibits a vyakti from hone elected to the presidency more than ekbar if ki vyakti previously tha parosa as president, or acting adhyaksh, liye more than two saalo of another vyakti 's pad as adhyaksh.
In all, 43 individuals have parosa 55 four-year sharten.
on janvari 20, 2009, baraak Obama became the 44th or vartmaan adhyaksh.
on navambar 6, 2012, he thi re-elected or is anusuchit to serve until janvari 20, 2017.
Bottled mineral jal
bottleband water is drinking jal ( e.g., well jal, asut jal, khanij jal, or vasant jal ) packaged in plastic or kaanch jal botalon.
bottleband jal may be carbonated or nahin.
Sizes dayera isse choti single serving bottles to large carboys for jal coolers.
map of the pramukh nadiyaan, jhiilon, and tank in india
Map prardashit rivers or baadh prone areas in India
Rivers of india play an important role in the jeevandaan of the bhartiya logon.
The nadi systems provide sinchai, potable jal, cheap parivahan, vidyut, or the livelihoods liye a vishaal kramank of logon all over the country or to gramin kshetron.
is easily explains kyon nearly sab the pramukh cities of India are located by the banks of rivers.
The rivers bhi have an mahatvapurn bhoomika in hindu mythology or hai mana holy by sab Hindus in the desh.
saat pramukh rivers saath saath unke numerous tributaries mek up the nadi pranali of india.
sabase of the nadiyaan daalana unke waters into the khadi of bengal ; however, kuch of the nadiyaan jinaki courses take them through the western bhaag of the desh or towards the east of the rajya of himachal pradesh khaali into the arabian Sea.
Parts of ladakh, uttari parts of the aravlli dayera or the arid bhaag of the thar marusthal have antardeshiy drainage.
Dr.Francis Buchanan surveyed the paathyakram of the rivers of india along with unke tributaries or shakhaon in 1810-11 ad or presented a minute khaataa of it.
the shifting of the paathyakram or bed over the sadiyaan is bahut ullekhneey.
anek of the channels ullekith in ki surveykshan have abhi become murde, sukhi or even extinct.
sab major nadiyaan of India originate from one of the three pramukh watersheds :
the himalay and the Karakoram seemayen
Vindhya or Satpura ranges or Chotanagpur pathaar in central india
Sahyadri or pashchimi ghats in pashchimi india
The bretton woods system of monetary prabandhan sthapit the niyam for vanijyik or vittiya sambandh among the sansar 's major audyogic states in the mid-20th sadi.
the Bretton woods pranali thi the first example of a fully negotiated maudrik anukram intended to govern maudrik sambandh among swatantra nation-states.
taiyaari to rebuild the antarrashtriya aarthik pranali as World yuddh ii was still raging, 730 delegates isse sab 44 Allied nations gathered at the mount washington hotel in bretton Woods, nai Hampshire, sanyukt rajya, liye the United raashtra maudrik or Financial sammelan.
the delegates deliberated dauraan 1–22 July 1944, or hastakshrit the anubandh on iske final din.
Setting up a pranali of niyam, sansthaanon, and prakriyaaon to regulate the antarrashtriya maudrik system, the planners at bretton woods established the antarrashtriya Monetary nidhi ( imf ) or the International bainko for punarnirmaan or vikaas ( ibrd ), jisase aaj is bhaag of the World bainko samooh.
These sanghathan became operational in 1945 baad a sufficient kramank of deshon tha ratified the anubandh.
the mukhya suvidhaayen of the bretton woods system yahood an daayitv liye prayek desh to apnaanaa a maudrik niti ki kaayam the exange rate by tying iske karency to the u.S. dollars or the kshamta of the IMF to bridge asthai imbalances of bhugtan.
on 15 agast 1971, the sanyukt rajya unilaterally terminated convertibility of the us $ to sunaharaa.
is brought the bretton woods system to an samaapt or dekhi the dollars become fiat karency.
This karrwai, referred to as the nicksan shock, nirmit the halaat in which the sanyukt rajya dollars became a reserve karency prayukt by anek rajya.
at the same samay, anek phixd mudraayen ( aise as gbp, liye udhaaharan ), also became free floating.
dukaati motor pakadakar S.p.A. is an italvi company ki dizin and manufactures motorcycle.
headquartered in Bologna, italy, Ducati is swaamitv by Audi through iske italvi subsidiary lemborgini.
A credit score is a numerical abhivyakti aadhaarit on a sankhyikeey analysis of a person 's credit filein, to represent the creditworthiness of ki person.
a credit score is primarily aadhaarit on credit rapat soochna typically sourced isse credit bureaus.
lenders, aise as banks or credit card companies, use credit score to evaluate the sambhavit risk posed by lending money to upabhokta and to mitigate nuksaan due to karaab karz.
lenders use credit score to determine jo qualifies liye a rin, at what byaaj rate, or what credit had.
lenders also use credit score to determine jisase graahak are sambhavit to bring in the most revenue.
the upyog of credit or pahchaan scoring prior to authorizing access or granting credit is an kriyanvayan of a vishwasaneey pranali.
credit scoring is not simit to bainko.
anya sanghathan, aise as mobile phone companies, insurance companies, jameendaar, or government departments employ the same takneekon.
Credit scoring bhi has a lot of overlap with aankada khanan, jisase uses many samaan techniques.
These takneekon combine hazaron of karkon lakin ve hai adhik or kam similar or the same.
The seven SI aadhaar ikai or the interdependency of their paribhaashaayen : liye udhaaharan, to extract the paribhaasha of the meter isse the gati of light, the definition of the second jarur be gyaat jabaki the ampere or candela hai dono dependent on the paribhaasha of energy jisase in turn is defined in sharten of lambaai, dravyaman or samay.
the antarrashtriya pranali of ikai ( si ) defines saat units of maap as a moulik niyat isse which sab anya SI units are niklaa.
These si base ikai or unke shaareerik quantities are:
meter liye length ( US angrezi : meter )
kilogram for dravyaman ( note : nahin the gram )
second liye samay
ampere liye electric vartmaan
kelvin liye taapmaana
candela liye chamakdaar intensity
mole liye the raashi of padaarth.
The si aadhaar quantities rup a niyat of mutually swatantra aayam as jaruri by aiami analysis commonly employed in vigyaan or praudyogiki.
however, in a die realization of ye units they may khub be interdependent, i.e. paribhaashit in sharten of prayek anya.
the names of si ikai hai written in lowercase varna ( the 'degree celsius ' meets this niyam, as 'degree ' is the unit, or 'celsius ' is a modifier ).
The pratikon of ikai hai written in loarkes ( e.g. meter rai the pratik m ), except that pratikon liye units named baad persons are likhaa saath an initial puunji letter ( e.g., the hertz has the aprkes pratik Hz ).
Many anya ikai, aise as the litre ( US English : leniyar ), are formally nahin bhaag of the si, lakin hai sweekrut liye upyog saath SI.
smarak Canyon
Colorado National smarak ( locally referred to as The smarak ) is a part of the neshnal Park seva nikat the city of Grand jankshan, colorado.
spectacular canyons kaaten gahan into sandstone or bhi granite–gneiss–schist chattan formations, in some kshetron.
This is an area of marusthal jameen high on the colorado Plateau, with pinian and juniper wanon on the pathaar.
the park host a chaudee dayera of vanyajeev, sahit red-tailed chilon or sunahari eagles, ravens, jays, marusthal bighorn sheep, and coyotes.
kriyaayein shaamil hiking, horseback sawari, road bicycling, or scenic drive ; a aagatuk center on the west paksh contains a prakritik history sangrahalay or gift duukaan.
There are bhavy drishy isse trails and the Rim chattan drive, jisase hawaayen saath the plateau.
Nearby are the kitaab cliffs, or the largest flat-topped mountain in the sansar, the grand Mesa.
Its feature aakarshan is smarak Canyon, which ranon the chaudai of the park, and includes chattan formations aise as Independence Monument, the Kissing yugal, or Coke chulhon.
the smarak shaamil 20,500 acre ( 32 vargakar miles ), much of jisase rai been anushansit to congress for namakan as wilderness.

North amareeki telephone kshetrafal code 419 and 567 serve the northwest quadrant of the U.S. rajya of ohio.
the largest city parosa by ye kshetrafal codes is tolado ( and its suburbs of holland, maumee, northwood, oregon, otawa pahadiyaan, Perrysburg, Rossford, sylvania, swanton, waterville, or whitehouse ).
anya shaharon served by ye kshetrafal codes shaamil Ada, Ashland, bellevue, Bluffton, Bowling green, bryan, Bucyrus, celina, clide, Crestline, defiance, delphos, edison, erastus, Findlay, fostoria, fremont, galion, kenton, lima, mansfield, Mount gilead, nepolian, norwalk, ok harbar, bandargahon Clinton, Sandusky, Shelby, st. marys, Tiffin, apper Sandusky, vine wert, wapakoneta, Wauseon, willard.
anya kshetron served shaamil the jhil erie islands north of Port clinton or west of sandusky.
The main kshetrafal code, 419, thi created as one of the asli area codes in aktubar 1947 ; the overle area code 567 thi nirmit on janvari 1, 2002.
Despite the upasthiti of tolado, the state 's fourth-largest nagar, 419 was the pichhlaa of ohio 's original chaar kshetrafal code to have maharoom vibhajit or overlaid.
miki Leroy gilley ( born kooch 9, 1936 ) is an amareeki desh music singer or musician.
Although he prarambh out gayan straight-up desh and pashchimi saamagree in the 1970s, he moved towards a adhik pop -friendly dhwani in the 1980s, bringing use further kamyaabi on not just the country chart, lakin the pop charts as khub.
among his biggest hits hai `` room puraa of gulab, '' `` do n't the ladakiyon sab milengi prettier at closing Time, '' or the rimek of the Soul hit `` stand by Me ``.
He is also the cousin of jeri lee louis, karl mcvoy, gym gilley or jimmy swaggart.
According to the sangheey vimaanan Administration, Gilley is a licensed pilot, jo holds an yantra darja saath vanijyik payalat privileges for multi-engine airplanes, as khub as private payalat privileges liye single engine aircraft.
The sitambar 11 hamale ( also referred to as sitambar 11, sitambar 11th, or 9/11 ) were a shrenee of four samanvit terrorist hamale shubharambh by the Islamic terrorist group al-qaeda upon the United States in nai york nagar or the Washington, D.C. kshetrafal on sitambar 11, 2001.
Four yatri airliners were hijacked by 19 al-Qaeda aatankwaadi so they could be flown into imaaraten in aatmahatya hamale.
Two of those planes, American airlines udaan 11 and sanyukt airlines udaan 175, were krash into the uttar or dakshin towers, kramshah, of the sansar Trade bich jatil in New York nagar.
bheetar two ghanton, dono minaaren collapsed saath malba and the resulting fir causing partial or puraa patan of all anya imaaraten in the wtc jatil, as khub as major kshati to ten other vishaal surrounding structures.
A third plane, amareeki airlines Flight 77, thi crashed into the Pentagon ( the mukhyalay of the United rajya Department of Defense ), agrani to a aanshik collapse in iske pashchimi paksh.
the chauthi plane, sanyukt Airlines udaan 93, thi targeted at the United rajya capital in Washington, d.C., lakin krash into a field nikat shanksville, pencilvenia, baad its yatri aajamaaya to overcome the hijackers.
in kul, lagbhag 3,000 people died in the attacks, including the 227 nagarikon and 19 hijackers savaar the chaar planes.
suspicion jaldi giri on al-qaeda.
haalanki the group 's netaa, osama bin laden, initially denied koi bhagidaari, in 2004 he claimed responsibility liye the hamale.
Al-Qaeda and bin laden cited U.S. support of israel, the upasthiti of u.S. troops in Saudi Arabia, and pratibandhon against iraqi as motives liye the hamale.
the sanyukt rajya responded to the hamale by shubharambh the yuddh on aatank and invading Afghanistan to depose the taliban, jisase tha harbored al-qaeda.
anek countries strengthened unke anti-terrorism legislation or vistaarit vidhi pravartan shaktiyaan.
Having evaded capchar liye saalo, bin laden thi stith and maare by U.S. forces in may 2011.
the vinaash of the Twin Towers or anya gun caused gambhir kshati to the arthvyavastha of nimnatar manahaton or tha a significant prabhaav on vaishvik bazaar.
clyaap of the World vyapaar bich site thi completed in May 2002, and the prastutikaran thi repaired bheetar a saal.
numerous memorials have maharoom constructed, sahit the National sitambar 11 memorial & Museum in nai York, the Pentagon memorial, or the Flight 93 neshnal memorial in Pennsylvania.
baad a lengthy delay, the ek World vyapaar bich is expected to be samaapt at maidan shunya in nai york nagar in 2013.
dhundhna nemo is a 2003 amareeki computer-animated comedy-drama adventure filmi likhaa or directed by Andrew Stanton, released by walt Disney Pictures, and the fifth filmi produced by Pixar anemation studios.
it tells the story of the over-protective clownfish namit Marlin ( Albert brookes ) jo, saath saath a regal tang namit dory ( ellen degeneres ), khoj liye uske abducted bete nemo ( sikandar gould ) all the way to sidney harbour.
saath the way, marlin learns to lo risks or let nemo lo care of khud.
it is pikchars 's first filmi to be released in cinemas in the uttari golardh summer.
The filmi thi re-released liye the pehla samay in 3d on September 14, 2012, and it was released on blu-ray on disambar 4, 2012.
A sequel, dhundhna dory, is philhal in vikaas, niyat to be released on navambar 25, 2015.
the filmi received saarvbhaumik najuk acclaim or jiti the academy puraskaar for behtareen Animated visheshta, or thi nominated in teen adhik shrenee sahit behtareen Original patakatha.
it was the duusari highest-grossing filmi of 2003, kamai a kul of $ 921 million vishwavyaapee.
Finding Nemo is also the best-selling dvd of all time, saath over 40 lakh copies bechi as of 2006, or thi the highest-grossing g-rated filmi of sab samay pehle pikchars 's apana khilonaa Story 3 overtook it.
It is bhi the 23rd highest-grossing filmi of sab time, as well as the 3rd highest-grossing anemated film.
in 2008, the amareeki filmi santhaan namit it the dasavaan mahanatam anemated filmi kabhi bana dauraan their sheersh 10.

In the United rajya, soshal Security refers to the old-age, survivors, or viklaangata bime ( oasdi ) sangheey kaarykram.
the original soshal suraksha adhinium ( 1935 ) or the vartmaan sanskaran of the adhinium, as amended, encompass several social welfare or soshal bime programs.
soshal suraksha is primarily vittposhit through samarpit payroll kar pukaara sangheey bime yogadan adhinium tax ( fica ).
kar deposits hai formally entrusted to the sangheey old-age or Survivors Insurance vishwaas nidhi, the sangheey viklaangata Insurance vishwaas nidhi, the sangheey hospital bime Trust Fund, or the sangheey Supplementary Medical bime Trust nidhi jisase comprise the soshal suraksha vishwaas Fund.
upward redistribution of aay is jimmedaar for parichay 43 % of the prakshipt soshal suraksha shortfall over the aglaa 75 saalo.
according to economist martin feldstein, the combined bitaa liye all soshal insurance programs in 2003 gathit 37 % of sarkari expenditure and 7 % of the sakal domestic utpaada.
soshal Security is philhal anumaanit to rakhana roughly 40 pratishat of sab america aayu 65 or older out of garibi.
the soshal Security prashasan is headquartered in woodlawn, maryland, bas west of Baltimore.

Alcohol by volume ( abbreviated as ABV, abv, or alc/vol ) is a maanak maap of kaisaa much alcohol ( ethanol ) is contained in an alcoholic beverage ( expressed as a pratishat of total volume ).
the ABV standard is prayukt worldwide.
In kuch deshon, alcohol by awaz is referred to as degrees Gay-Lussac ( after the french chemist joseph lui gay-lussac ).

Charles jon huffam dicans ( ; 7 farvari 1812 – 9 june 1870 ) thi an angrezi lekhak or social aalochak.
he nirmit kuch of the sansar 's sabase memorable fictional varna or is generally regarded as the greatest novelist of the victorian kaal.
dauraan his life, uske works enjoyed unprecedented kirti, or by the twentieth century uske literary pratibhashali thi broadly acknowledged by aalochakon and scholars.
His novels or choti kahaniyaan continue to be widely lokapriy.
Born in portsmouth, England, dicans baayein skool to kaary in a factory baad uske pita thi thrown into karjadaar ' thana.
haalanki he had choti aupchaarik shiksha, uske jaldi impoverishment drove use to safal.
Over his kariyar he edited a saptahik jarnal liye 20 saalo, likhaa 15 novels, 5 novellas and sainkadon of choti kahaniyaan or non-fiction aalekh, lectured or performed extensively, thi an indefatigable akshar lekhak, or campaigned vigorously liye children 's rights, shiksha, or anya social reforms.
Dickens sprang to kirti with the 1836 serial prakaashan of The Pickwick papers.
Within a few years he tha become an antarrashtriya literary hasti, famous liye uske humour, vyangy, or keen avlokan of character or samaaj.
uske novels, sabase prakashit in masik or saptahik kishton, pioneered the serial publication of katha fiction, jisase became the prabal victorian vidhi for anokhaa prakaashan.
The instalment swaroop allowed Dickens to evaluate his darshak 's pratikriya, or he praayah parivardhit uske plat and akshar development based on such pratikriya.
liye udhaaharan, when uske wife 's chiropodist expressed takalif at the rasta Miss mowcher in daud copperfield laga to pratibimbit uske disabilities, dicans gai on to improve the character saath dhanatmak lineaments.
fagin in oliver twist jaahir mirrors the famous baad ikey suleman ; His kairikechar of leigh hunt in the figure of mr Skimpole in bleak house was likewise toned bas on advice isse kuch of uske mitron, as ve padhaa apisod.
in the same novel, dono Lawrence Boythorne or Mooney the beadle hai drawn isse real jivan – boythorne isse walter Savage landor or mooni isse 'Looney ', a beadle at Salisbury Square.
uske bhukhand yahood carefully constructed, and Dickens praayah wove in tatv isse topical kaarykram into his kahaniyaan.
masses of the anpadh garib chipped in ha'pennies to have prayek nai monthly episode padhaa to them, kholane up and preranadai a nai class of pathak.
dicans thi regarded as the literary colossus of uske aayu.
uske 1843 novella, a Christmas Carol, is ek of the most influential works kabhi likhaa, or it remains lokapriy or continues to inspire adaptations in prayek kalakaari vidha.
uske rachanaatmak pratibhashali rai maharoom praised by fellow writers—from leo Tolstoy to G. K. chesterton and george orvel —for iske yatharthwaad, kamedi, prose style, adwitiya characterisations, or soshal aalochana.
On the anya haath auskar Wilde, Henry james or Virginia woolf complained of a kami of manovaigyanik gaharaai, dhilaa likhane, or a rag of saccharine sentimentalism.
martin luther king and other civil adhikaron netao in saamne of the pratimaa of abraham lincoln, August 28, 1963
the civil rights movement thi a series of worldwide rajnatik andolanon liye equality before the law ki peaked in the 1960s.
in anek paristhitiyon it took the rup of abhiyaan of civil resistance aimed at achieving badalen by nonviolent form of resistance.
in kuch situations it thi accompanied, or followed, by civil unrest and hathiyaarband vidroh.
The prakram thi long or tenuous in anek deshon, or anek of ye movements kiya not fully achieve unke goals although, the efforts of ye movements did sise to sudhaar in the vidhik adhikaron of previously dalit samooh of people.
the pramukh uddeshy of the civil rights gati shaamil, or shaamil, ensuring ki the adhikaron of all logon hai equally protected by the law, sahit the rights of minorities.
civil adhikaron movements ranging isse the vaishvik LGBT adhikaron gati to the global mahilaon 's adhikaron movement to vibhinn jatigat alpsankhyak adhikaron andolanon around the sansar continue.
The 2010 fifa sansar cap thi the 19th FIFA sansar cap, the sansar championship liye men 's neshnal sangh footbaal tiimon.
It took place in dakshin africa isse 11 june to 11 july 2010.
The bidding prakram for hosting the toornament final thi kholen only to African raashtra ; in 2004, the antarrashtriya football sangh, fifa, chaynit dakshin africa over Egypt or morocco to become the pehla africa swadesh to mejabaan the final.
the milan yahood nibhaai in ten stadium in nau host shaharon around the country, saath the final nibhaai at the soker City stadium in dakshin africa 's largest nagar, johansburg.
Thirty-two teams were chaynit for bhagidaari via a vishwavyaapee yogyata toornament that began in agast 2007.
in the pehla golakaar of the tournament final, the teams competed in round-robin groups of chaar tiimon for ank, saath the sheersh do teams in each samooh proceeding.
These solah teams unnat to the nokout stage, jahaan teen rounds of play decided jisase tiimon would participate in the final.
in the final, spain, the europea champions, parajeet third-time finalists the Netherlands 1–0 after atirikt time, saath andres Iniesta 's lakshya in the 116th minute giving spain unke pehla sansar sheershak, banane the eighth swadesh to jeet the tournament, or the pehla European swadesh to win the toornament baahar iske home mahadweep.
mejabaan nation dakshin africa, 2006 sansar champions Italy or 2006 runners-up France yahood all eliminated in the pehla golakaar of the tournament.
it thi the pehla samay ki the host yahood eliminated in the pehla golakaar.
nai jiland saath unke teen draws yahood the tabhi aparajit toli in the toornament, but yahood bhi eliminated in the pehla golakaar.

John lenon thi an angrezi musician jo gained vishwavyaapee kirti as ek of the sansthaapakon of the betals, liye uske subsequent solo kariyar, or for uske rajnatik sakriyata or shantivaad.
He thi shot by chihnit daud chapman at the entrance of the bhawan jahaan he lived, The dakota, in New york nagar on 8 December 1980.
lenon tha just laute isse ricard sanyantr studio saath uske bivi, yoko Ono.

shortly baad local news stesan reported Lennon 's death, crowds gathered at Roosevelt Hospital and in saamne of the dakota.

New orlions ( or, locally or ; ) is a pramukh sanyukt States port and the largest nagar or metropolitan kshetrafal in the rajya of louisiana.
the janasankhyikee of the nagar was 343,829 as of the 2010 u.S. janasankhyikee.
the nai orlions mahanagar kshetrafal ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner mahanagar sankhyikeey kshetrafal ) had a janasankhyikee of 1,167,764 in 2010 or was the 46th largest in the United rajya.
the New orleans–metairie–bogalusa sanyukt sankhyikeey Area, a larger vyapaar kshetrafal, tha a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
the nagar is namit after Orléans, a nagar stith on the loire nadi in kendra, frans, or is khub known liye iske pruthak French Creole vaastukala, as well as iske cross-cultural or multilingual viraasat.
nai Orleans is bhi prasiddh liye its cuisine, music ( visheshkar as the janmasthan of jaiz ), and its salanaa celebrations or tyohaar, most notably mardi Gras.
the nagar is often referred to as the `` most adwitiya '' in america.
nai orlions is stith in southeastern louisiana, straddling the mississippi nadi.
the nagar or Orleans Parish ( ) hai.

The United States adhyakshiya chunaav of 1968 thi the 46th quadrennial adhyakshiya chunaav, yojit on Tuesday, November 5, 1968.
the republican nominee, purv Vice-President Richard nicksan, jiti the chunaav over the loktantric nominee, incumbent Vice-President Hubert humphrey.
Nixon ran on a abhiyaan ki promised to restore vidhi or anukram to the nation 's shaharon, torn by dange or aparaadhon.
vishleshkon have argued the chunaav of 1968 is a realigning chunaav as it permanently disrupted the nai saude gathbandhan ki had dominated adhyakshiya raajnneeti liye 36 saalo.
Coming chaar saalo baad Democrat lyndon B. Johnson jiti in a historic landslide, the chunaav dekhi the incumbent adhyaksh majaboor out of the res or a republican nirvaachit for the pehla samay in baarah saalo.
it thi a wrenching national anubhav, conducted dauraan a year of violence ki shaamil the assassination of civil adhikaron netaa Martin luther king, jr., or subsequent res dange aarpaar the swadesh, the assasination of loktantric adhyakshiya pratyaashee robert F. kennedy, faili vipaksh to the Vietnam yuddh aarpaar university campuses, or hinsak confrontations between police and anti-war pradarshnakariyon at the 1968 loktantric neshnal sammelan as the loktantric party vibhajit again or again.
the chunaav pradarshit the strongest teesraa party praytn chunki 1912 by purv albama rajyapal george Wallace, a democrate.
Because wales 's abhiyaan opposed sangheey hastkshep in the dakshin to samaapt skool pruthakkaran, he carried the gahan dakshin or ran khub in jaateey audyogic jile in the uttar.
is thi the pichhlaa chunaav in which nai york tha the most votes in the chunavi college ( 43 mat ).
baad the 1970 janasankhyikee, california gained the sabase chunavi mat and rai remained the most populous rajya chunki tab.
is is the naveenatam chunaav jahaan a adhyakshiya ticket jiti without carrying the vice adhyakshiya candidate 's home rajya.

court Donald cobain ( farvari 20, 1967 – april 5, 1994 ) was an amareeki musician or kalakaar, behtareen known as the sise singer, guitarist and praathmik songwriter of the grunge band nirvana.
cobain formed nirvana with krist novoselic in Aberdeen, washington in 1985 and established it as bhaag of the Seattle music jhaanki, having iske debyue album bleech released on the independent ricard label Sub pop in 1989.
baad hastakshar with pramukh label DGC record, the band mila bhedan kamyaabi saath `` khushbu jaise Teen spirit `` isse iske duusari album nevermind ( 1991 ).
following the success of Nevermind, nirvana was labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X, or Cobain hailed as `` the pravaktaa of a peedhee ''.
cobain, however, thi praayah uncomfortable or kunthit, believing his message or artistic drushti to have maharoom misinterpreted by the public, saath his personal mudde praayah subject to media dhyaan.
he challenged nirvana 's darshak saath iske final studio album In Utero ( 1993 ).
During the last saalo of uske life, cobain struggled saath heroin vyasan, beemaari or avsaad.
he bhi tha pareshaani coping saath his fame or public chitra, and the peshewar and lifelong nijee pressures surrounding khud or his wife, musician Courtney prem.
on april 8, 1994, cobain thi found murde at his ghar in sietal, the shikaar of what was officially shasit a aatmahatya by a self-inflicted shotgun ghaav to the sir.
The halaaton of uske maut at age 27 have become a topic of public fascination or bahes.
Since their debut, Nirvana, saath cobain as a songwriter, rai bechi over 25 lakh albums in the U.S., or over 50 million vishwavyaapee.
a millwright is a craftsman or tradesman sagaai saath the nirmaan and mentanence of mashinari.
More generally in the angrezi speaking world, early millwrights were visheshgy carpenters jo erected mashine prayukt in krishi, khaanaa prasanskaran or prasanskaran lumber or paper.
In the early bhaag of the Industrial Revolution, unke kaushal were dabaaya into service bhawan the earliest sanchalit vastra milon.
Modern millwrights kaary saath steel and anya saamagree in jod to lakdi or jarur praayah combine the kaushal of anek skilled trades in order to safaltaapurvak fabricate audyogic machinery or to ikatthe mashine from pre-fabricated bhaag.
The aadhunik millwright jarur bhi be samarth to padhaa blueprints and anya schematics to sahaayta him in the nirmaan of jatil pranaaliyon.
millwrights are frequently unionized, saath around 45 % unionized in the us, haalanki anbhavi millwrights praayah niyat themselves up as swatantra thekedaaron.
The samaayojan beuro is a 2011 amareeki romantic karrwai thriller filmi loosely based on the Philip K. land choti story, `` Adjustment Team ``.
the film was likhaa or directed by george Nolfi or stars mat Damon or emily kund.
the cast bhi shaamil Anthony Mackie, jon Slattery, maaikel keli, or terrence Stamp.

sodium azide is the inorganic yogic saath the formula NaN3.
is colorless namak is the gas-forming component in many car airbag pranaaliyon.
it is prayukt liye the taiyaari of other azide yogicon.
It is an ionic padaarth, is atyadhik soluble in jal, or is bahut acutely vishakt.
Double renbo and supernumerary rainbows on the andar of the praathmik chaap.
the chaaya of the photographer 's head on the neeche marks the kendra of the renbo vrutt ( antisolar point ).
a renbo is an optical or meteorological ghatana ki is caused by pratibimb of lite in water droplets in the dharti 's atmosphere, resulting in a varnakram of lite appearing in the aasmaan.
it takes the form of a multicoloured chaap.
rainbows caused by dhoop sadaa appear in the khand of aasmaan sidhe vipareet the surya.
in a `` primary renbo '', the chaap shows red on the outer bhaag or violet on the bhitari paksh.
This renbo is caused by lite being refracted jabaki pravesh a droplet of jal, then reflected andar on the back of the droplet and refracted again jab leaving it.
In a doguna renbo, a duusari chaap is dekhi baahar the praathmik chaap, or has the anukram of iske rang reversed, red facing toward the anya one, in dono rainbows.
is duusari rainbow is caused by lite reflecting twice andar jal droplets.
the roodhiwaadee party, officially the roodhiwaadee and Unionist party or colloquially referred to as the tory Party or the tories, is a centre-right rajnatik party in the United kingdom ki espouses the tatvagyan of kosa and angrejon unionism.
it is the largest political party in the sanyukt kingdom, being the largest single party in the house of comons saath 303 mps, the largest party in local government saath 9,391 parshadon, or the largest angrejon party in the europea parliament saath 25 meps.
it governs in gathbandhan saath the Liberal democrate, saath party netaa David Cameron as pradhan mantri.
the roodhiwaadee party was santhaapit in 1834, or thi one of do dominant partiyon in the 19th sadi, saath saath the udaar Party.
It badla iske naam to the roodhiwaadee or unionist party in 1912 baad merging with the udaar unionist party, haalanki that name is rarely prayukt or it is generally referred to as simply the roodhiwaadee Party.
in the 1920s, the Liberal vote greatly diminished or the shramik Party became the conservatives ' main virodhiyon.
roodhiwaadee Prime Ministers led sarkarein liye 57 saalo of the 20th sadi, including winston churchill ( 1940–45, 1951–55 ) and margaret Thatcher ( 1979–90 ).
thatcher 's kaarykaal led to wide-ranging aarthik udaarikaran and saw the conservatives become the sabase eurosceptic of the teen major partiyon.
the party thi returned to sarkari in gathbandhan, having vifal to jeet a majority, in 2010 antargat the adhik `` udaar '' netritv of David cameron.
in the europea parliament, the Conservatives hai the largest British party saath 25 meps, who baithna saath the soft eurosceptic europea conservatives and reformists ( ECR ) sansadeey samooh, jabaki the party itself is a sadsy of the Alliance of europea Conservatives or reformists ( AECR ) Europarty.
They are the third-largest party in the scottish parliament or second-largest in the welsh Assembly.
ve were formally alide to the ulster unionist party ( uup ) as bhaag of the Ulster Conservatives or unionists vyavastha, saath the uup philhal participating in the five-party uttari ireland Executive.
niyati 's child thi an amareeki r & B girl samooh jinaki final, or shaayad most recognizable, line-up comprised Beyoncé Knowles, Kelly rowland or Michelle williams.
formed in 1990 in Houston, Texas, Destiny 's Child sadasyon began unke musical endeavors as ladki 's time comprising, among others, noles, Rowland, LaTavia roberson or letoya luckett.
baad saalo of simit kamyaabi, they yahood hastakshrit to colombia record as niyati 's child.
niyati 's child was launched into mukhyadhara manyata following the relies of unke best-selling duusari album, the likhane 's on the Wall, which contained the number-one singles `` Bills, bills, bills `` or `` kah my naam ``.
despite najuk or commercial success, the group thi plagued by internal virodh and legal turmoil, as roberson or Luckett attempted to split isse the samooh 's manager mathew Knowles, citing favoritism of Knowles and rowland, uske daughter or bhanji, kramshah.
dono roberson or Luckett were jald replaced with williams or Farrah franklin ; however, in 2000, franklin was barkhaast, leaving them as a tikdi.
unke third album, Survivor, jisase contains vishaywastu the public interpreted as a channel to the samooh 's experience, contains the vishwavyaapee hits `` Independent Women ``, `` Survivor `` or `` bootylicious ``.
in 2002, ve announced a antaraal and re-united two years later for the relies of unke chauthi studio album, Destiny Fulfilled ( 2004 ).
niyati 's Child rai sold adhik than 50 lakh records vishwavyaapee to date.
Billboard patrika baandhane the samooh as ek of the mahanatam musical trios of sab samay, the naveen sabase kaamyaab artist/band of the 2000s, or lagaai the group 68th in iske All-Time Hot 100 kalakaaron suchi in 2008.
the Centers liye beemaari control or rokthaam ( sidisi ) is a sanyukt States sangheey agency antargat the vibhaag of swasthya and insaan sevaayen headquartered in Druid Hills, unincorporated dekalb county, georgia, in Greater atlanta.
It works to protect public swasthya or suraksha by providing information to badhayen swasthya nirnay, or it promotes swasthya through partnerships saath rajya swasthya vibhaag or other sanghathan.
the CDC focus neshnal dhyaan on vikasshil or applying disease rokthaam or control ( especially sankramak rogon or foodborne pathogens and anya microbial infections ), paryaavarniya swasthya, occupational suraksha or swasthya, swasthya promotion, injury rokthaam or shiksha kriyaayein designed to improve the swasthya of the people of the sanyukt rajya.
the sidisi is the sanyukt States ' neshnal public health santhaan and is a founding sadsy of the antarrashtriya sangh of neshnal public swasthya santhaan.
Earthquake bhavishyavaanee `` is praayah defined as the specification of the samay, sthaan, or pariman of a future bukamp bheetar stated had '', or visheshkar of `` the next strong bukamp to occur in a pradesh. ''
is can be vishisht isse earthquake forecasting, jisase is the probabilistic moolyankan of saamaanya earthquake jokhim, sahit the aavriti or magnitude of damaging bukamp, in a given area over avadhi of saalo or decades.
is can be further vishisht isse real-time bukamp warning systems, jisase, upon ditection of a severe bukamp, can provide neighboring regions a few second warning of potentially significant shaking.
to be upyogi, an bukamp prediction jarur be precise paryaapt to warrant the laagat of increased ehtiyaat, sahit disruption of ordinary kriyaayein or commerce, or samayik paryaapt that taiyaari can be bana.
purvanumaan jarur also be vishwasaneey, as galat alarms or radd sachetak are not tabhi economically costly, lakin seriously undermine vishwaas in, or thereby the prabhavakaarita of, koi dayaalu of warning.
With over 7,000 bukamp around the sansar prayek saal saath a magnitude of 4.0 or vrihad, naganya kamyaabi in earthquake prediction is easily obtained using fear vyapak paramiters of samay, sthaan, or pariman.
however, such naganya `` successful purvanumaan '' hai nahin useful.
pramukh bukamp hai often followed by reports ki ve were purvanumanit, or at tanik anticipated, lakin no arji of a kaamyaab prediction of a pramukh bukamp rai survived band inquiry.
in the 1970s vahin thi teevr ashavad amongst vaigyanikon that some vidhi of predicting bukamp might be found, lakin by the 1990s continuing failure led anek vaigyanikon to question whether it thi bhi sambhavit.
jabaki many scientists still hold ki, die paryaapt sansaadhan, bhavishyavaanee might be possible, anek anya maintain ki bukamp prediction is inherently naammumkin.
Deborah ain `` debby '' Ryan ( born May 13, 1993 ) is an amareeki actress, singer, sangeetkaar, songwriter and record nirmaataa.
rayaan is behtareen gyaat liye abhinit as Bailey picket in the dijani Channel asli Series The Suite jivan on deck.

wo is bhi gyaat liye appearing in the 2008 feature filmi the longshots as edith.
in 2009, she atithi strecchar in an episode of wizards of waverly place in wizards on deck saath Hannah montana as Bailey picket saath saath her anya cast mates isse The Suite jivan on Deck.
Then, in 2010, wo starred in the filmi 16 badhaaiyaan, jisase thi the sabase dekhi cabel kaarykram on the din of iske premier on the dijani channel.
16 badhaaiyaan introduced rayaan to new audiyans ; the film praapt high viewership in the adults janasankhyikee ( 18-34 ).

Released farvari 17, 2012.

Stührling tourbillon gati ( ).
in horology, a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an jod to the mechanics of a dekhen escapement.
viksit around 1795 by the French-Swiss ghadisaz abraham-louis breguet isse an pehle idea by the angrezi chronometer mekar jon Arnold, a tourbillon aims to counter the prabhaav of gambheertha by mounting the escapement and santulan wheel in a rotating pinjraa, to negate the effect of gambheertha jab the timepiece ( yun the escapement ) is stuck in a nishchit sthiti.
originally an attempt to improve sateekta, tourbillons hai still included in some mahangi aadhunik ghadiyaan as a vilakshantaa or demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity.
the yantriki is usually ujagar on the dekhen 's phase to dikhaaen it off.
the khidkiyaan installer ( previously gyaat as microsoft installer ) is a tantra ghatak prayukt for the sansthapana, maintenance, or hataanaa of software on aadhunik Microsoft Windows pranaaliyon.
the installation information, or praayah the filein themselves, hai packaged in installation package, loosely relational databases sanrachit as com Structured storages or commonly gyaat as `` msi filein '', isse their difolt sanchika extension.
Windows Installer contains significant parivartan isse iske purvavarti, Setup API.
nai suvidhaayen shaamil a jeeyuai fremawork or swachaalit generation of the uninstallation anukram.
khidkiyaan installer is positioned as an alternative to stand-alone executable installer frameworks aise as puraani versions of installshield or NSIS.
Microsoft encourages teesraa partiyon to upyog Windows installer as the aadhaar liye sansthapana frameworks, so that ve synchronize correctly saath anya installers or rakhana the aatanrik database of installed products satat.
mahatvapurn features aise as rollback or versioning nirbhar on a satat aatanrik database for vishwasaneey aaparishan.
furthermore, Windows installer facilitates the principle of tanik visheshadhikaar by performing software sansthapana by proxi liye unprivileged users.
chaar loko is a lakeer of alcoholic beverages, originally marketed as urja peya, bechi by phusion project of chicago, illinois.
Phusion operates as peya chaar brewing Company.
Four loko, the company 's most lokapriy peya, debuted in the United rajya market in 2005.
it is abhi bechi in 48 rajya, or in Canada, the bahama, bolivia, honduras, or europea.
The name `` chaar '' is niklaa isse the asli urja drink 's chaar pramukh ingredients : daaru, caffeine, taurine, or guarana.
Four branded utpaada have maharoom the object of vidhik, naitik, or swasthya concerns sambandhit to the company allegedly vipanan unhen to the underaged or the purported danger of combining alcohol or caffeine.
baad the peya thi bain in anek states, a product reintroduction in December 2010 removed caffeine, taurine, or guarana as ingredients, and the malt peya is no longer marketed as an urja peya.
The gardan of a guitar prardashit the nat ( in the prishthbhumi, coloured white ) or first chaar metal frets.
a fret is a uthaaya tatv on the gardan of a stringed yantra.
frets praayah extend aarpaar the puraa width of the neck.
on sabase modern pashchimi fretted yantra, frets hai metal strips inserted into the fingerboard.
on kuch historical yantra or non-european yantra, frets are bana of pieces of string tied around the gardan.
Frets divide the neck into phixd khand at intervals sambandhit to a musical framework.
on instruments such as guitars, each fret represents one semitone in the standard pashchimi pranali jahaan ek ashtak is vibhajit into baarah semitones.
fret is praayah prayukt as a kriya, arth bas `` to press bas the string behind a fret. ''
fretting praayah refers to the frets and/or their pranali of avasthiti.
vahin thi khapat of daaru dono dauraan or baad nishedh.
the 18th amendment prohibited the utpaadan, vitaran or sale of alcoholic peya in the sanyukt rajya or thi widely supported by the amareeki public jab it gai into prabhaav in 1920.
the temperance gati tha popularized the belief ki daaru thi the pramukh kaaran of sabase nijee or social problems and prohibition thi dekhi as the samaadhaan to the swadesh 's poverty, aparaadhon, violence, or other ills.
Upon ratification of the amendment, the famous enjeelwaadi billy sande said ki `` the slums hoga soon be only a memory.
We hoga turn hamaari prisons into kaarkaanon or hamaari jails into storehouses and corncribs. ''
( compare Christianity or daaru. )
chunki daaru thi to be bain or chunki it thi dekhi as the cause of sabase, if nahin all, aparaadhon, kuch communities bechi unke jails.
the swadesh was atyadhik ashaavadi or the agrani prohibitionist in the United States congress confidently asserted ki `` vahin is as much chance of repealing the Eighteenth amendment as there is liye a humingbard to fly to the grah mangal saath the Washington Monument tied to iske tail.”
the meter ( meter in amareeki angrezi ), ( SI ikai symbol : m ; si aayam symbol : l ), is the aadharbhoot ikai of lambaai in the antarrashtriya pranali of ikai ( si ).
originally intended to be ek ten-millionth of the distance from the dharti 's equator to the uttar Pole ( at samudr str ), iske paribhaasha rai maharoom periodically parishkrut to pratibimbit growing knowledge of metrology.
Since 1983, it rai maharoom paribhaashit as `` the lambaai of the path travelled by light in vaikum dauraan a samay interval of 1/299,792,458 of a duusari. ''
geologists exploring Jurassic sedimentary rox in makhtesh gadol, Negev marusthal, israel
geologists explaining the mahatv of volcanic raakh paraton to students on field in Iceland
a geologist is a vaigyanik jo adhyayan the solid or drav padaarth ki constitutes the dharti as khub as the processes or itihaas ki rai taraasha it.
geologists praayah engage in adhyayan bhuvigyaan.
geologists, studying adhik of an applied vigyaan than a saidhantik ek, jarur drushtikon bhuvigyaan using bhautikee, chemistry and jeevigyaan as khub as anya sciences.
geologists, compared to vaigyanikon sagaai in anya fields, hai generally adhik exposed to the bahari than rahakar in laboratories ; haalanki kuch geologists prefer to perform most of their studies in the lab.
geologists hai sagaai in khoji liye khanan companies in search of dhaatuon, oils, and other Earth resources.
ve hai bhi in the forefront of prakritik jokhimon and disasters warning or mitigation, adhyayan earthquakes, volcanic kaaryaklap, tsunamis, weather toofaan, and the jaise ; unke adhyayan hai prayukt to warn the saamaanya public of the occurrence of ye kaarykram.
philhal, geologists hai bhi engaged in the charchaa of jalwaayu badalen, as ve padhai the itihaas and evidence liye this dharti prakram.
neeche is a comprehensive drill or tap aakaar chart liye all drills, imperial or metric, or tap up to 36.5 mm.
Modern vaikum tubes, mostly miniature style
in electronics, a vaikum tub, electron tub ( in uttar america ), tapayanic valve, tub, or valve is a device controlling electric vartmaan through a vaikum in a sealed container.
the sangraahak is praayah patala transparent glass in a roughly belanaakaar shape.
the saralatam vacuum tub, the diod, is essentially an incandescent light bulb saath an added electrode andar.
When the balb 's filament is heated white-hot, electrons are `` boiled '' band iske sataha and into the vaikum andar the balb.
if the electrode -- called a `` thali '' or `` dhanagar '' -- is made more dhanatmak than the hot filament, a direct vartmaan bahati through the vaikum to the electrode ( a demonstration of the Edison prabhaav ).
as the vartmaan tabhi bahati in ek direction, it makes it possible to badalen an prayavarti vartmaan lagu to the philament to sidhaa current.
the parichay of a third electrode, a grid between the philament or the thali, yields another function.
A voltage lagu to the grid niyantran the vartmaan flowing from the philament to the thali.
Thus, it allows the device to be prayukt as an electronic pravardhak.
vaikum tubes are thus prayukt liye rectification, pravardhan, switching, or similar prasanskaran or sristi of electrical signals.
The vast majority of aadhunik day tubes consist of a sealed sangraahak with a vaikum andar, or essentially rely on tapayanic utsarjan of electrons from a hot philament or a cathod heated by the philament.
kuch apwaad to this hai dealt saath in the section parichay gas-filled tubes neeche.
vaikum tubes yahood najuk to the vikaas of electronic praudyogiki, jisase drove the expansion and vyavsyeekaran of radio prasaaran, television, radar, dhwani reinforcement, dhwani recording and reproduction, large telephone sanjaal, analog and digital computer, or industrial prakram control.
haalanki some anuprayog tha counterparts using pehle technologies such as the chingaari gap transmeter or mechanical computer, it was the invention of the vacuum tub saath teen electrodes ( called a triode ) or iske kaabiliyat of electronic amplification ki made ye technologies faili or vyaavhaarik.
in sabase anuprayog, solid-state divaais aise as transistors or anya semiconductor devices have replaced tubes.
solid-state divaais last longer and are choti, adhik efficient, adhik vishwasaneey, or sasta than tubes.
Tubes can be fragile, sometimes generate significant anaavashyak ooshmaa, and can lo anek seconds—many minutes in najuk applications—after powering on to garam to a temperature jahaan ve perform bheetar operational sahishnutaa.
however, tubes still find upyog jahaan solid-state devices have nahin been viksit, hai avyavhaarik, or where a tub has shreshth performance, as saath kuch divaais in peshewar audio or high-power radio transmitters.
Tubes are still produced liye aise anuprayog.
Tubes hai kam likely than semiconductor divaais to be destroyed by the electromagnetic pulse produced by nuclear visphot or geomagnetic toofaan produced by daanav saura flares.
skittles is a brands of fruit-flavoured mithai, currently utpaadit or marketed by the Wm. wrigley jr. company, a prabhag of Mars, Inc.
ve have mushkil sugar shells jisase carry the akshar s.
the andar is mukhyatah sugar, makai syrup, or hydrogenated tad karnel aayal along with fal ras, citric acid, and prakritik or artificial flavours.
The confectionery rai maharoom bechi in a kismein of flavor sangrahan, such as teevr or junglee beri.
sar winston leonard spencer-churchill, ( 30 November 1874 – 24 janvari 1965 ) thi a British rajaneta jo was the Prime mantri of the sanyukt kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955.
widely regarded as one of the mahanatam wartime netao of the 20th sadi, Churchill thi also an adhikari in the British Army, a itihaaskaar, a lekhak, or an artist.
he is the only angrejon pradhan Minister in history to have praapt the nobel puraskaar in sahitya, or was bhi the pehla vyakti to be bana an maanad Citizen of the sanyukt rajya.
Churchill thi born into an vaibhavshaalee parivaar as the pota of the 7th Duke of marlborough.
His father, Lord randolph churchill, thi a charismatic rajaneta jo parosa as Chancellor of the exchequer ; his mother, Jennie Jerome, thi an amareeki socialite.
as a yang fouj adhikari, he saw action in angrejon india, the sudan, or the duusari boar yuddh.
He gained fame as a yuddh correspondent or likhaa kitabe parichay uske abhiyaan.
At the forefront of raajnneeti liye pachaas saalo, he held anek rajnatik or cabinet positions.
pehle the pehla sansar yuddh, he parosa as President of the Board of vyapaar, ghar sachiv, and pehla rab of the admiralty as bhaag of the asquith udaar government.
dauraan the war, he jari as pehla rab of the admiralty until the vinaashkari gallipoli Campaign caused uske prasthaan isse sarkari.
he then briefly resumed active army seva on the pashchimi saamne as commander of the 6th batalian of the royal scots fusiliers.
he returned to sarkari as mantri of munitions, sachiv of rajya liye War, and Secretary of rajya liye air.
baad the yuddh, churchill served as Chancellor of the exchequer in the Conservative ( baldwin ) sarkari of 1924–29, controversially returning the pound sterling in 1925 to the sunaharaa maanak at its pre-war parity, a move widely seen as creating deflationary dabaav on the uk economy.
Also vivaadaaspad thi uske vipaksh to increased ghar rule liye India or uske resistance to the 1936 abdication of Edward viii.
out of daftar or politically `` in the wilderness '' dauraan the 1930s, churchill took the sise in warning parichay naaji germany and in campaigning liye rearmament.
On the outbreak of the duusari sansar War, he was again niyukt pehla rab of the admiralty.
following the resignation of nevilly chemberlen on 10 may 1940, Churchill became pradhan mantri.
uske vafaadaar refusal to consider shikast, aatmasamarpan, or a sulah peace helped inspire angrejon pratirodh, visheshkar dauraan the difficult jaldi dinon of the War jab britain stood alon among europea countries in its kriyasheel vipaksh to Adolf hitler.
churchill was visheshkar vikhyath for uske speeches or radio prasaaran, jisase helped inspire the British logon.
he led Britain as pradhan mantri jabatak victory over naaji Germany had maharoom secured.
baad the roodhiwaadee party khoyaa the 1945 chunaav, he became netaa of the vipaksh to the shramik ( attlee ) government.
baad jeetna the 1951 chunaav, he again became pradhan mantri, pehle retiring in 1955.
upon his maut, Elizabeth ii granted use the izzat of a rajya antyeshti, jisase dekhi ek of the largest sabhaaon of sansar kootneetigyon in history.
namit the mahanatam briton of sab samay in a 2002 pole, Churchill is widely regarded as being among the most influential logon in angrejon itihaas.

The ghat fokas is a compact car ( c-segment in europea ) manufactured by the Ford Motor company chunki 1998.
ghat began bikri of the fokas to europea in july 1998 or in uttar America dauraan 1999 for the 2000 model saal.
In Europe, dakshin America, uttar america or dakshin africa, the fokas replaced the various sanskaran of the ghat anurakshan bechi in those bazaar.
in asia or Australasia, it replaced the ghat leisure.
as of the first half of 2012, the fokas surpassed the toyota corola to become the world 's behtareen selling automobile nameplate.
the fokas rai maharoom considered ek of the 50 greatest gaadiyaan of the past fifty saalo by angrejon magazine CAR.
An agar thali -- an udhaaharan of a bacterial vikaas medium.
Specifically, it is a streak plate ; the orange lines or dots hai formed by bacterial colonies.
a growth medium or samskruti medium is a drav or gel designed to support the vikaas of microorganisms or cells, or choti paudhe like the moss physcomitrella patens.
vahin hai alag prakaar of media liye growing alag prakaar of koshikaayen.
vahin hai do major prakaar of growth media : those used liye koshika samskruti, jisase use vishisht cell prakaar niklaa from plants or pashu, or microbiological samskruti, jisase are prayukt for growing microorganisms, such as jeevanu or khamir.
the sabase aam vikaas media liye microorganisms hai nutrient broths and agar platon ; specialized media hai sometimes required liye microorganism or koshika samskruti growth.
Some jeevon, termed sukumaar jeevon, aavashyaktaa specialized environments due to jatil nutritional aavashyaktaayen.
virus, liye udhaaharan, hai obligate intracellular paraseete or aavashyaktaa a vikaas medium containing living koshikaayen.
a hunar agent, or booking agent, is a person who finds kaary liye actors, lekhak, filmi nirdeshkon, sangeetkaaron, models, nirmaataa, peshewar athlete, writers or other logon in various entertainment businesses.
An agent bhi defends, supports or promotes the byaaj of his/her client.
Agents can nahin produce unke own shows due to virodh of byaaj.
a talent agent jarur be parichit saath their client.
an agent rai to jaan kayaa dayaalu of kaary the client can or can nahin do in anukram to match them saath vibhinn jobs.
having an agent is nahin required, but karata sahaayta the kalakaar in getting kaary.
in anek cases dhalaai nirdeshkon, or anya businesses, go to talent agenciyon to find artists ve hai looking liye.
the agent is sashulk a percentage of the star 's earnings ( typically 10 % ).
agenton sometimes hoga be referred to as `` 10 percenters. ''
There hai different regulations ki govern alag types of agenton ki hai sthapit by kalakaar 's sangh or the vidhik jurisdiction in jisase the agent operates.
There are also peshewar sanghathan ki license hunar agenciyon.
chunki the manaahi in viewership in theatre, isse the 1950s to 1960s, this caused a smaarkeey shift in kaisaa studios would produce films and yun reducing the laagat of vishesh and mahangi abhinaytaon.
abhinaytaon and abhinetriyon yahood working liye the studios but yahood not owned by ek major studio antity or so yahood samarth to work on within unke time or saath anya studios.
kuki of this, agenton yahood abhi seen as a necessity bajaay of an option.
Agents abhi became teesraa partiyon ki negotiated between studios and client, this making unke sevaayen imperative between prayek party.
Since hunar agencies hai working saath lucrative contracts, sab talent agencies jarur be licensed antargat khaas bhaag of the California Labor code, which kals an agent a `` vyakti or nigam jo engages in the occupation of procuring, offering, promising, or attempting to procure employment liye kalakaar or kalakaaron. ''
mangal rai do gyaat moons, Phobos or deimos, jisase are thought to be captured kshudragrah.
dono satellites yahood khoja in 1877 by Asaph Hall or hai namit baad the characters Phobos ( panic/fear ) and Deimos ( terror/dread ) jo, in unani mythology, accompanied their pita aries, god of yuddh, into battle.
aries thi gyaat as mangal to the romans.
It is possible ki mangal may have moons choti than 50 - 100 meter or a dust ring between phobos or deimos may be present lakin none have maharoom discovered.
in vidhi pravartan parlance, the pad hatya kitaab refers to the case sanchika of a murder chaanbin.
typically, hatya books include crime jhaanki photographs or sketches, postmortem or forensic reports, transcripts of investigators ' tip or gavaah saakshaatkaar.
The murder kitaab encapsulates the puraa paper trail of a hatya chaanbin, isse the samay the murder is pehla reported through the giraftaar of a suspect.
vidhi enforcement agenciyon typically guard hatya kitabe carefully, or it is asaamaanya for nagarikon to be die unfettered access to these kinds of record, especially liye ansulajhaa maamle.
a melon baller
melon genden hai genden of melon made using a melon baller ki varies isse around 1 centimeter to 3 centimetre ( parichay 3/8 inch to 1 inch ).
They hai generally prayukt in fal salad.
A ksa, or gyaan, kaushal, and Abilities, is a series of katha kathan ki hai jaruri jab applying to sanyukt rajya sangheey sarkari job openings.
ksas hai prayukt to determine, along with resumes, jo the behtareen applicants are when anek ummidavaar qualify for a job.
The knowledge, kaushal or abilities ( ksas ) necessary liye the successful pradarshan of a sthiti are contained on each job rikti announcement.
in 2009 the Office of Personal Management poocha sangheey agencies to roke requiring job aavedakon to bharan out the questionnaires, to be phased out within a saal.
ksas hai brief or kendrit essays parichay ek 's kariyar and educational prishthbhumi ki presumably qualify ek to perform the kartavya of the position being lagu liye.
a gyaan, kaushal, or abilities ( ksa ) is a concise nibandh parichay ek 's hunar and expertise and sambandhit anubhavon ( kaary, shiksha, swayamsevi ) and accomplishments.
a shrenee of KSA kathan are praayah jaruri jab applying liye sabase federal sarkari or kuch state and nagar government kaary.
KSAs hai prayukt as a gaj to assess the capabilities of a prospective applicant in sharten of sambhavit ability to perform the kartavya of the job.
sabase government bhartee officials look for a choti, kurkure or saaf ksa ki emphasizes parinaam or accomplishments praapt in pichhlaa work.
KSA kathan are also known as moolyankan karkon.
anya agencies sometimes call unhen `` Rating karkon '', `` visheshta ranking karkon '', `` Knowledge, abilities, kaushal and Other visheshtaayen '', or `` Job tatv ''.
the name can be bas a naam but praayah it prabhaav saamagree and lambaai of the essay.
Every agency has iske apana regulations lakin sabase of the samay the each KSA factor should be 1/2 to 11⁄2 prishthon long.
The neeche paribhaashaayen hai paribhaashit by the U.S. daftar of Personnel prabandhan :
gyaan, Skills, or abilities ( KSAs ) - The gun jaruri to perform a job and are generally demonstrated through qualifying seva, shiksha, or prashikshan.
gyaan - Is a body of soochna applied directly to the pradarshan of a falan.
kaushal - Is an observable competence to perform a siikhe psychomotor adhinium.
kshamta - Is competence to perform an observable bartaav or a bartaav ki parinaam in an observable utpaada.
The scoring of ksa essays is based on a scale of from ek to 100.
job aavedakon must score upar 70 to be mana for the sthiti.
unchi scores are niklaa through answering the KSA question as specifically as sambhavit, providing udhaaharan isse pichhlaa employment or prashikshan ki clearly demonstrate you meet the yogyata.
jab applying to sangheey sarkari sthitiyaan, a sangheey punararambh is praayah required in jod to ksa kathan.

Love Always is the debyue album of amareeki R & B duo k-ci & jojo, released on june 17, 1997, by MCA record.
it thi recorded at vibhinn studios in New york or the los angeles area in 1996 or 1997.
It was produced by JoJo or anek anya, sahit devante jhule, james Mtume, and Jeff redd.
the duo were originally a bhaag of jodeci pehle is album.
The album peaked at chathe on the US Billboard 200 and bhi appeared on international charts.
the single `` sab my jivan `` charted kramank ek in multiple deshon, or sab chaar of the album 's singles peaked upar the sheersh 25 in the us hot r & b/hip-hop geeton or the nai Zealand sheersh 40 singles.
prem Always was praapt favorably by aalochakon, who praised the brothers ' gayan kshamta or the utpaadan.
the album rai been certified three times platinum by the Recording udyog Association of america ( riaa ) and sunaharaa by music Canada and ifpi sweden.
as of June 1999 it tha bechi 2.9 million nakal in the sanyukt States.
a variable-rate bandhak, adjustable-rate bandhak ( bhujaa ), or tracker mortgage is a bandhak rin saath the byaaj rate on the note periodically samyojit aadhaarit on an anukramanika which reflects the laagat to the lender of udhaar on the credit markets.
The loan may be offered at the lender 's maanak parivartaneey chuhaake/ aadhaar rate.
vahin may be a sidhaa and legally-defined link to the underlying anukramanika, lakin jahaan the lender offers no specific kadi to the underlying market or anukramanika the rate can be badla at the lender 's discretion.
The term `` variable-rate mortgage '' is most aam baahar the sanyukt rajya, whilst in the sanyukt rajya, `` adjustable-rate bandhak '' is sabase aam, or implies a mortgage regulated by the Federal sarkari, with caps on aarope.
in anek deshon, samyojya rate mortgages hai the norm, or in aise sthaan, may bas be referred to as mortgages.
among the sabase aam indices hai the daron on 1-year constant-maturity rajkosh ( cmt ) pratibhuti, the Cost of nidhi anukramanika ( cofi ), or the London interbank Offered Rate ( libor ).
A few lenders use unke apana laagat of nidhi as an anukramanika, balki than using anya indices.
is is kiya to ensure a steady hashia for the lender, whose apana laagat of funding hoga praayah be sambandhit to the anukramanika.
Consequently, bhugtan bana by the borrower may change over samay saath the changing byaaj rate ( alternatively, the pad of the loan may badalen ).
This is distinct isse the graduate bhugtan bandhak, jisase offers changing bhugtan amounts lakin a fixed byaaj rate.
anya form of bandhak loan shaamil the interest tabhi bandhak, the phixd rate mortgage, the rinatmak amortization bandhak, or the gubbaaraa bhugtan bandhak.
samyojya daron transafar part of the byaaj rate risk from the lender to the borrower.
ve can be prayukt jahaan manamaujee byaaj daron mek phixd rate lone mushkil to obtain.
The borrower laabh if the byaaj rate jalprapaat but loses if the interest rate increases.
the borrower benefits isse ghataya margin to the underlying cost of udhaar compared to phixd or capped rate mortgages.
the assassination of robert francis `` bobby '' kennedy, a sanyukt States seenetter or brother of assassinated adhyaksh John fitzgerald `` joker '' kennedy, took place shortly after midnight on june 5, 1968, in los angeles, California, dauraan the abhiyaan ritu for the United rajya adhyakshiya chunaav, 1968.
baad jeetna the california or dakshin dakota praathmik chunaavon liye the loktantric namakan liye adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya, kennedy was shot as he walked through the rasoighar of the doot hotel or died in the Good samari hospital twenty-six hours baad.
sirhan sirhan, a 24-year-old philistini / jordan immigrant, thi convicted of Kennedy 's hatya or is sevarat a life vaakya liye the aparaadhon.
Sirhan 's vakil have released statements claiming pramaan ki he thi framed.
the shooting thi ankit on audio tape by a freelance newspaper reporter, or the aftermath was captured on filmi.
kennedy 's deh lay in repose at st. patric 's girjaghar in nai York liye two days before a antyeshti dravyaman was yojit on june 8.
His deh thi interred near his bhai jon at arlington neshnal kabristaan.
uske maut prompted the suraksha of presidential ummidavaar by the United rajya Secret seva.
huebert humphrey went on to jeet the loktantric namakan liye the presidency, lakin ultimately narrowly khoyaa the chunaav to richard nicksan.
As saath uske bhai Jack 's death, bobby 's hatya or the halaaton surrounding it have shakhit a kismein of shadyantr theories.
as of 2013 kennedy remains ek of tabhi do baithe sanyukt rajya seenetteron to be assassinated ( the anya hone huey long ).
The aadhunik aayu of comic kitabe is an anaupchaarik naam for the kaal in the history of mukhyadhara amareeki comic kitabe generally mana to pichhlaa isse the mid-1980s jabatak upasthit day.
in is kaal, comic kitaab varna generally became gaharaa or adhik psychologically jatil, creators became better-known or active in changing the udyog, swatantra comics flourished, and larger publishing gharon became adhik commercialized.
an vaikalpik naam liye this kaal is the andhera aayu of comic kitabe, due to the lokapriyata or artistic influence of grim sheershak, aise as or wachamen.
jab Harry mili saili... is a 1989 amareeki romantic kamedi filmi written by nora Ephron or nirdeshit by Rob reiner.
It stars billy Crystal as Harry or Meg rayaan as saili.
the story folo the sheershak varna isse the samay ve milen bas before sharing a cross-country drive, through baarah saalo or so of chance muthbhedon in nai York nagar.
the filmi uthaata the sawaal `` can main and mahilaon kabhi bas be friends ? '' or advances many vichaar about sambandh ki became household avadharanaon, such as those of the `` '' garlfriend and the `` transitional person ''.
the origins of the filmi aae isse reiner 's return to single life baad a talaak.
an interview ephron conducted with Reiner provided the basis liye harry.
saili thi aadhaarit on ephron or kuch of uske friends.
crystal came on falak or made uske own contributions to the patakatha, bananaa harry funnier.
ephron supplied the dhaancha of the filmi with much of the samvaad aadhaarit on the real-life friendship between Reiner or crystal.
The soundtrack consists of maanakon performed by harry connick, jr., saath a big band or orcestra arranged by Marc Shaiman.
Connick jiti his first grami Award liye behtareen jaiz purush gayan Performance.
colombia tasviren released the filmi using the `` manch '' technique, which involved kholane it in a few chune shaharon, letting dhanatmak shabd of mouth generate byaaj, or tab dhire expanding vitaran over subsequent weeks.
jab harry mili saili... grossed a total of US $ 92.8 million in North America.
ephron received a angrejon academy filmi puraskaar, an auskar namakan, or a lekhak gild of america Award namakan liye uske screenplay.
the filmi is kramit 23rd on eeffai 's 100 saalo... 100 Laughs suchi of the sheersh kamedi films in American cinema or number 60 on Bravo 's `` 100 funniest Movies ''.
in early 2004, the film thi adapted liye the stage in a production abhinit luk peri or alyson haningan.
