hamburger Helper is a line of packaged food products primarily consisting of boxed pasta bundled with a packet or packets of powdered sos or seasonings.
the contents of prayek baksaa hai sanyukt saath browned maidan bif, jal and milk to banaaen a complete dish.
the utpaada line also features utpaada saath anya starches aise as rice or potatoes bajaay of pasta.
it is bana by saamaanya Mills.
haalanki the clasik boxed hamburger helper utpaada only supplai the mand mad or the sauce packets, kuch varieties of the utpaada include maidan bif.
ye shaamil a frozen khaanaa lakeer, jisase features kuch of the brands 's classic varieties in a puraa bhojan kit form, saath frozen maidan bif and frozen sos packaged separately from the noodles in the same thilaa.
There is also an `` tatkaal '' sanskaran of Hamburger helper containing nirjalit maance, noodles and seasonings in a small thili, requiring tabhi jal to be added.
the hamburger helper shubhankar is the `` Helping haath '', an anthropomorphic animated, chaar fingered left-hand dastaane, jisase appears in the utpaada 's television commercials or on the packages.

a dwarf grah is a planetary-mass object that is neither a grah nor a satellite.
adhik explicitly, the antarrashtriya khagoleey sangh ( iau ) defines a bouna grah as a celestial body in direct orbit of the Sun ki is vishaal paryaapt for its shape to be niyantrit by gravitation, lakin that naapsand a grah has nahin saaf iske kakshiya pradesh of anya vastuen.
the term dwarf grah thi apanaaya in 2006 as part of a three-way categorization of laashen orbiting the Sun, brought parichay by an badhayen in discoveries of trans-neptunian vastuen ki rivaled Pluto in size, and aakhirkaar precipitated by the discovery of an bhi more vishaal object, eris.
is vargeekaran states ki laashen large paryaapt to have cleared the neighbourhood of unke kaksha hai paribhaashit as grah, jabaki those ki are nahin massive paryaapt to be rounded by unke apana gravity are paribhaashit as small saura pranali bodies.
bouna grah come in between.
The exclusion of bouna grah isse the roster of grah by the iau has maharoom dono praised and criticized ; it thi kaha to be the `` sahi decision '' by mike bhura, jo discovered or anya nai dwarf grah, lakin rai maharoom rejected by alan Stern, jo tha coined the term bouna planet in 1990.
the iau philhal recognizes five bouna planets in the saura System :, pluto,,, or.
however, tabhi do of these bodies, Ceres and Pluto, have been observed in enough vivaran to demonstrate ki ve anuroop the paribhaasha.
Eris rai maharoom sweekrut as a bouna planet kuki it is more vishaal than pluto.
the iau subsequently decided that unnamed trans-neptunian objects with an nirpeksh pariman ujjwal than +1 ( or hence a vyas of ≥838 km assuming a jyamitiya albido of ≤1 ) hai to be namit under the assumption that ve hai bouna planets.
the tabhi do aise vastuen known at the samay, makemake or Haumea, went through is naming procedure or yahood declared to be bouna grah.
it is suspected ki another sau or so gyaat objects in the Solar pranali hai dwarf planets.
estimates hai ki up to 200 dwarf grah may be mila jab the sampurna region gyaat as the kuiper belt is chaan, or that the kramank may exceed 10,000 jab vastuen bikhare baahar the Kuiper belt are mana.
vyaktigat khagolashastriyon recognize anek of ye, or in agast 2011 mike bhura published a suchi of 390 pratyaashee vastuen, ranging isse `` nearly nishchit '' to `` possible '' bouna planets. '
Brown identifies nine gyaat vastuen – the paanch sweekrut by the iau plus,,, or – as `` vastutah nishchit '', saath another do darjan atyadhik sambhavit, or vahin hai probably a sau or so aise objects in total.
the vargeekaran of bodies in anya grahiy pranaaliyon saath the characteristics of bouna planets rai nahin maharoom addressed.
a debit card ( bhi gyaat as a bainko card or check card ) is a plastic payment card ki provides the cardholder electronic abhigam to his or her bainko khaataa ( s ) at a vittiya sanstha.
kuch taash have a bhandaarit maan with jisase a payment is bana, while sabase relay a sandesh to the cardholder 's bainko to withdraw nidhi isse a payee 's designated bank khaataa.
the card, jahaan sweekrut, can be used bajaay of cash jab bananaa purchases.
In kuch maamle, the primary khaataa kramank is abantit exclusively liye use on the antarjaal or vahin is no shaareerik card.
in anek deshon, the upyog of debit taash has become so widespread that unke awaz has overtaken or entirely replaced cheques or, in kuch instances, nakadi transactions.
The vikaas of debit cards, unlike credit taash or charge taash, has generally been desh specific resulting in a kramank of alag systems around the sansar, jisase yahood praayah asangat.
chunki the mid-2000s, a kramank of initiatives have allowed debit cards issued in one country to be prayukt in anya countries or anumat unke upyog liye antarjaal or phone purchases.
naapsand credit or charge taash, bhugtan using a debit card hai tatkaal transferred isse the cardholder 's designated bainko khaataa, bajaay of unhen paying the dhan back at a baad date.
debit taash praayah bhi allow liye tatkaal vaapasi of cash, acting as the atm card liye withdrawing nakadi.
vyapaariyon may bhi prastaav cashback suvidhaayen to graahak, jahaan a customer can withdraw nakadi saath with unke purchase.
Francois Henri `` joker '' lalanne ( September 26, 1914 - janvari 23, 2011 ) thi an amareeki fitaness, kasarat, or nutritional visheshgy and prerak speaker jo is sometimes pukaara `` the godfadar of fitness '' and the `` first fitaness superhiro. ''
he varnit himself as hone a `` sugarholic '' or a `` junk khaanaa junkie '' jabatak he thi 15.
he bhi tha behavioral samasyaayein, lakin `` turned uske jivan around '' baad listening to a public lacture by paul bragg, a well-known nutrition spikar.
During uske career, he aae to maananaa ki the desh 's overall swasthya depended on the swasthya of iske janasankhyikee, likhane ki `` shaareerik samskruti or nutrition — is the moksh of america. ''
dashakon before swasthya or fitaness began being prachaarit by hastiyaan jaise jine phonda or richard simons, lalanne was already widely pahachaanaa liye saream upadesh the health laabh of regular kasarat or a shubh diet.
he published numerous books on fitaness or hosted a fitaness television dikhaaen between 1953 or 1985.
as jaldi as 1936, at aayu 21, he opened ek of the swadesh 's pehla fitaness gyms in ockland, California, jisase became a prototip for darjanon of samaan gyms using his name.
One of uske 1950s television kasarat kaarykram was aimed toward mahilaon, jisko he also protsaahit to juden uske health club.
he invented a kramank of kasarat mashine, including leg-extension or pulley divaais.
besides producing uske own series of video, he coached the bujurg or niskriy nahin to forgo kasarat, believing it hota enable unhen to badhayen their shakti.
lalanne bhi gained manyata liye uske success as a bodybuilder, as well as liye uske prodigious feats of shakti.
arnald shwarzanegar ekbar stated, `` That joker lalanne 's an animal !, '' baad lalanne, at 54, beat a 21-year-old Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an anaupchaarik contest.
on the avasar of LaLanne 's death, shwarzanegar credited lalanne liye hone `` an apostle for fitness '' by preranadai `` arabon sab over the sansar to sajiv healthier jeevandaan, '' or, as rajyapal of california, had pehle placed use on uske Governor 's parishad on shaareerik Fitness.
steve reeves credited lalanne as uske prerana to nirmaan uske muscular physique while keeping a slim qamar.
he thi inducted to the california haul of kirti or rai a star on the hollywood Walk of kirti.
air forces of sabase of the countries upyog pranali samaan to sena.
however, the raf or the air forces of many rashtramandal countries, or those formerly under a British influence, use a different set of baandhane loosely aadhaarit on naval equivalents ; leftinent, Commander, Captain or commodore are prefixed liye air force upyog saath udaan, wing, Group or air, kramshah ( the pehla three hone the ikai ki ve used to cmand ).
penallope Cruz Sánchez ( ; born april 28, 1974 ) is a spani abhinetri.
hastakshrit by an agent at age 15, wo made uske acting debyue at 16 on television and uske feature film debyue the following saal in Jamón, jamón ( 1992 ), to najuk acclaim.
Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s shaamil kholen apana ankhen ( 1997 ), The Hi-Lo desh ( 1999 ), the ladki of apana sapano ( 2000 ) or stri on Top ( 2000 ).
Cruz achieved recognition liye uske sise bhoomikaaye in the 2001 films vanilla aasmaan or uda.
wo rai chunki built a kaamyaab kariyar, appearing in films from a wide range of jati, including the kamedi waking Up in reno ( 2002 ), the thriller gothika ( 2003 ), the christmas movie Noel ( 2004 ), or the karrwai adventure Sahara ( 2005 ).
wo rai received najuk acclaim liye uske bhoomikaaye in Volver ( 2006 ) and Nine ( 2009 ) receiving Golden globe or academy Award nominations liye prayek.
wo won the academy Award liye behtareen supporting abhinetri in 2008 liye vicky christina barsilona.
She thi the pehla Spanish abhinetri in history to praapt an academy Award or the pehla spani actress to praapt a star at the Hollywood chalanaa of kirti.
Cruz rai modeled liye companiyaan aise as Mango, ralph lauren and l'oréal.
penallope and uske younger sister mónica cruge have designed vasteen for Mango.
wo rai daan dono uske samay or dhan to dharmarth.
Cruz rai volunteered in uganda and india, jahaan she kharch ek week working for Mother Teresa ; wo daan her selary isse ' to help nidhi the let nun 's mishan.
a wax murtikla of cruge hoga be lagaai in a premier spot in the grevin mom Museum in paris.
sanchika explorer, previously gyaat as Windows explorer, is a sanchika manager anuprayog or bhi a nevigation tool ki is included saath relies of the microsoft khidkiyaan oparating pranali isse khidkiyaan 95 onwards.
It provides a graphical upayokta interfes for accessing the sanchika systems.
it is bhi the ghatak of the operating system ki presents anek upayokta interfes items on the monitor such as the taskbar or desktop.
controlling the computer is sambhavit bagaiyr khidkiyaan Explorer kaaryshil ( liye example, the sanchika | chalaaen command in kaary Manager on nt-derived sanskaran of khidkiyaan will falan without it, as will commands typed in a cmand prompt khidki ).
Located in the C : \khidkinus nirdeshika, it is sometimes referred to as the Windows shell, explorer.exe, or bas “explorer”.
The parvaah Bears hai characters nirmit by amareeki Greetings in 1981 liye upyog on greeting taash.
the asli kalakriti liye the taash thi chitrit by artist Elena kucharik.
in 1983, kenner turned the Care bears into plush tedi bears.

Each parvaah bhaaluu aata in a alag color or has a specialized insignia on iske pet ki represents iske duty or vyaktitv.
This tamgaa thi known as unke `` tummy symbol. ''
however, the film parvaah bears : oopsy Does It ! renamed unhen `` pet baij ''.

antarraji 70 ( I-70 ) is an antarraji Highway in the sanyukt rajya ki ranon isse Interstate 15 nikat Cove fort, uta, to a Park or Ride nikat Baltimore, maryland.
it thi the pehla antarraji Highway project in the sanyukt rajya.
i-70 approximately traces the path of u.S. root 40 ( and also the boodha neshnal sadak ) east of the Rocky kyu.
West of the rockies, the route of i-70 thi niklaa isse anek strot.
i-70 is the paanchvaan longest antarraji rajmarg, after I-90, i-80, i-40, or I-10.
the nirmaan of i-70 in colorado and uta is considered an abhiyantriki aashcharya as the route passes through the ijanhavar Tunnel, glenwood canyon, or the san Rafael Swell.
the ijanhavar tunnel is the ucchtam point saath the antarraji rajmarg pranali saath an unnayan of.
the sections of the antarraji in Missouri and kansas have laid arji to be the pehla antarraji in the sanyukt States.
haalanki vivaadit, the sangheey rajmarg prashasan rai claimed the section of i-70 through glenwood Canyon, completed in 1992, thi the pichhlaa piece of the antarraji rajmarg pranali, as originally niojit, to kholen to trekkic.
photo of 1999 kul grahan
as dekhi isse the dharti, a saura grahan occurs jab the chandramaa passes between the Sun or Earth, or the chandramaa fully or partially block ( `` occults `` ) the surya.
This can happen tabhi at nai moon, jab the surya and the Moon are in conjunction as dekhi isse Earth in an sanrekhan referred to as syzygy.
in a total grahan, the disk of the Sun is fully obscured by the chandramaa.
in aanshik or annular eclipses only bhaag of the surya is obscured.
if the chandramaa yahood in a perfectly circular kaksha, a little closer to the Earth, or in the vahi orbital plane, vahin would be kul saura eclipses prayek single maah.
However, the chandramaa 's kaksha is inclined ( tilted ) at adhik than 5 degrees to dharti 's kaksha around the surya ( dekhie ecliptic ) so iske chaaya at nai chandramaa praayah misses dharti.
Earth 's kaksha is pukaara the ecliptic plane as the chandramaa 's orbit jarur cross is plane in anukram liye an grahan ( dono saura as khub as chandra ) to occur.
in jod, the chandramaa 's actual kaksha is andakaar, praayah lene it dur paryaapt dur isse dharti ki its apparent size is nahin vishaal paryaapt to blaak the surya totally.
The kakshiya planes cross prayek year at a line of nodes resulting in at tanik do, or up to five, saura eclipses occurring prayek year ; no adhik than do of jisase can be kul eclipses.
however, kul saura eclipses hai viral at koi particular sthaan kuki totality exists tabhi along a narrow path on dharti 's sataha traced by the Moon 's chaaya or umbra.
An grahan is a prakritik ghatana.
nevertheless, in some pracheen and aadhunik cultures, saura eclipses have been attributed to supernatural kalyankari or regarded as karaab shakunon.
a kul saura grahan can be frightening to people jo hai bekhbar of iske khagoleey explanation, as the surya seems to gaayab dauraan the day or the sky darkens in a padaarth of minutes.
kuki it is dangerous to dekh sidhe at the surya, observers chahie upyog khaas najar suraksha or apratyaksh dekhne takneekon when viewing a partial grahan, or the partial phases of a kul grahan.
it is safe to drishy the kul phase of a kul saura grahan saath the unaided najar or bagaiyr suraksha, however.
logon referred to as grahan chasers or umbraphiles hoga safar to remote sthitiyaan to observe or gavaah purvanumanit central saura eclipses.
A rajnatik party ( from, genitive partis, `` bhaag '', `` portion '' ) is a rajnatik organization ki typically seeks to influence, or entirely control, sarkari niti, praayah by nominating candidates with lakeer rajnatik views and trying to seat unhen in rajnatik daftar.
partiyon participate in chunavi abhiyaan and shaikshanik mangavane or virodh kriyaayein.
partiyon praayah espouse an ideology or drushti, expressed in a party kaarykram, bolstered by a written manch saath vishisht lakshya, forming a gathbandhan among disparate interests.
the mango is a fleshy stone fruit belonging to the genus mangifera, consisting of numerous tropical fruiting trees in the flowering sanyantr parivaar Anacardiaceae.
the aam is deshi to dakshin Asia, isse jahaan it rai maharoom vitarit vishwavyaapee to become ek of the most cultivated fal in the tropics.
jabaki anya mangifera species ( e.g. ghoda aam, M. foetida ) hai bhi grown on a adhik sthaniyakrut aadhaar, mangifera indica – the 'common aam ' or 'Indian mango ' – is the tabhi aam tree commonly cultivated in anek teevr or uposhna regions.
It is the neshnal fruit of india, pakistani and philippine.
in several samskritiyon, iske fal and leaves hai ritually prayukt as puspak sajaavat at vivaah, public jashn and dharmik ceremonies.
gil arnette byrd, < sandarbh naam > http : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/B/ByrdGi00.htm ( born farvari 20, 1961 in san francisco, california ) is a former peshewar American football khilaadi.
he thi a do samay Pro Bowl cornerback in 1991 or 1992 for the san diego chargers baad graduating from San jose State University.
byrd thi inducted into the chargers haul of kirti in 1998.
he was an all-city kaaryshil back and rakshaatmak waapas at lowell High skool ( San francisco ), helping to sise the Cardinals to the nagar championships in uske senior ritu of 1978.
World map prardashit the tropic of karkat
The tropic of karkat, bhi referred to as the Northern tropic, is the vrutt of akshansh on the dharti that marks the sabase northerly sthiti at jisase the surya may appear sidhe overhead at its zenith.
is event occurs ekbar per saal, at the samay of the june solstice, when the uttari Hemisphere is tilted toward the surya to its adhiktam extent.
It currently ( saal 2013 ) lies at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ uttar of the Equator.
iske dakshini golardh counterpart, ankan the sabase southerly sthiti at jisase the surya may appear sidhe overhead, is the Tropic of makar.
ye ooshnakaribandh are do of the paanch pramukh oopaadhi upayon or major circles of akshansh ki chihnit maanchitr of the Earth, besides the Arctic or antarctic vrutt and the equator.
The sthitiyaan of these circles of akshansh ( anya than the equator ) are likhavai by the jhukaav of the Earth 's axis of roteshan saapeksh to the plane of iske kaksha.
dvd-video is a upabhokta video swaroop prayukt to store digital video on dvd discs, or is philhal the prabal upabhokta video format in asia, North america, europea, or australia.
discs using the dvd-video specification aavashyaktaa a dvd drive or an h.262/mpeg-2 bhaag 2 dicoder ( e.g., a dvd khilaadi, or a computer dvd drive saath a tantra DVD player ).
vanijyik dvd movies hai encoded using a sangyojan of H.262/MPEG-2 bhaag 2 sampidit video and audio of varying swarup ( often multi-channel swarup as varnit neeche ).
typically, the aankada rate liye DVD filmon ranges isse 3 mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, or the bit rate is praayah anukuli.
it thi first available liye khudara around 1997.
the DVD-Video specification thi nirmit by dvd foram or can be obtained isse dvd format/logo licencing nigam liye a fee of $ 5,000.
the specification is nahin saream uplabdhiyaan, because every sadsy jarur chihn a non-disclosure anubandh.
nishchit information in the dvd Book is proprietary or confidential.
in computing or specifically Internet, a jonk is ek jo laabh, usually deliberately, isse anya ' soochna or praytn lakin does nahin prastaav anything in vaapasi, or makes only token offerings in an attempt to avoid hone pukaara a jonk.
in economics, is type of bartaav is pukaara `` free sawari '' or is sambhddha saath the free rider problem.
depending on context, leeching karata nahin necessarily refer to illegal upyog of computer sansaadhan, lakin praayah instead to greedy upyog according to etiquette : to wit, using too much of what is freely given without contributing a reasonable raashi waapas to the community ki provides it.
the naam derives from the jonk, an animal ki jhanjhat blood or then koshishen to leave unnoticed.
anya sharten hai used, aise as `` freeloader '', but jonk is the sabase aam.

The sanyukt States Postal Service ( usps ), bhi gyaat as the post Office or u.S. mail, is an independent agency of the sanyukt States federal government jimmedaar liye providing dak seva in the sanyukt rajya.
it is one of the few sarkari agencies explicitly authorized by the United rajya Constitution.
the USPS traces its jaden to 1775 during the Second mahadwipiya congress, jahaan benjamin franklin was niyukt the pehla postmaster saamaanya.
The cabinet-level Post daftar vibhaag thi nirmit in 1792 isse franklin 's aaparishan or roopantarit into iske vartmaan form in 1971 under the dak Reorganization Act.
The USPS employs over 574,000 majdoor or operates over 260,000 vehicles.
The USPS is the oparator of the largest gadee fleet in the sansar.
the usps is legally obligated to serve sab america, regardless of bhugol, at uniform daam and visheshta.
the usps rai exclusive abhigam to letter baks chihnit `` u.S. Mail '' or personal letterboxes in the United States, lakin still competes against nijee package delivery sevaayen, such as UPS or fedex.
the usps rai nahin sidhe received taxpayer-dollars since the jaldi 1980s with the naaballig excepshan of subsidies liye costs sambhddha with the niskriy and videshi matadaata.
chunki the 2006 all-time shikhar mail awaz, baad jisase congress passed the dak Accountability or enhancement adhinium ``, ( jisase mandated $ 5.5 billion per saal to be sashulk into an khaataa to pre-fund retiree health-care, 75 saalo into the future, a requirement adwitiya among sanghathan and vyavsaayon in the U.S. ), revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced ghatati mail awaz, prompting the dak service to dekh to anya strot of aay jabaki cutting costs to reduce its budget deficit.
washington, d.C. rai been the puunji of the United rajya chunki 1800.
aath anya shaharon have parosa as the baithak place liye Congress or hai isliye mana to have once maharoom the puunji of the United rajya.
In jod, prayek of the 50 u.S. rajya or the five principal territories of the sanyukt rajya maintains iske apana capital.
Princess kaaten diamond niyat in a ring
the rajkumaari kaaten is the duusari most popular kaaten aakaar liye diamonds, aglaa to a golakaar shandaar.
the face-up aakaar of the princess kaaten is vargakar or ytaakar or the profil or side-on shape is samaan to that of an inverted pyramid saath chaar beveled pahalu.
the rajkumaari kaaten is a apekshaakrit nai diamond kaaten, having maharoom nirmit in the 1960s.
it rai gained in lokapriyata in haal years as a adhik distinctive vaikalpik to the adhik lokapriy golakaar shandaar kaaten, in jisase the sheersh of diamond, called the crown, is kaaten saath a round face-up aakaar or the neeche, pukaara the mandap, is taraasha samaan to a cone.
A princess cut saath the same width as the vyas of a round shandaar will taul adhik as it has chaar kinare jisase would varanaa have maharoom cut band or rounded to form a golakaar brilliant.
the princess kaaten is sometimes referred to as a vargakar parivardhit shandaar.
however, while displaying the vahi high oopaadhi of brilliance, its faceting style is unique or completely alag from ki of a golakaar shandaar.
The rajkumaari kaaten tha its origins in the early `` French '' kaaten, having a step-modified `` double-french '' or `` cross '' kaaten crown or a series of adwitiya, chevron-shaped facets in the mandap which combine to de a pruthak cross-shaped pratibimb jab the stone is viewed sidhe through the table.
Effectively, the Princess kaaten combines the unchi oopaadhi of lite vaapasi of a golakaar shandaar kaaten saath a distinctive square or ytaakar aakaar.
The vargakar rajkumaari kaaten diamond is praayah slightly sasta than round shandaar kaaten eent of the vahi carat weight kuki it retains parichay 80 % of the ashisht diamond, as opposed to the round brilliant jisase retains tabhi parichay 50 % of the ashisht.
The kshamta to retain more crystal vazan makes is aakaar lokapriy amongst diamond cutters.
accredited gem appraisers ( AGA ) and amareeki gem Society prayogshaala ( agsl ) or europea Gem laboratories-usa ( egl-usa ) are philhal the tabhi labs that grad the Princess kaaten for kaaten.
vahin is no saarvbhaumik paribhaasha of what maap mek an ideal rajkumaari kaaten diamond or anek diamond manufacturers market adarsh diamonds saath differing facet pattern or kone as `` ideal cut ''.
In contrast to the agsl, AGA, or EGL-USA the gemological santhaan of america ( GIA ) rai stated ki vahin is nahin paryaapt industry consensus or anubhavjanya aankada to bataaen cut grading standards liye Princess kaaten diamonds or to do so is at the risk of consumers jo may be deceived by diamonds accompanied by nirgun adarsh or behtareen kaaten grad.
The naam `` rajkumaari kaaten '' thi originally prayukt in conection saath another diamond cut, otherwise gyaat as the `` profil '' cut, designed by arpad Nagy, a London kattar, in 1961.
The same name thi baad used or bana popular by ygal Perlman, betzalel Ambar, or israel Itzkowitz in israel in 1979.
A samaan kaaten saath tabhi 49 facets, as opposed to the original 58 facets of the rajkumaari kaaten, thi baad branded the `` quadrillion '' and initially vitarit by ambar eent in los angeles.
Three years of optical research yielded a vargakar stone saath faceting samaan to that of a round shandaar kaaten diamond.
a tulana
The kramank of chevrons can affect the overall outluk of a rajkumaari kaaten diamond.
is can praayah be sankalpit by the wire diagram ki is plotted in diamond grading reports.
by adding adhik chevrons on the mandap paksh of the diamond, the vyaktigat facets of the diamond hoga abhi be tutaa bas into choti facets.
as a parinaam, it can de a rajkumaari kaaten diamond a `` kuchal barf '' dekh.
vaais versa, jab a rajkumaari kaaten diamond has lesser chevrons, it tends to de the diamond a chanki outluk due to broader facets.
The domestic dog ( canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies of the dhoosar bhediya ( Canis lupus ), a sadsy of the canidaye parivaar of the mammalian anukram Carnivora.
The term `` gharelu shwaan '' is generally prayukt liye both domesticated or feral kismein.
the shwaan has maharoom the pehla animal to be domesticated or rai maharoom the sabase widely kept working, hunting, and paalatu animal in insaan history.
the shabd `` shwaan '' may bhi mean the purush of a canine species, as opposed to the word `` kutiya '' liye the female of the species.
MtDNA pramaan shows an vikasvaadi split between the aadhunik shwaan 's lineage or the aadhunik wolf 's lineage around 100,000 years pehle lakin,, the oldest fossil namoonon genetically linked to the modern dog 's lineage tithi to lagbhag 33,000-36,000 saalo pehle.
kutto ' value to jaldi insaan hunter-gatherers led to unhen quickly becoming sarvyaapee aarpaar sansar samskritiyon.
Dogs perform anek roles liye people, such as shikaar, herding, pulling loads, suraksha, assisting police or sainya, companionship, or, adhik recently, aiding handicapped individuals.
is prabhaav on insaan samaaj rai die unhen the upnaam `` Man 's behtareen dost '' in the Western sansar.
In kuch cultures, dogs are bhi a sorce of meat.
in 2001, vahin were anumaanit to be 400 lakh kutto in the sansar.
Most breeds of kutto are at sabase a few sau saalo boodha, having maharoom artificially chaynit liye particular morphologies and behaviors by logon liye vishisht kaaryaatmak roles.
through is chaynaatmak prajnan, the shwaan rai viksit into sainkadon of varied breeds, or shows adhik behavioral or morphological vibhinnata than koi anya land standhari.
liye example, height measured to the withers seemayen isse in the chihuahua to about in the irish wolfhound ; rang varies isse shwet through grays ( usually pukaara `` blue '' ) to black, and bhura from light ( tan ) to andhera ( `` red '' or `` chocolate '' ) in a chaudee variation of pattern ; coats can be choti or long, coarse-haired to wool-like, sidhaa, ghunghraale, or chikna.
it is common liye sabase breeds to shed is coat.
Diagram of a hastantaran electron sookshmdarshi
A 1973 siemens electron microscope, Musée des kala et métiers, Paris
An electron sookshmdarshi ( EM ) is a prakaar of microscope ki upyog an electron beam to illuminate a specimen or produce a magnified chitra.
An em rai vrihad resolving power than a lite microscope and can reveal the dhaancha of smaller vastuen kuki electrons have wavelengths parichay 100,000 times shorter than drishy light photons.
ve can achieve behatar than 50 pm rezolution or magnifications of up to parichay 10,000,000x whereas ordinary, non-confocal lite microscopes hai simit by diffraction to parichay 200 nm resolution or upyogi magnifications neeche 2000x.
The electron sookshmdarshi upyog electrostatic or electromagnetic lenses to control the electron beam or fokas it to rup an image.
ye electron optical lenses hai analogous to the kaanch lenses of a lite optical sookshmdarshi.
Electron microscopes hai used to investigate the ultrastructure of a chaudee range of biological or acarbonic namoonon sahit microorganisms, koshikaayen, vishaal molecules, biopsy namoonay, dhaatuon, or crystals.
industrially, the electron sookshmdarshi is often used liye quality control or vifaltaa vishleshan.
aadhunik electron microscopes produce electron micrographs, using specialized digital cameras or frame grabbers to capchar the image.
popeyes Louisiana rasoighar is a kadi of fried murga fast khaanaa restaraan santhaapit in 1972 in nai orlions, louisiana.
Often referred to as Popeyes and sometimes as popeyes murga & Biscuits or popeyes murga & seafood, it thi acquired by sandy sroton, georgia -based afc udhyamon, originally america 's pasandida murga company, in 1993.
according to a company press relies dinaak june 29, 2007, popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service murga restaraan samooh, measured by kramank of ikai '', saath adhik than 1,800 restaurants in adhik than 40 rajya and the zila of Columbia, and over 22 deshon vishwavyaapee sahit turkon, uttari Cyprus, bahrain, china, hong Kong, iraqi, Indonesia, jordan, kuwait, sanyukt arab Emirates, Japan, malaysia, saudi Arabia, dakshin korian, Singapore, Canada, Jamaica, Guyana, surinam, mexico, Trinidad, Puerto rico, honduras, vietnam, panama, peru, and costa rika.
parichay tees sthitiyaan hai company-owned, the baaki franchised.
the leg press is a weight training kasarat in which the vyaktigat pushes a vazan or pratirodh dur from them using unke legs.
the term leg dabaayen bhi refers to the apparatus prayukt to perform is kasarat.
the leg press can be prayukt to evaluate an khilaadi 's overall lower deh strength ( isse ghutana joint to hip ).
using the tiryak sled-type leg dabaayen yantra.
vahin hai do main prakaar of leg press:
The diagonal or lambavat 'sled ' type leg dabaayen.
vazan discs ( platon ) are sanlagn sidhe to the sled, jisase is arohit on rails.
The upayokta sits neeche the sled or pushes it upward with unke feet.
ye mashine saamanytah shaamil samyojya suraksha koshthak ki prevent the upayokta from hone funs antargat the vazan.
the 'cable ' prakaar leg dabaayen, or 'seated leg dabaayen ', commonly mila on multigyms.
The upayokta sits upright or pushes aage with their feet onto a thali ki is sanlagn to the vazan stack by means of a long steel cabel.
vendi Williams shikari ( born vendi jone williams ; July 18, 1964 ) is an amareeki media vyaktitv, abhinetri or lekhak.
wo host a syndicated television baat show, the Wendy Williams dikhaaen.
Prior to television, williams thi a `` shock jockette `` on anek radio shows.
williams rai gained surkhi for uske on-air spats saath celebrities.
wo was the vishay of the 2006 vh1 reality tv series pukaara The vendi Williams Experience jisase broadcast events surrounding uske radio dikhaaen.
She has written an aatmakatha or anek anya kitabe, or rai nirmit a product lakeer pukaara adorn by vendi williams.
Patrick henry `` deshadroh '' vaak pehle the House of Burgesses in an 1851 painting by Peter F. rothermel
`` de me swatantraaa, or give me death ! '' is a quotation attributed to patric henry from a vaak he bana to the virginia sammelan.
on ki day, at St. jon 's girijaghar in richmond, Virginia, or is credited saath having swung the balance in convincing the virginia house of burgesses to pass a rezolution delivering the virginia troops to the Revolutionary yuddh.
among the delegates to the convention yahood bhavishya us raashtrapatiyon thomas jeffrasan or george Washington.
Newfoundland and labrador (, locally ) is the easternmost praant of canada.
situated in the desh 's atlantic region, it incorporates the dweep of newfoundland or menland labrador to the northwest, saath a sanyukt kshetrafal of.
in 2011, the praant 's janasankhyikee was 514,536.
lagbhag 92 pratishat of the praant 's janasankhyikee jeevandaan on the dweep of newfoundland ( sahit iske sambhddha smaller islands ), of jisase more than half live on the avalon prayadweep.
the praant is canada 's sabase linguistically homogenous, saath 97.6 % of residents reporting angrezi ( newfoundland angrezi ) as unke maan jeebh in the 2006 janasankhyikee ;.
historically, newfoundland thi bhi ghar to unique varieties of french, or irish, as well as the now-extinct beothuk bhashaa.
in Labrador, local dialects of innu-aimun or inuktitut hai also bolaa.
newfoundland or labrador 's puunji or largest city, St. jon 's, is canada 's 20th-largest janasankhyikee mahanagar Area, or is ghar to lagbhag 40 pratishat of the praant 's population.
st. jon 's is the seat of sarkari, ghar to the house of Assembly of newfoundland or Labrador or the ucchtam adaalat in the kshetradhikaar, the Newfoundland or labrador adaalat of apil.
A purv upnivesh and dominian of the sanyukt Kingdom, newfoundland and labrador became the tenth praant to daalen the canadai canfederation on March 31, 1949, as newfoundland.
on December 6, 2001, an amendment thi bana to the samvidhan of canada to badalen the praant 's official naam to newfoundland or labrador.
In day-to-day vaartalap, however, canadians generally still refer to the praant itself as Newfoundland or to the pradesh on the canadai menland as labrador.
theodor `` T.R. ''
rujvelt, jr. ( ; aktubar 27, 1858—january 6, 1919 ) was the 26th adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya ( 1901–1909 ).
he is vikhyath liye his samrudh vyaktitv, dayera of ruchi or uplabdhiyaan, and uske leadership of the pragatisheel gati, as khub as his `` county `` persona and robust mardaangi.
He was a leader of the republican party or founder of the pehla avatar of the short-lived pragatisheel ( `` Bull Moose '' ) party of 1912.
pehle banane adhyaksh, he yojit karyaalayon at the nagar, rajya, and sangheey levels.
Roosevelt 's achievements as a naturalist, explorer, shikari, lekhak, or sipaahi hai as much a bhaag of uske kirti as koi daftar he yojit as a rajaneta.
rujvelt was 42 saalo boodha when sworn in as adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya in 1901, bananaa use the youngest adhyaksh kabhi ; he taal out the youngest elected adhyaksh, jon F. kennedy, by only ek saal.
rujvelt was bhi the pehla of tabhi teen sitting raashtrapatiyon to have jiti the nobel salaam puraskaar.
The tedi bhaaluu is namit after him, despite uske avmaananaa for hone pukaara `` tedi ''.
born into a wealthy parivaar in nai york nagar, rujvelt was a sickly child jo suffered isse asthma or stayed at home adhyayan natural itihaas.
to overcome uske physical kamazori, he embraced a zordaar jivan.
home-schooled, he became an eager chaatr of prakruti.
He attended harvard vishvavidhyalayon, where he studied jeevigyaan, boxed or viksit an byaaj in naval afares.
In 1881, ek saal out of harvard, he thi nirvaachit to the nai york rajya sabha, jahaan he became a netaa of the sudhaar gut of uske Republican party ( the `` gop '' ).
uske the Naval yuddh of 1812 ( 1882 ) sthapit his peshewar reputation as a gambhir itihaaskaar ; he wrote numerous kitabe on hunting, the bahari, and vartmaan rajnatik mudde, as well as frontier history.
In 1884, uske pehla bivi or uske maan died on the vahi din.
he temporarily left raajnneeti or went to the frontier, becoming a rancher in the `` badlands '' in the dakotas.
returning to nai york nagar, he bhaaga liye mahayor in 1886, finishing teesraa saath 60,000 mat.
he baad gained kirti by lene vigorous charge of the city police.
at the national str, he thi a netaa in civil seva sudhaar.
the spanish–american War broke out in 1898 jabaki rujvelt was, effectively, kaaryshil the Department of the navy.
he promptly resigned or formed the Rough rides – a volunteer pyaade regiment that ladaa in Cuba.
The yuddh hero thi nirvaachit rajyapal in 1898 or in 1900 thi manonith liye vaais adhyaksh.
he successfully sakriy the gop aadhaar as a highly drishy prachaarak to reelect President William mckinley on a manch of high tariffs, the sunaharaa maanak, imperialism, samruddhi at ghar or vijay videsh.
In 1901, adhyaksh William mckinley was assassinated or Roosevelt became adhyaksh.
He attempted to move the Republican party ( GOP ) toward Progressivism, sahit vishwaas busting or increased viniman of vyavsaayon.
Roosevelt became the pehla vyakti nirvaachit to a term in his own sahi in 1904 baad having ascended to the presidency ( from the Vice-Presidency ) upon the maut of uske purvavarti, jeetna the largest percentage of the lokapriy vote chunki the uncontested election of 1820.
rujvelt coined the phrase `` vargakar Deal `` to describe uske domestic kaarysoochee, emphasizing that the average naagarik hota milengi a fair share under his policies.
as an outdoorsman or naturalist, he prachaarit the sangrakshan gati.
on the sansar stage, rujvelt 's nitiyon yahood characterized by uske slogan, `` bolo softly or carry a big stick ``.
a cousin is a relative saath jisko a vyakti shares one or adhik common purvaj ( s ) ( anya than a janak, child/descendant, sibling, child/descendant of a sahodar, or sahodar of a parent/ancestor ).
however in aam parlance, `` cousin '' saamanytah specifically arthath `` first cousin ''.
Systems of `` degree '' or `` removals '' are prayukt in the english-speaking sansar to describe the sateek sambandh between two cousins ( in the vyapak bhav ) or the ancestor they have in aam.
vibhinn governmental entities have established pranaaliyon liye vidhik upyog ki can adhik precisely bataaen kinships with aam ancestors existing koi kramank of peedhiyaan in the past, haalanki aam upyog often eliminates the degrees or removals and refers to logon with aam ancestry as simply `` dur cousins '' or `` relatives ''.
Webster is an amareeki halaat kamedi ki aired on abisi isse September 16, 1983 jabatak May 8, 1987, or in first-run anuprayog from sitambar 21, 1987 jabatak kooch 10, 1989.
the shrenee was nirmit by stu chaandi.
the dikhaaen sitaron Emmanuel louis in the title bhoomika as a yang ladke jo, baad khone uske abhibhavak, is apanaaya by his enegel -pro godfadar, portrayed by Alex karras, and uske nai socialite bivi, nibhaai by susaan Clark.
the fokas thi largely on how this impulsively shaadishuda yugal tha to samaayojan to unke new lives and sudden parenthood, lakin it thi the congenial Webster himself who drove much of the plat.
The shrenee thi utpaadit by georgian khadi ltd., emmanuel Lewis entertainment udhyamon, inc. ( 1986-1989 ) or sarvopari Television.
jaise NBC 's pehle hit diff'rent strokes, Webster featured a young african-american boy apanaaya by a white family.
teen prakaar of cell prabhag
koshika prabhag is the prakram by jisase a janak cell divides into do or more daughter koshikaayen.
koshika division usually occurs as bhaag of a larger koshika cycle.
in eukaryotes, vahin hai two pruthak prakaar of koshika prabhag : a vegetative prabhag, whereby prayek beti cell is genetically identical to the parent koshika ( mitosis ), or a reductive koshika prabhag, whereby the kramank of gunasutron in the beti koshikaayen is reduced by half, to upaj agunit gamit ( meiosis ).
dono of these cell prabhag chakra are required in sexually reproducing jeevon at some point in unke jivan saikil, or both hai believed to be present in the last eukaryotic aam purvaj Prokaryotes bhi undergo a vegetative koshika division gyaat as binary fission, jahaan unke genetic saamagree is segregated baraabar into do daughter koshikaayen.
All koshika divisions, regardless of sajiv, are preceded by a single golakaar of diene replication.
For saral eckoshikeey organisms aise as the amoeba, ek koshika prabhag is samatuly to janan – an sampurna nai sajiv is created.
on a larger scale, mitotic cell prabhag can banaaen progeny isse bahukoshikeey organisms, aise as plants that grow isse cuttings.
koshika prabhag also enables sexually reproducing jeevon to develop from the one-celled zygote, which itself was utpaadit by cell prabhag isse gamit.
And baad vikaas, koshika prabhag allows liye continual nirmaan or repair of the sajiv.
A human hone 's deh anubhavon parichay 10,000 kharab koshika divisions in a aaajeevan.
koshika prabhag rai been modeled by finite subdivision niyam.
the primary concern of cell division is the mentanence of the asli koshika 's genome.
pehle division can occur, the genomic information ki is bhandaarit in gunasutron jarur be replicated, and the duplicated genome jarur be alag cleanly between koshikaayen.
a great saude of cellular avasanrachana is shaamil in keeping genomic information consistent between `` peedhiyaan ''.

harvard jones ( born jon Howard Jones, 23 February 1955, Southampton, Hampshire, England ) is a angrejon sangeetkaar, singer and songwriter.
according to the ginis kitaab of angrejon hit singles & album, `` Jones is an sampannataa singer-songwriter jo thi a niyamit chart aagatuk in the mid-1980s saath uske brands of synthpop.
jones, jo thi baraabar lokapriy in the u.S., appeared at sajiv sahaayta ``.

uske music merged the praudyogiki intensive dhwani of nai wave saath the cheery ashavad of hippies and late 1960s pop.
jones racked up a string of hits in the mid or let 1980s, pehle he retreated into hone a cult figure in the 1990s ''.
the antarrashtriya oil of man tt ( paryatak trophy ) Race is a motorcycle racing event yojit on the Isle of man or thi liye anek saalo the sabase prestigious motorcycle race in the world.
the event thi part of the FIM motorcycle grand Prix World Championship during the period 1949–1976 pehle hone transferred to the sanyukt kingdom baad suraksha chintaaen or chalaaen by the fim as the British grand pricks liye the 1977 season.
the oil of Man TT Races became part of the tt Formula 1 championships isse 1977 to 1990 to bachaana the event 's racing status.
isse 1989 the racing rai been viksit by the Isle of Man Department of Tourism as the oil of man tt parv.
the race is chalaaen in a time-trial swaroop on public sadaken closed for racing by the praavdhaanon of an Act of tynwald ( the parliament of the oil of man ).
the pehla res thi yojit on Tuesday 28 may 1907 or thi pukaara the antarrashtriya auto-cycle paryatak Trophy.
the event thi organised by the Auto-Cycle klbon over 10 laps of the St jon 's choti course of 15 mile 1,470 yards liye road-legal touring motorcycles saath exhaust silencers, saddles, pedals or mud-guards.
the winner of the single-cylinder class, or overall vijeta of the pehla event in 1907, thi charlie collier riding a Matchless motorcycle in a samay of 4 hours, 8 minutes and 8 second at an ausat res gati of 38.21 kimi.
the vijeta of the twin-cylinder class thi rem Fowler sawari a peugeot angine Norton in a samay of 4 ghanton 21 minutes or 52 seconds at an ausat res gati of 36.21 kimi.
the trophy presented to charlie collier as the vijeta of the 1907 oil of man tt res, thi daan by the bille de Mouzilly St. mangal.
It featured a stylised sanskaran of olympic parameshwar hermes by Giovanni Da bologna as a chaandi figurine astride a winged wheel.
the trophy thi samaan in dizine to the 18 carat gold montague trophy prastut to John nepier ( Arrol-Johnston ) as the inaugural vijeta of the Isle of man paryatak Trophy car res in 1905 abhi known as the RAC paryatak Trophy.
the bille de mouzilly St. mangal trophy is abhi prastut annually to the vijeta of the Isle of man varisht TT Motor-Cycle res.
the 2007 oil of man tt was the centenary event jisase bhaaga between 26 May or 8 june 2007 or pradarshit a khaas Re-enactment of the 1907 Isle of man tt Race held on the gaanv green aglaa to tynwald Hill in st jon 's on somvaar 28 may 2007.
the wintage parade of 100 clasik motorcycle for the centenary Re-enactment on the original st jon 's choti Course was flagged dur by purv sansar Motor-Cycle champion geoff duk.
the pehla of the bhagidaar to be flagged dur thi the recently restored twin-cylinder peugeot-norton ridden by Rem fowler during the pehla oil of man tt res in 1907.
bhi participating in the 2007 re-enactment thi tt race competitor guy Martin riding a 1938 triumph baagh 100 500 cc or anya purv tt competitors sahit alan Cathcart, saimi Miller, upnaam Jefferies or mik Grant bhi samaapt the re-enactment god.

berogari ( or joblessness ) occurs jab logon hai bagaiyr kaary and actively seeking kaary.
the berogari rate is a maap of the vyapaktaa of berogari and it is calculated as a pratishat by dividing the kramank of berozegaar individuals by sab individuals currently in the majdoor force.
dauraan avadhi of recession, an arthvyavastha praayah experiences a apekshaakrit unchi unemployment rate.
According to International Labour sanghathan report, adhik than 197 million logon globally hai out of kaary or 6 % of the world 's workforce were bagaiyr a job in 2012.
vahin remains considerable theoretical bahes regarding the kalyankari, consequences or samaadhaan liye berogari.
shastreey arthshaastra, New shastreey economics, and the austria skool of arthshaastra argue that market mechanisms hai vishwasaneey arthath of resolving berogari.
These theories argue viruddh interventions imposed on the labor market isse the baahar, aise as unionization, nunatam mazdooree laws, taxes, or anya regulations ki ve arji discourage the bhartee of majdoor.
keynesian arthshaastra emphasizes the cyclical prakruti of berogari and anushansa government interventions in the arthvyavastha ki it daawa hoga reduce berogari dauraan recessions.
This siddhanth focuses on tool shocks that ekaek reduce kul maang for goods or services or yun reduce maang liye majdoor.
keynesian model sujhaayen sarkari interventions designed to increase maang liye majdoor ; ye can include vittiya stimuli, saream funded job sristi, or expansionist monetary nitiyon.
in jod to ye vyapak theories of unemployment, vahin are a few categorizations of berogari ki hai used to more precisely model the prabhaav of berogari bheetar the aarthik pranali.
The pramukh prakaar of berogari include sanrachanaatmak unemployment jisase focuses on structural samasyaayein in the economy and inefficiencies antarnihit in shramik markets, sahit a bemail between the supply or maang of laborers saath jaruri kaushal set.
sanrachanaatmak vitark emphasize causes and samaadhaan sambandhit to vighatnkaaree technologies and vaishvikaran.
charchaayen of frictional berogari fokas on voluntary nirnay to kaary aadhaarit on prayek individuals ' valuation of unke apana kaary or kaisaa ki compares to vartmaan mazdooree daron plus the time or effort jaruri to dhundhen a job.
kalyankari or solutions for frictional berogari often pataa job pravishti dahalij or mazdooree daron.
behavioral arthshaastriyon hilite vyaktigat biases in nirnay bananaa, and praayah involve samasyaayein or samaadhaan concerning sticky mazdooree or efficiency mazdooree.
Collectivism is koi philosophic, rajnatik, religious, economic, or soshal outluk ki emphasizes the interdependence of prayek insaan being in a society or sabhyataa.
Collectivism is a moulik saanskrithik element ki exists as the reverse of individualism in insaan nature ( in the same rasta unchi context samskruti exists as the reverse of kam context samskruti ).
Collectivist orientations tanaav the mahatv of milaap bheetar social groups ( such as an `` in-group '', in what specific context it is paribhaashit ) and in kuch cases, the priority of group lakshya over individual lakshya.
Collectivists praayah fokas on jatiyaan, samaaj, nation or desh.
It rai been prayukt as an tatv in anek alag or vividh types of government or political, aarthik or shaikshanik tatvagyan throughout itihaas and sabase insaan samaajon in practice contain elements of both individualism or collectivism.
Some udhaaharan of collectivist samskritiyon shaamil india and japani.
collectivism can be divided into aadaa collectivism and lambavat collectivism.
aadaa collectivism tanaavon samuhik decision-making among baraabar individuals, or is yun praayah aadhaarit on decentralization or samtawaad.
lambavat collectivism is based on hierarchical structures of shakti and on moral or saanskrithik conformity, or is isliye based on centralization and padanukram.
a sahakaari enterprise hota be an udhaaharan of aadaa collectivism, whereas a sainya hierarchy hota be an example of vertical collectivism.
adhi disseminated encephalomyelitis ( ADEM ) is an pratiraksha mediated beemaari of the brain.
it usually occurs following a viral sankraman lakin may appear following tikaakaran, bacterial or parasitic sankraman, or bhi appear anayas.
As it involves asankramy demyelination, it is samaan to anek kaathinya, and is mana bhaag of the anek kaathinya borderline diseases.
The incidence rate is parichay 8 per 1,000,000 people prati saal.
haalanki it occurs in sab aayu, sabase reported cases hai in children or adolescents, saath the ausat aayu around 5 to 8 years old.
The mrityu rate may be as unchi as 5 %, puraa recovery is dekhi in 50 to 75 % of maamle, while up to 70 to 90 % ricover with kuch naaballig avshesh viklaangata.
the ausat samay to recover is ek to six maheene.
ADEM produces anek jalan lesions in the dimag or spinal cord, visheshkar in the white padaarth.
praayah ye are mila in the subcortical and central shwet padaarth or cortical gray-white jankshan of dono cerebral baantati, cerebellum, brainstem, and spinal cord, lakin periventricular shwet padaarth or dhoosar matter of the cortex, thalami or basal ganglia may bhi be shaamil.
jab the rogi peedit more than one demyelinating apisod, it is pukaara recurrent disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis ( mdem ).
the stomach is a muscular, khokhla, dilated bhaag of the pachan pranali jisase functions as an mahatvapurn ang of the digestive tract in kuch pashu, sahit vertebrates, echinoderms, insects ( mid-gut ), or molluscs.
it is involved in the duusari phase of pachan, following mastication ( chewing ).
The pet is located between the grasanal and the choti aant.
It secretes protein-digesting anzimon pukaara protease and strong acids to aid in food pachan, ( sent to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through chikna muscular contortions ( pukaara segmentation ) pehle sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the small aanton.
the shabd pet is niklaa from the latin stomachus jisase is niklaa isse the unani shabd stomachos ( στόμαχος ), ultimately isse stoma ( ), `` munh ''.
the shabd gastro- or gastric ( meaning sambandhit to the stomach ) are dono niklaa isse the unani word gaster ( ).

A woodie is a car deh style, especially a stesan wagon, jahaan the pasch bodywork is constructed of wood framework saath infill panels of lakdi or painted metal.
After the nidhan of actual lakdi nirmaan, nirmaataaon prayukt anukaran woodgrain chadar vinyl—sometimes augmented saath three-dimensional, anukaran framework—to recall lakdi nirmaan.

a parl is a hard object utpaadit bheetar the naram utak ( specifically the mantle ) of a jeena shelled mollusc.
bas jaise the shell of a clam, a pearl is bana up of calcium carbonate in minute crystalline rup, jisase rai maharoom deposited in kendriya paraton.
the adarsh parl is perfectly round or chikna, lakin anek anya aakaar of moti ( baroque moti ) occur.
the finest visheshta prakritik moti have been atyadhik valued as ratnon or objects of saundarya for many sadiyaan, or kuki of is, the word parl has become a roopak liye kuch bahut viral, thik, saraahneey, or moolyawaan.
the sabase moolyawaan pearls occur anayas in the junglee, lakin ve are extremely viral.
ye junglee moti hai referred to as prakritik moti.
sanskari or farmed pearls from pearl oysters or freshwater mussels make up the bahumat of those ki hai philhal bechi.
Imitation moti hai bhi widely bechi in inexpensive jewelry, lakin the visheshta of unke iridescence is usually bahut garib, or praayah, kritrim pearls are easily vishisht isse genuine moti.
Pearls have been harvested and cultivated primarily liye upyog in aabhushan, but in the past ve yahood also stitched onto lavish kapadey.
Pearls have bhi been kuchal or prayukt in cosmetics, davaaiyaan, or in paint formulations.
Whether junglee or cultured, gem quality moti are almost sadaa nacreous and, as is the aantarik of the shell ki produces them.
However, lagbhag all prajati of shelled molluscs hai sakasham of producing pearls ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by some strot ) of lesser chamak or kam spherical shape.
haalanki ye may also be legitimately referred to as `` pearls '' by gemological labs and also antargat u.S. sangheey vyapaar Commission niyam, and hai formed in the vahi rasta, most of them have no maan, except as curiosities.

bing thi anaavaran by Microsoft siio steve balmar on May 28, 2009 at the All bate Digital sammelan in san diego liye relies on june 1.
Notable changes shaamil the listing of dhundhen suzav while queries hai entered and a suchi of related khoj ( pukaara `` Explore falak '' ) aadhaarit on semantic praudyogiki from powerset jisase microsoft kharida in 2008.

sab yahuu ! dhundhen vaishvik graahak or saajhedaar hai apekshit to have made the parivartan by early 2012.

gyaat as `` baagh '', the nai index-serving praudyogiki rai been incorporated into bing globally, chunki agast 2011.

in amareeki football, prayek toli has gyaarah khilaadi on the field at ek samay.
The vishisht bhoomika ki a player takes on the field is pukaara unke sthiti.
antargat the modern niyam of amareeki football, teams hai anumat aseemit subsititutions, ki is tiimon may change any kramank of khilaadi baad any khel.
is rai resulted in the vikaas of teen `` platoons '' of khilaadi, the thokar ( the toli saath the ball, jo is trying to score ), the raksha ( the toli trying to prevent the other toli isse scoring, or to take the ball isse unhen ), or the khaas tiimon ( jo khel in kicking paristhitiyon ).
bheetar those platoons, vibhinn vishisht positions exist depending on kayaa the player 's main job is.
The irish logon ( or na hÉireannaigh ; ulster-scots : Airish fowk ) hai an jaateey samooh jo originate in ireland, an dweep in northwestern Europe.
ireland rai maharoom populated liye around 9,000 saalo ( according to puraatatv adhyayan, dekhie pragaitihaasik ireland ).
the irish logon 's earliest purvajo hai recorded in mahapurush – they hai claimed to be descended isse groups aise as the nemedians, fomorians, fir bolg, Tuatha Dé Danann or the milesians.
lebor gabála Érenn, a kitaab of irish mythology tells ki milesians were skythian descendants.
the main samooh that interacted saath the irish in the madhya Ages include the picts, scots, and the Vikings.
due to is contact, Icelanders are vikhyath for having kuch irish descent.
the anglo-norman akraman of the unchi madhya aayu, the angrezi baganon or the subsequent angrezi niyam of the desh introduced the normans or flemish into ireland.
welsh, picts, Bretons, or small parties of gauls or bhi anglo-saxons are gyaat in ireland from much pehle times.
vahin have maharoom anek notable irish people throughout history.
the 6th sadi irish monk or mishanri Columbanus is regarded as ek of the `` fathers of Europe '', followed by Kilian of Würzburg or vergilius of saljbarg.
The vaigyanik Robert boil is mana the `` pita of rasayan ``.
prasiddh Irish explorers include brendan the navik, robert mcclure, arnest shackleton or tom crean.
by kuch accounts, the first European child born in uttar America tha Irish descent on dono pahalu ; and an irishman was the pehla europea to niyat foot on American mrudaa in columbus ' expedition of 1492.
vahin hai vanshajon of Irish people jeena in anek pashchimi deshon, visheshkar in English-speaking deshon.
historically, karanon has maharoom caused by politics, akaal or aarthik mudde.
an anumaanit 50 to 80 lakh logon are vanshajon of Irish logon, primarily in the sanyukt Kingdom, the sanyukt rajya, Australia, Canada or iceland ; there are bhi choti sankhyaayein in argentina, chile, mexico, Jamaica, Barbados, South africa, New jiland, France, germany or brazil.
The largest kramank of vanshajon of irish people live in the sanyukt States.
the kramank of logon jeena in australia who hai of irish descent is ucchtar, as a percentage of total janasankhyikee, than that of koi anya desh.
lagbhag chalis pratishat of the upnivesh janasankhyikee of Iceland came from ireland or scotland.
the very pehla nivaasiyon of Iceland were irish.
the Hubble spes doordarshee ( hst ) is a space doordarshee ki thi carried into kaksha by a spes shatal in 1990 or remains in operation.
a epperchar doordarshee in low dharti kaksha, habal 's chaar pramukh yantra observe in the nikat parabangnee, drishy, or near infrared.
the doordarshee is namit after the astronomer edwin habal.
Hubble 's kaksha baahar the distortion of Earth 's maahaul allows it to lo atyadhik sharp bimb with lagbhag no background lite.
habal 's gahan field have maharoom kuch of the sabase vistrut visible-light images ever, allowing a gahan drishy into spes or samay.
anek habal observations have led to breakthroughs in astrophysics, aise as accurately determining the rate of expansion of the brahmad.
Although not the pehla space doordarshee, habal is ek of the largest and sabase versatile, or is khub gyaat as both a vital shodh aujaar or a public sambandh boon for khagolashastra.
The hst thi nirmit by the sanyukt rajya spes agency nasa, saath yogadan from the europea Space agency, or is operated by the Space Telescope vigyaan santhaan.
the hst is one of NASA 's Great observatories, along with the compton gamma re vedhashala, the chandra x-ray Observatory, and the spitger spes doordarshee.
spes telescopes yahood prastaavit as jaldi as 1923.
habal thi vittposhit in the 1970s, saath a proposed launch in 1983, lakin the project thi beset by takneekee delays, bajet problems, or the Challenger vipatti.
jab aakhirkaar launched in 1990, vaigyanikon mila ki the main darpan tha been maidan incorrectly, compromising the telescope 's samarthy.
the doordarshee thi lauti to iske intended quality by a servicing mission in 1993.
habal is the tabhi doordarshee designed to be sarvice in spes by astronauts.
Between 1993 and 2002, four mishan repaired, upgraded, and replaced pranaaliyon on the doordarshee ; a fifth mishan thi radd on safety grounds following the Columbia disaster.
However, baad spirited public charchaa, nasa administrator mike griffin sweekrut ek final servicing mission, completed in 2009 by Space Shuttle atlantis.
the doordarshee is abhi apekshit to falan until at tanik 2013.
iske scientific successor, the james webb spes Telescope ( jwst ), is to be shubharambh in 2018 or sambhawatah later.
Anti-inflammatory refers to the property of a padaarth or upachaar that reduces sujan.
Anti-inflammatory drugs mek up about half of analgesics, remedying pidaa by reducing inflammation as opposed to opioids, jisase affect the central baichaiyn system.
The tonight dikhaaen is a us late-night baat dikhaaen ki has aired on enbisi since 1954.
it is the longest philhal kaaryshil regularly anusuchit entertainment program in the us and the teesraa longest-running dikhaaen on enbisi after Meet the dabaayen and aaj.
The tonight dikhaaen thi hosted by Steve alan ( 1954–1957 ), joker paar ( 1957–1962 ), johny carsan ( 1962–1992 ), jay lino ( 1992–2009, 2010–present ), or conan o'brien ( 2009–2010 ).
Several atithi host bhi appeared, visheshkar dauraan the paar or carsan eras.
The longest-serving mejabaan to tithi was johny carsan, who hosted The tonight dikhaaen Starring Johnny carsan for 30 sizan from the patan of 1962 through the vasant of 1992.
the vartmaan mejabaan of the dikhaaen is jay lino, who tha previously hosted the dikhaaen isse 1992 to 2009 and began uske duusari kaarykaal on kooch 1, 2010.
on April 3, 2013, enbisi ghoshit Jimmy fallon hota become the nai mejabaan of the tonight dikhaaen.
the tonight dikhaaen with jimmy fallon hoga premier farvari 24, 2014, the din baad the closing ceremonies of the 2014 sheet Olympics.
ss andria doriya.
sunaaya thi an samandar liner liye the Italian lakeer ( società di navigazione Italia ) ghar ported in genoa, italy, sabase prasiddh liye its dub in 1956, jab 52 people died ( 51 isse taatkaalik impact ).
namit after the 16th-century Genoese admiral andria doriya, the jalayaan tha a gross panjikaran tonnage of 29,100 or a kshamta of parichay 1,200 yatri or 500 crew.
liye a country attempting to rebuild iske arthvyavastha or pratishtha after World War ii, andria Doria thi an pratik of Italian neshnal abhimaan.
Of sab italy 's jahaajon at the time, Andrea Doria was the largest, fastest or mana safest.
shubharambh on 16 june 1951, the jalayaan undertook iske maiden voyage on 14 janvari 1953.
on 25 July 1956, jabaki the Andrea doriya thi approaching the coast of nantucket, Massachusetts, bandhi liye nai york nagar, the eastbound of the swedish American lakeer collided with it in kayaa became one of itihaas 's most infamous meritime aapadaaon.
struck in the side, the top-heavy Andrea doriya immediately prarambh to list severely to starboard, jisase baayein half of iske lifeboats anupayogi.
The consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant ghaataa of life, lakin the dakshata of the jalayaan 's takneekee design allowed it to stay afloat liye over 11 ghanton after the ramming.
the shubh bartaav of the crew, improvements in sanchaar or the rapid response of anya ships averted a disaster similar in scale to ki of the in 1912.
1,660 yatri and kru were bachaaya or survived, jabaki 46 people died as a consequence of the collision.
The evacuated lakjri liner capsized or sank the following morning.
is durghatana remains the worst maritime disaster to occur in sanyukt States waters since the dub of the in 1915.
the ghatana and its aftermath were heavily covered by the news media.
While the bachaav praytn were dono kaamyaab and commendable, the kaaran of the takkar saath the stoffhome and the ghaataa of andria doriya utpann much interest in the media or anek lawsuits.
largely kuki of an out-of-court upnivesh anubandh between the two shipping companiyaan dauraan hearings immediately baad the vipatti, no determination of the cause ( s ) was ever formally published.
haalanki vrihad dosha appeared initially to fall on the italvi liner, adhik haal discoveries have indicated ki a misreading of radar on the swedish jalayaan may have initiated the takkar course, agrani to trutiyaan on dono jahaajon.
Andrea doriya was the pichhlaa major transatlantic passenger vessel to doobana before vayuyan became the preferred vidhi of travel.
dialysis tubing
dialysis tubing is a type of semhai- or partially permeable jhilli tubing made isse regenerated cellulose or cellophane.
It can be used liye diffusion saath solutes or paraasaran if prayukt saath water only.
paraasaran is jab jal gujarata through a semi-permeable parat to pahunchein equilibrium.
diffusion, on the anya haath, allows the gati of anuon isse unchi concentration to kam concentration.
it hoga tabhi allow molecules to pass through a semi-permeable jhilli or parat if the molecule is choti paryaapt to anuroop through the jhilli or a jhilli 's pore.
is praayah parinaam saath the effects of diffusion through a jhilli tabhi vaaki affects small anuon, and lagbhag never larger molecules.
Dialysis tubing is prayukt in clinical halaaton to ensure a filtered pravaah of anuon, preventing the pravaah of larger solute anuon.
choti anuon can be `` dhoyaa '' out of a samaadhaan jisase is uttejit through the tubing into a solvent, praayah jal, which surrounds it or in which ve can be flushed dur.
In demonstrations of semi-permeable membranes, a solution containing anek prakaar of molecules, praayah glucose or mand, is lagaai into a semi-permeable dialysis bag, aise as a cellulose jhilli saath pores, or the thilaa is sealed saath a ganth or elastic band.
The sealed dialysis thilaa is lagaai in a container of a different samaadhaan, or water.
anuon choti enough to pass through the tubing ( jal, lavan, monosaccharides, or anya small molecules ) tend to move into or out of the dialysis bag in the disha of avarohan visheshgyata, therefore displaying diffusion.
larger molecules ( aise as proteins, or polysaccharides ) that have aayam significantly vrihad than the pore vyas are retained andar the dialysis thilaa.
the jal or choti solutes in a hypotonic samaadhaan ( a samaadhaan ki rai a lesser solute visheshgyata than the samaadhaan it is sanderbhit to ) will cross a semi-permeable membrane, jaise dialysis tubing, into a hypertonic samaadhaan ( a samaadhaan that rai a higher solute visheshgyata than the samaadhaan it is sanderbhit to ) in an attempt to pahunchein santulan, where the solute visheshgyata of prayek samaadhaan is in santulan.
paara prayogshaala tharmametre
A thermometer ( isse the unani, thermos, arth `` hot '' or μἐτρον, metron, `` maap '' ) is a yantra ki measures taapmaana or taapmaana gradient using a variety of alag siddhanth.
a tharmametre has do mahatvapurn tatv : the taapmaana sensor ( e.g. the balb on a mercury-in-glass tharmametre ) in which some physical badalen occurs saath temperature, plus kuch arthath of converting is shaareerik badalen into a numerical maan ( e.g. the visible scale that is chihnit on a mercury-in-glass tharmametre ).
vahin hai anek prakaar or anek uses for thermometers, as vistrut neeche in bhaag of is aalekh.
him White or the saat dwarfs is a 1937 amareeki anemated musical kaalpanik filmi utpaadit by walt dijani and released by rko radio tasviren.
Based on the German fairy tale by the Brothers grimm, it is the first full-length cel animated feature filmi or the earliest in the walt dijani Animated clasik shrenee.

the prakram of saamaanya prasav is categorized in teen charan of shramik : the shortening or dilation of the greeva, descent or janam of the infant, or janam of the placenta.
in anek maamle or with increasing frequency, childbirth is hasil through preran of majdoor or caesarean khand, which is the hataanaa of the neonate through a surgical incision in the udar, rather than through vaginal birth.
prasav by C-Sections increased 50 % in the u.S. isse 1996 to 2006, or comprise nearly 32 % of births in the u.S. and Canada.
saath respect to induced labor, adhik than 22 % of mahilaon undergo preran of labour in the sanyukt rajya.

the pattey of a beech ped

a patta is an ang of a vascular sanyantr, as paribhaashit in vanaspati sharten, or in particular in sanyantr morphology.
foliage is a mass noun ki refers to leaves as a visheshta of plants.
typically a patta is a patala, flattened ang borne upar ground and specialized for photosynthesis, lakin many prakaar of pattey hai adapted in ways lagbhag unrecognisable in those terms : some are nahin chapata ( for example anek raseele pattey and conifers ), some hai nahin upar maidan ( such as bulb scales ), or some hai bagaiyr pramukh photosynthetic falan ( consider liye example cataphylls, kaante, and cotyledons ).
Conversely, anek structures of non-vascular plants, or bhi of kuch lichens, jisase hai nahin paudhe at sab ( in the bhav of being sadasyon of the kingdom plantae ), do dekh and falan much jaise pattey.
Furthermore, several structures mila in vascular paudhe look jaise leaves lakin hai nahin darasal pattey ; they differ isse pattey in unke structures or origins.
udhaaharan shaamil phyllodes, cladodes, or phylloclades.

Lake tahoe is the largest alpine jhil in uttar America.

the chaar tihaai system is a maanak nirmit by olympus or kodak for digital single-lens reflex camera ( DSLR ) dizine or development. < sandarbh name='dpreview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
the system provides a maanak ki, with digital camere or lenses available isse multiple nirmaataaon, allows liye the interchange of lenses or laashen isse alag nirmaataaon.
seems to cover the standard.
proponents describe it as an kholen standard, lakin companiyaan may only upyog it antargat a non-disclosure anubandh.
Unlike puraani slr pranaaliyon, chaar tihaai rai been designed isse the maidan up to be entirely digital.
Many lenses are extensively computerized, to the point ki Olympus offers formaware updates liye anek of unhen.
Lens design has maharoom tailored to the aavashyaktaayen of digital sensor, sabase notably through telecentric designs.
the aakaar of the sensor is significantly choti than for sabase dslrs or is implies ki lenses, visheshkar telephoto lenses, can be choti.
liye example, a Four Thirds lens saath a 300 mm focal length hota cover parichay the same kone of drishy as a 600 mm focal length lens for the 35 mm filmi maanak, and is correspondingly adhik compact.
Thus, the chaar tihaai pranali rai crop factor ( focal length multiplier ) of parichay 2, or while this enables longer focal lambaai for vrihad magnification, it karata n't aid the manufacture of wide kone lenses.
The chitra sensor format, generally intermediate between those of larger slrs or choti compact cameras, generally detaa str of laagat, pradarshan or convenience intermediat between those do varg.
hvac pranaaliyon upyog ventilation air nalikaayen santhaapit throughout a bhawan to supplai conditioned air to a room through outlet vents, pukaara diffusers ; and ducts to remove air through return-air grilles.
HVAC ( heating, ventilation, or air condishning ) is the technology of indoor or automotive paryaavarniya sukun.
hvac system dizine is a subdiscipline of mechanical abhiyantriki, aadhaarit on the siddhanth of ooshmaagatiki, drav yantriki, or ooshmaa transafar.
prashithan is sometimes added to the field 's abbreviation as HVAC & R or hvacr, or ventilating is dropped as in hacr ( aise as the namakan of hacr-rated circuit brakers ).
HVAC is mahatvapurn in the dizine of medium to vishaal audyogic and daftar buildings aise as skyscrapers and in samudri environments aise as aquariums, where surakshit and swasth building sharten are regulated saath aadar to taapmaana and ardrata, using bhais air isse outdoors.
Ventilation on the downdraught system, by impulsion, or the 'plenum ' principle, lagu to schoolrooms ( 1899 )
heating, ventilating, or air conditioning is aadhaarit on avishkaron and discoveries bana by nicholay lvov, maaikel farade, wilis Carrier, reuben trane, james Joule, wiliam Rankine, Sadi carnot, and anek anya.
the avishkaar of the components of hvac systems gai hand-in-hand saath the audyogic kranti, or nai methods of modernization, higher dakshata, or system control hai constantly introduced by companies or avishkaarak vishwavyaapee.
the teen central functions of heating, ventilating, or air-conditioning hai interrelated, especially saath the need to provide thermal comfort or sweekaarya indoor air visheshta bheetar uchit sansthapana, aaparishan, or mentanence laagat.
hvac pranaaliyon can provide ventilation, reduce air ghuspaith, and maintain dabaav relationships between spaces.
the arthath of air delivery and hataanaa isse spaces is gyaat as room air distribution.
the starting point in carrying out an anumaan both liye kooling or heating depends on the exterior jalwaayu or interior specified conditions.
However pehle lene up the ooshmaa lod gananaa, it is necessary to dhundhen bhais air requirements for prayek kshetrafal in vivaran, as pressurization is an mahatvapurn consideration.
in modern imaaraten the design, sansthapana, or control systems of ye krityon hai ekikrut into ek or more HVAC pranaaliyon.
liye very choti imaaraten, thekedaaron saamanytah kshamta ejeeniyar and chune hvac systems or upkaran.
liye larger imaaraten, building sevaayen designers or engineers, aise as mechanical, architectural, or bhawan services engineers analyze, design, and bataaen the hvac pranaaliyon, or specialty mechanical contractors fabricate or ayog unhen.
bhawan permits or code-compliance inspections of the sansthapana are normally required for all aakaar of imaaraten.
the hvac udyog is a vishwavyaapee enterprise, saath bhoomikaaye including aaparishan or mentanence, system dizine or nirmaan, equipment nirmaan and bikri, or in shiksha or shodh.
the HVAC udyog thi historically regulated by the nirmaataaon of hvac upkaran, but regulating and standards sanghathan aise as HARDI, ASHRAE, SMACNA, asisie, vardi mechanical Code, antarrashtriya mechanical code, and AMCA have maharoom sthapit to support the udyog or protsaahit unchi maanakon and uplabdhi.

the bandha akshar is a rahasy seva agent, code number 007, residing in London but kriyasheel internationally.
Bond thi a compojit akshar jo thi based on a kramank of commando jisko Fleming knew dauraan uske seva in the Naval pragna prabhag during World War ii, to whom fleming added his apana style or a kramank of uske apana tastes ; bandha 's naam thi appropriated isse amareeki ornithologist James bandha.
Bond rai a kramank of akshar traits which chalaaen throughout the kitabe, sahit an enjoyment of gaadiyaan, a prem of food or peya, and an ausat seven of saath custom-made cigarettes a din.
chunki fleming 's maut in 1964, there have maharoom anya authorised lekhak of bandha saamagree, sahit John Gardner, jo likhaa chaudaa novels and two novelizations and remand benson, who likhaa chah novels, teen novelizations or teen choti stories.

`` Nature ladke '' is a song by Eden ahbez, published in 1947.

louisiana ( or ;, ; louisiana creole : Léta de la lwizyàn ) is a rajya stith in the dakshini pradesh of the United rajya of america.
louisiana is the 31st sabase extensive and the 25th most populous of the 50 United rajya.
iske puunji is baton Rouge or largest nagar is nai orlions.
Louisiana is the tabhi rajya in the u.S. saath rajnatik subdivisions termed parishes, which are local sarkari 's samatuly to counties.
the largest mohalla by janasankhyikee is East baton Rouge mohalla, and the largest by jameen area is cameron mohalla.
Much of the rajya 's lands yahood formed from sediment dhoyaa down the Mississippi River, leaving vishaal deltas and vishaal kshetron of tateey daldal and magn.
ye contain a samrudh dakshini biota ; typical udhaaharan shaamil pakshiyon aise as ibis or egrets.
There hai bhi anek species of ped mendhak, or fish such as sturgeon or paddlefish.
in adhik elevated kshetron, aag is a prakritik prakram in the landscape, or rai utpaadit extensive kshetron of longleaf pine van or geela savannas.
ye support an exceptional vishaal kramank of sanyantr prajati, including anek species of orchids or maansaahaari plants.
Some louisiana shahari environments have a multicultural, bahubhashi viraasat, being so strongly bahekaave by an admixture of 18th-century french, spani, deshi amareeki ( bhartiya ) and African samskritiyon that they hai mana to be somewhat asaadhaaran in the u.s.
pehle the amareeki khariden of the territory, the vartmaan Louisiana rajya tha maharoom dono a Spanish and French colony.
in jod, the pattern of vikaas included importing numerous African slave in the 18th sadi, saath anek isse the vahi region of West africa, yun concentrating unke samskruti.
in the post-civil yuddh environment, anglo-americans increased the dabaav liye anglicization, or in 1915, angrezi was bana the tabhi aadhikarik bhashaa of the rajya.
mahilaon 's adhikaron are the adhikaron and entitlements claimed liye mahilaon or ladakiyon of many samaajon vishwavyaapee.
in kuch sthaan ye adhikaron hai institutionalized or samarthit by law, local custom, or aacharan, whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed.
ve differ isse broader dharanaen of insaan adhikaron through claims of an inherent aitihaasik or paramparaagat purvaagrah viruddh the kasarat of adhikaron by women or ladakiyon in paksh of main and ladakon.
mudde commonly sambhddha saath notions of mahilaon 's adhikaron shaamil, haalanki hai not limited to, the sahi : to bodily integrity or autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold public daftar ; to kaary ; to fair mazdooree or equal adaa ; to apana property ; to shiksha ; to serve in the sainya or be conscripted ; to daalen into vidhik anubandh ; or to have marital, parental and dharmik rights.
the laws of science or scientific kanoon hai kathan that describe, bhavishyavaanee, or shaayad explain kyon, a dayera of phenomena behave as they appear to in prakruti.
the pad `` law '' rai vividh upyog in anek maamle : sannikat, sateek, broad or simit theories, in sab prakritik scientific disciplines ( bhautikee, rasayan, biology, bhuvigyaan, khagolashastra ityadi. ).
An analogous pad for a vaigyanik vidhi is a principle.
vaigyanik vidhitis:
summarize a vishaal collection of facts sankalpit by prayog into a single statement,
can praayah be pratipaadit mathematically as one or anek kathan or sameekaran, or at tanik stated in a single vaakya, so that it can be used to predict the nishkarsh of an prayog, die the aarambhik, boundary, or anya shaareerik sharten of the prakriyaaon jisase lo place,
are strongly samarthit by anubhavjanya pramaan - ve hai vaigyanik knowledge that prayog have repeatedly satyapit ( and never falsified ).
unke sateekta karata nahin badalen when nai theories hai worked out, lakin rather the paimaana of anuprayog, chunki the sameekaran ( if koi ) representing the vidhi does nahin badalen.
as saath anya vaigyanik knowledge, they do nahin have nirpeksh certainty jaise ganitiya theorems or identities, and it is sadaa sambhavit liye a vidhi to be overturned by bhavishya observations.
are praayah quoted as a fundamental controlling influence rather than a description of observed facts.
I.e. `` the kanoon of gati require ki ''
Laws differ isse hypotheses or postulates, jisase hai prastaavit dauraan the scientific prakram pehle and dauraan validation by prayog or avlokan.
ye are nahin kanoon since ve have not maharoom satyapit to the vahi oopaadhi and may nahin be sufficiently general, haalanki ve may sise to the formulation of laws.
A law is a adhik solidified or formal bayaan, asut isse doharaaya prayog.
haalanki the concepts of a vidhi or principle in prakruti is borderline to darshanashastra, or presents the gaharaai to jisase mathematics can describe nature, vaigyanik kanoon hai considered from a vaigyanik pariprekshya or follow the vaigyanik method ; ve `` serve unke purpose '' balki than `` questioning vaastaviktaa '' ( philosophical ) or `` statements of logical absolution '' ( mathematical ).
For udhaaharan, whether a vidhi `` refers to vaastaviktaa '' is a philosophical issue, rather than vaigyanik.
fundamentally, sab vaigyanik kanoon follow isse physics, kanoon jisase occur in other sciences ultimately follow isse shaareerik kanoon.
praayah, isse mathematically aadharbhoot viewpoints, saarvbhaumik sthiraank emerge from vaigyanik kanoon.
the launch of the plastesan 3 into the japani market on 10 November 2006 chihnit the duusari pramukh saatvaan peedhee entertainment system to be released.
