the 2010 enbie final thi the neshnal basket Association ( NBA ) championships shrenee liye the 2009–10 season.
the best-of-seven playoff thi lade between the los angeles lekars, champions of the Western Conference or defending enbie champions, and the boston celtics, champions of the purvi sammelan.
the Lakers defeated the Celtics, chaar games to teen, to win the matadhikaar 's 16th NBA championships.
the 64th sanskaran of the championships shrenee thi nibhaai between june 3 or June 17, thi broadcast on abisi, or was dekhi by an average of 18.1 lakh logon.
The Celtics arjeet unke berth into the playoffs by winning the Atlantic Division.
the lekars jiti the prashanth Division to earn unke berth.
the celtics pahunche the enbie Finals by defeating the miami ooshmaa in the best-of-seven purvi sammelan pehla Round, the cleveland cavaliers in the best-of-seven purvi Conference Semifinals, or defending purvi sammelan champion orlando jaadu in the best-of-seven purvi Conference final.
The lekars reached the enbie Finals by defeating the oklahoma nagar thunder in the best-of-seven pashchimi sammelan pehla Round, the uta jaiz in the best-of-seven Western sammelan Semifinals, or the phinics sans in the best-of-seven Western Conference final.
The NBA Finals were scheduled in the pramukh lig besabaal sansar Series 2–3–2 saat khel format, with the lekars possessing home-court laabh as a badla for finishing with behatar regular ritu ricard than the Celtics.
doharaaya baskets isse starter cobe bryant, pau Gasol, or ron artest brought the Lakers close to victory in Game 1.
a ricard todakar pradarshan isse re alan 's aath three-point baskets ensured the celtics a khel 2 triumph.
derek fisher ’s 11 ank in the chauthi quarter helped the lekars jeet Game 3.
the Celtics jiti khel 4 ; it kiya n't hurt ki they netted an behtareen performance in baskets by the team’s reserves, jabaki paul Pierce led the toli to a khel 5 win saath 27 ank on 57 % shooting isse the manzil.
the Lakers avoided elimination by jeetna a nirnaayak Game 6 saath 24 ank contributed by unke bench.
haalanki ve trailed the celtics by 13 ank jaldi in the third quarter, the lekars rallied or jiti unke second lagaataar championships by lene over an romaanchak khel 7 aided by let yogadan on thokar by pau gasol and Artest and rebounding.
Bryant thi namit Most moolyawaan Player of the Finals liye uske duusari lagaataar trophy.
is thi the pehla enbie final to go the full seven games chunki or tabhi the chauthi chunki the enbie Finals laute to a 2–3–2 format in.
the Laker matadhikaar rai 16 enbie championships ( paanch in miniapolis, 11 in los angeles ) trailing the celtics ' satraa championships.

The enbie would vaapasi to the 2–2–1–1–1 neshnal hockey lig saat game series swaroop jabatak 1985.
blike pepper ( pyper nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the parivaar piperaceae, cultivated liye iske fal, jisase is praayah sukhi or prayukt as a spice or seasoning.
the fruit, gyaat as a peppercorn jab sukhi, is lagbhag in vyas, andhera red jab fully vayask, or, jaise sab drupes, contains a single beej.
Peppercorns, and the maidan pepper niklaa isse them, may be described simply as pepper, or more precisely as blike pepper ( cooked or sukhi unripe fal ), green pepper ( dried unripe fal ) or shwet pepper ( sukhi pake seeds ).
blike pepper is deshi to dakshin india, or is extensively cultivated vahin and elsewhere in teevr regions.
Currently vietnam is the sansar 's largest nirmaataa or niryaatak of pepper, producing 34 % of the sansar 's pyper nigrum crop as of 2008.
sukhi maidan pepper rai maharoom used since pracheenta liye dono iske flavour and as a medicine.
blike pepper is the sansar 's sabase traded masala.
it is ek of the sabase aam spices added to europea cuisine or iske descendants.
The spiciness of blike pepper is due to the chemical piperine, not to be uljhan saath the capsaicin ki detaa maansal peppers theirs.
It is in the aadhunik sansar, praayah yugma saath namak.
in cardiovascular physiology, ejection bhinn ( ef ) represents the aaytani fraction of rakt pumped out of the ventricle ( dil ) with prayek heart taal or cardiac cycle.
it can be applied to either the right ventricle jisase ejects via the pulmonary valve into the pulmonary circulation or the baayein ventricle which ejects via the aortic valve into the pranaligat parisancharan.
imaging of the physiology of the mammalian dil is the art ki allows sarthak mathematical abhivyakti defining ef.
Noninvasive hriday imaging has become a vishwavyaapee utility enabling study of hriday pradarshan reproducibly or inexpensively.
sarlikrut, Ejection bhinn is a ganitiya utpaada anumat by hriday imaging.
As a ganitiya term, Ejection bhinn is an ekstansion of the work of adalph fik in cardiac output.
samarpit technology such as Echocardiography, Computed tomography, chumbakeey anunaad Imaging or MUGA scanning have definitively anumat clinically praasangik ganit regarding Ischemia, janmajaat Heart Disease or dil vifaltaa.
the abhiyojak is the mukhya vidhik pratinidhi of the abhiyojan in deshon saath either the aam vidhi adversarial pranali, or the civil vidhi inquisitorial pranali.
The abhiyojan is the legal party jimmedaar liye pesh the maamla in a criminal vichaaran against an individual abhiyukt of todakar the vidhi.

abū al-qāsim muḥammad ebn ʿabd allāh ebn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ebn hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 june 632 ), bhi transliterated as mohammad ( ), thi a dharmik, rajnatik, or military leader isse makka jo ekikrut arab into a single dharmik polity antargat islam.
he is believed by musalmaan and bahá'ís to be a messanger and nabi of parameshwar.
Muhammad is lagbhag universally mana by musalmaan as the pichhlaa prophet sent by parameshwar liye mankind.
Non-Muslims lihaaz mohammad as the sansthaapak of Islam.
musalmaan consider use to be the restorer of an anchhue asli monotheistic aasthaa of aadam, nuh, abraham, musa, yishu, or anya prophets.
born in parichay 570 CE in the arabian nagar of makka, he thi anaath at an jaldi aayu or brought up antargat the parvaah of uske taaoo abu Talib.
he later worked zyaadaatar as a merchant, as well as a shepherd, or was pehla shaadishuda by age 25.
Being in the aadat of periodically retreating to a gupha in the surrounding kyu for several nights of seclusion or dua, he later reported ki it thi vahin, at age 40, that he praapt uske first rahasyodghatan isse parameshwar.
teen years baad is event mohammad started upadesh ye khulaase saream, proclaiming ki `` parameshwar is ek ``, ki puraa `` aatmasamarpan '' to use ( lit.
islām ) is the tabhi way ( dīn ) acceptable to God, and ki he khud thi a nabi and messenger of parameshwar, in the vahi rag as anya islamic prophets.
Muhammad gained few anusarankarta jaldi on, or thi mili saath dushmani isse kuch meccan tribes ; he or his anusarankarta yahood treated harshly.
to escape persecution, mohammad sent some of uske anusarankarta to abisinia before he or his followers in makka migrated to madina ( then known as yathrib ) in the saal 622.
This event, the hijr, marks the beginning of the islamic calendar, jisase is bhi gyaat as the hijri Calendar.
in madina, mohammad sanyukt the janajatiyon antargat the samvidhan of madina.
baad aath years of lard saath the meccan janajatiyon, uske anusarankarta, jo by tab had grown to 10,000, took control of Mecca in the largely shantipurna conquest of Mecca.
He nasht the pagan murtiyon in the nagar and then sent uske followers out to nasht sab of the baaki pagan mandiron in purvi Arabia.
in 632, a few maheene after returning to madina from the vidaai Pilgrimage, mohammad fell biimaar or died.
By the time of uske maut, sabase of the Arabian prayadweep tha parivartit to islam, or he had sanyukt arab into a single muslim dharmik polity.
the khulaase ( or ayah, lit.
`` lakshan [ of parameshwar ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until his maut – rup the aayatein of the quran, regarded by musalmaan as the `` shabd of God '' or around which the dharm is aadhaarit.
Besides the Quran, mohammad 's jivan ( sira ) and traditions ( sunnat ) hai also upheld by musalmaan as the sources of sharia vidhi.
ve discuss mohammad and other nabiyon of islam with reverence, adding the phrase peace be upon use whenever unke names are mentioned.
jabaki conceptions of mohammad in medieval Christendom or premodern times yahood largely rinatmak, appraisals in aadhunik itihaas have maharoom far kam so.
the great Books ( duusari sanskaran )
Great kitabe of the Western World is a shrenee of books originally prakashit in the sanyukt rajya in 1952 by Encyclopædia vishwakosh inc. to upasthit the great kitabe in a single package of 54 aaytan.
The shrenee is abhi in its second sanskaran or contains 60 volumes.
the original sampadak of the shrenee chose teen maapdand liye inclusion : a book must be praasangik to samakaleen mudde, or nahin tabhi mahatvapurn in iske aitihaasik context ; it jarur badla rereading ; and it jarur be a bhaag of `` the great conversation parichay the great vichaar, '' praasangik to at tanik 25 of the 102 great vichaar pahachaanaa by the sampadak.
kitabe yahood not chosen on the aadhaar of jaateey or saanskrithik inclusiveness, aitihaasik influence, or the editors ' anubandh saath the drishy expressed.
`` Cocaine '' is a song likhaa and ankit by jj cale in 1976, lakin bhi gyaat as a cover sanskaran recorded by eric clapton.
allmusic calls the latter `` among [ clapton 's ] most enduringly popular hits '' or notes ki `` even for an kalakaar like clapton saath a vishaal deh of high-quality work, 'Cocaine ' ranks among uske best. ''
glyn johns, who tha previously worked saath The jo, led Zeppelin or the Rolling pattharon, utpaadit the clapton recording, jisase was released on Clapton 's 1977 album slowhand or as a single in 1980.
The sajiv sanskaran of `` coca '', isse the Just ek raatri album ankit in tokio, charted on the billboard hot 100 as the b-side of `` Tulsa samay ``, which was a no. 30 hit in 1980. ``

the akraman on Pearl harbar ( pukaara Hawaii Operation or aaparishan ai by the japani imperial saamaanya Headquarters ( aaparishan z in niyojan ) and the battle of parl harbar ) thi a surprise military strike conducted by the imperial japani navy viruddh the United rajya naval aadhaar at parl Harbor, hawaii, on the morning of disambar 7, 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ).
isse the standpoint of the defenders, the akraman commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian samay.
the attack thi intended as a nivarak action in order to rakhana the U.S. Pacific bede from dakhal saath military kriyaayein the samrajya of Japan thi niyojan in Southeast Asia viruddh videshi territories of the sanyukt Kingdom, the Netherlands, or the sanyukt rajya.
the aadhaar was attacked by 353 japani senaanee, bamavarshak or torpedo planes in do lehren, launched isse chah vayuyan vaahak.
sab aath u.S. navy battleships were kshatigrast, with chaar hone sunk.
do of ye yahood baad raised, and saath the baaki chaar repaired, six battleships laute to service baad in the war.
The Japanese also sank or kshatigrast teen cruisers, teen destroyers, an anti-aircraft prashikshan jalayaan, and one minelayer.
188 U.S. vayuyan were destroyed ; 2,402 america yahood maare and 1,282 wounded.
mahatvapurn aadhaar sansthapana aise as the power station, dockyard, mentanence, or eendhan and torpedo bhandar facilities, as khub as the pandubbi pier and mukhyalay building ( bhi home of the pragna khand ) yahood nahin attacked.
japani nuksaan were light : 29 vayuyan or five midget submarines lost, and 65 servicemen maare or wounded.
One japani sailor thi captured.
the akraman aae as a profound shock to the amareeki logon and led directly to the amareeki entry into World yuddh ii in both the prashanth and europea theatre.
The following din ( disambar 8 ), the sanyukt rajya ghoshit yuddh on japani.
gharelu support for non-interventionism, jisase had been damdaar, disappeared.
clandestine support of britain ( for example the neutrality patrol ) thi replaced by kriyasheel gathbandhan.
subsequent parichaalan by the u.S. prompted Germany or italy to ghoshit yuddh on the u.S. on disambar 11, which thi reciprocated by the u.S. the same din.
vahin yahood numerous aitihaasik precedents for unannounced military karrwai by Japan.
However, the kami of koi aupchaarik warning, particularly while negotiations yahood still jaahir jari, led adhyaksh franklin D. rujvelt to proclaim disambar 7, 1941, `` a tithi jisase hoga sajiv in infamy ``.

an udhaaharan of a Heraclius khachchar
In numismatics, a mule is a sikaa or padak minted saath obverse or reverse dizin nahin normally dekhi on the same tukdaa.
These can be jaanboojhkar or utpaadit by error.
This prakaar of error is atyadhik sought baad, or udhaaharan can laane steep keemten from collectors.
the earliest mules are mila among ancient unani or roman coins.
raay is vibhajit between those jo socho that ve hai accidental, the parinaam of an galat sangyojan of a nai die saath ek ki tha officially maharoom withdrawn isse upyog, or the kaary of coiners working with marataa churaayaa isse an official mint, shaayad at a samay when ek of unhen should have maharoom destroyed.
the naam derives isse the khachchar, the sankar offspring of a ghoda or a donkey, due to aise a sikaa having do pahalu intended liye alag sikke, much as a khachchar rai abhibhavak of two different prajati.
This page dastauez the tornadoes or bavandar outbreaks of 2010.
the bahumat of tornadoes form in the u.S., lakin they can occur lagbhag anywhere under the sahi sharten.
a lesser kramank occur baahar the u.S., sabase notably in bhaag of neighboring southern canada dauraan the Northern golardh 's garmiyaan ritu, but hai also known in South America, Europe, Asia, and australia.
vahin yahood 1,531 tornadoes reported in the sanyukt rajya in 2010 ( of jisase at least 1,266 yahood confirmed ), with 45 pushti fatalities.
elsewhere in the world, 11 logon yahood maare in tornadoes, six in argentina, teen in the bahama, ek in Bangladesh, or one in germany.
the year was nikat average liye tornadoes despite an atyadhik shant jaldi vasant kaal, however such changed baad a vishaal upswing starting in late April or a vyast let vasant or summer kaal.
The patjhad maheene yahood thodaa upar ausat.
a lymphocyte is a prakaar of shwet rakt cell in the vertebrate immune pranali.
Under the microscope, lymphocytes can be vibhajit into vishaal lymphocytes or choti lymphocytes.
vishaal granular lymphocytes include prakritik killer koshikaayen ( NK koshikaayen ).
choti lymphocytes consist of t koshikaayen or B koshikaayen.
Windows powershell is microsoft 's kaary swachaalan framework, consisting of a command-line shell or associated encripshan language nirmit on.neT Framework.
powershell provides puraa access to com or wmi, enabling administrators to perform administrative kaary on dono local or remote khidkiyaan pranaaliyon.
in powershell, administrative kaary hai generally performed by cmdlets ( pronounced command-lets ), jisase hai specialized.neT varg implementing a particular operation.
set of cmdlets may be combined saath in script, executables ( which hai standalone anuprayog ), or by instantiating niyamit.neT classes ( or WMI/COM vastuen ).
ye kaary by accessing aankada in alag aankada stores, like the filesystem or registry, jisase hai made uplabdhiyaan to the powershell runtime via khidkiyaan powershell pradaataaon.
khidkiyaan powershell bhi provides a hosting API saath jisase the Windows powershell runtime can be embedded andar anya anuprayog.
These anuprayog can tab upyog khidkiyaan powershell kaaryakshmata to implement nishchit operations, sahit those exposed via the graphical interfes.
is kaabiliyat rai been used by microsoft exange sarwar 2007 to expose iske prabandhan kaaryakshmata as powershell cmdlets or pradaataaon or implement the graphical prabandhan tools as powershell host which invoke the jaruri cmdlets.
anya microsoft applications sahit microsoft escuel sarwar 2008 also expose unke prabandhan interfes via powershell cmdlets.
saath PowerShell, graphical interface-based prabandhan applications on khidkiyaan hai paratdaar on top of Windows powershell.
a powershell scripting interfes liye khidkiyaan utpaada is mandated by the aam Engineering maapdand.
khidkiyaan PowerShell shaamil iske apana extensive, console-based sahaayta, samaan to man pages in Unix shells, via the get-help cmdlet.
Mary Poppins is a 1964 musical filmi abhinit Julie andrews, land Van Dyke, daud Tomlinson, or glynis Johns, utpaadit by walt dijani, and aadhaarit on the mariyam poppins kitabe shrenee by P. L. trevers.

it thi shot at Walt dijani Studios in burbank, california.

a story chaap is an vistaarit or continuing storyline in episodic storytelling media aise as television, comic kitabe, comic strips, boardgames, video games, or in kuch maamle, films.
on a television kaarykram, for udhaaharan, the story hota unfold over many apisod.
In television, the upyog of the story arc is much adhik common in dramas than in comedies, visheshkar in soap operas.
webcomics hai adhik sambhavit to upyog story arcs than samachaarpatr comics, as sabase web comics have pathneey abhilekh online ki a newcomer to the strip can padhaa in anukram to samajhe kayaa is going on.
haalanki story arcs have existed for dashakon, the pad `` story chaap '' thi coined in 1988 in relation to the television shrenee wiseguy, or thi jaldi adapted for other uses.
anek American comic book series are abhi likhaa in chaar or six-issue arcs, bheetar a continuing shrenee.
choti story arcs hai easier to package as vyapaar paperbacks liye punarvikray, and adhik accessible to the cazual reader than the never-ending continuity ki once characterised comics.
blike Friday is the din following thankgiving din in the sanyukt States, often regarded as the shuruuaat of the christmas kharidari season.
in recent years, most pramukh retailor have opened atyadhik early and offered promotional sales to laat band the holiday kharidari ritu, samaan to mukkebaazi din bikri in anek Commonwealth raashtra.
blike shuukravaar is nahin an aadhikarik public avkaash as aise, but anek non-retail employees or skulon have dono Thanksgiving and the din baad band, followed by a weekend, thereby increasing the kramank of sambhavit shoppers.
it has routinely maharoom the busiest kharidari day of the saal chunki 2005, haalanki news reports, jisase at ki samay were inaccurate, have varnit it as the vyastatam kharidari day of the saal liye a much longer kaal of samay.
The day 's naam originated in Philadelphia, where it originally thi prayukt to describe the baari or disruptive paidal or gadee traffic jisase hota occur on the day baad thankgiving.
upyog of the pad prarambh pehle 1961 or began to dekhie broader upyog baahar philadelphia around 1975.
baad an alternative spashtikaran began to be offered : ki `` blike shuukravaar '' indicates the point at jisase retailers begin to phere a laabh, or are `` ''.
liye anek saalo, it thi aam liye retailers to open at 6:00 a.m., lakin in the let 2000s anek tha crept to 5:00 or bhi 4:00.
This thi liya to a nai extreme in 2011, when several retailers ( sahit nishaanaa, kohl 's, Macy 's, behtareen khride, and bealls ) kholi at madhyaraatri liye the first samay.
In 2012, walmart or anek anya retailor ghoshit ki they would kholen sabase of unke stores at 8:00 p.m. on thankgiving din ( except in rajya jahaan kholane on Thanksgiving is nishiddh due to blue kanoon, aise as Massachusetts where ve still kholi around midnight ), prompting kals liye a walkout among kuch majdoor.
blike Friday shopping is gyaat liye attracting aggressive crowds, saath salanaa reports of assaults, shootings, or throngs of logon trampling on anya shoppers in an attempt to milengi the behtareen saude on a product before aapurtiyan run out.
the parivaar ki preys is a 2008 amareeki movie drama likhaa, utpaadit, or nirdeshit by Tyler peri.
the patakatha focuses on two pariwaron, one wealthy and the anya working class, jinaki jeevandaan hai intertwined in dono love or kaarobaar.
the film is the duusari of chaar in jisase peri 's hastakshar character, Madea, does not make an appearance.
it is also the duusari Perry-directed filmi ( alongside Daddy 's choti Girls ) that is nahin aadhaarit on koi of the filmkaar 's stage plays.
Net 10, jaal 15, jaal 30 and Net 60 ( bhi Net 10 dinon, et al ) are form of vyapaar credit which bataaen that the net raashi ( the kul bakaayaa on the chaalaan ) is expected to be paid in puraa or praapt by the vikreta bheetar 10, 15, 30 or 60 days baad the goods are dispatched or seva is completed.
Net 30 or Net 60 sharten are often coupled saath a credit liye early payment.
the shabd jaal in is sense arthath `` kul baad sab chhot. ''
it originally garbhashayi isse the Latin nitere ( to shine ) or nitidus ( elegant, trim ), and adhik recently isse the french net ( sharp, neat, clean ).
roadtown, Tortola
The angrejon west indies yahood the islands in or around the caribbean that yahood part of the angrejon samrajya.
in 1912, the angrejon West indies yahood divided into eight colonies : the Bahamas, Barbados, angrejon guiana, angrejon Honduras, jamaica ( with its dependencies the turks or caicos islands and the Cayman islands ), trinidad or tobago, the windward islands or the Leeward islands.
between 1958 or 1962, sab of the dweep territories magar the angrejon virgin islands, the bahama, British Honduras or angrejon Guiana yahood sangathit into the west indies sangh.
it was hoped that the sangh hota become swatantra as a single swadesh, lakin it tha limited shaktiyaan, many practical samasyaayein, or a lack of popular support.
natijatan, the west indies sangh thi dissolved.
Most of the territories, sahit sab the larger ones, hai abhi independent as separate deshon, saath membership to anek antarrashtriya forums such as the sanghathan of American States, the sangh of caribbean rajya, the sansar Trade sanghathan, the sanyukt Nations, the caribbean jatiyaan, the rashtramandal of raashtra or the Caribbean vikaas Bank among others.
the shesh hai angrejon videshi territories.
sab the purv raashtra of the angrejon west indies, except the rashtramandal of dominican, Guyana or Trinidad and Tobago, are Commonwealth realms.
The pad is still prayukt liye angrejon videshi Territories in the caribbean, aise as the Cayman Islands.
the remaining angrejon west Indies
`` kayaa a adbhut World '' is a song written by bob Thiele ( as `` george duglas '' ) and george daud Weiss.
It was pehla ankit by Louis Armstrong and released as a single in 1967.
thiele or veis yahood both prominent in the music sansar ( Thiele as a nirmaataa or veis as a composer/performer ).
armastrang 's recording thi inducted in the grami haul of kirti in 1999.

udghaatan din 2009 on the west kadam of the u.S. capital.
adhyaksh george W. bush or pehla mahila Laura bush sise the inaugural parade bas Pennsylvania avenue to the shwet house, 2005
The udghaatan of the adhyaksh of the United States is a ceremonial event ankan the shuruyaat of a nai four-year pad of a adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya.
The day a adhyakshiya udghaatan occurs is known as `` Inauguration din '' and occurs on January 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a Sunday ).
( prior to the beesvin Amendment, the tithi thi March 4, the din of the saal on which the samvidhan of the United rajya pehla took effect in 1789 ; the last udghaatan to take place on the puraani date thi franklin D. rujvelt 's first ek on March 4, 1933. )
The sabase recent public adhyakshiya udghaatan rasm, the swearing in of adhyaksh baraak Obama to shuru uske duusari four-year term in daftar, took place on somvaar, janvari 21, 2013.
the only inauguration tatv mandated by the sanyukt rajya Constitution is ki the adhyaksh mek an shapath or pratigyaan before ki person can `` enter on the nishpaadan '' of the daftar of the presidency.
However, over the years, vibhinn paramparaon have arisen ki have vistaarit the inauguration isse a saral oath-taking rasm to a day-long event, including parades, bhaashanon, or balls.
isse the presidency of Andrew Jackson through ki of jimmy carter, the praathmik udghaatan Day ceremony took place on the capital 's east portico.
Since the 1981 udghaatan of ronaald reagan, the ceremony has maharoom yojit at the Capitol 's west saamne.
The inaugurations of wiliam harvard taft in 1909 or reagan in 1985 were sthanantarit indoors at the Capitol due to thanda mausam.
the yuddh of 1812 or sansar yuddh II caused two inaugurations to be held at anya sthitiyaan in washington, D.C.
When george Washington thi udghaatan, the shapath was administered by robert Livingston, chancelar of nai York rajya, in 1789, or by William cushing, Associate insaaf of the param Court, in 1793.
chunki Chief insaaf oliver elsworth swore in adhyaksh jon adams, no mukhya justice rai chhuti an udghaatan din.
When Inauguration din rai gire on a Sunday, the mukhya insaaf rai administered the shapath to the adhyaksh on the sande privately or tab again the aglaa day saream.
jab a nai adhyaksh takes over mid-term due to the death or istipha of a adhyaksh, the oath of office is administered lakin aupchaarik, public udghaatan kaarykram have nahin maharoom yojit.
stefani Joanne angelina Germanotta ( ; born kooch 28, 1986 ), gyaat by her stage naam Lady gaaga, is an American singer, songwriter, ricard producer, nartki, activist, businesswoman, faishan designer, abhinetri and locasevak.
born or uthaaya in nai york nagar, wo primarily padhai at the kanvent of the pavitra Heart or briefly attended nai York vishvavidhyalayon 's tisch School of the kala pehle withdrawing to focus on her musical kariyar.
wo jald began performing in the chattan music scene of manahaton 's Lower east paksh.
by the samaapt of 2007, record executive and nirmaataa vincent herbert signed uske to uske label streamline Records, an imprint of interscope record.
initially working as a songwriter at interscope Records, her vocal abilities captured the attention of recording kalakaar econ, jo also hastakshrit her to kon sajiv vitaran, uske own label antargat Interscope.
mahila Gaga aae to prominence as a recording artist following the relies of uske debyue album, the Fame ( 2008 ), which thi a najuk or vanijyik kamyaabi that topped charts around the sansar and shaamil the antarrashtriya number-one singles `` Just nrity `` or `` Poker phase ``.
After embarking on the the kirti ball Tour, wo followed the album with the Fame daanav ( 2009 ), which spawned the worldwide hit singles `` karaab Romance ``, `` Telephone ``, and `` alejandro ``.
the kirti rakshas success anumat uske to embark on the eighteen-month long daanav Ball daure, jisase later became ek of the highest-grossing concert tours of sab samay.
uske most haal album, Born is Way ( 2011 ), awwal the charts of most major markets or utpann more antarrashtriya chart-topping singles, sahit `` born is rasta ``, `` yahuda ``, and `` the kinare of Glory ``.
Influenced by Britney spirs, daud bovi, maaikel jackson, madonna, or maharani, mahila gaaga is pahachaanaa liye her flamboyant, vividh and outré contributions to the music udyog through uske faishan, pradarshan or music video.
As of aktubar 2011, wo rai bechi an anumaanit 23 million albums and 64 million singles worldwide and uske singles hai kuch of the best-selling vishwavyaapee.
Her uplabdhiyaan shaamil five grami puraskaar or 13 amtivi video music puraskaar.
Lady gaaga rai consecutively appeared on Billboard patrika 's kalakaaron of the saal ( scoring the nirnaayak sheershak in 2010 ), kramit chauthi in vh1 's suchi of 100 Greatest mahilaon in music, is the chathe behtareen selling digital singles artist in us according to riaa, is regularly placed on lists rachit by Forbes patrika and thi namit ek of the most influential logon in the sansar by samay patrika.
besides her musical kariyar, wo involves herself with humanitarian kalyankari or lgbt sakriyata.

elizabeth cady stanton and uske beti, Harriot
elizabeth cady stanton ( navambar 12, 1815 – October 26, 1902 ) was an amareeki soshal activist, abolitionist, or agrani figure of the jaldi women 's adhikaron movement.
uske Declaration of sentiments, prastut at the pehla women 's adhikaron sammelan yojit in 1848 in seneca Falls, nai york, is praayah credited saath initiating the first vyavasthit mahilaon 's rights or women 's suffrage andolanon in the sanyukt rajya.
pehle stanton narrowed her rajnatik fokas almost exclusively to mahilaon 's adhikaron, she was an kriyasheel abolitionist saath saath uske husband, henry brewster stanton or cousin, gerrit smith.
naapsand anek of those shaamil in the mahilaon 's adhikaron gati, stanton addressed various mudde pertaining to mahilaon beyond matdaan rights.
uske concerns shaamil women 's parental or custody adhikaron, property rights, niyukti and aay adhikaron, talaak, the aarthik swasthya of the parivaar, and janam control.
wo thi bhi an outspoken samarthak of the 19th-century temperance gati.
baad the amareeki civil yuddh, stanton 's patibaddhta to maadaa suffrage caused a schism in the women 's adhikaron gati jab wo, saath saath susaan B. anthoni, asweekrut to support dyodhi of the Fourteenth or pandrahavin Amendments to the United rajya Constitution.
She opposed giving added vidhik suraksha or matdaan adhikaron to africa amareeki men jabaki mahilaon, blike or white, yahood asweekrut those vahi adhikaron.
uske sthiti on this samasya, saath with uske vichaar on vyavasthit christianity or women 's mudde pare voting adhikaron, led to the gathan of do separate women 's adhikaron sanghathan ki yahood aakhirkaar rejoined, with stanton as president of the joint sanghathan, lagbhag bees saalo baad uske brake from the asli mahilaon 's suffrage gati.
Stanton died in 1902 having authored dono the stri 's bible or uske aatmakatha, along with anek aalekh and pamphlets concerning maadaa suffrage or women 's rights.
my mela mahila is a musical aadhaarit upon George barnard shaw 's pygmalion or saath book or geet by alan jay Lerner or music by fredrick loewe.
the story chintaaen Eliza doolittle, a kaakani pushp ladki jo takes vaak lessons isse professor Henry higgins, a phoneticist, so that wo may pass as a well-born lady.
the musical 's 1956 broadway production thi a hit, setting kayaa thi tab the ricard liye the longest chalaaen of any major musical theatre utpaadan in itihaas.
it thi followed by a hit London utpaadan, a lokapriy film version, or numerous revivals.
It rai maharoom pukaara `` the purna musical ''.

nasl or jaateey group is a socially paribhaashit shrenee based on aam samskruti or rashtriyata.
nasl can, but karata nahin have to, include aam ancestry, rup, bhojan, dressing style, viraasat, itihaas, bhashaa or dialect, dharm, symbols, paramparaon, or anya cultural factor.
jaateey identity is constantly reinforced through common visheshtaayen jisase niyat the samooh alaava isse other samooh.
The 19.9 mw Gemasolar solar plant in spain suvidhaayen 15 hours of bhandar and can supply shakti 24 hours a din.
Solar urja, raushan lite and ooshmaa from the surya, rai maharoom harnessed by insaano chunki pracheen times using a dayera of ever-evolving technologies.
saura urja technologies include solar heating, solar photovoltaics, saura thermal vidyut, saura vaastukala and kritrim photosynthesis, jisase can make considerable yogadan to solving kuch of the sabase urgent energy samasyaayein the sansar abhi chehron.
Solar technologies hai broadly characterized as either passive saura or kriyasheel saura depending on the rasta ve capchar, convert and vitarit saura energy.
kriyasheel solar takneekon shaamil the use of photovoltaic panels or saura thermal collectors to dohan the energy.
Passive saura takneekon shaamil orienting a bhawan to the Sun, selecting saamagree with favorable thermal dravyaman or light dispersing properties, or designing spaces ki naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the International urja agency kaha ki `` the development of sasti, inexhaustible or saaf saura urja technologies hoga have vishaal longer-term benefits.
It hoga badhayen countries’ energy suraksha through reliance on an swadeshi, inexhaustible or mostly import-independent sansaadhan, badhayen sthirataa, reduce pollution, nimnatar the costs of mitigating jalwaayu badalen, or rakhana fossil fuel prices lower than varanaa.
ye advantages hai vaishvik.
hence the additional laagat of the protsaahan liye jaldi deployment chahie be mana learning nivesh ; they jarur be wisely spent and need to be widely saajha ''.
The shastreey Latin varnmaala or roman varnmaala evolved isse a pashchimi kismein of the unani alphabet called the cumaean alphabet, which was apanaaya and parivardhit by the etruscans jo ruled jaldi Rome.
The etruscan varnmaala thi in phere adopted or further parivardhit by the pracheen romans to write the latin bhashaa.
dauraan the madhya aayu, the Latin varnmaala thi adapted to romance languages, direct vanshajon of latin, as well as to Celtic, germanic, Baltic, or kuch Slavic bhashaaen.
saath the aayu of upniveshwaad or Christian evangelism, the Latin script thi sprad videshi, and lagu to indigenous amareeki, australian, Austronesian, Austroasiatic, and africa languages.
More recently, linguists have bhi tended to prefer the latin script or the antarrashtriya dhvanyatmak varnmaala ( itself largely based on latin script ) when transcribing or creating likhaa maanakon liye non-european bhashaaen, aise as the africa sandarbh alphabet.
the pad latin varnmaala may refer to either the varnmaala used to likhen Latin ( as varnit in is article ), or anya alphabets based on the Latin script, jisase is the moulik set of akshar common to the vibhinn alphabets descended isse the shastreey Latin one, such as the angrezi varnmaala.
ye latin-derived alphabets may choden letters, jaise the rotokas alphabet, or add nai akshar, jaise the danish and norwegian varnmaala.
Letter aakaar have badla over the centuries, sahit the sristi liye Medieval Latin of nimnatar case form jisase did not maujuud in the Classical period.
The hatya of sanyukt rajya adhyaksh abraham lincoln took place on shubh Friday, april 14, 1865, as the amareeki civil War thi drawing to a band.
The hatya occurred five dinon baad the commander of the Confederate fouj of Northern virginia, saamaanya Robert E. lee, surrendered to leftinent saamaanya Ulysses S. Grant or the sangh fouj of the Potomac.
Lincoln thi the first amareeki adhyaksh to be assassinated, haalanki an unsuccessful attempt had maharoom made on andrew Jackson 30 saalo pehle in 1835.
the assassination was niojit and carried out by the well-known stage actor John wilkes booth, as bhaag of a larger conspiracy in a boli to revive the confederate kaaran.
booth 's co-conspirators yahood louis pavel or David herold, jo yahood abantit to kill Secretary of rajya wiliam H. seward, and george atzerodt jo thi to kill vaais adhyaksh andrew johnson.
by simultaneously eliminating the top teen logon in the administration, Booth or uske co-conspirators hoped to sever the nirantarata of the sanyukt rajya sarkari.
lincoln thi shot jabaki watching the khel hamaari American cousin with uske bivi Mary tod lincoln at Ford 's theatre in washington, d.C. on the raatri of april 14, 1865.
he died jaldi the aglaa morning.
the baaki of the shadyantrkariyon ' plot vifal ; Powell tabhi prabandhit to ghaav seward, jabaki atzerodt, Johnson 's would-be hatyare, khoyaa uske tantrika or fled Washington.

plug-in ( computing ), a tukdaa of software which enhances another tantra application and praayah can not be chalaaen independently

klbon level seating is a special section of seating in aadhunik khel stadium.
The Club str is usually stith towards the madhya of the stage of seating bhaag, above the nimnatar deck but below the upper deck.
They are praayah sahi aglaa to the Luxury baks, either sahi upar, sahi below, or sandwiched between do str of Luxury Boxes.
klbon str seating is mana as ucchtar class than sitting anywhere else in the arina, lakin lower class compared to the lakjri baks.
naapsand the Luxury baks, sabase klbon levels do nahin rap entirely around the arena.
kuch club str roke at a nishchit point, giving rasta to an expansion of the mezanin, jabaki others de rasta to nimnatar class lakjri Boxes ( such as `` party suites '' ).
A notable excepshan to is is emirate stadium in London, jisase rai a puraa tier of klbon seating.
klbon str allow prashansak anek str of entertainment.
Club Level seating is kholen to the elements, as opposed to the entirely enclosed lakjri baks, jisase gives adhik of an outdoors chhap at roofless or open-roof stadium and arenas.
klbon str seating is saamanytah kharida on a anubandh aadhaar to allow for adhiktam profit on the bhaag of the stadium.
The klbon str provides fans saath special abhigam to an andar bhaag of the arina vishesh to prashansak with khaas tikaten.
These kshetron are air conditioned or allow access to khaas restaraan, merchandise stand, or lounge kshetron of the stadium ki hai not varanaa uplabdhiyaan.
riyaayat stand or vikreta on the klbon str also praayah prastaav alag menu than in anya stand to de adhik of a special mahasoos to the klbon.
These kshetron are closed band to the baaki of the stadium, or ve praayah can tabhi be accessed through the vishesh, private club entrances.
sophia Loren ( ; born Sofia Villani scicolone ; 20 sitambar 1934 ) is an italvi actress.

hospital apaat code are prayukt in aspataal vishwavyaapee to chetavanee staff to vibhinn emergencies.
The upyog of codes is intended to convey essential soochna jaldi and saath minimal misunderstanding to staff, jabaki preventing tanaav or dehshat among vizitor to the hospital.
These code may be posted on placards throughout the hospital, or mudrit on karmchaaree pahchaan baij liye taiyaar sandarbh.
waapas of a hospital id baij showing vipatti codes.
hospital apaat codes may denote different kaarykram at alag aspataal, sahit aasapaas ones.
Because many physicians work at more than ek suvidha, this may lead to bhram in emergencies, so vardi systems have maharoom prastaavit.
The root of the Eifel aqueduct, with its ausat dhalaan.
the eifel Aqueduct thi ek of the longest aqueducts of the Roman Empire.
The jalsetu, constructed in ad 80, carried water some isse the hilly Eifel pradesh of kayaa is abhi germany to the ancient nagar of Colonia Claudia aara agrippinensium ( present-day Cologne ).
If the auxiliary spers to atirikt sroton hai included, the lambaai thi.
the nirmaan thi lagbhag entirely neeche maidan, or the flow of the water was produced entirely by gravity.
A few bridges, sahit ek up to in lambaai, were needed to pass over ghaatiyon.
naapsand some of the anya famous roman aqueducts, the eifel aqueduct thi specifically designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it isse kshati or jamane.
In rasayan, a disulfide bandha ( br.e. disulphide bandha ) is a covalent bond, usually niklaa by the coupling of do thiol groups.
the linkage is bhi pukaara an ss-bond or disulfide bridge.
the overall connectivity is isliye r-s-s-r.
the shabdaawalee is widely used in biochemistry.
in aupchaarik sharten, the connection is a persulfide, in analogy to its congener, peroxide ( r-o-o-r ), lakin is shabdaawalee is aspasht and is no longer prayukt ( magar in reference to r-s-s-h or h-s-s-h compounds ).
Formal depiction of disulfide bandha gathan as an oxidation.
westminster abi is prayukt liye the rajtilak of angrejon monarchs
dharm in the sanyukt kingdom or in the countries ki preceded it, has been varchasv, liye over 1,400 years, by various form of Christianity.
according to some surveys, a bahumat of nagarikon still pahachaano saath Christianity, although regular girijaghar upasthiti rai gire dramatically since the madhya of the 20th century, or avrajan or janasankhyikee badalen have contributed to the growth of other faiths.
dharmik sambandhon of UK nagarikon hai ankit by niyamit surveykshan, the chaar pramukh ones being the UK Census, the shramik Force surveykshan, the angrejon soshal attitudes survey and the European soshal Survey.
according to the 2001 uk census, Christianity is the pramukh dharm, followed by islam, Hinduism, Sikhism, judaism or buddhism in sharten of kramank of adherents.
This, or the apekshaakrit vishaal number of individuals saath nominal or no dharmik sambandhon rai led tikaakaron to variously describe the United kingdom as a multi-faith, secularised, or post-Christian samaaj.
the sanyukt Kingdom thi formed by the union of previously independent deshon isse 1707, or consequently sabase of the largest religious groups do nahin have uk-wide organisational structures.
jabaki some samooh have separate structures for the vyaktigat countries of the United kingdom, anya may have a single structure covering England and wales or great britain.
similarly, due to the relatively recent sristi of uttari Ireland in 1921, most major dharmik samooh in uttari ireland hai sangathit on an all-ireland aadhaar.
the 1967 Newark dange yahood a pramukh civil disturbance that occurred in the nagar of Newark, New Jersey between july 12 and july 17, 1967.
the chah dinon of rioting, luutane, or vinaash left 26 dead and sainkadon injured.
in sanyukt rajya college athletics, redshirt is a vilamb or suspension of an khilaadi 's bhagidaari in anukram to lengthen his or uske kaal of eligibility.
Typically, a chaatr 's athlettic eligibility in a die khel is chaar sizan, a kramank niklaa from the chaar saalo of academic classes ki hai saamanytah jaruri to obtain a bachelor 's oopaadhi at an American college or university.
However, a chaatr khilaadi may be offered the opportunity to redshirt liye up to two years, which allows the khilaadi to sprad those four saalo of eligibility over paanch, or sometimes chah saalo.
In a redshirt saal, a chaatr khilaadi may attend varg at the college or university, practice saath an athletic team, or dress liye play but he or she may nahin compete dauraan the khel.
using is yantriki, a student khilaadi rai up to paanch academic saalo to use the chaar years of paatrata, yun becoming a fifth-year senior.
The pad is used as a kriya, sangya, and adjective.
liye udhaaharan, a coach may chune to redshirt a khilaadi jo is tab referred to as a redshirt freshman or bas a redshirt.
the vipareet of is is a `` sachcha freshman. ''
sansar yuddh I ( wwi ) was a vaishvik war kendrit in Europe ki began on 28 july 1914 or lasted jabatak 11 navambar 1918.
it thi predominantly called the sansar War or the great yuddh isse iske occurrence until the prarambh of sansar yuddh II in 1939, and the pehla World yuddh or sansar yuddh i thereafter.
it involved sab the sansar 's great powers, jisase yahood samavet in do opposing alliances : the allies ( aadhaarit on the tripal entente of the sanyukt kingdom, frans and rus ) and the central shaktiyaan ( originally the tripal gathbandhan of germany, austria-hungary and italy ; lakin, as Austria–Hungary tha liya the apriy viruddh the anubandh, italy kiya nahin daalen into the war ).
ye alliances yahood both reorganised or vistaarit as adhik raashtra entered the yuddh : italy, japani or the sanyukt rajya joined the allies, or the osmani samrajya or Bulgaria the central shaktiyaan.
ultimately, adhik than 70 lakh sainya karmiyon, sahit 60 lakh europeans, yahood mobilised in ek of the largest yudhon in history.
More than 9 million combatants yahood maare, largely kuki of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of hathiyaar bagaiyr sambandhit sudhaar in suraksha or gatishiltaa.
It thi the fifth- deadliest virodh in sansar itihaas, subsequently paving the way for vibhinn rajnatik changes, aise as revolutions in anek of the nations shaamil.
ek of the long-term kalyankari of the yuddh thi the punarutthan of samrajyavad in the videshi nitiyon of the great shaktiyaan of europea.
adhik immediately, the hatya of Archduke franj ferdinand of austria, the vaaris to the singhaasana of austria-hungary, on 28 june 1914 by Yugoslav rashtravaadi gavrilo Princip in sarajevo triggered a diplomatic sankat jab austria-hungary subsequently vitarit an ultimatum to the kingdom of Serbia.
anek alliances formed over the pichhlaa decades yahood invoked.
bheetar saptaah, the major shaktiyaan yahood at yuddh or, via unke colonies, the conflict jald sprad around the world.
on 28 july, the austro-hungarians fired the pehla goliyaan of the war as taiyaari liye the akraman of srbija.
jabaki the russians mobilised, the germans invaded neutral belgium and dhvaj on the rasta to France, providing a casus belli liye britain 's declaration of yuddh against Germany.
baad the germany kooch on paris thi brought to a halt—the so-called chamatkaar of the marne —the pashchimi Front settled into a sthir battle of apgharshan saath a trench lakeer that changed choti jabatak 1917.
on the purvi saamne, the Russian fouj was kaamyaab against the austro-hungarians, lakin thi roka in iske invasion of east prussia by the germans.
In navambar the osmani samrajya joined the yuddh, opening up fronts in the kakeshas, Mesopotamia or the sinai.
Italy or bulgaria gai to yuddh in 1915 or Romania in 1916.
in rus, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 or a subsequent kranti in navambar brought the russians to terms saath the central shaktiyaan.
baad a 1918 germany apriy saath the pashchimi saamne, the Allies drove back the germans in a shrenee of kaamyaab offensives and American forces began pravesh the trenches.
germany, jisase had iske apana trubal with krantikariyon, sahamat to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
the yuddh ended in victory for the Allies.
kaarykram on the ghar fronts were as ugr as on the battle fronts, as the bhagidaar tried to mobilize unke janashakti or aarthik sansaadhan to fight a kul yuddh.
by the end of the yuddh, four pramukh imperial powers—the germany, Russian, austro-hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to maujuud.
The successor rajya of the purv do lost a great raashi of territory, jabaki the latter do were dismantled entirely.
the map of central Europe thi redrawn into anek choti states.
the lig of raashtra thi formed in the aashaa of preventing another aise virodh.
the europea rashtrawaad shakhit by the war or the brallep of empires, the repercussions of germany 's defeat or problems saath the sandhi of Versailles hai sahamat to be factors contributing to World War ii.
map of countries that ghoshit themselves to be samaajawaadee rajya antargat the marxist–leninist or Maoist paribhaasha - ki is to kah, `` communist rajya '' - between 1979 or 1983.
This kaal chihnit the mahanatam territorial extent of communist rajya.
a communist rajya is a rajya jahaan the arthath of utpaadan hai collectively owned by the samaaj.
it rai a form of sarkari characterized by single-party niyam or dominant-party niyam of a communist party ( referred as taanaashaahee of the Proletariat by iske proponents ) or a professed nishtha to a leninist or Marxist–Leninist vichaardhaara as the guiding principle of the rajya.
technically, `` communist rajya '' is a contradictio in terminis as a communist society as paribhaashit by dono Marxists or anarcho-communists is in principle stateless.
isse is pariprekshya, the pad marxist-leninist state is more uchit.
historically, a `` communist state '' referred to a pranali jahaan public ownership of sab or sabase arthath of production by the communist party -run rajya is deemed jaruri to further the ruchi of the working class ; today, a communist rajya can bhi, liye udhaaharan, refer to contemporary china or Vietnam, jahaan a Communist Party-run rajya exists alongside a mishrit economy.
according to marxist–leninists, the rajya is a tool in the hands of the ruling class, jisase in a samaajawaadee samaaj is the working class, so a socialist rajya is, according to leninists, a rajya of the working class.
in abhyaas, communist rajya do not darasal refer to themselves as such.
They do is not to bhes the fact that the ruling party is communist, lakin balki kuki they do nahin consider themselves to be a communist society at upasthit.
bajaay, ve constitutionally identify themselves as samaajawaadee states or majdoor ' rajya.
the primary lakshya of ye rajya, jisase bhi explains unke aadhikarik name, is to maargdarshika unke sambandhit deshon in the prakram of bhawan samaajawaadee, ultimately agrani to samyavaadee.
communist rajya may have anek legal rajnatik partiyon, lakin the communist party is praayah granted a khaas or prabal role in government, praayah by statute or antargat the samvidhan.
natijatan, the sansthaanon of the rajya or of the communist party become intimately entwined, aise as in the vikaas of samanaantar sansthaanon.
in the 20th sadi, sabase communist states apanaaya niojit economies.
however, vahin yahood apwaad : The Soviet sangh dauraan the 1920s or let 1980s or Yugoslavia after sansar yuddh ii anumat simit bazaar or a oopaadhi of kaaryakarta self-management, jabaki china, Vietnam or laos introduced far-reaching market reforms after the 1980s.
in the 21st century, China or Vietnam have anumat a mishrit arthvyavastha to develop.
the fundamental avadharanaon of communist rajya often diverge from the original socio-economic vichaardhaaraon isse jisase ve develop.
as a parinaam, many adherents of ye ideologies praayah oppose the rajnatik systems commonly sambhddha saath these states.
liye udhaaharan, dissenting communists aise as trotskyists yahood often opposed to the communist rajya of the 20th century, claiming either ki ve tha nothing to do with `` real '' samyavaadee or ki the vichaardhaara of such states tha pahunche a point of irrevocable bhrashtachar.
maaikel Fred felps II ( born June 30, 1985 ) is a ritred amareeki tairaak and the sabase sajaa olympian of sab samay, saath a total of 22 medals.
felps bhi holds the all-time record for olympic gold medals ( 18, doguna the second ucchtam ricard dharakon ), Olympic sunaharaa medals in vyaktigat kaarykram ( 11 ), or Olympic medals in vyaktigat events for a purush ( 13 ).
in jeetna aath gold medals at the 2008 beijing khel, felps took the ricard for the most first-place finishes at koi single Olympic khel.
paanch of those victories were in vyaktigat kaarykram, tying the single khel ricard.
in the 2012 Summer olympic in London, Phelps won chaar golds or two silver medals, bananaa him the sabase successful khilaadi of the khel liye the teesraa Olympics in a pankti.
felps is the long course sansar recordholder in the 100-meter titali, 200-meter titali and 400-meter vyaktigat medley as khub as the purv long course sansar recordholder in the 200-meter freestil and 200-meter vyaktigat medley.
He has jiti a kul of 71 medals in major antarrashtriya long-course competition, 57 sunaharaa, 11 chaandi, or three bronze spanning the Olympics, the World, and the pan prashanth championships.
felps 's antarrashtriya sheershak or record-breaking performances have earned him the World tairaak of the saal puraskaar saat times or amareeki tairaak of the Year puraskaar nine times as khub as the phina Swimmer of the saal Award in 2012.
uske unprecedented olympic kamyaabi in 2008 arjeet felps khel illustrated patrika 's sportsman of the saal puraskaar.
After the 2008 Summer olympic, felps prarambh the Michael felps nyaas, jisase focuses on growing the khel of tairaaki or promoting healthier lifestyles.
He expects to do further kaary saath his nyaas after the 2012 olympic, jisase he rai said hoga be uske pichhlaa.
lenovo samooh simit ( ) is a chinis bahurashtriya computer hardware or electronics company saath iske mukhyalay in beijing, china or morrisville, North carolina or its registered daftar in hong kong, china.
iske utpaada shaamil personal computers, tablet computers, mobile phone, workstations, sarwar, electronic bhandar divaais, it prabandhan tantra and smart television.
lenovo is the sansar 's second-largest PC vikreta by 2012 ikai bikri.
it bazaar the ThinkPad lakeer of kopi computer or the ThinkCentre lakeer of desktops.
lenovo rai parichaalan in adhik than 60 deshon or bikta iske utpaada in around 160 countries.
lenovo thi santhaapit in beijing in 1984 and incorporated in hong Kong in 1988 under iske pichhlaa name, Legend.
Lenovo is listed on the Hong Kong bhandar exange and is a constituent of the Hang seng china-affiliated corporations Index.
Slug is a aam name liye an apparently shell-less sthaliy gastropod mollusk.
the shabd `` slog '' is also praayah used as bhaag of the aam naam of any gastropod mollusc ki rai no shell, rai a very ghataya shell, or rai tabhi a small aatanrik shell.
( is is in contrast to the common naam `` ghongha ``, which is lagu to gastropods ki have a nattejey shell that is large paryaapt ki the soft parts of the animal can retract fully into it. )
slugs exist on jameen or in the samudr, or vahin is bhi ek genus of freshwater slugs, Acochlidium.
the unadorned shabd `` slog '' is however lagu primarily to jameen slugs, whereas slugs from the samudr or isse freshwater hai usually referred to as `` sea slugs `` and `` freshwater slugs ''.
Land gastropods saath a shell that is not quite vestigial, lakin is too choti to retract into ( like anek in the parivaar urocyclidae ), are gyaat as semislugs.
the vibhinn taxonomic families of slugs form part of anek quite alag vikasvaadi lineages jisase bhi shaamil snails.
yun, liye example, the vibhinn pariwaron of jameen slugs hai nahin very closely related to one another, despite a satahi samanta in the overall body form.
the shell-less condishan rai arisen anek times independently dauraan the vikasvaadi past, or yun the category `` slog '' is emphatically a polyphyletic ek.
Slugs, jaise sab anya gastropods, undergo torsion ( a 180° tedi of the aatanrik angon ) dauraan vikaas.
Internally, slog anatomy clearly shows the prabhaav of is rotation, lakin externally the laashen of land slugs appear to be adhik or kam symmetrical, magar liye the positioning of the pneumostome, which is on ek side of the animal, saamanytah the sahi haath paksh.
the naram, slimy bodies of slugs hai prone to desiccation, so land-living slugs hai confined to nam environments or jarur retreat to nam hiding places jab the mausam is shushk.
the subsequent information in this article applies to jameen slugs.
is a latin word ki arthath `` yun '' or, in writing, `` it thi thus in the sorce saamagree ''.

sic, the aarambhik of Marco Simoncelli.

vishisht aagamanaatmak capacity, abbreviated to SIC, jisase is adhik commonly known as the saapeksh permittivity or the paravaidyut nirantar

Imperial maanak of nepolian I
nepolian bonapart (, ; 15 agast 1769 – 5 May 1821 ) thi a french sainya and political leader who rose to prominence during the latter charan of the french kranti or its associated yudhon in europea.
as nepolian i, he was samraat of the French isse 1804 to 1815.
uske vidhik sudhaar, the napoleonic code, has maharoom a major influence on many civil vidhi jurisdictions worldwide, lakin he is best remembered liye uske bhoomika in the yudhon led viruddh frans by a series of coalitions, the so-called Napoleonic yudhon.
he sthapit aadhipaty over most of continental europea or sought to sprad the aadarshon of the french Revolution, jabaki consolidating an imperial samrajya jisase restored pahaluon of the apdasth ancien régime.
due to uske kamyaabi in ye wars, praayah viruddh numerically shreshth dushmano, he is generally regarded as one of the mahanatam sainya cmanderon of sab time, or his campaigns hai studied at sainya academies vishwavyaapee.
Napoleon thi born at ajaccio in corsica in a family of noble italvi ancestry which tha settled corsica in the 16th sadi.
he prashikshit as an topakhane officer in menland France.
He rose to prominence under the french pehla ganatantr and led kaamyaab campaigns viruddh the pehla and duusari coalitions arrayed viruddh France.
he led a successful invasion of the italvi prayadweep.
in 1799, he staged a coup d'état and santhaapit khud as First kaunsul ; five saalo later the french Senate proclaimed him samraat, following a plebiscite in his paksh.
in the first dashak of the 19th sadi, the french samrajya under Napoleon sagaai in a shrenee of conflicts—the napoleonic yudhon —that shaamil prayek pramukh europea power.
baad a streak of victories, frans secured a prabal sthiti in mahadwipiya europea, or nepolian kaayam the french gola of influence through the gathan of extensive alliances or the niyukti of mitron or parivaar sadasyon to niyam anya europea deshon as french claayent states.
the Peninsular yuddh or 1812 french akraman of Russia chihnit turning ank in Napoleon 's fortunes.
uske Grande Armée thi badly damaged in the abhiyaan or never fully baraamad.
in 1813, the chathe gathbandhan parajeet his shaktiyaan at Leipzig ; the following saal the gathbandhan invaded frans, majaboor Napoleon to abdicate and exiled him to the dweep of Elba.
Less than a year baad, he faraar alba or returned to power, but was parajeet at the Battle of Waterloo in june 1815.
nepolian kharch the last six saalo of uske jivan in karawas by the British on the dweep of sant Helena.
An autopsy concluded he died of stomach cancer, lakin vahin rai maharoom kuch bahes parichay the kaaran of uske maut, as some vidwaanon have speculated ki he thi a shikaar of arsenic vishaaktata.
is is a kalanukramik listing of the sanyukt States Senators from Pennsylvania.
sanyukt rajya seenetteron hai popularly nirvaachit, liye a six-year pad, beginning janvari 3.
chunaavon hai yojit the pehla mangalvaar baad November 1.
pehle 1914, they yahood chosen by the Pennsylvania saamaanya sabha, and pehle 1935, their sharten began March 4.
The dakshin Africa neshnal rugby sangh toli ( gyaat as the springboks ) represents dakshin Africa in rugby sangh.
ve compete in the annual Rugby Championship, saath saath southern-hemisphere counterparts argentina, australia or nai Zealand.
ve have jiti this championship on three avasaron in solah saalo.
ve hai philhal ranked duusari in the sansar by the International Rugby Board, or yahood named 2008 sansar toli of the saal at the laureus sansar khel Awards.
haalanki dakshin africa thi instrumental in the sristi of the Rugby sansar Cup pratiyogita, the Springboks did nahin compete in the pehla do sansar Cups in 1987 or 1991 because of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of dakshin africa.
the toli bana iske World Cup debut in 1995, jab the newly loktantric South Africa hosted the tournament.
the Springboks tab parajeet the sab ashweton 15–12 in the final, jisase is abhi remembered as one of the mahanatam pal in South africa 's sporting itihaas, or a watershed pal in the post-apartheid nation-building prakram.
dakshin Africa regained their sheershak as champions 12 years baad, jab ve parajeet england 15–6 in the 2007 final.
as a parinaam of the 2007 World cap tournament the springboks yahood promoted to pehla place in the IRB sansar Rankings, a sthiti ve held until july the following saal when nai jiland regained the top spot.
the springboks khel in green or sunaharaa jerseys, or unke emblems hai the springbok or the protea.
the side rai maharoom playing antarrashtriya rugby chunki 1891, jab a angrejon isles paksh toured the nation, playing South Africa in unke first pareekshan on 30 july.
South africa thi coached by jack White, jo led the boks to the 2007 sansar cap title, announcing uske istipha effectively isse the samaapt of 2007.
uske replacement 's ( Peter de villiers ) anubandh samaapt in 2011, following a 11–9 shikast to australia in the Rugby sansar Cup quarter-final, who tab stated he would nahin be hastakshar a new saude.
the pichhlaa captain thi jon smit, who pehle he retired in 2011 nibhaai veshya liye most of uske career, haalanki he rai also maharoom a prop, mainly in 2008 or 2009.
Due to smit hone anuplabdh liye the navambar 2010 pareekshan after surgery, taala victor matfield took Smit 's place as captain liye that daure.
the vartmaan captain is jaan de Villiers.
the Battle of gettysburg (, saath an dhwani ), thi fought july 1–3, 1863, in and around the kasbaa of gettysburg, Pennsylvania.
it thi the battle saath the largest kramank of casualties in the American Civil yuddh or is praayah described as the war 's turning point.
sangh maj. gen. george Gordon meade 's Army of the potomac parajeet hamale by Confederate gen. robert E. Lee 's Army of uttari Virginia, samaapti Lee 's akraman of the uttar.
baad uske success at chancellorsville in virginia in may 1863, Lee led uske fouj through the shenandoah ghati to shuru uske duusari akraman of the north—the gettysburg abhiyaan.
saath uske fouj in unchi atmaaon, Lee intended to shift the fokas of the garmiyaan abhiyaan isse war-ravaged northern Virginia or hoped to influence uttari politicians to de up unke abhiyojan of the yuddh by penetrating as far as harrisburg, pencilvenia, or bhi philadelphia.
Prodded by adhyaksh abraham lincoln, Maj. Gen. Joseph Hooker sthanantarit uske fouj in pursuit, but was sukun bas three dinon before the battle or replaced by meade.
tatv of the do sena initially collided at gettysburg on july 1, 1863, as Lee tatkaal concentrated his forces vahin, his objective hone to engage the sangh fouj and nasht it.
kam ridges to the uttarpashchim of kasbaa yahood defended initially by a sangh pyaade prabhag antargat Brig. gen. John buford, or jald reinforced with do corps of Union infantry.
However, two large confederate corps fahraa unhen isse the uttarpashchim or north, collapsing the hastily developed sangh linon, sending the defenders retreating through the streets of kasbaa to the pahadiyaan bas to the dakshin.
on the duusari din of battle, most of dono armies tha samavet.
The Union lakeer thi laid out in a defensive gathan resembling a fishhook.
In the let dopaher of July 2, Lee launched a baari assault on the Union baayein parshv, and fierce lard raged at choti Round Top, the wheatfield, shaitan 's den, and the aadu baag.
On the Union sahi, demonstrations escalated into full-scale assaults on Culp 's hill or kabristaan hill.
All aarpaar the ranbhumi, despite significant nuksaan, the sangh defenders held unke lines.
on the teesraa din of battle, july 3, lard resumed on Culp 's hill, or pyaade ladaaiyon raged to the east and dakshin, but the pramukh event was a naatakeey infantry utpeedan by 12,500 confederates against the bich of the sangh lakeer on Cemetery Ridge, gyaat as Pickett 's Charge.
the charge was repulsed by sangh rifl and topakhane aag, at great nuksaan to the confederate army.
lee led uske army on a torturous retreat waapas to Virginia.
between 46,000 or 51,000 sainiko isse dono sena yahood hataahat in the three-day battle.
ki November, adhyaksh lincoln prayukt the samarpan rasm liye the Gettysburg National Cemetery to sammaan the gire Union sainiko or redefine the purpose of the yuddh in uske historic gettysburg pataa.
an academik anushaasan, or field of padhai, is a shakha of gyaan that is taught or researched at the college or university str.
Disciplines hai paribhaashit ( in bhaag ), and pahachaanaa by the academik jarnals in jisase shodh is prakashit, and the learned samaajon or academik vibhaag or faculties to which unke practitioners belong.
however, there exists no aupchaarik criteria liye jab shaikshanik kaarykram or scholarly jarnals rup an academic anushaasan.
a vishaal antar exists between, on the ek hand, khub sthapit disciplines that exist in lagbhag sab vishvavidhyalayon sab over the sansar, have a long itihaas, or have a khub sthapit niyat of journals or sammelnon, or, on the anya haath, suggestions for nai field supported tabhi by few vishvavidhyalayon or publications.
field of padhai praayah have anek sub-disciplines or branches, and the distinguishing linon between ye hai praayah dono manamaani and aspasht.
piechapi is a server-side encripshan language designed for web vikaas but bhi prayukt as a general-purpose programing bhashaa.
piechapi is now santhaapit on adhik than 244 million websiton and 2.1 lakh web sarwar.
originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995, the sandarbh kriyanvayan of piechapi is abhi utpaadit by the piechapi Group.
jabaki piechapi originally stood liye nijee ghar pej, it now stand for PHP : hypertext preprocessor, a recursive acronym.
PHP code is interpreted by a web sarwar with a PHP procesar modul which generates the resulting web pej : piechapi cmand can be antahsthapit sidhe into an HTML sorce dastauez balki than colling an bahya sanchika to process data.
It has also viksit to include a command-line interfes capability or can be prayukt in staneylon aalekhiy applications.
piechapi is free software released under the piechapi anugna, which is incompatible with the gnu General Public anugna ( jeepiel ) due to pratibandh on the upyog of the pad PHP.
piechapi can be tainaat on sabase web sarwar and bhi as a staneylon shell on almost prayek oparating pranali and platform, free of charge.
John Fitzgerald `` joker '' kennedy ( may 29, 1917 – navambar 22, 1963 ), praayah referred to by uske adyakshar JFK, was the 35th President of the sanyukt States, sevarat from 1961 jabatak uske maut in 1963.
baad sainya seva as commander of the motor torpedo naukaaye PT-109 or PT-59 dauraan World yuddh ii in the dakshin prashanth, kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the u.S. house of Representatives isse 1947 to 1953 as a democrate.
Thereafter, he served in the u.S. Senate isse 1953 until 1960.
Kennedy defeated vaais adhyaksh and republican pratyaashee Richard nicksan in the 1960 U.S. adhyakshiya chunaav.
at 43 saalo of aayu, he is the youngest to have maharoom nirvaachit to the office, the second-youngest adhyaksh ( baad theodor rujvelt ), and the pehla person born in the 20th sadi to serve as adhyaksh.
a Catholic, Kennedy is the tabhi non- protostant adhyaksh, and is the tabhi president to have jiti a pulitzer puraskaar.
kaarykram during uske presidency shaamil the khadi of Pigs Invasion, the cuban Missile sankat, the building of the berlin wal, the Space Race, the african-american civil Rights Movement, or jaldi charan of the Vietnam War.
Therein, kennedy increased the number of sainya advisers, khaas operation shaktiyaan, or helicopters in an praytn to kor the sprad of samyavaadee in dakshin east asia.
the Kennedy administration adopted the niti of the Strategic hamelet kaarykram jisase thi implemented by the dakshin vietnami sarkari.
It involved nishchit majaboor relocation, village internment, or pruthakkaran of gramin dakshin Vietnamese from the uttari or dakshini communist insurgents.
kennedy thi assassinated on navambar 22, 1963 in dalas, texas.
lee ghanghor Oswald was charge saath the aparaadhon, lakin he was shot or maare by Jack maaniky two days baad, pehle a vichaaran could take place.
the epabiai and the warren ayog officially concluded ki Oswald thi the lone hatyare.
however, the sanyukt States House chune Committee on assassinations ( hsca ) concluded ki those investigations yahood flawed or ki kennedy was probably assassinated as the parinaam of a conspiracy.
However, abisi news in their chaanbin, The kennedy Assassination : pare shadyantr, confirmed the nishkarshon of the warren Commission ; having concluded oswald acted alone.
kennedy 's controversial vibhaag of raksha tfx fighter bomber kaarykram led to a Congressional investigation ki lasted isse 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s soochna concerning kennedy 's nijee life rai aaiye to light.
vivaran of Kennedy 's swasthya samasyaayein in jisase he struggled have become behatar gyaat, visheshkar chunki the 1990s.
haalanki initially rakhaa rahasy isse the saamaanya public, reports of kennedy 's philandering have garnered much dabaayen.
Kennedy baandhane atyadhik in public raay ratings of u.S. raashtrapatiyon.
`` stand by me '' is a song originally performed by ben E. King or written by King, jeri leiber, or mike stoller, inspired by the aadhyatmik `` Lord stand by me, '' plus do linon rooted in Psalms 46:2–3.
vahin have been over 400 recorded versions of the song.

a metaphor is a figure of vaak that describes a vishay by asserting ki it is, on some point of comparison, the same as another varanaa unrelated object.
roopak is a prakaar of saadrishy or is closely related to anya rhetorical aankade of vaak ki achieve unke prabhaav via association, tulana or praturup including allegory, atishyokti, or simile.
In simpler sharten, a metaphor compares do vastuen or bate bagaiyr using the shabd `` jaise '' or `` as ''.
One of the most prominent udhaaharan of a roopak in angrezi sahitya is the sab the sansar 's a stage monologue isse as tum jaise It :
All the sansar 's a stagae,
or all the main and mahilaon merely khilaadi ;
They have their exits or unke entrances ; — William shakespeare, as tum Like It, 2/7
This uddhran is a roopak because the sansar is nahin vastutah a stage.
by figuratively asserting that the sansar is a stage, shakespeare uses the ank of comparison between the world or a stage to convey an understanding parichay the mechanics of the sansar or the lives of the people bheetar it.

Printmaking is the prakram of bananaa artworks by printing, saamanytah on paper.
printmaking saamanytah covers only the process of bananaa prints with an tatv of originality, rather than bas hone a photographic reproduction of a painting.
Except in the case of monotyping, the prakram is capable of producing multiples of the vahi tukdaa, jisase is pukaara a chapai.
prayek chapai produced is nahin mana a `` nakal '' but balki is mana an `` original ''.
is is kuki typically prayek print varies to an extent due to parivartaneey moolbhoot to the printmaking prakram, or bhi kuki the imagery of a print is typically not bas a janan of another kaary lakin rather is praayah a adwitiya chitra designed from the prarambh to be expressed in a particular printmaking takanic.
a print may be known as an chhap.
Printmaking ( other than monotyping ) is nahin chuni tabhi liye iske kshamta to upaj multiple impressions, lakin balki liye the unique qualities ki each of the printmaking processes lends itself to.
Prints hai nirmit by transferring syaahi isse a matrix or through a prepared screen to a chadar of paper or anya material.
Common prakaar of matrices shaamil : metal platon, praayah tambe or jasta, or polimur platon liye engraving or etching ; stone, aluminum, or polimur for lithography ; blocks of lakdi liye woodcuts or lakdi engravings ; or linoleum for linocuts.
screens bana of resha or synthetic fabrics hai used liye the screenprinting process.
anya prakaar of matrix substrates or sambandhit prakriyaaon hai discussed neeche.
Multiple impressions mudrit isse the vahi metrics rup an sanskaran.
chunki the let 19th sadi, kalakaaron have generally signed individual impressions isse an edition or praayah kramank the impressions to form a simit sanskaran.
prints may bhi be mudrit in book rup, aise as illustrated kitabe or artist 's books.

an interceptor vayuyan ( or bas interceptor ) is a prakaar of fighter vayuyan designed specifically to prevent missions of dushman aircraft, particularly bamavarshak or reconnaissance vayuyan, or destroy unhen, relying praayah on great gati or shaktishaalee armament.
Being used chunki the pehla World yuddh, baad the late 1960s, interceptors became kam mahatvapurn due to shifting isse bombers to intercontinental ballistic misile ( icbms ) liye nuclear warfare.
A Vietnamese amareeki ( ) is an amareeki of Vietnamese descent.
They mek up about half of sab videshi vietnami ( Người việt hải ngoại ) and are the fourth-largest asian American samooh.
dravyaman vietnami avrajan to the United rajya prarambh after 1975, baad the samaapt of the Vietnam yuddh.
jaldi immigrants were sharnaarthi naav people fleeing persecution or garibi.
majaboor to bhaago isse unke mathrubhumi or often thrust into poor urban neighborhoods, these newcomers have nevertheless prabandhit to sthapit damdaar communities in a choti raashi of samay.
adhik than saath percent of Vietnamese america reside in the states of california, Texas, Washington, florida, and virginia.
