adolf hitler vachanabaddh aatmahatya by gunshot on 30 april 1945 in his führerbunker in berlin.
uske bivi eva ( née braun ) vachanabaddh aatmahatya saath use by ingesting synide.
ki dopaher, in accordance with hitler 's prior nirdesh, unke remains yahood carried up the seedhiyaan through the bunker 's emergency nikaas, doused in petrol and niyat alight in the reich chancellery garden baahar the bunker.
the Soviet abhilekh ricard ki their jaale remains yahood recovered or interred in successive sthitiyaan jabatak 1970 jab ve yahood again exhumed, cremated and the raakh bikhare.
Accounts differ as to the cause of maut ; ek ki he died by poison tabhi or another ki he died by a self-inflicted gunshot, jabaki biting bas on a cyanide capsule.
Contemporary itihaaskaaron have asweekrut ye khate as hone either Soviet prachaar or an attempted sulah in anukram to reconcile the alag conclusions.
ek eye-witness ankit that the deh dikhaaya lakshan of having been shot through the munh, lakin this rai maharoom siddh asambhavit.
vahin is bhi vivaad regarding the authenticity of kapaal or jabadon fragments jisase yahood baraamad.
In 2009, DNA tests yahood performed on a skull Soviet officials tha long believed to be Hitler 's.
The pareekshan nazil ki the kapaal thi actually ki of a stri kam than 40 years boodha.
Location of mizori
the alcohol kanoon of mizori hai among the least pratibandhak or sabase lax or permissive in the sanyukt rajya.
mizori is gyaat throughout the midwest for iske largely laissez-faire drushtikon to daaru regulation, in sharp contrast to the bahut sakht daaru laws of kuch of iske padosi, jaise kansas or oklahoma.
necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or nf, commonly gyaat as flesh-eating beemaari or flesh-eating bacteria syndrome, is a viral sankraman of the deeper paraton of skin and subcutaneous tissues, easily spreading aarpaar the fascial plane within the subcutaneous utak.
necrotizing fasciitis is jaldi progressing, having greater risk of vikasshil in the immunocompromised due to conditions jaise madhumeh, karkat, ityadi.
it is a kathor beemaari of achaanak onset or is praayah treated immediately with high doses of intravenous antibiotics.
prakaar i describes a polymicrobial sankraman, whereas prakaar ii describes a monomicrobial sankraman.
anek prakaar of jeevanu can cause necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g., samooh a streptococcus ( streptococcus pyogenes ), staphylococcus aureus, clostridium perfringens, bacteroides fragilis, Aeromonas hydrophila ).
aise infections hai adhik likely to occur in people saath compromised pratiraksha pranaaliyon.
historically, Group A streptococcus bana up most maamle of prakaar ii infections.
However, chunki as early as 2001, another gambhir rup of monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis rai maharoom observed with increasing aavriti, caused by methicillin-resistant staphylococcus aureus ( marasaa ).
kuch prakashit maamla reports have implied a sambhavit link between upyog of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs or NF, though the pramaan of the link thi said to be kamjor kuki of a small number of case marijon or it was unclear whether the davaayen bas masked the lakshan of a dwitiyak infection or yahood a kaaran prati se.
sansar yuddh ii ( wwii or WW2 ), bhi gyaat as the duusari World yuddh, was a vaishvik war that lasted isse 1939 to 1945.
it shaamil the vast bahumat of the sansar 's raashtra —including all of the great powers —eventually forming two opposing sainya alliances : the allies or the aksh.
it thi the sabase faili yuddh in itihaas, saath adhik than 100 million logon sevarat in sainya ikai isse over 30 alag deshon.
In a state of `` total war ``, the pramukh bhagidaar lagaai unke entire economic, audyogic, or vaigyanik capabilities at the service of the yuddh praytn, erasing the bhed between civilian or sainya resources.
chihnit by mass mauton of civilians, sahit the holocaust or the tabhi upyog of nuclear hathiyaar in warfare, it resulted in 50 lakh to over 75 lakh fatalities.
ye mauton mek sansar yuddh ii by dur the deadliest virodh in human itihaas.
The samrajya of Japan aimed to dominate east asia or thi already at yuddh saath the Republic of china in 1937, lakin the world yuddh is generally said to have begun on 1 sitambar 1939 saath the invasion of candal by germany and subsequent ghoshnaaon of yuddh on germany by France or Britain.
isse late 1939 to early 1941, in a shrenee of abhiyaan or treaties, germany formed the aksh alliance saath italy, conquering or subduing much of mahadwipiya europea.
Following the molotov–ribbentrop Pact, germany or the soviet Union partitioned or annexed territories between themselves of their European neighbours, sahit candal.
the sanyukt kingdom or the other members of the angrejon Commonwealth yahood the tabhi major alide shaktiyaan continuing the fight against the aksh, saath ladaaiyon lene place in uttar africa as khub as the long-running battle of the Atlantic.
in june 1941, the europea aksh shubharambh an invasion of the soviet sangh, giving a start to the largest jameen theatre of yuddh in itihaas, which tied bas the pramukh bhaag of the Axis ' sainya forces liye the baaki of the yuddh.
In December 1941, japani joined the aksh, attacked the sanyukt States or European territories in the prashanth samandar, and quickly conquered much of the pashchimi Pacific.
The Axis advance thi roka in 1942, baad Japan lost a series of naval ladaaiyon and europea aksh troops yahood parajeet in uttar Africa or, decisively, at stalingrad.
In 1943, saath a shrenee of germany defeats in purvi Europe, the alide akraman of italy, and amareeki victories in the prashanth, the Axis khoyaa the pahal and undertook strategic retreat on sab fronts.
in 1944, the pashchimi Allies invaded frans, jabaki the soviet sangh regained all of iske territorial losses or invaded germany and iske allies.
dauraan 1944 or 1945 the sanyukt rajya parajeet the japani Navy or captured key pashchimi Pacific islands.
The war in Europe ended saath the capchar of berlin by soviet or Polish sainikon or the subsequent germany unconditional aatmasamarpan on 8 may 1945.
following the potsdam Declaration by the Allies on 26 july 1945, the sanyukt rajya dropped parmaanu bombs on the japani shaharon of hiroshima on 6 August, or nagasaki on 9 August.
saath an akraman of the Japanese dweepasmooh nikat, or the soviet sangh having ghoshit yuddh on Japan by invading manchuriya, Japan surrendered on 15 agast 1945, samaapti the yuddh in asia or cementing the total vijay of the allies over the aksh.
sansar yuddh ii altered the rajnatik sanrekhan and soshal dhaancha of the sansar.
the United raashtra ( UN ) thi sthapit to foster antarrashtriya sahyog or prevent bhavishya virodh.
the great shaktiyaan that yahood the victors of the war—the sanyukt rajya, the soviet sangh, china, the sanyukt kingdom, and France—became the sthai sadasyon of the sanyukt Nations suraksha parishad.
the soviet sangh or the sanyukt States ubhara as rival superpowers, setting the stage liye the thanda yuddh, jisase lasted for the aglaa 46 saalo.
meanwhile, the influence of europea great shaktiyaan prarambh to manaahi, jabaki the decolonisation of asia or africa began.
Most deshon jinaki industries tha maharoom damaged moved towards aarthik recovery.
rajnatik sangyojan, visheshkar in Europe, ubhara as an effort to stabilise postwar relations and lado adhik effectively in the thanda yuddh.
A limited deyta company ( llc ) is a lacheelee rup of enterprise that mishranon tatv of saajhedaari or corporate structures.
note than an LLC is not a nigam, or colling an llc a nigam is technically galat.
An llc is a vidhik form of company that provides simit liability to iske swami in the vishaal majority of United States jurisdictions.
LLCs do nahin need to be vyavasthit liye profit.
paanch k-cups
the andar of a prayukt K-Cup, saath the sheersh foil and the prayukt coffee grounds removed.
This shows the filter andar the k-cup.
k-cup portion pack hai prayukt with keurig or other single cap brewing systems to kadha a cap of coffee, tea, or hot chocolate.
prayek K-Cup is a plastic container saath a coffee filter inside.
Ground coffee saim hai packed in the k-cup or sealed air-tight with a sangyojan plastic or foil dhakkan.
jab the k-cup is placed in a Keurig brewer, the brewer punctures the foil dhakkan and the neeche of the K-Cup or shaktiyaan hot jal antargat pressure through the k-cup and into a mug.
Keurig panktiyaan iske k-cup technology to coffee roasters and chaay makers aise as green pahaad coffee roasters, diedrich/ Gloria Jeans, timothy 's sansar Coffee, vine houtte, Caribou coffee, celestial Seasonings, bigelow chaay company, Twinings, tali 's, coffee logon or neuman 's Own.
keurig 's patents on the asli k-cup dizine expired in sitambar 2012.
keurig holds at tanik ek additional, still-active US patent or another patent anuprayog, detailing sudhaar that have subsequently maharoom incorporated in unke K-Cup dizine.

a chronograph is a specific prakaar of dekhen that is prayukt as a stopwatch combined saath a display watch.
a moulik chronograph has an swatantra sweep duusari haath ; it can be prarambh, stopped, or laute to shunya by successive dabaav on the stem.
lui moinet invented the chronograph in 1816
conventional pisiai ( pisiai is an initialism formed from paridhiy ghatak interconect, bhaag of the pisiai Local bas maanak or praayah shortened to bas pisiai ) is a local computer bas for attaching hardware divaais in a computer.
the pisiai bas supports the functions found on a procesar bas, lakin in a manakikrut swaroop ki is swatantra of any particular processor.
divaais conect to the bas appear to the procesar to be conect sidhe to the processor bas, or hai assigned pataa in the processor 's address space.
Attached divaais can lo either the form of an ekikrut circuit fitted onto the motherboard itself, pukaara a planar yantra in the pisiai specification, or an vistaar card ki fits into a slot.
the pisiai Local Bus thi pehla implemented in IBM pc compatibles, where it visthapit the sangyojan of isa plus ek vesa local bas as the bas vinyas.
it rai subsequently maharoom apanaaya liye anya computer prakaar.
pisiai or pci-x are hone replaced by pisiai Express, but, sabase motherboards hai still bana with ek or adhik pisiai slot, which hai sufficient liye anek upyog.
The pisiai specification cover the shaareerik aakaar of the bas ( sahit the aakaar or antaran of the circuit board kinare vidyut sampark ), vidyut characteristics, bas samay, or protocol.
the specification can be kharida isse the PCI Special byaaj samooh ( PCI-SIG ).
theth PCI taash prayukt in pcs shaamil : network cards, sound taash, modems, atirikt port aise as USB or serial, TV tuner cards or discs controllers.
PCI video taash replaced ISA or vesa taash, until growing bandwidth aavashyaktaayen outgrew the samarthy of PCI ; the pasandida interfes liye video taash became agap, or then pisiai express.
PCI video taash remain uplabdhiyaan liye upyog saath old pcs bagaiyr agap or pisiai express slots.
Many divaais previously provided on pisiai vistaar taash hai abhi commonly ekikrut onto motherboards or uplabdhiyaan in universal serial bas or pisiai Express sanskaran.
maaikel whitaker smith ( born aktubar 7, 1957 ) is an amareeki samakaleen isai sangeetkaar, jo has charted primarily in the samakaleen isai or occasionally in the mukhyadhara chart.

An amareeki poster isse the World War II -era ki was prayukt to inform logon about kayaa ve should do if they suspect todphod.
Sabotage is a deliberate karrwai aimed at weakening another antity through subversion, rukaawat, disruption, or destruction.
in a kaarysthal setting, todphod is the sachet withdrawal of dakshata generally nirdeshit at causing kuch change in kaarysthal sharten.
ek jo engages in todphod is a saboteur.
As a niyam, saboteurs try to conceal unke pahchaan kuki of the consequences of unke kriyaayein.
liye udhaaharan, whereas an paryaavarniya pressure samooh might be prasann to be pahachaanaa saath an adhinium of todphod, it hota nahin want the vyaktigat identities of the perpetrators gyaat.

The itihaas of television comprises the kaary of numerous engineers or avishkaarak in anek deshon over many dashakon.
the earliest prastaav was in 1908, in a paper by a. A. campbell-swinton or postulated the upyog of cathod kirane.
the first practical demonstrations of television, however, yahood viksit using electromechanical vidhi to scan, transmit, or reproduce an chitra.
as electronic camera or pradarshak tubes yahood perfected, electromechanical television diya rasta to all-electronic pranaaliyon in nearly sab anuprayog.

a film theatre ( bhi called a cinema, film house, film house, filmi theatre or chitra house ) is a venue, praayah a building, liye dekhne films.
sabase lakin nahin sab movie theatre hai commercial operations catering to the general public, jo attend by khareednaa a tikat.
the film is prakshipt with a film projector onto a vishaal prakshep screen at the saamne of the auditorium.
sabase film theaters hai abhi equipped liye digital cinema prakshep, nikaalnaa the need to banaaen or hastantaran a shaareerik filmi chapai.

lyme disease, lyme borreliosis is an sankramak beemaari caused by at tanik teen prajati of jeevanu belonging to the genus borrelia.
borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the main kaaran of lyme beemaari in uttar america, whereas borrelia afzelii and borrelia garinii kaaran most europea maamle.
the beemaari is named after the kasbon of lyme and Old lyme, connectikat, uese, jahaan a kramank of cases yahood pahachaanaa in 1975.
haalanki alan steere ehsaas that Lyme beemaari thi a tick-borne beemaari in 1978, the cause of the beemaari remained a rahasy jabatak 1981, jab B. burgdorferi was identified by Willy burgdorfer.
lyme beemaari is the most aam tick-borne disease in the uttari Hemisphere.
borrelia is transmitted to insaano by the kaatna of sankramit ticks belonging to a few prajati of the genus ixodes ( `` mushkil ticks '' ).
jaldi lakshan may shaamil fever, sirdard, thakaan, depression, or a characteristic golakaar skin rash pukaara erythema migrans ( em ).
baayein anupachaarit, baad lakshan may involve the joints, dil, and central nervous system.
in sabase cases, the sankraman or iske symptoms hai eliminated by antibiotic, visheshkar if the beemaari is treated jaldi.
vilambit or aparyaapt upachaar can sise to adhik gambhir lakshan, jisase can be disabling or mushkil to daavat.

Penis ( bahuvachan penises or penes ) is a saamaanya pad liye the angon saath which purush and ubhayalingi pashu introduce shukranu into receptive mahilaon during copulation.
Such angon occur in anek animals, both vertebrate and invertebrate, lakin males do not bhaaluu a shishn in prayek animal species, and in those prajati in jisase the male karata bear a so-called shishn, the penes in the various prajati are not necessarily samajaat.
For udhaaharan, the penis of a standhari is at sabase analogous to the penis of a purush keet or barnacle.
The pad shishn applies to anek reproductive intromittent angon, but not to sab ; for example the intromittent organ of most cephalopoda is the hectocotylus, a specialised arm, and purush spiders upyog unke pedipalps.
in most prajati of pashu in jisase there is an ang ki might reasonably be varnit as a shishn, it has no pramukh falan anya than intromission, or at tanik conveying the sperm to the maadaa, lakin in the placental stanadhariyon the shishn bears the distal part of the urethra, jisase discharges dono mutr dauraan urination or veery during copulation as the avasar requires.
Artists or repertoire ( a & R ) is the prabhag of a record label or music prakaashan company that is jimmedaar liye talent scouting or overseeing the kalakaari development of recording artists and/or songwriters.
it bhi adhiniyamon as a liaison between kalakaaron or the record label or publishing company ; prayek activity involving artists to the point of album relies is generally mana antargat the purview of, or jimmedaari of, a & R.
A furlong is a measure of alahada in imperial units or U.S. customary ikai baraabar to one-eighth of a mile, equivalent to 220 yards, 660 feet, 40 rods, or 10 zanjeeron.
the sateek maan of the furlong varies thodaa among english-speaking countries.
paanch furlongs are lagbhag 1 kilometre ( 1.0058 km is a closer sanniktan ).
chunki the asli definition of the meter thi one-quarter of one ten-millionth of the paridhi of the dharti ( saath the great vrutt coincident saath the madhyahn of longitude guzar through paris ), the paridhi of the dharti is parichay 40,000 km or parichay 200,000 furlongs.
cr2032 lithium batan koshika bydaree
lithium 9 volt, AA, & AAA aakaar
lithium bydaree hai dispojable ( praathmik ) batteries ki have lithium metal or lithium compounds as an dhanagar.
ve stand alaava isse anya bydaree in their unchi charge ghanatv ( long life ) or unchi laagat prati unit.
depending on the design or chemical yogicon used, lithium koshikaayen can upaj voltages isse 1.5 v ( comparable to a zinc–carbon or kshareey battery ) to parichay 3.7 V. lithium batteries hai widely prayukt in utpaada aise as portable upabhokta electronic devices.

Facebook on the ad-tech 2010
fasebuk is an online soshal networking seva, whose name tana from the colloquial naam liye the kitaab given to students at the prarambh of the academic saal by kuch vishvavidhyalayon administrations in the sanyukt States to help students milengi to jaan each other.
it thi santhaapit in farvari 2004 by chihnit zuckerberg saath his college roommates and fellow Harvard University vidhyaarthee aduardo saverin, Andrew mccollum, dustin moskovitz and kris Hughes.
the jalsthal 's sadsyta thi initially limited by the sansthaapakon to Harvard vidhyaarthee, lakin was expanded to other collejon in the boston kshetrafal, the ivi lig, or stenford vishvavidhyalayon.
it gradually added support liye vidhyaarthee at vibhinn anya vishvavidhyalayon before opening to unchi skool vidhyaarthee, and aakhirkaar to anyone aged 13 or over.
fasebuk abhi allows koi upayokta who ghoshit themselves to be at tanik 13 saalo old to become registered users of the site.
upayokta must panjikaran before using the site, baad jisase they may banaaen a personal profil, add other upayokta as friends, or exange sandesh, sahit swachaalit suchanaaen jab ve update unke profil.
additionally, upayokta may juden common-interest user samooh, organized by kaarysthal, skool or college, or anya visheshtaayen, or categorize unke mitron into suchiyaan aise as `` People isse Work '' or `` Close mitron ''.
as of September 2012, fasebuk rai over ek billion kriyasheel users.
according to a may 2011 Consumer reports surveykshan, there hai 7.5 lakh children antargat 13 saath khate or 5 million antargat 10, violating the site 's terms of service.
in may 2005, accel saajhedaar invested $ 12.7 lakh in Facebook, and gym Breyer added $ 1 lakh of his apana dhan to the ghat.
a January 2009 Compete.com study ranked fasebuk as the sabase prayukt soshal netwarking service by worldwide masik kriyasheel upayokta.
entertainment Weekly included the sait on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' suchi, saying, `` How on dharti did we stalk hamaari exes, remember hamaari co-workers ' janmdin, keedaa hamaari friends, and play a rousing khel of scrabulous pehle fasebuk ? ''

quantcast estimates Facebook rai 138.9 lakh masik adwitiya u.S. visitors in May 2011.
according to soshal media Today, in april 2010 an anumaanit 41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the u.S. janasankhyikee tha a Facebook khaataa.
Nevertheless, fasebuk 's market growth prarambh to stall in kuch regions, saath the sait khone 7 lakh active users in the sanyukt rajya or Canada in may 2011.

arvin Johannes eugen khabaron ( 15 navambar 1891 – 14 aktubar 1944 ), popularly gyaat as the marusthal fox ( wüstenfuchs, ), thi a germany field Marshal of sansar War II.
he arjeet the aadar of dono his apana sainikon or the enemies he ladaa.
khabaron thi a highly sajaa adhikari in World yuddh i or thi awarded the daalana le Mérite liye his exploits on the italvi saamne.
in sansar yuddh ii, he further vishisht khud as the commander of the 7th panzer Division during the 1940 akraman of France.
uske netritv of germany or italvi forces in the uttar African abhiyaan sthapit use as ek of the sabase samarth cmanderon of the yuddh, or arjeet use the appellation of the marusthal Fox.
he is regarded as ek of the sabase skilled commanders of desert warfare in the conflict.
he later commanded the germany shaktiyaan opposing the Allied cross-channel invasion in normandy.
uske kaarybhaar never took use to the purvi saamne.
khabaron is regarded as having maharoom a dayaalu and professional adhikari.
His afrika Korps was never abhiyukt of yuddh crimes, and sainiko captured dauraan uske africa abhiyaan yahood reported to have maharoom treated humanely.
aadesh to maar yahudee soldiers, nagarikon and captured commando were upekshit.
let in the yuddh, khabaron thi linked to the conspiracy to assassinate Adolf hitler.
Since khabaron thi a national nayika, hitler desired to eliminate use chupchaap.
He forced khabaron to commit aatmahatya with a synide pill, in vaapasi liye assurances ki Rommel 's family hota not be persecuted following uske maut.

the saat uphaar of the paavan Spirit is an enumeration of saat aadhyatmik uphaar originating saath patristic authors, baad elaborated by five intellectual virtues or chaar anya samooh of ethical visheshtaayen.
ve hai : akl, samajhnaa, achraj or awe ( bhay of the Lord ), counsel, gyaan, fortitude, or parhezgaare ( reverence ).
the dharti din dhvaj, the latest prastaav of jon McConnell liye a dhvaj of dharti Day
dharti din is an salanaa event, manaaye on april 22, on jisase kaarykram hai yojit vishwavyaapee to demonstrate support liye paryaavarniya suraksha.
it thi first celebrated in 1970, or is now coordinated globally by the dharti din sanjaal, or celebrated in adhik than 192 deshon each year.
in 1969 at a UNESCO sammelan in San francisco, the tithi prastaavit thi kooch 21, 1970, the first din of vasant in the uttari hemisphere.
is din of prakruti 's equipoise was baad sanctioned in a Proclamation hastakshrit by sachiv saamaanya u thant at the sanyukt Nations.
A maah later a pruthak dharti Day was santhaapit by sanyukt States seenetter gaylord nelson as an paryaavarniya teach-in first yojit on april 22, 1970.
nelson thi later awarded the Presidential padak of swatantraaa puraskaar in recognition of uske work.
jabaki is april 22 dharti Day was focused on the sanyukt rajya, an sanghathan shubharambh by denis hez, jo thi the asli national coordinator in 1970, took it international in 1990 or vyavasthit kaarykram in 141 raashtra.
numerous samudaayon celebrate dharti Week, an entire saptaah of kriyaayein kendrit on paryaavarniya mudde.
iodine is a rasinic tatv with pratik I or parmaanu number 53.
The name is isse Greek ioeidēs, arth violet or jamuni, due to the rang of elemental iodine vaashp.
iodine or its yogicon are primarily prayukt in nutrition, or industrially in the production of acetic acid or certain polymers.
iodine 's relatively unchi parmaanu kramank, kam toxicity, or aasaani of anulgnak to sashulk yogicon have bana it a bhaag of anek x-ray contrast materials in aadhunik medicine.
iodine has tabhi one stable isotope.
A kramank of iodine radioisotopes hai bhi prayukt in chikitsa applications.
iodine is mila on dharti mukhyatah as the atyadhik water-soluble iodide aayan, I−, jisase concentrates it in oceans or brine pools.
Like the anya hellogence, free iodine occurs mukhyatah as a diatomic molecule i2, or tab only momentarily baad hone oxidized isse iodide by an oxidant jaise free oxygen.
in the brahmad or on Earth, iodine 's high parmaanu number makes it a apekshaakrit rare element.
However, its upasthiti in samandar water has given it a bhoomika in jeevigyaan.
it is the adhiktam anivaary element utilized widely by life in biological krityon ( tabhi tungston, employed in enzymes by a few prajati of jeevanu, is atyadhik ).
iodine 's rarity in anek soils, due to aarambhik low prachurtaa as a crust-element, or bhi leaching of ghulansheel iodide by rainwater, rai led to anek deficiency problems in jameen pashu or antardeshiy human populations.
Iodine kamiyaan affects parichay two arab logon and is the leading preventable kaaran of bauddhik disabilities.
iodine is jaruri by ucchtar pashu, which upyog it to synthesize thyroid hormone, jisase contain the tatv.
Because of is falan, radioisotopes of iodine hai concentrated in the thyride granthi saath saath nonradioactive iodine.
If inhaled, the radioisotope iodine-131, jisase has a unchi parivardhan utpaada upaj, concentrates in the thyride, lakin is easily remedied saath potacium iodide treatment.
Lobbying ( bhi lobby ) is the adhinium of attempting to influence nirnay bana by officials in the sarkari, sabase praayah vidhayak or sadasyon of niamak agencies.
Lobbying is kiya by anek alag types of people or organized samooh, sahit individuals in the nijee sector, corporations, fellow vidhayak or sarkari officials, or advocacy samooh ( byaaj groups ).
Lobbyists may be among a vidhayak 's constituencies, arth a voter or bloc of matadaata within his or uske chunavi zila, or not ; they may engage in lobbying as a kaarobaar, or nahin.
peshewar lobbyists hai logon whose business is trying to influence legislation on nimitt of a samooh or individual jo hires unhen.
Individuals or nonprofit sanghathan can bhi lobby as an adhinium of volunteering or as a choti part of their saamaanya job ( for udhaaharan, a siio baithak with a pratinidhi about a project mahatvapurn to his/her company, or an activist meeting with his/her legislator in an unpaid kshamta ).
sarkarein often define or viniyamit vyavasthit samooh lobbying that has become influential.
the ethics or naitikta of lobbying are.
lobbying is praayah spoken of with avmaananaa, jab the implication is ki people saath atyadhik socioeconomic shakti hai corrupting the vidhi ( tedi it away isse fairness ) in anukram to serve unke own virodh of interest.
But another side of lobbying is bananaa sure that anya ' ruchi hai duly defended viruddh anya ' corruption, or bhi simply making sure ki alpsankhyak ruchi are fairly defended viruddh mere tyranny of the bahumat.
liye udhaaharan, a chikitsa sangh, or a trade sangh of swasthya insurance companiyaan, may lobby a vidhanmandal in anukram to counteract the influence of tambaaku companies, in jisase case the lobbying hota be viewed by most people as jaij ( vidhivat defending viruddh anya ' bhrashtachar ).
the pareshaani in aarekhan uddeshy linon between jisase lobbyists are `` good lobbyists '' or jisase ones hai `` bad ones '' is compounded by the cleverness saath jisase lobbyists or unke clients can argue ki their apana lobbying is of the `` shubh '' kind.
at dil, the effort to influence vidhaan is a shakti struggle.
as in anya forms of power sangharsh, aise as yuddh or vidhi pravartan, motives dayera isse to self-defense to fighting liye justice, or the dividing lakeer between predation or justice is vishay to rationalization.

Cream yahood a 1960s angrejon chattan supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist Jack Bruce, guitarist/vocalist eric Clapton, or drummer Ginger baker.
Their dhwani was characterised by a hybrid of blues chattan, mushkil chattan or cicedelik rock, combining the psychedelia-themed lyrics, Eric clapton 's bluez guitar playing or vocals, joker Bruce 's awaz or prominent bass playing or adarak baker 's jaiz -influenced drumming.
the samooh 's teesraa album, pahiyon of Fire, was the sansar 's first platinum-selling double album.
malai hai widely regarded as hone the sansar 's first kaamyaab supergroup.
in their kariyar, ve bechi over 15 million album worldwide.
malai 's music included songs aadhaarit on paramparaagat blues such as `` crossrods `` and `` spoonful ``, or aadhunik blues such as `` Born antargat a karaab chihn ``, as well as adhik eccentric songs aise as `` ajeeb kadha ``, `` Tales of Brave ulysses `` and `` tod ``.
malai 's biggest hits yahood `` i mahasoos free `` ( uk, number 11 ), `` sunshine of apana prem `` ( us, kramank 5 ), `` shwet Room `` ( us, kramank 6 ), `` crossrods '' ( us, number 28 ), and `` baij `` ( uk, kramank 18 ).
malai bana a significant prabhaav on the lokapriy music of the samay, or, saath saath Jimi Hendrix, and terry kath of Chicago, popularised the upyog of the wah-wah paidal.
They provided a baari yet technically nipun musical theme that foreshadowed and bahekaave the emergence of British bands aise as the jeff bek samooh in the let 1960s.
The band 's live performances bahekaave pragatisheel chattan adhiniyamon aise as fatafat.
malai yahood inducted into the chattan or phenken haul of kirti in 1993.
ve yahood shaamil in dono rolling stone or vh1 's suchiyaan of the `` 100 mahanatam kalakaaron of sab samay ''.
ve yahood also kramit kramank 16 on VH1 's `` 100 mahanatam Artists of mushkil Rock ''.
Hairspray is a 1988 kamedi film written or directed by jon waters, or abhinit Ricki jhil, Sonny Bono, Debbie harry, maaikel st. jerard, shawn Thompson, colleen fitzpatrick, jeri Stiller, or in uske pichhlaa filmi bhoomika, Divine.
Hairspray thi a naatakeey prasthaan isse waters ' pehle works, saath a much broader intended audience.
in fact, hairsprays pg is the mildest darja a waters filmi rai praapt ; sabase of uske pichhlaa films yahood rated x by the MPAA.
niyat in 1962 balteemor, maryland, the filmi revolves around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' kishoravastha Tracy turnblad as wo pursues staradam as a nartki on a local tv dikhaaen or reliyon against racial pruthakkaran.
hairspray thi tabhi a moderet kamyaabi upon iske aarambhik natya release, kamai a modest gross of $ 8 lakh.
however, it managed to aakarshith a larger audience on ghar video in the jaldi 1990s or became a cult clasik.
sabase aalochakon praised the film, haalanki some yahood displeased saath the overall campiness.
in 2002, the filmi thi adapted into a broadway musical of the same name, which jiti aath tony puraskaar, including behtareen musical in 2003.
a duusari filmi sanskaran of Hairspray, an anukulan of the stage musical, thi also released by New lakeer cinema in 2007, which shaamil many changes of scripted vasteen from the original.
the film bhi baandhane # 444 on Empire patrika 's 2008 suchi of the 500 greatest filmon of sab samay.
a Christian denomination is an identifiable dharmik deh antargat a aam naam, dhaancha, or doctrine bheetar christianity.
kuch samooh included do not consider themselves a denomination ( e.g., the catholic Church considers itself the one sachcha girijaghar or the apostolic dekhie, or as pre-denominational ).
kuch groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist hone called a denomination or do nahin have koi formal denominational dhaancha, authority, or record-keeping pare the local sabha ; several groups bheetar bahaali gati patan into is shrenee.
kuch samooh are large ( e.g. catholics, lutherans, anglicans or baptists ), jabaki anya hai just a few choti carch, and in sabase maamle the saapeksh aakaar is nahin evident in this list.
aadhunik movements such as Fundamentalist christianity, Pietism, Evangelicalism, pentecostalism or the pavitrataa gati sometimes cross denominational lines, or in kuch maamle banaaen nai denominations out of do or adhik continuing groups, ( as is the maamla liye anek sanyukt or uniting churches, liye udhaaharan ).
aise subtleties or complexities hai nahin clearly chitrit yahan.
Major vibhaajan bheetar Christianity.
note : is is nahin a puraa suchi, lakin aims to provide a comprehensible avlokan of the vividhta among denominations of christianity.
as there hai reported to be lagbhag 41,000 Christian denominations, many of jisase can not be verified to be significant, tabhi those denominations saath Wikipedia aalekh hoga be listed in anukram to ensure ki sab pravishtiyaan on is suchi are notable or verifiable.
between denominations, theologians, and tulanaatmak religionists there hai considerable matbhinnata parichay jisase samooh can be properly called isai, matbhinnata arising primarily from doctrinal differences between samooh.
liye the purpose of simplicity, is suchi is intended to pratibimbit the self-understanding of each denomination.
spashtikaran of alag raay concerning unke aukaat as isai denominations can be mila at unke sambandhit aalekh.
vahin is no aadhikarik manyata in sabase bhaag of the sansar liye dharmik laashen, or vahin is no official clearinghouse jisase could determine the aukaat or respectability of dharmik laashen.
praayah vahin is considerable asahmati between vibhinn carch parichay whether anya carch chahie be labeled with pejorative terms such as `` cult '', or about whether is or ki samooh enjoys kuch measure of respectability.
aise considerations often vary isse place to place, where one religious samooh may anand bahumat aukaat in one region, lakin be widely regarded as a `` khatarnaak cult '' in another bhaag of the sansar.
samavesh on is suchi karata nahin indicate koi nirnay about the size, mahatv, or akshar of a samooh or iske sadasyon.
1804 map of `` louisiana ``, edged on the west by the Rocky kyu.
the Louisiana Purchase ( `` bikri of louisiana '' ) thi the adhigrahan by the United rajya of america in 1803 of of frans 's arji to the territory of Louisiana.
the u.S. sashulk 50 lakh francs ( $ 11,250,000 ) plus raddikaran of debts laayak 18 lakh francs ( $ 3,750,000 ), for a total yoga of 15 lakh dollar ( kam than 3 cents prati acre ) liye the louisiana territory ( $ lakh in dollar, less than 42 saint prati acre ).
the louisiana territory encompassed sab or part of 15 upasthit U.S. rajya or do canadai provinces.
the jameen kharida contained all of present-day arkansaas, mizori, iova, oklahoma, kansas, or nebraska ; parts of minesota ki yahood west of the Mississippi nadi ; sabase of uttar dakota ; most of dakshin dakota ; northeastern nai mexico ; uttari Texas ; the portions of Montana, Wyoming, or colorado east of the mahadwipiya divide ; louisiana west of the mississippi nadi, sahit the nagar of nai orlions ; or small portions of jameen ki would eventually become bhaag of the Canadian praanton of alberta or saskatchewan.
frans niyantrit is vishaal kshetrafal from 1699 jabatak 1762, the saal it diya the territory to iske ally spain.
antargat Napoleon Bonaparte, frans took back the territory in 1800 in the hope of building an samrajya in uttar America.
A slave vidroh in haiti or an impending yuddh with britain, however, led frans to abandon ye yojanaayen and bechein the sampurna territory to the sanyukt rajya, jo tha originally intended tabhi to talash the khariden of New orlions and iske sata lands.
the khariden of the territory of louisiana took place dauraan the presidency of Thomas jeffrasan.
at the samay, the khariden faced domestic vipaksh kuki it thi vichaar to be asanvaidhanik.
haalanki he sahamat ki the U.S. samvidhan did nahin contain praavdhaanon liye acquiring territory, jeffrasan decided to go ahead saath the purchase anyway in order to hataayen France 's presence in the region or to protect dono u.S. vyapaar abhigam to the port of nai Orleans or free dyodhi on the mississippi nadi.
rasm at place d'Armes, nai orlions marking transafar of louisiana to the sanyukt States, 10 March 1804, as chitrit by thure de thulstrup.
`` Cool jhatka '' is a lokapriy song written by Donald storball or originally performed by The Capitols.
released in 1966, it pahunche no. 2 on the amareeki r & b chart and no. 7 on the pop chart.
the baking track for is song thi darasal ankit ( secretly ) by the Motown house band the durgandh bhaaiyo.
Per one of the durgandh Brothers, the song thi originally to be called `` pimp jhatka. ''
is thi taken from watching pados pimps, jo hota nrity in the club, but were too `` cool '' to do the jhatka jaise niyamit folks.
Their version thi subsequently namit `` the pimp Jerk. ''
The nirmaataa thi bhaybheet ki a song with the shabd pimp in the title would be bain or nahin praapt much positive dhyaan, and had the sheershak changed to iske current rup.
the go-go 's, Todd rundgren, Big trubal, Human yon Response, The la de da 's, The sristi, and the coasters have covered the song.
Todd rundgren did uske sanskaran in an odd time hastakshar ( 7/4 ), giving an obviously jerky mahasoos to the song.
the go-go 's covered the song liye unke 1982 album avkaash and baad re-recorded it for unke 1990 album Greatest.
In the visheshta filmi ghar alon 2 : khoyaa in nai York, taaoo frank ( gerry bamman ) gaati `` Cool jhatka '' in the shower.
a sanskaran of the song saath alag geet ( `` Do the kool chaabuk '' ) is prayukt in kool chaabuk commercials.
a recording of `` kool jhatka '' by ricardo re is featured in the visheshta film donnie brasco ( 1997 ).
the song suvidhaayen in the film Standing in the saae of motown, performed by the Funk Brothers saath sise vocals by bootsy Collins.
the song is suna briefly in the anemated visheshta, Madagascar 3 : europea 's sabase chaahi.
despite is kaaran, it is soochibaddh in kuch visangatiyaan of the film 's soundtrack.
a league is a ikai of length ( or, rarely, kshetrafal ).
It thi long aam in Europe or latin america, but it is no longer an official ikai in koi nation.
the league originally referred to the alahada a vyakti could walk in an ghanta.
chunki the madhya aayu, anek maan have maharoom nirdisht in anek countries.
in the context of nautical dooriyaan, the 3 mile ( 4.8 km ) alahada corresponds to kaisaa far an observer of ausat height ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can dekhie jab standing at samudr str.
yun, a jalayaan traveling ek `` lig '' rai pahunche what thi previously the farthest visible alahada on the kshitij.
the kami of a aitihaasik or global maanak liye the sateek maap of a `` lig '' can be accounted liye by the parivartaneey elevation of the observer ( i.e., sightings from a jalayaan 's deck vs. masthead ).
the irish state aae into being in 1922 as the irish free State, a dominian of the angrejon rashtramandal, having seceded from the sanyukt kingdom under the anglo-irish sandhi.
It comprises 26 of ireland 's 32 counties.
chunki 1949 it rai existed as the ganatantr of Ireland.
isse iske foundation, the Irish Free State was embroiled in a civil yuddh between rashtravaadiyon supporting the sandhi or pratidwandviyon jo samarthit a republic.
the pro-treaty paksh, sangathit as Cumann na nGaedheal emerged victorious isse the virodh or won subsequent chunaavon.
ve formed the government of the rajya jabatak 1932, when ve shantipurvak handed over power to the anti-treaty gut in Fianna fáil, jo defeated them in an chunaav.
The irish rajya, despite its violent beginnings, has remained a udaar loktantr throughout its astitv.
a nai constitution in 1937 removed anek of the kadi with britain sthapit antargat the sandhi and ireland 's neutrality in the Second sansar yuddh demonstrated iske swatantraaa in videshi niti matters isse britain.
In 1948 Ireland formally left the angrejon Commonwealth and adopted the sheershak of `` ganatantr ''.
in the aarthik gola, the irish rajya has tha a mishrit performance.
On independence, it thi ek of the wealthier deshon in europea per head of janasankhyikee.
however it also inherited from British rule the samasyaayein of berogari, karanon, uneven bhugolic vikaas and kami of a deshi industrial aadhaar.
liye much of iske itihaas, the rajya struggled to rectify these samasyaayein.
particular chotiyon of emigration were recorded dauraan the late 1930s, 1950s or 1980s, jab the irish economy recorded little growth.
in the 1930s, Fianna fáil sarkarein attempted to banaaen irish gharelu udyog using subsidies or surakshatmak tarifs.
In the late 1950s, these nitiyon were dropped in paksh of free vyapaar saath chaynit deshon and encouraging of videshi nivesh saath kam taxes.
is thi vistaarit jab ireland daalaa the European aarthik jatiyaan in 1972.
in the 1990s or 2000s, ireland anbhavi an economic boom gyaat as the celtic baagh, in jisase the desh 's jidipi surpassed anek of its europea neighbours.
avrajan bhi surpassed emigration, bringing the state 's janasankhyikee up to over 4 lakh.
however, chunki 2008, Ireland has anbhavi a kathor sankat in the banking sector and saath sovereign karz.
The resultant economic slump rai deepened the prabhaav of the sansar mandi on ireland.
isse 1937 to 1998, the irish samvidhan shaamil a arji on Northern ireland as a bhaag of the national territory.
however, the rajya bhi opposed or prayukt iske suraksha shaktiyaan viruddh those hathiyaarband samooh - principally the asthaayee Irish Republican Army, who aajamaaya to ekajute ireland by force.
This occurred in the 1950s, throughout the 1970s or 1980s or has jari on a ghataya scale.
irish sarkarein meanwhile aajamaaya to dallali an agreement to the conflict gyaat as The pareshaaniyon bheetar uttari Ireland isse 1968 to the let 1990s.
The British government officially recognised the right of the irish sarkari to be a party to the uttari negotiations in the Anglo-Irish anubandh of 1985.
in 1998, as bhaag of the Good shuukravaar anubandh, the irish constitution thi altered by referendum to hataayen the territorial claim to Northern ireland and instead extend the sahi of Irish citizenship to sab the logon of the island chahie ve kaash to have it.
jon quinci adams ( july 11, 1767february 23, 1848 ) was the chathe President of the United rajya ( 1825–1829 ).
He parosa as amareeki rajanyik, Senator, or congressional pratinidhi.
he was a member of the federalist, Democratic-Republican, National Republican, and baad anti-masonic or whig partiyon.
adams thi the bete of purv President John Adams or Abigail adams.
as a rajanyik, adams nibhaai an mahatvapurn bhoomika in negotiating anek antarrashtriya treaties, sabase notably the Treaty of Ghent, jisase ended the yuddh of 1812.
As sachiv of rajya, he negotiated saath the United kingdom over america 's northern kinaaraa saath Canada, negotiated saath spain the annexation of florida, and authored the munro Doctrine.
itihaaskaaron agree he thi ek of the mahanatam rajanyikon and secretaries of state in amareeki itihaas.
as adhyaksh, he sought to modernize the American arthvyavastha or prachaarit shiksha.
adams enacted a bhaag of his kaarysoochee or sashulk band much of the national karz.
he thi stymied by a congress niyantrit by his dushmano, or uske kami of patronage sanjaal helped politicians eager to undercut use.
he khoyaa uske 1828 boli for re-election to Andrew jackson.
In doing so, he became the pehla adhyaksh chunki uske pita to serve a single pad.
adams is behtareen gyaat as a rajanyik jo taraasha america 's foreign niti in line saath uske ardently nationalist patibaddhta to america 's republican maan.
adhik recently hove ( 2007 ) portrayed adams as the exemplar or moral leader in an era of modernization.
dauraan adams ' aaajeevan, technological innovations or nai arthath of sanchaar sprad sandesh of dharmik punaruddhar, social sudhaar, and party politics.
goods, dhan, and logon traveled more rapidly or efficiently than ever pehle.
Adams thi nirvaachit a u.S. pratinidhi isse masachusets baad leaving daftar, sevarat for the pichhlaa 17 saalo of uske life with dur vrihad acclamation than he had achieved as adhyaksh.
he is, so dur, the only adhyaksh baad nirvaachit to the sanyukt rajya House of pratinidhi ( haalanki jon Tyler thi nirvaachit to the house of pratinidhi of the confederate States just before his maut in 1862 ).
anemated by uske growing revulsion against gulaami, Adams became a leading opponent of the slave Power.
he purvanumanit that if a civil war were to brake out, the adhyaksh could abolish gulaami by using uske yuddh shaktiyaan.
adams bhi purvanumanit the Union 's dissolution over the gulaami samasya, lakin kaha ki if the dakshin became swatantra vahin would be a shrenee of khooni slave revolts.
khidkiyaan antarjaal Explorer 9 ( IE9 ) is a sanskaran of the antarjaal explorer web browser isse microsoft.
it was released to the public on kooch 14, 2011.
Microsoft rai released antarjaal explorer 9 as a pramukh out-of-band sanskaran ki is not tied to the release anusuchee of any particular sanskaran of khidkiyaan, unlike pichhlaa versions.
it is the pehla sanskaran chunki antarjaal explorer 2 to nahin be bundled with a khidkiyaan oparating pranali, haalanki kuch OEMs have installed it saath khidkiyaan 7 on their pcs, as well as nai khidkiyaan 7 laptops.
The pranali aavashyaktaayen liye antarjaal Explorer 9 are khidkiyaan 7, khidkiyaan Server 2008 r2, khidkiyaan Vista seva pack 2 or Windows sarwar 2008 sp2 with the manch adhyatan.
khidkiyaan XP or earlier hai nahin samarthit.
antarjaal explorer 9 is the pichhlaa sanskaran of Internet Explorer to be supported on khidkiyaan Vista.
dono ia-32 and x64 builds hai uplabdhiyaan.
Internet Explorer 9 supports several siesas 3 properties, embedded isisi v2 or v4 rang profil support via khidkiyaan rang pranali, or has improved javascript pradarshan.
it is the pichhlaa of the paanch pramukh web browsers to implement support liye scalabel vector Graphics ( svg ).

Internet explorer 9 bhi supports the html5 video and audio tag or the web kholen font Format.

A stalactite (, ; isse the unani stalasso, ( σταλάσσω ), `` to drip '', or arth `` ki which drips '' ) is a prakaar of speleothem ( dwitiyak khanij ) that hangs isse the ceiling of chuunaa gufaaen.
it is a type of dripstone.
the sambandhit gathan on the floor of the gupha is known as a stalagmite.

Many degree have adhik than one sankshipt.

res is a classification pranali prayukt to categorize insaano into vishaal or distinct populations or groups by anatomical, saanskrithik, jaateey, genetic, geographical, aitihaasik, linguistic, dharmik, or soshal sambhddha.
pehla prayukt to denote neshnal sambandhon, the pad began to be prayukt to relate to shaareerik traits in the 17th sadi.
in the jaldi 20th sadi the pad thi praayah prayukt, in a taxonomic bhav, to denote genetically differentiated insaan populations paribhaashit by phenotype.
jabaki biologists sometimes use the concept of res to mek bhed among faji set of traits, others in the vaigyanik jatiyaan sujhaayen ki the vichaar of race often is prayukt in a bholi or simplistic way, i.e. ki among insaano, res has no taxonomic significance : sab jeena humans belong to the vahi prajati, homo sapiens or subspecies, Homo sapiens sapiens.
Social conceptions and groupings of daud vary over time, involving lok taxonomies
ki define of individuals based on abhas traits.
Scientists consider biological essentialism obsolete, and generally discourage racial spashtikaran for samuhik differentiation in dono shaareerik or behavioral traits.
chunki the duusari half of the 20th century the associations of res saath the vichaardhaaraon and theories ki grew out of the kaary of 19th-century anthropologists or physiologists has led to the use of the shabd race itself becoming samasyapurna.
Although still prayukt in saamaanya contexts, it is now praayah replaced by anya shabd jisase are less aspasht or emotionally charge, aise as populations, people ( s ), ethnic samooh or samudaayon depending on context.
Lucy stone ( agast 13, 1818 – aktubar 19, 1893 ) thi a prominent American abolitionist or suffragist, and a vocal advocate and aayojak promoting adhikaron for women.
In 1847, stone became the pehla stri isse Massachusetts to earn a college degree.
She spoke out liye mahilaon 's adhikaron or viruddh gulaami at a samay jab women were hatotsahit or prevented from public speaking.
stone thi the pehla ankit amareeki woman to retain her own pichhlaa naam baad marriage.
Stone 's organizational kriyaayein liye the kaaran of mahilaon 's adhikaron yielded thos gains in the difficult political paryaavaran of the 19th sadi.
stone helped initiate the first National mahilaon 's adhikaron sammelan and she samarthit or sustained it annually saath saath a kramank of anya local, rajya or kshetreey activist prathaon.
Stone spoke in saamne of a number of legislative laashen to promote laws giving adhik adhikaron to women.
wo assisted in establishing the stri 's neshnal vafaadaar lig to sahaayta pass the terahavin amendment or thereby abolish gulaami, after which wo helped form the largest samooh of like-minded mahilaon 's adhikaron reformers, the politically moderate amareeki stri Suffrage sangh, jisase worked liye decades at the rajya str in ehsaan of mahilaon 's right to vote.
stone likhaa extensively parichay a wide dayera of mahilaon 's adhikaron, publishing or distributing bhaashanon by herself and others, or sammelan kaarywahi.
in the long-running or influential stri 's jarnal, a saptahik periodical ki wo sthapit or prachaarit, stone aired dono uske apana or differing drishy parichay mahilaon 's adhikaron.
pukaara `` the orator '' and `` the morning star of the stri 's rights movement '', stone vitarit a vaak jisase sparked susaan B. anthoni to take up the kaaran of mahilaon 's suffrage.
elizabeth Cady Stanton likhaa ki `` Lucy stone thi the pehla vyakti by whom the dil of the amareeki public was deeply stirred on the woman sawaal. ''
Together, anthoni, Stanton, or stone have maharoom pukaara the 19th sadi `` triumvirate `` of women 's suffrage and nariwad.
in finance, a bandha is an yantra of indebtedness of the bandha issuer to the dharakon.
It is a karz suraksha, under jisase the jarikarta owes the dharakon a debt or, depending on the sharten of the bandha, is obliged to adaa unhen interest ( the coupon ) or to repay the principal at a baad tithi, termed the paripakvata.
byaaj is praayah dey at fixed intervals ( semiannual, salanaa, sometimes monthly ).
bahut praayah the bond is negotiable, i.e. the swaamitv of the yantra can be transferred in the dwitiyak market.
yun a bandha is a rup of rin or iou : the holder of the bandha is the lender ( creditor ), the jarikarta of the bandha is the borrower ( debtor ), or the coupon is the interest.
bonds provide the borrower with bahya nidhi to vitt long-term investments, or, in the case of government bonds, to finance vartmaan vyay.
praaanpatr of jamaa ( cds ) or short term vanijyik paper hai mana to be dhan market yantra and nahin bonds : the pramukh difference is in the lambaai of the term of the yantra.
Bonds or stox are dono securities, lakin the major antar between the two is ki ( puunji ) stockholders have an equity stake in the company ( i.e. ve are swami ), whereas bondholders have a creditor stake in the company ( i.e. ve are lenders ).
Another difference is ki bonds praayah have a paribhaashit pad, or paripakvata, baad which the bond is redeemed, whereas stox may be bakaayaa indefinitely.
An excepshan is an irredeemable bandha, aise as Consols, jisase is a perpetuity, i.e. a bandha saath no paripakvata.

a scale model is a physical model, a pratinidhitiv or copy of an object ki is larger or smaller than the vaastavik aakaar of the object, which seeks to maintain the saapeksh proportions ( the scale factor ) of the shaareerik aakaar of the asli object.
Very often the scale model is prayukt as a maargdarshika to bananaa the object in puraa size.
Scale models hai nirmit or ekatrit for many kaaran.

it thi a direct competitor with the tehraana ipod or iPhone shrenee of mobile devices.
It thi initially released in 16 or 32 GB capacities.

Old sparky, the electric kursi prayukt at gaao Sing thana
Execution by electrocution, praayah performed using an electric kursi, is an execution method originating in the United rajya in jisase the condemned person is strapped to a visheshkar nirmit lakdi chair or electrocuted through electrodes placed on the deh.
is nishpaadan method thi created by employees of thomas edison during the yuddh of currents, or has been prayukt tabhi in the sanyukt rajya or, liye a kaal of anek dashakon, in the philippine ( iske first upyog vahin in 1924 under American occupation, pichhlaa in 1976 ).
historically, ekbar the condemned vyakti thi sanlagn to the kursi, vibhinn chakra ( differing in voltage and avadhi ) of alternating vartmaan would be passed through the vyaktigat 's deh, in anukram to kaaran fatal kshati to the aatanrik organs ( sahit the dimag ).
the pehla dhakka of electric vartmaan was designed to kaaran taatkaalik unconsciousness or brain maut ; the duusari ek thi designed to kaaran fatal damage to the vital organs.
maut thi aksar caused by vidyut overstimulation of the dil.
Although in the sanyukt rajya the electric kursi has become a pratik of the maut penalty, iske upyog is in manaahi due to the vruddhi of lethal injection, jisase is widely believed to be a adhik humane vidhi of execution.
haalanki kuch rajya still maintain electrocution as a vidhi of nishpaadan, aaj it is tabhi kaayam as a dwitiyak method ki may be chosen over lethal injection at the nivedan of the kaidi.
as of 2010, electrocution is an optional form of nishpaadan in albama, florida, South carolina and virginia.
They allow the kaidi to chune lethal injection as an vaikalpik method.
In the states of Kentucky or tennesi, the electric kursi has maharoom retired magar liye those whose capital aparaadhon yahood vachanabaddh prior to legislated dates in 1998 ( kentki : kooch 31, 1998 ; tennesi : disambar 31, 1998 ) or jo chose electrocution.
in dono rajya, inmates jo do nahin chune electrocution or inmates jo committed their crimes baad the designated date are killed by lethal injection.
The electric kursi is an vaikalpik rup of nishpaadan approved liye potential upyog in arkansaas and oklahoma if anya form of execution hai mila asanvaidhanik in the rajya at the time of nishpaadan.
It is the sole vidhi of execution in vermant, jahaan treason is the only puunji aparaadhon.
on farvari 8, 2008, the Nebraska Supreme Court sankalpit ki execution by electric kursi was a `` bedard or unusual dand '' antargat the rajya 's samvidhan.
This brought executions of is type to an samaapt in nebraska, the tabhi baaki rajya to retain electrocution as iske ekmaatr method of nishpaadan liye hatya.
the maryland house of delegates is the nimnatar house of the saamaanya sabha, the rajya vidhanmandal of the amareeki rajya of maryland, and is rachit of 141 delegates nirvaachit isse 47 districts.
The House of delegates kaksh is located in the maryland State House ( state capital ) on rajya vrutt in annapolis, jisase is the state puunji.
the rajya House bhi houses the maryland rajya seenet kaksh or the karyaalayon of the Governor and leftinent rajyapal of the State of Maryland.
prayek pratinidhi has offices in Annapolis, in the aasapaas Casper R. tailor, jr. house daftar bhawan.
the mukti of paris ( bhi known as the Battle for paris ) took place dauraan sansar War ii isse 19 agast 1944 jabatak the aatmasamarpan of the occupying germany garrison on 25 agast.
The mukti of paris prarambh saath an uprising by the french Resistance against the germany garrison.
On 24 agast, the french shaktiyaan of the Interior ( shaktiyaan françaises de l'intérieur, FFI ) received sudrudheekaran from the free french fouj of mukti or isse the u.S. teesraa fouj antargat saamaanya Patton.
the capital pradesh of frans had maharoom governed by naaji germany since the signing of the Second compiègne armistice in june 1940, when the germany Army occupied uttari or westernmost frans, and jab the kathputli shashan of Vichy frans thi sthapit in the kasbaa of vichy in central France.
is battle chihnit the mukti of Paris or the nirvaasan of the Vichy sarkari to sigmaringen in germany.
However, vahin thi still much heavy fighting to be kiya before frans was liberated, including the campaign in dakshini frans dauraan august-september ( in Provence or extending into the southwestern pradesh of the Vosges kyu ), saath the german-held seaports of western frans ( such as at brest and dunkirk ), in Alsace and loren in purvi frans, and in northeastern frans, aise as along the Rhine or moder nadiyaan.
the germany fouj or SS fought doggedly in ye kshetron liye the remainder of 1944 and into 1945.

Sample view of an electronic swasthya ricard
an electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept paribhaashit as a systematic collection of electronic swasthya soochna parichay vyaktigat marijon or populations.
It is a record in digital swaroop ki is theoretically sakasham of hone shared across alag health parvaah jamaavat.
In kuch maamle is sharing can occur by rasta of network-connected enterprise-wide soochna systems or anya information networks or exchanges.
EHRs may shaamil a dayera of aankada, including demographics, chikitsa itihaas, medication or allergies, immunization status, prayogshaala pareekshan parinaam, radiology bimb, vital lakshan, nijee aankade like aayu or vazan, and billing information.
rin origination is the process by jisase a borrower applies liye a new rin, or a lender processes ki anuprayog.
Origination generally includes all the steps isse lene a rin anuprayog up to disbursal of nidhi ( or declining the anuprayog ).
rin servicing cover sabakuch after disbursing the nidhi jabatak the rin is fully sashulk band.
Loan origination is a specialized sanskaran of nai khaataa opening for vittiya sevaayen sanghathan.
nishchit logon or sanghathan specialize in rin origination.
Mortgage brokers and anya bandhak originator companiyaan serve as a prominent udhaaharan.
vahin hai anek alag prakaar of lone.
For more soochna on rin types, dekhie the rin or consumer lending aalekh.
kadam involved in originating a rin vary by rin prakaar, various kinds of rin risk, regulator, lender niti, and other karkon.

Top sahi : Franklin delano rujvelt, jo was jimmedaar liye pahalon and programs collectively known as the nai saude.

the nai Deal was a shrenee of aarthik kaarykram enacted in the United rajya between 1933 and 1936.
ve shaamil presidential karypalika orders or laws passed by congress dauraan the pehla pad of adhyaksh Franklin D. rujvelt.
the programs yahood in jawaab to the Great avsaad, or focused on what historians kol the `` 3 rs '' : raahat, recovery, or sudhaar.
ki is Relief liye the unemployed and garib ; recovery of the arthvyavastha to saamaanya str ; and sudhaar of the vittiya pranali to prevent a repeat avsaad.
The New Deal produced a political realignment, bananaa the Democratic Party the majority ( as khub as the party ki yojit the shwet house for saat out of nau Presidential sharten isse 1933 to 1969 ), saath its aadhaar in liberal vichaar, the white South, paramparaagat democrate, big nagar mashine, and the newly shashakt labor sangh or ethnic minorities.
the republicans were vibhajit, saath conservatives opposing the sampurna nai saude as an dushman of kaarobaar or vikaas, or udaarvaadiyon accepting kuch of it or promising to mek it adhik kushal.
the realignment crystallized into the nai saude gathbandhan that dominated sabase presidential elections into the 1960s, jabaki the vipaksh Conservative gathbandhan largely controlled congress isse 1937 to 1963.
by 1936 the pad `` udaar '' typically thi prayukt liye samarthak of the nai saude, or `` roodhiwaadee `` for iske opponents.
isse 1934 to 1938, rujvelt thi assisted in his endeavours by a “pro-spender” bahumat in congress ( drawn from two-party, pratispardhi, non-machine, pragatisheel, and baayein party jile ).
as vikhyath by sikandar hiks, “Roosevelt, backed by rare, non-Southern democrate majorities — 270 non-southern democrate pratinidhi or 71 non-southern democrate senators — spelled duusari nai saude reform.”
anek itihaaskaaron fark between a `` pehla nai saude '' ( 1933–34 ) or a `` duusari nai saude '' ( 1935–38 ), saath the duusari one more liberal and adhik controversial.
the `` First nai Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt saath diverse groups, isse banking or railroads to udyog or kheti, sab of jisase maange sahaayta liye aarthik survival.
the sangheey apaat Relief Administration, liye instance, provided $ 500 lakh liye raahat parichaalan by rajya and shaharon, jabaki the short-lived cwa ( civil works prashasan ) diya bastiyon dhan to operate make-work project in 1933-34.
the `` Second nai saude `` in 1935–38 shaamil the veganar Act to prachaar majdoor unions, the Works pragati prashasan ( wpa ) raahat kaarykram ( jisase bana the sangheey sarkari by dur the largest single niyokta in the swadesh ), the soshal suraksha adhinium, or nai programs to aid tenant kisaano or migrant majdoor.
the final pramukh vasteen of New Deal vidhaan yahood the creation of the sanyukt States awaas praadhikaar or farm Security prashasan, dono in 1937, and the mela majdoor maanakon adhinium of 1938, jisase set adhiktam ghanton or minimum wages liye sabase categories of majdoor.
the aarthik downturn of 1937–38, and the kadava vibhajit between the afl or CIO majdoor unions led to pramukh Republican gains in congress in 1938.
roodhiwaadee republicans or democrate in Congress joined in the informal Conservative gathbandhan.
By 1942–43 ve shut bas raahat kaarykram aise as the WPA or ccc or avarodhit major udaar prastaav.
rujvelt khud turned uske dhyaan to the yuddh praytn, or jiti reelection in 1940 or 1944.
the Supreme adaalat ghoshit the neshnal Recovery prashasan ( nra ) or the pehla sanskaran of the Agricultural samaayojan adhinium ( aaa ) asanvaidhanik, however the aaa thi rewritten and tab upheld.
as the pehla republican adhyaksh nirvaachit baad fdr, Dwight D. ijanhavar ( 1953–61 ) baayein the nai saude largely barkaraar, bhi expanding it in kuch kshetron.
in the 1960s, lyndon B. johnson 's great samaaj used the nai saude as prerana liye a naatakeey expansion of udaar kaarykram, jisase Republican Richard M. nicksan generally retained.
baad 1974, however, the kol liye deregulation of the arthvyavastha gained bipartisan support.
The New saude regulation of banking ( glass–steagall adhinium ) thi nilambit in the 1990s.
Many New saude kaarykram remain kriyasheel, saath kuch still oparating antargat the original names, sahit the sangheey jamaa bime nigam ( FDIC ), the Federal Crop bime nigam ( fcic ), the Federal awaas prashasan ( FHA ), or the tennesi ghati Authority ( tv ).
the largest programs still in astitv aaj hai the soshal Security System or the Securities and Exchange ayog ( SEC ).
a stri ( ), pl : mahilaon ( ) is a female insaan.
The pad stri is praayah surakshit liye an adult, with the pad girl hone the usual pad liye a maadaa child or adolescent.
however, the pad stri is bhi sometimes prayukt to identify a maadaa insaan, regardless of aayu, as in vaakyansh such as `` mahilaon 's adhikaron ``.
Women hai typically sakasham of giving birth, though older mahilaon jo have gaye through rajonivritti or kuch intersex mahilaon can not.
`` i Do n't Want to miss a baat '' is a song performed by amareeki chattan band arosmith liye the 1998 film armageddon.
likhaa by diane warren, the song debuted at kramank ek on the billboard hot 100 ( the pehla # 1 for the band baad 28 years together ).
the song stayed at number ek for chaar weeks from sitambar 5 to sitambar 26, 1998.
the song bhi tehre at number 1 liye anek saptaah in several anya countries.
in the uk, the song peaked at kramank chaar, banane arosmith 's highest charting song in the uk, jahaan it was the 17th best-selling single of 1998, and has sold over a lakh nakal.
haalanki nahin prayukt by the bahumat of the world 's deshon, daylight chhayankan samay is aam in the Western world.
daylight chhayankan time ( dst ) —also summer time in angrejon English — is the abhyaas of advancing ghadiyaan dauraan the lighter months so ki evenings have adhik daylight and mornings have kam.
Typically clocks are adjusted aage ek ghanta nikat the prarambh of spring and are samyojit pichhadaa in patjhad.
the aadhunik vichaar of daylight chhayankan was pehla prastaavit in 1895 by george vernon hadsan or it thi pehla implemented dauraan the pehla sansar War.
anek deshon have used it at vibhinn times since tab.
much of the sanyukt rajya prayukt DST in the 1950s or 1960s, and DST upyog vistaarit following the 1970s urja crisis and has maharoom widely prayukt in North america or Europe chunki tab.
the practice rai maharoom dono praised or criticized.
adding daylight to evenings laabh retailing, khel, or anya activities that exploit dhoop baad working hours, lakin can kaaran samasyaayein liye evening entertainment or anya occupations tied to the surya.
Although an jaldi goal of dst was to reduce sandhya upyog of incandescent lighting ( formerly a praathmik upyog of electricity ), modern heating or kooling usage pattern differ greatly, and shodh parichay kaisaa dst philhal affects urja upyog is simit or contradictory.
dst clock shifts upasthit anya chunautiyaan.
ve complicate timekeeping, or can disrupt meetings, travel, billing, ricard keeping, medical devices, heavy upkaran, or neend pattern.
tantra can often adjust computer ghadiyaan automatically, but is can be limited or error-prone, particularly when DST tithiyaan hai changed.
