montargis is a commune in the Loiret vibhaag in north-central frans on the loing nadi.
the kasbaa is stith about south of paris or east of orléans in the Gâtinais.
montargis is the duusari largest city in the loiret, after orléans.
it is near a vishaal van, and contains lite industry and kheti, sahit saffron.
due to iske numerous naharon or pulon, montargis sometimes bills itself as the `` venice of the Gâtinais. ''
haalanki kaaphi aadhunik, it retains a medieval charm in iske downtown kshetrafal.
in computer bhandar, a logical ikai kramank, or LUN, is a kramank used to pahachaano a logical unit, which is a device addressed by the SCSI protocol or protocol which encapsulate scsi, aise as fibre channel or iscsi.
a LUN may be prayukt saath koi yantra jisase supports read/write parichaalan, aise as a tape drive, but is sabase praayah prayukt to refer to a logical discs as created on a SAN.
haalanki nahin technically sahi, the term `` LUN '' is praayah also prayukt to refer to the logical discs itself.
the inzel according to chihnit (,, to euangelion kata Markon ), commonly shortened to the inzel of chihnit or bas chihnit, is the duusari kitaab of the New vasiyat.
is canonical account of the jivan of yishu of nasarat is one of the three synoptic gospels.
it thi vichaar to be an nichod, jisase accounts liye iske place as the duusari gospel in the Bible.
however, sabase samakaleen scholars abhi lihaaz it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ).
That chihnit thi used as a sorce liye the anya synoptic gospels inzel of mathew or Gospel of luk is widely yojit by anek, haalanki not all, nai vasiyat vidwaanon.
the inzel of chihnit narrates the Ministry of yishu isse uske baptism by John the baptist to his maut or qayamat.
it focuses visheshkar on the last saptaah of uske jivan ( adhyay 11–16 ) in jerusalem.
iske swift katha portrays Jesus as a vir man of karrwai, an exorcist, healer or chamatkaar kaaryakarta.
An mahatvapurn theme of Mark is the muktidaata rahasy.
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals, koshishen unsuccessfully to keep uske muktidaata pahchaan rahasy, or conceals uske message saath parables.
meanwhile, the shishyon asafal to samajhe both the implication of the chamatkaar of Jesus or the meaning of the things he predicts parichay his arrest, maut or resurrection.
sabase vidwaanon believe that the asli text of the inzel ends at Mark 16:8 saath the discovery of yishu ' khaali tomb or that the following account of his qayamat dikhaave is a later addition.
According to parampara and kuch jaldi girijaghar lekhak, the lekhak is Mark the Evangelist, the companion of the apostle peter.
the inzel, however, appears to rely on anek underlying sources, varying in form or in theology, which tells viruddh the parampara ki the inzel thi aadhaarit on peter 's preaching.
The text is a sankalan which may shaamil eye-witness accounts as khub as gyaat apostolic preachings, or pre-existing written record that do nahin maujuud aaj lakin can be confirmed isse 2nd-century tikaakaron.
kuch of the kahaniyaan in the inzel may have been transmitted orally before being likhaa bas.
Various tatv within the gospel sujhaayen ki the lekhak wrote in syrian or philistin for a non-jewish isai jatiyaan.
The rab of the Rings is an apik unchi kaalpanik anokhaa likhaa by English bhashashasthri and University of oxford praadhyaapak J. R. R. tolkien.
the story began as a sequel to tolkien 's 1937 children 's fantasy novel the hobbit, but aakhirkaar viksit into a much larger work.
It thi likhaa in stages between 1937 and 1949, much of it dauraan sansar yuddh ii.
It is the duusari best-selling anokhaa ever likhaa, saath over 150 lakh copies bechi.
The sheershak of the anokhaa refers to the story 's main vipakshi, the andhera rab Sauron, jo tha in an pehle aayu nirmit the One ring to niyam the anya bajati of shakti as the param hathiyaar in uske campaign to jeeten or niyam sab of Middle-earth.
isse shant beginnings in the shaayar, a hobbit land nahin naapsand the angrezi countryside, the story seemayen aarpaar north-west middle-earth, following the course of the War of the Ring through the eyes of iske characters, notably the hobbits frodo baggins, samwise `` sam '' gamgee, meriadoc `` mairi '' brandybuck or peregrin `` pippin '' took, lakin bhi the hobbits ' chief allies or yatraaen companions : Aragorn, a Human ranger ; boromir, a man from Gondor ; gimli, a Dwarf yoddha ; legolas, an elven prince ; or Gandalf, a jaadugar.
the work was initially intended by tolkien to be ek volume of a two-volume niyat, saath the anya being The silmarillion, but is vichaar thi barkhaast by uske publisher.
it thi decided liye economic kaaran to publish The rab of the bajati as teen volumes over the course of a saal isse 29 july 1954 to 20 aktubar 1955, yun bananaa the now parichit rab of the Rings trilogy.
The teen aaytan yahood entitled the Fellowship of the Ring, The Two minaaren, and the vaapasi of the king.
structurally, the anokhaa is divided internally into six kitabe, two prati volume, saath anek appendices of prishthbhumi saamagree shaamil at the samaapt of the teesraa awaz.
the rab of the bajati has chunki been reprinted numerous times or anudit into anek bhashaaen.
tolkien 's kaary rai maharoom the vishay of extensive analysis of iske vishaywastu or origins.
haalanki a pramukh work in itself, the story thi only the pichhlaa gati of a larger apik Tolkien had worked on chunki 1917, in a process he described as mythopoeia.
prabhaav on this pehle kaary, or on the story of the rab of the bajati, shaamil philology, mythology, religion or the lekhak 's distaste for the prabhaav of industrialization, as khub as earlier fantasy works or tolkien 's anubhavon in sansar yuddh i.
The rab of the bajati in iske phere is mana to have tha a great prabhaav on modern fantasy ; the impact of tolkien 's works is aise that the upyog of the shabd `` Tolkienian '' or `` tolkienesque '' have been recorded in the oxford angrezi shabdkosh.
the enduring lokapriyata of the rab of the Rings rai led to numerous references in lokapriy samskruti, the founding of many societies by prashansak of tolkien 's works, and the prakaashan of many kitabe parichay tolkien and uske works.
The rab of the bajati has inspired, and continues to inspire, kalakriti, music, films or television, video khel, and subsequent sahitya.
award-winning adaptations of the rab of the bajati have maharoom bana liye radio, theatre, or filmi.
the following is an episode suchi liye the niklodian sitcom drek & josh.
the series debuted on janvari 11, 2004.
a tv filmi mairi christmas, drek & Josh thi bana alaava from the niyamit shrenee on December 5, 2008.
vahin hai a total of 60 episodes yahood produced spanning four seasons.
drek ghanti, Josh pek, or miranda cosgrove yahood the only abhinaytaon to appear in all 60 apisod.
the San francisco 49ers conduct prashikshan shivi at the toli 's mukhyalay or practice facility in santa clara, california in agast 2010.
the thokar is wearing red jerseys saath the exception of quarterbaque Alex smith, who is in a blike jersey ; the raksha in shwet.
in the National footbaal League, prashikshan camp refers to the time pehle the ritu commences.
During is samay, tiimon will sometimes congregate at an outside sthaan, praayah a vishvavidhyalayon, to conduct prashikshan shivi liye at tanik the pehla few saptaah.
is is samaan to besabaal 's spring prashikshan.
prashikshan shivi is prayukt in anek different tareeke.
New players or coaches upyog it to acclimate themselves to nai teammates or pranaaliyon.
liye younger khilaadi, it serves as a kaal of evaluation ; liye diggajon, it is samay to golakaar back into rup.
Training shivi is divided into anek alag components.
the pehla is scrimmages.
These hai pseudo-games where tiimon chalaaen nearly puraa khel ' laayak of plays.
sometimes, do practice satr hai held on the same day.
is avadharana is referred to as two-a-days.
Other bhaag of training shivi shaamil drills, baithak saath coaches and anya khilaadi at ek 's position, weight prashikshan, or pre-season khel.
the latter half of training camp lead sidhe into the pradarshnee ritu.
With enegel prashikshan camps starting in late-july, the biggest concern has maharoom nirjaleekaran.
in 2001, Minnesota vikings khilaadi Korey stringer died of a medical condishan aadhaarit isse dehydration and heatstroke.
The maut of stringer prompted the enegel to change unke prashikshan nitiyon.
at each practice, prayek toli must have the toli doctor or prashikshakon on the field ; additionally, an ambulance must be upasthit dauraan practices.
saath NFL prashikshan camps shuruuaat in let july, severe mausam can affect abhyaas or exhibition khel.
In 2002, a Cleveland bhura pradarshnee khel ended due to bijli nikat cleveland Browns stadium, and kathor storms have been gyaat to disrupt prashikshan shiviron.
prashansak are often able to vizit unke pasandida toli 's prashikshan shivi to kaich an early look at the khilaadi ; pravesh to practices is praayah free or substantially kam expensive than a game tikat, making training shivi yatraayen a popular vikalp liye prashansak jo can not attend anek khel due to vittiya or anya kaaran.
enegel teams praayah bechein kalakritiyaan or concessions at shivi site saath saath offering kriyaayein or kaarykram to mek training camp a adhik fan-friendly anubhav.
In computing, a file pranali ( or filesystem ) is a prakaar of aankada store jisase can be prayukt to store, retrieve and adhyatan a niyat of files.
the pad could refer to the abstract aankada structures prayukt to define files, or to the vaastavik tantra or firmware components ki implement the amoort vichaar.
kuch file pranaaliyon hai prayukt on local aankada bhandar divaais ; others provide file abhigam via a sanjaal protocol ( e.g. nfs, smb, or 9p client ).
kuch sanchika pranaaliyon hai `` abhaasi '', in ki the `` filein '' supplied are computed on request ( e.g. procfs ) or hai merely a maanchitran into a alag sanchika pranali prayukt as a baking store.
The sanchika pranali manages abhigam to dono the saamagree of filein or the metadata about those filein.
it is jimmedaar for arranging storage space ; vishwasaneeyata, dakshata, and tuning saath regard to the shaareerik bhandar medium are mahatvapurn dizine considerations.
wiliam harvard taft ( sitambar 15, 1857 – kooch 8, 1930 ) thi the 27th adhyaksh of the United States ( 1909–1913 ) or baad the dasavaan Chief insaaf of the sanyukt rajya ( 1921–1930 ).
he is the only vyakti to have served in both of ye karyaalayon.
pehle banane adhyaksh, taft, a republican, thi chaynit to serve on the Superior adaalat of Cincinnati in 1887.
in 1890, taft thi appointed solicitor General of the sanyukt States or in 1891 a nyaayadhish on the sanyukt rajya Court of appeals liye the Sixth circuit.
in 1900, President wiliam mckinley appointed Taft Governor-General of the philippine.
In 1904, adhyaksh theodor rujvelt niyukt taft sachiv of yuddh in an praytn to duulhe taft, tab uske close political ally, into his handpicked adhyakshiya successor.
Taft assumed a prominent bhoomika in problem solving, assuming on kuch avasaron the role of acting sachiv of rajya, while ghatati doharaaya offers from rujvelt to serve on the Supreme adaalat.
sawari a wave of lokapriy support liye fellow republican rujvelt, taft jiti an aasaan vijay in his 1908 boli for the presidency.
In uske tabhi pad, taft 's gharelu agenda emphasized trust-busting, civil seva sudhaar, strengthening the antarraji commers ayog, improving the pradarshan of the postal service, or dyodhi of the solahavin amendment.
videsh, taft sought to further the economic development of raashtra in latin america or Asia through `` dollars kootneeti ``, or dikhaaya decisiveness or restraint in jawaab to revolution in Mexico.
the task-oriented taft was bekabar to the rajnatik ramifications of uske decisions, praayah alienated his apana kunjee constituencies, or thi overwhelmingly parajeet in uske bid liye a second pad in the adhyakshiya chunaav of 1912.
In surveykshan of adhyakshiya vidwaanon, Taft is usually ranked nikat the madhya of suchiyaan of all amareeki raashtrapatiyon.
baad leaving daftar, taft kharch his time in academia, madhyasthata, or the dhundhen liye world peace through his self-founded lig to enforce salaam.
In 1921, baad the pehla sansar yuddh, adhyaksh Warren G. Harding appointed taft mukhya insaaf of the sanyukt rajya.
taft parosa in this kshamta until shortly before uske maut in 1930.
the ten aayatein is a 1956 apik filmi utpaadit and nirdeshit by cesil B. demille ki dramatized the biblical story of the exodus, in jisase the hebrew-born musa, an apanaaya mishra prince, becomes the deliverer of the yahudee slave.
It strecchar charlton heston in the lead role, Yul brynner as uske adoptive brother, pharaoh Rameses II, eni baxtor as nefretiri, edward G. robinsan as dathan, yvonne de Carlo as sephora, debra pejet as lilia, and John Derek as Joshua.
the supporting daal shaamil Sir cedrick Hardwicke as Pharaoh seti i, nina foch as bithiah, martha scot as yoshebel, judith anderson as memnet, vincent daam as baka, or John Carradine as aaron.
The film thi released by Paramount tasviren in vistavision on aktubar 5, 1956.
The ten aayatein, which demille narrated, thi the pichhlaa filmi ki he nirdeshit.
he thi set to sidhaa the 1958 remake of his 1938 filmi the Buccaneer, but uske final illness majaboor use to baaj the directing chores to uske son-in-law, actor anthoni Quinn.
demille tha also niojit to filmi the jivan of Lord baden Powell, the founder of the scout movement, with daud niven ; is project thi never ehsaas.
the Ten aayatein is a aanshik rimek of demille 's 1923 mook film.
kuch of the cast or kru of the 1956 sanskaran worked on the asli.
it rai chunki maharoom remade as a television miniseries broadcast in April 2006.
the ten aayatein is ek of the most financially successful films kabhi made, grossing over $ 65 lakh at the u.S. baksaa office.
adjusting liye mahangaai, is makes it the chathe highest-grossing filmi domestically, with an samyojit total of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012.
the baksaa daftar jalsthal `` the sankhyaayein '' suchiyaan the gharelu sakal at $ 80 lakh.
in 1999, The ten Commandments thi selected liye sangrakshan in the sanyukt States neshnal filmi registry by the pustakaalayon of congress as hone `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
In june 2008, the amareeki Film santhaan nazil iske `` Ten Top ten `` —the best ten films in ten amareeki film genres—after polling over 1,500 people isse the rachanaatmak jatiyaan.
the ten aayatein thi listed as the dasavaan best filmi in the apik vidha.
The filmi praapt seven academy puraskaar nominations sahit behtareen chitra, or jiti the academy Award liye Best Visual prabhaav.
charlton Heston thi nominated liye a sunahari Globe puraskaar liye Best gati chitra karta in the naatak shrenee.
Yul brynner won the National Board of punarvilokan puraskaar liye Best karta liye uske role as rameses, saath saath uske anya bhoomikaaye in the king or i or anastasia.
louisville (, or ) is a pramukh nagar and the largest nagar in the U.S. rajya of kentki and the county seat of jeffrasan county.
Since 2003, the nagar 's simaayen have maharoom saath those of the county kuki of a city-county vilay.
The city 's kul sanchit janasankhyikee at the 2010 janasankhyikee was 741,096 ( louisville 's santulan kul, 602,011, excludes semi-autonomous towns or is the janasankhyikee listed in sabase sources or neshnal rankings ).
As of 2010, the Louisville mahanagar kshetrafal ( MSA ) had a janasankhyikee of 1,307,647 ranking 42nd nationally.
the metro area shaamil louisville-jefferson county and 12 surrounding county, aath in kentki or chaar in Southern indiana ( dekhie bhugol neeche ).
the Louisville sanyukt sankhyikeey Area, having a population of 1,451,564, shaamil the emesa, hardin County or Larue county in kentki, or scot County, indiana.
an mahatvapurn aatanrik shipping bandargahon in the 19th century, louisville aaj is behtareen known as the sthaan of the Kentucky darbi, the pehla of teen annual thoroughbred ghoda daud bananaa up the Triple crown.
a theth experimental seoup liye an aldol pratikriya.
dono flasks hai submerged in a shushk ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78 °c ) the taapmaana of jisase is hone monitored by a taapyugma ( the taar on the baayein ).
a kooling nahaana, in prayogshaala rasayan ( praayah but not sadaa sashulk rasayan ) abhyaas, is a drav mishran which is used to maintain kam temperatures, typically between 13 °C or −196 °c.
ye kam temperatures hai prayukt to collect liquids baad aswan, to remove solvaints using a rotary evaporator, or to perform a chemical reaction neeche room taapmaana ( dekhie : kinetic control ).
Cooling baths hai generally one of do prakaar : ( a ) a thanda drav ( visheshkar drav nitrogen, water, or bhi air ) — but sabase commonly the pad refers to ( b ) a mishran of 3 components : ( 1 ) a cooling agent ( aise as shushk barf or jal barf ) ; ( b ) a drav 'kairicar ' ( such as drav water, ethylene glykol, asitone, ityadi. ), jisase hastantaran ooshmaa between the bath or the pot ; ; or ( c ) an yogtmak to depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid pranali.
( a parichit udhaaharan of is is the upyog of an ice/rock-salt mixture to freeze ice malai.
the phase-change of barf into drav jal requires urja, 'pulling ' heat from the pranali.
Adding namak lowers the asthaayee at jisase this happens, arth adhik energy rai to be avashoshit isse the paryaavaran in anukram to melt the barf.
is effectively makes the barf 'colder ' — it jarur 'pull ' adhik ooshmaa from iske paryaavaran to become drav. )
khaane vikaar hai sharten paribhaashit by asaamaanya khaane habits that may involve either aparyaapt or excessive khaanaa seven to the detriment of an vyaktigat 's physical and mental swasthya.
bulimia nervoza or anorexia nervoza hai the sabase aam specific form in the sanyukt kingdom.
Other prakaar of khaane vikaar include binge khaane vikaar or eating disorder not varanaa nirdisht.
Bulimia nervoza is a vikaar characterized by binge khaane or purging.
Purging can include self-induce ulti, over-exercising, or the upyog of diuretics, enemas, or laxatives.
anorexia nervoza is characterized by extreme khaanaa restriction to the point of self-starvation or excessive weight ghaataa.
Though primarily vichaar of as affecting females ( an anumaanit 5–10 lakh hone prabhavit in the u.K. ), khaane vikaar affect males as well.
an anumaanit 10 – 15 % of logon with eating vikaar hai males ( Gorgan, 1999 ).
( an anumaanit 1 lakh u.K. males hone prabhavit ).
haalanki khaane disorders hai increasing all over the world among both men or mahilaon, vahin is pramaan to suggest that it is mahilaon in the Western sansar jo hai at the highest risk of vikasshil unhen or the oopaadhi of westernization increases the risk.
nearly half of sab america personally know someone with an khaane disorder.
the kaushal to comprehend the central processes of appetite has increased tremendously chunki leptin thi khoja, or the kaushal to observe the functions of the dimag as khub.
interactions between prerak, homeostatic or self-regulatory control prakriyaaon hai involved in khaane aacharan, jisase is a key ghatak in khaane vikaar.
the precise kaaran of khaane vikaar is not entirely understood, lakin vahin is evidence that it may be linked to anya medical sharten or paristhitiyon.
saanskrithik idealization of thinness or youthfulness have contributed to khaane vikaar affecting vividh populations.
ek study dikhaaya ki ladakiyon saath ADHD have a vrihad mauka of getting an eating disorder than those nahin prabhavit by ADHD.
another padhai sujhaayaa ki women with ptsd, visheshkar due to sexually sambandhit trauma, are adhik sambhavit to develop anorexia nervosa.
ek padhai showed ki foster ladakiyon hai adhik sambhavit to develop bulimia nervosa.
kuch socho ki pir dabaav or idealized body-types dekhi in the media hai also a significant factor.
Some shodh dikhaaen ki for certain people vahin hai genetic kaaran kyon ve may be prone to developing an khaane disorder.
haal adhyayan have mila pramaan a sahasambandh between marijon with bulimia nervoza and padaarth upyog vikaar.
in jod, chintaa vikaar or personality vikaar hai aam occurrences saath client of eating disorders.
While uchit upachaar can be atyadhik prabhavi liye many suffering from vishisht prakaar of khaane vikaar, the consequences of eating disorders can be kathor, sahit maut ( whether isse direct medical prabhaav of ashaant khaane aadaten or from comorbid sharten aise as suicidal thinking ).
gulaami in the sanyukt rajya existed isse the early saalo of the aupniveshik kaal ; it was firmly sthapit by the samay the sanyukt rajya sought swatantraaa isse great britain in 1776.
however, by 1804, sab states uttar of the mesun and Dixon lakeer tha either abolished slavery outright or passed kanoon for the kramik abolition of gulaami.
in 1787 congress nishiddh slavery in the uttarpashchim territory.
lakin slavery gained nai life in the dakshin saath the cotton udyog after 1800, and vistaarit into the dakshinpaschim.
the swadesh thi polarized into slave and free states saath the mason-dixon lakeer, which separated pencilvenia and Maryland.
The sanyukt rajya or great britain both nishiddh the antarrashtriya slave vyapaar in 1808, lakin the gharelu vyapaar, saath bikri to the gahan dakshin, expanded dramatically, and anek captives yahood shipped by the coastwise slave vyapaar.
pehle the 1840s, the dakshin thi vigorously defending gulaami or its expansion into the territories.
in the uttar some abolitionists denounced it as sinful, or numerous anti-slavery forces asweekrut it as detrimental to the adhikaron of free main.
baad failed compromises and abraham Lincoln 's chunaav, in 1861 gyaarah slave rajya broke dur to form the Confederate States of america, agrani to the amareeki Civil yuddh.
the federal government in 1862 made abolition of gulaami a yuddh lakshya.
In janvari 1863 President Lincoln freed slave in the confederacy through the emancipation udghoshnaa.
baad the war, the terahavin amendment, prabhavi disambar 1865, abolished gulaami throughout the sampurna sanyukt States, sahit the kinaaraa rajya or the bhartiya territories.
From the 16th to the 19th sadiyaan, an estimated 12 lakh Africans were shipped as slave to the americas.
dekhie gulaami in the Americas.
The great bahumat went to the sugar baganon of the West indies or brazil, jahaan mrityu thi high.
parichay 645,000 yahood brought to kayaa is abhi the sanyukt rajya.
by the 1860 sanyukt States janasankhyikee, the slave janasankhyikee in the American dakshin tha grown to chaar million.
Of sab 1,515,605 pariwaron in the 15 slave rajya, nearly 400,000 yojit slave ( roughly ek in four ), amounting to 8 % of all amareeki pariwaron.
While kuch slaves worked as house bandon or shahari shilpkaar, the great bahumat worked on baganon or vishaal kheto, cultivating lucrative nakadi fasalon, aise as rice, tambaaku, sugar or, baad 1800, chiefly kapaas.
by 1860 sabase slaves yahood held in the Deep South, jahaan ve parosa in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in kapaas.
in small operations, ve worked with their swami.
In vishaal plantations ve yahood nirdeshit by white paid overseers.
antargat the system ki became chattel gulaami ( ownership of a insaan being, and of his/her descendants ), a jatigat tatv thi aadharbhoot : slave yahood ashweton of African descent or swaamitv, lagbhag universally, by whites of europea descent.
in the 17th sadi, virginia, followed by anya southern colonies, enacted vidhi that children of slave maataaon were born into slavery.
slave could laabh swatantraaa only by kaaryshil away ( jisase was mushkil and illegal to do ), or by manumission by swami, jisase thi regulated by rajya, or became increasingly difficult or nishiddh.
in the earliest era of chattel gulaami, the colonies bhi vyavasthit kaary by a system of bandhua majdoor known as indentured servitude.
is typically lasted for anek saalo liye both garib europeans and africans alike, to adaa band the costs of hastantaran to the colonies.
ve contracted liye aise arrangements kuki of garib economies in their ghar deshon.
Between 1680 or 1700, as kam europeans migrated to the colonies, planters began to aayaat adhik africans as slave.
recognizing the importance of gulaami, the house of Burgesses in virginia enacted a nai slave code in 1705 ; it sanyukt a kismein of vidhaan and added nai praavdhaanon enforcing shwet sarvocchata in the vidhi.
schematic cross khand of bhaag of leaf, jilam shown as red vrutt at figure 8.
Xylem is ek of the two prakaar of hastantaran tissue in vascular paudhe ( floem is the anya ).
The shabd jilam is derived from the unani word ξύλον ( xylon ), arth `` lakdi '' ; the best-known jilam tissue is lakdi, haalanki it is mila throughout the sanyantr.
iske basic falan is to transport jal, lakin it bhi transports some nutrients through the sanyantr.
is clock pratinidhitiv shows kuch of the pramukh units of geological time or nirnaayak kaarykram of Earth history.
the hadean eon represents the samay pehle fossil ricard of jivan on dharti ; its apper boundary is now regarded as 4.0 ga ( arab saalo ago ).
anya subdivisions reflect the evolution of jivan ; the Archean and proterozoic hai dono eons, the palaeozoic, mesozoic or cenozoic are eras of the phanerozoic eon.
the two lakh saal quaternary period, the time of recognizable humans, is too small to be drishy at is scale.
the bhugarbhik samay scale is a pranali of chronological maapan ki relates stariki to time, and is used by geologists, paleontologists, and anya earth vaigyanikon to describe the timing and sambandh between events that have occurred throughout dharti 's itihaas.
the talika of bhugarbhik samay spans prastut yahan agrees saath the tithiyaan or nomenclature niyat forth by the antarrashtriya ayog on Stratigraphy maanak rang codes of the antarrashtriya ayog on stariki.
Evidence isse radiometric dating indicates that the dharti is about 4.54 arab saalo boodha.
The geology or deep time of dharti 's past rai been vyavasthit into various ikai according to events jisase took place in prayek kaal.
Different spans of samay on the GTS hai praayah simaankit by parivartan in the sangyojan of strata jisase correspond to them, indicating pramukh geological or paleontological kaarykram, aise as dravyaman extinctions.
liye udhaaharan, the boundary between the cretaceous kaal or the Paleogene period is paribhaashit by the cretaceous–paleogene extinction event, jisase chihnit the nidhan of the dinosaurs or anek anya samooh of jivan.
puraani samay spans jisase predate the vishwasaneey chattan record ( pehle the Proterozoic Eon ) hai defined by nirpeksh aayu.
The TI-82 is a graphing calculator bana by Texas yantra.
the ti-82 thi designed in 1993 as a stripped down, more upayokta dostana sanskaran of the ti-85, or as a badalanaa liye the ti-81.
it thi the direct predecessor of the ti-83.

the harpy Eagle ( harpia harpyja ) is a neotropical prajati of tribhuj.
It is sometimes gyaat as the amareeki harpy Eagle to fark it from the papuai Eagle which is sometimes gyaat as the New Guinea harpy tribhuj or papuai harpy tribhuj.
it is the largest or sabase shaktishaalee raptor mila in the americas, or among the largest extant prajati of eagles in the world.
it praayah inhabits teevr lowland rainforests in the apper ( emergent ) canopy parat.
vinaash of iske natural habitat has seen it vanish isse anek bhaag of iske purv dayera, or it is nearly extirpated in Central america.
biological vargeekaran, or scientific classification in jeevigyaan, is a vidhi of vaigyanik taxonomy prayukt to samooh and categorize jeevon into groups aise as genus or prajati.
These samooh hai gyaat as taxa ( singular : texon ).
aadhunik biological classification has iske root in the work of carolus liniyas, jo grouped prajati according to saajha shaareerik visheshtaayen.
ye groupings have chunki maharoom revised to improve sangati saath the darwinian principle of aam descent.
saath the parichay of the cladistic vidhi in the late 20th sadi, phylogenetic taxonomy in jisase jeevon hai grouped aadhaarit purely on inferred vikasvaadi relatedness, ignoring morphological samanta, rai become aam in some areas of biology.
aanvik phylogenetics, jisase upyog diene sequences as data, has bhi chalit anek recent revisions and is likely to continue doing so.
biological classification belongs to the vigyaan of biological systematics.

jon Winston Ono lenon, ( born jon Winston lenon ; 9 aktubar 1940 – 8 disambar 1980 ) thi an angrezi sangeetkaar, singer or songwriter who rose to worldwide kirti as a founder sadsy of the betals, one of the sabase commercially kaamyaab and critically acclaimed adhiniyamon in the itihaas of lokapriy music.
With paul mccartney, he formed ek of the most manaaye songwriting partnerships of the 20th sadi.
born or uthaaya in Liverpool, as a teenager lenon became involved in the skiffle craze ; his first band, the quarrymen, evolved into the betals in 1960.
as the samooh disintegrated towards the samaapt of the dashak, lenon embarked on a solo career ki utpaadit the critically acclaimed album John lennon/plastic ono band and imagine, or iconic songs aise as `` de Peace a mauka `` or `` Imagine ``.
baad uske vivaah to yoko ono in 1969, he badla his name to jon ono lenon.
lenon disengaged khud from the music business in 1975 to devote samay to raising uske infant bete shaun, but re-emerged saath ono in 1980 saath the new album Double kaalpanik.
he thi murdered teen weeks baad iske relies.
lenon revealed a rebellious prakruti and acerbic wit in his music, likhane, drawings, on filmi or in saakshaatkaar.
vivaadaaspad through uske rajnatik or peace activism, he sthanantarit to nai york nagar in 1971, jahaan uske aalochana of the vietnam yuddh resulted in a lengthy attempt by Richard nicksan 's prashasan to deport use, jabaki kuch of uske geeton were apanaaya as anthems by the anti-war gati.
as of 2012, lenon 's solo album bikri in the United States exceed 14 lakh units, or as lekhak, co-writer or yajmaan, he is jimmedaar for 25 number-one singles on the us Hot 100 chart.
In 2002, a BBC poll on the 100 mahanatam Britons voted use aathvin, or in 2008, rolling stone ranked him the fifth-greatest singer of sab samay.
he thi maranoparant inducted into the Songwriters Hall of kirti in 1987 or into the Rock or Roll haul of kirti in 1994.

Pee-wee herman is a comic fictional akshar nirmit or portrayed by American hasya Paul reubens.
he is behtareen gyaat for uske do television shrenee or film shrenee during the 1980s.
the childlike pee-wee herman akshar developed as a stage adhinium that jaldi led to an HBO khaas in 1981.

kansas ( ) is a u.S. rajya stith in the midwestern United States.
It is named baad the kansas nadi jisase bahati through it, jisase in phere thi named after the kansa deshi American janajati, which inhabited the kshetrafal.
The tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is praayah kaha to ausat `` logon of the hawa '' or `` people of the dakshin hawa, '' haalanki this thi sambhawatah not the term 's asli arth.
nivaasiyon of kansas hai pukaara `` kansans. ''
For hazaron of saalo kayaa is now kansas thi ghar to numerous or vividh deshi amareeki tribes.
Tribes in the purvi part of the rajya generally jiya in gaanvon saath the river ghaatiyon.
Tribes in the pashchimi part of the rajya were semi- nomadic or hunted vishaal herds of bison.
kansas was first settled by europea Americans in the 1830s, lakin the pace of upnivesh twarit in the 1850s, in the midst of rajnatik yudhon over the slavery samasya.
jab officially opened to upnivesh by the U.S. government in 1854, abolitionist Free-Staters isse nai england and pro-slavery settlers isse neighboring mizori rushed to the territory to determine if kansas would become a free state or a slave state.
yun, the kshetrafal thi a hotbed of hinsa or chaos in its jaldi dinon as these forces collided, and thi gyaat as bleeding kansas.
the abolitionists eventually prevailed or on janvari 29, 1861, kansas entered the Union as a free rajya.
After the civil yuddh, the population of kansas grew rapidly, when waves of apravasiyon turned the prairie into farmland.
aaj, Kansas is ek of the sabase productive agricultural rajya, producing unchi yields of gehun, jowar and sunflowers.
Kansas is the 15th sabase extensive or the 33rd sabase populous of the 50 United States.
Psychology is an academik or lagu anushaasan ki involves the vaigyanik study of dimagi krityon or vyavhaar.
Psychology rai the immediate lakshya of samajhnaa individuals or groups by dono establishing saamaanya siddhanth or researching specific cases, and by many khate it ultimately aims to laabh samaaj.
in is field, a peshewar or researcher is called a psychologist or can be vargeekrut as a soshal, behavioral, or sangyanatmak vaigyanik.
psychologists attempt to samajhe the bhoomika of dimagi krityon in vyaktigat or soshal bartaav, while bhi exploring the physiological or neurobiological processes ki underlie certain cognitive krityon or vyavhaar.
psychologists explore concepts aise as bodh, sangyaan, dhyaan, jajbaat, phenomenology, prerana, brain functioning, vyaktitv, bartaav, or interpersonal sambandh.
psychologists of vividh dhaariyaan bhi consider the behosh dimag.
psychologists employ anubhavjanya vidhi to infer causal or correlational relationships between psychosocial variables.
in addition, or in vipaksh, to employing anubhavjanya or nigamanaatmak methods, some—especially naidanik or counseling psychologists—at times rely upon symbolic nirvachan or other aagamanaatmak takneekon.
Psychology rai maharoom described as a `` hub vigyaan '', with manovaigyanik nishkarshon linking to shodh or perspectives from the social sciences, natural sciences, ayurvigyaan, or the maanavtaa, such as darshanashastra.
jabaki manovaigyanik gyaan is often lagu to the moolyankan or upachaar of mental health problems, it is bhi directed towards samajhnaa or solving problems in anek different spheres of insaan activity.
The majority of psychologists hai involved in kuch kind of therapeutic bhoomika, practicing in naidanik, counseling, or skool settings.
Many do scientific shodh on a chaudee dayera of topics sambandhit to mental prakriyaaon or behavior, and typically kaary in vishvavidhyalayon manovigyaan vibhaag or sikhaa in other academik jamaavat ( e.g., medical schools, hospitals ).
Some hai employed in audyogic or organizational settings, or in other areas aise as human vikaas or vriddhavastha, sports, swasthya, or the media, as khub as in forensic chaanbin or anya aspects of vidhi.
Thomas jeffrasan ( april 13, 1743 ( april 2, 1743 o.S. ) – July 4, 1826 ) was an American Founding Father, the principal lekhak of the ghoshnaa of swatantraaa ( 1776 ) or the teesraa adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya ( 1801–1809 ).
at the shuruuaat of the amareeki kranti, he served in the mahadwipiya Congress, representing Virginia or tab served as a wartime rajyapal of Virginia ( 1779–1781 ).
bas baad the yuddh ended, isse mid-1784 jeffrasan parosa as a rajanyik, stationed in Paris.
in may 1785, he became the sanyukt States mantri to frans.
jeffrasan thi the pehla United rajya sachiv of rajya ( 1790–1793 ) sevarat antargat adhyaksh george washington.
saath uske band friend james Madison he vyavasthit the democratic-republican party, or subsequently resigned isse washington 's cabinet.
nirvaachit vaais adhyaksh in 1796, when he came in second to jon adams of the Federalists, jeffrasan opposed adams and with medisson secretly wrote the Kentucky or virginia rizolution, which attempted to nullify the alian and Sedition adhiniyamon.
Elected adhyaksh in kayaa Jefferson called the kranti of 1800, he oversaw the khariden of the vishaal louisiana territory isse frans ( 1803 ), or bheja the louis or clark expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the nai west.
uske second pad thi ghira with pareshaaniyon at ghar, aise as the vifal deshadroh vichaaran of his purv vaais adhyaksh aaron burr.
With escalating trubal saath britain who was chunauteepurn amareeki neutrality or threatening shipping at samudr, he aajamaaya economic warfare saath uske embargo kanoon jisase tabhi kshatigrast amareeki vyapaar.
In 1803, adhyaksh Jefferson initiated a prakram of bhartiya tribal hataanaa or relocation to the Louisiana territory west of the Mississippi nadi, in anukram to open lands liye eventual amareeki settlers.
a netaa in the atmagyaan, jeffrasan thi a bahushrut who spoke five languages dhadlle and thi deeply dilchaspee in vigyaan, avishkaar, vaastukala, dharm or darshanashastra, interests ki led him to the founding of the vishvavidhyalayon of virginia baad uske presidency.
he designed uske apana large mansion on a 5,000 acre plantation near charlottesville, virginia, jisase he named monticello.
jabaki nahin a notable orator, jeffrasan was a skilled writer or corresponded saath anek influential logon in america or Europe throughout uske vayask jivan.
haalanki jeffrasan owned anek slave, he opposed the sanstha sab uske jivan or natijatan treated or took parvaah of them very khub or apekshit unhen to kaary no more than free kisaano.
chunki 1802 historians and anya have been vibhajit over the vivaad of whether jeffrasan thi the father of ek or more children belonging to Sally hemings, a slave at monticello. ''
itihaaskaaron are also in asahmati saath kaisaa much jeffrasan thi vachanabaddh to the anti-slavery cause.
In 1807, adhyaksh jeffrasan signed into vidhi a bill ki bain the importation of slaves into the United States.
baad martha jeffrasan, his bivi of eleven saalo, died in 1782, jeffrasan remained a vidhur liye the baaki of uske jivan ; unke vivaah utpaadit chah children, of jisko do batch to adulthood.
haalanki jeffrasan rai maharoom criticized by anek aadhunik din scholars over the samasya of gulaami, he remains rated as one of the greatest u.S. raashtrapatiyon.
`` Sun nagar '' is a 1985 virodh song likhaa by steven vine Zandt, utpaadit by vine zandt and arthur baker or ankit by Artists United Against rangabhed to convey opposition to the dakshin African niti of rangabhed.
The praathmik arthath of ki opposition is to ghoshit that all the kalakaaron involved would refuse koi and sab offers to perform at surya City, a resort which was located in bantustan of Bophuthatswana, ek of a kramank of internationally aparichit supposed `` independent '' rajya nirmit by the dakshin africa government to forcibly relocate iske blike janasankhyikee.

the neshnal Basketball sangh ( enbie ) is a pramukh professional basket league in uttar america.
it thi founded in 1946 as the basket sangh of America ( baa ).
The league apanaaya iske vartmaan naam at the prarambh of the when it merged saath the neshnal basket League ( nbl ).
The NBA Finals is the championships series for the enbie or the nishkarsh of the khel 's postseason.
the winning team of the series receives the laire o'brien Championship Trophy.
khilaadi isse the winning toli praayah praapt championships bajati isse the team honoring unke contribution.
however, in some rare occasion, the tiimon opted to gave anya commemorative vasteen, aise as kalai ghadiyaan, instead of bajati.
the kramank of championships jiti by enbie superstar is praayah prayukt as a measurement of unke vishalata.
Boston Celtics center vidheyak Russell holds the record liye the sabase NBA championships jiti with 11 titles during uske 13-year playing kariyar.
he jiti uske first championships saath the boston Celtics in uske rukii saal.
afterwards, he gai on to jeet 10 championships in the aglaa 12 years, sahit aath lagaataar championships isse 1959 to 1966.

chaar Celtics khilaadi, tom Heinsohn, K. C. jones, satch sanders or jon havlicek, won eight championships prayek.
do anya celtics, gym loscutoff or frank raimase, won saat championships prayek.
Four players, Bob cousy, kareem abdul-jabbar, maaikel Jordan or scottie pippen, won chah championships each.
Jordan or Pippen hai sadasyon of the Chicago bulls toli jo jiti teen lagaataar championships twice in the 1990s.
robert horry or jon salley hai the tabhi khilaadi to have jiti the championships saath teen different tiimon.

frank shaul or Steve Kerr are the only khilaadi to jeet do championships saath do alag tiimon in lagaataar sizan.
shaul jiti lagaataar championships saath the Rochester Royals or the miniapolis lekars in the 1950s, jabaki ker won consecutive championships saath the bulls and the spers in the 1990s,
sateekta indicates nikatataa of maapan parinaam to the true maan, parishuddhta to the repeatability, or reproducibility of the maapan
in the field of vigyaan, abhiyantriki, udyog, or aankde, the accuracy of a measurement system is the oopaadhi of nikatataa of maap of a maatra to ki quantity 's vaastavik ( sachcha ) maan.
The parishuddhta of a maapan pranali, bhi called reproducibility or repeatability, is the oopaadhi to jisase doharaaya maap antargat aparivartit sharten dikhaaen the vahi results.
Although the two shabd reproducibility or repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial upyog, ve hai deliberately contrasted in the context of the vaigyanik vidhi.
a measurement pranali can be sateek lakin not precise, precise lakin nahin sateek, neither, or both.
liye udhaaharan, if an prayog contains a systematic error, then increasing the namoona aakaar generally increases parishuddhta lakin karata nahin improve sateekta.
The parinaam hota be a consistent yet inaccurate string of parinaam isse the flawed prayog.
eliminating the systematic galati improves accuracy lakin karata nahin badalen parishuddhta.
A maapan pranali is designated maanya if it is dono sateek or precise.
sambandhit sharten shaamil bias ( non- yadrichhik or nirdeshit prabhaav caused by a factor or karkon unrelated to the swatantra parivartaneey ) or error ( random variability ).
the shabdaawalee is also lagu to apratyaksh measurements—that is, values praapt by a computesnal kaarividhi isse observed aankada.
in addition to sateekta and precision, measurements may bhi have a maapan rezolution, jisase is the smallest badalen in the underlying shaareerik maatra ki produces a jawaab in the maapan.
in the maamla of full reproducibility, aise as when rounding a kramank to a representable floating point kramank, the shabd parishuddhta rai a meaning nahin sambandhit to reproducibility.
liye udhaaharan, in the iiqui 754-2008 maanak it arthath the kramank of bits in the significand, so it is prayukt as a maap liye the relative accuracy with jisase an manamaani kramank can be represented.
Fuck in iske shabdic arth refers to the adhinium of yon intercourse.
it is an angrezi shabd ki is praayah prayukt as a profanity, either to denote tiraskaar or as an intensifier.
the utpatti of the shabd is obscure.
It is praayah considered to be pehla attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably puraani.
In aadhunik usage, bakawaas or iske derevative ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be prayukt in the sthiti of a sangya, a verb, an adjective or an kriyavisheshan.
There hai many aam phrases jisase make upyog of the shabd, as khub as a kramank of compounds incorporating it, aise as motherfucker.
anemated, color-coded map prardashit the vibhinn mahadwipon or regions.
depending on the convention or model, kuch mahadwipon may be consolidated or subdivided : liye example, uresia is sabase praayah subdivided into europea or Asia ( red shades ), jabaki North and dakshin america are sometimes pahachaanaa as ek amareeki mahadweep ( green shades ).
a continent is one of anek very vishaal landmasses on dharti.
ve hai generally pahachaanaa by sammelan balki than koi strict maapdand, saath up to saat regions commonly regarded as continents—they hai ( isse largest in size to smallest ) : asia, Africa, uttar america, dakshin america, Antarctica, Europe, and australia.
in bhuvigyaan, mahadwipon are varnit by arthath of tectonic platon.
thali vivartaniki is the prakram or study of the gati, takkar or division of continents, pehle known as continental bahaav.

jatiyaan property is a vaivaahik property regime ki originated in civil vidhi jurisdictions or is abhi also found in kuch aam law jurisdictions.
the rajya of the sanyukt rajya that recognize jatiyaan property hai primarily in the west ; it thi inherited from mexico 's ganancial jatiyaan pranali, jisase itself thi inherited isse Spanish law ( a roman -derived civil vidhi system ) or ultimately isse the visigoths.
jabaki antargat spani rule louisiana apanaaya the ganancial jatiyaan pranali of acquests or gains, which replaced the paramparaagat french jatiyaan of movables or acquests in its civil law pranali.
map of the sanyukt States with jatiyaan property states highlighted in red.
in jod to the highlighted states, alaska is a pruthak property rajya ki permits couples to opt into a community property arrangement.
In a jatiyaan property kshetradhikaar, sabase property acquired dauraan the vivaah ( magar for uphaar or inheritances ) —the jatiyaan, or communio bonorum—is swaamitv jointly by dono spouses or is divided upon divorce, annulment or maut.
sanyukt swaamitv is automatically presumed by vidhi in the anupasthiti of vishisht evidence ki hota point to a contrary conclusion liye a particular tukdaa of property.
Division of community property may lo place by item, by splitting sab vasteen or by maan.
in kuch jurisdictions, aise as California, a 50/50 prabhag of jatiyaan property is strictly mandated by statute, meaning ki the fokas tab shift to whether particular items hai to be classified as community or pruthak property.
in other jurisdictions, such as texas, a talaak adaalat may decri an `` equitable vitaran `` of community property, which may parinaam in an gairbarabari prabhag of aise.
in non-community property states property may be vibhajit by nishpaksh vitaran.
Generally bolnaa, the property that each sangi brings into the vivaah or receives by tohfa, bequest or makkaari dauraan vivaah is called separate property ( i.e., nahin jatiyaan property ).
See prabhag of property.
prabhag of jatiyaan debts may not be the same as prabhag of community property.
liye udhaaharan, in california, community property is jaruri to be vibhajit `` equally '' jabaki community karz is jaruri to be vibhajit `` equitably ''.
Property ki is swaamitv by one spouse before the vivaah is the pruthak property of that spouse, jabatak the property is `` transmuted '' into jatiyaan property.
The rules liye this vary isse kshetradhikaar to kshetradhikaar.

a haath ( maid. / lat. : manus, pl. manūs ) is a prehensile, multi- fingered extremity stith at the end of an bhujaa or forelimb of primates or insaano, chimpanzees, bandaron, or lemurs.
A few anya vertebrates aise as the koala ( jisase rai do opposable thumbs on each `` haath '' or fingerprint remarkably similar to human fingerprint ) hai praayah described as having either `` hands '' or `` panje '' on their saamne limbs.
hands hai the main structures for physically manipulating the environment, prayukt for dono gross motor kaushal ( aise as grasping a large object ) or thik motor kaushal ( such as picking up a choti pebble ).
the ungaliyon contain kuch of the densest areas of tantrika endings on the deh, hai the richest sorce of tactile pratikriya, or have the greatest positioning kaabiliyat of the deh ; thus the sense of tach is intimately sambhddha saath hands.
jaise other yugma angon ( ankhen, feet, taange ), prayek hand is dominantly controlled by the opposing dimag golardh, so ki handedness, or the preferred haath chunaav for single-handed kriyaayein such as writing with a pencil, reflects vyaktigat brain kaamkaaj.
kuch evolutionary anatomists use the term hand to refer to the appendage of ank on the forelimb adhik generally — for udhaaharan, in the context of whether the teen digits of the bird haath shaamil the vahi samajaat loss of two ank as in the dinosaur haath.
the insaan haath rai 27 haddiyon, nahin including the sesamoid bones jisase number varies between people.
14 of jisase are the phalanges ( proximal, intermediat or distal ) of the ungliyaan.
the metacarpals hai the haddiyon ki connects the ungliyaan or the kalai.
prayek insaan haath has 5 metacarpals or 8 carpal haddiyon.
Too kool thi a peshewar wrestling tag toli or former gut most notably kriyasheel in sansar kushti federation/entertainment between 1998 or 2001 and liye a short samay in 2004.
moulik digital sachetak clock bagaiyr a radio.
the mark in the top-left of the pradarshak indicates ki the time is 4:00pm, nahin 4:00am.
A 1969 radio sachetak clock ( soni Digimatic 8fc-59w ) saath an jaldi mechanical-digital pradarshak.
A digital clock is a type of clock that pradarshak the time digitally, i.e. in numerals or anya pratikon, as opposed to an analog clock, jahaan the samay is indicated by the sthitiyaan of rotating hands.
digital ghadiyaan are often sambhddha saath electronic drives, lakin the `` digital '' description refers tabhi to the display, not to the drive yantriki.
( Both analog and digital clocks can be chalit either mechanically or electronically, but `` ghatiyantra '' mechanisms with digital pradarshak are rare. )
the biggest digital clock is the Lichtzeitpegel ( `` lite samay str '' ) on the television minar rheinturm düsseldorf, germany.

the paanch set of the falak khel ekadhikaar chitrit yahan dikhaaen the evolution of the game 's kalakriti or designs in the sanyukt rajya isse 1935–2005.
the history of the falak khel ekadhikaar can be traced back to the jaldi 20th sadi.
the earliest known dizine thi by the amareeki, elizabeth magie, patented in 1904 lakin maujuuda as early as 1902.
Magie 's original intent was to prakashit a falak khel to illustrate an aarthik principle, namely the georgist avadharana of a single land maan tax.
a shrenee of falak khel yahood viksit isse 1906 through the 1930s ki shaamil the kharide or selling of jameen and the vikaas of ki jameen.
By 1934, a falak khel tha been nirmit much like the sanskaran of Monopoly bechi by Parker bhaaiyo or its sambandhit companiyaan through the rest of the 20th sadi, and into the 21st.
anek logon, zyaadaatar in the midwestern United rajya or nikat the east Coast, contributed to the khel 's design or evolution.
by the 1970s, the vichaar that the game had maharoom created solely by Charles Darrow tha become popular loakgeet ; it thi printed in the game 's nirdesh liye many years, in a 1974 kitaab devoted to ekadhikaar, and thi cited in a general book parichay toys bhi as recently as 2007.
bhi a maargdarshika to parivaar khel prakashit liye reader 's diguest in 2003 tabhi diya credit to darrow or elizabeth Magie, erroneously stating ki magie 's asli khel was nirmit in the 1800s, or nahin acknowledging koi of the khel 's vikaas between Magie 's sristi of the khel, or the eventual prakaashan by parker bhaaiyo.
Also in the 1970s, praadhyaapak ralph anspach, jo tha khud published a falak khel intended to illustrate the principles of both monopolies or vishwaas busting, ladaa Parker bhaaiyo or iske then janak company, saamaanya milon, over the trademarks of the Monopoly board khel.
Through the research of Anspach or anya, much of the jaldi itihaas of the khel thi `` rediscovered ''.
anspach confronted maxine brady, lekhak of the 1974 kitaab The Monopoly kitaab : Strategy or tactics of the World 's Most lokapriy khel over the vaastavik itihaas of the khel on bairi farber 's New york City baat dikhaaen in 1975.
kuki of the lengthy adaalat prakram, including appeals, the vidhik status of parker Brothers ' trademarks on the game thi nahin settled jabatak 1985.
the khel 's name remains a panjikrut trademark of parker bhaaiyo, as do iske vishisht dizine tatv.
at the nishkarsh of the adaalat maamla, the game 's logo or graphic dizine elements became bhaag of a larger ekadhikaar brands, licensed by Parker bhaaiyo ' janak companiyaan onto a kismein of vasteen through the upasthit din.
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board khel 's early itihaas in the 1970s or 1980s, or anek kitabe or jarnal aalekh on the subject, hasbro ( Parker Brothers ' vartmaan janak company ) did not acknowledge koi of the khel 's itihaas pehle charles darrow on iske aadhikarik Monopoly jalsthal as recently as june 2012.
Nor did hasbro acknowledge anyone anya than darrow in materials prakashit or pryojit by unhen, at least as recently as 2006.
International tournaments, first yojit in the jaldi 1970s, continue to the present, saath the aglaa world championships likely anusuchit for 2013.
starting in 1985, a nai peedhee of spin-off board khel and card khel appeared on dono pahalu of the atlantic samandar.
in 1989, the first of anek video khel and computer khel editions thi prakashit.
Since 1994, anek aadhikarik visangatiyaan of the khel, aadhaarit on sthitiyaan other than atlantic City, nai jersey ( the aadhikarik u.S. setting ) or London ( the official rashtramandal setting, excepting canada ), have been prakashit by hasbro or iske licensees.
in 2008, hasbro permanently badla the rang yojana or kuch of the gameplay of the maanak u.s. sanskaran of the khel to match the uk Edition, although the u.S. standard sanskaran maintains the Atlantic nagar property names.
Hasbro also parivardhit the aadhikarik logo to give the `` mr. ekadhikaar '' akshar a 3-d computer-generated dekh, which rai since maharoom apanaaya by licensees usaopoly, jeetna chaalen or Winning samaadhaan.
or hasbro rai also maharoom sahit the Speed Die, introduced in 2006 's ekadhikaar : the aachman sanskaran by jeetna Moves khel, in versions utpaadit sidhe by hasbro ( such as the 2009 championships Edition ).
in baseball, a balidaan fly is a batted ball ki satisfies chaar criteria:
vahin hai kam than two outs jab the ball is hit.
the ball is hit to the outfield ( mela or beyimaani ), or to infield beyimaani territory.
the batter is put out kuki an outfielder ( or an infielder kaaryshil in the outfield, or beyimaani territory ) catches the ball on the makkhi ( alternatively if the batter would have maharoom out if not for an galati or if the outfielder boonden the ball and another dhaavak is put out ).
A dhaavak who is already on aadhaar scores on the khel.
it is pukaara a `` sacrifice '' makkhi kuki the batter presumably intends to kaaran a teammate to score a run, jabaki sacrificing uske apana ability to do so.
Minnesota ( ) is a u.S. rajya located in the midwestern sanyukt rajya.
Minnesota thi carved out of the eastern half of the minesota territory or admitted to the Union as the 32nd state on May 11, 1858.
gyaat as the `` jameen of 10,000 jhiilon '', the rajya 's name comes isse a dakota shabd liye `` sky-tinted jal ''.
Those waters, saath saath forests, parks, or wilderness kshetron, prastaav nivaasiyon and tourists a kismein of outdoor recreational opportunities.
minesota is the 12th sabase extensive and the 21st sabase populous of the U.S. rajya.
nearly 60 % of iske residents sajiv in the Minneapolis–Saint paul mahanagar area ( gyaat as the `` judwa shaharon '' ), the center of parivahan, kaarobaar, udyog, education, government and ghar to an internationally known kala jatiyaan.
the shesh of the rajya consists of western prairies now die over to intensive krishi ; deciduous wanon in the southeast, now saaf, farmed and settled ; or the less populated uttar woods, prayukt liye khanan, forestry, or manoranjan.
minesota is gyaat liye iske relatively mishrit soshal or rajnatik orientations, and rai a high rate of civic bhagidaari or voter turnout.
minesota baandhane among the healthiest states, and has a atyadhik sakshar janasankhyikee.
the vishaal bahumat of nivaasiyon are of scandinavian and germany descent.
the rajya is gyaat as a bich of scandinavian amareeki samskruti.
jaateey diversity rai increased in haal dashakon.
substantial influxes of asian, African, or latin amareeki apravasiyon have joined the vanshajon of europea settlers and the original deshi amareeki nivaasiyon.
Grants hai non-repayable funds by one party ( grant makers ), often a government vibhaag, corporation, nyaas or vishwaas, to a, often ( but not always ) a nonprofit entity, shaikshanik sanstha, kaarobaar or an vyaktigat.
in anukram to praapt a grant, kuch form of `` Grant likhane '' praayah referred to as either a prastaav or an application is usually jaruri.
sabase anudaan hai made to nidhi a specific project and aavashyaktaa some str of anupaalan or reporting.
The grant likhane process involves an aavedak submitting a prastaav ( or sabamishan ) to a sambhavit funder, either on the applicant 's own initiative or in jawaab to a Request for Proposal isse the funder.
anya anudaan can be die to individuals, aise as victims of prakritik aapadaaon or individuals who talash to kholen a small kaarobaar.
sometimes grant makers aavashyaktaa grant zaruratmandon to have some rup of tax-exempt aukaat, be a panjikrut nonprofit organization or a local sarkari.
liye udhaaharan, tiered funding liye a frive hai bahut vishaal anudaan negotiated at government niti str.
however smaller grants may be provided by a sarkari agency ( e.g. nagarpalika sarkari ).
project-related funding involving sarkarein, business, communities, and individuals is often arranged by anuprayog either in likhane or online.
naturally occurring cobalt ( Co ) is rachit of 1 stable samasthanik, 59co. 28 radioisotopes have maharoom characterized with the sabase stable hone 60co saath a half-life of 5.2714 saalo, 57Co saath a half-life of 271.79 dinon, 56co saath a half-life of 77.27 dinon, or 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 dinon.
All of the baaki radioactive isotopes have half-lives ki hai kam than 18 ghanton or the bahumat of ye have half-lives ki hai kam than 1 duusari.
is tatv also rai 11 meta rajya, sab of jisase have half-lives kam than 15 minutes.
the isotopes of cobalt dayera in atomic vazan isse 47co to 75co.
The primary decay mode liye isotopes saath parmaanu dravyaman ikai maan kam than that of the sabase abundant stable isotope, 59Co, is electron capture or the praathmik vidhi of kshay liye those of greater than 59 parmaanu mass units is beta kshay.
the praathmik decay utpaada pehle 59Co hai aayran isotopes or the praathmik utpaada after hai nikal isotopes.

An adbhut Way to Deal saath badalen in Your kaary or in apana jivan, prakashit in 1998, is a prerak book by spencer johnson likhaa in the style of a parable or kaarobaar fable.
it describes badalen in ek 's kaary or jivan, and chaar theth pratikriyaayein to kaha change by do chuuhe or do `` littlepeople '', dauraan their hunt liye cheez.
A New york times business bestceller chunki relies, jo sthanantarit My cheez ?
remained on the list for almost five years or kharch over 200 saptaah on prakaashak saptahik 's sajild nonfiction suchi.
it rai bechi adhik than 26 lakh nakal worldwide in 37 bhashaaen or remains to be ek of the best-selling kaarobaar books.
nikita Sergeyevich khrushchev ( – sitambar 11, 1971 ) led the soviet sangh dauraan part of the Cold yuddh.
he parosa as First sachiv of the communist party of the Soviet sangh isse 1953 to 1964, and as adhyaksh of the parishad of mantriyon, or premier, isse 1958 to 1964.
khrushchev was jimmedaar liye the partial de-stalinization of the Soviet Union, liye backing the pragati of the jaldi soviet space kaarykram, or for several relatively udaar reforms in areas of gharelu niti.
Khrushchev 's party sahyogiyon removed use isse power in 1964, replacing use with leonid brezhnev as pehla Secretary or alexi Kosygin as premier.
khrushchev thi born in the Russian village of kalinovka in 1894, close to the present-day border between Russia and yukt.
he thi employed as a metalworker in uske yuvavastha, and dauraan the Russian civil yuddh was a rajnatik commissar.
With the sahaayta of Lazar kaganovich, he worked uske way up the soviet padanukram.
he supported joseph stallin 's purges, or sweekrut hazaron of rakhwale.
In 1939, stallin sent use to govern yukt, or he jari the purges vahin.
During kayaa thi known in the Soviet sangh as the Great patriotic yuddh ( purvi saamne of sansar War ii ), khrushchev thi again a commissar, serving as an intermediary between stallin or uske senapatiyon.
khrushchev was upasthit at the khooni raksha of stalingrad, a fact he took great abhimaan in throughout uske jivan.
baad the war, he returned to yukt pehle hone recalled to Moscow as one of stallin 's band advisers.
in the power sangharsh triggered by stallin 's maut in 1953, khrushchev, baad anek years, emerged vijayi.
on farvari 25, 1956, at the 20th party congress, he vitarit the `` Secret vaak, '' denouncing stallin 's purges or ushering in a kam repressive era in the soviet Union.
uske domestic nitiyon, aimed at bettering the jeevandaan of ordinary citizens, yahood praayah aprabhavi, visheshkar in the kshetrafal of agriculture.
ummid eventually to rely on misile for neshnal raksha, khrushchev ordered pramukh katautee in conventional forces.
Despite the katautee, khrushchev 's rule dekhi the tensest saalo of the Cold yuddh, culminating in the cuban missile sankat.
kuch of khrushchev 's nitiyon were dekhi as erratic, visheshkar by uske ubharate virodhiyon, jo chupchaap rose in shakti and apdasth use in aktubar 1964.
He kiya nahin suffer the ghaatak bhagya of some previous losers of soviet shakti struggles, lakin thi pensioned band saath an apartment in masco and a dacha in the countryside.
uske lengthy memoirs yahood smuggled to the west or published in bhaag in 1970.
Khrushchev died in 1971 of dil beemaari.
apper jathrantra ( gi ) bleeding refers to hemorrhage in the apper jathrantra tract.
the anatomic cut-off liye upper gi bleeding is the ligament of treitz, jisase connects the chauthi portion of the duodenum to the diaphragm near the splenic flexure of the colon.
Upper GI bleeds hai considered chikitsa emergencies, and aavashyaktaa pravesh to hospital liye taatkaalik nidaan and prabandhan.
due to agrim in medications or endoscopy, apper gi hemorrhage is abhi usually treated without surgery.
sansar population estimates from 1800 to 2100, aadhaarit on un 2010 projections ( red, naarangi, green ) or us janasankhyikee beuro aitihaasik estimates ( blike ).
vaastavik ankit janasankhyikee aankade are in blue.
according to the ucchtam estimate, the world janasankhyikee may vruddhi to 16 arab by 2100 ; according to the nunatam estimate, it may manaahi to 6 billion.
the sansar population is the kul kramank of jeena insaano on Earth.
as of aaj, it is estimated to number billion by the United States Census beuro ( uscb ).
the uscb estimates that the sansar janasankhyikee exceeded 7 arab on March 12, 2012.
According to a pruthak anumaan by the sanyukt Nations Population nidhi, it pahunche is padaav on aktubar 31, 2011.
the sansar janasankhyikee rai anbhavi continuous growth chunki the samaapt of the Great akaal or the Black maut in 1350, jab it stood at around 370 lakh.
the highest daron of vikaas – vaishvik janasankhyikee increases upar 1.8 % prati saal – yahood dekhi briefly dauraan the 1950s, or liye a longer kaal dauraan the 1960s or 1970s.
the vikaas rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, or had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
kul salanaa births yahood ucchtam in the late 1980s at parichay 138 lakh, or are abhi apekshit to remain essentially nirantar at unke 2011 str of 134 lakh, jabaki mauton number 56 lakh prati saal, or are apekshit to badhayen to 80 lakh prati year by 2040.
vartmaan projections dikhaaen a jari increase in janasankhyikee in the nikat bhavishya ( lakin a steady decline in the population vikaas rate ), saath the global janasankhyikee expected to reach between 7.5 or 10.5 arab by 2050.
vibhinn longer-term estimates bhavishyavaanee further vikaas, stagnation, or bhi overall manaahi in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sthirataa of further sansar population vikaas, citing the growing pressures on the environment, global khaanaa aapurtiyan, and urja sansaadhan.

knuckle mnemonic liye the kramank of dinon in prayek maah of the gregorian panchang.
prayek projecting knuckle represents a 31-day maah.
a mnemonic (, with a mook `` m '' ), or mnemonic yantra, is koi siikhnaa takanic that aids soochna stambhan.
mnemonics aim to translate soochna into a rup that the human brain can retain behatar than its asli rup.
bhi the prakram of applying this parivartan might already sahaayta the transafar of soochna to long-term memory.
commonly encountered mnemonics hai praayah for suchiyaan or in auditory rup, aise as choti kavitaayen, acronyms, or memorable vaakyansh, lakin mnemonics can also be liye anya types of soochna or in vizual or kinesthetic form.
Their upyog is aadhaarit on the avlokan ki the insaan dimag adhik easily remembers sthanik, nijee, ascharyajanak, shaareerik, yon, humorous, or varanaa 'relatable ' information, rather than adhik abstract or impersonal form of soochna.
the word mnemonic is derived isse the pracheen Greek word μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ), arth `` of memory '' and is sambandhit to Mnemosyne ( `` samaran '' ), the naam of the devi of memory in Greek mythology.
dono of ye shabd hai niklaa from μνήμη ( mnēmē ), `` samaran, memory ''.
mnemonics in pracheenta yahood sabase often mana in the context of kayaa is today gyaat as the Art of memory.
pracheen unaniyon and romans distinguished between do prakaar of memory : the 'natural ' memory or the 'artificial ' memory.
the former is inborn, or is the one ki everyone uses automatically and without soch.
the kritrim memory in contrast rai to be prashikshit and viksit through the learning or practicing of a variety of mnemonic takneekon.
mnemonic systems are khaas takneekon or ranneeti consciously used to improve memory, it helps employ soochna already stored in long-term memory to mek memorization an easier kaary.
adhyaksh bush signing the no child baayein peeche adhinium at Hamilton h.s. in hamiltan, ohio.
the No child baayein peeche adhinium of 2001 ( nclb ) is a sanyukt rajya adhinium of Congress ki is a reauthorization of the Elementary or dwitiyak shiksha adhinium, jisase included Title i, the sarkari 's flagship aid kaarykram liye disadvantaged vidhyaarthee.
nclb supports standards-based shiksha sudhaar aadhaarit on the aadhaar ki setting unchi maanakon and establishing measurable goals can improve vyaktigat outcomes in shiksha.
the adhinium requires rajya to develop akalan in moulik skills.
States jarur give ye assessments to sab vidhyaarthee at chune grade str in order to praapt sangheey skool funding.
the Act does nahin assert a neshnal achievement maanak ; maanakon hai niyat by each vyaktigat rajya.
nclb vistaarit the sangheey bhoomika in public shiksha through salanaa testing, salanaa academik progress, report cards, teacher qualifications, or funding parivartan.
the vidheyak passed in the u.S. congress saath bipartisan support.

A pikup trek or pick-up, often bas referred to as a pikup, is a light motor gadee saath an open-top, pasch cargo kshetrafal ( bed ).
in uttar america, the pad pikup is prayukt liye lite trek saath a halkaa duty chassis or factory nirmit, integrated bed, as khub as liye coupé utility vaahanon, praayah based on a nijee car chassis, but also praayah on a special samarpit chassi liye such upyog.
kuch deshon have unke own sharten samaan to pikup, aise as ute in australia or New jiland, or bakkie in dakshin africa.
vishaal pikup trek hai somewhat viral in Europe, jahaan vine or lite lorries hai commonly prayukt for similar bhoomikaaye.
is 15th-century chithran of sharalamen and pope adrian I shows a well-bred medieval ghoda saath mehrabadar gardan, parishkrut sir or suruchipurna gait.
ghode in the madhya aayu differed in size, build or breed from the aadhunik horse, and yahood, on average, choti.
ve were bhi more central to samaaj than unke aadhunik counterparts, being anivaary for war, krishi, or hastantaran.
natijatan, specific prakaar of horse viksit, anek of jisase have no aadhunik samatuly.
jabaki an understanding of aadhunik ghoda breeds or equestrianism is vital for koi vishleshan of the madhyakaalin ghoda, shodhakartaaon bhi need to consider vruttchitr ( dono likhaa or sachitr ) and puraatatv evidence.
ghode in the Middle aayu yahood rarely differentiated by nasl, lakin balki by upyog.
is led unhen to be varnit, liye example, as `` chargers `` ( war ghode ), `` palfreys `` ( sawari horses ), cart horses or packhorses.
sandarbh is bhi given to their place of utpatti, such as `` spani horses, '' lakin whether is referred to ek breed or anek is anjaan.
another pareshaani arising dauraan koi padhai of medieval documents or literature is the lacheelaapan of the madhyakaalin bhashaaen, jahaan several shabd can be prayukt liye ek thing ( or, conversely, anek vastuen are referred to by ek word ).
shabd aise as ' courser ' and 'chargeier ' hai prayukt interchangeably ( bhi within ek dastauez ), or jahaan ek apik may bolo disparagingly of a rouncey, another gungan its skill and swiftness.
Significant technological agrim in ghudsavaar equipment, praayah introduced from anya samskritiyon, anumat liye significant parivartan in dono warfare and krishi.
In particular, improved dizin for the solid-treed saddle as khub as the aagaman of the rakaab, naal and ghoda collar yahood significant advances in madhyakaalin samaaj.
Consequently, the assumptions or theories viksit by itihaaskaaron hai nahin nirnaayak, or bahes still rages on many issues, such as the prajnan or size of the ghoda, or a kramank of strot jarur be consulted in anukram to samajhe the vishalata of the subject.

the plat concerns con man herold hill, who mudraayen as a ladakon ' band aayojak or leader or bikta band yantra and vardi to bholi townsfolk before skipping kasbaa saath the nakadi.

makhtesh Ramon, negev marusthal, israel
a marusthal is a landscape or region of jameen that is bahut shushk because of kam varsha amounts ( precipitation ), often rai choti coverage by paudhe, and in jisase streams dry up unless ve hai supplied by water isse outside kshetron.
registan can bhi be described as kshetron jahaan adhik water is khoyaa by evapotranspiration than jalprapaat as precipitation.
marusthal plants jarur have khaas adaptations to jivit saath is choti water.
Deserts generally praapt kam than 25 cm of rain ( varshan ) prayek saal.
semideserts or steppes hai regions which praapt between and.
In the köppen jalwaayu vargeekaran pranali, registan hai classed as bwh ( hot marusthal ) or bwk ( shitoshna marusthal ).
In the Thornthwaite climate vargeekaran pranali, deserts hota be vargeekrut as arid megathermal climates.
World yuddh i ( wwi ) thi a vaishvik war kendrit in Europe ki began on 28 july 1914 or lasted jabatak 11 navambar 1918.
it thi predominantly called the World yuddh or the great yuddh isse iske occurrence jabatak the start of sansar War ii in 1939, or the pehla World War or sansar War i thereafter.
it involved sab the sansar 's great shaktiyaan, jisase yahood samavet in do opposing alliances : the Allies ( aadhaarit on the Triple entente of the United kingdom, frans or rus ) and the Central Powers ( originally the tripal gathbandhan of germany, Austria-Hungary or italy ; lakin, as austria–hungary tha liya the apriy against the anubandh, italy did nahin daalen into the yuddh ).
ye alliances yahood dono reorganised or vistaarit as adhik nations daalaa the war : italy, japani or the United rajya joined the allies, and the Ottoman samrajya or bulgaria the Central shaktiyaan.
Ultimately, more than 70 lakh sainya karmiyon, sahit 60 lakh Europeans, were mobilised in ek of the largest wars in history.
adhik than 9 lakh combatants yahood maare, largely kuki of technological advancements ki led to vishaal increases in the lethality of weapons bagaiyr sambandhit sudhaar in suraksha or mobility.
it thi the fifth- deadliest virodh in sansar itihaas, subsequently paving the rasta liye various political parivartan, such as revolutions in many of the raashtra involved.
ek of the long-term causes of the yuddh thi the punarutthan of samrajyavad in the foreign nitiyon of the great shaktiyaan of europea.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz ferdinand of Austria, the vaaris to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 june 1914 by yugoslav rashtravaadi gavrilo princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic sankat jab Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
anek alliances formed over the previous dashakon yahood invoked.
bheetar saptaah, the major powers yahood at war and, via unke colonies, the virodh soon sprad around the sansar.
on 28 july, the austro-hungarians fired the pehla shots of the yuddh as taiyaari liye the akraman of Serbia.
jabaki the russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral belgium or Luxembourg on the rasta to frans, providing a casus belli liye britain 's ghoshnaa of yuddh viruddh germany.
baad the German kooch on paris was brought to a halt—the so-called chamatkaar of the marne —the Western Front settled into a sthir battle of apgharshan with a gart lakeer ki badla little jabatak 1917.
on the purvi saamne, the roosi army thi kaamyaab viruddh the Austro-Hungarians, but thi roka in iske akraman of East prussia by the germans.
in navambar the Ottoman Empire joined the war, kholane up fronts in the kakeshas, mesopotamia and the Sinai.
italy or bulgaria gai to yuddh in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
in rus, the tsar 's sarkari collapsed in kooch 1917 or a subsequent kranti in navambar brought the russians to sharten saath the central shaktiyaan.
baad a 1918 germany offensive saath the pashchimi front, the allies drove waapas the Germans in a shrenee of kaamyaab offensives and amareeki shaktiyaan began pravesh the trenches.
Germany, which had iske apana trubal saath krantikariyon, sahamat to an armistice on 11 navambar 1918.
the war ended in victory liye the Allies.
Events on the ghar fronts yahood as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the bhagidaar tried to mobilize unke janashakti and aarthik sansaadhan to lado a kul yuddh.
by the samaapt of the yuddh, chaar pramukh imperial powers—the germany, roosi, austro-hungarian or osmani empires—ceased to maujuud.
the successor rajya of the purv two khoyaa a great raashi of territory, jabaki the latter do yahood dismantled entirely.
the map of central europea thi redrawn into anek choti states.
the lig of raashtra thi formed in the aashaa of preventing another aise virodh.
the European nationalism shakhit by the yuddh and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's shikast and problems saath the sandhi of versailles hai sahamat to be factors contributing to sansar yuddh ii.
`` ladakiyon bas want to Have majaa '' is a 1979 song originally likhaa by robert Hazard or bana prasiddh by singer cyndi Lauper.
It thi the pehla pramukh single released by lauper as a solo kalakaar or the lead-off single isse her debyue album wo 's so Unusual.

drishy of defibrillator electrode sthiti or avasthiti.
defibrillation is a common upachaar liye life-threatening hriday dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of vidyut urja to the prabhavit dil saath a device pukaara a defibrillator.
is depolarizes a najuk dravyaman of the dil mansapeshi, terminates the dysrhythmia, or allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the deh 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the dil.
Defibrillators can be bahya, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the type of device prayukt or needed.
Some external ikai, known as swachaalit bahya defibrillators ( aeds ), automate the nidaan of treatable lay, meaning ki lay responders or bystanders hai samarth to upyog unhen safaltaapurvak saath choti, or in kuch maamle no prashikshan at sab.
The keto Institute is an American libertarian socho tanks headquartered in washington, d.c.
it was founded as the charles Koch nyaas in 1974 by mare Rothbard, ed kraine and charles koch, adhyaksh of the falak or mukhya karypalika officer of the sangutica koch udyog, inc..
in july 1976, the naam was changed to the keto santhaan.
According to the 2011 Global Go To Think tanks anukramanika, keto is the 6th sabase influential us aadhaarit socho tanks, ranking 3rd in aarthik niti or 2nd in soshal Policy.
the santhaan 's stated mishan is `` to increase the samajhnaa of public nitiyon aadhaarit on the siddhanth of simit sarkari, free bazaar, individual swatantraaa, and salaam.
the santhaan hoga upyog the sabase prabhavi means to originate, edwocket, prachaar, or disseminate lagu niti proposals ki banaaen free, kholen, and civil samaajon in the sanyukt States and throughout the sansar. ''
keto vidwaanon were najuk of george W. bush 's republican prashasan ( 2001–2009 ) on anek issues, sahit the Iraq yuddh, civil liberties, shiksha, krishi, urja policy, and excessive government bitaa.
on other mudde, ve samarthit bush administration initiatives, sabase notably health parvaah, Social suraksha, vaishvik varming, kar niti, or avrajan.
During the 2008 U.S. presidential chunaav, keto scholars criticized dono major-party ummidavaar, John macken or Barack Obama.
keto has criticized President obama 's stances on policy mudde since his udghaatan, such as phiscal stimulus, healthcare sudhaar, videshi niti, and the yuddh on davaayen, while supporting his stance on the repeal of do n't pucho, do n't bataanaa and udaar immigration niti.
drakula is an 1897 gothic horror anokhaa by irish lekhak bram stokar.
Famous liye introducing the akshar of the pishaach ginati drakula, the novel tells the story of drakula 's attempt to relocate isse transylvania to England, or the battle between drakula or a small group of main and mahilaon led by praadhyaapak abraham vine helsing.

Quidditch is a pratispardhi sport in the wizarding world of the Harry kumhaar brahmad, or is from the shrenee of children 's novels and filmon.
it is an atyadhik ashisht lakin bahut lokapriy semi-contact sport, nibhaai by wizards or witches.
milan are nibhaai between do tiimon of saat khilaadi sawari flying broomsticks, using chaar genden or chah elevated ring-shaped lakshya, three on prayek paksh of the Quidditch pich ( field ).
