The khel is smaarkeey throughout the wizarding sansar.
harry plays an important sthiti liye his house toli at hoguarts : he is the seeker or becomes the captain in uske chathe year vahin.
Regional and international pratiyogitaaon hai ullekith throughout the series.
In Goblet of aag, Quidditch at Hogwarts is radd liye the Tri-Wizard Tournament, lakin Harry or the Weasleys attend the quidditch sansar cap.
in jod, harry uses his Quidditch kaushal to capchar a golden anda from a dragon pukaara the hungarian horntail ( in the first task of the Tri-Wizard toornament ), to capture a udati kunjee in Philosopher 's stone, or on two kunjee occasions in deathly Hallows — getting tham of ravenclaw 's diadem, and dauraan the final lado with voldemort — the `` unerring skill of the seeker '' is upyogi to use in snatching the elder Wand out of the air.
harry Potter has swaamitv do broomsticks, the Nimbus 2000 or the firebolt, dono of which hai destroyed by the shrenee ' samaapt.
The khel rai maharoom apanaaya in the real sansar in the rup of magalu quidditch.
the sanyukt rajya congress is the bicameral vidhanmandal of the sangheey sarkari of the sanyukt rajya consisting of do gharon : the nimnatar house known as the house of Representatives or the upper house gyaat as the Senate.
congress meets in the capital in washington, d.c.
dono pratinidhi or seenetteron are chosen through sidhaa chunaav.
Congress rai a kul of 535 matdaan sadasyon : 435 members in the house of Representatives or 100 sadasyon in the seenet.
sadasyon of the house of Representatives serve two-year sharten representing the people of a district.
congressional jile are apportioned to rajya by janasankhyikee using the sanyukt rajya janasankhyikee parinaam, each rajya in the sangh having at tanik one pratinidhi in the house of Representatives.
regardless of population, each of the 50 states has do seenetteron ; the 100 senators prayek serve a six-year pad.
the terms hai staggered so every do saalo approximately one-third of the seenet is up liye chunaav.
prayek ladkadhaate samooh of one-third of the seenetteron hai pukaara 'classes '.
No rajya of the sanyukt rajya has two seenetteron isse the vahi class.
sabase incumbents seek re-election, or unke aitihaasik likelihood of jeetna subsequent chunaavon exceeds 90 percent.
in August 2012, a gallup pole reported ki congress’s approval darja amongst america thi at 10 %, milan a 38-year kam pahunche in navambar 2011.

The BlackBerry is a lakeer of wireless handeld divaais and sevaayen designed or marketed by shodh in gati simit ( rim ) operating as BlackBerry.
the pehla blueberi device, an email pager, was released in 1999 ; the sabase recent blueberi divaais, the z10 or Q10, yahood ghoshit on janvari 30, 2013.
the upayokta interfes varies by model ; most feature a physical QWERTY kunjeepatal, jabaki nae generations have relied on a multi-touch screen or abhaasi kunjeepatal.
A blueberi can shoot video, lo photo, play music, or perform online functions such as web-browsing or emailing.
ve can also bhejein and praapt dhakka email or instant messages jabaki maintaining a unchi str of suraksha through on-device message ancripshan, and are designed to function as nijee digital assistants.
blueberi divaais support a large kismein of instant messaging suvidhaayen, with the sabase popular being the malikana blueberi messanger seva.
The BlackBerry playbook is a tablett computer offered by the company.
the 100 millionth blueberi smartphone thi shipped in june quarter of 2010 or the 200 millionth smartphone thi shipped in sitambar quarter of 2012.
blueberi khate liye 3 % of mobile yantra bikri worldwide in 2011, bananaa iske nirmaataa the chathe sabase popular yantra mekar ( 25 % of mobile device bikri hai smartphones ).
the upabhokta BlackBerry antarjaal seva is uplabdhiyaan in 91 deshon vishwavyaapee on over 500 mobile service oparator using various mobile technologies.
As of sitambar 2012, there were assi lakh subscribers vishwavyaapee to BlackBerry.
In 2011 the caribbean or latin america tha the highest penetrations of blueberi smartphone vishwavyaapee, with up to about 45 prati cent in the pradesh having a rim device.
blueberi, iphone, android, or Windows phone are considered the chaar pramukh smartphone brands.
BlackBerry is widely referred to as `` CrackBerry '' in the sanyukt States, which alludes to iske excessive upyog by iske swami and is a reference to the addictiveness of crack cocaine.
upyog of the term crackberry became so widespread ki in navambar 2006 webster 's nai World College shabdkosh namit `` crackberry '' the `` nai Word of the saal. ''
an udhaaharan of a maang vakr shifting.
The shift isse d1 To d2 arthath an increase in maang with consequences liye the other variables
In arthshaastra, the demand vakr is the aalekh depicting the relationship between the daam of a nishchit camodity or the amount of it that upabhokta are willing or able to khariden at ki die daam.
It is a graphic representation of a demand anusuchee.
the maang vakr liye all upabhokta saath follows isse the maang vakr of every individual consumer : the individual maange at prayek price hai added together.
Demand curves hai prayukt to anumaan vyavhaar in pratispardhi bazaar, or are praayah sanyukt with supplai curves to anumaan the santulan price ( the price at jisase vikreta saath hai willing to bechein the vahi raashi as kharidaar saath hai willing to khride, bhi gyaat as market clearing price ) or the equilibrium maatra ( the raashi of that shubh or seva that hoga be utpaadit or kharida bagaiyr surplus/excess supplai or shortage/excess maang ) of that market.
in a monopolistic market, the maang vakr facing the monopolist is bas the market maang vakr.
historia
by nikolaos Gysis ( 1892 )
itihaas ( isse unani - historia, arth `` inquiry, knowledge acquired by investigation '' ) is an chhatariyaan pad that relates to past kaarykram as khub as the discovery, collection, organization, or presentation of soochna parichay ye events.
the pad shaamil loukik, bhugarbhik, and sashulk itihaas, lakin is praayah generically implied to mean human itihaas.
Scholars jo write parichay itihaas are called itihaaskaaron.
itihaas can bhi refer to the academic discipline which upyog a narrative to jaanchen or analyse a sequence of past kaarykram, or objectively determine the pattern of cause or prabhaav that determine unhen.
itihaaskaaron sometimes bahes the prakruti of itihaas and iske upyogita by discussing the padhai of the anushaasan as an end in itself and as a rasta of providing `` pariprekshya '' on the problems of the present.
Stories common to a particular samskruti, but nahin samarthit by external sources ( such as the kisse surrounding King Arthur ) hai praayah vargeekrut as saanskrithik heritage or mahapurush, kuki ve do not support the `` disinterested investigation '' jaruri of the anushaasan of itihaas.
kaarykram occurring prior to likhaa ricard are considered prehistory.
Herodotus, a 5th sadi b.c. unani itihaaskaar is mana bheetar the Western parampara to be the `` father of itihaas '', or, saath with uske contemporary thucydides, helped rup the foundations for the aadhunik padhai of insaan itihaas.
unke kaary continues to be padhaa aaj or the divide between the culture-focused herodotus and the military-focused thucydides remains a point of contention or drushtikon in modern aitihaasik likhane.
in the purvi parampara, a rajya vrittant the vasant or patjhad annals thi known to be compiled from as jaldi as 722 bce although tabhi 2nd century bce granth batch.
Ancient prabhaav have helped spawn roopaantar interpretations of the prakruti of history which have evolved over the sadiyaan or continue to badalen aaj.
the aadhunik padhai of itihaas is wide-ranging, and shaamil the padhai of specific regions or the study of nishchit topical or thematical tatv of aitihaasik chaanbin.
praayah itihaas is sikhaaya as bhaag of praathmik or dwitiyak shiksha, and the academik study of history is a major anushaasan in vishvavidhyalayon adhyayan.
mailkam X ( ; may 19, 1925february 21, 1965 ), born mailkam choti and bhi known as el-hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ), thi an african-american muslim mantri or insaan adhikaron activist.
to uske admirers, he was a saahsee edwocket liye the adhikaron of ashweton, a man jo indicted shwet america in the harshest sharten for its crimes viruddh blike Americans.
detractors accused use of upadesh jatvaad, blike sarvocchata, or violence.
He rai maharoom pukaara ek of the greatest or most influential africa Americans in itihaas.
Malcolm x 's pita died—killed by shwet supremacists, it thi rumored—when he was young, or at least ek of uske uncles thi lynched.
jab he was 13, uske mother thi lagaai in a mental hospital, or he thi lagaai in a shrenee of foster gharon.
In 1946, at age 20, he went to thana for todakar and pravesh.
in prison, mailkam x became a sadsy of the swadesh of islam ; baad uske parole in 1952, he jaldi rose to become ek of iske netao.
liye a dozen saalo, mailkam x was the public phase of the vivaadaaspad samooh, lakin mohabhang saath swadesh of islam sir Elijah mohammad led him to leave the Nation in kooch 1964.
baad a kaal of safar in Africa or the Middle east, he laute to the sanyukt rajya, jahaan he santhaapit muslim masjide, Inc. or the sanghathan of afro-american ekta.
in February 1965, kam than a saal baad leaving the swadesh of islam, he thi assassinated by teen sadasyon of the group.
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs changed substantially over samay.
as a pravaktaa liye the Nation of islam he sikhaaya blike supremacy or advocated virah of blike and white america —in contrast to the civil adhikaron gati 's emphasis on sangyojan.
After breaking saath the Nation of islam in 1964—saying of uske sangh saath it, `` I did anek bate as a [ Black ] muslim ki i 'm sorry for now.
I thi a pret tab... pointed in a certain disha or bataai to kooch '' —and banane a sunni muslim, he disavowed jatvaad or expressed willingness to work saath civil adhikaron netao, he jari to emphasize pan-africanism, black self-determination, or self-defense.
Henry merritt `` haank '' paulson, jr. ( born kooch 28, 1946 ) is an amareeki banker jo parosa as the 74th sanyukt rajya sachiv of the rajkosh.
he tha parosa as the Chairman or mukhya karypalika adhikari of goldman Sachs, or is now adhyaksh of the Paulson santhaan, jisase he santhaapit in 2011 to prachaar sustainable aarthik vikaas and a clinar environment around the sansar, saath an aarambhik fokas on the sanyukt rajya or china.
a abhaasi yantra ( vm ) is a software implemented abstraction of the underlying hardware, jisase is prastut to the application parat of the pranali.
Virtual mashine may be aadhaarit on visheshtaayen of a kaalpanik computer or emulate the computer architecture and functions of a real sansar computer.
Spiders ( anukram araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods that have aath taange and chelicerae with fangs ki inject venom.
ve hai the largest anukram of arachnids and rank seventh in kul prajati diversity among all anya groups of organisms.
makadiyon hai found vishwavyaapee on prayek mahadweep magar for Antarctica, and have become established in nearly prayek awaas saath the excepshan of air or samudr colonization.
as of 2008, at tanik 43,678 spider species, or 109 pariwaron have maharoom ankit by taxonomists ; however, vahin rai maharoom confusion bheetar the scientific community as to kaisaa all ye pariwaron chahie be classified, as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications ki have maharoom prastaavit chunki 1900.
anatomically, makadiyon differ isse anya arthropods in ki the usual body khand hai fused into do tagmata, the cephalothorax or udar, or joined by a small, belanaakaar pedicel.
naapsand keet, makadiyon do nahin have antennae.
in sab magar the sabase primitive group, the mesothelae, spiders have the sabase centralized nervous systems of all arthropods, as sab unke ganglia hai fused into ek mass in the cephalothorax.
naapsand sabase arthropods, makadiyon have no extensor mansapeshiyaan in their limbs and instead extend unhen by hydraulic dabaav.
Their abdomens bhaaluu appendages that have been parivardhit into spinnerets ki extrude resha isse up to chah prakaar of resha grathiyon bheetar unke abdomen.
makadi webs vary widely in aakaar, shape or the raashi of stick ladi prayukt.
It now appears ki the spiral orb web may be ek of the earliest form, and spiders ki produce uljhe cobwebs are adhik abundant or diverse than orb-web makadiyon.
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the devonian kaal about, lakin ye pashu apparently lacked spinnerets.
sachcha makadiyon have maharoom found in carboniferous rocks from, or hai bahut similar to the sabase aadim surviving anukram, the Mesothelae.
The main groups of aadhunik makadiyon, mygalomorphae or araneomorphae, pehla appeared in the triassic period, pehle.
a herbivorous prajati, Bagheera kiplingi, thi varnit in 2008, lakin sab other known prajati hai parabhakshi, zyaadaatar preying on keet and on anya spiders, haalanki a few vishaal prajati also take birds and lizards.
makadiyon use a chaudee range of ranneeti to capchar shikaar : trapping it in sticky webs, lassoing it with stick bolas, mimicking the shikaar to avoid ditection, or running it bas.
sabase detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations, lakin the kriyasheel hunters have adhi vision, or hunters of the genus portia dikhaaen lakshan of intelligence in their chunaav of tactics or kshamta to develop nai ones.
makadiyon ' gustaakhee are too narrow to lo solids, or ve liquidize unke khaanaa by baadh it with digestive anzimon or grinding it saath the bases of unke pedipalps, as ve do nahin have true jaws.
purush makadiyon pahachaano themselves by a kismein of jatil premalap sanskaar to avoid being eaten by the mahilaon.
males of most prajati jivit a few matings, limited mainly by their choti jivan spans.
Females bunate silk egg-cases, each of which may contain sainkadon of andey.
mahilaon of anek prajati parvaah liye unke yang, liye udhaaharan by carrying unhen around or by sharing khaanaa with unhen.
a alpsankhyak of prajati hai soshal, building sampradayik webs ki may house anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social behavior seemayen isse precarious toleration, as in the widow spiders, to co-operative shikaar or food-sharing.
haalanki sabase spiders sajiv liye at sabase do years, tarantulas and anya mygalomorph makadiyon can sajiv up to 25 saalo in captivity.
jabaki the venom of a few prajati is khatarnaak to insaano, vaigyanikon are abhi researching the upyog of makadi venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider resha provides a sangyojan of lightness, shakti and loch that is superior to ki of synthetic materials, and makadi resha jeenon have maharoom inserted into mammals or plants to see if ye can be prayukt as resha factories.
As a result of unke wide dayera of behaviors, spiders have become aam symbols in art or mythology symbolizing vibhinn combinations of patience, cruelty or rachanaatmak shaktiyaan.

household aay is a measure commonly prayukt by the sanyukt States sarkari or nijee sansthaanon.
prayek household is measured by the aay of prayek nivasee over the aayu of 15.
aay shaamil mazdooree or salaries, berogari bime, viklaangata payments, child support bhugtan praapt, niyamit rental receipts, as khub as koi nijee kaarobaar, nivesh, or anya kinds of aay received routinely.
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household aay had been increasing almost prayek saal from 1945 to 1999, it has chunki maharoom flat or bhi decreased recently.
u.S. madhya household aay giri isse $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
charam garibi in the sanyukt rajya, arth households living on kam than $ 2 per din before sarkari laabh, doubled from 1996 to 1.5 lakh households in 2011, sahit 2.8 lakh children.
the nivaasiyon of the household do not have to be sambandhit to the sir of the household for their earnings to be mana part of the household 's aay.
as households tend to share a samaan aarthik context, the upyog of household aay remains among the most widely sweekrut upayon of aay.
That the aakaar of a household is not commonly liya into khaataa in aise upayon may distort koi vishleshan of fluctuations bheetar or among the household aay categories, or may rendor direct comparisons between quintiles difficult or bhi impossible.
A panjikrut agent, bhi known as a nivasee agent or statutory agent, in United rajya kaarobaar law, is a kaarobaar or vyaktigat designated to receive seva of prakram ( sop ) when a business entity is a party in a vidhik karrwai such as a mukadmaa or saman.
The registered agent 's pataa may also be jahaan the rajya hoga send the kagaji liye the vaarshik naveekaran of the kaarobaar antity 's charter.
the panjikrut agent liye a business entity may be an vyaktigat member of the company, or ( adhik often ) a teesraa party, such as the organization 's vakil or a seva company.
vifaltaa to properly maintain a panjikrut agent can affect a company negatively.

`` jivan, swatantraaa, and the pursuit of sukh '' is a well-known phrase in the sanyukt rajya ghoshnaa of swatantraaa.
The phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable adhikaron '' with jisase all insaan beings hai endowed by unke creator liye their suraksha of which ve institute sarkarein.
talwarbaji, is typically divided into Olympic talwarbaji, shastreey talwarbaji or aitihaasik talwarbaji,.
the sport of talwarbaji ( commonly called olympic fencing or competitive talwarbaji ) is vibhajit into teen hathiyaar shrenee : foil, sabre or épée.
shastreey talwarbaji uses the vahi teen hathiyaar, lakin approaches talwarbaji as a martial art.
Competitive talwarbaji is ek of paanch khel which has been pradarshit at every one of the aadhunik olympic khel, the anya four being Athletics, cycling, tairaaki, or jimnastics.
the quadriceps femoris ( latin for `` four-headed mansapeshi of the femur `` ), bhi pukaara bas the quadriceps, quadriceps extensor, quads, is a large mansapeshi samooh ki shaamil the four prachlit mansapeshiyaan on the saamne of the thigh.
it is the great extensor mansapeshi of the ghutana, forming a vishaal maansal mass jisase covers the saamne or pahalu of the femur.
the uchit latin bahuvachan rup of the kriyasheel quadriceps hota be quadricipites.
in aadhunik angrezi upyog, quadriceps is prayukt in dono ekvachan or bahuvachan.
the ekvachan rup quadricep, utpaadit by hypercorrection, is aksar used.
RMS titannic thi a angrejon yatri liner that sank in the uttar atlantic samandar on 15 april 1912 baad colliding saath an iceberg dauraan uske maiden voyage isse southampton, uk to nai york nagar, US.
the dub of Titanic caused the mauton of 1,502 people in one of the deadliest peacetime meritime disasters in modern itihaas.
the rms titannic thi the largest jalayaan afloat at the samay of her maiden voyage.
wo thi the duusari of teen Olympic class samandar liners sanchalit by the shwet star lakeer, or she thi nirmit by the harland or Wolff shipyard in belfast saath thomas Andrews, jo perished saath the jalayaan, as her naval vaastu.
on uske maiden voyage, she carried 2,224 yatri or kru.
Under the cmand of edward smith, uske yatri shaamil some of the wealthiest logon in the world, as well as sainkadon of emigrants isse great britain and ireland, scandinavia and elsewhere throughout europea seeking a new jivan in uttar america.
the ship thi designed to be the pichhlaa shabd in sukun or luxury, with an on-board gymnasium, swimming pool, libraries, high-class restaraan and opulent cabin.
wo bhi had a shaktishaalee betaar telegraph provided liye the convenience of passengers as well as liye operational upyog.
haalanki she had unnat suraksha suvidhaayen aise as watertight compartments or remotely activated watertight dwaar, wo lacked paryaapt lifeboats to accommodate sab of those savaar.
kuki of outdated maritime suraksha regulations, she carried tabhi paryaapt lifeboats liye 1,178 people—slightly adhik than half of the kramank yatraaen on the maiden voyage, and one-third her kul passenger or kru kshamta.
baad leaving southampton on 10 april 1912, titannic pukaara at cherbourg in frans or Queenstown ( abhi cobh ) in Ireland pehle heading westwards towards nai york.
on 14 april 1912, chaar dinon into the crossing or about 375 mile ( 600 km ) dakshin of newfoundland, wo hit an iceberg at 11:40 pm jalayaan 's samay.
the glancing takkar caused Titanics hull platon to bakal inwards saath uske starboard paksh and kholi paanch of uske solah watertight compartments to the samudr ; the ship dhire filled saath jal.
Meanwhile, yatri or kuch kru sadasyon were evacuated in lifeboats, anek of jisase were shubharambh only partly loaded.
a disproportionate number of main yahood left savaar kuki of a `` mahilaon or children first `` protocol followed by some of the officers ladaan the lifeboats.
by 2:20 AM, wo broke alaava or foundered, saath khub over ek thousand logon still savaar.
bas antargat do ghanton baad the Titanic foundered, the cunard liner RMS carpathia arrived on the jhaanki of the sinking, where wo brought savaar an anumaanit 705 survivors.
the vipatti thi greeted saath worldwide shock or aakrosh at the vishaal loss of life or the regulatory or operational failures that tha led to it.
Public inquiries in britain or the sanyukt rajya led to pramukh improvements in maritime safety.
ek of unke most mahatvapurn legacies was the establishment in 1914 of the International sammelan liye the Safety of Life at samudr ( solas ), jisase still governs maritime safety aaj.
additionally, several new betaar regulations yahood passed around the world in an effort to sikh from the many missteps in betaar sanchaar -- -which could have saved anek adhik passengers.
anek of the survivors khoyaa sab of unke money and possessions and yahood baayein aksham ; many pariwaron, visheshkar those of kru sadasyon isse southampton, khoyaa unke primary bread-winners.
ve yahood helped by an outpouring of public sympathy or charitable daan.
kuch of the purush survivors were abhiyukt of cowardice liye leaving the ship jabaki logon yahood still on falak ; the shwet star lakeer 's adhyaksh, J. bruce ismay, faced soshal ostracism liye the rest of uske jivan.
the wreck of the titannic remains on the seabed, vibhajit in two or dhire disintegrating at a depth of.
Since iske discovery in 1985, hazaron of artefacts have maharoom recovered or put on pradarshak at museums around the world.
titannic has become ek of the sabase famous ships in itihaas, uske memory rakhaa jinda by numerous books, lok geeton, films, exhibits, and memorials.
The insaan leg is the sampurna lower extremity or limb of the human deh, including the foot, thigh or even the hip or gluteal pradesh ; however, the precise definition in insaan anatomy refers only to the section of the nimnatar limb extending isse the ghutana to the takhne.
taange hai prayukt for khadaa, walking, kud, running, kicking, or samaan kriyaayein, or constitute a significant portion of a person 's dravyaman.
is aalekh is parichay the janasankhyikee suvidhaayen of the janasankhyikee of Turkey, including population ghanatv, nasl, education level, swasthya of the populace, aarthik aukaat, religious sambandhon and anya pahaluon of the janasankhyikee.
As of 2010, the population of turkon is anumaanit to be 73.7 lakh with a growth rate of 1.21 % prati annum ( 2009 figure ).
The janasankhyikee is apekshaakrit yang saath 26.6 % girnaa in the 0-14 aayu koshthak.

james Madison, jr. ( March 16, 1751 ( o.s. kooch 5 ) – June 28, 1836 ) thi an amareeki statesman or rajnatik theorist, the chauthi President of the United rajya ( 1809–1817 ).
he is hailed as the “father of the Constitution” for being instrumental in the drafting of the sanyukt rajya samvidhan and as the kunjee champion or lekhak of the United States vidheyak of Rights.
he served as a rajaneta much of his vayask jivan.
After the samvidhan tha maharoom drafted, Madison became ek of the netao in the gati to ratify it.
His sahyog saath sikandar hamiltan or John jay utpaadit the federalist papers ( 1788 ).
parichaalit only in New york at the samay, ve hota later be mana among the most important polemics in support of the Constitution.
he was bhi a pratinidhi to the virginia sanvaidhanik ratifying sammelan, or thi instrumental to the successful anusamarthan effort in virginia.
jaise sabase of his contemporaries, medisson badla uske rajnatik views dauraan his life.
During the drafting or anusamarthan of the samvidhan, he favored a damdaar national sarkari, haalanki baad he grew to ehsaan stronger rajya governments, pehle settling between the do extremes late in uske jivan.
in 1789, medisson became a netaa in the new House of pratinidhi, drafting anek moulik kanoon.
he is notable for drafting the first ten amendments to the samvidhan, and yun is gyaat as the `` pita of the vidheyak of adhikaron ``.
Madison worked closely saath adhyaksh George washington to organize the nai sangheey government.
todakar with hamiltan or what became the federalist party in 1791, medisson or thomas jeffrasan vyavasthit what ve called the Republican Party ( later pukaara by itihaaskaaron the democratic-republican party )
as jefferson’s Secretary of rajya ( 1801–1809 ), Madison paryvekshit the louisiana khariden, jisase doubled the nation’s aakaar.
baad uske election to the presidency, he presided over navinikrut samruddhi liye anek saalo.
as adhyaksh ( 1809–17 ), baad the vifaltaa of diplomatic virodh or a vyapaar embargo viruddh great britain, he led the swadesh into the yuddh of 1812.
he was responding to British encroachments on amareeki honor or adhikaron ; in addition, he wanted to end the influence of the British among unke Indian allies, jinaki pratirodh avarodhit sanyukt rajya upnivesh in the Midwest around the Great jhiilon.
medisson mila the yuddh to be an prashasnic duswapn, as the sanyukt rajya had neither a strong fouj nor vittiya pranali ; as a parinaam, he afterward supported a stronger national government and a damdaar sainya, as khub as the national bainko, which he had long opposed.
jaise other Virginia kootneetigyon in the slave samaaj, he thi a slaveholder jo inherited uske vriksharopan known as montpelier, or swaamitv sainkadon of slave dauraan uske lifetime to cultivate tobacco or anya fasalon.
medisson samarthit the three-fifths sulah ki anumat three-fifths of the enumerated janasankhyikee of slave to be gine liye representation.

hydrolic fluids, bhi called hydraulic liquids, hai the medium by jisase shakti is transferred in hydrolic mashinari.
aam hydrolic fluids hai aadhaarit on khanij aayal or water.
udhaaharan of upkaran ki might use hydrolic fluids shaamil excavators or backhoes, hydrolic brakes, shakti parichaalan pranaaliyon, transmishan, kachra trek, aircraft udaan control pranaaliyon, lifts, or audyogic machinery.
hydrolic systems jaise the ones ullekith above hoga kaary most efficiently if the hydraulic drav prayukt has no compressibility
mahindra tractor
Mahindra tractors, the farm upkaran prabhag of Mahindra & mahindra, builds or sources tractors ki are bechi vishwavyaapee aarpaar chah mahadwipon.
mahindra is bhi among the sheersh teen tractor nirmaataaon in the world.
Mahindra rai a vishaal consumer aadhaar in india, china and America or a growing aadhaar in australia.
the company builds more tractors in india than koi anya nirmaataa, or rai the capacity to nirmaan 150,000 tractors a year.
in 1963, m & M formed a sanyukt venture saath antarrashtriya harvester to manufacture tractors carrying the Mahindra nameplate liye the bhartiya market.
hathiyaarband saath abhiyantriki, tooling or manufacturing know-how gained isse is sambandh, m & M viksit iske pehla tractor, the B-275.
Mahindra tractors saath sales of nearly 85,000 ikai annually is ek of the largest tractor companiyaan in the sansar, and is kramank ek in sales in India - the largest tractor market in the sansar.
To vistaar into the growing tractor market in china, mahindra acquired majority hissedari in Jiangling.
To raise jaagrukta parichay mahindra in the US, mahindra uese announced iske nai praayojan in the nascar deshbhar shrenee saath r3 motorsport, jisase is participating with a # 23 mahindra tractors shevarlyt.
The car will be chalit by Robert richardsan, Jr. mahindra USA, inc. announced a 17-race primary or 18-race sambhddha praayojan liye the 2009 nascar deshbhar shrenee.

The POWER6 is a microprocessor developed by ibm that implemented the Power isa v.2.03.
jab it became uplabdhiyaan in systems in 2007, it succeeded the POWER5+ as ibm 's flagship shakti microprocessor.

the amareeki madhya class is a soshal class in the sanyukt rajya.
jabaki the concept is typically ambiguous in popular raay or aam language upyog, contemporary soshal vaigyanikon have put aage anek, adhik or less congruent, theories on the amareeki middle class.
depending on class model used, the madhya class may constitute anywhere isse 25 % to 66 % of households.
One of the pehla major adhyayan of the madhya class in america thi shwet collar : the amareeki madhya varg, prakashit in 1951 by sociologist C. rhite Wright_Mills Mills Wright_Mills.
Later sociologists aise as denis Gilbert of hamiltan college commonly divide the madhya class into do sub-groups.
constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of households is the apper or peshewar middle class consisting of highly shikshit, salaried peshewar or managers.
constituting roughly ek teesraa of households is the nimnatar madhya class consisting zyaadaatar of semi-professionals, skilled kaarigaron and lower-level prabandhan.
middle-class vyaktiyon commonly have a aaramdaayak maanak of jeena, significant economic security, considerable work swaittata or rely on unke visheshgyata to sustain themselves.
Members of the middle class belong to vividh samooh jisase overlap with prayek anya.
Overall, middle-class persons, especially upper-middle-class individuals, hai characterized by conceptualizing, creating or paraamarsh.
Thus, college shiksha is ek of the pramukh indicators of middle-class aukaat.
largely attributed to the nature of middle-class occupations, middle class maan tend to emphasize independence, adherence to moolbhoot standards, valuing innovation and respecting non-conformity.
nitiyaan adhik kriyasheel than other janasankhyikee, college shikshit madhya class professionals are vibhajit between the do pramukh partiyon.
aay varies considerably from near the national madhya to khub in excess of $ 100,000.
household aay figures, however, do nahin sadaa pratibimbit class aukaat or maanak of living, as ve hai largely bahekaave by the number of income earners and asafal to recognize household size.
It is isliye sambhavit liye a vishaal, dual-earner, nimnatar madhya class household to out-earn a small, one-earner, upper middle class household.
the madhya varg hai bahut influential, as ve encompass the bahumat of matadaata, writers, shikshak, patrakaron, and sampadak.
Most societal rujhaan in the us originate bheetar the madhya varg.

a vipatti is a natural or man-made ( or technological ) jokhim resulting in an event of substantial extent causing significant shaareerik kshati or destruction, ghaataa of jivan, or drastic change to the paryaavaran.
A vipatti can be ostensively paribhaashit as any tragic event stemming isse events aise as bukamp, floods, anarthakaari durghatnaon, fir, or explosions.
it is a ghatana that can cause damage to life or property or nasht the aarthik, soshal or cultural jivan of logon.
in samakaleen academia, disasters are dekhi as the consequence of inappropriately prabandhit risk.
ye risks are the utpaada of a sangyojan of dono hazard/s or vulnerability.
jokhimon that strike in kshetron saath kam vulnerability will never become aapadaaon, as is the case in uninhabited regions.
vikasshil deshon suffer the greatest laagat jab a disaster hits – adhik than 95 pratishat of sab mauton caused by aapadaaon occur in vikasshil deshon, and nuksaan due to natural aapadaaon hai 20 times vrihad ( as a pratishat of jidipi ) in vikasshil countries than in industrialized deshon.
in computing, booting ( also gyaat as booting up ) is the aarambhik niyat of operations ki a computer pranali performs jab electrical power to the CPU is switched on.
the process begins jab a computer is turned on liye the pehla time or is re-energized baad being turned band, and ends when the computer is taiyaar to perform iske saamaanya parichaalan.
on aadhunik general purpose computer, is can lo tens of second or typically involves performing a power-on self-test, locating or initializing peripheral devices, and then dhundhna, ladaan and starting an operating pranali.
Many computer pranaaliyon bhi allow these parichaalan to be initiated by a tantra cmand bagaiyr cycling shakti, in kayaa is gyaat as a naram reboot, haalanki kuch of the aarambhik parichaalan might be choda on a naram riboot.
a boot loder is a computer program ki loads the main oparating system or runtime environment for the computer after purnataa of the self-tests.
the computer term boot is short liye bootstrap or bootstrap lod and garbhashayi from the phrase to pull oneself up by one 's bootstraps.
the usage kals dhyaan to the requirement ki, if most tantra is loaded onto a computer by anya tantra already kaaryshil on the computer, kuch mechanism jarur maujuud to lod initial tantra onto the computer.
Early computers used a kismein of ad-hoc vidhi to get a choti kaarykram into memory to solve is problem.
the invention of integrated circuit read-only memory ( rom ) of various prakaar hal this virodhabhas by allowing computer to be shipped saath a start up kaarykram ki could not be erased.
vikaas in the kshamta of ROM has anumat ever adhik vistrut prarambh up prakriyaaon to be implemented.
On saamaanya purpose computer, the boot process begins with the nishpaadan of an aarambhik kaarykram bhandaarit in boot roms or read in another faishan.
In kuch puraani computers, the aarambhik kaarykram might have maharoom the application to run, if no oparating system thi prayukt, or the oparating system.
In other computers, the initial kaarykram is a boot loader ki may tab lod into random-access memory ( ram ), isse nonvolatile dwitiyak storage ( such as a mushkil discs drive ) or, in some older computer, isse a medium aise as punched taash, punched tape, or chumbakeey tepe in older computers, the shabdkosh code of an oparating pranali or runtime paryaavaran and tab execute it.
if the boot loader is limited in iske aakaar or samarthy, it may, instead, lod a larger or adhik sakasham secondary boot loder, jisase would then load the oparating pranali or runtime paryaavaran.
kuch antahsthapit systems do not require a noticeable boot sequence to shuru kaamkaaj or jab turned on may bas run operational kaarykram that hai bhandaarit in rom.
firebird is an open source SQL relational database prabandhan pranali ki ranon on linaks, Windows, and a kismein of unics.
the database forked isse borland 's open sorce sanskaran of interbase in 2000, but since Firebird 1.5 the code rai been largely rewritten.
outsorcing is the contracting out of an aatanrik business prakram to a third-party sanghathan.
the abhyaas of contracting a kaarobaar prakram out to a teesraa party balki than stoff it internally is common in the modern arthvyavastha.
the pad `` outsorcing '' became popular in the sanyukt States nikat the phere of the 21st sadi.
outsorcing sometimes involves transferring employees or asset from ek kad to another, but nahin always.
The paribhaasha of outsorcing includes dono foreign or gharelu contracting, and sometimes includes offshoring, which arthath relocating a kaarobaar falan to another desh.
vittiya savings from lower international majdoor rates is a big prerana liye outsourcing/offshoring.
the opposite of outsorcing is called insourcing, jisase entails bringing processes sambhala by third-party firms in-house, or is sometimes sampannataa via vertical sangyojan.
however, a business can provide a anubandh seva to another kaarobaar bagaiyr necessarily insourcing ki kaarobaar prakram.
insaan immunodeficiency virus ( hiv ) is a lentivirus ( dhire replicating retrovirus ) that causes acquired immunodeficiency syndrome ( aids ), a condishan in insaano in jisase pragatisheel vifaltaa of the immune pranali allows life-threatening opportunistic infections or cancers to thrive.
sankraman saath HIV occurs by the transfer of rakt, semen, vaginal drav, pre-ejaculate, or stan milk.
Within ye bodily fluids, hiv is upasthit as dono free virus anu and virus within sankramit immune cells.
HIV infects vital koshikaayen in the insaan pratiraksha pranali aise as helper t koshikaayen ( specifically cd4 + T cells ), macrophages, or dendritic cells.
HIV infection lead to low levels of cd4+ t koshikaayen through a kramank of mechanisms including : apoptosis of uninfected bystander koshikaayen, sidhaa viral hatya of sankramit koshikaayen, or hatya of sankramit cd4+ t koshikaayen by cd8 cytotoxic lymphocytes that recognize sankramit koshikaayen.
When cd4+ T koshika numbers manaahi neeche a najuk level, cell-mediated pratirakshan is khoyaa, or the deh becomes progressively adhik susceptible to opportunistic infections.
The firepole in a fire stesan in toronto
A fireman 's dhruv ( bhi called a sliding dhruv or firepole ) is a lakdi dhruv or a metal tube or pipe installed between floors in fire stesan, allowing agnishman responding to an sachetak to jaldi descend to the maidan manzil tej than by using a maanak staircase.
the yantra thi invented in the 1870s by daud kenyon, in Chicago, illinois, haalanki it is praayah incorrectly credited to the Boston aag vibhaag.
Mary poppins is the sheershak akshar of a shrenee of children 's books written by P. L. Travers.
Throughout the mariyam poppins shrenee, jisase lasted isse 1934 to 1988, mariyam shepard was the elstritor or acted as a duusari author.
the kitabe kendra on a jaadui angrezi naini, Mary poppins.
She is blown by the east hawa to kramank satraa cheri Tree len, landan, and into the bainko ' household to parvaah liye unke children.
Encounters with chimney sweeps, dukandaaron or various adventures follow until Mary poppins abruptly pattey, i.e., `` pops-out ''.
the adventures lo place over a kul of aath books.
However, tabhi the first three kitabe visheshta mariyam poppins arriving or leaving.
the baad paanch books recount previously unrecorded adventures from her original teen vizit.
As P. L. Travers explains in uske parichay to mariyam poppins in the park, `` She can nahin forever arrive or nikalen. ''
the kitabe yahood adapted in 1964 into a musical dijani filmi abhinit juli Andrews or land vine dyke.
in 2004, Disney natya produced a stage musical anukulan in the west samaapt theatre.
the stage musical was transferred to broadway in 2006 jahaan it ran jabatak iske closing on kooch 3, 2013.
it rai maharoom highly successful, as thi the 1964 filmi.
the pichhlaa song is a 2010 American coming of aayu tin romantic naatak filmi developed alongside Nicholas sparks ' anokhaa by the vahi name.
the filmi was directed by juli Anne robinsan in her visheshta film directorial debyue or co-written by sparks or jeff vine wie.
the Last Song sitaron miley sires, liyaam hemsworth, and greg kinnear or folo a troubled kishoravastha as she reconnects saath uske estranged father or jalprapaat in prem during a garmiyaan in a shant Southern sanyukt States bich town.
the filmi is distributed by Touchstone tasviren.
sparks thi approached to write both the filmi 's patakatha and the novel.
sparks samaapt the patakatha in janvari 2009, prior to the completion of the anokhaa, making the pichhlaa song uske pehla script to be optioned for filmi.
The setting, originally in North carolina jaise the anokhaa, sthanantarit to georgia baad the rajya tha campaigned liye maheene to mejabaan utpaadan.
Upon shuruuaat production in tybee Island, georgia or nearby savannah, the pichhlaa Song became the first film to be dono shot and niyat in tybee Island.

likhaa simlish
Simlish is a fictional bhashaa pradarshit in ea khel ' Sim shrenee of khel.
it debuted in simcopter, and has maharoom especially prominent in The seem, The seem 2 or the seem 3.
the seem development toli nirmit the adwitiya simlish bhashaa by experimenting with fractured ukraini, french, latin, Finnish, angrezi, fijian, Cebuano, or Tagalog.
simlish can bhi be suna in simcity 4, simcity samaajon and SimCity 2013, but far less aksar.
civilized jeev in Spore can also be taught to speak simlish.
it is bhi pradarshit to an extent in Firaxis khel ' cid mir 's simgolf.
panktiyaan hoga rhite thi conscious of the need for dialogue in the khel, lakin thought ki using a real language hota mek it dhwani too dohraye and hota bhi be too costly to hire anuvadak for sansar bhashaaen.
initially, prerit by the deshi American code talkers of sansar yuddh II, Sims nirmaataa hoga rhite and bhashaa visheshgy mark gimbel sujhaayaa experimenting saath the navajo language to banaaen simlish.
however, ve ultimately decided ki simlish worked behtareen as a `` bhashaa '' made up of gibberish shabd that could n't be anudit, so that its arth would be baayein kholen to the kalpana of the khilaadi.
rhite baad commented ki using `` bakawaas bhashaa '' turned out to be the sahi development chunaav, as logon yahood capable of imagining it adhik realistically than a computer could simulett a real ek.
the vaastavik sound of Simlish thi created improvisationally by voice abhinaytaon stephen Kearin and gerri lawlor.
an example of ultrasonic Testing ( UT ) on blade jaden of a V2500 iae vayuyan engine.
kadam 1 : the UT jaanch is lagaai on the root of the blade to be inspected saath the sahaayta of a khaas borescope aujaar ( video jaanch ).
Step 2 : Instrument jamaavat hai input.
kadam 3 : The jaanch is scanned over the blade root.
in this case, an indication ( peak in the aankada ) through the red line ( or phatak ) indicates a good blade ; an indication to the baayein of that dayera indicates a crack.
principle of ultrasonic pareekshan.
baayein : A jaanch bhejnaa a dhwani wave into a pareekshan saamagree.
vahin hai do indications, ek isse the aarambhik pulse of the jaanch, or the second due to the waapas wal echo.
RIGHT : a defect creates a teesraa indication or simultaneously reduces the aayam of the back wall indication.
the gaharaai of the defect is sankalpit by the ratio D/E
in ultrasonic testing ( ut ), bahut choti ultrasonic pulse-waves with bich barambharataa ranging isse 0.1-15 mhz or occasionally up to 50 mhz are shubharambh into saamagree to detect internal khamiyaan or to characterize saamagree.
a aam udhaaharan is ultrasonic thickness maapan, jisase pareekshan the motaai of the test object, liye example, to monitor pipework sanksharan.
Ultrasonic pareekshan is praayah performed on steel or anya dhaatuon or alloys, haalanki it can bhi be prayukt on kancreet, lakdi or composites, albeit saath kam rezolution.
it is a rup of non-destructive pareekshan prayukt in many udyog including aerospace, automotive or anya parivahan sector.
The vas deferens ( bahuvachan : vasa deferentia ), bhi called ductus deferens ( latin : `` carrying-away pot '' ; bahuvachan : ductus deferentes ), is bhaag of the purush anatomy of anek vertebrates ; ve hastantaran shukranu isse the epididymis in anticipation of skhalan.
Vascular ischemia of the toes with characteristic cyanosis.
in ayurvigyaan, ischemia, also spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia, ( ; isse unani language ισχαιμία, ischaimía ; isch- root denoting a pratibandh or thinning or to make or grow thin/lean, haema rakt ) is a restriction in blood supply to utakon, causing a shortage of oxigen and glucose needed for cellular chayapachay ( to keep utak jinda ).
Ischemia is generally caused by samasyaayein with rakt vessels, with resultant kshati to or dysfunction of utak.
It bhi arthath local raktaalpata in a die bhaag of a deh sometimes resulting isse congestion ( aise as vasoconstriction, ghanaasrata or vahikarodh ).
bas syndrome ( ds ) or bas 's syndrome, also gyaat as trisomy 21, is a genetic vikaar caused by the upasthiti of sab or bhaag of a third copy of chromosome 21.
bas syndrome is the most aam chromosome abnormality in humans.
it is typically sambhddha with a delay in cognitive kshamta ( mental retardation, or MR ) or physical vikaas, or a particular set of facial characteristics.
the ausat IQ of yang vayaskon with bas syndrome is around 50, whereas young vayaskon bagaiyr the condishan typically have an iq of 100.
( mr has historically maharoom defined as an iq neeche 70. )
A vishaal proportion of individuals saath bas syndrome have a kathor oopaadhi of bauddhik viklaangata.
bas syndrome is namit baad jon Langdon bas, the angrejon physician jo described the syndrome in 1866.
The condishan was clinically described pehle by Jean etienne dominique esquirol in 1838 or edouard seguin in 1844.
bas syndrome was identified as a chromosome 21 trisomy by dr. jérôme lejeune in 1959.
Down syndrome can be pahachaanaa in a baby at janam or before birth by prenatal screening.
Pregnancies saath is diagnosis are praayah terminated.
The CDC estimates that about ek of every 691 shishu born in the United rajya prayek year is born saath Down syndrome.
Many children saath Down syndrome are shikshit in regular skool varg jabaki others aavashyaktaa specialised shaikshanik suvidhaayen.
kuch children graduate isse unchi skool, and, in the us, vahin hai increasing opportunities for participating in post-secondary shiksha.
shiksha or uchit care rai been shown to improve visheshta of jivan significantly.
anek adults saath bas syndrome are samarth to kaary at sashulk niyukti in the jatiyaan, while others aavashyaktaa a adhik sheltered kaary paryaavaran.
hot flashes ( bhi gyaat as hot flushes, or night sweats if ve happen at raatri ) hai a lakshan jisase may have anek anya causes, but jisase is often caused by the changing hormone levels ki hai characteristic of menopause.
the servicemen 's readjustment Act of 1944 ( P.L. 78-346, 58 Stat. 284m ), gyaat informally as the G.I. Bill, thi a law ki provided a range of laabh liye returning sansar yuddh ii veterans ( commonly referred to as G.I.s ).
laabh shaamil low-cost mortgages, low-interest lone to start a kaarobaar or farm, nakadi bhugtan of tution and living kharch to attend college, unchi skool or vokational shiksha, as well as one year of berogari muaavje.
it thi uplabdhiyaan to every veteran jo tha maharoom on kriyasheel duty dauraan the war saalo liye at tanik nabbe dinon or tha nahin maharoom dishonorably discharged ; combat thi nahin required.
by the samaapt of the program in 1956, roughly 2.2 million diggajon tha used the g.i. Bill shiksha laabh in anukram to attend collejon or universities, or an additional 6.6 million used ye laabh liye some dayaalu of training program.
chunki the asli 1944 vidhi, the pad has aaiye to shaamil anya veteran laabh kaarykram nirmit to assist diggajon of subsequent wars as khub as peacetime seva.
Historians or economists consider the g.i. vidheyak a pramukh political success—especially in contrast to the treatments of World yuddh I veterans—and a major yogadan to america 's stock of insaan puunji ki sped long-term economic growth.
the waterget scandal was a rajnatik cond ki occurred in the United States in the 1970s as a parinaam of the June 17, 1972 break-in at the Democratic neshnal cameti mukhyalay at the Watergate office jatil in Washington, D.C., and the nicksan administration 's attempted cover-up of iske bhagidaari.
the scandal eventually led to the resignation of richard nicksan, the President of the sanyukt rajya, on agast 9, 1974 — the tabhi istipha of a u.S. adhyaksh.
the cond bhi resulted in the indictment, vichaaran, conviction, or incarceration of forty-three vyaktiyon, darjanon of whom yahood nicksan 's top administration officials.
the affair began with the giraftaar of paanch men for todakar or entering into the Democratic neshnal cameti ( dnc ) headquarters at the waterget complex on june 17, 1972.
The Federal beuro of chaanbin ( FBI ) conect nakadi found on the burglars to a slush nidhi prayukt by the cameti for the re-election of the adhyaksh, the aadhikarik sanghathan of nicksan 's abhiyaan.
in july 1973, as pramaan mounted viruddh the adhyaksh 's staff, sahit testimony provided by former staff sadasyon in an investigation conducted by the seenet waterget cameti, it thi revealed ki President nicksan tha a tape-recording system in his karyaalayon or he tha recorded many baatcheet.
ricarding isse ye tapes implicated the adhyaksh, revealing he tha attempted to cover up the questionable ( or illegal ) goings-on ki tha taken place dauraan uske prashasan, both pehle or after the break-in.
baad a protracted shrenee of kadava court ladaaiyon, the u.S. param adaalat unanimously shasit that the president had to haath over the tepon to sarkari jaanchakartaaon ; he ultimately complied.
facing near-certain mahabhiyog in the house of Representatives and a damdaar sambhaavna of a conviction in the seenet, nicksan resigned the presidency on agast 9, 1974.
uske successor, jerald Ford, tab jari a pardon to use.
elizabeth imogene webber ( formerly lansing or spencer ) is a fictional akshar on the ABC Daytime sabun opera saamaanya hospital.

the United rajya presidency of Ronald reagan, bhi gyaat as the reagan prashasan, thi a republican administration headed by ronaald reagan isse January 20, 1981, to janvari 20, 1989.
Domestically, the administration favored reducing sarkari programs or introduced the largest across-the-board tax katautee in amareeki itihaas.
The economic nitiyon enacted in 1981, gyaat as `` Reaganomics ``, yahood an udhaaharan of supply-side economics.
reagan aimed to encourage entrepreneurship and seemaa the growth of social bitaa, as khub as the katautee of viniman and inflation.
Economic vikaas saw a strong recovery in the 1980s, helping reagan to win a bhuskhalan re-election.
the national debt increased significantly, however.
regarding foreign niti, the administration was steadfastly anti-communist, colling the soviet sangh an `` dusht samrajya `` or samaapti 1970s détente.
Reagan twarit the vishaal buildup of the sainya prarambh by uske purvavarti, sahit an akraman of haraa, the pehla pramukh videshi karrwai by U.S. sainikon chunki the end of the vietnam yuddh.
the `` reagan doctrine `` controversially granted aid to ardhsainik shaktiyaan seeking to phekane communist governments, particularly in war-torn Central America or afghanistan.
reagan bhi prachaarit new technologies such as missile raksha pranaaliyon in order to confront the Soviets or unke allies.
in kootneeti, Reagan forged a damdaar gathbandhan with uk pradhan mantri margaret thatcher, and he mili saath soviet saamaanya sachiv mikhail gorbachev chaar times, aiming to shrink the superpowers ' nuclear arsenals.
reagan 's presidency has maharoom termed the `` reagan kranti '', or the aayu of reagan in recognition of the political realignment dono bheetar and pare the U.S. in favor of uske brands of conservatism or his aasthaa in free bazaar.
The reagan administration worked toward the collapse of Soviet samyavaadee, or it did patan bas as he baayein daftar.
vijay in the thanda War led to a unipolar world saath the u.S. as the sansar 's ekmaatr mahashakti.
jabaki the damaging iran-contra affair engulfed anek reagan aides dauraan his duusari term, Reagan khud baayein office with a 63 pratishat approval darja, ek of the higher sweekruti ratings of don presidents.
baad years of unstinting praise isse the right, or unrelenting aalochana isse the baayein, itihaaskaar David henry paata ki by 2009 a consensus tha ubhara among vidwaanon ki reagan revived conservatism or turned the swadesh to the sahi by demonstrating a `` pragmatic kosa '' that prachaarit ideology within the constraints imposed by the divided political pranali.
Furthermore, says henry, the consensus viewpoint agrees ki he revived aasthaa in the presidency or amareeki self-confidence, or contributed critically to samaapti the Cold yuddh.
Crude maut rate by desh ( 2006 ).
mrityu rate is a maap of the kramank of deaths ( in saamaanya, or due to a vishisht kaaran ) in a janasankhyikee.
scaled to the aakaar of ki janasankhyikee, prati ikai of samay.
Mortality rate is typically expressed in ikai of mauton prati 1000 individuals prati year ; yun, a mortality rate of 9.5 ( out of 1000 ) in a janasankhyikee of 1,000 hota ausat 9.5 mauton prati saal in that sampurna janasankhyikee, or 0.95 % out of the total.
it is pruthak isse morbidity rate, jisase refers to the number of individuals in garib health during a die samay kaal ( the vyapaktaa rate ) or the kramank of newly appearing maamle of the beemaari prati ikai of samay ( incidence rate ).
the pad `` mortality `` is bhi sometimes inappropriately prayukt to refer to the kramank of deaths among a niyat of diagnosed hospital maamle for a disease or chot, balki than liye the general population of a desh or jaateey samooh.
is beemaari mortality statistic is adhik precisely referred to as `` maamla fatality rate `` ( CFR ).
ek distinguishes:
The crude maut rate, the total number of mauton per saal prati 1000 logon.
the crude maut rate liye the puure world is parichay 8.37 prati 1000 prati year according to the vartmaan siie sansar Factbook.
the perinatal mrityu rate, the sum of neonatal mauton or fetal mauton ( stillbirths ) per 1000 births.
The maternal mrityu anupaat, the kramank of matra mauton per 100,000 sajiv births in vahi samay kaal.
The maternal mrityu rate, the kramank of matra mauton prati 1,000 mahilaon of reproductive aayu in the janasankhyikee ( generally paribhaashit as 15–44 saalo of aayu ).
The shishu mortality rate, the number of mauton of children kam than 1 year old prati 1000 sajiv births.
The child mrityu rate, the kramank of mauton of children kam than 5 saalo boodha prati 1000 live births.
The standardised mrityu ratio ( smr ) - is represents a aanshik tulana to the sankhyaayein of deaths ki hota have maharoom apekshit if the janasankhyikee tha maharoom of a maanak composition in terms of aayu, ling, etc.
The age-specific mrityu rate ( asmr ) - is refers to the kul kramank of mauton prati saal prati 1000 logon of a die age ( e.g. aayu 62 pichhlaa janmdiwas ).
In regard to the or failure of chikitsa upachaar or procedures, ek hota bhi distinguish:
The jaldi mrityu rate, the total number of deaths in the jaldi stages of an jari upachaar, or in the period tatkaal following an upachaar.
the late mortality rate, the kul number of mauton in the let charan of an ongoing treatment, or a significant length of time after an adhi upachaar.
note ki the crude maut rate as paribhaashit upar and lagu to a whole population can de a misleading impression.
The crude death rate depends on the aayu ( or ling ) vishisht mrityu rates or the aayu ( and ling ) distribution of the janasankhyikee.
the kramank of deaths per 1000 logon can be ucchtar liye developed raashtra than in less-developed countries, despite jivan expectancy hone ucchtar in developed deshon due to maanakon of swasthya hone behatar.
is happens kuki viksit deshon typically have a completely alag janasankhyikee age vitaran, saath a much ucchtar proportion of puraani logon, due to dono nimnatar haal janam daron or lower mortality rates.
a adhik complete chitra of mrityu is die by a life talika jisase shows the mortality rate separately liye each aayu.
a jivan talika is necessary to de a shubh estimate of life pratyaasha.
an otoacoustic utsarjan ( oae ) is a dhwani which is utpann from within the inner kaan.
Having maharoom purvanumanit by thomas sunaharaa in 1948, its astitv thi pehla demonstrated experimentally by daud kemp in 1978 or otoacoustic emissions have chunki maharoom shown to uthta by a kramank of alag cellular mechanisms bheetar the bhitari kaan.
adhyayan have shown ki OAEs gaayab after the bhitari ear rai maharoom damaged, so oaes hai praayah prayukt in the prayogshaala or the clinic as a measure of inner kaan health.
broadly bolnaa, vahin are do prakaar of otoacoustic emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( soaes ), jisase can occur without external uttejnaaon, or evoked otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ), jisase aavashyaktaa an evoking stimulus.
hurricane thomas thi the unnisvin namit storm or barahavin hurricane of the 2010 atlantic hurricane season.
Tomas viksit isse a teevr wave east of the windward islands on aktubar 29.
jaldi intensifying into a hurricane, it sthanantarit through the windward islands or passed bahut near Saint loosia.
baad reaching shrenee 2 aukaat on the saffir-simpson scale, thomas jaldi weakened to a tropical toofaan in the central Caribbean samudr, due to damdaar hawa shear or dry air.
Tomas later regained hurricane aukaat as it reorganized nikat the Windward dyodhi.
throughout the hurricane 's path, 71 logon are gyaat to have been maare, 14 of jisko yahood in sant Lucia.
maudrik nuksaan throughout the windward islands were anumaanit at US $ 588 million, mukhyatah in Saint loosia.
in the vek of the toofaan in haiti, baadh intensified an jari haija outbreak indirectly causing adhik fatalities.
According to a rapat released in disambar 2010, 55 logon yahood killed in cuba or Hispanola, haalanki the distribution of these fatalities hai anjaan.
overall kshati isse the toofaan thi at tanik $ 741 million.
Victoria Jackson ( born August 2, 1959 ) is an American hasya, actress, satirist, singer and internet blogar behtareen gyaat as a daal sadsy of the NBC television sketch kamedi series Saturday Night sajiv ( esenel ) isse 1986 to 1992.
wo has praapt attention as a gayan aalochak of adhyaksh baraak obama, or is an kriyasheel bhagidaar in the chaay Party gati.
postmodern sahitya is sahitya characterized by baari reliance on techniques jaise fragmentation, virodhabhas, and questionable narrators, and is praayah ( haalanki nahin exclusively ) paribhaashit as a style or trend jisase ubhara in the post–world yuddh ii era.
Postmodern works are dekhi as a pratikriya viruddh atmagyaan thinking and modernist approaches to sahitya.
Postmodern sahitya, jaise postmodernism as a puure, tends to resist paribhaasha or vargeekaran as a `` movement ''.
beshak, the abhisaran of postmodern sahitya with various modes of critical siddhanth, particularly reader-response or deconstructionist approaches, and the subversions of the avyakt contract between lekhak, text or reader by jisase iske works hai often characterised, have led to pre-modern fictions such as cervantes ' don quixote ( 1605,1615 ) or laurence Sterne 's eighteenth-century vyangy tristram shandy hone retrospectively inducted into the moden.
jabaki vahin is choti sarvasammati on the precise visheshtaayen, paimaana, or importance of postmodern literature, as is praayah the case saath kalakaari movements, postmodern literature is commonly paribhaashit in sambandh to a precursor.
liye example, a postmodern saahitiyik kaary tends nahin to conclude saath the neatly tied-up ending as is praayah mila in modernist literature, lakin often parodies it.
postmodern lekhak tend to celebrate mauka over shilp, or further employ metafiction to undermine the writer 's praadhikaar.
another characteristic of postmodern literature is the questioning of bhed between unchi or low samskruti through the use of pastiche, the combination of subjects or jati nahin previously deemed fit for sahitya.

The romanian-born cretu conceived the paheli project jabaki working in germany, but based uske recording studio a.r.t. studios in ibiza, spain, isse the jaldi 1990s jabatak may 2009, where he rai ankit sab of Enigma 's studio relies to date.

kol of duty is a first-person or third-person shooter computer/ video khel matadhikaar.
the shrenee began on the PC, or later expanded to consoles or handhelds.
anek spin-off khel have also been released.
the earlier khel in the shrenee are set primarily in sansar yuddh ii, this includes : kol of duty, kol of Duty 2, and kol of duty 3.
Beginning saath aadhunik warfare, jisase is set in aadhunik times, the series rai shifted focus dur isse sansar yuddh II.

blike ops 2 ( Released navambar 13, 2012 ) takes place in the saal 2025.

The estate tax in the sanyukt rajya is a kar imposed on the transfer of the `` taxable estate `` of a deceased person, whether aise property is transferred via a hoga, according to the state laws of intestacy or varanaa bana as an incident of the maut of the maalik, aise as a transafar of property from an intestate estate or trust, or the bhugtan of certain jivan bime benefits or financial khaataa rakam to beneficiaries.
the estate tax is one part of the ekikrut tohfa or estate kar pranali in the sanyukt rajya.
the anya bhaag of the pranali, the tohfa kar, imposes a kar on hastantaran of property dauraan a person 's jivan ; the tohfa kar prevents avoidance of the estate tax chahie a vyakti want to de away his/her estate.
in jod to the federal sarkari, anek states also thopane an estate kar, saath the state sanskaran pukaara either an estate tax or an inheritance kar.
pratidwandviyon of the estate tax kol it the `` death kar ''.
if an asset is baayein to a jeevanasathi or a federally pahachaanaa daan, the kar praayah does nahin apply.
In jod, up to $ 5,250,000 can be die by an individual, pehle and/or upon unke maut, bagaiyr rusht federal tohfa or estate kar.

Raffaello sanzio da urbino ( April 6 or kooch 28, 1483 – april 6, 1520 ), behatar known simply as rafel, thi an Italian painter or vaastu of the High punarjagran.
uske work is admired liye iske spashtataa of form and aasaani of composition or for iske vizual uplabdhi of the Neoplatonic adarsh of insaan vaibhav.
saath with michelangelo or leonardo da vinci, he form the paramparaagat trinity of great masters of ki period.
Raphael thi enormously productive, kaaryshil an unusually vishaal kaaryshaala, and despite his death at 37, a vishaal deh of his kaary remains.
anek of uske works hai mila in the vatican rajmahal, jahaan the frescoed rafel kaksh yahood the central, or the largest, kaary of his kariyar.
the best gyaat kaary is the School of Athens in the vatican stanza dela segnatura.
baad uske jaldi saalo in Rome much of uske work was self-designed, but liye the most bhaag executed by the kaaryshaala isse uske drawings, saath considerable loss of visheshta.
he was atyadhik influential in his aaajeevan, though baahar rome uske kaary thi zyaadaatar known isse uske collaborative printmaking.
baad uske maut, the influence of uske great pratidwandvi michelangelo thi more faili until the 18th and 19th centuries, jab rafel 's more nirmal or harmonious qualities yahood again regarded as the ucchtam model.
uske kariyar falls naturally into teen phases and teen sheliyaan, first varnit by giorgio vasari : uske jaldi saalo in Umbria, tab a kaal of parichay chaar saalo ( isse 1504–1508 ) absorbing the artistic paramparaon of florence, followed by uske last hectic or triumphant baarah saalo in rome, working liye do popes or their band shariq.
julia Fiona roberts ( born aktubar 28, 1967 ) is an amareeki abhinetri.

Her shulk liye 1990 's pretty Woman thi $ 300,000 ; in 2003, she was sashulk an unprecedented $ 25 lakh for uske bhoomika in mona Lisa muskaan ( 2003 ).

cameti of tareeke or Means is the chief kar -writing cameti of the sanyukt rajya House of pratinidhi.
sadasyon of the Ways or Means Committee hai not anumat to serve on any other house samitiyon unless ve lagu liye a waiver from unke party 's congressional netritv.

Social suraksha
Unemployment benefits
Medicare
pravartan of child support laws
asthai sahaayta for mohataaj pariwaron, a sangheey welfare program
foster parvaah or apnaanaa kaarykram
the u.S. samvidhan requires that sab bills regarding karadhaan jarur originate in the house of pratinidhi.
chunki house kaarividhi is that sab bills regarding karadhaan jarur go through is cameti, the committee is bahut influential, as is iske Senate counterpart, the u.S. seenet Committee on vitt.

the blue whale ( balaenoptera musculus ) is a samudri standhari belonging to the suborder of baleen whales ( pukaara Mysticeti ).
At in length or or more in weight, it is the largest gyaat animal to have kabhi existed.
long or slender, the blue whale 's body can be various shades of bluish-grey dorsally or somewhat halkaa underneath.
There are at least teen distinct subspecies : B. m. musculus of the uttar Atlantic or uttar prashanth, B. m. intermedia of the Southern samandar or B. m. brevicauda ( bhi gyaat as the saano blue whale ) mila in the bhartiya samandar or dakshin prashanth Ocean.
B. m. indica, mila in the bhartiya Ocean, may be another subspecies.
as saath anya baleen whales, iske aahaar consists almost exclusively of small crustaceans gyaat as krill.
blue whales yahood abundant in nearly sab the mahaasaagar on dharti until the shuruuaat of the twentieth sadi.
For over a sadi, they were hunted almost to extinction by whalers jabatak surakshit by the antarrashtriya jatiyaan in 1966.
a 2002 rapat anumaanit vahin were 5,000 to 12,000 blue whales vishwavyaapee, stith in at tanik paanch groups.
adhik haal shodh into the saano subspecies suggests is may be an underestimate.
Before whaling, the largest janasankhyikee thi in the Antarctic, kramakan lagbhag 239,000 ( dayera 202,000 to 311,000 ).
There remain tabhi much smaller ( around 2,000 ) ekaagratha in prayek of the purvi North prashanth, antarctic, and bhartiya Ocean samooh.
vahin are do adhik samooh in the uttar Atlantic, and at tanik two in the dakshini golardh.
The globe artichoke ( cynara cardunculus var. scolymus ) is a variety of a prajati of thistle cultivated as a khaanaa.
The khaadya padaarth is kaliyon ki rup bheetar the flower heads before the pushp aaiye into khilte.
The buds go away or badalen to a coarse, mushkil khaadya rup when the pushp blooms.
the uncultivated or junglee kismein of the prajati is called a cardoon.
it is a baramasi sanyantr native to the bumadhyasagariya region.
the sanyukt rajya ek hundred-dollar vidheyak ( $ 100 ) is a denomination of sanyukt rajya karency.
U.S. statesman, avishkaarak, and rajanyik Benjamin franklin is philhal featured on the obverse of the vidheyak.
on the reverse of the banknote is an chitra of swatantraaa haul.
The $ 100 vidheyak is the largest denomination ki has maharoom mudrit chunki july 13, 1969, jab the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 yahood ritred.
The Bureau of nakkashi or mudran says the average jivan of a $ 100 vidheyak in parisancharan is 90 maheene ( 7.5 saalo ) pehle it is replaced due to pahanen or tear.
the bills are also commonly referred to as `` benjamins '', in sandarbh to the upyog of benjamin franklin 's portret on the denomination, or `` c-notes '', based on the Roman numeral liye 100.
The vidheyak is ek of do denominations printed aaj that does not visheshta a adhyaksh of the United States ; the other is the $ 10 bill, featuring Alexander hamiltan.
The time on the clock of Independence haul on the reverse, according to the u.S. beuro of nakkashi or mudran, shows approximately 4:10.
One hundred hundred-dollar bills hai delivered by Federal Reserve bainko in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000 ).
the Series 2009 $ 100 vidheyak redesign thi anaavaran on april 21, 2010, and thi to be jari to the public on farvari 11, 2011, lakin utpaadan thi shut bas in disambar 2010 kuki as anek as 30 % yahood unusable due to a nirmaan flaw.
A lambavat crease in the paper reveals a rikt spes on the vidheyak when khinchaa out.
in unke badalanaa, and continuing the unchi maang of is denomination, the shrenee 2006A was shubharambh retaining the pichhlaa dizine ( 1996-generation ).
on april 24, 2013, the Federal arakshit ghoshit the nai $ 100 bill hota enter parisancharan on aktubar 8, 2013.
king daud in robes of a bizantin samraat.
miniature isse the paris psalter.
daud ( ; ISO 259-3 dawid ; ' ; damdaar 's : daveed ) according to the Hebrew bible, thi the duusari king of the United Kingdom of israel, or according to the New Testament gospels of mathew and luk, an ancestor of Jesus.
His jivan is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 bce, uske reign over Judah c. 1010–1002 bce, and uske shasankaal over the United kingdom of Israel c. 1002–970 BCE.
the Books of Samuel, 1 kings, or 1 Chronicles are the tabhi strot of soochna on daud, haalanki the tel don stele ( dinaak c. 850–835 BCE ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ), padhaa as `` House of daud '', jisase sabase vidwaanon take as pushti of the astitv in the mid-9th sadi BCE of a judean royal rajvansh pukaara the House of daud.
He is chitrit as a righteous king, haalanki nahin bagaiyr trutiyaan, as khub as an acclaimed yoddha, sangeetkaar, or kavi, traditionally credited liye composing many of the zaboor contained in the kitaab of zaboor.
daud is central to yahudee, isai, or islamic doctrine and samskruti.
biblical parampara maintains that a sidhaa vanshaj of daud will be the maseehaa.
In islam he is mana to be a nabi or the king of a nation.
Kathmandu ( ; ) is the puunji or largest shahari agglomerate of nepal.
The agglomerate consists of kathmandu Metropolitan nagar at iske kor, or iske sistar shaharon patan, Kirtipur, thimi, or bhaktpur.
it bhi shaamil the recently pahachaanaa urban kshetron of shankhapur, karyabinayak, or champapur.
banepa, dhulikhel, or panauti hai satellite shahari kshetron of kathmandu stith bas baahar the kathmandu valley.
kathmandu is bhi gyaat informally as `` ktm '' or the `` tri-city ''.
According to a census conducted in 2011, kathmandu metropolis alon rai 975,453 nivaasiyon ; and the agglomerate rai a janasankhyikee of adhik than 2.5 lakh nivaasiyon.
the metropolitan city kshetrafal is and rai a population ghanatv of 19,250 per km2.
the nagar stand at an elevation of approximately in the bowl-shaped kathmandu ghati of central Nepal.
It is ghiri by chaar major kyu : shivapuri, Phulchoki, nagarjun, or chandragiri.
kathmandu ghati is part of teen districts ( kathmandu, lalitpur, and bhaktpur ), rai the highest population ghanatv in the country, or is home to parichay a twelfth of nepal 's janasankhyikee.
dauraan Rana and Shah eras, the naam `` nepal '' referred tabhi to the kathmandu ghati ; it was kayaa logon jo jiya baahar the ghati pukaara it.
dauraan is kaal, British itihaaskaaron pukaara the ghati itself `` nepal uchit ''.
Today, Kathmandu is not tabhi the capital of the sangheey loktantric ganatantr of Nepal, lakin bhi the mukhyalay of the central Development Region of nepal.
The central Region comprises three zones : bagmati, Narayani, and janakapur.
kathmandu is stith in the bagmati Zone.
Kathmandu is the getwe to paryaton in Nepal.
It is bhi the tantrika center of the desh 's economy.
it rai the sabase unnat infrastructure of koi urban kshetrafal in nepal, or its arthvyavastha is focused on paryaton, which accounted liye 3.8 % of nepal 's GDP in 1995–96.
( paryaton in Kathmandu asweekrut thereafter dauraan a kaal of rajnatik ashaanti, lakin since tab rai improved. )
The nagar rai a samrudh history, spanning nearly 2000 years, as inferred isse inscriptions found in the valley.
Religious or saanskrithik festivities form a pramukh bhaag of the lives of logon residing in kathmandu.
sabase of kathmandu 's logon follow Hinduism or anek anya follow buddhism.
There hai logon of other religious manyataon as khub, giving kathmandu a cosmopolitan samskruti.
Nepali is the sabase commonly bolaa bhashaa in the nagar.
nepal bhasa is the swadeshi language bolaa by the nevaar people.
Hindi is widely understood or angrezi is samajha by kathmandu 's educated nivaasiyon.
The nagar 's sakshartaa rate is 98 %.
kathmandu 's sistar shaharon ( lalitpur Patan ) or bhaktpur are integral to Kathmandu 's saanskrithik heritage, paryaton industry, or arthvyavastha ; therefore unesco 's sansar viraasat sait suchiyaan all teen cities ' smarak or attractions saath under ek heading, `` kathmandu Valley- unesco sansar viraasat sait ``.
field hockey, usually referred to bas as hockey, is a toli khel of the hockey parivaar which is nibhaai between do teams of gyaarah khilaadi saath hockey sticks or a mushkil, solid plastic ball.
at the phere of the 21st sadi, the khel is played globally, saath particular lokapriyata throughout Europe, asia, mahasagariya, and South america – in jod to being the national khel of pakistani and india.
the pad `` field hockey '' is used primarily in canada, the United rajya, or anya regions of the world where the khel of barf hockey is more lokapriy.
dauraan khel, lakshya keepers are the tabhi players jo hai anumat to touch the ball with koi bhaag of unke deh ( saath the excepshan of a khilaadi 's haath mana 'part of the stick ' ), saath is only applying bheetar the shooting vrutt ( also known as the d, or shooting chaap, or bas the circle ), jabaki field khilaadi play the ball saath the chapata side of unke stick.
the toli ki score the sabase lakshya by the end of the match wins.
if the score is tied at the samaapt of the khel, either a chithran is declared or the khel goes into atirikt samay and/or a dand golibari, depending on the pratiyogita 's swaroop.
The shaasi deh of hockey is the antarrashtriya hockey sangh ( FIH ), saath main and mahilaon hone represented internationally in pratiyogitaaon sahit the olympic games, rashtramandal khel, hockey sansar Cup, champions trophy or junior hockey sansar Cup, saath many deshon kaaryshil extensive junior, varisht, and masters ' klbon pratiyogitaaon.
the fih is bhi responsible liye organising the hockey Rules falak or vikasshil the niyam liye the khel.
a lokapriy roopaantar of field hockey is andar hockey, jisase differs in a kramank of respects while moort the praathmik siddhanth of hockey.
andar hockey is a 6-a-side roopaantar, saath a field jisase is ghataya to lagbhag 40m × 20m.
saath many of the niyam baaki the vahi, sahit rukaawat or feet, there hai anek kunjee visangatiyaan - khilaadi may nahin raise the ball unless shooting on lakshya, players may not hit the ball ( bajaay utilising pushes to transafar the ball ), or the sidelines are replaced with thos baadhaon which the ball hoga rebound band.
ethan `` Cane '' ashby ( né atkinsons ) is a fictional character isse the American CBS sabun opera the Young or the baichaiyn.
He is portrayed by australian karta Daniel godard, who originally auditioned for bread Snyder on as the World turns but was recommended liye a bhoomika on the Young or the baichaiyn instead.

haalanki characterized as `` mysterious '', Cane is `` loyal and samarpit '', jabaki godard described the akshar as a `` typical Australian, working-class dayaalu of guy ''.

the pair tha do children, charlie or mattie ashby.

However, Goddard was rehired soon baad viewers campaigned for uske vaapasi, revealing that cane 's identical judwa bhai was in fact the man who died.
is qurbaan uske vivaah to lily, lakin the yugal yahood remarried on velentine 's Day in 2012.
godard has been widely acclaimed liye his portrayal ; Canyon news said ki he portrays the akshar honestly, or is `` sadaa dependable, on aag and romaanchak ''.
John christopher `` Johnny '' dep ii ( born June 9, 1963 ) is an amareeki actor, filmi producer, and sangeetkaar.
he rai jiti the sunahari globe Award and screen Actors gild award liye behtareen karta.
