the World chaudee web ( abbreviated as www or w3, commonly gyaat as the web ), is a system of interlinked hypertext dastauez pahunchaa via the antarjaal.
saath a web broujar, ek can drishy web pages ki may contain text, bimb, video, or anya multimedia, or navigate between unhen via hyperlinks.
Using concepts isse uske pehle hypertext pranaaliyon like enquire, angrejon ejeeniyar, computer vaigyanik or at that time employee of the cern, sar tim berners-lee, abhi nideshak of the World chaudee Web consortium ( w3c ), wrote a proposal in March 1989 liye kayaa hota aakhirkaar become the sansar Wide web.
at CERN, a European research sanghathan nikat geneva straddling the kinaaraa between frans or Switzerland, berners-lee or Belgian computer vaigyanik robert cailliau prastaavit in 1990 to upyog hypertext `` to kadi or abhigam soochna of vibhinn kinds as a web of node in jisase the upayokta can browz at will '', or ve publicly introduced the project in December of the same saal.
chihnit Travis jon sanches ( born navambar 11, 1986 ) is an amareeki football quarterback liye the nai york jets of the neshnal Football lig ( NFL ).
he was drafted in the pehla golakaar of the 2009 enegel draft as the fifth overall chayan by the Jets or the duusari quarterbaque liya overall.
He nibhaai college footbaal at the University of dakshini california ( yuassi ).
sanches grew up in a well-disciplined or athlettic family.
in the aathvin grade, he began to khel footbaal or sikh the intricacies of the quarterbaque sthiti, training saath his pita, Nick.
a well-regarded prospect, Sanchez committed to Southern California following uske kaamyaab high school kariyar in jisase he led uske toli to a championships sheershak dauraan uske final season.
at yuassi, sanches thi relegated as the byaap quarterbaque dauraan uske first teen years haalanki he rose to prominence due to his bread dikhaave on the field in 2007 due to choton suffered by starting quarterbaque John daud booti.
sanches bhi became lokapriy bheetar the jatiyaan due to his mexican-american viraasat.
namit the starter in 2008, Sanchez led yuassi to a 12–1 record and jiti the rose katori viruddh Penn rajya liye jisase sanches thi awarded the Most Valuable khilaadi puraskaar liye uske pradarshan on thokar.
haalanki anek mana use too anubhavheen, sanches announced uske intention to daalen the 2009 enegel Draft.
He thi chaynit by the Jets baad they traded up with the cleveland bhura, and thi named the starting quarterbaque prior to the prarambh of the ritu.
despite a subpar pradarshan, sanches led the jets to the afc Championship khel, a khone praytn to the Indianapolis coltas, banane the chauthi rukii quarterbaque in enegel history to win uske pehla playoff game and the duusari to jeet do playoff games.
In his second ritu, sanches jari to develop and led the Jets to the playoffs and the toli 's duusari lagaataar AFC championships khel jahaan ve narrowly khoyaa to the Pittsburgh stilers, 24–19.
saath the jeet over the New england deshpremi the week prior, sanches tied chaar other quarterbacks liye the duusari sabase post-season road victories by a quarterbaque in NFL itihaas.
in agrani the jets to two lagaataar sammelan championships, Sanchez joined quarterbaque ben roethlisberger as the only do quarterbacks in enegel history to pahunchein the conference championships in unke pehla two seasons in the lig.
the aglaa do seasons would be a slop liye dono the toli or Sanchez as ve vifal to pahunchein the playoffs.
prashansak or media critics pukaara for a struggling sanches to be benched.
He aakhirkaar thi replaced towards the samaapt of the 2012 ritu saath greg mcelroy.
paul Avery ( April 2, 1934december 10, 2000 ) was an amareeki police reporter, behtareen gyaat for uske stories on the infamous serial kaatil gyaat as the Zodiac, or baad liye uske kaary on the petricia hearst apharan.
a choti submersible ac sump pump with a garden hose conector
a sump pump is a pump prayukt to hataayen jal ki has sanchit in a jal collecting sump jalashay, commonly mila in the basement of gharon.
the jal may daalen via the gheraa naalon of a tahkhaane waterproofing pranali, funneling into the jalashay or because of barsaat or prakritik maidan jal, if the basement is neeche the jal talika level.
sump pumps hai prayukt jahaan tahkhaane flooding happens regularly and to remedy dampness jahaan the jal talika is above the foundation of a home.
sump panpon bhejein water away from a house to koi place where it is no longer samasyapurna, aise as a nagarpalika storm naalee or a shushk khub.
Pumps may nirvahan to the sanitary siver in older installations.
ekbar mana acceptable, is abhyaas may now violate the plumbing code or nagarpalika bylaws, kuki it can overwhelm the nagarpalika malajal treatment pranali.
Municipalities urge homeowners to discnect and reroute sump pump discharge away isse sanitary sewers.
jurmaana may be imposed liye noncompliance.
Many homeowners have inherited unke sump pump configurations or do not realize ki the pump discharges to the siver.
If the nirvahan is khilaayaa to a laundry doobana in the tahkhaane, it 's sambhavit going to the sewer.
praayah hardwired into a ghar 's vidyut pranali, sump pumps may have a battery backup.
the ghar 's pressurized water supplai powers kuch panpon, eliminating the need for electricity at the vyay of using potable jal, potentially bananaa unhen more expensive to operate than vidyut panpon or bananaa an atirikt jal niptaan problem.
chunki a sump jalashay may atipravaah if nahin constantly pumped, a byaap system is important liye maamle jab the main shakti is out liye prolonged periods of time, as during a kathor toofaan.
vahin are generally two types of sump panpon — pedestal or submersible.
the pedestal pump 's motor is arohit above the sump, jahaan it is more easily serviced, lakin is bhi adhik conspicuous.
the pump impeller is chalit by a long, vertical extension shaft or the impeller is in a scroll housing in the aadhaar of the pump.
the submersible pump is entirely mounted inside the sump, and is visheshkar sealed to prevent electrical short circuits.
Sump pump pranaaliyon are bhi utilized in industrial or vanijyik applications to control water table -related samasyaayein in sataha mrudaa.
an artysian aquifer or periodic high jal table halaat can cause the maidan to become asthir due to water santrupt.
as long as the pump functions, the sataha soil hoga remain stable.
ye sumps are typically ten feet in gaharaai or adhik ; lined saath corrugated metal pipe that contains perforations or naalee chhed throughout.
ve may shaamil electronic control pranaaliyon with vizual and audible sachetak and hai praayah covered to prevent malba or pashu isse girnaa in.
bleeding kansas, khooni Kansas or the kinaaraa yuddh, thi a shrenee of hinsak rajnatik confrontations involving anti-slavery free-staters or pro-slavery `` kinaaraa ruffian `` tatv, ki took place in the Kansas territory and the neighboring kasbon of mizori between 1854 or 1861.
At the heart of the conflict thi the sawaal of whether kansas hota daalen the Union as a free state or slave rajya.
as such, Bleeding Kansas was a proxi yuddh between Northerners or southerners over the samasya of gulaami in the sanyukt rajya.
the pad `` bleeding Kansas '' thi coined by horess Greeley of the New york tribune ; the kaarykram it encompasses sidhe presaged the amareeki Civil War.
Congress tha long struggled to santulan the interests of pro-slavery shaktiyaan and anti-slavery shaktiyaan.
the kaarykram baad gyaat as Bleeding Kansas yahood set into gati by the kansas–nebraska Act of 1854, jisase nullified the Missouri sulah or instead implemented the avadharana of lokapriy prabhutaa.
an ostensibly democratic vichaar, lokapriy sovereignty stated ki the inhabitants of prayek territory or rajya should decide whether it would be a free or slave state ; however, is resulted in avrajan en masse to Kansas by activists isse dono pahalu.
at ek point, kansas tha two pruthak governments, prayek with iske apana samvidhan, haalanki tabhi ek thi federally recognized.
on January 29, 1861, Kansas thi admitted to the Union as a free rajya, less than teen maheene before the Battle of fort sumter jisase began the Civil yuddh.
benzene is an organic rasinic compound saath the aanvik sutara C6 h|hydrogen|h6.
Its anu is rachit of 6 carbon anu joined in a ring, with 1 hydrogen anu sanlagn to each carbon anu.
Because iske molecules contain only carbon or hydrogen anu, benzene is classed as a hydrocarbon.
benzene is a natural constituent of crude aayal, and is one of the sabase basic petrochemicals.
benzene is an khushboodaar hydrocarbon or the duusari [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ), a cyclic hydrocarbon saath a continuous pi bandha.
It is sometimes abbreviated Ph –h. benzene is a colorless and atyadhik jvalansheel drav saath a sweet mahakate.
it is mukhyatah prayukt as a precursor to baari chemicals, aise as ethylbenzene or cumene, jisase hai produced on a billion kilogram scale.
Because it rai a unchi octane kramank, it is an mahatvapurn ghatak of gasoline, composing a few pratishat of iske dravyaman.
sabase non-industrial anuprayog have maharoom simit by benzene 's carcinogenicity.
Giovanni virginio scaparelli ( ; 14 kooch 1835 – 4 july 1910 ) thi an italvi astronomer and science itihaaskaar.
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of nintendo 's Wii game consol to chalaaen tantra ki rai not maharoom praadhikrut by nintendo.
it achieves this by defeating the ve 's copy protection or code signing upayon.
in more general sharten, Wii homebrew refers to the upyog of the ve 's hardware, accessories or software liye uddeshy baahar those intended by the nirmaataa.
asli efforts focused on using the Wii remote as a ingit yantra on other oparating pranaaliyon, or kaaryshil web-based games in the built-in web broujar.
subsequent developments in games exploits, aise as the `` godhuli hack ``, `` bannerbomb '' or iske later incarnation `` letterbomb '', `` tod steke '', `` Indiana pwns '', `` Yu-Gi-OWNED '', `` bathaxx '', or `` vaapasi of the Jodi '', bana installing the `` homebrew channel `` sambhavit.

Stephen John hadlee ( born February 13, 1947 ) thi the 21st U.S. sahaayak to the adhyaksh liye neshnal Security Affairs ( commonly referred as neshnal Security Advisor ), serving antargat adhyaksh George W. bush.
lo ekasmaan growing paudhe or de urvarak to half of unhen.
If there hai matbhed between the nishechit sanyantr samooh and the unfertilized `` control '' samooh, ye differences may be due to the urvarak.
A scientific control is an prayog or avlokan designed to minimize the effects of parivartaneey anya than the single swatantra parivartaneey.
is increases the vishwasaneeyata of the parinaam, often through a tulana between control maap or the other maap.
vaigyanik niyantran are a bhaag of the vaigyanik vidhi.
liye udhaaharan, dauraan drug testing, vaigyanikon hoga koshish to control do samooh to keep unhen as ekasmaan as sambhavit, tab allow ek samooh to try the drug.
another udhaaharan might be pareekshan sanyantr urvarak by giving it to tabhi half the plants in a garden : the plants ki praapt no urvarak hai the control samooh, kuki they sthapit the besaline str of vikaas ki the fertilizer-treated plants hoga be compared against.
bagaiyr a control samooh, the prayog can nahin determine whether the fertilizer-treated plants grow adhik than ve would have if anupachaarit.
ideally, sab variables in an prayog hoga be controlled ( accounted for by the control maap ) or none hoga be uncontrolled.
in such an prayog, if all the niyantran kaary as apekshit, it is sambhavit to conclude ki the experiment is working as intended or ki the parinaam of the prayog are due to the prabhaav of the parivartaneey hone tested.
That is, vaigyanik controls allow an anveshak to mek a claim jaise `` Two paristhitiyon were identical jabatak factor X occurred.
chunki factor x is the only difference between the do situations, the nai outcome thi caused by factor x. ''

jon Adams ( aktubar 30, 1735 ( o.s. aktubar 19, 1735 ) – july 4, 1826 ) thi the second president of the sanyukt rajya ( 1797–1801 ), having pehle parosa as the first vaais adhyaksh of the sanyukt States.
An amareeki founding Father, he thi a statesman, rajanyik, or a agrani advocate of amareeki swatantraaa from great Britain.
khub shikshit, he was an atmagyaan rajnatik theorist who prachaarit republicanism and wrote prolifically parichay his praayah seminal vichaar, dono in prakashit works and in akshar to his bivi or kunjee adviser Abigail as khub as to anya founding fathers.
adams aae to prominence in the jaldi charan of the amareeki kranti.
A lawyer or public figure in boston, as a pratinidhi from masachusets to the Continental Congress, he nibhaai a agrani role in persuading congress to declare swatantraaa.
he assisted thomas jeffrasan in drafting the ghoshnaa of swatantraaa in 1776, or thi iske praathmik edwocket in the congress.
baad, as a rajanyik in Europe, he helped negotiate the eventual salaam sandhi saath great britain, or thi responsible liye obtaining vital governmental loans isse amsterdam bankers.
a rajnatik theorist and itihaaskaar, Adams largely likhaa the masachusets samvidhan in 1780, which saath with his pehle vichaar on Government, bahekaave amareeki rajnatik vichaar.
ek of uske mahanatam bhoomikaaye thi as a nyaayadhish of akshar : in 1775, he manonith george washington to be commander-in-chief, or 25 years later manonith jon marshall to be mukhya insaaf of the sanyukt rajya.
adams ' krantikari shrey secured use two terms as george washington 's vice adhyaksh or his apana chunaav in 1796 as the duusari president.
dauraan uske ek term, he encountered ferocious attacks by the jeffersonian republicans, as khub as the prabal gut in his own federalist party led by his kadava enemy Alexander hamiltan.
Adams hastakshrit the vivaadaaspad alian and Sedition adhiniyamon, or nirmit up the fouj and navy visheshkar in the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) saath frans, 1798–1800.
The pramukh accomplishment of uske presidency thi uske peaceful rezolution of the conflict in the phase of hamiltan 's opposition.
in 1800, adams was defeated liye re-election by thomas jeffrasan and ritred to masachusets.
He baad resumed his dosti saath jeffrasan.
He or his bivi, abigale Adams, santhaapit an sampannataa family line of rajaneta, rajanyikon, or itihaaskaaron abhi referred to as the Adams rajnatik parivaar.
Adams thi the pita of jon quinci Adams, the chathe adhyaksh of the sanyukt States.
His uplabdhiyaan have praapt vrihad manyata in modern times, haalanki uske yogadan yahood nahin initially as manaaye as those of other Founders.
Adams thi the pehla u.S. adhyaksh to reside in the building ki aakhirkaar became known as the shwet house.
A wat bhaap engine.
the bhaap ingine, fuelled primarily by koyale, propelled the audyogic kranti in great Britain and the sansar.
The Industrial kranti was the transition to nai nirmaan prakriyaaon ki occurred in the kaal from about 1760 to kuch samay between 1820 or 1840.
is parivartan shaamil going isse haath utpaadan vidhi to mashine, new chemical nirmaan and aayran utpaadan processes, improved efficiency of jal shakti, the increasing upyog of bhaap shakti or vikaas of yantra tuls.
The transition bhi shaamil the badalen isse wood and anya bio-fuels to koyale.
the Industrial kranti began in britain or within a few dashakon spread to Western europea and the sanyukt rajya.
The Industrial Revolution marks a pramukh turning point in itihaas ; lagbhag every pahalu of daily jivan thi influenced in kuch rasta.
Most notably, ausat aay and janasankhyikee began to pradarshnee unprecedented sustained vikaas.
in the shabd of nobel puraskaar vijeta Robert E. lucas, Jr., `` For the pehla time in itihaas, the living standards of the masses of ordinary logon have begun to undergo sustained vikaas... nothing remotely jaise is aarthik behavior is ullekith by the classical arthshaastriyon, bhi as a saidhantik sambhaavna. ''
wiliam ghanti scot aayran or Coal, 1855-60
The kaal of samay covered by the audyogic kranti varies with alag historians.
Eric hobsbawm yojit ki it 'broke out ' in Britain in the 1780s or thi nahin fully felt jabatak the 1830s or 1840s, jabaki T. S. eshton held ki it occurred roughly between 1760 or 1830.
Some 20th-century itihaaskaaron aise as jon clapham or nicholas Crafts have argued ki the prakram of aarthik or soshal badalen took place dhire or the pad kranti is a misnomer.
is is still a vishay of bahes among itihaaskaaron.
jidipi per capita thi broadly stable pehle the audyogic kranti and the emergence of the aadhunik capitalist economy.
the audyogic Revolution began an era of per-capita aarthik vikaas in poonjivadi economies.
aarthik itihaaskaaron hai in agreement ki the onset of the audyogic Revolution is the sabase important event in the itihaas of maanavtaa chunki the domestication of animals and paudhe.
the pehla Industrial kranti evolved into the Second audyogic kranti in the transition years between 1840 or 1870, jab technological or aarthik progress gained aaveg with the increasing apnaanaa of steam-powered naukaaye, jahaajon or rail, the large scale manufacture of yantra tools and the increasing upyog of bhaap sanchalit kaarkaanon.
Juliet annmarie huddy ( born September 27, 1969 ), is an American television news reporter, philhal appearing on Fox News channel.
is list baandhane u.S. shaharon by land kshetrafal ( not sahit laashen of jal ).
Total kshetron ( including jal ) hai bhi die, lakin note ki, jab kramit by kul kshetrafal, a number of coastal shaharon appear disproportionately `` larger ''.
San francisco is an charam udhaaharan ; jal makes up nearly 80 % of its total kshetrafal of 232 vargakar miles ( 601 km2 ).
Note bhi that in anek maamle a nagar may be geographically large primarily kuki iske nagarpalika sarkari rai milaayaa saath the sarkari of the surrounding county.
in kuch maamle the county no longer exists, while in anya the vyavastha has formed a sanchit city–county ( or city- baro in alaska, or city- mohalla in louisiana ).
ye hai dikhaaya in bold in the suchi neeche ( lakin nahin sab examples may be indicated ).

the vishaal aant ( or bowel, colon ) is the pichhlaa bhaag of the digestive pranali in vertebrate pashu.
iske falan is to absorb water isse the baaki indigestible khaanaa padaarth, or then to pass vyarth barbaad saamagree isse the deh.
This article is primarily parichay the insaan aant, though the information parichay its prakriyaaon are sidhe lagu to sabase stanadhariyon.
the vishaal aant consists of the cecum, malashay or guda kanal.
it starts in the right iliac pradesh of the pelvis, just at or below the right waist, jahaan it is joined to the neeche samaapt of the small aant.
isse yahan it continues up the abdomen, tab aarpaar the chaudai of the abdominal guha, or tab it turns bas, continuing to iske endpoint at the guda.
the vishaal intestine is about long, which is parichay one-fifth of the puure length of the intestinal kanal.
In terminologia Anatomica the vishaal intestine shaamil the cecum, colon, malashay, and anal kanal.
however, kuch strot exclude the guda canal.
the green Bay Packers are an amareeki footbaal toli aadhaarit in green khadi, visconsin.
ve hai sadasyon of the uttar prabhag of the neshnal footbaal sammelan ( nfc ) in the National footbaal lig ( enegel ).
green khadi is the third-oldest matadhikaar in the NFL, having been vyavasthit or playing in 1919.
The pakars hai the tabhi non-profit, community-owned pramukh lig peshewar sports team in the sanyukt rajya.
the Packers hai the pichhlaa vestige of `` choti town tiimon '' ki were once aam in the enegel dauraan the 1920s and 1930s.
santhaapit in 1919 by Earl `` ghunghraale '' lambeau ( hence the name lambeau field on jisase the toli plays ) or george Whitney calhoun, the green khadi pakars can tres unke lineage to other semi-professional tiimon in green khadi dating back to 1896.
in 1919 and 1920 the pakars competed as a semi-professional football toli viruddh club isse around visconsin and the midwest.
ve joined the amareeki peshewar footbaal sangh ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to kayaa is gyaat aaj as the neshnal footbaal lig ( NFL ).
Although green Bay is the pichhlaa NFL `` choti kasbaa '' toli, iske local prashansak base or media extends into aasapaas Milwaukee ; the toli bhi nibhaai selected home games vahin between 1933 or 1994.
the green khadi pakars have jiti 13 lig championships ( adhik than koi anya toli in the enegel ), sahit nau enegel championships prior to the Super katori era or chaar super katori victories —in 1967 ( Super katori i ), 1968 ( super Bowl ii ), 1997 ( super katori xxxi ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl xlv ).
The Packers have long-standing, kadava rivalries saath their nfc uttar ( formerly the nfc central ) pratidwandviyon, the chicago bears, minesota vikings or the detroit sher.
the bears-packers rivalry is one of the oldest rivalries in enegel history, dating back to 1921.
the San furnando ghati ( locally gyaat as `` the ghati '' ) is an urbanized ghati located in the Los angeles metropolitan kshetrafal of dakshini california, sanyukt rajya, paribhaashit by the kyu of the Transverse Ranges ghoomana it.
ghar to 1.76 million logon, it jhooth uttar of the larger or more populous Los angeles jalashay.
nearly do tihaai of the ghati 's jameen area is bhaag of the City of los angeles.
the anya incorporated shaharon in the ghati hai glandele, burbank, san furnando, chupa pahadiyaan and calabasas.

Susan leigh vaughan Smith ( born sitambar 26, 1971 ) is an amareeki stri sentenced to jivan in prison for murdering her children.
born in sangh, dakshin carolina, or a purv student of the University of dakshin carolina sangh, wo thi convicted on july 22, 1995 liye murdering her do bete, 3-year-old maaikel Daniel smith, born aktubar 10, 1991, or 14-month-old sikandar Tyler smith, born August 5, 1993.

wo baad claimed ki wo suffered isse dimagi swasthya issues that impaired uske nirnay.
According to the dakshin Carolina vibhaag of corrections, smith hoga be yogya for parole on navambar 4, 2024, baad serving a nunatam of tees years.

Mount McKinley ( also known as denali liya isse the inuit Koyukon athabaskan language arth `` the great ek '' ) is the highest pahaad peak in the United rajya or in uttar America saath a summit unnayan of upar samudr str.
at some, the aadhaar to shikhar vruddhi is mana the largest of koi mountain situated entirely upar samudr str.
measured by sthalakritik prominence, it is the teesraa sabase prominent shikhar baad mount Everest and akonkagua.
stith in the alaska Range in the aantarik of us state of alaska, it is the centerpiece of Denali neshnal park or Preserve.
the pehla European to dastauez sighting the pahaad thi George Vancouver in 1794.
in 1903, james Wickersham ankit the pehla attempt at climbing mckinley which thi unsuccessful.
in 1906, Frederick cook claimed the pehla ascent which thi baad siddh to be false.
the pehla verifiable ascent to mckinley 's summit thi hasil on June 7, 1913 by chadhnaa hadsan stuck, harry karstens, walter Harper, or Robert tatum.
in 1951, breadford Washburn pioneered the west buttress root mana to be the safest and easiest root or isliye the sabase lokapriy philhal in upyog.
the honda s600 is an automobile manufactured by honda.
it was shubharambh in March 1964.
uplabdhiyaan as a roadster – bearing damdaar resemblance to the honda s500 – and as a fastback coupé – introduced in kooch 1965 – the s600 thi the pehla Honda uplabdhiyaan in do trim str.
dauraan iske production chalaaen up to 1966, the model styling hota remain pretty much the same, saath the sabase notable parivartan coming to the front grille, bumper, or headlights.
Powered by a dohc, water-cooled, four-cylinder inline engine with chaar carburetors, the ingine capacity thi increased to 606 cc isse the S500 's 531 cc.
the ingine utpaadit at 8,500 rpm or had a top gati of.
saath the convertible weighing in at mere, the atirikt sheet metal of the coop tabhi added to the overall vazan.
barkhaastagi thi swatantra saath sealed roller kadi drive to prayek pasch wheel.
the S600 thi the first dravyaman marketed honda car.
pehla offered only in right-hand drive, it jald became available in left-hand drive to appeal to export bazaar.
There yahood a few pre-production s500s manufactured in baayein haath drive, two or teen bhi being shown in some early sales vivaranika.
Both the S600 roadster or coupé yahood uplabdhiyaan in maanak trim or a khaas, upgraded package pukaara the sm600 jisase shaamil, among other items, special paint rangon, exclusive badging, a maanak radio or spikar, a special antina in the passenger side sun chazza, maanak reversing lights, a maanak cigarette halkaa, a standard heater, behatar cushioned seats, and a detachable seat track liye jaldi hataanaa of the yatri seat.
honda nirmit 3,912 roadsters in 1964, with utpaadan chadhaai to 7,261 convertibles or 1,519 coupes in 1965.
utpaadan dropped band in 1966 ( as ve yahood shifting to the s800 ) saath only 111 roadsters or 281 coupes, giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles or 1,800 coupes liye the 3 year span.
Everybody Hates Chris is an amareeki television kaal sitcom ki depicts the teenage anubhavon of hasya kris chattan ( jo is bhi the narrator ) jabaki growing up in the bedford-stuyvesant pados of brukaleen, nai york.
the dikhaaen is niyat between 1983 or 1987 ; however, chattan khud thi a teenager between 1978 or 1983.
chattan grew up saath a ladke namit keni Montero, whom he has praayah referred to as the prerana for a lot of the apisod.
in anek saakshaatkaar, chattan has varnit Kenny as the kaaran he got into kamedi in the first place.
the show 's sheershak parodies the sibies sitcom everybody Loves remand.
chattan stated : `` Everybody loves remand lakin Everybody hates kris ! ``.
The show 's lead actors hai Tyler james Williams, terry kru, tichina arnald, Tequan richmond, imani Hakim, or Vincent martella.
in patan 2008, the the cw sthanantarit Everybody Hates kris or The khel to the shuukravaar raatri death slot.
the chauthi ritu of the shrenee premiered shuukravaar, aktubar 3, 2008, at 8:00pm Eastern/7:00PM central.
on may 21, 2009, the cw announced ki it tha radd everybody Hates kris.
prior to is, karypalika producer Chris Rock ghoshit that the samaapt of season 4 matched up with uske own past—dropping out of unchi school to become a comedian—and ki it thi samay to samaapt the dikhaaen.
pleural effusion is excess fluid ki accumulates between the do pleural paraton, the fluid-filled spes ki surrounds the lungs.
excessive amounts of aise fluid can impair shwaas by limiting the vistaar of the lungs dauraan ventilation.
biovulf ( ; in Old angrezi or ) is the conventional title of an boodha angrezi vir apik poem consisting of 3182 alliterative long lines, set in Scandinavia, commonly cited as ek of the sabase mahatvapurn works of anglo-saxon literature.
It survives in a single manuscript gyaat as the nowell codex.
iske composition by an benaam anglo-saxon kavi is dinaak between the 8th or the jaldi 11th sadi.
in 1731, the manuscript thi badly kshatigrast by a fire ki swept through a bhawan awaas a collection of madhyakaalin pandulipiyon assembled by Sir robert bruce kapaas.
the kavita giri into aspashtataa liye dashakon, and iske existence kiya nahin become widely gyaat again jabatak it was mudrit in 1815 in an sanskaran prepared by the Icelandic-Danish vidwaan grímur jónsson thorkelin.
In the poem, biovulf, a nayika of the Geats in scandinavia, aata to the sahaayta of Hroðgar, the king of the danes, whose mid hall ( in Heorot ) has maharoom under akraman by a daanav gyaat as grendel.
After biovulf jaanboojh use, Grendel 's mother attacks the haul or is tab bhi parajeet.
vijayi, biovulf goes ghar to geatland in sweden or baad becomes king of the Geats.
baad a kaal of pachaas years rai passed, biovulf defeats a dragon, lakin is fatally wounded in the battle.
After his death, uske sevakon bury use in a tumulus, a burial mound, in geatland.
shem Ham and japheth by James Tissot 1904.
shem ( ; sēm ; Arabic : sām ; Ge'ez : ሴም, sēm ; `` renown ; samruddhi ; name '' ) thi ek of the bete of nuh in the yahudee bible as well as in islamic sahitya.
He is sabase popularly regarded as the jyeshtha bete, though kuch paramparaon lihaaz use as the duusari bete.
utpatti 10:21 refers to saapeksh aayu of Shem or his brother japheth, lakin saath sufficient ambiguity to have yielded alag anuwaad.
the shloke is anudit in the kjv as `` unto Shem bhi, the pita of all the children of eber, the bhai of Japheth the elder, bhi to him were children born. ``.
However, the nai amareeki maanak Bible gives, `` bhi to Shem, the father of sab the children of eber, or the puraani bhai of japheth, children were born. ''
utpatti 11:10 record that shem was still 100 saalo boodha at the janam of arphaxad, ( lakin nearly 101 - dekhie Chronology note, ) two saalo baad the flood, making use barely 99 at the samay the baadh began ; and ki he jiya for another 500 saalo baad this, making his aayu at death 600 saalo.
the children of shem were Elam, asshur, arphaxad, lud, and Aram, in addition to betiyaan.
abraham, the patriarch of the hebrews or arabs, was one of the vanshajon of arphaxad.
islamic sahitya describes Shem as ek of the believing sons of nuh.
kuch strot bhi pahachaano shem as a nabi in uske own sahi or that he thi the next nabi after uske pita.
in ek muslim legend, shem thi one of the logon ki parameshwar bana Jesus uthayega as a chihn to the children of israel.
the 1st century historian flavius josephus, among many anya, recounted the parampara that these paanch bete yahood the progenitors of the raashtra of ilam, Assyria, chaldea, ledia, and Syria, respectively.
Semitic is still a commonly prayukt pad liye the samiti languages, as a upasamucchy of the afro-asiatic languages, denoting the aam bhashaai viraasat of arabi, aramaic, akkadi, ethiopic, Hebrew and phonishian languages.
According to kuch yahudee paramparaon ( e.g., B. Talmud nedarim 32b ; utpatti Rabbah 46:7 ; utpatti rabbah 56:10 ; leviticus rabbah 25:6 ; sankhyaayein Rabbah 4:8. ), shem is believed to have maharoom melchizedek, king of salem whom abraham is ankit to have met baad the battle of the four kings.
In a few of the anek extra-biblical sources that describe use, Shem is also credited saath killing nimrod, bete of cush.
Shem is ullekith in Genesis 5:32, 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; bhi in 1 chronicals 1:4.

it is the sixth smallest swadesh in europea, having an area of or an anumaanit janasankhyikee of 85,000 in 2012.
Its capital, andora la vela, is the ucchtam capital nagar in Europe, at an elevation of above samudr str.

it is not a member of the European sangh, lakin the european is the de facto karency.

A London-based `` consulting detective '' jinaki abilities kinaaraa on the fantastic, holmes is prasiddh for uske kutil logical tark, his ability to apnaanaa lagbhag any bhes, and uske upyog of forensic vigyaan skills to solve mushkil cases.

the sanyukt rajya House of Representatives is one of the do houses of the United States congress ( a bicameral vidhanmandal ).
it is aksar referred to as the house.
the anya house is the seenet.
the sangyojan and shaktiyaan of the house hai established in aalekh One of the United rajya Constitution.
the pramukh power of the house is to pass sangheey vidhaan that affects the entire desh although iske bills jarur bhi be passed by the Senate or further sahamat to by the u.S. President before becoming vidhi ( unless both the house or seenet re-pass the vidhaan saath a two-thirds majority in prayek kaksh ).
the house rai several exclusive shaktiyaan : the shakti to initiate aay bills, to impeach officials, or to elect the u.S. President in maamla vahin is no bahumat in the Electoral College.
prayek u.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to iske janasankhyikee lakin is hakdaar to at tanik ek representative.
the sabase populous rajya, california, philhal rai 53 pratinidhi.
The kul kramank of voting pratinidhi is phixd by law at 435.

Kennywood is an manoranjan park located in west mifflin, pencilvenia, a upnagareey of pittsburg.
the park pehla opened in 1898 as a `` trolley park '' aakarshan at the samaapt of the mellon family 's monongahela Street rail.
The park thi purchased in 1906 by F. W. Henninger or andrew mcswigan or yun began the Kennywood entertainment company that rai remained a closely yojit family kaarobaar liye over 100 saalo.
is paramparaagat amusement park still rai structures or rides dating waapas to its kholane or the early 1900s.

Parque reunidos is in turn a subsidiary of candover nivesh, an nivesh nidhi based in the uk.
A soshal Security card issued by the railroad Retirement Board in 1943 to a now deceased person.
in the sanyukt States, a soshal suraksha kramank ( ssn ) is a nine-digit kramank jari to u.S. nagarikon, permanent nivaasiyon, and asthai ( working ) nivaasiyon under khand 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the Social Security adhinium, codified as.
The number is issued to an vyaktigat by the soshal Security prashasan, an swatantra agency of the United States sarkari.
iske primary purpose is to track individuals liye Social suraksha uddeshy.
a soshal suraksha kramank may be praapt by applying on Form SS-5, `` Application for a soshal Security Number card ''.
Minimalism describes movements in vibhinn form of art and dizine, especially vizual art or music, jahaan the kaary is niyat out to expose the essence or pahchaan of a vishay through eliminating all non-essential form, features or avadharanaon.
Minimalism is koi design or style in jisase the saralatam or fewest tatv are used to banaaen the maximum prabhaav.
as a specific movement in the arts it is identified saath developments in post–world War ii pashchimi art, sabase strongly with American vizual kala in the 1960s or early 1970s.
prominent artists sambhddha saath this movement shaamil donald judd, John McCracken, agnes martin, don flavin, robert morris, Anne truitt, and Frank stela.
It is rooted in the reductive pahaluon of modernism, or is praayah interpreted as a pratikriya viruddh amoort abhivyanjanawad and a sethu to postminimal art practices.
the sharten have expanded to encompass a gati in music jisase suvidhaayen repetition or iteration, as in the rachanaaen of La monte yang, terry Riley, steve reich, philip kaanch, and jon adams.
alpatam rachanaaen hai sometimes gyaat as systems music.
the term `` alpatam '' is often lagu colloquially to designate anything ki is atirikt or stripped to iske anivaary.
it rai also maharoom used to describe the plays and novels of Samuel beckett, the films of robert Bresson, the stories of remand carver, or bhi the automobile dizin of colin Chapman.
the shabd thi pehla prayukt in English in the early 20th sadi to describe the mensheviks.
In rasayan and bhautikee, dalton 's law ( bhi pukaara dalton 's law of aanshik pressures ) rajya that the kul pressure exerted by the mishran of non-reactive gaison is baraabar to the yoga of the aanshik pressures of vyaktigat gases.
is empirical vidhi thi observed by John dalton in 1801 and is related to the adarsh gas laws.
mathematically, the dabaav of a mishran of gases can be defined as the sankalan
or
jahaan represent the aanshik dabaav of prayek ghatak.
It is assumed ki the gaison do nahin react with prayek other
jahaan is the mole fraction of the i-th ghatak in the kul mishran of n components.
The sambandh neeche provides a rasta to determine the awaz aadhaarit visheshgyata of any individual gasiy ghatak
where is the visheshgyata of the i-th ghatak expressed in ppm.
dalton 's vidhi is nahin exactly followed by real gaison.
those deviations hai considerably vishaal at unchi pressures.
in such sharten, the awaz occupied by the molecules can become significant compared to the free spes between unhen.
in particular, the choti ausat dooriyaan between anuon uthaata the tivrata of intermolecular shaktiyaan between gas anuon enough to substantially badalen the dabaav exerted by them.
neither of those effects hai mana by the adarsh gas model.
is is a suchi of the largest sanyukt rajya collejon or universities by enrollment liye collejon or vishvavidhyalayon in the sanyukt rajya.
What this suchi includes:
Colleges or vishvavidhyalayon bheetar the sanyukt States
vishvavidhyalayon pranaaliyon if the pranali is run antargat a single prashasan
Enrollment is the sum of the headcount of undergraduate and graduate students
namakan is gine by the ekikrut post-secondary shiksha pranali within the U.S. Department of Education.
namakan is the 12-month unduplicated headcount, indicating the kramank of unique vidhyaarthee jo attended the vishvavidhyalayon during the saal.
kayaa this suchi does not include:
Any indication of kaisaa anek of the enrolled vidhyaarthee hai puraa or bhaag samay ( e.g., some vishvavidhyalayon may have a unchi namakan, lakin have sabase students enrolled in tabhi a single class )
For anya suchiyaan that measure vishvavidhyalayon namakan, dekhie the dekhie Also khand neeche.
`` sahi golakaar '' is a song performed by American rapper Flo rida, released as the sise single isse uske duusari studio album, r.o.o.t.s. ( 2009 ).
the song features atithi vocals isse kesha.
it thi released to radio on 27 January 2009 or thi digitaly released on 10 February by po ladke Entertainment and atlantic record.

according to one of the song 's writers, the kores refers to maukhik sex.

the mukhya Justice of the United rajya is the head of the United rajya sangheey adaalat pranali ( the nyaayik shakha of the sangheey sarkari of the sanyukt rajya ) and the mukhya judge of the param Court of the sanyukt rajya.
The Chief Justice is ek of nau Supreme adaalat justices ; the other eight hai the Associate Justices of the param adaalat of the sanyukt rajya.
isse 1789 jabatak 1866, the daftar thi gyaat as the Chief Justice of the param Court.
The mukhya Justice is the highest nyaayik adhikari in the country, and acts as a chief administrative officer liye the sangheey courts or as head of the nyaayik sammelan of the sanyukt rajya appoints the nideshak of the prashasnic daftar of the sanyukt States Courts.
the mukhya Justice bhi serves as a pravaktaa liye the nyaayik shakha.
the Chief insaaf lead the kaarobaar of the param Court.
he presides over maukhik vitark pehle the adaalat.
jab the adaalat renders an opinion, the Chief justice—when in the majority—decides who writes the adaalat 's raay.
the Chief Justice bhi rai significant agenda-setting shakti over the court 's meetings.
in the maamla of an mahabhiyog of a President of the United rajya, which has occurred twice, the mukhya insaaf presides over the trial in the Senate.
in modern parampara, the mukhya insaaf has the ceremonial duty of administering the shapath of daftar of the President of the sanyukt States.
the first Chief Justice thi jon jay.
The 17th and vartmaan mukhya insaaf is jon G. Roberts, jr.

prudhoe Bay aayal Field is a vishaal aayal field on Alaska 's uttar dhalaan.
it is the largest oil field in dono the United States or in uttar america, covering or originally containing lagbhag of aayal.
the raashi of recoverable oil in the field is adhik than double ki of the aglaa largest field in the sanyukt States, the east Texas aayal field.
the field is sanchalit by bp ; saajhedaar are exxonmobil and conocophillips alaska.
majdoor unions hai legally recognized as pratinidhi of workers in many udyog in the sanyukt States.
Their kaaryaklap aaj centers on collective bargaining over wages, laabh, or working sharten liye unke sadsyta, and on representing their members in vivaadon with prabandhan over ulalanghanon of anubandh praavdhaanon.
larger sangh bhi typically engage in lobbying kriyaayein and electioneering at the rajya and sangheey level.
sabase sangh in america hai lakeer saath one of do larger chhatariyaan sanghathan : the AFL-CIO created in 1955, or the badalen to jeet sangh jisase vibhajit from the AFL-CIO in 2005.
dono advocate nitiyon or legislation on behalf of majdoor in the sanyukt States or Canada, or lo an kriyasheel bhoomika in raajnneeti.
the afl-cio is visheshkar concerned saath vaishvik vyapaar mudde.
in 2010, the pratishat of majdoor belonging to a sangh in the United rajya ( or kul majdoor sangh `` density '' ) was 11.4 %, compared to 18.4 % in germany, 27.5 % in Canada, or 70 % in Finland.
sangh membership in the private sector has gire antargat 7 % — str nahin dekhi chunki 1932.
sangh allege ki employer-incited vipaksh rai contributed to this manaahi in sadsyta.
the sabase prominent unions hai among public sector karmchaaree aise as shikshak or police.
sadasyon of unions hai disproportionately puraani, male or nivaasiyon of the purvottar, the midwest, and California.
sangh workers ausat 10-30 % ucchtar pay than non-union in America after controlling liye individual, job, or majdoor market visheshtaayen.
Although much smaller compared to unke shikhar membership in the 1950s, amareeki unions remain a prominent political factor, dono through mobilization of unke own sadsytaayen or through coalitions saath like-minded activist sanghathan around mudde such as apravasi adhikaron, vyapaar niti, swasthya care, or jeena wage abhiyaan.
To lado alleged employer anti-union kaarykram, unions hai philhal vakaalat nai `` card jaanch `` sangheey vidhaan ki would aavashyaktaa niyokta to saudebaaji saath a sangh if more than 50 % of majdoor hastakshrit forms, or `` taash, '' stating ve wish to be represented by ki sangh.
the vartmaan kaarividhi involves pratiksharat 45 to 90 days liye a federally paryvekshit secret-ballot karmchaaree referendum on the vishay.
the arthshaastri joseph Stiglitz rai asserted ki, `` damdaar unions have helped to reduce asamanta, whereas weaker sangh have made it easier for ceos, sometimes working saath market forces ki they have helped aakaar, to badhayen it. ''
the manaahi in unionization chunki wwii in the sanyukt States rai maharoom sambhddha with a sunaaya vruddhi in aay and maal asamanta.
A isai lacroix faishan boutique
A boutique is a small kharidari outlet, especially ek that specializes in elite or fashionable vasteen aise as kapadey or aabhushan.
the shabd is French liye `` duukaan '', via latin from unani ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ), `` storehouse ''.
the pad daalaa into roj angrezi upyog in the late 1960s jab, liye a brief period, landan thi the kendra of the faishan trade.
carnaby gali or the kings Road yahood the fokas of much media dhyaan as home to the sabase fashneble boutiques of the era.
abhi the east of landan has maharoom regenerated or adhik Boutiques pop up in fashneble kshetron, aise as Tower Bridge sadak.
it can bhi refer to a specialised kad such as a boutique nivesh bank or boutique law kad.
the word is often used to describe a property in the independent section of the hotel market ( such as the rockwell in London ) in anukram to distinguish themselves isse larger zanjeeron ( aise as hilton Hotels ).
In aise cases the establishments uddeshy to convey the vichaar that the operation is elite or highly specialised.
in the strictest sense of the shabd, boutiques hota be one-of-a-kind lakin adhik generally bolnaa, some zanjeeron can be referred to as boutiques if they specialize in particular sheliyaan.
recently, the pad `` boutique '' rai prarambh being lagu to normally-mass-market vasteen ki hai either niche or utpaadit in intentionally choti sankhyaayein at very high prices.
is may be referred to as boutique nirmaan.
liye udhaaharan, pehle the relies of the Wii, a Time patrika aalekh sujhaayaa that nintendo could become a `` boutique video-game company '', producing khel liye niche audiyans, balki than trying to compete directly saath microsoft or Sony.

the swiss company upyog a atyadhik flexible boutique nirmaan sait, jisase allows producing small shrenee or even adwitiya timepieces.

manastaap ( isse the Greek ψυχή `` psyche '', liye mind/soul, or -ωσις `` -oesaius '', liye asaamaanya condishan or derangement ) refers to an asaamaanya condishan of the dimag, or is a generik manorog pad liye a dimagi rajya often varnit as involving a `` ghaataa of sampark saath vaastaviktaa ``.
logon ksht from manastaap hai varnit as psychotic.
Psychosis is die to the adhik kathor form of manorog vikaar, dauraan jisase hallucinations or delusions, sakal uttejnaa or stupor or impaired insite may occur.
The term `` psychosis '' is bahut broad or can ausat anything from apekshaakrit saamaanya aberrant anubhavon through to the jatil and catatonic expressions of schizophrenia and dwidhruvi type 1 vikaar.
moreover a wide variety of central baichaiyn pranali diseases, from dono external substances or aatanrik physiologic beemaari, can upaj lakshan of manastaap.
is led anek professionals to kah ki manastaap is nahin vishisht paryaapt as a diagnostic pad.
despite is, `` manastaap '' is generally given to noticeable deficits in saamaanya bartaav ( rinatmak lakshan ) or adhik commonly to vividh prakaar of hallucinations or delusional manyataon ( e.g. grandiosity, delusions of persecution ).
Someone exhibiting bahut obvious lakshan may be varnit as `` frankly psychotic '', whereas ek exhibiting bahut halkaa lakshan could be vargeekrut in the category of an `` attenuated psychotic risk syndrome ''.
an excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the dhanatmak lakshan of manastaap, especially those of schizophrenia.
is is vichaar to occur through a mechanism of aberrant salience of environmental stimuli.
anek antipsychotic davaayen tadnusaar nishaanaa the dopamine pranali ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled trial of ye davaayen, however, dikhaaen either no significant antar between drug and placebo, or a bahut choti prabhaav aakaar, suggesting that the pathophysiology of psychosis is much more jatil than an overactive dopamine pranali.
logon experiencing psychosis may pradarshnee some vyaktitv changes or vichaar vikaar.
depending on iske gambhirtha, this may be accompanied by asaamaanya or bizarre bartaav, as khub as pareshaani saath social baatcheet or impairment in carrying out rose jivan kriyaayein.

A punaravarti antagonist, he is the param commander of the confederacy of swatantra pranaaliyon, a rajnatik gut of grahiy pranaaliyon waging yuddh on the gangey ganatantr.

uese annual real GDP isse 1910–60, saath the saalo of the great avsaad ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
the unemployment rate in the us 1910–1960, with the saalo of the Great avsaad ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
the Great avsaad was a severe vishwavyaapee aarthik avsaad in the dashak preceding World War II.
the timing of the Great Depression varied aarpaar nations, lakin in sabase deshon it started in 1930 and lasted jabatak the late 1930s or madhya 1940s.
it thi the longest, sabase faili, or deepest avsaad of the 20th sadi.
in the 21st sadi, the Great Depression is commonly prayukt as an udhaaharan of kaisaa far the sansar 's arthvyavastha can decline.
the depression originated in the U.S., baad the patan in bhandar prices ki began around sitambar 4, 1929, or became worldwide news saath the bhandar market krash of aktubar 29, 1929 ( gyaat as Black Tuesday ).
The great avsaad tha devastating prabhaav in deshon rich or poor.
nijee income, tax revenue, profits or keemten dropped, jabaki international vyapaar plunged by more than 50 %.
berogari in the u.S. rose to 25 %, and in kuch deshon rose as high as 33 %.
Cities all around the sansar were hit hard, especially those dependent on baari udyog.
nirmaan thi vastutah halted in anek countries.
Farming and gramin areas suffered as crop keemten fell by lagbhag 60 %.
Facing plummeting maang saath few vaikalpik sources of kaary, kshetron nirbhar on praathmik sector udyog aise as nakadi cropping, khanan or logging suffered the most.
kuch economies prarambh to ricover by the mid-1930s.
in many countries, the rinatmak effects of the great avsaad lasted jabatak the samaapt of World yuddh ii.
a asamyik ventricular sankuchan ( PVC ), also gyaat as a asamyik ventricular jatil, ventricular asamyik sankuchan ( or jatil or complexes ) ( vpc ), ventricular asamyik beat ( VPB ), or ventricular extrasystole ( ves ), is a apekshaakrit aam event where the dhadkan is initiated by purkinje machhlee in the ventricles balki than by the sinoatrial node, the saamaanya dhadkan initiator.
the electrical events of the heart detected by the electrocardiogram allow a pivisi to be easily vishisht isse a saamaanya dil taal.
a pivisi may be abhas as a `` skipped taal `` or laga as palpitations in the chaati.
in a saamaanya heartbeat, the ventricles anubandh after the atria have helped to bharan unhen by contracting ; in is rasta the ventricles can pump a maximized amount of blood both to the lungs and to the baaki of the deh.
in a pivisi, the ventricles anubandh pehla and pehle the atria have optimally filled the ventricles with rakt, jisase arthath that parisancharan is akushal.
However, single taal pivisi arrhythmias do not praayah pos a khatre or can be asymptomatic in healthy individuals.

the anti-counterfeiting vyapaar anubandh ( acta ), is a bahurashtriya sandhi liye the purpose of establishing antarrashtriya maanakon liye intellectual property adhikaron enforcement.
the anubandh aims to sthapit an international vidhik framework liye lakshyikaran nakli goods, generik medicines and kapirite infringement on the antarjaal, or hota banaaen a new governing deh baahar maujuuda forums, such as the sansar vyapaar Organization, the sansar bauddhik Property sanghathan, or the sanyukt raashtra.
the anubandh thi hastakshrit in aktubar 2011 by australia, Canada, japani, morocco, nai jiland, singapore, dakshin korian, and the United States.
in 2012, mexico, the europea sangh or 22 deshon jisase are sadsy rajya of the European sangh hastakshrit as khub.
ek signatory ( Japan ) has ratified ( formally sweekrut ) the anubandh, jisase hota aaiye into force in countries ki ratified it after anusamarthan by chah countries.
samarthak have described the agreement as a jawaab to `` the badhayen in vaishvik vyapaar of nakli goods or pirated kapirite surakshit works ''.
trade sangh representing majdoor in the music, filmi or tv udyog or large intellectual property-based sanghathan aise as the gati Picture sangh of america or pharmaceutical shodh or Manufacturers of america yahood kriyasheel in the treaty 's vikaas.
pratidwandviyon kah the convention adversely affects aadharbhoot adhikaron sahit freedom of expression or privacy.
acta has also maharoom criticised by doctor bagaiyr Borders liye endangering access to medicines in developing deshon.
the secret nature of negotiations rai excluded civil society samooh, vikasshil deshon and the saamaanya public isse the agreement 's negotiation prakram or it rai maharoom described as policy laundering by aalochakon including the electronic Frontier Foundation or the entertainment Consumers sangh.
The signature of the EU or many of iske sadsy rajya resulted in the istipha in virodh of the europea Parliament 's niyukt mukhya anveshak, rapporteur kadar aarif, as well as faili protests aarpaar europea.
in 2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur, angrejon MEP daud martin, anushansit viruddh the sandhi, stating : `` the intended laabh of this international agreement hai dur outweighed by the potential khatre to civil liberties ''.
On 4 July 2012, the European Parliament asweekrut the anubandh in plenary satr, with 478 matdaan viruddh the treaty, 39 in favour or 165 MEPs abstaining.
faw semi-trailer trek in china
Tractor saath paksh damp trailor semi-trailer
a tractor saath an auto-transport semi-trailer.
semi-trailer trek saath sleeper peeche the taxi.
A semi-trailer trek is an articulated vehicle ki consists of a towing engine, gyaat as a tractor in the sanyukt States and trek in anek anya sthaan, sanlagn to one or adhik semi-trailers to carry haada.
It is also gyaat as a hastantaran in Canada, pradhan mover in australia, semi, tractor-trailer, trek or trailor, transfer truck, 18-wheeler, mack trek, big rig in the sanyukt States, or artic, short liye articulated lari, in britain and ireland.
a semi-trailer karata nahin trail completely peeche the towing gadee, lakin is sanlagn at a point ki is bas forward of the rear-most axle of the towing unit.
is is kiya so ki a bhinn of the vazan of the trailer is carried by the pradhan mover.
This arrangement arthath ki dono tractor and semi-trailer hoga have a distinctly different design than a rigid trek or trailor.
The Pittsburgh Steelers hai a professional footbaal toli aadhaarit in pittsburg, Pennsylvania.
the team philhal belongs to the North prabhag of the American footbaal Conference ( AFC ) in the National Football lig ( enegel ).
santhaapit in, the stilers hai the oldest matadhikaar in the AFC.
Pittsburgh has won more super Bowl sheershak ( chah ), won adhik afc championships khel ( eight ) or played in ( pandrah ) or hosted adhik ( eleven ) sammelan championship khel than koi anya afc or nfc toli.
the stilers share the ricard liye most Super katori appearances saath the dalas cowboys ( aath ).
The stilers won unke most recent championships, super katori xliii, on February 1, 2009.
the stilers yahood santhaapit as the Pittsburgh pirates on July 8, 1933, by art runi, taking iske asli naam from the besabaal team of the vahi naam, as was common practice liye enegel tiimon to do at the time.
the ownership of the stilers has remained within the Rooney family since iske founding.
the vartmaan maalik is art 's bete, don Rooney, jo rai die much control of the franchise to uske son art Rooney II.
long ek of the enegel 's flagship tiimon, the stilers anand a vishaal, faili fanbase nicknamed steeler Nation.
the stilers philhal khel unke ghar khel at Heinz field on pittsburg 's North paksh in the uttar Shore neighborhood, jisase also host the vishvavidhyalayon of pittsburg panthars.
Built in 2001, the stadium replaced teen nadiyaan stadium jisase hosted the Steelers liye 31 seasons.
Prior to teen nadiyaan, the stilers had played unke games in Pitt Stadium and forbs field.
teen different kinds of wheat or rye flour
Flour is a churna jisase is bana by grinding khadyann dane, or anya beej or jaden ( like kasaava ).
it is the pramukh sanghatak of bread, which is a staple khaanaa liye anek samskritiyon, bananaa the availability of paryaapt aapurtiyan of flour a pramukh aarthik or rajnatik samasya at various times throughout itihaas.
gehun aataa is one of the most mahatvapurn bhojan in europea, North amareeki, madhya purvi, bhartiya or uttar African samskritiyon, or is the defining sanghatak in sabase of their sheliyaan of breads or pastries.
jabaki gehun is the sabase aam aadhaar liye flour, corn aataa has maharoom important in mesoamerican bhojan chunki pracheen times, and remains a staple throughout the americas.
Rye aataa is an mahatvapurn constituent of bread in much of central europea, or rice can bhi be prayukt in aataa, though is is apekshaakrit uncommon.
dil rate is the kramank of heartbeats prati ikai of time, typically expressed as beats prati minute ( bpm ).
dil rate can vary as the body 's need to avashoshit oxigen or excrete carbon dioxide changes, such as during shaareerik exercise, neend, beemaari, or as a result of ingesting davaayen :
Central baichaiyn pranali stimulants aise as amphetamines badhayen dil rate.
Central nervous pranali depressants or sedatives decreases the heart rate ( alaava isse kuch particularly ajeeb ones saath equally ajeeb effects, aise as ketamine which can kaaran - amongst anek other things - stimulant-like prabhaav aise as tachycardia ).
There hai anek tareeke in jisase the dil rate speeds up or slows down.
sabase involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormone hone released in the brain, anek of which are those ki hai 'forced'/'enticed ' out by the ingestion or processing of davaayen.
due to individuals having a nirantar rakt awaz, one of the physiological tareeke to uddhaar more oxigen to an organ is to badhayen dil rate to permit rakt to pass by the ang adhik praayah.
saamaanya resting heart rates dayera isse 60-100 bpm.
mandanaadi is paribhaashit as a resting heart rate below 60 bpm.
However, dil daron from 50 to 60 bpm hai aam among swasth logon or do nahin necessarily aavashyaktaa khaas dhyaan.
Tachycardia is paribhaashit as a resting heart rate upar 100 bpm, haalanki persistent rest daron between 80-100 bpm, mukhyatah if ve are present dauraan neend, may be lakshan of hyperthyroidism or anemia ( dekhie neeche ).

a carriage is a wheeled gadee liye logon, praayah horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) or sedan chairs hai excluded, since ve are wheelless vehicles.
The carriage is visheshkar designed liye nijee yatri upyog or for sukun or elegance, haalanki kuch hai also prayukt to transport goods.
It may be lite, smart or tej or baari, vishaal and comfortable.
carriages saamanytah have barkhaastagi using patta sroton, andakaar springs ( in the 19th sadi ) or leather strapping.
a public passenger gadee would nahin praayah be pukaara a carriage – terms for aise shaamil stagecoach, charabanc or omnibus.
working vaahanon such as the ( four-wheeled ) wagon or ( two-wheeled ) cart share mahatvapurn bhaag of the history of the carriage, as is the fast ( two-wheeled ) rath.
the 2004 bhartiya samandar bukamp thi an undersea megathrust bukamp that occurred at 00:58:53 utc on sande, 26 December 2004, saath an epicentre band the west coast of sumatra, indonesia.
the quake itself is gyaat by the vaigyanik jatiyaan as the sumatra–andaman bukamp.
the resulting tsunami was die vibhinn names, sahit the 2004 bhartiya samandar tsunami, dakshin Asian tsunami, Indonesian tsunami, or the mukkebaazi din tsunami.
the bukamp was caused by subduction and triggered a shrenee of vinaashkari tsunamis along the coasts of sabase landmasses bordering the Indian samandar, hatya over 230,000 logon in chaudaa deshon, and inundating coastal samudaayon with lehren up to unchi.
it thi ek of the deadliest prakritik aapadaaon in recorded itihaas.
indonesia was the hardest-hit desh, followed by shri lanka, India, or thailand.
saath a magnitude of mw 9.1–9.3, it is the teesraa largest earthquake ever ankit on a seismograph.
the earthquake tha the longest duration of faulting kabhi observed, between 8.3 or 10 minutes.
It caused the sampurna grah to hilanaa as much as or triggered other bukamp as dur dur as alaska.
Its epicentre thi between simeulue and menland indonesia.
the durdasha of the prabhavit logon or deshon prompted a vishwavyaapee humanitarian jawaab.
In sab, the vishwavyaapee community daan adhik than $ 14 arab ( 2004 US $ ) in humanitarian sahaayta.
bhaap uthati from the nesjavellir geothermal shakti stesan in Iceland.
geothermal urja is thermal urja generated or stored in the Earth.
thermal urja is the urja ki determines the taapmaana of padaarth.
The geothermal energy of the dharti 's crust originates from the asli gathan of the grah ( 20 % ) or isse radioactive kshay of khanij ( 80 % ).
the geothermal anupaat, which is the antar in taapmaana between the kor of the grah and iske sataha, drive a continuous conduction of thermal urja in the rup of heat isse the kor to the sataha.
the kriyasheel geothermal originates isse the unani jaden γη ( ge ), meaning dharti, and θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
at the kor of the dharti, thermal urja is nirmit by radioskriy kshay and temperatures may pahunchein over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
ooshmaa conducts from the core to surrounding cooler chattan.
the unchi temperature or dabaav cause kuch chattan to melt, creating magma sanvahan upward since it is halkaa than the thos chattan.
the megma heats chattan or jal in the crust, sometimes up to 370 °c ( 700 °F ).
isse hot springs, geothermal energy rai maharoom prayukt liye snaan since Paleolithic times or liye spes heating since pracheen roman times, lakin it is abhi better gyaat liye vidyut peedhee.
vishwavyaapee, about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal power is online in 24 countries.
an atirikt 28 gigawatts of sidhaa geothermal heating kshamta is santhaapit liye zila heating, spes heating, spa, audyogic prakriyaaon, desalination and agricultural applications.
geothermal power is laagat prabhavi, vishwasaneey, chirsthayee, or environmentally friendly, lakin rai historically maharoom simit to kshetron near tectonic thali boundaries.
haal technological advances have dramatically vistaarit the dayera and aakaar of viable sansaadhan, especially liye anuprayog such as ghar heating, kholane a potential for faili shoshan.
geothermal kuen relies greenhouse gases funs gahan within the dharti, but ye emissions hai much nimnatar prati energy ikai than those of chattan fuels.
As a result, geothermal shakti has the sambhavit to sahaayta mitigate global varming if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels.
the dharti 's geothermal sansaadhan hai theoretically adhik than adequate to supply maanavtaa 's urja needs, lakin only a very choti bhinn may be profitably exploited.
Drilling and khoji for gahan resources is bahut mahangi.
forecasts for the bhavishya of geothermal shakti nirbhar on assumptions parichay praudyogiki, energy prices, subsidies, or interest daron.
payalat kaarykram jaise eweb 's graahak opt in Green Power Program dikhaaen ki customers hota be willing to adaa a choti adhik liye a bedardi energy source jaise geothermal.
lakin as a result of sarkari assisted shodh or udyog anubhav, the cost of generating geothermal power rai decreased by 25 % over the past do decades.
In 2001, geothermal urja cost between do and ten cents prati sampaat.
the pad cubic pair is an Imperial and us prathagat ( non- metric ) unit of awaz, prayukt in the United rajya and the sanyukt kingdom.
it is defined as the awaz of a cube saath pahalu of ek pair ( 0.3048 m ) in lambaai.
to gananaa cubic feet multiply lambaai X chaudai X height.
Hồ Chí minh ( uttari vietnami uccharan :, dakshini vietnami uccharan : ) ; 19 may 1890 – 2 September 1969 ), born nguyễn sinh cung or also known as Nguyễn tất thành or nguyễn ái Quốc, thi a vietnami communist krantikari netaa jo thi pradhan mantri ( 1945–1955 ) or adhyaksh ( 1945–1969 ) of the Democratic ganatantr of Vietnam ( uttar vietnam ).
he was a kunjee figure in the nyaas of the loktantric Republic of vietnam in 1945, as khub as the people’s Army of Vietnam ( pavn ) or the việt cộng ( nlf or VC ) dauraan the Vietnam yuddh.
he led the việt minh swatantraaa movement from 1941 onward, establishing the communist -niyamand Democratic ganatantr of vietnam in 1945 or defeating the French sangh in 1954 at the battle of Điện biên Phủ.
he officially stepped bas from shakti in 1955 due to swasthya problems, lakin remained a atyadhik drishy figurehead or inspiration for those vietnami lard liye uske cause—a united, communist Vietnam—until uske maut.
After the war, sigon, puunji of the ganatantr of vietnam, thi renamed hồ Chí minh nagar.

nirdeshit by denis fallon, it sitaron peter Boyle, Patton oswalt, Jason landan, vivien Cardone, venesa shakha, peter kyoti, stephen milton, or allan Kayser.

bikri taxes in the sanyukt rajya hai kar lagaai on the bikri or patte of goods or sevaayen in the United rajya.
jabaki no national general bikri kar exists, the federal sarkari levies several national selective bikri kar on the bikri or patte of particular goods or sevaayen.
furthermore, forty-five rajya, the District of colombia, or Guam thopane general bikri taxes ki lagu to the bikri or patte of sabase goods and some sevaayen, or states also may levi chaynaatmak bikri kar on the bikri or patte of particular goods or services.
States may also pratinidhi to local governments the authority to thopane additional general or chaynaatmak sales taxes.
Sales kar is gananaa by multiplying the khariden daam by the lagu kar rate.
kar daron vary widely by kshetradhikaar or dayera isse kam than 1 % to over 10 %.
Sales kar is ekatrit by the vikreta at the time of sale.
upyog kar is swah assessed by a buyer who rai nahin sashulk bikri kar on a taxable khariden.
Unlike the maan added kar, a bikri tax is imposed only once, at the khudara str.
however, in maamle jahaan vasteen are bechi at khudara adhik than ekbar, aise as used gaadiyaan, the sales tax can be charge on the vahi mad indefinitely.
The paribhaasha of retail bikri or kayaa goods or sevaayen hai taxable vary among the rajya.
nearly sab jurisdictions provide numerous shrenee of goods or sevaayen ki hai exempt isse bikri kar, or taxed at reduced daron.
the khariden of goods liye further manufacture or liye punarvikray is uniformly exempt isse sales kar.
Most jurisdictions exempt khaanaa bechi in kiraanaa stores, nuskhaa medications, and anek agricultural supplies.
bikri taxes, sahit those imposed by local sarkarein, hai generally administered at the state level.
States imposing bikri tax aavashyaktaa khudara sellers to collect kar isse customers, sanchika returns, and remit the kar to the rajya.
prakriyaatmak niyam vary widely.
vikreta generally jarur collect kar isse in-state purchasers jabatak the kreta provides an exemption praaanpatr.
sabase rajya allow or require electronic remittance.
a central prasanskaran ikai ( CPU ), bhi referred to as a central procesar unit, is the hardware bheetar a computer that carries out the nirdesh of a computer kaarykram by performing the moulik ankaganitiya, logical, or input/output parichaalan of the pranali.
the term rai been in upyog in the computer udyog at tanik chunki the jaldi 1960s.
the form, design, or kriyanvayan of CPUs have badla over the course of their itihaas, but their aadharbhoot aaparishan remains much the vahi.
a computer can have adhik than ek CPU ; is is pukaara multiprocessing.
Some ekikrut circuits ( ics ) can contain anek cpu on a single chip ; those ICs are pukaara multi-core processors.
do theth components of a cpu are the arithmetic logic ikai ( alu ), which performs arithmetic or logical parichaalan, or the control ikai ( cu ), jisase extracts nirdesh from memory or decodes or chalaata unhen, colling on the ALU jab necessary.
nahin sab computesnal pranaaliyon rely on a central prasanskaran ikai.
an sarani procesar or vector procesar rai anek samanaantar computing elements, saath no ek ikai mana the `` bich ''.
in the vitarit computing model, problems hai hal by a vitarit interconnected niyat of processors.
rfid chip next to a anaaj of rice.
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field kundali that modulates an bahya magnetic field to transafar a coded pahchaan kramank jab queried by a reader yantra.
is choti type is incorporated in consumer products, or implanted in pets, liye pahchaan uddeshy.
radio-frequency pahchaan ( RFID ) is the betaar non-contact upyog of radio-frequency electromagnetic field to transafar data, liye the purposes of automatically identifying or trekking tag attached to objects.
the tag contain electronically stored information.
kuch tag hai powered or padhaa at short seemayen ( a few meter ) via magnetic field ( electromagnetic induction ).
anya upyog a local power sorce such as a bydaree, or else have no battery lakin collect energy from the interrogating em field, or tab adhinium as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or uhf radio waves ( i.e., electromagnetic radiation at high barambharataa ).
bydaree sanchalit tag may operate at sainkadon of meter.
Unlike a baar code, the tag does nahin necessarily need to be bheetar lakeer of sight of the reader, or may be antahsthapit in the tracked object.
rfid tag hai prayukt in anek udyog.
An rfid tag sanlagn to an automobile dauraan utpaadan can be prayukt to track its pragati through the assembly lakeer.
davaayen can be tracked through warehouses.
pashudhan or paalatu may have tag injected, allowing dhanatmak pahchaan of the animal.
chunki RFID tag can be attached to clothing, possessions, or bhi implanted bheetar logon, the sambhaavna of padhnaa personally-linked information bagaiyr sahmati rai raised gopneeyata chintaaen.
overtime is the raashi of samay kisi works pare saamaanya working ghanton.
saamaanya ghanton may be sankalpit in several rastants:
by custom ( kayaa is mana healthy or uchit by samaaj ),
by practices of a die vyapaar or profession,
by legislation,
by anubandh between employers and majdoor or their pratinidhi.
sabase nations have overtime majdoor kanoon designed to dissuade or prevent niyokta isse forcing unke employees to work excessively long ghanton.
These kanoon may lo into account anya considerations than the humanitarian, aise as preserving the swasthya of majdoor so that they may continue to be utpaadak, or increasing the overall str of niyukti in the arthvyavastha.
ek common drushtikon to regulating overtime is to aavashyaktaa niyokta to adaa majdoor at a ucchtar hourly rate liye overtime kaary.
Companies may chune to pay majdoor ucchtar overtime adaa even if nahin obliged to do so by vidhi, visheshkar if ve maananaa ki they phase a pichhadaa bending supply vakr of labour.
overtime adaa daron can kaaran majdoor to work longer ghanton than they hota at a chapata hourly rate.
Overtime laws, attitudes toward overtime or ghanton of kaary vary greatly from desh to desh or between alag aarthik sectors.
kalpana of kadi between prishthon on a vik using a force-directed leout.
force-directed aalekh aarekhan algorithms hai a class of algorithms liye aarekhan graphs in an aesthetically pleasing rasta.
unke purpose is to position the nodes of a aalekh in two-dimensional or three-dimensional spes so ki all the edges hai of adhik or kam baraabar lambaai and vahin hai as few crossing kinare as sambhavit, by assigning shaktiyaan among the niyat of kinare or the set of node, based on their saapeksh sthitiyaan, and tab using these forces either to simulate the motion of the kinare or nodes or to minimize unke urja.
While aalekh aarekhan can be a mushkil problem, force-directed algorithms, hone shaareerik simulations, praayah aavashyaktaa no special gyaan parichay graph theory aise as planarity.
khareednaa shakti ( sometimes retroactively called samyojit for mahangaai ) is the amount of goods or sevaayen ki can be kharida with a ikai of karency.
liye udhaaharan, if tum had liya ek dollars to a store in the 1950s, tum hota have maharoom samarth to buy a vrihad kramank of vasteen than you hota aaj, indicating that tum hota have tha a greater khareednaa shakti in the 1950s.
Currency can be either a camodity dhan, jaise sunaharaa or chaandi, or fiat currency, or free-floating market-valued currency jaise us dollar.
as aadam smith noted, having dhan gives one the ability to `` cmand '' anya ' majdoor, so khareednaa power to some extent is shakti over anya logon, to the extent ki ve hai willing to vyapaar their labor or goods liye dhan or karency.
If one 's maudrik income stays the same, lakin the daam str increases, the khareednaa shakti of ki aay jalprapaat.
mahangaai karata not sadaa imply girnaa khareednaa shakti of ek 's dhan aay since it may vruddhi tej than the daam level.
a ucchtar real aay arthath a ucchtar khareednaa power chunki real aay refers to the aay samyojit liye mahangaai.
For a price anukramanika, iske value in the aadhaar saal is praayah samanyikrut to a maan of 100.
The khareednaa shakti of a ikai of karency, kah a dollars, in a die year, expressed in dollars of the aadhaar saal, is 100/p, jahaan P is the price anukramanika in ki year.
So, by paribhaasha the khareednaa power of a dollars decreases as the daam str udai.
