jahaan in is maamla i is an assumed bhavishya salanaa mahangaai rate.
shiksha in dakshin Korea is viewed as hone nirnaayak liye kamyaabi and competition is natijatan very heated and fierce.
A central prashasan oversees the prakram for the shiksha of children isse kindergarton to the teesraa or final year of unchi skool.
Mathematics, vigyaan, korian, angrezi, and soshal adhyayan hai generally considered to be the sabase mahatvapurn vishay.
Normally physical education is not mana mahatvapurn as it is not recognised, by the generally academik elitist dakshin korian populace, as shiksha or therefore many skulon kami high-quality gymnasiums or varsity athletics.
dakshin Korea thi the pehla desh in the world to provide high-speed internet abhigam to sab praathmik, junior, and high skulon.
haalanki dakshin korian vidhyaarthee often rank highly on antarrashtriya tulanaatmak akalan jab compared to students of sabase pashchimi shiksha pranaaliyon, the dakshin korian shiksha system is criticised liye emphasising too much upon passive learning or memorisation.
the dakshin korian shiksha system is balki notably sakht and overly structured as compared to iske counterparts in sabase pashchimi societies.
Also, the vyapaktaa of non-school for-profit nijee santhaan aise as acadamiyon or cram-schools ( Hagwon [ 학원 ] ), jisase too emphasise on passive memorisation, as opposed to conceptual understanding, in students hai criticised as a major soshal problem.
the My lai Massacre (, ;,, or ) thi the Vietnam War mass hatya of between 347 or 504 nihathe nagarikon in South vietnam on kooch 16, 1968, by United rajya fouj sainiko of `` charlie '' Company of 1st batalian, 20th infantry regiment, 11th brigade of the americal prabhag.
peediton included mahilaon, main, children, and infants.
kuch of the women were gang-raped or unke laashen yahood later mila to be mutilated or many mahilaon yahood allegedly raped prior to the hatyaon.
jabaki 26 U.S. sainiko yahood initially charged saath dand offenses liye unke kriyaayein at mỹ Lai, tabhi Second leftinent wiliam calley, a platoon leader in charlie company, thi convicted.
Found guilty of hatya 22 graminon, he thi originally given a life vaakya, lakin only parosa teen and a half years under house giraftaar.
The massacre took place in the hamlets of my lai or my khe of bete my gaanv.
the event is bhi gyaat as the bete my Massacre, especially in the vietnami rajya media.
the u.S. sainya codeword liye the `` viet cong stronghold '' was `` pinkville ''.
the incident prompted vaishvik aakrosh jab it became public gyaan in 1969.
the massacre also increased gharelu vipaksh to the u.S. bhagidaari in the Vietnam War.
teen u.S. servicemen who had aajamaaya to halt the massacre or protect the wounded yahood initially denounced by several u.s. congressiyon as traitors.
ve received nafrat mail and maut threats or mila mutilated pashu on unke doorsteps.
The teen yahood baad widely praised or sajaa by the fouj liye unke vir actions.
the hijackers in the sitambar 11 hamale yahood 19 main sambhddha saath al-qaeda, and 15 of the 19 yahood nagarikon of Saudi arab.
anya were isse Egypt, lebanon, or the UAE.
The hijackers yahood vyavasthit into chaar tiimon, prayek led by a pilot-trained hijacker with chaar `` muscle hijackers '' jo yahood trained to sahaayta subdue the payalton, yatri, or kru.
the pehla hijackers to arrive in the sanyukt rajya were khalid al-mihdhar and nawaf al-hazmi, jo settled in the san diego area in January 2000.
They yahood followed by three hijacker-pilots, Mohamed atta, marwan al-shehhi, or ziad Jarrah early in the summer of 2000 to undertake udaan prashikshan in south Florida.
The fourth hijacker-pilot, hani hanjour, arrived in san Diego in disambar 2000.
The rest of the `` mansapeshi hijackers '' arrived in the spring or jaldi garmiyaan of 2001, just maheene before the sitambar 11 hamale.
abū al-qāsim Muḥammad ebn ʿabd allāh ebn ʿAbd al-muṭṭalib ebn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ), bhi transliterated as mohammad ( ), was a dharmik, rajnatik, or sainya netaa from makka jo ekikrut Arabia into a single dharmik polity antargat Islam.
he is believed by musalmaan or bahá'ís to be a messanger or nabi of parameshwar.
mohammad is lagbhag universally mana by Muslims as the pichhlaa nabi sent by parameshwar liye mankind.
non-muslims lihaaz Muhammad as the sansthaapak of islam.
musalmaan consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered asli monotheistic faith of aadam, nuh, abraham, musa, yishu, or anya nabiyon.
Born in about 570 CE in the arabian nagar of Mecca, he was anaath at an jaldi aayu or brought up antargat the parvaah of uske uncle Abu Talib.
he later worked mostly as a merchant, as khub as a gadriye, and thi first shaadishuda by aayu 25.
hone in the aadat of periodically retreating to a gupha in the surrounding mountains for anek nits of seclusion or prayer, he later reported that it thi vahin, at aayu 40, ki he praapt uske pehla rahasyodghatan from parameshwar.
Three saalo baad this event mohammad prarambh upadesh these khulaase saream, proclaiming ki `` parameshwar is ek ``, that complete `` aatmasamarpan '' to use ( lit.
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) sweekaarya to parameshwar, or ki he khud was a nabi or messanger of parameshwar, in the vahi rag as anya islamic prophets.
mohammad gained few anusarankarta jaldi on, or thi met with hostility isse kuch Meccan janajatiyon ; he or uske followers yahood treated harshly.
to escape persecution, mohammad sent some of his followers to abisinia pehle he or uske followers in Mecca migrated to madina ( tab gyaat as Yathrib ) in the saal 622.
is event, the hijr, marks the shuruuaat of the Islamic panchang, jisase is bhi known as the Hijri panchang.
in madina, Muhammad sanyukt the janajatiyon antargat the samvidhan of madina.
baad eight saalo of lard saath the meccan janajatiyon, uske anusarankarta, who by then tha grown to 10,000, took control of Mecca in the largely shantipurna Conquest of makka.
he destroyed the pagan murtiyon in the nagar or then sent uske anusarankarta out to nasht sab of the baaki pagan mandiron in purvi Arabia.
in 632, a few maheene baad returning to madina isse The Farewell Pilgrimage, mohammad fell biimaar or died.
by the samay of uske death, sabase of the arabian prayadweep tha converted to islam, or he had sanyukt Arabia into a single muslim dharmik polity.
the revelations ( or Ayah, lit.
`` lakshan [ of parameshwar ] '' ) — which mohammad reported receiving jabatak his maut – rup the aayatein of the quran, regarded by musalmaan as the `` Word of parameshwar '' or around jisase the religion is aadhaarit.
besides the quran, mohammad 's life ( sira ) or traditions ( sunnah ) hai bhi upheld by Muslims as the strot of sharia law.
They discuss mohammad or anya nabiyon of islam saath reverence, adding the phrase salaam be upon use whenever unke names hai ullekith.
While conceptions of mohammad in madhyakaalin christendom or premodern times yahood largely rinatmak, appraisals in aadhunik itihaas have been dur kam so.
is is a suchi of teble of the satyapit oldest logon in the world in ordinal rank, such as oldest person or oldest man.
in ye tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim rai maharoom validated by an international body that specifically saude in aayu shodh, aise as the jaraavidya shodh samooh ( grg ) or Guinness sansar record.
The longest unambiguously pralekhith human lifespan is ki of Jeanne Calment of frans ( 1875–1997 ), jo died at aayu 122 saalo, 164 days.
She mili vincent vine gogh when wo thi 12 or 13.
This led to news media dhyaan in 1985, after calment turned 110.
subsequent chaanbin mila dastavezikaran liye calment 's age, pare koi uchit question, in the record of uske deshi nagar, arles, frans.
More evidence of calment 's jeevankaal has maharoom produced than for koi other supercentenarian ; her maamla serves as an archetype in the methodology liye verifying the ages of the world 's oldest logon.
The longest undisputed jeevankaal liye purush supercentenarians is that of jiroemon kimura, jo philhal jeevandaan in Japan or is aayu as of.
chunki the maut of 115-year boodha dina Manfredini of the sanyukt rajya, on 17 disambar 2012, kimura, born 19 April 1897, is the oldest living vyakti in the sansar jinaki aayu can be pralekhith.
he has also been the oldest jeena man chunki the maut of 114-year boodha walter breuning on 14 April 2011.
Since the death of 115-year boodha Koto Okubo of japani on 12 janvari 2013, the oldest living stri has maharoom -year-old misao okawa, bhi isse japani, born on 5 March 1898.
is is a samayrekha of the African-American civil adhikaron gati.
The civil adhikaron movement thi a freedom sangharsh by africa america in the 1950s or 1960s to gain samta.
the goals of the gati yahood freedom isse pakshpaat, baraabar avasar in employment, shiksha or awaas, the sahi to vote or baraabar access to public facilities.
baari metal ( praayah referred to as metal ) is a vidha of rock music ki viksit in the late 1960s or jaldi 1970s, largely in the sanyukt kingdom or in the United States.
saath jaden in bluez chattan or cicedelik chattan, the bands that created baari metal viksit a motaa, vishaal dhwani, characterized by atyadhik amplified distortion, extended guitar solos, emphatic beats, or overall loudness.
Heavy metal lyrics or pradarshan sheliyaan hai generally sambhddha with masculinity and machismo.
the first baari metal bands such as led zeppelin, gahan jamuni or blike sabbath aakarshith vishaal audiyans, though ve were often derided by critics, a status aam throughout the history of the genre.
in the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur the genre 's evolution by discarding much of its bluez influence ; motörhead introduced a pank chattan sensibility or an increasing jor on gati.
bands in the nai wave of angrejon baari Metal aise as aayran maiden followed in a samaan rag.
pehle the samaapt of the decade, heavy metal prashansak became gyaat as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers ``.
During the 1980s, glam metal became a vanijyik force saath samooh like mötley crüe and Poison.
bhumigat scenes utpaadit an sarani of adhik charam, aakraamak sheliyaan : thrash metal broke into the mukhyadhara saath bands aise as metalika, megadeth, Slayer, or anthrex, while other sheliyaan of the sabase extreme subgenres of metal jaise death metal or blike metal remain subcultural phenomena.
chunki the mid-1990s, lokapriy sheliyaan aise as nu metal, jisase often incorporates tatv of grunge or hip hop ; or metalcore, jisase mishranon extreme metal with hardkor pank, have further expanded the paribhaasha of the vidha.
the far-right ( bhi gyaat as the extreme sahi ) refers to the highest oopaadhi of rightism in right-wing raajnneeti.
Far right politics involves support of strong or puraa soshal padanukram in samaaj, or supports sarvocchata of certain individuals or samooh deemed to be innately shreshth or astabalon jo hai to be more valued than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable.
The far sahi 's vakaalat of supremacism is aadhaarit on what iske adherents perceive as swaabhaavik visheshtaayen of people ki can nahin be changed.
This stands as a point of antar saath the centre-right 's aropan of behaviours, such as aalasy or decadence, as the praathmik strot of soshal inequalities.
The kendra right—unlike the dur right—claims that logon can end unke behavioural inferiority through changing unke aadaten and chunaav.
the original dur sahi, jisase ubhara in frans after the french kranti, refused to accept the french ganatantr or samarthit a counter-revolution to restore the french monarchy or aristocracy.
the dur sahi is commonly sambhddha with vyaktiyon or samooh who tham charam rashtravaadi, xenophobic, jatvaad, dharmik fundamentalist or pratikriyaavaadi drishy.
the sabase extreme-right andolanon have pursued daman and narsanhaar viruddh groups of people on the basis of unke kathith inferiority.
thomas hobbes of malmesbury ( 5 April 1588 – 4 disambar 1679 ), in kuch puraani granth thomas habs of malmsbury, thi an angrezi philosopher, behtareen gyaat aaj for his kaary on rajnatik darshanashastra.
uske 1651 book leviathan sthapit the foundation for sabase of pashchimi political philosophy isse the perspective of soshal anubandh siddhanth.
hobbes was a champion of absolutism liye the sovereign, lakin he also viksit kuch of the fundamentals of European liberal thought : the sahi of the vyaktigat ; the natural equality of all main ; the artificial akshar of the rajnatik anukram ( jisase led to the baad bhed between civil samaaj or the rajya ) ; the drishy ki sab legitimate political shakti jarur be `` pratinidhi '' or aadhaarit on the sahmati of the people ; or a liberal nirvachan of law jisase pattey logon free to do whatever the law does not explicitly forbid.
He thi ek of the founders of aadhunik rajnatik darshanashastra.
His samajhnaa of insaano as hone padaarth and gati, obeying the vahi physical kanoon as other matter or motion, remains influential ; and uske account of insaan prakruti as self-interested sahyog, and of political samudaayon as hone aadhaarit upon a `` social anubandh `` remains ek of the pramukh topics of political darshanashastra.
In addition to rajnatik darshanashastra, Hobbes bhi contributed to a vividh sarani of anya fields, including itihaas, geometry, the bhautikee of gaison, dharamshastra, aachaar, or general darshanashastra.
Emotional intelligence ( ei ) is the kshamta to pahachaano, assess, or control the bhav of oneself, of others, or of samooh.
it can be vibhajit into ability EI or trait ei.
kshamta ei is usually measured using maximum pradarshan pareekshan or rai stronger relationships with paramparaagat pragna, whereas trait ei is praayah measured using self-report questionnaires or has stronger relationships saath vyaktitv.
aalochanaon have kendrit on whether ei is a real pragna or whether it rai incremental validity over iq or the big paanch personality traits.
anuvanshikta is the guzar of traits to offspring from iske parents or purvaj.
is is the prakram by jisase an offspring cell or sajiv acquires or becomes predisposed to the visheshtaayen of iske janak koshika or sajiv.
Through anuvanshikta, visangatiyaan exhibited by individuals can accumulate or kaaran kuch prajati to evolve.
the padhai of heredity in biology is pukaara genetics, which shaamil the field of epigenetics.
liye sanyukt States vyaktigat income tax, samyojit sakal aay ( agi ) is kul sakal aay rin vishisht reductions.
Taxable aay is adjusted gross aay rin bhatton for personal chhuton and itemized deductions.
liye sabase individual kar uddeshy, agi is adhik relevant than sakal aay.
sakal aay is sales daam of goods or property, rin cost of the property sold, plus anya aay.
It shaamil mazdooree, byaaj, dividends, kaarobaar income, rental aay, or all anya types of aay.
samyojit sakal aay is sakal aay less deductions isse a kaarobaar or rental kaaryaklap or 21 anya specific vasteen.
anek deductions ( e.g. chikitsa expenses or vividh itemized deductions ) hai limited aadhaarit on a pratishat of agi.
Certain phase outs, sahit those of lower tax daron and itemized deductions, hai aadhaarit on str of agi.
anek rajya aadhaar rajya income tax on AGI saath certain deductions.

a telephone prefix is the pehla niyat of digits of a telephone kramank ; in the uttar American Numbering yojana deshon ( desh code 1 ), it is the pehla three ank of a seven-digit phone kramank.
in anya deshon dono the upsarg or the kramank may have alag lengths.
It shows jisase exange the baaki sankhyaayein refer to.
a puraa telephone kramank is praayah bana up of desh code ( jaruri liye antarrashtriya calls tabhi ), area code ( jaruri liye kals between telephone kshetron ), upsarg, or subscriber number.
kuch places simit nishchit prefixes to fax sankhyaayein or koshika phone tabhi ; in anya places such samarpit prefixes hai not prayukt.
as telephone praudyogiki unnat, the precise significance of the upsarg became dhundhala in anek places ; 485 in landan, uk, thi ekbar the gulliver exange, lakin abhi 44207485xxxx is bas mana ek of many kramank block served by the clken Kentish Town exange ; 4420770703xx is another.
Metformin ( bp, sunaaya, ; originally bechi as glucophage ) is an maukhik antidiabetic drug in the biguanide class.
it is the first-line drug of chunaav for the treatment of prakaar 2 madhumeh, in particular, in overweight or mote logon or those saath saamaanya gurda falan.
iske upyog in gestational madhumeh has maharoom simit by suraksha chintaaen.
it is bhi prayukt in the treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome, or has maharoom investigated liye anya rogon jahaan insulin pratirodh may be an mahatvapurn factor.
metformin works by suppressing glucose utpaadan by the liver.
Metformin is the tabhi antidiabetic drug ki has maharoom conclusively dikhaaya to prevent the cardiovascular jatiltaaon of diabetes.
it helps reduce LDL cholestrol or triglyceride str, and is nahin sambhddha with weight gain.
, metformin is ek of only two oral antidiabetics in the sansar Health sanghathan model suchi of anivaary davaaiyaan ( the anya being glibenclamide ).
When vihit appropriately, metformin causes few pratikul effects ( the sabase aam is jathrantra pareshaan ) or is sambhddha saath a kam risk of hypoglycemia.
lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the rakt ) can be a gambhir chintaa in overdose or jab it is vihit to logon saath contraindications, but varanaa, there is no significant risk.
pehla synthesized or mila to reduce blood sugar in the 1920s, metformin thi forgotten liye the aglaa do dashakon as shodh shifted to insulin or anya antidiabetic drugs.
byaaj in metformin thi rekindled in the let 1940s baad anek reports that it could reduce blood sugar str in logon, or in 1957, french chikitsak jaan Sterne prakashit the first naidanik vichaaran of metformin as a upachaar liye madhumeh.
it was introduced to the sanyukt kingdom in 1958, canada in 1972, or the sanyukt rajya in 1995.
Metformin is abhi believed to be the sabase widely vihit antidiabetic drug in the sansar ; in the sanyukt rajya alone, adhik than 48 lakh prescriptions were bhar in 2010 for iske generik formulations.
the Mount rushmore neshnal memorial is a murtikla carved into the grenite face of mount Rushmore nikat Keystone, dakshin dakota, in the sanyukt rajya.
sculpted by danish-american Gutzon borglum or uske bete, Lincoln borglum, mount Rushmore suvidhaayen sculptures of the heads of four sanyukt States presidents : george Washington, Thomas jeffrasan, Theodore rujvelt and Abraham lincoln.
the sampurna memorial cover or is upar samudr str.
the tallest pahaad in the pradesh is harney shikhar ( ).
dakshin dakota itihaaskaar Doane robinsan is credited saath conceiving the idea of carving the likenesses of prasiddh logon into the Black pahadiyaan region of dakshin dakota in anukram to prachaar tourism in the pradesh.
robinsan 's aarambhik vichaar was to sculpt the needles ; however, gutzon borglum asweekrut the Needles sait kuki of the poor visheshta of the grenite or damdaar vipaksh from paryaavarnavid and Native American groups.
ve settled on the mount rushmore location, which bhi rai the advantage of facing southeast for maximum surya expozar.
Robinson chaahi it to visheshta western nayak jaise louis and clark, Red badal or Buffalo Bill kodi lakin borglum decided the sculpture should have a adhik neshnal fokas, or chose the four presidents jinaki likenesses hota be carved into the pahaad.
baad securing sangheey funding, nirmaan on the memorial began in 1927, or the raashtrapatiyon ' chehron were samaapt between 1934 or 1939.
upon gutzon borglum 's maut in March 1941, uske bete lincoln Borglum took over construction.
haalanki the aarambhik avadharana pukaara for prayek president to be depicted from sir to qamar, lack of funding forced nirmaan to samaapt in let aktubar 1941.
The U.S. National park seva took control of the memorial in 1933, jabaki it thi still under nirmaan, or rai prabandhit the memorial to the upasthit din.
it attracts nearly teen lakh logon annually.

A shirt, poshaak kameez, button-front, button-front shirt, or button-up shirt is a paridhaan saath a collar, a full-length kholane at the saamne isse the collar to the hem, or taak with cuffs.
Shirts hai predominantly used by main, chunki mahilaon praayah pahanen blouses.
the saamne opening is fastened using batan or studs, or the cuffs band saath batan or kaph kadi.
Shirts are saamanytah bana isse woven cloth, or hai often accompanied by a jacket or taai, liye udhaaharan saath a suut or formalwear, lakin shart hai bhi worn adhik casually.
in British angrezi, poshaak kameez arthath specifically the adhik formal sandhya paridhaan worn with black- or white- taai, bhi discussed neeche.
kuch of ye formal shirts have stiff fronts or detachable chhallon sanlagn saath collar studs.
the pad `` button-down '' ( jisase refers a prakaar of shirt jisase rai a collar fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes prayukt in galati to lagu to sab shart ( saath or bagaiyr buttoned bas chhallon ), hone used as a paryaay liye `` button-up '' or `` button-front ''.
Administrative peshewar din ( bhi known as secretaries Day or admin din ) is an unofficial dharmanirpeksh holiday observed in anek deshon to recognize the kaary of secretaries, prashasnic assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support professionals.
In North america, it is manaaye on the buudhvaar of the last puraa week of April ( april 24 in 2013 ).
In frans it is celebrated on the third guuruuvaar in april ( april 18 in 2013 ).
in Australia it is manaaye on the pehla shuukravaar in may

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 navambar 1665 ) thi the agrani chitrakaar of the classical french Baroque style, although he kharch most of his working jivan in rome.
uske kaary is characterized by spashtataa, logic, or anukram, or favors line over rang.
Until the 20th sadi he remained a pramukh inspiration liye aise classically oriented kalakaaron as jacques-louis daud, jean-auguste-dominique ingres and paul Cézanne.
He worked in Rome liye a vrutt of agrani collectors vahin or elsewhere, magar liye a choti kaal when Cardinal Richelieu ordered him waapas to frans to serve as pehla Painter to the king.
sabase of uske works hai history paintings of dharmik or mythological subjects ki bahut praayah have a vishaal landscape tatv.

statute of Grand Duchy of Lithuania, likhaa in Polish
a statute is a aupchaarik likhaa enactment of a vidhaan authority ki governs a rajya, city, or county.
typically, statutes command or prohibit kuch, or declare niti.
the shabd is praayah prayukt to fark vidhi made by vidhaan bodies isse maamla vidhi, decided by nyaayalayon, or regulations jari by government agenciyon.
statutes hai sometimes referred to as vidhaan or `` blike akshar law. ''
as a source of vidhi, statutes are mana primary praadhikaar ( as opposed to dwitiyak authority ).
Ideally sab statutes jarur be in harmony saath the aadharbhoot vidhi of the land ( constitutional ).
is shabd is used in contradistinction to the aam vidhi.
statutes acquire unke force isse the time of their dyodhi, however unless varanaa provided.
Statutes are of anek kinds ; namely, Public or nijee.
declaratory or remedial.
asthai or perpetual.
a asthai statute is ek jisase is limited in its avadhi at the time of its enactment.
it continues in force until the samay of its limitation rai samaapt, jabatak sooner repealed.
a perpetual statute is ek for the firaakar of which vahin is no simit samay, haalanki it may nahin be expressly ghoshit to be so.
If, however, a statute jisase kiya nahin itself contain koi limitation is to be governed by another which is asthai only, the purv hoga bhi be asthai or nirbhar upon the existence of the latter.
pehle a statute becomes vidhi in some countries, it jarur be agreed upon by the ucchtam executive in the government, or aakhirkaar published as bhaag of a code.
in anek deshon, statutes hai organized in topical intjaam ( or `` samhitabaddh '' ) bheetar publications called code, such as the United rajya Code.
in anek nations statutory vidhi is distinguished isse and subordinate to constitutional vidhi.
the bahya iliac dhamniyon are do pramukh dhamniyon which bifurcate off the aam iliac dhamniyon agravarti to the sacroiliac sanyukt of the pelvis.
They proceed agravarti or inferior along the medial kinaaraa of the psoas major mansapeshiyaan.
ve nikaas the shroni girdle posterior and avar to the inguinal snaayu parichay one teesraa laterally from the pravisht point of the vankshan snaayu on the jananaang tubercle at jisase point ve hai referred to as the naiya dhamniyon.
the external iliac artery is usually the dhamni prayukt to attach the renal dhamni to the praptakarta of a gurda pratyaropan.
Steam is a digital vitaran, digital adhikaron management, ekaadhik and communications manch developed by valve nigam.
it is prayukt to vitarit khel or sambandhit media online, isse choti independent develper to larger software houses ; in October 2012, Valve vistaarit the seva to shaamil non-gaming tantra.
bhaap provides the upayokta saath sansthapana and swachaalit prabandhan of software across anek computers, jatiyaan suvidhaayen aise as friends lists or samooh, badal saving, or in-game voice or gapshap kaaryakshmata.
the tantra provides a freely uplabdhiyaan anuprayog programming interfes, Steamworks, ki develper can lo laabh of to integrate anek of bhaap 's functions bheetar unke tantra utpaada, sahit copy protection, networking and matchmaking, in-game achievements or micro-transactions, and support liye user-created saamagree through bhaap kaaryshaala.
haalanki initially developed for upyog on microsoft khidkiyaan, the claayent rai vistaarit to include OS X or linaks versions, or clients saath limited kaaryakshmata on the plastesan 3 consol or for dono ioes or android mobile divaais.
in addition to being a central hub liye gaming tantra, valve rai nirmit a version of bhaap saath altered kaaryakshmata to be prayukt in skulon for educational tantra, sahit a modified sanskaran of Portal 2 for shikshan vigyaan or critical soch lessons.
, vahin hai nearly 2000 games uplabdhiyaan through bhaap, and 54 lakh kriyasheel upayokta accounts.
as of janvari 2013, Steam rai dekhi over 6.6 million sanyukt players.
bhaap has an estimated 50–70 % share of the digital vitaran market liye video khel.
the bhaap logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank or lathi from the walschaerts valve gear of a steam locomotive.
jeri louis ( born kooch 16, 1926 ) is an American hasya, actor, singer, filmi producer, screenwriter or filmi nideshak.
he is gyaat liye uske slapstick humar in filmi, television, stage and radio.
He was originally yugma up saath dean martin in 1946, forming the famed comedy toli of Martin and louis.
In jod to the duo 's lokapriy nightclub work, ve strecchar in a kaamyaab series of comedy films for sarvopari tasviren.
louis is bhi gyaat liye uske daan fund-raising telethons and sthiti as national adhyaksh liye the muscular Dystrophy sangh ( MDA ).
Lewis rai won anek puraskaar liye aaajeevan achievements isse The amareeki kamedi puraskaar, los angeles Film Critics Association, and venice filmi parv, or he rai do sitaron on the hollywood chalanaa of kirti.
In 2005, he praapt the Governors puraskaar of the academy of television kala & sciences Board of rajyapalon, which is the ucchtam emi puraskaar prastut.
On farvari 22, 2009, the academy of Motion Picture kala and sciences awarded Lewis the jaan hersholt humanitarian puraskaar.
The rin ( ; ; ) is a European river ki ranon isse the swiss canton of Grisons in the southeastern Swiss Alps through germany or aakhirkaar bahati into the uttar samudr coast in the Netherlands or is the twelfth longest river in europea, at parichay, saath an ausat nirvahan of adhik than.
The Rhine or the denube formed sabase of the northern antardeshiy frontier of the roman samrajya or, chunki those days, the rin has been a vital or navigable waterway carrying vyapaar and goods gahan inland.
it has bhi served as a rakshaatmak feature and rai maharoom the aadhaar liye regional or international simaayen.
the many castles or pragaitihaasik fortifications saath the rin testify to iske importance as a waterway.
nadi trekkic could be roka at these locations, usually liye the purpose of collecting tolls, by the rajya that niyantrit that portion of the river.
shri ( Sinhala )
shri ( devanagari : shri, iast ; śrī ), bhi transliterated as sree or shri or Shree is a shabd of sanskrit utpatti, prayukt in the Indian upmahadweep as vinamr rup of pataa samatuly to the English `` Mr. '' in likhaa or spoken bhashaa, or as a sheershak of veneration for deities ( praayah anudit as `` paavan '' ).
dizine of complex structures jaise the antarrashtriya Space stesan needs in-depth samajhnaa of sanrachanaatmak vishleshan.
Civil abhiyantriki is a peshewar abhiyantriki anushaasan ki saude saath the dizine, nirmaan, or mentanence of the shaareerik and naturally nirmit environment, sahit works jaise sadaken, pulon, naharon, dams, or imaaraten.
civil abhiyantriki is the oldest abhiyantriki anushaasan baad sainya abhiyantriki, and it thi paribhaashit to fark non-military abhiyantriki isse military engineering.
It is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines sahit paryaavarniya engineering, bhootkneekee abhiyantriki, bhubhautikee, bhuganit, control abhiyantriki, sanrachanaatmak abhiyantriki, biomechanics, nanotechnology, parivahan abhiyantriki, earth science, vayumandaleey sciences, forensic engineering, nagarpalika or shahari engineering, water resources abhiyantriki, saamagree abhiyantriki, tateey abhiyantriki, surveykshan, or nirmaan abhiyantriki.
civil abhiyantriki takes place on sab str : in the public sector isse nagarpalika through to neshnal sarkarein, or in the nijee sector isse vyaktigat homeowners through to antarrashtriya companiyaan.

Katherine Dunham ( june 22, 1909 – may 21, 2006 ) thi an amareeki nartki, koreographer, author, educator, and soshal activist.
dunham had ek of the most kaamyaab dance careers in amareeki or europea theatre of the 20th sadi, or nirdeshit uske apana nrity company liye anek saalo.
She rai maharoom pukaara the `` matriarch or maharani maan of blike nrity ''.
dauraan uske heyday in the 1940s or 1950s, Dunham thi prasiddh throughout europea and latin america or thi widely lokapriy in the United rajya, jahaan the washington post pukaara her `` dancer catherine the great ''.
liye lagbhag tees saalo wo kaayam the catherine dunham Dance company, the tabhi self-supported American blike nrity troupe at that samay, or over uske long kariyar wo choreographed adhik than nabbe individual dances.
Dunham thi an innovator in African-American aadhunik nrity as khub as a netaa in the field of dance maanavshaastra, or ethnochoreology.
sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 and 3500 prajati of mosses, commonly called peat moss due to iske vyapaktaa in geela habitats where it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires.
sphagnum accumulations can store jal, chunki dono living and murde plants can hold large quantities of jal andar unke koshikaayen ; paudhe may tham isse 16-26 times as much water as their dry vazan depending on the species.
The khaali cells sahaayta retain jal in drier sharten.
hence, as sphagnum moss grows, it can dhire sprad into drier conditions, forming larger peatlands, dono uthaaya bogs or kambal bogs.
ye peat accumulations tab provide habitat liye a wide array of peatland paudhe, sahit sedges or ericaceous shrubs, as well as orchids or carnivorous paudhe.
Sphagnum and the peat formed isse it do not kshay readily kuki of the phenolic yogicon antahsthapit in the moss 's koshika walls.
In jod, bogs, like sab wetelends, develop anaerobic mrudaa conditions, jisase produces dhimaa avayaviya kshay balki than aerobics sookshmjaivik karrwai.
peat moss can bhi acidify iske surroundings by lene up cations, aise as calcium or magnesium, or releasing hydrogen ions.
antargat the sahi conditions, peat can accumulate to a gaharaai of anek meter.
Different species of sphagnum have different sahishnutaa had liye flooding and pH, so koi ek peatland may have a kramank of alag sphagnum species.
vyaktigat peat moss paudhe consist of a main stem, saath tightly arranged cluster of shakha fascicles usually consisting of do or teen spreading shakhaon and do to chaar hanging shakhaon.
The sheersh of the plant, or capitulum, has compact clusters of yang shakhaon.
saath the stem hai bikhare pattey of vibhinn aakaar, namit stem leaves ; the aakaar varies according to prajati.
the pattey consist of two kinds of koshikaayen ; choti, green, jeena koshikaayen ( chlorophyllose cells ), or large, saaf, structural, dead cells ( hyaline cells ).
the latter have the vishaal water-holding kshamta.
the earliest version of the sanjaal card, issued hastchalit balki than through an aptis machine.
the pehla APTIS sanskaran of the Network Card.
is thi prayukt isse the start of the aptis era in 1986/1987 jabatak well into the 1990s, as stox tha to be used up despite the parichay of the new-look orange-banded sanskaran in 1991.

is sanskaran is still in upyog as of 2007.
the sanjaal railcard is a discount card introduced in 1986 by British rail, upon the sristi of unke sanjaal southeast kshetrafal around landan, england.
the card is intended to protsaahit leisure travel by rail by offering chhot for vayaskon or accompanying children on a wide range of off-peak kiraye.
the dayera of chhot uplabdhiyaan, or the price of the card, have varied since that samay, lakin the card rai sadaa been maanya for a saal 's unlimited upyog.
it can be purchased by koi person aged 16 or over isse koi staffed National rail stesan or rail niyukt safar agent, by completing an anuprayog rup - no photographic pahchaan or anya dastavezikaran is needed to khride or use the card.
it is ek of a kramank of concessionary fare yojanaayen uplabdhiyaan on the British rail pranali.
the sanyukt Nations ( un ; french : sanghathan des Nations Unies, onu ) is the world 's largest, foremost, and sabase prominent antarrashtriya sanghathan.
The stated aims of the United raashtra shaamil promoting or facilitating sahyog in antarrashtriya vidhi, antarrashtriya suraksha, aarthik development, soshal pragati, human adhikaron, civil adhikaron, civil liberties, rajnatik freedoms, loktantr, and the uplabdhi of sthaayee sansar salaam.
the un was santhaapit in 1945 baad sansar yuddh II to replace the lig of raashtra, to roke yudhon between deshon, or to provide a platform liye dialogue.
It contains anek subsidiary sanghathan to carry out iske mishan.
at iske founding, the un tha 51 sadsy rajya ; as of 2011, there hai 193.
isse its karyaalayon around the sansar, the un or its specialized agencies decide on substantive or prashasnic mudde in niyamit baithak yojit throughout the saal.
the sanghathan rai six principal angon : the General Assembly ( the pramukh deliberative sabha ) ; the Security parishad ( liye deciding nishchit rizolution liye peace or security ) ; the aarthik and soshal parishad ( liye assisting in promoting international economic or soshal cooperation or vikaas ) ; the sachivalay ( for providing adhyayan, soochna, and suvidhaayen needed by the un ) ; the International adaalat of insaaf ( the praathmik nyaayik organ ) ; and the sanyukt raashtra trustiship parishad ( jisase is currently niskriy ).
anya prominent un System agenciyon shaamil the sansar Health Organization ( WHO ), the sansar Food kaarykram ( wfp ) or sanyukt Nations Children 's nidhi ( UNICEF ).
the un 's sabase prominent sthiti is ki of the office of secretary-general jisase has maharoom yojit by bain ki-moon of South korian chunki 2007.
The United raashtra mukhyalay resides in international territory in New york nagar, saath further pramukh offices at Geneva, nairobi, or vienna.
the organization is financed isse assessed and voluntary yogadan from iske sadsy rajya, or rai chah aadhikarik bhashaaen : arabi, Chinese, angrezi, french, Russian, or spani.
South Beach, also nicknamed sobe, is a pados in the city of miami bich, Florida, sanyukt rajya, stith due east of miami city proper between biscayne khadi and the atlantic samandar.
the area encompasses sab of the avrodh islands of Miami bich dakshin of Indian creek.
is kshetrafal thi the pehla khand of miami Beach to be viksit, starting in the 1910s, thanks to the development praytn of karl G. fisher, the lummus bhaaiyo, or jon S. colins, the latter whose nirmaan of the colins sethu provided the pehla vital jameen kadi between menland miami or the samudratat.
The kshetrafal rai gaye through numerous kritrim or natural parivartan over the saalo, sahit a booming kshetreey arthvyavastha, increased paryaton, and the 1926 hurricane, jisase nasht much of the area.
as of 2010, parichay 39,186 nivaasiyon sajiv in South bich.
the United States adhyakshiya chunaav of 1960 thi the 44th quadrennial presidential chunaav, yojit on mangalvaar, navambar 8, 1960.
the republican party manonith incumbent vice-president richard nicksan, while the loktantric party manonith jon F. kennedy, seenetter from masachusets.
the laazim adhyaksh, republican dwite D. ijanhavar, was nahin yogya liye re-election baad sevarat the maximum two terms anumat by the twenty-second Amendment.
kennedy was elected saath a lead of 112,827 mat, or 0.17 % of the popular vote, giving him a vijay of 303 to 219 in the chunavi College, the closest chunki 1916.
is was the pehla chunaav in jisase sab pachaas of the vartmaan United rajya participated.
A kramank of factors bataaiye kyon the chunaav thi so band.
kennedy gained chunki vahin thi an aarthik mandi jisase thes the laazim Republican, or he had the advantage of 17 lakh adhik registered democrate than republicans.
furthermore, the new mat that Kennedy gained among catholics lagbhag neutralized the nai mat nicksan gained among protestants.
kennedy 's campaigning kaushal decisively outmatched nicksan 's.
In the samaapt, nicksan 's emphasis on his anubhav carried choti vazan, and he wasted urja by campaigning in sab 50 rajya instead of concentrating on the swing states.
Kennedy prayukt uske vishaal, well-funded campaign sanghathan to win the namakan, surakshit samarthan, or, saath the aid of the last of the big-city bosses, to milengi out the vote in the big cities.
he relied on running mate lyndon B. johnson to hold the dakshin or used television effectively.
is chunaav is notable as hone the pehla samay in u.S. history ki two sitting u.s. seenetteron ( kennedy or johnson ) yahood nirvaachit as president or vice-president, a phenomenon that has maharoom doharaaya ekbar, by Barack obama or jo biden in 2008 ( in dono maamle, the president was the younger, more junior senator ).
a poster liye a c. 1884 American utpaadan of makebeth, abhinit thomas W. keene.
chitrit, counter clockwise from top-left, are : makebeth and Banquo milen the witches ; just after the murder of dancan ; banquo 's bhut ; makebeth duels Macduff ; or Macbeth.
makebeth is a khel likhaa by wiliam shakespeare.
It is mana ek of uske darkest or most shaktishaalee tragedies.
niyat in scotland, the khel dramatizes the corroding manovaigyanik and rajnatik prabhaav produced jab its samarthak, the scottish rab makebeth, chooses dusht as the rasta to fulfill uske mahatvakanksha for shakti.
he commits regicide to become king and tab furthers his moral descent saath a shasankaal of murderous aatank to raho in shakti, aakhirkaar plunging the desh into civil war.
In the samaapt, he loses sabakuch ki detaa arth or purpose to uske jivan before khone uske jivan itself.
the play is believed to have been likhaa between 1603 or 1607, or is sabase commonly dinaak 1606.
the earliest khaataa of a pradarshan of kayaa thi sambhawatah shakespeare 's khel is april 1611, jab simon forman ankit dekhakar aise a khel at the Globe theatre.
it was first published in the folio of 1623, sambhawatah from a prompt kitaab.
it was sabase likely likhaa dauraan the reign of James i, jo tha been james vi of Scotland pehle he succeeded to the angrezi singhaasana in 1603.
james was a patron of shakespeare’s acting company, and of sab the plays shakespeare likhaa dauraan James’s shasankaal, Macbeth sabase clearly reflects the playwright’s sambandh saath the sovereign.
makebeth is Shakespeare’s shortest traasadee, or tells the story of a brave scottish saamaanya namit makebeth jo receives a prophecy isse a trio of witches ki ek din he hoga become King of scotland.
khapat by mahatvakanksha or spurred to karrwai by uske bivi, makebeth hatyaein King dancan or takes the singhaasana liye khud.
uske shasankaal is racked saath guilt and paranoia, or he soon becomes a tyrannical shaasha as he is majaboor to commit adhik and more hatyaein to protect khud isse enmity or suspicion.
the bloodbath swiftly takes makebeth or mahila Macbeth into realms of arrogance, madness, and maut.
shakespeare 's source liye the traasadee is the khaataa of King Macbeth of Scotland, macduff, or dancan in holinshed 's chronicals ( 1587 ), a itihaas of england, Scotland or ireland familiar to shakespeare and uske contemporaries, haalanki the kaarykram in the khel differ extensively isse the itihaas of the real makebeth.
In the backstage sansar of theatre, kuch believe that the khel is shaapit, or hoga not zikr iske sheershak aloud, referring to it bajaay as `` the scottish khel ``.
over the course of anek centuries, the khel rai attracted kuch of the sabase prasiddh abhinaytaon to the bhoomikaaye of Macbeth and mahila makebeth.
It has maharoom adapted to film, television, opera, novels, comic kitabe, or other media.
The milton hershey skool is a nijee paropkaaree ( pre-K through 12 ) boarding skool in Hershey, pencilvenia.
originally namit the hershey Industrial skool, the sanstha thi santhaapit and vittposhit by chocolate industrialist milton snavely hershey and his wife, catherine Sweeney hershey.
the school thi originally established liye impoverished, swasth, caucasian, male orphans, jabaki aaj it serves students of vibhinn backgrounds.
the milton hershey skool Trust, jisase funds the skool, owns controlling byaaj in the hershey company or owns the Hershey entertainment or Resorts Company ( herco ) jisase oversees anek of the kshetrafal hotel saath saath a theme park called hersheypark.
saath over chah arab dollar in assets, the milton hershey skool is ek of the wealthiest skulon in the sansar.
the skool is overseen by a falak of Managers.
The skool currently serves 1,818 vidhyaarthee, or yojanaayen to grow to 2,100 students by 2013.
A sadsy of kor : gathbandhan for Residential shiksha, it is the largest awasaiya education kaarykram in the US.

the niyantrit substances adhinium ( CSA ) thi enacted into vidhi by the congress of the sanyukt rajya as sheershak ii of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse rokthaam or control adhinium of 1970.
the siese is the sangheey u.S. drug niti antargat jisase the manufacture, importation, possession, use or vitaran of nishchit substances is regulated.
the adhinium bhi parosa as the national implementing vidhaan liye the single sammelan on Narcotic davaayen.
the legislation nirmit paanch schedules ( classifications ), saath varying qualifications liye a padaarth to be shaamil in prayek.
Two federal agenciyon, the drug Enforcement prashasan and the Food or drug prashasan, determine which substances hai added to or removed isse the vibhinn schedules, haalanki the statute passed by congress created the aarambhik listing, or congress has sometimes anusuchit anya substances through vidhaan aise as the hillory J. Farias or Samantha Reid date-rape rokthaam Act of 2000, jisase placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in anusuchee I. vargeekaran nirnay hai jaruri to be bana on criteria sahit potential liye gaali ( an aparibhaashit pad ), philhal accepted chikitsa upyog in upachaar in the United rajya, or antarrashtriya treaties.
Second-language adhigrahan or second-language siikhnaa is the process by jisase people sikh a duusari language.
second-language adhigrahan ( praayah abbreviated to sla ) also refers to the scientific discipline devoted to studying ki prakram.
Second bhashaa refers to any language siikhe in addition to a person 's pehla bhashaa ; haalanki the concept is named second-language acquisition, it can bhi charitaarth the learning of third, fourth, or subsequent bhashaaen.
second-language adhigrahan refers to kayaa learners do ; it karata nahin refer to practices in language shikshan.
the academik anushaasan of second-language acquisition is a subdiscipline of lagu bhashavigyaan.
it is broad-based or apekshaakrit new.
as khub as the vibhinn shakhaon of linguistics, second-language adhigrahan is bhi closely sambandhit to psychology, sangyanatmak manovigyaan, and shiksha.
to pruthak the academik anushaasan from the learning process itself, the sharten second-language adhigrahan shodh, second-language adhyayan, or second-language adhigrahan adhyayan hai bhi prayukt.
sla research began as an interdisciplinary field, or kuki of is it is mushkil to pahachaano a precise starting tithi.
However, it karata appear to have developed a great saude chunki the mid-1960s.
the pad acquisition thi originally used to emphasize the avchetan prakruti of the siikhnaa prakram, lakin in haal years siikhnaa or acquisition have become largely synonymous.
second-language adhigrahan can incorporate heritage bhashaa siikhnaa, but it does nahin praayah incorporate bilingualism.
Most sla shodhakartaaon dekhie bilingualism as hone the samaapt result of siikhnaa a bhashaa, nahin the process itself, or dekhie the pad as referring to native-like fluency.
Writers in fields such as education and manovigyaan, however, often upyog bilingualism loosely to refer to sab form of multilingualism.
Second-language adhigrahan is also nahin to be contrasted saath the adhigrahan of a videshi bhashaa ; balki, the siikhnaa of second bhashaaen or the learning of videshi bhashaaen involve the vahi fundamental processes in alag halatas..
vahin rai been much bahes parichay exactly kaisaa bhashaa is siikhe, or many mudde hai still unresolved.
There hai anek theories of second-language adhigrahan, lakin none hai sweekrut as a puraa spashtikaran by sab SLA shodhakartaaon.
due to the interdisciplinary prakruti of the field of second-language adhigrahan, is is not expected to happen in the foreseeable future.
forbs list of arbapatiyon is an salanaa ranking of the sansar 's wealthiest logon, compiled or prakashit by forbs, an American neshnal business patrika.
The kul net laayak of prayek individual on the suchi is anumaanit, in sanyukt rajya dollar, aadhaarit on unke asset or hisaab for debt.
the suchi tabhi represents prayek vyakti 's valuation on a single din, due to rose fluctuations among exchange daron and bhandar valuations.
the sanyukt rajya rahasy Service is a U.S. sangheey vidhi pravartan agency ki is bhaag of the sanyukt rajya vibhaag of mathrubhumi suraksha.
the sworn sadasyon are divided among the khaas agenton and the uniformed Division.
jabatak kooch 1, 2003, the seva was bhaag of the sanyukt rajya vibhaag of the rajkosh.
the U.S. rahasy seva rai do pruthak kshetron of responsibility:
vittiya aparaadhon, covering mishan aise as rokthaam and chaanbin of counterfeiting of u.S. karency or u.S. rajkosh pratibhuti, or investigation of pramukh dhokhadhadi.
suraksha, which entails ensuring the safety of vartmaan or purv neshnal netao or unke families, aise as the adhyaksh, past presidents, vice raashtrapatiyon, presidential candidates, visiting heads of state, and foreign embassies ( prati an agreement saath the u.S. rajya Department 's beuro of rajanyik suraksha ( DS ) Office of Foreign mishan ( ofm ), etc. )
the Secret Service 's aarambhik responsibility thi to investigate counterfeiting of U.S. karency, jisase thi rampant following the u.S. civil yuddh.
the agency then viksit into the United States ' pehla gharelu intelligence or counterintelligence agency.
anek of the agency 's missions were baad liya over by subsequent agencies aise as the Federal beuro of chaanbin ( FBI ), beuro of daaru, tambaaku, firearms or visphotak ( ATF ), avrajan or custom pravartan ( barf ), or Internal aay Service ( IRS ).
`` Me or Bobby mcgee '' is a song likhaa by kris Kristofferson and fred Foster, originally performed by roger miller.
Others performed the song baad, sahit Kristofferson khud, or Janis joplin jo awwal the u.S. singles chart saath the song in 1971 baad uske maut, bananaa the song the duusari posthumous number-one single in u.S. chart itihaas baad `` ( Sittin ' On ) the dock of the Bay `` by otis redding.
franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; janvari 30, 1882 – april 12, 1945 ), also gyaat by his adyakshar, fdr, thi the 32nd adhyaksh of the sanyukt States ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in sansar kaarykram dauraan the mid-20th century, agrani the sanyukt rajya dauraan a samay of vishwavyaapee aarthik avsaad or kul war.
a prabal leader of the Democratic party and the only amareeki adhyaksh nirvaachit to adhik than two terms, he nirmit a nai Deal gathbandhan ki realigned amareeki raajnneeti after 1932, as uske gharelu nitiyon defined American udaarataavaad for the middle teesraa of the 20th sadi.
saath the bouncy popular song `` prasann dinon Are yahan Again `` as uske abhiyaan theme, fdr defeated incumbent republican Herbert hover in navambar 1932, at the gaharaai of the great avsaad.
sakriy by uske personal vijay over polio, FDR 's unfailing ashavad or sakriyata contributed to a naveekaran of the national spirit.
he worked closely with British Prime Minister winston churchill or soviet saamaanya sachiv joseph stallin in agrani the Allies against Germany or japani in sansar War ii, and restoring samruddhi to the swadesh 's arthvyavastha.
in uske pehla sau days in daftar, which began kooch 4, 1933, Roosevelt pathpradarshan major legislation or issued a profusion of karypalika aadesh that instituted the nai saude —a variety of kaarykram designed to upaj relief ( sarkari jobs liye the berozegaar ), recovery ( aarthik vikaas ), and sudhaar ( through viniman of wal gali, bainko or transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly isse 1933 to 1937, lakin tab relapsed into a gahan mandi.
the bipartisan roodhiwaadee gathbandhan that formed in 1937 prevented uske packing the param adaalat or passing koi considerable vidhaan ; it abolished anek of the raahat programs when berogari diminished dauraan sansar War II.
sabase of the regulations on kaarobaar yahood ended parichay 1975–85, magar for the regulation of wal gali by the pratibhuti or Exchange ayog, jisase still exists.
saath saath several smaller programs, major surviving kaarykram shaamil the Federal Deposit bime nigam, jisase was nirmit in 1933, or soshal suraksha, which congress passed in 1935.
As sansar War II loomed after 1938, with the Japanese invasion of china or the aggression of naaji germany, FDR gave damdaar diplomatic or vittiya support to china or great britain, jabaki baaki officially neutral.
uske goal was to make america the `` arsenal of Democracy `` jisase hota supply munitions to the allies.
in kooch 1941, rujvelt, saath congressional approval, provided Lend-Lease sahaayta to the deshon fighting viruddh Nazi germany with britain.
With very damdaar neshnal support, he made yuddh on Japan and germany after the japani akraman on parl harbar on disambar 7, 1941, colling it a `` tithi jisase hoga sajiv in infamy ``.
he supervised the mobilization of the U.S. arthvyavastha to support the alide yuddh praytn.
as an active sainya leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall yuddh ranneeti on do fronts ki ended in the shikast of the aksh Powers or the vikaas of the sansar 's first anu bomb.
in 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 japani American nagarikon.
berogari dropped to 2 %, raahat kaarykram largely ended, and the audyogic arthvyavastha grew rapidly to new heights as lakho of logon moved to new jobs in yuddh centers, or 16 million main or 300,000 mahilaon yahood drafted or volunteered liye military seva.
Roosevelt varchasv the American rajnatik jhaanki not tabhi dauraan the baarah saalo of uske presidency, lakin bhi liye decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of voters ki nirmit the paanchvaan Party pranali.
fdr 's New saude Coalition sanyukt majdoor sangh, big nagar machines, shwet ethnics, africa Americans or rural shwet southerners.
he bhi bahekaave the baad sristi of the sanyukt Nations or Bretton woods.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by vidwaanon as ek of the sheersh teen u.S. Presidents, along saath abraham Lincoln and george washington.
A udaar Democrat, rujvelt defined uske vaicharik sthiti as `` a choti baayein of center. ''
maaraa salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as ms, Mara, or ms-13 ) is a transnational dand giroh that originated in los angeles and rai sprad to other bhaag of the sanyukt States, canada, Mexico, or Central america.
the bahumat of the giroh is ethnically composed of central america or kriyasheel in shahari or suburban kshetron.
in the u.S., the ms-13 rai an visheshkar baari upasthiti in los angeles County or the san francisco Bay kshetrafal in uttari California ; the washington, d.C. mahanagar kshetron of ferefaques county, virginia, Montgomery county, maryland, or prince george 's county, maryland ; Long dweep, nai york ; the Boston, masachusets area ; sherlot, uttar carolina ; and Houston, texas.
vahin is also a upasthiti of MS-13 in toronto, ontario, Canada.
sadasyon of ms fark themselves by tattoos covering the deh and bhi often the face, as khub as the use of unke own chihn bhashaa.
ve hai notorious for their use of hinsa and a subcultural moral code ki predominantly consists of merciless revenge or bedard retributions.
is cruelty of the distinguished sadasyon of the `` Maras '' or `` mareros '' earned unhen a path to be recruited by the Sinaloa cartil battling viruddh los zetas in an jari drug yuddh dakshin of the United States kinaaraa.
unke wide-ranging kriyaayein have drawn the dhyaan of the epabiai or Immigration or custom pravartan, jo have initiated wide-scale raids against gyaat or suspected giroh members – netting sainkadon of rakhwale aarpaar the desh.
haddiyon is an American aparaadhon comedy-drama television series ki premiered on the Fox network in the sanyukt States on September 13, 2005.
the show is based on forensic maanavshaastra or forensic puraatatv, with prayek apisod focusing on an epabiai maamla sanchika concerning the mystery behind insaan remains brought by epabiai khaas agent seeley Booth ( daud boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist dr. temperance `` haddiyon '' briken ( emily deschanel ).
the baaki of the main daal shaamil Michaela Conlin, T. J. thyne, Eric millegan, Tamara Taylor, jonathan adams, or John francis daale.
Created by Hart hanson, the shrenee is bahut loosely aadhaarit on the jivan and kritiyaan of novelist or forensic anthropologist kathi Reichs, jo bhi produces the dikhaaen.
Its sheershak akshar, Temperance briken, is named after the samarthak of reichs ' aparaadhon anokhaa shrenee.
conversely, dr. Brennan writes kaamyaab rahasy novels aadhaarit around a fictional ( in the haddiyon brahmad ) forensic anthropologist namit kathi reichs.
haddiyon is a sanyukt production by Josephson entertainment, Far field productions or 20th sadi Fox television.
the shrenee rai samaapt airing iske eighth season or rai maharoom navinikrut liye a ninth ritu.
super katori xxv was an amareeki footbaal khel between the amareeki Football sammelan ( afc ) champion bhens bills or the neshnal Football sammelan ( NFC ) champion nai York diggaj to decide the neshnal footbaal lig ( enegel ) champion liye the 1990 ritu.
the diggaj parajeet the bills by the score of 20–19, winning their second ever Super katori.
it is the tabhi super katori decided by ek point.
the khel thi yojit at tampa stadium in tampa, florida, on janvari 27, 1991, dauraan the oonchaai of the Gulf yuddh.
it was thus nibhaai antargat much patriotic fervor.
The kaarywahi shaamil a rousing rendition of `` The Star-Spangled dhvaj `` by Whitney huston dauraan the pregame ceremonies.
The Bills and their explosive no-huddle thokar yahood making their first super katori rup after finishing the niyamit ritu with a 13-3 ricard, and agrani the lig in kul ank scored saath 428.
in advancing to unke duusari Super Bowl, the diggaj bhi posted a 13-3 niyamit season ricard, lakin saath a ball-control offense or a defense ki anumat a lig low 211 ank.
The khel is behtareen remembered liye bills placekicker Scott Norwood 's last-second field goal attempt which gai chaudee sahi of the uprights, agrani to a diggaj vijay, or starting a four-game khone streak in the Super katori for the Bills.
the diggaj set a Super katori record pakadakar kabza of the ball for 40 minutes or 33 second.
New york bhi overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit, and bana a 75-yard touchdown drive ki khapat a super katori ricard 9:29 off the clock.
Giants kaaryshil back Ottis Anderson, jo carried the ball 21 times for 102 yards or one touchdown, thi named super katori MVP.
he thi the first awardee to praapt the newly namit `` peet rozelle trophy '' ( namit liye the purv kamishnar ).
Anderson bhi ankit one reception liye saat yards.
mailkam x ( ; May 19, 1925february 21, 1965 ), born Malcolm Little or bhi gyaat as el-hajj malik El-Shabazz ( ), was an african-american Muslim minister or insaan adhikaron activist.
To uske admirers, he thi a saahsee edwocket liye the adhikaron of ashweton, a man jo indicted shwet america in the harshest sharten for iske aparaadhon viruddh blike Americans.
detractors abhiyukt him of preaching racism, blike sarvocchata, or hinsa.
he has been pukaara one of the mahanatam or most influential African Americans in itihaas.
mailkam x 's pita died—killed by shwet supremacists, it thi rumored—when he was yang, and at least ek of his uncles thi lynched.
jab he thi 13, uske maan thi placed in a dimagi hospital, or he thi lagaai in a series of foster gharon.
In 1946, at aayu 20, he went to prison liye breaking and pravesh.
in thana, mailkam X became a member of the swadesh of islam ; baad his parole in 1952, he quickly rose to become ek of iske netao.
liye a dozen saalo, mailkam x was the public face of the vivaadaaspad samooh, but disillusionment with swadesh of islam sir eliyas mohammad led use to chhod the swadesh in kooch 1964.
baad a kaal of travel in Africa or the madhya east, he returned to the sanyukt rajya, jahaan he founded muslim masjide, inc. or the sanghathan of afro-american ekta.
In February 1965, kam than a saal baad leaving the swadesh of islam, he was assassinated by teen members of the group.
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs badla substantially over samay.
as a pravaktaa liye the Nation of islam he sikhaaya blike sarvocchata or advocated virah of black or shwet america —in contrast to the civil adhikaron gati 's jor on sangyojan.
baad breaking saath the swadesh of Islam in 1964—saying of his sangh saath it, `` i kiya anek bate as a [ blike ] Muslim that i 'm sorry for abhi.
i was a zombie then... pointed in a nishchit disha or bataai to kooch '' —and banane a Sunni Muslim, he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to kaary saath civil adhikaron leaders, he continued to emphasize pan-africanism, blike self-determination, or self-defense.

Elizabeth II ( elizabeth elexandra mariyam ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the sanvaidhanik monarch of 16 sovereign rajya, known as the rashtramandal realms, or unke territories and dependencies, or sir of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
wo is Supreme rajyapal of the girijaghar of England and, in kuch of her realms, carries the sheershak of Defender of the Faith as bhaag of uske full title.
On uske accession on 6 farvari 1952, Elizabeth became Head of the rashtramandal and queen regnant of saat swatantra rashtramandal countries : the sanyukt Kingdom, canada, Australia, nai Zealand, South Africa, pakistani and ceylon.
isse 1956 to 1992, the kramank of her realms varied as territories gained swatantraaa or kuch realms became republics.
at present, in addition to the pehla chaar aforementioned deshon, elizabeth is maharani of Jamaica, barbados, the Bahamas, haraa, Papua nai gini, the suleman islands, tuvaalu, sant loosia, Saint vincent or the Grenadines, beliz, antigua or Barbuda or sant kits and nevis.
uske shasankaal of years is currently the duusari longest liye a angrejon monarch ; only maharani Victoria rai reigned longer at over 63 years.
Elizabeth was born in landan and educated privately at home.
uske pita acceded to the throne as george vi in 1936 on the abdication of uske bhai edward viii, from jisase samay wo thi the vaaris presumptive.
wo began to undertake public duties dauraan the duusari sansar yuddh, in jisase she parosa in the Auxiliary Territorial seva.
in 1947, she shaadishuda prince philip, duk of edinburgh, saath jisko wo has chaar children : charles, Anne, Andrew, or edward.
uske rajtilak seva took place in 1953 or thi the pehla to be televised.
The Queen 's anek aitihaasik vizit and baithak include a rajya vizit to the ganatantr of ireland and reciprocal vizit to or isse the pope.
The maharani has seen pramukh constitutional parivartan in uske realms, such as devolution in the United kingdom and the patriation of the canadai samvidhan.
times of nijee significance have shaamil the births or marriages of uske children, the births of uske grandchildren, the pratishthapan of the prince of wales, or the jashn of milestones aise as uske Silver, Golden, or Diamond Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, respectively.
Major kaarykram in the maharani 's reign have shaamil the pareshaaniyon in Northern ireland, the falklands War, yudhon with Iraq or the yuddh in Afghanistan.
vahin have been times of personal vishaad for uske which shaamil the maut of uske pita at 56, the assassination of prince philip 's taaoo, Lord Mountbatten, the vishleshan of her children 's marriages in 1992 ( a saal deemed uske annus horribilis ), the death in 1997 of her purv daughter-in-law, Diana, rajkumaari of wales, or the deaths of uske maan or sistar in 2002.
The Queen has occasionally faced kathor dabaayen aalochana of the royal parivaar and republican sentiments, but support liye the samrajya and uske nijee lokapriyata remain high.
the 2010 United rajya seenet chunaav in florida took place on November 2, 2010 saath saath other elections to the sanyukt States Senate in other rajya as khub as all elections to the sanyukt rajya House of pratinidhi and vibhinn state or local elections.
Republican Marco Rubio, former spikar of the Florida House of Representatives, parajeet swatantra charlie crist or Democrat kendrick namr in a three-way res.
ek pad Senator mel Martinez thi nirvaachit in a very close race viruddh Democrat Betty arandi in 2004 saath 49 % of the vote.
martines announced on disambar 2, 2008 ki he would nahin seek re-election to the seenet, or would istipha prior to the samaapt of his pad.

at the samay he received anek Republican endorsements, aise as the neshnal Republican senatorial cameti, martines, or the 2008 republican presidential nominee jon macken.
His support of the amareeki recovery or reinvestment adhinium of 2009 hurt his lokapriyata among conservatives, and pratyaashee marco rubio surged.

upgrah drishy of Doha
doha (, ' or ', literally : `` the big tree '' ) is the puunji nagar of the rajya of qatar.
Located on the coast of the parsi gulf,
it tha a population of 998,651 in 2008, or is bhi one of the municipalities of Qatar.
Doha is qatar 's largest nagar, saath over 60 % of the nation 's janasankhyikee residing in doha or iske surrounding upnagaron, and is bhi the aarthik kendra of the desh.
Doha also serves as the seat of government of qatar, jisase is shasit by sheikh Hamad bin khalipha al Thani.
Doha is home to the Education nagar, an area devoted to shodh and education.
doha thi the site of the pehla ministerial-level baithak of the doha vikaas golakaar of sansar vyapaar sanghathan negotiations.
the nagar of doha yojit the 2006 asian khel, jisase thi the largest Asian Games kabhi held.
doha bhi hosted the 2011 pan arab khel and most of the khel at the 2011 AFC asian cap.
doha hosted the unfccc Climate negotiations ( cop 18 ) December 2012 or hoga host a vishaal kramank of the venues liye the 2022 fifa sansar Cup.
The sansar Petroleum Council yojit the 20th sansar petroleum Conference in Doha in disambar 2011.
Paranasal sinuses are a group of chaar yugma air-filled spaces ki gher the nasal guha ( urdhvahanu sinus ), upar the eyes ( frontal sinus ), between the ankhen ( ethmoid sinus ), or peeche the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinus ).
the sinuses hai named liye the facial haddiyon in jisase ve hai stith.
Lean nirmaan, lean enterprize, or jhukna utpaadan, often bas, `` jhukna, '' is a utpaadan abhyaas that considers the vyay of sansaadhan for koi lakshya anya than the creation of maan liye the samaapt graahak to be apvyay, or yun a nishaanaa liye vilopan.
Working isse the perspective of the graahak jo consumes a utpaada or service, `` maan '' is paribhaashit as any karrwai or process ki a customer would be willing to adaa liye.
essentially, lean is kendrit on preserving maan saath kam kaary.
jhukna nirmaan is a prabandhan philosophy derived zyaadaatar isse the toyota utpaadan System ( tps ) ( hence the pad toyotism is also prachlit ) and pahachaanaa as `` Lean '' tabhi in the 1990s.
TPS is prasiddh liye iske fokas on reduction of the asli toyota saat wastes to improve overall graahak maan, but there are varying perspectives on kaisaa this is behtareen achieved.
The sthir growth of toyota, isse a small company to the world 's largest automaker, rai kendrit dhyaan on kaisaa it rai hasil is kamyaabi.

vitamin a is a samooh of nutritionally asantrupt hydrocarbons, jisase shaamil retinul, retinal, retinoic acid or anek provitamin a carotenoids among which beta-carotene is the sabase mahatvapurn.
vitamin a has multiple krityon, it is mahatvapurn for vikaas or vikaas, liye the mentanence of the pratiraksha pranali and shubh vision.
vitamin a is needed by the retina of the najar in the form of retinal, jisase combines saath protein opsin to rup rhodopsin the light-absorbing molecule, ki is jaruri liye both low-light ( scotopic drushti ) or color drushti.
vitamin a bhi krityon in a bahut alag bhoomika as an irreversibly oxidized rup of retinul gyaat as retinoic acid, jisase is an mahatvapurn hormone-like vikaas factor for epithelial or other cells.
in bhojan of animal utpatti, the major form of vitamin a is an ester, primarily retinyl palmitate, jisase is converted to retinul ( chemically an daaru ) in the choti intestine.
the retinul form krityon as a storage form of the vitamin, or can be parivartit to and isse iske visually kriyasheel aldehyde rup, retinal.
the associated acid ( retinoic acid ), a metabolite that can be irreversibly synthesized isse vitamin a, has tabhi partial vitamin A kaaryaklap, or karata not falan in the retina liye the visual saikil.
retinoic acid is used liye growth or cellular differentiation.
sab form of vitamin a have a beta-ionone ring to jisase an isoprenoid kadi is sanlagn, pukaara a retinyl samooh.
Both sanrachanaatmak features hai anivaary liye vitamin kaaryaklap.
the naarangi ranjak of gaajar – beta-carotene – can be represented as do conect retinyl samooh, jisase hai used in the body to yogadan to vitamin A str.
alpha-carotene or gamma-carotene bhi have a single retinyl samooh, jisase give them kuch vitamin kaaryaklap.
none of the other carotenes have vitamin activity.
The carotenoid shartaq- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone group or rai vitamin activity in insaano.
vitamin A can be mila in two principal forms in foods :
retinul, the rup of vitamin a avashoshit jab khaane animal khaanaa strot, is a pilaa, fat-soluble padaarth.
chunki the pure alcohol rup is asthir, the vitamin is mila in utakon in a rup of retinyl ester.
it is also commercially produced or administered as esters aise as retinyl acetate or palmitate.
the carotenes alpha-carotene, beta-carotene, gamma-carotene ; or the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( sab of jisase contain beta-ionone bajati ), lakin no anya carotenoids, function as provitamin a in herbivores or sarvahari pashu, which possess the anzime ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) jisase cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa or converts it retinul.
in saamaanya, carnivores hai garib converters of ionine-containing carotenoids, or pure carnivores aise as cats or ferrets kami 15-15'-dioxygenase and can not badalen koi carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids hone forms of vitamin a liye ye prajati ).
