Sacramento is the puunji nagar of the u.S. rajya of California or the seat of sarkari of sacramento County.
it is stith at the sangam of the sacramento River or the amareeki nadi in the uttari portion of california 's expansive central Valley.
saath an estimated 2011 janasankhyikee of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest nagar in california and the 35th largest city in the United States.
sacramento is the kor saanskrithik or aarthik center of the sacramento metropolitan kshetrafal jisase includes seven county with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
iske metropolitan kshetrafal is the chauthi largest in California after the vrihad los Angeles Area, san francisco khadi kshetrafal, or the San diego mahanagar area, as khub as the 25th largest in the sanyukt rajya.
sacramento thi cited by samay patrika as America 's sabase ethnically or racially ekikrut nagar in 2002.
sacramento became a nagar through the praytn of the swiss apravasi jon Sutter, sr., his son jon sutter, jr., and james W. marshall.
sacramento grew quickly dhanyavad to the protection of sutter 's Fort, which was sthapit by Sutter in 1839.
dauraan the california sunaharaa Rush, sacramento thi a pramukh vitaran point, a vanijyik or agricultural bich, or a terminus for wagon rail, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the tattu express, or the pehla transcontinental railroad.
California rajya University, sacramento, adhik commonly gyaat as Sacramento rajya or sac rajya, is the largest local university.
it is ek of the twenty-three campuses of the california State University pranali.
drexel vishvavidhyalayon sacramento is stith in shahar, sacramento.
vishvavidhyalayon of the prashanth 's mcgeorge skool of vidhi is stith in the ok Park pados.
In addition, the vishvavidhyalayon of california, Davis is stith in aasapaas Davis, west of the puunji.
the uc Davis chikitsa bich, a world-renowned research hospital, is located in the nagar of Sacramento.
memorial Day is a sanyukt rajya federal holiday which occurs prayek saal on the final somvaar of may.
Memorial Day is a day of remembering the main or mahilaon jo died jabaki sevarat in the sanyukt rajya hathiyaarband shaktiyaan.
formerly gyaat as sajaavat din, it originated after the amareeki Civil yuddh to commemorate the sangh and confederate sainiko jo died in the civil yuddh.
by the 20th sadi memorial din tha been vistaarit to sammaan all america jo have died in sab yudhon.
it typically marks the start of the garmiyaan avkaash ritu, jabaki majdoor din marks iske samaapt.
anek logon vizit cemeteries or memorials, visheshkar to sammaan those who have died in sainya seva.
Many swayamsevak place an amareeki flag on each grave in neshnal kabristaan.
By the jaldi 20th sadi, memorial din thi an avasar for more saamaanya expressions of memory, as logon visited the qabron of their deceased relatives in girijaghar kabristaan, whether ve had served in the sainya or nahin.
it also became a long weekend increasingly devoted to shopping, parivaar mehphilon, aatishbaajee, yatraayen to the beach, or national media kaarykram.
salanaa sajaavat dinon liye particular kabristaan hai yojit on a sande in let vasant or jaldi garmiyaan in some gramin kshetron of the amareeki dakshin, notably in the kyu.
In maamle involving a parivaar graveyard jahaan remote ancestors as well as those jo were mritak adhik recently are buried, is may take on the character of an extended family punarmilan to jisase kuch logon safar sainkadon of miles.
logon ekatrit on the designated day and put pushp on qabron and navinikrut contacts with kinfolk or anya.
vahin often is a dharmik seva or a `` dinner on the ground, '' the paramparaagat pad liye a potluck bhojan in which people used to sprad the bartan out on chaadaren or tablecloths on the grass.
it is believed that is practice began pehle the amareeki Civil yuddh or yun may pratibimbit the real utpatti of the `` memorial day '' vichaar.
Memorial din is nahin to be uljhan saath diggajon Day ; memorial Day is a day of remembering the main or women jo died jabaki sevarat, jabaki diggajon Day manaata the seva of sab U.S. sainya diggajon, jeena or murde.
mt. zion girijaghar rajya itihaas marker nikat philadelphia, Mississippi.
Freedom Summer ( bhi gyaat as the Mississippi Summer Project ) was a abhiyaan in the sanyukt States launched in June 1964 to attempt to panjikaran as anek African amareeki matadaata as possible in mississippi, which tha historically excluded sabase blacks isse matdaan.
The project bhi set up darjanon of swatantraaa skulon, swatantraaa gharon, or community centers in small kasbon throughout Mississippi to aid the local black janasankhyikee.
The project was vyavasthit by the parishad of federated sanghathan ( cofo ), a gathbandhan of the mississippi branches of the chaar major civil adhikaron sanghathan ( sncc, kor, naacp or sclc ).
sabase of the impetus, leadership, and financing liye the garmiyaan Project aae isse the SNCC.
Robert Parris musa, sncc field sachiv and co-director of cofo, directed the summer project.
bluez is the naam given to dono a musical rup and a music vidha ki originated in communities of primarily the `` Deep dakshin `` of the sanyukt rajya around the samaapt of the 19th sadi from spirituals, work geeton, field hollers, shouts and chants, or rhymed saral katha ballads.
the bluez rup, sarvyaapee in jazz, rhythm and blues, or chattan or phenken is characterized by vishisht cord progressions, of jisase the twelve-bar bluez chord progression is the sabase aam.
the blue tip ki, for arthpurna purposes hai sung or nibhaai flattened or dhire jhuki ( naaballig 3rd to pramukh 3rd ) in sambandh to the pich of the pramukh scale, hai bhi an mahatvapurn bhaag of the dhwani.
the bluez vidha is based on the bluez rup lakin possesses anya visheshtaayen aise as specific geet, baas linon, or yantra.
bluez can be subdivided into anek subgenres ranging isse country to shahari blues ki yahood adhik or kam lokapriy dauraan alag avadhi of the 20th sadi.
Best gyaat hai the delta, piedmont, Jump, or chicago blues sheliyaan.
sansar yuddh ii chihnit the transition isse dhvanik to electric blues or the progressive opening of bluez music to a wider darshak, visheshkar white shrota.
in the 1960s or 1970s, a hybrid form pukaara blues-rock viksit.
The pad `` the blues '' refers to the `` blue devils '', arth melancholy and sadness ; an jaldi upyog of the term in this bhav is found in George colman 's one-act tamaasha Blue shaitanon ( 1798 ).
Though the upyog of the phrase in african-american music may be puraani, it rai been attested to chunki 1912, jab Hart wand 's `` dalas bluez `` became the pehla swatvadhikaar bluez composition.
In geet the phrase is praayah prayukt to describe a depressed manodasha.
a quarter dollars, commonly shortened to quarter, is a sikaa laayak 1⁄4 of a sanyukt rajya dollars or 25 saint.
the quarter rai maharoom utpaadit chunki 1796.
the chunaav of 25¢ as a denomination, as opposed to 20¢ jisase is adhik aam in other bhaag of the sansar, originated with the abhyaas of dividing spani milled dollar into eight keel taraasha khand ( cf. `` tukade of aath `` ).
at one samay `` do bits ``, i.e. do wedges, each keel an aathvin, yun a quarter of the spani real, was a common nickname for a quarter.
din of the murde ( ) is a mexican avkaash manaaye throughout Mexico or around the world in anya samskritiyon.
the avkaash focuses on mehphilon of parivaar or mitron to duwa for or yaad mitron or family members who have died.
it is visheshkar celebrated in mexico, where it is a neshnal holiday, and all banks hai band.
The celebration takes place on navambar 1 or 2, in connection saath the catholic chhuttiyaan of sab Saints ' Day or sab souls ' din.
paramparaon conect saath the avkaash shaamil building nijee altars honoring the mritak using sugar skulls, marigolds, or the pasandida bhojan or peya of the raji or visiting qabron saath ye as uphaar.
ve bhi leave possessions of the mritak.
Scholars tres the origins of the modern Mexican avkaash to swadeshi observances dating waapas hundreds of saalo and to an Aztec parv samarpit to the goddess Mictecacihuatl.
the holiday has sprad throughout the sansar : in Brazil, dia de finados is a public avkaash that anek brazilians celebrate by visiting kabristaan or churches.
in spain, vahin hai tyohaar or parades, and, at the samaapt of the day, people gather at cemeteries and pray for their dead loved ones.
Similar observances occur elsewhere in Europe, or similarly themed jashn appear in many Asian or africa samskritiyon.
ANITA mk viii.
the ANITA chihnit saat or anitha chihnit viii calculators were launched simultaneously in late 1961 as the sansar 's pehla all- electronic desktop calculators.
designed or built by the Bell panch co.
in britain, and marketed through iske sumlock comptometer prabhag, ve used vacuum tubes or cold-cathode switching tubes in their logic circuits or nixie tubes liye unke numerical displays.
ve yahood the first of a shrenee of desktop or hand-held electronic calculators ki the company was to develop and sell antargat the anitha name into the mid-1970s.
george Washington ( –, 1799 ) thi the pehla adhyaksh of the United rajya ( 1789–1797 ), the commander-in-chief of the mahadwipiya fouj dauraan the amareeki krantikari War, or ek of the founding fathers of the sanyukt States.
He presided over the sammelan ki drafted the samvidhan, which replaced the Articles of Confederation and established the sthiti of President.
washington thi elected adhyaksh as the sarvasammat chunaav of the 69 nirvaachak in 1788, or he parosa do sharten in daftar.
he oversaw the creation of a damdaar, well-financed national sarkari ki kaayam neutrality in the yudhon raging in europea, suppressed vidroh, and jiti sweekruti among america of sab prakaar.
uske netritv style established anek forms or rituals of sarkari ki have been used chunki, aise as using a cabinet pranali or delivering an inaugural pataa.
further, the shantipurna transition isse his presidency to the presidency of John adams sthapit a parampara ki continues into the 21st sadi.
washington thi hailed as `` pita of his country `` bhi dauraan uske aaajeevan.
washington was born into the prantiy gentry of Colonial virginia ; his wealthy planter parivaar swaamitv tambaaku plantations and slave.
baad both uske pita or older bhai died jab he thi yang, washington became personally or professionally attached to the shaktishaalee William ferefaques, who promoted uske kariyar as a surveyor or sipaahi.
washington jaldi became a varisht adhikari in the colonial shaktiyaan during the pehla charan of the french or Indian yuddh.
chuni by the duusari mahadwipiya congress in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the mahadwipiya Army in the amareeki kranti, Washington prabandhit to force the angrejon out of boston in 1776, but thi parajeet or lagbhag captured baad ki saal when he khoyaa New york nagar.
baad crossing the Delaware nadi in the murde of sheet, he parajeet the angrejon in do ladaaiyon, retook New jersey or lauti aaveg to the patriot cause.
kuki of his ranneeti, krantikari forces captured do pramukh British armies at saratoga in 1777 or yorktown in 1781.
itihaaskaaron laud washington liye uske selection and paryvekshan of uske generals, protsaahan of morale or ability to tham saath the fouj, samanvay saath the rajya governors or rajya milicia ikai, relations saath congress or dhyaan to supplies, logistics, or training.
in battle, however, washington thi repeatedly outmaneuvered by angrejon senapatiyon saath larger armies.
baad vijay tha maharoom finalized in 1783, washington resigned as commander-in-chief balki than seize shakti, proving his opposition to taanaashaahee or his patibaddhta to amareeki republicanism.
asantusht saath the kamajoriyon of the aalekh of Confederation, in 1787 washington presided over the sanvaidhanik sammelan that drafted the sanyukt rajya samvidhan.
Elected unanimously as the pehla adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya in 1789, he attempted to lao pratidwandvi girohon saath to unify the swadesh.
he supported Alexander hamiltan 's kaarykram to adaa band all state or national karz, to implement an effective tax pranali and to create a national bainko ( despite vipaksh from Thomas jeffrasan ).
washington proclaimed the sanyukt rajya neutral in the yudhon raging in europea baad 1793.
he avoided yuddh saath Great Britain or guaranteed a dashak of salaam or laabhprad vyapaar by securing the jay sandhi in 1795, despite teevr vipaksh from the jeffersonians.
Although never officially joining the federalist party, he supported iske programs.
washington 's vidaai pataa thi an influential primer on republican virtue or a warning viruddh partisanship, sectionalism, and bhagidaari in videshi yudhon.
He retired isse the presidency in 1797 and laute to uske ghar, mount vernon, or his gharelu jivan jahaan he prabandhit a kismein of udhyamon.
he freed sab uske slave by his final hoga.
Washington tha a drushti of a great and shaktishaalee swadesh ki hota be nirmit on republican linon using federal shakti.
He sought to upyog the neshnal sarkari to preserve liberty, improve avasanrachana, kholen the pashchimi lands, promote commers, mila a sthai capital, reduce regional tanaav and prachaar a spirit of amareeki rashtrawaad.
at uske death, Washington was eulogized as `` pehla in yuddh, pehla in salaam, or first in the dil of uske countrymen '' by henry lee.
the federalists bana use the pratik of unke party lakin liye many saalo, the jeffersonians continued to avishvaas uske influence or vilambit bhawan the Washington smarak.
as the netaa of the first successful kranti viruddh a aupniveshik samrajya in sansar itihaas, washington became an antarrashtriya icon liye mukti or nationalism, visheshkar in frans or latin america.
phiscal Year 2012 u.S. Federal Spending – nakadi or bajet Basis.
phiscal saal 2012 u.S. sangheey raseeden.
the bajet of the sanyukt rajya sarkari praayah begins as the adhyaksh 's prastaav to the u.S. congress jisase anushansa funding str for the aglaa phiscal year, beginning aktubar 1.
However, Congress is the deh jaruri by vidhi to pass a bajet annually or to submit the bajet passed by dono gharon to the adhyaksh liye hastakshar.
congressional nirnay hai governed by rules and vidhaan regarding the federal bajet process.
bajet committees niyat bitaa limits liye the House or seenet committees or for appropriations subcommittees, jisase tab approve individual appropriations bills to allocate funding to various sangheey programs.
If congress fails to pass an salanaa bajet ( as rai maharoom the maamla chunki 2009 ), a shrenee of appropriations bills must be passed as `` roke gap '' upayon.
After congress approves an appropriations bill, it is bheja to the adhyaksh, jo may chihn it into vidhi, or may vito it ( as he hota a bajet when passed by the Congress ).
a vetoed bill is bheja waapas to Congress, jisase can pass it into vidhi with a two-thirds majority in prayek chamber.
congress may bhi combine all or kuch appropriations bills into an omnibus reconciliation vidheyak.
in addition, the adhyaksh may nivedan and the congress may pass supplemental appropriations bills or apaat supplemental appropriations bills.
anek sarkari agencies provide bajet aankada or vishleshan.
ye shaamil the sarkari Accountability daftar ( GAO ), Congressional bajet daftar, the Office of Management or bajet ( omb ) or the u.S. rajkosh Department.
ye agenciyon have reported that the federal sarkari is facing a shrenee of mahatvapurn financing challenges.
in the short-run, tax revenues have declined significantly due to a severe recession or kar niti chunaav, while expenditures have expanded liye yudhon, berogari bime and other suraksha jaal bitaa.
in the long-run, expenditures sambandhit to healthcare kaarykram aise as Medicare or Medicaid hai projected to grow faster than the arthvyavastha overall as the janasankhyikee matures.
nai gini ( bhi, Tok pisin : niugini, Dutch : nieuw gini, or ; historically : Papua ) is the sansar 's duusari largest dweep, baad Greenland, covering a jameen area of 786,000 km2.
stith in the dakshinpaschim prashanth Ocean, it lies geographically to the east of the malay dweepasmooh, saath which it is sometimes shaamil as part of a vrihad indo-australian dweepasmooh.
geologically it is a bhaag of the same tectonic thali as Australia.
jab sansar samudr str yahood low, the two shared shorelines ( which abhi jhooth 100 to 140 meter neeche sea str ), combining saath lands now inundated into the tectonic mahadweep of sahul, also gyaat as vrihad australia.
The two landmasses became alag jab the kshetrafal abhi gyaat as the torace Strait flooded baad the samaapt of the pichhlaa glacial kaal.
anthropologically, New gini is considered part of Melanesia.
nitiyaan, the pashchimi half of the island comprises do indonesian praanton : Papua or west papua.
the purvi half form the menland of the country of papua nai gini.
the dweep rai a janasankhyikee of about 7.5 lakh, saath a bahut kam janasankhyikee density of only 8 inh/km2.
nai gini is differentiated isse its drier, khushaamad, and less fertile southern bantwaaraa, australia, by its much ucchtar rainfall and its active volcanic geology, saath iske ucchtam point, Puncak Jaya, reaching an elevation of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ).
Yet the do jameen masses share a samaan animal fauna, saath marsupials, sahit wallabies or possums, or the egg-laying monotreme, the spiny anteater, or ekidna.
Other than bats and kuch do darjan swadeshi krintak genera, there are no pre-human indigenous placental stanadhariyon.
boar, anek atirikt prajati of chuuhe, or the purvaj of the nai gini Singing Dog were introduced with human colonization.
the human upasthiti on the island dates waapas at least 40,000 saalo to the oldest insaan migrations out of africa.
shodh indicates that the highlands yahood an jaldi or swatantra center of krishi, saath evidence of sinchai going waapas at tanik 10,000 saalo.
kuki of the time gaharaai of iske inhabitation and iske atyadhik fractured landscape, an unusually unchi number of bhashaaen hai bolaa on the island, saath some 1,000 bhashaaen ( a figure ucchtar than ki of sabase mahadwipon ) having maharoom catalogued out of an anumaanit world-wide pre-columbian kul of 6,000 insaan dialects.
sabase hai classified as papuai bhashaaen, a generally sweekrut geographical pad jisase a alpsankhyak of lekhak tham to be a genetic ek.
a number of Austronesian languages hai spoken on the coast or on offshore islands.
in the 16th sadi Spanish explorers khoja the island or called it Nueva Guinea.
in recent itihaas western nai gini was shaamil in the Dutch east Indies upnivesh.
The germans annexed the northern coast of the eastern half of the dweep as German New gini in their pre–world War i praytn to sthapit themselves as a aupniveshik shakti, whilst the dakshin purvi portion thi anichhaa claimed by Britain.
Following the sandhi of versailles, the germany portion thi awarded to australia ( which thi already shaasi the angrejon claim, namit the territory of papua ) as a lig of raashtra janadesh.
the eastern half of the dweep thi granted independence isse australia as Papua nai gini in 1975.
the pashchimi half gained swatantraaa isse the dach in 1961, lakin became bhaag of Indonesia jald afterwards in vivaadaaspad halaaton.
`` the vine buren ladakon '' is the 148th apisod of the sitcom seinfeld, or naam of a fictional nai york gali gang.
Their sign is crossing the hands, with ek haath saath sab the ungliyaan 'up ' and spread out.
The other haath rai sab lakin the angootha or pointer ungali up, liye a kul of eight ( 8 ).

it aired on farvari 6, 1997.
bevo chihn
bevo thi a non-alcoholic malt peya, or near bear, brewed in the sanyukt States by the anheuser-busch company shuruuaat in the jaldi 20th century.
bevo enjoyed iske mahanatam success during the time of prohibition, jab bear, wine or distilled liquors, yahood made illegal for teraa saalo.
the anheuser-busch company prarambh brewing bevo jab alcoholic beverages were nishiddh in 1916 by the sanyukt States armed shaktiyaan.
utpaadan rose greatly with national nishedh in 1919, or bevo was by far the sabase popular of the anek `` khadyann beverages '' or `` nikat beers '' of the samay.
at the shikhar of iske popularity in the early 1920s, adhik than five million maamle of Bevo were bechi annually.
Renard saath a mag of bevo, chitrit in terra cotta on the interior deevaaren of the Bevo building, st. lui
labals on the botalon billed it as `` bevo the peya ''.
the naam `` bevo '' was coined from the shabd `` peya '' and the slavi bhashaa word liye bear `` pivo '', and thi sunaaya `` Bee-vo ''.
Some bevo advertising pradarshit the character `` renard the fox `` ( aadhaarit on the samarthak of a madhyakaalin french folk-tale ), and promotional mag with is akshar were manufactured.
in 1930 Anheuser-Busch built a shrenee of boat-bodied gaadiyaan in iske St. lui dukaane called the `` Bevo naukaaye '' jisase were used for pramotion.
saat hai believed to have maharoom nirmit on pierce-arrow 8-cylinder chassis jabaki ek surviving udhaaharan thi aadhaarit upon 1930 cadilack 353 v8.
billboard advertising bevo in Trenton, nai Jersey, 1917
a contemporary vigyaapan padhaa `` kooling or invigorating, Bevo the peya.
anukram by the case from apana pansaari, druggist, or dealer. ''
The paper label on the back of the bottle read `` the All-Year-Round naram Drink.
appetizing - healthful - paushtik - tazaa.
Milk or water may contain bacteria.
bevo never karata. ''
bevo became bhaag of the lokapriy samskruti of the samay, or is ullekith in vibhinn lokapriy geeton or vaudeville skits of the era.
is led to dwitiyak kathboli uses of the word ; liye udhaaharan, in American sainya kathboli a yang or anubhavheen adhikari thi pukaara a `` bevo ''.
The vishvavidhyalayon of texas namit iske mascot `` bevo '', a naam which rai stuck to is din.
Irving Berlin included a paean to the peya, `` You ca n't raho up on bevo '', in uske 1917 fouj revue, yip yip Yaphank.
In the late 1920s smuggled bootleg bear or liquor as well as `` homebrew ``, kaaten into bevo 's marketshare.
saath bikri flattening to 100,000 maamle by 1929, Anheuser-Busch stopped production.
The Bevo mil, st. Louis, in 2008
the Bevo bhawan, with the renard akshar prominently pradarshit at the kinare, still operates as a bottling suvidha at unke main brewery in st. Louis, mizori.

milk is a shwet drav utpaadit by the mammary glands of stanadhariyon.
it is the primary sorce of poshan liye young stanadhariyon pehle ve hai samarth to diguest anya prakaar of food.
arlday- lactation milk contains colostrum, jisase carries the maan 's antibodies to the baby and can reduce the risk of anek rogon in the baby.
it bhi contains anek anya nutrients.
as an agricultural product, milk is extracted isse mammals and prayukt as food liye insaano.
Worldwide, dugdh kheto utpaadit parichay 730 lakh tonnes of milk in 2011.
india is the sansar 's largest nirmaataa or upabhokta of milk, yet neither niryaat nor imports milk.
nai jiland, the europea sangh 's 27 sadsy rajya, australia, or the sanyukt rajya are the sansar 's largest exporters of milk or milk utpaada.
China or rus hai the sansar 's largest importers of milk or milk utpaada.
throughout the world, there hai adhik than 6 arab consumers of milk or milk products.
over 750 lakh people sajiv bheetar dugdh kheti households.
milk is a key yogadanakarta to improving poshan or food suraksha visheshkar in vikasshil countries.
sudhaar in pashudhan or dairy technology prastaav significant vaada in reducing poverty or kuposhan in the sansar.
Motorcycle speedway, praayah referred to as speedway, is a motorcycle khel involving chaar or sometimes up to six rides spardhaa over chaar anti-clockwise god of an ovel circuit.
speedway motorcycle upyog tabhi ek gear or have no brakes and racing takes place on a chapata oval track praayah consisting of mile or loosely packed shale.
pratispardhi upyog is surface to slide unke mashine bagalon, powersliding or broadsiding into the bends.
On the straight bhaag of the track the motorcycle reach speeds of up.
the sateek origins of the khel hai anjaan lakin there is pramaan of a prakaar of speedway racing hone practised in the uese before the pehla sansar War or in australia in the late 1910s or early 1920s.
vahin hai abhi dono gharelu and antarrashtriya pratiyogitaaon in a kramank of deshon sahit the Speedway sansar Cup whilst the highest overall scoring vyaktigat in the speedway Grand pricks kaarykram is sunaaya the sansar champion.
speedway is lokapriy in central or uttari europea and to a lesser extent in australia or North america.
a roopaantar of track racing, speedway is administered internationally by the fédération internationale de motocyclisme ( fim ).
Domestic speedway kaarykram hai regulated by FIM sambhddha national motor khel federations.
vitamin D is a samooh of fat-soluble secosteroids jimmedaar liye intestinal avasorana of calcium or phosphate.
in humans, the sabase mahatvapurn sambandhit yogicon of vitamin d are vitamin d2 or vitamin D3.
cholecalciferol ( vitamin d3 ) or ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 ) hai adwitiya as ve constitute what we know as vitamin d or can be ingested isse the diet and/or poorak.
The body can bhi synthesize vitamin D ( from cholestrol ) jab sun expozar is paryaapt ( hence its upnaam, the `` sunshine vitamin '' ).
haalanki vitamin d is commonly called a vitamin, it is not darasal an essential dietary vitamin in the sakht bhav, as it can be synthesized in paryaapt amounts by sabase stanadhariyon ujagar to dhoop.
( billiyon and kutto can nahin synthesize vitamin d efficiently and jarur receive it in unke aahaar. )
an sashulk rasinic yogic ( or sambandhit niyat of yogicon ) is only scientifically called a vitamin when it can nahin be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an sajiv, or must be obtained isse unke aahaar.
However, as saath anya yogicon commonly pukaara vitamin, vitamin D thi khoja in an praytn to dhundhen the dietary padaarth ki was lacking in a beemaari, namely, rickets, the balykaal form of osteomalacia.
additionally, like anya yogicon pukaara vitamin, in the viksit sansar vitamin d is added to staple bhojan, aise as milk, to avoid disease due to deficiency.
Measures of serum str pratibimbit endogenous sanshleshan isse expozar to sunlight as khub as seven from the aahaar, and it is believed ki sanshleshan may contribute generally to the mentanence of paryaapt serum concentrations.
the pramaan indicates ki the sanshleshan of vitamin d from surya expozar works in a feedback loop ki roktaa toxicity but, because of uncertainty parichay the cancer risk from dhoop, no suzav hai jari by the santhaan of ayurvigyaan, uese, liye the raashi of sun expozar jaruri to meet vitamin d aavashyaktaayen.
Accordingly, the dietary sandarbh Intakes liye vitamin d assume that no sanshleshan occurs and ki sab of a person 's vitamin D is isse unke aahaar, haalanki ki hoga rarely occur in practice.
in the jigar vitamin d is converted to calcidiol, jisase is also gyaat as calcifediol ( in ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( oh ) d ; or jisase is the vishisht vitamin d metabolite ki is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin d aukaat.
bhaag of the calcidiol is converted by the gurde to calcitriol, the biologically kriyasheel form of vitamin D. calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood, regulating the visheshgyata of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream or promoting the swasth growth or remodeling of bone.
calcidiol is bhi parivartit to calcitriol baahar of the gurde for anya purposes, such as the aprasar, differentiation or apoptosis of koshikaayen ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular falan or sujan.
pare iske upyog to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the pramaan liye anya health prabhaav of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is asangat.
the behtareen pramaan of laabh is for asthi swasthya and a ghati in mrityu in bujurg women.

The nisaan ucchisht is a mid-size / entry-level luxury car manufactured by Nissan, marketed as the `` four-door sports car ''.
the origins of the ucchisht began in july 1976 as the datson 810, an upscale six-cylinder sanskaran of the bluebird, and thi spun into its apana line in 1981, having maharoom made lagaataar chunki tab.

propolis as chhatta sealing
Propolis is a resinous mixture that honey madhumakhiyon collect isse ped kaliyon, sap flows, or anya vanaspati sources.
It is prayukt as a sealant liye unwanted open spaces in the chhatta.
propolis is prayukt for choti gaps ( lagbhag or less ), jabaki larger spaces are usually bhar saath beeswax.
Its rang varies depending on iske botanical source, the most aam being dark brown.
propolis is stick at or upar room temperature,.
at nimnatar temperatures, it becomes hard and bahut bhangur.
steven tyler ( born steven victor tallarico ; kooch 26, 1948 ) is an amareeki singer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist, best gyaat as the frontman and sise singer of the boston -aadharand chattan band arosmith, in jisase he also plays the hormonica, and occasional piano or percussion.
He is gyaat as the `` Demon of screamin ' '' due to his high chillaati or his wide gayan range.
he is also gyaat for his on-stage acrobatics.
dauraan uske high-energy pradarshan, he praayah poshaak in ujjwal, rangeen outfits saath his trademark scorf hanging isse his microphone stand.
In the 1970s, tyler rose to prominence as the frontman of arosmith, jisase released such padaav mushkil chattan album as Toys in the ataari and rox.
in the late 1970s and early 1980s, tyler tha a baari drug or daaru vyasan, and the band 's lokapriyata waned.
he completed drug rehabilitation in 1986 and subsequently kaayam sobriety liye over 20 saalo, lakin tha a relapse saath prescription painkillers in the let 2000s, liye which he safaltaapurvak praapt upachaar in 2009.
baad arosmith shubharambh a ullekhneey comeback in the late 1980s or early 1990s saath the album sthai avkaash, pump, or milengi a pakad, tyler became a household naam and rai remained a praasangik chattan pratik.
As a parinaam, he rai since embarked on anek solo endeavors including atithi dikhaave on anya artists ' music, filmi or tv bhoomikaaye ( sahit as a nyaayadhish on amareeki idal ), authoring a bestselling kitaab, and solo kaary ( including a sheersh 40 hit single in 2011 ).
however, he rai jari to ricard music or perform saath Aerosmith, baad adhik than 43 saalo in the band.
the band 's naveenatam album, Music isse another aayam !
, thi released on navambar 6, 2012.
tyler is shaamil among Rolling pattharon 100 Greatest Singers.
He thi bhi kramit 3rd on hit parader 's sheersh 100 Metal vocalists of sab samay.
in 2001 he thi inducted into the chattan and phenken Hall of Fame saath arosmith, or he thi the presenter when ac/dc thi inducted into the Hall of Fame in 2003.
In 2013, tyler or his songwriting partner jo peri hoga be praptakarta of the ascap sansthaapakon puraskaar or hoga also be inducted into the songwriters Hall of kirti.

the yahudiyon ( ISO 259-3 israeli uccharan ), bhi known as the yahudee logon, hai a swadesh or an ethnoreligious samooh, originating in the israelites or hebrews of the pracheen Near East.
The yahudee nasl, nationality, or dharm hai strongly interrelated, as judaism is the paramparaagat aasthaa of the yahudee nation.
converts to judaism, jinaki status as Jews within the Jewish ethnos is equal to those born into it, have maharoom avashoshit into the yahudee logon throughout the sahasrabdiyon.
In yahudee parampara, yahudee ancestry is traced to the biblical patriarchs Abraham, ishaq or yaaqub in the duusari milinium bce.
The aadhunik rajya of israel was sthapit as a Jewish nation-state, and defines itself as aise in its moulik kanoon.
iske vidhi of vaapasi anudaan the sahi of citizenship to koi jew jo nivedan it.
israel is the tabhi country jahaan yahudiyon hai a bahumat of the janasankhyikee.
yahudiyon bhi enjoyed rajnatik swaittata twice pehle in ancient history.
the pehla of ye avadhi lasted isse 1350 to 586 bce, and encompassed the avadhi of the Judges, the sanyukt samrajya, or the vibhajit samrajya of the kingdoms of Israel and yahuda, ending saath the destruction of the pehla Temple.
The second thi the period of the Hasmonean Kingdom spanning isse 140 to 37 bce.
chunki the vinaash of the pehla temple, sabase yahudiyon have jiya in diaspora.
a minority in prayek desh in jisase ve sajiv ( magar israel ), ve have frequently experienced persecution throughout itihaas, resulting in a janasankhyikee ki rai fluctuated dono in sankhyaayein or distribution over the sadiyaan.
the world yahudee population pahunche a shikhar of 15 million prior to the duusari World War, but chah lakh Jews were maare in the holocaust.
chunki tab the population has risen again or, thi estimated at 13.4 lakh by the uttar American yahudee aankada bainko, or kam than 0.2 % of the total world janasankhyikee ( roughly ek in prayek 514 logon ).
according to this rapat, parichay 42.5 % of sab Jews reside in Israel ( 5.7 lakh ), and 39.3 % in the sanyukt States ( 5.3 lakh ), with sabase of the shesh jeena in Europe ( 1.5 lakh ) or canada ( 0.4 lakh ).
ye sankhyaayein shaamil all those jo consider themselves yahudiyon, whether or nahin they hai sambhddha with a yahudee sanghathan.
the kul world yahudee janasankhyikee, however, is mushkil to measure.
In jod to mudde with janasankhyikee methodology, vahin hai halakhic vivaadon regarding jo is a jew and dharmanirpeksh, rajnatik, and ancestral identification factors ki may affect the figure considerably.

the feast of Corpus christi ( latin liye deh of Christ ), bhi known as corpus domini, is a latin reeti liturgical solemnity celebrating the tradition or belief in the deh and rakt of yishu messiah and uske real Presence in the eucharist.
it emphasizes the anand of the sanstha of the Eucharist, jisase was observed on Holy guuruuvaar in the somber maahaul of the nearness of shubh shuukravaar.
in the present roman missal, the feast is designated the solemnity of the sabase paavan deh or rakt of Christ.
it is also celebrated in kuch anglican, Lutheran, or boodha catholic carch ki tham samaan manyataon regarding the real Presence.
the feast is liturgically manaaye on the guuruuvaar baad Trinity sande or, `` jahaan the Solemnity of the sabase paavan deh or rakt of messiah is nahin a Holy Day of daayitv, it is abantit to the Sunday baad the Most paavan trinity as iske uchit din ''.
At the samaapt of Holy Mass, there is praayah a procession of the dhanya Sacrament, generally pradarshit in a monstrance.
the baraat is followed by sunaakar of the dhanya Sacrament.
a notable Eucharistic procession is that presided over by the pope prayek saal in rome, where it begins at the archbasilica of st. John Lateran or makes its rasta to the basilica of Saint mariyam Major, jahaan it concludes with Benediction.
c-reactive protein ( siarapy ) is a protein found in the rakt, the str of jisase vruddhi in jawaab to inflammation ( i.e. C-reactive protein is an acute-phase protein ).
iske physiological bhoomika is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the surface of murde or maranaa koshikaayen ( or kuch types of jeevanu ) in order to activate the complement pranali via the c1q complex.
siarapy is synthesized by the jigar in jawaab to karkon released by macrophages or mote koshikaayen ( adipocytes ).
it is a sadsy of the pentraxin family of protein.
It is nahin sambandhit to C-peptide or protein c.
c-reactive protein thi the pehla pattern recognition receptor ( prr ) to be identified.
The start of the vyavasthit European colonization of the Americas is typically dinaak to 1492, jab a spani expedition headed by Christopher Columbus sailed liye india to kholen vyapaar lakin inadvertently discovered the americas.
europea conquest, large-scale khoji and colonization soon followed.
Seeing that Europe thi preoccupied saath anek aatanrik yudhon or thi slowly recovering isse the many mauton that the bubonic plague caused, the rapid vistaar at which it grew in wealth or power thi unforeseeable in the jaldi 1400s.
The pehla expeditions occurred saath the caribbean coasts on the islands of hispaniola, Puerto rico and cuba, or baad 1500 vistaarit into the interiars of both uttar or South America.
in 1497, sailing isse the uttar on nimitt of England, jon cabot utraa on the North amareeki coast, and a saal baad, Columbus 's third voyage pahunche the dakshin amareeki coast.
France santhaapit colonies in much of purvi uttar america, on a kramank of Caribbean islands, or in South america.
Portugal colonized brazil.
aakhirkaar, the sampurna pashchimi golardh aae antargat the control of europea sarkarein, agrani to profound parivartan to iske landscape, janasankhyikee, or sanyantr or animal jivan.
in the 19th sadi alone over 50 lakh logon left Europe liye the Americas.
the post-1492 era is known as the kaal of the columbian Exchange.
kaith Richards ( born 18 disambar 1943 ) is an angrezi sangeetkaar, singer-songwriter or sansthaapak member of the English rock band the rolling pattharon.

testosterone is a steroid hormone isse the androgen samooh or is mila in stanadhariyon, reptiles, pakshiyon, or other vertebrates.
in stanadhariyon, testosterone is primarily secreted in the testicles of males and the ovaries of mahilaon, haalanki choti amounts hai bhi sravit by the adhivrikk grathiyon.
it is the principal male sex hormone or an anabolic steroid.
In men, testosterone plays a kunjee role in the development of male reproductive utakon such as the testis or prostate as well as promoting dwitiyak sexual visheshtaayen such as increased mansapeshi, asthi mass, or the growth of deh bal.
in jod, testosterone is anivaary for swasthya or well-being as khub as the rokthaam of osteoporosis.
on ausat, in adult insaan males, the plasma visheshgyata of testosterone is about 7–8 times as great as the visheshgyata in vayask human females ' plasma, lakin as the metabolic consumption of testosterone in males is vrihad, the rose utpaadan is about 20 times greater in main.
mahilaon bhi hai adhik sensitive to the hormone.
testosterone is observed in sabase vertebrates.
machhlee mek a thodaa alag rup pukaara 11-ketotestosterone.
Its bantwaaraa in insects is ecdysone.
ye sarvyaapee steroids sujhaayen that sex hormone have an ancient vikasvaadi itihaas.
cluster sampling is a sampling takanic prayukt jab `` natural '' lakin apekshaakrit homogeneous groupings hai evident in a sankhyikeey janasankhyikee.
It is praayah used in vipanan shodh.
in is technique, the kul population is divided into ye samooh ( or cluster ) and a simple random sample of the groups is chaynit.
tab the jaruri information is ekatrit isse a simple yadrichhik sample of the tatv bheetar prayek selected samooh.
is may be kiya liye prayek tatv in ye groups or a subsample of tatv may be chaynit bheetar prayek of ye samooh.
A aam motivation liye cluster sampling is to reduce the kul kramank of interviews or laagat die the desired accuracy.
assuming a phixd namoona aakaar, the takanic gives adhik sateek parinaam jab most of the vibhinnata in the janasankhyikee is within the samooh, not between unhen.

Copper is a rasinic tatv saath the symbol Cu ( isse ) and parmaanu number 29.
It is a ductile metal saath bahut unchi thermal or vidyut chaalakata.
pure tambe is soft and malleable ; a freshly exposed sataha rai a reddish-orange rang.
it is prayukt as a conductor of ooshmaa or vidyut, a building saamagree, or a constituent of vibhinn metal alloys.
The metal or iske alloys have maharoom prayukt for hazaron of saalo.
in the Roman era, tambe thi pradhanthya mined on cyprus, hence the utpatti of the name of the metal as сyprium ( metal of cyprus ), baad shortened to сuprum.
iske compounds hai commonly encountered as tambe ( ii ) lavan, jisase often impart blue or green rangon to khanij aise as azurite or firoza or have maharoom widely used historically as pigments.
architectural structures nirmit saath tambe corrode to de green verdigris ( or patina ).
Decorative art prominently features tambe, dono by itself or as part of pigments.
Copper is anivaary to sab living organisms as a tres dietary mineral kuki it is a kunjee constituent of the respiratory anzime complex cytochrome c oxidase.
in molluscs and crustacea copper is a constituent of the rakt ranjak hemocyanin, jisase is replaced by the iron-complexed haemoglobin in machhlee and anya vertebrates.
The main kshetron jahaan tambe is found in vertebrates hai jigar, mansapeshi or asthi.
in sufficient concentration, tambe yogicon are jaharila to ucchtar organisms or hai prayukt as bacteriostatic substances, fungicides, or lakdi preservatives.
the major peshewar sports lig, or simply major lig, in the United rajya and Canada hai the ucchtam peshewar pratiyogitaaon of toli khel in the do deshon.
haalanki individual khel such as golf, tennis, and swachaalit racing are bhi bahut lokapriy, the pad is usually simit to team khel.
The term `` pramukh league '' was pehla used in 1921 in sandarbh to pramukh lig besabaal ( emelbi ), the top level of peshewar amareeki besabaal.
Today, the major northern uttar america peshewar toli sports leagues are pramukh lig besabaal ( MLB ), the neshnal basket Association ( enbie ), the National footbaal League ( enegel ), and the National hockey lig ( NHL ).
anya notable lig shaamil Major lig soker ( mls ), the canadai Football League ( CFL ), the arina footbaal lig, Major League lacrosse, the National lacrosse lig and the Women 's National basket Association.
The enegel, MLB, NBA, and enechael hai commonly referred to as the big chaar.
prayek of these is the richest peshewar klbon competition in iske khel vishwavyaapee.
the behtareen khilaadi can become saanskrithik pratik in dono deshon or elsewhere in the sansar, because the leagues anand a significant place in popular samskruti in the us or canada.
the enegel rai 32 tiimon, and the anya have 30 each.
The vast bahumat of major lig teams hai concentrated in the sabase populous mahanagar kshetron of the sanyukt rajya.
Baseball, footbaal, hockey, or soker have tha professional lig liye over 100 saalo ; jaldi lig aise as the neshnal sangh, ohio lig, or National hockey sangh formed the aadhaar of the modern MLB, NFL and NHL respectively.
Soccer thi pehla professionalized in 1894, lakin lig suffered greatly isse kami of sthirataa or seldom lasted more than a dashak.
soker 's mahanatam safaltaaon yahood in the rup of the amareeki Soccer lig ( 1921-1933 ), the original North amareeki soker lig ( 1968-1984 ), the National peshewar Soccer lig ( 1984-2001 ) or, philhal, pramukh lig Soccer ( 1996-present ).
basket is a apekshaakrit nai vikaas ; the enbie evolved from the neshnal basket League or iske splinter samooh the basket sangh of america, lene on its current rup in 1949.
prayek major lig averages 15,000 prashansak in attendance prati game or ucchtar as of 2011.
madhyahn oonchaai is an khagoleey nevigation vidhi of calculating an nireekshak 's akshansh.
Earned value prabandhan ( evm ), or Earned maan project/performance management ( evpm ) is a project management takanic for measuring project pradarshan and progress in an uddeshy manner.
kuki evm has the ability to combine maap of :
scope
anusuchee
and cost,
in a single integrated pranali, arjeet Value prabandhan is samarth to provide sateek forecasts of project pradarshan samasyaayein, which is an important yogadan liye project prabandhan.
jaldi evm shodh showed that the areas of niyojan or control hai significantly impacted by its upyog ; or similarly, using the methodology improves both paimaana paribhaasha as khub as the vishleshan of overall project pradarshan.
More haal research studies have dikhaaya ki the siddhanth of evm hai dhanatmak predictors of project success.
lokapriyata of evm has grown significantly in haal saalo pare sarkari contracting, in jisase sector iske mahatv continues to vruddhi ( e.g., recent nai DFAR rules ), in part kuki EVM can also surface in and sahaayta substantiate contract disputes.
Colorful vasant garden flowers
vasant is ek of the chaar conventional shitoshna seasons, following winter or preceding summer.
vahin hai vibhinn technical paribhaashaayen of vasant, but local upyog of the term varies according to local climate, cultures or custom.
When it is vasant in the uttari golardh, it hoga be patjhad in the southern golardh.
at the vasant equinox, dinon hai band to 12 ghanton long saath din lambaai increasing as the ritu progresses.
vasant or `` springtime '' refer to the ritu, or bhi to vichaar of rebirth, kayakalp, naveekaran, qayamat, and regrowth, with tyohaar such as carnival, Easter or holi hone manaaye at is samay.
jamestown thi a upnivesh in the upnivesh of virginia, the first permanent angrezi upnivesh in the americas.
sthapit by the virginia Company of landan as `` james Fort '' on may 14, 1607 ( O.S., may 24, 1607 N.S. ), it followed anek pehle vifal koshishen, sahit the Lost upnivesh of Roanoke.
jamestown parosa as the puunji of the upnivesh liye 83 years, isse 1616 jabatak 1699.
the settlement thi stith bheetar the territory of a rajnatik entity known as Tsenacommacah, the rajya of the powhatan Confederacy, saath around 14,000 native inhabitants, or specifically was in bhaag of the subdivision gyaat as the paspahegh janajati.
The natives initially satkar the colonists with naachna, feasting or tobacco ceremonies, or ve provided nirnaayak praavdhaanon or support liye the astitv of the colonists, jo yahood nahin agriculturally inclined, haalanki sambandh with the newcomers also soured fairly jaldi on, agrani to the kul annihilation of the paspahegh in warfare bheetar 3 saalo.
bheetar a saal of Jamestown 's founding, the virginia company brought polish or dach colonists to sahaayta improve the settlement.
in 1619, the pehla documented africans were brought to Jamestown, haalanki the aadhunik dharna of slavery in the bhavishya sanyukt States kiya not shuru in Virginia jabatak 1660.
jab the upnivesh thi subdivided into the asli eight shires of virginia in 1634, the kasbaa became stith in the eponymous james City shaayar.
The landan company 's duusari upnivesh, Bermuda, daawa to be the site of the oldest kasbaa in the angrezi nai World, as st. George 's, Bermuda thi officially sthapit ( as nai landan ) in 1612, whereas james fort, in virginia, was nahin to be parivartit into James towne jabatak 1619, or further kiya not jivit into the upasthit din.
in 1699, the capital was relocated isse Jamestown to kayaa is today williamsburg, after jisase jamestown ceased to maujuud as a upnivesh, existing today tabhi as an archaeological sait.
aaj, Jamestown is ek of teen sthitiyaan comprising the aitihaasik Triangle of aupniveshik Virginia, along saath williamsburg or yorktown, with do praathmik viraasat site.
aitihaasik jamestowne, the archaeological sait on Jamestown Island, is a sahakaari praytn by jamestown neshnal aitihaasik Site ( bhaag of aupniveshik neshnal aitihaasik park ), or Preservation Virginia.
the jamestown upnivesh, a jeena itihaas interpretive sait, is sanchalit by the jamestown yorktown nyaas in sangyojan saath the rashtramandal of virginia.

To support the kor businesses, jon deere also provides vittiya services or anya sambandhit kriyaayein.

the sanyukt rajya ten-dollar vidheyak ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of sanyukt rajya karency.

( Hamilton is ek of do non-presidents featured on currently issued u.S. bills.
the other is benjamin franklin, on the $ 100 bill.

the others hai : albert gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 vidhik tender ) ; george meade, spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 rajkosh note ) ; and Robert morris, England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 vidhik tender ; $ 10 1878/80 chaandi praaanpatr ).

heliocentrism, or heliocentricism, is the khagoleey model in jisase the Earth or grah revolve around a relatively stationary Sun at the bich of the saura pranali.
The shabd comes isse the unani ( helios `` surya '' or kentron `` bich '' ).
historically, heliocentrism thi opposed to geocentrism, jisase lagaai the dharti at the bich.
The khyaal ki the Earth gumti around the Sun tha been proposed as jaldi as the 3rd sadi bc by aristarchus of Samos, but aristarchus 's heliocentrism aakarshith choti dhyaan jabatak kopernicus revived and elaborated it.
lucio russo, however, argues ki this is a bhraamak chhap resulting from the ghaataa of scientific works of the Hellenistic Era.
Using indirect pramaan he argues ki a heliocentric drishy thi expounded in hipparkas 's work on gambheertha.
it was not jabatak the 16th sadi that a fully predictive ganitiya model of a heliocentric pranali thi prastut, by the Renaissance ganitagya, astronomer, or catholic maulavee Nicolaus kopernicus of Poland, agrani to the Copernican kranti.
in the following sadi, yohaness kapler elaborated upon and vistaarit this model to shaamil elliptical orbits, or supporting observations bana using a doordarshee were presented by galileo Galilei.
saath the observations of William harchel, Friedrich Bessel, or anya, khagolashastriyon ehsaas ki the surya thi not the bich of the brahmad and by the 1920s edwin habal had shown ki it was bhaag of a akashganga ( the milky rasta ) ki was tabhi ek of anek billions.

nahin to be uljhan saath Dimension of a shaareerik maatra.
liye anya upyog, see Dimension ( disambiguation ).
isse baayein to right, the vargakar, the cube, and the tesseract.
The vargakar is bounded by 1-dimensional linon, the ghan by 2-dimensional areas, and the tesseract by 3-dimensional aaytan.
a prakshep of the ghan is given chunki it is viewed on a two-dimensional screen.
the vahi applies to the tesseract, which additionally can tabhi be dikhaaya as a prakshep bhi in three-dimensional spes.
a diagram prardashit the pehla four sthanik dimensions.
in bhautikee or ganit, the aayam of a spes or object is informally paribhaashit as the minimum number of coordinates needed to bataaen koi point bheetar it.
yun a lakeer has a aayam of ek kuki only ek coordinate is needed to bataaen a point on it ( liye udhaaharan, the point at 5 on a kramank line ).
a surface such as a plane or the surface of a belan or gola has a dimension of two kuki two nirdeshaank hai needed to specify a point on it ( for example, to locate a point on the surface of a gola you need dono iske akshansh or iske longitude ).
the inside of a ghan, a belan or a gola is three-dimensional kuki teen nirdeshaank hai needed to locate a point bheetar ye spaces.
In shaareerik sharten, dimension refers to the constituent dhaancha of sab spes ( volume ) or its sthiti in time ( abhas as a scalar aayam saath the t-axis ), as khub as the spatial samvidhan of vastuen within—structures ki correlate saath both kan or field conceptions, interact according to saapeksh gun of dravyaman —and are fundamentally ganitiya in description.
ye, or anya aksh, may be referenced to uniquely pahachaano a point or dhaancha in iske attitude or sambandh to anya objects and aavriti.
shaareerik theories ki charitaarth samay, aise as general aapekshikta, are kaha to kaary in 4-dimensional `` spacetime ``, ( paribhaashit as a Minkowski spes ).
aadhunik theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional '' sahit kwantum field or string theories.
The state-space of quantum mechanics is an infinite-dimensional function spes.
the concept of aayam is nahin restricted to shaareerik vastuen.
high-dimensional spaces occur in ganit or the sciences liye anek kaaran, aksar as configuration spaces aise as in lagranjiy or Hamiltonian yantriki ; these hai amoort spaces, swatantra of the physical spes we sajiv in.
fontana ( ) is a nagar of 200,762 residents in san bernardino County, California.

is res is the fastest half-marathon course in the world.

Cowboys stadium is a stadium saath a retractable chat in arlington, texas.

The adhiktam kshamta of the stadium, sahit khadaa room, is 105,000.
the party pass ( kholen areas ) sections hai peeche site in each samaapt mandal or on a series of chah elevated plateform conect by stairways.
it rai the sansar 's largest column-free interior and the chauthi largest unchi paribhaasha video screen, which hangs isse 20 yard line to 20 yard lakeer.
The suvidha can bhi be used for a variety of anya kriyaayein outside of iske pramukh purpose ( peshewar footbaal ) such as concert, basketball khel, boxing matches, college football or unchi skool football contests, soker milan, or motocross races.
canadai itihaaskaaron jabatak the 1980s tended to fokas on aarthik itihaas, sahit labour history.
in bhaag is is kuki Canada has had far kam political or sainya conflicts than anya samaajon.
This thi especially sachcha in the pehla half of the twentieth sadi when aarthik itihaas thi overwhelmingly dominant.
anek of the sabase prominent angrezi canadai itihaaskaaron isse is kaal yahood aarthik itihaaskaaron, aise as Harold innis, donald creighton or arthur R. M. nimnatar
vidwaanon of canadai itihaas yahood vaaris to the paramparaon that viksit in europea or the sanyukt States, lakin frameworks ki worked well elsewhere often vifal in canada.
The heavily Marxist bahekaave economic itihaas ki dominates Europe rai choti praasangikta to sabase of canadai history.
a fokas on class, urban areas, or industry fails to pataa canada 's rural or resource based economy.
similarly, the monetarist skool ki is prabal in the sanyukt rajya bhi has maharoom mushkil to transfer north of the border.
the padhai of aarthik itihaas in Canada became atyadhik kendrit on aarthik bhugol, or for many years the prabal school of vichaar rai maharoom the staples lekh.
This skool of thought bases the study of the Canadian arthvyavastha on the study of natural sansaadhan.
is drushtikon has since bhi become used baahar of canada in australia and in anek vikasshil nations.
pehle the arrival of europeans, the pehla raashtra of kayaa hota become Canada tha a vishaal or harshollas vyapaar sanjaal.
Furs, tuls, sajaavati vasteen, or other goods yahood praayah transported hazaron of kilometre, zyaadaatar by canoe throughout the many nadiyaan or lakes of the pradesh.
The jaldi europea history of the canadai arthvyavastha is praayah studied through the stepuls lekh which argues the Canadian arthvyavastha developed through the exploitation of a series of stepuls ki would be exported to europea.
carbon-14, 14c, or radiocarbon, is a radioactive samasthanik of carbon with a cendrak containing 6 protons or 8 neutrons.
iske upasthiti in sashulk saamagree is the aadhaar of the radiocarbon dating vidhi pioneered by willard libbi or sahyogiyon ( 1949 ) to tithi puraatatv, geological and hydrogeological namoonay.
carbon-14 thi khoja on 27 farvari 1940, by martin kamen or sam Ruben at the vishvavidhyalayon of california vikiran prayogshaala in Berkeley, haalanki its existence had maharoom suggested by franj kurie in 1934.
vahin hai three naturally occurring isotopes of carbon on Earth : 99 % of the carbon is carbon-12, 1 % is carbon-13, or carbon-14 occurs in trace amounts, i.e., bananaa up parichay 1 bhaag prati trillion ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the carbon in the maahaul.
the half-life of carbon-14 is 5,730±40 saalo.
carbon-14 decays into nitrogen-14 through beta kshay.
the praathmik natural sorce of carbon-14 on Earth is loukik re action upon nitrogen in the atmosphere, and it is isliye a cosmogenic nuclide.
However, open-air nabhikeey pareekshan between 1955–1980 contributed to this pool.
The alag isotopes of carbon do nahin differ appreciably in their chemical properties.
is is used in rasinic or biological shodh, in a technique pukaara carbon labeling : carbon-14 anu can be used to badalen nonradioactive carbon, in anukram to tres rasinic or biochemical reactions involving carbon atoms isse koi die organic compound.
bijli is a atyadhik visible rup of urja transfer
Lightning strikes hai vidyut discharges on a vishaal scale between the maahaul or an earth-bound object.
ve mostly originate in thunderclouds or terminate on the maidan, pukaara badal to Ground ( CG ) bijli.
however, ve may also be initiated from a bahut lambaa grounded object or reach into the badal.
haalanki `` a lightning strike '' is commonly prayukt to describe all bijli, it is balki galat or a misnomer, as tabhi about 25 % of all bijli events vishwavyaapee hai cg, the large bulk of bijli kaarykram hai intracloud ( IC ) or badal to Cloud ( cc ), jahaan nirvahan tabhi occurs high in the atmosphere.
the vaigyanik naam for the puraa prakram of a single bijli event is a and it is a very jatil, multiple stepped baatcheet, which is not completely samajha.
sabase cg flashes tabhi `` strike '' ek shaareerik sthaan, referred to as a termination.
The praathmik conducting channel, the ujjwal coursing lite tum may dekhie or kol a `` strike '', is tabhi about 1 inch in vyas, haalanki to hamaari eyes it looks much larger.
They are mile long, upwards of tens of miles.
or the sampurna flash, lasts tabhi a few bhinnon of a duusari, most of which is nahin drishy to insaan eyes.
thunder is always utpaadit by bijli.
bas jaise bijli, ki deceives our ankhen, praayah looking larger or kareeb than it really is, the earth 's maahaul or hamaari dimag 's bodh of the baahar sansar, ultimately determines whether it is `` suna '' or nahin.
bijli can nahin happen in a vacuum viheen of ions, nor can thunder occur bagaiyr anuon to vibrate.
thunder is a shaareerik absolute liye prayek single flash of bijli.
contrary to lokapriy vishwaas, a bijli strike itself is praayah nahin jimmedaar liye anek deaths or choton from a single event.
it would be impossible die the prakritik tendencies of a flash, jabatak logon or pashu were stacked on top of prayek anya, or ve yahood somehow arranged khadaa and bhaag of the flash channel.
jab lightning ignites an uplabdhiyaan eendhan source or an explosion occurs, it is the shock wave or aag causing the choton, nahin the strike itself.
maidan currents, bhi pukaara kadam potential, of an dharti termination is what truly kalyankari most injuries or maut to insaano or animals.
the near instantaneous fatafat of surface aarope, induced by the overhead thundercloud itself, race to the strike point isse sainkadon to hazaron of feet away dauraan nirvahan.
This vartmaan, caused dauraan prayek stroke, takes the path of tanik resistance, which may be aayan samrudh human or animal taange, over poorly conducting dharti.
is is kyon it is behtareen to crouch, saath feet close saath, if kabhi caught in the open dauraan a andhad.

The Gunfight at the o.k. corral thi a gunfight ki took place at parichay 3:00 p.m. on Wednesday, aktubar 26, 1881, in tombstone, erizona territory, or is generally regarded as the sabase prasiddh gunfight in the history of the amareeki Old West.
the gunfight, believed to have lasted tabhi parichay thirty seconds, thi ladaa between the outlaw cowboys billy Claiborne, ike and billy clanton, or tom and frank mclaury, or the opposing town marshall virgil earp or uske brothers sahaayak Town marshall morgan or temporary lawman Wyatt, aided by dastauez holiday designated as a asthai marshal by virgil.
ike Clanton or billy Claiborne bhaaga isse the lado unharmed, but Ike 's bhai billy clanton thi killed, along saath dono mclaurys.
lawmen Virgil and morgan earp or dastauez holiday were wounded.
Only vyat Earp aae through the lado unharmed.
the lado rai aaiye to represent a time in American itihaas jab the frontier thi kholen dayera for outlaws opposed by vidhi enforcement that was sprad patala over vishaal territories, leaving kuch kshetron unprotected.
the gunfight was nahin khub gyaat to the American public jabatak 1931 jab lekhak Stuart jhil published kayaa rai chunki maharoom determined to be a largely fictionalized biography, vyat Earp : frontier Marshal, do years baad earp 's death.
jhil retold uske story in a 1946 book ki nideshak jon Ford viksit into the movie my Darling clementine.
baad the film gunfight at the o.k. corral was released in 1957, the golibari came to be gyaat by ki naam.
Since tab, the conflict rai maharoom portrayed saath varying degree of sateekta in numerous pashchimi films or kitabe.
despite its naam, the gunfight actually occurred in a narrow lot chah dwaar west of the pasch entrance to the o.k. corral on fremont gali, or bhi in the gali.
the two opposing parties yahood initially only parichay alaava.
parichay tees goliyaan yahood fired in thirty second.
ike clanton daayar hatya charges viruddh the earps or Doc holiday lakin ve were aakhirkaar exonerated by a local nyaayadhish baad a 30-day praarambhik hearing and tab again by a local grand juri.
on December 28, 1881, virgil earp thi maimed in an hatya attempt by the outlaw cowboys, or on kooch 18, 1882, ve assassinated Morgan earp.
the suspects susajjit thos alibis, or newly appointed dipti u.s. Marshal vyat earp took matters into his apana hands during the earp vendetta sawari, ironically dhada by county Sheriff johny behan saath warrants liye the earp 's giraftaar.
HDMI ( high-definition multimedia interfes ) is a compact audio/video interfes liye transferring uncompressed video aankada or compressed/uncompressed digital audio data isse a hdmi-compliant yantra ( `` the sorce device '' ) to a sangat computer monitor, video projector, digital television, or digital audio yantra.
hdmi is a digital badalanaa liye maujuuda analog video maanakon.
vahin hai a number of hdmi-standard cabel conectors uplabdhiyaan, prayek of jisase can be used for any uncompressed tv or PC video swaroop, including maanak, unnat, high definition, or 3d video signals ; up to 8 channels of compressed or uncompressed digital audio ; a cec ( Consumer Electronics control ) connection ; or an ethernet aankada conection.
HDMI implements the eia/cea-861 maanakon, jisase define video swarup or waveforms, transport of compressed, uncompressed, or lpcm audio, auxiliary aankada, or implementations of the vesa edid.
The cec allows HDMI devices to control prayek other jab jaruri and allows the user to operate multiple divaais saath ek remote control handset.
Because HDMI is electrically sangat saath the cea-861 signal prayukt by digital vizual interfes ( DVI ), no signal parivartan is jaruri, nor is vahin a ghaataa of video visheshta jab a dvi-to-hdmi adapter is prayukt.
As an uncompressed cea-861 conection, hdmi is swatantra of the vibhinn digital television standards used by vyaktigat divaais, aise as atsc or dvb, as ye are encapsulations of sampidit MPEG video stream ( jisase can be decoded or output as an uncompressed video stream on hdmi ).
Production of upabhokta HDMI products prarambh in let 2003.
in Europe either DVI-HDCP or hdmi is shaamil in the hd ready in-store labeling specification liye tv set liye hdtv, pratipaadit by eicta saath ses astr in 2005.
hdmi began to appear on upabhokta HDTV camcorders or digital still cameras in 2006.
as of January 8, 2013, jisase is ten years baad the relies of the pehla hdmi specification, over 3 arab hdmi divaais have shipped chunki the launch of the hdmi maanak.

elizabeth ain bloomer warren `` betty '' ghat ( april 8, 1918 – July 8, 2011 ), thi pehla mahila of the sanyukt States isse 1974 to 1977 dauraan the presidency of uske husband Gerald Ford.
As pehla mahila, she thi kriyasheel in soshal niti and nirmit precedents as a nitiyaan kriyasheel adhyakshiya wife.

Pro-choice on garbhpaat or a netaa in the Women 's gati, wo gained kirti as ek of the sabase nishkapat pehla mahilaon in history, commenting on prayek hot-button samasya of the samay, including feminism, baraabar adaa, the era, sex, davaayen, garbhpaat, or gan control.

anglo-saxon england refers to the kaal of the itihaas of the part of britain that became gyaat as England, lasting isse the end of roman occupation or sthapana of anglo-saxon kingdoms in the 5th century until the norman conquest of England in 1066 by wiliam the conqueror.
anglo-saxon is a saamaanya pad referring to the germanic peoples who came to britain dauraan the 5th and 6th sadiyaan, sahit kone, saxons, frisii, or jutes.
the term bhi refers to the bhashaa spoken at the time in england, jisase is abhi pukaara boodha angrezi, and to the culture of the era, jisase has long attracted lokapriy and scholarly dhyaan.
jabatak the 9th century anglo-saxon England thi varchasv by the heptarchy, the kingdoms of northmbria, mercia, east Anglia, Essex, kent, Sussex, or wessex.
in sharten of dharm the kingdoms followed anglo-saxon paganism during the jaldi kaal, lakin parivartit to Christianity dauraan the 7th century.
paganism tha a final stronghold in a kaal of mercian hegemony during the 640s, samaapti saath the maut of penda of mercia in 655.
Facing the threat of viking invasions, the House of wessex became dominant dauraan the 9th sadi, antargat the niyam of alfred the great.
During the 10th sadi, the vyaktigat kingdoms ekikrut antargat the niyam of Wessex into the Kingdom of england, jisase stood opposed to the danelaw, the viking kingdoms sthapit isse the 9th century in the north and east of england.
The Kingdom of England fell in the viking invasion isse denmark in 1013 or thi shasit by the house of denmark until 1042, jab the anglo-saxon House of wessex was lauti.
the last anglo-saxon king, herold godwinson, thi maare in 1066 at the Battle of Hastings.

drishy of defibrillator electrode sthiti and avasthiti.
defibrillation is a common upachaar for life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, or pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic khuraaq of vidyut urja to the prabhavit dil saath a device pukaara a defibrillator.
is depolarizes a critical dravyaman of the dil muscle, terminates the dysrhythmia, or allows saamaanya sinus lay to be reestablished by the deh 's prakritik pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the dil.
Defibrillators can be bahya, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the prakaar of yantra prayukt or needed.
kuch bahya ikai, gyaat as swachaalit bahya defibrillators ( AEDs ), automate the nidaan of treatable lay, meaning ki lay responders or bystanders hai able to upyog unhen safaltaapurvak saath little, or in kuch cases no prashikshan at sab.
gabrielle `` cocao '' bonheur Chanel ( agast 19, 1883 – janvari 10, 1971 ) thi a french fashion panktiyaan and sansthaapak of the channel brands.
wo thi the tabhi faishan panktiyaan to appear on Time patrika 's suchi of the 100 sabase influential people of the 20th sadi.
saath saath paul poiret, channel thi credited with liberating women from the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' or popularizing the sweekruti of a sportive, cazual chik as the feminine maanak in the post- sansar yuddh I era.
a safal faishan nirmaataa, channel 's influence vistaarit pare couture clothing.
Her dizine aesthetic was realized in jewelry, handbags, and fragrance.

romania ( ; dinaak spellings roumania or rumania ; ) is a desh located at the chauraahey of central or southeastern Europe, bordering on the blike samudr.
romania saajha a kinaaraa saath hungarian and srbija to the west, yukt or moldova to the northeast or east, or Bulgaria to the dakshin.
at, romania is the aathvin largest desh of the europea sangh by kshetrafal, or has the saatvaan largest janasankhyikee of the europea Union saath adhik than 19 lakh logon.
Its puunji or biggest city is bucharesti, the 11th largest nagar in the EU.
the United principalities emerged jab the territories of moldavia or Wallachia yahood united under Prince sikandar Ioan cuza in 1859.
in 1866 Prince Karl of hohenzollern-sigmaringen thi pukaara to the singhaasana as the sattadhari prince of the romanian Principate or in 1881 he was aakhirkaar pahanaaya as king carol i the first monarch of the kingdom of romania.
swatantraaa isse the Ottoman samrajya thi ghoshit on 9 may 1877, or thi internationally pahachaanaa the following saal.
at the end of sansar yuddh i, transylvania, Bukovina or bessarabia sanyukt saath the Kingdom of romania.
sansar yuddh ii diya kaaran to the vruddhi of a sainya dictatorship in romania antargat phacist saamaanya aayan antonescu, who chose to fight on the paksh of the aksh powers isse 1941 to 1944.
baad uske hataanaa, romania switched sides in 1944 or joined the allies.
by the samaapt of the yuddh, kuch formerly romanian northeastern territories yahood occupied by the soviet Union, saath Red fouj ikai stationed on Romanian mrudaa.
In 1947 Romania forcibly became a logon 's ganatantr ( 1947-1965 ) or a sadsy of the warso anubandh.
in 1965 nicolae ceauşescu became saamaanya sachiv of the romanian communist Party, or the harsh austerity upayon, political daman, or cult of vyaktitv he implemented led to the samaajawaadee Republic of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) banane the sabase stalinist police rajya in the Eastern bloc.
aakhirkaar uske authoritarian sarkari thi toppled in December 1989 dauraan the romanian kranti of 1989.
With the patan of the Iron pardaa, Romania began its transition towards democracy or a capitalist market arthvyavastha.
baad a dashak of post-revolution aarthik problems or living-standards decline, extensive reforms fostered aarthik recovery.
as of 2010, Romania is an upper-middle-income country saath a unchi human vikaas index.
romania joined nato on 29 kooch 2004, or the europea Union on 1 janvari 2007.
It is bhi a sadsy of the : Latin sangh, francophonie, OSCE, wto, bsec, United raashtra, ityadi.
aaj, romania is a unitary semi-presidential ganatantr, in jisase the karypalika shakha consists of the adhyaksh or the Government.
`` pracheen '' redirects yahan.
liye anya upyog, dekhie pracheenta ( bahuviklpi ).
the times pehle likhane belong either to protohistory or to praagitihaas.
khafre 's pyramid ( 4th rajvansh ) or Great sphinx of giza ( c. 2500 BC or shaayad pehle )
pracheen history is the study of the likhaa past from the shuruuaat of ankit insaan itihaas to the jaldi madhya aayu.
the span of recorded history is roughly 5,000 saalo, saath Cuneiform script, the oldest discovered rup of coherent likhane, isse the protoliterate period around the 30th century bc.
This is the beginning of itihaas, as opposed to prehistory, according to the definition prayukt by sabase itihaaskaaron.
the pad shastreey antiquity is praayah prayukt to refer to itihaas in the boodha sansar from the shuruuaat of recorded unani itihaas in 776 bc ( First olympiad ).
This roughly coincides saath the paramparaagat tithi of the founding of rome in 753 bc, the shuruuaat of the itihaas of pracheen Rome, or the shuruuaat of the archaic kaal in Ancient unaniyon.
haalanki the samaapti tithi of ancient itihaas is vivaadit, kuch pashchimi vidwaanon use the patan of the pashchimi roman samrajya in 476 ad, the closure of the platonic Academy in 529 ad, the maut of the emperor Justinian i, the coming of islam or the rise of sharalamen as the samaapt of pracheen or shastreey europea itihaas.
in india, the period shaamil the jaldi kaal of the Middle kingdoms, or, in china, the samay up to the Qin rajvansh is shaamil.
methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a rup of vitamin B12.
physically it resembles the anya form of vitamin b12, occurring as andhera red crystals ki freely form cherry-colored paardarshee samaadhaan in jal.
Vitamin B12, vitamin B12 or vitamin b-12, bhi called cobalamin, is a water-soluble vitamin with a kunjee bhoomika in the saamaanya kaamkaaj of the dimag or baichaiyn pranali, or liye the gathan of rakt.
it is ek of the aath B vitamins.
it is normally shaamil in the chayapachay of prayek koshika of the human deh, visheshkar affecting DNA sanshleshan or viniman, but bhi vasiy acid sanshleshan or urja utpaadan.
neither fungi, plants, nor animals hai capable of producing vitamin b12.
Only bacteria or orchia have the anzimon jaruri liye its sanshleshan, haalanki anek foods hai a natural sorce of b12 because of bacterial symbiosis.
The vitamin is the largest and sabase structurally complicated vitamin and can be utpaadit industrially tabhi through bacterial fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin B12 consists of a class of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ), all of which have vitamin kaaryaklap.
it contains the biochemically viral element cobalt.
jaivasanshleshan of the moulik structure of the vitamin is sampannataa tabhi by jeevanu ( which praayah produce hydroxocobalamin ), but parivartan between different form of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human deh.
a aam semi-synthetic rup of the vitamin, cyanocobalamin, karata not occur in nature, lakin is utpaadit isse bacterial hydroxocobalamin or then prayukt in anek davaayen or poorak, or as a khaanaa yogtmak, kuki of iske sthirataa or lower utpaadan laagat.
in the deh it is parivartit to the insaan physiological form methylcobalamin or adenosylcobalamin, leaving peeche the synide, albeit in minimal concentration.
adhik recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, and adenosylcobalamin can be mila in adhik mahangi pharmacological products and khaanaa poorak.
The atirikt utility of ye is philhal debated.
vitamin B12 was khoja isse iske sambandh to the beemaari ghaatak raktaalpata, jisase is an asankramy beemaari in jisase parietal cells of the stomach jimmedaar liye secreting moolbhoot factor hai nasht.
moolbhoot factor is nirnaayak liye the normal absorption of b12, so a kami of intrinsic factor, as dekhi in pernicious raktaalpata, kalyankari a vitamin b12 kamiyaan.
anek anya subtler kinds of vitamin b12 deficiency and unke biochemical effects have chunki maharoom elucidated.
the Roman samrajya ( ) thi the post- Republican kaal of the pracheen roman civilization, characterised by an nirankush rup of sarkari or vishaal territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in europea, africa, or asia.
the 500-year-old roman ganatantr, which preceded it, tha maharoom destabilized through a shrenee of civil wars.
anek kaarykram chihnit the transition from ganatantr to samrajya, sahit julius seizar 's appointment as perpetual taanashaah ( 44 bc ) ; the Battle of actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific augustus to octavian by the Roman seenet ( 27 BC ).
the pehla two sadiyaan of the samrajya yahood a kaal of unprecedented sthirataa or prosperity known as the pax romana ( `` roman salaam '' ).
It reached iske greatest expanse dauraan the shasankaal of Trajan ( 98–117 ad ).
in the 3rd sadi, the Empire underwent a sankat ki threatened iske astitv, but was reunified or stabilized antargat the emperors aurelian and diocletian.
isaayiyon rose to shakti in the 4th sadi, dauraan jisase samay a pranali of dual niyam thi developed in the Latin west or unani East.
baad the patan of central sarkari in the West in the 5th century, the eastern half jari as what hota baad be gyaat as the Byzantine Empire.
Because of the samrajya 's vishaal extent or long sahansheeltaa, the institutions and culture of rome had a profound or sthaayee influence on the development of bhashaa, dharm, vaastukala, darshanashastra, law, or form of sarkari in the territory it governed, visheshkar europea, or by arthath of europea expansionism throughout the aadhunik sansar.
Total deh surface kshetrafal ( TBSA ) is an moolyankan maap of burns of the skin.
in vayaskon, the `` niyam of nines '' is prayukt to determine the total pratishat of area burned for prayek pramukh khand of the deh.
in some cases, the burns may cover adhik than ek deh bhaag, or may not fully cover aise a bhaag ; in ye maamle, burns are measured by using the casualty 's tad as a reference point liye 1 % of the deh.
For children and infants, the lund-browder chart is prayukt to assess the burned body sataha area.
alag percentages hai prayukt kuki the ratio of the sanyukt surface area of the sir or neck to the sataha area of the limbs is typically larger in children than ki of an vayask.
Typical values liye aam samooh of insaano follow.
( due to rounding, maan may not add to 100 %. )
sansar infant mrityu daron by paanch years averages in 2008.
is is a suchi of countries by infant mrityu rate.

the oopaadhi pratik ( ° ) is a typographical pratik ki is prayukt, among other things, to represent degree of arc ( e.g. in geographic nirdeshaank systems ), ghanton ( in the medical field ), or degree of taapmaana.
The pratik consists of a choti uthaaya circle, historically a shunya glyph.
in unicode it is encoded at.
is is a suchi of jaden, pratyay, or prefixes prayukt in chikitsa shabdaawalee, their meanings, or unke etymology.
There hai a few niyam jab using chikitsa jaden.
firstly, prefixes or suffixes, primarily in Greek, but also in Latin, have a droppable -o-.
as a saamaanya niyam, is -o- lagbhag sadaa adhiniyamon as a joint-stem to conect two consonantal jaden, e.g. arthr- + -o- + logy = arthrology.
But generally, the -o- is dropped jab connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g. arthr- + itis = arthritis, instead of arthr-o-itis.
secondly, chikitsa roots generally go saath according to bhashaa : unani prefixes go saath Greek pratyay or latin prefixes saath latin pratyay.
Although antarrashtriya vaigyanik shabdaawalee is not kathor parichay segregating combining form of alag bhashaaen, it is advisable jab coining nai shabd nahin to mixr alag lingual jaden.
Stomach karkat, or gastric karkat, refers to karkat arising from koi bhaag of the pet.
pet karkat kalyankari about 800,000 deaths vishwavyaapee prati saal.
prognosis is garib ( 5-year survival < 5 to 15 % ) kuki most marijon present saath advanced beemaari.
