The berlin nakebandi ( 24 june 1948 – 12 may 1949 ) thi ek of the pehla pramukh antarrashtriya crises of the Cold yuddh.
dauraan the bahurashtriya occupation of post–world yuddh ii germany, the soviet sangh avarodhit the Western allies ' rail, road, or kanal abhigam to the sector of berlin under Allied control.
unke aim thi to force the pashchimi powers to allow the soviet mandal to prarambh supplying berlin saath khaanaa or eendhan, thereby giving the soviets vyaavhaarik control over the sampurna city.
In jawaab, the pashchimi allies vyavasthit the berlin airlift to carry aapurtiyan to the logon in west berlin.
aircrews isse the sanyukt rajya air Force, the angrejon royal Air Force, the Royal australian air Force, the royal canadai Air Force, the royal nai Zealand air Force, or the dakshin africa air force udaaya over 200,000 flite in ek year, providing up to 4700 tons of daily necessities aise as eendhan or khaanaa to the berliners.
by the spring of 1949, the praytn thi clearly succeeding or, by april, the airlift thi delivering adhik cargo than tha previously maharoom transported into the nagar by rail.
the kamyaabi of the berlin Airlift brought embarrassment to the Soviets who tha refused to believe it could mek a antar.
the nakebandi was lifted in May 1949 or resulted in the sristi of two pruthak German rajya.
the sangheey Republic of germany ( West germany ) and the German loktantric Republic ( east Germany ) split up berlin.
in samaran of the airlift, teen airport in the purv western zones of the nagar parosa as the praathmik gateways to germany for another pachaas saalo.
The european chihn ; logotype or hastlikhit.
The european chihn is the currency chihn prayukt liye the european, the aadhikarik currency of the eurozone in the European Union ( eu ).
the dizine thi presented to the public by the europea ayog on 12 disambar 1996.
the antarrashtriya three-letter code ( according to iesao maanak ISO 4217 ) for the european is EUR.
In unicode it is encoded at.
In angrezi, the chihn precedes the maan.
in kuch styleguides, but not anya, the european chihn is unspaced.
mate (, ; sometimes bhi spelled maté ), also known as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ), is a paramparaagat South American infused peya, particularly in argentina, urugve, paragway or the dakshini rajya of Brazil and to a lesser oopaadhi in dakshin of chile, the bolivian chaco, syrian and lebanon.
it is prepared isse steeping sukhi leaves of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis, gyaat in Portuguese as erva-mate ) in hot jal.
mate is parosa saath a metal straw isse a saajha khokhla calabash gourd.
the straw is called a bombilla in kuch latin American deshon, a bomba in Portuguese, or a bombija or, adhik generally, a masassa ( prakaar of straw ) in arabi.
the straw is traditionally made of chaandi.
aadhunik, commercially available lobhi hai typically bana of nickel silver, pukaara alpaca ; stainless steel, or hollow-stemmed cane.
the gourd is gyaat as a mate or a guampa ; jabaki in brazil, it rai the vishisht naam of cuia, or also cabaça ( the name liye indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in anya regions of brazil, still prayukt liye general khaanaa or peya in remote regions ).
bhi if the jal is supplied isse a aadhunik thermos, the infusion is traditionally drunk isse mates or cuias.
as saath anya brewed herbs, yerba mate leaves are sukhi, chopped, or ground into a powdery mishran pukaara yerba.
the bombilla acts as dono a straw or a sieve.
The submerged end is flared, saath small holes or slot ki allow the brewed drav in, lakin blaak the chunky padaarth that makes up much of the mishran.
a modern bombilla dizine upyog a sidhaa tub saath chhed, or vasant sleeve to adhinium as a sieve.
`` Tea-bag '' prakaar infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have maharoom on the market in argentina, Paraguay and urugve liye many years under aise vyapaar names as `` taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina, `` pajarito '' or `` kurupí '' in Paraguay, or in brazil antargat the name `` mate Leão ''.
is is mana a completely alag drink.
it is never nashe isse cuias or pukaara chimarrão, nor is it sambhddha with the gaucho/gaúcho samskruti.
the automotive industry is a pad ki cover a wide dayera of companiyaan or sanghathanon shaamil in the design, vikaas, manufacture, vipanan, or selling of motor vaahanon, towed vaahanon, motorcycle or mopeds.
it is ek of the sansar 's sabase mahatvapurn aarthik sector by aay.
the term automotive udyog usually does not shaamil udyog dedicated to the maintenance of automobile following delivery to the end-user, aise as marammat dukaane and motor eendhan bharna stations.
the pad automotive thi created from unani autos ( swah ), and Latin motivus ( of motion ) to represent koi rup of self-powered gadee.
This pad thi proposed by sae sadsy almer speri.

Henry T. thomas Sampson, jr. ( born in jackson, mississippi in 1934 ) is an african-american avishkaarak.

hellovien or hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` sab hallows ' sandhya `` ), bhi gyaat as sab Hallows ' Eve, is a yearly jashn observed in a kramank of deshon on aktubar 31, the eve of the pashchimi isai feast of All hallows ( or sab santo ) and the din initiating the triduum of hallowmas.
according to many vidwaanon, sab hallows ' sandhya is a christianised feast originally bahekaave by pashchimi europea kataai tyohaar, or tyohaar of the murde saath sambhavit pagan jaden, visheshkar the celtic samhain.
anya vidwaanon maintain that it originated independently of samhain or has solely isai roots.
theth tyohaar Halloween kriyaayein shaamil trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ), upasthit veshbhusha partiyon, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, tehraana bobbing, visiting haunted aakarshan, playing pranks, telling daraavne stories, or watching horer films.
Freedom of speech is the rajnatik sahi to communicate one 's raay or ideas using ek 's body or property to anyone who is willing to receive unhen.
the pad freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously, but includes koi adhinium of seeking, receiving or imparting soochna or vichaar, regardless of the medium prayukt.
In abhyaas, the sahi to swatantraaa of vaak is nahin nirpeksh in koi country and the right is commonly vishay to limitations, as saath libel, badanaami, obscenity, sedition ( sahit, for udhaaharan inciting jaateey dwesh ), copyright ulanghan, rahasyodghatan of soochna ki is classified or varanaa.
the sahi to freedom of abhivyakti is pahachaanaa as a insaan sahi antargat Article 19 of the saarvbhaumik ghoshnaa of insaan Rights or recognized in antarrashtriya human adhikaron vidhi in the antarrashtriya Covenant on civil or rajnatik Rights ( iccpr ).
aalekh 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the sahi to tham raay bagaiyr interference '' or `` everyone shall have the sahi to swatantraaa of expression ; is sahi shall include swatantraaa to talash, praapt or impart information or ideas of sab kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in chapai, in the form of art, or through koi anya media of his chunaav ''.
aalekh 19 goes on to say that the exercise of ye adhikaron carries `` khaas duties or jimmedaariyon `` and may `` isliye be vishay to nishchit pratibandh '' when jaruri `` [ f ] or aadar of the rights or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of neshnal suraksha or of public anukram ( order public ), or of public swasthya or morals ''.
swatantraaa of speech may be legally curtailed in some religious vidhik pranaaliyon or in dharmanirpeksh jurisdictions jahaan it is mila to cause religious thokar, aise as the angrejon Racial and dharmik dwesh adhinium 2006.
sidney harbour isse the air, prardashit the Opera house, the sibidi, golakaar quay, the Bridge, the parramatta nadi, uttar Sydney or kirribilli in the foreground
the sidney Harbour Bridge is a steel through mehrab sethu aarpaar Sydney Harbour ki carries rail, vehicular, cykil or pedestrian trekkic between the Sydney central business district ( sibidi ) or the uttar shore.
The naatakeey drishy of the sethu, the harbour, and the nearby Sydney Opera House is an iconic chitra of sidney, New South Wales, or Australia.
the sethu is nicknamed `` the coathanger '' kuki of its arch-based dizine.
antargat the directions of dr j.j.c. bradfield of the nsw vibhaag of public Works, the sethu thi designed or nirmit by angrejon kad dorman long and co Ltd of middlesbrough or kholi in 1932.
the sethu 's dizine was influenced by the narak phatak sethu in nai york.
It was the world 's widest long-span sethu, at 48.8 meter ( 160 feet ) chaudee, jabatak construction of the nai bandargahon man sethu in vainkuvar.
It is bhi the fifth longest spanning-arch sethu in the world, and it is the tallest steel arch sethu, measuring from sheersh to jal str.
jabatak 1967 the harbour Bridge thi sidney 's tallest dhaancha.
the hawaii hotspot is a volcanic hotspot stith near the namesake hawaii islands, in the uttari Pacific samandar.
ek of the most well-known or heavily studied hotspot in the world, the hawaii plume is responsible liye the sristi of the hawaii – Emperor seamount kadi, an over 5,800 kilometres ( 3,600 mi ) long kadi of jwalamukhi, four of which hai kriyasheel, do of which hai dormant, or more than 123 of which hai extinct, anek having since maharoom maidan beneath the lehren by apradan as seamounts and atolls.
the chain extends from dakshin of the island of hawaii to the kinare of the Aleutian gart, nikat the purvi edge of rus.
jabaki most jwalamukhi hai created by geological kaaryaklap at tectonic plate seemayen, the hawaii hotspot is stith dur from nearby thali boundaries ; the classic hotspot siddhanth, pehla prastaavit in 1963 by jon tuzo wilson, proposes that a single, phixd mantle plume builds jwalamukhi ki then, kaaten band from unke sorce by the gati of the prashanth Plate, become increasingly niskriy and aakhirkaar erode neeche sea str over lakho of saalo.
According to is siddhanth, the nearly 60° bend separating the samraat and hawaii segments of the kadi thi caused by a achaanak shift in the gati of the prashanth Plate.
in 2003, bhais investigations of this irregularity led to the prastaav of a mobile hotspot siddhanth, suggesting that hotspots hai mobile, not fixed, and ki the 47 lakh year old bend thi caused by a shift in the hotspot 's motion balki than the thali 's.
Ancient hawaiians were the first to recognize the increasing aayu or weathered rajya of the volcanoes to the north as ve progressed on fishing rijhaane saath the islands.
The volatile rajya of the Hawaiian jwalamukhi and their constant battle saath the samudr thi a pramukh element in Hawaiian mythology, samavisht in Pele, the devtaa of volcanoes.
After the aagaman of europeans on the island, in 1880-1881 James dwite dana nirdeshit the pehla aupchaarik geological study of the hotspot 's volcanics, confirming the sambandh long observed by the natives.
1912 marked the founding of the hawaii jwalamukhi Observatory by volcanologist thomas Jaggar, initiating nirantar vaigyanik avlokan of the islands.
in the 1970s, a maanchitran project thi initiated to laabh adhik soochna about the complex bhuvigyaan of hawaii 's seafloor.
the hotspot has chunki maharoom tomographically imaged, prardashit it to be wide or up to gahan, or oliwine or garnet -aadharand adhyayan have shown iske megma kaksh is lagbhag.
in iske at tanik 85 lakh years of activity the hotspot rai utpaadit an estimated of chattan.
the kadi 's rate of bahaav rai dhire increased over samay, causing the raashi of samay each vyaktigat jwalamukhi is kriyasheel to decrease, isse 18 lakh saalo for the 76 million year boodha detroit Seamount, to just antargat 900,000 liye the ek lakh year-old kohala ; on the anya haath, eruptive awaz has increased isse per saal to about.
overall, is has caused a trend towards adhik active but quickly-silenced, closely spaced volcanoes—whereas jwalamukhi on the nikat paksh of the hotspot overlap each anya ( forming aise superstructures as hawaii island and the ancient maavi nui ), the oldest of the samraat seamounts hai spaced as dur as alaava.

the dikhaaen airs on treehouse tv canada or Nick jr. ( formerly noggin ).

Osteonecrosis of the jabadon ( onj ) is a kathor bone beemaari ki affects the maxilla or the mandible.
vibhinn forms of ONJ have maharoom varnit over the pichhlaa 160 saalo, and a number of kalyankari have been sujhaayaa in the literature.
Osteonecrosis of the jabade associated saath bisphosphonate chikitsa, jaruri by kuch karkat upachaar regimens, has maharoom pahachaanaa or paribhaashit as a pathological antity chunki 2003.
the possible risk isse lower oral doses of bisphosphonates, liya by marijon to prevent or daavat osteoporosis, remains uncertain.
vibhinn upachaar vikalp have maharoom chaan, however severe maamle of ONJ still require surgical removal of the affected bone.
a thorough itihaas and assessement of pre-existing systemic problems or possible site of dental sankraman hai jaruri to sahaayta prevent the condishan, visheshkar if bisphosphonate therapy is mana.
The boston red sox hai a professional besabaal team aadhaarit in boston, masachusets, or a sadsy of pramukh lig Baseball 's American lig Eastern prabhag.

Mince pai filled saath mincemeat
mincemeat is a mishran of kataa sukhi fal, asut spirits or masaale, or sometimes bif suet, bif, or venison.
originally, mincemeat sadaa contained meat.
anek aadhunik vyanjanon contain bif suet, haalanki sabzi shortening is sometimes used in iske place.
visangatiyaan of mincemeat hai mila in Australia, britaini, canada, uttari europea, Ireland, South africa, the United kingdom or the sanyukt rajya.
in kuch countries the pad mincemeat refers to minced or ground maance.

wo thi khub gyaat liye uske fund-raising kaary liye international dharmarth or as an pratishthit hasti of the let 20th sadi.

Diana was born into an vaibhavshaalee angrezi parivaar with royal ancestry.
wo thi the chauthi child of jon spencer, 8th arl spencer and uske wife frances, daughter of mauris rosh, 4th Baron fermoy.
wo became a public figure with the ghoshnaa of uske sagaai.
wo bhi received manyata liye uske daan kaary and liye uske support of the International Campaign to Ban landmines.

argentina, officially the argentine ganatantr ( ), is the second largest country in both dakshin america and the latin america region.
the desh is a sangh of 23 praanton and the autonomous nagar of buenos yrs, iske capital or largest nagar.
it is the eighth -largest desh in the sansar by jameen kshetrafal or the largest among spanish-speaking raashtra by bhugolic area of 2,780,400 km2 or is the chauthi by janasankhyikee, saath over 41 lakh people.
argentina is a founding sadsy of the sanyukt Nations, mercosur, the Union of dakshin American raashtra, the sanghathan of ibero-american States, the sansar bainko samooh and the sansar vyapaar Organization, or is ek of the g-15 and g-20 major economies.
Argentina is located in dakshin america, bordered by chile to the west and south, Bolivia or paragway to the uttar or brazil or urugve to the northeast.
argentina daawa sovereignty over bhaag of antarctic, the fockland Islands ( ) and South georgia or the dakshin sandwich Islands.
Argentina is the successor state of the Viceroyalty of the río de la plata, an videshi colony of the spani Empire.
argentina declared swatantraaa dauraan the argentine yuddh of Independence, jisase thi followed by the Argentine civil Wars dauraan sabase of the 19th sadi.
the desh faced anek military coups or political asthirataa dauraan the 20th sadi, saath saath aavadhik economic sankat ki continue to is din.
a pahachaanaa dakshini Cone shakti, or madhya power, argentina is latin america 's third-largest economy, saath a `` bahut unchi '' darja on the Human development anukramanika.
bheetar latin america, argentina has the paanchvaan ucchtam nammaatr GDP per capita or the ucchtam in purchasing power sharten.
The Legatum santhaan have argued ki the desh has a `` nyaas liye bhavishya vikaas due to iske market size, str of videshi sidhaa investment, and pratishat of high-tech exports as share of total manufactured goods '', and it is classed by niveshkon as madhya emerging arthvyavastha.
Argentina is the Latin amareeki desh saath the sabase nobel puraskaar, liye a kul of five, sab praapt during the duusari half of the twentieth sadi.
the desh has teen nobel puraskaar in vigyaan and do of salaam.
the sabase mahatvapurn pahaluon of science or praudyogiki in argentina hai concerned saath medicine, nabhikeey bhautikee, jaevpraudyogiki, nanotechnology, spes or rocket praudyogiki and several field sambandhit to the desh 's pramukh Economic kriyaayein.
The country bhi rai the aachman pradarshnee center of vigyaan, technology, udyog or art ki are latin america 's largest.

polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes likhaa poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ), commonly abbreviated paalatu, peet, or the obsolete petp or pet-p, is a thermoplastic polimur raal of the poliester parivaar or is prayukt in synthetic machhlee ; peya, khaanaa or anya liquid containers ; thermoforming anuprayog ; or abhiyantriki resins praayah in sangyojan with glass resha.
the pad polyethylene terephthalate is a sorce of bhram kuki this padaarth, paalatu, karata nahin contain polyethylene.
Thus, the vaikalpik rup, bahu ( ethilin terephthalate ), is often prayukt in scholarly journals for the khatir of sateekta or spashtataa.
depending on iske prasanskaran or thermal history, polyethylene terephthalate may maujuud both as an amorphous ( transparent ) and as a semi-crystalline polimur.
The semicrystalline saamagree might appear transparent ( kan aakaar < 500 nm ) or apaardarshee and shwet ( kan aakaar up to a few microne ) depending on iske crystal dhaancha or kan aakaar.
Its monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification pratikriya between terephthalic acid or ethylene glykol saath water as a byproduct, or by transesterification pratikriya between ethilin glykol and dimethyl terephthalate saath methanol as a byproduct.
bahulkikaran is through a polycondensation reaction of the monomers ( kiya immediately after esterification/transesterification ) saath jal as the byproduct.
the bahumat of the sansar 's paalatu utpaadan is liye synthetic machhlee ( in excess of 60 % ), with bottle utpaadan hisaab for around 30 % of vaishvik maang.
In the context of vastra anuprayog, paalatu is referred to by iske aam naam, `` poliester, '' whereas the echronim `` paalatu '' is generally prayukt in relation to packaging.
Polyester makes up about 18 % of world polymer utpaadan or is the third-most-produced polymer ; polyethylene ( pe ) or polypropylene ( pp ) are pehla or duusari, kramshah.
PET consists of polymerized ikai of the monomer ethilin terephthalate, saath repeating c10h8o4 units.
paalatu is commonly recycled, or rai the kramank `` 1 '' as iske ricycling symbol.
louisiana thi admitted to the sangh on april 30, 1812, or elects seenetteron to varg 2 or class 3.
Its current senators hai democrate mariyam landrieu or Republican David vitter.
blike kheer, rakt pudding or blood sockes is a prakaar of sausage bana by kooking blood or dried blood saath a philler until it is motaa paryaapt to congeal jab cooled.
The dish exists in vibhinn samskritiyon from asia to europea and the americas.
suar, choupayon, sheep, duck, or goat rakt can be used depending on different countries.
In Europe and the americas, theth fillers shaamil maance, mote, suet, bread, cornmeal, mithi potato, pyaaj, chestnuts, barley, or oatmeal.
in spain, portugal or asia, aalu is often replaced by rice.
shairdharak may refer to:
shairdharak ( corporate ), a vyakti, samooh, sanghathan, sadsy or pranali who affects or can be prabhavit by an organization 's kriyaayein
Stakeholder, an antity ki can be prabhavit by the parinaam of ki in jisase they are said to be hitdharakon, i.e., ki in jisase they have a stake.
Project shairdharak, a person, group or sanghathan with an byaaj in a project
shairdharak theory, a siddhanth that identifies and model the samooh which hai stakeholders of a corporation or project
shairdharak analysis, the process of identifying those prabhavit by a project or event
shairdharak ( law ), a teesraa party jo temporarily holds dhan or property jabaki iske maalik is still hone determined

Modesto ( spani for `` modest '' ), officially the City of Modesto, is the county seat or largest city of stanislaus county, california, United rajya.
With a janasankhyikee of approximately 201,165 at the 2010 janasankhyikee, Modesto ranks as the 18th largest city in the state of california.
the modesto janasankhyikee county prabhag, jisase shaamil the shaharon of Ceres or riverbank, has a population of 312,842 as of 2010.
modesto is stith in the central ghati kshetrafal of uttari california, 90 mile uttar of fresno, 92 miles east of san francisco, 68 mile south of the rajya capital of Sacramento, 66 mile west of yosemite neshnal park, or 24 mile dakshin of stowton.
modesto, a 29-time ped City USA honoree, is ghiri by samrudh farmland, lending to a ranking for the county as 6th among sab California county in farm utpaadan.
led by milk, almonds, murgiyon, walnuts, or makai silage, the county grossed nearly $ 3.1 arab in agricultural utpaadan in 2011.
Modesto thi immortalized in the 1973 george Lucas filmi amareeki Graffiti.
the puraskaar jeetna film captured the spirit of `` cruising '' or dosti on 10th and 11th Streets in 1962 or led to the punaruddhar of 1950 's nostalgia ki included the TV dikhaaen prasann dinon or the anya spin-offs.
ron harvard, harrison ghat and Richard dreyfuss starred in the film.
the soundtrack was a vishaal kamyaabi.
nideshak George lucas is a deshi of Modesto, graduating isse Downey unchi skool in 1962.

in disambar 2009, Forbes kramit modesto 48th out of 100 among `` behtareen bang-for-the-buck Cities ''.

Independence Day, commonly gyaat as the chauthi of july, is a federal avkaash in the sanyukt States commemorating the apnaanaa of the ghoshnaa of swatantraaa on july 4, 1776, declaring independence isse the kingdom of Great Britain.
swatantraaa din is commonly sambhddha saath aatishbaajee, parades, barbecues, carnivals, melon, picnics, concert, besabaal khel, parivaar reunions, or political speeches or ceremonies, in jod to vibhinn anya public or private events celebrating the itihaas, sarkari, or paramparaon of the sanyukt rajya.
swatantraaa din is the neshnal din of the sanyukt rajya.
A gender symbol denotes the sex of an sajiv or characterizes an agent by gender.
The two standard ling symbols denoting male ♂ and maadaa ♀ hai derived isse astrological symbols, denoting the classical grah mangal or Venus, kramshah.
ye symbols have maharoom in upyog chunki the Renaissance also denoting elements in alchemy, specifically the dhaatuon iron or tambe.
They yahood pehla prayukt to denote the prabhavi ling of paudhe ( i.e. sex of vyaktigat in a die crossbreed, chunki sabase paudhe hai hermaphroditic ) by carolus Linnaeus in 1751.
a leasehold estate is an swaamitv of a asthai sahi to hold jameen or property in jisase a lessee or a kiraayedaar holds adhikaron of real property by some form of sheershak isse a lessor or landlord.
haalanki a kiraayedaar karata tham adhikaron to real property, a leasehold estate is typically mana nijee property.
leasehold is a rup of land kaarykaal or property kaarykaal jahaan one party kharidta the sahi to occupy jameen or a bhawan liye a die length of time.
As patte is a vidhik estate, leasehold estate can be kharida or bechi on the kholen market.
a leasehold yun differs isse a freehold or shulk saral jahaan the swaamitv of a property is kharida outright or thereafter yojit liye an anirdharya lambaai of samay, and also differs isse a tenancy where a property is let ( rented ) on a aavadhik aadhaar aise as saptahik or masik.
jabatak the end of the patte period ( praayah measured in dashakon or sadiyaan ; a 99 saal patte is quite aam ) the leaseholder has the sahi to remain in occupation as an assured kiraayedaar paying an agreed rent to the maalik.
sharten of the anubandh hai contained in a lease, which rai tatv of anubandh or property vidhi intertwined.
the term estate liye saalo may occasionally be prayukt.
is refers to a leasehold estate liye koi vishisht kaal of samay ( the word `` saalo '' is misleading ).
an estate liye saalo is nahin automatically navinikrut.
Colloquially, `` patte '' or `` patte `` are praayah a formalization of a longer, vishisht kaal as compared saath a `` rental '' ki nirmit a tenancy at will, terminable or bedardi at the end of a short period.
Olivia ( bhi gyaat as swaagat to the sansar of the suar olivia ) is a British-American children 's anemated television series utpaadit by media company chorion or aadhaarit on ian falconer 's kitabe.

, upnaam jr. in the uk or Ireland, or dijani Junior in Latin America or brazil, Treehouse TV in canada.

sthaan of panama between prashanth ( neeche ) or caribbean ( sheersh ), saath kanal at sheersh bich
the panama kanal ( ) is a jalayaan canal in Panama ki connects the atlantic Ocean ( via the caribbean Sea ) to the Pacific samandar.
the kanal cuts across the isthmus of panama and is a kunjee conduit liye antarrashtriya meritime vyapaar.
There hai taale at prayek samaapt to lift jahaajon up to gatun jhil ( upar sea-level ).
gatun Lake thi nirmit to reduce the raashi of work required liye the kanal.
The vartmaan taale hai chaudee.
a teesraa, wider len of taale is being nirmit.
frans began work on the kanal in 1881, lakin tha to roke because of abhiyantriki samasyaayein or high mortality due to beemaari.
The sanyukt States ( us ) later took over the project or took a dashak to puraa the kanal in 1914, enabling jahaajon to avoid the lengthy kep sing root around the southernmost tip of dakshin america ( via the Drake Passage ) or to navigate the jalsandhi of magellan.
ek of the largest or sabase difficult abhiyantriki project kabhi undertaken, the Panama kanal shortkat bana it possible liye jahaajon to safar between the atlantic or prashanth mahaasaagar in half the samay previously required.
the shorter, tej, safer route to the us West coast or to raashtra in or saath the prashanth samandar anumat those sthaan to become adhik ekikrut saath the sansar arthvyavastha.
During this samay, swaamitv of the territory that is abhi the panama kanal was first columbian, tab french, or tab amareeki ; the sanyukt States samaapt the nirmaan.
the kanal was liya over in 1999 by the panamanian sarkari, as long planned.
salanaa trekkic has risen from parichay 1,000 jahaajon when the kanal kholi in 1914, to 14,702 baratan in 2008, the latter measuring a kul of 309.6 lakh Panama Canal/Universal Measurement pranali ( pc/ums ) ton.
by 2008, more than 815,000 baratan tha passed through the kanal, anek of them much larger than the asli planners could have envisioned ; the largest jahaajon that can transit the kanal today hai pukaara panamax.
the amareeki samaaj of civil ejiniers rai named the panama Canal ek of the saat chamatkaar of the aadhunik world.
benjamin franklin ( april 17, 1790 ) thi ek of the founding Fathers of the United States.
a noted polymath, franklin thi a agrani lekhak, printer, rajnatik theorist, politician, postmaster, scientist, sangeetkaar, inventor, satirist, naagarik activist, statesman, and rajanyik.
as a vaigyanik, he thi a pramukh figure in the American atmagyaan or the itihaas of bhautikee for uske discoveries and theories regarding electricity.
he invented the lightning lathi, bifocals, the franklin stove, a carriage odometer, and the kaanch 'armonica '.
he facilitated many civic organizations, including a aag vibhaag or a vishvavidhyalayon.
Franklin arjeet the sheershak of `` The pehla amareeki '' liye uske early or indefatigable campaigning liye colonial ekta ; as an lekhak or pravaktaa in landan for several colonies, tab as the first United States doot to frans, he saranchanaaon the emerging American swadesh.
franklin was foundational in dhamak the amareeki ethos as a vivaah of the vyaavhaarik maan of thrift, hard kaary, shiksha, jatiyaan spirit, self-governing institutions, or opposition to authoritarianism dono rajnatik or religious, saath the scientific and tolerant values of the atmagyaan.
in the shabd of itihaaskaar Henry steel commager, `` in a franklin could be milaayaa the virtues of puritanism bagaiyr iske dosha, the illumination of the atmagyaan bagaiyr its ooshmaa. ''
to walter isaacson, this makes franklin `` the most sampannataa amareeki of uske age or the sabase influential in inventing the prakaar of samaaj america hota become. ''
Franklin, sadaa proud of uske working class jaden, became a kaamyaab samachaarpatr editor and mudrak in philadelphia, the leading nagar in the colonies.
he thi bhi saajhedaar saath William Goddard and joseph Galloway the three of jisko published the pencilvenia Chronicle, a samachaarpatr ki thi gyaat for its krantikari sentiments and aalochanaon of the angrejon monarchy in the amareeki colonies.
He became dhanwaan publishing Poor richard 's almanack or the Pennsylvania gajet.
Franklin gained antarrashtriya renown as a scientist liye uske prasiddh prayog in vidyut and for uske anek avishkaron, especially the bijli rod.
He nibhaai a major bhoomika in establishing the vishvavidhyalayon of Pennsylvania and thi nirvaachit the pehla president of the amareeki philosophical samaaj.
franklin became a neshnal nayika in america jab he pathpradarshan the praytn to have parliament repeal the unpopular stamp adhinium.
An sampannataa rajanyik, he thi widely admired among the french as American mantri to paris or was a pramukh figure in the development of dhanatmak franco-american sambandh.
liye many saalo he thi the angrejon postmaster liye the colonies, jisase sakriy use to niyat up the pehla neshnal sanchaar network.
he was kriyasheel in jatiyaan affairs, colonial or rajya raajnneeti, as khub as neshnal or antarrashtriya affairs.
From 1785 to 1788, he parosa as rajyapal of pencilvenia.
toward the samaapt of his jivan, he freed uske slave and became ek of the most prominent abolitionists.
uske rangeen jivan and legacy of vaigyanik or political uplabdhi, or aukaat as ek of america 's sabase influential founding fathers, have dekhi Franklin sammanit on coinage or dhan ; warships ; the names of anek kasbon, county, educational sansthaanon, namesakes, or companiyaan ; or more than do sadiyaan baad uske maut, countless saanskrithik sandarbh.
dand minds is an amareeki police prakriyaatmak television program that premiered September 22, 2005, on sibies.
the series follows a team of profilers isse the epabiai 's behavioral Analysis ikai ( bau ) based in Quantico, virginia.
the BAU is bhaag of the epabiai neshnal Center liye the vishleshan of hinsak aparaadhon.
The dikhaaen differs isse anek prakriyaatmak dramas by focusing on profiling the dand, balki than the aparaadhon itself.

sibies ghoshit in October 2009 ki Legacy interactive would develop a video khel aadhaarit on the dikhaaen.

the interactive paheli game was released in 2012, lakin kiya nahin visheshta koi of the awaazen of the dikhaaen 's cast, nor thi the daal shaamil saath the project.

`` Heart-Shaped Box '' is a song by the American grunge band nirvana, likhaa by vocalist or guitarist court cobain.
The song was released as the pehla single from the samooh 's teesraa and final studio album, in utero, in 1993.

While Nirvana 's label dgc Records kiya nahin release a physical single liye bikri in the sanyukt rajya, `` heart-shaped Box '' praapt much amareeki radio airplay, reaching number ek on the billboard Modern Rock treks chart.
The antarrashtriya relies of the single pahunche number paanch on the uk singles chart.

The kakshiya gati of a deh, generally a grah, a prakritik upgrah, an kritrim upgrah, or a multiple star, is the gati at jisase it orbits around the barycenter of a system, usually around a adhik vishaal deh.
it can be used to refer to either the mean kakshiya gati, the average gati as it completes an kaksha, or instantaneous kakshiya gati, the speed at a particular point in iske kaksha.
the kakshiya speed at koi position in the kaksha can be computed isse the alahada to the central body at ki sthiti, or the specific orbital energy, jisase is swatantra of position : the kinetic urja is the kul urja minus the sambhavit urja.
bhura rajmahal Interior or alind
bhura Palace Hotel is the second-oldest oparating hotel in denwar, colorado or is ek of the pehla atrium-style hotel kabhi nirmit.
it is abhi operated by Quorum hotel or resort.
it thi nirmit in 1892, ek year later than the oxford Hotel.
It thi named liye its asli maalik, henry C. bhura, or thi designed with iske odd triangular shape by vaastu frank edbrooke.
the hotel is located at 321 17th St, denwar, co between 17th gali, Broadway and tremont Street/Pl in shahar denwar behind the ganatantr plaza.
The pramukh pravesh dwaar is on tremont gali.
DVD-Video is a consumer video swaroop used to store digital video on dvd discs, or is philhal the prabal upabhokta video swaroop in Asia, uttar america, europea, or australia.
Discs using the dvd-video specification require a dvd drive or an h.262/mpeg-2 bhaag 2 dicoder ( e.g., a dvd player, or a computer DVD drive saath a tantra dvd khilaadi ).
Commercial dvd movies hai encoded using a sangyojan of h.262/mpeg-2 bhaag 2 sampidit video or audio of varying swarup ( often multi-channel swarup as varnit neeche ).
Typically, the aankada rate liye DVD filmon seemayen from 3 mbit/s to 9.5 mbit/s, or the bit rate is praayah anukuli.
It thi first uplabdhiyaan liye khudara around 1997.
the dvd-video specification thi nirmit by dvd Forum or can be praapt from dvd format/logo licencing Corporation liye a shulk of $ 5,000.
the specification is nahin publicly uplabdhiyaan, kuki prayek subscriber jarur chihn a non-disclosure agreement.
Certain information in the dvd kitaab is malikana or gopneey.
the nautical mile ( symbol M, NM or nmi ) is a ikai of lambaai that is parichay ek minute of arc of akshansh measured saath koi madhyahn, or parichay one minute of arc of deshaantar at the equator.
by antarrashtriya agreement it rai maharoom set at 1,852 metres exactly ( parichay 6,076 feet ).
It is a non- si ikai ( haalanki sweekrut for use in the International pranali of ikai by the BIPM ) prayukt visheshkar by navigators in the shipping or vimaanan industries, and bhi in dhruviya exploration.
it is commonly prayukt in antarrashtriya vidhi or treaties, visheshkar regarding the had of territorial waters.
it developed from the samudr mile and the related geographical mile.
The nautical mile remains in upyog by sea or air navigators vishwavyaapee kuki of iske convenience when working with charts.
Most nautical chart upyog the mercator prakshep whose scale varies by parichay a factor of six from the equator to 80° latitude, so charts covering large kshetron can not upyog a single raikhik scale.
the nautical mile is nearly baraabar to a minute of akshansh on a chart, so a distance measured saath a chart divider can be roughly parivartit to nautical mile using the chart 's akshansh scale.
Shippensburg is a baro in kambarland and franklin counties in the u.S. rajya of pencilvenia.
settled in 1730, Shippensburg jhooth in the kambarland ghati, 41 mile ( 66 km ) west-southwest of harrisburg, or is part of the harrisburg– carlisle Metropolitan sankhyikeey kshetrafal.
in 1900, 3,228 logon lived there ; in 1910, 3,457 ; or in 1940, 5,244 logon jiya vahin.
the janasankhyikee was 5,492 at the 2010 census.
shippensburg was incorporated as a baro on janvari 21, 1819.
In the past, vahin yahood furniture factories, ingine and pump works, or anya industrial works stith bheetar the kasbaa.
Shippensburg is bhi the ghar of the beistle Company, the oldest or largest manufacturer of decorations or party goods, which bikta its distinctive madhukosh paper sajaavat worldwide.
it is bhi the sthaan of Pague and Fegan, the oldest lagaataar sanchalit hardware store in Pennsylvania.
in May 2012, volvo nirmaan upkaran began a $ 100 lakh expansion project to lao iske amareeki headquarters to shippensburg.
shippensburg is also ghar to shippensburg vishvavidhyalayon of pencilvenia, ek of 14 vishvavidhyalayon of the Pennsylvania State pranali of Higher shiksha.
vaarshik the pichhlaa puraa saptaah of july, the shippensburg jatiyaan mela is yojit.
begun in 1958, the mela bills itself as Pennsylvania 's largest bi-county mela.
the mela shaamil agricultural exhibits, a craft show, khaanaa vikreta, or carnival rides amongst anya bate.
prayek garmiyaan on the last Saturday of agast, shippensburg holds the makai Festival, an event ki brings regional shilpkaar and vendors to operate stand shahar.
The shahar is band to trekkic liye at least 5 block liye sabase of the din.
ausat upasthiti at the parv is anumaanit at 60,000 - 70,000 each year.
blike baldaar jeebh ( bht, bhi termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a condition of the jeebh jahaan the filiform papillae elongate saath blike or bhura discoloration, giving a blike or baldaar rup.
the appearance may be alarming, lakin it is a hanirahit condition.
predisposing karkon shaamil smoking, xerostomia ( shushk munh ), soft diet, garib maukhik hygiene and nishchit medications.
prabandhan is by improving oral hygiene, visheshkar scraping or brushing the jeebh.
the iiqui 1394 interfes is a serial bas interface maanak liye high-speed sanchaar or isochronous real-time data transafar.
It thi viksit in the let 1980s or jaldi 1990s by tehraana, jo called it FireWire.
The 1394 interface is comparable to usb, or praayah those do technologies hai mana saath, haalanki USB rai more market share.
Apple pehla shaamil firewire in kuch of iske 1999 model, or sabase Apple computer chunki the saal 2000 have included firewire port, haalanki, as of 2013, nothing pare the 800 sanskaran ( ieee-1394b ).
The interfes is also known by the brands i.link ( soni ), and links ( texas yantra ).
IEEE 1394 replaced samanaantar scsi in anek anuprayog, kuki of nimnatar implementation laagat or a sarlikrut, more adaptable cabling pranali.
the 1394 maanak also defines a backplane interfes, haalanki is is nahin as widely prayukt.
iiqui 1394 is the High-Definition audio-video sanjaal Alliance ( haana ) standard conection interfes for a/v ( audio/visual ) component sanchaar and control.
firewire is bhi uplabdhiyaan in betaar, resha optic, or samakshiya sanskaran using the isochronous protocols.
stephen `` steewi '' Ray vaughan ( aktubar 3, 1954 – agast 27, 1990 ) was an amareeki guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record nirmaataa.
praayah referred to by uske initials SRV, vaughan is best gyaat as a founding sadsy and netaa of doguna trubal.
saath saath drummer kris Layton and bassist tommy Shannon, they ignited the bluez revival of the 1980s.
saath a kariyar spanning saat saalo, Vaughan or doguna trubal consistently sold out concert jabaki their albums frequently went gold.
he thi born or uthaaya in dalas, texas, or liye a choti period of samay jiya in graham, texas.
as the younger bhai of jimmie vaughan, vaughan prarambh playing the guitar at aayu saat and formed several bands ki occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
at age 17, he dropped out of unchi school or moved to austin to further pursue uske musical career, joining samooh such as krackerjack, the nightcrawlers, or the Cobras.
in 1977, he formed tripal threat Revue, a band ki aakhirkaar viksit into doguna trubal and regularly performed around Austin.
in 1982, vaughan or doguna trubal performed at the montreux Jazz Festival in switzaraland, catching the dhyaan of sangeetkaaron daud bovi or Jackson browne.
bovi poocha vaughan to khel on his aagaamee studio album Let 's nrity, jabaki Browne offered the band free use of uske nijee studio in los angeles to ricard an album.
in kooch 1983, vaughan or Double Trouble yahood hastakshrit to apik record by diggaj ricard nirmaataa jon hamend sr. or released unke debyue album, texas baadh in June of ki saal.
baad successful touring, the samooh released the album, Could n't stand the Weather ( 1984 ) or aatma to aatma ( 1985 ), the latter of which pradarshit nai keyboardist reez wynans.
Although his kariyar tha progressed safaltaapurvak, vaughan checked into a punarvaas hospital in Atlanta, Georgia to de up a cocaine and daaru aadat or laute to touring saath the band.
in June 1989, in kadam was released and arjeet unhen a grami puraskaar for Best samakaleen Blues pradarshan.
on agast 27, 1990, vaughan thi killed in a helicopter crash following a pradarshan in east troy, visconsin.
vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet teevr style thi derived isse a kismein of musical jati.
he was bahekaave by bluez musicians including Albert king, fredy king, Otis Rush, or muddy Waters, or rock guitarists aise as Jimi hendrix and lonnie mack.
His guitar playing reflected the clasik blues or pentatonic scales.
he rai praapt wide najuk recognition liye uske guitar playing, ranking at # 6 on rolling Stones suchi of `` 100 mahanatam guitarists '' in 2011.
he was maranoparant inducted into the Blues Hall of kirti in 2000 or a memorial pratimaa thi erected in austin 's auditorium shores park.
steewi re vaughan is widely mana to be ek of the greatest sangeetkaaron to aaiye from the state of Texas.

in computer networking, gigabit ethernet ( gbe or 1 gige ) is a term describing vibhinn technologies liye transmitting ethernet frames at a rate of a gigabit prati second ( 1,000,000,000 bits per duusari ), as defined by the iiqui 802.3-2008 standard.
It came into upyog shuruuaat in 1999, dhire supplanting Fast Ethernet in taar local sanjaal, jahaan it performed considerably tej.
the cabel or equipment hai bahut samaan to pichhlaa maanakon and yahood very aam or kifayati by 2010.
Half-duplex gigabit kadi conect through hubs are anumat by the specification, but full-duplex upyog saath switches is much adhik aam.

a postage stamp is a choti piece of paper ki is kharida or pradarshit on an mad of mail as pramaan of bhugtan of postage.
typically, stamps hai bana isse khaas paper, saath a neshnal namakan or denomination ( daam ) on the phase, or a gum chipakane on the reverse side.
Postage stamps are kharida isse a dak administration or other praadhikrut vendor or hai prayukt to adaa liye the laagat shaamil in chalati mail as khub as anya kaarobaar necessities aise as insurance and panjikaran.
The stamp’s aakaar is praayah that of a choti rectangle of varying proportions, haalanki trikon or anya shapes hai occasionally prayukt.
The stamp is affixed to an lipapha or other postal cover ( i.e., packet, baksaa, mailing belan ) ki the graahak badhaaiyaan to bhejein.
the mad is then processed by the postal pranali, jahaan a postmark, sometimes gyaat as a raddikaran mark, is praayah lagu over the stamp and cover ; is kaarividhi marks the stamp as prayukt, jisase roktaa its reuse.
The postmark indicates the tithi or point of utpatti of the mailing.
the mailed mad is tab delivered to the pataa that the graahak rai applied to the lipapha or cover.
postage stamps have facilitated the delivery of mail since the 1840s.
Before this samay, syaahi or hand-stamps ( hence the shabd 'stamp ' ), praayah bana isse lakdi or cork, yahood praayah prayukt to frank the mail or confirm the payment of postage.
the pehla adhesive postage stamp, commonly referred to as the paini blike, thi jari in the sanyukt kingdom in 1840.
the invention of the stamp thi a bhaag of the attempt to sudhaar or improve the dak pranali in the United kingdom of Great britain or Ireland, jisase in the jaldi 19th sadi thi in disarray and rife with bhrashtachar.
There hai varying khate of the inventor or avishkaarak of the stamp.
pehle the introduction of postage stamps, mail in the uk thi sashulk liye by the praptakarta, a pranali that was sambhddha saath an irresolvable problem : the costs of delivering mail yahood not recoverable by the dak seva jab recipients yahood unable or unwilling to pay for vitarit vasteen, or senders tha no incentive to simit the kramank, aakaar, or vazan of vasteen bheja, whether or not ve would ultimately be sashulk for.
the postage stamp resolved is samasya in a saral and elegant manner, with the atirikt laabh of room liye an tatv of saundarya to be introduced.
baad sambandhit avishkaron shaamil dak steshnari aise as prepaid-postage envelopes, post taash, lettercards, aerogrammes or wrappers, postage meter, or, adhik recently, specialty baks or lipaphe provided free to the customer by the U.S. dak seva liye pradhanta or express mailing.
The postage stamp afforded convenience for dono the mailer or dak officials, adhik efficiently recovered laagat for the postal service, or ultimately resulted in a behatar, tej dak system.
saath the conveniences stamps offered, unke use resulted in greatly increased mailings dauraan the 19th and 20th centuries.
Postage stamps dauraan this era yahood the sabase lokapriy rasta of paying liye mail, but by the end of the 20th sadi were rapidly hone aat by the use of metered postage or balk mailing by vyavsaayon. )
the vahi parinaam saath respect to sanchaar by private parties occurred over the pichhlaa dashak of the 20th century and the first decade of the 21st due to ghatati laagat of long distance telephone communications or the development and visphotak spread of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the antarjaal ) and vidheyak paying systems had.
As postage stamps saath unke engraved imagery began to appear on a faili aadhaar, itihaaskaaron and collectors began to lo notice.
The study of postage stamps or unke upyog is referred to as philately.
stamp collecting can be dono a shauk and a rup of aitihaasik study and reference, as government-issued postage stamps or unke mailing pranaaliyon have always maharoom involved saath the itihaas of nations.
the University of albama at birmingham ( UAB ) is a public vishvavidhyalayon in birmingham in the u.S. rajya of Alabama.
vikasshil isse an ekstansion bich sthapit in 1936, the sanstha became an autonomous institution in 1969 or is aaj ek of teen sansthaanon in the vishvavidhyalayon of Alabama pranali.
UAB offers over 140 kaarykram of padhai in 12 academik vibhaajan agrani to snaatak 's, nipun 's, doctoral, and peshewar degree in the soshal and behavioral sciences, the udaar kala, kaarobaar, shiksha, abhiyantriki, or health-related field aise as ayurvigyaan, dentistry, optometry, nursing, or public swasthya.
the skool is atyadhik prasiddh liye iske medical research or prakritik sciences kaarykram.
the uab swasthya pranali, ek of the largest academic chikitsa centers in the sanyukt rajya, is affiliated saath the vishvavidhyalayon.
uab hospital sponsors residency kaarykram in vibhinn chikitsa specialties, sahit aatanrik ayurvigyaan, neurology, surgery, radiology, and anesthesiology.
uab hospital is the only acs verified str i aghat bich in albama, as rated by the American college of adhyetavriti aghat kaarykram.
UAB is the rajya 's largest employer, saath more than 18,000 sankaay or staff and over 53,000 kaary at the vishvavidhyalayon or in the swasthya pranali.
an anumaanit 10 pratishat of the kaary in the birmingham-hoover Metropolitan kshetrafal and 1 in 33 kaary in the rajya of albama hai directly or indirectly related to uab.
The vishvavidhyalayon 's overall salanaa aarthik impact thi anumaanit to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010.
in the patan of 2012, the vishvavidhyalayon of albama at birmingham enrolled 17,999 vidhyaarthee from adhik than 110 deshon, including 1,605 freshmen.
vahin hai yojanaayen to commence saath an `` aakraamak '' vikaas in namakan at uab.
the current uab adhyaksh is dr. re L. watts.
Tofu, also called saim curd, is a khaanaa bana by coagulating soya ras or then pressing the resulting curds into naram white block.
It is a ghatak in many East asian or southeast Asian vyanjan.
vahin are many alag kismein of tofu, sahit bhais tofu or tofu ki rai maharoom processed in kuch rasta.
tofu rai a halkaa swaad and can be prayukt in savory or mithi dishes.
it is praayah seasoned or marinated to suut the dish.
tofu originated in pracheen China kuch 2,000 years pehle.
Chinese legend ascribes iske avishkaar to prince liyu An ( chinis : 劉安 liú ān, 179–122 BC ).
tofu and iske utpaadan technique yahood introduced into korian and tab japani during the Nara period.
it sprad into anya parts of east Asia as well.
is sprad sambhavit coincided saath the spread of buddhism kuki it is an mahatvapurn sorce of protein in the shaakaahaari diet of east asian buddhism.
Li shizhen in the Ming Dynasty varnit a method of bananaa tofu in Bencao Gangmu.
tofu rai a kam calorie ginati, apekshaakrit large amounts of protein, or little fat.
It is unchi in aayran or depending on the coagulant used in nirmaan, may bhi be unchi in calcium and/or magnesium.
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a common chimpanji, gyaat liye hone the one-time pet of amareeki recording kalakaar maaikel Jackson, jo bought the primate from a texas research suvidha in the jaldi 1980s.
the animal thi a frequent safar companion to the singer, whose anulgnak to the animal led to media mockery or, among anya karkon, to a public bodh of Jackson as an eccentric.
dauraan the karaab sansar daure, liye example, jackson brought bulbule saath use to japani, jahaan ve dono drank chaay saath the mahayor of Osaka.
bulbule was initially rakhaa at the Jackson parivaar 's home in encino, los angeles, lakin was moved to neverland ranch in 1988.
There, he slept in a crib in jackson 's bedroom, used the singer 's prashaadhan, and ate candy in the neverland film theatre.
In 2003 the public siikhe ki, jaise sab captive chimpanzees, Bubbles tha matured into a vishaal or aakraamak vayask chimp unsuitable as a saathi animal.
he thi bheja to a California animal prashikshak, where he thi reported to have attempted aatmahatya.
jab the prashikshak shut down uske aaparishan in 2004, bulbule thi moved to the bich for great apes, a abhayaarany in wauchula, Florida, jahaan he rai jiya since 2005.
chintan hai an English chattan band isse teignmouth, devon, jisase formed in 1994.
the band consists of skool mitron mathew bellamy ( sise vocals, lead guitar, piano, keyboards, keytar ), christopher wolstenholme ( baas, vocals, keyboards, rhythm guitar, hormonica ) or dominic harvard ( drums, percussion, synthesisers, sampling ).

Awards or an amareeki music Award.

bloemfontein (, ; Dutch liye `` fountain of pushp '' ) is the capital nagar of the free State praant of dakshin africa ; or, as the nyaayik capital of the swadesh, ek of South africa 's teen neshnal capitals – the other do hone kep kasbaa, the vidhaan puunji, or peshkashon, the prashasnic puunji.
Bloemfontein is popularly or poetically gyaat as `` the nagar of gulab ``, owing to the abundance of ye pushp or the salanaa rose parv held there.
the nagar 's sesotho name is Mangaung, meaning `` place of cheetahs `` and it rai maharoom shaamil in the mangaung local nagarpalika chunki 2000.
Bloemfontein is situated on shushk ghasbhumi at, at an altitude of upar sea str.
the nagar is ghar to 369,568 nivaasiyon, jabaki the mangaung Local nagarpalika rai a janasankhyikee of 645,455.

The meaning of life is a philosophical sawaal concerning the significance of life or existence in saamaanya.
it can bhi be expressed in alag form, such as `` kyon hai we yahan ? ``, `` kayaa is jivan sab parichay ? ``, or `` kayaa is the purpose of astitv ? ''
it rai been the vishay of much philosophical, scientific, and theological atakalein throughout itihaas.
There have maharoom a vishaal kramank of prastaavit jawaab to ye sawaal isse anek alag cultural or vaicharik prishthbhumi.
the arth of jivan is in the philosophical and religious conceptions of astitv, social ties, chetana, or sukh, and borders on anek anya mudde, aise as symbolic arth, ontology, maan, purpose, ethics, shubh or dusht, free hoga, the astitv of ek or anek Gods, conceptions of parameshwar, the aatma, or the afterlife.
vaigyanik contributions focus primarily on describing related anubhavjanya tathy parichay the brahmad, exploring the context and parameters concerning the 'how ' of jivan.
vigyaan bhi adhyayan or can provide recommendations liye the pursuit of well-being or a sambandhit dharna of naitikta.
an vaikalpik, humanistic drushtikon mudraayen the sawaal `` kayaa is the arth of my jivan ? ''
the value of the question pertaining to the purpose of jivan may coincide with the uplabdhi of param vaastaviktaa, or a ahsaas of oneness, or bhi a feeling of sacredness.
parivaar guy nirmaataa Seth MacFarlane also provides the awaazen of peter Griffin, stewie griffin, Brian Griffin, and glen Quagmire.

The principal awaz daal consists of dikhaaen nirmaataa seth MacFarlane, elex borstein, seth green, mila kunis ( who replaced Lacey chabert after the pehla season ) and Mike henry or now, the nai actor beau Osborne.

anek cast sadasyon provide awaazen for multiple characters.

`` The Princess or the matar '' ( ; shabdic anuwaad : `` the rajkumaari on the matar '' ) is a saahitiyik pari tail by Hans Christian andersen parichay a yang stri whose royal pahchaan is established by a test of uske physical sensitivity.
the tale was first prakashit saath teen others by andersen in an inexpensive pustika on 8 May 1835 in copenhegan by C.A. Reitzel.
andersen tha suna the story as a child, or it sambhavit rai iske sorce in lok material, possibly originating isse Sweden as it is unknown in the danish maukhik parampara.
Neither `` the rajkumaari and the matar '' nor andersen 's anya kisse of 1835 yahood well received by danish critics, jo disliked unke casual, chatty style, or unke lack of naitikta.
in 1959 `` the rajkumaari or the matar '' thi adapted to the musical stage in a utpaadan pukaara ekbar upon a gadda abhinit Carol burnett.
German Americans ( ) are nagarikon of the United rajya who yahood either born in germany or hai of German ancestry.
ve comprise about 50 lakh logon, bananaa unhen the largest ancestry samooh ahead of Irish america, africa america or English Americans.
ve comprise about 1/3 of the germany diaspora sab over the sansar.
none of the German states tha nai sansar colonies.
Not until the 1670s did the pehla significant samooh of germany apravasiyon arrive in the angrejon colonies, settling primarily in nai York and pencilvenia.
avrajan jari in bahut vishaal sankhyaayein dauraan the 19th sadi, saath kuch aath lakh aamad isse germany.
ve yahood khinchaa by the attractions of land or dharmik swatantraaa, or pushed out of europea by shortages of land or dharmik or rajnatik oppression.
anek arrived seeking dharmik or political swatantraaa, anya for aarthik opportunities vrihad than those in europea, and others simply liye the mauka to prarambh bhais in the nai sansar.
The arrivals before 1850 yahood zyaadaatar kisaano who sought out the sabase productive jameen, jahaan unke intensive kheti techniques hota adaa off.
baad 1840, many aae to shaharon, jahaan `` germania '' —german-speaking districts—soon ubhara.
germany america sthapit the pehla kindergartens in the sanyukt rajya, introduced the christmas tree parampara, or originated lokapriy amareeki foods such as hot dogs or hamburgers.
germany amareeki celebrations hai held throughout the country, ek of the most well-known hone the german-american Steuben parade in New York City, held prayek third shanivaar in sitambar.
vahin hai also pramukh annual kaarykram in chicago, sinsinati, milvowki, pittsburg, st. lui or other shaharon.
jaise anek other immigrants that aae to the sanyukt rajya, an overwhelming kramank of people of germany or aanshik germany descent have essentially become americanized.
The prastaavna to the sanyukt States samvidhan is a bread parichayatmak bayaan of the samvidhan 's aadharbhoot uddeshy or guiding principles.
it states in saamaanya sharten, or nyaayalayon have referred to it as reliable pramaan of, the Founding Fathers ' iraadon regarding the samvidhan 's meaning and kayaa ve hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to sab of the logon of the sanyukt rajya.
As the phrase, `` we the logon '' suggests that the new sarkari originates isse the logon of the sanyukt States or it set into gati a question as it pertains to that vast janasankhyikee concerning the vyaktigat rights or samta among all logon ; is can be dekhi sabase broadly in the divide between republicanism or social loktantr.
the itihaas of the antarjaal began saath the development of electronic computer in the 1950s.
The public thi pehla introduced to the avadharanaon ki hota lead to the antarjaal when a sandesh thi sent over the arpanet isse computer vigyaan praadhyaapak leonard kleinrock 's prayogshaala at vishvavidhyalayon of california, los Angeles ( UCLA ), baad the second tukdaa of sanjaal upkaran thi santhaapit at stenford shodh santhaan ( SRI ).
packet switched sanjaal aise as arpanet, Mark i at npl in the uk, cyclades, merit Network, tymnet, or telenet, were viksit in the let 1960s and jaldi 1970s using a kismein of protocol.
The arpanet in particular led to the development of protocol liye internetworking, in which anek separate sanjaal could be joined saath into a sanjaal of sanjaal.
In 1982, the antarjaal protocol suite ( tcp/ip ) thi standardized, or natijatan, the avadharana of a world-wide sanjaal of interconnected tcp/ip networks, called the antarjaal, was introduced.
abhigam to the ARPANET thi vistaarit in 1981 when the National vigyaan nyaas ( nsf ) developed the computer vigyaan sanjaal ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when nsfnet provided abhigam to supercomputer site in the sanyukt rajya isse research or education sanghathan.
vanijyik Internet seva pradaataaon ( isps ) began to emerge in the late 1980s or jaldi 1990s.
The arpanet was decommissioned in 1990.
The antarjaal thi commercialized in 1995 jab NSFNET thi decommissioned, nikaalnaa the pichhlaa restrictions on the use of the antarjaal to carry vanijyik trekkic.
Since the mid-1990s, the antarjaal rai tha a krantikari prabhaav on samskruti and commers, including the vruddhi of near-instant sanchaar by electronic mail, tatkaal messaging, Voice over antarjaal protocol ( voip ) `` phone calls '', two-way interactive video calls, or the sansar chaudee web with iske charchaa forums, blog, soshal netwarking, or online kharidari site.
the shodh or shiksha jatiyaan continues to develop or upyog unnat networks such as NSF 's bahut unchi gati ridh sanjaal seva ( vbns ), internet2, or National LambdaRail.
increasing amounts of aankada are transmitted at ucchtar or ucchtar speeds over resha optic sanjaal oparating at 1-gbit/s, 10-gbit/s, or more.
the antarjaal 's takeover over the vaishvik sanchaar landscape thi almost tatkaal in aitihaasik sharten : it only communicated 1 % of the soochna bahati through two-way doorsanchaar networks in the saal 1993, already 51 % by 2000, or adhik than 97 % of the telecommunicated soochna by 2007.
aaj the Internet continues to grow, chalit by ever vrihad amounts of online soochna, commers, entertainment, and soshal netwarking.
dakshinpaschim airlines Co. ( ) is a major U.S. airline or the sansar 's largest low-cost carrier, headquartered in Dallas, texas.
It was established in 1967 and adopted iske vartmaan naam in 1971.
the airline rai adhik than 46,000 employees and operates more than 3,400 flite prati din.
as of June 5, 2011, it carries the sabase domestic yatri of koi u.S. airline.
as of April 2013, Southwest airlines rai scheduled seva to 84 gantavyon in 41 states or purto rico.
dakshinpaschim Airlines rai solely sanchalit bowing 737s, magar for a few saalo in the 1970s or 1980s, jab it operated Boeing 727s.
as of agast 2012, dakshinpaschim is the largest oparator of the 737 worldwide with over 550 in seva, prayek operating an ausat of chah flite per din.
in may 2011, the airline acquired AirTran Airways, saath integration of the vaahak apekshit to be puraa by 2014.
on kooch 1, 2012, the company was jari a single operating certificate, technically banane ek airline.
rolling Rock is a 4.6 % abv paale lager launched in 1939 by the latrobe brewing company.
haalanki santhaapit as a local beer in pashchimi Pennsylvania, it was marketed aggressively or aakhirkaar became a neshnal utpaada.
The brand thi bechi to anheuser-busch of st. lui, mizori, in mid 2006, jisase transferred brewing parichaalan to nai Jersey.
Benedict XVI (,, ; born joseph aloisius ratzinger on 16 april 1927 ) is Pope emeritus of the catholic girijaghar.
he served as Pope isse 2005 to 2013.
In that sthiti, he was dono the netaa of the Catholic girijaghar and Sovereign of the vatican nagar rajya.
Benedict was nirvaachit on 19 April 2005 in a papal conclave, celebrated uske papal udghaatan dravyaman on 24 april 2005, or took kabza of his girjaghar, the Archbasilica of St. jon lateran, on 7 May 2005.
ordained as a priest in 1951 in uske deshi Bavaria, ratzinger sthapit khud as a highly regarded university theologian by the let 1950s and thi niyukt a puraa praadhyaapak in 1958.
After a long kariyar as an academik, sevarat as a professor of dharamshastra at anek germany universities—the pichhlaa hone the vishvavidhyalayon of regensburg, jahaan he served as vaais adhyaksh of the vishvavidhyalayon in 1976 or 1977—he thi appointed archbishop of munich or freising or cardinal by pope paul vi in 1977, an asaamaanya pramotion liye kisi saath choti lubhaavne anubhav.
in 1981, he settled in rome jab he became prefect of the sabha liye the doctrine of the aasthaa, ek of the sabase important dicasteries of the roman Curia.
From 2002 until his chunaav as pope, he was bhi dean of the college of cardinals, or as aise, the primus inter pares among the cardinals.
prior to banane pope, he thi `` a pramukh figure on the vatican stage liye a quarter of a century '' as `` one of the sabase respected, influential or vivaadaaspad sadasyon of the college of Cardinals '' ; he tha an influence `` duusari to none jab it came to setting girijaghar priorities or directions '' as one of pope jon paul II 's closest confidants.
he thi originally a udaar theologian, but apanaaya conservative drishy baad 1968.
His safal kritiyaan bachaav paramparaagat Catholic doctrine and maan.
dauraan his papacy, benedict XVI advocated a vaapasi to aadharbhoot Christian maan to counter the increased secularisation of many pashchimi countries.
he views relativism 's denial of objective sachai, or the denial of moral sachai in particular, as the central problem of the 21st sadi.
he sikhaaya the mahatv of both the catholic girijaghar or an samajhnaa of parameshwar 's redemptive love.
pope benedict bhi revived a kramank of paramparaon including elevating the tridentine dravyaman to a adhik prominent sthiti.
he navinikrut the relationship between the Catholic Church or art, dekhne the upyog of saundarya as a path to the sacred, prachaarit the upyog of latin, or reintroduced paramparaagat papal garments, liye jisase reason he thi pukaara `` the pope of aesthetics ''.
He rai maharoom described as `` the pramukh bauddhik force in the girijaghar '' chunki the mid-1980s.
Several of pope benedict 's students isse uske academik kariyar hai bhi prominent churchmen aaj and confidantes of use, notably christoff schönborn.
on 11 farvari 2013, Pope benedict ghoshit uske istipha in a speech in Latin pehle the cardinals, citing a `` lack of strength of dimag and deh '' due to uske advanced aayu.
uske istipha became prabhavi on 28 February 2013.
he is the pehla pope to resign since Pope Gregory barahavin in 1415, or the pehla to do so on uske apana pahal chunki pope celestine v in 1294.
as pope emeritus, benedict retains the style of His pavitrataa, or the sheershak of pope, or hoga continue to dress in the papal rang of shwet.
he thi succeeded by pope Francis on 13 kooch 2013, or he sthanantarit into the newly sanvar Mater ecclesiae math for his retirement on 2 may 2013..
jeb stereoscope saath asli test chitra.
prayukt by sainya to jaanchen stereoscopic pairs of aerial chayachitr.
drishy of Boston, c. 1860 ; an early stereoscopic card for viewing a jhaanki from prakruti
Kaiser-Panorama consisted of a multi-station dekhne apparatus or set of stereo slide.
patented by A. fuhrmann around 1890.
company of ladies watching stereoscopic photographs, painting by yaaqub spoel, pehle 1868.
A very jaldi chithran of logon using a stereoscope.
stereoscopy ( also pukaara stereoscopics or 3D imaging ) is a technique liye bananaa or enhancing the bhram of depth in an chitra by arthath of stereopsis liye binocular drushti.
the shabd stereoscopy garbhashayi isse the unani `` στερεός '' ( stereos ), `` kad, thos '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ), `` to dekh '', `` to see ''.
sabase stereoscopic methods upasthit two ofaset images separately to the baayein or sahi najar of the darshak.
These two-dimensional bimb hai tab combined in the dimag to give the bodh of 3d gaharaai.
This takanic is distinguished isse 3d displays ki pradarshak an chitra in teen full dimensions, allowing the nireekshak to badhayen soochna parichay the 3-dimensional vastuen hone pradarshit by sir or najar andolanon.
jon adams ( aktubar 30, 1735 ( o.s. October 19, 1735 ) – july 4, 1826 ) was the duusari president of the sanyukt States ( 1797–1801 ), having pehle parosa as the first vice president of the sanyukt rajya.
an amareeki Founding pita, he was a statesman, diplomat, or a agrani edwocket of amareeki swatantraaa from great britain.
Well shikshit, he thi an atmagyaan political theorist jo prachaarit republicanism or likhaa prolifically parichay uske often seminal ideas, both in prakashit works and in letters to uske bivi and key adviser abigale as khub as to anya founding fathers.
adams aae to prominence in the early stages of the amareeki Revolution.
A lawyer or public figure in boston, as a pratinidhi isse Massachusetts to the mahadwipiya congress, he nibhaai a agrani bhoomika in persuading Congress to ghoshit swatantraaa.
he assisted thomas jeffrasan in drafting the Declaration of swatantraaa in 1776, or thi iske primary edwocket in the congress.
baad, as a diplomat in europea, he helped negotiate the eventual salaam treaty with Great britain, and thi responsible liye obtaining vital sarkari lone from amsterdam bankers.
a rajnatik theorist or itihaaskaar, adams largely likhaa the Massachusetts samvidhan in 1780, jisase saath saath uske pehle vichaar on sarkari, bahekaave amareeki rajnatik vichaar.
ek of his mahanatam bhoomikaaye thi as a nyaayadhish of akshar : in 1775, he manonith george washington to be commander-in-chief, or 25 saalo baad manonith John marshall to be mukhya insaaf of the sanyukt rajya.
adams ' krantikari credentials secured him two terms as george washington 's vaais adhyaksh or uske own chunaav in 1796 as the duusari adhyaksh.
dauraan his ek pad, he encountered ferocious hamale by the jeffersonian republicans, as khub as the prabal faction in his apana federalist party led by uske kadava dushman sikandar hamiltan.
adams signed the vivaadaaspad alian or Sedition adhiniyamon, or nirmit up the fouj or navy visheshkar in the face of an undeclared naval yuddh ( pukaara the `` Quasi-War `` ) saath frans, 1798–1800.
The pramukh accomplishment of uske presidency thi uske peaceful rezolution of the virodh in the face of hamiltan 's vipaksh.
in 1800, adams thi parajeet for re-election by thomas jeffrasan or ritred to Massachusetts.
he later resumed uske dosti saath jeffrasan.
he or uske bivi, abigale adams, santhaapit an accomplished parivaar lakeer of rajaneta, diplomats, or itihaaskaaron now referred to as the adams rajnatik parivaar.
adams thi the father of jon Quincy Adams, the chathe adhyaksh of the sanyukt rajya.
uske uplabdhiyaan have praapt greater manyata in aadhunik times, though uske yogadan yahood not initially as manaaye as those of anya sansthaapakon.
Adams was the pehla u.S. adhyaksh to reside in the bhawan that eventually became gyaat as the White House.
the sanyukt States ten-dollar vidheyak ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of sanyukt States karency.
the pehla u.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), sikandar Hamilton, is philhal pradarshit on the obverse of the vidheyak, while the u.S. rajkosh bhawan is pradarshit on the reverse.
( hamiltan is ek of do non-presidents pradarshit on philhal jari u.S. bills.
the anya is benjamin franklin, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is ek of tabhi chaar people featured on u.S. paper karency ( 1861 to the upasthit ) jo thi nahin born in the mahadwipiya sanyukt rajya, as he was isse the West indies.
the anya hai : Albert Gallatin, switzaraland ( $ 500 1862/63 vidhik tender ) ; George meade, spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 rajkosh Note ) ; and robert Morris, england ( $ 1,000 1862/63 vidhik Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver praaanpatr ).
in jod, Kamehameha i, appears on the 2008 Hawaii state quarter. )
All $ 10 bills jari aaj are sangheey Reserve Notes.
the Bureau of nakkashi or Printing says the ausat jivan of a $ 10 vidheyak in parisancharan is 18 months pehle it is replaced due to pahanen.
lagbhag 6 % of sab US banknotes mudrit in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten dollars bills hai vitarit by Federal arakshit Banks in yellow straps.
The sorce of the phase on the $ 10 vidheyak is jon Trumbull ’s 1805 portret of hamiltan ki belongs to the portret sangrahan of New York nagar haul.
The $ 10 bill is the tabhi u.S. paper currency in circulation in jisase the portrait chehron to the baayein ( the $ 100,000 vidheyak pradarshit a portret of woodro wilson facing to the baayein, lakin was prayukt tabhi liye intra-government tranjection ).
a rider on a yamaha waverunner XL performing a high-speed turn.
a jetboat is a naav propelled by a jet of jal ejected isse the waapas of the shilp.
naapsand a powerboat or motorboat ki upyog a propeller in the jal below or peeche the naav, a jetboat draws the jal from antargat the boat into a pump andar the naav, tab expels it through a nozzle at the stern.
Jetboats yahood originally designed by Sir wiliam hamiltan ( jo viksit a waterjet in 1954 ) liye aaparishan in the fast-flowing and uthle nadiyaan of New jiland, specifically to overcome the problem of propellers striking rocks in such waters.
Previous koshishen at waterjet nodan had very choti lifetimes, generally due to the akushal dizine of the ikai or the fact that ve offered few laabh over conventional propellers.
naapsand ye pichhlaa waterjet developments, such as campini 's or the hanley hydrojet, hamiltan had a vishisht need liye a nodan pranali to operate in very-shallow jal, and the waterjet proved to be the adarsh samaadhaan.
isse is, the lokapriyata of the jet ikai or jetboat increased rapidly.
through further developments, it thi mila the waterjet offered anek anya laabh over propellers liye a wide dayera of vessel types, and as aise, waterjets hai used widely aaj for many high-speed baratan, sahit yatri ferries, bachaav craft, patrol boats or offshore supplai baratan.
jetboats hai atyadhik maneuverable, or many can, isse puraa gati, be reversed and brought to a stop bheetar choti adhik than their apana lambaai, in a maneuver gyaat as a `` krash stop ''.
The khub gyaat hamiltan turn or `` jet spin '' is a high-speed maneuvre jahaan the naav 's ingine throttle is cut, the parichaalan is turned sharply or the throttle kholi again, causing the naav to spin quickly around saath a vishaal spray of water.
vahin is no abhiyantriki limit to the aakaar of jetboats, haalanki the vaid of unke upyog depends a lot on the type of anuprayog.
clasik prop-drives hai generally adhik kushal or kifayati at low speeds, up to about, lakin as naav gati increases pare this, the atirikt hull pratirodh utpann by struts, rudders, shafts ( ityadi. ) arthath waterjets hai adhik kushal in the 20-50 ganth range ( up to ).
Also, in paristhitiyon saath bahut vishaal propellers turning at slow speeds ( such as tug boats ), the equivalent aakaar waterjet would be too big to be vyaavhaarik.
liye ye reasons, the vast bahumat of waterjet ikai hai santhaapit in high-speed vessels or in particular situations jahaan shallow draught, maneuverability, or lod flexibility hai pramukh chintaaen.
the biggest jet-driven baratan are found in sainya upyog or the high-speed passenger/car ferry udyog.
dakshin africa 's s ( approximately long ) are the biggest jet-propelled baratan so far.
bhi these German-built vessels hai sakasham of performing `` krash stops ''.
Uveitis is broadly paribhaashit as sujan of the uvea.
the uvea consists of the madhya, pigmented, vascular structures of the najar or shaamil the iris, ciliary body, and choroid.
Uveitis requires an urgent referral and thorough parikshaw by an ophthalmologist or optometrist along with taatkaalik upachaar to control the sujan.
