the jagamagaataa is a 1980 manovaigyanik horer filmi utpaadit or nirdeshit by stanley kubrick, co-written saath upanyaaskaar diane johnson, or starring joker nicolsan, shelli Duvall, scatman crothers, or danni loyad.
the film is aadhaarit on the Stephen king novel The jagamagaataa.
A lekhak, joker Torrance, takes a job as an off-season kaaryvahak at an isolated hotel.
His yang son possesses maansik abilities and is able to dekhie bate from the past or future, such as the bhoot jo inhabit the hotel.
jald after settling in, the parivaar is funs in the hotel by a snowstorm, or joker dhire becomes bahekaave by a alokik presence ; he utarataa into deewangi and attempts to hatya his bivi or bete.
naapsand previous kubrick films, jisase developed an darshak dhire by bhawan on word-of-mouth, the jagamagaataa thi released as a mass-market filmi, kholane at pehla in just two shaharon on memorial Day, tab deshbhar a maah later.
haalanki initial jawaab to the film thi mishrit, baad najuk moolyankan thi adhik anukool or it is abhi viewed as a clasik of the horror genre.
filmi nideshak Martin Scorsese, writing in the Daily Beast, kramit it as one of the 11 scariest horror filmon of all samay.
Film aalochakon, filmi vidhyaarthee, or Kubrick 's nirmaataa, Jan harlan, have remarked on the enormous influence the filmi rai tha on lokapriy culture.
the aarambhik europea relies of The jagamagaataa thi 25 minutes shorter than the amareeki version, achieved by nikaalnaa most of the drishyon lene place baahar the environs of the hotel.
aangan cola Bottle
aangan aahaar cola was a brands of aahaar soda introduced by Pepsi in 1963.
It thi nirmit in jawaab to aahaar reeti cola, jisase thi the pehla aahaar cola on the market.
fitaness pravartak dibbi drek thi Patio aahaar cola 's pravaktaa.
in 1964, aangan released naarangi, angoor, or root beer flavors.
is flavor lakeer thi nahin meant to compete saath brands like Orange Crush, lakin balki bharan out the lakeer.
aangan sodas were uplabdhiyaan in the cold-bottle market : kiraanaa or mom-and-pop stores.
vigyaapan liye Patio was comparatively scarce ; at the samay, bottlers were regionally franchised, or sambandhit vigyaapan thi necessarily local.
in 1964, Patio aahaar cola became aahaar pepsy.
the newly branded diet soda thi advertised alongside Pepsi saath the tagaline `` pepsy either way '', jisase replaced the slogan `` dances saath swaad ''.
the choti jivan span of aangan Diet cola makes it a great jod liye bottle collectors.
sabase of the remaining aangan lakeer of flavors yahood phased out by the early 1970s, jabaki a few batch jabatak the mid 70s
Infrastructure is moulik shaareerik or organizational structures needed liye the operation of a samaaj or enterprize, or the services or suvidhaayen jaruri liye an economy to falan.
it can be generally defined as the set of interconnected structural tatv that provide fremawork supporting an sampurna dhaancha of development.
It is an mahatvapurn pad liye judging a desh or pradesh 's vikaas.
The pad typically refers to the technical structures ki support a samaaj, aise as roads, pulon, water supply, sewers, electrical grid, doorsanchaar, and so forth, or can be paribhaashit as `` the shaareerik components of interrelated systems providing commodities or sevaayen anivaary to enable, sustain, or enhance societal living conditions. ''
Viewed functionally, avasanrachana facilitates the production of goods and services, or bhi the distribution of samaapt utpaada to bazaar, as khub as basic soshal sevaayen aise as skulon or aspataal ; liye udhaaharan, roads enable the hastantaran of raw saamagree to a factory.
in sainya parlance, the pad refers to the buildings or permanent installations jaruri liye the support, redeployment, and operation of sainya shaktiyaan.
To mek it saral, avasanrachana is anything ki is needed roj, an roj mad.
a graphical pratinidhitiv of the ideal insaan karyotype
mitochondrial diene.
Human genetic vibhinnata is the genetic matbhed dono bheetar or among populations.
vahin may be multiple variants of koi die jin in the insaan janasankhyikee ( jeenon ), agrani to polymorphism.
anek jeenon are nahin bahurupi, arth that tabhi a single allele is upasthit in the janasankhyikee : the jin is tab said to be phixd.
No do insaano hai genetically ekasmaan.
Even monozygotic judwa, jo develop from one zygote, have infrequent genetic matbhed due to mutations occurring during vikaas or jin copy kramank variation.
matbhed between individuals, bhi closely sambandhit individuals, hai the kunjee to takneekon aise as genetic fingerprinting.
Alleles occur at different frequencies in different insaan populations, with populations that hai more geographically or ancestrally remote tending to differ adhik.
kalyankari of matbhed between individuals shaamil the exange of jeenon dauraan meiosis or various mutational events.
There hai at least two reasons kyon genetic variation exists between populations.
prakritik chayan may confer an adaptive laabh to individuals in a vishisht paryaavaran if an allele provides a pratispardhi laabh.
Alleles under chayan hai likely to occur tabhi in those bhugolic regions jahaan ve confer an advantage.
the second main kaaran of genetic variation is due to the unchi degree of neutrality of sabase mutations.
sabase mutations do not appear to have koi selective effect ek rasta or the anya on the sajiv.
the main cause is genetic bahaav, is is the prabhaav of random parivartan in the jin pool.
In humans, sansthaapak effect or past choti janasankhyikee aakaar ( increasing the likelihood of genetic bahaav ) may have tha an mahatvapurn influence in neutral matbhed between populations.
the siddhanth ki insaano recently migrated out of Africa supports this.
the study of human genetic vibhinnata rai both vikasvaadi significance or chikitsa applications.
It can sahaayta vaigyanikon samajhe pracheen insaan population migrations as khub as kaisaa alag insaan groups hai biologically sambandhit to ek another.
For medicine, padhai of insaan genetic vibhinnata may be mahatvapurn kuki some disease-causing alleles occur adhik praayah in logon isse specific bhugolic regions.
nai nishkarshon show that prayek human rai on average 60 new mutations compared to unke parents.
alaava isse mutations, anek genes that may have aided insaano in pracheen times plague insaano aaj.
liye udhaaharan, it is suspected ki jeenon that allow humans to more efficiently process khaanaa hai those ki mek people susceptible to motopa or diabetes aaj.
chaay party pradarshnakariyon on the west lon of the u.S. Capitol or the National mal at the Taxpayer kooch on Washington on sitambar 12, 2009.
the chaay party gati is an amareeki political gati ki adhivaktaaon sakht adherence to the sanyukt rajya samvidhan, reducing u.S. sarkari bitaa or kar, or reduction of the u.S. neshnal karz or sangheey budget deficit.
the gati rai maharoom pukaara partly roodhiwaadee, partly libertarian, or partly populist.
The gati rai sponsored virodh and supported political ummidavaar chunki 2009.
the naam of the gati is niklaa isse the boston chaay Party of 1773, an iconic event in American itihaas.
anti-tax pradarshnakariyon in the sanyukt rajya have often referred to the asli boston Tea Party for prerana.
sandarbh to the Boston chaay party yahood bhaag of kar din protests held throughout the 1990s and pehle.
By 2001, a custom had viksit among some roodhiwaadee kaaryakartaaon of mailing chaay bag to vidhayak and anya officials as a symbolic act.
the mudraayen of purto Rico closely follow the historic development of purto rico.
As a upnivesh of spain and the sanyukt States, Puerto rico thi granted the use of dono videshi and prantiy mudraayen.
Following the spani colonization in 1502, purto rico became an mahatvapurn port, with iske apana supplai of sunaharaa.
however, as the khanij reserves ran khaali bheetar the sadi, the dweepasmooh 's arthvyavastha suffered.
The Spanish Crown jari the situado Mexicano, jisase meant that a semi-regular shipment of gold isse the Viceroyalty of nai spain hota be bheja to the island, as a way to provide aarthik support.
between 1636 or 1637, philip iv of spain imposed a tax which had to be sashulk using a aay stamp.
Inspired by this, Puerto rico began producing banknotes in 1766, banane the pehla colony to print 8- real banknotes in the spani samrajya and jisase in the spani sarkari 's sweekruti of subsequent issues.
the situado thi discontinued dauraan the 19th sadi, bananaa an economic sankat, as a result of mexico gaining iske swatantraaa from spain.
salvador meléndez Bruna, the colonial governor in daftar, ordered the samasya of provincial banknotes, bananaa the purto rican peso.
However, mudran of ye banknotes ceased baad 1815.
dauraan the following dashakon, videshi sikke became the faili karency.
in the 1860s or 1870s, banknotes reemerged.
on February 1, 1890, the Banco español de purto rico was udghaatan or began issuing banknotes.
the bank designed four shrenee or placed teen in parisancharan antargat Spanish niyam.
in 1895, a Royal decri ordered the utpaadan of prantiy peso sikke.
On agast 13, 1898, the spanish-american yuddh ended saath Spain ceding Puerto rico to the sanyukt rajya.
The banco español de purto Rico was renamed bainko of Porto rico or issued bills equivalent to the United rajya dollars, bananaa the purto Rican dollars.
in 1902, the pehla neshnal bainko of porto rico jari banknotes in a samanaantar manner.
Two adhik shrenee yahood jari jabatak 1913.
baad purto Rico 's arthvyavastha and maudrik pranali thi fully ekikrut into the sanyukt rajya ' aarthik or monetary pranali, the purto Rican dollar were redeemed for those jari by the sanyukt rajya rajkosh.
the peso and dollar have maharoom followed by anya contemporary mudde, sahit commemorative banknotes, nijee currency, or a quarter sikaa designed with fort San phelip del morro in the face.
pepsy ( stylized in lowercase as pepsy, formerly stylized in uppercase as PEPSI ) is a carbonated naram peya that is utpaadit and manufactured by pepsico.
Created or viksit in 1893 and introduced as bread 's peya, it thi renamed as pepsi-cola on agast 28, 1898, tab to pepsy in 1961.
the Book of ezekiel is the teesraa of the Latter nabiyon in the Hebrew bible, following the kitabe of Isaiah and yirmayaah or preceding the kitaab of the Twelve.
( the anukram is somewhat different in the isai Old vasiyat ).
It garbhashayi iske naam isse, or record the visions of, the 6th sadi BC priest or nabi ezekiel.
according to the kitaab, the nabi, exiled in Babylon, experienced a series of saat visions dauraan the 22 saalo isse 593 to 571 bc, a kaal jisase spans the final vinaash of Jerusalem in 586.
the visions, or the kitaab, hai structured around teen vishaywastu : ( 1 ) judgment on Israel ( chapters 1-24 ) ; ( 2 ) judgment on the nations ( adhyay 25-32 ) ; or bhavishya aashirwad liye israel ( adhyay 33-48 ).
nai orlions ( or, locally or ; ) is a pramukh sanyukt States bandargahon and the largest nagar and mahanagar area in the rajya of louisiana.
the janasankhyikee of the nagar thi 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. janasankhyikee.
the New Orleans mahanagar kshetrafal ( nai orleans–metairie–kenner mahanagar Statistical kshetrafal ) had a janasankhyikee of 1,167,764 in 2010 or was the 46th largest in the United rajya.
the New orleans–metairie–bogalusa Combined sankhyikeey kshetrafal, a larger trading kshetrafal, tha a 2010 janasankhyikee of 1,214,932.
the nagar is namit baad orléans, a nagar stith on the loire River in kendra, France, and is khub gyaat liye its distinct French Creole vaastukala, as khub as its cross-cultural or bahubhashi viraasat.
New Orleans is bhi prasiddh for iske bhojan, music ( visheshkar as the janmasthan of jazz ), or iske annual jashn or festivals, sabase notably Mardi gra.
the nagar is praayah referred to as the `` sabase adwitiya '' in america.
nai orlions is stith in southeastern louisiana, straddling the Mississippi River.
the city or Orleans mohalla ( ) hai.
the city or mohalla are bounded by the parishes of st. Tammany to the uttar, st. barnard to the east, Plaquemines to the dakshin and Jefferson to the south or west.
jhil pontchartrain, part of which is shaamil in the nagar had, jhooth to the uttar or Lake Borgne jhooth to the east.
the neshnal janam control lig thi a janam control sanghathan in the sanyukt rajya.
It thi founded in March 1915 by mariyam dennett, clara gruening stillman and Jessie ashley.
iske pramukh purpose was to overturn the kanoon jisase bain contraceptives isse the U.S. mails.
abhiyaan yahood arohit in New York, but in 1919 the League thi disbanded and reformed into the voluntary parenthood lig.
karkat, gyaat medically as a malignant phulav, is a vyapak group of vibhinn rogon, sab involving unregulated cell vikaas.
in karkat, koshikaayen divide or grow uncontrollably, forming malignant tumors, or invade aasapaas bhaag of the deh.
the karkat may bhi sprad to adhik dur bhaag of the deh through the lymphatic pranali or bloodstream.
nahin sab tumors hai cancerous.
Benign tumors do nahin grow uncontrollably, do nahin invade neighboring utakon, and do nahin spread throughout the deh.
vahin are over 200 different gyaat cancers that afflict insaano.
determining what kalyankari karkat is jatil.
anek things hai gyaat to badhayen the risk of cancer, sahit tambaaku use, certain infections, vikiran, lack of shaareerik activity, obesity, or paryaavarniya pradooshak.
ye can sidhe kshati genes or combine with maujuuda genetic faults bheetar cells to kaaran the beemaari.
lagbhag five to ten pratishat of cancers hai entirely hereditary.
karkat can be detected in a number of tareeke, sahit the presence of nishchit signs or lakshan, screening pareekshan, or medical imaging.
ekbar a possible karkat is detected it is diagnosed by microscopic parikshaw of a tissue sample.
karkat is usually treated saath chemotherapy, vikiran chikitsa and surgery.
The chances of surviving the disease vary greatly by the prakaar or sthaan of the karkat or the extent of beemaari at the start of upachaar.
jabaki karkat can affect people of sab aayu, or a few types of karkat hai adhik aam in children, the risk of vikasshil cancer generally increases saath aayu.
In 2007, karkat caused parichay 13 % of sab insaan deaths vishwavyaapee ( 7.9 lakh ).
daron are rising as adhik logon sajiv to an old aayu or as mass jeevanstyli parivartan occur in the vikasshil sansar.

skiing is a recreational kaaryaklap or pratispardhi khel in jisase the bhagidaar attaches long dhaavak or skis to boot or juute on the feet or upyog them to travel on sheersh of snow.
aside isse manoranjan and pratiyogita, skiing rai maharoom used for military uddeshy or even travelling in areas ki anubhav heavy himpat.
anek prakaar of pratispardhi skiing kaarykram hai pahachaanaa by the antarrashtriya olympic cameti, or the International ski sangh.
John Maynard Keynes, 1st Baron keynes, cb, fba ( ; 5 june 1883 – 21 april 1946 ) thi a British arthshaastri jinaki ideas have fundamentally prabhavit the siddhanth or practice of aadhunik macroeconomics, or informed the economic policies of governments.
he built on or greatly refined pehle kaary on the kalyankari of kaarobaar cycles, or is widely mana to be ek of the sansthaapakon of aadhunik macroeconomics or the sabase influential arthshaastri of the 20th sadi.
His vichaar hai the basis liye the skool of vichaar known as keynesian arthshaastra, as well as its vibhinn offshoots.
In many tareeke, subsequent developments in 20th sadi arthshaastra can be viewed as either bhawan on Keynes ' ideas or reacting viruddh them.
in the 1930s, Keynes spearheaded a revolution in aarthik thinking, overturning the puraani vichaar of neoclassical economics ki yojit that free markets would, in the short to medium term, automatically provide puraa employment, as long as workers were lacheelee in unke mazdooree maange.
keynes bajaay argued ki kul maang sankalpit the overall str of aarthik kaaryaklap, or that inadequate kul maang could sise to prolonged periods of unchi berogari.
he advocated the upyog of phiscal or maudrik upayon to mitigate the pratikul effects of economic recessions or depressions.
Following the outbreak of the duusari sansar yuddh, Keynes 's vichaar concerning economic niti yahood apanaaya by agrani pashchimi economies.
in 1942, keynes thi awarded a khandaani peerage as samant Keynes of Tilton in the county of sasex.
Keynes died in 1946, lakin dauraan the 1950s and 1960s the kamyaabi of keynesian economics resulted in lagbhag sab capitalist governments adopting iske policy suzav.
keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s, partly as a result of problems ki began to pahunchakar the Anglo-American economies isse the prarambh of the dashak, or partly kuki of critiques isse milton Friedman or anya arthshaastriyon jo yahood pessimistic parichay the kshamta of sarkarein to viniyamit the business saikil saath fiscal policy.
however, the advent of the vaishvik financial sankat in 2007 caused a punarutthan in Keynesian vichaar.
keynesian arthshaastra provided the saidhantik underpinning liye aarthik policies undertaken in jawaab to the sankat by Presidents george W. bush and baraak obama of the sanyukt rajya, pradhan mantri Gordon bhura of the sanyukt kingdom, or anya heads of sarkarein.
in 1999, samay magazine shaamil Keynes in unke list of the 100 sabase mahatvapurn and influential people of the 20th sadi, commenting that : `` His kattarpanthi vichaar ki governments should spend money ve do n't have may have saved poonjeevaad. ''
In jod to hone an arthshaastri, keynes was bhi a civil naukar, a nideshak of the angrejon eugenics samaaj, a director of the bainko of england, a sangrakshak of the kala or an art colector, a bhaag of the Bloomsbury samooh of intellectuals, an advisor to several charitable trusts, a writer, a paras, a private investor, and a kisaan.
is 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by jekuthiel Sofer emulated the 1675 ten Commandments at the Amsterdam esnoga synagogue.
the ten Commandments, bhi known as the decalogue, are a niyat of biblical kanoon relating to aachaar or worship, jisase khel a aadharbhoot bhoomika in Judaism, islam or christianity.
ve shaamil nirdesh to ibaadat tabhi parameshwar, to rakhana the sabbath paavan or prohibitions viruddh idolatry, inkaar, murder, chori, deception or adultery.
Different samooh follow thodaa alag paramparaon liye interpreting or kramakan unhen.
The ten aayatein appear twice in the yahudee bible, in the kitabe of Exodus or deuteronomy.
According to the story in Exodus, parameshwar inscribed them on do stone tablet, which he diya to musa on Mount Sinai.
aadhunik scholarship rai mila sambhavit influences in hittite and Mesopotamian kanoon or treaties, but is vibhajit over exactly jab the Ten aayatein were written and jo likhaa them.
the discographi of the English vaikalpik chattan band the Smiths consists of four studio albums, ek extended play ( ep ), ek sajiv album, ten compilation album, bees singles, ek video album or chaudaa music videos on the ashisht Trade, Sire or wea ricard labals.
the band thi formed in 1982 in manchester by vocalist morrissey, guitarist Johnny marr, bass khilaadi endi Rourke or vadak Mike joyce.
despite being championed by BBC Radio 1 discs jockey John chhilake, the band 's debyue single, `` Hand in dastaane `` ( May 1983 ), vifal to chart.
iske follow-up, `` is aakarshak man `` ( aktubar 1983 ), met saath najuk acclaim or pahunche number twenty-five on the uk singles chart.
the smiths ' cult status was followed by mukhyadhara success in 1984, as ve reached number baarah in the uk with the `` kayaa antar Does it mek ? `` single or pahunche number do on the uk album Chart with unke debyue album, The smiths ( 1984 ).
unke aglaa teen singles sab pahunche the sheersh bees of the charts in the uk, helping to consolidate unke previous chart success.
the aglaa studio album, maance Is Murder ( 1985 ), reached the sheersh of the angrejon chart ; however, the tabhi single to be released isse the album, `` ki chutkula is n't Funny anymore `` ( 1985 ), vifal to brake the uk sheersh 40.
returning to rup, the Smiths ' aglaa chah singles all pahunche the ucchtar than kramank tees in the uk or unke teesraa album, the maharani is murde ( 1986 ), pahunche number do in the UK.
despite the band 's chart success, marr left the group in agast 1987 due to a strained sambandh saath morrissey.
failing to dhundhen a badalanaa, the Smiths disbanded by the samay unke final studio album, Strangeways, Here We Come, thi released in sitambar ki year.
strangeways, Here we aaiye pahunche number do in the uk or became the band 's highest-charting release in the United rajya jab it pahunche kramank fifty-five on the billboard 200.
in jaldi 1992, wea acquired the sampurna waapas katalog of The smiths or utpaadit two compilations – Best... I or... Best ii – the pehla of jisase pahunche the sheersh of the UK Albums Chart.
wea released do further singles compilations in 1995 and 2001, saath a further compilation, the Sound of the smiths, released in navambar 2008.
gaye with the hawa is a novel written by margaret mishael, pehla prakashit in 1936.
it is praayah lagaai in the saahitiyik sub-genre of the historical romance novel.
However, it rai maharoom argued the novel is a `` nikat miss '' and does nahin contain sab of the elements of the romance vidha, bananaa it bas a historical anokhaa.
the story is niyat in clayton county, georgia, or Atlanta dauraan the amareeki civil yuddh and punarnirmaan.
it depicts the anubhavon of skarlet O'Hara, the bigade beti of a well-to-do vriksharopan owner, jo jarur upyog every arthath at uske niptaan to aaiye out of the poverty wo finds herself in baad Sherman 's `` March to the samudr ''.
Margaret mishael began likhane Gone with the hawa in 1926 to pass the time jabaki recovering isse an auto-crash chot ki refused to changa.
In April 1935, Harold Latham of macmillan, an editor who was looking liye new fiction, read kayaa she tha likhaa and dekhi ki it could be a best-seller.
baad Latham sahamat to prakashit the kitaab, mishael worked liye another six maheene checking the aitihaasik sandarbh, and rewrote the kholane chapter anek times.
mishael and uske husband jon daldal, a nakal editor by trade, edited the final sanskaran of the novel.
mishael wrote the kitaab 's final moments pehla, or tab wrote the kaarykram ki led up to it.
as to kayaa became of uske lovers, Rhett or skarlet, after the anokhaa ended, mishael kiya nahin know, or kaha, `` liye sab i jaan, rahet may have mila kisi else jo thi less mushkil. ''
Mitchell praapt the pulitzer puraskaar liye fiction liye the kitaab in 1937.
the book thi adapted into a 1939 amareeki filmi.
gaye with the hawa is the tabhi anokhaa by Mitchell prakashit dauraan her aaajeevan.
Endodontics ( isse the unani endo `` andar '' ; or odons `` tooth '' ) is ek of the danta specialties pahachaanaa by the American danta sangh, Royal College of dentists of canada, or royal australasian college of danta Surgeons, or saude saath the daant guda or the utakon surrounding the root of a daant.
endodontists perform a variety of prakriyaaon including endodontic therapy ( commonly known as `` root kanal chikitsa '' ), endodontic retreatment, surgery, treating cracked daant, or treating danta aghat.
Root canal chikitsa is one of the sabase aam prakriyaaon.
if the pulp ( containing nerves, arterioles, venules, lymphatic utak, or tantumay tissue ) becomes diseased or ghayal, endodontic upachaar is jaruri to sahejen the daant.
serial sanlagn scsi ( SAS ) is a point-to-point serial protocol that moves aankada to or isse computer bhandar devices aise as mushkil drive and tepe drive.
sas replaces the puraani samanaantar scsi ( pronounced `` scuzzy '' ) bas technology that first appeared in the mid-1980s.
sas, like iske purvavarti, upyog the maanak scsi cmand niyat.
SAS offers pichhadaa sangatta with second-generation sata drive.
sata 3 gbit/s drive may be connected to sas backplanes, lakin sas drive can not conect to sata backplanes.
the t10 technical cameti of the antarrashtriya cameti liye Information praudyogiki maanakon ( INCITS ) develops or maintains the sas protocol ; the scsi vyapaar sangh ( SCSITA ) promotes the praudyogiki.

aukaat as a natural-born naagarik of the United rajya is one of the paatrata aavashyaktaayen sthapit in the sanyukt rajya samvidhan liye chunaav to the office of adhyaksh or vaais President.
is requirement thi intended to protect the swadesh from videshi influence.
the samvidhan karata nahin define the phrase natural-born naagarik, or vibhinn raay have maharoom offered over time regarding its precise arth.
a 2011 Congressional shodh Service rapat stated
the natural-born-citizen clause has maharoom mentioned in guzar in anek nirnay of the sanyukt rajya param adaalat or nimnatar courts dealing saath the question of paatrata liye naagarikta by janam, lakin the Supreme adaalat has never sidhe addressed the sawaal of a vishisht adhyakshiya or vice-presidential candidate 's eligibility as a natural-born naagarik.
kurtis ujin `` court '' warner ( born june 22, 1971 ) is a purv amareeki footbaal khilaadi.
he nibhaai quarterbaque for three National Football lig ( NFL ) teams : the st. lui medhon, the nai york diggaj, and the erizona Cardinals.
he was originally signed by the green khadi pakars as an undrafted free agent in 1994 baad playing college footbaal at Northern Iowa.
warner would go on to be mana the behtareen undrafted player of sab samay, following a 12-year career regarded as ek of the mahanatam kahaniyaan in enegel itihaas.
warner pehla attained staradam jabaki playing liye the st. lui Rams from 1998 to 2003, jahaan he jiti two enegel mvp puraskaar in 1999 or 2001 as well as the Super Bowl MVP award in Super katori xxxiv.
he led the 2008 erizona Cardinals to super Bowl XLIII ( the franchise 's pehla super Bowl berth ), or owns the three ucchtam single-game guzar yardage yoga in super Bowl itihaas.
warner philhal holds the seventh-highest kariyar passer rating of all-time ( 93.7 ), or the third-highest kariyar purnataa pratishat in enegel history with 65.5 %.
in 13 kariyar playoff khel, warner baandhane pehla all-time in purnataa pratishat ( 66.5 % ), gaj prati attempt ( 8.55 ), and duusari in passer darja ( 102.8 ).
he bhi holds the ucchtam completion percentage liye a single khel during the niyamit ritu, at 92.3 percent ( 24/26 ), on sitambar 20, 2009, viruddh the jacksonville jaguars.
he announced uske ritairement on January 29, 2010. < sandarbh name='cnn 2010-01-29 ' >
Janet Kay Ruthven hagan ( ; born may 26, 1953 ) is the junior United rajya seenetter isse North carolina, in daftar chunki janvari 2009.
previously wo parosa in the North carolina Senate isse 1999 to 2009.
wo is a member of the Democratic party or is viewed as a moderet sadsy of her party.
When Hagan parajeet Republican laazim elizabeth dole in the 2008 sanyukt rajya seenet chunaav, wo became the pehla woman to shikast an incumbent stri in a seenet election.
the heisman memorial trophy Award ( praayah gyaat colloquially as the Heisman Trophy or the heisman ), is awarded annually to the khilaadi deemed the most bakaayaa khilaadi in colejiet footbaal.
It thi nirmit in 1935 as the shahar athlettic Club trophy or renamed in 1936 following the maut of the Club 's athlettic nideshak, jon heisman ( purv bhura vishvavidhyalayon or vishvavidhyalayon of Pennsylvania khilaadi ; sir footbaal coach at oberlin college, auburn University, Clemson University, rice University, or the vishvavidhyalayon of Pennsylvania ; and football, basket, or besabaal sir coach or athlettic nideshak at georgia Tech ).
the award is prastut by the heisman trophy vishwaas in jaldi December pehle the postseason katori games.
it is the oldest of anek overall awards in college footbaal, including the maxwell puraskaar, walter shivi puraskaar, or the ap khilaadi of the saal.
the heisman or the ap Player of the saal are the only puraskaar to sammaan the sabase bakaayaa khilaadi, while the maxwell puraskaar or walter shivi puraskaar recognize the best khilaadi, or the archi griffin puraskaar recognizes the sabase moolyawaan khilaadi.
the United raashtra cmand ( unc ) is the ekikrut cmand dhaancha liye the bahurashtriya sainya shaktiyaan supporting the ganatantr of korian ( dakshin Korea or rok ) dauraan and baad the Korean yuddh.
baad troops of the Democratic logon 's ganatantr of Korea ( uttar korian or dprk ) invaded South korian on june 25, 1950, the sanyukt raashtra Security parishad apanaaya rezolution 82 colling on North korian to cease hostilities and withdraw to the 38th samanaantar.
On june 27, 1950, it adopted rezolution 83, recommending ki members of the United raashtra provide sahaayta to the ganatantr of korian `` to repel the armed akraman and to restore antarrashtriya salaam or suraksha to the kshetrafal ''.
suraksha Council rezolution 84, adopted on July 7, 1950, anushansit that sadasyon providing sainya forces and other sahaayta to South korian `` mek such shaktiyaan and anya sahaayta available to a unified cmand under the sanyukt rajya of america ''.
haalanki the rizolution sujhaayaa the shaktiyaan under the unc yahood `` sanyukt raashtra shaktiyaan '', or sanyukt Nations itself could be considered a belligerent, in abhyaas the United Nations exercised no control over the combat shaktiyaan, jisase were niyantrit by the sanyukt rajya.
sabase observers concluded ki the forces antargat the unc yahood nahin in vidhi sanyukt raashtra troops, or the acts of the unc were nahin the adhiniyamon of the sanyukt raashtra.
the unc can be regarded as an alliance of neshnal sena, operating under the samuhik right of self-defense.
On August 29, 1950, the angrejon Commonwealth 's 27th Infantry brigade arrived at busaan to juden the unc, jisase jabatak then shaamil only rok or u.S. forces.
the 27th brigade moved into the naktong nadi line west of daegu.
troop units isse anya deshon of the un followed in rapid succession ; australia, belgian sanyukt Nations cmand, canada, colombia, ithiopia, frans, unaniyon, dhvaj, the netherlands, nai jiland, the Philippines, thailand and turkon.
the Union of dakshin africa provided air units which ladaa alongside the air forces of anya member nations.
denmark, India, norway, or sweden provided chikitsa ikai.
Italy provided a hospital, bhi haalanki it was nahin a UN sadsy.
the United raashtra Command or the Chinese-North korian cmand signed the korian armistice anubandh on 27 july 1953, samaapti the baari lard.
the armistice agreement sthapit the sainya armistice ayog ( mike ), consisting of pratinidhi of the do signatories, to supervise the implementation of the armistice terms.
the uttar korean-chinese mike rai maharoom replaced by panmumjon Representatives antargat vishesh uttar korian management.
Regular baithak have been roka, although duty officers of sanyukt suraksha kshetrafal, commonly gyaat as the yudhviram gaanv of panmunjom, isse prayek paksh milen regularly.
lincoln Heights is an amareeki family naatak television shrenee parichay Eddie Sutton, a mishan vista police adhikari jo chaalen uske family waapas to his boodha pados, lincoln Heights, to prarambh a nai life or to help out uske boodha pados.
it is a khatarnaak place to raise a family, or through the many trial the parivaar goes through, ve jald learn ki settling in is nahin as aasaan as it seems.
jabaki adhikari saton struggles to cope with prayek din jivan as a gali cop in los Angeles, uske kids try to anuroop in at their new skulon and saath their nai neighbors.
the show premiered janvari 8, 2007 on the abisi parivaar sanjaal with 13 episodes ordered for the first season.
it thi sweekrut for a second season, which premiered sitambar 4, 2007.

The dikhaaen 's theme song thi likhaa and performed by bassist stanley clark or singer-songwriter blaire reinhard.

A isai denomination is an identifiable dharmik deh antargat a aam naam, dhaancha, and doctrine bheetar Christianity.
In the paramparaagat parampara, carch hai vibhajit often saath jaateey and linguistic linon, into separate carch and traditions.
technically, vibhaajan between ek samooh and another are defined by doctrine and girijaghar praadhikaar.
Issues aise as the nature of yishu, the authority of apostolic succession, eschatology, or papal primacy pruthak ek denomination isse another.
the Roman Catholic girijaghar is the largest denomination saath over 1.1 arab members, over half of sab isaayiyon vishwavyaapee, bananaa it the largest denomination liye koi dharm vishwavyaapee ( haalanki the girijaghar karata not drishy itself as a denomination, lakin as the original pre-denominational church ).
protostant denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of isaayiyon vishwavyaapee, or saath the catholics, protestants, anglicans, and other closely sambandhit denominations comprise pashchimi christianity.
the purvi paramparaagat girijaghar, praachya paramparaagat carch or the Assyrian Church of the East are mana purvi isai denominations.
pashchimi Christian denominations jeetna in pashchimi europea or iske former colonies.
purvi isai denominations hai represented zyaadaatar in purvi europea, the madhya east and uttar africa.
Christians have various doctrines parichay the girijaghar, the body of faithful ki they maananaa was sthapit by yishu messiah, or how the daivi girijaghar corresponds to Christian denominations.
dono the Catholics or the Eastern Orthodox consider prayek of themselves solely to faithfully represent the One paavan catholic or Apostolic girijaghar to the exclusion of the other.
protestants alag isse the catholic girijaghar kuki of theologies or practices ki ve mana to be in ulanghan of unke interpretation.
generally, sadasyon of the vibhinn denominations acknowledge prayek other as isaayiyon, at tanik to the extent ki they have mutually pahachaanaa baptisms or acknowledge historically orthodox drishy sahit the Divinity of yishu or doctrines of sin or moksh, bhi haalanki doctrinal or ecclesiological baadhaaen rokte puraa niyaaz between carch.
chunki the reforms surrounding Vatican ii, the Catholic girijaghar rai referred to Protestant samudaayon as `` denominations '', jabaki reserving the pad `` girijaghar '' for apostolic carch, sahit the purvi paramparaagat ( see subsistit in and shakha siddhanth ).
There hai however some non-denominational Christians jo do nahin follow any particular shakha.
the pandas ( Ailuropoda melanoleuca, lit.
`` black or shwet cat-foot '' ), bhi known as the giant pandas to distinguish it from the unrelated red pandas, is a bhaaluu deshi to central-western or dakshin pashchimi china.
it is easily recognized by the large, distinctive black dhabbe around iske eyes, over the kaanon, or aarpaar its golakaar deh.
haalanki it belongs to the anukram carnivora, the pandas 's diet is 99 % baansuri.
Pandas in the junglee will occasionally kha anya grasses, junglee tubers, or bhi meat in the form of birds, rodents or carrion.
In captivity, they may praapt honey, andey, machhlee, yams, shrub pattey, santare, or kele along saath visheshkar prepared khaanaa.
the giant pandas jeevandaan in a few pahaad seemayen in central china, mainly in sichuaan province, but bhi in the shaanxi and gansu praanton.
as a parinaam of kheti, wanon and anya vikaas, the panda rai maharoom chalit out of the lowland areas jahaan it once jiya.
The pandas is a sangrakshan reliant endangered species.
A 2007 report shows 239 pandas jeena in captivity andar china or another 27 outside the desh.
junglee janasankhyikee estimates vary ; ek anumaan shows ki vahin hai parichay 1,590 individuals living in the junglee, while a 2006 padhai via diene analysis anumaanit that is figure could be as unchi as 2,000 to 3,000.
kuch reports bhi dikhaaen ki the kramank of pandas in the junglee is on the vruddhi.
However, the aiusien does nahin maananaa vahin is paryaapt certainty yet to reclassify the prajati from endangered to vulnerable.
jabaki the dragon rai praayah parosa as china 's neshnal emblem, internationally the pandas appears at tanik as commonly.
as aise, it is banane widely prayukt within China in international contexts, for udhaaharan the five fuwa mascots of the Beijing olympic.
the patang dhaavak is a 2007 amareeki naatak film nirdeshit by mark Forster aadhaarit on the anokhaa of the vahi name by Khaled hosseini.
it tells the story of Amir, a well-to-do ladke isse the vazeer Akbar khan district of kabul, jo is tormented by the guilt of abandoning uske dost Hassan, the bete of uske father 's Hazara naukar.
the story is niyat viruddh a backdrop of tumultuous events, from the patan of the samrajya in afghanistan through the soviet sainya hastkshep, the dravyaman exodus of afgaan sharnaarthiyon to Pakistan and the sanyukt rajya, or the taliban shashan.
Though sabase of the filmi is niyat in afghanistan, ye parts yahood mostly shot in Kashgar, China, due to the khataron of filmakan in afghanistan at the samay.
the bahumat of the film 's samvaad is in jameendaari, saath the shesh bolaa in angrezi.
the child abhinaytaon are native adhyakshon, lakin anek vayask abhinaytaon tha to sikh Dari.
filmakan wrapped up on disambar 21, 2006, and the filmi was expected to be released on navambar 2, 2007.
However, after concern liye the suraksha of the yang abhinaytaon in the filmi due to fears of hinsak reprisals to the sexual nature of some scenes in jisase they appear, iske relies tithi thi dhakel waapas chah weeks to disambar 14, 2007.
The patang dhaavak thi released on dvd on March 25, 2008.
A HD dvd release thi announced liye the vahi date, but thi radd following the swaroop 's nidhan.
the filmi was manonith liye the sunahari globe puraskaar liye behtareen videshi Language filmi in 2007.
the filmi 's score by Alberto Iglesias thi nominated liye behtareen asli Score at the sunahari globs or the Academy puraskaar.
the vaidhata of cannabis varies from country to desh.
Possession of canbis is illegal in sabase countries or rai been chunki the shuruuaat of faili cannabis prohibition in the late 1930s.
however, many deshon have decriminalized the kabza of choti quantities of canbis, visheshkar in uttar america, South America or europea.
furthermore, possession is vidhik or effectively legal in the netherlands, uttar korian and would be in the u.S. rajya of colorado and Washington if it were nahin for federal vidhi, jisase governs persons in sab rajya.
The aushadhiy use of cannabis is vidhik in a kramank of countries, including canada, the check ganatantr and Israel.
While sangheey vidhi in the sanyukt rajya bans all sale or kabza of cannabis, pravartan varies widely at the rajya str and kuch rajya have sthapit medicinal marijuana kaarykram in that contradict sangheey vidhi ; two states ( colorado or washington ) have repealed unke laws prohibiting the recreational upyog of cannabis and replaced unhen saath a niamak regime, bhi contrary to sangheey statute.
kuch countries have kanoon ki hai nahin as vigorously prosecuted as anya but, apart isse the deshon that offer abhigam to medical marijuana, sabase countries have vibhinn dand ranging isse lenient to bahut kathor.
Some infractions hai liya more seriously in kuch countries than others in lihaaz to the cultivation, upyog, possession or transafar of canbis liye recreational upyog.
a few jurisdictions have lessened dand liye possession of choti quantities of canbis, making it dandaneey by confiscation and a fine, rather than imprisonment.
kuch kshetradhikaaras/ drug nyaayalayon use anivaary treatment kaarykram for yang or barambar users, saath swatantraaa from narcotic davaayen as the lakshya or a few jurisdictions permit canbis upyog liye medicinal purposes.
vahin are bhi changes in a adhik restrictive direction as in Canada.
drug tests to detect canbis hai increasingly aam in anek deshon or have resulted in karawas vaakya or logon losing unke kaary.
however, saral possession can carry long karawas vaakya in some deshon, visheshkar in parts of east asia and southeast Asia jahaan the bikri of canbis may lead to a sentence of jivan in thana or bhi nishpaadan.

the test is uplabdhiyaan in both French or angrezi, the aadhikarik languages of Canada.

Epithelium is ek of the four moulik prakaar of animal utak, saath saath sanyoji utak, mansapeshi tissue or baichaiyn tissue.
Epithelial utakon lakeer the cavity or satahon of structures throughout the deh, and also rup anek glands.
krityon of epithelial koshikaayen shaamil srav, selective avasorana, suraksha, transcellular hastantaran or detection of sansani.
In unani `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) arthath `` on '' or `` upon '', or `` θηλή '' ( `` thēlē '' ) means `` nipple ''.
epithelial layers are avascular, so ve jarur praapt nourishment via diffusion of substances isse the underlying sanyoji utak, through the tahkhaane jhilli.
epithelia can bhi be vyavasthit into cluster of koshikaayen ki falan as bahibasravi and antahsravi glands.
kent E. hovind ( born janvari 15, 1953 ) is an amareeki young dharti creationist.

he is incarcerated at the sangheey correctional sanstha at berlin, nai Hampshire.

a bindi (, from Sanskrit bindu, meaning `` a buund, choti kan, bindu '' ), or a pottu/bottu ( in tamil, telegu, and malayalam ) is a forehead sajaavat worn in dakshin asia ( visheshkar india, bangladesh, nepal, shri lanka or morishas ) or southeast asia.
traditionally it is a ujjwal bindu of red rang lagu in the bich of the maathe close to the eyebrows, lakin it can bhi consist of a chihn or piece of aabhushan worn at this location.

The comanche hai a Plains bhartiya janajati jinaki historic territory, gyaat as comancheria, consisted of present din purvi New mexico, dakshini colorado, northeastern erizona, dakshini Kansas, sab of Oklahoma, or sabase of northwest texas.
the comanche people hai namankit in the federally recognized comanche Nation, in Oklahoma.
historically, the Comanches yahood hunter-gatherers with a ghoda samskruti.
vahin may have maharoom as many as 45,000 comanches in the let 18th sadi.
aaj, the comanche swadesh comanche janajaatiy namakan sankhyaayein 15,191 saath lagbhag 7,763 sadasyon residing in the lawton – fort sill or surrounding areas of dakshinpaschim oklahoma.
The Comanche swadesh homecoming powwow is yojit annually in walters, Oklahoma in mid-july.
the comanche spoke the comanche bhashaa, a numic bhashaa of the uto-aztecan family, sometimes vargeekrut as a Shoshone dialect ; however, tabhi parichay 1 % of comanches bolo it aaj.

coca-cola is a carbonated naram peya bechi in stores, restaraan, or vending machines in every desh except Cuba or North Korea.
it is utpaadit by the Coca-Cola company of atlanta, georgia, or is praayah referred to bas as Coke ( a panjikrut trademark of the coca-cola company in the sanyukt States chunki March 27, 1944 ).
originally intended as a patent ayurvigyaan jab it thi invented in the let 19th sadi by jon Pemberton, coca-cola was bought out by businessman asa Griggs candler, whose vipanan tactics led coke to its dabadabaa of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The company produces concentrate, jisase is tab sold to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the world.
the bottlers, jo tham territorially exclusive anubandh saath the company, upaj samaapt utpaada in dibbe or botalon isse the concentrate in sangyojan saath filtered jal or sweeteners.
The bottlers tab bechein, distribute or merchandise coca-cola to khudara stores or vending mashine.
aise bottlers shaamil Coca-Cola udhyamon, jisase is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in uttar america or pashchimi europea.
the Coca-Cola Company bhi bikta concentrate liye soda sroton to pramukh restaraan and khaanaa service vitarakon.
The coca-cola company rai, on avasar, introduced other cola peya under the coke brands name.
the most aam of ye is aahaar coke, saath anya sahit caffeine-free Coca-Cola, aahaar Coke caffeine-free, coca-cola cheri, Coca-Cola Zero, coca-cola Vanilla, or special sanskaran with lemon, lim or coffee.
aadhaarit on interbrand 's behtareen vaishvik brands 2011, coca-cola thi the sansar 's sabase valuable brand.
prakaar of bar-lines
in musical sanketan, a baar ( or maap ) is a segment of samay paribhaashit by a die kramank of beats, prayek of which hai assigned a particular note value.
dividing music into bars provides niyamit sandarbh ank to pin point sthitiyaan within a tukdaa of music.
it bhi makes written music easier to follow, chunki prayek baar of staff pratikon can be padhaa or played as a batch.
typically, a tukdaa consists of anek bars of the vahi lambaai, and in aadhunik musical sanketan the number of beats in prayek baar is specified at the shuruuaat of the score by the sheersh number of a time hastakshar ( aise as 3/4 ), jabaki the neeche number indicates the note maan of the taal ( the beat rai a quarter note maan in the 3/4 example ).
the shabd baar is adhik aam in angrejon angrezi, or the shabd measure is adhik common in amareeki angrezi, haalanki sangeetkaaron generally samajhe both usages.
In American angrezi, haalanki the shabd baar or maap hai praayah prayukt interchangeably the correct upyog of the word 'bar ' refers only to the lambavat lakeer itself, jabaki the shabd 'measure ' refers to the beats contained between baar.
in antarrashtriya upyog, it is baraabar sahi to bolo of bar sankhyaayein or measure sankhyaayein, e.g. ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm. 9–16’.
saath the vahi linon, it is hikmat to arakshit the abbreviated rup ‘bb.
3–4’ ityadi. liye beats tabhi ; bars chahie be referred to by naam in full.
The pehla metrically complete maap bheetar a tukdaa of music is pukaara ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’.
jab the tukdaa begins saath an anacrusis ( an adhuri maap at the head of a piece of music ), ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’ is the following maap.
the 19.9 mw gemasolar saura sanyantr in spain suvidhaayen 15 ghanton of bhandar or can supplai shakti 24 hours a day.
saura urja, raushan lite or ooshmaa isse the sun, has been harnessed by humans since pracheen times using a dayera of ever-evolving technologies.
saura urja technologies shaamil solar heating, saura photovoltaics, saura thermal vidyut, solar architecture and kritrim photosynthesis, jisase can make considerable contributions to solving kuch of the most taatkaalik urja samasyaayein the sansar abhi chehron.
Solar technologies hai broadly characterized as either passive saura or active saura depending on the rasta they capchar, badalen or vitarit saura urja.
Active saura takneekon shaamil the upyog of photovoltaic panels and solar thermal collectors to harness the urja.
passive saura takneekon shaamil orienting a bhawan to the surya, selecting saamagree saath anukool thermal mass or lite dispersing gun, or digining spaces ki naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the antarrashtriya urja Agency kaha ki `` the development of affordable, inexhaustible or saaf solar urja technologies will have huge longer-term laabh.
It hoga badhayen countries’ energy suraksha through reliance on an swadeshi, inexhaustible and mostly import-independent sansaadhan, enhance sthirataa, reduce pradooshan, nimnatar the laagat of mitigating climate badalen, or rakhana chattan eendhan prices lower than varanaa.
ye laabh are vaishvik.
hence the atirikt laagat of the protsaahan liye jaldi deployment should be mana learning nivesh ; ve jarur be budhimaani kharch or need to be widely shared ''.
praathmik parvaah may be provided in jatiyaan swasthya centres.
praathmik parvaah is the swasthya care die by a swasthya parvaah provider.
Typically is pradaata adhiniyamon as the principal point of paraamarsh for marijon within a swasthya care pranali or nirdeshaank anya specialists that the rogi may need.
aise a peshewar can be a praathmik parvaah physician, such as a saamaanya practitioner or parivaar physician, or depending on the mohalle, swasthya pranali sanghathan, or rogi 's discretion, ve may dekhie a pharmacist, a chikitsak sahaayak, a nurse practitioner, a nurse ( aise as in the sanyukt kingdom ), a clinical adhikari ( aise as in bhaag of africa ), or an ayurvedic or anya traditional medicine professional ( aise as in bhaag of asia ).
Depending on the prakruti of the swasthya condition, patients may tab be referred liye dwitiyak or tertiary care.

A psychiatrist is a chikitsak who specializes in psychiatry.
a manochikitsak specializes in the upachaar of dimagi vikaar.
psychiatrists hai praadhikrut to prescribe medicine, conduct shaareerik examinations, order or interpret prayogshaala pareekshan, upyog manochikitsa or may anukram brain imaging studies aise as computed tomography ( ct/cat Scan ), chumbakeey anunaad imaging ( mri ), or positron utsarjan tomography ( paalatu ) scanning.
bheetar the framework of the sansar swasthya sanghathan 's ( jo ) paribhaasha of swasthya as a state of puraa shaareerik, mental or soshal well-being, and nahin merely the anupasthiti of disease or infirmity, reproductive health, or yon health/hygiene, pataa the reproductive prakriyaaon, krityon or pranali at all charan of jivan.
reproductive health, therefore, implies ki logon hai samarth to have a jimmedaar, santoshjanak or safer sex jivan or ki ve have the capability to reproduce and the freedom to decide if, jab or kaisaa praayah to do so.
One nirvachan of is implies ki main or mahilaon ought to be suchit of or to have access to surakshit, prabhavi, sasti or acceptable methods of janam control ; also access to appropriate swasthya parvaah sevaayen of yon, reproductive ayurvigyaan or kriyanvayan of swasthya shiksha kaarykram to tanaav the mahatv of mahilaon to go sakushal through pregnancy and prasav could provide yugal with the behtareen chance of having a swasth infant.
on the anya hand individuals do face inequalities in reproductive swasthya sevaayen.
inequalities vary aadhaarit on socioeconomic aukaat, shiksha str, aayu, nasl, dharm, or resources available in unke paryaavaran.
it is possible for udhaaharan, ki low aay individuals kami the sansaadhan liye appropriate swasthya sevaayen or the knowledge to jaan what is appropriate for maintaining reproductive swasthya.
according to the WHO, `` reproductive and yon ill-health khate liye 20 % of the vaishvik burden of ill-health for mahilaon, or 14 % for main. ''
reproductive health is a part of yon or reproductive swasthya or adhikaron.

kor 2 is a brand encompassing a range of intel 's consumer 64-bit x86-64 single-, dual-, or quad-core microprocessors aadhaarit on the kor microarchitecture.
the single- or dual-core model hai single- die, whereas the quad-core model comprise two dies, each containing two cores, packaged in a multi-chip module.
The parichay of Core 2 relegated the Pentium brands to the mid-range market, or reunified laptop or desktop cpu linon, which previously had maharoom divided into the Pentium 4, pentium D, or Pentium m brands.
the Core 2 brand thi introduced on 27 July 2006, comprising the solo ( single-core ), duo ( dual-core ), quad ( quad-core ), and in 2007, the charam ( duail- or quad-core cpu for enthusiasts ) subbrands.
intel Core 2 processors with vpro praudyogiki ( designed liye vyavsaayon ) include the dual-core or quad-core shakhaon.
the super katori is the salanaa championships khel of the National footbaal lig ( enegel ), the highest str of peshewar amareeki football in the United States, culminating a ritu ki begins in the let garmiyaan of the pichhlaa panchang saal.
the Super katori upyog roman numerals to pahachaano each khel, balki than the saal in jisase it is yojit.
liye example, Super Bowl i thi nibhaai on January 15, 1967, following the 1966 niyamit season, while super katori xlvii was nibhaai on farvari 3, 2013, following the 2012 ritu.
the khel thi nirmit as part of a vilay anubandh between the enegel and iske then-rival league, the amareeki Football lig ( afl ).
It was sahamat that the two lig ' champion tiimon hota play in an afl–nfl World championships khel jabatak the vilay was to officially shuru in 1970.
baad the vilay, each lig was redesignated as a `` sammelan ``, or the khel was tab nibhaai between the conference champions.
Currently, the neshnal Football Conference ( nfc ) leads the shrenee saath 25 wins to 22 vins for the amareeki footbaal sammelan ( afc ).
the din on jisase the super katori is nibhaai, abhi mana by some a de facto amareeki national holiday, is pukaara `` super katori sande ``.
it is the second-largest din liye u.S. food khapat, baad thankgiving din.
in addition, the Super katori has aksar maharoom the sabase dekhi amareeki television broadcast of the year.
super katori xlv, nibhaai in 2011, became the most-watched American television kaarykram in history, aarekhan an ausat audience of 111 million viewers and lene over the spot yojit by the pichhlaa year 's super katori, jisase itself had liya over the # 1 spot yojit liye twenty-eight years by the final episode of m*a*s*h.
the super katori is also among the sabase watched sporting events in the world, lagbhag sab hone North amareeki audiyans, or is duusari to sangh footbaal ’s yuiefee Champions lig final as the sabase watched salanaa sporting event vishwavyaapee.
kuki of its high viewership, vanijyik airtime during the super katori broadcast is the sabase mahangi of the saal.
due to the unchi laagat of nivesh in vigyaapan on the super Bowl, companiyaan regularly develop their sabase mahangi advertisements liye is broadcast.
As a result, watching or discussing the broadcast 's commercials rai become a significant pahalu of the event.
In jod, anek popular gayakon and musicians have performed dauraan the event 's pre-game or madhyantar ceremonies kuki of the expozar.
fiona is a feminine given naam.
the naam Fiona thi invented, and pehla prayukt, by the scottish kavi james macpherson ( 1736–96 ), lekhak of the ossian kavitaayen, jisase he claimed yahood anuwaad isse ancient Gaelic strot ( strot, jab challenged, he never utpaadit ).
the naam thi subsequently prayukt as a pseudonym by wiliam sharp ( 1855–1905 ), jo authored anek romantic works antargat the naam `` Fiona macleod ''.
the naam has chunki become lokapriy in England, Scotland or ireland.
the name is mana to be a Latinised rup of the Gaelic shabd fionn, arth `` white '', `` fair ''.
The name Fiona is bhi sometimes prayukt as an anglicisation of the irish-language naam fíona, haalanki ye names are varanaa unrelated ( as fíona is niklaa from an tatv meaning `` bel '' ).
vahin is bhi a modern tendency to equate the authentic scottish Gaelic feminine naam fionnghal with fiona.
The name Fiona is uthati in lokapriyata visheshkar in germany -speaking deshon.
fiona thi the 49th sabase lokapriy naam for baby ladakiyon born in 2008 in germany.
fiona thi tied for teesraa place in the ranking of sabase lokapriy names liye baby ladakiyon born in the tiny principality of liechtenstein in 2008.
the name was the 347th most lokapriy naam liye girls born in the sanyukt rajya in 2008, jahaan it has kramit among the sheersh 1,000 sabase lokapriy names liye ladakiyon chunki 1990 or among the sheersh 500 chunki 1999.
the name Fiona rai maharoom visheshkar lokapriy for ladakiyon of asian or Pacific islander descent in New York City, jahaan fiona kramit as the naveen sabase popular naam liye ladakiyon isse those samooh in 2007.
Many languages are prayukt, or historically have been prayukt in the sanyukt rajya.
the most commonly prayukt language is angrezi.
vahin hai also many languages swadeshi to North America or to U.S. rajya or holdings in the prashanth pradesh.
bhashaaen brought to the desh by colonists or apravasiyon isse europea, Asia, or other parts of the sansar mek up a vishaal portion of the languages currently prayukt ; several bhashaaen, sahit creoles or chihn languages, have bhi viksit in the United rajya.
lagbhag 337 languages hai bolaa or hastakshrit by the janasankhyikee, of jisase 176 hai indigenous to the kshetrafal.
fifty-two languages formerly bolaa in the desh 's territory hai abhi vilupt.
the kismein of English bolaa in the United rajya is gyaat as American English.
angrezi is the de facto neshnal bhashaa of the sanyukt rajya, saath 80 % of the janasankhyikee claiming it as a maan jeebh, or kuch 95 % claiming to bolo it `` khub '' or `` bahut khub ''.
However, no aadhikarik bhashaa exists at the sangheey str.
vahin have maharoom anek prastaav to mek angrezi the neshnal bhashaa in amendments to avrajan reform bills, lakin none of ye bills rai become vidhi saath the amendment barkaraar.
the halaat is kaaphi varied at the rajya or territorial str, with some rajya mirroring the sangheey niti of adopting no aadhikarik bhashaa in a de jure capacity, anya adopting angrezi alon, anya officially adopting angrezi as well as local bhashaaen, or still anya adopting a policy of de facto bilingualism.
spani is the duusari sabase aam language in the desh, or is bolaa by over 12 % of the population.
the United rajya holds the sansar 's paanchvaan largest spanish-speaking population, outnumbered only by mexico, spain, Colombia, and Argentina.
throughout the southwestern sanyukt States, long-established Spanish-speaking communities coexist saath large sankhyaayein of more haal hispanophone apravasiyon.
Although anek nai latin amareeki apravasiyon hai less than dharapravaah in angrezi, nearly sab second-generation Hispanic Americans bolo English fluently, while only about half still speak spani.
according to the 2000 US janasankhyikee, logon of germany ancestry make up the largest single jaateey samooh in the United States, or the German language ranks paanchvaan.
italvi, polish, and french are still widely bolaa among populations descending isse apravasiyon isse those deshon in the early 20th sadi, lakin the upyog of ye bhashaaen is dwindling as the puraani peedhiyaan die.
roosi is bhi spoken by apravasi populations.
Tagalog or vietnami have over ek million adhyakshon prayek in the sanyukt States, almost entirely within haal apravasi populations.
dono bhashaaen, along saath the kismein of the Chinese bhashaa, Japanese, or korian, hai abhi used in chunaavon in alaska, california, Hawaii, Illinois, New york, texas, and Washington.
deshi amareeki bhashaaen are spoken in smaller pockets of the desh, lakin these populations are avarohan, and the bhashaaen are almost never widely prayukt outside of reserveshan.
hawaii, although having few native adhyakshon, is an official bhashaa saath with angrezi at the state str in hawaii.
the rajya sarkari of louisiana offers sevaayen and documents in french, as karata nai Mexico in spani.
besides English, spani, french, German, navajo or anya Native American languages, sab other languages hai praayah siikhe isse apravasi purvajo that came baad the samay of independence or siikhe through kuch rup of shiksha.

on an automobile, a quarter falak ( or pasch wing as it is gyaat in angrejon angrezi ) is usually mana the deh falak jisase goes between the pasch door or the trunk and typically wraps around the wheel khub ; however, the samaan front khand phender ( vehicle ), between the dwaar or the hud, is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter falak.
The quarter panel is typically made of chadar metal, lakin is sometimes bana of fiberglass or fiber-reinforced plastic ; haalanki, this varies with alag makes or model.
a quarter panel is typically a welded on component of the uni-body structure or monocoque.
badalanaa of a sheet metal quarter falak typically requires it to be kaaten band the gadee and a badalanaa bhaag to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the gadee.
due to is unchi raashi of specialized labor, a quarter falak may praayah be repaired balki than replaced by hammering out the kshati, or a deh philler sometimes referred to as bondo to be lagu to finalize the asli sataha.
shropshire ( or ; alternatively Salop ; abbreviated, in chapai tabhi, Shrops ) is a county in the West midlands region of england.
it simaayen Wales to the west, Cheshire to the north, staffordshire to the east, wastershire to the south-east or herefordshire to the dakshin.
a ekaatmak praadhikaar ( shropshire parishad ) was nirmit on 1 April 2009, lene over isse the pichhlaa county parishad or 5 zila councils, or covers sabase of the county.
the baro of telford or wrekin rai maharoom a separate ekaatmak praadhikaar since 1998 lakin continues to be included in the ceremonial county.
the county 's janasankhyikee and arthvyavastha is kendrit on paanch kasbon : the county kasbaa of shrewsbury, jisase is culturally or historically important or is stith in the kendra of the county ; telford, a new town in the east jisase thi constructed around a kramank of older kasbon, sabase notably wellington, Dawley or madeley, jisase is aaj the most populous ; and Oswestry in the north-west, bridgnorth bas to the south of Telford, or ludlow in the south.
The county rai anek further market kasbon, sahit whitchurch in the uttar, newport bas to the north-east of telford, and market Drayton in the north-east of the county.
the ironbridge gorge kshetrafal is a unesco sansar Heritage Site, covering ironbridge, coalbrookdale or a bhaag of madeley.
vahin hai, additionally, anya notable aitihaasik audyogic site located around the county, aise as at shrewsbury, broseley, Snailbeach and highley as khub as the Shropshire Union Canal.
The Shropshire pahadiyaan kshetrafal of bakaayaa prakritik saundarya cover parichay a quarter of the county, mukhyatah in the south.
shropshire is one of england 's sabase rural and sparsely aabaadi counties, saath the janasankhyikee ghanatv of the shropshire Council kshetrafal hone bas 91/km2 ( 337/sq mi ).
the wrekin is ek of the sabase famous natural landmark in the county, haalanki the highest hills hai the clee Hills, stiperstones or the long mynd.
wenlock Edge is another significant bhugolic and geological landmark.
in the low-lying uttarpashchim of the county ( or overlapping the kinaaraa saath wales ) is the fenn 's, whixall or Bettisfield mosses National Nature arakshit, ek of the sabase mahatvapurn or behtareen preserved bogs in Britain.
the nadi severn, great britain 's longest nadi, ranon through the county, exiting into wastershire via the severn ghati.
shropshire is landlocked, or saath an area of, is england 's largest antardeshiy county.
the county pushp is the round-leaved sundew.
For eurostat uddeshy, the county ( kam the ekaatmak zila of telford and Wrekin ) is a NUTS 3 pradesh ( code ukg22 ).
the two shropshire ekaatmak kshetron ( covering sab of the ceremonial county ), together with the adhikariyon covering the ceremonial county of staffordshire, comprise the `` shropshire and staffordshire '' nuts 2 pradesh.

over samay, anek supporting varna have maharoom promoted to abhinit roles : Leslie Winkle ( ritu 1 punaravarti ; ritu 2 regular ; ritu 3 guest ), a physicist sahyogi, or, at alag times, a premi of dono Leonard or harvard ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ritu 3 recurring ; season 4-present niyamit ), a microbiologist, harvard 's fiancée and subsequent wife, or purv part-time waitress alongside paini ; neuroscientist emi Farrah fowler ( ritu 3 atithi ; ritu 4 recurring ; ritu 4-present regular ), jo joins the group baad hone matched to Sheldon on a dating jalsthal ; or comic book store-owner, Stuart khilte ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; ritu 6-present niyamit ), jo replaces Howard as Raj 's best dost jab harvard is in space.
The dikhaaen bhi suvidhaayen numerous supporting characters, prayek of jisko plays a prominent bhoomika in a choti samooh of episodes.

wat phra kaew, Bangkok, thailand
There is no aadhikarik state dharm in the Thai constitution, jisase guarantees dharmik swatantraaa liye all Thai nagarikon, haalanki the king is required by law to be buddha.
according to the pichhlaa janasankhyikee ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of Thais are baudhon of the Theravada tradition.
musalmaan hai the duusari largest dharmik group in thailand at 4.6 %.
thailand 's southernmost praanton - Pattani, Yala, Narathiwat or part of songkhla chumphon have dominant Muslim populations, consisting of dono jaateey Thai and malay.
The southern tip of thailand is mostly jaateey malays.
Christians, mainly catholics, represent 0.7 % of the population.
a choti lakin influential community of sikhon in thailand or some hinduon also sajiv in the desh 's shaharon, and are heavily sagaai in khudara commers.
There is bhi a choti yahudee jatiyaan in thailand, dating waapas to the 17th century.
Since 2001, muslim activists, generally varnit by the thai sarkari as aatankwaadi or separatists, have rallied viruddh the central government because of kathith corruption or ethnic bias on the bhaag of officials.
Thailand 's vibhaag of dharm, philhal under the Ministry of samskruti, is formally jimmedaar liye the panjikaran of dharmik groups in thailand url_http jisase hold gun through legally sthapit muladhar.
it rai oversight, along saath the Immigration Police, over the kaary permits of prachaarkon jo hai `` expatriate dharmik workers '' of sab dharmon.
a value added kar ( vat ) is a rup of khapat kar.
From the pariprekshya of the kharidaar, it is a kar on the khariden price.
isse that of the seller, it is a kar only on the maan added to a product, material, or service, isse an hisaab point of view, by is stage of iske manufacture or distribution.
the nirmaataa remits to the government the difference between ye two amounts, and retains the baaki for themselves to ofaset the kar ve tha previously sashulk on the inputs.
the maan added to a utpaada by or with a kaarobaar is the bikri price charged to iske graahak, rin the laagat of materials and anya taxable inputs.
a vat is like a sales kar in that ultimately only the samaapt upabhokta is taxed.
It differs from the bikri kar in ki, saath the latter, the kar is ekatrit or remitted to the government tabhi ekbar, at the point of purchase by the samaapt consumer.
saath the vat, sangrahan, remittances to the sarkari, or credit for kar already sashulk occur each samay a kaarobaar in the supplai kadi purchases utpaada.
a referi colling a high-sticking penaltyhigh
-sticking is the naam of do infractions in the khel of ice hockey that may occur jab a khilaadi intentionally or inadvertently plays saath his or uske stick upar the height of the kandhon or above the cross baar of a hockey lakshya.
is can parinaam in a stoppage of play or in a dand.
In the rules of the neshnal Hockey lig, high-sticking is paribhaashit as a dand in Rule 60 or as a non-penalty beyimaani in niyam 80.
a stoppage in khel parinaam if a high stick aata in contact saath the pak or the toli jo chuaa it regains control of the puck.
However, khel praayah continues if a khilaadi chhu the puck saath a unchi stick or the opposing toli gains control of the pak.
if the pak goes into the opposing net baad coming into sampark saath a unchi stick, the lakshya is pratibandhit.
The level at which a stick is considered too unchi for a lakshya is the crossbar of the jaal.
however, if a player knocks the pak into uske apana jaal with a unchi stick, the goal is anumat.
a dand is assessed if a player strikes another khilaadi with a unchi stick.
the player is given a minor dand jabatak uske unchi stick caused an injury, in jisase maamla the referi rai the vikalp to assess a double-minor, pramukh or match penalty.
it is the referi 's discretion jisase dand to assess : the rule kals liye a doguna naaballig for an aakasmik injury, or a match dand for a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the vipaksh khilaadi was darasal ghayal ).
chot is praayah decided by the unchi stick causing bleeding, but the presence of rakt karata nahin automatically ausat an atirikt penalty is awarded.
Some referees have been gyaat to puraskaar an atirikt dand without the upasthiti of rakt if the referee determines that the chot sustained thi sufficient to warrant a double-minor penalty.
Typical modern memory card reader, sangat saath anek aam formats
A memory card reader is a yantra, typically having a usb interfes, liye accessing the aankada on a memory card aise as a compactflash ( cf ), surakshit digital ( sd ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ).
sabase card pathak bhi prastaav likhen capability, and saath with the card, is can falan as a kalam drive.
kuch printers or personal computer have a built-in card reader.
A multi card reader is used for sanchaar saath more than one prakaar of flash memory card.
multi card readers do not have built-in memory kshamta, lakin hai samarth to accept multiple prakaar or sheliyaan of memory taash.
the kramank of sangat memory taash varies from reader to reader and can include adhik than 20 alag prakaar.
The number of alag memory taash that a multi card reader can accept is expressed as x-in-1, saath x hone a figure of merit indicating the kramank of memory taash accepted, aise as 35-in-1.
There hai three shrenee of card pathak sorted by the prakaar and quantity of the card slots : single card reader ( e.g. 1x SD-only ), multi card reader ( e.g. 9-in-1 ) or shrenee card reader ( e.g. 4x sd tabhi ).
Some kinds of memory taash with their apana usb krityon do not need the card reader, aise as the budhimaan Stick memory card, jisase can plag sidhe into a USB slot.
the usb device class prayukt is 0x08.
dhamkaana is detrimental to vidhyaarthee ' well-being or vikaas.
dhamkaana is the upyog of force or coercion to gaali or intimidate anya.
the bartaav can be habitual or involve an asantulan of social or shaareerik shakti.
It can shaamil maukhik utpeedan or threat, shaareerik utpeedan or coercion or may be nirdeshit repeatedly towards particular victims, shaayad on grounds of race, dharm, gender, kaamuktha, or ability.
if dhamkaana is kiya by a samooh, it is called mobbing.
The shikaar of dhamkaana is sometimes referred to as a `` target ''.
dhamkaana can be paribhaashit in many alag tareeke.
The UK philhal rai no vidhik definition of bullying, jabaki kuch U.S. rajya have laws against it.
dhamkaana consists of three moulik prakaar of abuse – emotional, maukhik, and shaareerik.
it typically involves halkaa vidhi of coercion aise as intimidation.
Bullying seemayen isse saral one-on-one bullying to more jatil dhamkaana in jisase the buli may have ek or more `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing to assist the praathmik bully in his or uske dhamkaana kriyaayein.
dhamkaana in skool and the workplace is bhi referred to as pir gaali.
robert W. fuller rai analyzed bullying in the context of rankism.
a dhamkaana samskruti can develop in koi context in jisase human beings interact saath each other.
is includes skool, church, parivaar, the kaarysthal, ghar, or pados.

laura bush or rae Leigh bradbury ( formerly laapata ) on april 4, 2007, in austin, texas, baad the 8-year-old introduced mrs. Bush dauraan ghoshnaa of the bhavishya kholane of the Texas kshetreey daftar of the neshnal bich liye laapata or Exploited children.
rae leigh thi the pehla child in the u.S. to be recovered as a result of an ember chetavanee jab wo was 8 weeks boodha in November 1998.
an ember chetavanee or a child abduction apaat ( vahi code : cae ) is a child abduction chetavanee system originating in 1996, abhi employed in 9 deshon.
ember is officially a backronym liye america 's laapata : prasaaran apaat jawaab, namit liye ember hagerman, a 9-year-old abducted or murdered in Arlington, Texas in 1996.
vaikalpik kshetreey chetavanee names yahood ekbar prayukt ; in georgia, `` levi 's kol '' ( namit after Levi frady ) ; in hawaii, `` Maile ember chetavanee '' ( baad Maile gilbert ) ; or arkansaas, `` morgan Nick Amber chetavanee '' ( in memory of morgan chauntel Nick ).
ember Alerts hai vitarit via vanijyik radio stations, antarjaal radio, upgrah radio, television stesan, and cabel TV by the Emergency chetavanee pranali and noaa mausam Radio ( jahaan ve are termed `` child Abduction apaat '' or `` ember chetavaniyaan '' ).
the chetavaniyaan hai bhi jari via e-mail, electronic traffic-condition lakshan, the led billboards jisase are stith baahar of newer walgreens sthitiyaan, along saath the led/lcd signs of billboard companiyaan aise as saaf channel bahari, sibies bahari and laimor, or through betaar yantra SMS text messages.
AMBER chetavanee has bhi teamed up saath Google or fasebuk to riley soochna regarding an AMBER chetavanee to an kabhi growing janasankhyikee.
Those interested in subscribing to receive AMBER Alerts in unke area via sms sandesh can visit betaar ember Alerts, which hai offered by vidhi as free messages.
in kuch states, the pradarshak scrollboards in front of lottery terminals are also used.
The nirnay to declare an AMBER chetavanee is made by prayek police organization ( in anek maamle, the state police or highway patrol ) jisase investigates prayek of the abductions.
Public soochna in an ember Alert usually consists of the naam or varnan of the abductee, a description of the suspected abductor, or a varnan and anugna thali kramank of the abductor 's vehicle, if uplabdhiyaan.
monica samille lewinsky ( born july 23, 1973 ) is an amareeki stri saath jisko sanyukt rajya adhyaksh vidheyak clinton admitted to having tha an `` improper sambandh '' while wo worked at the shwet house in 1995 or 1996.
the affair and iske parakhnaa ( jisase included clinton 's mahabhiyog ) became known as the lewinsky cond.

in unani mythology, the trojan yuddh thi waged viruddh the nagar of Troy by the Achaeans ( unaniyon ) after Paris of troy took hellen isse uske husband menelaus king of Sparta.
the yuddh is ek of the sabase mahatvapurn kaarykram in unani mythology and rai maharoom narrated through anek works of Greek literature, sabase notably through homer 's elliod or the Odyssey.
The elliod relates a part of the last saal of the siege of troy ; the odissi describes Odysseus 's yatra ghar.
anya parts of the yuddh hai contained in a cycle of epic kavitaayen, which have batch through fragments.
apisod isse the yuddh provided saamagree liye unani tragedy or anya works of Greek sahitya, or liye roman poets sahit Virgil or ovid.
the yuddh originated isse a jhagada between the goddesses athena, hera, or Aphrodite, after eris, the devi of sangharsh or anban, gave unhen a sunahari tehraana, sometimes known as the Apple of Discord, chihnit `` for the fairest ''.
zeeus sent the deviyaan to Paris, jo judged ki aphrodite, as the `` fairest '', chahie praapt the tehraana.
in exchange, aphrodite made hellen, the sabase khubasurat of sab mahilaon or bivi of menelaus, patan in love saath Paris, jo took uske to Troy.
agamemnon, king of Mycenae or the bhai of hellen 's husband Menelaus, led an expedition of Achaean sainikon to Troy and besieged the city liye ten saalo kuki of paris ' beijjati.
After the deaths of many heroes, including the Achaeans achilles and ajaks, or the trogence hectares or Paris, the city giri to the ruse of the trojan ghoda.
The achaeans slaughtered the Trojans ( magar for kuch of the mahilaon or children whom ve rakhaa or bechi as slave ) or desecrated the mandiron, yun earning the gods ' prakope.
few of the achaeans returned sakushal to unke homes and anek founded colonies in dur shores.
the romans baad traced unke origin to aeneas, ek of the Trojans, jo thi kaha to have led the surviving trogence to modern-day italy.
the pracheen unaniyon vichaar that the Trojan yuddh was a historical event ki tha liya place in the 13th or 12th sadi bc, or believed ki troy thi located in modern-day turkon nikat the dardanelles.
By aadhunik times, dono the war or the nagar were widely believed to be non-historical.
in 1868, however, the German archaeologist heinrich Schliemann mili frank calvert, jo kaayal schliemann ki troy was at hissarlik and Schliemann took over calvert 's excavations on property belonging to calvert ; is arji is abhi accepted by sabase vidwaanon.
whether vahin is koi historical vaastaviktaa behind the trojan War is an open sawaal.
Many vidwaanon believe ki vahin is a historical kor to the tail, though is may simply ausat that the homeric stories hai a sanlayan of various tales of sieges and rijhaane by misinian unaniyon during the kaansya Age.
those who maananaa ki the kahaniyaan of the trojan yuddh hai niklaa from a specific aitihaasik virodh praayah tithi it to the 12th or 11th sadiyaan BC, often preferring the tithiyaan die by iratosthaniz, 1194–1184 bc, which roughly corresponds saath puraatatv evidence of a catastrophic burning of troy viia.
anarchists have employed certain pratikon liye their kaaran, sahit sabase prominently the circle-a or the blike dhvaj, although anarchists have historically largely asweekrut the mahatv of symbols to rajnatik gati.
chunki the punaruddhar of araajaktaavaad around the prarambh of the 21st-century sanyukt saath the vruddhi of the anti-globalization gati, araajaktaavaadi saanskrithik pratikon are widely present.
The vrihad palatine kanal ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a dyodhi in the kapaal ki transmits the vrihad palatine dhamni, rag, or tantrika between the pterygopalatine fossa and the maukhik guha.
sataha taapmaana of antarctic in winter or garmiyaan isse the europea kendra liye medium-range Weather forecasts
the jalwaayu of antarctic is the coldest on the puure of dharti.
antarctic has the lowest naturally occurring taapmaana kabhi ankit on the maidan on Earth : −89.2 °c ( −128.6 °f ) at Vostok Station.
it is also extremely dry ( technically a marusthal ), averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of varshan prati year.
bhi so, on sabase parts of the mahadweep the him rarely melts or is eventually sampidit to become the glacial barf ki makes up the barf chadar.
Weather fronts rarely penetrate far into the continent.
sabase of antarctic rai an barf cap jalwaayu ( köppen ef ) saath bahut cold, generally atyadhik shushk mausam throughout the saal and no month averaging upar 0 °C ( 32 °f ).
kuch frinz tateey kshetron have a tundra jalwaayu ( köppen et ) saath a choti garmiyaan averaging above jamane, and much ucchtar varshan.
vartmaan sir coach mike Tomlin, dauraan the 2007 season
the pittsburg stilers franchise has tha 16 sir coach throughout iske itihaas.
santhaapit as the Pittsburgh pirates in, the naam thi badla to the Steelers prior to the ritu to celebrate the nagar 's heritage of producing steel.
jo Bach parosa do separate sharten as head coach or walt kiesling served three pruthak terms.
dauraan the or sizan, due to the raashi of khilaadi jo ladaa in sansar yuddh ii, the Steelers sanyukt unke toli saath philadelphia or Chicago, kramshah.
dauraan ye sizan, Steelers ' coach Walt kiesling saajha coaching kartavya with Greasy neale and phil Handler, jo have nahin maharoom shaamil bheetar is list.

in, antargat Sutherland, the Steelers nibhaai their pehla playoff khel viruddh the philadelphia Eagles.
Ten of the 16 sir coach kharch their sampurna professional coaching careers saath the matadhikaar, including John mcnally, Walt Kiesling and chak noll, jo have bhi maharoom voted into the Pro footbaal Hall of kirti.
ek of tabhi four men to coach the vahi team for 23 years, chak noll ritred in.
noll is bhi the only coach in neshnal footbaal League itihaas to jeet chaar Super pyaale.
