in dand vidhi, dhokhadhadi is jaanboojhkar deception bana liye nijee laabh or to damage another individual ; the sambandhit kriyasheel is beyimaan, or kriya is defraud.
dhokhadhadi is a aparaadhon or a civil vidhi violation, though the specific criminal vidhi definition varies by vidhik kshetradhikaar.
Defrauding logon or entities of dhan or valuables is a aam purpose of fraud.
A hoax bhi involves deception, lakin without the iraade of laabh or of damaging or depriving the shikaar.
dhokhadhadi is a defense in a civil karrwai for breach of anubandh or vishisht pradarshan of a anubandh.
dhokhadhadi is a basis liye nishpaksh kshetradhikaar.
Passover, or pesach ( isse : in yahudee, yahudee ), tiberian :, aadhunik yahudee : /ˈpesaχ/ pesah, pesakh, Yiddish : peysekh, Paysakh, paysokh ) is an mahatvapurn biblically -derived yahudee festival.
historically, together saath shavuot ( `` Pentecost '' ) or sukkot ( `` jhopadiyon '' ), passover is one of the three yatraaen festivals ( shalosh regalim ) during jisase the sampurna janasankhyikee of the kingdom of yahuda bana a yatraaen to the Temple in jerusalem.
Samaritans still mek is pilgrimage to Mount gerizim, lakin tabhi main participate in public ibaadat.
passover commences on the 15th of the Hebrew maah of nisan or lasts liye either saat dinon ( in Israel ) or aath days ( in the diaspora ).
In Judaism, a din commences at sandhya and lasts jabatak the following sandhya, thus the pehla day of passover tabhi begins baad sandhya of the 14th of nisan or ends at sandhya of the 15th din of the maah of nisan.
the sanskaar adwitiya to the passover jashn commence saath the passover seder jab the 15th of nisan rai begun.
in the Northern Hemisphere passover takes place in vasant as the tora prescribes it : `` in the month of [ the ] vasant '' ( בחדש האביב ).
it is ek of the sabase widely observed Jewish holidays.
the yahudee people celebrate passover as a commemoration of their liberation over 3,300 saalo pehle by parameshwar isse gulaami in pracheen mishra ki thi ruled by the pharaohs, or unke janam as a swadesh antargat the netritv of musa.
It commemorates the story of the exodus as varnit in the yahudee bible especially in the Book of exodus, in jisase the israelites yahood freed from gulaami in mishra.
in the narrative of the exodus, the bible tells ki parameshwar helped the Children of israel escape isse unke gulaami in mishra by inflicting ten plagues upon the pracheen unhone before the Pharaoh would relies uske israelite slave ; the dasavaan or worst of the plagues was the death of the mishra first-born.
the israelites yahood instructed to chihnit the doorposts of unke gharon saath the rakt of a slaughtered vasant memne and, upon dekhakar is, the spirit of the rab knew to pass over the first-born in ye gharon, hence the naam of the avkaash.
There is kuch bahes over jahaan the pad is actually niklaa from.
When the Pharaoh freed the israelites, it is kaha that ve left in aise a hurry ki they could nahin intjaar for bread dough to rise ( leaven ).
in commemoration, for the avadhi of Passover no leavened bread is khaaya, for jisase kaaran it is called `` the Festival of the unleavened bread ''.
Thus matzo ( flat unleavened bread ) is khaaya dauraan passover or it is a pratik of the avkaash.
heley 's dhoomaketu or dhoomaketu heley ( or ), officially designated 1P/Halley, is the best-known of the short-period dhoomaketuon and is visible isse dharti prayek 75–76 years.
heley is the only short-period dhoomaketu ki is clearly drishy to the nagn najar isse dharti, and thus the tabhi naked-eye dhoomaketu ki might appear twice in a insaan aaajeevan.
anya naked-eye comets may be ujjwal or adhik spectacular, but hoga appear tabhi ekbar in thousands of years.
heley 's returns to the bhitari saura pranali have maharoom observed or recorded by astronomers chunki at tanik 240 bce.
saaf record of the comet 's dikhaave were made by Chinese, babylonian, and madhyakaalin European chroniclers, lakin yahood nahin pahachaanaa as reappearances of the same object at the samay.
The comet 's periodicity thi first determined in 1705 by English astronomer edmond heley, baad jisko it is abhi named.
heley 's dhoomaketu last appeared in the inner saura System in 1986 or will aglaa appear in mid-2061.
dauraan its 1986 apparition, Halley became the pehla dhoomaketu to be observed in detail by spacecraft, providing the pehla observational aankada on the dhaancha of a dhoomaketu cendrak or the mechanism of coma or tail formation.
ye observations supported a kramank of longstanding hypotheses about dhoomaketu nirmaan, visheshkar Fred Whipple 's `` ganda snowball '' model, jisase correctly predicted that heley hota be rachit of a mishran of volatile ices – such as jal, carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dhul.
the mishan also provided data jisase substantially reformed or reconfigured ye vichaar ; for udhaaharan it is abhi samajha ki heley 's sataha is largely rachit of dusty, non-volatile saamagree, or ki only a choti portion of it is icy.
Anti-communism is vipaksh to samyavaadee.
Organized anti-communism developed in pratikriya to the rise of samyavaadee, visheshkar baad the 1917 aktubar kranti in rus or reaching vaishvik dimensions during the thanda War.
sabase anti-communists asweekrut the avadharana of aitihaasik materialism, jisase is a central vichaar in Marxism.
anti-communists asweekrut the marxvaadi vishwaas ki poonjeevaad will be followed by samaajawaadee or communism, bas as feudalism thi followed by capitalism.
Anti-communists sawaal the vaid of the marxvaadi arji that the socialist rajya will `` wither dur '' jab it becomes anaavashyak in a true communist samaaj.
anti-communists argue ki the daman in the jaldi years of Bolshevik niyam, jabaki not as charam as ki dauraan Joseph Stalin 's niyam, was still kathor by uchit maanakon, citing udhaaharan aise as felics dzerzhinsky 's rahasy police, jisase eliminated numerous rajnatik pratidwandviyon by extrajudicial executions, or the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt vidroh or tambov vidroh.
Some anti-communists refer to both samyavaadee or fascism as sarvasattawad, dekhakar samanta between the actions of communist or phacist sarkarein.
Historian robert conquest rai argued ki Communism was jimmedaar liye tens of lakho of deaths dauraan the 20th sadi.
pratidwandviyon argue ki communist partiyon ki have come to shakti have tended to be rigidly ashishnu of rajnatik vipaksh.
ye pratidwandviyon arji ki sabase communist deshon have shown no signs of advancing isse marks 's samaajawaadee stage of arthvyavastha to an adarsh communist stage.
balki, communist sarkarein have maharoom abhiyukt of creating a new ruling class ( a nomenklatura ), saath powers or privileges vrihad than those previously enjoyed by the apper varg in the non- communist regimes.
gil Heron ( 9 april 1922 – 27 November 2008 ) was a Jamaican peshewar footballer.

the soyabean ( us ) or soya saim ( uk ) ( Glycine adhiktam ) is a species of legume deshi to east asia, widely grown liye iske khaadya saim jisase rai numerous upyog.
the plant is classed as an oilseed balki than a pulse by the un khaanaa or agricultural Organization ( FAO ).
fat-free ( defatted ) soyabean bhojan is a significant or cheap sorce of protein liye animal feeds and anek prepackaged meals ; soya sabzi aayal is another product of prasanskaran the soyabean crop.
liye example, soyabean utpaada such as textured sabzi protein ( TVP ) hai ingredients in anek meat or dugdh analogues.
Soybeans produce significantly more protein per acre than sabase anya upyog of jameen.
paramparaagat nonfermented khaanaa uses of soybeans shaamil soy milk, or isse the latter tofu and tofu skin.
Fermented bhojan shaamil soya sos, fermented saim paste, natto, or tempeh, among anya.
the aayal is prayukt in anek audyogic anuprayog.
the main nirmaataa of soya hai the sanyukt rajya ( 35 % ), brazil ( 27 % ), argentina ( 19 % ), China ( 6 % ) or india ( 4 % ).
The saim contain significant amounts of phytic acid, alpha-linolenic acid, and isoflavones.

ghat is the husband of actress Calista Flockhart.
a tub of chapstick
chapstick is a brands naam for lip balm manufactured by fizer upabhokta healthcare or prayukt in anek deshon vishwavyaapee.
it is intended to sahaayta daavat and prevent chapped hoth ; hence the naam.
anek varieties bhi include sanscreen in anukram to prevent sunburn.
Due to iske popularity, the pad rai become a genericized trademark.
it popularly refers to koi lip balm contained in a lipstick-style tub and applied in the vahi manner as lipstick.
however, the pad is still a panjikrut trademark, saath adhikaron exclusively swaamitv by Pfizer.
in sweden or in the United kingdom, the utpaada 's pramukh competitor is lypsyl, bana by Novartis Consumer swasthya, jisase is distributed in similar packaging to chapstick.
George Berkeley ( ; 12 kooch 168514 janvari 1753 ), bhi gyaat as bishap barkali ( Bishop of Cloyne ), thi an Anglo-Irish paras jinaki praathmik uplabdhi thi the advancement of a theory he pukaara `` immaterialism '' ( baad referred to as `` subjective idealism `` by anya ).
is siddhanth denies the astitv of material substance or bajaay contends ki parichit vastuen jaise tables and chairs hai tabhi ideas in the minds of perceivers, or as a parinaam can nahin maujuud without hone perceived.
yun, as Berkeley famously put it, for shaareerik vastuen `` esse est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be abhas `` ).
barkali is bhi gyaat for uske critique of abstraction, an mahatvapurn aadhaar in his argument liye immaterialism.
In 1709, Berkeley published uske pehla pramukh kaary,, in jisase he discussed the simaaen of human vision or unnat the theory ki the uchit vastuen of sight are not saamagree vastuen, lakin lite or colour.
is foreshadowed his chief philosophical kaary a treatise Concerning the Principles of Human gyaan in 1710 jisase, baad iske garib reception, he rewrote in samvaad rup or published under the title teen Dialogues between hylas and philonous in 1713.
In is book, Berkeley 's drishy yahood represented by philonous ( unani : 'premantr of dimag ' ), while Hylas ( Greek : 'mattker ' ) embodies the irish thinker’s pratidwandviyon, in particular John Locke.
barkali argued against sar ishaq newton 's doctrine of nirpeksh spes, time or motion in De Motu ( on gati ), prakashit 1721.
uske vitark yahood a precursor to the views of mach or oinstin.
in 1732, he prakashit alciphron, a Christian apologetic viruddh the free-thinkers, or in 1734, he prakashit the vishleshak, an empiricist critique of the muladhar of infinitesimal calculus, jisase thi influential in the vikaas of ganit.
uske pichhlaa pramukh philosophical kaary, Siris ( 1744 ), begins by vakaalat the aushadhiy upyog of tarkol jal, and tab continues to discuss a wide dayera of vishay sahit vigyaan, philosophy, and theology.
byaaj in barkali 's kaary increased baad sansar War ii, kuki he tackled anek of the mudde of sarvopari interest to darshanashastra in the 20th century such as the samasyaayein of perception, the antar between praathmik or dwitiyak qualities, or the mahatv of language.

iske nirmit up area, bana of 6 urban jile and 4 county-level cities, is ghar to parichay 4,896,000 nivaasiyon in 2010.
it simaayen yantai to the purvottar, weifang to the west or rizhao to the dakshinpaschim.
Qīng ( ) in chinis arthath `` green '' or `` raseele '', jabaki dǎo ( ) means `` dweep ''.

It is bhi the site of the tsingtao brewery.

mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single pahachaanaa prajati namit acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( apmv ), or is a group of phylogenetically related vishaal virus ( designated praayah mimin ).
in colloquial vaak, apmv is more commonly referred to as bas `` mimivirus ''.
jabatak aktubar 2011, jab a larger virus megavirus chilensis thi varnit, it tha the largest capsid diameter of sab gyaat virus.
Mimivirus rai a vishaal or jatil genome compared saath most other viruses.
Mimivirus, choti liye `` mimicking microbe '', is so pukaara to pratibimbit its large aakaar or apparent gram-staining gun.
the mexican yuddh of swatantraaa ( 1810–1821 ) was an hathiyaarband virodh between the logon of mexico or the spani colonial adhikariyon which prarambh on September 16, 1810.
the gati, which became gyaat as the mexican yuddh of Independence, thi led by mexican-born spaniards, Mestizos or amerindians jo sought independence isse spain.
It prarambh as an idealistic peasants ' vidroh viruddh their aupniveshik masters, but ended as an asambhavit gathbandhan between mexican ex-royalists and mexican chhapamar insurgents.
crohn 's beemaari, bhi known as crohn syndrome or regional enteritis, is a prakaar of jalan bowel disease ki may affect koi part of the gastrointestinal tract isse munh to anus, causing a wide kismein of symptoms.
it primarily causes abdominal pidaa, atisar ( jisase may be khooni if sujan is at its worst ), vomiting ( can be nirantar ), or vazan loss, lakin may also kaaran jatiltaaon outside the gastrointestinal tract such as skin rashes, gathiya, inflammation of the najar, thakaan, or kami of visheshgyata.
crohn 's beemaari is caused by interactions between paryaavarniya, immunological and bacterial karkon in genetically susceptible individuals.
is parinaam in a dirghakaalik jalan vikaar, in which the body 's pratiraksha pranali attacks the jathrantra tract sambhawatah nirdeshit at sookshmjaivik antigens.
crohn 's beemaari has wrongly maharoom varnit as an autoimmune disease in the past ; recent jaanchakartaaon have varnit it as an pratiraksha kamiyaan state.
There is a genetic association saath crohn 's beemaari, primarily saath visangatiyaan of the nod2 jin or its protein, jisase hosh bacterial cell deevaaren.
sahodar of prabhavit individuals hai at ucchtar risk.
Males or mahilaon hai baraabar prabhavit.
smokers hai do times more likely to develop Crohn 's beemaari than nonsmokers.
crohn 's beemaari affects between 400,000 and 600,000 logon in North america.
vyapaktaa estimates liye uttari europea have ranged isse 27–48 prati 100,000.
crohn 's beemaari tends to present initially in the kishor or twenties, saath another peak incidence in the fifties to seventies, haalanki the disease can occur at koi aayu.
vahin is no gyaat pharmaceutical or surgical ilaaj for crohn 's beemaari.
Treatment options are pratibandhit to controlling lakshan, maintaining remission, or preventing relapse.
the disease thi namit baad gastroenterologist burrill barnard Crohn, who, in 1932, saath saath do other colleagues at mount sinai hospital in New york, varnit a shrenee of marijon saath sujan of the terminal ileum, the area sabase commonly prabhavit by the illness.

sabase of the saamagree on YouTube rai maharoom aplod by individuals, although media corporations sahit sibies, the bibisi, vevo, hulu, or anya sanghathan prastaav kuch of unke saamagree via the sait, as bhaag of the YouTube saajhedaari kaarykram.
apnjikrut upayokta can watch videos, jabaki panjikrut upayokta can aplod an aseemit number of videos.

Microsoft directex is a sangrahan of anuprayog programing antarfalak ( api ) for handling kaary related to multimedia, visheshkar game programing and video, on microsoft plateform.
originally, the names of these APIs sab began saath Direct, aise as direct3d, directdraw, directmusic, directplay, directsound, and so forth.
the naam DirectX thi coined as ashulipi pad liye sab of ye APIs ( the x khadaa in liye the particular api names ) or jald became the naam of the sangrahan.
When Microsoft baad niyat out to develop a gaming consol, the x was prayukt as the basis of the naam exbox to indicate that the consol thi aadhaarit on directex praudyogiki.
the X aarambhik has maharoom carried aage in the namakaran of APIs designed for the Xbox aise as xinput and the Cross-platform audio Creation aujaar ( xact ), jabaki the directex pattern rai been jari liye khidkiyaan APIs such as direct2d and DirectWrite.
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics api bheetar DirectX ) is widely used in the vikaas of video khel liye Microsoft Windows, Microsoft exbox, microsoft Xbox 360 or kuch sega dreamcast khel.
direct3d is also prayukt by anya tantra anuprayog liye kalpana or graphics tasks aise as cad/cam engineering.
as direct3d is the sabase widely publicized component of DirectX, it is aam to dekhie the names `` directex '' and `` direct3d '' prayukt interchangeably.
the directex tantra development kit ( SDK ) consists of runtime libraries in redistributable shabdkosh rup, saath saath accompanying dastavezikaran or headers for upyog in koding.
originally, the runtimes yahood tabhi installed by khel or explicitly by the user.
khidkiyaan 95 kiya not launch saath directex, but directex thi shaamil saath khidkiyaan 95 oem seva relies 2.
khidkiyaan 98 or Windows nt 4.0 dono shipped saath directex, as rai prayek version of Windows released since.
the sdk is uplabdhiyaan as a free downlod.
While the runtimes are malikana, closed-source tantra, sorce code is provided liye most of the SDK samples.
starting saath the relies of khidkiyaan 8 Developer purvavlokan, directex sdk rai maharoom ekikrut into khidkiyaan sdk.
direct3d 9ex, direct3d 10, or direct3d 11 hai tabhi uplabdhiyaan for khidkiyaan vista or nae kuki each of ye nai sanskaran was nirmit to nirbhar upon the nai Windows Display driver model that was introduced for Windows Vista.
The new vista/wddm graphics vaastukala includes a new video memory manager supporting abhasikaran of graphics hardware liye vibhinn anuprayog or services jaise the desktop khidki manager.
quetzaltenango, bhi commonly gyaat by iske indigenous name, xelajú, or adhik commonly, xela, is the duusari largest city of guatemala.

It rai an anumaanit janasankhyikee of 224,703.

The apik of Gilgamesh, an apik kavita from mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of sahitya.
The saahitiyik itihaas of gilgamesh begins saath paanch swatantra sumerian kavitaayen about 'bilgamesh ' ( sumerian liye gilgamesh ), king of uruk.
chaar of these were prayukt as source saamagree for a combined apik in akkadi.
is pehla sanyukt apik, gyaat as the `` boodha babylonian '' sanskaran, tithiyaan to the 18th sadi bc or is titled baad its incipit, shūtur eli sharrī ( `` surpassing sab anya kings '' ).
tabhi a few fragments of it have survived.
the baad `` maanak Babylonian '' sanskaran tithiyaan isse the 13th to the 10th sadiyaan bc or bears the incipit sha naqba īmuru ( `` he who dekhi the Deep '' ).
fragments of lagbhag do tihaai of this longer, twelve-tablet version have maharoom recovered.
Some of the best nakal yahood khoja in the pustakaalayon tabah of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king ashurbanipal.
the story centers on a dosti between Gilgamesh or enkidu.
enkidu is a wild man nirmit by the devataaon as Gilgamesh 's baraabar to distract use from oppressing the logon of uruk.
saath, ve yatra to the deodaar pahaad to shikast humbaba, its monstrous sangrakshak.
baad ve maar the sand of Heaven, jisase the devi Ishtar sends to sajaa gilgamesh for spurning uske agrim.
As a dand for ye kriyaayein, the devataaon vaakya Enkidu to death.
the second half of the apik focuses on gilgamesh 's takalif at Enkidu 's maut, or uske quest liye amartv.
in anukram to sikh the rahasy of anant jivan, gilgamesh undertakes a long or perilous yatra.
He learns that `` the jivan ki tum are seeking you hoga never find.
jab the devataaon nirmit man ve allotted to him death, lakin life ve retained in their apana keeping. ''
is uddhran thi originally attributed to Siduri in the boodha Babylonian version of the apik, or tab attributed to the amar baadh nayika Utnapishtim in the akkadi version of the epic.
nevertheless, gilgamesh 's fame jiya on baad uske maut, because of uske great bhawan projects, or uske khaataa of kayaa utnapishtim bataai use happened during the baadh.
the story rai been translated into anek alag languages, or Gilgamesh has since become adapted in works of lokapriy fiction.
vahin hai numerous debates over jo created the first video game, saath the jawaab depending largely on kaisaa video games are defined.
The evolution of video khel represents a tangled web of anek alag udyog, including scientific, computer, arcade, or upabhokta electronics.
The `` video '' in `` video khel `` traditionally refers to a raster display yantra.
saath the lokapriy kaich phrase upyog of the term `` video khel '', the pad abhi implies sab pradarshak types, formats, or plateform.
itihaaskaaron have also sought to bypass the issue by bajaay using the adhik specific `` digital khel '' varnanaatmak.
This pad leaves out the pehle analog-based computer khel.
is is a suchi of best-selling video khel franchises ki have sold or shipped at least 5 lakh nakal.
jabatak varanaa stated, sankhyaayein indicate vishwavyaapee ikai sold, ordered alphabetically whenever two or more list the vahi raashi.
the excepshan hai the ones specifying shipment, which have nimnatar purvata than others listing bikri.
Franchise sales shaamil vistaar packs bhi though they hai not mana puraa video games.
liye best-selling vyaktigat video games, dekhie suchi of best-selling video khel.
the bikri aankade die neeche do not shaamil arched khel bikri, which can be mila at List of highest-grossing arched video games.
– is rang indicates a sub-series of a larger video khel matadhikaar.
is karata not necessarily lagu liye shrenee ki are nahin video game-based.

Ann Richards thi the duusari maadaa governor of Texas.
aankada Execution Prevention ( DEP ) is a security visheshta shaamil in aadhunik oparating pranaaliyon.
it is known to be uplabdhiyaan in Linux, Mac OS X, ioes, microsoft Windows or android oparating pranaaliyon or is intended to prevent an application or service isse nishpadit code isse a non-executable memory pradesh.
is helps prevent nishchit karname ki store code via a bafar overflow, for example.
dep ranon in do mods : hardware-enforced dep liye cpu ki can chihnit memory prishthon as nonexecutable, or software-enforced DEP saath simit suraksha for cpu ki do nahin have hardware support.
software-enforced dep karata nahin protect viruddh execution of code in aankada prishthon, but instead counters seh overwrite, another prakaar of akraman.
dep thi introduced on linaks in 2004 ( karnel 2.6.8 ), on khidkiyaan in 2004 saath khidkiyaan xp seva Pack 2, jabaki tehraana introduced dep when they sthanantarit to x86 in 2006.
udhaaharan udhaaharan of do aam futanari variants
, is the japani word liye hermaphroditism, which is bhi prayukt in a broader bhav liye androgyny.
Beyond Japan the pad is prayukt to describe a commonly pornographic vidha of computer khel, comics or anemation, jisase includes characters that show both primary yon characteristics.
But in today 's language it refers almost exclusively liye characters jo have an overall feminine rup.
In that case the pad is bhi praayah abbreviated as futa ( s ), jisase is occasionally bhi prayukt as pad for the works itself.
Early CAPTCHAs aise as these, generated by the ez-gimpy kaarykram, yahood used on yahuu !
a modern CAPTCHA, balki than attempting to banaaen a distorted prishthbhumi and unchi levels of warping on the text, might focus on bananaa segmentation mushkil by adding an angled lakeer.
another rasta to mek segmentation mushkil is to crowd symbols saath, as in yahuu ! 's vartmaan captcha format.
Some CAPTCHAs koshish to utilize the kshamta of people to dekhie three-dimensional vastuen.
on this image, symbols are drawn saath lines of alag motaai to make an prabhaav of extrusion.
a captcha ( ) is a prakaar of challenge-response pareekshan prayukt in computing as an attempt to ensure that the response is generated by a insaan hone.
the process praayah involves a computer puche a upayokta to puraa a simple pareekshan which the computer is samarth to grad.
ye pareekshan hai designed to be aasaan for a computer to generate lakin mushkil for a computer to solve, lakin again aasaan liye a insaan.
if a sahi solution is praapt, it can be presumed to have maharoom daalaa by a insaan.
a aam prakaar of CAPTCHA requires the upayokta to prakaar akshar and/or ank isse a distorted chitra ki appears on the screen.
aise pareekshan hai commonly used to prevent anaavashyak antarjaal bots isse accessing websiton, chunki a saamaanya human can easily padhaa a captcha, jabaki the bot can nahin process the chitra akshar or isliye, can nahin jawaab properly, or at all.
haalanki most CAPTCHAs are akshar tasviren randomly utpann, many of unhen have become difficult even for a insaan to padhaa, so chitra captchas yahood created in jisase a human is dikhaaya a saral pareekshan to show a chitra of a certain animal ( die few animal tasviren ), jisase is saral for a insaan being to prakram, and therefore aasaan to pick, jabaki a bot can not process and solve the sawaal because although it can analyze the chitra, it can nahin easily guess the animal.
The pad `` captcha '' thi coined in 2000 by louis von Ahn, manuel Blum, nicholas J. hoper, or John langford ( sab of Carnegie Mellon University ).
it is an echronim based on the word `` capchar '' or khadaa liye `` Completely Automated public turing pareekshan to tell computer or insaano alaava ''.
carnegi mellon vishvavidhyalayon attempted to trademark the term on 15 aktubar 2004, but the trademark anuprayog thi abandoned on 21 april 2008.
a captcha is sometimes varnit as a reverse turing pareekshan, kuki it is administered by a machine and targeted at a insaan, in contrast to the maanak turing test ki is typically administered by a insaan and targeted at a yantra.
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly known in angrezi as zaak cousteau ; 11 june 1910 – 25 june 1997 ) thi a french naval officer, explorer, conservationist, filmkaar, innovator, scientist, photographer, lekhak or researcher jo padhai the samudr or sab form of jivan in water.
he co-developed the aqua-lung, pioneered samudri sangrakshan or thi a sadsy of the académie française.
KFC ( kentki Fried murga ) is a tej food restaraan kadi headquartered in Louisville, kentki, United rajya, jisase specializes in fried murga.
an `` American pratik '', it is the sansar 's duusari largest restaurant kadi overall ( as measured by sales ) baad mcdonald 's, saath over 18,000 outlet in 120 deshon and territories.
The company is a subsidiary of yama !
Brands, a restaurant company jisase bhi owns pizza Hut or taco ghanti.
keeffsi was founded by harland sanders, who began selling fried murga isse uske roadside restaraan in Corbin, kentki dauraan the great avsaad.
sanders was ek of the pehla logon to dekhie the potential of the restaraan franchising avadharana, with the pehla `` kentki fried Chicken '' matadhikaar kholane in Utah in 1952.
The matadhikaar popularized murga in the tej food udyog, thereby diversifying the market and challenging the dabadabaa of the hamburger.
vipanan khud as `` karnal sanders '', he became a legendary figure of amareeki cultural itihaas, or his chitra is still prominently prayukt in keeffsi branding.
the company 's rapid vistaar dekhi it grow too vishaal liye sanders to manage, and in 1964 he bechi the company to a group of niveshkon led by jon y. bhura, jr. or joker massey.
keeffsi thi ek of the pehla tej khaanaa chains to vistaar internationally, kholane outlet in England, mexico and Puerto rico by the mid-1960s.
Throughout the 1970s or 1980s, keeffsi experienced mishrit fortunes domestically, as it gai through a shrenee of corporate owners who tha choti or no anubhav in the restaurant kaarobaar.
in the early 1970s, KFC was bechi to the atmaaon kad heublein, jo yahood liya over by the R.J. reynolds food or tambaaku sangutica, jo bechi the kadi to PepsiCo.
The kadi jari to expand videshi however, and in 1987 keeffsi became the first pashchimi restaraan kadi to kholen in china.
The chain rai chunki vistaarit rapidly in china, or the country is abhi the company 's sabase laabhprad market.
pepsico spun band iske restaraan prabhag as Tricon vaishvik Restaurants, jisase later badla iske name to yama !
brands.
KFC primarily bikta fried chicken tukade or visangatiyaan aise as murga sandwiches or wraps, salad or side bartan aise as french friese or coleslaw, desserts or naram peya, praayah supplied by pepsico.
Its most famous product is dabaav fried murga tukade, seasoned saath sanders ' `` asli racippi '' of 11 herbs or masaale.
The sateek prakruti of ye sanghatak is unknown, or represents a notable trade rahasy.
Larger portions of fried murga hai served in a distinctive gatta `` baaltee '', which rai become a hastakshar of the kadi chunki being introduced by franchisee peet Harman.
KFC is prasiddh liye the slogan `` ungali lickin ' shubh '', jisase rai since maharoom replaced by `` Nobody does chicken jaise keeffsi '' or `` so shubh ''.
Cnidaria ( with a mook c ) or Coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 prajati of pashu mila exclusively in jaleey and zyaadaatar samudri environments.
unke distinguishing visheshta is cnidocytes, specialized koshikaayen ki they upyog mainly for capturing shikaar.
unke laashen consist of mesoglea, a non-living jelly-like padaarth, sandwiched between do layers of epithelium that hai zyaadaatar ek cell motaa.
They have two moulik deh form : tairaaki medusae or sthanbaddh polyps, both of jisase hai radially symmetrical saath mouths ghiri by tentacles ki bhaaluu cnidocytes.
dono form have a single orifice and deh guha ki hai prayukt liye digestion or respiration.
anek cnidarian species produce colonies ki are single jeevon rachit of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids, or dono.
Cnidarians ' activities hai samanvit by a vikendrit tantrika jaal and saral receptors.
anek free-swimming cubozoa or Scyphozoa possess balance-sensing statocysts, or kuch have saral ankhen.
nahin sab cnidarians reproduce sexually.
Many have jatil lifecycles saath alangik polyp charan and sexual medusae, lakin kuch omit either the polyp or the medusa stage.
cnidarians yahood for a long time grouped with ctenophores in the phylum coelenterata, lakin increasing awareness of their differences caused unhen to be placed in pruthak phyla.
Cnidarians are vargeekrut into four pramukh groups : the lagbhag wholly sthanbaddh Anthozoa ( samudr anemones, corals, samudr pens ) ; tairaaki scyphozoa ( jellyfish ) ; cubozoa ( box jellies ) ; or hydrozoa, a vividh samooh ki shaamil sab the freshwater cnidarians as khub as many samudri form, or has both sessile sadasyon such as hydra and colonial swimmers aise as the portugali man o ' War.
staurozoa have recently maharoom recognised as a class in unke apana sahi balki than a sub-group of Scyphozoa, or vahin is bahes parichay whether Myxozoa or polypodiozoa hai cnidarians or kareeb to bilaterians ( more jatil animals ).
Most cnidarians shikaar on jeevon ranging in aakaar from plavak to animals several times larger than themselves, lakin anek obtain much of unke poshan isse endosymbiotic shaiwal, or a few are parasites.
anek are preyed upon by anya pashu including starfish, samudr slugs, machhlee or tertels.
muunga reefs, whose polyps are samrudh in endosymbiotic algae, support some of the sansar 's sabase productive ecosystems, and protect vanaspati in tidal zones or on shorelines isse damdaar currents and tides.
While corals hai lagbhag entirely pratibandhit to warm, uthle samudri waters, anya cnidarians sajiv in the depths, in dhruviya samandar or in freshwater.
Fossil cnidarians have been found in rox formed parichay, or other fossils dikhaaen that corals may have maharoom upasthit shortly pehle and diversified a few million saalo baad.
Fossils of cnidarians ki do nahin build mineralized structures hai bahut rare.
vaigyanikon philhal think that cnidarians, ctenophores or bilaterians hai adhik closely sambandhit to calcareous sponges than ye hai to anya sponges, or that anthozoans are the vikasvaadi `` aunts '' or `` bahanon '' of other cnidarians, and the sabase closely sambandhit to bilaterians.
haal analyses have concluded that cnidarians, haalanki mana adhik `` aadim '' than bilaterians, have a wider range of genes.
The Aztec Pyramid at st. cecilia Acatitlan, Mexico State.
azetek jed mukhauta depicting the god xipe totec.
Large ceremic statue of an Aztec tribhuj Warrior
azetek cosmogram in the pre-hispanic codex fejérváry-mayer - the aag parameshwar Xiuhtecuhtli is in the bich.
the Aztec logon yahood nishchit ethnic samooh of central mexico, particularly those groups jo spoke the navatal bhashaa and jo dominated vishaal bhaag of mesamerica isse the 14th to 16th sadiyaan.
the navatal shabd aztecatl ( ekvachan ) or aztecah ( plural ) ausat `` people isse aztlan ``, a puranic place liye the nahuatl-speaking culture of the time, or baad apanaaya as the shabd to define the Mexica logon.
praayah the pad `` Aztec '' refers exclusively to the mexica logon of tenochtitlan ( now the sthaan of Mexico City ), situated on an island in Lake texcoco, who referred to themselves as Mexica tenochca or Cōlhuah mexica.
sometimes the pad bhi includes the nivaasiyon of tenochtitlan 's two principal allied city-states, the Acolhuas of Texcoco or the tepanecs of tlacopan, jo saath saath the Mexica formed the azetek Triple gathbandhan which niyantrit kayaa is often known as `` the azetek samrajya ''.
In anya contexts, azetek may refer to sab the vibhinn city rajya or unke peoples, jo saajha vishaal bhaag of unke ethnic history or cultural traits saath the Mexica, Acolhua or Tepanecs, and who praayah bhi prayukt the navatal bhashaa as a lingua franca.
In is meaning it is sambhavit to baat about an azetek sabhyataa sahit sab the particular saanskrithik pattern common for sabase of the peoples inhabiting central mexico in the let postclassic kaal.
isse the 13th sadi, the ghati of mexico was the dil of Aztec sabhyataa : here the capital of the Aztec Triple gathbandhan, the nagar of tenochtitlan, thi nirmit upon raised ilet in jhil texcoco.
The tripal gathbandhan formed a upanadi samrajya expanding iske rajnatik hegemony far beyond the ghati of mexico, conquering anya nagar rajya throughout Mesoamerica.
At iske pinnacle, azetek culture had samrudh or jatil mythological or dharmik paramparaon, as khub as reaching ullekhneey architectural or kalakaari accomplishments.
in 1521 hernán cortés, saath saath a vishaal number of Nahuatl speaking indigenous allies, conquered tenochtitlan or parajeet the azetek Triple gathbandhan antargat the leadership of hueyi tlatoani Moctezuma ii.
subsequently the spani founded the nai upnivesh of Mexico nagar on the sait of the ruined Aztec puunji, from where they proceeded with the prakram of colonizing central america.
azetek samskruti or itihaas is primarily known through puraatatv evidence mila in excavations such as that of the prasiddh templo mahayor in mexico nagar ; isse indigenous chaal paper codices ; isse eyewitness accounts by Spanish conquistadors aise as hernán cortés and bernal díaz del castillo ; and visheshkar isse 16th or 17th sadi descriptions of azetek samskruti or history likhaa by spani clergymen and literate aztecs in the spani or navatal bhashaa, such as the famous florentine codex compiled by the franciscan bhikshu bernardino de Sahagún with the sahaayta of indigenous azetek informants.
Anderson hays kupar ( born june 3, 1967 ) is an amareeki patrkaar, lekhak, or television vyaktitv.

A plot of a saamaanya vitaran ( or bell-shaped curve ) jahaan each band has a chaudai of 1 maanak vichlan – dekhie bhi : 68-95-99.7 niyam
sanchayi sambhavyata of a normal distribution saath expected maan 0 or maanak vichlan 1.
In statistics or probability siddhanth, maanak vichlan ( represented by the symbol sigma, σ ) shows kaisaa much vibhinnata or dispersion exists isse the ausat ( ausat ), or apekshit maan.
A kam maanak deviation indicates ki the aankada ank tend to be very band to the mean ; unchi maanak vichlan indicates ki the data ank hai spread out over a vishaal dayera of maan.
the maanak vichlan of a random parivartaneey, statistical janasankhyikee, aankada niyat, or sambhavyata vitaran is the square root of iske variance.
It is algebraically simpler though practically kam robust than the average absolute vichlan.
A useful property of standard vichlan is ki, naapsand variance, it is expressed in the vahi units as the aankada.
Note, however, that for measurements saath pratishat as unit, the maanak vichlan hoga have pratishat ank as ikai.
in jod to expressing the variability of a population, standard vichlan is commonly prayukt to measure vishwaas in sankhyikeey conclusions.
For udhaaharan, the hashia of galati in polling data is determined by calculating the expected maanak vichlan in the results if the vahi pole were to be conducted multiple times.
the reported hashia of galati is typically parichay twice the maanak vichlan – the dayera of a 95 pratishat vishwaas antaraal.
in vigyaan, researchers commonly rapat the maanak vichlan of praayogic aankada, or tabhi prabhaav ki fall far baahar the range of maanak deviation hai mana statistically significant – saamaanya yadrichhik galati or vibhinnata in the maap is in is rasta vishisht isse causal vibhinnata.
Standard vichlan is also important in vitt, jahaan the standard deviation on the rate of vaapasi on an nivesh is a maap of the volatility of the nivesh.
jab tabhi a sample of aankada isse a janasankhyikee is uplabdhiyaan, the maanak vichlan of the population can be anumaanit by a parivardhit quantity pukaara the `` namoona maanak deviation ''.
jab the sample is the sampurna janasankhyikee, iske unmodified standard vichlan is called the `` population maanak vichlan ''.
ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) ( ullucus tuberosus ) is a plant grown primarily as a root sabzi, secondarily as a leaf sabzi.
the ulluco is one of the most widely grown or economically mahatvapurn root fasalon in the andean region of dakshin America, duusari tabhi to the potato.
it is known vahin saath the aam name of papa lisa, lakin bhi by the kshetreey names melloco ( Ecuador ), olluco ( Peru ), chugua ( colombia ) or ruba ( Venezuela ), among anya.
the patta and the tuber are khaadya, samaan to paalak or the aalu, kramshah.
ve hai gyaat to contain high str of protein, calcium, or caroten.
papalisa yahood prayukt by the incas prior to aagaman of europeans in dakshin america.
ulluco tubers hai marketed as `` dharti Gems '' in nai jiland, by Halfords exotic upaj.

An april 24, 1851 poster chetavanee the `` colored people of boston '' parichay pulicekarmiyon acting as slave catchers.
The bhagode Slave vidhi or bhagode slave Act thi passed by the sanyukt rajya congress on September 18, 1850, as bhaag of the sulah of 1850 between dakshini slave-holding ruchi and uttari Free-Soilers.
is thi one of the sabase vivaadaaspad adhiniyamon of the 1850 compromise or heightened Northern fears of a `` slave shakti shadyantr ''.
It declared ki all runaway slave were, upon capchar, to be returned to unke masters.
abolitionists nicknamed it the `` bloodhound Law '' liye the kutto that yahood prayukt to track bas runaway slave.

the album became the group 's duusari # 1 album on the sheersh Gospel chart.

The sanyukt rajya federal arjeet aay kar credit or arjeet income credit ( eitc or EIC ) is a refundable kar credit liye low- or medium-income individuals or yugal, primarily for those jo have qualifying children.
jab the credit exceeds the amount of taxes owed, it parinaam in a kar refund to those who arji the credit.
is credit is provided to ofaset the boj of soshal suraksha taxes or bhi to prachaar an protsaahan to work.
in anukram liye a vyakti or yugal to arji ek or more vyaktiyon as unke qualifying child ( ren ), the aayu, sambandh, or saajha racidency aavashyaktaayen jarur be mili, as well as some anya aavashyaktaayen.
u.S. kar forms 1040ez, 1040a, or 1040 can be prayukt to claim eic bagaiyr qualifying children.
to claim the credit saath qualifying children, 1040a or 1040 must be prayukt, as well as attaching anusuchee eic.
eic phases in dhire, rai a medium-length pathaar, or tab phases out adhik dhire than it phased in.
chunki the credit phases out at 21 % ( liye do children or for three or more qualilfying children ) or 16 % ( liye ek qualifying child ), it is sadaa preferable to have ek adhik dollars of actual selary or mazdooree ( although technically, chunki the eic talika chaalen by pachaas dollars increments, it 's sadaa astabalon to have an atirikt fifty-dollar vruddhi of selary or wages ).
For kar saal 2011, the adhiktam EIC liye a single vyakti or couple filing without qualifying children thi $ 464.
the maximum eic saath one qualifying child was $ 3,094, saath do children thi $ 5,112, or saath teen or adhik qualifying children thi $ 5,751.
ye amounts hai indexed annually liye inflation.
The arjeet income kar credit rai been part of rajnatik debates in the sanyukt rajya regarding whether raising the nunatam mazdooree or increasing EIC will behatar pataa a seeming shortage of good-paying kaary.
the following is a suchi of madhyantar shows yojit at the neshnal footbaal lig 's championships khel, the super Bowl.
While madhyantar shows are a tradition dauraan footbaal khel at sab str of pratiyogita, the Super katori madhyantar show represents a fundamental kadi to pop culture, which helps broaden the television darshak and deshbhar byaaj.
in sabase years chunki the mid-1980s, the madhyantar show of the super katori rai pradarshit popular recording kalakaaron and anya well-known celebrities.
It rai measurably increased television viewers dauraan or baad the madhyantar dikhaaen.
the pradarshan is regarded one of the most-watched kaarykram in amareeki television annually saath over 100 lakh darshak in the sanyukt rajya alon.
musical jati over the saalo have represented a broad dayera of music types, sahit pop, rock, clasik chattan, country, hip hop, rap, bluez, or aatma.
in kuch saalo, choti skits or naatak drishyon hai acted out on a stage.
the performance samooh up with logon rai performed at the sabase super Bowl madhyantar shows, abhinit in chaar dauraan the 1970s or 1980s.
according to nielsen darja, Super Bowl XLVI madhyantar dikhaaen headlined by Madonna in 2012 remains the most-watched madhyantar dikhaaen in itihaas, saath 114 million darshak or about 3 lakh more than the actual game.
Beyonce 's 2013 madhyantar dikhaaen pradarshan thi the second most viewed show in itihaas.
It is soochibaddh on the Guinness sansar record as the largest TV darshak liye a super katori half-time performance.
antarrashtriya Men 's din ( imd ) is an salanaa antarrashtriya event manaaye on 19th navambar.
udghaatan in 1999 in trinidad and tobago, the din and its kaarykram dhundhen support isse a variety of individuals or samooh in australia, the Caribbean, uttar America, asia, Europe or africa.
Speaking on behalf of unesco, Director of Women or Culture of Peace ingeborg breines kaha of imd, `` is is an behtareen vichaar and would de kuch ling santulan. ''
wo added ki UNESCO was looking aage to cooperating saath the aayojakon.
the uddeshy of celebrating an antarrashtriya main 's din include focusing on men 's or boys ' swasthya, improving gender relations, promoting ling equality, or highlighting positive purush role model.
It is an avasar to hilite pakshpaat viruddh men and boys and to celebrate unke uplabdhiyaan or contributions, in particular liye unke contributions to jatiyaan, family, vivaah, and child care.
the broader and param uddeshy of the event is to prachaar basic humanitarian values.
antarrashtriya main 's din is celebrated in over 60 deshon, sahit Trinidad or Tobago, jamaica, australia, india, china, sanyukt States, romania, singapore, malta, sanyukt kingdom, South Africa, tanzania, zimbabwe, botswana, Seychelles, burundi, hungarian, ireland, Isle of man, ghana, Canada, denmark, norway, austria, bosnia or harzegovina, yukt, frans, italy, pakistani, cuba, antigua or Barbuda, st. kits and nevis, st. loosia, Grenada or keman islands, on 19 November, or vaishvik support liye the jashn is vyapak.

gaanv is a zila in the san furnando ghati pradesh of Los angeles, California.
the median aayu of iske janasankhyikee, at 36, is `` old liye the nagar of Los angeles. '' or its ausat household size of two logon is kam, compared to anya bhaag of the city.
developmental psychology is the vaigyanik padhai of parivartan ki occur in human beings over the course of unke jivan span.
Originally chintit with infants and children, the field rai expanded to include kishoravastha, adult vikaas, aging, and the sampurna jivan span.
This field examines change aarpaar a vyapak range of vishay sahit motor skills and other psycho-physiological processes ; cognitive vikaas involving kshetron aise as problem solving, moral samajhnaa, or conceptual samajhnaa ; bhashaa adhigrahan ; soshal, personality, and emotional development ; or self-concept or pahchaan gathan.
developmental manovigyaan includes issues aise as the extent to jisase vikaas occurs through the gradual accumulation of gyaan versus stage-like vikaas, or the extent to which children hai born saath swaabhaavik dimagi structures banaam siikhnaa through experience.
anek shodhakartaaon are dilchaspee in the interaction between nijee visheshtaayen, the individual 's bartaav, and paryaavarniya karkon sahit social context, or their impact on vikaas ; others take a more narrowly-focused drushtikon.
developmental manovigyaan informs anek lagu field, sahit : shaikshanik psychology, child psychopathology, or forensic developmental manovigyaan.
developmental psychology complements anek anya basic shodh field in manovigyaan sahit soshal manovigyaan, sangyanatmak manovigyaan, ecological manovigyaan, and tulanaatmak manovigyaan.
Joseph Michael `` Joey '' stivic is a fictional akshar who first appeared on the 1970s amareeki sitcom All in the parivaar.
joy Stivic was the bete or only child of mike stivic ( played by rob Reiner ) and gloria stivic ( played by saili struthers ), or the grandson of Archie bunker ( Carroll O'Connor ) or edith Bunker ( jaan stapleton ).
the akshar pehla appeared as a navjaat baby in a two-part apisod of All in the parivaar which aired in disambar 1975.
baad anek dikhaave on sab in the parivaar until reiner or struthers left the shrenee in 1978 ( by ki samay, Joey tha maharoom nibhaai sabase praayah by alternating judwa jesan or justin Draeger ), the joy stivic akshar aglaa appeared on the sab in the parivaar spin-off shrenee ( some kol it a continuation of the asli ) Archie bunker 's Place in a guest rup in the November 1979 apisod `` Thanksgiving Reunion. ''
In is udhaaharan, the akshar was played by child actor land Billingsley or thi appropriately pre-school aayu.
saath Gloria abhi alag isse mike, wo returned to archi Bunker 's place saath joy in the farvari 1982 episode `` Gloria Comes ghar. ''
in is episode, Joey thi nibhaai by christopher johnston.
joy stivic was a niyamit character on the sab in the parivaar spin-off series gloria in 1982 or 1983.
on this series, in which the now-divorced gloria bunker akshar tha sthanantarit to Upstate nai york in order to kaary as an sahaayak veterinarian, the bhaag of joy Stivic was nibhaai by ten-year-old karta Christian jacobs.
After Gloria thi radd in 1983, joy stivic disappeared from prime samay television for 11 years, until the akshar bana one pichhlaa appearance on 704 hauser, a short-lived 1994 shrenee about a blike family who had sthanantarit into the boodha Bunker home, saalo baad Bunker had bechi it.
in is rup, the joy Stivic character was played by kasee siemaszko, an actor born in 1961 ( 14 saalo pehle joy stivic 's fictional janam ).
in 1976 the adarsh khilonaa Company released a 14-inch `` Joey stivic gudiya '' ( pukaara `` archi bunker 's pota '' ) jisase thi billed as the `` first anatomically correct male gudiya. ''
the gudiya inspired mild vivaad at the samay, or is a collectors ' mad aaj.

nibhaai in pasadena, california, the TCU horned mendhak of the Mountain west sammelan parajeet the visconsin badgers of the big ten sammelan by a score of 21 – 19.
the Pasadena Tournament of Roses sangh was the aayojak of the khel.
vizio inc. thi the corporate praayojak and the khel thi officially named `` The Rose katori khel prastut by vizio ''.
is game chihnit the first samay a team isse a non-automatic qualifying Conference nibhaai in, and jiti, the rose Bowl in iske 97 saalo.
the pratiyogita was broadcast on cable television station iespien saath a radio broadcast on ESPN radio and xm upgrah Radio and espn3 strimming video over the internet.
kawarej began at 1:30 PM ( PST ) saath kickoff at 2:10 PM ( pst ).
is chihnit the pehla samay that the game was nahin broadcast nationally `` over-the-air '' ( sthaliy television ) chunki the khel prior to the 1952 rose katori, jisase was the pehla nationally televised college footbaal game.
the rose katori khel, prasang bhawan sapano, Friendships, & Memories, thi a contractual sell-out, saath 64,500 tikaten abantit to the participating tiimon or conferences.

The ghoshnaa of swatantraaa is a statement apanaaya by the mahadwipiya Congress on july 4, 1776, jisase ghoshit ki the teraa American colonies, tab at yuddh saath Great Britain, regarded themselves as swatantra rajya, or no longer a part of the angrejon Empire.
bajaay ve now formed a new nation—the United States of america.
jon adams was a netaa in pushing liye swatantraaa, jisase was unanimously sweekrut on july 2.
a cameti tha already drafted the aupchaarik ghoshnaa, to be taiyaar jab congress voted on swatantraaa.
adams persuaded the committee to select thomas jeffrasan to likhen the original draft of the dastauez, which congress hota edit to upaj the final version.
The Declaration thi ultimately a aupchaarik spashtikaran of kyon congress tha voted on July 2 to ghoshit swatantraaa isse great britain, adhik than a saal baad the outbreak of the amareeki krantikari War.
The neshnal janmdiwas, the swatantraaa Day is manaaye on july 4, haalanki adams wanted July 2.
baad ratifying the text on July 4, congress jari the ghoshnaa of swatantraaa in several form.
It thi initially published as the mudrit danlap broadside ki thi widely distributed or padhaa to the public.
The sabase prasiddh version of the ghoshnaa, a hastakshrit copy that is popularly regarded as the ghoshnaa of Independence, is pradarshit at the National Archives in washington, d.c.
haalanki the wording of the ghoshnaa thi sweekrut on july 4, the date of iske signing was agast 2.
the original july 4 sanyukt States ghoshnaa of swatantraaa pandulipi was khoyaa while all anya nakal have maharoom niklaa isse this asli dastauez.
The sources and nirvachan of the Declaration have been the vishay of much scholarly poochtacha.
the ghoshnaa justified the independence of the United rajya by listing colonial grievances viruddh King george iii, or by asserting certain natural or vidhik adhikaron, including a right of kranti.
having served iske asli purpose in announcing independence, the text of the ghoshnaa thi initially upekshit after the American kranti.
chunki tab, it rai aaiye to be mana a major bayaan on insaan adhikaron, particularly its duusari sentence:
we tham ye sachai to be self-evident, ki sab main are nirmit baraabar, ki ve are endowed by unke nirmaataa saath nishchit unalienable adhikaron, ki among these hai jivan, Liberty or the pursuit of sukh.
is has been pukaara `` ek of the best-known sentences in the English bhashaa '', containing `` the most potent and consequential words in amareeki itihaas. ''
the passage came to represent a moral maanak to jisase the sanyukt rajya should strive.
is view was notably prachaarit by abraham lincoln, who mana the ghoshnaa to be the nyaas of uske political philosophy, and argued ki the Declaration is a bayaan of siddhanth through which the United rajya samvidhan should be interpreted.
It rai inspired kaary liye the adhikaron of adhikarhin logon throughout the sansar.
chitty chitty Bang Bang is a 1968 angrejon musical filmi loosely aadhaarit on ian fleming 's anokhaa.
the filmi 's script is by roald dahl or ken hughes or iske songs by the sharaman bhaaiyo.
it stars land Van dyke as Caractacus Potts and Sally Ann Howes as truly scrumptious.
The filmi was nirdeshit by ken Hughes or utpaadit by albert R. Broccoli ( co-producer of the james bandha shrenee of films, also aadhaarit on fleming 's novels ).
jon Stears paryvekshit the special prabhaav.
irvin Kostal supervised and conducted the music, while the musical sankhyaayein yahood manchan by mark breaux or dee dee lakdi.
a region is arid when it is characterized by a severe kami of uplabdhiyaan water, to the extent of hindering or preventing the vikaas or development of sanyantr or animal jivan.
environments vishay to arid climates tend to kami vanaspati and hai pukaara xeric or desertic.
sabase `` arid '' climates gher the equator ; these sthaan shaamil sabase of africa and bhaag of dakshin america or central america.
Cancer ( ♋ ) is an astrological chihn, jisase is associated saath the nakshatra karkat.
It spans the 90-120th oopaadhi of the zodiac, between 90 or 125.25 oopaadhi of celestial longitude, jisase the surya transits is kshetrafal on ausat between june 22 to july 22 prayek saal.
And under the sidereal zodiac, it is philhal isse july 21 to August 9.
the sanyukt rajya presidential election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial adhyakshiya chunaav, yojit on mangalvaar, November 8, 1960.
the republican party manonith laazim vice-president richard nicksan, jabaki the Democratic party manonith John F. kennedy, seenetter isse masachusets.
the incumbent President, republican dwite D. ijanhavar, was nahin yogya for re-election baad sevarat the maximum do sharten anumat by the Twenty-second Amendment.
kennedy thi nirvaachit saath a lead of 112,827 mat, or 0.17 % of the lokapriy vote, giving use a vijay of 303 to 219 in the Electoral college, the closest chunki 1916.
This thi the first election in which sab pachaas of the current sanyukt rajya participated.
A kramank of factors bataaiye why the chunaav thi so close.
Kennedy gained chunki vahin thi an aarthik mandi which thes the laazim Republican, and he tha the advantage of 17 lakh adhik panjikrut democrate than republicans.
furthermore, the new votes ki kennedy gained among catholics lagbhag neutralized the nai mat Nixon gained among Protestants.
Kennedy 's campaigning kaushal decisively outmatched nicksan 's.
in the samaapt, nicksan 's jor on his experience carried little weight, and he wasted urja by campaigning in sab 50 states bajaay of concentrating on the swing states.
kennedy prayukt uske vishaal, well-funded abhiyaan organization to win the nomination, surakshit samarthan, and, saath the sahaayta of the pichhlaa of the big-city bosses, to milengi out the vote in the big shaharon.
he relied on running mate Lyndon B. Johnson to hold the dakshin and used television effectively.
This chunaav is notable as hone the pehla samay in u.S. itihaas ki two baithe u.s. seenetteron ( Kennedy or Johnson ) yahood nirvaachit as adhyaksh or vice-president, a ghatana ki rai maharoom doharaaya once, by baraak obama or Joe biden in 2008 ( in dono maamle, the adhyaksh thi the younger, adhik junior seenetter ).
sherwood is a city in washington county, oregon, sanyukt rajya.
stith in the southeast corner of the county, it is a residential jatiyaan in the Tualatin ghati dakshinpaschim of portland.
the janasankhyikee thi 11,791 at the 2000 janasankhyikee.
according to the 2010 janasankhyikee, the janasankhyikee thi 18,205 nivaasiyon.
indirectly namit liye the sherwood van in england, it thi pehla incorporated in 1893 as a kasbaa.
the USA patriot adhinium of 2001 is an adhinium of the u.S. Congress that thi hastakshrit into vidhi by adhyaksh George W. bush on October 26, 2001.
the title of the act is a ten akshar echronim ( uese patriot ) that stand liye uniting ( or ) strengthening america ( by ) providing uchit Tools Required ( to ) interphes ( and ) obstruct aatank Act of 2001.
The adhinium, as a jawaab to the aatankwaadi attacks of September 11th, significantly ghataya restrictions in law pravartan agenciyon ' mehafil of intelligence bheetar the sanyukt States ; vistaarit the sachiv of the treasury’s authority to regulate vittiya tranjection, visheshkar those involving videshi individuals or entities ; and broadened the discretion of vidhi pravartan or immigration adhikariyon in detaining or deporting apravasiyon suspected of terrorism-related acts.
The act bhi vistaarit the definition of aatank to shaamil gharelu terrorism, yun enlarging the kramank of activities to jisase the uese patriot act’s vistaarit vidhi enforcement shaktiyaan can be applied.
on may 26, 2011, adhyaksh baraak obama prayukt an autopen to chihn the patriot Sunsets ekstansion adhinium of 2011, a four-year ekstansion of three kunjee praavdhaanon in the uese PATRIOT adhinium jabaki he thi in France : roving wiretaps, khoj of kaarobaar record ( the `` pustakaalayon record provision `` ), or conducting nigaraanee of `` lone wolves '' — individuals suspected of terrorist-related activities nahin linked to terrorist groups.
Republican netao questioned if the upyog of the Autopen mili the constitutional requirements liye hastakshar a bill into law.
