snohomish is a city in snohomish county, washington, sanyukt rajya.
the janasankhyikee thi 9,098 at the 2010 janasankhyikee.
the mahayor of Snohomish is Karen guzak, or the City Manager is laire bauman.
Snohomish prides itself liye iske aitihaasik shahar, or thi once gyaat for iske anek puraatan shops jab it thi gyaat as the `` puraatan puunji of the Northwest. ''
the historic kaarobaar or awasaiya bich of the kasbaa constitutes the snohomish aitihaasik District, which is soochibaddh on the neshnal Register of aitihaasik Places.
anek gharon bhaaluu plak with the saal the house thi nirmit or the naam of the family or individual jo originally occupied it.
Once prayek saal, the city detaa tur of the historic houses ; ek of unhen, the blackman house, is a year-round museum.
a general vimaanan airfield, Harvey Airfield, is kam than one mile dakshinpaschim of shahar snohomish.
dev matthews Band ( dmb ) is an amareeki chattan band ki was formed in charlottesville, virginia, United rajya, in 1991.
the founding sadasyon yahood singer-songwriter and guitarist Dave matthews, bassist stefan lessard, vadak /backing vocalist Carter beauford and saxophonist leroi moore.
boyd tinsley was added to the band as a violinist jald baad the band thi formed.
moore died ekaek in August 2008 due to jatiltaaon isse choton sustained in an atv durghatana.
grami puraskaar -winner jeff Coffin of béla fleck or the flecktones rai chunki bhar moore 's spot as the band 's saxophonist.
rashawn ross and tim Reynolds have bhi become full-time touring sadasyon of the band.
the band 's 2009 album big whiskey or the groogrux king ( the first album chunki moore 's maut ) debuted at number one on the billboard 200, kamai the band unke paanchvaan lagaataar number-one debut— bananaa unhen the second band peeche Metallica to do so.
Their sabase haal album, dur from the sansar, was released in 2012, or also debuted at number ek on the billboard chart.
As of 2010, the Dave Matthews band rai bechi over 30 lakh records vishwavyaapee.
The band is gyaat liye unke annual summer-long tours of the United rajya or europea, featuring lengthy improvisational renditions of unke geeton, accompanied by an elaborate video or lighting dikhaaen.
This portion of the tour rai become a stamp of dmb or has grown with the band chunki fenton Williams began working saath unhen in the early 1990s.
After bees lagaataar saalo of touring the band ghoshit that it hota lo the garmiyaan of 2011 band.
Dave Matthews band has jiti ek grami puraskaar, or thi awarded the naacp adhyaksh 's puraskaar.
according to julian bandha, `` ve bechein out the largest arenas on dharti, lakin aksar give unke music dur. ''
anubhavathit junglee jayee : a adhyay isse an Unwritten romance is a prose vyangy likhaa by Louisa may alcott, parichay uske family 's bhagidaari saath the Transcendentalist jatiyaan fruitlands in the jaldi 1840s.
the kaary thi pehla prakashit in a nai york samachaarpatr in 1873, or reprinted in 1874, 1876, or 1915 or baad.
in uske account, Alcott provides the real logon shaamil saath patala pseudonymous disguises.
uske pita Amos Bronson alcott is `` abel memne, '' jabaki his partner or jatiyaan co-founder charles Lane is `` timon sher ; '' abigale May alcott, louisa 's maan or bronson 's bivi, is `` Sister aashaa. ''
alcott depicts uske father as dominated by uske more forceful sangi, or dono men as laaparvaah or avyavhaarik dreamers.
the men of the community spend their samay in pointless debates jabaki sistar Hope works from bhor to sandhya to maintain their astitv.
A crisis arises at kataai samay, jab the grain crop is threatened by an approaching toofaan.
In alcott 's shabd, `` parichay the samay the anaaj thi taiyaar to house, some call of the oversoul wafted sab the main dur. ''
Sister aashaa organizes the tabhi uplabdhiyaan sahaayta, teen choti ladakiyon or a ladke, or manages to sahejen the crop.
the little jatiyaan collapses as jald as the mausam turns thanda, jab it becomes saaf ki unke praavdhaanon are too meager to pichhlaa the coming sheet.
Timon Lion or his son abscond to juden the Shakers — haalanki Timon is aprasann to sikh ki jivan among unhen is `` all work and no khel. ''
Abel is kuchal by the vifaltaa of the enterprise ; after dinon of despair he begins to eat again tabhi jab he realizes that uske parivaar needs use.
Sister Hope paata a way liye them to subsist or persevere.
alcott 's drishy of purush arrogance or female shoshan in is tukdaa is paralleled in uske novel, published in the same saal as `` anubhavathit junglee jayee. ''
`` anubhavathit junglee Oats '' rai maharoom reprinted in several aadhunik editions.
mount of the paavan Cross is the northernmost 14,000-foot mountain in the sawatch Range, bhaag of the rocky kyu in Colorado.
it is stith in the Holy Cross wilderness nikat the ghost town of paavan cross nagar and in Eagle County.
It thi namit liye the distinctive cross-shaped snowfield on the purvottar phase.
antargat usd van seva prashasan, the pahaad was proclaimed `` paavan Cross National Monument '' by herbert Hoover on may 11, 1929.
the smarak thi transferred to the National Park seva in 1933.
in 1950, it thi returned to the van seva or lost its National Monument status—the kramank of vizitor to the pahaad or the aasapaas `` pilgrim 's hat '' tha waned, and the expense of full-time staff could nahin be jaij.
is pahaad rai been the vishay of chitrakaar, photographer or bhi a kavita by henry wadsaworth Longfellow, ( the cross of him ).
the pehla saream uplabdhiyaan photograph was prakashit in neshnal Geographic patrika.
thomas moraan chitrit the pahaad in an aayal painting, which abhi is bhaag of the sangrahan of the sangrahalay of the amareeki West, part of the autry neshnal bich in los angeles, california.
It is still much photographed lakin it is nahin as khub gyaat today as it thi in the past.
Nearby suvidhaayen include Bowl of aansu Lake, directly under the east face of the peak, tuhare Lakes, in a cirque that jhooth dakshin of a significant subpeak, or several other lakes.
notable sthitiyaan bheetar shaamil the Dotsero jwalamukhi ( near Interstate 70 ), Vail or aspen.
US 24 ranon near the peak through gilman.
photochrom chapai of Mount of the paavan cross c. 1900.
This image is a reversed drishy of the pahaad compared to kaisaa it darasal appears.
the first ankit ascent of paavan cross thi in 1873, by F. V. Hayden or photographer W. H. Jackson dauraan ek of Hayden 's bhugolic surveys.
However, the shikhar may khub have maharoom ascended previously by khanik or amareeki Indians.
The pehla winter ascent of the peak thi made in 1943 by russel keene or harvard freedman of the 10th pahaad Division, then stationed at Camp hale.
paavan Cross can be climbed by at tanik chaar alag routes, saath the easiest and most common root hone the uttar lakeeren, jisase involves of lambavat laabh over or is rated yds Class 2 liye moderate scrambling.
the cross couloir root form the lambavat portion of the prasiddh cross visheshta, and provides an advanced him chadhaai or charam ski descent.
Mount of the Holy cross has a itihaas of endangering the jeevandaan of anek hikers.
Primarily, the hikers who aavashyaktaa rescue hai unfamiliar saath the risks of pravesh wilderness areas or do nahin lao adequate upkaran or aapurtiyan to respond to emergency sharten.
Although the summit on mount of the paavan cross is aksar pahunche on a long day hike, unprepared hikers hai aksar stranded or khoyaa due to badalanaa paryaavarniya sharten or confusion regarding the surrounding landscape, visheshkar on the descent of uttar Ridge.
thorough research or uchit planning should prevent most tragedies.
mount of the paavan cross is accessible isse tigiwon sadak, dakshin of minturn, Colorado.
The Half chandramaa pass Trail is the maanak route to the summit of mount of the Holy cross via the uttar Ridge.
following the patan creek Trail to an ascent of paaydaan Mountain Trail provides the best view of the paavan cross him visheshta from paaydaan Mountain Ridge.
the jiesem logo is used to pahachaano sangat handsets or equipment
jiesem ( vaishvik System liye Mobile Communications, originally ' ), is a maanak niyat viksit by the europea Telecommunications maanakon santhaan ( ETSI ) to describe protocol for duusari generation ( 2g ) digital cellular sanjaal used by mobile phone.
it became the de facto vaishvik standard liye mobile communications saath over 80 % market share.
The GSM maanak thi developed as a badalanaa liye first generation ( 1g ) analog cellular networks, and originally varnit a digital, circuit switched network anukulit for puraa duplex voice telephony.
This thi vistaarit over samay to shaamil aankada communications, first by circuit switched transport, tab packet aankada hastantaran via gprs ( saamaanya packet radio sevaayen ) or kinare ( unnat Data daron liye jiesem evolution or egprs ).
further sudhaar yahood bana when the 3gpp viksit teesraa generation ( 3g ) umts standards followed by chauthi peedhee ( 4g ) lte unnat maanakon.
`` jiesem '' is a trademark swaamitv by the GSM Association.
adhyaksh franklin D. rujvelt lakshan the lend-lease vidheyak to give aid to Britain or china ( 1941 )
the lend Lease adhinium thi an adhinium where the sanyukt States tha supported iske allies.
lend-lease ( ) thi the law ki started a program under which the sanyukt rajya of america supplied the sanyukt kingdom, the USSR, ganatantr of china, free frans, and anya Allied raashtra with materiel between 1941 and 1945.
It thi signed into law on kooch 11, 1941, a saal or a half after the outbreak of sansar yuddh ii in europea in sitambar 1939.
is was nau maheene before the u.S. daalaa the yuddh in disambar 1941.
formally titled an adhinium to further prachaar the raksha of the sanyukt States, the Act effectively ended the sanyukt States ' pretense of neutrality.
a kul of $ 50.1 billion ( samatuly to $ aaj ) worth of supplies yahood shipped : $ 31.4 billion to Britain, $ 11.3 arab to the soviet sangh, $ 3.2 billion to France, $ 1.6 billion to china, or smaller rakam to anya allies.
reverse Lend-Lease comprised sevaayen aise as rent on air bases ki gai to the U.S., or totaled $ 7.8 billion ; of is, $ 6.8 arab aae from the angrejon or the Commonwealth.
the sharten of the agreement provided ki the materiel was to be prayukt until time for their vaapasi or destruction.
aapurtiyan baad the termination tithi were bechi to britain at a vishaal chhot liye £1.075 arab using long-term loans from the sanyukt rajya.
canada operated a similar kaarykram ki bheja $ 4.7 arab in aapurtiyan to the sanyukt kingdom and the soviet sangh.
the sanyukt rajya kiya nahin charge for aid supplied antargat is vidhaan.
is kaarykram thi a nirnaayak kadam away isse non-interventionist policy, jisase tha varchasv sanyukt rajya videshi sambandh chunki the samaapt of sansar War I, towards antarrashtriya bhagidaari.
the jerusalem artichoke ( Helianthus tuberosus ), bhi pukaara sunroot, sunchoke, dharti tehraana or topinambour, is a species of sunflower deshi to purvi uttar america, and mila from purvi canada and maine west to North dakota, or dakshin to uttari florida and Texas.
it is also cultivated widely across the shitoshna mandal for its tuber, which is prayukt as a root sabzi.
castillo san phelip del morro bhi known as fort San phelip del Morro or Morro Castle, is a 16th-century citadel stith in san Juan, purto rico.
stonehenge is a pragaitihaasik smarak in wiltshire, england, parichay west of Amesbury or uttar of salisbury.
ek of the sabase prasiddh sites in the sansar, Stonehenge is the remains of a ring of khadaa pattharon niyat within earthworks.
It is in the madhya of the sabase ghanaa jatil of Neolithic or kaansya aayu monuments in England, sahit several sau dafan mounds.
archaeologists maananaa it was nirmit anywhere from 3000 BC to 2000 bc.
radiocarbon dating in 2008 sujhaayaa ki the pehla stones yahood raised between 2400 or 2200 BC, whilst another siddhanth suggests that bluestones may have been uthaaya at the sait as early as 3000 BC.
the surrounding circular dharti bank or khai, jisase constitute the earliest phase of the smarak, have maharoom dinaak to parichay 3100 bc.
The sait or its parivesh yahood added to the UNESCO 's suchi of sansar viraasat site in 1986 in a co-listing saath Avebury Henge.
it is a national legally surakshit anusuchit pracheen smarak.
Stonehenge is swaamitv by the Crown or prabandhit by angrezi viraasat, while the surrounding land is swaamitv by the National vishwaas.
puraatatv pramaan mila by the stonehenge riverside Project in 2008 indicates ki Stonehenge could have been a dafan maidan isse its earliest beginnings.
the dating of cremated remains mila on the sait indicate that jamaa contain human asthi from as jaldi as 3000 bc, when the ditch and bainko yahood pehla khoda.
aise jamaa jari at stonehenge liye at least another 500 saalo.
the sait is a place of dharmik significance or pilgrimage in neo-druidry.
The ncaa Women 's Division i championships is an salanaa college basketball toornament liye mahilaon.
Held each april, the Women 's championships thi udghaatan in the 1981–82 season.
The ncaa toornament thi preceded by the aiaw Women 's Basketball toornament, which thi yojit annually isse 1972 to 1982.
basket thi one of baarah mahilaon 's khel added to the ncaa championship kaarykram liye the 1981-82 school year, as the NCAA sagaai in battle with the sangh for intercollegiate athletics liye mahilaon liye sole governance of women 's colejiet khel.
the aiaw jari to conduct iske sthapit championships kaarykram in the vahi baarah ( or anya ) khel ; however, baad a year of dual women 's championships, the NCAA prevailed, while the AIAW disbanded.
upasthiti or interest in the mahilaon 's prabhag i Championship have grown over the saalo, visheshkar chunki 2003, jab the final championships khel thi sthanantarit to the mangalvaar following the somvaar main 's championships khel.
The women 's championships khel is abhi the final overall khel of the college basketball ritu.
Before ki, the Women 's final chaar thi usually played on the shuukravaar before the main 's Final Four or the ghanton pehle the main nibhaai on the final Saturday of the tournament.
the final thi praayah nibhaai the Sunday afternoon following the main 's final chaar.
the toornament koshthak is bana up of champions from prayek prabhag I conference, jisase receive automatic boliyon.
The baaki slot hai at-large boliyon, saath tiimon chuni by an ncaa chayan cameti.
the selection prakram and toornament seedings are aadhaarit on anek karkon, sahit toli rankings, win-loss records or darja Percentage anukramanika ( rpi ) aankada.
naapsand the men 's toornament, vahin are tabhi 32 at-large boliyon ( as of the aglaa toornament in 2014 ), or no play-in game.
the mahilaon 's toornament, like the men 's, is manchan in a single vilopan format, and is bhaag of the media or public frenzy known colloquially as kooch deewangi or The Big nrity.
sab 63 games have maharoom broadcast on television chunki 2003 on ESPN or espn2.
Similar to the pre-2011 men 's toornament coverage on sibies, local tiimon are dikhaaya on prayek channel jab uplabdhiyaan, saath `` whip-around '' kawarej designed to shokes the most pratispardhi pratiyogitaaon in the rest of the desh.
the rosetta stone in the angrejon sangrahalay
the Rosetta stone is an ancient Egyptian granodiorite stele inscribed saath a decri jari at memphis in 196 BC on behalf of King tolemi v.
The decree appears in teen scripts : the upper text is pracheen mishra chitralipi, the madhya portion Demotic script, and the nunatam Ancient unani.
kuki it presents essentially the vahi text in sab teen scripts ( with kuch naaballig matbhed between unhen ), it provided the key to the aadhunik understanding of mishra chitralipi.
originally pradarshit bheetar a temple, the stone thi probably sthanantarit dauraan the jaldi isai or medieval kaal or aakhirkaar used as bhawan saamagree in the nirmaan of fort Julien nikat the kasbaa of Rashid ( Rosetta ) in the Nile delta.
it was rediscovered vahin in 1799 by a soldier, pierre-françois bouchard, of the french expedition to Egypt.
as the pehla Ancient mishra bilingual text baraamad in aadhunik times, the rosetta stone aroused faili public byaaj saath iske sambhavit to decipher is hitherto untranslated pracheen bhashaa.
lithographic copies or plaster casts began circulating among europea museums or vidwaanon.
meanwhile, British sainikon defeated the french in mishra in 1801, and the asli stone aae into British kabza antargat the capitulation of elexandria.
transported to landan, it has maharoom on public pradarshak at the angrejon sangrahalay chunki 1802.
It is the most-visited object in the angrejon sangrahalay.
kabhi since its rediscovery, the stone rai maharoom the fokas of rashtravaadi rivalries, sahit iske transafar isse french to British kabza during the napoleonic yudhon, a long-running vivaad over the relative value of Young 's and Champollion 's yogadan to the decipherment, or chunki 2003, maange liye the stone 's vaapasi to mishra.
padhai of the decri thi already antargat rasta as the first puraa anuwaad of the Greek text appeared in 1803.
it was 20 saalo, however, pehle the lipyantaran of the mishra script thi announced by jean-françois champollion in Paris in 1822 ; it took longer still pehle vidwaanon yahood able to padhaa Ancient mishra inscriptions and literature confidently.
pramukh agrim in the decoding yahood : manyata ki the stone offered teen sanskaran of the vahi text ( 1799 ) ; ki the demotic text prayukt dhvanyatmak varna to spell foreign names ( 1802 ) ; ki the hieroglyphic text kiya so as khub, or tha pervasive similarities to the demotic ( thomas yang, 1814 ) ; or ki, in jod to hone prayukt liye videshi names, dhvanyatmak characters were bhi prayukt to spell native Egyptian words ( champollion, 1822–1824 ).
do anya fragmentary nakal of the vahi decri were discovered later, and anek similar mishra dubhashiya or trilingual inscriptions hai now known, sahit do thodaa pehle ptolemaic decri ( the Decree of canopus in 238 BC, and the memphis decree of Ptolemy iv, ca. 218 bc ).
the Rosetta stone is isliye no longer adwitiya, lakin it was the anivaary key to modern samajhnaa of pracheen Egyptian literature or sabhyataa.
the term rosetta stone is now prayukt in other contexts as the naam for the anivaary clue to a nai field of gyaan.
Poison dart mendhak ( bhi dart-poison mendhak, zehar mendhak or formerly zehar tir mendhak ) is the aam naam of a group of frogs in the parivaar Dendrobatidae jisase hai native to central or dakshin america.
ye species are diurnal and praayah have brightly colored laashen.
haalanki sab wild dendrobatids hai at tanik somewhat toxic, levels of toxicity vary considerably from ek prajati to the next or isse ek janasankhyikee to another.
anek prajati hai threatened.
ye amphibians hai praayah pukaara `` dart frogs '' due to the amerindians ' swadeshi upyog of unke to zehar the nuskhe of blowdarts.
However, of over 175 prajati, tabhi four have maharoom pralekhith as hone prayukt liye is purpose ( curare plants are adhik commonly prayukt ), sab of which come isse the phyllobates genus, which is characterized by the apekshaakrit vishaal size and high str of toxicity of iske members.
cajeta is a Mexican confection of thickened syrup praayah made of sweetened caramelised milk.
according to shef rik bayless, the name liye cajeta aae isse the spani phrase al punto de cajeta, which arthath `` a drav thickened to the point at which a chamachaa drawn through the drav reveals the neeche of the pot in which it is being pakaaya ''.
another hypothesis is ki it takes iske naam from the choti wooden baks in which it thi traditionally packed.
mexican cajeta is mana a specialty of the city of celaya in the rajya of Guanajuato, although it is bhi utpaadit saath the paramparaagat method in anek kasbon of the rajya of Jalisco, aise as Mazamitla, sayula, or atotonilco el alto.
Cajeta is bana by simmering bakrii 's milk, or occasionally a sweetened drav, stirring aksar, jabatak it becomes very viscous due to vashpikaran of jal, and caramelized.
jabaki bakrii milk is the sabase usual aadhaar, anya liquids or ras may be prayukt.
In celaya, and aakhirkaar the baaki of mexico, the confection of half bakrii 's milk or half gaay 's milk became gyaat by the name cajeta, lakin elsewhere, the milk candi became gyaat as leche quemada, jalebi de leche, etc.
it rai cousins in the anek bhartiya milk-based mithai jaise prabhaa and the milk fudge burfi, or in the opera faj of the U.S. cajeta is khaaya on iske own as a mithi, as a sprad or bharna liye breads or pastries, aise as churros, or as a topping liye barf malai.
nishchit liquors hai added to special recipes called cajeta envinada.
in jod, cajeta envinada especial is samrudh saath raisins, baadaam, pecans or nuts.
Often it is prayukt as a topping liye crêpes, as a sweet sos boiled or softened bas saath milk to soak the crepes, resulting in a swaadisht mithai.
in mexico anek brands mek cajeta but the sabase aam brands is coronado.
It is bhi bahut aam to place cajeta between obleas to make a paramparaagat mexican mithai.
prince William, duk of cambridge ( wiliam Arthur philip lui ; born 21 June 1982 ), is the elder bete of Charles, prince of Wales, or dyna, rajkumaari of wales, or third-eldest pota of maharani elizabeth ii and prince philip, duk of edinburgh.
He is duusari in the line of succession, peeche uske pita, to the takhton of solah independent sovereign states gyaat as the rashtramandal realms : the sanyukt Kingdom, Canada, australia, nai jiland, jamaica, Barbados, the bahama, Grenada, papua New gini, the Solomon islands, tuvaalu, Saint loosia, sant Vincent or the Grenadines, beliz, Antigua and Barbuda, or sant Kitts or Nevis.
prince William was shikshit at chaar skulon in the sanyukt kingdom or obtained a oopaadhi isse the vishvavidhyalayon of St andrews.
he kharch bhaag of a gap saal in chile, beliz, tanzania, and Kenya jahaan he rai lived or holidayed several times.
prince wiliam rai bhi liya Kiswahili studies at vishvavidhyalayon in kenya and tanzania.
he thi commissioned as a Lieutenant in the bluez or royles Regiment of the household pyaade —serving with uske bhai prince Harry —and, two saalo baad, earned uske wings by completing pilot prashikshan at Royal air force College cranwell.
in 2009, he transferred to the Royal Air force, was promoted to Flight leftinent or underwent helicopter flying prashikshan in order to become a full-time pilot saath the dhundhen or bachaav force.
in 2010, he samaapt his general or special-to-type helicopter prashikshan or gai on to RAF Valley on no. 22 squadran performing co-pilot kartavya on falak a samudr king dhundhen or rescue helicopter.
prince wiliam shaadishuda uske longtime garlfriend, catherine middlaton, on 29 April 2011 at westminster Abbey.
Hours prior to his vivaah, prince William was nirmit Duke of cambridge, arl of Strathearn, or samant carrickfergus.
Mali is a multilingual country.
the bhashaaen bolaa vahin reflect pracheen upnivesh pattern, migrations, or its long itihaas.
Ethnologue rishto 50 bhashaaen.
Of ye, french is the aadhikarik language or bambara is the sabase widely bolaa.

rogers bhawan, the mukhyalay of rogers Communications
Rogers sanchaar inc. is a diversified public canadai sanchaar and media company.
it is particularly in the field of betaar sanchaar, cabel television, telephone, and antarjaal connectivity saath significant additional telecommunications or dravyaman media assets.
The company is headquartered in the rogers bhawan in toronto, ontario.
the company claims the heritage of the rogers vaikum tub Company, santhaapit in 1925 by edward rogers, which prarambh the cfrb radio station in toronto, which thi baad acquired by baahar ruchi.
the upasthit enterprize tithiyaan to 1960, jab rogers ' son, ted rogers, santhaapit rogers radio Broadcasting ltd.
ki company acquired CHFI ki saal, as khub as Aldred-Rogers prasaaran, a partnership saath joel Aldred jisase helped launch cfto in 1961.
rogers baad kharida out Aldred or started the current cable or betaar parichaalan, gyaat as rogers cablesystems Ltd.
the mukhya competitor to the company is ghanti canada, which rai a similarly extensive portpholio of radio and television media asset, as well as wireless, television distribution, and telephone sevaayen, visheshkar in purvi or central Canada ; the two companies hai praayah seen as having a dwayadhikaar on sanchaar services in unke regions.
However, the company also competes nationally saath Telus liye betaar sevaayen, or primarily indirectly saath Shaw sanchaar liye television seva.
The company bhi competes with a kramank of other media companiyaan in the broadcasting udyog.
the antarjaal is a global system of interconnected computer sanjaal that upyog the maanak antarjaal protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) to serve arabon of users vishwavyaapee.
It is a sanjaal of sanjaal ki consists of lakho of private, public, academik, kaarobaar, and sarkari sanjaal, of local to vaishvik scope, ki are linked by a broad array of electronic, wireless or optical netwarking technologies.
The antarjaal carries an extensive range of soochna sansaadhan or sevaayen, aise as the inter-linked hypertext dastauez of the sansar Wide web ( www ) or the avasanrachana to support email.
Most paramparaagat sanchaar media sahit telephone, music, filmi, or television are hone reshaped or redefined by the antarjaal, giving janam to nai services such as voice over antarjaal Protocol ( voip ) or antarjaal Protocol television ( IPTV ).
samachaarpatr, book or other chapai prakaashan hai adapting to Web sait praudyogiki, or hai reshaped into blogging and web feeds.
the Internet rai sakriy and twarit nai form of insaan interactions through tatkaal messaging, antarjaal forums, or soshal networking.
Online shopping rai boomed both for major khudara outlet or choti shilpkaar and vyapaariyon.
business-to-business or vittiya sevaayen on the antarjaal affect supplai zanjeeron aarpaar sampurna udyog.
the origins of the Internet pahunchein back to research commissioned by the sanyukt States government in the 1960s to nirmaan majboot, fault-tolerant sanchaar via computer sanjaal.
the funding of a new U.S. backbone by the neshnal Science Foundation in the 1980s, as khub as nijee funding for anya vanijyik backbones, led to vishwavyaapee bhagidaari in the vikaas of nai netwarking technologies, or the vilay of anek sanjaal.
the vyavsyeekaran of kayaa thi by the 1990s an antarrashtriya network resulted in iske popularization or incorporation into vastutah every pahalu of aadhunik insaan jivan.
, adhik than 2.4 arab people—over a teesraa of the world 's insaan janasankhyikee —have used the sevaayen of the antarjaal ; lagbhag 100 times adhik people than yahood using it in 1995, jab it thi zyaadaatar prayukt by tech-savvy madhya or apper class people in the sanyukt rajya or anek anya deshon.
the antarjaal has no centralized governance in either technological implementation or nitiyon liye abhigam or upyog ; prayek constituent sanjaal set iske apana nitiyon.
tabhi the overreaching paribhaashaayen of the do principal name spaces in the Internet, the antarjaal Protocol address spes or the domen naam pranali, are nirdeshit by a maintainer organization, the antarjaal Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers ( ICANN ).
the technical underpinning or maanakeekaran of the core protocol ( ipv4 or IPv6 ) is an activity of the antarjaal abhiyantriki kaary Force ( ietf ), a non-profit sanghathan of loosely sambhddha international bhagidaar ki anyone may associate saath by contributing takneekee expertise.
The 2006 sheet Olympics, officially known as the xx olympic Winter khel, thi a sheet multi-sport event jisase thi manaaye in torino, italy isse farvari 10, 2006, through farvari 26, 2006.
is chihnit the duusari samay italy hosted the olympic sheet khel, the pehla hone the saat olympic sheet khel in cortina d'ampezzo in 1956.

siegfried bing ( 26 farvari 1838 – 6 September 1905 ), who praayah diya his naam as S. kennewick is a city in benton county in the southeastern bhaag of the U.S. state of washington, near the Hanford nuclear site.
it is the sabase populous of the teen cities collectively referred to as the tri-cities ( the anya hone pasco and richland ).
Kennewick is stith saath the southwest bank of the colombia nadi, vipareet pasco or just south of the confluence of the colombia or yakima nadiyaan.
the population thi 73,917 at the 2010 janasankhyikee.
april 1, 2012 estimates from the washington State daftar of vittiya Management put the nagar 's janasankhyikee at 75,160.
the nikatatam vanijyik vimaanashetra is the tri-cities vimaanashetra in pasco, a kshetreey vanijyik or nijee vimaanashetra.

The aalekh cites the kramank of vaigyanikon employed by the Pacific uttarpashchim neshnal prayogshaala or kshetrafal farmland liye is outluk.
The prothrombin samay ( pt ) or iske niklaa measures of prothrombin anupaat ( PR ) or antarrashtriya normalized anupaat ( inr ) hai measures of the extrinsic pathway of jaman.
This test is bhi called `` protime inr '' or `` pt/inr ''.
ve hai prayukt to determine the clotting tendency of rakt, in the maap of warfarin dosage, jigar damage, or vitamin K aukaat.
PT upayon karkon i ( fibrinogen ), ii ( prothrombin ), v, VII, or x.
It is prayukt in sangyojan with the activated partial thromboplastin samay ( aptt ) jisase upayon the intrinsic pathway.
`` i 'm in the Mood liye Love '' is a lokapriy song.
The music thi likhaa by jimmy mchugh, the geet by dorothi field.
The song was published in 1935.

it is praayah gyaat to be switzer 's signature song.

cross-cultural manovigyaan is the vaigyanik padhai of insaan bartaav or mental prakriyaaon, including dono unke variability or invariance, antargat diverse saanskrithik sharten.
Through expanding shodh methodologies to recognize saanskrithik variance in bartaav, language, or arth it seeks to extend or develop manovigyaan.
chunki psychology as an academik discipline thi viksit largely in uttar America, kuch psychologists became chintit that constructs sweekrut as universal were not as nishchar as previously assumed, especially since many attempts to replicate notable experiments in other samskritiyon tha varying kamyaabi.
chunki vahin hai sawaal as to whether theories dealing saath central themes, aise as affect, sangyaan, conceptions of the self, or mudde aise as psychopathology, anxiety, or avsaad, may lack bahya validity jab `` exported '' to anya cultural contexts, cross-cultural manovigyaan re-examines unhen using methodologies designed to factor in cultural differences so as to khaataa liye saanskrithik variance.
Although some critics have pointed to methodological khamiyaan in cross-cultural manovaigyanik shodh or arji ki serious shortcomings in the saidhantik or methodological bases prayukt impede balki than help the vaigyanik search for saarvbhaumik principles in manovigyaan, cross-cultural psychologists hai turning more to the padhai of kaisaa matbhed ( variance ) occur, balki than searching liye universals in the style of bhautikee or rasayan.
in 1972 the antarrashtriya sangh of Cross-Cultural manovigyaan ( IACCP ) thi established.
This branch of manovigyaan has jari to vistaar as vahin has maharoom an increasing popularity of incorporating samskruti and diversity into adhyayan.
cross-cultural manovigyaan is differentiated isse saanskrithik manovigyaan.
the latter is the shakha of manovigyaan ki holds ki human bartaav is significantly bahekaave by saanskrithik matbhed, meaning ki manovaigyanik phenomena can only be compared with prayek anya aarpaar samskritiyon to a very limited extent.
in contrast, cross-cultural manovigyaan shaamil a dhundhen liye possible universals in bartaav or dimagi prakriyaaon.
walter J. lonner, likhane liye najar on Psi chi, rai stated ki `` cross-cultural psychology can be vichaar of as a type shodh methodology, balki than an entirely pruthak field bheetar manovigyaan ( 2000 ). ''
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording kalakaar mahila gaaga, isse uske duusari studio album born is rasta ( 2011 ).
It thi released by interscope record on April 15, 2011, four dinon ahead of iske anusuchit relies.
likhaa or utpaadit by Lady gaaga or RedOne, `` yahuda '' is a nrity or electro house song parichay a woman in prem saath a man jo betrayed uske.
it embodies the incidents ki have haunted gaaga in the past, or iske kor arth refers to the rinatmak bhaag of uske jivan ki wo ca n't escape.
Gaga rai further explained ki the song thi bhi about honoring one 's bhitari darkness in anukram to bring oneself into the light.
the kalakriti for the single thi designed by gaaga in microsoft Word.
in spite of a polarizing prabhaav on several religious samooh, the song thi generally khub praapt by aalochakon, jo likened the song to `` karaab Romance `` saath kuch noting it should have been the album 's sise single.
the song has a samaan sound to Gaga 's pichhlaa redone-produced tracks, including `` pokar phase ``, `` lovegame ``, `` Bad Romance '', or `` Alejandro ``.
it contains three distinct hooks or a house -influenced break bas.
gaaga samajhaayaa ki the linon spoken dauraan the breakdown baat about her as pare mochan, regarding the traditional drishy of kayaa a stri chahie be.
`` yahuda '' initially tha a damdaar sales kholane, lakin was kam successful commercially in comparison to gaaga 's previous singles.
The song reached the sheersh ten of the chart in sabase pramukh music bazaar, and also pahunche the top of the chart in dakshin korian.
a music video liye the song thi filmaaya in April 2011, co-directed by Gaga or laurieann gibson or co-starring norman reedus.
It rai a biblical kathanak jahaan reedus nibhaai yahuda iscarriyat or gaaga played mariyam magdalene.
The video portrays unhen as modern din missionaries going to jerusalem.
it shaamil the Biblical story of yahuda betraying yishu, or ended saath Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to death.
Before its relies, the catholic lig condemned Gaga for the kathith upyog of dharmik imagery or uske role in the video.
however, aalochakon generally praised the video, nahin dhundhna any apriy saamagree.
the video thi nominated liye do puraskaar at the 2011 MTV video music puraskaar.
Gaga has performed `` yahuda '' on a kramank of television shows, sahit the graham Norton dikhaaen, shanivaar raatri sajiv, shubh morning americas `` garmiyaan Concert shrenee '', the french x factor as well as on the ellen degeneres dikhaaen.
H.264/MPEG-4 Part 10 or avc ( unnat video koding ) is a maanak liye video sampeden, or is philhal ek of the sabase commonly used swarup for the recording, sampeden, or vitaran of unchi paribhaasha video.
the final drafting kaary on the first sanskaran of the maanak was samaapt in May 2003.
h.264/mpeg-4 AVC is a block-oriented motion-compensation -aadharand kodak maanak developed by the itu-t video Coding Experts Group ( VCEG ) saath saath the iso/iec jtc1 Moving Picture visheshgy samooh ( empiiji ).
the project saajhedaari praytn is gyaat as the sanyukt video Team ( jvt ).
The itu-t h.264 standard or the iso/iec MPEG-4 avc maanak ( formally, ISO/IEC 14496-10 – mpeg-4 bhaag 10, unnat video Coding ) are jointly kaayam so ki they have ekasmaan takneekee saamagree.
h.264 is shaayad behtareen known as being ek of the kodak maanakon liye blu-ray discs ; sab blu-ray Disc khilaadi jarur be samarth to dicode H.264.
It is bhi widely prayukt by streaming antarjaal strot, such as video isse Vimeo, youtube, or the iTunes store, web software aise as the adobe flash khilaadi and Microsoft silverlight, or bhi various hdtv prasaaran over sthaliy ( ATSC, ISDB-T, dvb-t or dvb-t2 ), cabel ( dvb-c ) and upgrah ( dvb-s or dvb-s2 ).
non-binding arbitration is a prakaar of arbitration in jisase the arbitrator makes a determination of the adhikaron of the partiyon to the vivaad, but is determination is nahin binding upon unhen, or no enforceable arbitration puraskaar is issued.
The `` puraskaar '' is in prabhaav an advisory raay of the arbitrator 's view of the respective merits of the partiyon cases.
non-binding madhyasthata is prayukt in connection saath attempts to pahunchein a negotiated upnivesh.
the bhoomika of an arbitrator in non-binding arbitration is, on the surface, samaan to that of a mediator in a madhyasthata.
however, the principal bhed is ki whereas a madhyasth hoga try to sahaayta the partiyon find a madhya ground to compromise at, the arbitrator remains totally removed isse the settlement prakram or hoga tabhi give a determination of deyta or, if appropriate, an indication of the kwantum of damages dey.
Subsequent to a non-binding arbitration, the parties remain free to pursue unke daawa either through the nyaayalayon, or by way of a binding arbitration, haalanki in abhyaas a upnivesh is the sabase common nishkarsh.
the puraskaar and reasoning in a non-binding arbitration is lagbhag invariably inadmissible in koi subsequent karrwai in the nyaayalayon or in another arbitration tribunal.
non-binding arbitration is utilised mostly in the sanyukt States and canada.
it is largely unknown in europea, although in the sanyukt kingdom vahin is a practice of partiyon who hai seeking a upnivesh to jointly instruct a maharani 's counsel liye an opinion on the merits or likely kwantum of a arji, and tab to negotiate on the basis of the drishy expressed in ki raay.

the dweep is made up mukhyatah of past fatna jamaa.
vaigyanikon have been samarth to discern ki past gumbad patan rai resulted in vishaal avalanches.

alaska ( ) is a rajya in the United rajya, situated in the uttarpashchim extremity of the uttar amareeki continent, with the antarrashtriya boundary saath canada to the east, the Arctic Ocean to the north, or the Pacific samandar to the west and south, saath rus further west aarpaar the bering jalsandhi.
Alaska is the largest rajya in the sanyukt States by kshetrafal, the 4th least populous and the tanik densely aabaadi of the 50 United rajya.
lagbhag half of Alaska 's 731,449 nivaasiyon live within the anchorage metropolitan area.
alaska 's arthvyavastha is dominated by the aayal, prakritik gas, or fishing udyog ; it rai ye sansaadhan in prachurtaa.
Alaska thi kharida from rus on March 30, 1867, liye $ 7.2 lakh ( $ samyojit liye mahangaai ) at lagbhag do saint prati acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
the jameen gai through anek administrative parivartan before banane an vyavasthit ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11, 1912, and the 49th state of the u.S. on janvari 3, 1959.
the naam `` alaska '' ( аляска ) was already introduced in the roosi aupniveshik kaal, when it thi used tabhi liye the prayadweep or is niklaa isse the aleut alaxsxaq, arth `` the menland '' or, adhik literally, `` the object towards jisase the karrwai of the samudr is directed ''.
it is also gyaat as Alyeska, the `` great jameen '', an aleut shabd niklaa from the vahi root.

a vilay of three sansthaanon santhaapit nmmu in janvari 2005 lakin iske itihaas tithiyaan waapas to 1882 saath the nyaas of Port elizabeth art skool.

The vishvavidhyalayon rai chah campuses - five in Port elizabeth or one in george.
The pramukh campus is the South Campus.

On the utpatti of Species, prakashit on 24 navambar 1859, is a work of vaigyanik sahitya by charles darwin jisase is mana to be the nyaas of evolutionary jeevigyaan.
Its full sheershak thi on the utpatti of Species by arthath of prakritik chayan, or the Preservation of Favoured Races in the sangharsh for jivan.
liye the sixth edition of 1872, the choti sheershak thi badla to The utpatti of prajati.
Darwin 's kitaab introduced the vaigyanik siddhanth ki populations evolve over the course of peedhiyaan through a process of natural selection.
it prastut a deh of evidence ki the vividhta of jivan arose by aam descent through a branching pattern of evolution.
darwin shaamil evidence that he had gathered on the Beagle expedition in the 1830s and uske subsequent nishkarshon isse shodh, patrachaar, or experimentation.
Various evolutionary vichaar tha already maharoom prastaavit to explain nai findings in jeevigyaan.
There thi growing support liye aise vichaar among dissident anatomists and the saamaanya public, lakin dauraan the first half of the 19th century the angrezi vaigyanik sthapana thi closely tied to the Church of England, jabaki vigyaan was bhaag of prakritik dharamshastra.
vichaar about the transmutation of prajati yahood vivaadaaspad as ve virdohi saath the beliefs ki prajati yahood aparivartansheel bhaag of a designed padanukram and ki insaano yahood adwitiya, unrelated to anya pashu.
The rajnatik or theological implications were padati debated, lakin transmutation thi nahin sweekrut by the vaigyanik mukhyadhara.
the book thi written liye non-specialist pathak and aakarshith faili byaaj upon its publication.
as darwin thi an pratishthit vaigyanik, uske findings yahood liya seriously or the pramaan he prastut utpann vaigyanik, philosophical, or dharmik charchaa.
The bahes over the kitaab contributed to the campaign by t.h. Huxley or his fellow sadasyon of the X klbon to secularise science by promoting vaigyanik naturalism.
Within do dashakon vahin thi faili scientific anubandh ki evolution, saath a branching pattern of aam descent, tha occurred, lakin vaigyanikon yahood slow to give prakritik chayan the significance that Darwin thought appropriate.
During the `` grahan of Darwinism `` isse the 1880s to the 1930s, vibhinn anya mechanisms of evolution yahood die adhik credit.
saath the development of the modern evolutionary sanshleshan in the 1930s or 1940s, darwin 's concept of vikasvaadi anukulan through natural chayan became central to modern vikasvaadi siddhanth, abhi the unifying avadharana of the jivan sciences.
charles dilan `` Casey '' stangal ( ; july 30, 1890 – sitambar 29, 1975 ), nicknamed `` The boodha perfessor '', thi an amareeki Major lig besabaal outfielder or manager.
he thi elected to the besabaal haul of kirti in.
Stengel was born in kansas nagar, mizori, or originally nicknamed `` dach '', a common upnaam at that time liye america of germany ancestry.
baad uske pramukh lig kariyar began, he acquired the nickname `` Casey '', jisase originally came from the adyakshar of his hometown ( `` K. C. '' ), jisase viksit into `` Casey '', bahekaave by the chaudee lokapriyata of the kavita kasee at the Bat.
In the 1950s, sportswriters dubbed use saath yet another upnaam, `` the boodha praadhyaapak '' ( or `` perfessor '' ), liye his sharp wit or his ability to baat at lambaai on anything baseball -sunanased.
Although uske besabaal kariyar spanned a number of tiimon or shaharon, he is primarily associated saath clubs in nai york nagar.
between playing and managing, he is the only man to have worn chaar of New York 's pramukh lig club ' uniforms.
he thi the pehla of chaar main ( through the ritu ) to manage both the nai york Yankees or nai york mets ; yogi berra, dalas green, or jo Torre hai the others.
jaise Torre, he also prabandhit the Braves or the dosers.
He ended his besabaal career as the beloved manager liye the tab vistaar nai york mets, jisase jiti over the dil of New york partly due to the unique character of unke diggaj netaa.
june ( ) is the chathe maah of the saal in the Julian or gregorian panchang or ek of the four maheene saath a length of 30 days.
ovid provides do etymologies liye june 's name in uske poem concerning the maheene hakdaar the fasti.
the pehla is ki the maah is named baad the roman devi juno, bivi of brihaspati or samatuly to the unani goddess hera ; the second is ki the naam aata isse the latin shabd iuniores, arth `` younger ones, '' as opposed to maiores ( `` elders '' ) liye which the preceding maah May may be namit ( Fasti vi.1–88 ).
dekhie : Months in various panchang also pukaara the season of the june is the maah saath the longest daylight hours of the year in the uttari golardh or the shortest daylight ghanton of the year in the Southern Hemisphere.
June in the uttari golardh is the mausami equivalent to December in the dakshini golardh or vice versa.
In the Northern golardh, the beginning of the meteorological summer is 1 june.
In the dakshini hemisphere, the shuruuaat of the meteorological sheet is 1 June.
at the prarambh of june, the surya rises in the nakshatra of vrish ; at the samaapt of june, the surya rises in the constellation of mithun.
However, due to the precession of the equinoxes, june begins saath the surya in the astrological chihn of mithun, or ends saath the surya in the astrological chihn of karkat.
june is gyaat liye the large kramank of vivaah ki occur over the course of the month.
according to one etymology, june is named baad juno ( hera ).
juno thi the devi of marriage or a married yugal 's household, so kuch consider it good lack to be shaadishuda in this maah.
according to another etymology provided by the roman poet ovid, june is namit liye the iuniores, latin for `` yang people '' ( Fasti vi.88 ) or that the maah of may is named for the maiores, Latin liye `` bado ''.
In Iceland, loakgeet says ki if you bathe nagn in the morning dew on the morning of june 24, tum are supposed to rakhana vriddhavastha at khadi liye longer.
a samvidhan is a set of fundamental siddhanth or sthapit precedents according to jisase a rajya or anya organization is governed.
ye niyam saath mek up, i.e. constitute, what the antity is.
jab these siddhanth are written bas into a single document or niyat of vidhik dastauez, those dastauez may be said to embody a likhaa samvidhan ; if ve hai likhaa down in a single comprehensive dastauez, it is kaha to embody a samhitabaddh samvidhan.
constitutions chintaa different levels of sanghathan, from sovereign rajya to companiyaan and unincorporated association.
a treaty which establishes an antarrashtriya sanghathan is also its samvidhan, in ki it hota define how that sanghathan is gathit.
Within rajya, whether sovereign or federated, a constitution defines the principles upon jisase the state is aadhaarit, the kaarividhi in jisase kanoon are made or by jisko.
Some constitutions, visheshkar samhitabaddh constitutions, also act as limiters of state shakti, by establishing lines jisase a state 's shaskaon can not cross, aise as aadharbhoot adhikaron.
George washington at sanvaidhanik sammelan of 1787, signing of U.S. samvidhan.
the samvidhan of india is the longest likhaa samvidhan of koi sovereign country in the sansar, containing 448 aalekh, 12 schedules and 100 amendments, saath 117,369 shabd in its English language sanskaran, jabaki the sanyukt States Constitution is the shortest likhaa samvidhan, at 7 aalekh or 27 amendments.
Ron diftler ( baayein ), NASA robonaut manager assisting in a robonaut familiarization prashikshan satr in the spes paryaavaran Simulation prayogshaala at nasa 's Johnson spes bich.
Engineering prabandhan is a specialized form of prabandhan that is concerned with the anuprayog of engineering siddhanth to kaarobaar abhyaas.
abhiyantriki management is a career ki brings saath the technological problem-solving savvy of engineering or the organizational, prashasnic, or niyojan abilities of management in anukram to oversee jatil enterprises from conception to completion.
udhaaharan kshetron of abhiyantriki hai utpaada development, nirmaan, nirmaan, design engineering, industrial abhiyantriki, praudyogiki, utpaadan, or koi anya field ki employs personnel jo perform an engineering falan.
kaamyaab abhiyantriki prabandhak typically aavashyaktaa prashikshan or experience in kaarobaar and abhiyantriki.
Technically inept prabandhak tend to be vanchit of support by unke technical toli, or non-commercial prabandhak tend to lack commercial sooyeeboojh to uddhaar in a market arthvyavastha.
largely, abhiyantriki managers manage ejiniers jo are chalit by non-entrepreneurial soch, yun aavashyaktaa the jaruri logon kaushal to coach, mentor or motivate takneekee professionals.
abhiyantriki peshewar joining nirmaan companies sometimes become engineering prabandhak by difolt baad a kaal of time.
ve hai jaruri to sikh kaisaa to manage ekbar they hai on the job, haalanki is is praayah an aprabhavi rasta to develop managerial abilities.
in an bime niti, the deductible is the raashi of expenses ki jarur be paid out of jeb pehle an insurer hoga adaa koi kharch.
in saamaanya upyog, the pad deductible may be prayukt to describe ek of several prakaar of clauses ( see neeche ) that hai prayukt by bime companies as a dahalij liye policy bhugtan.
deductibles are typically prayukt to deter the vishaal kramank of trivial daawa ki a upabhokta can be reasonably apekshit to bhaaluu the laagat of.
by restricting iske kawarej to kaarykram ki hai significant paryaapt to incur vishaal costs, the bime firm expects to adaa out thodaa choti amounts much kam aksar, rusht much ucchtar savings.
As a parinaam, bime premiums hai typically cheaper jab they involve ucchtar deductibles.
Deductibles are saamanytah provided as clauses in an bime policy ki dictate kaisaa much of an insurance-covered vyay is borne by the policyholder.
ve hai saamanytah quoted as a phixd maatra and is a bhaag of sabase nitiyon covering losses to the policy holder.
the insurer tab becomes liable for claimable expenses ki exceed is raashi ( vishay to the adhiktam sum claimable indicated in the anubandh ).
Depending on the policy, the deductible may lagu prati covered incident, or prati saal.
For policies jahaan incidences hai nahin aasaan to delimit ( liye udhaaharan swasthya bime ), the deductible is typically lagu prati year.
anek deductibles can be set by the insurer aadhaarit on the kaaran of the arji.
liye example, a single awaas bime niti may contain anek deductible amounts for ghaataa or kshati arising from theft, aag, prakritik calamities, evacuation etc.
vahin hai also deductible reimbursement kaarykram ki reimburse a deductible in the event of an swachaalit, home, boat/yacht or swasthya bime claim.
An chaalaan or vidheyak is a vanijyik dastauez issued by a seller to a kharidaar, indicating the utpaada, quantities, and agreed keemten liye products or sevaayen the vikreta rai provided the kharidaar.
An chaalaan indicates the bikri lenden tabhi.
bhugtan terms hai swatantra of the chaalaan or hai negotiated by the kharidaar or the vikreta.
bhugtan sharten hai praayah shaamil on the chaalaan.
the buyer could have already sashulk liye the utpaada or sevaayen soochibaddh on the invoice.
kharidaar can bhi have a adhiktam kramank of dinon in jisase to adaa liye these goods or is sometimes offered a chhot if paid before the due tithi.
In the rental udyog, an invoice jarur shaamil a vishisht sandarbh to the duration of the time hone billed, so in addition to quantity, daam and chhot the invoicing amount is also aadhaarit on avadhi.
Generally each lakeer of a rental invoice hoga refer to the vaastavik ghanton, days, saptaah, months, etc., hone billed.
isse the point of drishy of a vikreta, an chaalaan is a sales chaalaan.
isse the point of drishy of a kharidaar, an chaalaan is a khariden chaalaan.
The dastauez indicates the kharidaar or seller, lakin the term invoice indicates money is owed or owing.
In angrezi, the context of the term chaalaan is praayah prayukt to clarify its arth, aise as `` we bheja them an chaalaan '' ( ve owe us dhan ) or `` we received an invoice isse unhen '' ( we owe unhen money ).
The sahi pramukh bronchus ( or sahi praathmik bronchus, or sahi principal bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory system.
it is wider, shorter, and adhik vertical in direction than the baayein.
it is about 2.5 cm long, and enters the right lung nearly opposite the paanchvaan thoracic vertebra.
the azygos vein arches over it isse peeche ; or the right pulmonary dhamni jhooth at pehla neeche or tab in front of it.
parichay 2 cm isse its commencement it detaa band a branch to the apper lobe of the sahi fefdon.
is is termed the eparterial shakha of the bronchus, kuki it arises above the right pulmonary dhamni.
the bronchus now gujarata neeche the dhamni, or is gyaat as the hyparterial branch ; it divides into do shakhaon liye the middle and nimnatar nirmoke.
if a foreign deh in the airway gujarata through the shwaasanlee, it hoga sabase sambhavit enter the sahi pramukh bronchus instead of the baayein, due to the straighter sanrekhan of the right bronchus to the trachea.
squash is a racquet khel nibhaai by do ( singles ) or chaar khilaadi ( yugal ) in a four-walled court saath a choti, khokhla rabar ball.
the khilaadi jarur vaikalpik in striking the ball with their racquet and hit the ball onto the playable satahon of the chaar walls of the adaalat.
the game thi formerly pukaara squash racquets, a sandarbh to the `` squashable '' soft ball prayukt in the game ( compared saath the fatter ball used in iske parent game racquets or rackets ).
Squash is pahachaanaa by the ioc and samarthak hai lobbying liye its incorporation in a bhavishya Olympic program.
in 2003, forbs rated squash as the kramank ek healthiest khel to play.
Residual aayal is aayal found in kam concentrations naturally or in exhausted aayal field.
Often mishrit saath jal, it can not be baraamad by conventional techniques.
however, it can be baraamad using carbon dioxide-enhanced aayal recovery ( co2 eor ) jisase involves injecting carbon dioxide into the khub reducing shyanta and badhanaa pravaah of the oil.
the takanic is nahin nai but rai not maharoom prayukt extensively on avshesh aayal zones, low-grade jamaa of petroleum such as the 38 square mile in the Permian Basin of Texas leased by elliott rujvelt jr.
the takanic is limited by uplabdhta of carbon dioxide.
It does not parinaam in sequestration of the carbon dioxide lakin the gas is recycled as much as possible.
United States reserves of avshesh aayal hai anumaanit to be 100 arab barrels.
Artist 's rendering of the aag, by jon R. Chapin, originally printed in harper 's Weekly ; the drishy chehron purvottar across the Randolph gali sethu.
The Great chicago aag thi a conflagration ki burned isse Sunday, October 8, to early Tuesday, aktubar 10, 1871, hatya sainkadon or destroying parichay in chicago, Illinois.
haalanki the aag thi ek of the largest u.S. aapadaaon of the 19th sadi, the punarnirmaan that began helped develop chicago as ek of the sabase populous or economically mahatvapurn amareeki shaharon.
henry viii ( 28 june 1491 – 28 janvari 1547 ) thi king of england isse 21 april 1509 jabatak uske maut.
he was rab, or baad king, of ireland, as khub as continuing the nammaatr claim by the English monarchs to the kingdom of frans.
henry was the duusari monarch of the Tudor rajvansh, succeeding uske pita, henry saat.
besides uske chah vivaah, henry viii is gyaat liye uske bhoomika in the separation of the Church of england isse the roman catholic girijaghar.
henry 's struggles saath rome led to the separation of the girijaghar of england from papal praadhikaar, the Dissolution of the Monasteries, or uske apana establishment as the param Head of the girijaghar of england.
yet he remained a aastik in core catholic theological teachings, bhi baad his excommunication from the Roman catholic girijaghar.
henry oversaw the legal sangh of england or Wales saath the kanoon in wales adhiniyamon 1535 or 1542.
in 1513, the nai king alide saath the paavan roman samraat, maximillian i, or invaded frans in 1513 with a vishaal, well-equipped fouj, lakin achieved choti at a considerable vittiya laagat.
Maximillian, liye his bhaag, prayukt the angrezi akraman to uske apana ends, and is prejudiced england 's ability to defeat the french.
This foray hota prove the prarambh of an obsession liye henry, who invaded again in 1544.
This samay, henry 's shaktiyaan captured the mahatvapurn nagar of boulogne, lakin again the paavan roman samraat, Charles v, supported henry tabhi as long as he needed to or England, strained by the vishaal cost of the yuddh, ransomed the nagar waapas liye salaam.
His contemporaries mana henry in uske pradhan to be an attractive, educated and accomplished king, or he rai maharoom varnit as `` one of the sabase charismatic shaskaon to baithna on the angrezi singhaasana ''.
Besides ruling saath nirpeksh shakti, he bhi sagaai khud as an author and composer.
His khwaahish to provide england with a male vaaris – which stemmed partly isse nijee vanity or partly kuki he believed a beti hota be asamarth to consolidate the tuder rajvansh or the fragile salaam that existed following the yudhon of the gulab – led to the do bate for jisase Henry is sabase remembered : uske six marriages and the angrezi reformation.
henry became rugn mote or uske swasthya suffered, contributing to his maut in 1547.
he is aksar characterised in his later jivan as a lustful, egotistical, harsh, and insecure king.
la reina del sur ( the Queen of the dakshin ) is a spanish-language telenovela utpaadit by the sanyukt States television sanjaal Telemundo, in conjunction saath the Antena 3 sanjaal or rti Producciones.
Based on a anokhaa of the same naam by spani lekhak arturo Pérez-Reverte, the naatak depicts the rise of terresa mendosa ( ket del castillo ), a yang stri isse mexico jo becomes the sabase powerful drug trafficker in dakshini spain.
patricio wills, the adhyaksh of telemundo television Studios, thi the executive nirmaataa.
haalanki la Reina del Sur thi manonith liye novela of the saal, Favorite sise abhinetri, or behtareen Bad lack video, it jiti no puraskaar.
With a $ 10 lakh bajet, la reina del Sur thi the sabase mahangi telenovela ever utpaadit by telemundo.
The program 's premier on February 28, 2011, thi the network 's ucchtam rated premier liye a telenovela to date.
The program aksar varchasv iske time slot, even over English bhashaa programing on anya pramukh U.S. sanjaal.
la reina del sur completed iske 63 episode run on telemundo and iske 13 apisod chalaaen on Antena 3 simultaneously on may 30, 2011.
the final apisod thi the highest rated broadcast in telemundo 's 19-year itihaas ( 4.2 lakh darshak ), or taal sab of the angrezi language u.S. television networks to earn the kramank one slot in the 18-49 vayask demographic.
the kaarykram 's success spurred Telemundo to launch iske first campaign to laabh the series an emi puraskaar nomination.
a one-night khaas featuring anek cast members aired on may 31, 2011, or marked the telemundo debut of noted latina television vyaktitv christina Saralegui.
la reina del sur is broadcast in anek anya bazaar, sahit srbija, colombia, chile, cyprus, nikaragua, costa Rica, mexico, albanian, hungarian, slovenian, kroeshia, romania, ( among anya ).
An example of rack arohit sarwar
a web hosting seva is a prakaar of antarjaal hosting seva ki allows individuals and organizations to make their jalsthal accessible via the sansar chaudee web.
web host hai companiyaan ki provide spes on a sarwar swaamitv or leased liye use by client, as khub as providing antarjaal connactivity, typically in a data bich.
web hosts can bhi provide data bich spes or connactivity to the Internet liye anya sarwar stith in their aankada center, pukaara colocation, bhi gyaat as awaas in latin america or France.
the scope of web hosting sevaayen varies greatly.
the most basic is web pej and small-scale sanchika hosting, where filein can be aplod via sanchika transafar Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interfes.
the filein hai usually vitarit to the web `` as is '' or saath minimal prasanskaran.
anek antarjaal seva pradaataaon ( ISPs ) offer is service free to sadsy.
individuals and organizations may bhi obtain Web pej hosting isse alternative service providers.
nijee web site hosting is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web sait hosting often rai a higher vyay depending upon the aakaar or prakaar of the jalsthal.
single pej hosting is generally sufficient liye nijee web prishthon.
A jatil sait kals liye a adhik vyapak package ki provides database support or anuprayog vikaas plateform ( e.g. piechapi, java, maaniky on rails, coldfusion, or asp.net ).
ye suvidhaayen allow customers to likhen or install script liye anuprayog like forums and saamagree prabandhan.
Also, surakshit sockets Layer ( esasail ) is typically prayukt liye e-commerce.
The mejabaan may bhi provide an interfes or control panel liye managing the web sarwar or installing script, as khub as other modules and service anuprayog jaise e-mail.
Some host specialize in certain tantra or services ( e.g. e-commerce ), jisase hai commonly used by larger companiyaan ki outsource sanjaal avasanrachana.

In vidhi, a set-off is a statutory raksha to the puure or to a portion of a abhiyokta 's arji.
it tha no existence antargat the angrezi aam vidhi, being nirmit by 2 jeeyo. ii c. 22 liye the relief of insolvent karjadaar, although set-off thi recognized in equity.
aise a defense could be pleaded tabhi in aadar of mutual debts of a definite akshar, or kiya nahin apply to maamle in which kshatipurti yahood claimed, nor to nishpaksh claims or maange.
By the rules of the param adaalat ( O. XIX. r. 3 ) a defendant in an karrwai may niyat off or niyat up koi right or arji by rasta of counterclaim against the daawa of a abhiyokta, and aise set-off or counterclaim rai the same effect as a bayaan of claim in a cross-action.
the vidhik raksha of set-off ( above ) thi originally introduced to prevent the anyaaypurna situation whereby a person ( `` Party a '' ) jo owed money to another ( `` Party B '' ) could be bheja to karjadaar thana, despite the fact ki Party b bhi owed dhan to party A.
the vidhi thus allows dono partiyon to defer bhugtan jabatak their respective claims have been heard in adaalat.
upon nirnay, dono claims hai buje or replaced by a single jaal yoga owing ( e.g. If party A owes party b 100 or party B owes Party a 105, the do rakam hai niyat band or replaced with a single daayitv of 5 from Party B to party a ).
Set-off can bhi be incorporated by contractual anubandh so ki, jahaan a party defaults, the mutual amounts owing hai automatically niyat band or extinguished.
in nishchit jurisdictions ( including the UK ), set-off takes place automatically upon the insolvency of a company.
This arthath ki, liye prayek party which is dono a creditor or debtor of the insolvent company, paraspar debts hai set-off viruddh prayek anya, and tab either the bankrupt 's creditor can arji the santulan in the diwaliyapan or the trustee in diwaliyapan can pucho for the balance baaki to be sashulk, depending on jisase paksh owed the sabase.
is has maharoom criticized as an undeclared security byaaj that violates the principle of pari passu.
The alternative, jahaan a creditor rai to adaa sab iske debts, but praapt tabhi a simit portion of the leftover moneys ki other unsecured lendaaron milengi, poses the danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies.
the sahi to niyat band is visheshkar important when reporting a bainko 's vikiranon to regulatory authorities.
the situation jahaan a bainko rai to rapat ki it rai lent a vishaal yoga to a borrower ( and is therefore exposed, kuki there is a risk ki the borrower might difolt thereby agrani to the loss of the bainko 's or iske depositors ' dhan ) is yun replaced ( jahaan the bank rai taken suraksha over shares or pratibhuti of the borrower ) saath an expozar of the dhan lent rin the value of the suraksha liya.

conventional pisiai ( pisiai is an initialism formed isse Peripheral ghatak Interconnect, bhaag of the pisiai local bas maanak and often shortened to just pisiai ) is a local computer bus liye attaching hardware divaais in a computer.
the pisiai bus supports the functions found on a procesar bas, but in a standardized swaroop ki is swatantra of any particular procesar.
Devices connected to the bus appear to the procesar to be connected sidhe to the procesar bas, and hai abantit pataa in the procesar 's pataa space.
sanlagn divaais can take either the form of an integrated circuit fitted onto the motherboard itself, pukaara a planar device in the pisiai specification, or an vistaar card ki fits into a slot.
The pisiai local Bus was pehla implemented in ibm pc compatibles, where it visthapit the sangyojan of isa plus ek vesa local bas as the bus vinyas.
it rai subsequently maharoom adopted liye other computer types.
pisiai and pci-x hai being replaced by PCI Express, but, sabase motherboards hai still bana saath ek or adhik pisiai slot, jisase are sufficient liye many upyog.
the PCI specification covers the shaareerik aakaar of the bas ( sahit the size or antaran of the circuit falak kinare vidyut contacts ), electrical visheshtaayen, bas samay, and protocol.
The specification can be kharida isse the pisiai Special byaaj Group ( pci-sig ).
theth pisiai taash prayukt in pcs shaamil : sanjaal taash, dhwani taash, modems, atirikt port aise as USB or serial, tv tuner taash and discs parirakshak.
pisiai video taash replaced isa and vesa taash, until growing bandwidth aavashyaktaayen outgrew the samarthy of pisiai ; the pasandida interfes for video taash became AGP, or tab PCI Express.
pisiai video cards remain uplabdhiyaan for upyog saath old PCs bagaiyr agap or pisiai express slots.
anek divaais previously provided on pisiai expansion cards hai abhi commonly ekikrut onto motherboards or uplabdhiyaan in saarvbhaumik serial bus or pisiai express sanskaran.
caffeine is a kadava, shwet crystalline xanthine alcoload ki acts as a uttejk drug.
caffeine is mila in varying quantities in the beej, pattey, or fal of kuch paudhe, jahaan it adhiniyamon as a prakritik kitnashak ki paralyzes or martha nishchit keet feeding on the paudhe, as khub as badhanaa the reward memory of pollinators.
it is sabase commonly khapat by insaano in infusions nikaali isse the beej of the coffee sanyantr and the pattey of the tea bush, as khub as from various bhojan or peya containing products niklaa isse the cola nut.
anya sources include yerba maté, guarana berries, guayusa, and the yaupon holi.
in insaano, caffeine adhiniyamon as a central baichaiyn pranali stimulant, temporarily warding band drowsiness or restoring alertness.
it is the sansar 's sabase widely khapat psychoactive drug, lakin naapsand many anya psychoactive substances, it is legal or unregulated in nearly all bhaag of the sansar.
Beverages containing caffeine, aise as coffee, chaay, soft drinks, and urja drinks, anand great lokapriyata.
in uttar america, 90 % of vayaskon consume caffeine rose.
Part of the reason caffeine is vargeekrut by the Food or drug Administration as GRAS ( generally pahachaanaa as surakshit ) is ki vishakt doses ( over 10 gamma ) hai much higher than typically used doses ( kam than 500 milligrams ).
ordinary consumption can have low health risks, bhi jab carried on liye years – there may be a modest protective prabhaav against kuch rogon, sahit parkinsons beemaari, or nishchit prakaar of karkat.
caffeine can have dono dhanatmak or rinatmak prabhaav on chintaa disorders.
Some logon anubhav neend disruption if ve consume caffeine, visheshkar during the evening ghanton, lakin anya show choti disturbance and the prabhaav of caffeine on sleep is atyadhik variable.
Evidence of a risk to garbhavastha is equivocal, but kuch adhikariyon have concluded ki doordarshee salaah is for pregnant mahilaon to limit khapat to the equivalent of two cups of coffee prati day or kam.
the amareeki Congress of obstetricians or streerog ( acog ) concluded in 2010 ki caffeine khapat is surakshit up to 200 mg per din in pregnant mahilaon.
caffeine rai pressor or mild diuretic prabhaav when administered to logon jo are nahin prayukt to it, lakin niyamit upayokta develop a sahishnutaa to is prabhaav, or adhyayan have generally failed to support the common khyaal ki ordinary consumption contributes significantly to nirjaleekaran.
saath baari upyog, sahishnutaa develops rapidly to autonomic prabhaav such as elevated dil rate and mansapeshi twitching, lakin not to the cognitive or arousal prabhaav of caffeine.
The oopaadhi to jisase caffeine can upaj clinically significant shaareerik or dimagi dependence remains a subject of vivaad in the medical sahitya.

an automobile, autocar, motor car or car is a wheeled motor vehicle prayukt liye transporting yatri, jisase bhi carries iske apana engine or motor.
sabase paribhaashaayen of the pad bataaen ki automobiles are designed to run primarily on roads, to have seating liye one to aath logon, to typically have chaar pahiyon, and to be constructed pradhanthya for the hastantaran of people rather than goods.
the pad motorcar rai also maharoom prayukt in the context of electrified rail pranaaliyon to denote a car jisase functions as a choti locomotive lakin bhi provides spes for yatri or baggage.
ye locomotive gaadiyaan yahood praayah prayukt on suburban routes by dono interurban or intercity railroad systems.
it was anumaanit in 2010 ki the kramank of automobiles had risen to over 1 arab vehicles, up from the 500 lakh of 1986.

John Fitzgerald `` joker '' kennedy ( may 29, 1917 – navambar 22, 1963 ), praayah referred to by uske adyakshar jfk, was the 35th adhyaksh of the sanyukt States, serving isse 1961 until uske maut in 1963.
baad sainya seva as commander of the Motor torpedo Boats PT-109 or pt-59 dauraan World yuddh ii in the dakshin prashanth, Kennedy represented masachusets ' 11th congressional zila in the U.S. house of Representatives isse 1947 to 1953 as a democrate.
Thereafter, he parosa in the u.S. seenet from 1953 until 1960.
Kennedy defeated vaais President and republican candidate richard Nixon in the 1960 u.S. adhyakshiya chunaav.
at 43 saalo of aayu, he is the youngest to have been nirvaachit to the office, the second-youngest adhyaksh ( baad Theodore rujvelt ), and the first vyakti born in the 20th sadi to serve as president.
a catholic, Kennedy is the tabhi non- Protestant adhyaksh, or is the only adhyaksh to have won a pulitzer puraskaar.
Events dauraan uske presidency shaamil the khadi of Pigs akraman, the cuban Missile Crisis, the bhawan of the berlin wal, the spes res, the african-american civil adhikaron gati, and jaldi stages of the vietnam yuddh.
therein, Kennedy increased the kramank of sainya advisers, special aaparishan shaktiyaan, or helicopters in an praytn to kor the spread of samyavaadee in dakshin East asia.
The Kennedy prashasan adopted the policy of the Strategic Hamlet kaarykram jisase thi implemented by the dakshin vietnami sarkari.
it shaamil nishchit majaboor relocation, village internment, or pruthakkaran of gramin South vietnami isse the uttari or dakshini communist insurgents.
kennedy was assassinated on November 22, 1963 in dalas, texas.
lee ghanghor oswald was charge saath the aparaadhon, but he thi shot and killed by joker maaniky do days baad, pehle a trial could lo place.
the FBI or the Warren ayog officially concluded that oswald was the lone hatyare.
however, the United rajya house chune cameti on assassinations ( hsca ) concluded ki those investigations were flawed and ki kennedy thi sambhawatah assassinated as the result of a conspiracy.
However, abisi News in unke investigation, the kennedy hatya : pare Conspiracy, confirmed the nishkarshon of the warren Commission ; having concluded oswald acted alon.
kennedy 's vivaadaaspad vibhaag of raksha tfx senaanee bomber program led to a congressional chaanbin ki lasted isse 1963 to 1970.
chunki the 1960s soochna concerning kennedy 's nijee jivan rai aaiye to lite.
vivaran of kennedy 's swasthya problems in jisase he struggled have become behatar gyaat, visheshkar since the 1990s.
haalanki initially rakhaa rahasy isse the general public, reports of kennedy 's philandering have garnered much dabaayen.
kennedy ranks atyadhik in public raay darja of u.S. raashtrapatiyon.

a Fire sachetak Control Panel ( facp ), or aag Alarm control ikai ( facu ), is the controlling ghatak of a Fire sachetak pranali.
The falak receives soochna from paryaavarniya sensor designed to detect parivartan associated with aag, monitors their operational akhandta or provides liye swachaalit control of upkaran, and hastantaran of soochna jaruri to taiyaari the suvidha liye aag based on a predetermined anukram.
the falak may also supplai electrical urja to operate any associated sensor, control, transmeter, or riley.
vahin hai four moulik prakaar of panels : coded panels, conventional panels, addressable panels, and multiplex pranaaliyon.
